A partly submerged  हिमानी गुफा on perito मोरेनो  Glacier .
The ice facade is  लगभग 60 m ऊँची
Ice formations in  the titlis हिमानी गुफा
A glacier cave is a cave formed  भीतर the बर्फ of a हिमानी  .
Glacier caves are often  पुकारा बर्फ गुफाएं , लकिन इस पद is properly प्रयुक्त to describe  bedrock caves that contain year-round ice .
In physics , circular motion is a movement of an object along the circumference of a  वृत्त or रोटेशन साथ a गोलाकार  path .
It can be uniform , with constant angular rate of  रोटेशन ( और निरंतर गति ) , or non-uniform साथ a बदलना रेट  of rotation .
The rotation around a fixed axis of a three-dimensional  देह involves गोलाकार गति of इसके भाग  .
The equations of motion  describe the गति of the  center of mass of a body .
Examples of circular motion  शामिल : an कृत्रिम उपग्रह orbiting the धरती at निरंतर ऊँचाई , a स्टोन जिससे is tied to a रस्सी और is होने swung in वृत्त , a car turning through a वक्र in a रेस track , an इलेक्ट्रॉन  moving perpendicular to a uniform magnetic field , and a gear turning inside a mechanism .
Since the object 's velocity  वेक्टर is constantly बदलना दिशा , the चलती ऑब्जेक्ट is undergoing  acceleration by a centripetal force in the direction of the center of rotation .
Without this acceleration , the  ऑब्जेक्ट होता मूव in a सीधा लकीर , according to न्यूटन 's कानून  of motion .
Apollo Creed is a  fictional अक्षर इससे the रॉकी films , initially portrayed  as the Undisputed Heavyweight Champion of the World .
he थी निभाई by  Carl Weathers .
Creed had multiple nicknames ,  सहित the निपुण of विपत्ति , the किंग of स्टिंग , the नाचना विनाशक  , The Prince of Punch , The One and Only and The Count of Monte Fisto .
Urban legend states that Apollo Creed  's नाम is a wordplay on the रसूलों ' पंथ , a बयान of विश्वास प्रयुक्त in ईसाई चर्च  .
All of Apollo 's  चैंपियनशिप झगड़े यहूद अनुसूचित  for the 15 round distance .
चैंपियनशिप झगड़े किया नहीं बदलें  from 15 rounds to 12 rounds until 1987 .
Rocky Balboa is often wrongly credited with popularizing the red , white , and blue trunks ; Creed was  the पहला man to पहनें उन्हें ( latterly worn by रॉकी बाल्बोआ in the 3rd और 4th किश्तों और आखिरकार by टॉमी `` the यंत्र '' gunn ( टॉमी मॉरिसन ) in the 5th किश्त )  although normally he wore red and white , as seen in Rocky II .
Balboa 's  हस्ताक्षर रंगों यहूद ब्लैक और gold—colors  he used in the latest movie .
In the United States , the  शीर्षक of संघीय न्यायधीश प्रायः अर्थात् a न्यायधीश नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य और पुष्टि by the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट pursuant to the  Appointments Clause in Article II of the United States Constitution .
In addition to the Supreme Court of the United States , whose existence and some aspects of whose jurisdiction are beyond the  संवैधानिक शक्ति of कॉंग्रेस to alter , अधिनियमों of कॉंग्रेस have स्थापित 13 न्यायालयों of appeals ( भी पुकारा `` सर्किट न्यायालयों '' ) साथ appellate क्षेत्राधिकार over अलग regions of the संयुक्त राज्य , और 94 संयुक्त राज्य  district courts .
Every judge  नियुक्त to ऐसे a अदालत may be categorized as a संघीय न्यायधीश ; ऐसे स्थितियाँ शामिल the मुख्य इंसाफ और संबद्ध justices of the परम् अदालत , सर्किट न्यायाधीशों  of the courts of appeals , and district judges of the United States district courts .
All of  ये न्यायाधीशों वर्णित यूँ दूर हैं referred to sometimes as `` आलेख iii न्यायाधीशों '' क्युकी वे कसरत the न्यायिक शक्ति vested in the न्यायिक  branch of the federal government by Article III of the U.S. Constitution .
In addition , judges of the Court of  अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार कसरत न्यायिक शक्ति pursuant to आलेख  III .
Other judges  सेवारत in the संघीय न्यायालयों , सहित मजिस्ट्रेट न्यायाधीशों और दिवालियापन न्यायाधीशों , हैं भी sometimes referred to as `` संघीय न्यायाधीशों  '' ; however , they are neither appointed by the President nor confirmed by the Senate , and their power derives from Article I instead .
See  आलेख i और आलेख iii अधिकरणों  .
The Beretta 21A  बॉबकैट is a छोटी pocket-sized semi-automatic पिस्टल  designed by Beretta in Italy .
Production began in late 1984 ,  solely in the beretta u.s.A. सुविधा in accokeek , मेरीलैंड  .
It is a further development of the Beretta Model 20  , जिनकी उत्पादन ended in 1985  .
Variable Universal Life Insurance ( often  shortened to vul ) is a प्रकार of जीवन बीमे कि  builds a cash value .
In a VUL , the cash value can be  invested in a चौड़ी किस्में of पृथक खाते , समान to परस्पर निधि , और the चुनाव of जिससे  of the available separate accounts to use is entirely up to the contract owner .
The 'variable ' component in the name refers to  इस क्षमता to invest in पृथक खाते जिनकी मान vary—they vary क्युकी वे हैं invested in भण्डार  and/or bond markets .
the 'universal ' घटक in the नाम refers to the लचीलापन  the owner has in making premium payments .
The  प्रीमियम can vary इससे nothing in a दिए माह up to maximums पारिभाषित  by the Internal Revenue Code for life insurance .
This flexibility is in contrast to whole life insurance that has fixed premium payments that  typically can नहीं be छूटी बगैर lapsing the नीति ( हालांकि एक may कसरत an स्वचालित प्रीमियम ऋण विशेषता , or आत्मसमर्पण dividends to अदा  a Whole Life premium ) .
Variable universal life is a type of permanent life  बीमे , क्युकी the मौत लाभ होगा be सशुल्क if the insured मरता कोई समय as long as वहीँ is sufficient नकदी मान to अदा the लागत of बीमे  in the policy .
साथ सबसे if नहीं सब vuls , नापसंद पूरे जीवन , वहीँ is no endowment आयु ( the आयु at जिससे  the cash value equals the death benefit amount , which for whole life is typically 100 ) .
This is yet another  कुंजी लाभ of vul over  Whole Life .
With a typical whole life  नीति , the मौत लाभ is सीमित to the फेस राशि निर्दिष्ट in the नीति  , and at endowment age , the face amount is all that is paid out .
Thus  साथ either मौत or endowment , the बीमे कम्पनी keeps कोई नकदी मान निर्मित  up over the years .
However ,  कुछ participating पूरे जीवन नीतियों प्रस्ताव राइडर्स जिससे बताएँ कि कोई dividends सशुल्क on the नीति  be used to purchase `` paid up additions '' to the policy which increase both the cash value and the death benefit over time .
If investments made  in the पृथक खाते out-perform the सामान्य खाता of the बीमे कम्पनी , a उच्चतर rate-of-return can  occur than the fixed rates-of-return typical for whole life .
The combination over the years of no endowment age , continually increasing death benefit , and if a high rate-of-return  is अर्जित in the पृथक खाते of a vul नीति , इस could परिणाम in उच्चतर मान to the मालिक or लाभार्थी than कि of a पूरे जीवन नीति साथ the वही amounts of धन सशुल्क in as  premiums .
The outdoor wood boiler is a variant of the classic wood stove  adapted लिये set-up बाहरी जबकि स्टिल transferring the ऊष्मा to आंतरिक इमारतें  .
A mound  of लड़की स्काउट  cookies .
This  mound contains 74 बाक्स  of cookies
Girl Scout Cookies are cookies sold by  लड़की स्काउट of the यूएसए ( gsusa ) as एक of इसके प्रमुख fundraisers  for local Scout units .
Members of the GSUSA have  महरूम selling कुकीज़ चूंकि 1917  to raise funds .
Girls who  participate can earn  prizes for their efforts .
There are also unit  प्रोत्साहन if the ईकाई as a पूरे  does well .
as of 2007 , बिक्री यहूद अनुमानित  at about 200 million boxes per year .
विश्वविद्यालयों  Hall
Purdue University , located in West Lafayette ,  इंडियाना , is the फ्लैगशिप विश्वविद्यालयों of the six-campus  Purdue University system .
Purdue was founded on May 6 , 1869 , as a land-grant  विश्वविद्यालयों जब the इंडियाना सामान्य सभा , लेने लाभ of the morrill अधिनियम , स्वीकृत a दान of जमीन और धन इससे lafayette  businessman John Purdue to establish a college of science , technology , and agriculture in his name .
The first classes  यहूद आयोजित on सितंबर 16 , 1874 , साथ छह instructors  and 39 students .
आज , purdue is a सदस्य of the बिग टेन सम्मेलन ,  and is a well known world-class research institution .
Purdue enrolls the second largest student body of any university in Indiana as well as the  चौथी largest अंतरराष्ट्रीय छात्र जनसांख्यिकी of कोई विश्वविद्यालयों in the संयुक्त  States .
Purdue offers both  undergraduate और ग्रैजुएट कार्यक्रम in over 211 प्रमुख क्षेत्रों of  study , and is well known for its competitive engineering curricula .
The university has also been highly influential in America 's history of  विमानन , having स्थापित the पहला कॉलेज क्रेडिट offered in उड़ान प्रशिक्षण , the पहला four-year स्नातक 's उपाधि in विमानन , और the  first university airport ( Purdue University Airport ) .
purdue 's विमानन प्रौद्योगिकी कार्यक्रम remains एक of the सबसे प्रतिस्पर्धी aviation-specific  programs in the world .
In the mid-20th century , Purdue 's aviation program expanded to  encompass उन्नत spaceflight प्रौद्योगिकी giving वृद्धि to purdue 's उपनाम , पालना of astronauts  .
Twenty-three Purdue graduates have gone on to become astronauts  , सहित गस grissom ( एक of the असली पारा सात astronauts ) , neil आर्मस्ट्रांग ( the पहला व्यक्ति to चलना on the चंद्रमा ) , और यूजीन cernan (  the most recent person to walk on the moon ) .
a वसामय गाँठ ( ) is a पद कि loosely refers to either epidermoid cysts  ( also known as epidermal cysts ; L72.0 ) or pilar cysts ( also known as trichilemmal cysts ; L72.1 ) .
Because an epidermoid cyst  originates in the epidermis और a पिलर गाँठ originates इससे बाल follicles , by परिभाषा  , neither type of cyst is strictly a sebaceous cyst .
The name is regarded as a misnomer as the  वसीय , श्वेत , semi-solid सामग्री in दोनो of ये गाँठ entities is नहीं sebum ,  but keratin .
Furthermore , under the microscope  neither एंटिटी contains वसामय  glands .
In practice , however , the terms  हैं प्रायः प्रयुक्त interchangeably .
`` True '' sebaceous cysts are relatively rare and are known  as steatocystomas or , if अनेक , as steatocystoma मल्टीप्लेक्स  .
Modern  pointe जूते .
The edge of the toe pad , which is inserted between the foot  और टो बक्सा लिये cushioning , can be देखी on the सही  foot .
A pointe shoe is a type of shoe worn by ballet  नर्तक जब performing pointe  work .
Pointe shoes developed from the desire for dancers to appear weightless and sylph -like and have evolved to  enable नर्तक to नृत्य en pointe ( on the नुस्ख़े of उनके toes ) लिये विस्तारित अवधि of समय .
They are normally worn by female dancers , though male dancers may wear them for unorthodox roles such as the ugly stepsisters in Cinderella , Bottom in A  midsummer रात्रि 's सपना , or मेन performing as महिलाओं in नृत्य कंपनियाँ ऐसे as लेस नाटिकाओं trockadero और  Grandiva .
They are manufactured in a  किस्में of रंगों , सबसे commonly in शेड्स  of light pink .
This tablespoon  रै a क्षमता of परिचय 15 ml  .
measuring spoons
In the US and parts of Canada , a  tablespoon is the largest प्रकार of चमचा प्रयुक्त लिये खाने इससे  a bowl .
In the  uk , यूरोपीय और सबसे राष्ट्रमंडल देशों , a tablespoon is a प्रकार  of large spoon usually used for serving .
In countries where a  tablespoon is a सेवारत चमचा , the निकटतम समतुल्य to the us tablespoon is either the मिठाई  spoon or the soup spoon .
A  tablespoonful , nominally the क्षमता of  one tablespoon , is commonly used as a measure of volume in cooking .
It is  abbreviated as t , tb , tbs , tbsp ,  tblsp , or tblspn .
The capacity of ordinary  tablespoons is नहीं regulated by विधि और is विषय to considerable  variation .
In the USA  एक tablespoon ( मापन ईकाई ) is लगभग 15 ml ; the क्षमता of an वास्तविक tablespoon (  dining utensil ) ranges from 7 mL to 14 mL .
In Australia  एक tablespoon ( मापन  unit ) is 20 mL .
Harry Potter is a series of  सात काल्पनिक novels लिखा by the अंग्रेजों  author J. K. Rowling .
The books chronicle the adventures of a wizard , Harry Potter , and his friends Ronald  वीज़्ली और हर्माइनी ग्रेंजर , सब of जिसको हैं विद्यार्थी at हॉग्वार्ट्स स्कूल of चुड़ैल और wizardry  .
The main story arc concerns Harry 's  क्वेस्ट to overcome the अंधेरा जादूगर रब voldemort , जिनकी aims हैं to become अमर , जीतें the wizarding संसार , subjugate non-magical लोगों , और नष्ट सब those  who stand in his way , especially Harry Potter .
Since  the रिलीज of the पहला अनोखा हैरी कुम्हार और the पारस 's स्टोन on 30 जून 1997 , the किताबे  have gained immense popularity , critical acclaim and commercial success worldwide .
The series has  भी था कुछ share of आलोचना , सहित चिंता लिये  the increasingly dark tone .
, the book  श्रेणी रै बेची परिचय 450 लाख नक़ल , बनाना it the best-selling किताब श्रेणी in  history , and has been translated into 67 languages .
the पिछला चार किताबे consecutively नियत रिकॉर्ड as the fastest-selling  books in history .
A series of many genres ,  सहित काल्पनिक और coming of आयु ( साथ तत्व of रहस्य , थ्रिलर , एडवेंचर , और रोमांस ) , it रै अनेक सांस्कृतिक meanings और  references .
according to रोलिंग ,  the main theme is death .
There are also many  अन्य विषयवस्तु in the श्रेणी , ऐसे as पूर्वाग्रह और  corruption .
The  आरंभिक प्रमुख प्रकाशक of the किताबे यहूद bloomsbury in the संयुक्त किंगडम और scholastic  Press in the United States .
The books have since been  प्रकाशित by अनेक प्रकाशक  worldwide .
the किताबे , साथ the सातवाँ किताब विभाजित into दो भाग , have महरूम बना into an eight-part फिल्मी  series by Warner Bros. Pictures , the highest-grossing film series of all time .
The series also originated much tie-in merchandise ,  बनाना the हैरी कुम्हार ब्रांड लायक in excess of $ 15 अरब  .
Also due to the success of the books and films , Harry Potter has been used for  a थीम पार्क , the wizarding संसार of हैरी कुम्हार in सार्वभौमिक पार्क & रिसॉर्ट 's आइलैंड्स of एडवेंचर  .
RS-68  होने tested at नासा 's stennis स्पेस  Center .
The  nearly पारदर्शी exhaust is due to इस इंजन 's exhaust होने ज़्यादातर अतितप्त भाप  ( water vapor from its propellants , hydrogen and oxygen )
Viking  5c प्रक्षेपास्त्र इंजन
A  प्रक्षेपास्त्र इंजन , or बस `` प्रक्षेपास्त्र '' , is a जेट इंजन कि उपयोग तभी  stored propellant mass for forming its high speed propulsive jet .
Rocket engines  हैं प्रतिक्रिया इंजन और obtain thrust in accordance  with Newton 's third law .
Since they need no external material to form their jet , rocket  इंजन can be प्रयुक्त लिये spacecraft नोदन  as well as terrestrial uses , such as missiles .
Most rocket  इंजन हैं आतंरिक दहन इंजन , हालांकि non-combusting  forms also exist .
Rocket engines as a group have the highest exhaust velocities , are  by दूर the lightest , लकिन हैं the तनिक propellant कुशल of सब प्रकार of जेट  engines .
`` ... baby एक अधिक समय '' is a सोंग by  American recording artist Britney Spears .
It served as Spears 's debut single and title  track इससे उसके डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम , ... baby एक अधिक  Time ( 1999 ) .
Written by Max Martin and produced by Martin and  रामी , `` ... baby एक अधिक समय '' थी released on सितंबर 30 , 1998 , by  Jive Records .
After  रिकॉर्डिंग और sending a डेमो टेप साथ an अप्रयुक्त सोंग इससे toni  Braxton , Spears signed a multi-album deal with Jive .
`` ... Baby One More Time '' is a teen pop and dance-pop song  कि refers to a लड़की जो संताप तोड़कर up साथ उसके बॉयफ्रेंड  .
The song received generally favorable  समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों , जो praised इसके संयोजन  .
`` ... Baby One More Time '' attained global success ,  reaching क्रमांक एक in प्रत्येक देश it charted  .
It also  प्राप्त numerous certifications around the संसार , और is एक of the best-selling singles  of all time , with over 10 million copies sold .
an accompanying म्यूज़िक वीडियो , निर्देशित by निगेल लंड , portrays स्पीयर्स as a छात्र इससे a कैथोलिक  high school , who starts to daydream that she is singing and dancing around the school , while watching her love interest from afar .
The music video was later referenced in the music video of `` If U Seek Amy `` ( 2008 ) ,  जहाँ स्पीयर्स 's fictional बेटी is वेश साथ a समान schoolgirl पहनावा जबकि wearing गुलाबी ribbons in उसके  hair .
In 2010 , the  म्यूज़िक वीडियो लिये `` ... baby एक अधिक समय '' थी voted the तीसरा सबसे influential वीडियो  in the history of pop music , in a poll held by Jam ! .
Spears has performed `` ... Baby One  अधिक समय '' in a क्रमांक of सजीव दिखावे और in सब of उसके कॉन्सर्ट टुर  .
It was the encore of the ... Baby One More Time Tour ( 1999  ) और सपना भीतर a सपना दौरे ( 2001 ) ; स्पीयर्स भी performed remixed संस्करण of the सोंग दौरान  the Oops ! ...
I Did It Again World Tour ( 2000 ) , The Onyx Hotel Tour (  2004 ) , the m+m 's दौरे ( 2007 ) , the सर्कस अभिनीत britney स्पीयर्स ( 2009 ) , और the femme fatale  Tour ( 2011 ) .
`` ... Baby One More Time '' was nominated for a Grammy Award  लिये बेहतरीन मादा पॉप गायन प्रदर्शन , और रै महरूम शामिल  in lists by Blender , Rolling Stone and VH1 .
It has been noted for  redefining the ध्वनि of लेट 1990s म्यूज़िक .
Spears has named `` ... Baby One  अधिक समय '' as एक of उसके पसंदीदा गीतों इससे  her career .
it थी भी the फाइनल सोंग to be निभाई on the बीबीसी  's music programme Top of the Pops .
Cholera is an infection in  the छोटी आंत caused by the bacterium vibrio  cholerae .
The main symptoms  हैं watery अतिसार और उल्टी  .
Transmission occurs primarily by drinking water  or खाने खाना कि रै महरूम contaminated by the मल ( बर्बाद उत्पाद ) of an संक्रमित  person , including one with no apparent symptoms .
The severity of the diarrhea and vomiting can lead to rapid dehydration and  electrolyte असंतुलन , और मौत in कुछ मामले  .
The primary  उपचार is मौखिक पुनर्जलीकरण चिकित्सा , typically साथ मौखिक पुनर्जलीकरण समाधान  , to replace water and electrolytes .
If this is not tolerated or  करता नहीं provide सुधार तेज़ पर्याप्त , intravenous fluids can  also be used .
Antibacterial drugs are  फायदेमंद in those साथ कठोर बीमारी to shorten  its duration and severity .
Worldwide , it affects 3–5 million  लोगों और कल्याणकारी 100,000–130,000 मौतों  a year .
Cholera  थी एक of the earliest infections to be  studied by epidemiological methods .
The Picture of Dorian Gray is the only  प्रकाशित अनोखा by ऑस्कर वाइल्ड , appearing as the सीसे स्टोरी in lippincott 's मासिक पत्रिका on 20 जून 1890 , मुद्रित as the  July 1890 issue of this magazine .
The  पत्रिका 's सम्पादक feared the स्टोरी थी अभद्र as सुपुर्द , so वे censored roughly  500 words , without Wilde 's knowledge , before publication .
But even with that , the story was still greeted with outrage by  अंग्रेजों reviewers , कुछ of जिसको सुझाया कि वाइल्ड चाहिए be prosecuted on moral grounds , अग्रणी वाइल्ड to बचाव the अनोखा aggressively in अक्षर to the अंग्रेजों  press .
Wilde later revised the story for book publication , making  substantial alterations , हटाना विवादास्पद passages , adding नई अध्याय और सहित an aphoristic preface जिससे  has since become famous in its own right .
The amended version  थी प्रकाशित by वार्ड , ताला और कम्पनी  in April 1891 .
Some scholars believe that Wilde would today have wanted us to read the  संस्करण he originally सुपुर्द to lippincott  's .
the अनोखा tells of a यंग man नामित डोरियन धूसर , the  subject of a painting by artist Basil Hallward .
Basil is impressed by Dorian 's beauty and becomes  infatuated साथ उसे , believing उसके सौंदर्य is जिम्मेदार लिये a नई विधि  in his art .
डोरियन meets रब हेनरी wotton , a dost of बेसिल 's , और becomes enthralled  by Lord Henry 's world view .
Espousing a new hedonism , Lord Henry suggests the only  बाते लायक pursuing in जीवन हैं सौंदर्य और fulfilment  of the senses .
Realizing that one  दिन उसके सौंदर्य होगा फीका , डोरियन ( whimsically ) expresses a ख्वाहिश to बेचें उसके आत्मा to ensure the  portrait Basil has painted would age rather than he .
Dorian 's wish is fulfilled , and when he subsequently pursues a life of debauchery , the portrait serves as a reminder of  the प्रभाव प्रत्येक अधिनियम रै upon उसके आत्मा , साथ प्रत्येक सिन प्रदर्शित as a disfigurement  of his form , or through a sign of aging .
The Picture of Dorian Gray is considered a work of  क्लासिक गोथिक fiction साथ a दमदार faustian थीम .
Sári Gábor ( born 6 February 1917 ) , known as Zsa Zsa  गैबर ( ) , is a हंगेरियाई -born अमरीकी अभिनेत्री जो acted in supporting भूमिकाएँ in फिल्मों  , on Broadway , and occasionally on television .
गैबर थी भी  a socialite .
She began her stage career  in वियना at आयु 15 , और थी पहनाया मिस हंगेरियाई  in 1936 .
She emigrated to the United States in 1941 and became a sought-after actress  साथ `` यूरोपीय फ्लेयर और स्टाइल '' , साथ a व्यक्तित्व कि `` exuded आकर्षण  and grace '' .
Her first movie role was as supporting  अभिनेत्री in प्यारे to  Look At .
वो बाद acted in we  're Not Married !
and played one of her few  अग्रणी भूमिकाएँ in moulin रूज ( 1952 ) , निर्देशित  by John Huston , who described her as a `` creditable '' actress .
Besides her film and  टेलीविज़न दिखावे , वो is बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये having नौ पतियों , सहित होटल महारथी कोनराड हिल्टन  and actor George Sanders .
She once stated , ``  मेन have सदा liked me और i have सदा liked मेन  .
But I like a mannish man , a man  जो knows कैसा to बात to और दावत a स्त्री – नहीं बस a man साथ मांसपेशियां  . ''
Bruce Lee (  परंपरागत : 李小龍 ; born ली jun-fan ; 27 नवम्बर 1940 – 20 जुलाई 1973 ) थी a चाइनीज अमरीकी martial कलाकार , कर्ता  , martial arts instructor , philosopher , and filmmaker .
The founder of Jeet Kune  do , ली थी the बेटे of cantonese ओपेरा  star Lee Hoi-Chuen .
He is widely  माना by टीकाकारों , आलोचकों , मीडिया और अन्य martial कलाकारों to be एक of the सबसे  influential martial artists of all time , and a pop culture icon of the 20th century .
He is often credited with helping to  बदलें the रास्ता एशियाइ यहूद प्रस्तुत in अमरीकी  films .
Lee was born in Chinatown , San Francisco on 27 November 1940 to parents from  हांग काँग और थी उठाया in कोलून साथ उसके परिवार जबतक  his late teens .
He was introduced to  the फिल्मी उद्योग by उसके पिता और appeared in अनेक films  as a child actor .
Lee moved to the United States at  the आयु of 18 to प्राप्त उसके उच्चतर शिक्षा , और it थी दौरान इस समय  that he began teaching martial arts .
His Hong Kong and Hollywood -produced films elevated the  परंपरागत हांग काँग martial कला फिल्मी to a नई स्तर of लोकप्रियता और acclaim , sparking a surge of ब्याज in चाइनीज martial  arts in the West in the 1970s .
The direction and tone of his films changed and influenced  martial कला और martial कला films in हांग काँग और the  rest of the world .
He is noted for his roles in five feature-length films : Lo Wei 's The Big Boss ( 1971 ) and Fist of Fury ( 1972 ) ; Way of the Dragon ( 1972 ) ,  निर्देशित और लिखा by ली ; warner भाइयो ' डालें the ड्रैगन ( 1973 ) और the खेल  of Death ( 1978 ) , both directed by Robert Clouse .
Lee  became an iconic फिगर ज्ञात throughout the संसार , विशेषकर  among the Chinese , as he portrayed Chinese nationalism in his films .
He initially trained in Wing Chun , but later rejected well-defined martial art  शैलियाँ , favouring बजाय the उपयोग of तकनीकों इससे विभिन्न स्त्रोत , in the स्पिरिट of उसके निजी martial कला दर्शनशास्त्र , जिससे he उतावले जीत kune do ( the रास्ता of the intercepting  Fist ) .
Lee held dual  नागरिकता of हांग काँग और the संयुक्त  States .
He died in  कोलून टोंग on 20 जुलाई 1973  at age 32 .
Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) , also known as chronic obstructive lung disease ( COLD ) , chronic obstructive airway disease ( COAD ) , chronic  airflow limitation ( कैलोरी ) और दीर्घकालिक obstructive respiratory बीमारी ( cord ) , is the occurrence of दीर्घकालिक ब्रोंकाइटिस or emphysema , a जोड़ी of commonly co-existing  diseases of the lungs in which the airways narrow over time .
This limits airflow to and from the lungs ,  causing shortness of साँस ( dyspnea  ) .
In  नैदानिक अभ्यास , copd is पारिभाषित by इसके characteristically  low airflow on lung function tests .
In  कंट्रास्ट to दमा , इस limitation is  poorly reversible and usually gets progressively worse over time .
COPD is caused by noxious particles or gas , most commonly from  तम्बाकू धूम्रपान , जिससे triggers an असामान्य जलन जवाब in the फेफड़ों  .
The diagnosis  of copd requires फेफड़ों  function tests .
Important management strategies  हैं धूम्रपान cessation , vaccinations , पुनर्वास , और  drug therapy ( often using inhalers ) .
Some patients go on to  आवश्यकता long-term ऑक्सीजन चिकित्सा or फेफड़ों  transplantation .
Worldwide , COPD ranked as  the छठे अग्रणी कारण of मौत in  1990 .
It is projected to  become the चौथी अग्रणी कारण of मौत विश्वव्यापी by 2030 , due to an बढ़ाएँ in धूम्रपान दरों  and demographic changes in many countries .
COPD is the third leading cause of death in the  u.S. , और the आर्थिक बोझ of copd in the u.S. in 2007 थी $ 42.6 अरब in स्वास्थ्य परवाह  costs and lost productivity .
Annelies `` Anne '' Marie Frank ( , ? , ; 12 June 1929early March  1945 ) is एक of the सबसे discussed यहूदी पीड़ितों of the holocaust  .
Her  डायरी रै महरूम the आधार  for several plays and films .
Born in the city  of फ्रैंकफर्ट am प्रमुख in वाइमर जर्मनी , वो जिया सबसे of उसके जीवन in or निकट एम्सटर्डम , in the  Netherlands .
Born a German  नेशनल , फ़्रैंक खोया उसके नागरिकता  in 1941 .
She gained  अंतरराष्ट्रीय कीर्ति मरणोपरांत  after her diary was published .
It documents  उसके अनुभवों छुपाना दौरान the जर्मनी occupation of the नीदरलैंड्स  in World War II .
The Frank family moved from Germany to Amsterdam in 1933  , the साल the nazis gained कंट्रोल over जर्मनी  .
By the  शुरूआत of 1940 , वे यहूद फंस in एम्सटर्डम by the  Nazi occupation of the Netherlands .
As persecutions of the  यहूदी जनसांख्यिकी increased in जुलाई 1942 , the परिवार गई into छुपाना in the छुपा कक्ष of  Anne 's father , Otto Frank 's , office building .
After two years  , the समूह थी गद्दारी और transported to विशेषज्ञता शिविरों  .
Anne Frank and her sister , Margot , were eventually  transferred to the bergen-belsen विशेषज्ञता शिविर , जहाँ वे died of सन्निपात in  March 1945 .
Otto Frank , the only survivor of the family , returned to Amsterdam after  the युद्ध to ढूँढें कि ऐनी 's डायरी था महरूम saved , और उसके प्रयत्न led to इसके प्रकाशन in  1947 .
It  थी अनूदित इससे इसके असली डच और पहला प्रकाशित  in English in 1952 as The Diary of a Young Girl .
It has since been  अनूदित into अनेक भाषाएं  .
The diary , which  थी दिए to ऐनी on उसके 13th जन्मदिवस , क्रॉनिकल्स  her life from 12 June 1942 until 1 August 1944 .
कर्ट 's हस्ताक्षर
Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20 ,  1967 – अप्रैल 5 , 1994 ) थी an अमरीकी संगीतकार और कलाकार , बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the सीसे सिंगर , guitarist और प्राथमिक songwriter  of the grunge band Nirvana .
Cobain formed Nirvana with  krist novoselic in एबरडीन , वॉशिंगटन in 1985 और स्थापित it as भाग of the सिएटल म्यूज़िक झाँकी  , having its debut album Bleach released on the independent record label Sub Pop in 1989 .
After signing with major label DGC Records , the band found breakthrough success with ``  खुश्बू जैसे टीन स्पिरिट `` इससे इसके दूसरी एल्बम nevermind ( 1991 )  .
Following the success of  nevermind , निर्वाण थी labeled `` the फ्लैगशिप बैंड '' of पीढी x , और कोबेन hailed as ``  the spokesman of a generation '' .
Cobain , however , was often uncomfortable and frustrated , believing his message and artistic vision  to have महरूम misinterpreted by the पब्लिक , साथ उसके निजी मुद्दे प्रायः विषय to मीडिया ध्यान .
He challenged Nirvana 's audience with its  फाइनल स्टुडियो एल्बम in utero ( 1993  ) .
During the last  सालो of उसके जीवन , कोबेन struggled साथ हेरोइन व्यसन , बीमारी  and depression .
He also had difficulty coping with his fame and public image , and the  पेशेवर और lifelong निजी pressures surrounding खुद और उसके बीवी  , musician Courtney Love .
On April 8 , 1994 , Cobain was found dead at his  घर in सिएटल , the शिकार of कया थी officially शासित a आत्महत्या by a self-inflicted  shotgun wound to the head .
The circumstances of his death at age 27  have become a टॉपिक of पब्लिक fascination और  debate .
Since their debut ,  निर्वाण , साथ कोबेन as a songwriter , रै बेची over 25 लाख एल्बम in  the U.S. , and over 50 million worldwide .
रेडियल इंजन समय और  cam mechanism .
click लिये पूरा रेज़ोल्यूशन  animation .
रेडियल इंजन of  a biplane
Master rod  ( कतरा ) , स्लेव और balances इससे a two-row , fourteen-cylinder  Pratt & Whitney Twin Wasp
The  रेडियल इंजन is a प्रत्यागमनी प्रकार आतंरिक दहन इंजन विन्यास in जिससे the सिलेंडर पाइंट outward  from a central crankshaft like the spokes of a wheel .
It resembles a stylized star when  viewed इससे the सामने , और is पुकारा a `` स्टार इंजन '' (  German Sternmotor ) in some languages .
The radial configuration was very  commonly प्रयुक्त in वायुयान इंजन पहले टर्बाइन इंजन became  predominant .
The Golden Girls is  an अमरीकी sitcom , निर्मित by सुसान हैरिस , कि originally aired  on NBC from September 13 , 1985 , to May 9 , 1992 .
अभिनीत bea आर्थर , बेट्टी श्वेत , rue mcclanahan और estelle getty , the दिखाएँ centers  on four older women sharing a home in Miami , Florida .
It was  उत्पादित by witt/thomas/harris प्रोडक्शन्स , in संघ साथ touchstone टेलीविज़न , और पॉल  Junger Witt , Tony Thomas , and Harris served as the original executive producers .
The Golden Girls received critical acclaim throughout most of its run and  जीती अनेक पुरस्कार , सहित the प्राइमटाइम एमी पुरस्कार लिये बकाया कॉमेडी श्रेणी twice  .
It also  जीती तीन सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन  Television Series – Musical or Comedy .
All four stars each  प्राप्त an एमी पुरस्कार throughout the श्रेणी ' चलाएं और था  multiple nominations .
The series also ranked among the top  टेन highest-rated कार्यक्रम लिये छह आउट of इसके सात  seasons .
Deepwater drilling  is the प्रक्रम of आयल और गैस खोजी और उत्पादन in गहराइयों  of more than 500 feet .
By this definition ,  वहीँ हैं लगभग 600 deepwater कुएं  in the Gulf of Mexico .
It has been  economically infeasible लिये अनेक सालो , लकिन साथ उठती आयल  prices , more companies are investing in this area .
प्रमुख कंपनियाँ working in इस सेक्टर शामिल  Diamond Offshore , TransOcean , and Baker Hughes .
There  हैं मूलरूप दो kinds of मोबाईल deepwater खुदाई  rigs : semi-submersible drilling rigs and drillships .
Drilling can also be  performed इससे a fixed-position संस्थापना ऐसे as a फ्लोटिंग spar ( मंच ) or  tension-leg platform .
Recent  उद्योग विश्लेषण रै अनुमानित कि the कुल व्यय in the वैश्विक deepwater  infrastructure market will reach $ 145bn in 2011 .
“not सब आयल is accessible on जमीन or  in shallow water .
You can find some oil deposits buried deep under the ocean floor.” ... Using sonic  उपकरण , आयल कंपनियाँ determine the खुदाई साइट सबसे संभावित to उपज  oil .
Then they use a  मोबाईल offshore खुदाई ईकाई ( मोदू  ) to dig the initial well .
Some units are converted into production rigs , meaning they switch from drilling for  आयल to capturing आयल एकबार it 's मिला  .
Most of the time , the oil company will replace the MODU with a more permanent oil production  रिग to कैप्चर oil.” ... the मोदू 's जॉब is to ड्रिल bas into the समंदर 's मंजिल to ढूँढें  oil deposits .
The part of the  ड्रिल कि extends नीचे the डेक और through the जल  is called the riser .
The  riser allows लिये खुदाई fluids to मूव between  the floor and the rig .
Engineers lower a drill  स्ट्रिंग -- a श्रेणी of पाइप designed to ड्रिल bas to the आयल जमा  -- through the riser.”
“the विस्तार of deepwater खुदाई is happening despite  accidents in offshore fields ... ”
in 2010 a विशाल विस्फोट occurred हत्या 11 मजदूर और spilling लाखो of  gallons of oil into the Gulf of Mexico while a BP oil rig was drilling in deep waters .
“ ... Despite the risks ,  the deepwater खुदाई ट्रेंड is spreading in the भूमध्यसागरीय  and off the coast of East Africa after a string of huge discoveries of natural gas.”
“The reason for the resumption of  ऐसे खुदाई , विश्लेषक कह , is continuing  high demand for energy worldwide.”
America needs the oil so it is almost necessary to face  the ऊँची risks कि आइये साथ deepwater खुदाई in अनुक्रम लिये अमेरिकी to continue to carry  on their everyday lives .
“The Energy  विभाग recently प्रक्षिप्त कि गल्फ आयल उत्पादन होता विस्तार इससे इसके  2011 level of 1.3 million barrels a day , still nearly a quarter of total domestic production , to 2 million barrels a day by 2020.”
Deepwater drilling affects the  पर्यावरण in दोनो ऋणात्मक और धनात्मक तरीके  .
Although Deepwater drilling rarely causes oil  spills it is स्टिल a hazardous संभावित निष्कर्ष  .
Oil spills result  in आयल डूब to the नीचे of the समंदर smothering  plant life leaving fish without food and shelter to survive .
on the अन्य हाथ deepwater खुदाई प्रभाव the पर्यावरण  in a positive ways too .
In time once the deepwater oil  खूब is नहीं in उपयोग anymore पौधे होगा grow on और around the खूब बनाना a गुफा or cavern जैसे आश्रय आदर्श  for animals to thrive in .
Deepwater drilling also lets us see  the गहराइयों of the समंदर मंजिल कि  are hardly ever seen .
”Cameras on rovers at the bottom of the wells record  फुटेज और लो फ़ोटो of विरल मछली कि हैं in वहीँ प्राकृतिक आवास , giving वैज्ञानिक a dekh at पशु वे rarely  seen” ( Chevron Corporation ) . ''
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23 , 1973 ) is an  अमरीकी स्त्री साथ जिसको संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्ष विधेयक क्लिंटन admitted to having था an `` improper संबंध '' जबकि वो worked  at the White House in 1995 and 1996 .
The  affair और इसके परखना ( जिससे शामिल क्लिंटन  's impeachment ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal .
Francis Albert `` Frank '' Sinatra ,  , ( दिसम्बर 12 , 1915 – may 14 , 1998 ) थी an अमरीकी सिंगर  and film actor .
Beginning his musical career in the swing era with Harry James and Tommy Dorsey , Sinatra found  unprecedented कामयाबी as a सोलो कलाकार इससे the जल्दी to mid-1940s बाद होने हस्ताक्षरित to कोलंबिया रिकॉर्ड in 1943 .
Being the idol  of the `` bobby soxers `` , he released उसके पहला एल्बम , the  Voice of Frank Sinatra in 1946 .
His  पेशेवर करियर था stalled by the 1950s , लकिन it थी पुनर्जन्म in 1953  after he won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for his performance in From Here to Eternity .
He signed with Capitol Records in 1953 and released several critically lauded albums ( such as In the Wee Small Hours , Songs for  swingin ' प्रेमियों ! , आइये मक्खी साथ me , तभी the निर्जन और nice  'n ' Easy ) .
Sinatra left Capitol to found his own record label , Reprise Records  in 1961 ( ढूंढना कामयाबी साथ एल्बम ऐसे as ring-a-ding-ding ! , सिनात्रा at the sands और फ्रांसिस अल्बर्ट सिनात्रा & अंतोनियो कार्लोस jobim ) , toured internationally  , was a founding member of the Rat Pack and fraternized with celebrities and statesmen , including John F. Kennedy .
Sinatra turned 50 in 1965 , recorded the retrospective  सितंबर of my सालो , स्ट्रक्चर in the एमी -winning टेलीविज़न खास फ़्रैंक सिनात्रा : a man और उसके म्यूज़िक , और scored  hits with `` Strangers in the Night `` and `` My Way `` .
With sales of his music  dwindling और बाद appearing in अनेक poorly प्राप्त films , सिनात्रा रिटायर्ड लिये the  first time in 1971 .
Two years later , however , he came  आउट of रिटायरमेंट और in 1973 अंकित अनेक एल्बम , स्कोरिंग a शीर्ष 40 hit साथ  `` ( Theme From ) New York , New York `` in 1980 .
Using his Las Vegas shows as a  घर आधार , he toured दोनो भीतर the संयुक्त राज्य और  internationally , until a short time before his death in 1998 .
Sinatra  भी forged a अत्यधिक कामयाब करियर  as a film actor .
बाद जीतना बेहतरीन supporting कर्ता in 1953 , he भी garnered a नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता लिये the man साथ  the Golden Arm , and critical acclaim for his performance in The Manchurian Candidate .
He also starred in  ऐसे musicals as ऊँची समाज , pal जॉय , यारों और  Dolls and On the Town .
Sinatra was honored at the Kennedy  बीच honors in 1983 और थी awarded the अध्यक्षीय पदक of स्वतंत्रता  by Ronald Reagan in 1985 and the Congressional Gold Medal in 1997 .
He  थी the प्राप्तकर्ता of ग्यारह ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , सहित the ग्रैमी trustees पुरस्कार ,  Grammy Legend Award and the Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award .
Sinatra  is भी एक of world’s best-selling कलाकारों of सब समय , having बेची अधिक  than 150 million copies worldwide .
Typical  cornhole  board
Cornhole , also known as bean bag toss ,  मकई टॉस , baggo or बैग , is a लॉन खेल in जिससे खिलाड़ी लो turns फेंकना मकई छेद बैग  at a raised platform with a hole in the far end .
A bag in the hole  स्कोर 3 अंक , जबकि एक on the मंच स्कोर  1 point .
Play  continues जबतक a टोली or खिलाड़ी  reaches the score of 21 .
The American Gold  त्रिभुज is an आधिकारिक सुनहरा bullion  coin of the United States .
Authorized under the Gold Bullion Coin Act of 1985 , it was first  released by the संयुक्त राज्य मिंट in 1986  .
Bikram Yoga is a  प्रणाली of योग कि बिक्रम choudhury synthesized इससे परंपरागत hatha योग तकनीकों और popularized  beginning in the early 1970s .
All Bikram Yoga classes run for  90 मिनट्स और consist of the वही श्रेणी of 26 postures  and 2 breathing exercises .
Bikram Yoga is ideally  practiced in a रूम heated to 105°f ( ≈ 40.6°c ) साथ a आर्द्रता  of 40 % , .
Christopher Michael Massey ( born  26 जनवरी 1990 ) is an अमरीकी कर्ता , हास्य और rapper बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये अभिनीत as माइकल barret in निकलोडियन  television series Zoey 101 .
Massey has received many awards and  नामांकन सहित a यंग कलाकार पुरस्कार और  Emmy Awards nominations .
He is also known for  appearing in अनेक commercials in the जल्दी  2000s .
A  conventional teaspoon बना  of stainless steel .
A teaspoon is an item of cutlery and/or a measuring instrument , as  खूब as a ईकाई of मापन of आवाज़ in कुछ देशों और कस्टम  .
A fern is any  एक or अधिक of a समूह of परिचय 12,000 प्रजाति of पौधे belonging to the वनस्पति  group known as Pteridophyta .
Unlike mosses , they have  जाइलम और फ्लोएम ( बनाना उन्हें vascular पौधे  ) .
They have stems , leaves ,  और जड़ें जैसे अन्य vascular पौधे  .
Ferns reproduce  via बीजाणुओं और have neither बीज nor पुष्प  .
By far the largest  समूह of ferns is the leptosporangiate ferns , लकिन ferns as पारिभाषित यहाँ ( भी पुकारा monilophytes ) शामिल horsetails  , whisk ferns , marattioid ferns , and ophioglossoid ferns .
The term  pteridophyte भी refers to ferns और a few अन्य बीजरहित vascular पौधे ( देखिए वर्गीकरण  section below ) .
Ferns first appear in the fossil record  360 लाख सालो पहले in the carboniferous लकिन अनेक of the वर्तमान परिवारों और प्रजाति किया नहीं appear जबतक roughly 145 लाख सालो पहले in the जल्दी  Cretaceous ( after flowering plants came to dominate many environments ) .
Ferns are not of major economic importance , but  कुछ हैं grown or gathered लिये खाना , as शोभायमान पौधे , लिये remediating contaminated soils , और have महरूम the विषय of शोध  for their ability to remove some chemical pollutants from the air .
Some are  significant  weeds .
They  भी खेल a भूमिका in mythology  , medicine , and art .
Flat  roofs in इसराईल
Flat  छत in लॉस एंजिल्स
A flat roof is a  प्रकार of covering लिये a भवन  .
In contrast to the more sloped  रूप of छत , a चपटा छत is आड़ा or  nearly horizontal .
The slope of a roof is properly known as  इसके पिच : roofs जिससे हैं nearly चपटा हैं ज्ञात as low-pitch  roofs ( as the angle of slope increases , so the pitch is said to increase ) .
Any sheet  of सामग्री प्रयुक्त to कवर a चपटा or low-pitched छत is प्रायः ज्ञात as a झिल्ली और the प्राथमिक purpose  of these membranes is to waterproof the roof area .
Materials that cover flat roofs  typically allow the जल to चलाएं बंद इससे a पतला inclination or  camber into a gutter system .
Water from some flat roofs  ऐसे as on गार्डन sheds sometimes बहती freely बंद the किनारे of a छत , हालांकि gutter प्रणालियों हैं of लाभ in keeping  both walls and foundations dry .
Gutters on  छोटी roofs प्रायः सीसे जल सीधे onto the मैदान , or बेहतर  , into a specially made soakaway .
Gutters on  larger roofs प्रायः सीसे जल into the  rainwater drainage system of any built up area .
Occasionally flat roofs though are designed to  collect जल in a पूल , प्रायः लिये aesthetic उद्देश्य , or  for rainwater buffering .
चपटा roofs मौजूद सब over the संसार और प्रत्येक क्षेत्रफल रै इसके  own tradition or preference for materials used .
In warmer climes where rainfall is less and  जमने is असंभावित to occur , अनेक चपटा roofs हैं बस निर्मित of चिनाई or कंक्रीट और इस is शुभ at keeping  out the heat of the sun and cheap and easy to build where timber is not readily available .
In areas where the roof could become saturated by  बरसात और लीक , or जहाँ जल soaked into the brickwork could फ्रीज to बर्फ और यूँ सीसे to 'blowing ' ( तोड़कर up of the mortar/brickwork/concrete by the विस्तार of बर्फ as it  forms ) these roofs are not suitable .
traditionally सबसे चपटा roofs in the पश्चिमी संसार मेक उपयोग of तारकोल or अधिक प्रायः तारकोल पेपर  applied over roof decking to keep a building watertight .
The tar or tarpaper is in turn covered in gravel to keep the sun 's heat , UV rays  और मौसम बंद it और helps protect it इससे cracking or blistering और degradation  .
Roof decking is  प्रायः of प्लाईवुड , chipboard or osb फलक ( osb = उन्मुख strand फलक , भी ज्ञात as स्टर्लिंग फलक  ) of around 18mm thickness .
The tar coating is applied in one or more coats  as a hot द्रव , heated in a तारकोल केतली , or as चादरें of तारकोल impregnated 'paper ' चिपके bas और sealed साथ at joints by  hot tar - once it has cooled , the gravel is spread evenly over it .
A main reason for failure of these traditional roofs is  अनभिज्ञता or कमी of मेंटेनेंस जहाँ लोगों or कार्यक्रम कारण the बजरी to be स्थानांतरित or removed इससे the तारकोल or tarpaper waterproofing , यूँ exposing it to मौसम और सूर्य whereupon cracking और blistering occurs  over time and eventually water gets in .
Tarpaper is usually a 'paper ' or  fibre सामग्री soaked or impregnated in  tar .
As gravel can not protect tarpaper surfaces where they rise vertically  इससे the छत ऐसे as on मुंडेर दीवारें or upstands , tarpaper विसंगतियाँ हैं उत्पादित साथ ठीक बजरी लागू  to the hot tar during the process of manufacture such that a permanent layer of gravel is stuck to it in order to give it ongoing protection .
Tarpapers  vary in विशेषता as करता the कारीगरी और प्रशिक्षण of those applying it  to produce more or less successful results .
In some micro climates or shaded areas these rather 'basic ' tarpaper roofs can last well in relation to the cost of materials purchase and  लागत of लेटा उन्हें , however the लागत of आधुनिक झिल्लियों ऐसे as epdm रै आइये bas over हाल सालो to मेक उन्हें अधिक और अधिक सस्ती  .
There  हैं अभी अधिक firms supplying आधुनिक विकल्प और  there is generally a growing awareness of their performance and availability .
If a leak does occur  on a चपटा छत तब क्षति प्रायः goes unnoticed लिये long अवधि of समय दौरान जिससे जल  penetrates and soaks the decking and any insulation and/or structure beneath it .
This can  सीसे to महंगी क्षति इससे the दुर्गन्ध जिससे प्रायः develops और if बाएँ can  weaken the roof structure .
There are also  विभिन्न स्वास्थ्य risks to लोगों और पशु श्वास  the mould spores : the severity of this health risk remains a debated point .
One problem with  maintaining चपटा roofs is कि if जल करता घुस the अवरोध covering ( be it परंपरागत or  a modern membrane ) it can travel a long way before causing visible damage or leaking into a building where it can be seen .
Thus it is not easy  to देखिए जहाँ it is टपकती in अनुक्रम to मरम्मत  it .
एकबार underlying छत अलंकार is soaked it प्रायः sags causing a further संग्रहण or puddling  of water in that area and the problem worsens .
A  cd-rom ( ) is a pre-pressed कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क जिससे  contains data .
The name is an acronym which  स्टैंड लिये `` कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क read-only मेमोरी  `` .
Computers can read  cd-roms , लकिन can नहीं लिखें on उन्हें  .
CD-ROMs are popularly used to distribute  कंप्यूटर तन्त्र , सहित वीडियो खेल और मल्टीमीडिया अनुप्रयोग , हालांकि कोई आंकड़ा can be भंडारित  ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ) .
Some CDs ,  पुकारा उन्नत cds , थाम दोनो कंप्यूटर आंकड़ा और ऑडियो साथ the latter सक्षम of होने निभाई on a cd खिलाड़ी  , while data ( such as software or digital video ) is only usable on a computer ( such as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ) .
The  पीला किताब is the तकनीकी मानक  that defines the format of CD-ROMs .
One of a set of color-bound books that contain  the तकनीकी विशेषताएँ लिये सब cd स्वरुप , the पीला किताब , निर्मित by सोनी और फिलिप्स , थी the  first extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio .
It adapted the  स्वरूप to थाम कोई रूप of आंकड़ा  .
Joanne `` Jo '' Rowling ( ) , ( born 31 July 1965 ) , pen  नाम J. K. रोलिंग , is a अंग्रेजों उपन्यासकार , बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the लेखक of the हैरी कुम्हार  fantasy series .
The Potter books have gained worldwide  ध्यान , जीती अनेक पुरस्कार , और बेची अधिक than 400 लाख  copies .
वे have become the best-selling किताब श्रेणी in इतिहास , और महरूम the आधार  for a series of films which has become the highest-grossing film series in history .
Rowling had  overall स्वीकृति on the स्क्रिप्ट as खूब as maintaining रचनात्मक कंट्रोल by सेवारत  as a producer on the final instalment .
Born in Yate , Gloucestershire , Rowling was working as a researcher and  दुभाषिया सचिव लिये माफ़ी अंतरराष्ट्रीय जब वो conceived the विचार लिये the हैरी कुम्हार श्रेणी on a विलम्बित ट्रैन इससे मैनचेस्टर  to London in 1990 .
The  seven-year काल कि followed entailed the मौत of उसके माँ , तलाक इससे उसके पहला husband और गरीबी  until Rowling finished the first novel in the series , Harry Potter and the Philosopher 's Stone ( 1997 ) .
Rowling subsequently published 6  sequels—the पिछला , हैरी कुम्हार और the deathly hallows ( 2007 ) —as  well as 3 supplements to the series .
In 2012 , Rowling parted with her agency and resumed  लिखने in the रूप of a tragicomedy अनोखा aimed at वयस्क readership  , entitled The Casual Vacancy .
Rowling has said she is currently working on two books—one aimed for adults , the other for children  younger than the हैरी कुम्हार दर्शक , और वो expects the latter to be प्रकाशित पहला  .
Rowling has led a `` rags to riches `` life story , in  जिससे वो progressed इससे जीना on राज्य लाभ to multi-millionaire  status within five years .
She is the United Kingdom 's  best-selling लेखक चूंकि रिकॉर्ड began , साथ बिक्री in excess of £238m  .
The 2008  संडे टाइम्स समृद्ध सूची अनुमानित रोलिंग 's सौभाग्य at £560 लाख ( $ 798 लाख ) ,  ranking her as the twelfth richest woman in the United Kingdom .
Forbes ranked Rowling as the forty-eighth most powerful celebrity of 2007 , and TIME magazine named her as a  runner-up लिये इसके 2007 व्यक्ति of the साल , noting the सोशल , moral , और राजनैतिक प्रेरणा वो रै दिए उसके प्रशंसक  .
in अक्तूबर 2010 , रोलिंग थी नामित the ``  Most Influential Woman in Britain '' by leading magazine editors .
She has become a notable  लोकसेवक , supporting ऐसे धर्मार्थ as कॉमिक राहत , एक जनक परिवारों , अनेक काठिन्य समाज of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और lumos ( formerly  the Children 's High Level Group ) .
Auburndale is a city in  polk काउंटी , फ्लोरिडा , संयुक्त राज्य .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 11,032 at the 2000  census .
According to  the u.s जनसांख्यिकी estimates of 2005 , the नगर था  a population of 12,381 .
It is part of the Lakeland  – शीत हेवन महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल  .
Hurricane Isabel ( 2003 ) as seen from  कक्षा दौरान expedition 7 of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्पेस  Station .
The eye , eyewall , and surrounding  rainbands , विशेषताएँ of तीव्र cyclones , हैं clearly  visible in this view from space .
a तीव्र चक्रवात is a तूफ़ान प्रणाली characterized by a low-pressure बीच घिरी by a सर्पिल व्यवस्था  of thunderstorms that produce strong winds and heavy rain .
Tropical  cyclones strengthen जब जल काफूर इससे the समंदर is released as the संतृप्त एयर उदय  , resulting in condensation of water vapor contained in the moist air .
They are fueled by a different heat mechanism  than अन्य cyclonic windstorms ऐसे as nor'easters , यूरोपीय windstorms , और ध्रुवीय  lows .
The characteristic that  separates तीव्र cyclones इससे अन्य cyclonic प्रणालियों is कि at कोई ऊँचाई in the माहौल , the बीच of a तीव्र चक्रवात होगा be warmer than इसके परिवेश ; a घटना पुकारा  `` warm core `` storm systems .
The term `` tropical '' refers both to the geographical origin of these systems , which usually form in  तीव्र regions of the ग्लोब , और to उनके गठन in मेरीटाइम तीव्र एयर masses  .
The term `` cyclone '' refers to such  तूफ़ान ' cyclonic प्रकृति , साथ counterclockwise हवा प्रवाह in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध और clockwise हवा प्रवाह in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध  .
The opposite  दिशा of the हवा प्रवाह is a  result of the Coriolis force .
Depending on its location and strength , a tropical  चक्रवात is referred to by names ऐसे as hurricane ( , ) , तूफ़ान ( ) , तीव्र तूफ़ान , cyclonic तूफ़ान  , tropical depression , and simply cyclone .
While tropical cyclones can produce extremely powerful winds  और मूसलाधार बरसात , वे हैं भी समर्थ to उपज ऊँची लहरें  , damaging storm surge , and tornadoes .
They  develop over विशाल लाशें of गरम जल , और खोना उनके शक्ति if वे मूव over जमीन due to increased  surface friction and loss of the warm ocean as an energy source .
This is why coastal  regions can प्राप्त significant क्षति इससे a तीव्र चक्रवात , जबकि अंतर्देशीय regions हैं अपेक्षाकृत  safe from receiving strong winds .
Heavy rains , however , can produce significant  बाढ़ अंतर्देशीय , और तूफ़ान surges can उपज extensive तटीय बाढ़ up to इससे the तटरेखा  .
Although their effects on human  populations can be विनाशकारी , तीव्र cyclones can  relieve drought conditions .
They also carry heat energy away from the tropics and transport it toward  शीतोष्ण latitudes , जिससे makes उन्हें an महत्वपूर्ण भाग of the वैश्विक वायुमंडलीय परिसंचरण यांत्रिकी  .
As a result ,  तीव्र cyclones सहायता to maintain संतुलन in the धरती 's क्षोभमण्डल  , and to maintain a relatively stable and warm temperature worldwide .
Many tropical cyclones develop when the  वायुमंडलीय शर्तें around a कमजोर disturbance in the माहौल हैं अनुकूल  .
The background environment is modulated by climatological cycles and patterns  ऐसे as the madden-julian दोलन , el niño-southern दोलन , और the अटलांटिक multidecadal दोलन  .
अन्य रूप जब अन्य प्रकार of cyclones acquire  tropical characteristics .
Tropical systems are  तब स्थानांतरित by परिचालन हवाएँ in the क्षोभमण्डल ; if the शर्तें remain अनुकूल  , the tropical disturbance intensifies , and can even develop an eye .
On the other end of the spectrum , if the conditions around the system  deteriorate or the तीव्र चक्रवात makes landfall , the प्रणाली weakens और  eventually dissipates .
It  is नहीं संभावित to artificially induce the dissipation  of these systems with current technology .
किर्क डगलस ( born issur danielovitch , ; दिसम्बर 9 , 1916 ) is an अमरीकी स्टेज  and film actor , film producer and author .
His popular films include Out of the Past ( 1947  ) , चैंपियन ( 1949 ) , इक्का in the छेद ( 1951 ) , the ख़राब और the खूबसूरत ( 1952 ) , 20,000 लीग अंतर्गत the समुद्र ( 1954 ) , हवस लिये जीवन ( 1956 ) , राहें of महिमा ( 1957 ) , gunfight at the o.k . corral ( 1957 ) , the वाइकिंग्स  ( 1958 ) , Spartacus ( 1960 ) , Lonely Are the Brave ( 1962 ) , Seven Days in May ( 1964 ) , The Heroes of Telemark ( 1965 ) and Tough Guys ( 1986 ) .
He is No.17 on the American Film Institute 's list of the greatest male American screen  महापुरूष of सब समय , बनाना उसे the highest-ranked जीना व्यक्ति  on the list .
In 1996 , he received the Academy Honorary  पुरस्कार `` लिये 50 सालो as a रचनात्मक और moral फ़ोर्स in the गति चित्र जातियाँ .  ''
He is one of the last surviving actors  इससे हॉलीवुड 's `` सुनहरी आयु  '' .
Robert Clark `` Bob '' Seger ( born May 6 ,  1945 ) is an अमरीकी चट्टान और फेंकें singer-songwriter , guitarist  and pianist .
As a  locally कामयाब detroit-area कलाकार , he performed और अंकित as bob seger  and the Last Heard and Bob Seger System throughout the 1960s .
By the early 1970s , he  था dropped the `` प्रणाली '' इससे उसके रिकार्डिंग और जारी  to strive for broader success with other various bands .
In 1973 , he put together The Silver Bullet Band , a group of Detroit-area musicians , with whom he became most successful on the national  स्तर साथ the एल्बम सजीव गोली , अंकित सजीव साथ the चांदी गोली बैंड in 1975 at cobo हॉल in डेट्रॉयट , मिशिगन  .
In 1976 , he achieved a national  ब्रेकआउट साथ the स्टुडियो एल्बम रात्रि  Moves .
On  उसके स्टुडियो एल्बम , he भी worked extensively साथ the alabama-based मांसपेशी  Shoals Rhythm Section , which appeared on several of Seger 's best-selling singles and albums .
A roots rocker with a classic raspy ,  चिल्लाना आवाज़ , seger लिखा और अंकित गीतों कि dealt साथ प्रेम , महिलाओं  , blue-collar themes and was an exemplar of heartland rock .
Seger has recorded many hits , including ``  रात्रि चालें , '' `` फेरे the पेज , '' `` we 've मिला tonight , '' `` विरूद्ध the हवा , '' और shakedown कि थी लिखा लिये बेवर्ली पहाड़ियाँ cop ii और `` जैसे  a Rock , '' and also co-wrote the Eagles ' number-one hit `` Heartache Tonight . ''
His iconic recording of `` Old Time Rock and Roll  `` थी नामित एक of the गीतों  of the Century in 2001 .
With a career spanning  पाँच दशकों , seger continues to perform  and record today .
seger थी inducted into the चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल of कीर्ति in 2004 और the  Songwriters Hall of Fame in 2012 .
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9 , 1913 – April 22 , 1994 ) was the 37th  अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य , सेवारत इससे 1969 to 1974 , जब he became the तभी अध्यक्ष to  resign the office .
Nixon had previously served as a Republican U.S. representative  और सीनेटर इससे कैलिफ़ोर्निया और as the 36th वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य इससे  1953 to 1961 .
निक्सन थी born in yorba लिंडा  , California .
He graduated from Whittier College in 1934 and  ड्यूक विश्वविद्यालयों स्कूल of विधि in 1937 , returning to कैलिफ़ोर्निया  to practice law .
He and his wife ,  पैट निक्सन , स्थानांतरित to वॉशिंगटन to कार्य लिये the संघीय सरकारी  in 1942 .
he subsequently परोसा in the संयुक्त राज्य  Navy during World War II .
Nixon was elected  in कैलिफ़ोर्निया to the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि in 1946 और to the सीनेट  in 1950 .
His pursuit of the Alger Hiss  मामला स्थापित उसके प्रतिष्ठा as a अग्रणी anti-communist  , and elevated him to national prominence .
He was the running mate of  ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर , the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी अध्यक्षीय  nominee in the 1952 election .
Nixon  परोसा लिये आठ सालो as वाइस अध्यक्ष  .
He waged an  unsuccessful अध्यक्षीय अभियान in 1960 , narrowly खोने to जॉन F. कैनेडी , और  lost a race for Governor of California in 1962 .
In 1968 , he ran  again लिये the प्रेसिडेंसी और थी निर्वाचित  .
Although Nixon initially escalated America 's  भागीदारी in the वियतनाम युद्ध , he subsequently ended u.S.  involvement in 1973 .
Nixon 's visit  to the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन in 1972 खोली राजनयिक संबंध between the दो राष्ट्र , और he initiated détente  and the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty with the Soviet Union the same year .
Domestically , his  प्रशासन generally embraced नीतियों कि transferred शक्ति इससे वॉशिंगटन  to the states .
Among other things , he launched initiatives  to लड़ो कर्कट और illegal दवाएँ , imposed मजदूरी और दाम नियंत्रण , enforced desegregation of कुछ दक्षिणी स्कूलों  , and established the Environmental Protection Agency .
Though he presided over  the चंद्र अवतरण शुरूआत साथ अपोलो 11 , he scaled वापस मानवयुक्त स्पेस  exploration .
He was re-elected  by a भूस्खलन in 1972  .
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo , the resignation of his vice president , Spiro  agnew , और a continuing श्रेणी of खुलासे परिचय the वाटरगेट कांड और अन्य misconduct by सदस्यों of the प्रशासन  .
The scandal  escalated , costing निक्सन much of उसके राजनैतिक support , और on अगस्त 9 , 1974 , he resigned in the  face of almost certain impeachment and removal from office .
बाद उसके इस्तीफा , he controversially प्राप्त  a pardon issued by his successor , Gerald Ford .
In retirement , Nixon 's work as an elder statesman ,  authoring अनेक किताबे और undertaking अनेक विदेशी यात्राएँ , helped to rehabilitate  his public image .
He suffered a debilitating stroke on April  18 , 1994 , और died चार दिनों बाद at the आयु  of 81 .
{ { infobox  Senator
The Dominican Republic annexation treaty  caused कड़वा contention between अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट और  Sen. Sumner .
Brady  1869 ]  ]
Sen. Sumner , opposed to American imperialism in the Caribbean and fearful that annexation would lead to the  conquest of the neighboring ब्लैक गणतंत्र of हैती , became कायल कि भ्रष्टाचार lay पीछे the सन्धि , और कि मेन बंद to the अध्यक्ष  shared in the corruption .
As chairman of the Senate Foreign Relations  कमेटी , sen. sumner initially withheld उसके राय on the सन्धि on जनवरी  18 , 1870 .
Sen. Sumner  था महरूम लीक सूचना इससे सहायक सचिव of राज्य , bancroft डेविस , कि u.s . नवल जहाजों यहूद  being used to protect President Báez .
Sen. Sumner 's committee voted against annexation and at Sen. Sumner’s  सुझाव और काफी संभवतः to सहेजें the पार्टी इससे an भद्दा लड़ो or the अध्यक्ष इससे शर्मिंदगी , the सीनेट आयोजित इसके बहस  of the treaty behind closed doors in executive session .
President Grant persisted and sent messages to Congress in  एहसान of annexation on कूच 14 , 1870 , और may  31 , 1870 .
In closed session , Sen. Sumner spoke out against the treaty ; warnng that there  होता be परेशानी साथ the विदेशी नागरिकों , noting the दीर्घकालिक विद्रोह कि took प्लेस on the द्वीप , और the रिस्क कि the स्वतंत्रता  of Haiti , recognized by the United States in 1862 , would be lost .
Sumner stated that Grant 's use of the U.S. Navy as a  प्रोटेक्टोरेट थी a उल्लंघन of अंतरराष्ट्रीय  law and unconstitutional .
Finally , on June 30 , 1870  the सन्धि थी voted on by the सीनेट और विफल to लाभ the जरूरी  2/3 majority for treaty passage .
The following day , President Grant ,  अहसास गद्दारी by sen. sumner , retaliated by ordering the dismissal of sumner’s बंद dost J. lothrop motley , दूत  to Britain .
By autumn  , sumner 's निजी दुश्मनी to the अध्यक्ष थी पब्लिक ज्ञान , और he blamed the सचिव of राज्य लिये failing to have  resigned , rather than let Grant have his way .
The two men , friends  जबतक तब , cooled into कड़वा  enemies .
In December , 1870 , still fearful that Grant meant to acquire Santo Domingo somehow , Sumner gave a fiercely  नाजुक वाक accusing the अध्यक्ष of usurpation और babcock of unethical conduct  .
Already , President Grant , supported by his Secretary of State  हैमिल्टन मछली , था initiated a अभियान to depose sumner इससे the  chairmanship of the Senate Foreign Relations Committee .
Although Sumner stated he was an `` Administration man '' , in addition to  having रोका ग्रान्ट 's डोमिनिकन गणतंत्र सन्धि attempt , sumner था पराजित ग्रान्ट 's पूरा repeal of the कार्यकाल of दफ्तर अधिनियम , अवरोधित ग्रान्ट 's नामांकन of सिकंदर स्टीवर्ट to u.S. सचिव of राजकोष , और  been a constant harassing force pushing Reconstruction policies faster than Grant had been willing to go .
Grant  resented sumner 's बड़प्पन of manner  , as well .
Told once that Sumner did not believe in the Bible , the  अध्यक्ष is supposed to have कहा कि he थी नहीं चकित : `` he किया  n't write it . ''
As the  दरार between ग्रान्ट और sumner increased ,  Sumner’s health began to decline .
When the 42nd U.S. Congress convened on March 4 , 1871 , Senators affiliated with President Grant , known  as ‘’new radicals’’ voted to oust sen. sumner इससे the सीनेट विदेशी संबंध कमेटी अध्यक्षता  .
कारोबार आचार ( भी कॉरपोरेट आचार ) is a रूप of लागू आचार or पेशेवर आचार  that examines ethical principles and moral or ethical problems that arise in a business environment .
It applies to  सब पहलुओं of कारोबार conduct और is प्रासंगिक to the conduct of individuals  and entire organizations .
कारोबार आचार रै दोनो normative और वर्णनात्मक  dimensions .
As a  कॉरपोरेट अभ्यास और a करियर specialization , the फ़ील्ड is primarily  normative .
Academics  attempting to समझे कारोबार बर्ताव employ  descriptive methods .
The  दायरा और मात्रा of कारोबार नैतिक मुद्दे reflects  the interaction of profit-maximizing behavior with non-economic concerns .
ब्याज in कारोबार आचार त्वरित dramatically दौरान the 1980s और 1990s , दोनो  within major corporations and within academia .
For example , today most major corporations promote their commitment to non-economic values under  headings ऐसे as आचार कोड और सोशल जिम्मेदारी charters .
Adam Smith said , ``  लोगों of the वही व्यापार seldom मिलें साथ , भी लिये merriment और diversion , लकिन the वार्तालाप ends in a षड्यंत्र विरूद्ध the पब्लिक , or in कुछ contrivance  to raise prices . ''
Governments use laws and regulations to point business behavior  in कया वे perceive to be फायदेमंद दिशानिर्देश .
Ethics implicitly regulates  क्षेत्रों और विवरण of बर्ताव कि झूठ परे  governmental control .
The emergence of large corporations with limited relationships and sensitivity to the  समुदायों in जिससे वे operate त्वरित the विकास of औपचारिक आचार  regimes .
A burn is a type of  चोट to flesh or स्किन caused by ऊष्मा , विद्युत , रसायन  , friction , or radiation .
सबसे burns affect तभी the सतही स्किन ( ज्ञात as सतही or पहला उपाधि ) or extend into the deeper स्किन लकिन do नहीं  involve the full thickness of the skin ( known as partial thickness or second degree ) .
Rarely all layers of the skin or deeper  ऊतकों , ऐसे as मांसपेशी or अस्थि can be घायल in जिससे मामला the बर्न is either पूरा मोटाई  ( third degree ) or fourth degree .
The treatment  जरूरी depends on the गंभीरता  of the burn .
Superficial burns maybe  प्रबंधित साथ छोटी अधिक than सरल पीड़ा हत्यारे जबकि प्रमुख burns may आवश्यकता prolonged उपचार in specialized  burn centers .
Cooling with tap water may aid pain and decrease damage however if  एक्सपोज़र is prolonged it may परिणाम in कम देह तापमान  .
Partial thickness  burns may आवश्यकता सफ़ाई साथ साबुन और जल followed  by dressings .
फफोले चाहिए typically  be left unbroken .
Full thickness burns usually  आवश्यकता सर्जिकल उपचार ऐसे as स्किन कलम और extensive burns प्रायः आवश्यकता विशाल राशि of intravenous  fluids .
the सबसे आम जटिलताओं of burns हैं  related to infection .
While large burns can be fatal , modern  उपचार विकसित in the पिछला 50 सालो have significantly improved the outcomes , विशेषकर in children  and young adults .
Globally about 11 million people seek medical  उपचार और 300,000 लोगों die इससे  burns .
In the United States , of those  admitted to a बर्न बीच , लगभग 4 %  die from their injuries .
The long term  निष्कर्ष is primarily सम्बन्धित to the आकार of बर्न और the आयु of  the person effected .
The Atlantic Ocean , not  सहित आर्कटिक और अंटार्कटिक regions
This video was taken by the crew of  expedition 29 on फलक the iss  .
The pass starts from  बस north-east of the द्वीप of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड over the उत्तर  Atlantic Ocean to central Africa , over South Sudan .
The Atlantic Ocean is the  second-largest of the संसार 's oceanic विभाजन  .
With a  कुल क्षेत्रफल of परिचय , it कवर लगभग 20 प्रतिशत of the धरती 's सतह  and about 29 percent of its water surface area .
The  पहला भाग of इसके नाम refers to एटलस of यूनानी mythology  , making the Atlantic the `` Sea of Atlas '' .
The oldest known mention of  `` अटलांटिक '' is in the histories of हिरोडोटस around 450 bc ( hdt . 1.202.4 ) : अटलांटिस थलैसा ( यूनानी : ἀτλαντὶς  θάλασσα ; English : Sea of Atlas ) .
The term Ethiopic Ocean ,  निकला इससे इथियोपिया , थी लागू to the दक्षिणी अटलांटिक as  late as the mid-19th century .
Before  europeans खोजा अन्य महासागर , the पद `` समंदर '' itself थी synonymous साथ the waters परे the जलसन्धि of जिब्राल्टर  that we now know as the Atlantic .
The early  यूनानियों believed इस समंदर to be a gigantic नदी encircling  the world .
The  अटलांटिक समंदर occupies an elongated , s-shaped जलाशय extending longitudinally  between Eurasia and Africa to the east , and the Americas to the west .
As one component of the interconnected global ocean , it is connected in the north to the Arctic Ocean ( which is sometimes considered a  समुद्र of the अटलांटिक ) , to the प्रशांत समंदर in the दक्षिणपश्चिम , the भारतीय समंदर in the southeast  , and the Southern Ocean in the south .
( Other  परिभाषाएं describe the अटलांटिक  as extending southward to Antarctica . )
The equator  subdivides it into the उत्तर अटलांटिक समंदर और  South Atlantic Ocean .
Due to their long-term persistence , and the  need लिये a अद्वितीय पहचानकर्ता in issuing forecasts और चेतावनियाँ , तीव्र cyclones और उपोष्ण cyclones हैं दिए names  according to policy ( see Tropical cyclone naming ) .
The following are lists from which these  तीव्र और उपोष्ण चक्रवात names हैं निकला  .
White light is dispersed by a  प्रिज़्म into the रंगों of the ऑप्टिकल  spectrum .
The visible spectrum is the portion of the  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम कि is दृश्य to ( can be detected  by ) the human eye .
Electromagnetic radiation  in इस दायरा of wavelengths is पुकारा दृश्य लाइट  or simply light .
A typical  इंसान नजर होगा respond to wavelengths  from about 390 to 700 nm .
In terms  of आवृत्ति , इस corresponds to a बैंड  in the vicinity of 430–790 THz .
A light-adapted eye generally has its maximum sensitivity at around 555 nm ( 540 THz ) , in the  ग्रीन प्रदेश of the ऑप्टिकल वर्णक्रम ( देखिए : दीप्ति  function ) .
The spectrum does not  , however , contain सब the रंगों कि the इंसान आँखें  and brain can distinguish .
Unsaturated  रंगों ऐसे as गुलाबी , or जामुनी विसंगतियाँ ऐसे as magenta , हैं अनुपस्थित , लिये उदाहरण  , because they can be made only by a mix of multiple wavelengths .
Colors  containing तभी एक wavelength हैं भी पुकारा pure रंगों  .
Visible wavelengths pass  through the `` ऑप्टिकल खिड़की `` , the प्रदेश of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम  which allows wavelengths to pass largely unattenuated through the Earth 's atmosphere .
An example of this phenomenon is that  साफ एयर scatters ब्लू लाइट अधिक than रेड wavelengths , और so the  midday sky appears blue .
The optical window is also  पुकारा the दृश्य खिड़की क्युकी it overlaps the इंसान दृश्य  response spectrum .
The near infrared  ( nir ) खिड़की झूठ बस आउट of the इंसान दृष्टि , as खूब as the मीडियम wavelength ir ( mwir ) खिड़की और  the Long Wavelength or Far Infrared ( LWIR or FIR ) window though other animals may experience them .
Many  प्रजाति can देखिए लाइट साथ बारंबारता बाहर the `` दृश्य वर्णक्रम  , '' which is defined in terms of human vision .
Bees and many other  कीट can detect पराबैंगनी लाइट , जिससे helps  them find nectar in flowers .
Plant species that depend on  कीट परागण may owe reproductive कामयाबी to उनके रूप in पराबैंगनी  light , rather than how colorful they appear to humans .
Birds , too , can see into the ultraviolet ( 300–400 nm ) ,  और कुछ have sex-dependent markings on उनके plumage कि हैं  visible only in the ultraviolet range .
Many  पशु कि can देखिए into the पराबैंगनी दायरा , however , can  not see red light or any other reddish wavelengths .
Bees '  दृश्य वर्णक्रम ends at परिचय 590nm , बस पहले the नारंगी  wavelengths start .
Birds , however , can see some  रेड wavelengths , लकिन नहीं as अनेक as  humans .
zebras ( or ) हैं अनेक प्रजाति of अफ़्रीकी equids ( घोड़ा परिवार  ) united by their distinctive black and white stripes .
Their stripes come  in अलग पैटर्न , अद्वितीय to प्रत्येक  individual .
They are generally social  पशु कि सजीव in छोटी harems to विशाल  herds .
Unlike  उनके closest रिश्तेदारों , घोड़े और asses , zebras  have never been truly domesticated .
There are three species of  zebras : the मैदान जेब्रा , the grévy 's  zebra and the mountain zebra .
The plains zebra and the mountain zebra  belong to the subgenus hippotigris , लकिन grévy 's जेब्रा is the एकमात्र प्रजाति  of subgenus Dolichohippus .
The latter resembles an ass , to which it is closely  सम्बन्धित , जबकि the पूर्व दो हैं अधिक horse-like  .
All three belong to  the genus equus , साथ साथ अन्य जीना  equids .
The unique stripes of  zebras मेक उन्हें एक of the पशु सबसे परिचित  to people .
They  occur in a किस्में of habitats , ऐसे as grasslands , savannas , वुडलैंड्स  , thorny scrublands , mountains , and coastal hills .
However , various anthropogenic factors have had  a कठोर प्रभाव on जेब्रा populations , in particular शिकार लिये खालें और आवास विनाश  .
grévy 's जेब्रा और the पहाड़ जेब्रा  are endangered .
While plains zebras are much more plentiful , one subspecies , the quagga , became extinct in the late 19th century – though there is currently a  योजना , पुकारा the quagga प्रोजेक्ट , कि aims to नस्ल zebras कि हैं phenotypically समान to the quagga in a प्रक्रम पुकारा प्रजनन  back .
Barry White , born  बैरी यूजीन कार्टर ( – ) , थी an अमरीकी composer और  singer-songwriter .
A two-time Grammy Award -winner known for his distinctive bass voice and romantic image , White 's greatest success came in the  1970s as a सोलो सिंगर और साथ the प्रेम असीमित ऑर्केस्ट्रा , crafting अनेक enduring आत्मा , दुर्गंध , और डिस्को  songs such as his two biggest hits , `` You 're the First , the Last , My Everything `` and `` Ca n't Get Enough of Your Love , Babe . ''
Along with  इसहाक़ हेज़ , श्वेत is माना by allmusic.com as a पायोनियर of डिस्को  music in the early 1970s .
During  the कोर्स of उसके करियर in the म्यूज़िक कारोबार , श्वेत हासिल 106 सुनहरा एल्बम विश्वव्यापी , 41 of जिससे  also attained platinum status .
White had 20 gold and 10 platinum singles , with worldwide sales in  excess of 100 लाख , according to आलोचकों ed होगन और  Wade Kergan .
His influences included Rev .  जेम्स क्लीवलैंड , रे चार्ल्स , एरीथा फ्रैंकलिन प्लस motown कलाकारों the supremes  , The Four Tops and Marvin Gaye .
Angelina Jolie ( , born Angelina Jolie Voight ;  जून 4 , 1975 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री , फिल्मी निदेशक , और screenwriter  .
She has received an Academy Award , two  स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार , और तीन सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार , और थी नामित हॉलीवुड  's highest-paid actress by Forbes in 2009 and 2011 .
Jolie  promotes humanitarian कल्याणकारी , और is विख्यात लिये उसके कार्य साथ शरणार्थियों as a खास envoy और पूर्व साख  Ambassador for the United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees ( UNHCR ) .
She has often been cited as  the संसार 's `` सबसे खूबसूरत '' स्त्री , a शीर्षक लिये जिससे वो रै प्राप्त  substantial media attention .
जोली बना उसके स्क्रीन डेब्यू as a चाइल्ड alongside उसके पिता jon वोइट in lookin ' to मिलेंगी आउट ( 1982 ) ,  but her film career began in earnest a decade later with the low-budget production Cyborg 2 ( 1993 ) .
Her  पहला अग्रणी भूमिका in a प्रमुख फिल्मी थी in the cyber-thriller  Hackers ( 1995 ) .
She starred in the critically acclaimed biographical television films George  वालेस ( 1997 ) और gia ( 1998 ) , और जीती an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री लिये उसके प्रदर्शन  in the drama Girl , Interrupted ( 1999 ) .
Jolie achieved wide fame after her portrayal of video game  नायिका लारा क्रॉफ्ट in लारा क्रॉफ्ट : मकबरा रेडर ( 2001 ) , और स्थापित herself among the highest-paid अभिनेत्रियों in हॉलीवुड  with the sequel The Cradle of Life ( 2003 ) .
She continued her action star career with Mr. &  mrs. स्मिथ ( 2005 ) और चाही ( 2008 ) —her biggest non-animated वाणिज्यिक सफलताओं to date—and प्राप्त further नाजुक acclaim लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in the dramas a mighty  Heart ( 2007 ) and Changeling ( 2008 ) , which earned her a nomination for an Academy Award for Best Actress .
Jolie made her directorial debut with  the wartime नाटक in the जमीन of रक्त और  Honey ( 2011 ) .
Divorced from actors Jonny Lee  मिलर और बिली bob थॉर्नटन , जोली अभी जीवनदान साथ कर्ता ब्रैड pitt  , in a relationship notable for fervent media attention .
Jolie and Pitt have three  biological children और तीन अपनाया  children .
A natural  मेहराब उत्पादित by the अपरदन of differentially  weathered rock in Jebel Kharaz , Jordan
Erosion is the process by which soil and  चट्टान हैं removed इससे the धरती 's सतह by exogenetic प्रक्रियाओं ऐसे as हवा or जल प्रवाह , और तब transported और deposited  in other locations .
While erosion is a natural process  , इंसान क्रियाएँ have increased by 10-40 टाइम्स the रेट at जिससे  erosion is occurring globally .
excessive अपरदन कल्याणकारी समस्याएं ऐसे as मरुस्थलीकरण , decreases in agricultural उत्पादकता due to जमीन degradation , sedimentation of जलमार्गों , और ecological पतन  due to loss of the nutrient rich upper soil layers .
Water and wind erosion are now the two primary causes of land degradation ; combined , they are responsible for 84 %  of degraded acreage , बनाना excessive अपरदन एक of the सबसे significant वैश्विक पर्यावरणीय  problems .
Industrial agriculture , deforestation , roads ,  anthropogenic जलवायु बदलें और शहरी sprawl हैं amongst the सबसे significant इंसान क्रियाएँ in लिहाज़ to उनके प्रभाव on stimulating अपरदन  .
However , there are many available alternative land use  practices कि can काटना or सीमा अपरदन , ऐसे as छत -building , no-till कृषि , और revegetation of  denuded soils .
Jersey Shore is an  अमरीकी वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी जिससे भागा on एमटीवी इससे दिसम्बर 3 , 2009 to दिसम्बर 20 , 2012 in the संयुक्त  States .
The series follows the lives of eight housemates  बिता उनके गर्मियाँ at the जर्सी shore in the u.S. राज्य of  New Jersey .
Season 2 followed the  डाल escaping the ठंडा पूर्वोत्तर शीत to मियामी बीच , साथ ऋतु 3 returning  to the Jersey Shore .
The  चौथी ऋतु , फिल्माया in इटली  , premiered on August 4 , 2011 .
The show  लौटे लिये a पांचवां ऋतु , at seaside हाइट्स on जनवरी  5 , 2012 .
The  पांचवां ऋतु finale aired on कूच  15 , 2012 .
On March 19 , 2012 , MTV confirmed that  the श्रेणी होता वापसी लिये उनके छठे ऋतु  .
On August 30 , 2012 , MTV announced that the series  होगा समाप्त बाद the छठे ऋतु , जिससे premiered on  October 4 .
The  श्रेणी finale aired on दिसम्बर  20 , 2012 .
The show debuted amid large amounts of controversy  regarding the उपयोग of the शब्द `` guido / guidette , '' portrayals of italian-american stereotypes , और scrutiny इससे स्थानीय क्युकी the डाल सदस्यों यहूद  not residents of the area .
The series  garnered रिकार्ड दरजा लिये एमटीवी , बनाना it the संजाल  's most viewed series telecast ever .
The series ' cast have also  महरूम credited साथ introducing अद्वितीय lexicon और वाक्यांश  into American popular culture .
The University of Chicago and the University of Oklahoma  हैं among the शैक्षणिक संस्थानों कि have था वर्ग or सम्मेलनों परिचय the दिखाएँ  .
In 2010 , the cast of Jersey  shore थी नामित on बारबरा walters ' 10 सबसे fascinating लोगों सूची , और the श्रेणी रै चूंकि महरूम  exported to dozens of countries worldwide .
There are several remakes of  the दिखाएँ in अन्य देशों , साथ दो नियत in the संयुक्त किंगडम ; the खूब ज्ञात geordie shore  , set in Newcastle upon Tyne , England .
the अन्य is the घाटियों , the वेल्श समतुल्य  , which is filmed and set in Cardiff .
The  तभी अन्य आधिकारिक रीमेक of the दिखाएँ is gandía shore  , set in Gandía , Spain .
सही
United States territory is any  extent of प्रदेश अंतर्गत the क्षेत्राधिकार of the संघीय सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य , सहित सब waters ( around आइलैंड्स  or continental tracts ) and all U.S . Naval vessels .
The United States has traditionally proclaimed the  sovereign अधिकारों लिये exploring , exploiting , conserving  , and managing its territory .
This  extent of territory is सब the क्षेत्रफल belonging to , और अंतर्गत the डोमिनियन of , the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय सरकारी ( जिससे शामिल tracts lying at a अलहदा  from the country ) for administrative and other purposes .
The  संयुक्त राज्य कुल territory शामिल a उपसमुच्चय  of political divisions .
The U.S. government is a government  साथ प्रतिनिधित्व शक्तियां अंतर्गत the  United States Constitution .
`` The powers not delegated to the  संयुक्त राज्य by the संविधान , nor निषिद्ध by it to the राज्य , हैं सुरक्षित to the राज्य क्रमशः  , or to the people '' by the Tenth Amendment .
Terminator 3 : Rise of the Machines ( commonly  abbreviated as t3 ) is a 2003 विज्ञान fiction कार्रवाई फिल्मी निर्देशित by जोनाथन mostow और अभिनीत अर्नाल्ड श्वार्ज़नेगर  , Nick Stahl , Claire Danes and Kristanna Loken .
It is the  दूसरी sequel to the टर्मिनेटर  ( 1984 ) .
After  स्काईनेट fails to मार सारा connor पहले उसके बेटे is born और to मार जॉन खुद as a चाइल्ड , it भेजना वापस another  Terminator , the T-X , in an attempt to wipe out as many Resistance officers as possible .
This includes John 's future wife ,  लकिन नहीं जॉन खुद as उसके whereabouts  are unknown to Skynet .
John 's life is  लगाई in खतरे जब the  T-X accidentally finds him .
A  cord of लकडी
The cord is a unit of measure of dry  आवाज़ प्रयुक्त in कनाडा और the संयुक्त राज्य to माप ईधन  and pulpwood .
A cord is the amount of wood that , when ``  क्रमित और खूब stowed '' ( arranged so टुकड़े हैं लकीर , समानांतर , छु और कॉम्पैक्ट ) , occupies  a volume of .
This corresponds to a well stacked woodpile high , long ,  और गहन ; or कोई अन्य व्यवस्था of रैखिक माप कि yields the वही  volume .
the नाम cord संभवतः आता इससे  the use of a cord or string to measure it .
The , is an 8-bit  हैंडहेल्ड वीडियो खेल यंत्र विकसित  and manufactured by Nintendo .
It was  released in जापानी on , in उत्तर अमेरिका in , और in यूरोपीय  on .
It is the first handheld console in the Game Boy  लकीर , और थी निर्मित by gunpei yokoi और निन्टेंडो शोध & विकास 1 —the वही स्टाफ जो था designed the खेल &  Watch series as well as several popular games for the Nintendo Entertainment System .
Redesigned  संस्करण यहूद released in 1996 और 1998 , in the रूप  of Game Boy Pocket , and Game Boy Light ( Japan only ) , respectively .
The Game Boy is Nintendo 's second handheld system following the Game & Watch series  introduced in , और it संयुक्त सुविधाएँ इससे दोनो the निन्टेंडो entertainment प्रणाली और  Game & Watch .
It was  originally bundled साथ  the puzzle game Tetris .
As part of the fourth generation of gaming , the Game Boy competed with the Sega Game  गियर , atari लिंक्स , और the turboexpress  .
Despite these  अन्य technologically श्रेष्ठ हैंडहेल्ड consoles , the  Game Boy was a tremendous success .
the खेल लड़के और इसके successor , the खेल लड़के रंग , have  both combined sold 118.69 million units worldwide .
Upon its  रिलीज in the संयुक्त राज्य , it बेची इसके संपूर्ण शिपमेंट  of one million units within weeks .
The World Trade Center is a complex of buildings  अंतर्गत निर्माण in निम्नतर मैनहटन , नई यॉर्क नगर , संयुक्त राज्य , replacing an पहले जटिल of सात इमारतें  with the same name on the same site .
The original World Trade Center featured  लैंडमार्क जुड़वा मीनारें , जिससे खोली on अप्रैल 4 , 1973 और यहूद नष्ट in the सितंबर 11 हमले of 2001 , साथ साथ  7 World Trade Center .
The other  इमारतें in the जटिल यहूद क्षतिग्रस्त in the हमले , और उनके  ruins were eventually demolished .
The site is being  rebuilt साथ पाँच नई skyscrapers और a मेमोरियल  to those killed in the attacks .
, only  एक skyscraper रै महरूम समाप्त ; the अन्य चार हैं अपेक्षित  to be completed before 2020 .
One  संसार व्यापार बीच होगा be the सीसे भवन लिये the  new complex , reaching more than 100 stories at its completion .
It became the tallest building in New York  नगर on अप्रैल 30 , 2012 , और is अपेक्षित to be समाप्त  by 2013 .
A  छठे मीनार is प्रतीक्षारत पुष्टि  .
At the time of their completion , the original 1 World Trade Center ( the North Tower ) and 2  संसार व्यापार बीच ( the दक्षिण मीनार ) , ज्ञात collectively as the `` जुड़वा मीनारें '' , यहूद the tallest इमारतें in the संसार  .
the अन्य इमारतें शामिल 3 wtc ( the मैरियट संसार  Trade Center ) , 4 WTC , 5 WTC , 6 WTC , and 7 WTC .
All of these buildings  यहूद निर्मित between 1975 और 1985  .
The cost for the  निर्माण थी $ 400 लाख ( $ in डॉलर  ) .
The complex was located in the heart of  नई यॉर्क नगर 's शहर वित्तीय ज़िला और contained 13.4 लाख वर्गाकार  feet ( 1.24 million m2 ) of office space .
The  संसार व्यापार बीच अनुभवी a आग on  , 1975 , a bombing on , 1993 and a robbery on , 1998 .
In 1998 , the Port Authority decided to privatize the World Trade  बीच , पट्टे the इमारतें to a निजी कम्पनी to मैनेज , और awarded the पट्टे to silverstein गुण  in .
On the  morning of सितंबर 11 , 2001 , al-qaeda -संबद्धd hijackers उड़ाया दो बोइंग 767 jets  into the complex , one into each tower , in a coordinated terrorist attack .
After burning for 56 minutes , the South Tower ( 2 ) collapsed , followed a half-hour later by the  उत्तर मीनार ( 1 ) , साथ the हमले on the संसार व्यापार बीच  resulting in 2,753 deaths .
Falling debris  इससे the मीनारें , संयुक्त साथ फ़ायर कि the मलबा initiated in अनेक surrounding इमारतें , led to the आंशिक or पूरा पतन of सब the अन्य इमारतें in the जटिल  and caused catastrophic damage to ten other large structures in the surrounding area .
The process of  क्लीनअप और रिकवरी at the संसार व्यापार बीच  site took eight months .
Over the following  सालो , योजनाएँ लिये a rebuilt संसार व्यापार बीच  took form .
The first new building at the site was 7 World  व्यापार बीच , जिससे खोली in  .
The Lower Manhattan Development  निगम ( lmdc ) , स्थापित in to oversee the पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम , व्यवस्थित प्रतियोगिताओं to चुनें  a site plan and memorial design .
