Memory Foundations , designed by Daniel Libeskind ,  थी चयनित as the निपुण योजना , लकिन इस गई through substantial परिवर्तन in डिज़ाइन  .
The new World Trade Center complex will include One  संसार व्यापार बीच , तीन अन्य high-rise दफ्तर मीनारें , और the नेशनल  September 11 Memorial & Museum .
San  जिबरील kyu
San Bernardino  kyu , साथ mt . सैन gorgonio in the अग्रभूमि और बिग भालू झील  in the background .
The Transverse Ranges are  a समूह of पहाड़ सीमाएँ of दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया , in the प्रशांत coast सीमाएँ physiographic  region in North America .
The Transverse Ranges begin at the southern end of the California Coast  सीमाएँ और झूठ between सांता बारबरा और सैन डिएगो  counties .
They derive the name Transverse  सीमाएँ due to उनके east-west अभिविन्यास , बनाना उन्हें अनुप्रस्थ to the सामान्य north-south अभिविन्यास  of most of California 's coastal mountains .
Periodic  तालिका साथ इलेक्ट्रॉन शेल
An electron shell may be  विचार of as an कक्षा followed by electrons  around an atom 's nucleus .
The closest shell to the  केंद्रक is पुकारा the `` 1 शेल '' ( भी पुकारा `` k शेल '' ) , followed by the `` 2 शेल '' ( or `` l शेल '' ) , तब the `` 3 शेल '' ( or ``  M shell '' ) , and so on farther and farther from the nucleus .
The shell letters  k , l , m , ... , प्रयुक्त in the x-ray  notation , are alphabetical .
Each shell can contain only a fixed number of electrons : The 1st shell can hold up to two  electrons , the 2nd शेल can थाम up to आठ electrons , the 3rd शेल can थाम up to 18 , और 4th शेल can थाम up to 32  and so on .
Since electrons are electrically attracted to the nucleus , an atom 's electrons will  generally occupy बाहरी शेल तभी if the अधिक भीतरी शेल have already महरूम completely भर by अन्य  electrons .
however , इस is नहीं a सख्त आवश्यकता : अणु may  have two or even three incomplete outer shells .
( See Madelung  नियम लिये अधिक विवरण  . )
For an explanation of why electrons  मौजूद in ये शेल देखिए इलेक्ट्रॉन विन्यास  .
The  electrons in the outermost occupied शेल ( or शेल )  determine the chemical properties of the atom ; it is called the valence shell .
Each shell consists of one or  अधिक subshells , और प्रत्येक subshell consists of एक or अधिक परमाणु orbitals  .
vickie lynn मार्शल ( née होगन ; नवम्बर 28 , 1967 – फ़रवरी 8 , 2007 ) , ज्ञात by उसके moniker anna निकोल स्मिथ , थी an  American model , actress , and television personality .
Smith first gained popularity in Playboy  , बनने the 1993 संगिनी of the साल .
She modeled for  कपडे कंपनियाँ , सहित अंदाज़ा जीन्स और लेन  Bryant .
Smith  dropped आउट of ऊँची स्कूल और थी  married in 1985 .
Her highly publicized second marriage to oil business mogul ,  J. हावर्ड मार्शल , 62 सालो उसके वरिष्ठ , resulted in अटकलें कि वो शादीशुदा  the octogenarian for his money , which she denied .
Following Marshall 's death ,  स्मिथ began a lengthy विधिक बैटल over a  share of his estate .
Her case , Marshall v. Marshall , reached the U.S. Supreme Court on a  सवाल of संघीय क्षेत्राधिकार , और again on a सवाल of दिवालियापन अदालत प्राधिकार (  now called Stern v. Marshall ) .
Smith died on February 8 , 2007 in a Hollywood , Florida hotel  रूम as a परिणाम of an overdose of नुस्खा  drugs .
Within the final six months of her life , Smith was the focus of a  नवीनीकृत दबायें कवरेज surrounding the मौत of उसके बेटे , डेनियल , और the paternity और कस्टडी बैटल over उसके नवजात बेटी , dannielynn  .
the is एक denomination of  Japanese yen .
The current design was first minted in 1959  using जापानी वर्ण ज्ञात as the `` नई स्क्रिप्ट `` , और यहूद भी minted  from 1949-1958 using `` old-script '' Japanese characters .
Five-yen coins date to 1870 (  जब , due to the much उच्चतर मान of the येन  , they were minted in gold ) .
The front of the coin depicts a rice plant growing out of the water , with `` five yen '' written in kanji ;  the वापस is stamped साथ `` जापानी '' और the साल of समस्या , भी  in kanji , separated by sprouts of a tree .
The three graphic  तत्व of the सिक्का represent कृषि और fisheries , the कुंजी तत्व  of the Japanese first-sector economy .
around a छेद , वहीँ is a गियर  that represents industry .

TLC is an American  लड़की समूह जिनकी रंगमंडल spanned r & b , हिप हॉप , आत्मा  , funk , and new jack swing .
Originally consisting of singer Tionne `` T-Boz '' Watkins , rapper Lisa `` Left Eye '' Lopes and singer  rozonda `` chilli '' थामस , the समूह मिला unprecedented कामयाबी in the 1990s जबकि भी enduring a श्रेणी of spats साथ the विधि , प्रत्येक अन्य , और the समूह 's रिकार्ड  label .
initially , tlc हासिल वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी following the रिलीज  of their debut album Ooooooohhh ...
On the TLC Tip ,  जिससे बेची 6 लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी  .
However , it was their  दूसरी एल्बम , crazysexycool , कि catapulted the समूह to superstar  status .
CrazySexyCool  गई on to be certified डायमंड by the riaa — a पहला लिये  a female group , and eventually sold 23 million copies worldwide .
Five years later , the group  released उनके तीसरा एल्बम fanmail , जिससे became the समूह 's पहला एल्बम to डेब्यू at क्रमांक  one and sold more than 11 million copies worldwide .
The  subsequent दौरे following fanmails रिलीज became the उच्चतम  grossing tour of all time by a female band .
In 2002 , Lisa ``  बाएँ नजर '' lopes died in a car दुर्घटना  in Honduras .
Seven months later , T-Boz and Chilli released the group 's fourth album 3D ,  जिससे बेची 2 लाख नक़ल विश्वव्यापी , it प्रदर्शित unreleased vocals इससे  Left Eye .
बिलबोर्ड पत्रिका क्रमित tlc as एक of the  greatest musical trios .
Between 1992 and 2003  , the बैंड संचित टेन शीर्ष टेन singles , चार क्रमांक एक singles , चार multi-platinum  albums , and four Grammy Awards .
At the end of 1999 ,  tlc थी क्रमित as the सातवाँ सबसे  successful act of the 1990s by Billboard .
in 2008 , the समूह थी inducted into the सब समय hot 100  Artist Hall of Fame by the same magazine , at 56th place .
कि साल it थी भी सूचीबद्ध as the # 25 r & b/hip-hop  artist of the preceding 25 years .
TLC has sold more than 65 million records worldwide and they are ranked as  the दूसरी बेहतरीन selling मादा समूह of सब समय , और the बेहतरीन selling  female R & B group of all time .
In 2012 , TLC ranked 12th on VH1 's 100 Greatest Women in  म्यूज़िक , होने क्रमित the क्रमांक एक सब लड़की समूह on कि  list .
Tarzan is a 1999 American animated adventure  फिल्मी उत्पादित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी विशेषता एनिमेशन और  distributed by Walt Disney Pictures .
The 37th film in the Walt Disney Animated  क्लासिक , it is आधारित on the स्टोरी टार्ज़न of the apes by एडगर राइस बरोज , और is the तभी प्रमुख  motion picture version of the story Tarzan property to be animated .
Directed by Chris Buck and Kevin Lima  साथ a पटकथा by tab मर्फी , bob tzudiker , और नोनी श्वेत , टार्ज़न सुविधाएँ the आवाज़ें of टोनी goldwyn , minnie ड्राइवर , ग्लेन बंद , और रोजी o'donnell  with Brian Blessed , Lance Henriksen , Wayne Knight , and Nigel Hawthorne .
It was  the पिछला bona fide hit पहले the डिज़्नी slump of the जल्दी 2000s grossing $ 171,091,819 domestically और $ 448,191,819  worldwide , outgrossing its predecessors Hercules ( 1997 ) and Mulan ( 1998 ) .
At the time of its release , its production budget of $ 130 million made it the most expensive  एनिमेटेड फिल्मी कभी बना , जबतक अव्वल by डिज़्नी 's अपना $ 140 लाख खजाना  Planet in 2002 .
It  थी भी the पहला डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड विशेषता to खोलें at # 1  since Pocahontas .
This was the last major box  दफ्तर कामयाबी of the डिज़्नी पुनर्जागरण  .
आयल मंच p-51 बंद the ब्राज़ीलियाई coast  is a semi-submersible platform .
Oil  मंच mittelplate in  the North sea
An oil  मंच , ( offshore मंच or colloquially आयल रिग ) is a विशाल ढांचा साथ सुविधाएं to ड्रिल कुएं , to निकालें और प्रक्रम आयल और प्राकृतिक गैस , और to temporarily  store product until it can be brought to shore for refining and marketing .
In many  मामले , the मंच contains सुविधाएं to हाउस the  workforce as well .
depending on the हालातों , the मंच may be फिक्स्ड to the समंदर मंजिल  , may consist of an artificial island , or may float .
Remote subsea wells  may भी be कनेक्ट to a मंच by प्रवाह  lines and by umbilical connections .
These subsea  समाधान may consist of एक or अधिक subsea कुएं , or of एक or अधिक manifold  centres for multiple wells .
Slaughter is the killing of  पशु , प्रायः कि of घरेलू पशुधन  for food .
The animals  सबसे commonly slaughtered लिये खाना हैं चौपायों , जल भैंस ( लिये बीफ और वील ) , शीप , बकरियों ( लिये मेमने और मटन ) , सूअर ( लिये पोर्क ) , घोड़े ( लिये घोड़ा मांस ) , और fowl , largely मुर्गियों  , turkeys , and ducks and increasingly fish from the aquaculture industry ( fish farming ) .
The  श्वेत हाउस , the अध्यक्ष 's आधिकारिक निवास और बीच  of the administration
Under the United States Constitution , the President of the  संयुक्त राज्य is the सिर of राज्य और सिर of सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य  .
As chief of the executive  शाखा और सिर of the संघीय सरकारी as a पूरे , the प्रेसिडेंसी is the उच्चतम राजनैतिक  office in the United States by influence and recognition .
The  अध्यक्ष is भी the commander-in-chief of the  United States Armed Forces .
The president is indirectly elected to a four-year term by an Electoral College ( or by the House of  प्रतिनिधि चाहिए the चुनावी कॉलेज असफल to पुरस्कार an निरपेक्ष बहुमत of मत to कोई व्यक्ति  ) .
Since the ratification of the Twenty-second Amendment to the United  राज्य संविधान in 1951 , no व्यक्ति may be निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष अधिक than twice , और no एक जो रै परोसा अधिक than दो सालो of a पद to जिससे किसी else थी  elected may be elected more than once .
Upon the  मौत , इस्तीफा , or हटाना इससे दफ्तर of an लाज़िम  President , the Vice President assumes the office .
The President must be at  तनिक 35 सालो of आयु और a `` प्राकृतिक  born '' citizen of the United States .
This list includes only those persons who were sworn into office as president following the  अनुसमर्थन of the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान , जिससे took प्रभाव on कूच 4 , 1789  .
For American leaders before this  अनुसमर्थन , देखिए अध्यक्ष of the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस  .
The list does not include any  एक्टिंग राष्ट्रपतियों अंतर्गत the twenty-fifth amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य  Constitution .
There have been 43 people sworn into office , and 44 presidencies ,  as ग्रोवर क्लीवलैंड परोसा दो non-consecutive शर्तें और is गिने क्रमबद्धता as दोनो  the 22nd and 24th president .
Of the individuals elected as president , four died in office of natural causes ( William Henry Harrison , Zachary Taylor  , वारेन G. हार्डिंग , और फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट ) , चार यहूद assassinated ( अब्राहम lincoln , जेम्स A. गारफ़ील्ड , विलियम mckinley , और जॉन F. कैनेडी ) और एक resigned ( रिचर्ड निक्सन  ) .
George Washington , the first  अध्यक्ष , थी उदघाटन in 1789 बाद a सर्वसम्मत vote of the  Electoral College .
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest  समय in दफ्तर साथ 32 दिनों in 1841 , और फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट खर्च the longest साथ  over twelve years , but died shortly into his fourth term in 1945 .
He is the only president to serve more than two terms , and a constitutional  amendment , affecting राष्ट्रपतियों बाद हैरी ट्रूमैन , थी passed to सीमा the क्रमांक of टाइम्स  an individual can be elected president .
Andrew Jackson , the seventh president , was  the पहला to be निर्वाचित by मेन of सब वर्ग in 1828 बाद सबसे कानून barring non-land-owners  from voting were repealed .
वारेन हार्डिंग थी the पहला निर्वाचित बाद महिलाओं gained  voting rights in 1920 .
History records four presidents – John Q Adams ,  रदरफोर्ड B. हेज़ , बेंजामिन हैरिसन और जार्ज W. बुश – जो खोया the  popular vote but assumed office .
John F.  कैनेडी रै महरूम the तभी अध्यक्ष of रोमन कैथोलिक आस्था , और the वर्तमान अध्यक्ष  , Barack Obama , is the first president of African descent .
Several firearms with detachable suppressors , from top to  नीचे : an uzi , an ar-15 , a heckler & koch खासियत रणनीतिक , a beretta 92fs , और a sig मच्छर  .
bolt कार्रवाई rimfire  rifle with suppressor
AWM-F sniper rifle  साथ संलग्न suppressor  .
A suppressor , sound suppressor , or sound moderator , is a device attached to or part of  the बैरल of a firearm जिससे reduces the राशि of रव , और प्रायः the राशि of muzzle फ्लैश , उत्पन्न by फायरिंग  the weapon .
A suppressor can be  प्रयुक्त दोनो साथ a firearm और साथ  compressed air gun .
Though it is sometimes referred to as a silencer , this term  is a misnomer popularized by cinematic fiction : the ध्वनि of a प्रक्षेप्य , विशेषकर  one moving faster than the speed of sound , through the air can not be eliminated .
Using a suppressor in long distance shooting ( i.e . greater  than 300 मीटर ) can lessen , or retard , the रपट at the पल of प्रभाव , और बनाएँ the छाप of खामोशी निकट  the target .
The noise heard near the muzzle  as a प्रक्षेप्य पत्ते the बैरल , हालांकि subdued  , is not silent at all .
A suppressor is usually a metal cylinder with internal mechanisms to reduce  the ध्वनि of फायरिंग by slowing the escaping propellant गैस और sometimes by  reducing the velocity of the bullet .
Early suppressors  यहूद निर्मित around the शुरूआत of the  20th century by several inventors .
American inventor Hiram Percy Maxim ( not to be confused with Hiram Stevens Maxim , Hiram Percy 's father , and the inventor  of the कहावत यंत्र गन ) , is credited साथ inventing और selling the पहला commercially कामयाब मॉडल circa 1902  ( patented 30 March 1909 ) .
Maxim gave  उसके यंत्र the trademarked नाम  Maxim Silencer .
The muffler for internal combustion engines was developed in parallel with the firearm suppressor by Maxim in the early 20th century ,  using अनेक of the वही तकनीकों to provide quieter-running इंजन ( in अनेक यूरोपीय देशों ऑटोमोबाइल mufflers हैं स्टिल  called silencers ) .
The word silencer in reference to gun suppressor remains in widespread use , although it has since  गिरे आउट of एहसान साथ कुछ , विशेषकर among the firearms उद्योग , होने replaced साथ the अधिक वस्तुतः सटीक पद ध्वनि suppressor or बस suppressor , क्युकी a `` ध्वनि suppressor '' करता नहीं `` खामोशी '' कोई हथियार , बल्कि it  eliminates muzzle flash and reduces the sonic pressure of a firearm discharging .
Common usage and U.S.  विधान भाषा एहसान the historically  earlier term , silencer .
In U.S. law , the terms ``  firearm मफलर '' और `` firearm silencer  '' are synonymous .
suppressors यहूद regularly प्रयुक्त by एजेंटों of the संयुक्त राज्य दफ्तर of रणनीतिक  Services , who favored the newly designed High Standard HDM .22 Long Rifle pistol during World War II .
OSS Director William Joseph `` Wild  विधेयक '' डोनोवन demonstrated the पिस्टल लिये अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन  D. Roosevelt at the White House .
According to OSS research chief Stanley Lovell , Donovan ( an old  और विश्वसनीय dost of the अध्यक्ष ) थी लहराया into the ओवल दफ्तर , जहाँ रूज़वेल्ट थी dictating  a letter .
While Roosevelt finished  उसके संदेश , डोनोवन turned उसके वापस और fired टेन गोलियाँ into a sandbag he था brought  with him , announced what he had done and handed the smoking gun to the astonished president .
The British SOE ( Special Operations Executive ) Welrod assassination pistol with an integral suppressor was  भी प्रयुक्त by the अमरीकी oss on clandestine परिचालन in नाजी occupied यूरोपीय दौरान the दूसरी संसार  War .
beatrice `` bea '' आर्थर ( may 13 , 1922 – अप्रैल 25 , 2009 ) थी an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री  , comedienne , and singer whose career spanned seven decades .
Arthur achieved fame as the  अक्षर maude findlay on the 1970s sitcoms सब in the परिवार और maude , और as डोरोथी zbornak on the 1980s  sitcom The Golden Girls , winning Emmy Awards for both roles .
A stage actress both before and after her television success , she won the Tony  पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन प्रदर्शित अभिनेत्री in a musical लिये उसके प्रदर्शन as वीरा चार्ल्स in the असली डाल of  Mame ( 1966 ) .
is a 2011  जापानी 3d computer-animated फिल्मी आधारित on the tekken वीडियो खेल श्रेणी , उत्पादित  by Digital Frontier and distributed by Asmik Ace Entertainment in association with Bandai Entertainment .
The film premiered in North America by Bandai Entertainment on July 26 , 2011 , and in  ऑस्ट्रेलिया on जुलाई 27 , 2011 in a खास विशेष one-off स्क्रीनिंग .

This film was  भी released on dvd on नवम्बर 22 , 2011 ( 2d  Version only ) .

For a  चर्चा of nonprofit , voluntary पड़ोस वकालत  groups , see neighborhood association .
In the United States , a homeowner association is a corporation formed by  a रियल एस्टेट डेवलपर लिये the purpose of विपणन , मैनेजिंग , और selling of घरों  and lots in a residential subdivision .
It grants the developer privileged voting rights in governing the  संघ , जबकि allowing the डेवलपर to निकास वित्तीय और विधिक जिम्मेदारी of the  organization , typically by transferring ownership of the association to the homeowners after selling off a predetermined number of lots .
Membership in the homeowners association by a residential  खरीदार is typically a कंडीशन of खरीदें ; a खरीदार is n't दिए an विकल्प to अस्वीकृत  it .
Most  homeowner एसोसिएशन हैं incorporated , और हैं विषय to राज्य statutes कि govern non-profit corporations  and homeowner associations .
State  oversight of homeowner एसोसिएशन is minimal , और मुख्यतः takes  the form of laws which are inconsistent from state to state .
Some states , such as Florida and California , have a large body of homeowner association  विधि , और कुछ राज्य , ऐसे as मैसाचुसेट्स , have वस्तुतः no homeowner  association law .
The fastest growing form of housing  in the संयुक्त राज्य आज is common-interest developments ( cids ) , a श्रेणी कि शामिल planned-unit developments of single-family  homes , condominiums , and cooperative apartments .
Since 1964 , homeowner associations have  become increasingly आम in the  USA .
The Community  एसोसिएशन संस्थान व्यापार संघ अनुमानित कि hoas governed 24.8  million American homes and 62 million residents in 2010 .
A  prize-winning lilac-and-white silkie
There are many breeds of Guinea pig which have  महरूम विकसित चूंकि इसके domestication ca . 5000 bc  .
Breeds vary widely in appearance and  purpose , ranging इससे दिखाएँ breeds साथ long , बहती बाल to those in उपयोग as मॉडल  organisms by science .
From ca . 1200 AD to the Spanish  conquest of the इन्का साम्राज्य in 1532 , चयनात्मक प्रजनन by स्वदेशी दक्षिण अमरीकी peoples resulted in अनेक किस्में of घरेलू गिनी  pigs , which form the basis for some of the modern domestic breeds .
Early Andean breeds were primarily kept as agricultural stock  लिये खाना , और प्रयत्न at improving the गिनी सुअर as a खाना सोर्स continue to  the modern era .
With the export of Guinea pigs to Europe in the 15th century  , the लक्ष्य in प्रजनन shifted to फ़ोकस on the विकास of appealing  pets .
To this end ,  विभिन्न प्रतिस्पर्धी प्रजनन संगठन यहूद  founded by fanciers .
The American Cavy Breeders  संघ , an adjunct to the अमरीकी खरगोश प्रजनक संघ , is the शासी देह  in the United States and Canada .
The British Cavy  परिषद governs cavy क्लब in the संयुक्त किंगडम  .
Similar  संगठन मौजूद in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ( ऑस्ट्रेलियाई नेशनल cavy परिषद ) और नई जीलैंड  ( New Zealand Cavy Club ) .
Each club  publishes इसके अपना मानक of पूर्णता और determines  which breeds are eligible for showing .
New breeds continue  to emerge in the 21st सदी  .
Though there are  अनेक breeds of गिनी सुअर , तभी a few breeds हैं commonly मिला on the  show table as pets .
Most Guinea  सूअर मिला as पालतु यहूद either मिला अवांछनीय by प्रजनक or यहूद करवाया to be सुखद पालतु regardless  of how well they meet the breed standard of perfection .
the छोटी बाल , abyssinian , peruvian और sheltie ( उर्फ silkie ) breeds हैं those सबसे अक्सर देखी as पालतु ,  and the former three are the core breeds in the history of the competitive showing of Guinea pigs .
In addition to their  मानक रूप , nearly सब breeds आइये in a साटन रूपांतर  .
Satins , due to their hollow hair  shafts , possess coats of a खास gloss और  shine .
However , there is  growing प्रमाण कि the जीनों जिम्मेदार लिये the साटन कोट भी can कारण कठोर अस्थि समस्याएं , सहित  Osteodystrophy and Paget 's disease .
Showing Satin variations is prohibited by  कुछ cavy प्रजनक ' एसोसिएशन क्युकी of एनिमल  welfare reasons .
All cavy breeds  have कुछ साझा सामान्य मानकों : the सिर प्रोफ़ाइल चाहिए be rounded  , with large eyes and large , smooth ears .
The body should be strong  और of कॉम्पैक्ट निर्माण  .
Coat colour should in all  विसंगतियाँ be clearly पारिभाषित और thorough  from root to tip .
These  मानकों हैं बेहतरीन मिले by long स्थापित , commonly करवाया breeds , as उनके प्रजनक have  had enough time and animals to effectively breed for these qualities .
The coat colour ideal of good definition and  thoroughness is rarely मिले by अन्य than the चिकना coated breeds , जिससे have था खूब स्थापित , पृथक  breeding lines for different colours .
State  स्कूलों ( भी ज्ञात as पब्लिक स्कूलों or सरकारी स्कूलों ) generally refer to प्राथमिक or द्वितीयक स्कूलों mandated लिये or offered to सब children  without charge paid for , in whole or in part , by taxation .
The term may also refer to institutions  of post-secondary शिक्षा वित्तपोषित , in पूरे or in भाग , और overseen  by government .
The  राइबोसोम assembles polymeric प्रोटीन अणुओं जिनकी अनुक्रम is नियंत्रित  by the sequence of messenger RNA molecules .
इस is जरूरी by सब जीना  cells and associated viruses .
The  राइबोसोम ( इससे ribonucleic एसिड और the यूनानी सोम , अर्थ `` देह '' ) is a विशाल और जटिल आणविक  machine , found within all living cells , that serves as the primary site of biological protein synthesis ( translation ) .
Ribosomes link amino  acids साथ in the अनुक्रम निर्दिष्ट by  messenger RNA ( mRNA ) molecules .
Ribosomes consist of two major subunits—the small  ribosomal subunit पढ़े the mrna , जबकि the विशाल subunit joins  amino acids to form a polypeptide chain .
Each subunit is composed of one or more  ribosomal rna ( rrna ) अणुओं और a किस्में of  proteins .
The sequence of DNA encoding for a  प्रोटीन may be कॉपी अनेक टाइम्स into मेसेंजर rna  ( mRNA ) chains of a similar sequence .
Ribosomes can bind to  an mrna कड़ी और उपयोग it as a टेम्पलेट लिये determining  the correct sequence of amino acids in a particular protein .
Amino acids are selected  , एकत्रित और carried to the राइबोसोम by ट्रांसफ़र rna ( trna अणुओं ) , जिससे डालें एक  part of the ribosome and bind to the messenger RNA chain .
The attached amino acids are  तब linked साथ by another भाग of the  ribosome .
Once the protein is  उत्पादित , it can तब 'fold ' to उपज a विशिष्ट कार्यात्मक three-dimensional  structure .
A ribosome is made from complexes of  rnas और प्रोटीन और is इसलिए a ribonucleoprotein  .
Each ribosome is divided into two subunits : the smaller  subunit बांधता to the mrna पैटर्न , जबकि the larger subunit बांधता  to the tRNA and the amino acids .
When a ribosome finishes reading an mRNA molecule  , ये दो subunits विभाजित अलावा  .
Ribosomes are ribozymes , because the  catalytic peptidyl transferase कार्यकलाप कि कड़ी अमीनो acids साथ is performed  by the ribosomal RNA .
Ribosomes from  जीवाणु , आर्किया और eukaryotes ( the तीन डोमेन of जीवन on धरती ) differ in उनके  size , sequence , structure , and the ratio of protein to RNA .
The differences in structure allow some  एंटीबायोटिक to मार जीवाणु by inhibiting उनके ribosomes , जबकि leaving इंसान ribosomes  unaffected .
In bacteria and archaea , more than one ribosome may move  साथ a सिंगल mrna कड़ी at एक समय , प्रत्येक `` पढना '' इसके अनुक्रम और producing a सम्बन्धित  protein molecule .
The ribosomes in the mitochondria of  eukaryotic कोशिकाएं functionally resemble अनेक सुविधाएँ of those in जीवाणु , reflecting the  likely evolutionary origin of mitochondria .
Albert Claude , Christian de Duve ,  और जार्ज एमिल palade यहूद jointly awarded the नोबेल पुरस्कार in physiology or आयुर्विज्ञान  , in 1974 , for the discovery of the ribosomes .
The Nobel  पुरस्कार in रसायन 2009 थी awarded to venkatraman रामकृष्णन , थामस A. steitz और एडीए E. yonath लिये determining the विस्तृत ढांचा  and mechanism of the ribosome .
The  सरलीकृत आतंरिक ढांचा of  a chloroplast
Overview of the Calvin  साईकिल और कार्बन fixation
The  light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ of photosynthesis हैं रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ  that convert carbon dioxide and other compounds into glucose .
These reactions occur in the  stroma , the fluid-filled क्षेत्रफल of a हरितलवक  outside of the thylakoid membranes .
These reactions take the  light-dependent प्रतिक्रियाएँ और perform further रासायनिक प्रक्रियाओं  on them .
There are three phases to the light-independent reactions ,  collectively पुकारा the calvin साईकिल : कार्बन fixation , कटौती प्रतिक्रियाएँ , और ribulose  1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration .
Despite its name ,  इस प्रक्रम occurs तभी जब लाइट is  available .
Plants do not  carry आउट the calvin साईकिल by  night .
They , instead , release sucrose  into the फ्लोएम इससे उनके मंड reserves  .
This process happens when light is available independent of the kind of photosynthesis ( C3 carbon fixation , C4 carbon fixation , and  crassulacean एसिड चयापचय ) ; कैम पौधे स्टोर malic एसिड in उनके vacuoles प्रत्येक रात्रि और रिलीज it by दिन in  order to make this process work .
In mathematics , a square number or  पूर्ण वर्गाकार is an पूर्णांक कि is the वर्गाकार of an पूर्णांक  ; in other words , it is the product of some integer with itself .
For  उदाहरण , 9 is a वर्गाकार क्रमांक ,  since it can be written as .
The usual notation for the formula for  the वर्गाकार of a क्रमांक is नहीं the उत्पाद , लकिन the समतुल्य घातांक  , usually pronounced as `` squared '' .
The name square number comes  इससे the नाम of the आकार ;  see below .
वर्गाकार संख्याएँ हैं  non-negative .
Another way of saying  कि a ( non-negative ) क्रमांक is a वर्गाकार क्रमांक , is  that its square roots are again integers .
For example ,  = ±3 , so 9 is a वर्गाकार क्रमांक  .
A  धनात्मक पूर्णांक कि रै no पूर्ण वर्गाकार divisors  except 1 is called square-free .
For a non-negative integer , the  th वर्गाकार क्रमांक is , साथ होने the zeroth वर्गाकार .
The  अवधारणा of वर्गाकार can be विस्तारित to  some other number systems .
If rational numbers are included , then a square is the ratio  of दो वर्गाकार integers , और , conversely , the अनुपात of दो वर्गाकार integers is a वर्गाकार ( e.g. , 4/9 = (  2/3 ) 2 ) .
Starting with 1 ,  वहीँ हैं वर्गाकार संख्याएँ up to और सहित , जहाँ the अभिव्यक्ति  represents the floor of the number .
The Era of Good Feelings marked a period in the political history of  the संयुक्त राज्य कि reflected a भाव of नेशनल purpose और a ख्वाहिश लिये एकता among अमेरिकी in the aftermath of the  Napoleonic Wars .
The  era देखी the पतन of the federalist पार्टी और an समाप्त to the कड़वा दलगत विवादों between  it and the dominant Democratic-Republican party during the First Party System .
President James Monroe  endeavored to downplay दलगत संबद्ध in बनाना उसके nominations , साथ the परम लक्ष्य of नेशनल एकता  and eliminating parties altogether from national politics .
The period is so closely associated with  मुनरो 's प्रेसिडेंसी ( 1817–1825 ) और उसके प्रशासनिक लक्ष्य कि उसके नाम और  the era are virtually synonymous .
The Era of Good Feelings marked a transition in  अमरीकी राजनीती साथ the समाप्त of the federalist पार्टी as अमेरिका began to develop बाद  the War of 1812 .
While America was experiencing  विकास और समृद्धि बाद the युद्ध साथ ब्रिटेन , इस era भी marks the पहला उदाहरण of आर्थिक परेशानियों  in the growing United States .
Mirroring the American System proposed by Henry Clay ,  सुरक्षात्मक tariffs और the chartering of the दूसरी बैंको of the संयुक्त राज्य जटिल the टेंशन between  the North and South with the coming of the first financial crisis .
While the term “Era of Good Feelings” is usually viewed with irony because of  the राजनैतिक turmoil , आर्थिक कारकों caused animosity between the उत्तर और  South .
The designation  of the काल by इतिहासकारों as एक of “good feelings” is प्रायः conveyed साथ विडंबना or skepticism , as the इतिहास of the era थी एक in जिससे the राजनैतिक माहौल थी  strained and divisive , especially among factions within the Monroe administration and the Republican Party .
The phrase “Era  of शुभ feelings” थी coined by बेंजामिन रसेल , in the बोस्टन federalist समाचारपत्र , columbian  Centinel , on July 12 , 1817 , following Monroe 's visit to Boston , Massachusetts as part of his good will tour of America .
Mariel Margaret `` Mia '' Hamm (  born कूच 17 , 1972 ) is a रिटायर्ड अमरीकी पेशेवर सॉकर  player .
hamm निभाई अनेक सालो as a आगे लिये the संयुक्त राज्य महिलाओं 's नेशनल  soccer team and was a founding member of the Washington Freedom .
Hamm scored 158  अंतरराष्ट्रीय लक्ष्य , अधिक than कोई अन्य खिलाड़ी , पुरूष or मादा , in the इतिहास of सॉकर और is the तीसरा सबसे capped मादा खिलाड़ी  in soccer history behind Kristine Lilly and Christie Rampone , appearing in 275 international matches .
Hamm was named the women 's FIFA World  खिलाड़ी of the साल the पहला दो टाइम्स कि पुरस्कार थी दिए ( in 2001 और 2002 )  , and is listed as one of FIFA 's 125 best living players ( as chosen by Pelé ) .
वो थी inducted into the नेशनल सॉकर हॉल of कीर्ति as खूब as the अलबामा  Sports Hall of Fame and Texas Sports Hall of Fame .
She is the author of Go For the Goal : A Champion 's  मार्गदर्शिका to जीतना in सॉकर और जीवन और appeared in the एचबीओ वृत्तचित्र  Dare to Dream : The Story of the U.S. Women 's Soccer Team .
Washington Post columnist Michael Wilbon called  hamm , `` शायद the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण खिलाड़ी of the पिछला 15  years . ''
Hamm  takes a कोने  kick .
The New York Red Bulls is an  अमरीकी पेशेवर सॉकर टोली आधारित in हैरिसन , नई जर्सी , representing  the New York metropolitan area .
The team competes in  the पूर्वी सम्मेलन of प्रमुख लीग  Soccer ( MLS ) .
It is one of the ten charter  क्लब of mls , having competed in the  league since its inception .
The team  थी a founding सदस्य of mls ( 1996 ) , लकिन रै गए through अनेक  name changes .
The  टोली थी originally ज्ञात as the नई york/new जर्सी  MetroStars through 1997 .
From the 1998 season  through the 2005 ऋतु , the टोली थी ज्ञात as  the MetroStars .
On  कूच 9 , 2006 , the टोली थी बेची to रेड सांड gmbh ,  leading to the team 's current name .
They are the only original MLS franchise not to have won any significant trophy (  सहित नियमित ऋतु , playoffs , और नॉकआउट प्रतियोगिता ) चूंकि inception  .
The  टोली 's बेहतरीन परिणाम in the mls थी the mls  Cup final in 2008 .
In the US Open Cup , the MetroStars reached three semifinals ( 1997 , 1998 ,  2000 ) , पहले reaching उनके पहला फाइनल in 2003 , खोने 1–0 to the शिकागो आग  .
On August 26 ,  2000 , the metros ' क्लिंट mathis नियत an mls रिकार्ड by स्कोरिंग पाँच लक्ष्य in a खेल विरूद्ध  the Dallas Burn .
Some well-known players that have played for  the टोली शामिल giovanni savarese , टिम हावर्ड , टोनी meola , tab ramos , alexi lalas , क्लिंट mathis , jozy altidore , माइकल ब्राडली , क्लाउडियो reyna , एडी पोप , रॉबर्टो donadoni , lothar matthäus , एडोल्फो वालेंसिया , youri djorkaeff , amado ग्वेरा , जुआन पाब्लो ángel , thierry  Henry , Juninho Pernambucano , Jan Gunnar Solli , Rafael Márquez , and Tim Cahill .
The team has also had well-known coaches , including Carlos Queiroz , Carlos  अल्बर्टो parreira , बोरा milutinović , bob ब्राडली , mo johnston , ब्रूस एरिना और hans backe  .
Confucianism , Taoism ,  और buddhism हैं एक , a पेंटिंग in the litang स्टाइल portraying तीन मेन हँस by a नदी स्ट्रीम , 12th  century , Song Dynasty .
Estimating the number of Buddhists  in the संसार , or in अनेक देशों , is मुश्किल due to definitional मुद्दे as खूब  as practical problems of enumeration .
To begin with , the religious  मान्यताओं , practices , और पहचान of ईस्ट एशियाइ ( जो comprise the बहुमत of the संसार 's बौद्धों by कोई माप ) प्रायः मिश्रण buddhism  with other traditions including Confucianism , the Chinese folk religion , Daoism , Shinto , and Korean shamanism .
Most followers of Buddhism do not belong to structured congregations , or observe  a definite अनुष्ठान of adherence ऐसे as लेने शरण , बनाना it मुश्किल to accurately अनुमान the क्रमांक of practitioners .
An  अतिरिक्त चुनौती is the दुश्मनी of अनेक नेशनल सरकारें ( प्रायः कम्युनिस्ट ones  such as China or North Korea ) to religion generally or to Buddhism specifically .
Government policies in these countries may encourage the under-reporting or non-reporting of religious adherence , resulting  in आधिकारिक योग कि may drastically underestimate the क्रमांक of धार्मिक  practitioners in these countries .
Estimate of the worldwide  बौद्ध जनसांख्यिकी दायरा इससे 350 लाख to over एक अरब , लकिन क्लस्टर  nearer to the first figure .
Adherents.com ( as of  2012 ) suggests a फिगर of 397  million .
By major  शाखाओं , the संख्याएँ हैं as follows:
( 1 ) Mahayana  buddhism , सहित ईस्ट एशियाई buddhism , साथ no कम than 185 लाख adherents , और संभवतः अनेक  times that many ( again , depending on definitional issues ) .
This is  the predominant रूप of buddhism practiced in चीन , दक्षिण कोरियाई  , Japan , Taiwan , Singapore , and Vietnam .
( 2 ) Theravada Buddhism ,  साथ no कम than 125 लाख  adherents .
इस is the predominant रूप of buddhism practiced in कंबोडिया  , Thailand , Laos , Sri Lanka , and Burma .
( 3  ) वज्रयान buddhism , साथ लगभग  20 million adherents .
This form predominates in the  वृहद तिब्बती और मंगोलियाई regions  , as well as in the Himalayas .
Besides the independent countries of Mongolia and Bhutan  , और विभिन्न territories भीतर कया is अभी पश्चिमी चीन , वज्रयान is परंपरागत to निश्चित regions of रूस ( e.g . कालमिकिया , बुर्यातिया  ) , India ( e.g . Ladakh , Sikkim ) , and Nepal ( e.g . Khumbu ) .
Vajrayana , also known as Tibetan Buddhism , is often conflated  साथ तांत्रिक buddhism , लकिन इस is imprecise , as shingon और अन्य फ़ॉर्म of ईस्ट एशियाई buddhism भी अभ्यास  tantra .
At least 7 countries ( Sri Lanka ,  थाईलैंड , कंबोडिया , लाओस , बर्मा , भूटान , और मंगोल ) have unambiguous  Buddhist majorities .
Depending on how one calculates Chinese and other East Asian adherents , this  फिगर might विस्तार to शामिल अनेक अधिक  countries .
In  जोड , buddhism is the राज्य धर्म of कंबोडिया और भूटान , और receives  prominent mention in the constitutions of Thailand and Sri Lanka .
In northern India and Nepal , the land  जहाँ buddhism थी born , the धर्म severely अस्वीकृत दौरान the पहला मिलेनियम  .
Whether this decline was due to the Islamic  conquest of उत्तरी इण्डिया , or to अन्य कारकों , remains  controversial .
See the  आलेख मनाही of buddhism in  India .
James Butler Hickok ( May 27 , 1837 –  अगस्त 2 , 1876 ) , बेहतर ज्ञात as जंगली विधेयक hickok , थी a लोक नायिका of the  American Old West .
His skills as a gunfighter and scout , along with his  प्रतिष्ठा as a lawman , provided the आधार लिये उसके कीर्ति , हालांकि कुछ of उसके  reported exploits are fictionalized .
Born and raised on a farm in rural Illinois , Hickok went west at age  18 as a भगोड़े इससे इंसाफ , पहला working as a stagecoach ड्राइवर , पहले he became a lawman in the  frontier territories of Kansas and Nebraska .
He fought for the Union Army during the American  सिविल युद्ध , और gained publicity बाद the युद्ध as a स्काउट , marksman , कर्ता ,  and professional gambler .
between उसके law-enforcement कर्तव्य और जुए , जिससे easily  overlapped , Hickok was involved in several notable shootouts .
He was shot and killed while playing poker in the  nuttal & मन 's सैलून in deadwood , डकोटा territory ( अभी दक्षिण  Dakota ) .
Artist 's  धारणा of the जिज्ञासा रोवर vaporizing चट्टान  on Mars .
The rover landed on  मंगल in अगस्त 2012 .
A Mars rover is an automated motor vehicle which  propels itself आरपार the सतह of the ग्रह मंगल बाद  landing .
Rovers have several  लाभ over stationary landers : वे जाँचें अधिक territory , वे can be निर्देशित to दिलचस्प सुविधाएँ , वे can प्लेस themselves in सनी स्थितियाँ to मौसम  winter months and they can advance the knowledge of how to perform very remote robotic vehicle control .
There have been  चार कामयाब robotically  operated Mars rovers .
The Jet  नोदन प्रयोगशाला प्रबंधित the मंगल pathfinder  mission and its now inactive Sojourner rover .
It currently manages the Mars  खोजी रोवर मिशन 's क्रियाशील अवसर रोवर और निष्क्रिय स्पिरिट , और , as भाग of the मंगल विज्ञान  Laboratory mission , the Curiosity rover .
A financial audit , or more accurately , an audit  of वित्तीय कथन , is the सत्यापन of the वित्तीय कथन  of a legal entity , with a view to express an audit opinion .
The audit opinion is intended to provide reasonable assurance , but not absolute assurance , that the financial  कथन हैं प्रस्तुत fairly , in सब सामग्री respects , and/or दे a सच्चा और मेला दृश्य in accordance साथ the वित्तीय रिपोर्टिंग  framework .
The purpose of an audit is provide and objective independent examination of the financial statements , which increases the value and  विश्वसनीयता of the वित्तीय कथन उत्पादित by प्रबन्धन , यूँ बढ़ाएँ उपयोक्ता विश्वास in the वित्तीय बयान , reduce निवेशकों रिस्क और नतीजतन reduce the लागत of पूंजी  of the preparer of the financial statements .
Financial audits are typically performed by firms of  practicing लेखपाल जो हैं विशेषज्ञ in वित्तीय रिपोर्टिंग  .
The financial audit is one  of अनेक परख कृत्यों provided by हिसाब firms  .
Many  संगठन separately employ or hire आतंरिक auditors , जो do नहीं attest to वित्तीय रिपोर्ट्स लकिन फ़ोकस मुख्यतः  on the internal controls of the organization .
External auditors may  चुनें to प्लेस सीमित रिलायंस on the कार्य of आतंरिक auditors  .
Auditing promotes  पारदर्शिता और सटीकता in the वित्तीय disclosures बना by an संगठन , इसलिए होता संभावित to reduce of ऐसे corporations  to conceal unscrupulous dealings .
internationally , the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मानकों on auditing ( isa ) जारी by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Auditing and Assurance Standards Board ( IAASB ) is considered as the benchmark for audit process .
Almost all jurisdictions  आवश्यकता auditors to follow the isa or a लोकल विभिन्नता  of the ISA .
Dollar coins have been minted  in the संयुक्त राज्य in सुनहरा , चांदी  , and base metal versions .
The term  चांदी डालर is प्रायः प्रयुक्त लिये कोई विशाल श्वेत मेटल सिक्का जारी by the संयुक्त राज्य साथ a फेस मान of एक डालर , हालांकि purists जिद कि  a dollar is not silver unless it contains some of that metal .
Silver dollars ,  the पहला डालर सिक्का समस्या , यहूद minted शुरूआत  in 1794 .
Gold dollars  और gold-colored डॉलर have भी  been produced by the United States .
The Sacagawea and Presidential dollars  हैं प्रायः referred to as `` सुनहरी डॉलर  '' .
In  आधुनिक टाइम्स , डालर सिक्के have नहीं महरूम बहुत  popular in the United States .
Despite efforts by the government to promote their use ,  सबसे अमेरिकी फिलहाल उपयोग the एक डालर विधेयक बल्कि than डालर  coins .
In straight  और स्तर उड़ान लिफ्ट ( l ) बराबरी  weight ( W ) .
In a banked turn of 60° ,  लिफ्ट बराबरी दोगुना the वज़न ( l=2w  ) .
The pilot  अनुभवों 2g और a doubled वज़न  .
The  steeper the बैंको , the वृहद  the g-forces .
This top-fuel  dragster can accelerate इससे शून्य to  in 0.86 seconds .
This is a horizontal acceleration  of 5.3 g. संयुक्त साथ the लंबवत g-force in the stationary मामला the pythagorean प्रमेय yields a g फ़ोर्स  of 5.4 g .
g-force ( with g from gravitational ) is a term for accelerations felt as  वज़न और measurable by accelerometers  .
It is not a  फ़ोर्स , प्रति se , लकिन a फ़ोर्स प्रति ईकाई  mass .
Since such a force is perceived as a weight , any  g-force can be वर्णित as a `` वज़न प्रति ईकाई द्रव्यमान '' ( देखिए the पर्याय  specific weight ) .
The g-force acceleration acts as a multiplier of weight-like forces for every unit of an  ऑब्जेक्ट 's द्रव्यमान , और ( सहेजें लिये निश्चित इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ोर्स प्रभाव ) is the कारण of an ऑब्जेक्ट 's त्वरण in संबंध  to free-fall .
This acceleration experienced by an object is  due to the वेक्टर योग of non-gravitational शक्तियां एक्टिंग on an ऑब्जेक्ट फ़्री to मूव  .
the accelerations कि हैं नहीं उत्पादित by गम्भीरता हैं termed उचित  accelerations , and it is only these that are measured in g-force units .
They  कारण तनावों और strains  on objects .
Because of  ये strains , विशाल g-forces may  be destructive .
Gravitation acting alone does not produce a g-force , even  हालांकि g-forces हैं expressed in multiples of the त्वरण of a मानक  gravity .
Thus , the standard  गुरुत्वाकर्षक त्वरण at the धरती 's सतह produces g-force तभी indirectly , as  a result of resistance to it by mechanical forces .
The 1 g-force on an  ऑब्जेक्ट बैठे on the धरती 's सतह is caused by mechanical फ़ोर्स exerted  in the upward direction by the ground , keeping the object from going into free-fall .
The upward force from the  मैदान ensures कि an ऑब्जेक्ट at बाकी on the धरती 's सतह is accelerating सापेक्ष to the free-fall कंडीशन  , which is the path that the object would follow when falling freely toward the Earth 's center .
Objects allowed to free-fall in an  inertial trajectory अंतर्गत the influence of gravitation-only ,  feel no g-force .
This is demonstrated by the `` zero-g '' conditions inside a freely falling elevator  गिरना toward the धरती 's बीच ( in वैक्यूम ) , or ( to शुभ सन्निकटन ) शर्तें अंदर a spacecraft in धरती कक्षा  .
ये हैं उदाहरण of निर्देशांक त्वरण ( a बदलें  in velocity ) without a sensation of weight .
The experience of no  g-force ( zero-g ) , however it is उत्पादित ,  is synonymous with weightlessness .
In the absence of gravitational  फ़ील्ड , or in दिशानिर्देश at सही कोण to उन्हें , उचित और निर्देशांक accelerations हैं the वही , और  any coordinate acceleration must be produced by a corresponding g-force acceleration .
an उदाहरण यहाँ is a प्रक्षेपास्त्र in फ़्री स्पेस , in जिससे सरल परिवर्तन in गति  are produced by the engines , and produce g-forces on the rocket and passengers .
An augur  पकड़कर a lituus , the curved wand प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a प्रतीक of augury  on Roman coins
The augur was a  पुजारी और आधिकारिक in the शास्त्रीय संसार , विशेषकर  ancient Rome and Etruria .
His main role was to  interpret the होगा of the देवताओं by अध्ययन the उड़ान of पक्षियों : whether वे हैं उड़ती in समूह or अलोन , कया noises वे मेक as वे मक्खी , दिशा  of flight and what kind of birds they are .
This was  ज्ञात as `` लेने the  auspices . ''
The ceremony and function of the augur was central to any major  undertaking in रोमन society—public or private—including matters of युद्ध , कॉमर्स , और धर्म  .
The Roman historian Livy stresses the importance of the augurs : ``  जो करता नहीं जान कि इस नगर थी संस्थापित तभी बाद लेने the auspices , कि सबकुछ in युद्ध और in सलाम , at घर और विदेश ,  was done only after taking the auspices ? ''
Farmington Hills is an  affluent जातियाँ in southeastern मिशिगन  .
It is the second largest  नगर in ओकलैंड काउंटी in the u.S. राज्य  of Michigan .
Its population was  79,740 at the 2010  census .
It is part of the upscale northwestern suburbs of Metropolitan  डेट्रॉयट और is भी पूर्वोत्तर of शहर  Ann Arbor .
Farmington Hills  consistently बाँधने as एक of the safest शहरों in the संयुक्त राज्य , as खूब  as in the state of Michigan .
In 2010 ,  the क्षेत्रफल क्रमित as the  30th safest city in America .
Although the two cities  have पृथक सेवाएं और पता , farmington और farmington पहाड़ियाँ हैं प्रायः  thought of as the same community .
Features of the community include a recently renovated downtown , boutiques , a vintage cinema  , numerous रेस्तरां , exotic car dealerships , आर्ट गैलरी , और पब्लिक पार्क सहित  Heritage Park .
There are several historical sites including  the longacre हाउस और the राज्यपाल warner  Mansion .
Both  शहरों हैं परोसा by farmington  Public Schools .
Farmington  पहाड़ियाँ serves as a प्रमुख कारोबार बीच लिये the वृहद  Detroit area .
present-day छाप of a लेट कांस्य  Age seal
कस्बा मुहर ( मेट्रिक्स )  of Náchod from 1570
A seal is a  यंत्र लिये बनाना an छाप in मोम , मिट्टी , पेपर , or कुछ अन्य मीडियम , सहित an embossment  on paper , and is also the impression thus made .
The  असली purpose थी to authenticate a दस्तावेज़ , a wrapper लिये एक ऐसे as a आधुनिक लिफाफा , or the कवर of a संग्राहक or पैकेज पकड़कर valuables or  other objects .
The sealing process is essentially that of a mould , with the  फाइनल चित्र represented on the यंत्र लिये बनाना the छाप by a mirror-image डिज़ाइन , incised in sunken- ( or  counter- ) relief or intaglio .
The seal-making device is also referred  to as the मुहर मेट्रिक्स or die ; the imprint it creates as the मुहर छाप ( or , अधिक rarely  , the sealing ) .
If the impression is made purely as a relief resulting from the greater pressure on the paper where the high  भाग of the मेट्रिक्स टच , the मुहर is ज्ञात as a शुष्क मुहर ; in सब अन्य मामले a द्रव or liquified मीडियम ( ऐसे as स्याही or मोम ) is प्रयुक्त , प्रायः in another रंग than  the paper .
For legal purposes , the  परिभाषा of a मुहर may be विस्तारित to शामिल रबर stamps , or लिखने निर्दिष्ट शब्द ( ``  seal '' or `` L.S . `` ) .
In the United States , the word `` seal  '' is sometimes आबंटित to a facsimile of the मुहर डिज़ाइन ( in मोनोक्रोम or रंग ) , जिससे may be प्रयुक्त in a किस्में of  contexts including architectural settings , on flags , or on official letterheads .
Thus , for example , the Great Seal of the United States , among other uses , appears on the reverse  of the one-dollar विधेयक ; और अनेक of the seals of the u.S. राज्य appear on उनके संबंधित  state flags .
in यूरोपीय , हालांकि coats of बाहें और  heraldic badges may well feature in such contexts as well as on seals , the seal design in its entirety rarely appears as an emblem .
The study of seals is known  as sigillography or sphragistics  .
Groundhog Day (  पेन्सिलवेनिया जर्मनी : grundsaudaag , murmeltiertag ) is a दिन  celebrated on February 2 .
According to folklore , if it is cloudy when a groundhog emerges from its burrow on this day , then spring will come early ; if it is sunny , the groundhog will supposedly see its  छाया और रिट्रीट वापस into इसके burrow , और the शीत मौसम होगा continue लिये  six more weeks .
Modern customs  of the अवकाश involve जश्न जहाँ जल्दी morning त्यौहार हैं आयोजित to देखें the  groundhog emerging from its burrow .
In southeastern Pennsylvania , Groundhog Lodges ( Grundsow Lodges ) celebrate the holiday with  fersommlinge , सोशल कार्यक्रम in जिससे खाना is परोसा , भाषणों हैं बना , और एक or अधिक g'spiel ( plays or skits ) हैं  performed for entertainment .
The Pennsylvania German dialect is the only language spoken at the event , and those who speak English pay a  दंड , प्रायः in the रूप of a निकल , dime , or क्वार्टर प्रति शब्द बोला , साथ the धन put into a कटोरी in the  center of the table .
The largest  groundhog दिन जश्न is आयोजित in  Punxsutawney , Pennsylvania .
Groundhog Day , already a widely recognized  और लोकप्रिय परंपरा , प्राप्त फैली ध्यान as a परिणाम of the 1993 फिल्मी groundhog दिन , जिससे थी नियत in punxsutawney , pa ( हालांकि फिल्माया  primarily in Woodstock , IL ) and portrayed Punxsutawney Phil .
High resolution  चित्र of tampa खाड़ी प्रदेश
The Tampa Bay area has  a आर्द्र उपोष्ण जलवायु ( koppen cfa ) , साथ गरम और आर्द्र ग्रीष्म साथ बारंबार thunderstorms और drier सर्दियों साथ  freezing temperatures occurring every 2–3 years .
The area experiences a significant summer wet season , as nearly two-thirds of the annual  वर्षण जलप्रपात in the महीने of जून through  September .
The area is listed by the United States Department of  कृषि ( यूएसडीए ) as होने in hardiness मण्डल 10 , जिससे is परिचय the उत्तरी सीमा of जहाँ नारियल हथेलियां और royal हथेलियां can be grown .
Highs  प्रायः दायरा between 65 और 95 °f ( 18  and 35 °C ) year round .
Though known for hot summers , Tampa 's official high has never  पहुँचे 100 °f ( 38 °c ) – the नगर 's all-time रिकार्ड तापमान is 99 °f ( 37 °c  ) .
St. Petersburg 's all-time record  ऊँची is exactly 100 °f ( 38 °c  ) .
Pinellas County lies on a peninsula between Tampa Bay and the Gulf of Mexico , and much  of the नगर of tampa झूठ on a छोटी प्रायद्वीप jutting आउट into tampa  Bay .
This proximity to large bodies of water both moderates temperatures  और introduces विशाल amounts of आर्द्रता into the माहौल  .
In general , the  लोकल समुदायों farthest इससे the coast have larger तापमान सीमाएँ , दोनो दौरान a सिंगल दिन और throughout  the seasons of the year .
A diagram of the electromagnetic  वर्णक्रम , प्रर्दशित विभिन्न गुण आरपार the दायरा  of frequencies and wavelengths
The  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम is the दायरा of सब संभावित बारंबारता of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  radiation .
The `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of  an ऑब्जेक्ट रै a अलग अर्थ , और is बजाय the characteristic वितरण of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण  emitted or absorbed by that particular object .
The  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम extends इससे नीचे the कम बारंबारता प्रयुक्त लिये आधुनिक रेडियो संचार to गामा विकिरण at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency  ) end , thereby covering wavelengths from thousands of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom .
The limit for long wavelengths is the size of the universe itself ,  जबकि it is विचार कि the छोटी wavelength सीमा is in the vicinity of the प्लांक लंबाई , हालांकि in principle the वर्णक्रम is अनन्त  and continuous .
सबसे भाग of the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम हैं प्रयुक्त in विज्ञान लिये spectroscopic  and other probing interactions , as ways to study and characterize matter .
In addition , radiation  इससे विभिन्न भाग of the वर्णक्रम रै मिला अनेक अन्य उपयोग लिये संचार और निर्माण ( देखिए इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  radiation for more applications ) .
लेजेंड
Franklin Delano  रूज़वेल्ट ( or ; जनवरी 30 , 1882 – अप्रैल 12 , 1945 ) , भी ज्ञात by उसके आद्याक्षर , fdr , थी the 32nd अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1933–1945 ) और a सेंट्रल फिगर in संसार कार्यक्रम दौरान the mid-20th सदी , अग्रणी the संयुक्त राज्य दौरान a समय  of worldwide economic depression and total war .
A dominant leader of the Democratic  पार्टी और the तभी अमरीकी अध्यक्ष निर्वाचित to अधिक than दो शर्तें , he निर्मित a नई सौदे गठबन्धन कि realigned अमरीकी राजनीती बाद 1932  , as his domestic policies defined American liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century .
With the bouncy popular song `` Happy Days Are Here Again `` as his campaign theme , FDR  पराजित लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन हर्बर्ट हूवर in नवम्बर 1932 , at the गहराई  of the Great Depression .
Energized by his personal victory over polio  , fdr 's unfailing आशावाद और सक्रियता contributed to a नवीकरण  of the national spirit .
He worked closely with British Prime Minister Winston  चर्चिल और सोवियत सामान्य सचिव जोसेफ स्टालिन in अग्रणी the allies विरूद्ध जर्मनी और जापानी in संसार युद्ध ii , और restoring  prosperity to the nation 's economy .
In his first hundred days in office , which  began कूच 4 , 1933 , रूज़वेल्ट पथप्रदर्शन प्रमुख विधान और जारी a profusion of कार्यपालिका आदेश कि instituted the नई सौदे —a किस्में of कार्यक्रम designed to उपज राहत  ( government jobs for the unemployed ) , recovery ( economic growth ) , and reform ( through regulation of Wall Street , banks and transportation ) .
The economy improved  rapidly इससे 1933 to 1937 , लकिन तब  relapsed into a deep recession .
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that  formed in 1937 prevented उसके पैकिंग the परम् अदालत or गुजर कोई considerable विधान ; it abolished अनेक of the राहत कार्यक्रम जब बेरोजगारी  diminished during World War II .
Most of the regulations on business were ended  परिचय 1975–85 , मगर लिये the विनियमन of वॉल गली by the प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज आयोग  , which still exists .
साथ साथ अनेक छोटी कार्यक्रम , प्रमुख surviving कार्यक्रम शामिल the संघीय जमा बीमे निगम  , which was created in 1933 , and Social Security , which Congress passed in 1935 .
As World War II loomed after 1938 , with the Japanese invasion of China and  the आक्रामकता of नाजी जर्मनी , fdr दिया दमदार राजनयिक और वित्तीय support to चीन और ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , जबकि बाकी officially  neutral .
His goal was to make  अमेरिका the `` आर्सेनल of लोकतंत्र `` जिससे होता सप्लाई munitions to the  Allies .
In March 1941 ,  रूज़वेल्ट , साथ congressional स्वीकृति , provided lend-lease सहायता to  the countries fighting against Nazi Germany with Britain .
With very strong national support , he made war on  जापानी और जर्मनी बाद the जापानी आक्रमण on पर्ल हार्बर  on December 7 , 1941 , calling it a `` date which will live in infamy `` .
He  पर्यवेक्षित the mobilization of the u.S. अर्थव्यवस्था to  support the Allied war effort .
As an active military leader , Roosevelt implemented an overall war strategy  on दो fronts कि ended in the शिकस्त of the अक्ष शक्तियां और the विकास of the संसार 's पहला अणु बमबारी .
In 1942 Roosevelt  ordered the internment of 100,000 जापानी अमरीकी  civilians .
Unemployment dropped to 2 % ,  राहत कार्यक्रम largely ended , और the औद्योगिक अर्थव्यवस्था grew rapidly to नई हाइट्स as लाखो of लोगों  moved to new jobs in war centers , and 16 million men and 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for military service .
Roosevelt  वर्चस्व the अमरीकी राजनैतिक झाँकी नहीं तभी दौरान the बारह सालो  of his presidency , but also for decades afterward .
He orchestrated the realignment of  मतदाता कि निर्मित the पांचवां पार्टी प्रणाली  .
FDR 's New  सौदे गठबन्धन संयुक्त मजदूर संघ , बिग नगर मशीने ,  white ethnics , African Americans and rural white Southerners .
He  भी बहकावे the बाद सृष्टि of the संयुक्त  Nations and Bretton Woods .
Roosevelt is  consistently रेटेड by विद्वानों as एक of the शीर्ष तीन u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों , साथ साथ  Abraham Lincoln and George Washington .
A liberal Democrat ,  रूज़वेल्ट पारिभाषित उसके वैचारिक स्थिति as `` a छोटी बाएँ of बीच  . ''
A Joint Committee is a term in politics that is used to refer  to a कमेटी बना up of सदस्यों of दोनो कक्षों of a bicameral विधानमंडल  .
In other  contexts , it refers to a कमेटी साथ  members from more than one organization .
The regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated powers of the federal government ; Under the Tenth  amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान , it is इसलिए exclusively the डोमेन of the राज्य to परमिट , prohibit , or वरना विनियमित वाणिज्यिक sex , मगर insofar  as Congress may regulate it as part of interstate commerce with laws like the Mann Act .
In most states , prostitution is considered a  misdemeanor in the श्रेणी of पब्लिक अनुक्रम अपराधों , a अपराधों कि disrupts  the order of a community .
it थी at एक समय माना to be  a vagrancy crime .
Currently , Nevada is the only state to  allow वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति , the शर्तें of जिससे हैं stipulated in the  Nevada Revised Statutes .
Only 8  काउंटी फिलहाल contain क्रियाशील  brothels .
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which contains the Las Vegas–Paradise metropolitan area )  , washoe काउंटी ( जिससे contains रेनो ) , कार्सन नगर , डगलस काउंटी , और lincoln काउंटी  .
The other counties theoretically allow brothel  वेश्यावृति , लकिन कुछ of ये काउंटी फिलहाल have  no active brothels .
Street prostitution , `` pandering , '' and living off of  the proceeds of a वेश्या remain illegal अंतर्गत नेवाडा विधि , as elsewhere in the  country .
As with other countries , prostitution in  the संयुक्त राज्य can be विभाजित into तीन व्यापक श्रेणी : गली  prostitution , brothel prostitution , and escort prostitution .
The national flag of the United States of America , often simply referred to as the American flag , consists of thirteen equal horizontal stripes of red ( top and bottom  ) प्रत्यावर्ती साथ श्वेत , साथ a ब्लू आयताकार in the कैण्टन ( referred to specifically as the `` संघ '' ) bearing पचास छोटी , श्वेत , five-pointed सितारों arranged in नौ ऑफसेट आड़ा पंक्ति of छह  stars ( top and bottom ) alternating with rows of five stars .
The 50 stars on the flag represent the 50 states of the United States of America and the 13 stripes represent the  तेरह अंग्रेजों colonies कि घोषित स्वतंत्रता इससे the किंगडम of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और became the पहला राज्य in the संघ .
Nicknames for the flag include the  `` सितारों और धारियाँ '' , `` बूढ़ा महिमा `` , और `` the star-spangled  Banner . ''
इण्डिया is a संघीय संघ of राज्य comprising twenty-eight राज्य और सात संघ  territories .
The states and territories  हैं further subdivided into जिले  and so on .
Congressional districts for the  113th संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस
2010  जनसांख्यिकी change:
Change in apportionment of  congressional जिले , starting in 2013 , as a परिणाम of  the 2010 census .
2000  जनसांख्यिकी change:
Change in  apportionment of congressional जिले , इससे 2003 to 2013  , as a result of the 2000 census .
This is a complete list of  congressional जिले लिये प्रतिनिधित्व in the संयुक्त राज्य  House of Representatives .
The quantity ( apportionment ) and boundaries (  redistricting ) of जिले हैं संकल्पित बाद प्रत्येक जनसांख्यिकी , हालांकि in कुछ मामले राज्य have बदला the सीमाएँ अधिक than एकबार  per census .
This list includes the  435 वर्तमान और over 200 obsolete जिले  .
For example , since the 2000  जनसांख्यिकी , नेब्रास्का रै था तीन जिले , लकिन it प्रयुक्त  to have as many as six .
In the first decade of the twenty-first century , Texas had 32  जिले , लकिन रै चूंकि added चार due to reapportionment as a परिणाम of the 2010  census .
अन्य राज्य have खोया जिले चूंकि the क्रमांक  of congressional seats has been set at 435 by statute .
Also included here are  non-voting delegations : छह वर्तमान और चार obsolete  .
The boundaries of  जिले प्रायः शिफ़्ट साथ प्रत्येक redistricting  .
Over time , the  प्रदेश और जनसांख्यिकी represented in a ज़िला  can change substantially .
Furthermore , districts  sometimes retain the वही सीमाएँ जबकि  changing their district numbers .
Mariah Carey ( born  कूच 27 , 1970 ) is an अमरीकी सिंगर , songwriter ,  record producer , actress , and philanthropist .
Under the guidance of Columbia  रिकॉर्ड कार्यपालिका टॉमी mottola , कैरी released उसके self-titled डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम mariah कैरी in 1990 ; it गई multi-platinum और  spawned four consecutive number one singles on the U.S . Billboard Hot 100 chart .
Following her  विवाह to mottola in 1993 और कामयाबी साथ hit रिकॉर्ड भाव ( 1991 ) , म्यूज़िक बक्सा ( 1993 ) , और मैरी क्रिसमस  ( 1994 ) , Carey was established as Columbia 's highest-selling act .
Daydream ( 1995 )  बना म्यूज़िक इतिहास जब इसके दूसरी सिंगल `` एक मीठी दिन `` , a duet साथ बॉयज ii मेन , खर्च a रिकार्ड सोलह सप्ताह on शीर्ष of the बिलबोर्ड  Hot 100 , and remains the longest-running number-one song in U.S. chart history .
During the recording of the album , Carey began to deviate  इससे उसके r & b और पॉप beginnings और धीरे traversed  into hip hop .
This  musical बदलें became evident साथ the रिलीज of तितली (  1997 ) , at which time Carey had separated from Mottola .
Carey  बाएँ कोलंबिया in 2000 , और हस्ताक्षरित a record-breaking  $ 100 million recording contract with Virgin Records .
Before the  रिलीज of उसके पहला विशेषता फिल्मी glitter ( 2001 ) , वो suffered a शारीरिक  and emotional breakdown and was hospitalized for severe exhaustion .
Following the film 's  ग़रीब रिसेप्शन , वो थी खरीदा आउट of उसके रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध लिये  $ 50 million , which led to a decline in her career .
She signed a multi-million  डालर अनुबंध सौदे साथ द्वीप रिकॉर्ड in 2002 , और बाद an unsuccessful  period , returned to the top of music charts with The Emancipation of Mimi ( 2005 ) .
Its second single ``  we belong साथ `` became उसके सबसे कामयाब सिंगल of the 2000s , और  was later named `` Song of the Decade '' by Billboard .
कैरी एकबार again ventured into फिल्मी साथ a well-received अभिनीत भूमिका in ( 2009 ) ; वो थी awarded the `` भेदन प्रदर्शन  Award '' at the Palm Springs International Film Festival , and Black Reel and NAACP Image Award nominations .
In a career  spanning over दो दशकों , कैरी रै बेची अधिक than  200 million records worldwide , making her one of the best-selling music artists of all time .
In 1998 , she was honored as the world 's best-selling  रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार of the 1990s at the संसार म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार  .
Carey was also named the  best-selling मादा कलाकार of the मिलेनियम  in 2000 .
According to  the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ of अमेरिका , वो is the तीसरा best-selling  female artist in the United States , with 63.5 million certified albums .
With the release of `` Touch My Body `` ( 2008 ) , Carey gained her  eighteenth क्रमांक एक सिंगल in the संयुक्त राज्य , अधिक than कोई अन्य सोलो  artist .
In 2012 , Carey was ranked second on  vh1 's सूची of the `` 100 महानतम महिलाओं  in Music '' .
Aside from her commercial accomplishments ,  कैरी रै जीती पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , 17 संसार म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार , 11 अमरीकी म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार , और 31 बिलबोर्ड  Music Awards .
Referred to as the `` songbird supreme '' by the  गिनीज संसार रिकॉर्ड , वो is famed लिये उसके five-octave गायन दायरा , शक्ति , melismatic स्टाइल और हस्ताक्षर उपयोग of  the whistle register .
Stratocumulus  stratiformis cumulogenitus
In meteorology , a cloud is a visible mass of  द्रव droplets or frozen crystals बना of जल or विभिन्न रसायन निलंबित in the माहौल  above the surface of a planetary body .
These suspended  अणु हैं भी ज्ञात as aerosols  .
Clouds in Earth 's atmosphere are  पढ़ाई in the बादल भौतिकी शाखा of meteorology  .
Two processes , possibly  एक्टिंग साथ , can सीसे to एयर बनने संतृप्त ; कूलिंग the एयर or adding  water vapor to the air .
In general , precipitation will fall to the  सतह ; an एक्सेप्शन is virga , जिससे evaporates पहले  reaching the surface .
The international cloud classification system is based on the fact clouds in their most  मौलिक फ़ॉर्म can दिखाएँ free-convective upward विकास जैसे कपासी , appear in non-convective परतदार चादरें ऐसे as स्ट्रेट्स , or लो the रूप of पतला  fibrous wisps , as in the case of cirrus .
Prefixes are used  in कनेक्शन साथ बादल to एक्स्प्रेस विसंगतियाँ or complexities  in these basic forms or to specify middle or high altitude ranges .
These include strato- for low clouds with limited convection that form mostly in uneven layers , cumulo- for complex highly-convective storm clouds ,  nimbo- लिये मोटा परतदार बादल of कुछ जटिलता कि can उपज मॉडरेट to भारी वर्षण , alto- लिये मध्य बादल , और cirro- लिये ऊँची  clouds ; the latter two of which may be of simple or moderately complex structure .
whether or नहीं a बादल is कम , मध्य , or ऊँची स्तर depends on कैसा  far above the ground its base forms .
बादल प्रकार साथ significant लंबवत extent can रूप in the कम or मध्य ऊँचाई  ranges depending on the moisture content of the air .
Clouds in the  क्षोभमण्डल have लैटिन names due to the लोकप्रिय अनुकूलन of ल्यूक हावर्ड 's बादल categorization प्रणाली ,  which began to spread in popularity during December 1802 .
Synoptic surface  मौसम observations उपयोग कोड संख्याएँ to रिकार्ड और रपट the प्रकार of tropospheric बादल दृश्य at प्रत्येक अनुसूचित अवलोकन समय आधारित on the ऊँचाई और शारीरिक  appearance of the clouds .
While a majority of clouds form in Earth 's  क्षोभमण्डल , वहीँ हैं अवसरों जब बादल in the stratosphere और mesosphere  can be observed .
These three main layers of the atmosphere where  बादल may be देखी हैं collectively ज्ञात as the homosphere  .
Above this lies the thermosphere and exosphere , which  साथ मेक up the heterosphere कि marks the परिवर्तन  to outer space .
Clouds have been  observed on अन्य ग्रह और moons भीतर the सौर प्रणाली , लकिन , due to उनके अलग तापमान विशेषताएँ  , they are composed of other substances such as methane , ammonia , and sulfuric acid .
Galveston County is a county located in the  u.S. राज्य of टेक्सास भीतर the houston–sugar land–baytown महानगर  area .
As of  the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी , the जनसांख्यिकी थी 291,309  .
Its county  सीट is galveston  .
League City is the largest city in  galveston काउंटी in शर्तें of जनसांख्यिकी ; url_http between 2000  and 2005 it surpassed Galveston as the county 's largest city .
galveston काउंटी थी संस्थापित  in 1838 .

freeport , बहामा
इस is a सूची of शहरों in the  Bahamas .
The following  तालिका सूचियाँ the नगर or कस्बा नाम , the भौगोलिक निर्देशांक , the जनसांख्यिकी as of the 1990 जनसांख्यिकी , an अनुमान of the जनसांख्यिकी  as of 2009 , and the island name .
The Big Ten  सम्मेलन , formerly पश्चिमी सम्मेलन और बिग नौ सम्मेलन  , is the oldest Division I college athletic conference in the United States .
Its twelve member  संस्थानों ( जिससे हैं primarily फ्लैगशिप शोध विश्वविद्यालयों in उनके संबंधित  states , well-regarded academically , and with relatively large student enrollment ) are located primarily in the Midwest , stretching from Nebraska in the west to Penn State in the east .
The conference competes in the NCAA 's Division I ; its football teams compete in the  फ़ुटबॉल कटोरी subdivision ( fbs ) , formerly ज्ञात as प्रभाग i-a , the उच्चतम स्तर of ncaa प्रतियोगिता  in that sport .
Member schools of the Big Ten ( or , in  दो मामले , उनके जनक विश्वविद्यालयों प्रणालियों ) भी हैं सदस्यों of the कमेटी  on Institutional Cooperation , a leading educational and research consortium .
Despite the conference 's name , the Big Ten actually consists of 12 schools  , following the जोड of the पेन्सिलवेनिया राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों in 1993 और the विश्वविद्यालयों of nebraska–lincoln  in 2011 .
In 2014 , the conference will expand to 14 members  साथ the परिवर्धन of the विश्वविद्यालयों of मेरीलैंड , कॉलेज पार्क और rutgers , the राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों of नई जर्सी  .
It is not to be confused with the Big 12 Conference , which has only ten  स्कूलों और represents a अलग प्रदेश  of the country .
सिंगल malt स्कॉच is सिंगल malt व्हिस्की बना in स्कॉटलैंड using a घट स्टिल आसवन  process at a single distillery , with malted barley as the only grain ingredient .
As with any Scotch whisky , a single malt Scotch must be distilled in Scotland and  matured in ओक casks in स्कॉटलैंड लिये at तनिक तीन सालो ( सबसे सिंगल malts हैं  matured longer ) .
`` Malt '' indicates that the whisky is  आसुत इससे a `` malted '' अनाज  .
Several types of  दाने can be malted ( लिये उदाहरण , जौ , rye और गेहूं हैं सब दाने जिससे can be malted ) ; however ,  in the case of single malt Scotch , barley is always the only grain used .
`` Single '' indicates that all  the malts in the बोतल आइये इससे a सिंगल डिस्टिलरी .
Bottlings containing malt whisky  इससे अनेक distilleries हैं पुकारा  `` blended malt `` .
जबतक the स्कॉच व्हिस्की regulations 2009 ( swr 2009 ) , the शब्द `` blended '' तभी appeared ( in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of स्कॉच व्हिस्की ) on बोतलों  of whisky that contained a mixture of both barley and non-barley grain whisky , but this is no longer the case .
Under the terminology established by the SWR 2009 , a `` blended malt Scotch  व्हिस्की '' is a मिश्रण of सिंगल malt स्कॉच whiskies , नहीं a मिश्रण of malted जौ व्हिस्की और non-barley व्हिस्की ; those हैं पुकारा `` blended स्कॉच व्हिस्की  '' , without the word `` malt '' .
The term `` blended malt ''  replaced `` vatted malt '' प्रयुक्त  under the prior labelling conventions .
the आयु बयान on a बोतल of सिंगल malt स्कॉच is the क्रमांक of सालो the व्हिस्की खर्च  maturing in cask .
As very few whiskies are bottled from a single cask the  आयु बयान reflects the आयु of the youngest malt in the मिक्सर  .
A texture may be arranged so as to , ``  closely दृष्टिकोण the single-object औकात of fused-ensemble timbres , लिये उदाहरण , the खूबसूरत 'northern लाइट्स ' कॉर्ड ... , in a बहुत दिलचस्प वितरण of pitches , produces a fused ध्वनि समर्थित by a निलंबित  cymbal roll `` ( Erickson ( 1975 ) , p.166 & 168 ) .
In contrast to more traditional musical textures , sound mass  संयोजन `` minimizes the महत्व of व्यक्तिगत pitches in वरीयता लिये बनावट , timbre , और डायनामिक्स as प्राथमिक shapers  of gesture and impact . ''
Developed from the modernist tone clusters and spread to orchestral writing by the late 1950s and 1960s  , sound-mass `` obscures the boundary between ध्वनि और रव `` ( एडवर्ड्स 2001 ,  pp . 326–27 ) .
Techniques which may create or be used with sound mass  शामिल विस्तारित तकनीकों ऐसे as मूक पीतल or स्ट्रिंग्स , आतुर tonguing , चौड़ी vibrato  , extreme ranges , and glissandos .
Composers and  works शामिल बारबरा kolb , pauline oliveros ' ध्वनि पैटर्न लिये कोरस ( 1961 )  , Norma Beecroft 's From Dreams of Brass for chorus ( 1963–1964 ) , and Nancy Van de Vate .
beecroft `` टुकड़ा व्यक्तिगत pitches in एहसान of a सामूहिक timbre through the उपयोग  of vocal and instrumental clusters , choral speech , narrator , and a wash of sounds from an electronic tape . ''
(  ibid )
A very early example is the opening of  jean-féry विद्रोही 's बैले लेस elémens ( 1737–38 ) , जहाँ अराजकता is represented by a धीरे cumulating orchestral क्लस्टर of सब सात  notes of the D minor scale ( Henck 2004 , pp . 52–54 ) .
A later example is the third movement of  रुथ क्रॉफर्ड seeger 's स्ट्रिंग quartet 1931 ( nonesuch h-71280 ) जबकि अधिक recently phill niblock 's अनेक ड्रोन आधारित म्यूज़िक  serves as an example .
The use of `` chords approaching timbres '' begins with Debussy and Edgard  varèse प्रायः carefully scored व्यक्तिगत इंस्ट्रूमेंटल भाग so कि वे होता फ्यूज into एक ensemble timbre or ध्वनि द्रव्यमान ( एरिक्सन 1975  , pp . 18 and 21 ) .
Other examples include European ``  textural '' रचनाएं of the fifties और sixties ऐसे as krzysztof penderecki 's threnody to the पीड़ितों of हिरोशिमा ( 1959 ) और györgy ligeti 's works featuring micropolyphony  in works like Atmosphères ( 1961 ) and his Requiem ( 1963-65 ) .
Other composers with works  using इस तकनीक शामिल henryk górecki , karel husa , witold lutosławski  , Kazimierz Serocki , and Steven Stucky .
Sound mass  तकनीकों भी appear in the म्यूज़िक of  George Crumb ( Anon . n.d. ) .
Students attending a lecture on  रैखिक बीजगणित at the हेलसिंकी विश्वविद्यालयों of प्रौद्योगिकी
विद्यार्थियों in ग्रामीण सूडान  , 2002
A student is a learner , or  किसी जो attends an शैक्षणिक संस्था  .
In some  राष्ट्र , the अंग्रेज़ी पद ( or इसके cognate in another भाषा ) is सुरक्षित लिये those जो attend विश्वविद्यालयों , जबकि a schoolchild अंतर्गत the आयु of अठारह is पुकारा a pupil in अंग्रेज़ी ( or an समतुल्य  in other languages ) , although in the United States a person enrolled in grades K–12 is often called a student .
In its  widest उपयोग , छात्र is प्रयुक्त लिये anyone  who is learning .
Australia is a continent  comprising मेनलैंड ऑस्ट्रेलिया , तस्मानिया , नई गिनी  , Seram , possibly Timor , and neighbouring islands .
The continent is sometimes known in technical contexts by the names  sahul , australinea or meganesia , to फर्क  it from the Australian mainland .
It is the smallest of the seven traditional  महाद्वीपों in the अंग्रेज़ी धारणा  .
New Zealand is not  भाग of the महाद्वीप of ऑस्ट्रेलिया , लकिन of the पृथक , submerged महाद्वीप  of Zealandia .
zealandia और ऑस्ट्रेलिया हैं दोनो भाग of the wider  regions known as Australasia and Oceania .
The continent of Australia lies on a continental shelf overlain by shallow seas  जिससे divide it into अनेक landmasses — the अराफुरा समुद्र और टोरेस जलसन्धि between मेनलैंड ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई गिनी , और बास जलसन्धि between मेनलैंड  Australia and Tasmania .
When sea levels were lower during the  pleistocene बर्फ आयु , सहित the पिछला glacial अधिकतम परिचय 18,000 bc , वे यहूद कनेक्ट  by dry land .
During the past ten  हजार सालो , उठती समुद्र स्तर overflowed the lowlands और अलग the महाद्वीप into आज 's low-lying arid to semi-arid  mainland and the two mountainous islands of New Guinea and Tasmania .
Geologically , a continent extends to  the किनारे of इसके महाद्वीपीय शेल्फ , so the now-separate आइलैंड्स  are considered part of the continent .
Due to the spread of  पशु , fungi और पौधे आरपार the सिंगल pleistocene landmass the पृथक lands  have a related biota .
Central Park is  nearly twice as बिग as the संसार 's second-smallest  country , Monaco .
Historically its  टंकी यहूद महत्वपूर्ण components of the नगर 's जल सप्लाई  .
Environmental issues in New  यॉर्क नगर हैं प्रभावित by the नगर 's आकार , घनत्व , abundant पब्लिक परिवहन अवसंरचना  , and location at the mouth of the Hudson River .
New York 's  जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व रै पर्यावरणीय  pros and cons .
It facilitates the  उच्चतम द्रव्यमान पारगमन उपयोग in the संयुक्त राज्य , लकिन भी concentrates  pollution .
गैसोलीन खपत in the नगर is at the रेट the नेशनल औसत थी in the 1920s , और ग्रीनहाउस गैस emissions हैं a भिन्न  of the national average , at 7.1 metric tons per person per year , below San Francisco , at 11.2 metric tons , and the national average , at 24.5 metric tons .
New York City accounts  लिये तभी 1 % of संयुक्त राज्य ग्रीनहाउस गैस emissions जबकि आवास  2.7 % of its population .
In September  2012 , नई यॉर्क थी नामित the # 1 `` अमेरिका 's dirtiest नगर , '' by a travel+leisure readership सर्वेक्षण कि रेटेड the  environmental quality of 35 prominent cities in the United States .
Atlanta ( , stressed , locally ) is the capital of  और the सबसे populous नगर in the u.S. राज्य of जॉर्जिया , साथ an अनुमानित 2011 जनसांख्यिकी of 432,427  .
Atlanta is the cultural and economic center of the  अटलांटा महानगर क्षेत्रफल , घर to 5,457,831 लोगों और the नवीं largest महानगर क्षेत्रफल  in the United States .
Atlanta is the county seat  of fulton काउंटी , और a छोटी portion of the नगर extends eastward into dekalb काउंटी  .
Atlanta was established in  1837 at the चौराहे of दो रेलरोड लाइनों , और the नगर रोज़ इससे the राख of the सिविल युद्ध to become a नेशनल बीच  of commerce .
In the decades following the Civil Rights Movement , during  जिससे the नगर अर्जित a प्रतिष्ठा as `` too व्यस्त to नफ़रत '' लिये the प्रगतिशील दृश्य of इसके नागरिकों और नेताओ , अटलांटा attained  international prominence .
Atlanta is the primary transportation hub of  the southeastern संयुक्त राज्य , via राजमार्ग , रेलरोड , और एयर , साथ hartsfield–jackson अटलांटा अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Airport being the world 's busiest airport since 1998 .
अटलांटा is माना an `` अल्फा ( - ) संसार नगर , '' और , साथ a सकल घरेलू  product of US $ 270 billion , Atlanta’s economy ranks 15th among world cities and sixth in the nation .
Although Atlanta’s economy is considered diverse ,  प्रबल सेक्टर शामिल लोजिस्टिक्स , पेशेवर और कारोबार सेवाएं , मीडिया परिचालन  , government administration , and higher education .
Topographically , Atlanta is marked  by रोलिंग पहाड़ियाँ और घना पेड़ कवरेज  .
पुनरोद्धार of अटलांटा 's पड़ोस , initially spurred by the 1996 ओलंपिक , रै intensified  in the 21st century , altering the city 's demographics , politics , and culture .
A 1947 propaganda comic book published  by the catechetical गिल्ड शैक्षणिक  Society raising the specter of a Communist takeover
McCarthyism is the practice of making accusations of  disloyalty , subversion , or देशद्रोह बगैर उचित लिहाज़ लिये प्रमाण  .
It also means `` the practice of making unfair allegations or  using अन्यायपूर्ण investigative तकनीकों , विशेषकर in अनुक्रम to सीमित  dissent or political criticism . ''
The  पद रै इसके origins in the काल in the संयुक्त राज्य ज्ञात as the दूसरी रेड scare , स्थायी roughly इससे 1950 to 1956  and characterized by heightened fears of communist influence on American institutions and espionage by Soviet agents .
Originally coined to  criticize the anti-communist pursuits of रिपब्लिकन u.s . सीनेटर जोसेफ मैकार्थी of विस्कॉन्सिन , `` mccarthyism '' जल्द  took on a broader meaning , describing the excesses of similar efforts .
The term is also now used more generally to describe reckless , unsubstantiated accusations , as well  as demagogic हमले on the अक्षर or राष्ट्रभक्ति of राजनैतिक  adversaries .
During the McCarthy era , thousands of Americans were  अभियुक्त of होने साम्यवादियों or कम्युनिस्ट sympathizers और became the विषय of आक्रामक investigations  and questioning before government or private-industry panels , committees and agencies .
The primary targets  of ऐसे suspicions यहूद सरकारी कर्मचारी , those  in the entertainment industry , educators and union activists .
Suspicions were often given credence despite inconclusive or questionable  प्रमाण , और the स्तर of threat posed by a व्यक्ति  's real or supposed leftist associations or beliefs was often greatly exaggerated .
Many people  suffered घाटा of नियुक्ति and/or विनाश of  their careers ; some even suffered imprisonment .
Most of these punishments came about through trial verdicts later overturned ,  कानून कि होता be घोषित असंवैधानिक , dismissals लिये कारण बाद घोषित illegal or actionable , or extra-legal प्रक्रियाओं कि होता आइये into  general disrepute .
The most famous examples of McCarthyism include the speeches , investigations , and hearings of Senator McCarthy himself ; the Hollywood  ब्लैकलिस्ट , संबद्ध साथ hearings conducted by the हाउस un-american क्रियाएँ कमेटी ( huac ) ; और the विभिन्न anti-communist क्रियाएँ of the संघीय ब्यूरो of छानबीन ( एफबीआई ) अंतर्गत निदेशक J. एडगर हूवर .
mccarthyism थी a फैली सोशल और सांस्कृतिक घटना कि प्रभावित सब स्तर of समाज  and was the source of a great deal of debate and conflict in the United States .
Napoleon is a fictional character  और the प्रमुख विपक्षी in जार्ज ऑरवेल 's एनिमल  Farm .
जबकि he is at पहला a आम फार्म सुअर , he gets rid of स्नोबॉल  , another pig which shares the power .
He then takes advantage of the  पशु ' uprising विरूद्ध उनके मास्टर्स to आखिरकार become the tyrannical `` अध्यक्ष of एनिमल फार्म  , '' which he turns into a dictatorship .
वरुण लोगो
The NEPTUNE  कनाडा प्रोजेक्ट is the world’s पहला regional-scale भाटे समंदर वेधशाला कि  plugs directly into the Internet .
Since December 2009 , it has allowed people to `` surf ''  the seafloor जबकि समंदर वैज्ञानिकों चलाएं deep-water प्रयोग इससे लैब्स और विश्वविद्यालयों around  the world .
Along  साथ इसके सिस्टर प्रोजेक्ट , शुक्र , वरुण offers a अद्वितीय दृष्टिकोण  to ocean science .
Traditionally , ocean scientists  have relied on infrequent जलयान क्रूज़ or space-based satellites to carry आउट उनके शोध , जबकि the वरुण प्रोजेक्ट  uses a remotely operated crawler .
The  coronet थी a full-size car इससे चकमा in the 1950s , initially the प्रभाग 's उच्चतम trim  line but , starting in 1955 , the lowest trim line .
in the 1960s , the नाम थी transferred to  Dodge 's mid-size entry .
ARM9 is an  भुजा वास्तुकला 32-bit  RISC CPU family .
राष्ट्रमंडल is a परंपरागत अंग्रेज़ी पद लिये a राजनैतिक  community founded for the common good .
historically , it रै sometimes महरूम synonymous  with `` republic `` .
More recently it has been used for fraternal  एसोसिएशन of कुछ sovereign राष्ट्र .
Most notably , the  राष्ट्रमंडल of राष्ट्र , an संघ primarily of पूर्व सदस्यों of the अंग्रेजों  Empire , is often referred to as simply `` the Commonwealth '' .
The September  11 हमले ( भी referred to as सितंबर 11 , सितंबर 11th , or 9/11 ) यहूद a श्रेणी of चार समन्वित आतंकवादी हमले  launched by the Islamic terrorist group al-Qaeda upon the United States in New York City and the Washington , D.C. area on September 11 , 2001 .
Four passenger airliners were hijacked by 19  al-qaeda आतंकवादी so वे could be flown into इमारतें  in suicide attacks .
Two of those planes ,  अमरीकी एयरलाइंस उड़ान 11 और संयुक्त एयरलाइंस उड़ान 175 , यहूद क्रैश into the उत्तर और दक्षिण मीनारें , क्रमशः  , of the World Trade Center complex in New York City .
Within two hours , both towers  collapsed साथ मलबा और the resulting फ़ायर causing आंशिक or पूरा पतन of सब अन्य इमारतें in the wtc  complex , as well as major damage to ten other large surrounding structures .
A third plane ,  अमरीकी एयरलाइंस उड़ान 77 , थी क्रैश into the प्रस्तुतीकरण ( the मुख्यालय of the संयुक्त  States Department of Defense ) , leading to a partial collapse in its western side .
The fourth plane , United Airlines Flight 93 , was targeted  at the संयुक्त राज्य कैपिटल in वॉशिंगटन , d.C. , लकिन क्रैश into a फ़ील्ड निकट shanksville , पेन्सिलवेनिया , बाद इसके यात्री  tried to overcome the hijackers .
In total , almost 3,000 people died in the attacks ,  सहित the 227 नागरिकों और 19 hijackers सवार the चार planes  .
suspicion जल्दी गिरी  on al-Qaeda .
हालांकि the समूह 's नेता , ओसामा बिन लादेन , initially अस्वीकृत कोई भागीदारी , in 2004  he claimed responsibility for the attacks .
Al-Qaeda and bin Laden cited U.S. support of  इसराईल , the उपस्थिति of u.S. सैनिकों in सऊदी अरब , और प्रतिबंधों  against Iraq as motives for the attacks .
The United States responded to the attacks by launching the War on  आतंक और आक्रमणकारी अफगानिस्तान to depose the तालिबान , जिससे  had harbored al-Qaeda .
Many countries strengthened their  anti-terrorism विधान और विस्तारित विधि प्रवर्तन  powers .
Having evaded capture for years , bin  लादेन थी स्तिथ और मारे by u.S. शक्तियां in may  2011 .
The destruction of the Twin Towers  और अन्य गुण caused गंभीर क्षति to the अर्थव्यवस्था of निम्नतर मैनहटन  and had a significant effect on global markets .
Cleanup of the World Trade Center site was completed in  may 2002 , और the प्रस्तुतीकरण थी repaired भीतर a साल  .
Numerous memorials have been constructed , including the National September 11  मेमोरियल & संग्रहालय in नई यॉर्क , the प्रस्तुतीकरण मेमोरियल , और the उड़ान 93 नेशनल मेमोरियल in पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
