Elizabeth II ( Elizabeth Alexandra Mary ; born 21 April 1926 ) is the  संवैधानिक monarch of 16 sovereign राज्य , ज्ञात as the राष्ट्रमंडल realms , और उनके territories और dependencies , और  head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations .
She is  परम् राज्यपाल of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड और , in कुछ of उसके realms , carries the शीर्षक of defender  of the Faith as part of her full title .
On her  accession on 6 फ़रवरी 1952 , एलिज़ाबेथ became सिर of the राष्ट्रमंडल और महारानी regnant of सात स्वतंत्र राष्ट्रमंडल देशों : the संयुक्त किंगडम , कनाडा , ऑस्ट्रेलिया  , New Zealand , South Africa , Pakistan and Ceylon .
From 1956 to 1992 , the number of her realms  varied as territories gained स्वतंत्रता और कुछ realms became republics  .
At present , in addition to the first four aforementioned countries ,  एलिज़ाबेथ is महारानी of जमैका , बारबाडोस , the बहामा , हरा , पापुआ नई गिनी , the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स , तुवालू , संत लूसिया , संत विंसेंट और the grenadines , बेलीज़ , अण्टीगुआ और  Barbuda and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Her  शासनकाल of सालो is फिलहाल the दूसरी longest लिये a अंग्रेजों monarch ; तभी महारानी विक्टोरिया  has reigned longer at over 63 years .
Elizabeth was  born in लंदन और शिक्षित  privately at home .
Her father acceded to the throne as George VI in  1936 on the abdication of उसके bhai एडवर्ड viii , इससे जिससे  time she was the heir presumptive .
She began to undertake public duties during the  दूसरी संसार युद्ध , in जिससे वो परोसा in the auxiliary territorial सेवा  .
In  1947 , वो शादीशुदा प्रिंस फिलिप , ड्यूक of एडिनबर्ग , साथ जिसको वो रै चार children  : Charles , Anne , Andrew , and Edward .
Her  राजतिलक सेवा took प्लेस in 1953 और थी the  first to be televised .
The Queen 's many historic visits  और बैठक शामिल a राज्य विज़िट to the गणतंत्र of आयरलैंड और reciprocal विज़िट to  and from the Pope .
The Queen  रै देखी प्रमुख संवैधानिक परिवर्तन in उसके realms , ऐसे as devolution  in the United Kingdom and the patriation of the Canadian constitution .
Times of personal significance have included the births and marriages of her children , the births of  उसके grandchildren , the प्रतिष्ठापन of the प्रिंस of वेल्स , और the जश्न of माइलस्टोन ऐसे as उसके चांदी , सुनहरी , और डायमंड jubilees in 1977 , 2002 , और 2012 , क्रमशः  .
Major  कार्यक्रम in the महारानी 's शासनकाल have शामिल the परेशानियों in उत्तरी आयरलैंड , the falklands  War , wars with Iraq and the War in Afghanistan .
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include the death of her father at 56 , the assassination of Prince Philip 's  ताऊ , रब माउंटबेटन , the विश्लेषण of उसके children 's विवाह in 1992 ( a साल deemed उसके annus horribilis ) , the मौत in 1997 of उसके पूर्व daughter-in-law , डायना , राजकुमारी  of Wales , and the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002 .
The Queen has  occasionally faced कठोर दबायें आलोचना of the royal परिवार और रिपब्लिकन sentiments , लकिन  support for the monarchy and her personal popularity remain high .
Christianity is the largest religion  सूचीबद्ध by australians in the नेशनल जनसांख्यिकी  .
In the 2011 Census , 61.1  % of australians यहूद सूचीबद्ध  as Christian .
Australia has no official state religion and  the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई संविधान protects स्वतंत्रता of  religion .
The presence of  christianity in ऑस्ट्रेलिया began साथ the आगमन of the पहला बेड़े of अंग्रेजों convicts  in 1788 .
The religion grew to account for 96.1 % of the national  जनसांख्यिकी at the समय of the संघ of ऑस्ट्रेलिया in 1901 .
The Anglican Church of Australia ( formerly  ज्ञात as the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ) remained the largest denomination जबतक 1986 ,  when it was surpassed by the Roman Catholic Church in Australia .
Post-war multiculturalism and a decline in religious observance  among कुछ भाग of the जनसांख्यिकी have diversified the जनसांख्यिकी of धर्म  in Australia .
Of the  roughly 61 % identifying as ईसाई in 2011 , the largest denominations यहूद either रोमन कैथोलिक ( 25 % ) or anglican ( 17 % ) , साथ the तीसरा largest denomination होने the 5 % संबद्ध साथ  the Uniting Church in Australia .
Post-war immigration has  grown the संख्याएँ belonging to चर्च जैसे the यूनानी परंपरागत archdiocese of ऑस्ट्रेलिया और वहीँ हैं विशाल और growing पेंटेकोस्टल समूह , ऐसे as सिडनी  's Hillsong Church .
The  त्यौहार of ईस्टर और क्रिसमस हैं पब्लिक छुट्टियाँ in  Australia .
Around a quarter of students attend church schools and Christian organisations are leading non-government  प्रदाताओं of स्वास्थ्य और welfare सेवाएं through संगठनों जैसे कैथोलिक स्वास्थ्य ऑस्ट्रेलिया , anglicare , unitingcare ऑस्ट्रेलिया , the मोक्ष फौज और st विंसेंट de पॉल समाज  .
Historically significant  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई ईसाइयों have शामिल रेव dr जॉन dunmore लैंग , संत  Mary MacKillop , Catherine Helen Spence , Pastor David Unaipon , the Reverend John Flynn and Pastor Sir Doug Nicholls .
High profile contemporary Australian Christians include : Tim  कॉस्टेलो बैपटिस्ट मंत्री और वर्तमान सीईओ of संसार दृष्टि ऑस्ट्रेलिया , फ़्रैंक ब्रेनन , जेसुइट इंसान अधिकारों वकील , कार्डिनल जार्ज pell , कैथोलिक archbishop of सिडनी , फिलिप aspinall the वर्तमान anglican primate और archbishop  of Brisbane , Kevin Rudd , former Labor Prime Minister , and Tony Abbott , leader for the Federal Opposition Liberal Party .
Charter creating  कॉलेजिएट स्कूल , जिससे became yale कॉलेज  , October 9 , 1701
Yale University is  a निजी आइवी लीग शोध विश्वविद्यालयों स्तिथ in  New Haven , Connecticut .
Founded  in 1701 in the उपनिवेश of कनेक्टिकट , the विश्वविद्यालयों is the third-oldest संस्था  of higher education in the United States .
Originally chartered as  the `` कॉलेजिएट स्कूल '' , the संस्था traces इसके जड़ें to 17th-century clergymen जो sought to स्थापित a कॉलेज  to train clergy and political leaders for the colony .
In 1718 , the College was renamed  `` yale कॉलेज '' to सम्मान a तोहफा इससे elihu yale , a राज्यपाल of the अंग्रेजों  East India Company .
In  1861 , the ग्रैजुएट स्कूल of कला और sciences became the पहला u.S. संस्था to पुरस्कार the phd . yale became  a founding member of the Association of American Universities in 1900 .
Yale College was transformed , beginning in the 1930s ,  through the स्थापना of आवासीय कॉलेजों : 12 अभी मौजूद  and two more are planned .
Yale employs over 1,100  संकाय to सिखा और सलाह परिचय 5,300 undergraduate और 6,100 ग्रैजुएट और  professional students .
Almost all tenured  professors सिखा undergraduate पाठ्यक्रम , अधिक than 2,000 of जिससे हैं  offered annually .
The University 's assets include an  endowment valued at $ 19.4 अरब , the second-largest of  any academic institution in the world .
Yale 's system of more  than दो दर्जन पुस्तकालयों holds 12.5 लाख आयतन  .
49 Nobel Laureates have been  संबद्ध साथ the विश्वविद्यालयों as विद्यार्थी , संकाय , और  staff .
Yale has produced many notable alumni , including five U.S. Presidents , 19  u.S. परम् अदालत justices , और अनेक विदेशी heads of राज्य  .
At the graduate level , Yale Law  स्कूल , yale स्कूल of आर्ट , और yale स्कूल of नाटक हैं consistently क्रमित the शीर्ष  programs in their field .
Yale Law School is  the सबसे चयनात्मक विधि स्कूल in the  United States .
yale विद्यार्थी compete intercollegiately as the  Yale Bulldogs in the NCAA Division I Ivy League .
The oldest intercollegiate  एथलेटिक इवेंट in the संयुक्त राज्य is the yale-harvard  regatta .
Artemisia tridentata (  `` बिग sagebrush '' or `` sagebrush '' ) is an खुशबूदार झाड़ी इससे the परिवार asteraceae , जिससे grows in arid और semi-arid शर्तें , throughout a दायरा  of cold desert , steppe , and mountain habitats in the Intermountain West of North America .
The vernacular name `` sagebrush '' is also used for several related members  of the genus artemisia , ऐसे as कैलिफ़ोर्निया sagebrush ( artemisia californica )  .
Big Sagebrush and other Artemisia species are the dominant plants across large portions of the Great  जलाशय , covering कुछ 422,000 वर्गाकार मील in 11 पश्चिमी u.S. & कनाडाई राज्य  .
It is the  राज्य पुष्प of नेवाडा .
Sagebrush provides food and  आवास लिये a किस्में of प्रजाति , ऐसे as ऋषि grouse , pronghorn  antelope , gray vireo , pygmy rabbit , and mule deer .
Big sagebrush was used as an herbal medicine by Native Americans  throughout the intermountain वेस्ट of उत्तर america—especially लिये preventing संक्रमण in wounds , stopping  internal bleeding , and treating headaches and colds .
Chemically , the active  औषधीय constituents शामिल camphor , terpenoids  , and tannins .
Several  प्रमुख खतरे मौजूद to ऋषि ब्रश ecosystems , सहित इंसान settlements , परिवर्तन  to agricultural land , livestock grazing , invasive plant species , wildfires , and climate change .
Yahoo ! Mail is  a फ़्री ईमेल सेवा  offered by the American search engine company Yahoo !
It was launched in 1997 , and , according to  comscore , याहू ! मेल is the third-largest web-based ईमेल सेवा साथ 281 लाख  users as of December 2012 .
फिलहाल , याहू ! offers तीन संस्करण  of Yahoo ! Mail .
The traditional `` Yahoo ! Mail  क्लासिक '' continues the उपलब्धता of the असली  interface introduced in 1997 .
A version introduced in 2005 included a new Ajax interface ,  drag-and-drop सुविधाएँ , improved ढूंढें कार्यक्षमता , कुंजीपटल शॉर्टकट , पता auto-complete , टैब्स , और अन्य अद्यतनीकृत सुविधाएँ  .
In October 2010 ,  याहू ! released a बीटा संस्करण of याहू ! मेल , जिससे शामिल सुधार to the डिज़ाइन , प्रदर्शन , ढूंढें कार्यक्षमता  , and Facebook integration .
In May 2011 , beta testing for the new  संस्करण रोका , और it became the डिफॉल्ट इंटरफ़ेस  for Yahoo ! Mail .
In early 2008 , Yahoo ! began offering  असीमित मेल भंडार to इसके उपयोक्ता in जवाब to heated प्रतियोगिता in the  free web-mail market segment .
On June 27 ,  2009 , याहू ! मेसेंजर थी एकीकृत  with Yahoo ! Mail .
Tacoma ( , ) is a mid-sized urban port city and  the काउंटी सीट of पियर्स काउंटी , वॉशिंगटन , संयुक्त राज्य  .
The city is on Washington 's Puget Sound , southwest of Seattle  , पूर्वोत्तर of the राज्य पूंजी , ओलंपिया , और उत्तरपश्चिम of माउंट rainier  National Park .
the जनसांख्यिकी थी 198,397 , according  to the 2010 census .
Tacoma is the second-largest city in the  puget ध्वनि क्षेत्रफल और the तीसरा  largest in the state .
Tacoma also serves as the center of  कारोबार कार्यकलाप लिये the दक्षिण ध्वनि प्रदेश , जिससे रै a  population of around 1 million people .
Tacoma adopted its  नाम बाद the आसपास माउंट rainier , originally  called Mount Tahoma .
It is known as the `` City of Destiny '' because the area was  चुनी to be the पश्चिमी टर्मिनस of the उत्तरी प्रशांत रेलरोड in the लेट 19th  century .
The decision of the railroad was  बहकावे by टकोमा 's neighboring deep-water हार्बर , शुरुआत  Bay .
By connecting the bay with the railroad  टकोमा 's motto became `` जब rails मिलें sails . ''
Today Commencement Bay serves the Port of  टकोमा , a बीच of अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार on the प्रशांत coast और वॉशिंगटन राज्य 's largest  port .
Like most central cities , Tacoma suffered a prolonged decline  in the mid-20th सदी as a परिणाम of suburbanization और  divestment .
Since the 1990s , developments in the downtown core include the University of Washington Tacoma ; Tacoma Link , the first modern  इलेक्ट्रिक लाइट रेल सेवा in the राज्य ; the राज्य 's उच्चतम घनत्व of आर्ट और इतिहास संग्रहालय ;  and a restored urban waterfront , the Thea Foss Waterway .
With a long history of blue-collar labor politics — from the railroad workers of the 19th century , to  the longshoremen of the 20th सदी , to the मजदूर तैयार मजदूर of आज — टकोमा रै long महरूम  known for its rough , gritty image .
A song about Tacoma , `` Thrice All American '' , by  अमरीकी singer-songwriter और पूर्व निवासी neko मामला , describes it as `` a dusty बूढ़ा गहना in the दक्षिण puget ध्वनि / जहाँ the  factories churn / and the timber 's all cut down '' .
tacoma-pierce काउंटी रै महरूम नामित एक of  the most livable areas in the country .
Tacoma was  भी recently सूचीबद्ध as the 19th सबसे  walkable city in the country .
In contrast , the city is  भी क्रमित as the सबसे stressed-out नगर in the देश  in a 2004 survey .
in 2006 , महिलाओं 's पत्रिका स्वः नामित टकोमा the `` सबसे sexually  Healthy City '' in the United States .
In 2012 , The  एडवोकेट दिया टकोमा the शीर्षक of `` gayest नगर in अमेरिका '' , in भाग क्युकी of the विशाल विविधता of पब्लिक कार्यालयों आयोजित , और  Washington State passing a bill in 2012 allowing LGBT couples to marry .
Tacoma is famous  लिये the 1940 पतन of the टकोमा narrows  Bridge .
Chula Vista ( ; ) is the  दूसरी largest नगर in the सैन डिएगो महानगर क्षेत्रफल , the सातवाँ largest नगर in दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , the fourteenth largest city in the State of California , and the 77th-largest city in the United States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 243,916 as of the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  .
Located  बस इससे शहर सैन डिएगो और इससे the मैक्सिकन किनारा in the दक्षिण खाड़ी प्रदेश of the महानगर क्षेत्रफल , the नगर is at  the center of one of the richest economic and culturally diverse zones in the United States .
Chula Vista is so  नामित क्युकी of इसके दर्शनीय स्थान between the सैन डिएगो  Bay and coastal mountain foothills .
संस्थापित in the जल्दी 19th सदी , तेज़ जनसांख्यिकी विकास रै  recently been observed in the city .
As the second largest  नगर in सैन डिएगो काउंटी , chula विस्टा रै जल्दी become a गंतव्य  popular to many tourists .
Located in the city is one of America 's few  year-round संयुक्त राज्य ओलम्पिक प्रशिक्षण centers और लोकप्रिय पर्यटक गंतव्यों शामिल क्रिकेट बेतार amphitheater , the  Chula Vista marina , and the Chula Vista Nature Center .
Metes and bounds is a system or method  of describing जमीन , रियल प्रॉपर्टी ( in कंट्रास्ट to निजी प्रॉपर्टी ) or रियल एस्टेट  .
The system  रै महरूम प्रयुक्त in इंग्लैण्ड लिये अनेक सदियां , और is स्टिल  used there in the definition of general boundaries .
By custom , it was applied in the original Thirteen Colonies that  became the संयुक्त राज्य , और in अनेक अन्य जमीन jurisdictions आधारित on अंग्रेज़ी आम विधि  .
Typically the system uses physical features of the local geography , along with directions and distances , to  define और describe the सीमाएँ of a पार्सल  of land .
The boundaries are described in a running prose  स्टाइल , working around the पार्सल in अनुक्रम , इससे a पाइंट of शुरूआत , returning वापस to  the same point ; compare with the oral ritual of beating the bounds .
It may  शामिल सन्दर्भ to अन्य adjoining parcels ( और उनके स्वामी ) , और it  , in turn , could also be referred to in later surveys .
At the time the description is compiled , it may have been marked on the ground with  स्थाई स्मारक लगाई जहाँ वहीँ यहूद no उपयुक्त प्राकृतिक स्मारक  .
The term `` metes '' refers to a boundary defined by the measurement of  प्रत्येक सीधा चलाएं , निर्दिष्ट by a अलहदा between the टर्मिनल  points , and an orientation or direction .
a दिशा may be a सरल कम्पास bearing , or a precise  orientation determined by accurate survey methods .
The term `` bounds '' refers to a more general boundary  वर्णन , ऐसे as साथ a निश्चित watercourse , a स्टोन वॉल , an adjoining पब्लिक सड़क रास्ता  , or an existing building .
The system is often used to define larger pieces of property ( e.g .  खेतो ) , और राजनैतिक subdivisions ( e.g . कस्बा सीमाएँ ) जहाँ precise परिभाषा is नहीं जरूरी or होता be दूर too महंगी , or previously  designated boundaries can be incorporated into the description .
Sir Isaac Newton ( 25 December 164220 March 1727 ) was an English physicist and mathematician who is  widely regarded as एक of the सबसे influential वैज्ञानिकों of सब समय और as a कुंजी फिगर in the वैज्ञानिक क्रान्ति  .
उसके किताब philosophiæ naturalis प्रिन्सिपिया mathematica ( `` गणितीय सिद्धान्त of प्राकृतिक दर्शनशास्त्र '' ) , पहला प्रकाशित  in 1687 , laid the foundations for most of classical mechanics .
Newton also made seminal  योगदान to प्रकाशिकी और साझा क्रेडिट साथ गॉटफ्राइड लैबनिट्ज़ लिये the आविष्कार  of the infinitesimal calculus .
Newton 's Principia formulated the laws of motion and universal gravitation  कि वर्चस्व वैज्ञानिकों ' दृश्य of the शारीरिक ब्रह्मांड लिये the  next three centuries .
It also demonstrated that the motion of objects  on the धरती और कि of celestial लाशें could be वर्णित by the  same principles .
By  deriving कॅप्लर 's कानून of ग्रहीय गति इससे उसके गणितीय वर्णन of गम्भीरता , न्यूटन removed the पिछला संदेह परिचय  the validity of the heliocentric model of the cosmos .
Newton built the first practical reflecting telescope and developed a theory of colour based on the observation  कि a प्रिज़्म decomposes श्वेत लाइट into the अनेक रंग  of the visible spectrum .
He also  प्रतिपादित an अनुभवजन्य विधि of कूलिंग और पढ़ाई the गति  of sound .
In addition to his work on the calculus , as a mathematician Newton  contributed to the पढ़ाई of शक्ति श्रेणी , generalised the द्विपद प्रमेय to non-integer exponents , और विकसित न्यूटन 's विधि लिये approximating the जड़ें  of a function .
Newton was a fellow of Trinity  कॉलेज और the दूसरी lucasian प्राध्यापक of गणित at  the University of Cambridge .
He was a devout but  अपरंपरागत ईसाई और , unusually लिये a सदस्य of the कैम्ब्रिज संकाय , he refused to लो पावन आदेश in the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड , शायद क्युकी  he privately rejected the doctrine of trinitarianism .
In addition to his work on the mathematical sciences , Newton also dedicated much of his time to the study of alchemy  और biblical कालक्रम , लकिन सबसे of उसके कार्य in those क्षेत्रों remained अप्रकाशित जबतक long बाद उसके  death .
In his later  जीवन , न्यूटन became अध्यक्ष of the  Royal Society .
He also served  the अंग्रेजों सरकारी as वार्डन और निपुण of the royal  Mint .
Prof. Walter Lewin  explains न्यूटन 's विधि of gravitation in  MIT course 8.01
Satellites and  projectiles सब obey न्यूटन 's विधि of  gravitation
Newton 's law of universal gravitation states that every point mass in the universe attracts every other point mass with a force  कि is सीधे आंशिक to the उत्पाद of उनके masses और inversely आंशिक to the वर्गाकार of the अलहदा  between them .
(  separately it थी दिखाया कि विशाल spherically सममित masses आकर्षित और हैं आकर्षित as if सब उनके  mass were concentrated at their centers . )
This is a general  शारीरिक विधि निकला इससे अनुभवजन्य observations by कया न्यूटन  called induction .
It is a part of classical  यांत्रिकी और थी प्रतिपादित in न्यूटन 's कार्य philosophiæ naturalis प्रिन्सिपिया mathematica ( `` the प्रिन्सिपिया  '' ) , first published on 5 July 1687 .
( When Newton 's book was  प्रस्तुत in 1686 to the royal समाज , रॉबर्ट hooke बना a अर्जी कि न्यूटन था प्राप्त the  inverse square law from him – see History section below . )
In modern  भाषा , the विधि राज्य the following:
assuming si इकाई , f is measured in newtons ( n ) , m1 और m2 in गामा ( kg )  , r in meters ( m ) , and the constant G is approximately equal to .
The value of  the निरंतर g थी पहला accurately संकल्पित इससे the परिणाम of the कैवेंडिश प्रयोग conducted by the अंग्रेजों वैज्ञानिक हेनरी कैवेंडिश in 1798  , although Cavendish did not himself calculate a numerical value for G .
This experiment was also the first test of Newton 's  सिद्धान्त of gravitation between masses in the प्रयोगशाला  .
It took place 111 years after the publication of Newton 's Principia and 71 years  बाद न्यूटन 's मौत , so none of न्यूटन 's calculations could उपयोग the मान of g ; बजाय he could तभी  calculate a force relative to another force .
Newton 's law of gravitation  resembles कूलम्ब 's विधि of विद्युत शक्तियां , जिससे is प्रयुक्त to गणना the परिमाण of विद्युत  force between two charged bodies .
Both are inverse-square laws , in  जिससे फ़ोर्स is inversely आंशिक to the वर्गाकार of the अलहदा  between the bodies .
Coulomb 's Law has the product of two charges in place of the product of the masses  , और the electrostatic निरंतर in प्लेस of  the gravitational constant .
Newton  's विधि रै चूंकि महरूम superseded by आइंस्टीन 's सिद्धान्त of सामान्य आपेक्षिकता , लकिन it continues  to be used as an excellent approximation of the effects of gravity .
Relativity is  जरूरी तभी जब वहीँ is a need लिये चरम परिशुद्धता , or जब dealing साथ gravitation लिये  extremely massive and dense objects .
White and red flags , representing Iraqi and  अमरीकी मौतों , बैठना in the ग्रास चतुष्कोण of the घाटी पुस्तकालयों on the corvallis , ऑरेगॉन , कैम्पस of ऑरेगॉन  State University .
As part of the traveling Iraq Body Count  प्रदर्शनी इससे 2008 to 2009 ( नहीं सम्बन्धित to इराकी देह गिनती प्रोजेक्ट ) , the ध्वज उद्देश्य to `` उठाएँ जागरूकता of the  human cost of the Iraq War . ''
( May  2008 )
Casualties of the conflict in Iraq since 2003 ( beginning with the 2003 invasion  of इराकी , और continuing साथ the ensuing occupation of इराकी , as खूब as the क्रियाएँ of the विभिन्न हथियारबंद समूह ऑपरेटिंग in the देश ) have आइये  in many forms , and the accuracy of the information available on different types of Iraq War casualties varies greatly .
The table below  summarizes विभिन्न estimates of  the Iraqi casualty figures .
For troops in the U.S.-led multinational coalition , the death toll is carefully  tracked और अद्यतनीकृत रोज़ , और the names और छायाचित्र of those मारे in कार्रवाई as खूब as in दुर्घटनाओं have महरूम प्रकाशित widely  .
A total of 4,486 U.S.  सैनिको यहूद मारे in इराकी between  2003 and 2012 .
Regarding the Iraqis ,  however , सूचना on दोनो सैन्य और civilian  casualties is both less precise and less consistent .
Estimates of  casualty स्तर हैं उपलब्धियाँ इससे पत्रकारों on the झाँकी , इससे officials of शामिल संगठन  , and from groups that summarize information on incidents reported in the news media .
The word ``  हताहत `` in इसके सबसे सामान्य भाव शामिल the घायल  as well as the dead .
Accounts of the number of coalition wounded vary widely , partly because it is not obvious what should be counted :  चाहिए तभी those चोटों गंभीर पर्याप्त to put a सिपाही आउट of आयोग  be included ?
Do illnesses or injuries  caused by दुर्घटनाओं गिनती , or चाहिए the फ़ोकस be प्रतिबंधित to wounds  caused by hostile engagement ?
Sources using different  परिभाषाएं may arrive at बहुत अलग संख्याएँ , और sometimes the precise  definition is not clearly specified .
asalto al coche ( डकैती of the कोच ) , by  Francisco de Goya
a highwayman थी a चोर और brigand  who preyed on travellers .
This type of outlaw usually travelled and robbed by  घोड़ा , as compared to a footpad जो travelled और robbed  on foot .
Mounted  लुटेरों यहूद widely माना to be socially  superior to footpads .
Such robbers operated in Great Britain  और आयरलैंड इससे the elizabethan era जबतक the जल्दी 19th सदी  .
The word highwayman is first known to be used in the  साल 1617 ; अन्य euphemisms शामिल `` शूरवीरों of the सड़क '' और `` सज्जनों of the  road . ''
Two terms  लागू to 19th-century उत्तर अमरीकी highwaymen यहूद सड़क एजेंटों in कुछ उदाहरण लिये पहाड़ डाकुओं जबकि in अन्य  cases the term is Rlallaala for mountain-based ruffians .
In the same time period in Australia ,  वे यहूद ज्ञात as bushrangers  .
Earvin `` Magic '' Johnson , Jr. ( born August 14 , 1959 ) is a retired  अमरीकी पेशेवर बास्केट खिलाड़ी जो निभाई पाइंट गार्ड लिये the लॉस एंजिल्स लेकर्स of the नेशनल बास्केट  Association ( NBA ) .
After  जीतना championships in ऊँची स्कूल और कॉलेज , जॉनसन  was selected first overall in the 1979 NBA Draft by the Lakers .
He won a championship and an NBA Finals Most Valuable  खिलाड़ी पुरस्कार in उसके रुकी ऋतु , और जीती चार अधिक championships साथ the लेकर्स दौरान the  1980s .
Johnson retired abruptly in 1991 after announcing that he had contracted HIV  , लकिन लौटे to खेल in the 1992 all-star खेल , जीतना the all-star mvp  Award .
After protests from his fellow players , he retired again for four  सालो , लकिन लौटे in 1996 , at आयु 36 , to खेल 32 खेल लिये the लेकर्स पहले retiring लिये  the third and final time .
Johnson 's career  उपलब्धियाँ शामिल तीन एनबीए mvp पुरस्कार , नौ एनबीए फाइनल दिखावे , बारह all-star खेल ,  and ten All-NBA First and Second Team nominations .
He led the league in  regular-season assists चार टाइम्स , और is the एनबीए 's all-time नेता in औसत  assists per game , at 11.2 .
Johnson was a member of the `` Dream  टोली `` , the u.S. बास्केट टोली कि जीती the ओलम्पिक सुनहरा पदक  in 1992 .
After leaving the NBA in 1992 ,  जॉनसन formed the जादू जॉनसन all-stars , a barnstorming टोली कि travelled  around the world playing exhibition games .
Johnson was honored as one of the 50 Greatest Players in NBA  इतिहास in 1996 , और enshrined in the बास्केट हॉल of कीर्ति in 2002  .
he थी रेटेड the महानतम एनबीए पाइंट गार्ड of  all time by ESPN in 2007 .
उसके दोस्ती और फंसने साथ बोस्टन सेल्टिक्स स्टार लैरी बर्ड , जिसको he  faced in the 1979 NCAA finals and three NBA championship series , were well documented .
Since his retirement , Johnson has been an  एडवोकेट लिये hiV/ एड्स रोकथाम और सुरक्षित sex , as खूब as an उद्योगों  , philanthropist , broadcaster and motivational speaker .
Johnson was a  part-owner of the लेकर्स लिये अनेक सालो , और थी भाग of a समूह कि  purchased the Los Angeles Dodgers in 2012 .
Allium cells  in अलग phases of  the cell cycle
The  कोशिकाएं of eukaryotes ( बाएँ )  and prokaryotes ( right )
The cell is the basic structural ,  कार्यात्मक और biological ईकाई of सब ज्ञात जीना जीवों .
It is the smallest unit of life that is  वर्गीकृत as a जीना बात ( मगर वायरस , जिससे consists तभी इससे dna/rna covered by प्रोटीन  and lipids ) , and is often called the building block of life .
It consists of a protoplasm enclosed within a  झिल्ली , जिससे contains अनेक biomolecules ऐसे as प्रोटीन  and nucleic acids .
Organisms can be classified as unicellular (  consisting of a सिंगल कोशिका ; सहित सबसे जीवाणु ) or बहुकोशिकीय ( सहित पौधे और पशु  ) .
While the number of cells in  पौधे और पशु varies इससे प्रजाति to प्रजाति , इंसानो contain परिचय  100 trillion ( 1014 ) cells .
Most plant and animal  कोशिकाएं हैं between 1 और 100 micrometres और इसलिए हैं दृश्य तभी अंतर्गत  the microscope .
The cell  थी खोजा by रॉबर्ट hooke  in 1665 .
The cell theory , first developed in 1839 by Matthias Jakob Schleiden and Theodor Schwann , states that all organisms are composed of one or more cells , that all cells come from  preexisting कोशिकाएं , कि vital कृत्यों of an सजीव occur भीतर कोशिकाएं , और कि सब कोशिकाएं contain the खानदानी सूचना जरुरी लिये regulating कोशिका कृत्यों और  for transmitting information to the next generation of cells .
Cells  उभरा on ग्रह धरती at तनिक 4.0–4.3 अरब  years ago .
The word cell  आता इससे the लैटिन गर्भगृह , अर्थ ``  small room '' .
The descriptive term for the smallest living biological structure was coined by  रॉबर्ट hooke in a किताब he प्रकाशित in 1665 जब he compared the कॉर्क कोशिकाएं he देखी through  his microscope to the small rooms monks lived in .
Grecian Formula is a men 's  बाल coloring उत्पाद in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
Canada  और यूरोपीय previously बैन the उत्पाद क्युकी  of its use of lead acetate .
A  मोटर स्कूटर 's सामने साथ an अव्यवहारिक क्रमांक और किस्में  of headlamps , added for decorative purposes
A headlamp is a lamp  संलग्न to the सामने of a गाडी to लाइट the सड़क ahead  .
Headlamp performance has steadily improved throughout the automobile age , spurred by the great disparity between daytime and nighttime  ट्रैफ़िक fatalities : the u.S. नेशनल राजमार्ग ट्रैफ़िक सुरक्षा प्रशासन राज्य कि nearly हाफ of सब traffic-related fatalities occur in the अंधेरा , despite तभी 25 % of ट्रैफ़िक यात्राएं दौरान  darkness .
जबकि it is आम लिये the पद हेडलाइट to be प्रयुक्त interchangeably in अनौपचारिक चर्चा , headlamp is the पद लिये the  device itself , while headlight properly refers to the beam of light produced and distributed by the device .
Other vehicles , such as trains  और वायुयान , हैं जरूरी to have  headlamps .
Bicycle headlamps are often used on  साइकिल , और हैं जरूरी in कुछ jurisdictions  .
They can be powered by  a बैटरी or a छोटी विद्युत सृजनकर्ता on the व्हील  .
Additionally automotive night  दृष्टि प्रणालियों कार्य to संपूरक headlamps  .
Women 's rights are the rights and entitlements claimed  लिये महिलाओं और लड़कियों of अनेक समाजों विश्वव्यापी  .
in कुछ स्थान ये अधिकारों हैं institutionalized or समर्थित by विधि , लोकल कस्टम , और आचरण  , whereas in others they may be ignored or suppressed .
They differ from  broader धारणाएं of इंसान अधिकारों through दावा of an अंतर्निहित ऐतिहासिक और परंपरागत पूर्वाग्रह विरूद्ध the कसरत  of rights by women and girls in favour of men and boys .
मुद्दे commonly संबद्ध साथ धारणाएं of महिलाओं 's अधिकारों शामिल , हालांकि हैं नहीं सीमित to , the सही : to bodily अखंडता और स्वायत्तता ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to थाम पब्लिक दफ्तर ; to कार्य ; to मेला मजदूरी or  equal pay ; to own property ; to education ; to serve in the military or be conscripted ; to enter into legal contracts ; and to have marital , parental and religious rights .
Caryn Elaine Johnson , best known as Whoopi Goldberg ( ,  ( born नवम्बर 13 , 1955 ) is an अमरीकी comedienne , अभिनेत्री , singer-songwriter , राजनैतिक activist , लेखक  and talk show host .
Goldberg made her film debut  in the रंग जामुनी ( 1985 ) , playing celie , a mistreated ब्लैक  woman in the Deep South .
She received a nomination for the Academy Award for  बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री और जीती उसके पहला सुनहरी ग्लोब  Award for her role in the film .
In 1990 ,  वो निभाई oda mae भूरा , a wacky मानसिक helping a slain man ( पैट्रिक swayze ) सहेजें उसके प्रेमी  ( Demi Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost .
This performance won her a second Golden Globe and an Academy Award for Best Supporting  अभिनेत्री ; इस बना गोल्डबर्ग तभी the दूसरी ब्लैक स्त्री in the इतिहास of the अकादमी पुरस्कार to जीत an एक्टिंग oscar—the  first being Hattie McDaniel who won for Gone With the Wind in 1939 .
Notable later films include Sister Act and Sister Act 2 , The  खिलाड़ी , बना in अमेरिका , कैसा स्टेला मिला उसके नाली वापस , लड़की , बाधित  and Rat Race .
She is also acclaimed for her  भूमिकाएँ as the बारटेंडर guinan in स्टार ट्रेक : the अगला पीढी , as टेरी doolittle in jumpin ' जोकर फ्लैश , और as कार्मेन tibideaux in ग्ली , as  well as the voice of Shenzi the hyena in The Lion King .
Goldberg has been  मनोनीत लिये 13 एमी पुरस्कार लिये उसके कार्य in टेलीविज़न  .
She was co-producer of the  लोकप्रिय खेल दिखाएँ हॉलीवुड वर्गों इससे  1998 to 2004 .
She has been the moderator of the  दिन बात दिखाएँ the दृश्य चूंकि  2007 .
गोल्डबर्ग रै a ग्रैमी , दो दिन emmys , दो सुनहरी ग्लोब्स , a टोनी ( लिये उत्पादन  , not acting ) , and an Oscar .
In addition  , गोल्डबर्ग रै a अंग्रेजों अकादमी फिल्मी पुरस्कार , चार लोगों 's चुनाव पुरस्कार , और  has been honored with a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
She is one  of the few मनोरंजनकर्ता जो have जीती an एमी , ग्रैमी , ऑस्कर , और  Tony Award .
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is  an `` unincorporated not-for-profit संघ '' जिससे operates a प्रमुख पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी लीग of 30 franchised सदस्य क्लब  , of which seven are currently located in Canada and 23 in the United States .
Headquartered  in नई यॉर्क नगर , the एनएचएल is widely माना to be the प्रीमियर पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी लीग in the संसार , और एक of the प्रमुख  professional sports leagues in the United States and Canada .
The Stanley Cup , the oldest professional sports trophy in North America , is  awarded annually to the लीग playoff चैंपियन at the समाप्त of प्रत्येक ऋतु  .
The league was organized on November 26 , 1917 , in Montreal ,  क्यूबेक , कनाडा , बाद the बर्खास्तगी of परिचालन of इसके पूर्ववर्ती संगठन , the नेशनल  Hockey Association ( NHA ) , which had been founded in 1909 .
It started with four teams and , through a  श्रेणी of expansions , contractions , और relocations , the लीग is अभी रचित of 30 क्रियाशील  franchises .
The nation to which the  नाम of the लीग originally referred थी कनाडा , हालांकि the लीग रै अभी महरूम binational चूंकि 1924  when it expanded into the United States .
After a labour dispute that led to the cancellation of the entire 2004–05  ऋतु , the लीग resumed खेल अंतर्गत a नई सामूहिक bargaining अनुबंध कि शामिल  a salary cap .
In 2009 , the NHL enjoyed record highs in terms of  sponsorships , उपस्थिति , और टेलीविज़न ऑडियंस  .
The NHL  draws अनेक अत्यधिक skilled खिलाड़ी इससे सब over the संसार और फिलहाल  has players from about 20 different countries .
Although Canadians  have historically गठित the बहुमत of the खिलाड़ी in the एनएचएल , over the पास्ट चार प्लस दशकों the percentages of us और यूरोपीय खिलाड़ी have  increased both because of the NHL 's continued expansion from six to thirty clubs since 1967 , and the increased availability of highly skilled European players .
maggots feeding on carrion  .
A maggot is the larva of a fly ( order Diptera ) ; it is applied in particular to the larvae of Brachyceran  उड़ता , ऐसे as houseflies , चीज उड़ता , और blowflies , बल्कि than लार्वे of the nematocera , ऐसे as मच्छरों  and Crane flies .
`` Maggot '' is not a technical term and should not be taken as such ; in many standard  पाठ्यपुस्तकों of कीटविज्ञान it करता नहीं appear in the अनुक्रमणिका at सब  .
in अनेक non-technical ग्रन्थ the पद is  used for insect larvae in general .
Other  स्त्रोत have coined उनके अपना परिभाषाएं ; लिये  example : `` ...
The term applies to a  ग्रब जब सब ट्रेस of limbs रै disappeared ... '' और `` ... लागू to the footless  larvae of Dipters . ''
Maggot-like fly  लार्वे हैं of चौड़ी महत्व in पारिस्थितिकी और आयुर्विज्ञान ; among अन्य भूमिकाएँ , विभिन्न प्रजाति  are prominent in recycling carrion and garbage , attacking crops and foodstuffs , spreading microbial infections , and causing myiasis .
Herod ( , Hordos ,  यूनानी : , hērōdēs ) , भी ज्ञात as हेरोदेस the ग्रेट ( 73/74 bce – 4 bce  in Jericho ) , was a Roman client king of Judea .
His epithet of `` the Great '' is widely disputed  as he is वर्णित as `` a madman जो murdered उसके अपना परिवार  and a great many rabbis `` .
He is also known for his colossal  भवन प्रोजेक्ट in जेरूसलम और elsewhere , सहित उसके विस्तार of the दूसरी टेम्पल in जेरूसलम ( sometimes  referred to as Herod 's Temple ) and the construction of the port at Caesarea Maritima .
Important  विवरण of उसके जीवनी हैं gleaned इससे the works of the 1st सदी ce roman–jewish  historian Josephus Flavius .
The Romans made Herod 's son , Herod Archelaus  , ethnarch of judea , samaria , और idumea ( biblical edom ) इससे 4 bce to 6 ce , referred to as the  tetrarchy of Judea .
Archelaus was  judged incompetent by the रोमन सम्राट augustus जो तब संयुक्त samaria , judea उचित  and Idumea into Iudaea province under rule of a prefect until age 41 .
Herod 's other son Herod Antipas was tetrarch of  galilee इससे 4 bce–39 ce  .
ABO blood  समूह antigens उपस्थित on रेड रक्त कोशिकाएं और  IgM antibodies present in the serum
The ABO blood group system is the most  महत्वपूर्ण रक्त प्रकार प्रणाली ( or रक्त समूह प्रणाली ) in इंसान  blood transfusion .
The associated anti-A and anti-B antibodies are usually  igm antibodies , जिससे हैं प्रायः उत्पादित in the पहला सालो of जीवन by sensitization to पर्यावरणीय substances ऐसे as खाना  , bacteria , and viruses .
ABO blood types are also present in some other animals , for  उदाहरण apes ऐसे as chimpanzees , bonobos  , and gorillas .
Year 1907 ( MCMVII ) was a common year starting on  मंगलवार ( कड़ी होगा प्रदर्शक the पूरा पंचांग ) of the gregorian पंचांग और a आम साल starting on सोमवार of the 13-day-slower जूलियन पंचांग  .
Northville is an affluent city located in and  विभाजित by ओकलैंड और वेन काउंटी in the u.S.  state of Michigan .
The  क्षेत्रफल is a उपनगरीय of महानगर  Detroit .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 5,970  at the 2010 census .
Most of the city is in  ओकलैंड काउंटी , और is घिरी  by the city of Novi .
The Wayne  काउंटी portion is घिरी by northville township  .
Northville is served  by northville पब्लिक स्कूलों  .
The city is  स्तिथ पूर्वोत्तर of ऐन arbor और उत्तरपश्चिम  of Detroit .
Elaine Stritch  ( born फ़रवरी 2 , 1925 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री  and vocalist .
She has appeared in numerous stage  plays और musicals , विशेषता films , और अनेक  television programs .
She is known for her performance of `` The Ladies Who Lunch '' in  स्टीफन sondheim 's 1970 musical कम्पनी , उसके 2001 one-woman दिखाएँ , ऐलेन stritch at स्वतंत्रता , और recently  for her role as Jack Donaghy 's mother Colleen on NBC 's 30 Rock .
She has been  मनोनीत लिये the टोनी पुरस्कार पाँच  times in various categories .
Stritch  is भी a three-time एमी पुरस्कार  winner .
Misfits  is a अंग्रेजों विज्ञान fiction comedy-drama टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ परिचय a समूह of यंग अपराधियों sentenced to कार्य in a जातियाँ  service programme , where they obtain supernatural powers after a strange electrical storm .
the श्रेणी खोली in 2009  and is currently ongoing .
Antonia Thomas , Iwan Rheon , Lauren  socha , नाथन stewart-jarrett , और रॉबर्ट sheehan हैं  introduced as Alisha Daniels , Simon Bellamy , Kelly Bailey , Curtis Donovan , and Nathan Young respectively .
Sheehan left after  the दूसरी श्रेणी , replaced in the तीसरा by जोसेफ gilgun  as Rudy Wade .
After the fourth series was announced Rheon , Thomas and Socha had left their roles  और होता be replaced by नई वर्ण कार्ला crome , नाथन mcmullen और मैट stokoe , as जेस , फिन और एलेक्स क्रमशः  .
Midway through the fourth  श्रेणी , stewart-jarrett बाएँ जबकि नताशा o'keeffe joined the डाल as ऐबी  Smith .
On 19 March 2013 , Channel 4 announced at a press event  कि वे have नवीनीकृत misfits लिये a पांचवां और फाइनल श्रेणी containing 8 एपीसोड  .
Brett Lorenzo Favre ( born October 10 , 1969  ) is a पूर्व अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक जो खर्च the बहुमत of उसके करियर  with the Green Bay Packers of the National Football League ( NFL ) .
He was a 20-year veteran of the NFL , having played  क्वार्टरबैक लिये the अटलांटा falcons ( 1991 ) , ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स  ( 1992 – 2007 ) , New York Jets ( 2008 ) and Minnesota Vikings ( 2009 – 2010 ) .
Favre  is the तभी क्वार्टरबैक in एनएफएल इतिहास to throw लिये over 70,000 गज  , over 500 touchdowns , over 300 interceptions , over 6,000 completions , and over 10,000 pass attempts .
Favre started at the quarterback  स्थिति लिये the विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिणी मिसिसिपी लिये चार सालो  before being selected in the second round of the 1991 NFL Draft by Atlanta ( 33rd overall ) .
he थी traded to ग्रीन खाड़ी on फ़रवरी 10 , 1992  , for the 19th pick in the 1992 NFL Draft .
Favre became the  पैकर्स ' starting क्वार्टरबैक in the चौथी खेल of the 1992 ऋतु , stepping in लिये घायल क्वार्टरबैक  Don Majkowski , and started every game through the 2007 season .
He was traded to the New York Jets and  प्रारंभ at क्वार्टरबैक लिये the 2008 ऋतु पहले हस्ताक्षर साथ the वाइकिंग्स on अगस्त 18 , 2009 as उनके  starting quarterback .
He made an NFL record 297  लगातार starts ( 321 सहित playoffs ) .
He  is the तभी खिलाड़ी to जीत the  AP Most Valuable Player three consecutive times ( 1995–97 ) .
He has led teams to eight division  championships ( 1995 , 1996 , 1997 , 2002 , 2003 , 2004 , 2007 , 2009 ) , पाँच nfc चैंपियनशिप खेल  ( 1995 , 1996 , 1997 , 2007 , 2009 ) , and two Super Bowl appearances ( Super Bowl XXXI , Super Bowl XXXII ) , winning one ( Super Bowl XXXI ) .
He  holds अनेक एनएफएल रिकॉर्ड , सहित सबसे करियर touchdown गुजरता , सबसे करियर गुजर गज , सबसे करियर pass completions , सबसे करियर pass कोशिशें , सबसे करियर interceptions thrown , सबसे लगातार starts  by a player , most consecutive starts by a quarterback , most career victories as a starting quarterback , most sacked , and most fumbles .
He is also  referred to by उसके उपनाम `` the gunslinger  '' .
The  following is a सूची of notable वायुयान hijackings  around the world .
The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or W3 , commonly known  as the वेब ) , is a प्रणाली of interlinked हाइपरटेक्स्ट दस्तावेज़ पहुँचा via the अंतरजाल  .
With a web  ब्राउजर , एक can दृश्य वेब पृष्ठों कि may contain टेक्स्ट , बिंब , वीडियो , और अन्य  multimedia , and navigate between them via hyperlinks .
Using concepts from his earlier hypertext systems like ENQUIRE , British engineer , computer scientist and at that time  कर्मचारी of the cern , सर टिम berners-lee , अभी निदेशक of the संसार चौड़ी वेब consortium ( w3c ) , लिखा a प्रस्ताव in  March 1989 for what would eventually become the World Wide Web .
At CERN , a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and Switzerland , Berners-Lee and Belgian computer  वैज्ञानिक रॉबर्ट cailliau प्रस्तावित in 1990 to उपयोग हाइपरटेक्स्ट `` to कड़ी और अभिगम सूचना of विभिन्न kinds as a वेब of नोड in जिससे the उपयोक्ता can ब्राउज़ at होगा '' , और वे सरेआम  introduced the project in December of the same year .
Wayne Lyman Morse ( October 20 , 1900July 22 , 1974 ) was a politician and attorney from Oregon , United States , known for his  proclivity लिये opposing उसके पार्टियों ' नेतृत्व , और specifically लिये उसके विपक्ष to the वियतनाम युद्ध on संवैधानिक grounds  .
Born in Madison , Wisconsin , and educated at the  विश्वविद्यालयों of wisconsin-madison और the विश्वविद्यालयों of मिनेसोटा विधि स्कूल , मोर्स स्थानांतरित to ऑरेगॉन in 1930  and began teaching at the University of Oregon School of Law .
During World War II he was elected to the United States  सीनेट as a रिपब्लिकन ; he became an स्वतंत्र बाद ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर 's चुनाव to the प्रेसिडेंसी  in 1952 .
While an  स्वतंत्र , he नियत a रिकार्ड लिये performing the दूसरी  longest one-person filibuster in the history of the Senate .
Morse  joined the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी in 1955 , और थी reelected  twice while a member of that party .
Morse made a brief run for  the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी 's अध्यक्षीय नामांकन  in 1960 .
A  few सालो बाद , मोर्स थी एक of तभी दो सीनेटरों जो opposed the गल्फ of tonkin रेज़ोल्यूशन , जिससे प्राधिकृत  the president to take military action in Vietnam without a declaration of war .
He continued to speak out  विरूद्ध the युद्ध in the ensuing सालो , और खोया उसके 1968 बोली लिये reelection  to Bob Packwood , who criticized his strong opposition to the war .
Morse made two  अधिक बोलियों लिये reelection to the सीनेट पहले उसके मौत in 1974  .
In parliamentary  कार्यविधि , a गति to तालिका रै दो अलग  and contradictory meanings:
In the United States , to table usually means the to lay [ the topic ]  on the तालिका or to मूव लिये postponement of विचार ; a प्रस्ताव to बर्खास्तगी विचार of  a pending motion .
Much less often , it means a motion to  `` put on the तालिका '' : a प्रस्ताव to शुरू विचार ( or reconsideration  ) , a usage consistent with the rest of the English-speaking world .
In the rest of the English-speaking world such as the United Kingdom , to table means to  मूव to प्लेस [ the टॉपिक ] upon the तालिका ( or to मूव to प्लेस on the तालिका ) : a प्रस्ताव to शुरू विचार ( or reconsideration  ) of a proposal .
Both the American and the British dialects have the sense of  `` to तालिका '' as to lay [ the टॉपिक ] on the तालिका or to कारण [ the टॉपिक  ] to lie on the table .
The difference is  the विचार of कया the तालिका is लिये , कि of  a shelf off to the side , or an active work bench .
The British meaning has the sense of the table as being an active work bench ,  साथ the टॉपिक होने the बीच of ध्यान , माना और discussed by सब जबतक it can be resolved , at जिससे पाइंट it is लिया बंद the  'table ' .
The American sense is that the table is like that of a shelf , archive ,  or long-term भंडार यंत्र , जहाँ the टॉपिक रै महरूम disposed of by sending it to the 'table  ' and leaving it there .
Toy Story 3 is a  2010 अमरीकी 3d कंप्यूटर एनिमेटेड comedy-drama थाना फिल्मी , और the तीसरा किश्त  in the Toy Story series .
It was produced by Pixar Animation  studios और वितरित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी तस्वीरें  .
Directed by Lee  unkrich , the फिल्मी थी released विश्वव्यापी इससे जून through अक्तूबर in डिज़्नी डिजिटल  3-D , RealD , and IMAX 3D .
Toy Story 3 was also  the पहला फिल्मी to be released theatrically साथ dolby  Surround 7.1 sound .
The  पटकथा थी लिखा by माइकल arndt , जबकि unkrich लिखा the स्टोरी साथ साथ जॉन lasseter और  Andrew Stanton , respectively director and co-writer of the two first films .
The plot focuses on the toys Woody , Buzz Lightyear ,  और उनके मित्रों dealing साथ an अनिश्चित भविष्य as उनके मालिक , एंडी , prepares  to leave for college .
Actors Tom Hanks , Tim Allen , Joan Cusack , Don Rickles , Estelle Harris , John Ratzenberger , Wallace Shawn , Jeff Pidgeon , Jodi Benson  , R. ली ermey , जॉन मॉरिस , और लॉरी metcalf reprised उनके voice-over भूमिकाएँ इससे the पिछला films  .
Jim Varney , who played Slinky  श्वान in the पहला दो films , और जो ranft , जो portrayed lenny और wheezy , दोनो died पहले  production began on Toy Story 3 .
The role of Slinky Dog was taken over by Blake  क्लार्क ( a dost of varney ) , जबकि ranft 's वर्ण और विभिन्न अन्य यहूद लिखा आउट of the स्टोरी  .
New characters include  प्रदर्शन by ned beatty , टिमोथी डाल्टन , क्रिस्टन schaal , bonnie  Hunt , Whoopi Goldberg , Jeff Garlin , Richard Kind , and Michael Keaton .
The feature broke  shrek the तिहाई रिकार्ड as the biggest खोलने दिन उत्तर अमरीकी सकल  for an animated film unadjusted for inflation , and a big opening with an unadjusted gross of $ 110,307,189 .
It is also the highest-grossing opening weekend for a Pixar  फिल्मी , as खूब as the highest-grossing खोलने वीकेंड लिये a फिल्मी to have खोली  in the month of June .
इस is the highest-grossing फिल्मी of 2010 , दोनो in the संयुक्त राज्य  and Canada , and worldwide .
In early August , it became Pixar 's highest-grossing film at the North American box office ( surpassing Finding Nemo ) , and  the highest-grossing एनिमेटेड फिल्मी of सब समय विश्वव्यापी ( surpassing shrek 2 ) ; बाद कि माह , खिलौना स्टोरी 3 became the पहला कभी एनिमेटेड फिल्मी in  history to make over $ 1 billion worldwide .
It is currently  the 10th-highest-grossing फिल्मी  of all time .
खिलौना स्टोरी 3 थी मनोनीत लिये पाँच अकादमी पुरस्कार , सहित  Best Picture , Best Adapted Screenplay , and Best Sound Editing .
It was the third animated film ( after Beauty  और the जानवर और up ) to be मनोनीत लिये अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन  Picture .
It won the awards for Best  एनिमेटेड विशेषता और बेहतरीन असली सोंग  .
John  levell starks ( born अगस्त 10 , 1965 ) is an अमरीकी  retired professional basketball shooting guard .
Starks was listed at 6'5 '' and 190  पाउंड दौरान उसके एनबीए playing करियर .
Although he was not drafted in the 1988 NBA Draft after attending  चार कॉलेजों in उसके देशी ओक्लाहोमा , सहित ओक्लाहोमा राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों , he gained कीर्ति जबकि playing लिये the नई यॉर्क knicks of the नेशनल बास्केट  Association in the 1990s .
सुरक्षित डिजिटल or ( sd ) is a non-volatile मेमोरी कार्ड स्वरूप लिये उपयोग in पोर्टेबल डिवाइस , ऐसे as  mobile phones , digital cameras , GPS navigation devices , and tablet computers .
The  सुरक्षित डिजिटल मानक is कायम by  the SD Card Association ( SDA ) .
SD technologies have been implemented in more than 400  ब्रांड्स आरपार दर्जनों of उत्पाद श्रेणी और अधिक than 8,000 मॉडल  .
The Secure Digital  स्वरूप शामिल चार कार्ड परिवारों उपलब्धियाँ in तीन अलग रूप कारकों  .
The four families are the original Standard-Capacity ( SDSC ) , the  high-capacity ( sdhc ) , the extended-capacity ( sdxc ) , और the sdio , जिससे combines input/output कृत्यों साथ आंकड़ा  storage .
The three  रूप कारकों हैं the असली आकार , the `` मिनी '' आकार , और the ``  micro '' size ( see illustration ) .
There are many  combinations of रूप कारकों और यंत्र परिवारों  .
Electrically passive adapters allow the use  of a छोटी कार्ड in a मेजबान यंत्र निर्मित to थाम a larger कार्ड .
Host devices that comply with newer versions of the specification  provide पिछड़ा संगतता और accept पुरानी sd ताश , लकिन इस आलेख explains अनेक कारकों कि can  prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A newer card may offer  वृहद क्षमता than the मेजबान यंत्र can  handle .
A newer  कार्ड may उपयोग a संचिका प्रणाली the मेजबान यंत्र  can not navigate .
Use of an SDIO card requires the host  यंत्र be designed लिये the input/output कृत्यों the कार्ड  provides .
the संगठन of the कार्ड थी बदला starting  with the SDHC family .
Some  विक्रेता उत्पादित sdsc ताश ऊपर 1 gb पहले the  SDA had standardized a method of doing so .
The SDA uses  अनेक trademarked लोगो to enforce अनुपालन साथ इसके विशेषताएँ  and assure users of compatibility .
ह्यूज जॉन mungo ग्रान्ट ( born 9 सितंबर 1960 ) is a  British actor and film producer .
He has  प्राप्त a सुनहरी ग्लोब , a bafta ,  and an Honorary César .
His films have earned more than US $ 2.4  अरब इससे 25 नाट्य रिलीज विश्वव्यापी  .
ग्रान्ट हासिल अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्टारडम बाद appearing in रिचर्ड कर्टिस  's successful Four Weddings and a Funeral ( 1994 ) .
he प्रयुक्त इस भेदन भूमिका as a बारंबार cinematic persona दौरान the 1990s  , delivering comic performances in mainstream films like Mickey Blue Eyes ( 1999 ) and Notting Hill ( 1999 ) .
By the turn of the 21st century , he had  स्थापित खुद as a अग्रणी man skilled साथ a satirical कॉमिक  talent .
Grant has expanded  उसके oeuvre साथ critically acclaimed turns as a कैड in ब्रिजेट जोन्स 's डायरी ( 2001 ) , परिचय  A Boy ( 2002 ) , Love Actually ( 2003 ) , and American Dreamz ( 2006 ) .
He later played  विरूद्ध प्रकार साथ अनेक कैमियो भूमिकाएँ in the एपिक नाटक फिल्मी  Cloud Atlas ( 2012 ) .
Within the film industry , Grant is cited as an anti-film star who  approaches उसके भूमिकाएँ जैसे a अक्षर कर्ता , और कोशिशें to मेक उसके एक्टिंग appear spontaneous  .
Hallmarks of his comic skills  शामिल a nonchalant टच of विडंबना / sarcasm और पढ़ाई शारीरिक  mannerisms as well as his precisely-timed dialogue delivery and facial expressions .
The  entertainment मीडिया 's कवरेज of ग्रान्ट 's जीवन बंद the बिग  screen has often overshadowed his work as a thespian .
He has been vocal about his disrespect for the  व्यवसायिक of एक्टिंग , और in उसके तिरस्कार towards  the culture of celebrity and hostility towards the media .
In a career spanning 30 years ,  ग्रान्ट रै repeatedly claimed कि एक्टिंग is नहीं a सच्चा कॉलिंग  but just a job he fell into .
The Han Dynasty ( ; ) ( 206 BC – 220 AD ) was an imperial dynasty of China , preceded  by the qin राजवंश ( 221–207 bc ) और succeeded by the तीन kingdoms ( 220–280 ad ) .
It was founded by the rebel  नेता लियू बंग , ज्ञात मरणोपरांत  as Emperor Gaozu of Han .
It was briefly interrupted by the Xin  राजवंश ( 9–23 ad ) of the पूर्व रीजेंट वांग mang  .
This interregnum separates the Han  into दो अवधि : the पश्चिमी हान ( 206 bc – 9 ad ) और  Eastern Han ( 25–220 AD ) .
Spanning over four centuries , the period of the  हान राजवंश is माना a सुनहरी आयु in चाइनीज इतिहास .
To this day , China 's majority ethnic group refers  to itself as the `` हान लोगों '' और the चाइनीज स्क्रिप्ट is referred to  as `` Han characters `` .
The Han Empire  थी विभाजित into क्षेत्रों सीधे नियंत्रित by the सेंट्रल सरकारी  , known as commanderies , and a number of semi-autonomous kingdoms .
ये kingdoms धीरे खोया सब vestiges of उनके स्वतंत्रता , विशेषकर  following the Rebellion of the Seven States .
The Xiongnu , a nomadic  कनफेडरेशन जिससे वर्चस्व the पूर्वी यूरेशियाई स्तान , पराजित the हान  army in battle in 200 BC .
following the शिकस्त , a राजनैतिक विवाह गठबंधन थी negotiated  in which the Han became the de facto inferior partner .
When ,  despite the सन्धि , the xiongnu जारी to रेड हान सीमायें , सम्राट  Wu of Han ( r. 141–87 BC ) launched several military campaigns against them .
The ultimate Han victory in these wars eventually forced  the xiongnu to accept vassal औकात as  Han tributaries .
These campaigns expanded Han sovereignty into the Tarim Basin of Central Asia and helped  स्थापित the विशाल व्यापार संजाल ज्ञात as the रेशा सड़क  , which reached as far as the Mediterranean world .
Han forces managed to  divide the xiongnu into दो स्पर्धा राष्ट्र , the दक्षिणी और उत्तरी xiongnu , और मजबूर the  Northern Xiongnu across the Ili River .
despite ये victories , the territories उत्तर of हान 's  borders were quickly overrun by the nomadic Xianbei Confederation .
After 92 AD , the palace eunuchs increasingly involved themselves in court  राजनीती , engaging in हिंसक शक्ति struggles between the विभिन्न consort clans of the empresses और सम्राज्ञी dowagers , causing the हान 's परम downfall  .
Imperial authority was also seriously  challenged by विशाल daoist धार्मिक समाजों जिससे instigated the पीला पगड़ी विद्रोह और the पाँच pecks of राइस विद्रोह  .
Following the death of Emperor Ling ( r.  168–189 ad ) , the राजमहल हिजड़े suffered होलसेल नरसंहार by सैन्य अधिकारियों , allowing सदस्यों of the aristocracy और सैन्य राज्यपालों  to become warlords and divide the empire .
When Cao Pi , King of Wei  , usurped the सिंहासन इससे सम्राट  Xian , the Han Dynasty ceased to exist .
The Han  राजवंश थी an आयु of आर्थिक समृद्धि और देखी a significant विकास of the धन अर्थव्यवस्था पहला स्थापित  during the Zhou Dynasty ( c. 1050–256 BC ) .
The coinage issued by the  सेंट्रल सरकारी मिंट in 119 bc remained the मानक coinage of चीन जबतक the तंग राजवंश  ( 618–907 AD ) .
To pay for its  सैन्य अभियान और the उपनिवेश of newly conquered frontier territories , the सरकारी राष्ट्रीयकृत the  private salt and iron industries in 117 BC .
These government monopolies were repealed during the Eastern Han period  , और the खोया आय थी recouped through heavily taxing निजी उद्यमियों .
The emperor  थी at the शिखर of हान समाज  .
He presided over the Han government but shared power with both the nobility  और नियुक्त मंत्रियों जो आए largely इससे the scholarly gentry क्लास  .
From the reign of Emperor Wu onward , the Chinese court officially sponsored Confucianism  in शिक्षा और अदालत राजनीती , synthesized साथ the cosmology of बाद विद्वानों  such as Dong Zhongshu .
This policy endured until  the पतन of the चिंग राजवंश in 1911 ad  .
Science and technology during the Han period  देखी significant अग्रिम , सहित papermaking , the nautical परिचालन अरित्र , the उपयोग of ऋणात्मक संख्याएँ in गणित , the raised-relief मैप , the हाइड्रोलिक  -powered armillary sphere for astronomy , and a seismometer employing an inverted pendulum .
Tourette  सिंड्रोम ( भी पुकारा tourette 's सिंड्रोम , tourette 's विकार , गाइल्स de la tourette सिंड्रोम , gts or , अधिक commonly , बस tourette 's or ts ) is an inherited neuropsychiatric विकार  with onset in childhood , characterized by multiple physical ( motor ) tics and at least one vocal ( phonic ) tic .
ये tics characteristically मोम और wane , can be suppressed  temporarily , and are preceded by a premonitory urge .
tourette 's is पारिभाषित as भाग of a वर्णक्रम of टिक विकार , जिससे शामिल  transient and chronic tics .
Tourette 's was once  माना a विरल और विचित्र सिंड्रोम , सबसे प्रायः संबद्ध साथ the मुँह of obscene शब्द or socially अनुचित और  derogatory remarks ( coprolalia ) , but this symptom is present in only a small minority of people with Tourette 's .
Tourette 's is no longer considered a rare condition , but it is not  सदा correctly पहचाना क्युकी सबसे मामले हैं mild और the गंभीरता of tics  decreases for most children as they pass through adolescence .
Between 0.4 % and 3.8 % of children ages 5 to 18 may have Tourette 's ; the prevalence of transient  और दीर्घकालिक tics in school-age children is उच्चतर , साथ the अधिक आम tics of नजर blinking , खाँसी , गला clearing , सूँघने , और फेशियल  movements .
Extreme Tourette 's in adulthood is a rarity , and Tourette 's does not  adversely affect प्रज्ञा  or life expectancy .
Genetic and environmental factors play a role  in the etiology of tourette 's , लकिन the सटीक कल्याणकारी हैं  unknown .
In most cases  , दवा is अनावश्यक  .
There is no  प्रभावी उपचार लिये प्रत्येक मामला of tics , लकिन निश्चित medications और therapies  can help when their use is warranted .
शिक्षा is an महत्वपूर्ण भाग of कोई उपचार योजना , और स्पष्टीकरण और reassurance अलोन  are often sufficient treatment .
Comorbid  शर्तें ( co-occurring diagnoses अन्य than tourette 's ) ऐसे as attention-deficit अतिसक्रियता विकार ( adhd ) और obsessive–compulsive  disorder ( OCD ) are present in many patients seen in tertiary specialty clinics .
These other conditions often cause more functional impairment  to the व्यक्तिगत than the tics कि हैं the hallmark of tourette 's , hence it is महत्वपूर्ण  to correctly identify comorbid conditions and treat them .
The eponym was bestowed by Jean-Martin Charcot ( 1825–1893 ) on behalf of his  निवासी , जॉर्जेस अल्बर्ट édouard ब्रूटस गाइल्स de la tourette ( 1859–1904 ) , a फ्रेंच चिकित्सक और neurologist , जो प्रकाशित an खाता of नौ मरीजों  with Tourette 's in 1885 .
सनबीम बैज  .
Sunbeam was a marque registered  by जॉन marston co. ltd of wolverhampton  , England , in 1888 .
the कम्पनी पहला बना साइकिल , तब मोटरसाइकिल और गाड़ियाँ इससे the लेट 19th सदी  until about 1936 , and applied the marque to all three forms of transportation .
The company also manufactured aero  इंजन in the पहला संसार युद्ध और 647 वायुयान दौरान the  Second World War .
A Sunbeam was the  पहला अंग्रेजों car to जीत a ग्रैंड प्रिक्स रेस  , and set a number of land speed records .
The company went into  receivership in 1935 और थी खरीदा by the rootes समूह , जिससे जारी  to use the Sunbeam marque .
Fox News Channel ( FNC ) , also known as Fox  न्यूज , is a केबल न्यूज चैनल स्वामित्व by the फॉक्स entertainment समूह , a subsidiary  of News Corporation .
As of April 2009 , the channel was available to 102 million households in  the संयुक्त राज्य और to दर्शक internationally , प्रसारण primarily इससे इसके नई  York studios .
The  चैनल थी निर्मित by australian-american मीडिया mogul रुपर्ट  Murdoch , who hired former NBC executive Roger Ailes as its founding CEO .
It  शुभारम्भ on अक्तूबर 7 , 1996 to  17 million cable subscribers .
It grew  दौरान the लेट 1990s और 2000s to become the  dominant cable news network in the United States .
Critics have stated that Fox News Channel promotes  रूढ़िवादी राजनैतिक स्थितियाँ और पक्षपातपूर्ण  reporting .
Commentators , news anchors , and reporters at Fox News  चैनल have responded कि न्यूज रिपोर्टिंग और राजनैतिक commentary operate independently  of each other , and have denied any bias in news reporting .
The  mandibular पहला molar or six-year molar is the दाँत स्तिथ distally ( दूर इससे the midline of the फेस ) इससे दोनो the mandibular दूसरी  premolars of the mouth but mesial ( toward the midline of the face ) from both mandibular second molars .
it is स्तिथ on the mandibular ( निम्नतर ) मेहराब of the मुँह , और generally  opposes the maxillary ( upper ) first molars and the maxillary 2nd premolar in normal class I occlusion .
The function of this molar is similar to that of all molars in regard to grinding  होने the प्रिंसिपल कार्रवाई दौरान mastication , commonly ज्ञात as चबाने  .
वहीँ हैं प्रायः पाँच well-developed पुलिन on mandibular पहला molars : दो on the buccal  ( side nearest the cheek ) , two lingual ( side nearest the tongue ) , and one distal .
There are great  मतभेद between the पतझड़ी ( baby ) mandibular molars और those of the स्थाई mandibular  molars , even though their function are similar .
The permanent  mandibular molars हैं नहीं माना to have कोई दांत कि precede  it .
Despite being named molars , the  पतझड़ी molars हैं followed by स्थाई  premolars .
In the universal system  of संकेतन , the पतझड़ी mandibular पहला molars हैं designated by a अक्षर  written in uppercase .
The right deciduous mandibular  पहला molar is ज्ञात as `` s '' , और the बाएँ एक is ज्ञात as `` l  '' .
The international notation  रै a अलग प्रणाली of संकेतन .
Thus , the right deciduous mandibular first  molar is ज्ञात as `` 84 '' , और the बाएँ एक is ज्ञात as `` 74 '' .
In the  सार्वभौमिक प्रणाली of संकेतन , the स्थाई mandibular पहला molars  are designated by a number .
The right permanent mandibular first molar is  ज्ञात as `` 30 '' , और the बाएँ एक is ज्ञात as `` 19 '' .
the पामर संकेतन उपयोग a क्रमांक in संयोजन साथ a प्रतीक  designating in which quadrant the tooth is found .
For this tooth , the left and right first molars would have the same  क्रमांक , `` 6 '' , लकिन the सही एक होता have the प्रतीक , `` ┐ '' , over  it , while the left one would have , `` ┌ '' .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय संकेतन रै a अलग क्रमांकन प्रणाली than the पिछला दो , और the सही स्थाई mandibular पहला  molar is known as `` 46 '' , and the left one is known as `` 36 '' .
mandibular प्राथमिक पहला  molars usually have four pulp horns .
The first molar is usually  the पहला स्थाई दाँत to erupt  and has adult undertones .
Anatomy : The  mandibular पहला molar रै पाँच पुलिन : the mesiobuccal ( mb , toward midline और गाल ) , mesiolingual ( ml , toward midline और जीभ ) , distolingual ( dl , दूर इससे midline और towards  tongue ) , distobuccal ( DB , away from midline and toward cheek ) , and distal ( D , away from midline ) , listed in order of decreasing size .
Listed in order of decreasing height they are  : ml , dl , df , mf , और D. an आठवीं cusp थी मिला in a प्राथमिक दूसरी  lower molar in an Argentinean child .
Viewed from the top of the tooth ( occlusal view ) , the mandibular first molar is  pentagonal ( पाँच तरफा ) in आकार और tapers toward the lingual , साथ the पहलू होने the buccal सतह , the mesial सतह , the lingual सतह , distal सतह  , and the distobuccal surface .
the occlusal सतह रै  four grooves .
The central  नाली is नहीं सीधा लकिन रनों bas the बीच of the दाँत mesially to distally और contains चार गड्ढों  ( mesial , central , central , and distal ) .
The distobuccal groove runs from  the distal गड्ढे in the सेंट्रल नाली distobuccally separating  the distal and distobuccal cusps .
The lingual  नाली रनों इससे the अधिक distal of the सेंट्रल गड्ढों in the सेंट्रल नाली toward the  lingual surface between the mesiolingual and distolingual cusps .
The  buccal नाली रनों इससे the अधिक mesial of the सेंट्रल गड्ढों in the सेंट्रल नाली toward the buccal सतह  between the mesiobuccal and distobuccal cusps ending in the buccal pit .
The portion of the central groove between the central pits is termed the  लुईस ऑफसेट और is अनिवार्य to खाता लिये the स्थितियाँ of the buccal और lingual डोले ( buccal नाली होने अधिक mesial than the lingual नाली  while they are parallel ) .
From the  buccal ( buccal दृश्य ) , दो जड़ें  are present .
The distal root is generally  straighter , हालांकि दोनो प्रायः have a पतला  distal curvature .
The heights of contour on the mesial  और distal सम्पर्क the सटा दांत और हैं स्तिथ at the जंक्शन of the  occlusal and middle thirds of the crown .
The Florida Legislature is the two  घरों कि अधिनियम as the राज्य विधानमंडल of the u.S. राज्य of फ्लोरिडा  .
the फ्लोरिडा संविधान राज्य कि `` the विधान शक्ति of the राज्य  shall be vested in a legislature of the State of Florida , '' composed of a Senate and House of Representatives .
The  विधानमंडल is seated at the फ्लोरिडा  State Capitol in Tallahassee .
Stained  कांच चित्रण of डेनियल interceding साथ arioch  , the king 's guard .
Arioch had been  चार्ज साथ हत्या सब the हिकमत मेन बाद वे यहूद नहीं समर्थ  to interpret Nebuchadnezzar 's dream .
Daniel 2 is the  दूसरी अध्याय of the किताब of डेनियल in the यहूदी  Bible .
The chapter 's  सोर्स टेक्स्ट is predominantly लिखा  in Aramaic .
According to the text  , nebuchadnezzar is the किंग of बाबुल जो is troubled by उसके  dreams .
He demands an  निर्वचन लिये उसके सपनो or होगा have उसके रहस्यवादी  interpreters executed .
Daniel seeks Divine Wisdom to  interpret the किंग 's सपनो और गुणगान परमेश्वर साथ a  short psalm .
God  देता डेनियल a दृष्टि in  the night to reveal the king 's dream .
Able to satisfy the king  , डेनियल is प्रचारित over the पूरे प्रांत  of Babylon .
One  comcast बीच , the मुख्यालय of comcast  in Philadelphia , PA .
The old  comcast लोगो इससे 1969 to 1999 , जब it थी replaced साथ the  crescent logo .
The Comcast Corporation  is an अमरीकी प्रदाता of entertainment , सूचना और संचार  products and services .
It is the largest cable operator , one of  the biggest द्रव्यमान मीडिया , घर अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाता , और तीसरा largest घर टेलीफोन सेवा प्रदाता in the संयुक्त राज्य , providing केबल टेलीविज़न , ब्रॉडबैंड अंतरजाल , टेलीफोन सेवा और in कुछ क्षेत्रों घर सुरक्षा ( सहित burglar सचेतक , निगरानी कैमरे  , fire alarm systems and home automation ) to both residential and commercial customers in 40 states and the District of Columbia .
The company is headquartered in  फिलाडेल्फिया , पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
In 2011 , Comcast acquired a 51 % majority stake in media conglomerate NBCUniversal from GE in January 2011 , and began the process  of खरीदना the बाकी 49 % on फ़रवरी 12 , 2013 , at a लागत of $ 16.7 अरब  .
It  समाप्त the खरीदें on कूच 19 ,  2013 .
Comcast also  रै significant पकड़कर in अनेक केबल संजाल  ( including E !
entertainment टेलीविज़न , स्टाइल संजाल , g4 , the गोल्फ़ चैनल और एनबीसी खेल संजाल ) , वितरण  ( ThePlatform ) , and related businesses .
Comcast has been the subject of criticism for  क्रियाएँ सहित इसके stance on जाल neutrality , as खूब as ग़रीब परिणाम on ग्राहक संतोष  surveys .
Porcupines are rodents with a coat  of शार्प कांटे , or quills , कि बचाव और camouflage  them from predators .
They  हैं स्वदेशी to the americas , दक्षिणी एशिया  , and Africa .
Porcupines are the  तीसरा largest of the rodents , पीछे the capybara और  the beaver .
सबसे porcupines हैं परिचय long  , with an long tail .
weighing , वे हैं rounded ,  large and slow .
porcupines आइये in विभिन्न  shades of brown , gray , and the unusual white .
porcupines ' spiny सुरक्षा resembles कि of  the unrelated erinaceomorph hedgehogs and monotreme echidnas .
The common  साही is a herbivore  .
It eats leaves , herbs , twigs and  ग्रीन पौधे जैसे skunk गोभी और क्लोवर और in the शीत it may खा  bark .
The North American  साही प्रायः climbs पेड़ to  find food .
The  अफ़्रीकी साही is नहीं a climber और  forages on the ground .
It is mostly nocturnal ,  लकिन होगा sometimes forage  for food in the day .
Porcupines have become a  pest in कीनिया और हैं खाया as  a delicacy .
The name porcupine  आता इससे मध्य फ्रेंच porc espin  ( spined pig ) .
A regional American  नाम लिये the एनिमल is quill  pig .
First page of US  पेटेंट 129,843 लिये सुधार in lubricators लिये steam-engines
Elijah J. McCoy ( May 2 ,  1844 – अक्तूबर 10 , 1929 ) थी a ब्लैक canadian-american आविष्कारक और इंजीनियर , जो थी notable लिये उसके  57 U.S. patents , most to do with lubrication of steam engines .
Born free in Canada , he returned as a five-year-old  चाइल्ड साथ उसके परिवार to the संयुक्त राज्य in 1847 , जहाँ he जिया लिये the बाकी of उसके जीवन और became  a US citizen .
Honda FCX Clarity , a  हाइड्रोजन ईंधन कोशिका demonstration गाडी introduced  in 2008
A  हाइड्रोजन गाडी is a गाडी कि  uses hydrogen as its onboard fuel for motive power .
Hydrogen vehicles include hydrogen fueled space rockets ,  as खूब as ऑटोमोबाइल और अन्य परिवहन वाहनों  .
The power plants of such vehicles convert the chemical energy of hydrogen to mechanical energy  either by burning हाइड्रोजन in an आतंरिक दहन इंजन , or by reacting हाइड्रोजन साथ ऑक्सीजन in a ईंधन  cell to run electric motors .
Widespread use of hydrogen for fueling  परिवहन is a कुंजी तत्व of a प्रस्तावित हाइड्रोजन अर्थव्यवस्था  .
Hydrogen fuel does not occur naturally on Earth and thus  is नहीं an उर्जा सोर्स ; बल्कि it is an उर्जा वाहक  .
It is most frequently made from methane or other fossil fuels , but it can be  उत्पादित using स्त्रोत ( ऐसे as हवा , सौर , or नाभिकीय ) कि हैं intermittent , too व्याप्त or too cumbersome to सीधे  propel vehicles .
Integrated wind-to-hydrogen plants , using electrolysis of water ,  हैं exploring technologies to उद्धार लागत कम पर्याप्त , और quantities ग्रेट  enough , to compete with traditional energy sources .
Many companies  हैं working to develop technologies कि might efficiently exploit the संभावित  of hydrogen energy for mobile uses .
The  आकर्षण of using हाइड्रोजन as an उर्जा करेंसी is कि , if हाइड्रोजन is prepared बगैर using चट्टान ईंधन inputs , गाडी  propulsion would not contribute to carbon dioxide emissions .
The drawbacks of hydrogen use are high capital cost , low energy content per unit volume , high tankage weights , very high storage vessel pressures , the storage , transportation and filling of gaseous or liquid hydrogen in vehicles , the  विशाल निवेश in अवसंरचना कि होता be जरूरी to ईंधन वाहनों , और the inefficiency of उत्पादन प्रक्रियाओं .
Sacramento is the capital city of the  u.S. राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the सीट of सरकारी of sacramento  County .
It is located at the confluence of the Sacramento River and the American River in  the उत्तरी portion of कैलिफ़ोर्निया 's expansive सेंट्रल  Valley .
With an estimated 2011  जनसांख्यिकी of 477,891 , it is the sixth-largest नगर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the 35th largest नगर in  the United States .
Sacramento is the core cultural and economic center of  the sacramento महानगर क्षेत्रफल जिससे शामिल सात काउंटी साथ  an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123 .
Its metropolitan area is the fourth largest in California after the Greater Los Angeles Area , San Francisco Bay Area ,  और the सैन डिएगो महानगर क्षेत्रफल , as खूब as the 25th  largest in the United States .
Sacramento was cited by Time magazine  as अमेरिका 's सबसे ethnically और racially एकीकृत नगर  in 2002 .
Sacramento became a city through the efforts of the Swiss  अप्रवासी जॉन sutter , sr. , उसके बेटे जॉन sutter , jr. , और  James W. Marshall .
Sacramento  grew जल्दी धन्यवाद to the सुरक्षा of sutter 's फोर्ट , जिससे  was established by Sutter in 1839 .
During the California Gold  फटाफट , sacramento थी a प्रमुख वितरण पाइंट , a वाणिज्यिक और agricultural बीच , और a टर्मिनस लिये वैगन रेल , stagecoaches , riverboats , the टेलीग्राफ , the टट्टू एक्स्प्रेस  , and the First Transcontinental Railroad .
California State University ,  sacramento , अधिक commonly ज्ञात as sacramento राज्य or सैक राज्य , is the largest लोकल  university .
It is one of the twenty-three  campuses of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों प्रणाली  .
Drexel  विश्वविद्यालयों sacramento is स्तिथ in शहर  , Sacramento .
University of the Pacific  's mcgeorge स्कूल of विधि is स्तिथ in  the Oak Park neighborhood .
In addition , the  विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया , डेविस is स्तिथ in आसपास  Davis , west of the capital .
The UC Davis Medical  बीच , a world-renowned शोध हॉस्पिटल , is  located in the city of Sacramento .
The Apple Store  is a कड़ी of खुदरा स्टोर्स स्वामित्व और संचालित by ठहराना inc. , dealing  in computers and consumer electronics .
The stores sell Macintosh personal  कंप्यूटर , तन्त्र , ipods , ipads , आईफ़ोन , third-party accessories  , and other consumer electronics such as Apple TV .
Some high profile stores  विशेषता a थिएटर लिये प्रस्तुतियों और वर्कशॉप और a स्टुडियो लिये प्रशिक्षण साथ ठहराना उत्पाद ; सब स्टोर्स प्रस्ताव a प्रतिभाशाली बार लिये तकनीकी  support and repairs , as well as free workshops available to the public .
Under the leadership  of रॉन जॉनसन , the पूर्व वरिष्ठ वाइस अध्यक्ष of खुदरा परिचालन , the ठहराना स्टोर्स have , according to an  article in the New York Times , been responsible for `` [ turning ] the boring computer sales floor into a sleek playroom filled with gadgets '' .
,  ठहराना रै 405 स्टोर्स विश्वव्यापी , साथ वैश्विक बिक्री of अरब in merchandise in 2011 , और वे सीसे the संयुक्त राज्य  retail market in terms of sales per unit area .
Steven  पॉल `` स्टीव '' कार्य ( ; फ़रवरी 24 , 1955 – अक्तूबर 5 , 2011 ) थी an अमरीकी  entrepreneur and inventor , best known as the co-founder , chairman , and CEO of Apple Inc .
Through Apple , he was widely recognized as a charismatic pioneer of the personal computer  क्रान्ति और लिये उसके influential करियर in the कंप्यूटर और उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स फ़ील्ड , transforming ``  one industry after another , from computers and smartphones to music and movies ... ''
Jobs also  co-founded और परोसा as मुख्य कार्यपालिका of पिक्चर्स एनिमेशन studios ; he became a सदस्य of the फलक  of directors of The Walt Disney Company in 2006 , when Disney acquired Pixar .
Jobs was among the first to see the commercial potential of Xerox PARC 's mouse -driven  आलेखीय उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस , जिससे led to the सृष्टि of the ठहराना लिसा और , एक साल बाद  , the Macintosh .
He also played a role in introducing  the laserwriter , एक of the पहला widely उपलब्धियाँ लेज़र मुद्रक  , to the market .
After a power struggle with the board of directors in 1985 , Jobs  बाएँ ठहराना और संस्थापित अगला , a कंप्यूटर मंच विकास  company specializing in the higher-education and business markets .
In  1986 , he acquired the कंप्यूटर ग्राफिक्स प्रभाग of लुकासफ़िल्म  , which was spun off as Pixar .
he थी credited in खिलौना स्टोरी ( 1995  ) as an executive producer .
He served  as सीईओ और बहुमत shareholder जबतक डिज़्नी 's खरीदें of  Pixar in 2006 .
In 1996 ,  बाद ठहराना था विफल to उद्धार इसके ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली , copland , gil amelio turned to अगला  Computer , and the NeXTSTEP platform became the foundation for the Mac OS X .
Jobs returned to Apple  as an सलाहकार , और took कंट्रोल of the कम्पनी  as an interim CEO .
Jobs brought Apple from  निकट दिवालियापन to profitability by 1998  .
As the new CEO of the company , Jobs oversaw the development of the iMac , iTunes ,  ipod , iphone , और ipad , और on the सेवाएं पक्ष , the कम्पनी 's ठहराना खुदरा स्टोर्स , itunes स्टोर और  the App Store .
the कामयाबी of ये उत्पाद और सेवाएं provided अनेक सालो of stable वित्तीय रिटर्न  , and propelled Apple to become the world 's most valuable publicly traded company in 2011 .
the reinvigoration of the कम्पनी is regarded by अनेक  commentators as one of the greatest turnarounds in business history .
In 2003  , कार्य थी diagnosed साथ a अग्न्याशय  neuroendocrine tumor .
Though it was initially treated , he reported a hormone imbalance , underwent  a जिगर प्रत्यारोपण in 2009 , और appeared progressively thinner as उसके स्वास्थ्य अस्वीकृत  .
On medical leave for most of 2011 , Jobs  resigned in अगस्त कि साल , और थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष  of the Board .
he died of respiratory गिरफ़्तार सम्बन्धित  to his metastatic tumor on October 5 , 2011 .
Jobs  प्राप्त a क्रमांक of honors और पब्लिक मान्यता  for his influence in the technology and music industries .
He has been referred to as `` legendary '' , a `` futurist ''  or बस `` दूरदर्शी '' , और रै महरूम वर्णित as the `` पिता of the डिजिटल क्रान्ति  '' , a `` master of innovation '' , and a `` design perfectionist '' .
