Roman numerals , the numeric system in ancient  रोम , उपयोग combinations of अक्षर इससे the लैटिन वर्णमाला  to signify values .
The  संख्याएँ 1 to 10 can be expressed in रोमन  numerals as follows:
और .
The Roman numeral  प्रणाली is a cousin of etruscan numerals  .
Use of Roman numerals  जारी बाद the मनाही of  the Roman Empire .
From the 14th century on , Roman numerals began to be replaced  in सबसे contexts by अधिक सुविधाजनक hindu-arabic numerals ; however इस प्रक्रम थी क्रमिक , और the उपयोग of रोमन numerals in कुछ नाबालिग अनुप्रयोग  continues to this day .
प्रभावी नाभिकीय चार्ज आरेख
The  प्रभावी नाभिकीय चार्ज ( प्रायः symbolize as or Z* ) is the जाल धनात्मक चार्ज  experienced by an electron in a multi-electron atom .
The term `` effective '' is  प्रयुक्त क्युकी the shielding प्रभाव of negatively चार्ज electrons रोकता उच्चतर कक्षीय electrons इससे experiencing  the full nuclear charge by the repelling effect of inner-layer electrons .
The effective nuclear  चार्ज अनुभवी by the बाहरी शेल इलेक्ट्रॉन  is also called the core charge .
it is संभावित to determine the शक्ति of the नाभिकीय चार्ज  by looking at the oxidation number of the atom .
This  is a सूची of एपीसोड इससे the डिस्कवरी  Channel series , Storm Chasers .
A rural stretch of I-5 , with two  गलियों in प्रत्येक दिशा अलग by a विशाल grassy मध्य , और साथ cross-traffic  limited to overpasses and underpasses
The Dwight D. Eisenhower National System of  अंतरराज्यीय और रक्षा राजमार्गों ( commonly ज्ञात as the अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग प्रणाली , अंतरराज्यीय फ्रीवे प्रणाली , अंतरराज्यीय प्रणाली , or बस the अंतरराज्यीय ) is a संजाल of freeways कि फ़ॉर्म a भाग of the नेशनल राजमार्ग प्रणाली  of the United States .
The system is named for  अध्यक्ष ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर , जो championed  its formation .
Construction was  प्राधिकृत by the संघीय सहायता राजमार्ग अधिनियम of 1956 , और the असली  portion was completed 35 years later .
The network has since been extended , and , it had a total length of , making it the world 's  दूसरी longest बाद चीन 's . , परिचय one-quarter of सब गाडी मील चलित in the देश उपयोग the अंतरराज्यीय  system .
The cost of construction has been estimated at $ 425 billion ( in 2006 dollars ) ,  बनाना it the `` largest पब्लिक works कार्यक्रम चूंकि the पिरामिडों  `` .
The system has  contributed in shaping the संयुक्त राज्य into a संसार आर्थिक महाशक्ति  and a highly industrialized nation .
.eu is the country code  top-level डोमेन ( cctld ) लिये  the European Union ( EU ) .
Launched on 7 December 2005 , the  डोमेन is उपलब्धियाँ लिये संगठनों in और निवासियों of eu सदस्य  states .
The TLD is administered by EURid , a consortium  originally consisting of the नेशनल cctld रजिस्ट्री ऑपरेटर of बेल्जियम , स्वीडन , और इटली , joined बाद by the नेशनल  registry operator of the Czech Republic .
ट्रेडमार्क स्वामी यहूद समर्थ to submit पंजीकरण through a सूर्योदय काल ,  in an effort to prevent cybersquatting .
Full  पंजीकरण प्रारंभ on 7 अप्रैल  2006 .
Meister means master  in जर्मनी ( as in निपुण craftsman , or as an honorific शीर्षक ऐसे  as Meister Eckhart ) .
The word is  akin to maestro  .
In sports  , meister is प्रयुक्त लिये the वर्तमान नेशनल , यूरोपीय or संसार  champion ( Deutscher Meister , *Europameister , Weltmeister ) .
Many modern day  जर्मनी पुलिस शक्तियां उपयोग the शीर्षक  Meister .
दौरान the दूसरी संसार युद्ध , meister थी the उच्चतम आयोजिक  rank of the Ordnungspolizei .
Meister has been  उधार into अंग्रेज़ी कठबोली , जहाँ it is प्रयुक्त  in compound nouns .
A person  referred to as “meister” is एक जो रै extensive सैद्धांतिक ज्ञान और व्यावहारिक  skills in his profession , business , or some other kind of work or activity .
लिये उदाहरण , a “puzzle-meister” होता be किसी  highly skilled at solving puzzles .
These neologisms sometimes have a  व्यंग्यात्मक intent ( लिये उदाहरण , “stubble-meister” लिये किसी साथ a छोटी , neat दाढ़ी or “crier-meister” लिये किसी जो  often cries ) .
Mighty Morphin Power Rangers is an American live-action children 's television series about  teenagers साथ super-powers , आधारित on the 16th किश्त of the जापानी सुपर sentai मताधिकार , kyōryū sentai zyuranger .
Both the show and  इसके सम्बन्धित merchandise देखी unbridled overnight कामयाबी , बनने a स्टेपल  of 1990s pop culture in mere months .
Under  the असली नाम , `` mighty morphin शक्ति रेंजरों '' the श्रेणी भागा इससे 1993 to 1995  and spawned the feature film Mighty Morphin Power Rangers : The Movie .
The  दूसरी और तीसरा सीज़न of the दिखाएँ खींचा on फुटेज और तत्व इससे the सुपर sentai श्रेणी gosei sentai dairanger और निंजा sentai kakuranger क्रमशः  , though the Zyuranger costumes were still used for the five main Rangers and several regular villains .
Only the mecha and the Kiba  रेंजर वेशभूषा ( worn by the श्वेत रेंजर ) यहूद retained इससे dairanger लिये the दूसरी ऋतु , जबकि तभी the mecha इससे kakuranger  were featured in the third season .
However the Kakuranger  वेशभूषा यहूद बाद प्रयुक्त लिये the शीर्षक वर्ण of the mini-series  , Mighty Morphin Alien Rangers .
The series was  उत्पादित by mmpr प्रोडक्शन्स , वितरित by saban entertainment  , and aired on Fox Kids .
The show 's merchandise  थी उत्पादित और वितरित  by Bandai Entertainment .
In 1996 , the series was rebranded as the Power  रेंजरों मताधिकार ; renaming the श्रेणी प्रत्येक साल बाद , और using वेशभूषा , प्रॉप्स  , and footage from subsequent Super Sentai series , as well as changing the cast and storyline .
While an overarching storyline would continue until Power Rangers Lost  आकाशगंगा , subsequent श्रेणी बाद mmpr हैं नहीं सिक्वेल or spin-offs in the परंपरागत भाव  .
In 2010 , a re-version of Mighty  morphin शक्ति रेंजरों , साथ a नई लोगो , कॉमिक book-referenced ग्राफिक्स , और अतिरिक्त वैकल्पिक खास प्रभाव , थी  broadcast on ABC Kids , and Bandai produced brand new toys to coincide with the series .
Edgar Allan Poe ( born Edgar Poe ; January 19 , 1809 –  अक्तूबर 7 , 1849 ) थी an अमरीकी लेखक , कवि , एडिटर और साहित्यिक आलोचक , माना  part of the American Romantic Movement .
Best known for his tales of mystery  और the घोर , पो थी एक of the earliest अमरीकी practitioners of the छोटी स्टोरी और is generally  considered the inventor of the detective fiction genre .
He is further credited with  contributing to the उभरते विधा of विज्ञान fiction  .
He was the first well-known American writer to try to earn a living  through लिखने अलोन , resulting in a financially मुश्किल जीवन  and career .
He was born as Edgar Poe in Boston , Massachusetts ; he was orphaned young  जब उसके माँ died shortly बाद उसके पिता abandoned the परिवार .
Poe was taken in by John and Frances Allan , of Richmond , Virginia ,  लकिन वे never formally अपनाया  him .
He attended the University of  वर्जिनिया लिये एक सेमेस्टर लकिन बाएँ due to कमी of धन  .
After enlisting in the Army and  बाद failing as an अधिकारी 's cadet at वेस्ट पाइंट , पो parted तरीके साथ the allans  .
His publishing career began humbly , with an anonymous collection  of कविताएं , tamerlane और अन्य कविताएं ( 1827 ) , credited तभी to `` a bostonian  '' .
Poe switched his focus to prose and  खर्च the अगला अनेक सालो working लिये साहित्यिक जर्नल्स  and periodicals , becoming known for his own style of literary criticism .
His work forced him  to मूव among अनेक शहरों , सहित बाल्टीमोर ,  Philadelphia , and New York City .
in बाल्टीमोर in 1835 , he शादीशुदा वर्जिनिया  Clemm , his 13-year-old cousin .
In January 1845  पो प्रकाशित उसके कविता , `` the रेवेन `` , to  instant success .
His wife died of  तपेदिक दो सालो बाद इसके प्रकाशन  .
He began planning  to उपज उसके अपना जर्नल , the penn ( बाद renamed the स्टाइलस ) , हालांकि he died पहले it  could be produced .
On October 7 , 1849 , at age 40 , Poe died in Baltimore ; the  कारण of उसके मौत is अनजान और रै महरूम variously attributed to दारू , दिमाग जमघट , हैजा , दवाएँ , दिल बीमारी , rabies , आत्महत्या , तपेदिक ,  and other agents .
Poe and his works influenced  साहित्य in the संयुक्त राज्य और around the संसार , as खूब as in specialized  fields , such as cosmology and cryptography .
Poe and his  कार्य appear throughout लोकप्रिय संस्कृति in साहित्य , म्यूज़िक , films  , and television .
A number  of उसके घरों हैं समर्पित संग्रहालय  today .
The Mystery  लेखक of अमेरिका उपस्थित an सालाना पुरस्कार ज्ञात as the एडगर पुरस्कार  for distinguished work in the mystery genre .
Lions are  obligate carnivores ; वे आवश्यकता up to सात गामा ( 15 पाउंड ) of मांस  per day .
A major component of their diet  is the flesh of विशाल स्तनधारियों , जैसे इस अफ़्रीकी भैंस  .
A carnivore ( ) meaning 'meat  भक्षक ' ( लैटिन , caro अर्थ 'meat ' or 'flesh ' और vorare अर्थ 'to devour ' ) is an सजीव कि गर्भाशयी इसके उर्जा और nutrient आवश्यकताएँ इससे a आहार consisting  mainly or exclusively of animal tissue , whether through predation or scavenging .
Animals that depend solely  on एनिमल flesh लिये उनके nutrient आवश्यकताएँ हैं माना carnivores जबकि those  that also consume non-animal food are considered carnivores .
Omnivores  भी consume दोनो एनिमल और non-animal खाना , और अलावा इससे the अधिक सामान्य परिभाषा , वहीँ is no clearly पारिभाषित अनुपात of  plant to animal material that would distinguish a facultative carnivore from an omnivore .
A  carnivore कि sits at the शीर्ष of the foodchain  is an apex predator .
Plants that capture and digest  कीट हैं पुकारा मांसाहारी पौधे  .
Similarly , fungi  कि कैप्चर microscopic पशु हैं प्रायः पुकारा मांसाहारी  fungi .
The FIFA World Cup , often simply the World Cup , is an international association football competition contested by the  वरिष्ठ मेन 's नेशनल टीमों of the सदस्यों of fédération internationale de फ़ुटबॉल संघ ( फीफा ) , the खेल 's वैश्विक शासी देह  .
The championship has been awarded every four years since the  inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1930 , मगर in 1942 और 1946 जब it थी नहीं आयोजित  because of the Second World War .
the वर्तमान champions हैं  Spain , who won the 2010 tournament .
The current format  of the टूर्नामेंट involves 32 टीमों स्पर्धा लिये the शीर्षक at  venues within the host nation ( s ) over a period of about a month ; this phase is often called the World Cup Finals .
A qualification phase ,  जिससे फिलहाल takes प्लेस over the preceding तीन सालो , is प्रयुक्त  to determine which teams qualify for the tournament together with the host nation ( s ) .
The 19 World Cup tournaments have been won by  आठ अलग नेशनल टीमों  .
Brazil have  जीती पाँच टाइम्स , और वे हैं the तभी टोली to have निभाई  in every tournament .
The other World Cup  विजेता हैं इटली , साथ चार शीर्षक ; जर्मनी , साथ तीन शीर्षक ; अर्जेंटीना और inaugural  winners Uruguay , with two titles each ; and England , France , and Spain , with one title each .
The World Cup is the world 's most widely viewed sporting event ; an estimated 715.1  लाख लोगों देखी the फाइनल मैच of the 2006 फीफा संसार कप  held in Germany .
The next  तीन संसार cups होगा be hosted by ब्राज़ील in 2014 , रूस  in 2018 , and Qatar in 2022 .
Heroes is an  अमरीकी विज्ञान fiction टेलीविज़न नाटक श्रेणी निर्मित by टिम क्रिंग कि appeared on एनबीसी लिये  four seasons from September 25 , 2006 through February 8 , 2010 .
The series tells  the कहानियां of ordinary लोगों जो discover superhuman abilities , और कैसा ये abilities लो  effect in the characters ' lives .
The series emulates the aesthetic style and  storytelling of अमरीकी कॉमिक किताबे , using multi-episode स्टोरी arcs कि निर्माण upon a larger  , more encompassing arc .
the श्रेणी थी उत्पादित by tailwind प्रोडक्शन्स in संघ  with Universal Media Studios .
It  थी फिल्माया primarily in लॉस  Angeles , California .
Four  पूरा सीज़न aired , समाप्ति on फ़रवरी  8 , 2010 .
The critically acclaimed first  ऋतु था a चलाएं of 23 एपीसोड और garnered an औसत of 14.3 लाख दर्शक in the संयुक्त  States , receiving the highest rating for an NBC drama premiere in five years .
The second season of Heroes attracted an average of 13.1  लाख दर्शक in the u.S. , और चिह्नित एनबीसी 's एकमात्र श्रेणी among the शीर्ष 20 क्रमित कार्यक्रम in कुल  viewership for the 2007–2008 season .
Heroes has earned a number of awards and nominations , including  प्राइमटाइम एमी पुरस्कार , सुनहरी ग्लोब्स , लोगों 's चुनाव  Awards and British Academy Television Awards .
An online extension of the  श्रेणी , नायक 360 अनुभव , बाद rebranded as नायक evolutions , थी निर्मित to explore the नायक ब्रह्मांड और provides  insight into the show 's mythology .
Other official Heroes media include magazines , action  आंकड़े , tie-in और इंटरैक्टिव वेबसाइटों , a मोबाईल खेल , a अनोखा  , clothing and other merchandise .
In  the पतन of 2008 , एनबीसी डिजिटल entertainment released a श्रेणी of ऑनलाइन सामग्री लिये  the summer , including more original web content , wireless iTV interactivity , graphic novels available for mobile viewing and webisodes .
NBC  घोषित नायक रद्दीकरण on  May 14 , 2010 .
Afterward , the network considered making a television special event to conclude the  श्रेणी ; however , on सितंबर 9 , 2010 , एनबीसी घोषित the निर्णय to रोकें कोई  further development of the Heroes franchise .
Tim Kring then suggested that the broad premise of Heroes storylines  अनुमत लिये the मताधिकार to वापसी लिये प्रशंसक , लकिन he किया नहीं बताएँ जब  or in what media format .
On April 17 , 2013 , TV  लकीर reported कि एमएसएन थी in बाते to revive  the series with a new cast .
John Pierpont  `` J. p .  ''
Morgan ( April 17 , 1837 – March 31 , 1913 )  थी an अमरीकी फाइनेंसर , बैंकर , लोकसेवक और आर्ट कलेक्टर जो वर्चस्व कॉरपोरेट वित्त और औद्योगिक  consolidation during his time .
In 1892 Morgan arranged the merger  of एडिसन सामान्य इलेक्ट्रिक और thomson-houston इलेक्ट्रिक कम्पनी to रूप  General Electric .
After financing the creation of the Federal Steel Company , he merged in 1901 with the Carnegie Steel Company and several other steel and iron businesses , including Consolidated Steel and Wire  कम्पनी स्वामित्व by विलियम edenborn , to रूप the संयुक्त राज्य स्टील निगम .
Morgan died in Rome , Italy , in his sleep in 1913 at the age of 75 , leaving his fortune and business to his son ,  जॉन pierpont `` जोकर '' मॉर्गन , jr. , और bequeathing उसके mansion और विशाल किताब संग्रहण to the मॉर्गन पुस्तकालयों & संग्रहालय in  New York .
At the height of Morgan 's career during the early 1900s , he and his partners had financial investments in  अनेक विशाल corporations और यहूद अभियुक्त by आलोचकों of controlling the स्वदेश 's ऊँची  finance .
He  निर्देशित the बैंकिंग गठबन्धन कि रोका  the Panic of 1907 .
He was the leading financier of  the प्रगतिशील era , और उसके समर्पण to दक्षता और modernization helped रूपांतरण  American business .
This is a list  of एपीसोड of the टेलीविज़न श्रेणी  .
The episodes were  निर्देशित by शिगेरू ueda और उत्पादित by the yggdrasil कार्यपालिका कमेटी  which included Xebec and Genco .
The plot of  the एपीसोड is नियत in टोकियो और घूमती around रिन asōgi , an अमर निजी अन्वेषक , as वो explores the रहस्य of आधुनिक और near-future संसार और the अलौकिक कार्यक्रम कि  surround the fictional society of immortals like herself .
There are large time gaps  in the आतंरिक कालक्रम between the पहला पाँच एपीसोड  , ranging from one to thirty years .
The six episodes were  ब्रॉडकास्ट मासिक on at-x चैनल in जापानी  , between February 3 and July 6 , 2008 .
प्रत्येक एपीसोड is 45 मिनट्स  long .
Two pieces of  थीम म्यूज़िक हैं प्रयुक्त लिये the एपीसोड : the खोलने थीम `` alsatia  '' and the ending theme `` Cause Disarray '' .
Both were  रचित और performed by the जापानी मेटल  band Galneryus .
The series was produced to commemorate the tenth  वर्षगांठ of the at-x संजाल it originally  aired on .
Aerial photo of FLETC , where  us डिजिटल forensics मानकों यहूद विकसित in the 1980s  and '90s
Digital forensics (  sometimes ज्ञात as डिजिटल forensic विज्ञान ) is a शाखा of forensic विज्ञान encompassing  the recovery and investigation of material found in digital devices , often in relation to computer crime .
The term digital forensics was originally used as a synonym  लिये कंप्यूटर forensics लकिन रै विस्तारित to कवर छानबीन of सब डिवाइस सक्षम of storing डिजिटल आंकड़ा  .
With roots in the personal computing revolution of the late 1970s and early  '80s , the अनुशासन विकसित in a haphazard manner दौरान the 1990s , और it थी नहीं जबतक the जल्दी 21st सदी कि  national policies emerged .
डिजिटल forensics investigations have  a variety of applications .
The most common is to support or refute a hypothesis before criminal  or सिविल ( as भाग of the इलेक्ट्रॉनिक डिस्कवरी प्रक्रम ) न्यायालयों  .
Forensics may also  विशेषता in the निजी सेक्टर ; ऐसे as दौरान आतंरिक कॉरपोरेट investigations or  intrusion investigation ( a specialist probe into the nature and extent of an unauthorized network intrusion ) .
The technical aspect of an  छानबीन is विभाजित into अनेक sub-branches , relating to the प्रकार of डिजिटल डिवाइस शामिल ; कंप्यूटर forensics , संजाल forensics  , forensic data analysis and mobile device forensics .
The typical forensic process encompasses the seizure , forensic imaging (  अधिग्रहण ) और विश्लेषण of डिजिटल मीडिया और the उत्पादन of a रपट into एकत्रित  evidence .
As well as identifying direct evidence of a crime ,  डिजिटल forensics can be प्रयुक्त to विशेषता प्रमाण to विशिष्ट संदिग्धों , confirm alibis or कथन , determine intent , पहचानो स्त्रोत  ( for example , in copyright cases ) , or authenticate documents .
Investigations are much broader in scope than other areas of  forensic विश्लेषण ( जहाँ the usual उद्देश्य is to provide जवाब to a श्रेणी of simpler सवाल ) प्रायः involving जटिल time-lines or hypotheses  .
a तुलना of the chromaticities enclosed  by some color spaces .
A color model is an abstract mathematical  मॉडल describing the रास्ता रंगों can be represented as tuples of संख्याएँ , typically as तीन or चार मान or रंग components ( e.g . आरजीबी और cmyk हैं रंग  models ) .
However , a color model with  no संबद्ध मानचित्रण फलन to an निरपेक्ष रंग स्पेस is a अधिक or कम  arbitrary color system with no connection to any globally understood system of color interpretation .
Adding  a निश्चित मानचित्रण फलन between the रंग मॉडल और a निश्चित सन्दर्भ रंग स्पेस परिणाम in a definite  `` footprint '' within the reference color space .
This `` footprint '' is known as a gamut ,  और , in संयोजन साथ the रंग मॉडल , defines  a new color space .
For example , Adobe  आरजीबी और srgb हैं दो अलग निरपेक्ष रंग स्पेसेस , दोनो  based on the RGB model .
In the  सबसे जेनेरिक भाव of the परिभाषा ऊपर , रंग स्पेसेस can be  defined without the use of a color model .
These spaces , such as Pantone , are in effect a given set of  names or संख्याएँ जिससे हैं पारिभाषित by the अस्तित्व of a सम्बन्धित नियत  of physical color swatches .
This  आलेख focuses on the गणितीय  model concept .
Labor Day is an  अमरीकी संघीय अवकाश observed on the पहला सोमवार in सितंबर , कि मनाता the आर्थिक और  social contributions of workers .
Life insurance is a contract between an insured ( insurance policy holder ) and an  insurer , जहाँ the insurer वादे to अदा a designated लाभार्थी a योग of धन ( the `` लाभ '' ) upon the मौत of the  insured person .
Depending on the contract , other events  ऐसे as टर्मिनल बीमारी or नाजुक  illness may also trigger payment .
the नीति होल्डर typically pays a प्रीमियम  , either regularly or as a lump sum .
Other expenses ( such  as अंत्येष्टि खर्च ) हैं भी sometimes  included in the benefits .
Life policies are legal  अनुबंध और the शर्तें of the अनुबंध describe the सीमाएं of the insured  events .
Specific  exclusions हैं प्रायः लिखा into the अनुबंध to सीमा the देयता of the insurer ; आम उदाहरण  are claims relating to suicide , fraud , war , riot and civil commotion .
Life-based  अनुबंध tend to पतन into दो  major categories:
सुरक्षा नीतियों – designed to provide a लाभ in the इवेंट of निर्दिष्ट  event , typically a lump sum payment .
A common form of  इस डिज़ाइन is पद बीमे  .
Investment policies – where the main  उद्देश्य is to सुकर the विकास of पूंजी by नियमित or सिंगल प्रीमियम  .
आम फ़ॉर्म ( in the us ) हैं पूरे जीवन , सार्वभौमिक  life and variable life policies .

9 – 12 फ़रवरी  ( Vietnam )
Mitzi Gaynor Donahue ( born May 2 , 1962 in Yorba Linda ,  नारंगी काउंटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री , भी credited और अधिक popularly ज्ञात as  Mitzi Kapture .
Kapture began her  करियर in films , सबसे of जिससे यहूद नहीं  huge commercial successes .
She went on to make a few television guest appearances ( MacGyver , 1st & Ten , and  as a प्रतियोगी on the $ 100,000 पिरामिड ) पहले वो gained अंतरराष्ट्रीय एक्सपोज़र साथ उसके पहला प्रमुख टेलीविज़न भूमिका as सार्जेंट रीता ली तलवार in the टेलीविज़न  series Silk Stalkings .
Kapture 's role as Rita , the  अन्य हाफ of the दो `` sams '' लिये लगभग 5 सालो , cemented  her popularity .
Paired with Rob  estes जो निभाई सार्जेंट क्रिस lorenzo , kapture gained वैश्विक मान्यता साथ साथ उसके costar चूंकि the दिखाएँ  was broadcast in several countries .
Sergeant  तलवार आखिरकार became लेफ्टिनेंट तलवार by the समय  Kapture left the series in 1995 to have her first child Madison .
During  उसके समय साथ the श्रेणी , kapture briefly सत in the निदेशक  's chair , for two episodes .
She was interviewed for the Silk  stalkings ऋतु 1 dvd जिससे थी वितरित by लंगर खाड़ी entertainment और released in सितंबर  2004 .
After a short  अंतराल इससे the स्क्रीन following उसके निकास इससे रेशा stalkings , kapture  returned in 1997 to the small screen and USA Network .
She played lead roles in two USA Pictures Originals telemovies ,  पूर्ण अपराधों ( आधारित on a सच्चा स्टोरी , भी पुकारा छुपा और तलाश : the जोआन जेन्सेन स्टोरी ) , जिससे भी स्ट्रक्चर चमेली  Guy and His Bodyguard .
She later starred in a few other independent film  प्रोजेक्ट और थिएटर प्रोडक्शन्स और था अनेक टेलीविज़न अतिथि दिखावे  .
kapture भी था a पुनरावर्ती भूमिका on बेवाच  as Alexis Ryker .
She played Anita Hodges on The Young and the Restless from  2002 through 2004 , जहाँ वो थी credited as mitzi kapture donahue , और स्ट्रक्चर in the made-for-tv फिल्म रात्रि of आतंक जिससे premiered  March 26 , 2006 on Lifetime Network .
Her latest is a supporting  भूमिका in परमेश्वर 's कानों , released in  2007 .
Kapture is the official  हस्ती प्रवक्ता लिये the xeroderma pigmentosum समाज  .
The Xbox 360 is the second video game console developed by  और उत्पादित लिये microsoft और the successor to  the Xbox .
The Xbox  360 competes साथ सोनी 's प्लेस्टेशन 3 और निन्टेंडो 's वी as भाग of the सातवाँ पीढी  of video game consoles .
As  of सितंबर 30 , 2012 , 70 लाख एक्सबॉक्स 360  consoles have been sold worldwide .
The Xbox 360 was officially unveiled on  एमटीवी on may 12 , 2005 , साथ विस्तृत लॉन्च और खेल सूचना divulged बाद कि माह at the इलेक्ट्रॉनिक entertainment  Expo ( E3 ) .
The console sold out completely  upon रिलीज in सब regions मगर in जापानी .
Several major features of the Xbox 360 are its integrated Xbox Live service that allows players to compete  ऑनलाइन ; डाउनलोड आर्केड खेल , खेल demos , trailers , tv shows , म्यूज़िक और फिल्मों ; और इसके खिड़कियाँ  Media Center multimedia capabilities .
the एक्सबॉक्स सजीव भी offers अभिगम to विभिन्न ( प्रायः region-specific ) third-party  media streaming applications .
At their E3  प्रस्तुतीकरण on जून 14 , 2010 , microsoft घोषित a redesigned एक्सबॉक्स 360 कि होता  ship on the same day .
The redesigned console is slimmer than the previous  एक्सबॉक्स 360 मॉडल और सुविधाएँ एकीकृत 802.11 b/g/n wi-fi , toslink s/pdif ऑप्टिकल ऑडियो आउटपुट , पाँच usb 2.0 पोर्ट ( compared  to the three from older versions ) and a special AUX port .
Older models  of the एक्सबॉक्स 360 have चूंकि महरूम discontinued  .
The first  नई कंसोल to be released सुविधाएँ a 250 gb मुश्किल ड्राइव , जबकि a बाद , कम महंगी sku सुविधाएँ  4 GB internal storage .
Backpack  may भी refer to a 2001  novel by Emily Barr
A  आधुनिक backpack
स्विस फौज backpack  ca . 1960
एकीकृत तुमको फ़्रेम  .
A  backpack ( भी पुकारा रूकसाक , knapsack , packsack , पैक ) is , in इसके सरलतम रूप , a cloth बोरी carried on एक 's वापस और secured साथ  two straps that go over the shoulders , but there can be exceptions .
Lightweight types of  backpacks हैं sometimes worn on तभी  one shoulder strap .
Backpacks are often  पसन्दीदा to हैंडबैग लिये carrying भारी loads or carrying कोई sort of उपकरण , क्युकी of the सीमित क्षमता  to carry heavy weights for long periods of time in the hands .
Large backpacks , used to carry loads over 10 kg ( 22 lbs ) , usually offload  the largest भाग ( up to परिचय 90 % ) of उनके वज़न onto padded हिप बेल्ट , leaving the कंधे straps मुख्यतः लिये stabilising  the load .
इस improves the संभावित to carry भारी loads , as the कूल्हों हैं stronger than the कन्धों , और  also increases agility and balance , since the load rides nearer the wearer 's own center of mass .
In ancient times , the backpack was used as a means to carry the  शिकारी 's larger खेल और अन्य प्रकार of शिकार और as a रास्ता of easier  transport for other materials .
In the cases of larger hunts , the hunters would  dismember उनके शिकार और वितरित the टुकड़े of the एनिमल around , प्रत्येक एक पैकिंग the मांस into अनेक wrappings और तब into  bags which they placed on to their backs .
The bag itself was made up of different animal hide and skin ( depending on what sorts  of पशु यहूद in the क्षेत्रफल ) और sewn साथ by the आंतों of कहा पशु , जिससे यहूद  woven together tightly to make a sturdy thread-like material .
मैक्सिको ( ; ; ) , officially the संयुक्त मैक्सिकन राज्य ( ) , is a संघीय  constitutional republic in North America .
It is bordered on the north by the United States ; on the south and  वेस्ट by the प्रशांत समंदर ; on the southeast by ग्वाटेमाला , बेलीज़ , और the caribbean समुद्र ; और on the ईस्ट by the  Gulf of Mexico .
Covering  लगभग दो लाख वर्गाकार किलोमीटर ( over 760,000 sq mi ) , मैक्सिको is the  fifth largest country in the Americas by total area and the 13th largest independent nation in the world .
With an  अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी of over 113 लाख , it is the संसार 's eleventh सबसे populous  country and the most populous Spanish-speaking country .
मैक्सिको is a संघ comprising thirty-one राज्य  and a Federal District , the capital city .
In pre-Columbian Mexico many cultures matured into advanced civilizations such as the  olmec , the toltec , the teotihuacan , the zapotec ,  the Maya and the Aztec before first contact with Europeans .
In 1521 , Spain conquered and colonized the territory  इससे इसके आधार in méxico-tenochtitlan , जिससे थी administered as the  Viceroyalty of New Spain .
This territory would eventually become  मैक्सिको following मान्यता of the उपनिवेश 's स्वतंत्रता  in 1821 .
The post-independence period was characterized by economic instability , the  mexican-american युद्ध और territorial cession to the संयुक्त राज्य , a सिविल युद्ध , दो empires और a घरेलू तानाशाही  .
The latter led to the Mexican Revolution in 1910 , which culminated  साथ the promulgation of the 1917 संविधान और the emergence of the देश 's वर्तमान राजनैतिक  system .
Elections held in July 2000 marked the first time that an opposition party won  the प्रेसिडेंसी इससे the संस्थागत क्रांतिकारी पार्टी  .
Since 2006 the country has been in the  midst of a ड्रग युद्ध जिससे रै caused  60,000 deaths .
मैक्सिको रै एक of the संसार 's largest economies , और is  considered both a regional power and middle power .
In addition , Mexico was the first Latin American member  of the संगठन लिये आर्थिक co-operation और विकास oecd ( चूंकि 1994 ) , और माना an upper-middle आय  country by the World Bank .
Mexico is considered a  newly industrialized देश और  an emerging power .
It  रै the fourteenth largest नाममात्र जीडीपी और the eleventh largest  GDP by purchasing power parity .
The economy is  strongly linked to those of इसके उत्तर अमरीकी फ़्री व्यापार अनुबंध ( nafta ) साझेदार  , especially the United States of America .
Mexico ranks sixth in the world and first in the Americas by number of UNESCO World Heritage  साइट साथ 31 , और in 2007 थी the दसवाँ सबसे visited देश in the संसार साथ 21.4 लाख अंतरराष्ट्रीय  arrivals per year .
Babe Ruth  holds the एमएलबी करियर slugging प्रतिशत रिकार्ड  ( .690 ) .
In baseball statistics , slugging percentage ( abbreviated  slg ) is a लोकप्रिय माप of the शक्ति of a hitter  .
It is  गणना as कुल bases विभाजित  by at bats :
where AB is the number of at-bats for a given player , and 1B , 2B ,  3b , और hr हैं the क्रमांक of singles , युगल , तिगुना , और  home runs , respectively .
Walks are  specifically excluded इससे इस गणना  .
For example , in 1920  , बेब रुथ निभाई उसके पहला ऋतु लिये the नई  York Yankees .
In 458  at bats , रुथ था 172 हिट्स , comprising 73 singles , 36 युगल , 9 तिगुना , और 54 घर रनों , जिससे  brings the total base count to ( 73 × 1 ) + ( 36 × 2 ) + ( 9 × 3 ) + ( 54 × 4 ) = 388 .
His total number of bases ( 388  ) विभाजित by उसके कुल at-bats ( 458 ) is .847 , उसके slugging प्रतिशत  for the season .
The next year he slugged .846 , and these records went  अखंड जबतक 2001 , जब बैरी bonds हासिल 411 bases in 476 at-bats , bringing उसके slugging प्रतिशत to .863 , बेमेल चूंकि  .
is a  role-playing वीडियो खेल विकसित और प्रकाशित by वर्गाकार ( अभी वर्गाकार एनिक्स ) लिये the  Super Nintendo Entertainment System in 1995 .
Chrono Trigger 's development team included three designers that Square  उतावले the `` सपना टोली '' : hironobu sakaguchi , the निर्माता of वर्गाकार 's फाइनल काल्पनिक श्रेणी ; yuji horii , a freelance पंक्तियां और निर्माता of एनिक्स 's लोकप्रिय  Dragon Quest series ; and Akira Toriyama , a freelance manga artist famed for his work with Dragon Quest and Dragon Ball .
kazuhiko aoki उत्पादित the खेल , masato काटो लिखा सबसे of the प्लाट , जबकि composer yasunori mitsuda  scored most of the game before falling ill and deferring remaining tracks to Final Fantasy composer Nobuo Uematsu .
The game 's story follows a  समूह of adventurers जो सफर through समय to prevent a वैश्विक प्रलय  .
Square re-released a ported version by Tose in Japan for Sony 's  प्लेस्टेशन in 1999 , बाद repackaged साथ a फाइनल काल्पनिक iv बंदरगाहों as फाइनल काल्पनिक क्रॉनिकल्स in 2001 लिये  the North American market .
A slightly  उन्नत chrono ट्रिगर थी released लिये the निन्टेंडो ds on नवम्बर 25 , 2008 , in उत्तर अमेरिका और जापानी  , and went on sale in Australia on February 3 , 2009 and in Europe on February 6 , 2009 .
The game  थी never released in pal territories पहले the निन्टेंडो  DS version .
Chrono  ट्रिगर थी a नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी upon रिलीज और is माना  today to be one of the greatest video games of all time .
Nintendo Power magazine described aspects of Chrono Trigger as revolutionary ,  सहित इसके अनेक endings , plot-related sidequests focusing on अक्षर विकास , अद्वितीय बैटल प्रणाली , और विस्तृत  graphics .
Chrono  ट्रिगर थी the तीसरा best-selling खेल of 1995 , और the खेल 's snes और प्लेस्टेशन  iterations have shipped 2.65 million copies as of March 2003 .
The  संस्करण लिये the निन्टेंडो ds बेची  790,000 copies as of March 2009 .
Chrono Trigger was also ported to mobile phones , Virtual  कंसोल , the प्लेस्टेशन संजाल ( तभी in the यूएसए ) , आईओएस  devices , and Android devices .
बकरी चीज
Goat cheese , or chèvre ( from the  फ्रेंच शब्द लिये बकरी ) , is चीज बना आउट of the मिल्क  of goats .
Hyperthermia is elevated body temperature due to  विफल thermoregulation कि occurs जब a देह produces or absorbs अधिक ऊष्मा than it dissipates  .
Extreme temperature  उन्नयन तब becomes a चिकित्सा आपात requiring तात्कालिक उपचार  to prevent disability or death .
The  सबसे आम कल्याणकारी शामिल ऊष्मा स्ट्रोक और प्रतिकूल प्रतिक्रियाएँ  to drugs .
The former is an acute  तापमान उन्नयन caused by एक्सपोज़र to excessive ऊष्मा , or संयोजन of ऊष्मा और आर्द्रता , कि overwhelms the  heat-regulating mechanisms .
The latter  is a अपेक्षाकृत विरल पक्ष प्रभाव of अनेक दवाएँ ,  particularly those that affect the central nervous system .
Malignant  अतिताप is a विरल complication of कुछ प्रकार of  general anesthesia .
Hyperthermia can also be deliberately induced using drugs or medical devices and may be  प्रयुक्त in the उपचार of कुछ kinds of कर्कट और अन्य शर्तें , सबसे commonly in संयोजन साथ radiotherapy  .
Hyperthermia differs from fever in that the body 's  तापमान नियत पाइंट remains अपरिवर्तित  .
The opposite is hypothermia , which  occurs जब the तापमान बूंदें नीचे कि जरूरी to  maintain normal metabolism .
बेलीज़ , is a देश स्तिथ on the northeastern  coast of Central America .
It is the only country in the area where English  is the आधिकारिक भाषा , हालांकि kriol और स्पेनी हैं अधिक commonly बोला  .
Belize is bordered on the  उत्तर by मैक्सिको , to the दक्षिण और वेस्ट by ग्वाटेमाला और to the  east by the Caribbean Sea .
Its  मेनलैंड is परिचय long  and wide .
With of land and a  जनसांख्यिकी of तभी 312,698 निवासियों ( 2010 जनसांख्यिकी ) , बेलीज़ possesses the  lowest population density in Central America .
The country 's population growth  रेट of 3.15 % ( 2012 est . ) is the दूसरी उच्चतम in the प्रदेश और एक of the उच्चतम in the  western hemisphere .
Belize 's abundance of terrestrial and marine species , and its diversity of ecosystems  दे it a कुंजी प्लेस भीतर the globally significant mesoamerican biological corridor  .
Belize has a diverse  समाज , comprising अनेक संस्कृतियों  and languages .
It is the only nation in the region with a British colonial heritage , but as a part of the  पश्चिमी caribbean मण्डल , it भी साझा a आम विरासत साथ the fellow anglophone  Caribbean countries .
in सामान्य , बेलीज़ is माना to be a सेंट्रल अमरीकी और caribbean  nation with strong ties to both the Caribbean and Latin America .
Belize is a member of the Caribbean Community ( CARICOM ) , the Community of  लैटिन अमरीकी और caribbean राज्य ( celac ) , और सेंट्रल अमरीकी संयोजन प्रणाली ( सिका )  .
Belize is known  लिये इसके सितंबर जश्न , और is the जन्मस्थान of चबाने गम  and Punta Rock .
the `` बेट्सी रॉस  '' flag
A `` Betsy Ross '' flag  उड़ती बाहर सैन फ्रांसिस्को  City Hall
The Betsy Ross flag is an  जल्दी डिज़ाइन of the ध्वज of the संयुक्त राज्य , popularly attributed to बेट्सी रॉस , using the आम motifs of प्रत्यावर्ती red-and-white  striped field with five-pointed stars in a blue canton .
The  ध्वज थी designed दौरान the अमरीकी क्रान्ति और सुविधाएँ  13 stars to represent the original 13 colonies .
The  distinctive विशेषता of the रॉस ध्वज is the व्यवस्था  of the stars in a circle .
Although the Betsy Ross  स्टोरी is स्वीकृत by सबसे अमेरिकी , कुछ ध्वज इतिहासकारों और revisionists do नहीं accept the बेट्सी रॉस डिज़ाइन  as the first American flag .
According to the traditional account , the original flag was made in June 1776 , when a small  committee—including जार्ज वॉशिंगटन , रॉबर्ट मॉरिस और सापेक्ष जार्ज रॉस —visited बेट्सी और discussed the  need for a new American flag .
Betsy accepted the job to manufacture the flag , altering  the कमेटी 's डिज़ाइन by replacing the six-pointed सितारों साथ  five-pointed stars .
While the  बेट्सी रॉस लेजेंड is questionable , the ध्वज डिज़ाइन is ज्ञात to have महरूम in उपयोग by 1777 ; अल्फ्रेड b . गली वर्णित it at the आत्मसमर्पण  of General Burgoyne and understood the circle of stars to represent equality among the American states .
It is one of the  oldest संस्करण of u.S. ध्वज ज्ञात to मौजूद ; जबकि it is नहीं the oldest surviving ध्वज centuries in cloth रूप , इसके likeness  appears on older physical relics , namely , the contemporary battlefield paintings by John Trumbull and Charles Willson Peale .
They depict the circular star arrangement being flown from ship  masts और अनेक अन्य स्थान , और यूँ provide the पहला ज्ञात ऐतिहासिक  documentation of the flag 's appearance .
The seal of the U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs  उपयोग the बेट्सी रॉस ध्वज to represent सेवा to सब दिग्गजों इससे the अमरीकी क्रान्ति  to the present day .
The Betsy Ross  डिज़ाइन of 13-star us ध्वज रै महरूम प्रदर्शित in अनेक लोकप्रिय artworks ( sometimes inaccurately , as in वॉशिंगटन क्रासिंग the डेलावेयर  ) and films , such as the 1960 version of Pollyanna .
The flag continues  to be एक of the सबसे लोकप्रिय प्रतीकों  of the American Revolution .
A  purr is a ध्वनि बना by सब प्रजाति of felids और is a भाग  of cat communication .
It varies between cats ( for example by loudness and tone ) ,  और इससे प्रजाति to प्रजाति , लकिन can be characterized as a tonal  buzzing .
The term ``  purring '' रै महरूम प्रयुक्त liberally in साहित्य , और it  has been claimed that viverrids ( civet , mongoose , genet ) , bears , badgers , hyaenas ( et cetera ) purr .
Other animals that  have महरूम कहा to purr हैं खरगोश , squirrels , गिनी सूअर , tapirs , ring-tailed lemurs , हाथियों  , raccoons and gorillas while eating .
However , using a strict definition of  purring कि निरन्तर ध्वनि उत्पादन जरूर वैकल्पिक between pulmonic egressive और ingressive airstream ( और प्रायः go on लिये मिनट्स ) , पीटर्स ( 2002 ) , in an विस्तृत पुनर्विलोकन of the वैज्ञानिक साहित्य , पहुँचे  the conclusion that until then only ‘purring cats’ ( Felidae ) and two species of genets , Genetta tigrina , and most likely also Genetta genetta , had been documented to purr .
The platypus ( Ornithorhynchus  anatinus ) is a semiaquatic स्तनधारी endemic to पूर्वी ऑस्ट्रेलिया , सहित  Tasmania .
साथ साथ the चार प्रजाति of एकिडना , it is एक of the पाँच extant प्रजाति of monotremes , the  only mammals that lay eggs instead of giving birth .
It is the sole living representative of  इसके परिवार ( ornithorhynchidae ) और genus ( ornithorhynchus ) , हालांकि a क्रमांक of सम्बन्धित  species have been found in the fossil record .
The unusual  रूप of इस egg-laying , बतख -billed , बीवर -tailed , otter -footed स्तनधारी मनोरथ यूरोपीय naturalists जब  they first encountered it , with some considering it an elaborate fraud .
It is one of the few venomous mammals , the  पुरूष platypus having a spur on the हिन्द पैर कि delivers a venom सक्षम of  causing severe pain to humans .
The unique features of the platypus make it an important subject in the study of  विकासवादी जीवविज्ञान और a recognisable और iconic प्रतीक of ऑस्ट्रेलिया ; it रै appeared as a शुभंकर  at national events and is featured on the reverse of its 20-cent coin .
the platypus is the एनिमल emblem of the  state of New South Wales .
Until the early 20th century  , it थी hunted लिये इसके फर , लकिन it is अभी सुरक्षित throughout इसके दायरा  .
Although captive breeding  programmes have था तभी सीमित कामयाबी और the platypus is vulnerable to the प्रभाव  of pollution , it is not under any immediate threat .
St. Elizabeth is a  गाँव in मिलर काउंटी , मिसौरी  , United States .
The population  थी 336 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  .
Wilton is a  census-designated प्लेस ( cdp ) in sacramento काउंटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , संयुक्त  States .
It is part of the  sacramento – arden-arcade – roseville महानगर सांख्यिकीय  Area .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 5,363 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी , up इससे  4,551 at the 2000 census .
In human-computer interaction , cut and paste and copy and  paste हैं सम्बन्धित कमांड कि प्रस्ताव a user-interface बातचीत तकनीक  for transferring text , data , files or objects from a source to a destination .
Most ubiquitously ,  उपयोक्ता आवश्यकता the क्षमता to काटें और paste भाग  of plain text .
The cut command removes the selected data from its original position , while  the नक़ल कमांड creates a नकल ; in दोनो मामले the चयनित आंकड़ा is लगाई in a clipboard  .
The data in  the clipboard is बाद inserted in the स्थिति  where the paste command is issued .
The command names are an interface metaphor based on  the शारीरिक कार्यविधि प्रयुक्त in पाण्डुलिपि संपादन to बनाएँ a  page layout .
This interaction technique has close associations with related  तकनीकों in आलेखीय उपयोक्ता अंतरफलक कि उपयोग इंगित डिवाइस ऐसे as a कंप्यूटर चूहा ( by खीचें  and drop , for example ) .
Economic  अनुक्रम मात्रा is the अनुक्रम मात्रा कि minimizes कुल inventory  holding costs and ordering costs .
It is one of  the oldest शास्त्रीय उत्पादन scheduling  models .
The framework used to  determine इस अनुक्रम मात्रा is भी ज्ञात  as Barabas EOQ Model or Barabas Formula .
The model  थी विकसित by घाट W. हैरिस in 1913 , लकिन R. H. विल्सन , a सलाहकार जो लागू it extensively  , is given credit for his in-depth analysis .
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray  vaughan ( अक्तूबर 3 , 1954 – अगस्त 27 , 1990 ) थी an अमरीकी guitarist , singer-songwriter  , and record producer .
Often referred to by his initials  srv , vaughan is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a founding सदस्य और नेता of दोगुना ट्रबल  .
Together with drummer Chris Layton and  bassist टॉमी शैनन , वे ignited the ब्लूज़ पुनरुद्धार of the 1980s  .
With a career spanning  सात सालो , vaughan और दोगुना ट्रबल consistently बेची आउट कॉन्सर्ट जबकि उनके एल्बम  frequently went gold .
He was born and raised in Dallas  , टेक्सास , और लिये a छोटी काल of समय जिया in ग्राहम  , Texas .
As the younger brother of  jimmie vaughan , vaughan प्रारंभ playing the गिटार at आयु सात और formed अनेक bands कि occasionally  performed in local nightclubs .
At age 17 , he dropped out of high school and moved to Austin to further  pursue उसके musical करियर , joining समूह ऐसे as krackerjack , the nightcrawlers , और the cobras  .
In 1977 , he  formed ट्रिपल threat revue , a बैंड कि आखिरकार विकसित into दोगुना ट्रबल और regularly  performed around Austin .
In 1982 , Vaughan and Double Trouble  performed at the montreux जैज़ पर्व in स्विट्ज़रलैंड  , catching the attention of musicians David Bowie and Jackson Browne .
Bowie asked Vaughan to  खेल on उसके आगामी स्टुडियो एल्बम let 's नृत्य , जबकि browne offered the बैंड फ़्री उपयोग of उसके निजी  studio in Los Angeles to record an album .
In March 1983 , Vaughan and Double Trouble were signed to Epic  रिकॉर्ड by दिग्गज रिकार्ड निर्माता जॉन हैमंड sr. और released उनके डेब्यू एल्बम ,  Texas Flood in June of that year .
After successful touring , the  समूह released the एल्बम , could n't स्टैंड the मौसम ( 1984 ) और आत्मा to आत्मा ( 1985 ) , the  latter of which featured new keyboardist Reese Wynans .
Although his career  था progressed सफलतापूर्वक , vaughan checked into a पुनर्वास हॉस्पिटल in अटलांटा , जॉर्जिया to दे up  a cocaine and alcohol habit and returned to touring with the band .
In June 1989 , In Step was released and earned  उन्हें a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन समकालीन ब्लूज़  Performance .
On August 27  , 1990 , vaughan थी मारे in a हेलीकाप्टर क्रैश following  a performance in East Troy , Wisconsin .
Vaughan 's  uniquely eclectic yet तीव्र स्टाइल थी निकला इससे a किस्में  of musical genres .
He was influenced by blues musicians  सहित अल्बर्ट किंग , फ्रेडी किंग , ओटिस फटाफट , और muddy waters , और चट्टान guitarists  such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack .
उसके गिटार playing reflected the क्लासिक  blues and pentatonic scales .
He has received wide  नाजुक मान्यता लिये उसके गिटार playing , रैंकिंग at # 6 on रोलिंग पत्थरों सूची  of `` 100 Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011 .
He was posthumously inducted into  the ब्लूज़ हॉल of कीर्ति in 2000 और a मेमोरियल प्रतिमा थी erected  in Austin 's Auditorium Shores park .
Stevie Ray  vaughan is widely माना to be एक of the महानतम  musicians to come from the state of Texas .
The Las Vegas  स्ट्रिप संसार of coca-cola संग्रहालय in  2003
Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in stores ,  रेस्तरां , और वेंडिंग मशीने in प्रत्येक देश मगर क्यूबा और  North Korea .
It is produced by The Coca-Cola Company of Atlanta , Georgia , and is often referred to  बस as कोक ( a पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क of the coca-cola कम्पनी in the संयुक्त राज्य चूंकि कूच  27 , 1944 ) .
Originally intended as a patent medicine when it was invented in the late  19th सदी by जॉन pemberton , coca-cola थी खरीदा आउट by बिजनेसमैन asa griggs candler , जिनकी विपणन tactics led कोक  to its dominance of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century .
The company produces concentrate , which is then  बेची to licensed coca-cola bottlers throughout the  world .
The bottlers , who  थाम territorially विशेष अनुबंध साथ the कम्पनी , उपज समाप्त उत्पाद in डिब्बे और बोतलों  from the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners .
The bottlers then  बेचें , वितरित और merchandise coca-cola to खुदरा स्टोर्स  and vending machines .
Such bottlers include  coca-cola उद्यमों , जिससे is the largest सिंगल coca-cola bottler in उत्तर अमेरिका और पश्चिमी  Europe .
The Coca-Cola Company  भी बिकता concentrate लिये सोडा स्रोतों to प्रमुख  restaurants and food service distributors .
The  coca-cola कम्पनी रै , on अवसर , introduced अन्य  cola drinks under the Coke brand name .
The  सबसे आम of ये is आहार कोक , साथ अन्य सहित caffeine-free coca-cola , आहार कोक caffeine-free  , Coca-Cola Cherry , Coca-Cola Zero , Coca-Cola Vanilla , and special versions with lemon , lime or coffee .
Based on Interbrand 's best global brand  2011 , coca-cola थी the संसार 's सबसे मूल्यवान ब्रांड  .
Barry Louis Larkin (  born अप्रैल 28 , 1964 ) is a रिटायर्ड प्रमुख  League Baseball player .
Larkin played  shortstop लिये the सिनसिनाटी लाल इससे 1986 to 2004 और थी एक of the pivotal खिलाड़ी on the 1990 लाल  ' World Series championship team .
Larkin was  निर्वाचित to the नेशनल बेसबॉल हॉल of कीर्ति  in January 2012 and was inducted on July 22 .
Larkin is considered one of the  शीर्ष खिलाड़ी of उसके era , जीतना नौ चांदी  Slugger awards and three Gold Glove awards .
He was  चयनित to the प्रमुख लीग all-star खेल बारह टाइम्स , और थी  elected the 1995 National League Most Valuable Player .
brasília ( ) is the संघीय पूंजी of ब्राज़ील और  the seat of government of the Federal District .
Administratively , the city is located  in the संघीय ज़िला जिससे is in the central-west प्रदेश  .
Physically , it is located  in the ब्राज़ीलियाई हाइलैंड्स .
It has a population  of परिचय 2,562,963 ( 3,716,996 in the महानगर क्षेत्रफल ) as of the 2008  IBGE estimate , making it the fourth largest city in Brazil .
However ,  as a महानगर क्षेत्रफल , it बाँधने निम्नतर at छठे  in population .
Brasília is the  largest नगर in the संसार कि किया नहीं मौजूद at the शुरूआत of  the 20th century .
Brasília has the fifth  largest जीडीपी among लैटिन अमरीकी शहरों और the तीसरा in ब्राज़ील  .
At around R $ 62,000 Brazilian reais (  बराबर to लगभग $ 30,900 us डॉलर or €23,000 euros ) , the नगर 's प्रति capita आय  is the highest among Brazil 's largest cities .
as the नेशनल पूंजी , brasília is the सीट of सब तीन शाखाओं  of the federal government of Brazil .
The  नगर भी होस्ट the मुख्यालय  of many Brazilian companies .
Planning policies such as the location of residential buildings around expansive urban areas , as well as building the  नगर around विशाल avenues और dividing it into सेक्टर , have sparked a बहस और प्रतिबिंब on जीवन in बिग शहरों in the 20th सदी  .
The  नगर 's डिज़ाइन divides it into गिने ब्लॉक as खूब as सेक्टर लिये निर्दिष्ट  activities , such as the Hotel Sector , the Banking Sector or the Embassy Sector .
Brasília hosts  124 विदेशी embassies  .
The city was planned and  विकसित in 1956 साथ lúcio कोस्टा as the प्रिंसिपल शहरी प्लानर , ऑस्कर  Niemeyer as the principal architect and Roberto Burle Marx as the landscape designer .
Brasilia is in  the युनेस्को 's संसार hertitage सूची due to इसके वास्तुकला  .
On April 22 ,  1960 , it formally became ब्राज़ील  's national capital .
Viewed from  ऊपर , the प्रमुख portion of the नगर resembles an वायुयान  or a butterfly .
The city is commonly  referred to as पूंजी संघीय , or  simply BSB .
Residents of Brasília  हैं ज्ञात as brasilienses or candangos ( the latter referring to  those not born in the city but who migrated there after it was established ) .
In local usage , the word `` Brasília '' usually refers only to the First Administrative Region ( RA I ) within  the संघीय ज़िला ( distrito संघीय ) , जहाँ the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण सरकारी इमारतें  are located .
Brasília has a unique status in Brazil , as it  is an प्रशासनिक प्रभाग बल्कि than a विधिक नगरपालिका जैसे nearly सब शहरों in ब्राज़ील  .
Nationally , the term is almost  सदा प्रयुक्त synonymously साथ the संघीय ज़िला , जिससे constitutes  an indivisible Federative Unit , analogous to a state .
अनेक `` उपग्रह शहरों '' मौजूद जिससे हैं  also part of the Federal District .
Brasília International Airport is the main airport in Brasília  , connecting the पूंजी to सब प्रमुख ब्राज़ीलियाई शहरों और अनेक अंतरराष्ट्रीय गंतव्यों  .
It  is the तीसरा सबसे महत्वपूर्ण विमानक्षेत्र in ब्राज़ील , in शर्तें  of passengers and aircraft movements .
Personifications of Germany , France , Russia , Austria-Hungary , and the United  किंगडम attempting to रखना the ढक्कन on the simmering cauldron of imperialist और राष्ट्रवादी तनाव  in the Balkans to prevent a general European war .
They were  कामयाब in 1912 और 1913 लकिन किया नहीं सफल  in in 1914 .
The causes of World War I  , जिससे began in सेंट्रल यूरोपीय in लेट जुलाई 1914 और समाप्त in 1918 , शामिल अनेक कारकों , ऐसे as the विरोध  and hostility of the four decades leading up to the war .
Militarism , alliances ,  साम्राज्यवाद , और राष्ट्रवाद निभाई प्रमुख भूमिकाएँ in the विरोध as  well .
The immediate  origins of the युद्ध , however , lay in the निर्णय लिया by कूटनीतिज्ञों और सेनापतियों दौरान the संकट of 1914 , casus belli लिये जिससे थी the हत्या of archduke फ्रांज फर्डिनेंड ( the  Archduke of Austria Hungary ) and his wife Sophie by Gavrilo Princip , an irredentist Serb .
The crisis came after a long and difficult  श्रेणी of राजनयिक clashes between the ग्रेट शक्तियां ( इटली , फ़्रांस , जर्मनी , the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य , the austria-hungarian साम्राज्य और रूस ) over यूरोपीय और औपनिवेशिक  issues in the decade before 1914 that had left tensions high .
In  फेरे ये राजनयिक clashes can be traced  to changes in the balance of power in Europe since 1867 .
The more immediate  कारण लिये the युद्ध थी तनाव over territory in  the Balkans .
austria-hungary competed साथ सर्बिया और रूस लिये territory और influence in the प्रदेश और वे खींचा the बाकी of the ग्रेट  Powers into the conflict through their various alliances and treaties .
Although the chain of events unleashed by the assassination triggered the war , the war 's origins go deeper , involving national  राजनीती , संस्कृतियों , अर्थशास्त्र , और a जटिल वेब of alliances और counterbalances कि था विकसित between  the various European powers since 1870 .
Some of the most important long term or structural causes are : the growth of nationalism across Europe , unresolved territorial disputes , an intricate system of alliances , the perceived breakdown of the balance of power in Europe ,  convoluted और fragmented शासन , the बाहें दौड़ of the पिछला दशकों , पिछला सैन्य नियोजन , इम्पीरियल और औपनिवेशिक फंसने लिये माल , शक्ति और प्रतिष्ठा , और आर्थिक और सैन्य फंसने in उद्योग और व्यापार – e.g. , the सुअर युद्ध between ऑस्ट्रिया  and Serbia .
Other causes that  आए into खेल दौरान the राजनयिक संकट कि preceded the युद्ध शामिल misperceptions of intent ( e.g. , the जर्मनी विश्वास कि the संयुक्त किंगडम होता remain  neutral ) and delays and misunderstandings in diplomatic communications .
The  विभिन्न श्रेणी of स्पष्टीकरण लिये  World War I correspond to different historians ' overall methods .
Most historians  और लोकप्रिय टीकाकारों शामिल कल्याणकारी इससे अधिक than एक श्रेणी of स्पष्टीकरण  to provide a rounded account of the causes of the war .
the deepest भेद among ये खाते is between कहानियां कि देखिए it as the अपरिहार्य और predictable  outcome of certain factors , and those that describe it as an arbitrary and unfortunate mistake .
In attributing causes for the war ,  इतिहासकारों और लड था to सौदे साथ an unprecedented बाढ़ of memoirs और  official documents , released as each country involved tried to avoid blame for starting the war .
Early releases of information by governments , particularly those  released लिये उपयोग by the `` आयोग on the जिम्मेदारी of the लेखक of the युद्ध '' यहूद दिखाया to be अधूरी और पक्षपातपूर्ण  .
In addition some documents , especially diplomatic  केबल between रूस और फ़्रांस , यहूद मिला to have महरूम doctored  .
Even  in बाद दशकों however , जब much अधिक सूचना था महरूम released , इतिहासकारों इससे the वही संस्कृति  have been shown to come to differing conclusions on the causes of the war .
Johnson 's new chart of  नेशनल प्रतीक , प्रकाशित  c. 1868 .
The large flags shown in the corners are the  37-star ध्वज of the संयुक्त राज्य ( flown 1867-1877 ) , the royal मानक of the संयुक्त किंगडम ,  the Russian Imperial Standard , and the French tricolore with inset Imperial Eagle .
Various other  ध्वज flown by जहाजों हैं दिखाया  .
The Flag  of क्यूबा is labelled `` क्यूबन ( so  called ) `` .
The  चाइनीज ड्रैगन on the ध्वज of चीन थी drawn mistakenly as  a western dragon .
A national flag is a  ध्वज कि symbolizes a देश .
The flag is  flown by the सरकारी , लकिन प्रायः can भी be flown by  citizens of the country .
Both public and private buildings such as schools and  courthouses may मक्खी the नेशनल  flag .
In  कुछ देशों , the नेशनल ध्वज हैं तभी flown इससे non-military इमारतें  on certain flag days .
There are three distinct types of national flag for use on land , and three  लिये उपयोग at समुद्र , हालांकि अनेक देशों उपयोग एकसमान डिजाइन लिये अनेक  ( and sometimes all ) of these types of flag .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a civil war fought from 1861 to 1865  between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि घोषित उनके secession और formed the confederate राज्य of अमेरिका ( the `` confederacy ''  or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its origin in the issue of  गुलामी , विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the पश्चिमी territories .
विदेशी शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene  .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's infrastructure , the Confederacy  collapsed , गुलामी थी abolished , और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल एकता और guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed स्लेव  began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans ,  led by अब्राहम lincoln , opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त राज्य '  territories .
Lincoln won , but before his inauguration on March 4 , 1861 ,  सात cotton-based स्लेव राज्य formed the confederacy  .
Outgoing  लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans  rejected secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's  inaugural पता घोषित उसके प्रशासन होता  not initiate civil war .
Eight remaining slave states  जारी to अस्वीकृत काल्स लिये secession .
Confederate forces  जब्त numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the confederacy  .
A Peace Conference failed to  ढूँढें a सुलह , और दोनो पहलू prepared  for war .
The Confederates assumed that  यूरोपीय देशों यहूद so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none  did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on  अप्रैल 12 , 1861 , जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट sumter , a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by संघ सैनिकों  in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ;  नतीजतन , चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the confederacy , bringing  their total to eleven .
the संघ जल्द नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित  a naval blockade that crippled the southern economy .
The  पूर्वी थिएटर थी inconclusive in  1861–62 .
the पतझड़ 1862 confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate  retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation  उदघोषणा , जिससे बना समाप्ति गुलामी  a war goal .
To the west , by  गर्मियाँ 1862 the संघ नष्ट the confederate नदी नेवी , तब much of उनके पश्चिमी  armies , and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee 's  confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the बैटल  of Gettysburg .
Western successes  led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब संघ सेना  in 1864 .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman  drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the समुद्र , destroying  Confederate infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to  आक्रमण the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश , और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण  through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The  defending confederate फौज विफल , अग्रणी to ली 's  surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American Civil War was  एक of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक  wars .
Railroads , the telegraph  , steamships , और mass-produced हथियार यहूद  employed extensively .
The mobilization of civilian factories ,  खानों , shipyards , बैंको , परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed  World War I .
It remains the deadliest war in  अमरीकी इतिहास , resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined  number of civilian casualties .
इतिहासकार जॉन huddleston estimates the मौत टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी  males 20–45 years old , and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
Norrie disease is a genetic  विकार कि primarily affects the नजर और लगभग सदा लीड  to blindness .
In addition to the congenital  ocular लक्षण , कुछ मरीजों suffer इससे a प्रगतिशील सुनना घाटा starting ज़्यादातर in उनके 2nd  decade of life , while another portion may be mentally challenged .
Patients with Norrie disease may develop cataracts , leukocoria ( a condition where  the विद्यार्थियों appear श्वेत जब लाइट is shone on उन्हें ) , साथ साथ अन्य developmental मुद्दे in the नजर , ऐसे as shrinking of the  globe and the wasting away of the iris .
Around 30–50 % of  उन्हें होगा भी have developmental डेलाy/ दिमागी retardation , psychotic-like सुविधाएँ , incoordination of आंदोलनों or  behavioral abnormalities .
Most  मरीजों हैं born साथ सामान्य सुनना ; however , the  onset of hearing loss is very common in early adolescence .
About 15 % of  the मरीजों हैं अनुमानित to develop सब the सुविधाएँ of the बीमारी  .
The  बीमारी affects लगभग तभी पुरूष infants at जनम or जल्द बाद जनम , क्युकी the बीमारी is inherited x-linked  recessive .
Only in  बहुत विरल मामले , महिलाओं have महरूम diagnosed  with Norrie disease as well .
The exact  incidence क्रमांक is अनजान ; तभी a few सौ मामले have महरूम reported  so far .
It is  a बहुत विरल विकार कि is नहीं संबद्ध साथ कोई  specific ethnic or racial groups .
A contract is an agreement having a lawful object  डाला into voluntarily by दो or अधिक पार्टियों , प्रत्येक of जिसको intends to बनाएँ एक or अधिक विधिक दायित्वों between  them .
The elements of a contract are `` offer '' and `` acceptance '' by `` competent persons ''  having विधिक क्षमता जो एक्सचेंज `` विचार '' to बनाएँ `` mutuality of दायित्व .  ''
Proof of some or all of these  तत्व may be किया in लिखने , हालांकि अनुबंध may be बना entirely  orally or by conduct .
The  उपाय लिये उल्लंघन of अनुबंध can be `` क्षतिपूर्ति '' in the रूप  of compensation of money or specific performance enforced through an injunction .
Both of these remedies award the party at loss the `` benefit of the bargain ''  or अपेक्षा क्षतिपूर्ति , जिससे हैं वृहद than mere रिलायंस क्षतिपूर्ति  , as in promissory estoppel .
The parties  may be प्राकृतिक व्यक्तियों or juristic व्यक्तियों  .
A contract is a  legally enforceable वादा or undertaking कि कुछ होगा  or will not occur .
The word  वादा can be प्रयुक्त as a विधिक पर्याय लिये अनुबंध , हालांकि परवाह is जरूरी as a वादा may नहीं  have the full standing of a contract , as when it is an agreement without consideration .
Contract law varies greatly  इससे एक क्षेत्राधिकार to another , सहित मतभेद in आम विधि compared to सिविल विधि , the प्रभाव of प्राप्त  law , particularly from England in common law countries , and of law codified in regional legislation .
regarding ऑस्ट्रेलियाई अनुबंध विधि लिये उदाहरण , वहीँ हैं 40 प्रासंगिक अधिनियमों जिससे प्रभाव on the निर्वचन of अनुबंध at the राष्ट्रमंडल  ( Federal / national ) level , and an additional 26 acts at the level of the state of NSW .
in जोड वहीँ हैं 6 अंतरराष्ट्रीय यंत्र or प्रथाओं जिससे हैं लागू लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय  dealings , such as the United Nations Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods .
ASP.NET is a  server-side वेब अनुप्रयोग फ्रेमवर्क designed लिये वेब विकास to उपज डायनेमिक वेब  pages .
It  थी विकसित by microsoft to allow प्रोग्रामर्स to निर्माण डायनेमिक वेब साइट , वेब अनुप्रयोग  and web services .
It was first  released in जनवरी 2002 साथ संस्करण 1.0 of the .neT फ्रेमवर्क , और is the successor to microsoft 's क्रियाशील सर्वर  Pages ( ASP ) technology .
ASP.NET is built on the Common Language  runtime ( clr ) , allowing प्रोग्रामर्स to लिखें asp.net कोड using कोई समर्थित .neT भाषा  .
the asp.net साबुन एक्सटेंशन फ्रेमवर्क allows asp.net components  to process SOAP messages .
Lysergic acid diethylamide ,  abbreviated एलएसडी or lsd-25 , भी ज्ञात as lysergide ( इन ) और colloquially as एसिड , is a semisynthetic साइकेडेलिक ड्रग of the ergoline परिवार , खूब ज्ञात लिये इसके मनोवैज्ञानिक प्रभाव जिससे can शामिल altered सोच  processes , closed and open eye visuals , synesthesia , an altered sense of time and spiritual experiences , as well as for its key role in 1960s counterculture .
It is used mainly as an  entheogen , recreational ड्रग , और as  an agent in psychedelic therapy .
LSD is non-addictive , is not known  to कारण दिमाग क्षति , और रै अत्यधिक कम toxicity सापेक्ष  to dose .
However , adverse psychiatric reactions such  as चिंता , paranoia , और delusions  are possible .
LSD was first synthesized by Albert Hofmann in 1938 from  ergotamine , a रासायनिक निकला by आर्थर stoll इससे ergot , a अनाज कवक कि typically  grows on rye .
The short form  `` एलएसडी '' आता इससे इसके जल्दी कोड नाम lsd-25 , जिससे is an संक्षिप्त लिये  the German `` Lysergsäure-diethylamid '' followed by a sequential number .
LSD is sensitive to oxygen , ultraviolet light , and chlorine  , विशेषकर in समाधान , हालांकि इसके potency may पिछला लिये सालो if it is भंडारित दूर इससे लाइट और नमी at कम तापमान  .
In  pure रूप it is a colorless , गंधहीन  , tasteless solid .
LSD is typically delivered orally ,  प्रायः on a substrate ऐसे as absorbent blotter पेपर , a शुगर घन  , or gelatin .
In its liquid form , it can also  be administered by intramuscular or intravenous इंजेक्शन  .
LSD is very potent  , साथ 20–30 μg ( micrograms ) होने the  threshold dose .
New experiments with LSD started in  2009 लिये the पहला समय in 40 सालो  .
Introduced by Sandoz Laboratories , with trade-name Delysid , as a  ड्रग साथ विभिन्न मनोरोग उपयोग in 1947 , एलएसडी जल्दी became a therapeutic एजेंट कि appeared to दिखाएँ ग्रेट वादा  .
In the 1950s , officials at the U.S. Central Intelligence Agency ( CIA ) thought the drug might be applicable to mind control  और रासायनिक warfare ; the एजेंसी 's mkultra शोध कार्यक्रम propagated the ड्रग among यंग servicemen और विद्यार्थी  .
The subsequent recreational use of the drug  by युवावस्था संस्कृति in the पश्चिमी संसार दौरान the 1960s led to a राजनैतिक firestorm कि resulted in इसके निषेध  .
Currently , a number of  organizations—including the beckley न्यास , मानचित्र , heffter शोध संस्थान और the अल्बर्ट hofmann foundation—exist  to fund , encourage and coordinate research into the medicinal and spiritual uses of LSD and related psychedelics .
The United States Navy 's Sea , Air , Land  टीमों , commonly ज्ञात as the नेवी seals , हैं the u.S. नेवी 's प्रिंसिपल खास परिचालन फ़ोर्स और a  part of the Naval Special Warfare Command and United States Special Operations Command .
`` SEAL '' is always capitalized in  सन्दर्भ to सदस्यों of the नवल खास warfare  community .
The acronym  is निकला इससे उनके क्षमता to operate at समुद्र , in the  air , and on land .
SEALs are male  सदस्यों of the संयुक्त  States Navy .
An exchange program with the Coast Guard , which  ग्रैजुएट तीन coast guardsmen as seals , थी  suspended in 2011 .
The CIA 's  अत्यधिक गुपचुप खास क्रियाएँ प्रभाग ( उदास ) और अधिक specifically इसके elite खास परिचालन समूह  ( SOG ) recruits operators from the SEAL Teams .
Joint Navy SEALs and CIA operations go  वापस to the famed macv-sog दौरान the वियतनाम  War .
This cooperation still  exists आज और is देखी in the युद्धों in इराकी और अफगानिस्तान , और in the ढूंढना और हत्या of ओसामा बिन लादेन  in Pakistan .
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100 , based on UN  2010 projections ( रेड , नारंगी , ग्रीन ) और us जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ऐतिहासिक estimates (  black ) .
Actual  अंकित जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़े हैं  in blue .
According to the highest estimate , the world population may rise to 16 billion by  2100 ; according to the न्यूनतम अनुमान , it may मनाही to 6 अरब  .
The world  जनसांख्यिकी is the कुल क्रमांक of जीना  humans on Earth .
As of today , it is estimated  to क्रमांक अरब by the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ( uscb  ) .
The USCB estimates that the world population  exceeded 7 अरब on कूच 12 , 2012  .
According to a  पृथक अनुमान by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र जनसांख्यिकी निधि , it पहुँचे  this milestone on October 31 , 2011 .
The world  जनसांख्यिकी रै अनुभवी निरन्तर विकास चूंकि the समाप्त of the ग्रेट अकाल और the ब्लैक मौत in 1350  , when it stood at around 370 million .
The highest rates of growth – global population increases above  1.8 % प्रति साल – यहूद देखी briefly दौरान the 1950s , और लिये a longer काल दौरान the 1960s  and 1970s .
The growth rate  peaked at 2.2 % in 1963 , और था अस्वीकृत to 1.1 % by  2011 .
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s at  परिचय 138 लाख , और हैं अभी अपेक्षित to remain essentially निरंतर at उनके 2011 स्तर of 134 लाख , जबकि मौतों क्रमांक  56 million per year , and are expected to increase to 80 million per year by 2040 .
वर्तमान projections दिखाएँ a जारी बढ़ाएँ in जनसांख्यिकी in the निकट भविष्य ( लकिन a स्थिर मनाही in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट  ) , with the global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050 .
Various  longer-term estimates भविष्यवाणी further विकास , stagnation , or भी overall  decline in the global population by 2150 .
Some analysts have questioned the  स्थिरता of further संसार जनसांख्यिकी विकास , citing the growing pressures on the पर्यावरण , वैश्विक खाना आपूर्तियाँ , और उर्जा  resources .
Memphis  is a नगर in the southwestern कोने of the u.S. राज्य of  Tennessee , and the county seat of Shelby County .
The city is located on the  4th chickasaw bluff , दक्षिण of the संगम of the भेड़िया और  Mississippi rivers .
Memphis had a population of 672,277 in 2011 making it the largest city in the  राज्य of टेनेसी , the largest नगर on the मिसिसिपी नदी , the तीसरा largest in the southeastern संयुक्त राज्य , और the 20th largest in the  United States .
The greater Memphis  महानगर क्षेत्रफल , सहित सटा काउंटी in मिसिसिपी और अरकंसास , था  a 2010 population of 1,316,100 .
This  makes मेम्फिस the दूसरी largest महानगर क्षेत्रफल in टेनेसी , surpassed तभी  by metropolitan Nashville , which has overtaken Memphis in recent years .
Memphis  is the youngest of टेनेसी  's major cities .
A resident of  मेम्फिस is referred to as a memphian , और the मेम्फिस प्रदेश is ज्ञात , विशेषकर to मीडिया  outlets , as `` Memphis & The Mid-South `` .
The  cattenom नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र  in France .
France  produces around तीन quarters of  its electricity by nuclear power .
The  grafenrheinfeld नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in  Germany .
Chancellor Angela Merkel 's coalition  घोषित on may 30 , 2011 , कि germany’s 17 नाभिकीय शक्ति स्टेशन होगा be shut bas by 2022 , in a नीति reversal following  Japan 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster .
फिलहाल , 68 रिएक्टरों हैं अंतर्गत निर्माण  in 15 countries .
Nuclear power  स्टेशन operate in तीस देशों  .
In 2010 , before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster , it was reported that an average of about 10  नाभिकीय रिएक्टरों यहूद अपेक्षित to become operational प्रति साल , हालांकि according to the संसार नाभिकीय संघ , of the 17 civilian रिएक्टरों नियोजित to  become operational between 2007 and 2009 , only five actually came on stream .
As of June 2011 , Germany and  स्विट्ज़रलैंड हैं phasing-out नाभिकीय  power .
As of June 2011 , countries such as Australia , Austria , Denmark  , यूनानियों , आयरलैंड , इटली , लातवियाई , liechtenstein , ध्वज , मलेशिया , माल्टा , नई जीलैंड , नार्वे और पुर्तगाल remain opposed  to nuclear power .
Skeletal  मांसपेशियां होमो sapiens
This is a table of  मांसपेशियां of the इंसान anatomy  .
There are approximately 642 skeletal muscles  भीतर the ठेठ इंसान , और लगभग प्रत्येक मांसपेशी constitutes एक भाग of a जोड़ी of एकसमान द्विपक्षीय मांसपेशियां , मिला on दोनो पहलू , resulting in लगभग  320 pairs of muscles , as presented in this article .
Nevertheless , the exact number is difficult to define because different sources group muscles  differently , e.g . regarding कया is पारिभाषित as अलग भाग of a सिंगल मांसपेशी or as अनेक  muscles .
उदाहरण दायरा इससे  640 to 850 .
The muscles of the human body can be  categorized into a क्रमांक of समूह जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the सिर और गर्दन , मांसपेशियां of the  torso or trunk , muscles of the upper limbs , and muscles of the lower limbs .
The action  refers to the कार्रवाई of प्रत्येक मांसपेशी  from the standard anatomical position .
In other  स्थितियाँ , अन्य क्रियाएँ  may be performed .
A reenactment of a battle at Fort  फोस्टर , 1837 ( at hillsborough  River State Park )
The Seminole Wars , also known as the Florida  युद्धों , यहूद तीन विरोध in फ्लोरिडा between the seminole — the सामूहिक नाम दिए to the amalgamation of विभिन्न समूह of देशी  Americans and Black people who settled in Florida in the early 18th century — and the United States Army .
The  पहला seminole युद्ध थी इससे 1814 to 1819 ( हालांकि स्त्रोत differ ) , the दूसरी seminole युद्ध इससे 1835 to 1842 , और  the Third Seminole War from 1855 to 1858 .
The  पहला विरोध साथ the seminoles arose आउट of तनाव relating to सामान्य एंड्रयू जैक्सन 's आक्रमण और विनाश  of Negro Fort in Florida in 1816 .
Jackson  भी attacked the स्पेनी at pensacola  .
ultimately , the स्पेनी क्राउन ceded the उपनिवेश  to United States rule .
Orono is a town in Penobscot  काउंटी , maine , संयुक्त राज्य .
It was first settled in 1774  और नामित in सम्मान of मुख्य जोसेफ orono of the penobscot  Nation .
it is घर to the विश्वविद्यालयों of  Maine .
the जनसांख्यिकी थी 10,362 at the  2010 census .

Luxor Las Vegas is a hotel  और कसीनो on the लास वेगास स्ट्रिप in स्वर्ग  , Nevada .
The  30-story होटल , स्वामित्व और संचालित by mgm रिसॉर्ट अंतरराष्ट्रीय , रै a  casino with over 2,000 slot machines and 87 table games .
In the 2008 to 2009 renovation , it has a new , highly modernized  , और समकालीन डिज़ाइन और contains a कुल of 4,400 कक्ष , सहित 442 suites , अस्तर the आंतरिक दीवारें of a पिरामिड स्टाइल  tower and within twin 22-story ziggurat towers that were built as later additions .
The hotel is  नामित बाद the नगर of लक्सर ( प्राचीन  Thebes ) in Egypt .
Luxor is the second largest hotel in Las Vegas (  the largest होने the mgm ग्रैंड ) और the आठवीं largest in the संसार .
As of 2010 , the Luxor has a 4 Key rating from  the ग्रीन कुंजी eco-rating कार्यक्रम , जिससे evaluates `` चिरस्थायी ''  hotel operations .
A pilot experiment , also called a pilot study , is a  छोटी स्केल प्रारंभिक पढ़ाई conducted in अनुक्रम to evaluate feasibility , समय , लागत , प्रतिकूल कार्यक्रम , और प्रभाव आकार ( सांख्यिकीय variability ) in  an attempt to predict an appropriate sample size and improve upon the study design prior to performance of a full-scale research project .
Pilot studies , therefore  , may नहीं be उचित लिये मामला  studies .
The Los Angeles Fire  विभाग ( lafd ) is the एजेंसी कि provides आग सुरक्षा और आपात चिकित्सा  services for the city of Los Angeles .
it may be unofficially referred to as the लॉस एंजिल्स नगर आग विभाग to फर्क  it from the Los Angeles County Fire Department .
The acre is a unit of area used in  the इम्पीरियल और u.S. प्रथागत प्रणालियों  .
An  एकड़ is परिचय 40 % of a हेक्टेयर – थोड़ा छोटी  than an American football field .
The acre is no longer commonly used , although a few notable exceptions include the United States , Australia , Burma and the United Kingdom ( as of  2010 , the एकड़ is no longer officially प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त किंगडम , हालांकि is स्टिल प्रयुक्त in रियल  estate descriptions ) .
It is still used ,  to कुछ extent , in  Canada .
The international symbol of  the एकड़ is ac , और is पारिभाषित as 1/640 of  a square mile .
The most  commonly प्रयुक्त एकड़ आज is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  acre .
In the United States  दोनो the अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ और the  slightly different US survey acre are in use .
The most common use  of the एकड़ is to माप tracts of  land .
One  अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ is पारिभाषित as 4046.8564224 वर्गाकार  metres .
During the Middle Ages , an acre  थी the राशि of जमीन कि could be plowed  in one day with a yoke of oxen .

Language processing refers to the way human  beings उपयोग शब्द to communicate विचार और जज्बात , और कैसा ऐसे संचार हैं processed और  understood .
Thus it is  कैसा the दिमाग creates और understands भाषा  .
Most recent theories consider that  इस प्रक्रम is carried आउट entirely by और अंदर the दिमाग  .
This is considered one of the most  characteristic abilities of the इंसान प्रजाति - शायद the सबसे characteristic  .
However very little is known about it  और वहीँ is विशाल पैमाना लिये शोध  on it .
सबसे of the ज्ञान acquired to तिथि on the विषय रै आइये इससे मरीजों जो have suffered कुछ प्रकार of significant सिर चोट , whether बाह्य  ( wounds , bullets ) or internal ( strokes , tumors , degenerative diseases ) .
Studies have shown  कि सबसे of the भाषा प्रसंस्करण कृत्यों हैं carried  out in the cerebral cortex .
The essential  फलन of the cortical भाषा क्षेत्रों is सांकेतिक प्रतिनिधित्व  .
Even though  भाषा exists in अलग फ़ॉर्म , सब of उन्हें हैं  based on symbolic representation .
The Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a mid-engined grand touring car , designed  और विकसित by the volkswagen समूह और manufactured in molsheim , फ़्रांस by bugatti ऑटोमोबाइल  S.A.S .
The Super  खेल संस्करण of the veyron is the तीव्रतम street-legal उत्पादन  car in the world , with a top speed of .
The  असली संस्करण रै a शीर्ष  speed of .
It was named Car of the  दशक ( 2000–2009 ) by the बीबीसी टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम  Top Gear .
the मानक veyron जीती शीर्ष गियर्स बेहतरीन car चलित  All Year award in 2005 .
On 6 April  2013 , bugatti नियत the रिकार्ड लिये the तीव्रतम roadster in the संसार साथ the veyron ग्रैंड खेल vitesse , reaching  on average a top speed of .
The Veyron 's chief designer was Hartmut  warkuss , और the exterior थी designed by jozef kabaň of volkswagen , साथ much of the अभियान्त्रिकी कार्य होने conducted अंतर्गत the मार्गदर्शन  of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber .
A number of  खास विसंगतियाँ have महरूम उत्पादित  .
In December 2010 , Bugatti began offering  prospective खरीदार the क्षमता to मनपसंद exterior और इंटीरियर्स रंग by using the veyron 16.4 configurator अनुप्रयोग on the marque  's official website .
DVD is an optical disc storage format , invented  और विकसित by फिलिप्स , सोनी , तोशिबा , और पैनासोनिक in  1995 .
DVDs offer  उच्चतर भंडार क्षमता than कॉम्पैक्ट discs जबकि  having the same dimensions .
pre-recorded dvds हैं mass-produced using सांचा मशीने  that physically stamp data onto the DVD .
Such discs are known as DVD-  rom , क्युकी आंकड़ा can तभी be पढ़ा और नहीं  written nor erased .
Blank recordable DVD discs ( DVD-R and DVD+R ) can be recorded once using a  dvd रिकॉर्डर और तब फलन as a dvd-rom . rewritable dvds ( dvd-rw , dvd+rw , और dvd-ram ) can be अंकित  and erased multiple times .
DVDs are used in DVD-Video  उपभोक्ता डिजिटल वीडियो स्वरूप और in dvd-audio उपभोक्ता डिजिटल ऑडियो स्वरूप , as खूब as लिये authoring  AVCHD discs .
DVDs  containing अन्य प्रकार of सूचना may be referred to as dvd आंकड़ा  discs .
What Chilli Wants is an American reality  श्रेणी on vh1 अभिनीत chilli , one-third of  the Grammy Award -winning R & B trio TLC .
The show  क्रॉनिकल्स chilli 's क्वेस्ट to ढूँढें प्रेम साथ the सहायता of tionna T. smalls  , an author and relationship coach .
The series premiered  on अप्रैल 11 , 2010 , और रै चूंकि  been renewed for a second season .
The second  ऋतु premiered on संडे , जनवरी 2 , 2011  .
Peter  जीन hernandez ( born अक्तूबर 8 , 1985 ) , ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम ब्रूनो मंगल , is an अमरीकी  singer-songwriter and record producer .
Raised in Honolulu , Hawaii , by a family of musicians , Mars began  बनाना म्यूज़िक at a यंग आयु और performed in विभिन्न musical venues in उसके गृहनगर throughout उसके बाल्यकाल  .
He graduated  इससे ऊँची स्कूल और तब स्थानांतरित to लॉस एंजिल्स ,  California , to pursue a musical career .
Mars  उत्पादित गीतों लिये अन्य कलाकारों , joining उत्पादन टोली  The Smeezingtons .
Mars had an  unsuccessful कार्यावधि साथ motown रिकॉर्ड , लकिन तब हस्ताक्षरित  with Atlantic in 2009 .
He became recognized as a solo artist after lending his vocals  और co-writing the hooks लिये the गीतों `` nothin ' on तुम ``  by B.o.B , and `` Billionaire `` by Travie McCoy .
He also  co-wrote the हिट्स `` सही गोलाकार `` by flo rida featuring ke $ ha , और `` wavin ' ध्वज ``  by K'naan .
in अक्तूबर 2010 , he released उसके डेब्यू एल्बम  , Doo-Wops & Hooligans .
Anchored by the worldwide number-one  singles `` बस the रास्ता तुम हैं `` और `` ग्रेनेड `` , the एल्बम peaked at क्रमांक  three on the Billboard 200 .
Mars was nominated for seven Grammys at the  53rd ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , जीतना बेहतरीन पुरूष पॉप गायन प्रदर्शन लिये `` बस the रास्ता तुम  Are '' .
His  दूसरी स्टुडियो एल्बम , अपरंपरागत ज्यूकबॉक्स , थी released  on December 11 , 2012 .
Mars ' music is noted for displaying a wide  किस्में of शैलियाँ और प्रभाव , और contains  elements of many musical genres .
He has  worked साथ an assortment of कलाकारों  from various genres .
As a child , he was highly influenced by artists such as Little Richard , Elvis  प्रेस्ली और माइकल जैक्सन और होता प्रायः impersonate ये कलाकारों इससे a यंग  age .
Mars  भी incorporates रेगी - और motown -inspired  sounds into his work .
विश्वव्यापी , मंगल became the best-selling डिजिटल  artist in 2011 .
He had three singles in the top ten , including  पहला प्लेस साथ `` बस the रास्ता तुम हैं '' , जिससे बेची 12.5 लाख नक़ल  .
Mars won Best International Male Solo  कलाकार at the 2012 ब्रिट पुरस्कार  .
Bruno Mars has sold 6  लाख एल्बम और 40 लाख singles विश्वव्यापी  as a singer .
Althought as a  song-writer , निर्माता और सिंगर उसके कुल सिंगल डाउनलोड बिक्री surpass  100 million worldwide .
Bust of Zeus , Otricoli (  sala रोटोंडा , museo pio-clementino  , Vatican ) .
यूनानी mythology is the देह of मिथकों और शिक्षाओं कि belong to the प्राचीन यूनानियों , concerning उनके देवताओं और नायक  , the nature of the world , and the origins and significance of their own cult and ritual practices .
It was a  भाग of the धर्म in प्राचीन यूनानियों और is भाग of धर्म in आधुनिक यूनानियों और around the संसार  , known as Hellenismos .
Modern scholars  refer to और पढ़ाई the मिथकों in an attempt to throw लाइट on the धार्मिक और राजनैतिक संस्थानों  of Ancient Greece and its civilization , and to gain understanding of the nature of myth-making itself .
Greek mythology is explicitly embodied in a large collection of narratives , and  implicitly in यूनानी representational कला , ऐसे as vase-paintings और votive उपहार  .
Greek myth attempts to explain the origins of the world , and details the lives and adventures of a wide  किस्में of देवताओं , देवियाँ , नायक , heroines , और पौराणिक जीव  .
These accounts initially were  disseminated in an oral-poetic परंपरा ; आज the यूनानी मिथकों हैं ज्ञात primarily  from Greek literature .
The oldest known Greek literary sources , Homer  's एपिक कविताएं इलियड और ओडिसी , फ़ोकस on कार्यक्रम surrounding  the Trojan War .
Two poems by Homer 's near contemporary Hesiod , the Theogony and the Works and Days ,  contain खाते of the उत्पत्ति of the संसार , the उत्तराधिकार of दैवी शासकों , the उत्तराधिकार of इंसान आयु , the उत्पत्ति  of human woes , and the origin of sacrificial practices .
मिथकों हैं भी preserved in the homeric hymns , in fragments of एपिक कविताएं of the एपिक साईकिल , in lyric कविताएं , in the works of the tragedians of the पांचवां सदी bc , in कृतियाँ of विद्वानों और कवियों of  the Hellenistic Age , and in texts from the time of the Roman Empire by writers such as Plutarch and Pausanias .
Archaeological findings provide a principal source of  विवरण परिचय यूनानी mythology , साथ देवताओं और नायक प्रदर्शित prominently in the सजावट  of many artifacts .
Geometric designs on pottery of the eighth century BC  depict दृश्यों इससे the trojan साईकिल as खूब as the adventures of heracles  .
In the succeeding  archaic , शास्त्रीय , और hellenistic अवधि , homeric और विभिन्न अन्य पौराणिक दृश्यों  appear , supplementing the existing literary evidence .
Greek mythology has  था an extensive influence on the संस्कृति , कला , और साहित्य of पश्चिमी सभ्यता  and remains part of Western heritage and language .
