Poets and artists  इससे प्राचीन टाइम्स to the उपस्थित have निकला प्रेरणा इससे यूनानी  mythology and have discovered contemporary significance and relevance in the themes .
मुँह & macneal  in 1971
Mouth & MacNeal  थी a पॉप duo इससे the नीदरलैंड्स  .
They are best known for  उनके लाख selling रिकॉर्डिंग of `` कैसा do  You Do `` .
The Boise State  broncos फ़ुटबॉल कार्यक्रम represents boise राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों in कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल और compete in the फ़ुटबॉल कटोरी subdivision ( fbs  ) of Division I as a member of the Mountain West Conference .
They are currently led by head coach  क्रिस petersen और खेल उनके घर खेल at bronco  Stadium .
The franc ( sign : Fr . or SFr . ; German : Franken , French and Romansh :  फ़्रैंक , इतालवी : फ्रेंको ; कोड : chf ) is the करेंसी और विधिक टेंडर of स्विट्ज़रलैंड और liechtenstein  ; it is also legal tender in the Italian exclave Campione d'Italia .
हालांकि नहीं formally विधिक टेंडर in the जर्मनी exclave büsingen ( the एकमात्र विधिक  currency is the euro ) , it is in wide daily use there .
The Swiss  नेशनल बैंको मुद्दे banknotes और the संघीय  mint Swissmint issues coins .
the स्विस फ़्रैंक is the तभी संस्करण of the  franc still issued in Europe .
The smaller denomination , a hundredth of a franc , is a Rappen ( Rp . ) in German  , centime ( c. ) in फ्रेंच , centesimo ( ct. ) in इतालवी , और रैप ( rp . ) in romansh  .
The ISO code of  the करेंसी प्रयुक्त by बैंको और वित्तीय संस्थानों is chf , हालांकि `` fr . '' is प्रयुक्त by सबसे व्यवसायों और विज्ञापनदाता ; कुछ उपयोग sfr . ; the latinate  `` CH '' stands for Confoederatio Helvetica .
Given the  अलग भाषाएं प्रयुक्त in स्विट्ज़रलैंड , लैटिन is प्रयुक्त लिये language-neutral  inscriptions on the coins .
Sir  चार्ल्स स्पेंसर `` चार्ली '' चैपलिन , ( 16 अप्रैल 188925 दिसम्बर 1977 ) थी a अंग्रेजों  comic actor and filmmaker who rose to fame in the silent era .
Chaplin became a worldwide icon  through उसके स्क्रीन persona `` the ट्रैम्प `` और is माना एक of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण  figures of the film industry .
His career spanned more than 75 years , from a child in the  विक्टोरियन era to बंद to उसके मौत at the आयु of 88 , और encompassed दोनो  adulation and controversy .
Raised in London ,  चैपलिन 's बाल्यकाल थी पारिभाषित by गरीबी और  hardship .
He was sent to a workhouse twice before  the आयु of नौ ; उसके पिता थी अनुपस्थित , और उसके माँ थी वचनबद्ध  to a mental asylum .
Chaplin began performing from a young age  , touring म्यूज़िक हॉल और बाद working as a स्टेज कर्ता  and comedian .
At 19 he was signed to  the prestigious फ्रेड karno कम्पनी , जिससे took उसे  to America .
Chaplin was scouted by  the फिल्मी उद्योग , और बना उसके पहला दिखावे in 1914  with Keystone Studios .
He soon developed the Tramp persona  और formed a विशाल प्रशंसक आधार  .
Chaplin  निर्देशित उसके films इससे an जल्दी स्टेज , और जारी to hone उसके शिल्प as he स्थानांतरित to the essanay , परस्पर  , and First National corporations .
By 1918 , he  थी एक of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध मेन  in the world .
In 1919  , चैपलिन co-founded the वितरण कम्पनी संयुक्त कलाकारों , giving उसे पूरा  control over his films .
His  पहला feature-length चित्र थी the बच्चा ( 1921 ) , followed by a स्त्री of पेरिस  ( 1923 ) , The Gold Rush ( 1925 ) , and The Circus ( 1928 ) .
He refused to move to sound films in the 1930s , instead  producing नगर लाइट्स ( 1931 ) और आधुनिक टाइम्स ( 1936 ) बगैर संवाद  .
Chaplin became increasingly political  और उसके अगला फिल्मी , the ग्रेट तानाशाह ( 1940 ) , satirised  Adolf Hitler .
The 1940s was  a दशक चिह्नित साथ विवाद लिये चैपलिन , और उसके लोकप्रियता  declined rapidly .
He was accused of communist sympathies , while  उसके भागीदारी in a paternity सूट और विवाह to much younger महिलाओं यहूद माना  scandalous .
An FBI investigation was opened on Chaplin , and he was eventually  मजबूर to छोड़ the संयुक्त राज्य और settle in स्विट्ज़रलैंड .
He abandoned the Tramp for his later films , which include Monsieur Verdoux ( 1947 ) ,  limelight ( 1952 ) , a किंग in नई यॉर्क ( 1957 )  , and A Countess From Hong Kong ( 1967 ) .
Chaplin wrote , directed ,  उत्पादित , संपादित , scored , और स्ट्रक्चर in सबसे of  his films .
He was a  perfectionist , और उसके वित्तीय स्वतंत्रता meant he प्रायः खर्च सालो on the विकास  and production of a picture .
His films are characterised by slapstick  संयुक्त साथ pathos , और प्रायः विशेषता the ट्रैम्प struggling विरूद्ध  adversity .
Many contain social and political  विषयवस्तु , as खूब as autobiographical तत्व  .
In 1972 , as part of a renewed  सराहना लिये उसके कार्य , चैपलिन प्राप्त an मानद अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये `` the incalculable प्रभाव he  has had in making motion pictures the art form of this century '' .
He continues to be held in high  लिहाज़ , साथ the सुनहरा फटाफट , नगर लाइट्स , आधुनिक टाइम्स , और the ग्रेट तानाशाह प्रायः क्रमित among the महानतम  films of all time .
Planned Parenthood Federation of America ( PPFA ) ,  commonly shortened to नियोजित parenthood , is the u.S. संबद्ध of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नियोजित parenthood  Federation ( IPPF ) and one of its larger members .
PPFA is a non-profit organization  providing reproductive स्वास्थ्य और मातृ और चाइल्ड  health services .
The Planned Parenthood Action Fund , Inc. ( PPAF ) is a related organization which lobbies for pro-choice legislation ,  व्यापक sex शिक्षा , और अभिगम to सस्ती स्वास्थ्य परवाह in the संयुक्त  States .
Planned Parenthood is the largest U.S. provider of reproductive health  सेवाएं , सहित कर्कट स्क्रीनिंग , hiv स्क्रीनिंग और counseling , निरोधक  , and abortion .
Contraception accounts  लिये 35 % of ppfa 's कुल सेवाएं और abortions खाता लिये 3 % ; ppfa conducts roughly 300,000 abortions  each year , among 3 million people served .
The organization has its roots in Brooklyn , New York , where  मार्गरेट सैंगर खोली the देश 's पहला birth-control  clinic .
Sanger  संस्थापित the अमरीकी जनम कंट्रोल लीग in 1921 , जिससे in 1942  became part of the Planned Parenthood Federation of America .
Since then , Planned  parenthood रै grown to have over 820 क्लिनिक स्थितियाँ in  the U.S. , with a total budget of US $ 1 billion .
PPFA provides an array  of सेवाएं to over तीन लाख लोगों in the संयुक्त राज्य , और supports सेवाएं लिये over एक  million clients outside the United States .
Mens rea  is लैटिन लिये `` अपराधी  mind '' .
In criminal law , it is viewed as  एक of the जरुरी तत्व of कुछ अपराधों  .
The standard common law test of criminal liability is  प्रायः expressed in the लैटिन phrase , actus गैर facit reum nisi पुरुषों बैठना rea , जिससे  means `` the act is not culpable unless the mind is guilty '' .
Thus , in jurisdictions with due process , there must be  an actus reus , or `` अपराधी अधिनियम , '' accompanied by कुछ स्तर of पुरुषों rea to constitute the अपराधों साथ जिससे the प्रतिवादी is चार्ज  ( see the technical requirement of concurrence ) .
As a general rule , criminal liability  करता नहीं संलग्न to a व्यक्ति जो acted साथ the अनुपस्थिति of दिमागी  fault .
the एक्सेप्शन is सख्त  liability crimes .
In civil law , it  is प्रायः नहीं जरुरी to prove a subjective दिमागी तत्व to स्थापित देयता  for breach of contract or tort , for example .
However , if a tort is intentionally committed or a  अनुबंध is intentionally breached , ऐसे intent may बढ़ाएँ the पैमाना of देयता as खूब as the माप of क्षतिपूर्ति देय to the  plaintiff .
इसलिए , पुरुषों rea refers to the दिमागी तत्व of the अपराध कि  accompanies the actus reus .
In some jurisdictions , the terms mens  rea और actus reus have महरूम replaced by वैकल्पिक  terminology .
In Australia , for example , the elements of the federal offences are now  designated as `` दोष तत्व '' or `` दिमागी तत्व '' ( पुरुषों rea ) और `` शारीरिक  elements '' or `` external elements '' ( actus reus ) .
This terminology was adopted to replace the obscurity of the Latin terms  साथ सरल और सटीक phrasing  .
Ulysses S. Grant ( born Hiram Ulysses Grant ;  अप्रैल 27 , 1822 – जुलाई 23 , 1885 ) थी the 18th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1869–1877 ) following उसके अत्यधिक कामयाब  role as a war general in the second half of the Civil War .
Under Grant , the Union Army defeated the Confederate military ;  having effectively ended the युद्ध और secession साथ the आत्मसमर्पण of रॉबर्ट E. ली 's फौज at appomattox  .
As president he  led the कट्टरपंथी republicans in उनके प्रयत्न to eliminate सब vestiges of confederate राष्ट्रवाद  and slavery .
Upset over uncontrolled violence in the South and having desired to protect African  अमरीकी नागरिकता , अध्यक्ष ग्रान्ट effectively नष्ट the ku klux क्लान in 1871  .
Grant was the first  अध्यक्ष to स्थापित सिविल सेवा सुधार having निर्मित a two-year  federally funded Civil Service Commission in 1871 .
In terms of foreign policy ,  ग्रान्ट नाज़िल an `` अनपेक्षित क्षमता लिये विवेचना और परामर्श '' कि प्रचारित the नेशनल  interest .
His reputation was marred by his  दोहराया रक्षा of भ्रष्ट appointees , और by अमेरिका 's पहला औद्योगिक आयु आर्थिक अवसाद ( पुकारा the `` दहशत of  1873 `` ) that dominated his second term .
Although his Republican  पार्टी विभाजित in 1872 साथ reformers denouncing उसे , ग्रान्ट थी  easily reelected .
By 1875 the conservative white Southern  विपक्ष regained कंट्रोल of प्रत्येक राज्य in the दक्षिण और as he बाएँ the श्वेत हाउस in कूच 1877 उसके नीतियों  were being undone .
A career soldier , he graduated from the United States Military Academy at West  पाइंट और परोसा in the mexican–american युद्ध .
When the Civil War began in 1861 ,  ग्रान्ट प्रशिक्षित संघ स्वयंसेवी regiments in इलिनोइस  .
In 1862 , as a general  he लड़ा a श्रेणी of लड़ाइयों और थी प्रचारित to प्रमुख सामान्य बाद forcing the आत्मसमर्पण of a विशाल confederate  army and gaining control of Kentucky and most of Tennessee .
He then led Union forces to victory after initial setbacks in the  बैटल of shiloh , कमाई a प्रतिष्ठा as an आक्रामक कमांडर .
In July 1863 ,  बाद a long , जटिल अभियान , ग्रान्ट पराजित पाँच uncoordinated confederate सेना ( capturing एक  of them ) and seized Vicksburg .
इस प्रसिद्ध विजय दिया the संघ पूरा कंट्रोल of the मिसिसिपी नदी , विभाजित बंद the पश्चिमी confederacy  , and opened the way for more Union triumphs .
After another win at the Battle  of चट्टानूगा in लेट 1863 , अध्यक्ष अब्राहम lincoln बना उसे लेफ्टिनेंट सामान्य और कमांडर  of all of the Union Armies .
As commanding general of the army ,  ग्रान्ट confronted रॉबर्ट E. ली in a श्रेणी of बहुत खूनी लड़ाइयों in 1864 ज्ञात as the overland अभियान कि ended साथ the  bottling up of Lee at Petersburg , outside the Confederate capital of Richmond .
During the siege , Grant coordinated a series of devastating campaigns  शुभारम्भ by विलियम tecumseh शरमन , फिलिप  Sheridan , and George Thomas .
Finally breaking through Lee 's trenches , the  संघ फौज captured रिचमंड in अप्रैल 1865  .
Lee  surrendered उसके depleted शक्तियां to ग्रान्ट at appomattox as the confederacy  collapsed .
Although pro-Confederate  इतिहासकारों attacked ग्रान्ट as a निष्ठुर कसाई जो जीती by brute फ़ोर्स , सबसे इतिहासकारों have hailed  his military genius .
Grant 's two  लगातार शर्तें as अध्यक्ष stabilized the स्वदेश बाद the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध और दौरान the  turbulent Reconstruction period that followed .
As president , he enforced  पुनर्निर्माण by enforcing सिविल अधिकारों कानून और लड़  Ku Klux Klan violence .
ग्रान्ट जीती ड्योढ़ी of the पंद्रहवीं amendment ; giving संवैधानिक सुरक्षा लिये african-american  voting rights .
He used the army to build the Republican  पार्टी in the दक्षिण , आधारित on ब्लैक मतदाता , उत्तरी newcomers ( `` carpetbaggers `` ) और देशी श्वेत समर्थक ( `` scalawags . ''  )
As a  परिणाम , अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी यहूद represented in the u.S. कॉंग्रेस  for the first time in American history in 1870 .
Reformers praised Grant 's Indian peace policy by having broken the deadlock on Indian  appropriations in कॉंग्रेस , the सृष्टि of the फलक of भारतीय commissioners to मेक सुधार सुझाव  , and his enlistment of Quaker Protestants who controlled mid western Indian agencies , that effectively curbed Congressional patronage .
ग्रान्ट remained संकल्पित in keeping इंडियंस  from being exterminated from white settler encroachment or by the U.S. military .
Grant 's reputation as president by 1875 was at an  all-time ऊँची लिये उसके पिछला वीटो of the महंगाई विधेयक , the ड्योढ़ी of the resumption of specie अधिनियम , और सचिव bristow  's successful raids that shut down the Whiskey Ring .
Grant 's foreign policy , led by Secretary of State  हैमिल्टन मछली , implemented अंतरराष्ट्रीय मध्यस्थता , settled the अलबामा दावा साथ ब्रिटेन और avoided युद्ध साथ स्पेन  over the Virginius Affair .
A jukebox is a partially automated music-playing  यंत्र , प्रायः a coin-operated यंत्र , कि होगा खेल a संरक्षक 's चयन  from self-contained media .
The classic  ज्यूकबॉक्स रै बटन साथ अक्षर और संख्याएँ on उन्हें कि , जब डाला in  combination , are used to play a specific selection .
A drug test is a technical analysis of a biological specimen – for example  मूत्र , बाल , रक्त , स्वेद , or मौखिक द्रव / लार – to determine the उपस्थिति or अनुपस्थिति of निर्दिष्ट जनक दवाएँ or उनके  metabolites .
Major uses of drug testing  हैं to detect the उपस्थिति of प्रदर्शन बढ़ाना steroids in खेल or लिये  drugs prohibited by laws , such as cannabis , cocaine and heroin .
A ``  10-panel मूत्र स्क्रीन '' consists  of the following:
amphetamines ( सहित  Methamphetamine )
barbiturates
benzodiazepines
cannabinoids ( thc  )
कोका
methadone
methaqualone
Opiates (  codeine , मॉरफीन , हेरोइन , oxycodone  , Hydrocodone , etc . )
phencyclidine  ( PCP )
propoxyphene
Saturn V rocket ,  प्रयुक्त लिये the अमरीकी मानवयुक्त चंद्र  landing missions
Space exploration is the  डिस्कवरी और खोजी of बाहरी स्पेस by अर्थात्  of space technology .
Physical  खोजी of स्पेस is conducted दोनो by इंसान spaceflights और by रोबोटिक  spacecraft .
While  the अवलोकन of वस्तुएँ in स्पेस , ज्ञात as खगोलशास्त्र , predates विश्वसनीय अंकित इतिहास , it थी the विकास of विशाल और अपेक्षाकृत कुशल rockets दौरान  the early 20th century that allowed physical space exploration to become a reality .
Common rationales for exploring space  शामिल advancing वैज्ञानिक शोध , uniting अलग राष्ट्र , ensuring the भविष्य अस्तित्व of मानवता और विकासशील सैन्य और रणनीतिक लाभ  against other countries .
विभिन्न आलोचनाओं of स्पेस खोजी हैं sometimes  made .
Space  खोजी रै प्रायः महरूम प्रयुक्त as a प्रॉक्सी प्रतियोगिता लिये geopolitical rivalries  such as the Cold War .
The early era of space exploration was driven by a `` Space Race `` between the  सोवियत संघ और the संयुक्त राज्य , the लॉन्च of the पहला man-made ऑब्जेक्ट to कक्षा the धरती , the ussr 's sputnik 1 , on 4 अक्तूबर 1957 , और the पहला चंद्रमा लैंडिंग by the  American Apollo 11 craft on 20 July 1969 are often taken as the boundaries for this initial period .
The  सोवियत स्पेस कार्यक्रम हासिल अनेक of the पहला माइलस्टोन , सहित the पहला जीना होने in कक्षा in 1957 , the पहला इंसान spaceflight ( यूरी गगारिन  aboard Vostok 1 ) in 1961 , the first spacewalk ( by Aleksei Leonov ) on 18 March 1965 , the first automatic landing on another celestial body in 1966 , and the launch of the first space station ( Salyut 1 ) in 1971 .
After the first 20 years of exploration , focus  shifted इससे one-off फ़्लाइट to बेदर्दी हार्डवेयर , ऐसे as the स्पेस शटल कार्यक्रम , और इससे प्रतियोगिता to सहयोग as साथ  the International Space Station ( ISS ) .
With  the substantial पूर्णता of the iss following sts-133 in कूच  2011 , plans for space exploration by the USA remain in flux .
Constellation , a Bush Administration  कार्यक्रम लिये a वापसी to the चंद्रमा by 2020 थी judged inadequately वित्तपोषित और unrealistic by an विशेषज्ञ पुनर्विलोकन  panel reporting in 2009 .
The Obama Administration proposed a revision of Constellation in 2010 to focus  on the विकास of the काबिलियत लिये crewed मिशन परे कम धरती कक्षा ( leo ) , envisioning extending the आपरेशन of the iss परे 2020 , transferring the विकास of लॉन्च वाहनों लिये इंसान क्रू इससे नासा to the निजी सेक्टर , और विकासशील प्रौद्योगिकी to enable  missions to beyond LEO , such as Earth/Moon L1 , the Moon , Earth/Sun L2 , near-earth asteroids , and Phobos or Mars orbit .
As of March 2011 , the US Senate and House of Representatives are still working towards a compromise  नासा funding विधेयक , जिससे होगा संभवतः terminate नक्षत्र और निधि विकास of a भारी लिफ्ट लॉन्च गाडी ( hllv  ) .
In the 2000s , the  लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन initiated a कामयाब मानवयुक्त spaceflight कार्यक्रम , जबकि the यूरोपीय संघ , जापानी , और इण्डिया have भी नियोजित भविष्य  manned space missions .
China , Russia , Japan , and India have  advocated मानवयुक्त मिशन to the चंद्रमा दौरान the 21st सदी , जबकि the यूरोपीय संघ रै  advocated manned missions to both the Moon and Mars during the 21st century .
From  the 1990s onwards , निजी रूचि began promoting स्पेस पर्यटन और तब निजी  space exploration of the Moon ( see Google Lunar X Prize ) .
John Calvin Coolidge , Jr. ( July 4 , 1872January  5 , 1933 ) थी the 30th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1923–1929  ) .
A Republican lawyer from Vermont , Coolidge worked  उसके रास्ता up the सीढ़ियाँ of मैसाचुसेट्स राज्य राजनीती , आखिरकार बनने राज्यपाल of कि राज्य  .
His conduct during the Boston Police Strike of 1919 thrust him into the  नेशनल स्पॉटलाइट और दिया उसे a प्रतिष्ठा as a man of निर्णायक कार्रवाई  .
Soon after , he was  निर्वाचित as the 29th वाइस अध्यक्ष in 1920 और succeeded to the प्रेसिडेंसी upon  the sudden death of Warren G. Harding in 1923 .
Elected in his own  सही in 1924 , he gained a प्रतिष्ठा as a small-government रूढ़िवादी , और  also as a man who said very little .
कूलिज लौटी पब्लिक विश्वास in the श्वेत हाउस बाद the घोटालों of उसके पूर्ववर्ती 's प्रशासन  , and left office with considerable popularity .
As a Coolidge  biographer put it , `` he समाविष्ट the स्पिरिट और उम्मीदें of the मध्य  class , could interpret their longings and express their opinions .
कि he किया represent the प्रतिभाशाली of the औसत is  the most convincing proof of his strength . ''
Some later  criticized कूलिज as भाग of a सामान्य आलोचना of laissez-faire  government .
His reputation underwent a renaissance during the Ronald Reagan Administration , but the  परम मूल्यांकन of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी is स्टिल विभाजित between those जो स्वीकृति of उसके कटौती of the आकार of सरकारी कार्यक्रम और those जो मानना the संघीय सरकारी चाहिए  be more involved in regulating and controlling the economy .
Espresso is a concentrated beverage brewed by  forcing a छोटी राशि of nearly खौलते जल अंतर्गत दबाव through  finely ground coffee beans .
Espresso often has a thicker consistency than coffee  brewed by अन्य विधि , a उच्चतर विशेषज्ञता of निलंबित और dissolved solids , और crema ( अर्थ मलाई , लकिन होने a सन्दर्भ to the झाग साथ a मलाईदार बनावट कि फ़ॉर्म as a परिणाम  of the pressure ) .
As a result of the pressurized brewing process  the जायका और रसायन in a ठेठ कप of  espresso are very concentrated .
Espresso is the base for other  पेय , ऐसे as a latte , कापुचीनो , macchiato , मोचा , or americano  .
Espresso has more caffeine per unit volume than most beverages , but the usual serving size is smaller—a typical 60 mL ( 2 US fluid ounce ) of espresso has 80 to 150 mg  of कैफीन , छोटी कम than the 95 to 200 mg of a मानक 240 ml ( 8 us द्रव औंस ) कप  of drip-brewed coffee .
Brian Keith Kelly ( born  अक्तूबर 25 , 1961 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल कोच और पूर्व खिलाड़ी  .
He is currently the head football coach for the  notre dame लड़ आयरिश , a स्थिति he रै आयोजित चूंकि  December 2009 .
Kelly was previously head coach at Grand Valley State University (  1991–2003 ) , सेंट्रल मिशिगन विश्वविद्यालयों ( 2004–2006 ) , और विश्वविद्यालयों of सिनसिनाटी  ( 2006–2009 ) .
A contract is  an अनुबंध having a lawful ऑब्जेक्ट डाला into voluntarily by दो  or more parties , each of whom intends to create one or more legal obligations between them .
The elements of a contract are `` offer '' and `` acceptance '' by `` competent persons '' having legal  क्षमता जो एक्सचेंज `` विचार '' to बनाएँ `` mutuality of दायित्व .  ''
Proof of some or all of these elements may be  किया in लिखने , हालांकि अनुबंध may be बना entirely orally or by conduct  .
The remedy for breach of contract can be `` damages  '' in the रूप of मुआवजे of धन or विशिष्ट प्रदर्शन enforced through  an injunction .
Both of these remedies award  the पार्टी at घाटा the `` लाभ of the सौदेबाजी '' or अपेक्षा क्षतिपूर्ति , जिससे हैं वृहद than mere रिलायंस क्षतिपूर्ति  , as in promissory estoppel .
The parties may be natural  व्यक्तियों or juristic व्यक्तियों  .
A contract is a legally enforceable  वादा or undertaking कि कुछ होगा or होगा नहीं occur  .
The word promise can be used as a legal synonym for  अनुबंध , हालांकि परवाह is जरूरी as a वादा may नहीं have the पूरा खड़ा of a अनुबंध , as  when it is an agreement without consideration .
Contract law varies greatly from one jurisdiction to another , including differences in common law compared to civil law ,  the प्रभाव of प्राप्त विधि , विशेषकर इससे इंग्लैण्ड in आम विधि देशों , और of विधि संहिताबद्ध in क्षेत्रीय  legislation .
Regarding Australian Contract Law for example , there are 40 relevant acts  जिससे प्रभाव on the निर्वचन of अनुबंध at the राष्ट्रमंडल ( संघीय / नेशनल  ) level , and an additional 26 acts at the level of the state of NSW .
In addition there are 6  अंतरराष्ट्रीय यंत्र or प्रथाओं जिससे हैं लागू लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय dealings , ऐसे as the संयुक्त राष्ट्र  Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods .
Sidney  पैट्रिक crosby , ons ( born अगस्त 7 , 1987 ) is a कनाडाई पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी  player who is captain of the Pittsburgh Penguins of the National Hockey League ( NHL ) .
Crosby was drafted first overall by the Penguins out  of the क्यूबेक प्रमुख जूनियर हॉकी लीग (  QMJHL ) .
During his two-year major junior career with the Rimouski Océanic , he  अर्जित back-to-back chl खिलाड़ी of the साल पुरस्कार और led उसके क्लबों to the 2005 मेमोरियल  Cup final .
Nicknamed `` The Next One `` , he was one of the most  अत्यधिक regarded ड्राफ्ट चयन in हॉकी इतिहास , अग्रणी अनेक to refer to the 2005 ड्राफ्ट लॉटरी as the `` sidney  Crosby Sweepstakes '' .
In his first NHL season , Crosby finished sixth  in लीग स्कोरिंग साथ 102 अंक ( 39 लक्ष्य , 63 assists ) और थी a runner-up लिये the calder मेमोरियल ट्रॉफी ( जीती by सिकंदर  Ovechkin ) .
By his second season , he led the NHL with 120 points ( 36 goals , 84 assists )  to कैप्चर the आर्ट रॉस ट्रॉफी , बनने the youngest खिलाड़ी और the तभी किशोरावस्था to जीत a स्कोरिंग शीर्षक  in any major North American sports league .
That same season , Crosby also won the Hart Memorial Trophy as the Professional Hockey Writers Association 's choice for most valuable player and the  लेस्टर B. पियर्सन पुरस्कार as the एनएचएल खिलाड़ी संघ 's चुनाव लिये सबसे बकाया खिलाड़ी , बनने the सातवाँ खिलाड़ी  in NHL history to earn all three awards in one year .
Crosby started the 2007–08 season with the team 's captaincy and subsequently  led उन्हें to the 2008 स्टेनली कप फाइनल , जहाँ वे यहूद पराजित by the डेट्रॉयट रेड विंग्स  in six games .
The Penguins returned to the Finals against  डेट्रॉयट the following साल और जीती in सात खेल ; crosby became the youngest कप्तान in एनएचएल  history to win the Stanley Cup .
In the 2009–10 season , Crosby scored a career-high 51 goals , tying him with Steven Stamkos for  the प्रक्षेपास्त्र रिचर्ड ट्रॉफी as the league-leader ; साथ 58 assists , he totaled 109 अंक  , second in the NHL .
During the off-season , Crosby  प्राप्त the चिह्नित मेसियर नेतृत्व  Award .
In 2010–11 , Crosby  sustained a concussion as a परिणाम of हिट्स to the  head in back-to-back games .
The injury  बाएँ उसे sidelined लिये  ten and a half months .
However , after playing eight games in the 2011–12 season ,  crosby 's concussion-like लक्षण लौटे in दिसम्बर 2011 , और he किया नहीं वापसी जबतक mid-march  2012 .
Internationally , Crosby has represented Canada  in numerous tournaments लिये the देश 's जूनियर और  men 's teams .
After competing in the 2003 U-18  जूनियर संसार कप , he represented कनाडा in back-to-back iihf संसार u20 championships  , winning silver in 2004 and gold in 2005 .
At the 2006 IIHF World Championship , he led the  टूर्नामेंट in स्कोरिंग , जबकि भी कमाई शीर्ष आगे और all-star टोली honours  .
Four years later , Crosby was  नामित to टोली कनाडा लिये the 2010 शीत ओलंपिक in  Vancouver .
Playing  the संयुक्त राज्य in the सुनहरा पदक खेल , he scored the game-winning  goal in overtime .
A  संयुक्त राज्य cent , भी ज्ञात as  a penny .
`` My two cents '' ( 2¢ ) and its longer version `` put my two cents in '' is an United States ( US ) idiomatic  अभिव्यक्ति , लिया इससे the असली अंग्रेज़ी मुहावरा अभिव्यक्ति : to put in `` my दो कौड़ी लायक '' or `` my tuppence  worth . ''
It is used to preface the  अंतरिम stating of one’s राय  .
By deprecating the opinion to follow – suggesting its value is only two cents ,  a बहुत छोटी राशि – the उपयोक्ता of the phrase उम्मीदें to lessen the प्रभाव of a संभवतः बयान  , showing politeness and humility .
However , it is also sometimes used with  विडंबना जब expressing a strongly लगा राय  .
The phrase is also  प्रयुक्त आउट of आदत to preface uncontentious  opinions .
For  example:
The Chinese Civil War was a  सिविल युद्ध in चीन लड़ा between शक्तियां वफ़ादार to the सरकारी of the गणतंत्र of चीन led by the kuomintang ( kmt ) और शक्तियां  of the Communist Party of China ( CPC ) .
The war began in April  1927 , amidst the उत्तरी expedition , और essentially  ended when major active battles ceased in 1950 .
The conflict eventually resulted in two de facto states , the Republic of China ( ROC ) in Taiwan and  the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन ( पीआरसी ) in मेनलैंड चीन , दोनो claiming to be the legitimate सरकारी of  China .
The war represented an  वैचारिक विभाजित ( बाएँ vs . सही ) between the कम्युनिस्ट cpc , और the  KMT 's brand of Nationalism .
The civil war continued intermittently until late 1937 , when the two parties formed a  दूसरी संयुक्त सामने to काउंटर a जापानी आक्रमण .
China 's  full-scale सिविल युद्ध resumed in 1946 , a साल बाद  the end of hostilities with Japan .
After four more years , 1950 saw  the cessation of प्रमुख सैन्य hostilities—with the newly संस्थापित लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन controlling मेनलैंड चीन ( सहित हाइनान ) , और the गणतंत्र of चीन 's क्षेत्राधिकार  being restricted to Taiwan , Penghu , Quemoy , Matsu and several outlying islands .
The Kuomintang defeat is attributed to several  कारकों : भ्रष्टाचार - च्यांग लिखा in उसके डायरी on जून 1948 कि the kmt था विफल , नहीं क्युकी of बाह्य  enemies but because of rot from within .
Strong initial  support इससे the u.S. diminished , और तब  , stopped .
( Partly because of KMT  भ्रष्टाचार और anti-democratic शासन , और partly क्युकी of the अनिश्चित u.S. विदेशी नीति towards साम्यवादी between 1945 और 1950 ) ; कम्युनिस्ट जमीन  reform policy promised poor peasants farmland from their landlords .
This  ensured pla लोकप्रिय  support .
After the surrender of Japan at the end of World War II , Soviet forces  turned over उनके captured जापानी हथियार to the cpc और अनुमत the cpc to लो कंट्रोल of territory  in Manchuria .
To this day , no armistice or peace treaty has ever been signed ,  और it is debated as to the whether the सिविल युद्ध रै legally ended  .
Cross-Strait relations have been hindered by military threats and political  और आर्थिक दबाव , विशेषकर over ताईवान 's राजनैतिक औकात , साथ दोनो सरकारें officially  adhering to a `` One-China policy . ''
The PRC still actively claims Taiwan as part of its territory  और continues to threaten the आरओसी साथ a सैन्य आक्रमण if the आरओसी officially declares स्वतंत्रता by बदलना इसके नाम to और  gaining international recognition as the Republic of Taiwan .
The ROC mutually claims mainland China , and  वे दोनो continue the लड़ो over राजनयिक  recognition .
Today , the  युद्ध as ऐसे occurs on the राजनैतिक और आर्थिक fronts in the रूप of cross-strait संबंध ; however , the दो पृथक de facto  states have close economic ties .
The One Hundred Twelfth United States Congress was the  बैठक of the विधान शाखा of the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय सरकारी , इससे जनवरी 3 , 2011 जबतक जनवरी  3 , 2013 .
It convened in Washington , D.C. on January  3 , 2011 , और ended on जनवरी 3 , 2013 , 17 दिनों पहले  the end of the presidential term to which Barack Obama was elected in 2008 .
सीनेटरों निर्वाचित to नियमित शर्तें in 2006  completed those terms in this Congress .
This  कॉंग्रेस शामिल the पिछला हाउस of प्रतिनिधि निर्वाचित इससे congressional जिले  that were apportioned based on the 2000 census .
In the 2010 midterm elections , the Republican Party won the majority  in the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि .
While the Democrats kept their  सीनेट बहुमत , it थी घटाया इससे the पिछला  Congress .
This was the first Congress in which the  हाउस और सीनेट यहूद नियंत्रित by अलग पार्टियों चूंकि the 107th कॉंग्रेस ( 2001–2003 ) , और the पहला कॉंग्रेस to शुरू  that way since the 99th Congress ( 1985–1987 ) .
In  इस कॉंग्रेस , the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि था the largest क्रमांक of रिपब्लिकन  members , 242 , since the 80th Congress ( 1947–1949 ) .
It was also the first Congress since 1947 in which no  सदस्य of the कैनेडी परिवार परोसा , as खूब as the सबसे नीतियां polarized कॉंग्रेस चूंकि  Reconstruction , with record low approval ratings .
Wealth in the United  राज्य is commonly measured in शर्तें of जाल लायक , जिससे is the योग of सब एसेट  , including home equity , minus all liabilities .
the कुल जाल लायक of us households और nonprofit संगठन 1945–2009 , unadjusted  for inflation or population change .
For example , a household in possession of an $ 800,000 house , $ 5,000 in mutual funds , $ 30,000 in cars , $  20,000 लायक of भण्डार in उनके अपना कम्पनी , और a $ 45,000 ira होता  have assets totaling $ 900,000 .
Assuming that this household would have a $  250,000 बंधक , $ 40,000 in car लोन , और $ 10,000 in क्रेडिट कार्ड कर्ज़ , इसके debts  would total $ 300,000 .
Subtracting the debts  इससे the लायक of इस household 's एसेट ( 900,000 - $ 300,000 = $ 600,000 ) , इस household होता have  a net worth of $ 600,000 .
Net worth can vary with fluctuations  in मान of the underlying एसेट  .
The wealth —more specifically , the  मध्य जाल worth—of households in the संयुक्त राज्य is varied साथ संबंध to रेस , शिक्षा , भौगोलिक  location and gender .
As one would expect , households  साथ वृहद आय विशेषता the उच्चतम जाल worths , हालांकि ऊँची आय  can not be taken as an always accurate indicator of net worth .
Overall the number of wealthier households  is on the वृद्धि , साथ baby boomers hitting  the highs of their careers .
In addition , wealth is unevenly  वितरित , साथ the wealthiest 25 % of us households owning 87 % of the माल in the संयुक्त राज्य  , which was $ 54.2 trillion in 2009 .
Including human capital such as  कौशल , the संयुक्त राष्ट्र अनुमानित the कुल माल of the संयुक्त राज्य in 2008  to be $ 118 trillion .
This article deals with Selective  पृष्ठीय rhizotomy ( sdr ) बल्कि than the rhizotomy प्रक्रियाओं लिये पीड़ा राहत ; लिये those प्रक्रियाओं , जिससे have begun to लो the नाम `` rhizotomy  '' in certain instances , see facet rhizotomy and similar .
A rhizotomy ( ) is a term chiefly referring to a neurosurgical procedure that selectively destroys problematic nerve roots in the spinal cord , most often to relieve the symptoms  of neuromuscular शर्तें ऐसे as spastic diplegia और अन्य फ़ॉर्म of spastic  cerebral palsy .
The  चयनात्मक पृष्ठीय rhizotomy ( sdr ) लिये spastic दिमागी palsy रै महरूम the प्रमुख उपयोग of rhizotomy लिये neurosurgeons specialising  in spastic CP since the 1980s ; in this surgery , the spasticity-causing nerves are isolated and then targeted and destroyed .
The sensory  तंत्रिका जड़ें , जहाँ spasticity is स्तिथ , हैं पहला अलग इससे the मोटर ones , और the तंत्रिका मछली  to be cut are then identified via electromyographic stimulation .
The ones producing  spasticity हैं तब selectively lesioned साथ छोटा विद्युत pulses  .
In  spasticity , rhizotomy precisely लक्ष्य और नष्ट the क्षतिग्रस्त nerves कि don’t  receive gamma amino butyric acid , which is the core problem for people with spastic cerebral palsy .
These over-firing , non-GABA-absorbing nerves generate unusual electrical activity  दौरान the emg परीक्षण phase in sdr और हैं यूँ माना to be the सोर्स of the रोगी 's hypertonia ; वे हैं eliminated साथ the विद्युत pulses एकबार पहचाना , जबकि  the remaining nerves and nerve routes carrying the correct messages remain fully intact and untouched .
This means that the spasticity is permanently dissolved , and that this is done without affecting nervous system  संवेदनशीलता or फलन in अन्य क्षेत्रों , क्युकी the तभी nerves नष्ट हैं the over-firing ones जिम्मेदार लिये the मांसपेशी tightness .
The terms rhizotomy and neurotomy are also increasingly  बनने interchangeable in the उपचार of दीर्घकालिक वापस पीड़ा इससे अपक्षयी डिस्क बीमारी  .
This is a procedure called a facet rhizotomy and is not a surgical procedure but is instead done on an  outpatient आधार using a सरल जांच to लागू radiofrequency लहरें to the impinged pain-causing तंत्रिका रूट lying between the facet संयुक्त  and the vertebral body .
Such radio  आवृत्ति तंत्रिका lesioning परिणाम in पाँच to आठ or अधिक महीने of पीड़ा राहत पहले the तंत्रिका regenerates और another  round of the procedure needs to be performed .
A facet rhizotomy is just one of many different forms of radiofrequency ablation , and its use of  the `` rhizotomy '' नाम चाहिए नहीं be उलझन साथ  the SDR procedure .
Migrant  मजदूर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया , 1935
The term migrant worker has  अलग आधिकारिक meanings और connotations in अलग  parts of the world .
The United  राष्ट्र ' परिभाषा is व्यापक , सहित कोई लोगों working बाहर of  their home country .
The term can also be used to describe someone  जो migrates भीतर a देश , संभवतः उनके अपना , in अनुक्रम to pursue कार्य ऐसे as मौसमी  work .
Photograph of Lil Wayne  साथ teardrop टैटू नीचे उसके आँखें  .
The teardrop  टैटू or आंसू टैटू is a सांकेतिक टैटू कि  is placed underneath the eye .
It  रै no फिक्स्ड अर्थ लकिन लगभग सब meanings ( देखिए नीचे ) have  some connection to prison .
U.S.  रूट 75 is a north–south u.S. राजमार्ग  .
The highway 's northern terminus  is in kittson काउंटी , मिनेसोटा , at the कनाडाई किनारा , जहाँ it एकबार जारी as मनिटोबा राजमार्ग 75 on the अन्य  side of the now-closed border crossing .
Its southern  टर्मिनस is at अंतरराज्यीय 30 और अंतरराज्यीय 45 in डलास , टेक्सास , जहाँ it is ज्ञात  as North Central Expressway .
U.S. 75 was a border-to-border route ,  इससे कनाडा to the गल्फ of मैक्सिको at galveston , टेक्सास .
However , the entire segment south of Dallas , Texas has been decommissioned in favor of Interstate 45 , a cutoff section of  town-to-town सतह सड़क having become  State Highway 75 .
Lower Ninth Ward  is a पड़ोस of the नगर of नई ऑरलियन्स  .
As the name implies , it  is भाग of the नवीं वार्ड of नई  Orleans .
The Lower Ninth  वार्ड is प्रायः विचार of as the संपूर्ण क्षेत्रफल भीतर नई ऑरलियन्स downriver of the औद्योगिक कनाल ; however , the नगर नियोजन  Commission divides this area into the Lower Ninth Ward ( 2 ) and Holy Cross ( 3 ) neighborhoods .
The  पद `` निम्नतर '' refers to इसके स्थान दूर towards the मुँह of the मिसिसिपी नदी , ``  down '' or `` below '' the rest of the city in local geographic terminology .
But  the 9th वार्ड , जैसे सब wards  in New Orleans , is a voting district .
The 9th Ward was  added as a मतदान ज़िला in  1852 .
The `` lower ''  9th वार्ड is रचित of वार्ड 9 जिले 1 , 2 , 4 , और 7 जिससे मेक up the पावन क्रॉस क्षेत्रफल  and Ward 9 Districts 3 , 5 , 6 , and 8 .
Higher voting district numbers  in the 9th वार्ड ( 8-27 ) हैं on the upriver पक्ष of the औद्योगिक  Canal .
The area came to national  ध्यान लिये इसके devastation in the aftermath  of Hurricane Katrina in 2005 .
Hubble views of  कोपरनिकस crater ( इनसेट ) , जिससे is परिचय 58 मील (  93 km ) wide
Red and orange tinted  चंद्रमा , as देखी इससे धरती दौरान a चंद्र ग्रहण , जहाँ  the Earth comes between the Moon and Sun
The Moon is the only natural  उपग्रह of the धरती , और the पांचवां largest  satellite in the Solar System .
It is the largest natural satellite of a planet in the Solar System relative to the size of  इसके प्राथमिक , having 27 % the व्यास और 60 % the घनत्व of धरती , resulting in इसके द्रव्यमान  .
The Moon is the  दूसरी densest उपग्रह बाद io , a उपग्रह  of Jupiter .
The Moon is in synchronous rotation with Earth , always showing the same face with its near side  चिह्नित by अंधेरा volcanic मरिया कि भरण between the उज्जवल प्राचीन crustal हाइलैंड्स और the prominent प्रभाव craters .
It is the brightest object in the sky after the  सूर्य , हालांकि इसके सतह is दरअसल बहुत अंधेरा , साथ a reflectance  similar to that of coal .
Its prominence in the sky and its regular cycle of phases  have , चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स , बना the चंद्रमा an महत्वपूर्ण सांस्कृतिक influence on भाषा , पंचांग , आर्ट और mythology  .
The  चंद्रमा 's गुरुत्वाकर्षक influence produces the समंदर tides  and the minute lengthening of the day .
The Moon 's current orbital distance , about thirty times the diameter of the Earth , causes it to appear almost the same  आकार in the आसमान as the सूर्य , allowing it to कवर the सूर्य nearly precisely in कुल सौर eclipses  .
This matching of  apparent विज़ुअल आकार is a  coincidence .
the चंद्रमा 's रैखिक अलहदा इससे the धरती is फिलहाल increasing at a  rate of 3.82±0.07cm per year , but this rate is not constant .
The Moon is thought to have  formed nearly 4.5 अरब सालो पहले , नहीं long बाद the धरती  .
Although there have been  अनेक hypotheses लिये इसके उत्पत्ति in the पास्ट , the वर्तमान सबसे widely स्वीकृत स्पष्टीकरण is कि the चंद्रमा formed इससे the  debris left over after a giant impact between Earth and a Mars -sized body .
The Moon is the only  celestial देह अन्य than धरती on जिससे इंसानो have नियत  foot .
The Soviet Union 's Luna programme was the first to reach the Moon with unmanned spacecraft in 1959 ; the United States ' NASA Apollo  कार्यक्रम हासिल the तभी मानवयुक्त मिशन to तिथि , शुरूआत साथ the पहला मानवयुक्त चंद्र orbiting मिशन by अपोलो 8 in 1968 , और छह मानवयुक्त चंद्र अवतरण between 1969 और 1972 , साथ the  first being Apollo 11 .
These missions returned over 380 kg of lunar rocks , which have been used to develop a geological  समझना of the चंद्रमा 's origins , the गठन of इसके आतंरिक ढांचा , और इसके subsequent इतिहास  .
After the Apollo 17 mission  in 1972 , the चंद्रमा रै महरूम visited तभी by unmanned spacecraft , notably by  the final Soviet Lunokhod rover .
Since 2004 ,  जापानी , चीन , इण्डिया , the संयुक्त राज्य , और the यूरोपीय  Space Agency have each sent lunar orbiters .
ये spacecraft have contributed to confirming the डिस्कवरी of चंद्र जल  ice in permanently shadowed craters at the poles and bound into the lunar regolith .
Future manned missions to the Moon have been planned , including  सरकारी as खूब as privately वित्तपोषित प्रयत्न  .
The  चंद्रमा remains , अंतर्गत the बाहरी स्पेस सन्धि , फ़्री to सब राष्ट्र to explore  for peaceful purposes .
Ronald Wilson Reagan ( ; February 6 , 1911 – June 5 , 2004 ) was the  40th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1981–1989 ) .
Prior  to कि , he थी the 33rd राज्यपाल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया ( 1967–1975  ) , and a radio , film and television actor .
Born in Tampico ,  इलिनोइस , और उठाया in डिक्सन , reagan थी शिक्षित at यूरेका कॉलेज ,  earning a Bachelor of Arts degree in economics and sociology .
After graduating , Reagan moved first to Iowa to work as a radio  प्रसारणकर्ता और तब , in 1937 , to लॉस एंजिल्स जहाँ he began a करियर as an कर्ता ,  first in films and later television .
Some of his most notable films  शामिल knute rockne , सब अमरीकी ( 1940 ) , किंग्स पंक्ति ( 1942 ) , और bedtime लिये bonzo ( 1951 )  .
Reagan served as  अध्यक्ष of the स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड और बाद as a प्रवक्ता लिये सामान्य इलेक्ट्रिक ( ge ) ; उसके प्रारंभ in राजनीती  occurred during his work for GE .
Originally a member of the  लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी , उसके स्थितियाँ began shifting rightward in the 1950s , और he switched  to the Republican Party in 1962 .
After delivering a rousing speech in support of Barry Goldwater 's presidential candidacy in 1964 , he was  persuaded to तलाश the कैलिफ़ोर्निया governorship , जीतना दो सालो बाद और  again in 1970 .
He was defeated in his run for the  रिपब्लिकन अध्यक्षीय नामांकन in 1968 और in 1976 , लकिन जीती दोनो the नामांकन और सामान्य चुनाव in 1980  , defeating incumbent Jimmy Carter .
as अध्यक्ष , reagan implemented sweeping  new political and economic initiatives .
His  supply-side आर्थिक नीतियों , उतावले `` reaganomics `` , advocated reducing कर दरों to spur आर्थिक विकास , controlling  the money supply to reduce inflation , deregulation of the economy , and reducing government spending .
In his first term he  बच an हत्या attempt , took a मुश्किल लकीर  against labor unions , announced a new War on Drugs , and ordered an invasion of Grenada .
He was  re-elected in a भूस्खलन in 1984 , proclaiming कि it थी `` morning  in America `` .
His second term was primarily  चिह्नित by विदेशी matters , ऐसे as the समाप्ति of the ठंडा युद्ध , the 1986 bombing of लीबिया , और  the revelation of the Iran-Contra affair .
Publicly describing the Soviet Union as an `` evil  साम्राज्य `` , he समर्थित anti-communist आंदोलनों विश्वव्यापी और खर्च उसके पहला पद forgoing the रणनीति of détente  by ordering a massive military buildup in an arms race with the USSR .
Reagan negotiated with  सोवियत सामान्य सचिव मिखाइल गोर्बाचेव , culminating in the inf सन्धि और the घटी  of both countries ' nuclear arsenals .
reagan बाएँ दफ्तर in  1989 .
In 1994  , the पूर्व अध्यक्ष disclosed कि he था महरूम diagnosed साथ अल्जाइमर 's  disease earlier in the year ; he died ten years later at the age of 93 .
A conservative icon , he ranks highly in public opinion polls of  u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों और is credited लिये generating an वैचारिक पुनर्जागरण on the अमरीकी राजनैतिक सही .
पूरा नियत of scrolls , constituting  the entire Tanakh .
the tanakh ( , or ; भी tenakh , tenak , tanach  ) is a name used in Judaism for the canon of the Hebrew Bible .
The Tanakh  is भी ज्ञात as the masoretic टेक्स्ट  or the Miqra .
The name is an acronym formed from the initial Hebrew  अक्षर of the masoretic टेक्स्ट 's तीन परंपरागत subdivisions : the तोरा ( `` शिक्षण '' , भी ज्ञात as the पाँच किताबे of  Moses ) , Nevi'im ( `` Prophets '' ) and Ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh .
The name `` Miqra '' ( מקרא ) , meaning `` that  जिससे is पढ़ा '' , is an वैकल्पिक यहूदी पद लिये the  Tanakh .
The books of the Tanakh were relayed with an  accompanying मौखिक परंपरा passed on by  each generation , called the Oral Torah .
the कावासाकी निंजा zx-6r is a कावासाकी  600 cc class sport motorcycle .
It was introduced in 1995 , and has  महरूम constantly अद्यतनीकृत throughout the सालो in जवाब to नई उत्पाद इससे होंडा ,  Suzuki , and Yamaha .
The ZX  श्रेणी is कया थी ज्ञात as the निंजा लकीर of कावासाकी मोटरसाइकिल in the  1980s and still carries the name today .
Assassination attempts and plots on  राष्ट्रपतियों of the संयुक्त राज्य have महरूम numerous : अधिक than 20 कोशिशें to मार बैठे और पूर्व राष्ट्रपतियों  , as well as the Presidents-elect , are known .
Four sitting presidents have been killed : Abraham Lincoln ( the 16th President ) , James A. Garfield ( the 20th  अध्यक्ष ) , विलियम mckinley ( the 25th अध्यक्ष ) और जॉन F. कैनेडी ( the 35th  President ) .
Two presidents were injured in attempted assassinations : former  अध्यक्ष थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट ( the 26th अध्यक्ष ) , और अध्यक्ष रोनाल्ड reagan  ( the 40th President ) .
Although the historian J.W . Clarke has suggested that  सबसे अमरीकी assassinations यहूद नीतियां प्रेरित क्रियाएँ ,  carried out by rational men , not all such attacks have been undertaken for political reasons .
Some  हमलावर था questionable दिमागी स्थिरता , और  a few were judged legally insane .
Since the Vice President of the United States has for more than a century been elected from the same  राजनैतिक पार्टी as the अध्यक्ष , the हत्या of the अध्यक्ष is असंभावित to परिणाम in प्रमुख  policy changes .
This may explain why  राजनैतिक समूह typically do नहीं मेक ऐसे हमले  .
Where the Red Fern Grows is a novel written by Wilson Rawls  in 1961 परिचय a लड़के जो खरीदता और रेल दो redbone coonhound शिकार कुत्तो  .
Oklahoma ( ) ( Pawnee : Uukuhuúwa , Cayuga :  gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a राज्य स्तिथ in वेस्ट दक्षिण सेंट्रल संयुक्त  States .
Oklahoma  is the 20th सबसे extensive और the 28th सबसे  populous of the 50 United States .
The state 's name is derived from the Choctaw words okla and  humma , अर्थ `` रेड लोगों '' , और it is ज्ञात informally by इसके उपनाम  , The Sooner State .
Formed by the combination of Oklahoma  territory और भारतीय territory on नवम्बर 16 , 1907 , ओक्लाहोमा  was the 46th state to enter the union .
Its  निवासियों हैं ज्ञात as oklahomans or , informally `` okies '' , और इसके पूंजी  and largest city is Oklahoma City .
A major producer of natural gas , oil , and agriculture ,  ओक्लाहोमा relies on an आर्थिक आधार of विमानन , उर्जा , दूरसंचार , और जैवप्रौद्योगिकी  .
It has one of the fastest  growing economies in the स्वदेश , रैंकिंग among the शीर्ष राज्य in प्रति capita आय विकास और सकल  domestic product growth .
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's primary economic anchors , with  nearly दो तिहाई of oklahomans जीना भीतर उनके महानगर सांख्यिकीय  areas .
With small mountain ranges , prairie , mesas , and eastern forests , most of Oklahoma lies in the Great Plains  और the u.s . आंतरिक हाइलैंड्स —a प्रदेश विशेषकर prone to कठोर मौसम  .
In addition to having a prevalence of English , German ,  स्कॉटिश , आयरिश और देशी अमरीकी ancestry , अधिक than 25 देशी अमरीकी भाषाएं हैं बोला in ओक्लाहोमा  , second only to California .
Oklahoma is located on a confluence of three major American  सांस्कृतिक regions और historically परोसा as a रूट लिये चौपायों ड्राइव , a गंतव्य लिये दक्षिणी settlers , और a government-sanctioned  territory for Native Americans .
Redwall , by Brian  ज़ाक , is a श्रेणी of children 's काल्पनिक  novels .
It is the title of the first book of the series , published in 1986 , as well as the name of the Abbey  प्रदर्शित in the किताब और the नाम of an एनिमेटेड tv श्रेणी आधारित on तीन of the novels  ( Redwall , Mattimeo , and Martin the Warrior ) , which first aired in 1999 .
The  किताबे हैं primarily aimed at पुरानी  children , but have fans of all ages .
वहीँ have महरूम twenty-two novels और दो  picture books published .
The twenty-second , and final  , अनोखा , the दुष्ट क्रू , थी मरणोपरांत released  on May 3 , 2011 .
प्राकृतिक गैस is प्रायः measured by आवाज़ in the संयुक्त राज्य  and is stated in cubic feet .
A cubic foot of gas is the amount of gas  needed to भरण a आवाज़ of एक घन पैर अंतर्गत नियत शर्तें of दबाव और temperature.to माप larger  amounts of natural gas , a `` therm '' is used to denote 100 cubic feet , and `` mcf '' is used to denote 1,000 cubic feet .
To provide greater accuracy in  comparing fuels , उर्जा सामग्री is measured in शर्तें of `` अंग्रेजों थर्मल इकाई  ( BTU 's ) . ''
A BTU is the amount of heat required to raise one pound of water (  लगभग a pint ) , एक उपाधि फ़ारेनहाइट at or बंद to इसके पाइंट of अधिकतम  density .
One  अंग्रेजों therm ( प्रतीक thm ) is a non- si ईकाई of ऊष्मा उर्जा बराबर  to 100,000 British thermal units ( BTU ) .
It is approximately the energy  समतुल्य of burning 100 घन फीट ( प्रायः  referred to as 1 CCF ) of natural gas .
Since ( Natural Gas )  मीटर माप आवाज़ और नहीं उर्जा सामग्री , a therm फ़ैक्टर is प्रयुक्त by ( प्राकृतिक ) गैस कंपनियाँ  to convert the volume of gas used to its heat equivalent , and thus calculate the actual energy use .
The therm  फ़ैक्टर is प्रायः in the इकाई therms/ccf  .
It will  vary साथ the मिक्सर of hydrocarbons  in the natural gas .
प्राकृतिक गैस साथ a उच्चतर than औसत विशेषज्ञता of इथेन ,  propane or butane will have a higher therm factor .
Impurities , such as carbon dioxide or  नाइट्रोजन , निम्नतर the therm फ़ैक्टर  .
The volume  of the गैस is गणना as if measured at मानक  temperature and pressure ( STP ) .
The heat content of natural gas is solely dependent on the  संयोजन of the गैस , और is स्वतंत्र of तापमान और दबाव  .
One therm is  बराबर to परिचय 105.5 megajoules , 25,200 kilocalories or 29.3 kilowatt-hours  .
One  therm can भी be provided by परिचय of  natural gas .
The  therm sometimes रै महरूम उलझन साथ the thermie  ( see below ) .
The  names of दोनो इकाई आइये इससे  the Greek word for heat .
A thermie ( th ) is a metric unit of heat  उर्जा , भाग of the meter-tonne-second प्रणाली sometimes प्रयुक्त by यूरोपीय  engineers .
The thermie is equal to the amount  of उर्जा जरूरी to उठाएँ the तापमान of 1 टन of जल by 1 °c .
the thermie is समतुल्य to 1,000 kilocalories , 4.1868 megajoules  or 3968.3 BTU .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a civil war  लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी  slave states that declared their secession and formed the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The  युद्ध था इसके उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of गुलामी , विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन  of slavery into the western territories .
Foreign powers  किया नहीं intervene .
After four years of bloody combat  कि बाएँ over 600,000 सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना , the confederacy collapsed , गुलामी थी abolished , और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल एकता और guaranteeing अधिकारों  to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860  अध्यक्षीय चुनाव , republicans , led by अब्राहम lincoln , opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त  States ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before his inauguration on  कूच 4 , 1861 , सात cotton-based स्लेव राज्य formed the  Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic  अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत  secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural  पता घोषित उसके प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate  civil war .
Eight remaining slave  राज्य जारी to अस्वीकृत काल्स लिये  secession .
Confederate forces seized  numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the  Confederacy .
A Peace Conference failed to find a  सुलह , और दोनो पहलू prepared लिये युद्ध .
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King  कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना  the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April  12 , 1861 , जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon  Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort ;  नतीजतन , चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the confederacy , bringing उनके कुल  to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the border states and  स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the दक्षिणी अर्थव्यवस्था  .
The  पूर्वी थिएटर थी inconclusive  in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate campaign into Maryland ( a Union  राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल of antietam , dissuading  British intervention .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation  उदघोषणा , जिससे बना समाप्ति  slavery a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy , then much of  उनके पश्चिमी सेना , और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in दो at  the Mississippi River .
in 1863 , रॉबर्ट E. ली 's confederate incursion उत्तर  ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
Western  सफलताओं led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब संघ सेना  in 1864 .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman  drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the समुद्र , destroying confederate अवसंरचना साथ the  way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the Confederacy from all directions , and could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland  अभियान towards रिचमंड , the confederate पूंजी .
The defending Confederate  फौज विफल , अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट  at Appomattox Court House on April 9 , 1865 .
The  अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध थी एक of the earliest सच्चा  industrial wars .
railroads , the टेलीग्राफ , steamships , और mass-produced  weapons were employed extensively .
The mobilization of civilian factories , mines ,  shipyards , बैंको , परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed संसार  War I .
It remains the deadliest war in American history , resulting in the  मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined  number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten percent of all  उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा , और 30 प्रतिशत of सब दक्षिणी श्वेत males aged  18–40 .
विलियम ब्रूस जेनर ( born अक्तूबर 28 , 1949 ) is a पूर्व u.S. track और फ़ील्ड खिलाड़ी , प्रेरक स्पीकर  , socialite , television personality and businessman .
He won the gold medal for  decathlon in the मॉन्ट्रियल 1976 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक .
following उसके ओलम्पिक जीत और the सम्बन्धित मान्यता , he शादीशुदा क्रिस  Kardashian , and his professional career evolved into being a television celebrity .
By 1981 , he had starred in  अनेक made-for-tv फिल्मों और थी erik एस्ट्राडा 's बदलना on the शीर्ष  rated TV series CHiPs .
He has six children :  बर्ट , केसी , ब्रैंडन , ब्रोडी , केंडल  and Kylie .
Since his 1991  विवाह to क्रिस जेनर , he is the stepfather to कोर्टनी , किम  , Khloe and Rob Kardashian .
चूंकि 2007 , he रै appeared साथ  his blended family on Keeping Up with the Kardashians .
Escherichia coli ( ; commonly abbreviated E. coli ) is a  gram-negative , rod-shaped bacterium कि is commonly  found in the lower intestine of warm-blooded organisms ( endotherms ) .
Most E. coli  strains हैं हानिरहित , लकिन कुछ serotypes can कारण गंभीर खाना विषाक्तता in इंसानो ,  and are occasionally responsible for product recalls due to food contamination .
The harmless strains are part of the  सामान्य फ्लोरा of the आंत , और can लाभ उनके होस्ट by producing विटामिन k2 , और by preventing the  establishment of pathogenic bacteria within the intestine .
E. coli and related bacteria  constitute परिचय 0.1 % of आंत फ्लोरा , और fecal–oral हस्तांतरण is the प्रमुख रूट through जिससे रोगजनक strains of the  bacterium cause disease .
Cells are able to survive  बाहर the देह लिये a सीमित राशि of समय , जिससे makes उन्हें आदर्श indicator जीवों to परीक्षण पर्यावरणीय  samples for fecal contamination .
There is ,  however , a growing देह of शोध कि रै examined environmentally persistent E. कोलाई जिससे can जीवित लिये  extended periods outside of the host .
The bacterium can also be grown easily and  inexpensively in a प्रयोगशाला सेटिंग , और रै महरूम intensively investigated लिये  over 60 years .
E. coli is the  सबसे widely पढ़ाई prokaryotic मॉडल सजीव , और an महत्वपूर्ण प्रजाति in the फ़ील्ड of जैवप्रौद्योगिकी और सूक्ष्मजैविकी  , where it has served as the host organism for the majority of work with recombinant DNA .
Area code 217 is the North American  टेलीफोन क्षेत्रफल कोड लिये much of पश्चिमी और सेंट्रल इलिनोइस  .
The 217 area  शामिल इलिनोइस ' पूंजी , springfield , प्लस champaign , urbana  , Decatur , Danville , Quincy , and Rantoul .
217 was one of the  असली क्षेत्रफल कोड , जिससे यहूद निर्मित  in 1947 .
The only significant change  in 217 's सीमाएँ थी in 1957 , जब इसके उत्तरी portion थी संयुक्त साथ  part of area code 815 to form area code 309 .
Image of  the largest अंटार्कटिक ओज़ोन छेद कभी अंकित  ( September 2006 ) , over the Southern pole
परतों of the माहौल ( नहीं  to scale )
Ozone depletion describes two distinct but related phenomena observed since the late  1970s : a स्थिर मनाही of परिचय 4 % प्रति दशक in the कुल आवाज़ of ओज़ोन in धरती 's stratosphere ( the ओज़ोन परत ) , और a much larger springtime घटी in stratospheric ओज़ोन  over Earth 's polar regions .
the latter घटना is referred  to as the ozone hole .
In addition to these  well-known stratospheric phenomena , वहीँ हैं भी springtime ध्रुवीय tropospheric  ozone depletion events .
The details of polar ozone hole  गठन differ इससे कि of mid-latitude thinning , लकिन the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण प्रक्रम in दोनो is catalytic विनाश  of ozone by atomic halogens .
The main source of  ये हैलोजन अणु in the stratosphere is photodissociation of man-made halocarbon refrigerants (  CFCs , freons , halons ) .
These  यौगिकों हैं transported into the stratosphere  after being emitted at the surface .
Both types of ozone depletion were observed to increase as  emissions of halo-carbons increased .
CFCs and other contributory  substances हैं referred to as ozone-depleting  substances ( ODS ) .
Since the ozone layer prevents most harmful UVB wavelengths ( 280–315 nm ) of ultraviolet light ( UV light ) from passing through the Earth 's atmosphere , observed and  प्रक्षिप्त decreases in ओज़ोन have उत्पन्न विश्वव्यापी चिंता अग्रणी to अपनाना of the मॉन्ट्रियल प्रोटोकॉल कि bans the उत्पादन  of CFCs , halons , and other ozone-depleting chemicals such as carbon tetrachloride and trichloroethane .
It is suspected  कि a किस्में of biological consequences ऐसे as increases in स्किन कर्कट , cataracts , क्षति to पौधे , और कटौती of  plankton populations in the ocean 's photic zone may result from the increased UV exposure due to ozone depletion .
The Preamble to the United  राज्य संविधान is a ब्रैड परिचयात्मक बयान of the  Constitution 's fundamental purposes and guiding principles .
It states in general terms , and courts have referred to it as reliable evidence of , the Founding Fathers '  इरादों regarding the संविधान 's अर्थ और कया वे hoped the संविधान होता achieve as it pertains to सब of the लोगों of the संयुक्त राज्य  .
As the phrase , `` we the people '' suggests that the new government originates from the people of the United States and it  सेट into गति a सवाल as it pertains to कि विशाल जनसांख्यिकी concerning the व्यक्तिगत अधिकारों और समता among सब लोगों ; इस can be देखी सबसे broadly in the divide between republicanism और सोशल  democracy .
czechoslovakian शॉट putter plihan at the 1957 ईस्ट जर्मनी अंदर  Athletics Championships
The shot put ( pronounced ) is a track and field event involving  `` फेंकना '' / '' putting '' ( फेंकना in a pushing गति ) a भारी गोलाकार ऑब्जेक्ट  —the shot—as far as possible .
The shot put  प्रतियोगिता लिये मेन रै महरूम a भाग of the आधुनिक ओलंपिक चूंकि उनके  revival in 1896 , women 's competition began in 1948 .
Map of  the संयुक्त राष्ट्र ( un ) सदस्य राज्य , साथ उनके territories ( सहित निर्भर territories ) पहचाना  by the UN in blue
There are  संयुक्त राष्ट्र ( un ) सदस्य राज्य , और प्रत्येक of  them is a member of the United Nations General Assembly .
The  मापदण्ड लिये प्रवेश of नई सदस्यों हैं नियत आउट in the संयुक्त राष्ट्र  Charter , Chapter II , Article 4:
A recommendation for admission from the Security Council requires  affirmative मत इससे at तनिक नौ of the परिषद 's पंद्रह  members , with none of the five permanent members voting against .
The  सुरक्षा परिषद 's अनुशंसा जरूर तब be subsequently स्वीकृत  in the General Assembly by a two-thirds majority vote .
In principle , only sovereign states can  become un सदस्यों , और फिलहाल सब un सदस्यों हैं sovereign राज्य ( हालांकि  a few members were not sovereign when they joined the UN ) .
Because a state can only be admitted to the UN by the approval of the Security Council and the  सामान्य सभा , a क्रमांक of राज्य कि may be माना sovereign राज्य according to the montevideo सम्मेलन  criteria are not members because the UN does not consider them to possess sovereignty , mainly due to the lack of international recognition or opposition from certain members .
In addition to the member states , the UN also invites non-member states ( currently two : the Holy See and Palestine ) , intergovernmental organizations , and other  अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन और entities जिनकी statehood or प्रभुता हैं नहीं precisely पारिभाषित , to become observers at the सामान्य सभा , allowing उन्हें to participate और बोलो , लकिन नहीं  vote , in General Assembly meetings .
The Eiffel Tower ( , ) is an iron  जाली मीनार स्तिथ on the champ de मंगल in पेरिस , नामित बाद the इंजीनियर gustave  Eiffel , whose company designed and built the tower .
Erected in 1889 as the entrance arch to the 1889 World  's मेला , it रै become दोनो a वैश्विक सांस्कृतिक प्रतीक of फ़्रांस और एक of the सबसे recognizable structures in the संसार  .
The  मीनार is the tallest ढांचा in पेरिस और the most-visited सशुल्क स्मारक in the  world ; 7.1 million people ascended it in 2011 .
The third level  वेधशाला 's अपर मंच is at the उच्चतम accessible to पब्लिक in the यूरोपीय संघ और the उच्चतम in यूरोपीय  as long as the platform of the Ostankino Tower , at , remains closed as a result of the fire of August 2000 .
The tower  प्राप्त इसके 250 millionth  visitor in 2010 .
The tower stands tall , about  the वही ऊँचाई as an 81-storey  building .
During its construction , the Eiffel Tower surpassed the Washington  स्मारक to assume the शीर्षक of the tallest man-made ढांचा in the संसार , a शीर्षक it आयोजित लिये  41 years , until the Chrysler Building in New York City was built in 1930 .
Because of the  जोड , in 1957 , of the एंटीना atop the एफिल मीनार , it is अभी taller than the  Chrysler Building .
Not including  ब्रॉडकास्ट एन्टेना , it is the second-tallest ढांचा in फ़्रांस , बाद the millau viaduct  .
the मीनार रै तीन स्तर लिये विज़िटर  .
Tickets can be purchased to ascend , by stairs or lift (  लिफ्ट ) , to the पहला और दूसरी स्तर  .
The walk from ground level to the first level is over 300 steps ,  as is the चलना इससे the पहला to the दूसरी स्तर  .
The third and highest level is accessible only by  lift—stairs do मौजूद लकिन हैं प्रायः बंद  to the public .
the पहला और दूसरी स्तर have  restaurants .
The tower has  become the सबसे prominent प्रतीक of दोनो पेरिस और फ़्रांस , प्रायः in the establishing शॉट of films नियत  in the city .
Kenneth Wayne `` Ken  '' जेनिंग्स iii ( born may 23 , 1974 ) is an अमरीकी खेल दिखाएँ प्रतियोगी  and author .
Jennings is noted  लिये पकड़कर the रिकार्ड लिये the longest जीतना streak on  the U.S. syndicated game show Jeopardy !
and as  होने the all-time अग्रणी  money winner on American game shows .
In 2004 , Jennings won  74 jeopardy  !
games before  he थी पराजित by चैलेंजर नैंसी zerg  on his 75th appearance .
His total  आय on jeopardy !
are $  3,172,700 , consisting of $ 2,520,700 over उसके 74 विन्स , a $ 2,000 second-place  prize in his 75th appearance , a $ 500,000 second-place prize in the Jeopardy !
Ultimate Tournament of Champions , as  खूब as हाफ of a $ 300,000 पुरस्कार in the  IBM Challenge .
During  उसके पहला चलाएं  of Jeopardy !
appearances , Jennings earned the record for  the उच्चतम अमरीकी खेल दिखाएँ winnings  .
His total was surpassed by Brad  rutter , जो पराजित जेनिंग्स in the फाइनल of the jeopardy  !
Ultimate Tournament of  champions ( पहला aired on may 25 , 2005 ) , adding  $ 2,000,000 to Rutter 's existing Jeopardy !
winnings .
Jennings  regained the रिकार्ड बाद appearing on अनेक अन्य खेल shows , culminating in an रूप  on Are You Smarter Than a 5th Grader ?
( first aired  on अक्तूबर 10 , 2008 ) , हालांकि rutter retains  the Jeopardy !
रिकार्ड  .
After his success on Jeopardy ! , Jennings wrote about his experience and  छान अमरीकी ट्रिविया इतिहास और संस्कृति in उसके किताब brainiac : adventures in the जिज्ञासु , प्रतिस्पर्धी  , Compulsive World of Trivia Buffs , published in 2006 .
The Canadian Football League or CFL ( ' [  lcf ] in फ्रेंच ) is a पेशेवर खेल लीग स्तिथ  in Canada .
The CFL is the highest level of competition in Canadian football ,  a रूप of gridiron फ़ुटबॉल closely सम्बन्धित to अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल  .
Its eight current teams  , जिससे हैं स्तिथ in आठ पृथक शहरों , हैं विभाजित into दो विभाजन of चार टीमों प्रत्येक — the ईस्ट  Division and the West Division .
The league 's 19-week regular  ऋतु रनों इससे लेट जून to जल्दी नवम्बर ; प्रत्येक टोली plays 18 खेल साथ एक अलविदा सप्ताह  .
Following the regular season , the three teams with the best records in their division ( except if the  चौथी प्लेस टोली in एक प्रभाग रै a बेहतर रिकार्ड than the तीसरा प्लेस टोली in the अन्य प्रभाग , जब the टोली साथ the बेहतर रिकार्ड makes the playoffs और `` crosses over '' to the अन्य प्रभाग 's playoff ) compete in the लीग 's three-week  divisional playoffs , which culminate in the late-November Grey Cup championship , the country 's largest annual sports and television event .
The CFL was officially founded on January 19 , 1958 , making it the second oldest gridiron  फ़ुटबॉल लीग in उत्तर अमेरिका स्टिल in आपरेशन , हालांकि सब इसके टीमों long predate the आधुनिक गठन  of the league .
it is the उच्चतम स्तर of खेल in कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल , the सबसे लोकप्रिय फ़ुटबॉल लीग in  Canada , and the second-most popular major sports league in Canada , after the National Hockey League .
Although ice hockey is Canada 's most popular sport , the CFL has  increased the लोकप्रियता of कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल in क्यूबेक और पश्चिमी  Canada .
Canadian football is also played at amateur levels ( i.e . youth , high school ,  cjfl , qjfl , cis और वरिष्ठ लीग ऐसे as the अलबर्टा फ़ुटबॉल लीग )  .
The 2010s will be a  significant दशक लिये the cfl in शर्तें of विकास , as टीमों have संवर  , expanded stadiums , or plan to build entirely new stadiums .
The Montreal Alouettes  संपन्नता इस पहला , adding 5,000 सीटे to पर्सिवल molson  Memorial Stadium in time for the 2010 CFL season .
The Edmonton Eskimos and Calgary  स्तेमपेड्रस भी संवर उनके संबंधित स्टेडियम और सुविधाएं  for the 2010 season .
in 2011 , the bc शेर निभाई अंतर्गत a नई , retractable छत in  BC Place after spending one and a half seasons at Empire Field .
Then the  विन्निपेग ब्लू बमवर्षक होगा खेल in an entirely नई स्टेडियम at the विश्वविद्यालयों of मनिटोबा  , scheduled to open in time for the 2013 season .
The Hamilton Tiger-Cats , Saskatchewan Roughriders and  the नई ओटावा मताधिकार हैं भी looking at नई or extensively-renovated  stadiums in the following years .
There are also  उम्मीदें of expanding the लीग to अटलांटिक कनाडा ( ideally basing a टोली in either the अधिक आबादी halifax , or the अधिक centralized  Moncton ) , as 2010 and 2011 had regular season games hosted in Moncton .
According to sports historian Douglas Brei , the Canadian  फ़ुटबॉल लीग holds the भेद of होने the तभी पेशेवर खेल लीग in उत्तर अमेरिका ,  major or minor league , in which each existing franchise has won at least one league title while in their current location .
Each antibody binds to a  विशिष्ट प्रतिजन ; an बातचीत समान to a ताला और  key .
An  एंटीबॉडी ( ab ) , भी ज्ञात as an immunoglobulin ( ig ) , is a विशाल y-shaped प्रोटीन उत्पादित by b-cells  that is used by the immune system to identify and neutralize foreign objects such as bacteria and viruses .
The antibody  recognizes a अद्वितीय भाग of the विदेशी  target , called an antigen .
Each tip of the `` Y '' of an antibody contains a  paratope ( a ढांचा analogous to a ताला ) कि is विशिष्ट लिये एक particular epitope ( similarly analogous to a कुंजी ) on an प्रतिजन ,  allowing these two structures to bind together with precision .
Using this binding mechanism ,  an एंटीबॉडी can टैग a microbe or an संक्रमित कोशिका लिये आक्रमण by अन्य भाग of the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली , or can neutralize इसके निशाना सीधे ( लिये उदाहरण  , by blocking a part of a microbe that is essential for its invasion and survival ) .
The production of antibodies is the  प्रमुख फलन of the humoral प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली .
Antibodies are  स्रावित by a प्रकार of श्वेत रक्त  cell called a plasma cell .
Antibodies can occur in two physical forms , a soluble form that is secreted from the cell  , और a झिल्ली -bound रूप कि is संलग्न to the सतह of a b कोशिका और is referred to as the b कोशिका  receptor ( BCR ) .
The BCR is only found on  the सतह of b कोशिकाएं और facilitates the सक्रियण of ये कोशिकाएं और उनके subsequent differentiation into either एंटीबॉडी कारखानों पुकारा प्लाज्मा कोशिकाएं , or मेमोरी b कोशिकाएं कि होगा जीवित in the  body and remember that same antigen so the B cells can respond faster upon future exposure .
In most cases , interaction of the B cell with a T helper cell is necessary to  उपज पूरा सक्रियण of the b कोशिका और , इसलिए , एंटीबॉडी पीढी following  antigen binding .
Soluble antibodies are released into the  रक्त और ऊतक fluids , as खूब as अनेक secretions to continue to सर्वेक्षण लिये आक्रमणकारी microorganisms  .
antibodies हैं glycoproteins belonging to the immunoglobulin superfamily ; the शर्तें  antibody and immunoglobulin are often used interchangeably .
Antibodies are typically made of  मौलिक संरचनात्मक units—each साथ दो विशाल भारी जंजीरों  and two small light chains .
There are several different  प्रकार of एंटीबॉडी भारी जंजीरों , और अनेक अलग kinds of antibodies , जिससे हैं grouped into अलग isotypes  based on which heavy chain they possess .
Five different  एंटीबॉडी isotypes हैं ज्ञात in स्तनधारियों , जिससे perform अलग भूमिकाएँ , और सहायता सीधा the उचित प्रतिरक्षा जवाब लिये प्रत्येक  different type of foreign object they encounter .
Though the general structure of all antibodies is very similar , a small region at the tip of the  प्रोटीन is अत्यधिक परिवर्तनीय , allowing लाखो of antibodies साथ थोड़ा अलग टिप structures , or प्रतिजन बाइंडिंग  sites , to exist .
This  प्रदेश is ज्ञात as the hypervariable  region .
Each of these variants can  bind to a अलग प्रतिजन  .
This  विशाल विविधता of antibodies allows the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली  to recognize an equally wide variety of antigens .
The large and diverse population of antibodies is generated  by यादृच्छिक combinations of a नियत of जीन खण्ड कि encode अलग प्रतिजन बाइंडिंग साइट ( or paratopes ) , followed by यादृच्छिक mutations in इस क्षेत्रफल of the  antibody gene , which create further diversity .
Antibody genes also  re-organize in a प्रक्रम पुकारा क्लास switching कि परिवर्तन the आधार of the भारी कड़ी to another ,  creating a different isotype of the antibody that retains the antigen specific variable region .
This allows a single antibody  to be प्रयुक्त by अनेक अलग भाग of the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली  .
The symbol used by  the zodiac कातिल to चिह्न उसके पत्राचार
The Zodiac Killer was a serial killer who operated  in उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया in the लेट 1960s और  early 1970s .
the कातिल 's पहचान remains  unknown .
The Zodiac  murdered पीड़ितों in benicia , vallejo , झील berryessa , और सैन फ्रांसिस्को between  December 1968 and October 1969 .
Four men and three women between  the आयु of 16 और 29 यहूद targeted .
The  कातिल originated the नाम `` zodiac '' in a श्रेणी of taunting अक्षर  sent to the local Bay Area press .
These  अक्षर शामिल चार cryptograms ( or ciphers  ) .
Of the four cryptograms  भेजा , तभी एक रै महरूम definitively  solved .
Suspects have  महरूम नामित by विधि प्रवर्तन और amateur जांचकर्ताओं ,  but no conclusive evidence has surfaced .
In April 2004 , the San Francisco Police Department marked the case `` inactive '' , yet re-opened  the मामला at कुछ पाइंट prior  to March 2007 .
The case also remains open in the  नगर of vallejo , as खूब as in नापा काउंटी और solano काउंटी  .
The California  विभाग of इंसाफ रै कायम an खोलें मामला संचिका on the  Zodiac murders since 1969 .
Jennings is a small  नगर in और the मोहल्ला सीट of जेफरसन डेविस मोहल्ला , louisiana  , United States , near Lake Charles .
The population  थी 10,383 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी , a छोटी मनाही  from the 2000 tabulation .
The  नगर is 68 प्रतिशत  white .
Jennings is the principal city of the Jennings  micropolitan सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल , जिससे शामिल सब of जेफरसन डेविस मोहल्ला  .
It  is भी भाग of the larger झील charles-jennings संयुक्त  Statistical Area .
Nanotechnology ( sometimes shortened to ``  nanotech '' ) is the हेरफेर of पदार्थ on an परमाणु और आणविक  scale .
The  earliest , फैली वर्णन of nanotechnology referred to the particular technological लक्ष्य of precisely manipulating  atoms and molecules for fabrication of macroscale products , also now referred to as molecular nanotechnology .
A more generalized description of nanotechnology was subsequently  स्थापित by the नेशनल nanotechnology पहल , जिससे defines nanotechnology as the हेरफेर of पदार्थ साथ at तनिक एक आयाम sized इससे  1 to 100 nanometers .
This  परिभाषा reflects the फैक्ट कि क्वांटम mechanical प्रभाव हैं महत्वपूर्ण at इस quantum-realm स्केल , और so the परिभाषा shifted इससे a particular technological लक्ष्य to a शोध  category inclusive of all types of research and technologies that deal with the special properties of matter that occur below the given size threshold .
It is therefore common to see the plural form `` nanotechnologies '' as well as `` nanoscale technologies ''  to refer to the व्यापक दायरा of शोध और अनुप्रयोग जिनकी आम trait is आकार .
Because of the variety of  संभावित अनुप्रयोग ( सहित औद्योगिक और सैन्य ) , सरकारें have invested  billions of dollars in nanotechnology research .
through इसके नेशनल nanotechnology पहल  , the USA has invested 3.7 billion dollars .
The European Union has invested 1.2 billion  और जापानी 750 लाख डॉलर .
nanotechnology as पारिभाषित by आकार is naturally बहुत व्यापक , सहित फ़ील्ड of विज्ञान as विविध as सतह विज्ञान ,  organic chemistry , molecular biology , semiconductor physics , microfabrication , etc .
The associated research and applications are equally diverse , ranging from extensions of conventional  यंत्र भौतिकी to completely नई approaches आधारित upon आणविक self-assembly , इससे विकासशील नई सामग्री साथ आयाम on the nanoscale to सीधा कंट्रोल of  matter on the atomic scale .
वैज्ञानिकों फिलहाल बहस the भविष्य implications  of nanotechnology .
Nanotechnology may  be समर्थ to बनाएँ अनेक नई सामग्री और डिवाइस साथ a विशाल दायरा of अनुप्रयोग , ऐसे as in आयुर्विज्ञान , इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स ,  biomaterials and energy production .
On the other hand , nanotechnology raises many of the same issues as  कोई नई प्रौद्योगिकी , सहित चिंताएं परिचय the toxicity और पर्यावरणीय प्रभाव of nanomaterials , और उनके संभावित प्रभाव on वैश्विक अर्थशास्त्र , as खूब as अटकलें  about various doomsday scenarios .
These concerns  have led to a बहस among वकालत समूह और सरकारें on whether  special regulation of nanotechnology is warranted .
Map of  the पूर्वी  Bloc
The term Eastern Bloc or  कम्युनिस्ट bloc refers to the पूर्व कम्युनिस्ट राज्य of सेंट्रल और पूर्वी यूरोपीय , generally the सोवियत  Union and the countries of the Warsaw Pact .
The terms Communist Bloc and Soviet Bloc were also used to denote groupings of states  लकीर साथ the सोवियत संघ , हालांकि ये शर्तें might शामिल राज्य बाहर सेंट्रल और पूर्वी यूरोपीय .
The New Jersey  gubernatorial चुनाव of 2009 took प्लेस on नवम्बर 3 ,  2009 .
Democratic Governor Jon Corzine was running for a second term and  थी होने challenged by रिपब्लिकन क्रिस क्रिस्टी , स्वतंत्र क्रिस्टोफर daggett और नौ अन्य , in जोड  to several write-in candidates .
Christie won the election ,  साथ परिचय 48.5 प्रतिशत of the vote , to 44.9 प्रतिशत लिये  Corzine and 5.8 percent for Daggett .
Christie won the largest margin for a first  पद रिपब्लिकन चूंकि 1969  .
Christie assumed  दफ्तर on जनवरी 19 , 2010  .
This was  the पहला चुनाव to भरण the newly निर्मित  office of Lieutenant Governor .
The candidates for governor and lieutenant governor were  joined साथ as a सिंगल चुनाव , so कि मतदाता किया नहीं  have the opportunity to split the ticket .
Kim Guadagno , Christie 's running mate , became New  जर्सी 's पहला लेफ्टिनेंट राज्यपाल following उसके उद्घाटन .
Health care in  the संयुक्त राज्य is provided by अनेक पृथक  organizations .
Health care  सुविधाएं हैं largely स्वामित्व और संचालित  by private sector businesses .
Health insurance for public sector  कर्मचारी is primarily provided by the सरकारी  .
60-65 % of healthcare  प्रावधान और बिता आता इससे कार्यक्रम ऐसे as medicare , medicaid , tricare , the children 's स्वास्थ्य  Insurance Program , and the Veterans Health Administration .
Most of the population under 65 is  insured by उनके or a परिवार सदस्य 's नियोक्ता , कुछ ख़रीदे स्वास्थ्य बीमे on उनके अपना , और the  remainder are uninsured .
Of 17 high-income countries studied by the National Institutes of Health in 2013 , the United  राज्य थी at or निकट the नीचे in शिशु मृत्यु , दिल और फेफड़ों बीमारी , sexually transmitted infections , adolescent pregnancies , चोटों , homicides , और दरों  of disability .
Together , such issues place  the u.S. at the नीचे of the सूची  for life expectancy .
On average , a U.S. male can be expected to live almost four fewer years  than those in the top-ranked देश  .
According to the World Health Organization ( WHO ) , the United States spent more on health care per capita ( $  7,146 ) , और अधिक on स्वास्थ्य परवाह as प्रतिशत of इसके जीडीपी ( 15.2 % ) , than कोई अन्य  nation in 2008 .
The  राष्ट्रमंडल निधि क्रमित the संयुक्त राज्य पिछला in the विशेषता of स्वास्थ्य परवाह among समान  countries , and notes U.S. care costs the most .
The U.S.  जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो reported कि 49.9 लाख निवासियों , 16.3 % of the जनसांख्यिकी , यहूद uninsured  in 2010 ( up from 49.0 million residents , 16.1 % of the population , in 2009 ) .
A 2004 Institute of  आयुर्विज्ञान ( iom ) रपट कहा : `` the संयुक्त राज्य is among the few industrialized राष्ट्र in the संसार कि करता नहीं गारंटी अभिगम to  health care for its population . ''
A  2004 oecd रपट कहा : `` साथ the एक्सेप्शन of मैक्सिको , तुर्कों , और the संयुक्त राज्य , सब oecd देशों था हासिल सार्वभौमिक  or near-universal ( at least 98.4 % insured ) coverage of their populations by 1990 . ''
A 2010 report observed that lack of health  बीमे कल्याणकारी roughly 48,000 अनावश्यक मौतों प्रत्येक साल in the  United States .
In 2007 , 62.1 % of filers for  bankruptcies claimed ऊँची चिकित्सा खर्च  .
A 2013 study found  कि परिचय 25 % of सब वरिष्ठ नागरिकों घोषित दिवालियापन due to चिकित्सा खर्च , और 43 % हैं  forced to mortgage or sell their primary residence .
On March 23 , 2010 , the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act  ( ppaca ) became विधि , providing लिये प्रमुख परिवर्तन in स्वास्थ्य  insurance .
In  physiology , देह जल is  the water content of the human body .
a significant भिन्न  of the human body is water .
Arthur Guyton 's Textbook of  चिकित्सा physiology राज्य कि `` the कुल राशि of जल in a man of औसत  weight ( 70 kilograms ) is approximately 40 litres , averaging 57 percent of his total body weight .
In a  नवजात शिशु , इस may be as ऊँची as 75 प्रतिशत of the देह वज़न , लकिन it progressively decreases  from birth to old age , most of the decrease occurring during the first 10 years of life .
Also ,  मोटापा decreases the प्रतिशत of जल in the देह , sometimes to as कम  as 45 percent '' .
These figures  हैं सांख्यिकीय averages , so हैं illustrative , और जैसे सब biostatistics , होगा vary  with things like type of population , age and number of people sampled , and methodology .
So there  is नहीं , और can नहीं be , a फिगर कि is exactly the वही लिये सब  people , for this or any other physiological measure .
For example , Jackson 's ( 1985 ) Anatomy & Physiology for Nurses gives a  फिगर of 60 % लिये the proportion of body-weight attributable to जल , जिससे approximates  Guyton 's 57 % .
In diseased states where body water  is प्रभावित , the कम्पार्टमेंट or compartments कि have  changed can give clues to the nature of the problem .
Body water is regulated by hormones ,  सहित anti-diuretic हार्मोन ( अध ) , aldosterone और अलिंदी  natriuretic peptide .
Per Netter  's एटलस of इंसान physiology , देह  water is broken down into the following compartments:
intracellular द्रव ( 2/3  of body water ) .
Per  guyton , in a देह containing 40 लीटर of द्रव , परिचय 25 लीटर is intracellular , जिससे  amounts to 62.5 % ( 5/8 ) , close enough to the 2/3 rule of thumb .
जैक्सन 's ग्रन्थ राज्य 70 % of देह द्रव  is intracellular .
extracellular द्रव ( 1/3 of  body water ) .
Per Guyton  's उदाहरण , लिये a 40 लीटर देह , परिचय 15 लीटर is extracellular , जिससे  amounts to 37.5 % Again , this is close to the 1/3 rule of thumb cited here .
प्लाज्मा ( 1/5 of extracellular  fluid ) .
Per Guyton 's illustration , of the 15 litres of  extracellular द्रव , प्लाज्मा आवाज़ averages 3  litres .
This  amounts to 20 % , the वही as प्रति  Netter 's Atlas .
अंतरालीय द्रव ( 4/5 of  extracellular fluid )
Transcellular  द्रव ( a.k.a . `` तीसरा स्पेस , '' सामान्यतः  ignored in calculations )
contained अंदर अंगों , ऐसे as the जठरांत्र , प्रमस्तिष्कमेरु  , peritoneal , and ocular fluids .
self-esteem is a पद प्रयुक्त in मनोविज्ञान to प्रतिबिंबित a व्यक्ति 's overall emotional  evaluation of his or her own worth .
It is a  निर्णय of oneself as खूब as an रवैया toward the  self .
Self-esteem encompasses beliefs ( for example , `` I am competent , '' `` I  am worthy '' ) और भाव ऐसे as triumph , despair , अभिमान और शर्म  .
Smith and Mackie define it by saying `` The self-concept is what  we सोचो परिचय the स्वः ; self-esteem , is the धनात्मक or ऋणात्मक evaluations  of the self , as in how we feel about it . ''
