self-esteem is भी ज्ञात as the evaluative आयाम of the स्वः कि शामिल जज्बात  of worthiness , prides and discouragement .
One 's self-esteem is  भी closely संबद्ध साथ self-consciousness  .
self-esteem is a disposition कि a व्यक्ति रै जिससे represents उनके निर्णयों  of their own worthiness .
In the mid-1960s , Morris  rosenberg और social-learning पैरोकार पारिभाषित self-esteem as a निजी लायक or worthiness  .
nathaniel branden in 1969 पारिभाषित self-esteem as `` the अनुभव of होने  competent to cope with the basic challenges of life and being worthy of happiness . ''
According  to branden , self-esteem is the योग of self-confidence ( a अहसास of निजी क्षमता  ) and self-respect ( a feeling of personal worth ) .
It exists as a  consequence of the अव्यक्त निर्णय कि प्रत्येक व्यक्ति रै of उनके क्षमता to फेस जीवन 's चुनौतियां , to समझे और solve समस्याएं , और  their right to achieve happiness , and be given respect .
As a  सोशल मनोवैज्ञानिक construct , self-esteem is आकर्षक क्युकी शोधकर्ताओं have conceptualized it as an influential predictor of  relevant outcomes , such as academic achievement ( Marsh 1990 ) or exercise behavior ( Hagger et al . 1998 ) .
In addition , self-esteem has also been treated  as an महत्वपूर्ण निष्कर्ष due to इसके बंद संबंध साथ मनोवैज्ञानिक well-being  ( Marsh 1989 ) .
Self-esteem can apply specifically to a particular dimension ( for example , `` I believe I am a good  लेखक और i महसूस प्रसन्न परिचय कि '' ) or a वैश्विक extent ( लिये उदाहरण , `` i मानना i am a ख़राब व्यक्ति , और महसूस ख़राब परिचय  myself in general '' ) .
Psychologists usually  लिहाज़ self-esteem as an enduring व्यक्तित्व characteristic ( `` trait  '' self-esteem ) , though normal , short-term variations ( `` state '' self-esteem ) also exist .
Synonyms or near-synonyms of self-esteem include : self-worth ,  self-regard , self-respect , और self-integrity  .
A Masonic Lodge , often termed a Private  आवास or constituent आवास , is the मौलिक organisational ईकाई  of Freemasonry .
Every new Lodge must be warranted or chartered by  a ग्रैंड आवास , लकिन is विषय to इसके दिशा तभी in enforcing the प्रकाशित संविधान  of the jurisdiction .
By exception the three surviving lodges that formed the world 's first known Grand Lodge in London ( today called the United Grand Lodge of  इंग्लैण्ड ) have the अद्वितीय विशेषाधिकार to operate as समय immemorial i.e . बगैर ऐसे वारंट ; तभी एक अन्य आवास operates बगैर a वारंट - इस is the ग्रैंड stewards ' आवास in लंदन , हालांकि it is नहीं भी हकदार to the  `` time immemorial '' title .
A  freemason is generally हकदार to विज़िट कोई आवास , in कोई क्षेत्राधिकार ( i.e  . under any Grand Lodge ) in amity with his own .
In some  jurisdictions इस विशेषाधिकार is प्रतिबंधित to निपुण masons ( कि is , freemasons  who have attained the Order 's third degree ) .
He is  पहला प्रायः जरूरी to जाँच , और certify , the नियमितता of the संबंध  of the Lodge - and be able to satisfy that Lodge of his regularity of membership .
Freemasons gather together as a Lodge  to कार्य the तीन मौलिक डिग्री of डाला प्रशिक्षु , fellowcraft और निपुण  Mason .
Pilkington Group Limited is a multinational glass manufacturing company headquartered  in st हेलेन्स , संयुक्त किंगडम और a wholly स्वामित्व subsidiary of the japan-based एनएसजी  Group .
Prior to its acquisition by NSG in  2006 it थी an स्वतंत्र कम्पनी सूचीबद्ध on the लंदन भण्डार  Exchange and for a time was a constituent of the FTSE 100 Index .
A quotation is the repetition of one  अभिव्यक्ति as भाग of another एक , विशेषकर जब the कोटेड अभिव्यक्ति is well-known or explicitly attributed by citation to इसके  original source , and it is indicated by ( punctuated with ) quotation marks .
A quotation can also refer to the  दोहराया उपयोग of इकाई of कोई अन्य रूप of अभिव्यक्ति , विशेषकर भाग of कलाकारी works : तत्व of a पेंटिंग , दृश्यों इससे a फिल्म or  sections from a musical composition .
Year 1877 ( MDCCCLXXVII ) was a common year  starting on सोमवार ( कड़ी होगा प्रदर्शक the पूरा पंचांग ) of the gregorian पंचांग और a आम साल starting  on Saturday of the 12-day slower Julian calendar .
Black pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering vine in the family Piperaceae , cultivated for its fruit  , जिससे is प्रायः सूखी और प्रयुक्त as  a spice and seasoning .
The fruit , known as a peppercorn when dried , is approximately  in व्यास , अंधेरा रेड जब fully वयस्क , और , जैसे सब drupes  , contains a single seed .
Peppercorns , and the ground pepper derived from them , may be described simply  as pepper , or अधिक precisely as ब्लैक pepper ( पकाया और सूखी unripe फल ) , ग्रीन pepper ( सूखी unripe फल ) और श्वेत  pepper ( dried ripe seeds ) .
Black pepper is native to  दक्षिण इण्डिया , और is extensively cultivated वहीँ और elsewhere in तीव्र  regions .
Currently Vietnam is the world 's largest producer and exporter of pepper , producing 34 %  of the संसार 's पाइपर nigrum क्रॉप  as of 2008 .
Dried  मैदान pepper रै महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्राचीनता  for both its flavour and as a medicine .
Black pepper  is the संसार 's सबसे traded  spice .
It is  एक of the सबसे आम मसाले added to यूरोपीय  cuisine and its descendants .
The spiciness of black pepper is due to the chemical  piperine , नहीं to be उलझन साथ the capsaicin कि देता  fleshy peppers theirs .
It is in  the आधुनिक संसार , प्रायः युग्म  with salt .
Fire hydrant in  charlottesville , वर्जिनिया ,  USA
A fire hydrant ( also known colloquially as a fire plug in the United States or as a  जॉनी पंप in नई यॉर्क नगर ) , is an क्रियाशील आग सुरक्षा माप , और a सोर्स of जल provided in सबसे शहरी , suburban और ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों साथ नगरपालिका जल सेवा to enable अग्निशमन to tap into  the municipal water supply to assist in extinguishing a fire .
Buildings near a hydrant may qualify for an insurance discount since  अग्निशमन चाहिए be समर्थ to अधिक rapidly बुझा a आग on the insured प्रॉपर्टी  .
The concept of  आग plugs तिथियाँ to at तनिक the 17th सदी  .
This was a time when firefighters responding to a call would dig down  to the लकड़ी जल मेन्स और hastily bore a छेद to सुरक्षित जल  to fight fires .
The water would fill the hole creating a temporary well , and be transported  इससे the खूब to the आग by बाल्टी brigades or , बाद  , by hand-pumped fire engines .
The holes were then plugged with stoppers , normally redwood ,  जिससे over समय आए to be ज्ञात as आग  plugs .
The location of the plug would  प्रायः be अंकित or चिह्नित so कि it could be reused  in future fires .
This is the source of the  colloquial पद आग प्लग स्टिल प्रयुक्त लिये आग hydrants  today .
After the Great Fire of  लंदन in 1666 , the नगर संस्थापित जल मेन्स साथ छेद drilled at intervals , equipped साथ  risers , allowing an access point to the wooden fire plugs from street level .
The  आविष्कार of a post- or pillar-type आग hydrant is generally credited to फ्रेडरिक graff  Sr. , Chief Engineer of the Philadelphia Water Works around the year 1801 .
It had a  संयोजन hose/faucet आउटलेट और थी of `` गीला बैरल '' डिज़ाइन  with the valve in the top .
It  is कहा कि graff आयोजित the पहला पेटेंट लिये a आग hydrant , लकिन इस can नहीं be सत्यापित क्युकी the पेटेंट दफ्तर in वॉशिंगटन d.C. caught on आग in 1836 destroying  many patent records from that period in the process .
the अध्यक्ष of the गणतंत्र of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी is the सिर of राज्य  and head of government under South Africa 's Constitution .
From 1961 to 1994 , the head of state was  पुकारा the राज्य अध्यक्ष  .
The President is elected by members  of the नेशनल सभा , the निम्नतर हाउस of पार्लियामेंट , और is प्रायः the नेता of the largest पार्टी , जिससे रै महरूम the अफ़्रीकी नेशनल कॉंग्रेस  since the first non-racial elections were held on 27 April 1994 .
The  भूमिका थी originally संस्थापित to be पृथक इससे the अभी defunct भूमिका of प्रधान मंत्री , लकिन the दो भूमिकाएँ यहूद  merged in the 1983 constitution which specified a four-year term of office .
The 1993 and later  constitutions हद the अध्यक्ष 's समय in दफ्तर  to two five-year terms .
The first  अध्यक्ष to be निर्वाचित अंतर्गत the नई संविधान थी नेल्सन मंडेला ,  and the incumbent president is Jacob Zuma .
Under the  अंतरिम संविधान ( मान्य इससे 1994 to 1996 ) , वहीँ थी a सरकारी of नेशनल एकता , in जिससे an mp इससे  the largest opposition party was entitled to a position as Deputy President .
Along with Thabo Mbeki , the last State President , F.W . De Klerk also served as Deputy  अध्यक्ष , in उसके क्षमता as the नेता of the नेशनल पार्टी जिससे थी the second-largest  party in the new Parliament .
लकिन de klerk बाद resigned और गई into विपक्ष  with his party .
A  voluntary गठबन्धन सरकारी continues to मौजूद अंतर्गत the नई संविधान ( अपनाया in 1996 ) , हालांकि वहीँ have महरूम  no appointments of opposition politicians to the post of deputy president .
खास शिक्षा or खास needs शिक्षा is the शिक्षा of विद्यार्थी साथ  special needs in a way that addresses the students ' individual differences and needs .
Ideally , this process involves the individually planned and systematically monitored  व्यवस्था of शिक्षण प्रक्रियाओं , adapted उपकरण और सामग्री , accessible जमावट , और अन्य interventions designed to सहायता learners साथ खास needs achieve a उच्चतर स्तर of निजी self-sufficiency और कामयाबी in स्कूल और जातियाँ than  would be available if the student were only given access to a typical classroom education .
Common special  needs शामिल चुनौतियां साथ सीखना , संचार चुनौतियां , emotional और behavioral विकार  , physical disabilities , and developmental disorders .
Students with these kinds of special needs are likely to benefit from  अतिरिक्त शैक्षणिक सेवाएं ऐसे as अलग approaches to शिक्षण , उपयोग of प्रौद्योगिकी , a specifically adapted शिक्षण  area , or resource room .
Intellectual giftedness is a difference in learning and can also benefit from specialized teaching techniques or different educational programs , but the  पद `` खास शिक्षा '' is generally प्रयुक्त to specifically indicate निर्देश of विद्यार्थी जिनकी खास needs reduce उनके क्षमता to सीख independently or in an ordinary कक्षा , और gifted शिक्षा is संभाला separately  .
In most developed countries , educators are modifying teaching methods  और environments so कि the अधिकतम क्रमांक of विद्यार्थी हैं परोसा in सामान्य शिक्षा environments  .
Special  शिक्षा in विकसित देशों is प्रायः regarded कम as a `` प्लेस '' और अधिक as `` a दायरा of सेवाएं  , available in every school . ''
संयोजन can reduce सोशल stigmas और improve  academic achievement for many students .
The  विपरीत of खास शिक्षा  is general education .
सामान्य शिक्षा is the मानक curriculum प्रस्तुत साथ मानक शिक्षण  methods and without additional supports .
George Soros ( or ; ; ; born August 12  , 1930 , as schwartz györgy ) is a hungarian-american कारोबार महारथी , निवेशकों , और लोकसेवक  .
He  is the अध्यक्ष of सोरोस निधि प्रबन्धन  .
Soros supports  progressive-liberal कल्याणकारी  .
He is known as ``  the man जो broke the बैंको of इंग्लैण्ड `` क्युकी of उसके in निवेश  profits during the 1992 Black Wednesday UK currency crisis .
Between 1979 and 2011 , Soros gave away over $ 8  अरब to इंसान अधिकारों , पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य , और शिक्षा कल्याणकारी  .
He played a  significant भूमिका in the शांतिपूर्ण परिवर्तन इससे साम्यवादी to पूंजीवाद in हंगेरियाई ( 1984–89 ) और provided एक of यूरोपीय 's  largest higher education endowments to Central European University in Budapest .
Soros is also  the अध्यक्ष of the खोलें समाज  Institute .
An actor portraying Alexander  ग्राहम घंटी बोलना into an जल्दी मॉडल टेलीफोन  .
The invention of the telephone is the  culmination of कार्य किया by अनेक individuals , the इतिहास of जिससे involves a संग्रहण of दावा और counterclaims  .
The development  of the आधुनिक विद्युत टेलीफोन शामिल an सरणी of lawsuits संस्थापित upon the पेटेंट दावा of अनेक individuals  and numerous companies .
This article covers the early years from 1844 to 1898 , from conception of the idea of an electric voice-transmission device , to failed attempts to use `` make-and-break ''  वर्तमान , to कामयाब प्रयोग साथ इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक telephones by सिकंदर ग्राहम घंटी और थामस वाटसन  , and finally to commercially successful telephones in the late 19th century .
A Master of Fine Arts ( MFA , M.F.A . ) is a graduate degree typically  requiring 2–3 सालो of postgraduate पढ़ाई परे the स्नातक 's उपाधि ( bfa ) , हालांकि the पद of पढ़ाई होगा vary  by country or by university .
The MFA is a creative degree usually  awarded as a टर्मिनल उपाधि in विज़ुअल कला , रचनात्मक लिखने , filmmaking , नृत्य  , or theatre and other performing arts .
Coursework is primarily of  an लागू or performing प्रकृति साथ the कार्यक्रम प्रायः  culminating in a major work or performance .
Master of Fine Arts  कार्यक्रम have generally जरूरी a स्नातक 's उपाधि prior to प्रवेश , लकिन अनेक do नहीं आवश्यकता कि the undergraduate प्रमुख be the वही as the mfa फ़ील्ड of  study .
The  सबसे महत्वपूर्ण admissions आवश्यकता रै प्रायः महरूम a नमूना पोर्टफोलियो  or a performance audition .
The Master of Fine Arts differs from the Master of Arts in that the MFA , while an  अकादमिक कार्यक्रम , centers around अभ्यास in the particular फ़ील्ड , whereas कार्यक्रम अग्रणी to the ma प्रायः बीच on the scholarly  , academic , or critical study of the field .
Additionally , in the United States , an MFA is recognized as a terminal  उपाधि लिये practitioners of विज़ुअल आर्ट , डिज़ाइन , नृत्य , थिएटर , film/video , नई मीडिया , और रचनात्मक लिखने - अर्थ कि it is माना to be the उच्चतम उपाधि  in its field , and is used as a minimum qualification to be able to apply to become a Full-Time Professor teaching at the University level in these disciplines .
There are exceptions to this standard in the Arts , notably in the  मामला of म्यूज़िक प्रदर्शन , जहाँ the mfa is नहीं देखी as a टर्मिनल उपाधि in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of the अधिक मानकीकृत  DMA degree .
It is also critical to note that in the interest of extending the connection between creative production and continued  अकादमिक शोध , कुछ विश्वविद्यालयों have स्थापित practice-based ph.d कार्यक्रम in फ़ील्ड ऐसे as रचनात्मक लिखने , विज़ुअल कला , नई मीडिया , डिज़ाइन  and theater .
While this has had an effect in Creative Writing , and to a lesser extent  in डिज़ाइन और नई मीडिया , the influx of graduates इससे practice-based phd कार्यक्रम रै नहीं appreciably बदला the मानक लिये the mfa as the टर्मिनल  degree in most Arts disciplines yet .
This is an ongoing contentious topic , and is  the बारंबार विषय of अकादमिक panels , विशेषकर at the  annual College Art Association conference .
The  caa 2008 दिशानिर्देश regarding the mfa strongly re-affirms कि the phd  is not required as a terminal degree in the visual arts .
The atomic  bombings of the शहरों of हिरोशिमा और नागासाकी in जापानी यहूद conducted by the संयुक्त राज्य दौरान the  final stages of World War II in 1945 .
The two events are the only use  of नाभिकीय हथियार in युद्ध to  date .
following a firebombing अभियान कि नष्ट अनेक जापानी शहरों , the  Allies prepared for a costly invasion of Japan .
The war in Europe  ended जब नाजी जर्मनी हस्ताक्षरित इसके यंत्र of  surrender on 8 May , but the Pacific War continued .
Together with the  संयुक्त किंगडम और the गणतंत्र of चीन , the संयुक्त राज्य पुकारा लिये a आत्मसमर्पण of जापानी in the पॉट्सडैम घोषणा on 26 जुलाई 1945  , threatening Japan with `` prompt and utter destruction '' .
The Japanese government ignored this ultimatum ,  और the संयुक्त राज्य तैनात दो नाभिकीय हथियार विकसित by the मैनहटन प्रोजेक्ट  .
अमरीकी airmen dropped छोटी लड़के on the नगर of हिरोशिमा on 6 अगस्त  1945 , followed by Fat Man over Nagasaki on 9 August .
Within the first two to four months of  the bombings , the अधि प्रभाव मारे 90,000–166,000 लोगों in हिरोशिमा और 60,000–80,000 in नागासाकी , साथ roughly  half of the deaths in each city occurring on the first day .
The Hiroshima prefecture health department estimated that , of  the लोगों जो died on the दिन of the विस्फोट , 60 % died इससे फ्लैश or ज्वाला burns , 30 % इससे गिरना मलबा  and 10 % from other causes .
During the following months , large  संख्याएँ died इससे the प्रभाव of burns , विकिरण बीमारी , और अन्य  injuries , compounded by illness .
In a US estimate of the total immediate and short term cause of  मौत , 15–20 % died इससे विकिरण बीमारी , 20–30 % इससे burns , और 50–60  % from other injuries , compounded by illness .
In  दोनो शहरों , सबसे of the मुर्दे यहूद नागरिकों , हालांकि हिरोशिमा  had a sizeable garrison .
On 15 August  , छह दिनों बाद the bombing of नागासाकी , जापानी घोषित इसके आत्मसमर्पण to the allies ,  signing the Instrument of Surrender on 2 September , officially ending World War II .
The bombings led , in  भाग , to post-war जापानी 's adopting तीन  Non-Nuclear Principles , forbidding the nation from nuclear armament .
The role of  the bombings in जापानी 's आत्मसमर्पण और उनके  ethical justification are still debated .
Mohandas  करमचंद गांधी ( ; 2 अक्तूबर 1869 – 30 जनवरी 1948 ) , commonly ज्ञात as महात्मा  Gandhi , was the preeminent leader of Indian nationalism in British-ruled India .
Employing non-violent civil  disobedience , गांधी led इण्डिया to स्वतंत्रता और प्रेरित आंदोलनों लिये non-violence  , civil rights and freedom across the world .
The son of  a वरिष्ठ सरकारी आधिकारिक , गांधी थी born और उठाया in a हिन्दू bania  community in coastal Gujarat , and trained in law in London .
Gandhi became famous by fighting  लिये the सिविल अधिकारों of मुस्लिम और हिन्दू इंडियंस  in South Africa , using new techniques of non-violent civil disobedience that he developed .
Returning to India in 1915 , he  नियत परिचय organising peasants to विरोध excessive  land-taxes .
A  lifelong प्रतिद्वन्दी of `` सांप्रदायिकता `` ( i.e . basing राजनीती on धर्म  ) he reached out widely to all religious groups .
he became a नेता of मुसलमान protesting  the declining status of the Caliphate .
Assuming leadership  of the भारतीय नेशनल कॉंग्रेस in 1921 , गांधी led देशभर अभियान लिये easing गरीबी , expanding महिलाओं 's अधिकारों , भवन धार्मिक  and ethnic amity , ending untouchability , increasing economic self-reliance , and above all for achieving Swaraj —the independence of India from British domination .
Gandhi led Indians in  protesting the नेशनल नमक कर साथ the dandi नमक कूच in 1930 , और बाद in demanding  the British to immediately Quit India in 1942 , during World War II .
he थी imprisoned लिये कि और लिये  numerous other political offenses over the years .
गांधी sought to अभ्यास non-violence और सच्चाई in सब  situations , and advocated that others do the same .
He saw the villages as the core of the true India and  प्रचारित self-sufficiency ; he किया नहीं support the industrialization  programs of his disciple Jawaharlal Nehru .
He lived modestly in a self-sufficient  आवासीय जातियाँ और पहना the परंपरागत भारतीय धोती और चादर , woven साथ धागे he था हाथ  spun on a charkha .
His chief political enemy in Britain was Winston  चर्चिल , जो ridiculed उसे as a `` half-naked फकीर . ''
He was a dedicated  शाकाहारी , और undertook long fasts as अर्थात् of दोनो self-purification और राजनैतिक  mobilization .
In his last year , unhappy at the partition of India , Gandhi worked to stop the carnage  between मुसलमान , हिन्दुओं और सिखों कि raged in the किनारा क्षेत्रफल between इण्डिया और पाकिस्तानी  .
He was assassinated on  30 जनवरी 1948 by nathuram गोडसे जो विचार गांधी थी too सहानुभूतिपूर्ण  to India 's Muslims .
30 January is  observed as शहीदो ' दिन in  India .
The honorific Mahatma (  `` ग्रेट आत्मा '' ) थी लागू to उसे by 1914  .
In India he was  भी पुकारा bapu ( `` पिता  '' ) .
He is known in  इण्डिया as the पिता of the स्वदेश ; उसके जन्मदिवस , 2 अक्तूबर , is commemorated वहीँ as गांधी jayanti , a नेशनल अवकाश  , and world-wide as the International Day of Non-Violence .
Gandhi  's दर्शनशास्त्र थी नहीं सैद्धांतिक लकिन एक of व्यावहारिकतावाद  , that is , practicing his principles in the moment .
Asked to give a  संदेश to the लोगों , he होता respond , `` my  life is my message . ''
Joan Crawford (  कूच 23 , ca . 1904 – may 10 , 1977 ) , born lucille fay lesueur  , was an American actress in film , television and theatre .
starting as a नर्तकी in traveling नाट्य कंपनियाँ पहले debuting on ब्रॉडवे , क्रॉफर्ड थी  signed to a motion picture contract by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer in 1925 .
initially कुंठित by the आकार और विशेषता of उसके भाग , क्रॉफर्ड began a अभियान of self-publicity  and became nationally known as a flapper by the end of the 1920s .
In the 1930s , Crawford 's fame  rivaled , और बाद outlasted , mgm सहयोगियों norma शियर्र  and Greta Garbo .
Crawford often played hardworking young women who find  रोमांस और वित्तीय कामयाबी  .
These `` rags-to-riches '' stories were well received by  अवसाद -era ऑडियंस और यहूद लोकप्रिय साथ महिलाओं  .
Crawford became one of Hollywood 's most prominent movie stars and one of the highest paid  महिलाओं in the संयुक्त राज्य , लकिन उसके films began खोने धन और by the समाप्त of the 1930s वो थी labeled `` बक्सा दफ्तर  poison '' .
After an absence of nearly two years from the screen , Crawford staged a comeback  by अभिनीत in मिल्ड्रेड पियर्स ( 1945 ) , लिये जिससे वो जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार  for Best Actress .
In 1955 , she became involved  साथ the pepsi-cola कम्पनी through उसके विवाह to  company Chairman Alfred Steele .
After his death  in 1959 , क्रॉफर्ड थी निर्वाचित to भरण उसके रिक्ति on the फलक of निर्देशकों लकिन थी  forcibly retired in 1973 .
She continued acting in film and television regularly through  the 1960s , जब उसके प्रदर्शन became कम ; बाद the रिलीज of the अंग्रेजों हॉरर फिल्मी  Trog in 1970 , Crawford retired from the screen .
Following a  पब्लिक रूप in 1974 , बाद जिससे unflattering छायाचित्र यहूद प्रकाशित , क्रॉफर्ड withdrew इससे पब्लिक  life and became increasingly reclusive until her death in 1977 .
क्रॉफर्ड शादीशुदा  four times .
Her  पहला तीन विवाह ended in तलाक ; the पिछला ended साथ  the death of husband Alfred Steele .
She  अपनाया पाँच children , एक of जिसको थी  reclaimed by his birth mother .
Crawford 's relationships  साथ उसके दो पुरानी children , क्रिस्टीना और क्रिस्टोफर  , were acrimonious .
Crawford disinherited the two and , after Crawford 's death ,  क्रिस्टीना लिखा a `` tell-all '' संस्मरण , mommie dearest , in जिससे वो कथित a lifelong पैटर्न of शारीरिक और emotional गाली perpetrated  by Crawford .
She was  voted the दसवाँ महानतम मादा स्टार in the इतिहास of अमरीकी  cinema by the American Film Institute .
1910 Buick  tonneau बगैर tonneau  cover
1903 Ford  मॉडल a rear-door  Tonneau
1903 lanchester rear-door  Tonneau
Tonneau cover ( or )  describes a मुश्किल or नरम कवर प्रयुक्त to protect unoccupied यात्री सीटे in a convertible  or roadster , or the cargo bed in a pickup truck .
Hard tonneau covers open by a hinging or  फोल्डिंग यांत्रिकी जबकि नरम कवर  open by rolling up .
The  tonneau कवर is प्रयुक्त to छिपाते  cargo .
When the cover is pulled out , it keeps items out of the  सूर्य और provides अतिरिक्त सुरक्षा by keeping निजी वस्तुएं आउट of sight , as खूब as shielding the ड्राइवर  from view .
Twitter is an online social networking service and microblogging service that enables its users to send and  पढ़ा text-based संदेश of up to 140 वर्ण , ज्ञात  as `` tweets '' .
Twitter was  निर्मित in कूच 2006 by जोकर dorsey और by जुलाई , the सोशल  networking site was launched .
The service rapidly gained  विश्वव्यापी लोकप्रियता , साथ over 500 लाख पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता as of 2012 , generating over 340 लाख  tweets daily and handling over 1.6 billion search queries per day .
Since its launch ,  ट्विटर रै become एक of the टेन सबसे visited वेबसाइटों on the अंतरजाल  , and has been described as `` the SMS of the Internet . ''
Unregistered users can read tweets , while registered users can  पोस्ट tweets through the जालस्थल इंटरफ़ेस , sms , or a दायरा of ऐप्स  for mobile devices .
Twitter Inc. is based in San  फ्रांसिस्को , साथ अतिरिक्त सर्वर और कार्यालयों  in New York City , Boston , and San Antonio .
The Hangover is a 2009 American comedy film ,  co-produced और निर्देशित by टॉड phillips और लिखा by  Jon Lucas and Scott Moore .
It is the first film of The Hangover franchise  .the फिल्मी सितारों ब्राडली कूपर , ed helms , zach galifianakis , हीथर ग्राहम  , Justin Bartha , and Jeffrey Tambor .
the hangover tells the स्टोरी of फिल wenneck , stu दाम और एलन गार्नर , जो सफर to लास वेगास  for a bachelor party to celebrate their friend Doug Billings ' impending marriage .
However , Phil , Stu and Alan have no memory of the previous  रात्रि 's कार्यक्रम और जरूर ढूँढें डग पहले the  wedding can take place .
Lucas and Moore wrote the script  बाद कार्यपालिका निर्माता क्रिस bender 's dost disappeared और था a विशाल विधेयक बाद होने भेजा  to a strip club .
After Lucas and Moore sold it to the studio for $ 2 million , Philips  और जेरेमी garelick rewrote the स्क्रिप्ट to शामिल a बाघ as खूब as a subplot involving a baby और a पुलिस क्रूजर , और भी सहित  boxer Mike Tyson .
Filming took place in Nevada for  15 दिनों , और दौरान फिल्मांकन , the तीन प्रमुख अभिनेताओं ( कूपर , helms और galifianakis ) formed a दोस्ती  .
The Hangover was  released on जून 5 , 2009 , बनने a नाजुक  and commercial success .
It became the tenth-highest-grossing film  of 2009 , साथ a विश्वव्यापी सकल of over us  $ 467 million .
Critics  praised the फिल्मी 's comedic दृष्टिकोण लकिन criticized  it for its vulgarity .
The film won the  सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन गति चित्र – musical or कॉमेडी  , and received multiple other accolades .
It is the tenth-highest-grossing film of 2009 in the  संसार , as खूब as the दूसरी highest-grossing r-rated कॉमेडी कभी in the संयुक्त राज्य , surpassing a रिकार्ड previously आयोजित  by Beverly Hills Cop for almost 25 years and later being surpassed by Ted in 2012 .
Out of all R-rated films , it is the third  highest-grossing कभी in the u.S. , पीछे तभी the जुनून of the मसीह और the मेट्रिक्स  Reloaded .
A sequel , The Hangover Part II , was released in 2011 , and a third  और फाइनल फिल्मी , the hangover  Part III , is set for release in 2013 .
Events  involving meiosis , प्रर्दशित chromosomal  crossover
meiosis ( ) is a खास प्रकार of कोशिका प्रभाग जरुरी  for sexual reproduction in eukaryotes .
The  कोशिकाएं उत्पादित by meiosis हैं  gametes or spores .
In many organisms  , सहित सब पशु और जमीन पौधे ( लकिन नहीं कुछ अन्य समूह ऐसे as fungi ) , गैमीट  are called sperm and egg cells .
Whilst the process of  meiosis bears a क्रमांक of similarities साथ the 'life-cycle ' कोशिका  division process of mitosis , it differs in two important respects:
the chromosomes in meiosis undergo a recombination which shuffles the genes producing a  अलग जेनेटिक संयोजन in प्रत्येक gamete , compared साथ the co-existence of प्रत्येक of the दो पृथक pairs of प्रत्येक chromosome ( एक प्राप्त इससे प्रत्येक जनक ) in  each cell which results from mitosis .
the outcome of meiosis is  potentially चार ( genetically अद्वितीय ) अगुणित कोशिकाएं , compared साथ the दो ( genetically एकसमान ) द्विगुणित  cells produced from mitosis .
Meiosis begins with one diploid cell containing two copies of  प्रत्येक chromosome —one इससे the सजीव 's माँ और एक इससे इसके पिता  .
The cell divides twice , potentially producing  up to चार अगुणित कोशिकाएं containing एक नक़ल of प्रत्येक chromosome  .
( `` Potentially '' because in some  मामले , ऐसे as the गठन of oocytes in स्तनधारियों , तभी एक of  the possible four haploid cells survives . )
In animals the haploid cell  resulting इससे meiosis is a पुरूष or मादा gamete  .
Each of the resulting chromosomes in the gamete  कोशिकाएं is a अद्वितीय मिश्रण of मातृ और पैतृक डीएनए , resulting in औलाद कि हैं genetically पृथक इससे  either parent .
This gives rise to genetic diversity in  sexually reproducing populations  .
This genetic diversity can provide the variation of physical and behavioural attributes ( phenotypes ) upon  जिससे प्राकृतिक चयन can अधिनियम , लकिन , as वर्णित नीचे in खण्ड 6 , उत्पत्ति और फलन of meiosis , the जेनेटिक विविधता may be largely a by-product of the समजात recombination कि is primarily employed  for its DNA repair function during meiosis .
It is also noteworthy that during meiosis , specific genes are more highly transcribed , and these are called the  meiome , the पद प्रयुक्त in कार्यात्मक जीनोमिक्स लिये the meiotic transcriptome  .
Meiosis is a key feature for all sexually  reproducing eukaryotes in जिससे समजात chromosome pairing , अन्तर्ग्रथन और recombination  occur .
In addition to strong meiotic stage-specific expression of mRNA ( the meiome ) , however ,  वहीँ हैं भी pervasive translational नियंत्रण ( e.g . चयनात्मक उपयोग  of preformed mRNA ) , regulating the ultimate meiotic stage-specific protein expression of genes during meiosis .
Thus  , दोनो the meiome और translational नियंत्रण determine the व्यापक restructuring of meiotic कोशिकाएं needed to carry  out meiosis .
Prior to the meiosis process the cell 's chromosomes are  duplicated by a गोलाकार of डीएनए replication , बनाना इससे the मातृ और पैतृक संस्करण of प्रत्येक chromosome ( homologs ) दो सटीक नक़ल  , sister chromatids , attached at the centromere region .
In  the शुरूआत of meiosis the मातृ  and paternal homologs pair to each other .
Then they typically exchange parts by homologous recombination leading to  crossovers of डीएनए between the मातृ और पैतृक संस्करण of the chromosome  .
Spindle fibers bind to the  centromeres of प्रत्येक जोड़ी of homologs और arrange the pairs at the spindle  equator .
Then the  मछली खींचो the recombined homologs to विपरीत  poles of the cell .
As the chromosomes move away from the center the cell  divides into दो बेटी कोशिकाएं , प्रत्येक containing a अगुणित क्रमांक of गुणसूत्रों रचित of दो chromatids  .
After the recombined maternal  और पैतृक homologs have अलग into the दो बेटी कोशिकाएं ,  a second round of cell division occurs .
There meiosis ends as the two sister chromatids making up each homolog are  अलग और मूव into एक of the चार resulting gamete  cells .
Upon fertilization , for example when a  शुक्राणु enters an अंडा कोशिका , दो gamete कोशिकाएं उत्पादित by  meiosis fuse .
The  gamete इससे the माँ और the gamete इससे the पिता प्रत्येक योगदान  one half of the set of chromosomes that make up the new offspring 's genome .
Meiosis uses many of the same mechanisms as mitosis , a type of cell division  प्रयुक्त by eukaryotes जैसे पौधे और पशु to विभाजित एक कोशिका into दो एकसमान  daughter cells .
In all plants and in many protists  meiosis परिणाम in the गठन of बीजाणुओं : अगुणित कोशिकाएं कि can divide vegetatively बगैर  undergoing fertilization .
Boxing ( pugilism , prize fighting , the sweet science or in Greek  pygmachia ) is a martial आर्ट और कॉम्बैट खेल in जिससे दो लोगों engage in a प्रतियोगिता of शक्ति  , speed , reflexes , endurance and will by throwing punches with gloved hands .
Amateur boxing is an Olympic and Commonwealth  खेल और is a आम fixture in सबसे of the प्रमुख अंतरराष्ट्रीय खेल - it भी रै इसके  own World Championships .
Boxing is supervised by a referee  over a श्रेणी of one- to three-minute intervals  called rounds .
The result is  decided जब an प्रतिद्वन्दी is deemed incapable to continue by a रेफरी , is disqualified लिये तोड़कर a नियम , resigns  by throwing in a towel , or is pronounced the winner or loser based on the judges ' scorecards at the end of the contest .
The birth hour of boxing as a sport may be its  स्वीकृति by the प्राचीन यूनानियों as an ओलम्पिक खेल as जल्दी as 688  BC .
Boxing evolved from 16th- and 18th-century prizefights , largely in  ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , to the forerunner of आधुनिक मुक्केबाज़ी in the mid-19th सदी , again initially in ग्रेट ब्रिटेन  and later in the United States .
In  2004 , ईएसपीएन क्रमित मुक्केबाज़ी as the सबसे मुश्किल  sport in the world .
Agreement or concord  happens जब a शब्द परिवर्तन रूप depending on the अन्य  words to which it relates .
It is an instance of inflection , and  प्रायः involves बनाना the मान of कुछ व्याकरणिक श्रेणी  ( such as gender or person ) `` agree '' between different words or parts of the sentence .
For example , in Standard English ,  एक may कह i am or he is , लकिन नहीं `` i is ''  or `` he am '' .
This is because the  व्याकरण of the भाषा requires कि the क्रिया और इसके  subject agree in person .
The  pronouns i और he हैं पहला और तीसरा व्यक्ति  respectively , as are the verb forms am and is .
The verb form  जरूर be चयनित so कि it रै the वही  person as the subject .
The agreement based on overt  व्याकरणिक श्रेणी as ऊपर is औपचारिक अनुबंध , in कंट्रास्ट to notional अनुबंध , जिससे  is based on meaning .
For instance , the phrase The United States is treated as singular for  उद्देश्य of अनुबंध , भी हालांकि it is formally बहुवचन  .
This is  a सूची of स्थान नीचे औसत समुद्र स्तर कि हैं  on land .
Places in tunnels , mines , basements , dug holes ( also with open sky ) , under water ,  अंतर्गत बर्फ , or मौजूदा temporarily as a परिणाम of ebbing of समुद्र tide इत्यादि . हैं नहीं शामिल  .
All  आंकड़े हैं in मीटर नीचे समुद्र level:
Debbie Macomber ( born October 22 , 1948 in Yakima , Washington ) is a  best-selling अमरीकी लेखक of over 150 रोमांस novels और  contemporary women 's fiction .
over 140 लाख नक़ल of उसके किताबे हैं in छपाई throughout the संसार , और  four have become made-for-TV-movies .
Macomber was the inaugural winner of the fan-voted Quill Award for romance in 2005 and  रै महरूम awarded दोनो a रोमांस लेखक of अमेरिका रीता और a आजीवन उपलब्धि पुरस्कार by the रोमांस  Writers of America .
Catonsville is a  census-designated प्लेस ( cdp ) in बाल्टीमोर  County , Maryland , United States .
The population  थी 41,567 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  .
The  जातियाँ झूठ to the वेस्ट of बाल्टीमोर साथ the  city 's border .
Catonsville is the home  of the विश्वविद्यालयों of मेरीलैंड , बाल्टीमोर काउंटी ( umbc ) , a पब्लिक  research university with over 12,000 students .
A lawyer , according to Black 's  विधि शब्दकोष , is `` a व्यक्ति सीखे in the विधि ; as an attorney  , counsel or solicitor ; a person who is practicing law . ''
Law is the system of  नियम of conduct स्थापित by the sovereign सरकारी of a समाज to सही  wrongs , maintain the stability of political and social authority , and deliver justice .
Working as a lawyer involves the practical application of  अमूर्त विधिक theories और ज्ञान to solve विशिष्ट individualized समस्याएं , or to अग्रिम the रूचि of those जो  retain ( i.e. , hire ) lawyers to perform legal services .
The role of the lawyer varies  significantly आरपार विधिक jurisdictions , और so it can be treated यहाँ in तभी the सबसे  general terms .
Vector  विपणन is the घरेलू बिक्री भुजा of cutco निगम , an olean  , New York based cutlery manufacturer .
The Family and Medical Leave Act of 1993 ( FMLA  ) is a संयुक्त राज्य संघीय विधि requiring covered नियोक्ता to provide कर्मचारी job-protected और unpaid  leave for qualified medical and family reasons .
Qualified medical and family reasons include : personal or  परिवार बीमारी , परिवार सैन्य छोड़ , गर्भावस्था , अपनाना , or the फोस्टर  care placement of a child .
The FMLA is administered  by the मजदूरी और घंटा प्रभाग of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग  of Labor .
The bill was a  प्रमुख भाग of अध्यक्ष विधेयक क्लिंटन 's कार्यसूची in उसके  first term .
अध्यक्ष क्लिंटन हस्ताक्षरित the विधेयक into विधि on फ़रवरी 5 , 1993 ( ; 29 u.s.c . सेक . 2601 ; 29  CFR 825 ) and it took effect on August 5 , 1993 , six months later .
The FMLA was intended  `` to संतुलन the मांगे of the कार्यस्थल साथ the  needs of families . ''
the अधिनियम allows योग्य कर्मचारी to लो up to 12 कार्य सप्ताह of unpaid छोड़ दौरान कोई 12-month काल to attend to the गंभीर स्वास्थ्य कंडीशन  of the employee , parent , spouse or child , or for pregnancy or care of a newborn child , or for adoption or foster care of a child .
In order to be eligible for  fmla छोड़ , an कर्मचारी जरूर have महरूम at the कारोबार at तनिक 12 महीने , और worked at तनिक 1,250 घंटों over the पास्ट 12 महीने , और कार्य at a  location where the company employs 50 or more employees within 75 miles .
The FMLA  कवर दोनो public- और private-sector कर्मचारी , लकिन निश्चित श्रेणी of कर्मचारी हैं  excluded , including elected officials and their personal staff members .
The Vietnam War (  ) थी a ठंडा युद्ध -era सैन्य विरोध कि occurred in वियतनाम , लाओस , और कंबोडिया इससे 1 नवम्बर  1955 to the fall of Saigon on 30 April 1975 .
This war followed the First Indochina War and  थी लड़ा between उत्तर वियतनाम , समर्थित by इसके कम्युनिस्ट allies , और the सरकारी of दक्षिण  Vietnam , supported by the United States and other anti-communist countries .
The Viet Cong ( also known as the National Liberation Front , or NLF ) , a lightly armed  दक्षिण वियतनामी कम्युनिस्ट आम सामने निर्देशित by the उत्तर , largely लड़ा a छापामार युद्ध  against anti-communist forces in the region .
The Vietnam People 's Army (  उत्तर वियतनामी फौज ) सगाई in a अधिक conventional युद्ध , at टाइम्स  committing large units into battle .
u.S. और दक्षिण वियतनामी शक्तियां relied on एयर बड़प्पन और overwhelming firepower to conduct ढूंढें और नष्ट परिचालन  , involving ground forces , artillery , and airstrikes .
The U.S. government viewed involvement in the war  as a रास्ता to prevent a कम्युनिस्ट कब्ज़ा of दक्षिण वियतनाम as भाग of उनके  wider strategy of containment .
The North  वियतनामी सरकारी और viet cong यहूद लड़ to reunify  Vietnam under communist rule .
They viewed the conflict as a colonial  युद्ध , लड़ा initially विरूद्ध फ़्रांस , समर्थित by the u.S. , और बाद विरूद्ध दक्षिण  Vietnam , which it regarded as a U.S. puppet state .
American military advisors  arrived in कया थी तब फ्रेंच इंडोचायना शुरूआत  in 1950 .
U.S. involvement escalated in the early  1960s , साथ troop स्तर tripling in 1961 और tripling again  in 1962 .
U.S. combat units  यहूद तैनात शुरूआत in 1965  .
Operations spanned international  सीमायें , साथ लाओस और कंबोडिया heavily bombed  .
American  भागीदारी in the युद्ध peaked in 1968 , at the समय of  the Tet Offensive .
After this , U.S.  मैदान शक्तियां यहूद धीरे withdrawn as भाग of a नीति  known as Vietnamization .
Despite the Paris Peace Accords  , हस्ताक्षरित by सब पार्टियों in जनवरी 1973 , लड़ जारी  .
U.S. military  भागीदारी ended on 15 अगस्त 1973 as a परिणाम of the case–church amendment passed  by the U.S. Congress .
The capture of Saigon by the  वियतनाम लोगों 's फौज in अप्रैल 1975 चिह्नित the समाप्त of the युद्ध , और उत्तर और दक्षिण  Vietnam were reunified the following year .
The war exacted a huge human cost in  शर्तें of fatalities ( देखिए वियतनाम युद्ध हताहत )  .
estimates of the क्रमांक of वियतनामी सैनिको और नागरिकों मारे vary  from 800,000 to 3.1 million .
Some 200,000–300,000 Cambodians ,  20,000–200,000 laotians , और 58,220 u.S. सेवा  members also died in the conflict .
Cleveland Volcano in the Aleutian Islands of Alaska  photographed इससे the अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्पेस स्टेशन , may 2006 .
Ash plumes reached a height of 19 km during  the climactic फटना at माउंट pinatubo , फिलीपीन  in 1991 .
A volcano is an opening , or  rupture , in a ग्रह 's सतह or क्रस्ट , जिससे allows hot मैग्मा , volcanic राख और गैसों to एस्केप  from the magma chamber below the surface .
ज्वालामुखी हैं generally मिला जहाँ tectonic  plates are diverging or converging .
A mid-oceanic ridge , for example the Mid-Atlantic Ridge ,  रै उदाहरण of ज्वालामुखी caused by अपसारी tectonic प्लेटों pulling अलावा ; the प्रशांत रिंग of आग रै उदाहरण of ज्वालामुखी caused by  convergent tectonic plates coming together .
By  कंट्रास्ट , ज्वालामुखी हैं प्रायः नहीं निर्मित जहाँ दो tectonic  plates slide past one another .
Volcanoes  can भी रूप जहाँ वहीँ is stretching और thinning of the धरती 's क्रस्ट in the इंटीरियर्स of प्लेटों , e.g. , in the ईस्ट अफ़्रीकी दरार , the  Wells Gray-Clearwater volcanic field and the Rio Grande Rift in North America .
This type of volcanism falls under the  छतरियाँ of `` थाली परिकल्पना '' volcanism  .
Volcanism  दूर इससे थाली सीमाएँ रै भी महरूम समझाया as  mantle plumes .
These so-called `` hotspots `` , for  उदाहरण हवाई , हैं postulated to उठता इससे upwelling diapirs साथ मैग्मा  from the core–mantle boundary , 3,000 km deep in the Earth .
Erupting  ज्वालामुखी can पोज़ अनेक जोखिमों , नहीं तभी in the तात्कालिक  vicinity of the eruption .
Volcanic ash  can be a threat to वायुयान , in particular those  with jet engines where ash particles can be melted by the high operating temperature .
Large eruptions can affect temperature as ash and droplets of  sulfuric एसिड अस्पष्ट the सूर्य और कूल the धरती 's निम्नतर माहौल or क्षोभमण्डल ; however , वे भी अवशोषित  heat radiated up from the Earth , thereby warming the stratosphere .
Historically , so-called volcanic  सर्दियों have caused अनर्थकारी  famines .
A deep  pothole on नई यॉर्क नगर 's दूसरी  Avenue
A pothole ( sometimes called a  केतली और ज्ञात in भाग of the पश्चिमी संयुक्त राज्य as a chuckhole ) is a प्रकार of disruption in the सतह of a roadway जहाँ a  portion of the road material has broken away , leaving a hole .
Renal cell carcinoma ( RCC , also known as hypernephroma ) is a kidney cancer that originates in  the अस्तर of the proximal convoluted tubule , the बहुत छोटी tubes in the गुर्दा कि हस्तांतरण gf ( glomerular filtrate ) इससे the glomerulus to the  descending limb of the nephron .
RCC  is the सबसे आम प्रकार of गुर्दा कर्कट in वयस्कों ,  responsible for approximately 80 % of cases .
It is also known  to be the सबसे lethal of सब the genitourinary  tumors .
Initial treatment is most  commonly a कट्टरपंथी or आंशिक nephrectomy और remains the mainstay  of curative treatment .
Where the tumor is confined to the renal parenchyma , the 5-year survival rate  is 60-70 % , लकिन इस is lowered considerably जहाँ metastases  have spread .
It is relatively  resistant to विकिरण चिकित्सा और कीमोथेरेपी ,  although some cases respond to immunotherapy .
Targeted cancer therapies such as sunitinib ,  temsirolimus , bevacizumab , interferon-alpha , और sorafenib have improved the आउटलुक लिये  RCC .
Estée Lauder Companies ,  inc. is a निर्माता और marketer of प्रतिष्ठा skincare , मेकअप , महक और बाल  care products .
the कम्पनी रै इसके मुख्यालय in  Midtown Manhattan , New York City .
The peritoneum ( ) is the serous  झिल्ली कि फ़ॉर्म the अस्तर of the abdominal गुहा or the coelom —it कवर सबसे of the intra-abdominal ( or coelomic ) organs—in amniotes और कुछ invertebrates (  annelids , for instance ) .
It is composed of  a परत of mesothelium समर्थित by a पतला परत  of connective tissue .
The peritoneum  दोनो supports the abdominal अंगों और serves as a conduit लिये उनके  blood and lymph vessels and nerves .
The abdominal cavity ( the space bounded by the vertebrae ,  abdominal मांसपेशियां , diaphragm और श्रोणि मंजिल ) चाहिए नहीं be उलझन साथ the intraperitoneal स्पेस ( स्तिथ भीतर the abdominal गुहा , लकिन  wrapped in peritoneum ) .
The structures within the intraperitoneal space are called `` intraperitoneal '' ( e.g . the stomach ) ,  the structures in the abdominal गुहा कि हैं स्तिथ पीछे the intraperitoneal स्पेस हैं पुकारा `` retroperitoneal `` ( e.g . the गुर्दे ) , और those structures नीचे the intraperitoneal  space are called `` subperitoneal '' or `` infraperitoneal '' ( e.g . the bladder ) .
Modern 2.5 ''  ssd प्रयुक्त in उपभोक्ता लैपटॉप और डेस्कटॉप  computers .
DDR  sdram आधारित  SSD .
अधिकतम और  .
पीसीआई संलग्न io  Accelerator SSD
PCI-E  , dram , और नन्द आधारित  SSD .
It uses an external power  सप्लाई to मेक the dram  non-volatile .
A  solid-state ड्राइव ( ssd ) ( भी ज्ञात as a solid-state डिस्क or इलेक्ट्रॉनिक डिस्क , हालांकि it contains no वास्तविक `` डिस्क ''  of any kind ) is a data storage device using integrated circuit assemblies as memory to store data persistently .
ssd प्रौद्योगिकी उपयोग इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अंतरफलक संगत साथ परंपरागत  block input/output ( I/O ) hard disk drives .
ssds have no चलती mechanical components , जिससे फर्क उन्हें इससे परंपरागत electromechanical चुम्बकीय डिस्क ऐसे as  hard disk drives ( HDDs ) or floppy disks , which contain spinning disks and movable read/write heads .
Compared with electromechanical disks , SSDs are  typically कम susceptible to शारीरिक शॉक , much quieter , have निम्नतर अभिगम  time , and less latency .
However , while the  दाम of ssds रै जारी to मनाही in 2012 , ssds हैं स्टिल परिचय 7 to 8 टाइम्स अधिक महंगी  per unit of storage than HDDs .
Many SSDs use I/O interfaces developed for  मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव , यूँ permitting सरल बदलना in आम अनुप्रयोग  .
, most SSDs use  nand-based फ्लैश मेमोरी , जिससे retains आंकड़ा बगैर  power .
For applications requiring fast access , but not  necessarily आंकड़ा हठ बाद शक्ति घाटा , ssds may be constructed इससे random-access मेमोरी (  RAM ) .
Such devices may employ  पृथक शक्ति स्त्रोत , ऐसे as बैटरी ,  to maintain data after power loss .
Hybrid drives or solid state hybrid drives ( SSHD )  combine the सुविधाएँ of ssds और hdds in the वही ईकाई , containing a विशाल मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव और an ssd संचय to improve प्रदर्शन  of frequently accessed data .
These devices may  प्रस्ताव near-ssd प्रदर्शन लिये अनेक  applications .
Salmon roe ( left ) and sturgeon  caviar ( सही ) परोसा साथ माँ of पर्ल caviar spoons to  avoid tainting the taste of the caviar .
Ossetra caviar , salmon  creme fraiche , आलू shallot croquette  , basil oil , egg whites and yolks
Caviar , according to  the खाना और कृषि संगठन , is a उत्पाद बना इससे salt-cured fish-eggs of the  Acipenseridae family .
The roe can  be `` भैस '' ( non-pasteurized ) or pasteurized , साथ pasteurization  reducing its culinary and economic value .
traditionally the पद caviar refers तभी to roe इससे जंगली  sturgeon in the Caspian and Black Seas ( Beluga , Ossetra and Sevruga caviars ) .
Depending on the country , caviar may also be used to describe the roe of other fish such  as सामन , steelhead , ट्राउट , lumpfish , whitefish , और अन्य प्रजाति  of sturgeon .
Caviar is considered a  लक्ज़री कोमलता और is खाया  as a garnish or a spread .
In 2012 ,  caviar बेची लिये $ 2,500 प्रति पाउंड ,  or $ 3,000 to $ 5,500 per kilo .
The SEC  संजाल is a टेलीविज़न अनुप्रयोग संजाल featuring सजीव प्रसारण of कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल और बास्केट कार्यक्रम  from the Southeastern Conference .
It is owned and operated by ESPN  प्लस और is दिखाया in अधिक than 50 प्रतिशत of households  in the United States , mostly Southeastern United States markets .
The SEC  संजाल typically airs in the नून पूर्वी स्लॉट कि थी पूर्व घर to the  Raycom Sports SEC game of the week .
Games are shown locally on  ब्रॉडकास्ट स्टेशन , क्षेत्रीय खेल संजाल , as खूब as on ईएसपीएन gameplan , ईएसपीएन  Full Court , and ESPN3.com .
The SEC Network is also  उपलब्धियाँ in कनाडा via अटलांटा  's WPCH-TV .
The SEC Network uses the same on-screen  ग्राफिक्स फिलहाल प्रयुक्त by ईएसपीएन on एबीसी , a संस्करण of ईएसपीएन  's graphics package .
SEC Network  's फ़ुटबॉल प्रोग्रामिंग स्टिल उपयोग a शीर्षक सुरक्षित क्षेत्रफल क्युकी सबसे of इसके affiliates do नहीं letterbox उनके मानक परिभाषा फ़ीड्स , जबकि ईएसपीएन 's टेलीविज़न संजाल have अनुमत उनके  graphics to abandon the title safe , but letterbox for SD viewers .
Starting  साथ the सेक 2012 बास्केट ऋतु , सेक संजाल 's ग्राफिक्स have  been converted to a 16:9 Widescreen-only format .
This is also being used for the  2013 बास्केट ऋतु , लकिन था स्टिल adapted the पूर्व 4:3-safe ग्राफिक्स स्वरूप लिये the 2012 सेक  football season .
The 1990s , pronounced and also known as `` the Nineteen-Nineties '' or abbreviated as ``  the nineties '' or `` the '90s '' , थी a दशक कि began on जनवरी 1 , 1990 , और ended on दिसम्बर 31  , 1999 .
It was the 10th and last decade of the 20th  सदी और the 100th और पिछला दशक of the 2nd मिलेनियम  .
The decade is best known for the end of the Cold  युद्ध at the शुरूआत of the दशक और the विस्तार और व्यावसायीकरण of the  Internet during the second half of the decade .
In much of the West the 1990s is remembered as a period of unprecedented  सलाम और समृद्धि , हालांकि अनेक भाग of the so-called तीसरा संसार faced विभिन्न समस्याएं सहित नरसंहार , एड्स और नई or continuing जातीय तनाव  and civil wars .
Culturally speaking the decade was characterized by  the वृद्धि of बहुसंस्कृतिवाद और वैकल्पिक  media .
आंदोलनों ऐसे as grunge , the रेव झाँकी और हिप हॉप स्प्रेड around the संसार to यंग लोगों दौरान the दशक , aided  by then-new technology such as cable television and the Internet .
A combination of factors , including the mass mobilization of capital markets through  neoliberalism , the शुरूआत of the फैली अप्रसार of नई मीडिया ऐसे as the अंतरजाल , और the विच्छेद of the सोवियत संघ led to a realignment और reconsolidation  of economic and political power across the world , and within countries .
Income  असमानता among देशों in the संसार रोज़ sharply between the 1980s और the mid-1990s , पहले  levelling off and then falling after 2000 .
नई जातीय विरोध उभरा in अफ़्रीकी , the balkans और the काकेशस , the पूर्व  two which led to the Rwandan genocide and Bosnian genocide , respectively .
The United States began its current military  occupation of the मध्य ईस्ट दौरान the गर्मियाँ of 1990 साथ मरुस्थल शील्ड बाद it काटें बंद  a large portion of the world 's petroleum supply .
Signs of any resolution of tensions  between इसराईल और the अरब संसार remained elusive , हालांकि the आयरिश परेशानियों आए to a standstill  in 1998 with the Good Friday Agreement after 30 years of violence .
The  धूसर भेड़िया or धूसर भेड़िया ( canis lupus ) is a प्रजाति of canid देशी  to the wilderness and remote areas of North America , Eurasia , and North Africa .
It  is the largest सदस्य of इसके परिवार  , with males averaging , and females .
It is similar in  सामान्य रूप और proportions to a जर्मनी गड़रिये , or sled श्वान , लकिन रै a larger सिर , narrower छाती  , longer legs , straighter tail and bigger paws .
Its winter fur is long and bushy , and predominantly a mottled gray in  रंग , हालांकि nearly pure श्वेत , रेड , or भूरा  to black also occur .
Within the genus Canis , the gray wolf  represents a अधिक specialised और प्रगतिशील रूप than इसके छोटी cousins ( the कायोटी और सुनहरी jackal ) , as demonstrated by इसके morphological adaptations to शिकार विशाल शिकार , इसके अधिक मिलनसार प्रकृति और  its highly advanced expressive behavior .
It is a social animal , travelling in nuclear  परिवारों consisting of a पन्द्रहवें जोड़ी , accompanied by the जोड़ी  's adult offspring .
the धूसर भेड़िया is typically an apex परभक्षी throughout इसके दायरा ,  with only humans and tigers posing a serious threat to it .
It  फ़ीड्स primarily on विशाल ungulates , हालांकि it भी eats छोटी  animals , livestock , carrion , and garbage .
The gray  भेड़िया is एक of the संसार 's सबसे खूब शोधकार्य पशु  , with probably more books written about it than any other wildlife species .
It has a long history of association with humans , having been  despised और hunted in सबसे agricultural समुदायों due to इसके हमले on पशुधन , जबकि conversely होने आदरणीय  by some Native American tribes .
It  is the एकमात्र पूर्वज of the श्वान , जिससे थी  first domesticated in the Middle East .
Although the fear of wolves is  प्रचलित in अनेक इंसान समाजों , the बहुमत of अंकित हमले on लोगों have  been attributed to animals suffering from rabies .
Non-rabid wolves have attacked and killed  लोगों , मुख्यतः children , लकिन इस is असामान्य , as भेड़ियों हैं अपेक्षाकृत few , सजीव दूर इससे लोगों , और have महरूम सिखाया to  fear humans by hunters and shepherds .
Hunting and trapping has reduced the species ' range to , though its  स्टिल अपेक्षाकृत फैली दायरा और stable जनसांख्यिकी अर्थात् कि the प्रजाति is नहीं threatened at a वैश्विक स्तर , और is इसलिए  classified by the IUCN as Least Concern .
The Roman Empire ( ) was the post- Republican period of the  प्राचीन रोमन सभ्यता , characterised by an निरंकुश रूप of सरकारी और विशाल territorial holdings around the भूमध्यसागरीय in  Europe , Africa , and Asia .
The 500-year-old Roman Republic ,  जिससे preceded it , था महरूम destabilized through a श्रेणी of  civil wars .
अनेक कार्यक्रम चिह्नित the परिवर्तन इससे गणतंत्र to साम्राज्य , सहित जूलियस सीज़र 's नियुक्ति as perpetual तानाशाह ( 44 bc )  ; the Battle of Actium ( 31 BC ) ; and the granting of the honorific Augustus to Octavian by the Roman Senate ( 27 BC ) .
The first two centuries  of the साम्राज्य यहूद a काल of unprecedented स्थिरता और समृद्धि  known as the Pax Romana ( `` Roman Peace '' ) .
It reached its greatest  expanse दौरान the शासनकाल of त्राजान (  98–117 AD ) .
In the 3rd  सदी , the साम्राज्य underwent a संकट कि threatened इसके अस्तित्व , लकिन थी reunified और  stabilized under the emperors Aurelian and Diocletian .
ईसाइयों रोज़ to शक्ति in the 4th सदी , दौरान जिससे समय  a system of dual rule was developed in the Latin West and Greek East .
After the collapse of central government in the West in the 5th century , the  पूर्वी हाफ जारी as कया होता बाद be ज्ञात as the बीज़ान्टिन साम्राज्य  .
Because of the Empire 's vast extent and long endurance , the institutions and culture of Rome had a profound  और स्थायी influence on the विकास of भाषा , धर्म , वास्तुकला , दर्शनशास्त्र , विधि , और फ़ॉर्म of सरकारी in the territory it governed , विशेषकर यूरोपीय , और by अर्थात् of यूरोपीय expansionism throughout  the modern world .
Education in the United States is mainly provided by the public  सेक्टर , साथ कंट्रोल और funding coming इससे तीन स्तर : लोकल , राज्य , और  federal , in that order .
Child education is compulsory , and there are also a large number  और चौड़ी किस्में of उच्चतर शिक्षा संस्थानों throughout the देश कि एक can चुनें to attend , दोनो सरेआम और  privately administered .
Public  शिक्षा is universally उपलब्धियाँ  .
स्कूल curricula , funding , शिक्षण , नियुक्ति , और अन्य नीतियों हैं नियत through locally निर्वाचित स्कूल  boards with jurisdiction over school districts with many directives from state legislatures .
स्कूल जिले हैं प्रायः पृथक इससे अन्य लोकल  jurisdictions , with independent officials and budgets .
Educational standards and  मानकीकृत परीक्षण निर्णय हैं प्रायः बना by राज्य सरकारें  .
The ages for  अनिवार्य शिक्षा vary by  state .
It begins from ages five  to आठ और ends इससे आयु  fourteen to eighteen .
Compulsory  शिक्षा आवश्यकताएँ can generally be संतुष्ट by educating children  in public schools , state-certified private schools , or an approved home school program .
In most public and private  स्कूलों , शिक्षा is विभाजित into तीन स्तर : elementary स्कूल , मध्य स्कूल ( sometimes पुकारा जूनियर ऊँची स्कूल ) , और ऊँची स्कूल  ( sometimes referred to as secondary education ) .
In almost all schools at these levels , children are divided by age groups into  ग्रेड , ranging इससे किंडरगार्टन ( followed by पहला ग्रेड ) लिये the youngest children in elementary स्कूल , up to  twelfth grade , the final year of high school .
The exact age range of  विद्यार्थी in ये ग्रेड स्तर varies थोड़ा  from area to area .
post-secondary शिक्षा , बेहतर ज्ञात as `` कॉलेज `` in the संयुक्त राज्य , is generally governed separately इससे  the elementary and high school system , and is described in a separate section below .
Government supported , free public schools for all started being established  बाद the क्रान्ति , और विस्तारित in the 19th सदी , as the परिणाम of प्रयत्न of  men like Horace Mann and Booker T. Washington .
By 1870 , all states had free elementary  स्कूलों , albeit तभी in शहरी centers  .
As the 20th century drew nearer ,  राज्य प्रारंभ गुजर कानून to मेक schooling अनिवार्य , और by 1910 , 72 प्रतिशत of children attended  school .
निजी स्कूलों जारी to स्प्रेड दौरान इस समय , as खूब  as colleges and—in the rural centers— land grant colleges .
The year  of 1910 भी देखी the पहला  true high schools .
During  the बाकी of the 20th सदी , शैक्षणिक प्रयत्न केन्द्रित  on reducing the inequality of the schooling system .
The landmark Supreme Court case Brown v. Board of  शिक्षा बना the desegregation of elementary और ऊँची स्कूलों a नेशनल प्रधानता , जबकि the pell ग्रान्ट  program helped poor minorities gain access to college .
खास शिक्षा थी बना into  federal law in 1975 .
The Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 made  मानकीकृत परीक्षण a आवश्यकता , और in 1983 , a आयोग थी स्थापित to evaluate उनके परिणाम और propose  a course of action .
The  resulting no चाइल्ड बाएँ पीछे अधिनियम of 2001 थी विवादास्पद  and its goals proved to be unrealistic .
A commission established in 2006  evaluated उच्चतर शिक्षा , लकिन इसके सुझाव have yet to be fully  implemented .
Paul Bragg ( February  6 , 1895 – दिसम्बर 7 , 1976 ) , nutritionist , थी a पायोनियर in america’s  wellness movement .
Health spending  प्रति capita , in $ us ppp-adjusted , साथ the us और कनाडा compared  amongst other first world nations .
तुलना of the स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रणालियों in कनाडा और the संयुक्त  States are often made by government , public health and public policy analysts .
the दो देशों था समान स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रणालियों  before Canada reformed its system in the 1960s and 1970s .
the संयुक्त राज्य खर्च much अधिक धन on स्वास्थ्य परवाह than कनाडा ,  on both a per-capita basis and as a percentage of GDP .
In 2006 ,  per-capita बिता लिये स्वास्थ्य परवाह in कनाडा थी us  $ 3,678 ; in the U.S. , US $ 6,714 .
the u.S. खर्च 15.3 % of जीडीपी on स्वास्थ्य परवाह  in that year ; Canada spent 10.0 % .
In 2006 , 70 % of health  परवाह बिता in कनाडा थी financed by  government , versus 46 % in the United States .
Total government spending per  capita in the u.S. on स्वास्थ्य परवाह थी 23 % उच्चतर than कनाडाई सरकारी बिता , और u.S. सरकारी व्यय on स्वास्थ्य परवाह थी बस अंतर्गत 83 %  of total Canadian spending ( public and private ) though these statistics do n't take into account population differences .
Studies have come to different  conclusions परिचय the परिणाम of इस disparity in बिता  .
A 2007 review of all studies comparing health outcomes in Canada and the US in a Canadian peer-reviewed medical journal found that `` health outcomes  may be श्रेष्ठ in मरीजों cared लिये in कनाडा बनाम the संयुक्त राज्य , लकिन मतभेद हैं नहीं सतत  . ''
Life expectancy is  longer in कनाडा , और इसके शिशु मृत्यु रेट is निम्नतर than कि of the u.S. , लकिन वहीँ  is debate about the underlying causes of these differences .
One commonly  cited तुलना , the 2000 संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन 's दरजा of `` overall स्वास्थ्य सेवा प्रदर्शन '' , जिससे प्रयुक्त a `` कम्पोजिट  measure of achievement in the level of health , the distribution of health , the level of responsiveness and fairness of financial contribution '' , ranked Canada 30th and the US 37th among 191 member nations .
This study rated the US `` responsiveness '' , or  विशेषता of सेवा लिये individuals receiving उपचार , as 1st , compared साथ  7th for Canada .
While the average life expectancy for Canadians was 80.34 years compared with 78.6  सालो लिये निवासियों of the us , बस comparing the जीवन प्रत्याशा of दो समूह साथ अलग जातिगत मेकअप और अलग मोटापा दरों is संभावित नहीं an प्रभावी रास्ता  of determining which healthcare system is superior .
the जो 's पढ़ाई विधि यहूद  criticized by some analyses .
Although there is a  माप of सर्वसम्मति कि life-expectancy और शिशु मृत्यु चिह्नित the सबसे विश्वसनीय तरीके to compare nation-wide स्वास्थ्य परवाह , assuming the जनसांख्यिकी मेकअप is समान , a हाल रपट by the congressional शोध  Service carefully summarizes some recent data and notes the `` difficult research issues '' facing international comparisons .
The sound source has now broken through the sound speed  अवरोध , और is traveling at 1.4 टाइम्स the गति of ध्वनि , ( mach 1.4  ) .
Since the source is moving  तेज़ ( साथ a गति ) than the ध्वनि लहरें it creates  , it actually leads the advancing wavefront .
The sound source will pass  by a stationary निरीक्षक ( साथ a गति ) पहले the निरीक्षक  actually hears the sound it creates .
As a  परिणाम , an निरीक्षक in सामने of the  source will detect
and an observer  पीछे the सोर्स  .
A sonic boom produced  by an वायुयान चलती at m=2.92 , गणना  from the cone angle of 20 degrees .
An observer hears the boom when  the शॉक वेव , on the किनारे of the कोन , crosses  his or her location .
mach कोन कोण
A sonic boom is the sound associated with the shock  लहरें निर्मित by an ऑब्जेक्ट traveling through the एयर तेज़ than the गति  of sound .
Sonic booms generate enormous  amounts of ध्वनि उर्जा , sounding much जैसे an विस्फोट  .
The crack of a supersonic  गोली गुजर ओवरहेड is an  example of a sonic boom in miniature .
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno is  an अमरीकी late-night बात दिखाएँ hosted by jay लीनो कि initially aired इससे may 25 , 1992 to may 29 , 2009 , और resumed उत्पादन on कूच  1 , 2010 .
The fourth incarnation of the Tonight  दिखाएँ मताधिकार बना इसके डेब्यू on may 25 , 1992 , तीन दिनों following जॉनी कार्सन 's  retirement as host of the program .
The program originates from NBC  studios in burbank , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , और is ब्रॉडकास्ट सोमवार through शुक्रवार at 11:35 pm in the पूर्वी और प्रशांत  time zones ( 10:35 PM Central / Mountain time ) .
Unlike  कार्सन or उसके पूर्ववर्ती जोकर paar , लीनो तभी एकबार utilized a अतिथि मेजबान ,  preferring to host the series by himself .
On April 26 , 1999 , the show began  प्रसारण in 1080i hdtv , बनने the पहला अमरीकी nightly बात  show to be shot in high definition .
The show  is शॉट in 16:9 पहलू अनुपात  .
The series , which  followed the वही मौलिक स्वरूप as कि of उसके पूर्ववर्तियों ( an खोलने monologue followed  by comedy routines , interviews and performances ) , ran until May 29 , 2009 , after which Leno was succeeded by Conan O'Brien .
एनबीसी हस्ताक्षरित लीनो to a नई सौदे लिये a nightly  talk show in the 10:00 pm ET timeslot .
The primetime series , titled The Jay Leno Show , debuted on  सितंबर 14 , 2009 , following a समान स्वरूप to the लीनो अवतार  of Tonight .
Neither O'Brien 's  संस्करण of the कार्यक्रम , जिससे premiered जून 1 , 2009 , nor the  Jay Leno Show generated the ratings that NBC had expected .
The network decided to move a  सघन 30-minute संस्करण of लीनो 's दिखाएँ to o'brien 's समय स्लॉट , और  O'Brien 's Tonight Show a half-hour later .
इस निर्णय मिले साथ विपक्ष इससे o'brien , जिनकी कार्यावधि on the tonight दिखाएँ ended जनवरी  22 , 2010 , after which he began his own talk show on TBS .
The Tonight Show with Jay Leno then began its second and  वर्तमान अवतार , the छठे of the मताधिकार , on कूच 1 ,  2010 .
RFID chip  अगला to a अनाज  of rice .
इस चिप contains a radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड कुंडली कि modulates an बाह्य चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र  a coded identification number when queried by a reader device .
This small type is incorporated in consumer products  , और implanted in पालतु , लिये पहचान  purposes .
Radio-frequency  पहचान ( rfid ) is the बेतार non-contact उपयोग of radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र आंकड़ा  , for the purposes of automatically identifying and tracking tags attached to objects .
The tags contain  electronically भंडारित सूचना  .
Some  टैग हैं संचालित और पढ़ा at छोटी सीमाएँ ( a few मीटर  ) via magnetic fields ( electromagnetic induction ) .
Others use a local power source such as a battery , or else  have no बैटरी लकिन collect उर्जा इससे the interrogating em फ़ील्ड , और तब अधिनियम as a passive transponder to emit microwaves or uhf रेडियो लहरें ( i.e. , इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  radiation at high frequencies ) .
Battery  संचालित टैग may operate at सैंकड़ों  of meters .
नापसंद a बार कोड , the टैग करता नहीं necessarily need to be भीतर लकीर of  sight of the reader , and may be embedded in the tracked object .
RFID tags are used in  अनेक उद्योग .
An RFID tag attached to an  ऑटोमोबाइल दौरान उत्पादन can be प्रयुक्त to track इसके प्रगति  through the assembly line .
दवाएँ can be tracked through warehouses  .
Livestock and pets may have tags injected ,  allowing धनात्मक पहचान of the एनिमल  .
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing ,  possessions , or भी implanted भीतर लोगों , the सम्भावना of पढना personally-linked सूचना  without consent has raised privacy concerns .
Id , ego and super-ego are the three parts of the psychic  apparatus पारिभाषित in सिग्मुंड फ्रायड 's संरचनात्मक मॉडल of the psyche ; वे हैं the तीन सैद्धांतिक constructs in शर्तें of जिनकी कार्यकलाप और  interaction mental life is described .
According to this model of the psyche , the id is the set of uncoordinated instinctual trends ; the super-ego plays the  नाजुक और moralizing भूमिका ; और the अहंकार is the व्यवस्थित , यथार्थवादी भाग कि mediates between the इच्छाओं of  the id and the super-ego .
The  super-ego can रोकें तुम इससे doing निश्चित बाते कि अपना  id may want you to do .
Even though the model is structural and makes reference to an apparatus , the id  , अहंकार और super-ego हैं कृत्यों of the दिमाग बल्कि than भाग of the दिमाग और do नहीं correspond one-to-one साथ वास्तविक  somatic structures of the kind dealt with by neuroscience .
The concepts themselves arose at a late stage in the development of Freud 's thought : the `` structural model '' ( which succeeded his `` economic  मॉडल '' और `` topographical मॉडल '' ) थी पहला discussed in उसके 1920 निबन्ध `` परे the ख़ुशी principle `` और थी formalized और elaborated upon तीन सालो बाद  in his `` The Ego and the Id `` .
Freud 's  प्रस्ताव थी बहकावे by the ambiguity of the पद `` बेहोश ``  and its many conflicting uses .
एयर फ़ोर्स  ROTC emblem
The Air Force Reserve Officer Training Corps ( AFROTC ) is one of the three primary commissioning sources for officers in the  संयुक्त राज्य एयर फ़ोर्स , the अन्य दो होने the संयुक्त राज्य एयर फ़ोर्स अकादमी ( usafa ) और एयर फ़ोर्स अधिकारी प्रशिक्षण स्कूल  ( OTS ) .
A subordinate command of the Air University within the Air Education and  प्रशिक्षण कमांड ( aetc ) , afrotc is लकीर अंतर्गत the jeanne M. holm बीच लिये अधिकारी accessions और नागरिक विकास  at Maxwell AFB , Alabama .
The Holm Center , formerly known as the Air Force  अधिकारी accession और प्रशिक्षण स्कूलों ( afoats ) , retains सीधा जिम्मेदारी लिये दोनो afrotc और  OTS .
AFROTC is the largest and  oldest सोर्स of commissioned अधिकारियों लिये the u.S. एयर फ़ोर्स  .
AFROTC 's stated mission is to produce quality  नेताओ लिये the u.S.  Air Force .
AFROTC units are located on 144 college and university campuses with 984 additional institutions of higher learning participating in cross-town  समझौतों कि allow उनके विद्यार्थी to attend afrotc वर्ग at a आसपास `` मेजबान '' कॉलेज or विश्वविद्यालयों  .
According to  afoats hq , in 2006 , afrotc commissioned 2,083 यूएसएएफ दूसरी lieutenants , साथ afrotc नामांकन ranging इससे 23,605 in 1985 to 10,231 in  1993 , and around 13,000 enrolled today .
AFROTC units at colleges and universities are called ``  detachments , '' और हैं typically headed by an क्रियाशील ड्यूटी यूएसएएफ अधिकारी in the रैंक of कर्नल or लेफ्टिनेंट कर्नल जो कृत्यों as दोनो the detachment कमांडर लिये यूएसएएफ  purposes and with the nominal title of Professor of Aerospace Studies ( PAS ) within the institution 's academic community .
सबसे कॉलेजों और विश्वविद्यालयों होगा designate  the AFROTC detachment as the Department of Aerospace Studies .
The PAS is  assisted by तीन to चार सहायक professors of aerospace अध्ययन  ( APAS ) , all active duty USAF officers in the ranks of major or captain .
Three USAF non-commissioned officers and one senior non-commissioned officer  होगा typically provide सैन्य प्रशासनिक support और हैं प्रायः augmented by एक to दो  civilian staff support employees of the academic institution .
Within  afrotc detachments , the विद्यार्थी ( referred to as `` cadets '' ) हैं व्यवस्थित into विंग्स , समूह , squadrons  , and flights , mirroring the USAF functional wing structure .
The AFROTC detachment 's cadet wing or cadet group is separated into two divisions : the General Military Course ( GMC )  consisting of the पहला दो सालो of प्रशिक्षण , और the पेशेवर अधिकारी कोर्स ( poc  ) consisting of the last two years of training .
The AFROTC program is also divided into two training functions : the Academic  कक्षा कार्यक्रम ( aerospace अध्ययन वर्ग ) और cadet क्रियाएँ ( i.e. , नेतृत्व प्रयोगशाला ,  Physical Training , and other training ) .
Paper density ( also known as basis weight and grammage ) is a term used in the pulp and paper industry and also  लिये कपड़ा उद्योग to denote a माप of द्रव्यमान of the उत्पाद प्रति ईकाई of क्षेत्रफल लिये a प्रकार of कपड़ा  , paper or paperboard .
The term `` density '' is  नहीं प्रयुक्त in इसके परंपरागत भाव of द्रव्यमान प्रति  unit volume .
``  पेपर घनत्व '' , बल्कि , is a माप  of the area density .
Paper products that let  छोटी or no लाइट pass through ( e.g . पोस्टर फलक ) हैं  considered dense or heavy .
Paper products that allow some light to  pass through ( e.g . ऊतक पेपर ) हैं माना  lightweight .
In the pulp and paper industry , it is common  to नियत a वाणिज्यिक पेपर यंत्र to उपज पेपर to a  target paper density .
Paper density can also be used to  फर्क पेपर इससे paperboard as the latter प्रायः रै a grammage वृहद than 134 g/m2 .
Two  तरीके of expressing पेपर घनत्व हैं  commonly used:
Expressed in grams per square meter ( g/m2  ) , पेपर घनत्व is भी  known as grammage .
This is the measure  प्रयुक्त in सबसे भाग of the  world .
Expressed in terms of the  द्रव्यमान ( expressed as वज़न ) प्रति क्रमांक of चादरें , it is ज्ञात  as basis weight .
The convention used in the United States and a few other countries using US  पेपर आकार is पाउंड of a ream of 500 ( or in कुछ मामले 1000 ) चादरें  of a given ( raw , still uncut ) basis size .
Japanese paper is  expressed as the वज़न in kg of  1000 sheets .
Candace  निकोल पार्कर ( born अप्रैल 19 , 1986 ) is an अमरीकी बास्केट खिलाड़ी लिये the wnba 's  Los Angeles Sparks and UMMC Ekaterinburg of Russia .
She is  the younger सिस्टर of  NBA player Anthony Parker .
She  attended the विश्वविद्यालयों of टेनेसी और थी drafted  by the Sparks in 2008 .
She may be best known for being the first woman to dunk in an NCAA tournament game and the first woman to  डंक twice in a कॉलेज game—she नियत दोनो माइलस्टोन as a redshirt freshman on कूच 19 , 2006  .
She  भी became तभी the दूसरी खिलाड़ी to  dunk in a WNBA game on June 22 , 2008 .
A  बहुमुखी खिलाड़ी , वो is मुख्यतः a आगे , लकिन थी सूचीबद्ध on  Tennessee 's roster as a forward , center , and guard .
She was a starter  on the महिला vols बास्केट टोली , विजेता of the 2007 और 2008  NCAA championships .
Parker won the 2009  निकलोडियन बच्चे ' चुनाव पुरस्कार as the पसंदीदा मादा  athlete in the sports category .
And she was a guest star  on फिगर it  Out .
A food  मार्गदर्शिका पिरामिड is a पिरामिड तराशा मार्गदर्शिका of स्वस्थ भोजन विभाजित into भाग to दिखाएँ the  recommended intake for each food group .
The  पहला खाना पिरामिड थी प्रकाशित in स्वीडन  in 1974 .
The most widely known food  पिरामिड थी introduced by the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of कृषि in  the year 1992 , was updated in 2005 , and then replaced in 2011 .
Over 25 other countries and organisations have  भी प्रकाशित खाना पिरामिडों  .
Hans Christian Andersen ( ; often referred to in  scandinavia as H. C. andersen ; अप्रैल 2 , 1805august 4 , 1875 ) थी a डैनिश लेखक और कवि  .
हालांकि a सफल लेखक of plays , travelogues , novels , और कविताएं , andersen  is best remembered for his fairy tales , a literary genre he so mastered that he himself has become as mythical as the tales he wrote .
Andersen 's popularity is not limited to children ; his stories—called , or ``  fantastic किस्से '' —express विषयवस्तु कि transcend आयु  and nationality .
During his lifetime  he थी acclaimed लिये having प्रसन्न children विश्वव्यापी और थी feted by  royalty .
Andersen  's परी किस्से , जिससे have महरूम अनूदित into अधिक than 125 भाषाएं , have become culturally अंतःस्थापित in the वेस्ट 's सामूहिक चेतना , readily  accessible to children , but presenting lessons of virtue and resilience in the face of adversity for mature readers as well .
They have inspired motion  तस्वीरें , plays , नाटिकाओं , और एनिमेटेड films  .
Two figures locking eyes in  caravaggio 's the सौभाग्य  Teller
Eye  सम्पर्क occurs जब `` दो लोगों dekh at  each other 's eyes at the same time . ''
In human beings , eye contact is a form of nonverbal  संचार और is विचार to have a विशाल influence on सोशल बर्ताव .
Coined in the early to mid-1960s ,  the पद रै आइये in the वेस्ट to प्रायः define the अधिनियम as a सार्थक और महत्वपूर्ण चिह्न of विश्वास  and social communication .
The customs and significance  of नजर सम्पर्क vary widely between संस्कृतियों , साथ धार्मिक और सोशल मतभेद  often altering its meaning greatly .
The study  of नजर सम्पर्क is sometimes ज्ञात  as oculesics .
Bed bugs are parasitic insects  of the cimicid परिवार कि फीड exclusively  on blood .
The term most commonly  refers to सदस्यों of the genus cimex of जिससे cimex lectularius , the आम bed कीड़ा , is the बेहतरीन ज्ञात as it prefers to फीड on इंसान रक्त हालांकि अन्य cimex प्रजाति हैं specialized to अन्य  animals , e.g. , bat bugs , C. pipistrelli ( Europe ) , C. pilosellus ( western US ) , and C. adjunctus ( entire eastern US ) .
The name of the `` bed bug '' is derived from the  पसन्दीदा आवास of cimex lectularius : गरम घरों और विशेषकर आसपास or अंदर of beds  and bedding or other sleep areas .
Bed bugs are mainly  क्रियाशील at रात्रि , लकिन हैं नहीं exclusively  nocturnal .
They usually feed on  उनके होस्ट बगैर होने noticed  .
A number of adverse health effects may result  इससे bed कीड़ा bites , सहित स्किन  rashes , psychological effects , and allergic symptoms .
Diagnosis involves both finding bed bugs  और the occurrence of संगत लक्षण .
Bed bugs have been known  as इंसान परजीवी लिये हज़ारों of सालो  .
At a point in the  जल्दी 1940s , वे यहूद ज़्यादातर eradicated in the विकसित  world , but have increased in prevalence since 1995 .
Because  infestation of इंसान habitats रै महरूम on the बढ़ाएँ , bed  bug bites and related conditions have been on the rise as well .
The Book of Isaiah ( ) is the first of the Latter Prophets in  the यहूदी बाइबल , preceding ezekiel , यिर्मयाह और the किताब of the बारह  .
( The order of the  subsequent किताबे differs somewhat in the ईसाई बूढ़ा  Testament ) .
The first 39 chapters prophesy doom for a sinful Judah and for all the nations of the world that oppose God , while the last 27 prophesy the restoration of the nation of Israel and a new creation in God 's glorious future kingdom  ; इस खण्ड शामिल the गीतों of the कष्ट नौकर , चार पृथक passages referring to the स्वदेश of इसराईल , interpreted by ईसाइयों as prefiguring the coming of यीशु मसीह  .
Tradition ascribes authorship of the  किताब to यशायाह बेटे of amoz , लकिन अभी विद्वानों widely सहमत कि the किताब is the कार्य of तीन अलग लेखक - few विद्वानों इनकार इस दृश्य , और those कि do ,  do so for theological reasons .
The first , termed  proto-isaiah ( अध्याय 1–39 ) , contains the शब्द of the 8th-century bce नबी साथ 7th-century bce expansions ; the दूसरी , deutero-isaiah ( अध्याय 40–55 ) , is the कार्य of a 6th-century bce लेखक लिखने निकट the समाप्त of the babylonian captivity ; और  the third , the poetic Trito-Isaiah ( chapters 56–66 ) , was composed in Jerusalem shortly after the return from exile , probably by multiple authors .
Oregon State  विश्वविद्यालयों ( osu ) is a coeducational , पब्लिक शोध विश्वविद्यालयों स्तिथ in corvallis , ऑरेगॉन ,  United States .
The university offers undergraduate , graduate and  डॉक्टरेट डिग्री और a multitude of शोध अवसर  .
There are more  than 200 अकादमिक उपाधि कार्यक्रम offered  through the university .
OSU 's programs in  सूक्ष्मजैविकी , नाभिकीय अभियान्त्रिकी , पारिस्थितिकी , वानिकी , पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य , biochemistry , zoology , oceanography , खाना विज्ञान और फार्मेसी हैं  recognized nationally as top tier programs .
The OSU  's उदार कला कार्यक्रम have भी grown significantly और the विभाग is  considered a `` cornerstone '' of the institution .
More than 200,000 people have  attended osu चूंकि इसके founding .
The Carnegie  न्यास classifies ऑरेगॉन राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों as  part of its top tier of research institutions .
As  of 2008 , osu is एक of तभी seventy-three  land-grant universities .
The school is also recognized as a sea-grant , space-grant and sun-grant institution , making it one of only two US  संस्थानों to retain सब चार designations और the तभी पब्लिक विश्वविद्यालयों to do so ( कॉर्नेल is the तभी अन्य साथ समान designations  ) .
As one of the two flagship universities of the Oregon University  प्रणाली , osu receives अधिक funding लिये शोध , annually , than सब अन्य पब्लिक उच्चतर  education institutions in Oregon combined .
Female ejaculation is the expulsion of fluid by human  महिलाओं इससे the paraurethral नलिकाएं through और around the मादा urethra  during or before an orgasm .
It is also known colloquially as  gushing or squirting , हालांकि ये हैं माना to be अलग phenomena in  some research publications .
The exact source and nature of the fluid continue  to be a टॉपिक of बहस among चिकित्सा पेशेवर , जिससे is भी सम्बन्धित to संदेह over the अस्तित्व  of the G-Spot .
The Kanab ambersnail , scientific name Oxyloma haydeni kanabensis or Oxyloma kanabense , is a critically  endangered subspecies or प्रजाति of छोटी , air-breathing जमीन घोंघा , a स्थलीय pulmonate gastropod mollusc in the परिवार succineidae  , the amber snails .
The  आम नाम of the एम्बर घोंघे is आधारित on the शेल , जिससे is पारदर्शी  and when empty usually resembles amber in color .
This species is endemic to the United States , specifically the state of  एरिज़ोना और यूटा , जहाँ it थी पहला एकत्रित in the जल्दी 20th सदी  .
It has been listed as  endangered on the संयुक्त राज्य मछली और वन्यजीव सेवा सूची of endangered  species since 8 August 1991 .
This snail lives in wetlands , springs , and seeps , and  तभी दो of इसके प्राकृतिक habitats हैं ज्ञात to मौजूद : तीन झीलों , a मर्ग निकट kanab , यूटा , और vasey 's स्वर्ग , a वसन्त साथ the कोलोराडो  River within Grand Canyon National Park .
In its natural habitat it is rather  polyphagous , feeding मुख्यतः on जीवाणु , पौधे और fungi , और reproduces दौरान  the summer .
Now considered a Critically Endangered species on the IUCN Red List of Threatened  प्रजाति due to a श्रेणी of कारकों ( सहित influence ) , the kanab ambersnail रै महरूम reintroduced to तीन स्रोतों ऊपर the ऐतिहासिक ऊँची जल स्तर साथ the कोलोराडो नदी  .
the स्पेनी भाषा is the दूसरी सबसे प्रयुक्त भाषा  in the United States .
There are more Spanish speakers in the United States than there  हैं अध्यक्षों of चाइनीज , फ्रेंच , जर्मनी , इतालवी , हवाई , और the देशी  American languages combined .
According to  the 2010 अमरीकी जातियाँ सर्वेक्षण conducted by the u.S. जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो , स्पेनी is the प्राथमिक भाषा बोला at घर by लगभग  37 million people aged five or older , a figure more than double that of 1990 .
There are 45 million Hispanophones who speak Spanish as a first or second language , as well as six million Spanish language students , composing the largest national  spanish-speaking जातियाँ बाहर of मैक्सिको और बनाना स्पेनी the रोमांस भाषा और the indo-european भाषा साथ largest  number of native speakers in the world .
Roughly half of all  u.S. स्पेनी अध्यक्षों भी बोलो अंग्रेज़ी `` बहुत खूब , '' आधारित on the  self-assessment Census question respondents .
The language came to the country since the 16th and 17th centuries with the arrival  of स्पेनी colonists in क्षेत्रों कि होता बाद become the राज्य of फ्लोरिडा , टेक्सास , कोलोराडो , नई मैक्सिको , एरिज़ोना , नेवाडा , यूटा , और कैलिफ़ोर्निया और of the स्पेनी explorers  - who explored areas of 42 states- .
Also west of Louisiana Territory was Spanish between 1763 - 1800 ( year of the  फ्रेंच रिकवरी of territory ) , बाद the फ्रेंच और भारतीय  War .
After of the incorporation of these states to the U.S. in first half of 19th century , the Spanish language was later reinforced by the  अधिग्रहण of प्यूर्टो रीको in 1898 और by बाद लहरें of the हिस्पैनिक करणों , मूलरूप इससे हिस्पैनिक अमेरिका , to the संयुक्त  States beginning in the second half of 19th century until today .
