The Witch 's Finger in  the carlsbad caverns
A stalagmite ( or ;  इससे the यूनानी σταλαγμίτης - stalagmitês , इससे σταλαγμίας - stalagmias , `` छोड़ने , trickling '' ) is a प्रकार of speleothem कि उदय इससे  the floor of a limestone cave due to the dripping of mineralized solutions and the deposition of calcium carbonate .
इस stalagmite गठन occurs तभी अंतर्गत निश्चित ph शर्तें  within the underground cavern .
The corresponding  गठन on the छत of a गुफा is ज्ञात as a stalactite  .
If these formations grow  साथ , the परिणाम is ज्ञात as a कालम  .
The  हॉल of दिग्गज in the  Carlsbad Caverns
Stalagmites should normally not be touched , since the rock buildup is formed by minerals  precipitating आउट of the जल समाधान onto the बूढ़ा सतह ; स्किन oils can alter the सतह जहाँ the खनिज जल होगा चिपकी  , thus affecting the growth of the formation .
Oils and dirt from human  सम्पर्क can भी दाग the गठन और बदलें  its color permanently .
Similar  structures can भी रूप in लावा tubes , संबद्ध साथ कुछ प्रकार of lavacicles  , although the mechanism of formation is very different .
Stalactites and  stalagmites can भी रूप on कंक्रीट ceilings और floors , हालांकि वे रूप much अधिक rapidly  there than in the natural cave environment .
The largest stalagmite in the  संसार is ऊँची और is स्तिथ in the गुफा of cueva मार्टिन  Infierno , Cuba .
In the Zagros Mountains of south  इरान , लगभग इससे the प्राचीन नगर of bishapur , in the shapur गुफा on the चौथी of पाँच बरामदा स्टैंड the 3rd सदी ce प्रतिमा of shapur i , दूसरी  ruler of the Sassanid Empire .
the प्रतिमा , carved इससे एक stalagmite  , is nearly high .
How I Met Your  माँ is an अमरीकी sitcom कि premiered on  CBS on September 19 , 2005 .
The show was created by  क्रेग थामस और कार्टर  Bays .
How I Met Your Mother is framed by the year  2030 , जब टेड mosby ( voiced by bob saget ) gathers उसके बेटी ( lyndsy fonseca ) और बेटे ( दाउद henrie ) to बताना उन्हें the  story of how he met their mother .
We flashback to where it begins in 2005 with Ted Mosby ( Josh Radnor ) as a single , 27-year-old  वास्तु जीना साथ उसके दो बेहतरीन मित्रों इससे wesleyan विश्वविद्यालयों , मार्शल eriksen ( जेसन सेगल ) , a विधि छात्र , और लिली एल्ड्रिन ( alyson हनिंगन ) , a किंडरगार्टन टीचर , जो have महरूम  dating for almost nine years when Marshall proposes .
Their engagement causes Ted to think about finding his own soul mate , much to the disgust of his friend  बार्नी stinson ( neil पैट्रिक हैरिस ) , a womanizer साथ an बेनाम कॉरपोरेट  job .
और यूँ , टेड begins उसके ढूंढें लिये उसके पूर्ण mate , और meets रोबिन  Scherbatsky ( Cobie Smulders ) , whom he also befriends .
The 100th episode  of कैसा i मिले अपना माँ aired on जनवरी 11  , 2010 .
On December 21  , 2012 , the श्रेणी थी नवीनीकृत लिये  a ninth season .
On January 30 , 2013 , it  थी घोषित कि ऋतु  9 will be its final season .
gringo ( , , ) is a कठबोली स्पेनी और पुर्तगाली शब्द प्रयुक्त in ibero-america  , to denote foreigners , often from the United States .
The term can be applied to someone who is actually a foreigner , or it  can denote a दमदार संघ or सम्मिलन into विदेशी ( विशेषकर us ) समाज  and culture .
in स्पेनी it करता नहीं  have a negative connotation .
Roger  axtell , a सफर तहज़ीब विशेषज्ञ , टीप कि `` [ t ] he शब्द gringo  is not necessarily a bad word .
it is कठबोली लकिन is अपमानजनक तभी in  its use and context . ''
The  शब्द थी प्रयुक्त in स्पेन long पहले it crossed the अटलांटिक  to denote foreign , non-native speakers of Spanish .
The great white shark , Carcharodon carcharias , also  ज्ञात as the ग्रेट श्वेत , श्वेत सूचक , श्वेत शार्क , or श्वेत मौत , is a प्रजाति of विशाल lamniform शार्क जिससे can be मिला in the तटीय  surface waters of all the major oceans .
The great white shark is mainly  ज्ञात लिये इसके आकार , साथ the largest individuals ज्ञात to have approached or exceeded  in length , and in weight .
इस शार्क पहुँच इसके परिपक्वता around  15 years of age and can have a life span of over 30 years .
the ग्रेट श्वेत शार्क is arguably the संसार 's largest ज्ञात extant  macropredatory fish , and is one of the primary predators of marine mammals .
It is  भी ज्ञात to शिकार upon a किस्में of अन्य समुद्री पशु ,  including fish and seabirds .
It is the only known  surviving प्रजाति of इसके genus carcharodon , और is क्रमित  first in having the most attacks on humans .
The IUCN list the great white  शार्क as a vulnerable प्रजाति , जबकि it is शामिल in परिशिष्ट ii  of CITES .
The bestselling  अनोखा जबड़े by पीटर benchley और the subsequent ब्लॉकबस्टर  film by Steven Spielberg depicted the great white shark as a `` ferocious man eater `` .
In reality  , इंसानो हैं नहीं the पसन्दीदा शिकार of the  great white shark .
The  संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद शक्तियां हैं the सैन्य शक्तियां of the संयुक्त  States of America .
They  consist of the फौज , नेवी  , Marine Corps , Air Force , and Coast Guard .
The  u.S. रै a दमदार परंपरा of civilian कंट्रोल  of the military .
The President is the  सैन्य 's overall सिर , और helps रूप सैन्य नीति साथ the u.S. विभाग of रक्षा ( dod ) , a संघीय कार्यपालिका  department , acting as the principal organ by which military policy is carried out .
The DoD is headed by the  सचिव of रक्षा , जो is a civilian और  Cabinet member .
The Defense Secretary is second in the military 's chain of  कमांड , बस नीचे the अध्यक्ष , और serves as the प्रिंसिपल सहायक to the अध्यक्ष  in all DoD-related matters .
to निर्देशांक सैन्य कार्रवाई साथ कूटनीति , the अध्यक्ष रै  an advisory National Security Council headed by a National Security Advisor .
Both the President and Secretary of Defense are advised by a  seven-member संयुक्त chiefs of स्टाफ , जिससे शामिल the सिर of प्रत्येक of the रक्षा विभाग 's सेवा शाखाओं as खूब as the मुख्य  of the National Guard Bureau .
Leadership is  provided by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त chiefs of स्टाफ  and the Vice Chairman of the Joint Chiefs of Staff .
The Commandant of the Coast  गार्ड is नहीं a सदस्य of the संयुक्त chiefs of  Staff .
All of the branches work together during operations and joint missions , under  the एकीकृत combatant कमांड , अंतर्गत the प्राधिकार of the सचिव of रक्षा साथ the एक्सेप्शन of the coast  Guard .
The Coast Guard falls  अंतर्गत the प्रशासन of the विभाग of मातृभूमि सुरक्षा और receives इसके operational  orders from the Secretary of Homeland Security .
The  coast गार्ड may be transferred to the विभाग of the नेवी by the  President or Congress during a time of war .
All five armed services are among the seven uniformed services of the  संयुक्त राज्य ; the अन्य हैं the u.S. पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य सेवा commissioned corps और the नेशनल oceanic  and Atmospheric Administration Commissioned Corps .
From the time of  इसके inception , the सैन्य निभाई a निर्णायक भूमिका  in the history of the United States .
A sense of national unity and identity was forged as  a परिणाम of विजय in the पहला barbary युद्ध और  the Second Barbary War .
Even so , the  संस्थापकों यहूद संदिग्ध of a स्थाई सैन्य फ़ोर्स और नहीं जबतक the outbreak of संसार युद्ध ii किया a  large standing army become officially established .
The National Security Act of 1947 , adopted following World War II and during the Cold War 's onset , created the modern U.S. military framework ; the Act merged previously Cabinet-level Department of War and the Department  of the नेवी into the नेशनल सैन्य स्थापना ( renamed the विभाग of रक्षा in 1949 ) , headed by the सचिव of रक्षा ; और निर्मित the विभाग of the एयर फ़ोर्स और नेशनल सुरक्षा  Council .
The U.S. military is one  of the largest militaries in शर्तें of क्रमांक of कर्मियों  .
It draws its manpower  इससे a विशाल पूल of सशुल्क स्वयंसेवक ; हालांकि conscription रै महरूम प्रयुक्त in the पास्ट in विभिन्न टाइम्स of  both war and peace , it has not been used since 1972 .
As of  2013 , the u.S. खर्च परिचय $ 554.2 अरब annually to निधि इसके सैन्य शक्तियां , और appropriates लगभग $  88.5 billion to fund Overseas Contingency Operations .
Put together , the U.S.  constitutes roughly 43 प्रतिशत of the संसार 's सैन्य expenditures  .
the u.S. हथियारबंद शक्तियां as a पूरे possess विशाल quantities of उन्नत और शक्तिशाली उपकरण , साथ साथ फैली  placement of forces around the world , giving them significant capabilities in both defense and power projection .
Freedom of speech is the political right to communicate one 's opinions and ideas using one 's  देह और प्रॉपर्टी to anyone जो is willing to प्राप्त  them .
The term freedom of expression  is sometimes प्रयुक्त synonymously , लकिन शामिल कोई अधिनियम of seeking , receiving और imparting  information or ideas , regardless of the medium used .
In  अभ्यास , the सही to स्वतंत्रता of वाक is नहीं निरपेक्ष in कोई देश और the सही is commonly विषय to सीमाएं , as साथ मानहानि , बदनामी , obscenity , राजद्रोह (  including , for example inciting ethnic hatred ) , copyright violation , revelation of information that is classified or otherwise .
The right to freedom  of अभिव्यक्ति is पहचाना as a इंसान सही अंतर्गत आलेख 19 of the सार्वभौमिक घोषणा of इंसान अधिकारों और पहचाना in अंतरराष्ट्रीय इंसान अधिकारों विधि in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय वचन on  Civil and Political Rights ( ICCPR ) .
Article 19 of the ICCPR states that `` [ e ] veryone shall have the  सही to थाम राय बगैर हस्तक्षेप '' और `` everyone shall have the सही to स्वतंत्रता of अभिव्यक्ति ; इस सही shall शामिल स्वतंत्रता to तलाश , प्राप्त और impart सूचना और  ideas of all kinds , regardless of frontiers , either orally , in writing or in print , in the form of art , or through any other media of his choice '' .
Article 19 goes  on to कह कि the कसरत of ये अधिकारों carries `` खास कर्तव्य और जिम्मेदारियों `` और may `` इसलिए be विषय to निश्चित प्रतिबंध '' जब जरुरी `` [ f ] or आदर of the अधिकारों or प्रतिष्ठा of अन्य  '' or `` [ f ] or the protection of national security or of public order ( order public ) , or of public health or morals '' .
Freedom of speech may be legally  curtailed in कुछ धार्मिक विधिक प्रणालियों और in धर्मनिरपेक्ष jurisdictions जहाँ it is मिला to कारण धार्मिक  offense , such as the British Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006 .
the बिग बंग  Theory logo .
The Big Bang Theory  is an अमरीकी कॉमेडी टेलीविज़न श्रेणी निर्मित और कार्यपालिका  produced by Chuck Lorre and Bill Prady .
Like the name of the series itself , with the exception of the first episode—  '' पायलट '' —episode शीर्षक of the बिग बंग सिद्धान्त सदा प्रारंभ साथ `` the '' और resemble the नाम of a वैज्ञानिक principle , सिद्धान्त or प्रयोग , whimsically referencing  a plot point or quirk .
,  133 एपीसोड have  aired .
The  बिग बंग सिद्धान्त रै महरूम नवीनीकृत  for a seventh season .
Dwight David `` Ike '' Eisenhower ( pronounced , ;  अक्तूबर 14 , 1890 – कूच 28 , 1969 ) थी the 34th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य इससे 1953 जबतक  1961 .
He had previously been a five-star general in the United States  फौज दौरान संसार युद्ध ii और परोसा as परम् कमांडर of the अलाइड शक्तियां in यूरोपीय ; he था जिम्मेदारी लिये नियोजन और supervising the आक्रमण of उत्तर अफ़्रीकी in आपरेशन मशाल in 1942–43 और the कामयाब  invasion of France and Germany in 1944–45 from the Western Front .
In 1951 , he became the first  परम् कमांडर of नाटो  .
आइज़नहावर थी of पेन्सिलवेनिया डच ancestry और थी reared in  a large family in Kansas by parents with a robust work ethic and religious background .
as एक of छह बेटे , he थी conditioned by a प्रतिस्पर्धी माहौल  which instilled self-reliance .
He attended  और ग्रैजुएट इससे वेस्ट पाइंट और बाद शादीशुदा  and had two sons .
After World War II ,  आइज़नहावर परोसा as फौज मुख्य of स्टाफ अंतर्गत अध्यक्ष हैरी S. ट्रूमैन , तब assumed the पोस्ट  of President at Columbia University .
Eisenhower entered the 1952 presidential race as a Republican to counter the non-interventionism of Senator Robert  A. taft और to crusade विरूद्ध `` साम्यवादी , कोरियाई और भ्रष्टाचार  '' .
He won by a landslide , defeating Democrat  adlai stevenson और समाप्ति दो दशकों of the नई सौदे गठबन्धन  .
In the first  साल of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी , आइज़नहावर अपदस्थ the नेता of इरान in the 1953 ईरानी तख्तापलट d'état और प्रयुक्त नाभिकीय खतरे to conclude  the Korean War with China .
His New Look policy of nuclear deterrence gave priority to inexpensive nuclear weapons while  reducing the funding लिये conventional सैन्य शक्तियां ; the लक्ष्य थी to रखना दबाव  on the Soviet Union and reduce federal deficits .
In 1954 ,  आइज़नहावर पहला articulated the domino सिद्धान्त in उसके वर्णन of the threat प्रस्तुत  by the spread of communism .
The Congress  सहमत to उसके निवेदन in 1955 लिये the formosa रेज़ोल्यूशन , जिससे सक्रिय उसे to prevent  Chinese communist aggression against Chinese nationalists and established the U.S. policy of defending Taiwan .
When the Soviets launched Sputnik in  1957 , he था to खेल catch-up in the स्पेस  race .
Eisenhower forced Israel , the  uk , और फ़्रांस to समाप्त उनके आक्रमण of मिश्र दौरान  the Suez Crisis of 1956 .
In 1958 , he sent 15,000 US troops to Lebanon to  prevent the pro-western सरकारी इससे गिरना to a nasser -inspired  revolution .
Near the end of his term , his efforts to set up a  समिट बैठक साथ the soviets collapsed क्युकी of the u-2 घटना  .
On the  घरेलू सामने , he covertly opposed जोसेफ मैकार्थी और contributed to the समाप्त  of McCarthyism by openly invoking the modern expanded version of executive privilege .
he वरना बाएँ सबसे राजनैतिक कार्यकलाप  to his Vice President , Richard Nixon .
He was a moderate  रूढ़िवादी जो जारी नई सौदे एजेंसियों  and expanded Social Security .
Among his enduring innovations , he launched the Interstate Highway System ; the Defense Advanced Research Projects Agency ( DARPA ) , which led to the internet , among  अनेक invaluable आउटपुट ; the नेशनल aeronautics और स्पेस प्रशासन ( नासा ) , ड्राइविंग शांतिपूर्ण डिस्कवरी in स्पेस ; the स्थापना of दमदार विज्ञान शिक्षा  via the National Defense Education Act ; and encouraging peaceful use of nuclear power via amendments to the Atomic Energy Act .
In social policy , he sent federal troops to Little Rock , Arkansas , for the first time  चूंकि पुनर्निर्माण to enforce संघीय अदालत आदेश to desegregate पब्लिक स्कूलों  .
He  भी हस्ताक्षरित सिविल अधिकारों विधान in 1957 और 1960  to protect the right to vote .
He  implemented desegregation of the हथियारबंद शक्तियां in  two years and made five appointments to the Supreme Court .
He was the first term-limited president  in accordance साथ the 22nd amendment  .
Eisenhower 's two terms were  शांतिपूर्ण ones लिये the सबसे भाग और देखी considerable आर्थिक समृद्धि मगर  for a sharp recession in 1958–59 .
आइज़नहावर is प्रायः क्रमित अत्यधिक among the  U.S. Presidents .
एयर फ़ोर्स एक is the आधिकारिक एयर ट्रैफ़िक कंट्रोल कॉल चिह्न of a संयुक्त राज्य  Air Force aircraft carrying the President of the United States .
In common parlance the term  refers to those एयर फ़ोर्स वायुयान specifically designed , निर्मित , और  used for the purpose of transporting the president .
The Presidential  वायुयान is a prominent प्रतीक of  the American presidency and its power .
The idea of designating specific military aircraft to transport the President  arose in 1943 , जब officials of the संयुक्त राज्य फौज एयर शक्तियां – the पूर्ववर्ती to the u.S. एयर फ़ोर्स – became चिंतित साथ relying on वाणिज्यिक एयरलाइंस to हस्तांतरण the  President .
A C-87 Liberator Express was reconfigured  लिये उपयोग as a अध्यक्षीय हस्तांतरण ; however , it थी अस्वीकृत by the रहस्य सेवा amid  concerns over the aircraft 's safety record .
A C-54 Skymaster was  तब परिवर्तित लिये अध्यक्षीय उपयोग ; इस वायुयान , उतावले the पवित्र गाय , transported अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन  D. Roosevelt to the Yalta Conference in February 1945 , and was subsequently used for another two years by President Harry S. Truman .
the `` एयर फ़ोर्स एक '' कॉल चिह्न थी निर्मित बाद a 1953 घटना दौरान जिससे a उड़ान carrying अध्यक्ष  Dwight D. Eisenhower entered the same airspace as a commercial airline flight using the same call sign .
Several aircraft have been used as Air Force One since the creation of the presidential fleet , including two Boeing 707s introduced  in the 1960s और 1970s , क्रमशः ; चूंकि 1990 , the अध्यक्षीय बेड़े रै consisted of दो बोइंग vc-25as – specifically विन्यस्त  , highly customized Boeing 747-200B series aircraft .
The Air Force is looking into  replacing the दो vc-25 वायुयान साथ तीन बदलना  aircraft beginning in 2017 .
A wedding anniversary is the  वर्षगांठ of the तिथि a विवाह took  place .
Traditional names  मौजूद लिये सबसे of उन्हें : लिये उदाहरण , 50 सालो of विवाह is पुकारा a `` सुनहरी विवाह  anniversary '' or simply a `` golden anniversary '' .
A scanner with  duplexing स्वचालित दस्तावेज़ फीडर  .
In multifunction or all-in-one printers , fax machines ,  photocopiers और scanners , an स्वचालित दस्तावेज़ फीडर or adf is a विशेषता जिससे takes अनेक पृष्ठों और फ़ीड्स the पेपर एक पेज at a समय into a स्कैनर or कॉपियर , allowing the उपयोक्ता to स्कैन , और thereby नक़ल  , print , or fax , multiple-page documents without having to manually replace each page .
Most  copiers allow स्कैनिंग on the फ्लैटबेड or platen ( the `` कांच  '' ) or through a document feeder .
The vast majority of fax machines  have an adf , allowing the unattended sending of multi-page  faxes .
Due  to the ubiquity of adf in फैक्स मशीने , कुछ फैक्स यंत्र स्वामी उपयोग the फैक्स यंत्र  as a scanner , faxing multi-page documents to themselves .
दस्तावेज़ feeders हैं वर्णित by गति , in पृष्ठों प्रति मिनट or ppm ,  and capacity , usually in a range from 10 sheets to 200 .
There are two kinds of document  feeders सक्षम of two-sided ( duplex ) स्कैनिंग : a reversing स्वचालित दस्तावेज़ फीडर or radf  scans one side of a page , then flips it and scans the other side .
A  duplexing स्वचालित दस्तावेज़ फीडर or dadf  scans both sides in one pass .
The advantage of  the dadf is तेज़ गति लिये two-sided मूल  .
RADFs and DADFs are rated in images  प्रति मिनट ( ipm ) , the क्रमांक of पहलू वे can स्कैन प्रत्येक  minute .
Fair Park is a  recreational और शैक्षणिक जटिल स्तिथ in डलास , टेक्सास  ( USA ) .
The complex is registered  as a डलास लैंडमार्क , नेशनल ऐतिहासिक लैंडमार्क और is घर to नौ संग्रहालय , छह प्रदर्शन सुविधाएं  , a lagoon , and the largest Ferris wheel in North America .
Many of the buildings on  the जटिल यहूद constructed लिये the टेक्सास centennial exposition in  1936 which drew over six million visitors .
Most of the buildings built for the exposition still  जीवित और it is पहचाना as a significant उदाहरण of आर्ट डेको वास्तुकला  .
Fair Park has been  designated a ग्रेट प्लेस in अमेरिका by the अमरीकी नियोजन  Association .
The American Planning  संघ ( apa ) “is an स्वतंत्र , not-for-profit शैक्षणिक संगठन  that provides leadership in the development of vital communities.”
The Great  स्थान in अमरीकी कार्यक्रम helps to celebrate क्षेत्रों साथ  “exemplary character , quality , and planning.”
Being  designated as a ग्रेट प्लेस in अमेरिका  , Fair Park was one of only ten cities chosen in 2011 .
San Jose ( ; Spanish : St. Joseph ) is the third-largest city in California , the  tenth-largest in the u.S. , और the काउंटी सीट of सांता क्लारा काउंटी जिससे is  located at the southern end of San Francisco Bay .
San Jose is the largest city within Silicon Valley , which is a major component of the greater San Francisco  खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल , a प्रदेश of 8.4 लाख लोगों और the पांचवां largest महानगर क्षेत्रफल ( सीएसए  ) in the United States .
It is the largest  नगर in उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
San Jose was founded on  नवम्बर 29 , 1777 , as el pueblo de सैन जोस de guadalupe , the पहला civilian कस्बा in the स्पेनी उपनिवेश  of Nueva California , which later became Alta California .
The city served as a  खेती जातियाँ to support स्पेनी सैन्य संस्थापना at सैन फ्रांसिस्को और  Monterey .
When  कैलिफ़ोर्निया gained statehood  in 1850 , San Jose served as its first capital .
After more than 150 years as a small farming city , San Jose and the surrounding Santa  क्लारा घाटी became the पिछला ( और largest ) संलग्न क्षेत्रफल of अविकसित जमीन surrounding  the San Francisco Bay .
San Jose experienced increased demand for  आवास इससे सैनिको और दिग्गजों returning  from World War II .
San Jose  तब जारी इसके आक्रामक विस्तार दौरान the  1950s and 1960s by annexing more land area .
The rapid growth of the high-technology and electronics industries further  त्वरित the परिवर्तन इससे an agricultural बीच , to an urbanized  metropolitan area .
By the 1990s , San Jose 's  स्थान भीतर the booming लोकल प्रौद्योगिकी उद्योग अर्जित the नगर इसके उपनाम , पूंजी of  Silicon Valley .
San Jose now  maintains वैश्विक नगर औकात और is the largest नगर in the सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल in शर्तें of जनसांख्यिकी  , land area , and industrial development .
The U.S. Census  ब्यूरो reported the जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर to be 945,942 as  of the 2010 Census .
As of April 2013 , the  अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी of सैन जोस थी  984,000 .
San  जोस , साथ साथ the सांता क्लारा घाटी , अनुभवी परिचय हाफ a सदी of spectacular suburban sprawl ,  with characteristics of intense urbanization similar to the Los Angeles area of Southern California .
The city has taken  definite कदम to avoid बनने `` l.A. उत्तर  '' .
However , the  sprawl in सैन जोस is बदतर than in लॉस एंजिल्स by उपायों  such as population density and public transit safety , investment , and ridership .
यूरोपीय चित्रित by antwerp cartographer अब्राहम ortelius  in 1595
The history of  यूरोपीय कवर the लोगों inhabiting the यूरोपीय महाद्वीप चूंकि it थी पहला आबादी in प्रागैतिहासिक टाइम्स to उपस्थित , साथ the पहला होमो sapiens  arriving between 45,000 and 25,000 BC .
The earliest  settlers to प्रागैतिहासिक यूरोपीय आए दौरान the  paleolithic era .
The  आगमन of कृषि around 7000 bc ushered in the पाषाणकालीन  age .
Neolithic Europe lasted for 4000 years , overlapping with  metal-using संस्कृतियों कि धीरे स्प्रेड throughout  the continent .
technological अग्रिम दौरान the प्रागैतिहासिक आयु tended to arrive इससे the मध्य ईस्ट  , spreading gradually to the northwest .
Some of the  best-known सभ्यताओं of प्रागैतिहासिक यूरोपीय यहूद मिनोआई और माइसीनियाई ,  which flourished during the Bronze Age until they collapsed in a short period of time around 1200 BC .
The period known as classical  प्राचीनता began साथ the वृद्धि of the city-states of प्राचीन यूनानियों .
Greek influence reached its zenith under the  expansive साम्राज्य of सिकंदर the ग्रेट , spreading throughout  Asia .
Northern  और पश्चिमी यूरोपीय यहूद वर्चस्व by the la tène संस्कृति  , a precursor to the Celts .
Rome , a small  city-state traditionally संस्थापित in 753 bc , होता grow to become the रोमन गणतंत्र in 509 bc और होता  succeed Greek culture as the dominant Mediterranean civilization .
The events of the rule of Julius Caesar  led to reorganization of the गणतंत्र into the रोमन  Empire .
The  साम्राज्य थी बाद विभाजित by the सम्राट diocletian into  the Western and Eastern empires .
During the later years of the Roman Empire , the Germanic peoples of  उत्तरी यूरोपीय grew in शक्ति और दोहराया हमले led to the पतन of the पश्चिमी रोमन साम्राज्य in ad 476 , a तिथि जिससे traditionally marks  the end of the classical period and the start of the Middle Ages .
During the Middle Ages ,  the पूर्वी रोमन साम्राज्य बच , हालांकि आधुनिक इतिहासकारों refer to इस  state as the Byzantine Empire .
In Western Europe , Germanic  peoples स्थानांतरित into स्थितियाँ of शक्ति in the remnants of the पूर्व पश्चिमी  Roman Empire and established kingdoms and empires of their own .
Of all  of the germanic peoples , the franks होता वृद्धि to a स्थिति of आधिपत्य over पश्चिमी  Europe , the Frankish Empire reaching its peak under Charlemagne around AD 800 .
Francia was divided into  अनेक भाग ; वेस्ट francia होता evolve into the किंगडम of फ़्रांस , जबकि ईस्ट francia होता evolve into the  Holy Roman Empire , a precursor to modern Germany .
The British  isles यहूद the साईट of अनेक large-scale  migrations .
Native  सेल्टिक peoples था महरूम अधिकारहीन दौरान the काल of रोमन ब्रिटेन , और जब the romans abandoned the अंग्रेजों isles दौरान the 400s ,  waves of Germanic Anglo-Saxons migrated to southern Britain and established a series of petty kingdoms in what would eventually develop into the Kingdom of England by AD 927 .
During this period ,  the किंगडम of कैंडल और किंगडम of हंगेरियाई ( 1000–1945 ) यहूद  organized as well .
The  viking आयु , a काल of migrations of scandinavian peoples , वर्चस्व  the period from the late 700s to the middle 1000s .
Chief among the  viking राज्य थी the साम्राज्य of cnut the ग्रेट , a डैनिश नेता जो होता become  king of England , Denmark , and Norway .
the normans , a viking लोगों जो settled in उत्तरी फ़्रांस और संस्थापित the duchy of normandy , होता have a significant  impact on many parts of Europe , from the Norman conquest of England to Southern Italy and Sicily .
Another  scandinavian लोगों , the rus ' लोगों , होता go on to मिला kievan rus ' , an जल्दी राज्य जिससे  was a precursor for the modern country of Russia .
As  the viking आयु खींचा to a बंद , the काल ज्ञात as the क्रूसेड , a श्रेणी of religiously-motivated सैन्य रिझाने  originally intended to bring the Levant back into Christian rule , began .
अनेक जेहादी राज्य यहूद संस्थापित in the पूर्वी  Mediterranean .
ये यहूद सब short-lived  .
The  crusaders होता have a profound प्रभाव on अनेक भाग  of Europe .
Their Sack  of कुस्तुंतुनिया in 1204 brought an abrupt समाप्त to the  Byzantine Empire .
Extinct dog  breeds is a संकलन of श्वान breeds कि  have become extinct .
Wii Speak is a microphone  accessory लिये निन्टेंडो 's वी वीडियो खेल कंसोल  .
Connected to the  कंसोल via usb , the यंत्र can be लगाई निकट the वीडियो प्रदर्शक , allowing आवाज़  chat to be conducted with the entire room .
The device  सुविधाएँ an led to indicate जब  the microphone is active .
वी बोलो थी घोषित at निन्टेंडो  's 2008 E3 media briefing .
It was released separately and bundled with Animal Crossing :  नगर लोक on नवम्बर 16 , 2008 , in उत्तर अमेरिका , और थी released on दिसम्बर 5  , 2008 , in Europe .

A  smart कुंजी is an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अभिगम और प्राधिकरण प्रणाली जिससे is  available as an option or standard in several cars .
It was first developed by Siemens  in the mid-1990s और introduced by mercedes-benz अंतर्गत the नाम `` keyless  Go '' in 1998 on the W220 S-Class following its design patent filed by Daimler-Benz on May 17 , 1997 .
Univisión ( ) is a  spanish-language टेलीविज़न संजाल  in the United States .
The network is primarily dedicated for  लैटिन अमरीकी परिवारों जो reside in the संयुक्त  States .
It has the largest audience of  spanish-language टेलीविज़न दर्शक in the संसार according  to Nielsen ratings .
Randy Falco , (  सीईओ as of जून 29 , 2011 ) coo , रै महरूम in चार्ज of the कम्पनी चूंकि  the departure of Univision Communications president and CEO Joe Uva in April 2010 .
In recent years the network has reached parity with the U.S. 's five major English-language television networks ,  और is प्रायः a दमदार पांचवां , outranking the cw , साथ कुछ fourth-place साप्ताहिक placings , और as of 2012 , भी  first place rankings for individual programs over all five English networks due to the network 's consistent schedule of new telenovelas all 52 weeks of the year .
Univisión is  headquartered in नई यॉर्क , और रै इसके प्रमुख studios , उत्पादन सुविधाएं  , and operations in Doral , Florida , a suburb of Miami .
In 2009 , another  टेलीविज़न स्टुडियो थी घोषित , univision studios , to be निर्मित in doral  .
Univision is available on cable and satellite in most of the country , with local stations in over 50 markets with large Hispanic and Latino  populations और a नेशनल केबल संजाल फीड वितरित in बाज़ार  without either the availability or the demand for a locally-based station .
Most of these stations air full local news and other local programming in addition to network shows , and in major markets such as Los Angeles , New York , and Miami the  लोकल newscasts carried by the संजाल 's owned-and-operated स्टेशन ( o & o ) स्टेशन हैं बराबर प्रतिस्पर्धी साथ उनके english-language counterparts ratings-wise  .
Univisión was acquired on March 29 , 2007 by a consortium led by Haim Saban 's Saban Capital Group ( who had  previously स्वामित्व the एंटिटी saban entertainment ) , tpg पूंजी , l.P. , विधाता इक्विटी साझेदार , मैडिसन dearborn साझेदार , और थामस H. ली साझेदार लिये $ 13.7  billion or $ 36.25 per share plus $ 1.4 billion in acquired debt .
The buyout left the company with a debt level of twelve times its annual cash  प्रवाह , जिससे थी twice the norm in buyouts किया over the पिछला  two years .
कलाकार 's धारणा of a आदिग्रह  disk
The formation  और of the सौर प्रणाली is अनुमानित to have begun 4.6 अरब सालो  ago with the gravitational collapse of a small part of a giant molecular cloud .
Most  of the collapsing द्रव्यमान एकत्रित in the केन्द्र , forming the सूर्य , जबकि the बाकी flattened into  a protoplanetary disk out of which the planets , moons , asteroids , and other small Solar System bodies formed .
This widely accepted model , known as the nebular hypothesis , was first developed in the 18th century  by emanuel swedenborg , immanuel kant , और pierre-simon लाप्लास .
इसके subsequent विकास रै interwoven a किस्में of वैज्ञानिक disciplines सहित खगोलशास्त्र  , physics , geology , and planetary science .
Since the dawn of the space age in the 1950s and the discovery of extrasolar planets in the  1990s , the मॉडल रै महरूम दोनो challenged और परिष्कृत to खाता लिये नई observations  .
The Solar System has evolved  considerably चूंकि इसके आरंभिक गठन  .
Many moons have formed from circling discs of gas and dust around their parent planets , while other  moons हैं विचार to have formed independently और बाद महरूम captured  by their planets .
स्टिल अन्य , as the धरती 's चंद्रमा , may  be the result of giant collisions .
Collisions  between लाशें have occurred continually up to the उपस्थित दिन और have महरूम सेंट्रल to the एवोल्यूशन of  the Solar System .
The positions of the planets often shifted  , और ग्रह have switched स्थान  .
इस ग्रहीय माइग्रेशन is अभी विचार to have महरूम  responsible for much of the Solar System 's early evolution .
In roughly 5 billion years , the Sun will cool and expand outward many  टाइम्स इसके वर्तमान व्यास ( बनने a रेड दानव ) , पहले ढलाई बंद इसके बाहरी परतों as a ग्रहीय नीहारिका और leaving पीछे a तारकीय remnant ज्ञात as a श्वेत  dwarf .
In the far distant future , the  गम्भीरता of गुजर सितारों होगा धीरे reduce the सूर्य 's retinue of ग्रह .
Some planets  होगा be नष्ट , अन्य ejected into अंतरतारकीय  space .
ultimately , over the कोर्स of tens of अरबों of सालो  , it is likely that the Sun will be left with none of the original bodies in orbit around it .
The Trial ( Kafka 's original German  शीर्षक : , बाद as , और ) is a अनोखा लिखा by फ्रांज  Kafka in 1914 and 1915 but not published until 1925 .
एक of काफ्का 's best-known works , it tells the स्टोरी of a man गिरफ्तार और prosecuted by a रिमोट  , inaccessible authority , with the nature of his crime revealed to neither him nor the reader .
Like Kafka 's other novels , The Trial was never  समाप्त , हालांकि it करता शामिल a अध्याय जिससे brings the  story to an end .
Because of this there are certain inconsistencies which exist within the novel ,  ऐसे as असमानताओं in समय in जोड to अन्य discontinuities in narration .
After Kafka 's death in 1924 his friend and literary executor Max Brod  संपादित the टेक्स्ट लिये प्रकाशन by verlag die schmiede  .
The original manuscript is  आयोजित at the संग्रहालय of आधुनिक साहित्य , marbach am neckar , जर्मनी  .
In 1999 ,  the किताब थी सूचीबद्ध in le mondes 100 किताबे of the सदी और as no . 2 of the  Best German Novels of the Twentieth Century .
Lisa Anne Loeb ( born March 11 , 1968  ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter और अभिनेत्री  .
She launched her career in  1994 साथ the सोंग , `` रहो ( i छूटी तुम ) `` , जिससे थी  included in the film Reality Bites .
She was the first artist to have a number one  सिंगल in the संयुक्त राज्य जबकि नहीं हस्ताक्षरित to a रिकॉर्डिंग  contract .
Her five studio CDs include her major  लेबल डेब्यू , the gold-selling tails और इसके follow-up , the grammy-nominated  , gold-selling Firecracker .
Loeb has  भी worked in फिल्मी , टेलीविज़न , voice-over कार्य और  children’s recordings .
Loeb has appeared in two television series , Dweezil  & लिसा , a साप्ताहिक culinary एडवेंचर लिये the खाना संजाल और क्रमांक 1 सिंगल , a वास्तविकता दिखाएँ  on the E !
Network in 2006  केन्द्रित on उसके क्वेस्ट लिये प्रेम , कामयाबी , करियर , और परिवार  .
Her children 's music includes the albums Catch  the चंद्रमा ( 2003 ) , और शिविर लिसा ( 2008  ) .
Her first joint children 's book and album Lisa Loeb 's Silly  sing-along : the निराशाजनक पैनकेक  and Other Zany Songs was published in 2011 .
in 2010 वो संस्थापित the लिसा लोएब चश्मा संग्रहण ,  which is based on her own designs .
the कोट of बाहें of the  State of New Jersey includes:
A shield with  तीन plows emblazoned , प्रतिनिधि of नई जर्सी 's agricultural  tradition .
A  forward-facing नाईट  's helmet .
A horse 's head as  the crest of the हेल्मेट  .
The female  आंकड़े स्वतंत्रता और ceres , प्रतिनिधि of the राज्य  's motto ( see next item ) .
Liberty is holding a  स्टाफ supporting a `` स्वतंत्रता कैप `` ;  Ceres is holding an overflowing cornucopia .
The streamer at the foot of the emblem  contains the राज्य motto of नई जर्सी , `` स्वतंत्रता  and Prosperity '' , and the year of statehood , 1776 .
It was originally  designed by पियरे यूजीन du simitiere in 1777 और थी  modified slightly in 1928 .
The seal is the central  मोटिफ in the ध्वज of नई जर्सी और the ग्रेट मुहर of the राज्य of नई  Jersey .
The Coat of  बाहें contains a घोड़ा  's head .
A helmet showing that New Jersey governs  itself तदनुसार और तीन plows on a शील्ड referring to the राज्य 's कृषि परंपरा  , giving it the nickname `` Garden State '' .
The two Goddesses  represent the राज्य motto , `` स्वतंत्रता और  Prosperity '' .
स्वतंत्रता is on the  left .
She is holding  a स्टाफ साथ a स्वतंत्रता कैप on it , और the  word liberty underneath her .
The goddess on  the सही is ceres , देवी of कृषि  .
वो is पकड़कर a cornucopia साथ समृद्धि  written below her .
According to the minutes of the New Jersey  सामान्य सभा लिये कूच 11 , 1896 , the तिथि in जिससे the सभा officially स्वीकृत the ध्वज as the राज्य emblem , the buff रंग is due indirectly to जार्ज वॉशिंगटन ,  who had ordered on October 2 , 1779 , that the uniform coats of the New Jersey Continental Line be dark ( Jersey ) blue , with buff facings .
Buff-colored facings had until then  महरूम सुरक्षित तभी लिये उसके अपना वर्दी और those of  other Continental generals and their aides .
Then , on February 28 , 1780 , the Continental War Officers in Philadelphia  निर्देशित कि the वर्दी कोट facings of सब regiments यहूद to be the वही as the पृष्ठभूमि रंग of the regiments ' राज्य ध्वज  .
The  मुहर is वर्णित in नई जर्सी statute  Title 52 , §2-1:
`` We Can Work It Out  '' is a सोंग by the बीटल्स , लिखा  by Paul McCartney and John Lennon .
It  थी released as a `` दोगुना a-sided `` सिंगल साथ `` दिन tripper  `` , the first time both sides of a single were so designated in an initial release .
Both  गीतों यहूद अंकित दौरान the रबर आत्मा सत्र  .
The song is an example of  lennon–mccartney सहयोग at a गहराई कि happened तभी rarely  after they wrote the hit singles of 1963 .
This song , `` A Day in the Life `` , ``  baby , तुम 're a समृद्ध man `` और `` i 've मिला a अहसास  `` , are among the notable exceptions .
As a medical diagnosis ,  pedophilia or paedophilia is a मनोरोग विकार in व्यक्तियों 16 सालो of आयु or पुरानी typically characterized by a प्राथमिक or विशेष यौन ब्याज toward prepubescent children ( generally आयु 11 सालो or younger , हालांकि विशिष्ट निदान  criteria for the disorder extends the cut-off point for prepubescence to age 13 ) .
an adolescent जो is 16 सालो of आयु or पुरानी जरूर be at तनिक पाँच सालो पुरानी than the prepubescent  child before the attraction can be diagnosed as pedophilia .
The term has a range of  परिभाषाएं , as मिला in psychiatry , मनोविज्ञान , the देशी , और  law enforcement .
The International Classification of Diseases ( ICD )  defines pedophilia as a `` विकार of वयस्क व्यक्तित्व और आचरण '' in जिससे वहीँ is a यौन वरीयता लिये children  of prepubertal or early pubertal age .
According to the Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders ( DSM ) , it is a  paraphilia in जिससे वयस्कों or adolescents 16 सालो of आयु or पुरानी have तीव्र और तूल यौन प्रेरणाएं towards और कल्पनाओं परिचय prepubescent children कि वे  have either acted on or which cause them distress or interpersonal difficulty .
In popular usage , pedophilia means any sexual interest  in children or the अधिनियम of चाइल्ड यौन गाली , प्रायः termed `` pedophilic  behavior '' .
For example , The American Heritage  stedman 's चिकित्सा शब्दकोष राज्य , `` pedophilia is the अधिनियम or काल्पनिक on the भाग of an वयस्क of engaging in यौन कार्यकलाप साथ a चाइल्ड or  children . ''
This common use application also extends to the  यौन ब्याज in और यौन सम्पर्क साथ रोमिल or post-pubescent नाबालिग  .
Researchers recommend that these imprecise uses be avoided because although people who  कमिट चाइल्ड यौन गाली commonly प्रदर्शनी the विकार , कुछ अपराधियों do नहीं मिलें the नैदानिक निदान मानकों लिये  pedophilia and these standards pertain to prepubescents .
Additionally ,  नहीं सब pedophiles दरअसल कमिट ऐसे  abuse .
pedophilia थी पहला formally पहचाना और  named in the late 19th century .
a significant राशि of शोध in the क्षेत्रफल  has taken place since the 1980s .
Although mostly  प्रलेखित in मेन , वहीँ हैं भी महिलाओं जो प्रदर्शनी the विकार , और शोधकर्ताओं assume उपलब्धियाँ  estimates underrepresent the true number of female pedophiles .
No cure for pedophilia has been  विकसित , लकिन वहीँ हैं therapies कि can reduce the incidence of a व्यक्ति  committing child sexual abuse .
In the United States , following Kansas v. Hendricks , sex offenders who are diagnosed with  निश्चित दिमागी विकार , विशेषकर pedophilia , can be विषय to indefinite सिविल प्रतिबद्धता , अंतर्गत विभिन्न राज्य कानून ( generically पुकारा svp कानून ) और the  federal Adam Walsh Child Protection and Safety Act of 2006 .
At  उपस्थित , the सटीक कल्याणकारी of pedophilia  have not been conclusively established .
Research suggests that pedophilia may be correlated  साथ अनेक अलग neurological abnormalities , और प्रायः co-exists साथ अन्य व्यक्तित्व विकार और  psychological pathologies .
In the contexts of forensic psychology and law enforcement , a  किस्में of typologies have महरूम सुझाया to categorize pedophiles according to बर्ताव और motivations  .
Julio César  chávez ( born जूलियो césar chávez gonzález on जुलाई 12  , 1962 ) is a retired Mexican professional boxer .
Chávez  is माना by अनेक लोगों लिये उनके खेल आंकडे  the greatest fighter ever to come out of Mexico .
He is a six-time world champion in three  वज़न विभाजन , और लिये अनेक सालो he थी माना एक of the बेहतरीन pound-for-pound boxer  in the world .
In a career that spanned over 25 years , Chávez won five world titles in  तीन वज़न विभाजन : wbc सुपर featherweight in 1984 , wba lightweight in 1987 , wbc lightweight in 1988 , wbc लाइट welterweight in 1989 , ibf लाइट welterweight  in 1990 , and WBC Light Welterweight in 1994 .
He holds records for most  कामयाब लगातार defenses of संसार शीर्षक ( 27 ) , सबसे शीर्षक झगड़े ( 37 ) , सबसे title-fight victories ( 31 ) और he is बाद जो लुई साथ  ( 23 ) for most title defenses won by knockout ( 21 ) .
Chávez also has the  longest अपराजित streak in मुक्केबाज़ी इतिहास , 13 सालो  .
His record was 89-0-1 going into his first loss  to फ्रेंकी रान्डेल और था an 87 लड़ो जीत streak जबतक उसके `` चित्रण '' साथ  Whitaker .
Julio César Chávez was known for his  बकाया पंचिंग शक्ति , विनाशकारी देह आक्रमण , remarkably दमदार chin और the अथक  stalking of his opponents .
He ranks # 24 on  ईएसपीएन 's 50 महानतम मुक्केबाज  Of All Time .
On December  7 , 2010 , he थी inducted in the prestigious  International Boxing Hall of Fame for the Class of 2011 .
He is the father  of prospect ओमर chávez और पूर्व wbc middleweight चैंपियन  Julio César Chávez , Jr .

The  holocaust ( इससे the यूनानी ' : hólos , `` पूरे '' और kaustós , `` जले '' ) भी ज्ञात as the shoah ( यहूदी : , hashoah , `` प्रलय '' ; यहूदी : , churben or hurban , इससे the यहूदी लिये `` विनाश '' ) , थी the द्रव्यमान हत्या or नरसंहार of लगभग छह लाख यहूदियों दौरान संसार युद्ध ii  , a programme of systematic state-sponsored murder by Nazi Germany , led by Adolf Hitler and the Nazi Party , throughout German-occupied territory .
Of the nine million Jews who had resided in Europe  पहले the holocaust , लगभग two-thirds यहूद मारे .
Over one million Jewish children were killed in the  holocaust , as यहूद लगभग दो लाख यहूदी महिलाओं और तीन  million Jewish men .
A network of over 40,000 facilities in Germany and German-occupied  territory यहूद प्रयुक्त to concentrate , थाम , और मार यहूदियों  and other victims .
Some scholars argue that the mass murder of the Romani and people with disabilities should be included  in the परिभाषा , और कुछ उपयोग the आम संज्ञा `` holocaust '' to describe अन्य नाजी द्रव्यमान हत्याएं , सहित those of सोवियत बंदियों of युद्ध , पॉलिश और सोवियत नागरिकों , और  homosexuals .
Recent estimates based on  आंकड़े प्राप्त चूंकि the पतन of the सोवियत संघ indicates कुछ टेन to ग्यारह लाख नागरिकों  and prisoners of war were intentionally murdered by the Nazi regime .
The persecution  और नरसंहार यहूद carried  out in stages .
Various laws to remove the Jews  इससे सिविल समाज , सबसे prominently the nuremberg कानून , यहूद enacted in जर्मनी सालो पहले  the outbreak of World War II .
Concentration camps were  स्थापित in जिससे inmates यहूद वशीभूत to स्लेव  labor until they died of exhaustion or disease .
Where Germany  conquered नई territory in पूर्वी यूरोपीय , specialized इकाई पुकारा einsatzgruppen murdered यहूदियों और राजनैतिक  opponents in mass shootings .
The occupiers  जरूरी यहूदियों और romani to be confined in overcrowded ghettos पहले होने transported by भाड़ा ट्रैन  to extermination camps where , if they survived the journey , most were systematically killed in gas chambers .
Every arm of Germany 's bureaucracy was involved in the  लोजिस्टिक्स कि led to the genocides , turning the तीसरा reich into कया एक holocaust विद्वान रै पुकारा `` a genocidal राज्य  '' .
4-H  in the संयुक्त राज्य is a युवावस्था संगठन administered by the नेशनल संस्थान of खाना और कृषि of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of कृषि ( यूएसडीए ) , साथ  the mission of `` engaging youth to reach their fullest potential while advancing the field of youth development . ''
The name represents four personal development areas of focus  लिये the संगठन : सिर , दिल , हैंड्स , और स्वास्थ्य  .
The organization has over  6.5 लाख सदस्यों in the संयुक्त राज्य , इससे आयु पाँच to  twenty-one , in approximately 90,000 clubs .
The goal of 4-H is to develop  नागरिकता , नेतृत्व , जिम्मेदारी और जीवन कौशल of युवावस्था through experiential सीखना कार्यक्रम  and a positive youth development approach .
Though typically thought of as an agriculturally  केन्द्रित संगठन as a परिणाम of इसके इतिहास , 4-h आज focuses on नागरिकता  , healthy living , science , engineering , and technology programs .
Today , 4-H and related programs  मौजूद in over अस्सी देशों around the संसार ; the संगठन और प्रशासन  varies from country to country .
Each of these programs operates independently , but  cooperatively through अंतरराष्ट्रीय exchanges , वैश्विक शिक्षा कार्यक्रम  , and communications .
The 4-H motto is `` To make the best better  '' , जबकि इसके स्लोगन is `` सीख by doing '' ( sometimes लिखा as `` सीख to  do by doing '' ) .
The national  ध्वज of चिली , consists of दो गैरबराबरी आड़ा bands of श्वेत और रेड और a ब्लू वर्गाकार the वही ऊँचाई as  the white band in the canton , which bears a white five-pointed star in the center .
It was  अपनाया on 18 अक्तूबर 1817  .
The Chilean flag is also  ज्ञात in स्पेनी as la estrella solitaria ( the लोन  Star ) .
The star represents a  मार्गदर्शिका to प्रगति और सम्मान ; ब्लू symbolizes the आसमान और the प्रशांत समंदर , श्वेत is लिये the snow-covered  Andes , and red stands for the blood spilled to achieve independence .
According to the epic poem La  araucana , the रंगों यहूद निकला इससे those इससे the ध्वज flown by the mapuche दौरान  the Arauco War .
`` Flag Day  '' is आयोजित प्रत्येक साल on the नवीं of जुलाई to commemorate the 77 सैनिको जो died in  the 1882 Battle of La Concepción .
Generation  y , भी ज्ञात as the अंतर्दृष्टियों पीढी , is the  demographic cohort following Generation X .
वहीँ हैं no precise तिथियाँ लिये जब पीढी  Y starts and ends .
Commentators use beginning  जनम तिथियाँ इससे the latter 1970s , or इससे the जल्दी  1980s to the early 2000s .
the torches of नीरो , by henryk  Siemiradzki .
According to  tacitus , नीरो targeted ईसाइयों as those  responsible for the fire .
the ग्रेट आग of रोम ( ) थी an शहरी आग कि occurred  beginning 19 July AD 64 .
Virginia ( ) , officially  the राष्ट्रमंडल of वर्जिनिया , is a u.S. राज्य स्तिथ in the दक्षिण अटलांटिक  region of the United States .
Virginia is nicknamed the `` Old Dominion '' and the ``  माँ of राष्ट्रपतियों '' बाद the आठ u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों  born there .
The geography and climate of the Commonwealth are shaped  by the ब्लू लकीरें kyu और the chesapeake खाड़ी , जिससे provide आवास लिये much of इसके  flora and fauna .
The capital of the Commonwealth is Richmond  ; और वर्जिनिया बीच is the सबसे populous नगर  .
Fairfax  काउंटी is the सबसे populous राजनैतिक  subdivision .
The wealthiest is  loudoun काउंटी  .
The Commonwealth 's population  is over आठ लाख  .
the क्षेत्रफल 's इतिहास begins साथ  several indigenous groups , including the Powhatan .
In 1607 the London Company established the Colony  of वर्जिनिया as the पहला स्थाई नई संसार अंग्रेज़ी उपनिवेश  .
Slave labor and the  जमीन acquired इससे विस्थापित देशी अमरीकी जनजातियों प्रत्येक निभाई a significant भूमिका in the उपनिवेश 's जल्दी राजनीती  and plantation economy .
Virginia was one of the 13 Colonies in  the अमरीकी क्रान्ति और joined the confederacy in the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध , दौरान जिससे रिचमंड थी बना the confederate पूंजी और वर्जिनिया 's  northwestern counties seceded to form the state of West Virginia .
Although the Commonwealth was  अंतर्गत रूढ़िवादी single-party नियम लिये nearly a सदी following पुनर्निर्माण  , both major national parties are competitive in modern Virginia .
The  वर्जिनिया सामान्य सभा is the oldest विधानमंडल  in the Western Hemisphere .
The  राज्य सरकारी रै महरूम repeatedly क्रमित सबसे  effective by the Pew Center on the States .
It is unique in how  it ट्रीट शहरों और काउंटी बराबर , manages लोकल सड़कें , और prohibits  its governors from serving consecutive terms .
Virginia 's economy has many sectors : agriculture in the Shenandoah Valley ; federal  एजेंसियों in उत्तरी वर्जिनिया , सहित the मुख्यालय of the विभाग of रक्षा और सीआईए ; और सैन्य सुविधाएं in हैम्पटन सड़कें , the साईट of the  region 's main seaport .
Virginia 's public schools and many colleges  और विश्वविद्यालयों have contributed to growing मीडिया और प्रौद्योगिकी  sectors .
As a  परिणाम , कंप्यूटर चिप्स have become the राज्य  's leading export .
Windows  फिल्म मेकर ( formerly ज्ञात as खिड़कियाँ सजीव फिल्म मेकर , codenamed sundance ) is a  freeware video editing software by Microsoft .
It is a part of Windows  अनिवार्य तन्त्र सुइट और offers the क्षमता to बनाएँ और संपादन वीडियो as खूब as  to publish them on SkyDrive , Facebook , YouTube , and Flickr .
`` Brenda 's Got A Baby '' is the solo debut single by Tupac  shakur , और दसवाँ track इससे उसके डेब्यू एल्बम , 2pacalypse अभी  .
The song , which features R & B singer Dave  hollister , is परिचय a बारह year-old लड़की नामित ब्रेंडा जो जीवनदान in  a ghetto , has a baby , and is incapable of supporting it .
The song explores  the समस्या of टीन गर्भावस्था और इसके प्रभाव on the  young mothers and their families .
Like many of Shakur 's songs , ``  ब्रेंडा 's मिला a baby '' draws इससे the दुर्दशा of the impoverished  .
Using Brenda to represent young mothers in  सामान्य , shakur criticises the कम स्तर of support इससे the baby 's पिता , the सरकारी  , and society in general .
Shakur wrote the song when he read a  समाचारपत्र आलेख परिचय a twelve-year-old लड़की जो मिला गर्भवती इससे उसके cousin और , क्युकी वो किया नहीं want उसके अभिभावक to  know about the baby , threw it in a trash can .
The official logo of Pokémon for its international release ; `` Pokémon '' is short  लिये the असली जापानी शीर्षक of `` जेब राक्षस ''  .
is a media franchise published and  स्वामित्व by जापानी वीडियो खेल  company Nintendo and created by Satoshi Tajiri in 1996 .
originally released as a जोड़ी of interlinkable खेल लड़के role-playing वीडियो खेल विकसित by खेल freak , पोकीमॉन रै चूंकि become the second-most  successful and lucrative video game-based media franchise in the world , behind only Nintendo 's own Mario franchise .
पोकीमॉन गुण have चूंकि महरूम merchandised into दुश्मनी  , manga , trading cards , toys , books , and other media .
The franchise celebrated in 2006 ,  और , संचयी बिक्री of the वीडियो खेल ( सहित घर कंसोल संस्करण , ऐसे as the `` pikachu '' निन्टेंडो 64 ) have पहुँचे  more than 200 million copies .
In November 2005 , 4Kids Entertainment , which  था प्रबंधित the non-game सम्बन्धित लाइसेंसिंग of पोकीमॉन , घोषित कि it था सहमत नहीं to नवीनीकृत the पोकीमॉन  representation agreement .
Pokémon USA  inc. ( अभी the पोकीमॉन कम्पनी अंतरराष्ट्रीय ) , a subsidiary of जापानी 's पोकीमॉन co. , अभी  oversees all Pokémon licensing outside of Asia .
The  नाम पोकीमॉन is the romanized संकुचन  of the Japanese brand .
The term Pokémon , in addition to referring to the Pokémon franchise itself ,  भी collectively refers to the 649 fictional प्रजाति कि have बना दिखावे in पोकीमॉन मीडिया as of the रिलीज of the पांचवां पीढी शीर्षक पोकीमॉन  Black 2 and White 2 ; with the upcoming releases of Pokémon X and Y , 6 new Pokémon have been featured in promotions for the games .
`` Pokémon '' is identical in both the singular and plural , as is each individual species name ; it is grammatically  सही to कह `` एक पोकीमॉन '' और `` अनेक पोकीमॉन '' , as खूब as `` एक pikachu `` और `` अनेक  Pikachu '' .
Cover of the first  संस्करण of the प्रकाशन  Dada by Tristan Tzara ; Zurich , 1917
Dada  ( ) or dadaism थी an आर्ट गति of the  European avant-garde in the early 20th century .
Many claim Dada began in Zurich , Switzerland in 1916  , spreading to बर्लिन shortly thereafter लकिन the ऊँचाई of नई यॉर्क दादा थी the साल पहले in 1915  .
To quote Dona  budd 's the भाषा of आर्ट ज्ञान , दादा थी born आउट of ऋणात्मक प्रतिक्रिया  to the horrors of World War I .
This international  गति थी begun by a समूह of कलाकार और कवियों संबद्ध साथ the कैबरे  Voltaire in Zurich .
Dada  अस्वीकृत कारण और लॉजिक , prizing बकवास  , irrationality and intuition .
The origin of the name Dada is unclear  ; कुछ मानना कि it is a nonsensical शब्द  .
Others maintain that it originates from the  रोमानियाई कलाकारों ट्रिस्टन tzara और मार्सल janco 's बारंबार  use of the words da , da , meaning yes , yes in the Romanian language .
Another theory says that  the नाम `` दादा '' आए दौरान a बैठक of the समूह जब a पेपर चाकू stuck into a french-german शब्दकोष  happened to point to 'dada ' , a French word for 'hobbyhorse ' .
The movement primarily involved visual arts  , साहित्य , काव्य , आर्ट manifestoes , आर्ट सिद्धान्त , थिएटर , और ग्राफिक डिज़ाइन , और concentrated इसके anti-war राजनीती through a अस्वीकृति of  the prevailing standards in art through anti-art cultural works .
In addition to being anti-war , Dada was  भी anti- बुर्जुआ और था राजनैतिक affinities साथ the कट्टरपंथी बाएँ  .
Dada activities included public gatherings , demonstrations , and  प्रकाशन of art/literary जर्नल्स ; passionate कवरेज of आर्ट , राजनीती , और संस्कृति यहूद  topics often discussed in a variety of media .
Key figures in the movement included Hugo Ball , Emmy Hennings , Hans Arp , Raoul Hausmann , Hannah Höch ,  योहानेस baader , ट्रिस्टन tzara , फ्रांसिस picabia , रिचर्ड huelsenbeck , georg grosz , जॉन heartfield , मार्सल duchamp ,  Beatrice Wood , Kurt Schwitters , and Hans Richter , among others .
The movement influenced later styles like the avant-garde and downtown  म्यूज़िक आंदोलनों , और समूह सहित surrealism , देवानंद réalisme  , pop art and Fluxus .
दादा is the groundwork to अमूर्त आर्ट और ध्वनि काव्य , a starting पाइंट लिये प्रदर्शन आर्ट , a prelude to postmodernism , an influence on पॉप आर्ट , a जश्न of antiart to be  later embraced for anarcho-political uses in the 1960s and the movement that lay the foundation for Surrealism .
पहला trophic  level .
The plants in this image , and the algae  और phytoplankton in the झील , हैं प्राथमिक निर्माता  .
They take nutrients from the soil or the  जल , और manufacture उनके अपना खाना by photosynthesis , using  energy from the sun .
The  trophic स्तर of an सजीव is the स्थिति  it occupies in a food chain .
The word trophic derives from the Greek  τροφή ( trophē ) referring to खाना or feeding  .
A food  कड़ी represents a उत्तराधिकार of जीवों कि खा another सजीव और  are , in turn , eaten themselves .
The  क्रमांक of कदम an सजीव is इससे the प्रारंभ  of the chain is a measure of its trophic level .
Food chains  प्रारंभ at trophic स्तर 1 साथ प्राथमिक निर्माता ऐसे as पौधे , मूव to herbivores at स्तर 2 , परभक्षी at स्तर 3 और  typically finish with carnivores or apex predators at level 4 or 5 .
The path along the  कड़ी can रूप either a one-way  flow , or a food `` web . ''
Ecological  समुदायों साथ उच्चतर biodiversity रूप  more complex trophic paths .
चार of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण domesticated  silk moths .
Top to  नीचे : bombyx mori , hyalophora cecropia , antheraea pernyi  , Samia cynthia .
From Meyers  konversations-lexikon ( 1885-1892  )
A  silk-producing raspy  cricket .
Silk is a natural protein fibre ,  कुछ फ़ॉर्म of जिससे can be woven into वस्त्र  .
The protein  fibre of रेशा is रचित मुख्यतः of fibroin  and produced by certain insect larvae to form cocoons .
The best-known type of silk is obtained from the cocoons of the  लार्वे of the शहतूत silkworm bombyx mori reared in captivity ( sericulture  ) .
The shimmering appearance of silk is due to  the triangular प्रिज़्म -like ढांचा of the रेशा fibre , जिससे allows रेशा cloth to refract आवक लाइट at अलग  angles , thus producing different colors .
Silks are  उत्पादित by अनेक अन्य कीट , लकिन generally तभी the रेशा of शलभ  caterpillars has been used for textile manufacturing .
वहीँ रै महरूम कुछ शोध into अन्य silks , जिससे differ  at the molecular level .
Many silks are mainly produced by the larvae of insects undergoing complete metamorphosis , but some adult  कीट ऐसे as webspinners उपज रेशा , और कुछ कीट ऐसे as raspy झींगुर उपज रेशा throughout उनके जीवनदान  .
Silk production also occurs in  कलापक्ष ( मधुमक्खियों , wasps , और चींटियों ) , silverfish , mayflies ,  thrips , leafhoppers , beetles , lacewings , fleas , flies and midges .
Other  प्रकार of सन्धिपाद उपज रेशा , सबसे notably विभिन्न arachnids  such as spiders ( see spider silk ) .
Late Show with David Letterman is an  अमरीकी late-night बात दिखाएँ hosted by  David Letterman on CBS .
The  दिखाएँ debuted on अगस्त 30 , 1993 , और is उत्पादित by लेटरमैन 's उत्पादन  company , Worldwide Pants Incorporated .
The show 's  म्यूज़िक निदेशक और band-leader of the हाउस बैंड , the सीबीएस  Orchestra , is Paul Shaffer .
The head  लेखक is मैट रॉबर्ट्स  and the announcer is Alan Kalter .
Of the major U.S. late-night  कार्यक्रम , लेट दिखाएँ बाँधने दूसरी in संचयी औसत दर्शक over समय और तीसरा in  number of episodes over time .
The show leads other late night  shows in ad आय साथ $ 271 लाख  in 2009 .
In most U.S. markets the show airs at 11:35 p.m. Eastern/Pacific time , but is  अंकित सोमवार through बुधवार at 4:30 p.m. , और गुरुवार at 3:30 p.m और 6:00  p.m .
The second Thursday episode usually  airs on शुक्रवार of कि सप्ताह  .
In 2002 , Late Show  साथ दाउद लेटरमैन थी क्रमित no . 7 on tv मार्गदर्शिका 's 50 महानतम tv shows  of All Time .
CBS has a  अनुबंध साथ विश्वव्यापी पैंट to continue the दिखाएँ through 2014 ; by तब  , Letterman will surpass Johnny Carson as the longest tenured late-night talk show host .
The  रियल housewives of नारंगी काउंटी is an अमरीकी वास्तविकता वृत्तचित्र टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम on  Bravo , set in Orange County , California .
It was the first  the रियल housewives कार्यक्रम in the श्रेणी  .
The  श्रेणी is a voyeuristic dekh into the धनवान जीवनदान of ये housewives , as वे  shop , get plastic surgery , gossip , fight and live lavishly .
The financial crisis , the beginning of which coincided almost exactly with the first season 's broadcast , has since trimmed  the housewives ' lifestyles साथ जॉब नुकसान , evictions , बंधक मूलभूत , foreclosures , और वैवाहिक stress—all  recorded in progressive seasons of the show .
Cyberstalking is the use of the Internet or other  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अर्थात् to stalk  or harass an individual , a group of individuals , or an organization .
It may include the making of false accusations or statements of fact (  as in मानहानि ) , निगरानी , बनाना खतरे , पहचान चोरी , क्षति to आंकड़ा or उपकरण , the solicitation  of minors for sex , or gathering information that may be used to harass .
The definition of `` harassment '' must meet the criterion that a reasonable person , in  कब्ज़ा of the वही सूचना , होता लिहाज़ it as sufficient to कारण another उचित व्यक्ति तकलीफ  .
Cyberstalking is  अलग इससे स्थानिक or ऑफ़लाइन stalking in कि it occurs through the उपयोग of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक संचार  technology such as the internet .
However , it  sometimes लीड to it , or is accompanied  by it .
Both  हैं दण्ड offenses  .
cyberstalking साझा महत्वपूर्ण विशेषताएँ साथ ऑफ़लाइन  stalking .
Many stalkers – online or  बंद – हैं प्रेरित by a ख्वाहिश to  control their victims .
A  cyberstalker may be an ऑनलाइन अजनबी or a व्यक्ति  whom the target knows .
A cyberstalker may be anonymous and may solicit  भागीदारी of अन्य लोगों ऑनलाइन जो do नहीं भी जान the  target .
cyberstalking is a दण्ड ठोकर कि आता into खेल अंतर्गत राज्य anti-stalking कानून , बदनामी  laws , and harassment laws .
A cyberstalking conviction can  परिणाम in a restraining अनुक्रम , परिवीक्षा , or भी दण्ड दंड विरूद्ध the assailant , सहित  jail .
A business letter is usually used when writing from one company to  another , or लिये पत्राचार between ऐसे संगठन और उनके ग्राहक , क्लाइंट और अन्य बाह्य पार्टियों  .
The overall style of  अक्षर होगा निर्भर on the संबंध between  the parties concerned .
There are  अनेक कारण to लिखें a  business letter .
It could be to request direct information or action from another party , to order supplies from a  प्रदायक , to पहचानो a गलती कि थी वचनबद्ध , to जवाब सीधे to a निवेदन , to माफी लिये a ग़लत or बस to convey साख  .
Even today , the business letter is still very useful because it produces a permanent record ,  is गोपनीय , औपचारिक और delivers persuasive , well-considered संदेश  .
tilapia ( ) is the आम नाम लिये nearly a सौ प्रजाति of cichlid  fish from the tilapiine cichlid tribe .
Tilapia are mainly freshwater fish , inhabiting shallow  स्ट्रीम , तालाबों , नदियाँ और झीलों , और कम commonly मिला जीना in brackish जल  .
Historically , they have been of major  महत्व in कारीगर फ़िशिंग in अफ़्रीकी और the levant , और हैं of increasing महत्व in aquaculture  .
Tilapia can become problematic invasive species in new warm-water habitats ,  whether deliberately or accidentally introduced , लकिन generally नहीं in शीतोष्ण climates due to उनके अक्षमता to जीवित in कूलर waters नीचे  about .
Turner & Hooch is  a 1989 कॉमेडी नाटक अपराधों फिल्मी अभिनीत tom हैंक्स और beasley the श्वान as the eponymous वर्ण  , Turner and Hooch respectively .
The film  भी सितारों घोड़ी winningham , क्रेग T. नेल्सन , और  Reginald VelJohnson .
It was  निर्देशित by रोजर spottiswoode ; the फिल्मी थी originally slated to be निर्देशित by हेनरी  Winkler , but he was terminated due to `` creative differences '' .
it थी co-written by माइकल blodgett इससे परे  the Valley of the Dolls fame .
Although  k-9 ( साथ जेम्स belushi ) थी released prior to इस फिल्मी ( exactly तीन महीने पहले ) , टर्नर  & Hooch became more popular and seemingly overshadowed its greater success , even though K-9 had a very similar plot .
A pilot for a Turner & Hooch TV series  थी बना और भागा as a भाग of the जादुई  World of Disney .
