Adolf  हिटलर ( ; 20 अप्रैल 1889 – 30 अप्रैल 1945 ) थी an आस्ट्रिया -born जर्मनी राजनेता  and the leader of the Nazi Party ( ( NSDAP ) ; National Socialist German Workers Party ) .
he थी चांसलर of जर्मनी इससे 1933 to 1945  and dictator of Nazi Germany ( as Führer und Reichskanzler ) from 1934 to 1945 .
Hitler was at the centre of  नाजी जर्मनी , संसार युद्ध ii in यूरोपीय  , and the Holocaust .
Hitler was a decorated  दिग्गज of संसार युद्ध i  .
He joined the German  मजदूर ' पार्टी ( precursor of the nsdap ) in 1919 , और became नेता of  the NSDAP in 1921 .
In 1923 , he attempted a coup  d'état in म्यूनिख , ज्ञात as the बियर हॉल putsch  .
The failed  तख्तापलट resulted in हिटलर 's कारावास , दौरान जिससे समय  he wrote his memoir , Mein Kampf ( My Struggle ) .
After his release in 1924 ,  हिटलर gained लोकप्रिय support by attacking the सन्धि of versailles और promoting pan-germanism , antisemitism  , and anti-communism with charismatic oratory and Nazi propaganda .
After  उसके नियुक्ति as चांसलर in 1933 , he रूपांतरित the वाइमर गणतंत्र into the तीसरा reich , a single-party  dictatorship based on the totalitarian and autocratic ideology of Nazism .
Hitler  's उद्देश्य थी to स्थापित a नई अनुक्रम of निरपेक्ष नाजी जर्मनी  hegemony in continental Europe .
To this end , his foreign and domestic  नीतियों था the उद्देश्य of seizing lebensraum ( `` जीना स्पेस '' ) लिये  the Germanic people .
He directed the rearmament of Germany and the  आक्रमण of कैंडल by the wehrmacht in सितंबर 1939 , resulting in the outbreak of संसार  War II in Europe .
Under Hitler 's rule , in 1941  जर्मनी शक्तियां और उनके यूरोपीय allies occupied सबसे of  Europe and North Africa .
In  1943 , जर्मनी था महरूम मजबूर onto the रक्षात्मक  and suffered a series of escalating defeats .
In  the फाइनल दिनों of the युद्ध , दौरान the बैटल of बर्लिन  in 1945 , Hitler married his long-time partner , Eva Braun .
On 30 April 1945 , less than two  दिनों बाद , the दो वचनबद्ध आत्महत्या to avoid कैप्चर by the रेड फौज ,  and their corpses were burned .
Hitler 's  आक्रामक विदेशी नीति is माना the प्रमुख कारण of the outbreak  of World War II in Europe .
His antisemitic policies and racially motivated  विचारधारा resulted in the मौतों of at तनिक 5.5 लाख यहूदियों , और  millions of other people deemed racially inferior .
अंगूठा
A domain name is an identification string that  defines a फ्रेम of प्रशासनिक स्वायत्तता , प्राधिकार , or कंट्रोल on  the Internet .
Domain  names हैं formed by the नियम और प्रक्रियाओं of the डोमेन  Name System ( DNS ) .
technically , कोई नाम पंजीकृत  in the DNS is a domain name .
Domain names  हैं प्रयुक्त in विभिन्न नेटवर्किंग contexts और application-specific नामकरण और संबोधित  purposes .
In general , a domain name represents an Internet Protocol ( IP ) resource , such as a personal computer used to access the  अंतरजाल , a सर्वर कंप्यूटर होस्टिंग a वेब साईट , or the वेब साईट itself or कोई अन्य सेवा communicated via the अंतरजाल .
Domain  names हैं व्यवस्थित in अधीनस्थ  levels ( subdomains ) of the DNS root domain , which is nameless .
The first-level  नियत of डोमेन names हैं the top-level डोमेन ( tlds ) , सहित the जेनेरिक top-level डोमेन ( gtlds ) , ऐसे as the prominent डोमेन  com , info , net and org , and the country code top-level domains ( ccTLDs ) .
Below these top-level domains in the DNS hierarchy are the second-level and third-level domain names that are typically open for reservation by  end-users जो काश to कनेक्ट लोकल क्षेत्रफल संजाल to the अंतरजाल , बनाएँ अन्य सरेआम accessible अंतरजाल संसाधन or चलाएं वेब साइट  .
The registration of these domain names is usually  administered by डोमेन नाम registrars जो बेचें उनके सेवाएं to the पब्लिक  .
A  fully योग्य डोमेन नाम ( fqdn ) is a डोमेन नाम कि is completely  specified in the hierarchy of the DNS , having no omitted parts .
Domain names are usually written in lowercase ,  हालांकि लेबल्स in the डोमेन नाम प्रणाली हैं case-insensitive  .
Nitrate is a polyatomic ion with  the आणविक सूत्र no3− और a आणविक द्रव्यमान of 62.0049 g/mol . nitrates भी describe the  organic functional group RONO2 .
These nitrate  esters हैं a specialized क्लास of  explosives .
a गेहूं कटाई  in Idaho
इस फ़ोटो इससे a 1921 ज्ञानकोष  shows a tractor ploughing a crop field .
Agriculture is a  प्रमुख उद्योग in the संयुक्त राज्य और the देश  is a net exporter of food .
As of the last  जनसांख्यिकी of कृषि in 2007 , वहीँ यहूद 2.2 लाख  farms , covering an area of , an average of per farm .
Although agricultural activity occurs in most states , it is particularly concentrated in the  विशाल expanse of चपटा , arable जमीन ज्ञात as the ग्रेट मैदान , जिससे encompasses the सेंट्रल प्रदेश of the स्वदेश .
The Mpemba effect , named after  tanzanian छात्र erasto mpemba , is the assertion कि warmer  water can freeze faster than colder water .
Although there is anecdotal  support लिये the प्रभाव , वहीँ is no अनुबंध on exactly कया the प्रभाव is और अंतर्गत कया हालातों it occurs  .
There have been reports of similar phenomena since  प्राचीन टाइम्स , हालांकि साथ अपर्याप्त विवरण लिये the दावा to  be replicated .
The phenomenon seems contrary to  ऊष्मागतिकी , लकिन a क्रमांक of संभावित स्पष्टीकरण लिये the प्रभाव have  been proposed .
Further investigations will need to decide on a  precise परिभाषा of `` जमने '' और कंट्रोल a विशाल क्रमांक of starting पैरामीटर्स  in order to confirm or explain the effect .
The Siamese ( , ) is one  of the पहला distinctly पहचाना breeds of प्राच्य  cat .
The breed originated in Thailand  ( formerly ज्ञात as सियाम ) , जहाँ वे हैं एक of अनेक देशी breeds और हैं पुकारा wichian mat ( วิเชียรมาศ ,  a name meaning `` moon diamond '' ) .
In the 20th century the  siamese बिल्ली became एक of the सबसे लोकप्रिय breeds in यूरोपीय  and North America .
Quality Food Centers ( QFC ) is a supermarket chain based in Bellevue ,  वॉशिंगटन , साथ 64 स्टोर्स in the puget ध्वनि प्रदेश of वॉशिंगटन  state and in the Portland , Oregon metropolitan area .
In economics , the money supply or money stock , is the  कुल राशि of मौद्रिक एसेट उपलब्धियाँ in an अर्थव्यवस्था at a विशिष्ट  time .
There are several ways to define `` money  , '' लकिन मानक उपायों प्रायः शामिल करेंसी in परिसंचरण और माँग जमा ( जमाकर्ताओं ' easily पहुँचा एसेट on the किताबे of वित्तीय संस्थानों  ) .
Money supply data are recorded and published , usually  by the सरकारी or the सेंट्रल बैंको of the देश  .
Public and private sector analysts have long monitored changes in money  सप्लाई क्युकी of इसके प्रभाव on the दाम स्तर , महंगाई , the एक्सचेंज रेट और the कारोबार साईकिल  .
That relation  between धन और कीमतें is historically संबद्ध साथ  the quantity theory of money .
There is strong empirical evidence of a direct  संबंध between money-supply विकास और long-term दाम महंगाई , at तनिक लिये रैपिड increases  in the amount of money in the economy .
That is , a  देश ऐसे as ज़िम्बाब्वे जिससे देखी रैपिड increases in  its money supply also saw rapid increases in prices ( hyperinflation ) .
This is  एक कारण लिये the रिलायंस on मौद्रिक नीति as a  means of controlling inflation .
The  प्रकृति of इस causal कड़ी  is the subject of contention .
Some heterodox economists argue that the  धन सप्लाई is endogenous ( संकल्पित by the workings of the अर्थव्यवस्था ,  not by the central bank ) and that the sources of inflation must be found in the distributional structure of the economy .
In addition ,  those अर्थशास्त्रियों देखकर the सेंट्रल बैंको 's कंट्रोल over the  money supply as feeble say that there are two weak links between the growth of the money supply and the inflation rate .
First , in the aftermath of a recession , when many  संसाधन हैं underutilized , an बढ़ाएँ in the धन सप्लाई can कारण a sustained बढ़ाएँ in  real production instead of inflation .
Second , if the velocity of  धन , i.e. , the अनुपात between नाममात्र जीडीपी और धन सप्लाई , परिवर्तन , an बढ़ाएँ  in the money supply could have either no effect , an exaggerated effect , or an unpredictable effect on the growth of nominal GDP .
लोगो लिये  IMAX .
Warren Theatre  imax सिनेमा , wichita , कान्सास  , USA , 601 seats .
A  तुलना between 35 mm और 15/70  mm negative areas .
IMAX ( an  संक्षिप्त लिये चित्र अधिकतम ) is a गति चित्र फिल्मी स्वरूप और  a set of cinema projection standards created by the Canadian company IMAX Corporation .
IMAX has  the क्षमता to रिकार्ड और प्रदर्शक बिंब of दूर वृहद आकार  and resolution than conventional film systems .
Since 2002 , some feature films have been  परिवर्तित ( or upgraded ) into imax स्वरूप लिये प्रदर्शक in imax थिएटर और कुछ have भी महरूम partially  shot in IMAX .
IMAX is the most widely used  प्रणाली लिये special-venue फिल्मी प्रस्तुतियों  .
, there are  697 imax थिएटर in  52 countries .
Today  's खास is a कनाडाई children 's टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ  produced by Clive VanderBurgh at TVOntario from 1981 to 1987 .
It also ran on Nickelodeon and the Faith and Values  channel/odyssey ( अभी the hallmark चैनल ) as खूब as अनेक pbs स्टेशन throughout the संयुक्त राज्य  .
It was set in a department store , based on the  फ्लैगशिप स्थान of the अभी defunct सिम्पसन 's in टोरंटो  .
Many sequences for  it यहूद शॉट at the महारानी गली  West and Yonge Street store after hours .
Constitutionalism , in its most  सामान्य अर्थ , is `` a जटिल of विचार , attitudes , और पैटर्न of बर्ताव elaborating the principle कि the प्राधिकार of सरकारी गर्भाशयी  from and is limited by a body of fundamental law '' .
A political organization is constitutional to  the extent कि it `` contain [ s ] institutionalized mechanisms of शक्ति कंट्रोल लिये the सुरक्षा of the  interests and liberties of the citizenry , including those that may be in the minority `` .
As described  by राजनैतिक वैज्ञानिक और संवैधानिक विद्वान  David Fellman :
An ice-cream  सिरदर्द , भी ज्ञात as दिमाग फ्रीज , cold-stimulus सिरदर्द , or इसके दिए वैज्ञानिक नाम sphenopalatine ganglioneuralgia ( अर्थ `` तंत्रिका पीड़ा of the sphenopalatine  ganglion `` ) , is a form of brief cranial pain or headache commonly associated with consumption ( particularly quick consumption ) of cold beverages or foods such as ice cream and ice pops .
It is caused by having something  ठंडा टच the छत of the मुँह ( तालु ) , और is believed to परिणाम इससे a तंत्रिका जवाब causing रैपिड constriction  and swelling of blood vessels or a `` referring `` of pain from the roof of the mouth to the head .
The rate  of सेवन लिये ठंडा भोजन रै महरूम पढ़ाई  as a contributing factor .
There are people who can not  अनुभव `` दिमाग फ्रीज '' or समान लक्षण  .
The term ice-cream headache has been in use since at  तनिक 31 जनवरी 1937 , contained in a जर्नल प्रविष्टि by रेबेका timbres प्रकाशित in the 1939 किताब we किया n't पूछो यूटोपिया  : a Quaker family in Soviet Russia .
The first published use of the term brain freeze  , as it pertains to cold-induced headaches , थी on 27 may 1991  .
`` Auld Lang Syne '' ( : note `` s '' rather than `` z ''  ) is a स्कॉट्स कविता लिखा by रॉबर्ट burns in 1788 और नियत to the धुन of a परंपरागत लोक सोंग  ( Roud # 6294 ) .
It is well known in many countries , especially in the English-speaking world  ; इसके परंपरागत उपयोग होने to celebrate the प्रारंभ of the नई साल at the स्ट्रोक of मध्यरात्रि  .
By  एक्सटेंशन , it is भी सुंग at अंत्येष्टि , graduations और as a विदाई or समाप्ति  to other occasions .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय लड़के स्काउट युवावस्था गति , in अनेक देशों , उपयोग  it as a close to jamborees and other functions .
The song 's Scots title  may be अनूदित into अंग्रेज़ी वस्तुतः as `` बूढ़ा long चूंकि '' , or अधिक idiomatically , `` long long पहले '' , `` दिनों गए by '' or  `` old times '' .
Consequently `` For auld lang syne '' , as it appears  in the पहला लकीर of the कोरस , might be loosely अनूदित as `` लिये  ( the sake of ) old times '' .
The phrase `` Auld Lang Syne '' is also used in similar poems by Robert  ayton ( 1570–1638 ) , allan ramsay ( 1686–1757 ) , और जेम्स वाटसन ( 1711 ) as खूब as पुरानी लोक गीतों  predating Burns .
Matthew Fitt uses the phrase `` In the days of auld lang syne ''  as the समतुल्य of `` एकबार upon  a time ...
`` in his  retelling of परी किस्से in the स्कॉट्स भाषा  .
Ben  schulz , खिलाड़ी of leeroy जेनकींस at  BlizzCon 2007
Leeroy Jenkins , sometimes misspelled Leroy Jenkins  और प्रायः elongated साथ numerous अतिरिक्त अक्षर , is an अंतरजाल मीम नामित लिये a खिलाड़ी अक्षर  created by Ben Schulz in Blizzard Entertainment 's MMORPG , World of Warcraft .
The character  became लोकप्रिय due to a वीडियो of the खेल कि  circulated around the Internet .
The phenomenon has  चूंकि स्प्रेड परे the सीमाएँ of the गेमिंग जातियाँ into अन्य  online and mainstream media .
Oscar Grant was fatally shot  by बार्ट पुलिस अधिकारी योहानेस mehserle in ओकलैंड , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , संयुक्त राज्य  , in the early morning hours of New Year 's Day 2009 .
Responding to reports of a fight on a crowded Bay Area Rapid Transit train returning from San Francisco  , बार्ट पुलिस अधिकारियों detained ऑस्कर ग्रान्ट और अनेक अन्य यात्री on the मंच at the fruitvale बार्ट स्टेशन  .
Officer Johannes  mehserle और another अधिकारी यहूद restraining ग्रान्ट , जो थी सजदा  and allegedly resisting arrest .
Officer  mehserle stood और , according to गवाह , कहा : `` मिलेंगी वापस ,  I 'm gon na tase him . ''
Then Mehserle drew his gun and shot Grant once in the back  ; mehserle appeared दंग , put उसके हैंड्स to उसके सिर और exclaimed , `` oh , my परमेश्वर !  ''
दौरान उसके अदालत गवाही , mehserle कहा कि ग्रान्ट  then exclaimed , `` You shot me ! ''
Grant turned  आउट to be निहत्थे ; he थी सुनाया मुर्दे the अगला morning  at Highland Hospital in Oakland .
The  कार्यक्रम यहूद captured on अनेक डिजिटल वीडियो  and cell phone cameras .
The footage was  disseminated to मीडिया आउटलेट और to विभिन्न वेबसाइटों  , where it was watched millions of times .
The  following दिनों देखी दोनो शांतिपूर्ण  and violent protests .
The shooting  रै महरूम variously labeled an involuntary manslaughter  and a summary execution .
On January 13 ,  alameda काउंटी prosecutors चार्ज mehserle  with murder for the shooting .
He resigned his  स्थिति और pleaded नहीं अपराधी  .
The trial  began on जून 10 , 2010  .
Michael Rains , Mehserle 's criminal  रक्षा attorney , argued कि mehserle mistakenly शॉट ग्रान्ट साथ उसके पिस्टल , intending to उपयोग उसके  Taser when he saw Grant reaching for his waistband .
Pretrial filings  argue कि उसके क्लाएंट किया नहीं कमिट first-degree हत्या और पूछा a लॉस एंजिल्स न्यायधीश to instruct  the jury to limit its deliberations to either second-degree murder or acquittal .
Oakland civil rights attorney John Burris filed a  $ 25 लाख wrongful मौत अर्जी विरूद्ध बार्ट on निमित्त  of Grant 's family .
On July 8 , 2010 , the jury  लौटे इसके verdict : mehserle थी मिला अपराधी of involuntary manslaughter  and not guilty of second-degree murder and voluntary manslaughter .
आरंभिक विरोध विरूद्ध the सत्ताधारी यहूद शांतिपूर्वक  organized ; looting , arson , destruction of property , and small riots broke out after dark .
nearly 80 लोगों यहूद  eventually arrested .
On Friday , July 9 , 2010 , the U.S. Justice Department opened a civil  अधिकारों मामला विरूद्ध mehserle ; the संघीय सरकारी can prosecute उसे independently लिये the वही अधिनियम  under the separate sovereigns exception to double jeopardy .
The Department of Justice will be  working साथ the u.S. attorney 's दफ्तर in सैन फ्रांसिस्को और  the FBI .
On  नवम्बर 5 , 2010 , mehserle थी sentenced to दो सालो ,  minus time served .
He served  उसके समय in the लॉस एंजिल्स काउंटी कारावास , occupying  a private cell away from other prisoners .
He  थी released on जून  13 , 2011 and is now on parole .
Major  प्रतिनिधि of the हार्लेम पुनर्जागरण  .
The Harlem  पुनर्जागरण थी a सांस्कृतिक गति  that spanned the 1920s .
at the समय , it थी ज्ञात as the `` नई नीग्रो गति  '' , named after the 1925 anthology by Alain Locke .
Though it was centered in the Harlem neighborhood of New York City , many  french-speaking ब्लैक लेखक इससे अफ़्रीकी और caribbean colonies जो जिया in पेरिस यहूद  also influenced by the Harlem Renaissance .
The  हार्लेम पुनर्जागरण is unofficially पहचाना  to have spanned from about 1919 until the early or mid-1930s .
अनेक of इसके विचार जिया on much  longer .
The zenith of this `` flowering of Negro literature '' , as James Weldon Johnson preferred to call the Harlem  पुनर्जागरण , थी लगाई between 1924 ( the साल कि अवसर : a जर्नल of नीग्रो जीवन hosted a पार्टी लिये ब्लैक लेखक जहाँ अनेक श्वेत प्रकाशक यहूद in उपस्थिति ) और 1929 ( the साल of the भण्डार  market crash and the beginning of the Great Depression ) .
African States  between 500 bce और  1500 CE
obelisk at टेम्पल of लक्सर  , Egypt .
c. 1200  BCE .
अफ़्रीकी नाईट of baguirmi in  full padded armour suit .
The history of Africa begins with the prehistory of Africa and the emergence of Homo  sapiens in ईस्ट अफ़्रीकी , continuing into the उपस्थित as a patchwork of विविध और नीतियां विकासशील स्वदेश राज्य .
कुछ जल्दी प्रमाण of कृषि in अफ़्रीकी तिथियाँ इससे 16,000  BCE , and metallurgy from about 4000 BCE .
The recorded  इतिहास of जल्दी सभ्यता arose in मिश्र , और बाद in  Nubia , the Maghreb and the Horn of Africa .
During the Middle  आयु , islam स्प्रेड through  the regions .
Crossing the  मग़रिब और the सहेल , a प्रमुख बीच of  Muslim culture was Timbuktu .
Some notable pre-colonial states and societies in Africa include the Nok culture , Mali Empire  , ashanti साम्राज्य , किंगडम of mapungubwe , किंगडम of ज्या , किंगडम of saloum , किंगडम of baol , किंगडम of ज़िम्बाब्वे , किंगडम of kongo ,  Ancient Carthage , Numidia , Mauretania , the Aksumite Empire , the Ajuuraan State and the Adal Sultanate .
From the late 15th century ,  europeans और arabs took स्लेव इससे वेस्ट , सेंट्रल और southeast अफ़्रीकी विदेशी in the अफ़्रीकी  slave trade .
European colonization of Africa developed  rapidly in the हाथापाई लिये अफ़्रीकी of the लेट 19th और जल्दी 20th सदियां  .
Following struggles for  स्वतंत्रता in अनेक भाग of the महाद्वीप , as खूब as a weakened यूरोपीय बाद the दूसरी संसार युद्ध ; decolonization  took place .
Africa 's history has been challenging for researchers in the field  of अफ़्रीकी अध्ययन क्युकी of the किल्लत of लिखा स्त्रोत in विशाल भाग of sub-saharan अफ़्रीकी  .
Scholarly techniques such as the  रिकॉर्डिंग of मौखिक इतिहास , ऐतिहासिक भाषाविज्ञान , पुरातत्व और आनुवंशिकी have महरूम  crucial .
curry फोली थी the पहला खिलाड़ी in प्रमुख  League Baseball history to hit for the cycle .
In baseball , hitting  लिये the साईकिल is the accomplishment of एक बैटर hitting  a single , a double , a triple , and a home run in the same game .
collecting the हिट्स in कि अनुक्रम is ज्ञात  as a `` natural cycle '' .
Cycles are uncommon in Major League  बेसबॉल ( एमएलबी ) , और have occurred 294 टाइम्स चूंकि the पहला by curry  Foley in 1882 .
The cycle is roughly as common as a  no-hitter ( 279 आवृत्ति in एमएलबी इतिहास ) ; it रै महरूम पुकारा `` एक of the  rarest '' and `` most difficult feats '' in baseball .
Based  on 2009 अप्रिय स्तर , the संभाव्यता of an औसत एमएलबी खिलाड़ी hitting लिये a साईकिल विरूद्ध an  average team in a game is approximately 0.00590 % ; this corresponds to about 2.5 cycles in a 162-game season with 30 teams .
In other  बेसबॉल लीग , the साईकिल is हासिल  less frequently .
Through September 4 , 2008 ,  62 खिलाड़ी in निप्पन पेशेवर बेसबॉल ( npb ) , the top-level बेसबॉल  organization in Japan , have hit for the cycle , the most recent being Michihiro Ogasawara .
Two players have  hit लिये the साईकिल on the वही दिन एकबार in npb  history ; this has occurred twice in MLB history .
One NPB  खिलाड़ी रै भी hit लिये the साईकिल in an npb  All-Star game .
No  खिलाड़ी रै कभी hit लिये the साईकिल in the  MLB All-Star Game or the postseason .
The main  स्लेव रूट in मध्यकालीन अफ़्रीकी  .
This article discusses systems ,  इतिहास , और प्रभाव of गुलामी भीतर अफ़्रीकी  .
See Arab slave trade , Atlantic slave trade ,  maafa , और गुलामी in समकालीन अफ़्रीकी लिये अन्य चर्चाएँ  .
`` स्लेव हस्तांतरण in  Africa '' .
Europeans  प्रायः किया नहीं डालें the आंतरिक  regions .
Slavery  in अफ़्रीकी रै existed throughout the महाद्वीप लिये  many centuries , and continues in the current day .
Systems of servitude and slavery were  आम in अनेक भाग of the महाद्वीप , as वे यहूद in much  of the ancient world .
In most African societies where  गुलामी थी प्रचलित , the enslaved लोगों यहूद largely treated  as indentured servants and not treated as chattel slaves .
When the Arab  स्लेव व्यापार और अटलांटिक स्लेव व्यापार began , अनेक of the लोकल स्लेव प्रणालियों बदला और began supplying captives  for slave markets outside of Africa .
Slavery in historical  अफ़्रीकी थी practiced in अनेक अलग फ़ॉर्म और कुछ of  these do not clearly fit the definitions of slavery elsewhere in the world .
Debt  गुलामी , enslavement of युद्ध captives , सैन्य गुलामी , और दण्ड गुलामी  were all practiced in various parts of Africa .
Although there  था महरूम कुछ trans-saharan व्यापार इससे the आंतरिक of sub-saharan अफ़्रीकी to अन्य regions , गुलामी थी a छोटी भाग of the आर्थिक जीवन  of many societies in Africa until the introduction of transcontinental slave trades ( Arab and Atlantic ) .
Slave practices were again transformed with European  colonization of अफ़्रीकी और the औपचारिक abolition of गुलामी in the जल्दी 1900s  .
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System monitor application included with the Microsoft Windows NT family of operating systems that provides limited information about computer performance and running applications , processes and CPU usage , commit charge and memory information , network activity and statistics ,  logged-in उपयोक्ता , और प्रणाली सेवाएं ( और as प्रायः is the मामला साथ तन्त्र टूल्स provided by microsoft लिये खिड़कियाँ , 3rd पार्टी तन्त्र is उपलब्धियाँ जिससे भरता the आवश्यकताएँ अधिक thoroughly , e.g , `` प्रक्रम एक्सप्लोरर '' , `` विस्तारित कार्य मैनेजर '' , `` anvir कार्य मैनेजर '' , `` प्रक्रम हैकर '' , और `` प्रणाली एक्सप्लोरर  '' ) .
The Task Manager can also be used to set  प्रक्रम प्राथमिकताएं , प्रोसेसर अपनापन , forcibly terminate प्रक्रियाओं , और  shut down , restart , hibernate or log off from Windows .
Windows  कार्य मैनेजर थी introduced साथ  Windows NT 4.0 .
Previous versions of  खिड़कियाँ nt शामिल the कार्य सूची अनुप्रयोग , जिससे था दूर कम सुविधाएँ  .
The task list was capable of listing  फिलहाल कार्यशील प्रक्रियाओं और हत्या उन्हें , or बनाना a नई प्रक्रम  .
In Windows XP only , a Shutdown menu is also  उपस्थित कि allows अभिगम to standby , hibernate , फेरे बंद , restart  , Log Off and Switch User .
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows (  microsoft खिड़कियाँ 3.x , खिड़कियाँ 95 , खिड़कियाँ 98 ) था a कार्यक्रम ज्ञात as कार्य to प्रदर्शक the कार्यक्रम फिलहाल कार्यशील  .
This  संचिका थी चलाया by कार्यशील the taskman.exe संचिका इससे the  C : \Windows directory .
The Troop is an  american-canadian live-action , सिंगल कैमरा कॉमेडी -adventure टेलीविज़न श्रेणी परिचय a तिकड़ी of teenagers जो  fight and capture monsters and other supernatural phenomena that invade the fictional town of Lakewood .
Created and executive produced  by अधिकतम burnett , ग्रेग कूलिज और क्रिस मॉर्गन , the श्रेणी premiered  on Nickelodeon on September 18 , 2009 .
The second season premiered on June 25 ,  2011 और निकलोडियन रद्द the श्रेणी मिडवे through it 's दूसरी  season .
The remaining episodes of  ऋतु 2 यहूद aired on nicktoons मगर the  last 3..
Sparsely populated in relation to its area , the  लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of the कांगो ( drc ) is घर to a विशाल संभावित of प्राकृतिक संसाधन और खनिज माल , इसके untapped जमा of कच्चा खनिज हैं अनुमानित to be लायक in excess of us $ 24 खरब , yet the अर्थव्यवस्था of the drc रै अस्वीकृत drastically  since the mid-1980s .
At the time of its independence in 1960 , DRC was the  दूसरी सबसे industrialized देश in अफ़्रीकी बाद दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी ; it boasted a thriving खनन सेक्टर और इसके कृषि  sector was relatively productive .
If the viewer  stares at इस चित्र लिये 20–60 सेकेंड और stares at a श्वेत ऑब्जेक्ट , a ऋणात्मक afterimage होगा  appear ( in this case , it will be cyan on magenta ) .
इस can भी be हासिल by the दर्शक closing his/her आँखें और  tilting their head up .
An afterimage or ghost image  or चित्र burn-in is an ऑप्टिकल भ्रम कि refers to an चित्र continuing to appear in एक 's दृष्टि बाद the एक्सपोज़र to the  original image has ceased .
One of the most common afterimages is the bright glow that seems to float before one  's आँखें बाद looking into a लाइट सोर्स लिये a few सेकेंड  .
closing the नजर can सहायता achieve a बेहतर भाव  of the color in its own aspect .
afterimages आइये in दो फ़ॉर्म , ऋणात्मक ( उलट  ) and positive ( retaining original color ) .
The process behind positive afterimages is  अनजान , हालांकि विचार to be सम्बन्धित to neural अनुकूलन  .
On the  अन्य हाथ , ऋणात्मक afterimages हैं a retinal  phenomenon and are well understood .
Lost is an American serial drama television  श्रेणी कि premiered on सितंबर 22 , 2004 on the अमरीकी  Broadcasting Company ( ABC ) .
the श्रेणी थी निर्मित by J. J. abrams और डैमन lindelof , आधारित  upon an original pilot script titled Nowhere written by Jeffrey Lieber .
Six seasons of  the दिखाएँ aired , in जोड to numerous काटें  shows to recap previous episodes .
ABC announced that Lost  होता समाप्त बाद छह सीज़न , having उत्पादित a कुल of 121  episodes .
The series follows the past , present , and future experience ( s ) of the survivors of a plane crash  on a यात्री जेट , oceanic उड़ान 815 , उड़ती इससे सिडनी to लॉस एंजिल्स बाद it क्रैश on a तीव्र द्वीप  in the South Pacific .
The series also  शामिल कहानियां of the जीवनदान of लोगों already जीना on the द्वीप — वे शामिल the `` अन्य `` , जो initially antagonize the survivors , as खूब  as a group of people who arrive on the freighter Kahana .
Each  एपीसोड typically सुविधाएँ कार्रवाई on the द्वीप as खूब as a द्वितीयक कथानक इससे another  point in a character 's life .
Season 6 features a detailing of the lives of the  survivors in a अलग वास्तविकता , as if the उड़ान था never क्रैश  .
In the following list , the term `` featured character ( s  ) '' refers to the अक्षर or वर्ण जो हैं प्रदर्शित in the द्वितीयक कथानक  of each episode .
`` no  .
in series '' refers to  the एपीसोड 's क्रमांक in the overall श्रेणी ,  whereas `` No .
in season ''  refers to the एपीसोड 's क्रमांक in प्रत्येक particular  season .
`` U.S. viewers (  लाख ) '' refers to the क्रमांक of अमेरिकी in लाखो जो देखी  the episode live .
A total of 121 episodes of Lost  यहूद उत्पादित , the पिछला of जिससे aired on may 23  , 2010 .
All seasons are available on DVD in  regions 1–4 और on blu-ray in  Regions A and B .
चपटा फीट ( भी पुकारा pes planus or गिरे arches ) is a औपचारिक सन्दर्भ to a चिकित्सा कंडीशन in जिससे the मेहराब of the पैर collapses , साथ the संपूर्ण एकमात्र of the पैर coming into  complete or near-complete contact with the ground .
In some individuals ( an estimated 20–30 % of the general  जनसांख्यिकी ) the मेहराब बस never develops in एक पैर  ( unilaterally ) or both feet ( bilaterally ) .
Three studies (  देखिए citations नीचे in सैन्य खण्ड ) of सैन्य रंगरूटों have दिखाया no प्रमाण of बाद increased चोट , or पैर समस्याएं , due to चपटा फीट , in  a population of people who reach military service age without prior foot problems .
However , these studies can  नहीं be प्रयुक्त to न्यायधीश संभावित भविष्य क्षति इससे इस कंडीशन जब diagnosed  at younger ages .
They also can not be applied to persons whose flat feet are associated with foot  लक्षण , or निश्चित लक्षण in अन्य भाग of the देह ( ऐसे as the  leg or back ) possibly referable to the foot .
Generation X ,  commonly abbreviated to gen x , is the पीढी born बाद the पश्चिमी post-world  War II baby boom .
Demographers , historians and  टीकाकारों उपयोग शुरूआत जनम तिथियाँ इससे the जल्दी 1960s to the जल्दी 1980s  .
The term was popularized by Douglas Coupland 's 1991 novel  पीढी x : किस्से लिये an त्वरित संस्कृति  .
Before that , it had been  प्रयुक्त लिये विभिन्न subcultures or countercultures  after the 1950s .
Pressure ulcers , also known  as decubitus छाले or bedsores , हैं स्थानीयकृत चोटों to the स्किन and/or underlying ऊतक प्रायः over a बोनी prominence , as a परिणाम of दबाव  , or pressure in combination with shear and/or friction .
Most commonly this will be the sacrum ,  coccyx , एड़ियों or the कूल्हों , लकिन अन्य साइट ऐसे as the elbows , अदब , ankles  or the back of the cranium can be affected .
The cause of pressure ulcers is pressure applied to soft  ऊतक so कि रक्त प्रवाह to the नरम ऊतक is completely or partially  obstructed .
Shear is also a cause ; shear pulls  on रक्त बरतन कि फीड the स्किन  .
Pressure ulcers most  commonly develop in व्यक्तियों जो हैं नहीं चलती परिचय or हैं confined  to wheelchairs .
It is widely believed that  अन्य कारकों can influence the सहिष्णुता of स्किन लिये दबाव और shear thereby increasing the रिस्क of दबाव अल्सर विकास  .
These factors are protein-calorie malnutrition , microclimate ( skin wetness caused by  sweating or incontinence ) , रोगों कि reduce रक्त प्रवाह to the स्किन , ऐसे as arteriosclerosis  or diseases that reduce the feeling in the skin , such as paralysis or neuropathy .
The healing of pressure ulcers may be slowed by the age of the person , medical  शर्तें ( ऐसे as arteriosclerosis , मधुमेह or संक्रमण ) , धूम्रपान or medications  such as antiinflammatory drugs .
Although often prevented and treatable if found early , pressure ulcers can be very difficult to prevent in  critically बीमार मरीजों , frail बड़ो , व्हीलचेयर उपयोक्ता ( विशेषकर जहाँ स्पाइनल चोट is शामिल ) और  terminally ill patients .
Primary  रोकथाम is to redistribute दबाव by turning the रोगी  regularly .
The benefit of turning to avoid further sores is  खूब प्रलेखित चूंकि at तनिक the 19th सदी  .
In addition to turning and re-positioning  the रोगी in bed or व्हीलचेयर , खाने a संतुलित आहार साथ पर्याप्त प्रोटीन और keeping the स्किन  free from exposure to urine and stool is very important .
The prevalence of pressure ulcers in hospital settings is high ,  लकिन सुधार हैं होने बना  .
According to the  2010 ipup ( अंतरराष्ट्रीय दबाव अल्सर व्यापकता सर्वेक्षण ) conducted in कनाडा , वहीँ थी a significant घटी  in the overall facility-acquired prevalence of pressure ulcers from 2009-2010 .
Ulcers were  सबसे commonly पहचाना at the sacral/coccyx अल्सर स्थान ; however , एड़ी छाले यहूद the सबसे  common facility-acquired location in the survey .
Overboard is a 1987 American  रोमांटिक कॉमेडी फिल्मी अभिनीत goldie hawn और कर्ट रसेल  .
It was directed by Garry Marshall , produced by  roddy mcdowell , और loosely प्रेरित by the 1974 इतालवी फिल्मी  Swept Away .
In turn , Overboard  थी adapted into the 2006 दक्षिण कोरियाई टेलीविज़न श्रेणी  , Couple or Trouble .
Green Bay is a city in and the county seat of Brown  काउंटी in the u.S. राज्य of विस्कॉन्सिन , स्तिथ at the सिर of ग्रीन खाड़ी , a sub-basin  of Lake Michigan , at the mouth of the Fox River .
It has an  उन्नयन of ऊपर समुद्र स्तर और is स्तिथ उत्तर  of Milwaukee .
the जनसांख्यिकी थी 104,057 at  the 2010 census .
It is the  third-largest नगर in the राज्य of विस्कॉन्सिन ,  after Milwaukee and Madison .
It is also  the third-largest नगर on the वेस्ट shore of झील मिशिगन  , after Chicago and Milwaukee .
Green Bay is home to the Green Bay Packers of  the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग , बनाना it by दूर the smallest महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the यूएसए to मेजबान a प्रमुख  professional sports franchise .
Green Bay is the principal city of the Green Bay Metropolitan Statistical Area , which covers Brown , Kewaunee , and  oconto काउंटी और था a संयुक्त जनसांख्यिकी of 282,599 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी  .
Green Bay is an industrial city with several  meatpacking और पेपर पौधे , और a बंदरगाहों on ग्रीन खाड़ी , an भुजा of झील मिशिगन कि स्थानीय कॉल the खाड़ी  of Green Bay , to avoid conflating it with the eponymous city .
It is home to the  नेशनल रेलरोड संग्रहालय ; the नेविली पब्लिक संग्रहालय , साथ  exhibitions of art , history , and science ; and the University of Wisconsin–Green Bay .
Luteinizing hormone ( LH ,  भी ज्ञात as lutropin और sometimes lutrophin ) is a हार्मोन उत्पादित by gonadotroph कोशिकाएं  in the anterior pituitary gland .
In females , an acute rise of  lh ( `` lh surge '' ) triggers ovulation और विकास  of the corpus luteum .
In males , where LH  था भी महरूम पुकारा अंतरालीय cell-stimulating हार्मोन ( icsh ) , it stimulates leydig  cell production of testosterone .
It acts  synergistically साथ  FSH .
Selena  quintanilla-pérez ( अप्रैल 16 , 1971 – कूच 31 , 1995 ) , ज्ञात बस  as Selena , was an American singer-songwriter .
She was named the `` top Latin artist of the '90s '' and `` Best  selling लैटिन कलाकार of the दशक '' by बिलबोर्ड लिये उसके चौदह top-ten singles  in the Top Latin Songs chart , including seven number-one hits .
Selena had the most successful singles of 1994  और 1995 , `` amor prohibido `` और `` no me queda  Más `` .
She was called `` The Queen of Tejano music  `` और the मैक्सिकन समतुल्य of मैडोना  .
Selena  released उसके पहला एल्बम , सेलिना  y Los Dinos , at the age of twelve .
She won Female Vocalist of the Year at the 1987  tejano म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार और उतरा a रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध साथ emi a few सालो बाद  .
Her fame grew  throughout the जल्दी 1990s , विशेषकर in spanish-speaking देशों , और वो था begun रिकॉर्डिंग  in English as well .
Selena was murdered at the age of 23 on March 31 , 1995 by  yolanda saldívar , the पूर्व अध्यक्ष of उसके प्रशंसक क्लबों  .
On  अप्रैल 12 , 1995 , दो सप्ताह बाद उसके मौत , जार्ज W. बुश , राज्यपाल of टेक्सास at the समय , घोषित उसके  birthday `` Selena Day '' in Texas .
Warner Bros. produced Selena , a film based on  उसके जीवन अभिनीत जेनिफर लोपेज़ , in  1997 .
Selena 's life was also the  आधार of the musical सेलिना forever अभिनीत वेरोनिका  Vazquez as Selena .
In June 2006 Selena was commemorated with a life-sized bronze  प्रतिमा ( mirador de la flor in कॉर्पस christi , टेक्सास ) और a सेलिना संग्रहालय  opened there .
She has sold  over 60 लाख एल्बम विश्वव्यापी , बनाना उसके एक of the  best-selling artists of all time .
She is  भी the तभी मादा कलाकार to have पाँच एल्बम in u.s . बिलबोर्ड  200 at the same time .
जर्मनी stahlhelm इससे  World War II
तमगा of the bolivian फौज colorados रेजीमेंट , प्रर्दशित a stahlhelm और  two crossed bayonets
stahlhelm ( बहुवचन , stahlhelme  ) is German for `` steel helmet '' .
The Imperial German Army began to replace the  परंपरागत boiled-leather pickelhaube ( spiked कॉम्बैट हेल्मेट ) साथ the stahlhelm दौरान संसार  War I in 1916 .
The  पद stahlhelm refers दोनो to a जेनेरिक स्टील हेल्मेट , और अधिक specifically  to the distinctive ( and iconic ) German design .
The Stahlhelm , with its distinctive `` coal scuttle `` shape , was an instantly  recognizable प्रतीक लिये सैन्य imagery और became a आम तत्व of सैन्य प्रचार on दोनो पहलू , बस जैसे the pickelhaube  before it .
Its name was also used by the Stahlhelm , a  अर्धसैनिक राष्ट्रवादी संगठन स्थापित at the समाप्त of 1918  .
glow-in-the-dark may  refer to:
जीवदीप्ति , the उत्पादन और उत्सर्जन of लाइट by  a living organism
Chemiluminescence ,  is the उत्सर्जन of लाइट ( संदीप्ति ) बगैर  emission of heat
Phosphorescence  , a विशिष्ट प्रकार of photoluminescence सम्बन्धित  to fluorescence
Radioluminescence , production  of संदीप्ति in a सामग्री by the बमबारी of आयनकारी  radiation
Glow in  the अंधेरा दौरे , a 2008 कॉन्सर्ट दौरे by kanye  West
फ्रैंकफर्ट विमानक्षेत्र serves as a हब नगर लिये लुफ़्थान्सा और receives  flights from Star Alliance carriers .
Airline hubs are airports ranked  as विशाल , मीडियम , छोटी , और non-hubs as एक of the faa विमानक्षेत्र श्रेणी जिससे हैं re-evaluated प्रत्येक साल  based on number of commercial passengers .
The more common but informal use for the phrase airline hub is an  विमानक्षेत्र कि an एयरलाइन उपयोग as a ट्रांसफ़र पाइंट to मिलेंगी यात्री to उनके intended गंतव्य  .
It is part of a hub and  spoke मॉडल , जहाँ travelers चलती between एयरपोर्ट नहीं परोसा by सीधा फ़्लाइट बदलें planes en रूट to  their destinations .
This is as  opposed to the पाइंट to पाइंट मॉडल  .
Many hubs of the airlines are also situated at  एयरपोर्ट in the शहरों of the संबंधित सिर कार्यालयों  .
Some airlines may use only  a सिंगल हब , जबकि अन्य एयरलाइंस उपयोग अनेक hubs  .
Hubs are  प्रयुक्त लिये दोनो यात्री फ़्लाइट as  well as cargo flights .
Many airlines also use focus cities , which  फलन much the वही as hubs  .
Airlines may  भी उपयोग द्वितीयक hubs , a non-technical पद लिये  large focus cities .
A hub in the  मध्य of a रूट is अधिक प्रभावी than at either समाप्त as connecting ट्रैफ़िक अधिक easily भरता the प्लेन  - passengers prefer a one-stop ( two-leg ) route over a two-stop ( three-leg ) route .
खोखला lacedaemon  .
Site of the Menelaion , the shrine to Helen and Menelaus  constructed anciently in the कांस्य आयु नगर कि stood on the हिल of therapne on the बाएँ बैंको  of the Eurotas River overlooking the future site of Dorian Sparta .
Across the valley  the successive ridges of माउंट taygetus हैं in प्रमाण  .
Sparta ( Doric Greek : ; Attic Greek : ) , or Lacedaemon , was a prominent  city-state in प्राचीन यूनानियों , situated on the बैंको of the eurotas नदी in laconia , in south-eastern  Peloponnese .
It emerged as a political  एंटिटी around the 10th सदी bc , जब the आक्रमणकारी dorians subjugated  the local , non-Dorian population .
Around 650 BC , it  रोज़ to become the प्रबल सैन्य land-power in प्राचीन  Greece .
Given its  सैन्य pre-eminence , स्पार्टा थी पहचाना as the overall नेता of the संयुक्त यूनानी शक्तियां  during the Greco-Persian Wars .
Between 431 and  404 bc , स्पार्टा थी the प्रिंसिपल दुश्मन of एथेंस दौरान the peloponnesian  War , from which it emerged victorious , though at great cost .
Sparta 's defeat by Thebes in the Battle of  leuctra in 371 bc ended स्पार्टा 's prominent भूमिका in  Greece .
However  , it कायम इसके राजनैतिक स्वतंत्रता जबतक the रोमन conquest  of Greece in 146 BC .
It then underwent a long period of  मनाही , विशेषकर in the मध्य आयु , जब अनेक spartans स्थानांतरित to सजीव in mystras  .
आधुनिक स्पार्टा is the पूंजी of the यूनानी क्षेत्रीय ईकाई of laconia और  a center for the processing of goods such as citrus and olives .
Sparta  थी अद्वितीय in प्राचीन यूनानियों लिये इसके सोशल  system and constitution , which completely focused on military training and excellence .
Its inhabitants were classified as Spartiates (  spartan नागरिकों , जो enjoyed पूरा अधिकारों ) , mothakes ( non-spartan फ़्री मेन उठाया as spartans ) , perioikoi ( freedmen ) , और  Helots ( state-owned serfs , enslaved non-Spartan local population ) .
Spartiates  underwent the कठोर agoge प्रशिक्षण और शिक्षा regimen , और spartan phalanges  were widely considered to be among the best in battle .
Spartan women enjoyed  considerably अधिक अधिकारों और समता to मेन than  elsewhere in the classical world .
Sparta was the  विषय of fascination in इसके अपना दिन , as खूब as in the वेस्ट following the पुनरुद्धार  of classical learning .
This love or admiration of  स्पार्टा is ज्ञात as laconism or laconophilia  .
Fantasy football is an interactive competition in which  उपयोक्ता compete विरूद्ध प्रत्येक अन्य as सामान्य प्रबंधक of आभासी  teams .
The players that an  व्यक्तिगत is समर्थ to मैनेज हैं पेशेवर अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल खिलाड़ी in the नेशनल  Football League .
the अलग क्रियाएँ लोगों हैं समर्थ to मेक हैं drafting  , trading , adding or dropping players , and changing rosters .
Due to the growth of the Internet , Fantasy football has vastly increased in popularity , particularly because Fantasy football providers such as ESPN , Yahoo , CBS  , और the एनएफएल itself हैं समर्थ to रखना track of आंकडे entirely ऑनलाइन , eliminating the need to जाँच बक्सा स्कोर और अखबारों regularly to रखना track of खिलाड़ी  .
Most leagues have  a सिंगल सप्ताह चैंपियनशिप in सप्ताह 16 of the एनएफएल  season .
World population estimates from 1800 to 2100 , based on UN  2010 projections ( रेड , नारंगी , ग्रीन ) और us जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ऐतिहासिक estimates ( ब्लैक  ) .
Actual  अंकित जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़े हैं in ब्लू  .
According to the  उच्चतम अनुमान , the संसार जनसांख्यिकी may वृद्धि to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according to  the lowest estimate , it may decline to 6 billion .
The world population is the  कुल क्रमांक of जीना इंसानो on धरती  .
As of today , it is estimated  to क्रमांक अरब by the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो (  USCB ) .
The USCB estimates that  the संसार जनसांख्यिकी exceeded 7 अरब  on March 12 , 2012 .
according to a पृथक अनुमान by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र जनसांख्यिकी  Fund , it reached this milestone on October 31 , 2011 .
The world population has experienced continuous growth since the  समाप्त of the ग्रेट अकाल और the ब्लैक मौत in 1350 , जब it stood at around 370 लाख  .
The highest rates of growth – global  जनसांख्यिकी increases ऊपर 1.8 % प्रति साल – यहूद देखी briefly दौरान the 1950s , और  for a longer period during the 1960s and 1970s .
The growth rate  peaked at 2.2 % in 1963 , और था अस्वीकृत to 1.1 %  by 2011 .
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s at about 138 million ,  और हैं अभी अपेक्षित to remain essentially निरंतर at उनके 2011 स्तर of 134 लाख , जबकि मौतों क्रमांक 56 लाख प्रति साल , और हैं अपेक्षित to बढ़ाएँ  to 80 million per year by 2040 .
Current  projections दिखाएँ a जारी बढ़ाएँ in जनसांख्यिकी in the निकट भविष्य ( लकिन a स्थिर मनाही in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट ) , साथ the वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी अपेक्षित to पहुँचें between  7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050 .
Various longer-term  estimates भविष्यवाणी further विकास , stagnation , or भी overall  decline in the global population by 2150 .
Some  विश्लेषकों have questioned the स्थिरता of further संसार जनसांख्यिकी विकास , citing the growing  pressures on the environment , global food supplies , and energy resources .
skeletal मांसपेशियां  homo sapiens
इस is a तालिका of मांसपेशियां of the इंसान  anatomy .
There are approximately 642  skeletal मांसपेशियां भीतर the ठेठ इंसान , और लगभग प्रत्येक मांसपेशी constitutes एक भाग of a जोड़ी of एकसमान द्विपक्षीय मांसपेशियां , मिला  on both sides , resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles , as presented in this article .
Nevertheless ,  the सटीक क्रमांक is मुश्किल to define क्युकी अलग स्त्रोत समूह मांसपेशियां  differently , e.g . regarding what is defined as different parts of a single muscle or as several muscles .
Examples  दायरा इससे 640 to 850  .
The muscles  of the इंसान देह can be categorized into a क्रमांक of समूह जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating to the सिर और गर्दन , मांसपेशियां of the  torso or trunk , muscles of the upper limbs , and muscles of the lower limbs .
The action  refers to the कार्रवाई of प्रत्येक मांसपेशी इससे the मानक  anatomical position .
In other positions ,  अन्य क्रियाएँ may be performed  .
A gold bar is a  मात्रा of परिष्कृत धात्विक सुनहरा of कोई आकार कि is बना by a बार निर्माता  meeting standard conditions of manufacture , labeling , and record keeping .
Larger gold  बार कि हैं उत्पादित by pouring the molten मेटल  into molds are called ingots .
Smaller bars may be manufactured by  minting or stamping इससे appropriately  rolled gold sheets .
The standard gold bar held as gold  reserves by सेंट्रल बैंको और traded among bullion डीलर is the 400-troy-ounce  ( 12.4 kg or 438.9 ounces ) Good Delivery gold bar .
The kilobar , which is to say 1000 grams in mass , is the bar that  is अधिक manageable और is प्रयुक्त extensively लिये व्यापार और निवेश  .
The premium on these bars when traded is very  कम over the स्पॉट मान of the सुनहरा बनाना it आदर्श लिये छोटी हस्तांतरण between  banks and traders .
Most kilobars are flat , although some  निवेशकों , विशेषकर in यूरोपीय , prefer  the brick shape .
Elisha Archibald `` Archie '' Manning III ( born May 19 , 1949 ) is a former American  फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग , playing लिये the नई ऑरलियन्स संतो इससे 1971 to 1982 , तब  for the Houston Oilers and Minnesota Vikings .
He is the father of current Denver  broncos क्वार्टरबैक peyton मैनिंग , वर्तमान नई यॉर्क दिग्गज starting क्वार्टरबैक एली मैनिंग  , and former Ole Miss receiver Cooper Manning .
वकालत is a राजनैतिक प्रक्रम by an व्यक्तिगत or समूह जिससे aims to influence public-policy  and resource allocation decisions within political , economic , and social systems and institutions .
Advocacy can include many activities that a person or organization undertakes including  मीडिया अभियान , पब्लिक बोलना , commissioning और प्रकाशन शोध or पोल or the दाखिल of an  amicus brief .
Lobbying ( often by lobby groups ) is a form of advocacy where a direct approach is made to legislators on an issue  जिससे plays a significant भूमिका in आधुनिक राजनीती  .
Research is beginning to explore how  वकालत समूह in the u.S. और कनाडा हैं using सोशल मीडिया  to facilitate civic engagement and collective action .
The flag of Mexico ( Spanish : Bandera de  méxico ) is a लंबवत तिरंगा of ग्रीन , श्वेत , और रेड साथ the नेशनल कोट of  arms charged in the center of the white stripe .
While the meaning of the colors has changed over time , these three colors were adopted by Mexico  following स्वतंत्रता इससे स्पेन दौरान the देश 's युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता , और subsequent पहला मैक्सिकन साम्राज्य  .
The current flag was adopted in 1968 , but the overall design has been  प्रयुक्त चूंकि 1821 , जब the पहला नेशनल ध्वज थी निर्मित  .
The  वर्तमान विधि of नेशनल प्रतीकों , विधि on the नेशनल बाहें , ध्वज , और  Anthem , that governs the use of the national flag has been in place since 1984 .
Red ,  श्वेत , और ग्रीन हैं the रंगों of the नेशनल  liberation army in Mexico .
The central emblem is the Aztec  pictogram लिये tenochtitlan ( अभी मैक्सिको नगर ) , the बीच of  their empire .
It  recalls the लेजेंड कि प्रेरित the aztecs to  settle on what was originally a lake-island .
The form of  the कोट of बाहें थी सबसे recently संशोधित  in 1968 .
A ribbon in  the नेशनल रंगों is at the नीचे  of the coat of arms .
Throughout history , the flag has changed  चार टाइम्स , as the डिज़ाइन of the कोट of बाहें और the length-width ratios of the ध्वज have  been modified .
However , the coat  of बाहें रै था the वही सुविधाएँ throughout : an त्रिभुज , पकड़कर a serpent in इसके talon , is perched on शीर्ष of a prickly  pear cactus ; the cactus is situated on a rock that rises above a lake .
The coat of arms is derived from an Aztec legend that their gods told  उन्हें to निर्माण a नगर जहाँ वे स्पॉट an त्रिभुज on a nopal खाने a serpent ,  which is now Mexico City .
The current national flag  , the चौथी नेशनल ध्वज , is भी प्रयुक्त as the मैक्सिकन नवल ensign by जहाजों पंजीकृत in मैक्सिको  .
A destination  विपणन संगठन or सम्मेलन और आगंतुक ब्यूरो promotes a कस्बा ,  city , region , or country in order to increase the number of visitors .
It promotes the development and marketing of a  गंतव्य , focusing on सम्मेलन बिक्री , पर्यटन विपणन  , and services .
Such organizations promote economic development of a destination by increasing visits  इससे पर्यटकों और कारोबार travelers , जिससे generates overnight आवास लिये a गंतव्य , विज़िट to रेस्तरां , और खरीदारी revenues  .
Convention and visitor bureaus are the most  महत्वपूर्ण पर्यटन विपणन संगठन in उनके संबंधित पर्यटक गंतव्यों , as वे हैं सीधे जिम्मेदार लिये विपणन the गंतव्य ब्रांड through सफर और  tourism `` product awareness '' to visitors .
dmos उपज अरबों of डॉलर in सीधा और अप्रत्यक्ष आय और  taxes for their destinations ' economies with their marketing and sales expertise .
Destination marketing organizations are often called travel ,  सम्मेलन , विज़िटर , or पर्यटन bureaux , स्वागत centers , सूचना  centers and more .
regardless of the नाम , ये संगठन प्रस्ताव अनेक  services to the traveling public .
The elk or wapiti ( Cervus canadensis ) is one of the largest species of deer in the world , and one of the  largest जमीन स्तनधारियों in उत्तर अमेरिका और पूर्वी  Asia .
It was long  believed to be a subspecies of the यूरोपीय रेड हिरण ( cervus elaphus ) , लकिन प्रमाण इससे a 2004 पढ़ाई of the mitochondrial डीएनए  indicates that the two are distinct species .
This animal should not be  उलझन साथ the larger मूस ( alces alces ) , to जिससे the नाम `` नीलगाय ''  applies in Eurasia .
Apart from the moose ,  the तभी अन्य सदस्य of the हिरण परिवार to प्रतिद्वंद्वी the नीलगाय in आकार is the दक्षिण एशियाई  sambar ( Rusa unicolor ) .
Elk range in  वन और forest-edge आवास , feeding on grasses  , plants , leaves , and bark .
Although native to North America and eastern Asia , they  have adapted खूब to देशों जहाँ वे have महरूम introduced , सहित  Argentina , Australia , and New Zealand .
Their  ग्रेट adaptability may threaten endemic प्रजाति और ecosystems  into which they have been introduced .
Male elk  have विशाल antlers जिससे  are shed each year .
males भी engage in ritualized समागम व्यवहार दौरान the rut , सहित posturing , antler कुश्ती  ( sparring ) , and bugling , a loud series of vocalizations which establishes dominance over other males and attracts females .
Elk are  susceptible to a क्रमांक of संक्रामक रोगों , कुछ of जिससे can be transmitted  to livestock .
Efforts to  eliminate संक्रामक रोगों इससे नीलगाय populations , largely through टीकाकरण  , have had mixed success .
Some cultures revere  the नीलगाय as a आध्यात्मिक  force .
In parts of Asia , antlers and their  मखमल हैं प्रयुक्त in परंपरागत दवाइयाँ  .
Elk are hunted as a game species ;  the मांस is leaner और उच्चतर in प्रोटीन than  beef or chicken .
The George Washington University ( GW , GWU , or George  वॉशिंगटन ) is a व्यापक निजी , coeducational शोध विश्वविद्यालयों स्तिथ in  Washington , D.C. .
It awards certificates  , स्नातक डिग्री , मास्टर्स डिग्री ,  and PhDs across several dozen disciplines .
The university was chartered by an Act of Congress  on फ़रवरी 9 , 1821 as the columbian कॉलेज in the ज़िला of कोलंबिया  .
The lion ( Panthera  leo ) is एक of the चार बिग बिल्लियों in the genus पेंथेरा और a सदस्य of the परिवार  Felidae .
With some males  exceeding in वज़न , it is the second-largest जीना  cat after the tiger .
Wild  शेर फिलहाल मौजूद in sub-saharan अफ़्रीकी और in एशिया ( जहाँ an endangered remnant जनसांख्यिकी resides in गिर वन नेशनल पार्क in इण्डिया ) जबकि अन्य प्रकार of शेर  have disappeared from North Africa and Southwest Asia in historic times .
Until the late  pleistocene , परिचय 10,000 सालो पहले , the शेर थी the सबसे फैली विशाल जमीन स्तनधारी  after humans .
They were found in most of Africa ,  आरपार यूरेशिया इससे पश्चिमी यूरोपीय to इण्डिया , और in the americas इससे the yukon to पेरू  .
The lion is a vulnerable species  , having देखी a प्रमुख जनसांख्यिकी मनाही of 30–50 % over  the past two decades in its African range .
Lion populations are untenable outside  designated reserves और नेशनल पार्क  .
Although the cause of the  मनाही is नहीं fully समझा , आवास घाटा और विरोध साथ इंसानो हैं फिलहाल the महानतम कल्याणकारी  of concern .
Within Africa , the West  अफ़्रीकी शेर जनसांख्यिकी is विशेषकर  endangered .
Lions live  लिये 10–14 सालो in the जंगली , जबकि in captivity वे  can live longer than 20 years .
In the wild ,  males seldom सजीव longer than 10 सालो , as चोटों sustained इससे  continual fighting with rival males greatly reduce their longevity .
They typically inhabit savanna and  घासभूमि , हालांकि वे may लो to बुश  and forest .
Lions  हैं unusually सोशल compared to अन्य  cats .
A pride of lions consists of related  महिलाओं और औलाद और a छोटी क्रमांक of वयस्क males .
Groups of  मादा शेर typically हंट साथ , preying ज़्यादातर on  large ungulates .
Lions are apex and keystone predators ,  हालांकि वे scavenge as अवसर allows  .
जबकि शेर do नहीं typically हंट इंसानो  , some have been known to do so .
Sleeping mainly during the day , lions are  primarily nocturnal , हालांकि bordering on crepuscular in प्रकृति  .
Highly  distinctive , the पुरूष शेर is easily recognised by इसके माने , और इसके फेस is एक of the सबसे widely recognised  animal symbols in human culture .
Depictions have existed from the Upper  paleolithic काल , साथ उत्कीर्णन और paintings इससे the lascaux और chauvet गुफाएं  , through virtually all ancient and medieval cultures where they once occurred .
It has been extensively depicted in sculptures , in paintings , on  नेशनल ध्वज , और in समकालीन films और साहित्य .
Lions have been kept in  menageries चूंकि the समय of the रोमन साम्राज्य , और have महरूम a कुंजी प्रजाति sought लिये प्रदर्शनी in zoos  over the world since the late 18th century .
Zoos are cooperating  विश्वव्यापी in प्रजनन कार्यक्रम लिये the endangered  Asiatic subspecies .
In the history of video games , the  सातवाँ पीढी of consoles is the पिछला पीढी , और शामिल consoles  released since late by Nintendo , Microsoft , and Sony .
लिये घर consoles , the सातवाँ पीढी began on 22 नवम्बर 2005 साथ the रिलीज of एक्सबॉक्स 360 और जारी साथ the रिलीज  of PlayStation 3 on 11 November 2006 , and Wii on 19 November 2006 .
Each new  कंसोल introduced a नई प्रकार of भेदन in  technology .
The Xbox 360 offered games rendered natively at HD resolutions , the PlayStation 3  offered , in जोड to fhd गेमिंग , hd फिल्म प्लेबैक via a built-in 3d blu-ray डिस्क खिलाड़ी , और the वी केन्द्रित  on integrating controllers with movement sensors as well as joysticks .
Joining Nintendo in the motion market ,  सोनी released the प्लेस्टेशन मूव in सितंबर  2010 .
The PlayStation Move features motion  संवेदन गेमिंग , समान to कि of the वी  .
Microsoft also joined Sony  और निन्टेंडो , साथ इसके kinect  .
Unlike the other two  प्रणालियों ( प्लेस्टेशन 3 और वी ) , kinect करता नहीं उपयोग कोई परिरक्षक of कोई sort  and makes the users the `` controller . ''
Having sold  8 लाख इकाई in इसके पहला 60 दिनों on the मार्केट , kinect रै claimed the गिनीज  World Record of being the `` fastest selling consumer electronics device '' .
While the Xbox 360  offers तार परिरक्षक as a स्टैंडअलोन उत्पाद , सब प्लेस्टेशन 3 परिरक्षक can be प्रयुक्त  in wired and wireless configurations .
Starting with handheld consoles , the seventh generation began on 21 November 2004 with the North American  परिचय of the निन्टेंडो ds as a `` तीसरा pillar '' , alongside निन्टेंडो 's मौजूदा खेल लड़के अग्रिम और gamecube  consoles .
The Nintendo DS ( NDS ) features a touch screen and built-in  माइक्रोफोन , और supports बेतार आईईईई 802.11 ( wi-fi ) मानकों  .
Additionally , the revised  संस्करण of the nds , the dsi , सुविधाएँ दो निर्मित in कैमरे , the क्षमता to डाउनलोड खेल  from the DSi store , and a web browser .
The PlayStation Portable , or  psp , released बाद the वही साल on 12 दिसम्बर 2004 , followed a  different pattern .
It became the  पहला हैंडहेल्ड वीडियो खेल कंसोल to उपयोग an ऑप्टिकल डिस्क स्वरूप ,  Universal Media Disc ( UMD ) , as its primary storage media .
Sony also gave the PSP  मजबूत multi-media काबिलियत , कनेक्टिविटी साथ the प्लेस्टेशन 3 और अन्य  PSPs , and Internet connectivity .
the निन्टेंडो ds likewise रै कनेक्टिविटी to the अंतरजाल through the निन्टेंडो wi-fi कनेक्शन और निन्टेंडो ds ब्राउजर , as खूब  as wireless connectivity to other DS systems and Wii consoles .
Despite high sales numbers  लिये दोनो consoles , प्लेस्टेशन पोर्टेबल बिक्री have consistently पिछड़ापन पीछे those of the निन्टेंडो ds ; nevertheless  , the PlayStation Portable has the distinction of being the best-selling non-Nintendo handheld gaming system .
Sgt . Pepper 's Lonely Hearts Club Band ( often  shortened to sgt . pepper ) is the आठवीं स्टुडियो एल्बम by अंग्रेज़ी  rock band the Beatles .
Released in June 1967 , the album included songs such as ``  साथ a छोटी सहायता इससे my मित्रों `` , `` लुसी in the आसमान साथ ईंट `` , और `` a दिन in the जीवन  `` .
Continuing the artistic  maturation देखी on the बैंड 's एल्बम रिवाल्वर ( 1966 ) , sgt . pepper further रजि इससे the conventional पॉप चट्टान मुहावरा of the समय और incorporated  balladry , psychedelic , music hall , and symphonic influences .
During the Sgt . Pepper sessions , the group improved upon the quality of  उनके म्यूज़िक 's उत्पादन जबकि exploring प्रायोगिक रिकॉर्डिंग तकनीकों  .
निर्माता जार्ज मार्टिन 's अभिनव दृष्टिकोण शामिल  the use of an orchestra .
Widely acclaimed and imitated , the  एल्बम कवर , designed by अंग्रेज़ी पॉप कलाकारों पीटर ब्लेक और jann haworth , थी प्रेरित by a स्केच by पॉल mccartney कि चित्रित the बैंड पोज़ in सामने of a कोलाज  of some of their favourite celebrities .
sgt . pepper थी a विश्वव्यापी नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी , बिता 27 सप्ताह at the शीर्ष  of the UK Album Chart and 15 weeks at number one on the US Billboard 200 .
A seminal work in  the उभरते साइकेडेलिक चट्टान स्टाइल , the एल्बम थी critically acclaimed upon रिलीज और  won four Grammy Awards in 1968 .
With an estimated 32 million copies sold , it is one of  the संसार 's बेहतरीन selling  albums .
Sgt . Pepper is considered by many to be the  सबसे influential और प्रसिद्ध चट्टान एल्बम कभी , और रै महरूम नामित the महानतम एल्बम  of all time by both All Time Top 1000 Albums and Rolling Stone .
The temporal lobe is a region of the cerebral cortex that is  स्तिथ beneath the पार्श्ववर्ती फिशर on दोनो दिमागी बांटती of the mammalian दिमाग  .
The temporal lobes are involved in the retention of visual memories , processing  संवेदी इनपुट , comprehending भाषा , storing नई यादें , जज्बात , और deriving  meaning .
The human lungs are the organs  of श्वसन in इंसानो  .
Humans have two  फेफड़े , a सही  lung and a left lung .
The right lung consists of three lobes while the left lung is  थोड़ा छोटी consisting of तभी दो निर्मोक ( the बाएँ फेफड़ों रै a `` हृदय पायदान '' allowing स्पेस लिये the दिल भीतर  the chest ) .
साथ , the फेफड़े contain लगभग of एयरवेज़ और 300 to 500 लाख alveoli , having a कुल सतह क्षेत्रफल of परिचय ( ) in वयस्कों — roughly  the same area as one side of a tennis court .
Furthermore , if all of the capillaries  कि घेर the alveoli यहूद unwound और रखी समाप्त to समाप्त  , they would extend for about .
Each lung weighs ,  इसलिए बनाना the संपूर्ण  organ about .
इंसान फेफड़े
The trachea divides into two  bronchi ( एक लिये प्रत्येक पक्ष ) at the स्तर of t4  .
This  जंक्शन is भी ज्ञात as the carina  .
The conducting zone contains the trachea , the bronchi ,  the bronchioles , और the टर्मिनल bronchioles the respiratory  zone contains the respiratory bronchioles , the alveolar ducts , and the alveoli .
The conducting  मण्डल और the respiratory stuffers ( लकिन नहीं the alveoli  ) are made up of airways .
The conducting zone has no gas exchange  साथ the रक्त , और is reinforced साथ उपास्थि in अनुक्रम to थाम खोलें the एयरवेज़  .
the conducting मण्डल warms the एयर  to and humidifies the air .
It also  cleanses the एयर by निकालना अणु  via cilia located on the walls of all the passageways .
The lungs are  घिरी by the पसली पिंजरा .
The  respiratory मण्डल is the साईट  of gas exchange with blood .
The sympathetic  बेचैन प्रणाली via noradrenaline एक्टिंग on the बीटा receptors कल्याणकारी  bronchodilation .
The parasympathetic nervous system via  acetylcholine , जिससे अधिनियमों on the m-3 muscarinic receptors , maintains the  resting tone of the bronchiolar smooth muscle .
This action is related , although  माना पृथक इससे  bronchoconstriction .
Many  अन्य non-autonomic बेचैन और biochemical stimuli , सहित कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड  and oxygen , are also involved in the regulation process .
The pleural cavity is the potential space  between the parietal pleura , अस्तर the भीतरी वॉल of the thoracic पिंजरा , और the visceral  pleura lining the lungs .
The lung parenchyma is strictly used to refer  solely to alveolar ऊतक साथ respiratory bronchioles , alveolar नलिकाएं  and terminal bronchioles .
However , it often includes any form of lung tissue  , भी सहित bronchioles , bronchi , रक्त बरतन और फेफड़ों interstitium  .
The margarita is a Mexican cocktail consisting of tequila  मिश्रित साथ cointreau or समान नारंगी -flavoured liqueur और लाइम or  lemon juice , often served with salt on the glass rim .
It is the most common  tequila-based कॉकटेल in the संयुक्त  States .
The drink is served shaken with ice ( on the rocks ) , blended with ice ( frozen  मार्गरिटा ) , or बगैर बर्फ ( सीधा up ) .
Two bottles of red Burgundy wine from  gevrey-chambertin , côtes de nuits
बरगंडी is a अंधेरा रेड रंग संबद्ध साथ the बरगंडी वाइन of the वही नाम  , which in turn is named after the Burgundy region of France .
The color burgundy is  समान to अन्य शेड्स of अंधेरा रेड ऐसे  as maroon .
When referring  to the रंग , `` बरगंडी '' is प्रायः  not capitalized .
The first  अंकित उपयोग of `` बरगंडी '' as a रंग नाम  in English was in 1881 .
संगीन of an अनजान अंग्रेजों सिपाही , मारे in 1943  during the Battle of Leros .
Because  उसके पहचान is अनजान , he is लापता in  action .

Missing in action ( MIA ) is  a casualty श्रेणी आबंटित अंतर्गत the औकात of लापता to हथियारबंद सेवाएं कर्मियों जो हैं reported लापता  during active service .
They  may have महरूम मारे , wounded , become a कैदी  of war , or deserted .
If deceased , neither their  remains nor संगीन can be positively पहचाना  .
Becoming  मिया रै महरूम an occupational रिस्क लिये सेवा कर्मियों  for as long as there has been warfare .

This building is the  असली कारावास , निर्मित साथ साथ the ऐतिहासिक courthouse  .

The  रिओ थिएटर  in Center
First  बैपटिस्ट गिरिजाघर at 117 कोरा गली in बीच  is located next to the downtown section .

Center is a city  in शेल्बी काउंटी , टेक्सास , संयुक्त राज्य  .
