It is the county  सीट of शेल्बी काउंटी  .
It is named for its location near the center  of शेल्बी काउंटी , नहीं लिये इसके स्थान in टेक्सास as it is स्तिथ  near the Louisiana border .
Intense  red-eye प्रभाव in ब्लू आँखें साथ  dilated pupil
The red-eye  प्रभाव in छायाचित्र is the आम रूप of रेड  pupils in color photographs of eyes .
It occurs when using a photographic flash  बहुत बंद to the कैमरा लेंस ( as साथ सबसे कॉम्पैक्ट कैमरे ) , in परिवेश  low light .
The  प्रभाव appears in the आँखें of इंसानो और पशु कि  have tapetum lucidum .
Theatrical followspot  ऑपरेटर , positioned nearly coincidentally साथ a बहुत उज्जवल लाइट और somewhat दूर इससे the अभिनेताओं ,  occasionally witness red-eye in actors on stage .
The effect is not visible to the rest of the audience  क्युकी it is reliant on the बहुत छोटी कोण between the followspot ऑपरेटर और the  light .
The University of California , Santa Barbara ( commonly referred to as UC Santa  बारबरा or ucsb ) is a पब्लिक शोध विश्वविद्यालयों और एक of the टेन सामान्य campuses of the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया प्रणाली  .
The main  कैम्पस is स्तिथ on a साईट in goleta , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , संयुक्त राज्य , इससे सांता बारबरा और उत्तरपश्चिम  of Los Angeles .
Tracing its roots back to 1891 as an independent teachers ' college , UCSB joined the University of  कैलिफ़ोर्निया प्रणाली in 1944 और is the third-oldest general-education कैम्पस in the  system .
UCSB is one of America 's  पब्लिक आइवी विश्वविद्यालयों , जिससे recognizes शीर्ष पब्लिक शोध विश्वविद्यालयों in  the United States .
The university is  a व्यापक डॉक्टरेट विश्वविद्यालयों और is व्यवस्थित into पाँच कॉलेजों और स्कूलों offering  87 undergraduate degrees and 55 graduate degrees .
The campus is the 6th-largest in the UC system by enrollment with  18,977 undergraduate और 2,950 ग्रैजुएट विद्यार्थी  .
in 2012 , ucsb थी क्रमित 41st among `` नेशनल विश्वविद्यालयों '' और 10th among पब्लिक  universities by U.S. News & World Report .
The university was also ranked  35th विश्वव्यापी by the टाइम्स उच्चतर शिक्षा संसार विश्वविद्यालयों rankings और 34th विश्वव्यापी ( 6th विश्वव्यापी लिये अभियान्त्रिकी ) by the अकादमिक रैंकिंग of संसार विश्वविद्यालयों in 2012.  < ref name= '' Shanghairanking.com/FieldENG2012 '' >
UC Santa Barbara is a `` very high activity ''  शोध विश्वविद्यालयों और खर्च $ 191.2 लाख on शोध expenditures in the 2007 फिस्कल साल , 97th-largest  in the United States .
UCSB houses  बारह नेशनल शोध centers , सहित the प्रसिद्ध kavli संस्थान लिये सैद्धांतिक  Physics .
UCSB faculty includes five Nobel Prize laureates , one Fields Medalist , 29 members of the National  अकादमी of sciences , 27 सदस्यों of the नेशनल अकादमी of अभियान्त्रिकी , और 31 सदस्यों of the अमरीकी अकादमी of कला और  Sciences .
UCSB was the No . 3 host on the  arpanet और थी निर्वाचित to the संघ of अमरीकी  Universities in 1995 .
The UC Santa Barbara Gauchos compete  in the ncaa प्रभाग i बिग वेस्ट सम्मेलन .
The Gauchos have won NCAA national  championships in मेन 's सॉकर और मेन 's  water polo .
Saint  जोसेफ साथ the शिशु यीशु by  Guido Reni
Saint Joseph 's Day , March 19 , the Feast of St. Joseph is in  पश्चिमी christianity the प्रिंसिपल feast दिन of संत जोसेफ , जीवनसाथी of the धन्य वर्जिन मरियम  .
He is also the step-father  of यीशु of नासरत /jesus  Christ .
It has the rank of a  solemnity in the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर ; catholics जो follow the missal of 1962 celebrate  it as a first class feast .
पिछला to 1962 it थी मनाये as a  feast of the rank of double of the first class .
It is a feast or commemoration in the provinces of the  anglican नियाज़ , और a feast or पर्व in the लूथरन  Church .
Saint Joseph 's Day is the Patronal Feast day for Poland as well as  लिये कनाडा , व्यक्तियों नामित जोसेफ , josephine , etc. , लिये धार्मिक संस्थान , स्कूलों और parishes  bearing his name , and for carpenters .
It is also Father 's Day in some  कैथोलिक देशों , मुख्यतः स्पेन , पुर्तगाल  , and Italy .
कूच 19 थी समर्पित to संत जोसेफ in अनेक पश्चिमी  calendars by the tenth century , and this custom was established in Rome by 1479 .
Pope St. Pius V extended its use to the  संपूर्ण रोमन रीति by उसके अपोस्टोलिक संविधान quo primum (  July 14 , 1570 ) .
Since  1969 , एपिस्कोपल सम्मेलनों may , if वे काश , ट्रांसफ़र  it to a date outside Lent .
Between 1870 and 1955 , a feast was celebrated in honor of St. Joseph as  जीवनसाथी of the धन्य वर्जिन मरियम और संरक्षक of the सार्वभौमिक गिरिजाघर , the latter शीर्षक having महरूम  given to him by Pope Pius IX .
Originally celebrated on the third Sunday  बाद ईस्टर साथ an अष्टक , बाद divino afflatu of st. पायस x ( देखिए सुधार of the रोमन breviary by पोप पायस x ) , it थी स्थानांतरित to the preceding  Wednesday .
The  feast थी भी retitled the solemnity  of Saint Joseph .
इस जश्न और इसके accompanying अष्टक थी abolished दौरान  the modernisation and simplification of rubrics under Pope Pius XII in 1955 .
it is स्टिल कायम by catholics जो follow the missal  of 1962 or earlier missals .
As the traditional holiday of the Apostles Ss .  फिलिप और जेम्स , may 1 , था धुंधली इससे the मेमोरी of सबसे catholics by the mid-twentieth सदी , कि of जोसेफ the कार्यकर्ता थी निर्मित in अनुक्रम to coincide साथ  the celebration of international Labour Day ( May Day ) in many countries .
The  feast of ss . फिलिप और जेम्स , जिससे था महरूम मनाये on कि तिथि चूंकि the छठे  century , was moved from its traditional place .
In the new calendar published in 1969 ,  the feast , जिससे at एक समय occupied the उच्चतम संभावित रैंक in the गिरिजाघर  calendar , was reduced to an optional Memorial , the lowest rank for a saint 's day .
the पूर्वी परंपरागत गिरिजाघर मनाता संत जोसेफ on the संडे  after Christmas .
Mariah Carey ( born March 27 , 1970 ) is an  अमरीकी सिंगर , songwriter , रिकार्ड निर्माता , अभिनेत्री ,  and philanthropist .
Under the guidance of Columbia Records executive Tommy Mottola , Carey released her  self-titled डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम mariah कैरी in 1990 ; it गई multi-platinum और शाखित चार लगातार  number one singles on the U.S . Billboard Hot 100 chart .
Following her marriage to Mottola in 1993 and success with hit records Emotions ( 1991  ) , म्यूज़िक बक्सा ( 1993 ) , और मैरी क्रिसमस ( 1994 ) , कैरी थी स्थापित as कोलंबिया  's highest-selling act .
Daydream ( 1995 ) made music history when  इसके दूसरी सिंगल `` एक मीठी दिन `` , a duet साथ बॉयज ii मेन , खर्च a रिकार्ड सोलह सप्ताह on शीर्ष of the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 , और remains the longest-running  number-one song in U.S. chart history .
During the recording of the album ,  कैरी began to deviate इससे उसके r & b और पॉप beginnings और धीरे traversed into  hip hop .
This  musical बदलें became evident साथ the रिलीज of तितली  ( 1997 ) , at which time Carey had separated from Mottola .
Carey left Columbia in 2000 , and signed  a record-breaking $ 100 लाख रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध  with Virgin Records .
Before  the रिलीज of उसके पहला विशेषता फिल्मी glitter  ( 2001 ) , she suffered a physical and emotional breakdown and was hospitalized for severe exhaustion .
Following the film 's poor reception , she was bought  आउट of उसके रिकॉर्डिंग अनुबंध लिये $ 50 लाख , जिससे led to a मनाही  in her career .
She signed a multi-million dollar contract deal with Island Records in 2002  , और बाद an unsuccessful काल , लौटे to the शीर्ष of म्यूज़िक चार्ट साथ the emancipation of मिमी  ( 2005 ) .
Its second single `` We Belong Together  `` became उसके सबसे कामयाब सिंगल of the 2000s , और थी बाद नामित `` सोंग of the दशक  '' by Billboard .
Carey once again ventured into film with a well-received starring role in ( 2009 ) ; she was awarded the `` Breakthrough Performance Award  '' at the ताड़ स्रोतों अंतरराष्ट्रीय फिल्मी पर्व , और ब्लैक रील और  NAACP Image Award nominations .
In a career  spanning over दो दशकों , कैरी रै बेची अधिक than 200 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी , बनाना उसके एक of the  best-selling music artists of all time .
In 1998 , she was honored as  the संसार 's best-selling रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार of the 1990s at the संसार  Music Awards .
कैरी थी भी नामित the best-selling मादा  artist of the millennium in 2000 .
According to the Recording Industry Association of  अमेरिका , वो is the तीसरा best-selling मादा कलाकार in the संयुक्त राज्य , साथ 63.5 लाख  certified albums .
With the release of `` Touch My Body `` ( 2008 ) , Carey  gained उसके eighteenth क्रमांक एक सिंगल in the संयुक्त राज्य , अधिक than कोई अन्य  solo artist .
In 2012 , Carey was ranked second  on vh1 's सूची of the `` 100 महानतम महिलाओं in  Music '' .
Aside  इससे उसके वाणिज्यिक accomplishments , कैरी रै जीती पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , 17 संसार  Music Awards , 11 American Music Awards , and 31 Billboard Music Awards .
Referred to as  the `` songbird परम् '' by the गिनीज संसार रिकॉर्ड , वो is famed लिये  her five-octave vocal range , power , melismatic style and signature use of the whistle register .
A bumblebee is any  सदस्य of the मधुमक्खी genus bombus , in the परिवार apidae  .
There are over 250 known species , existing  primarily in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध हालांकि वे भी occur in दक्षिण  America .
They have been introduced to  नई जीलैंड और the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई राज्य  of Tasmania .
Bumblebees are social  कीट कि हैं characterised by ब्लैक और पीला  body hairs , often in bands .
however , कुछ प्रजाति have नारंगी or रेड on उनके  bodies , or may be entirely black .
Another obvious ( but not  अद्वितीय ) characteristic is the नरम प्रकृति of the बाल ( long , branched setae ) , पुकारा pile , कि  covers their entire body , making them appear and feel fuzzy .
They are best  विशिष्ट इससे similarly विशाल , फजी मधुमक्खियों by the रूप of the मादा हिन्द लेग , जिससे is परिवर्धित to रूप a corbicula : a चमकदार concave  surface that is bare , but surrounded by a fringe of hairs used to transport pollen ( in similar bees , the hind leg is completely hairy , and pollen grains are wedged into the hairs for transport ) .
Like their relatives  the मधु मधुमक्खियों , bumblebees फीड on मकरंद और  gather pollen to feed their young .
A man openly carrying a  handgun in a बर्गर किंग in त्रिभुज , कोलोराडो  .
In the United States , open carry is shorthand terminology for `` openly  carrying a firearm in पब्लिक '' , as विशिष्ट इससे concealed carry , जहाँ firearms can नहीं be देखी by the कैज़ुअल निरीक्षक  .
the अभ्यास of खोलें carry , जहाँ गन स्वामी खुलकर carry firearms जबकि वे go परिचय उनके रोज़  business , has seen an increase in the U.S. in recent years .
This has been marked by a number of  व्यवस्थित कार्यक्रम intended to बढ़ाएँ the दृश्यता of खोलें  carry and public awareness about the practice .
Proponents  of खोलें carry पाइंट to इतिहास और आंकडे , noting कि अपराधियों  usually conceal their weapons .
Encouraged by groups like OpenCarry.org , GeorgiaCarry.org and some  भागीदार of the फ़्री राज्य प्रोजेक्ट , खोलें carry रै देखी a पुनरुद्धार in हाल सालो , लकिन it is नहीं yet साफ if इस represents बस  a short-term trend .
the गन अधिकारों जातियाँ रै महरूम मिश्रित  in its response .
Alan Gottlieb of the Second Amendment Foundation and the NRA have been cautious  in expressing support , जबकि special-interest समूह ऐसे as the aforementioned opencarry.org और georgiacarry.org , और निश्चित नेशनल समूह ऐसे as the  Gun Owners of America ( GOA ) have been more outspoken in favor of the practice .
Open carry is strongly opposed by gun control  समूह ऐसे as the ब्रैडी अभियान और the गठबन्धन to रोकें गन  Violence .
The Cattenom  नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in  France .
फ़्रांस produces around तीन quarters of इसके विद्युत  by nuclear power .
the grafenrheinfeld नाभिकीय  Power Plant in Germany .
चांसलर एंजेला मार्केल 's गठबन्धन घोषित on may 30 , 2011 , कि germany’s 17 नाभिकीय शक्ति  stations will be shut down by 2022 , in a policy reversal following Japan 's Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster .
Currently , 68 reactors  हैं अंतर्गत निर्माण in 15 देशों  .
Nuclear power  स्टेशन operate in तीस  countries .
In 2010 , before the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear  विपत्ति , it थी reported कि an औसत of परिचय 10 नाभिकीय रिएक्टरों यहूद अपेक्षित to become operational  per year , although according to the World Nuclear Association , of the 17 civilian reactors planned to become operational between 2007 and 2009 , only five actually came on stream .
As  of जून 2011 , जर्मनी और स्विट्ज़रलैंड  are phasing-out nuclear power .
As of June 2011 , countries  ऐसे as ऑस्ट्रेलिया , ऑस्ट्रिया , डेनमार्क , यूनानियों , आयरलैंड , इटली , लातवियाई , liechtenstein , ध्वज , मलेशिया , माल्टा , नई  Zealand , Norway and Portugal remain opposed to nuclear power .
Color motion picture film refers both to unexposed color photographic film in a  स्वरूप उपयुक्त लिये उपयोग in a गति चित्र कैमरा , और to समाप्त गति चित्र फिल्मी , तैयार लिये उपयोग in a प्रोजेक्टर , जिससे bears बिंब in रंग  .
The first color cinematography was by means of additive color systems  ऐसे as the एक patented in इंग्लैण्ड by एडवर्ड रेमंड टर्नर in 1899 और tested in 1902  .
A  सरलीकृत योगात्मक प्रणाली थी विकसित by जार्ज अल्बर्ट  Smith and successfully commercialized in 1909 as Kinemacolor .
These early systems used  black-and-white फिल्मी to फोटोग्राफ और प्रोजेक्ट दो or अधिक घटक बिंब through  different color filters .
स्टिल इससे फुटेज अंकित by एडवर्ड  Turner in 1902
With the present-day technology , there are two  पृथक प्रक्रियाओं : eastman रंग ऋणात्मक 2 रसायन ( कैमरा ऋणात्मक स्टॉक्स , duplicating interpositive और internegative स्टॉक्स ) और eastman रंग धनात्मक 2  chemistry ( positive prints for direct projection ) , usually abbreviated as ECN-2 and ECP-2 .
फुजी 's उत्पाद हैं संगत साथ ecn-2  and ECP-2 .
Ashanti Shequoiya  डगलस ( born अक्तूबर 13 , 1980 ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter  , record producer , and actress .
Ashanti is most famous for her eponymous debut album , which featured the hit song  `` foolish `` , और बेची over 503,000 नक़ल in इसके  first week of release throughout the U.S. in April 2002 .
The album set a Soundscan record as the biggest opening week sales for a new female  कलाकार , outselling debuts by एलिसिया कुंजियाँ और लॉरिन हिल  .
In the same week , she became the first female performer to simultaneously hold the top two places on the  बिलबोर्ड hot 100 singles चार्ट साथ `` foolish '' , और `` कया 's luv ? ``
( साथ मोटे  Joe ) .
Ashanti broke records again by having three top ten songs , `` Foolish , '' ``  कया 's luv ? '' और `` सदा on समय `` , on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट in the वही सप्ताह , होने the पहला  woman to accomplish this feat and being second only to the Beatles .
In 2003 , the self-titled debut  एल्बम जीती ashanti उसके पहला ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन  Contemporary R & B album .
As of April 1st  2013 , ashanti रै बेची over 27.7  million records worldwide .
Ashanti ended the decade ( 2000–09 ) as the  तीसरा शीर्ष नई r & b कलाकार पीछे एलिसिया कुंजियाँ  and Beyoncé .
She also ended the decade at  क्रमांक 38 on the शीर्ष कलाकार of the दशक सूची .
She is currently on the list of  the बीस बेहतरीन selling म्यूज़िक singles चूंकि 1990 लिये उसके सिंगल  Foolish for selling 7.2 million copies to-date .
Ashanti has an estimated net  लायक of $ 40 लाख डॉलर [ usd ] .
Ashanti wrote and sang background on Jennifer Lopez 's `` Ai n't It  मजेदार ( हत्या रिमिक्स ) `` , जिससे पहुँचे क्रमांक एक on बिलबोर्ड hot 100 , जिससे थी भी in the शीर्ष 10 चार्ट at the वही  time as `` Foolish '' , `` Always on Time '' ( with Ja Rule ) , and `` What 's Luv '' ( with Fat Joe ) .
Later  कि साल , वो थी acclaimed as the `` राजकुमारी of hip-hop & r & b '' by उसके  label and capped off her successful debut by winning eight Billboard awards and two American Music Awards .
Within  सात सालो of ashanti 's करियर , वो रै scored 16 शीर्ष 40  hits on the Hot 100 .
Ashanti  रै endorsed numerous उत्पाद सहित  Gap , Herbal Essences and Mudd Jeans .
Ashanti cites  व्हिटनी ह्यूस्टन , जेनेट जैक्सन , प्रिंस , मैडोना , तुपाक shakur , मरियम J. blige , एला  Fitzgerald , Smokey Robinson , Donna Summer , and Blue Magic as her musical influences .
Praised as a  gifted songwriter by उसके peers और आलोचकों alike , ashanti रै written/co-written the  bulk of all her music .
वो is फिलहाल working on उसके अपना प्रकाशन कम्पनी हकदार लिखा  Entertainment .
She released her fourth studio album entitled The  घोषणा on जून 3 , 2008 और is फिलहाल in the स्टुडियो working on उसके पांचवां  .
She also performed the charity tune `` Just Stand Up `` alongside 15 other  मादा गायकों लिये the `` स्टैंड up to कर्कट '' सजीव टेलीविज़न खास जिससे helped उठाएँ  $ 100 million dollars for cancer research .
The  संयुक्त राज्य फौज एयर शक्तियां ( usaaf or aaf ) थी the सैन्य विमानन भुजा of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका दौरान और तत्काल  after World War II , and the direct predecessor of the United States Air Force .
The AAF was a component of the  संयुक्त राज्य फौज , जिससे in 1942 थी विभाजित functionally by कार्यपालिका अनुक्रम into तीन autonomous शक्तियां : the फौज मैदान  Forces , the Services of Supply ( which in 1943 became the Army Service Forces ) , and the AAF .
Each of these  शक्तियां था a commanding सामान्य जो reported सीधे to the मुख्य  of Staff of the United States Army .
The AAF administered all parts of military aviation formerly distributed among the Army Air Corps , General Headquarters Air Force , and ground  शक्तियां corps क्षेत्रफल कमांडरों , और यूँ became the पहला एयर संगठन of the u.S. फौज to कंट्रोल इसके अपना संस्थापना और support कर्मियों  .
In practice ,  the aaf थी वस्तुतः autonomous अंदर  the Army .
The peak size of the AAF was over 2.4 million men and  महिलाओं in सेवा और nearly 80,000 वायुयान in 1944 , और 783 घरेलू  bases in December 1943 .
By VE Day it had 1.25 million men stationed  विदेशी और संचालित इससे अधिक than 1,600 airfields  worldwide .
The Air Corps became the Army Air Forces in June 1941 to provide the air arm a greater  स्वायत्तता in जिससे to विस्तार अधिक efficiently , और to provide a ढांचा लिये the अतिरिक्त कमांड echelons जरूरी  by a vastly increased force .
Although other nations already had separate air forces independent of the army or navy ( such as the British Royal Air Force and the German Luftwaffe ) , the AAF remained  a भाग of the संयुक्त राज्य फौज जबतक the संयुक्त राज्य एयर फ़ोर्स आए into होने in सितंबर 1947 .
However , in its  विस्तार और conduct of the युद्ध , the  AAF became more than just an arm of the greater organization .
By  the समाप्त of संसार युद्ध ii the aaf था become  virtually an independent service .
By regulation and executive order , the AAF was a  अधीनस्थ एजेंसी of the युद्ध विभाग tasked तभी साथ आयोजन , प्रशिक्षण , और equipping कॉम्बैट इकाई , सीमित in जिम्मेदारी  to the continental United States , as were the Army Ground Forces and the Army Service Forces .
In reality , Headquarters AAF controlled the conduct of all aspects of the air war  in प्रत्येक भाग of the संसार , determining एयर नीति और issuing आदेश बगैर transmitting उन्हें through the मुख्य of  Staff .
This `` contrast  between सिद्धान्त और फैक्ट is ... आधारभूत  to an understanding of the AAF . ''
The Freedom of Information Act ( FOIA ) is a  संघीय स्वतंत्रता of सूचना विधि कि allows लिये the पूरा or आंशिक प्रकटीकरण of previously unreleased सूचना  and documents controlled by the United States government .
The Act defines  एजेंसी रिकॉर्ड विषय to प्रकटीकरण , outlines अनिवार्य प्रकटीकरण प्रक्रियाओं और अनुदान  nine exemptions to the statute .
It was originally signed into law by President Lyndon B. Johnson ,  despite उसके misgivings , on जुलाई 4 , 1966 as और गई into प्रभाव the following साल .
The Federal Government 's Freedom of Information Act  चाहिए नहीं be उलझन साथ the अलग और varying स्वतंत्रता of सूचना अधिनियमों  passed by the individual states .
Many of those state acts  may be समान लकिन नहीं एकसमान  to the federal act .
The European Union ( EU ) is an economic and  राजनैतिक संघ of 27 सदस्य राज्य कि हैं स्तिथ primarily  in Europe .
The EU operates through a system of  supranational स्वतंत्र संस्थानों और intergovernmental negotiated  decisions by the member states .
Institutions of the EU  शामिल the यूरोपीय आयोग , the परिषद of the यूरोपीय संघ , the यूरोपीय परिषद , the अदालत of इंसाफ of the यूरोपीय संघ , the यूरोपीय सेंट्रल बैंको  , the Court of Auditors , and the European Parliament .
The European  पार्लियामेंट is निर्वाचित प्रत्येक  five years by EU citizens .
The  eu 's de facto पूंजी  is Brussels .
The EU traces its origins from the European Coal and Steel  जातियाँ ( ecsc ) और the यूरोपीय आर्थिक जातियाँ ( eec ) , formed by the भीतरी छह देशों in 1951  and 1958 respectively .
In the  intervening सालो the जातियाँ और इसके successors have grown in आकार by the accession of  new member states and in power by the addition of policy areas to its remit .
The  maastricht सन्धि स्थापित the यूरोपीय संघ अंतर्गत  its current name in 1993 .
The  नवीनतम प्रमुख amendment to the संवैधानिक आधार of the  EU , the Treaty of Lisbon , came into force in 2009 .
The EU has developed a single  मार्केट through a standardised प्रणाली of कानून कि  apply in all member states .
Within the Schengen Area ( which includes 22 EU  और 4 non-eu राज्य ) पासपोर्ट नियंत्रण have महरूम  abolished .
EU  नीतियों उद्देश्य to ensure the फ़्री गति of लोगों , goods , सेवाएं , और पूंजी , enact विधान in इंसाफ और घर अफेयर्स , और  maintain common policies on trade , agriculture , fisheries and regional development .
A monetary union , the eurozone  , थी स्थापित in 1999 और is रचित of  17 member states .
Through the  आम विदेशी और सुरक्षा नीति the eu रै विकसित a भूमिका in बाह्य संबंध  and defence .
Permanent diplomatic missions  have महरूम स्थापित around the संसार  .
The EU is represented  at the संयुक्त राष्ट्र , the wto , the g8 और the g-20  .
With a combined population of over 500  लाख निवासियों , or 7.3 % of the संसार जनसांख्यिकी , the eu , in 2012 , उत्पन्न a नाममात्र सकल घरेलू उत्पाद ( जीडीपी ) of 16.584 खरब us डॉलर , representing लगभग 20 % of the वैश्विक  GDP when measured in terms of purchasing power parity , and represents the largest nominal GDP and GDP PPP in the world .
The EU was  the प्राप्तकर्ता of the 2012  Nobel Peace Prize .
The Wales national  रग्बी लीग टोली represent वेल्स in अंतरराष्ट्रीय  rugby league football matches .
फिलहाल the टोली is सातवाँ in the rlif  World Rankings .
the टोली यहूद चलाएं अंतर्गत the auspices of the रग्बी फ़ुटबॉल लीग , लकिन an  independent body , Wales Rugby League , now runs the team from Cardiff .
A total of three Welsh players  have महरूम डाला into the रग्बी लीग हॉल of कीर्ति  .
Similar to many other Welsh national  sporting टीमों , वेल्स स्ट्रिप रै महरूम primarily रेड लिये अनेक सालो , सहित अभी  .
However in their last World  कप अभियान in 2000 वे किया पहनें a कमीज़ featuring the वेल्श ध्वज , adding a टच of ग्रीन  and white .
The team  is ज्ञात as `` the ड्रेगन '' और so the टीमों लोगो on the कमीज़ is a  red dragon .
The team date back to 1907 , making them the  तीसरा oldest नेशनल पक्ष बाद इंग्लैण्ड और नई  Zealand .
And it was a touring  नई जीलैंड पक्ष कि वेल्स पहला निभाई विरूद्ध  in 1908 , winning 9-8 at Aberdare .
Since then Wales have regularly played England , since 1935  फ़्रांस , as खूब as सत्कार the touring ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई जीलैंड टीमों , हालांकि वे rarely toured themselves , नहीं playing a  match in the Southern Hemisphere until 1975 .
For twenty-six  सालो वेल्स competed विरूद्ध उनके दो biggest विरोधियों , इंग्लैण्ड और फ़्रांस ,  in the European Nations Cup , winning the trophy four times .
Wales have also  competed in the संसार कप on तीन अवसरों , the पहला समय होने  in 1975 .
In 1995 and 2000 they had  उनके सबसे कामयाब tournaments to तिथि , surprisingly बनाना the semi-finals on दोनो अवसरों पहले होने  beaten by England and Australia respectively .
Wales failed to qualify for  the 2008 संसार कप , होने the दूसरी उच्चतम क्रमित पक्ष नहीं to do so , having खोया to  Scotland on points difference over two matches .
In 2008 Australian John Dixon became the new head coach and appointed Lee  briers as कप्तान , having निभाई लिये वेल्स चूंकि 1998  .
In recent seasons Wales have taken massive strides under former  खिलाड़ी iestyn हैरिस जो रै coached वेल्स to वापस to वापस यूरोपीय कप सफलताओं , जिससे culminated in a चार  Nations appearance in 2011 .
Cardiomyopathy ( literally `` heart muscle disease '' ) is the measurable deterioration of the function of the myocardium ( the heart muscle ) for any reason ,  प्रायः अग्रणी to दिल विफलता ; आम लक्षण हैं dyspnea ( breathlessness ) और परिधीय एडिमा ( सूजन of the टाँगे  ) .
लोगों साथ cardiomyopathy हैं प्रायः at रिस्क of  dangerous forms of irregular heart beat and sudden cardiac death .
The most  आम रूप of cardiomyopathy is dilated  cardiomyopathy .
Fuck  in इसके शाब्दिक अर्थ refers to the अधिनियम of यौन  intercourse .
It is an English word that is often used as a  profanity , either to denote तिरस्कार or as an intensifier  .
The origin of  the शब्द is अस्पष्ट  .
It is usually considered to  be पहला attested to around 1475 , लकिन it may be considerably पुरानी  .
In modern usage , fuck and its derivatives ( such as  कमीने और fucking ) can be प्रयुक्त in the स्थिति of a संज्ञा , a क्रिया , an क्रियाशील or an क्रियाविशेषण  .
There are many common phrases which make use of the word ,  as खूब as a क्रमांक of यौगिकों incorporating it , ऐसे as motherfucker  .
Note : this article adopts the  u.S. विभाग of परिवहन 's परिभाषा of a यात्री गाडी , to औसत a car or ट्रक , प्रयुक्त लिये यात्री , excluding  buses and trains .
The United States is  घर to the largest यात्री गाडी मार्केट of कोई देश  in the world .
Overall , there were an estimated 254.4 million registered passenger  वाहनों in the संयुक्त राज्य according to a 2007 बिन्दु पढ़ाई  .
This number , along with the average age of  वाहनों , रै increased steadily चूंकि 1960 , indicating a growing क्रमांक of वाहनों प्रति capita  .
The Chinese car market , however , is poised to soon  exceed the संयुक्त राज्य ; by the समाप्त of 2012 , वहीँ यहूद over 240 लाख गाड़ियाँ  on the road in China .
The United States  is भी घर to तीन विशाल गाडी निर्माताओं : सामान्य मोटर्स , घाट मोटर कम्पनी और क्रिसलर , जिससे have historically महरूम referred  to as the `` Big Three . ''
Chrysler  however is no longer among the शीर्ष तीन ; लकिन is क्रमांक पाँच , पीछे  Toyota and Honda .
The motor car has clearly become  an अभिन्न भाग of अमरीकी जीवन , साथ वाहनों outnumbering licensed  drivers .
नैदानिक प्रयोगशाला in a हॉस्पिटल सेटिंग  showing several automated analysers .
a चिकित्सा प्रयोगशाला or नैदानिक प्रयोगशाला is a प्रयोगशाला जहाँ परीक्षण हैं किया on नैदानिक नमूनों in अनुक्रम to मिलेंगी सूचना  about the health of a patient as pertaining to the diagnosis , treatment , and prevention of disease .
In poker  , खिलाड़ी construct हैंड्स of पाँच ताश according to predetermined नियम  , which vary according to which variant of poker is being played .
These hands are compared using a hand ranking  प्रणाली कि is मानक आरपार सब विसंगतियाँ of पोकर , the खिलाड़ी  with the highest-ranking hand winning that particular deal in most variants of poker .
In some variants , the  lowest-ranking हाथ can  win or tie .
These hand rankings are also  प्रयुक्त in कुछ अन्य कार्ड खेल , और in पोकर  dice .
The ranking of a particular hand is increased by including  अनेक ताश of the वही कार्ड रैंक , by सब पाँच ताश होने इससे the वही सूट , or by सब पाँच ताश होने of लगातार  rank .
The relative ranking of the  विभिन्न हाथ श्रेणी is आधारित on the संभाव्यता of होने randomly dealt ऐसे  a hand from a well- shuffled deck .
Bruce Randall Hornsby ( born November 23 , 1954 ) is an American  virtuoso ; a सिंगर , pianist , सिंथेसाइज़र , accordion , और dulcimer खिलाड़ी , और songwriter  .
Known for the spontaneity and creativity of his live performances , Hornsby draws  अक्सर इससे शास्त्रीय , जैज़ , ब्लूग्रास , लोक , motown , इन्जील , चट्टान , ब्लूज़ , और jam बैंड musical परंपराओं साथ उसके songwriting और the seamless improvisations  contained within .
Hornsby 's recordings have been recognised on a number of occasions with industry awards ,  सहित the बेहतरीन नई कलाकार ग्रैमी in 1987 साथ ब्रूस hornsby और the दायरा , the बेहतरीन ब्लूग्रास रिकॉर्डिंग ग्रैमी in 1990 , और the बेहतरीन पॉप इंस्ट्रूमेंटल  Grammy in 1993 .
Hornsby has also achieved recognition for his  सोलो एल्बम और प्रदर्शन , उसके touring बैंड ब्रूस hornsby और the noisemakers  , his bluegrass project with Ricky Skaggs and his appearances as a session- and guest-musician .
He also collaborated with Grateful Dead and  थी a सदस्य of the बैंड इससे सितंबर 1990 to कूच 1992 , playing at over एक सौ  shows during that period .
गन्ना वृक्षारोपण in  rural Cuba
कृषि in क्यूबा रै निभाई an महत्वपूर्ण भाग in  the economy for several hundred years .
Agriculture contributes  कम than 10 प्रतिशत to the सकल घरेलू उत्पाद ( जीडीपी ) , लकिन it employs roughly 20 प्रतिशत  of the working population .
About 30 percent  of the देश 's जमीन is प्रयुक्त लिये क्रॉप  cultivation .
The inefficient agricultural industry in  क्यूबा रै led to the need to आयात विशाल amounts of भोजन .
क्यूबा अभी imports परिचय 80 % of the  food it rations to the public .
The rationing program  खाते लिये परिचय a तीसरा of the खाना उर्जा the औसत  Cuban consumes .
Overall ,  however , क्यूबा is निर्भर on imports लिये तभी  16 % of its food .

Mega Millions (  initially पुकारा the बिग खेल आचमन लाखो as the successor of the  Big Game ) is an American multi-jurisdictional $ 1 lottery game .
The first ( The  बिग खेल ) आचमन लाखो आरेखण थी in 2002  ( see below ) .
The minimum Mega Millions advertised jackpot is $ 12,000,000 , paid in 26 equal yearly  किश्तों ( जबतक the नकदी विकल्प is चुनी ) ; प्रायः , the जैकपॉट increases जब वहीँ is no top-prize  winner .
However , despite no jackpot winner for the $  12,000,000 दिसम्बर 18 , 2012 आरेखण , the जैकपॉट remained at $ 12,000,000 लिये the आरेखण to be आयोजित  on December 21 .
(  देखिए नीचे लिये सूचना on कैसा the  game 's jackpot is funded . )
Reflecting common  अभ्यास among अमरीकी lotteries  , the jackpot is advertised as a nominal value of annual installments .
A cash value option ( the usual choice ) , when chosen by a  जैकपॉट विजेता ( देखिए नीचे ) , pays the सन्निकट उपस्थित मान of the किश्तों .
Mega Millions currently uses a  5/56 ( श्वेत गेंदें ) प्लस 1/46 ( the आचमन  Ball ) double matrix to select its winning numbers .
Each  खेल लागत $  1 .
In 43 of the 44 Mega Millions jurisdictions ( California is the  एक्सेप्शन ) , वहीँ is an विकल्प , पुकारा megaplier ( ऐसे खेल हैं $ 2 प्रत्येक ) जहाँ non-jackpot पुरस्कार  are multiplied by 2 , 3 , or 4 .
The Megaplier was made available  to सब आचमन लाखो jurisdictions in जनवरी 2011 ; it began as  a Texas -only option .
Mega Millions is drawn at  10:59 p.m. पूर्वी समय मंगलवार और शुक्रवार , सहित  holidays .
Mega  लाखो is administered by a consortium of इसके 12 असली lotteries और the  drawings are held at WSB-TV in Atlanta , Georgia .
supervised  by the जॉर्जिया लॉटरी  .
The largest jackpot in Mega Millions , as well as in American lottery history , was $  656,000,000 annuitized ( साथ a नकदी विकल्प of $ 474,000,000 ) लिये the कूच 30 , 2012 आरेखण in जिससे वहीँ यहूद तीन jackpot-winning टिकटें ;  one each in Illinois , Kansas , and Maryland .
All three tickets had been claimed as of  अप्रैल 18 , साथ प्रत्येक नियत of विजेता चुनना the  cash option .
is a Japanese manga series created by  लेखक tsugumi ohba और manga कलाकार  Takeshi Obata .
The main character is Light Yagami , a high  स्कूल छात्र जो discovers a अलौकिक कोपी , the `` मौत नोट '' , dropped on धरती by a shinigami  ( a god of death ) named Ryuk .
The Death Note grants its user the ability to  मार anyone जिनकी नाम और फेस वे जान , by लिखने the नाम in  the notebook while picturing their face .
The series centers around Light 's attempt to create and rule a  संसार `` cleansed of दुष्ट '' as `` परमेश्वर '' using the कोपी , और the प्रयत्न of a जासूस ज्ञात  as L to stop him .
Death Note was first  serialized in 108 अध्याय by shueisha in the जापानी manga पत्रिका साप्ताहिक shōnen जम्प इससे  December 2003 to May 2006 .
The series was  भी प्रकाशित in tankōbon स्वरूप in जापानी starting in may 2004 और समाप्ति in  October 2006 with a total of thirteen volumes .
The anime  श्रेणी aired in जापानी इससे अक्तूबर 3 , 2006  , to June 26 , 2007 .
रचित of 37 एपीसोड , the दुश्मनी थी विकसित by madhouse  and directed by Tetsuro Araki .
A light  अनोखा आधारित on the श्रेणी , लिखा by nisio isin , थी  released in Japan .
Additionally ,  विभिन्न वीडियो खेल have महरूम प्रकाशित  by Konami for Nintendo DS .
The series was adapted into  live-action films released in जापानी on जून 17 , 2006 , नवम्बर 3 , 2006 , और फ़रवरी  2 , 2008 .
Viz Media licensed the  मौत नोट manga in उत्तर अमेरिका और रै प्रकाशित सब the बारह आयतन इससे the श्रेणी ,  a 13th volume which serves as a `` reader 's guide '' , as well as the light novels .
The episodes from the anime first appeared in North  अमेरिका as downloadable by  IGN .
Viz  बाद licensed the दुश्मनी श्रेणी और it aired on bionix in कनाडा और on कार्टून  Network in the United States .
The  live-action films briefly निभाई in निश्चित उत्तर  American theaters since 2008 .
However , none of the video  खेल have यूँ दूर महरूम प्रकाशित in उत्तर अमेरिका or यूरोपीय  .
Death Note is one of Weekly Shōnen  jumps best-selling manga श्रेणी of सब समय , साथ  sales over 26.5 million copies .
Halloween or Hallowe'en ( a contraction of `` All Hallows ' Evening `` ) , also known as All Hallows '  संध्या , is a वार्षिक जश्न observed in a क्रमांक of देशों on अक्तूबर 31 , the संध्या of the पश्चिमी ईसाई feast of सब hallows ( or सब संतो ) और the दिन initiating the triduum of hallowmas  .
According to many  विद्वानों , सब hallows ' संध्या is a christianised feast originally बहकावे by पश्चिमी यूरोपीय कटाई त्यौहार , और त्यौहार of  the dead with possible pagan roots , particularly the Celtic Samhain .
Other scholars  maintain कि it originated independently of samhain और रै  solely Christian roots .
Typical festive Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ) , attending costume parties , carving pumpkins into  jack-o'-lanterns , lighting bonfires , ठहराना bobbing , visiting haunted आकर्षण , playing pranks , telling डरावने कहानियां , और watching  horror films .
New York  नगर taxicabs दौरान midtown फटाफट घंटा in मैनहटन
The taxicabs of New York City , with  उनके distinctive पीला पेंट , हैं a widely पहचाना प्रतीक  of the city .
Taxicabs are operated by private companies and licensed  by the नई यॉर्क नगर टैक्सी और लिमोज़ीन आयोग ( tlc  ) .
It also  oversees over 40,000 अन्य for-hire वाहनों , सहित `` ब्लैक  cars '' , commuter vans and ambulettes .
`` Medallion  टैक्सी , '' the परिचित पीला कैब , हैं the तभी वाहनों in the नगर permitted to चुनें  up passengers in response to a street hail .

Xylem  is एक of the दो प्रकार of हस्तांतरण ऊतक  in vascular plants ( phloem is the other ) .
The word xylem is derived from the Greek word ξύλον ( xylon ) , meaning ``  लकडी '' ; the best-known जाइलम ऊतक is लकडी , हालांकि it is मिला throughout  the plant .
Its basic function is to  हस्तांतरण जल , लकिन it भी transports कुछ nutrients through  the plant .
U.S.  महिलाओं suffragists demonstrating लिये the  right to vote , February 1913 .
Women 's suffrage also known as woman  suffrage is the सही of महिलाओं to vote  and to run for office .
सीमित मतदान अधिकारों यहूद gained by महिलाओं in स्वीडन , फिनलैंड और कुछ पश्चिमी u.S. राज्य  in the late 19th century .
International organizations  यहूद formed to निर्देशांक प्रयत्न , विशेषकर the अंतरराष्ट्रीय परिषद  of Women ( 1888 ) and the International Woman Suffrage Alliance ( 1904 ) .
In 1893 , New Zealand , then a self-governing British colony  , granted वयस्क महिलाओं the सही to vote और the self-governing अंग्रेजों उपनिवेश of दक्षिण ऑस्ट्रेलिया किया the वही in 1895  , but also permitted women to run for office .
ऑस्ट्रेलिया federated in 1901 , और महिलाओं acquired the सही to vote और स्टैंड in संघीय चुनावों इससे 1902  , though uneven restrictions on Aboriginal women voting in national elections were not completely removed until 1962 .
The first European country to introduce women 's suffrage was the Grand Duchy of  फिनलैंड , तब भाग of the रूसी साम्राज्य , जिससे भी उत्पादित the संसार 's पहला मादा सदस्यों of पार्लियामेंट  in the 1907 parliamentary elections .
नार्वे followed , granting पूरा महिलाओं 's  suffrage in 1913 .
in सबसे पश्चिमी देशों , महिलाओं 's suffrage आए बाद संसार i युद्ध i i , साथ कुछ महत्वपूर्ण  late adopters being France in 1944 and Switzerland in 1971 .
Women 's suffrage has generally  महरूम पहचाना बाद राजनैतिक अभियान to obtain it यहूद  waged .
In many  देशों it थी granted पहले सार्वभौमिक  suffrage .
Women 's suffrage is explicitly stated as a right under  the सम्मेलन on the विलोपन of सब फ़ॉर्म of पक्षपात विरूद्ध महिलाओं ,  adopted by the United Nations in 1979 .
The Thirteenth Tale ( 2006 ) by Diane Setterfield is a gothic suspense  अनोखा , the लेखक 's पहला प्रकाशित किताब  .
Jehovah 's Witnesses is a millenarian restorationist Christian denomination with nontrinitarian beliefs distinct from mainstream Christianity .Sources for descriptors : • Millenarian : • Restorationist : • Christian : •  denomination : the संगठन रिपोर्ट्स विश्वव्यापी सदस्यता of over 7.78 लाख adherents शामिल in इंजीलवाद , सम्मेलन उपस्थिति of over 12 लाख , और सालाना मेमोरियल उपस्थिति of over 19 लाख  .
They are directed by the Governing Body of Jehovah  's गवाह , a समूह of बड़ो in ब्रुकलीन , नई यॉर्क , कि establishes  all doctrines .
Jehovah 's  गवाह ' मान्यताओं हैं आधारित on उनके interpretations of the बाइबल और  they prefer to use their own translation , the New World Translation of the Holy Scriptures .
They believe that the destruction of the present world system at Armageddon is imminent , and  कि the स्थापना of परमेश्वर 's किंगडम on धरती is the तभी समाधान लिये सब समस्याएं faced by mankind  .
the समूह उभरा इससे the बाइबल छात्र गति —founded in the लेट 1870s by चार्ल्स taze रसेल साथ the गठन of zion 's देखें  Tower Tract Society —with significant organizational and doctrinal changes under the leadership of Joseph Franklin Rutherford .
The name Jehovah 's witnesses , based on Isaiah 43:10–12 , was adopted in 1931 to  फर्क themselves इससे अन्य बाइबल छात्र समूह और symbolize a ब्रेक साथ the विरासत of रसेल 's परंपराओं  .
Jehovah 's Witnesses  हैं बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उनके door-to-door उपदेश , distributing साहित्य ऐसे  as The Watchtower and Awake !
, और refusing सैन्य सेवा  and blood transfusions .
वे consider उपयोग of the नाम यहोवा vital  for proper worship .
They reject  trinitarianism , अंतर्निहित अमरत्व of the आत्मा , और hellfire  , which they consider to be unscriptural doctrines .
They do not  observe क्रिसमस , ईस्टर , जन्मदिन , or अन्य छुट्टियाँ और कस्टम वे consider to have pagan origins असंगत साथ  Christianity .
adherents commonly refer to उनके देह of मान्यताओं as `` the सच्चाई '' और consider themselves  to be `` in the truth '' .
They consider secular society to be morally  भ्रष्ट और अंतर्गत the influence of शैतानी , और सबसे सीमा उनके सोशल बातचीत साथ non-witnesses  .
Congregational disciplinary actions include  disfellowshipping , उनके पद लिये औपचारिक expulsion और shunning  .
baptized individuals जो formally छोड़ हैं  considered disassociated and are also shunned .
disfellowshipped और disassociated individuals may आखिरकार  be reinstated if deemed repentant .
The religion 's  स्थिति regarding ईमानदार आपत्ति to सैन्य सेवा और refusal  to salute national flags has brought it into conflict with some governments .
नतीजतन , यहोवा 's गवाह have महरूम persecuted और उनके क्रियाएँ हैं  banned or restricted in some countries .
Persistent  विधिक चुनौतियां by यहोवा 's गवाह have बहकावे विधान सम्बन्धित  to civil rights in several countries .
Last Tango in Paris ( ) is a 1972 Franco-Italian  रोमांटिक नाटक फिल्मी निर्देशित by बर्नार्डो bertolucci जिससे portrays a हाल  American widower who begins an anonymous sexual relationship with a young , betrothed Parisian woman .
it सितारों मार्लोन ब्रैंडो  , Maria Schneider , and Jean-Pierre Léaud .
The film 's raw portrayal of  यौन हिंसा और emotional turmoil led to अंतरराष्ट्रीय  controversy and drew various levels of government censorship .
The MPAA gave the film an X  दरजा upon रिलीज in the संयुक्त  States .
बाद revisions यहूद बना to the mpaa दरजा कोड , it थी  classified as an NC-17 in 1997 .
MGM  released a censored r-rated  cut in 1981 .
The film  रै इसके nc-17 दरजा लिये `` कुछ सुस्पष्ट  sexual content . ''
Windows XP is an  ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली उत्पादित by microsoft लिये उपयोग  on personal computers , including home and business desktops , laptops and media centers .
First released to  कंप्यूटर निर्माताओं on अगस्त 24 , 2001 , it is the दूसरी सबसे लोकप्रिय संस्करण  of Windows , based on installed user base .
The name `` XP '' is short for  `` अनुभव '' , highlighting the उन्नत उपयोक्ता अनुभव  .
Windows  xp , the successor to खिड़कियाँ 2000 और खिड़कियाँ me , थी the पहला consumer-oriented  operating system produced by Microsoft to be built on the Windows NT kernel .
Windows XP was released  विश्वव्यापी लिये खुदरा बिक्री on अक्तूबर 25 , 2001 , और over  400 million copies were in use in January 2006 .
It was succeeded by  खिड़कियाँ विस्टा in जनवरी 2007  .
Direct OEM and retail sales  of खिड़कियाँ xp ceased on जून 30 , 2008  .
Microsoft continued to sell Windows XP through their System Builders ( smaller  oems जो बेचें समवेत कंप्यूटर ) कार्यक्रम जबतक जनवरी 31 , 2009  .
On April 10 , 2012 ,  microsoft reaffirmed कि विस्तारित support लिये खिड़कियाँ xp और दफ्तर 2003 होता समाप्त on अप्रैल 8 , 2014 और सुझाया कि प्रशासकों शुरू तैयारी to migrate to  a newer OS .
The NT -based  संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ , जिससे हैं प्रोग्रामित in c , C++ , और सभा , हैं ज्ञात लिये उनके improved स्थिरता  and efficiency over the 9x versions of Microsoft Windows .
Windows XP presented a significantly redesigned  आलेखीय उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस , a बदलें microsoft प्रचारित as अधिक user-friendly than पिछला  versions of Windows .
In an attempt to further  ameliorate the `` dll नरक `` कि plagued the पास्ट संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ , improved side-by-side सभा प्रौद्योगिकी in खिड़कियाँ xp allows side-by-side संस्थापना , पंजीकरण और सर्विसिंग of अनेक  versions of globally shared software components in full isolation .
It is also the first version of  खिड़कियाँ to उपयोग उत्पाद सक्रियण to कॉम्बैट illegal copying  .
During Windows XP 's development , the project was codenamed `` Whistler '' , after Whistler  , अंग्रेजों कोलंबिया , as अनेक microsoft कर्मचारी skied at the whistler-blackcomb स्की  resort .
According to web analytics data generated by Net Applications , Windows XP  थी the सबसे widely प्रयुक्त ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली जबतक अगस्त 2012 , जब खिड़कियाँ 7 overtook  it .
, Windows XP market  share is at 38.99 % , having decreased लगभग प्रत्येक माह चूंकि at तनिक नवम्बर 2007 , the पहला  month for which statistics are publicly available from Net Applications .
`` Por una Cabeza '' is an  अर्जेंटाइन टैंगो साथ म्यूज़िक और गीत लिखा in 1935 by कार्लोस gardel  and Alfredo Le Pera respectively .
The name  is a स्पेनी horse-racing phrase अर्थ `` by a सिर '' , जिससे refers  to a horse winning a race by the length of one head .
The lyrics speak of a compulsive horse-track gambler who compares his  व्यसन लिये घोड़े साथ उसके आकर्षण to महिलाओं  .
Alfredo Le Pera was a  ब्राज़ीलियाई इससे são पाउलो , a much italian-influenced क्षेत्रफल in ब्राज़ील , और भी the जन्मस्थान of zequinha de abreu  , composer of Tico-Tico no Fubá .
Le  प्रभा और gardel died in an वायुयान  crash in Medellín , ( Colombia ) , on June 24 , 1935 .
Por  ऊना cabeza
The tango has since  महरूम performed by numerous टैंगो  orchestras .
Tango scenes with `` Por una Cabeza '' appear in Delicatessen ( 1991 ) , Scent of a Woman (  1992 ) , schindler 's सूची ( 1993 ) , सच्चा झूठ ( 1994 ) , टाइटैनिक ( 1996 ) , ख़राब सांता ( uncut संस्करण , 2003 ) , सब the किंग 's मेन ( 2006 ) , ग्रह 51 ( 2009 ) , एपीसोड 37 of nip/tuck ( 2003–2010 ) , एपीसोड 9 of दक्षिण कोरियाई नाटक श्रेणी मीठी जासूस ( 2005–08 ) , the शुरूआत और समाप्ति क्रेडिट of the दक्षिण कोरियाई नाटक ब्रॉडकास्ट i 'm sorry , i प्रेम तुम ( 2004 ) , और  the episode `` Down the Rabbit Hole `` ( 2007 ) .
In the movie Frida ( Salma Hayek  , 2002 ) , gardel is सुना गायन it on  a radio .
It is  भी कोटेड in दाउद डेल tredici 's  `` Good News !
Nilda is Back  '' ( इससे the सोंग साईकिल  Miz Inez Sez ) .
In Scent of a Woman ( 1992 ) ,  the टैंगो is performed by the `` the टैंगो प्रोजेक्ट '' , जो दरअसल appear in the नाचना  scene starring Al Pacino ( the recording used is available on one of their CD albums ) .
John Williams  arranged a संस्करण of the टुकड़ा कि appears on the एल्बम `` सिनेमा  Serenade '' with the violin solo performed by Itzhak Perlman .
पर्लमैन और विलियम्स ( conducting ) have भी performed the  piece together in live concerts .
In 2012 a  नृत्य संस्करण थी released by the समूह `` da करेरा '' featuring  the original vocal recording by Carlos Gardel .
The baroreflex or baroreceptor  reflex is एक of the देह 's homeostatic mechanisms लिये maintaining रक्त  pressure .
It provides a negative feedback loop in which an elevated blood pressure reflexively causes heart rate to decrease  इसलिए causing रक्त दबाव to घटी ; likewise , decreased रक्त दबाव activates the baroreflex , causing दिल रेट to बढ़ाएँ यूँ causing  an increase in blood pressure .
The system relies on specialized neurons , known as baroreceptors ,  in the aortic मेहराब , carotid साइनस , और elsewhere to मॉनिटर परिवर्तन in रक्त दबाव और रिले उन्हें to the brainstem  .
subsequent परिवर्तन in रक्त दबाव हैं mediated by the  autonomic nervous system .
Atrial natriuretic peptide forms a parallel negative  प्रतिक्रिया लूप in an endocrinological कंट्रास्ट to the renin-angiotensin प्रणाली  .
The  loma prieta भूकंप , भी ज्ञात as the भूकंप of '89 और the संसार श्रेणी भूकंप , थी a प्रमुख  earthquake that struck the San Francisco Bay Area of California on October 17 , 1989 , at 5:04 pm local time .
Caused by  a स्लिप साथ the सैन andreas दोष , the भूकंप lasted 10–15 सेकेंड और measured 6.9 on दोनो the पल  magnitude scale ( surface-wave magnitude 7.1 ) and on the open-ended Richter Scale .
The  भूकंप मारे 63 लोगों throughout उत्तरी कैलिफ़ोर्निया , घायल  3,757 and left some 3,000–12,000 people homeless .
The earthquake occurred during the warm-up practice for the third game of the 1989 World Series ,  featuring दोनो of the खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल 's प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल टीमों , the ओकलैंड एथलेटिक्स और the सैन फ्रांसिस्को  Giants .
Because of game-related sports coverage , this  थी the पहला प्रमुख भूकंप in the संयुक्त राज्य to have इसके आरंभिक धक्का  broadcast live on television .
साहूकार in the  standard Staunton pattern
The pawn ( ♙♟ ) is the most numerous and in most circumstances the weakest piece in the game of  शतरंज , historically representing infantry or , अधिक विशेषकर , हथियारबंद peasants or pikemen  .
In chess , each player  begins the खेल साथ आठ प्यादे , एक on प्रत्येक वर्गाकार of the रैंक तत्काल in सामने  of the other pieces .
( In algebraic notation , the  श्वेत प्यादे प्रारंभ on a2 , b2 , c2 , ... , h2 , जबकि ब्लैक प्यादे प्रारंभ on  a7 , b7 , c7 , ... , h7 . )
व्यक्तिगत प्यादे हैं referred to by the  file on which they stand .
For example , one speaks of `` White 's f-pawn '' or  `` ब्लैक 's b-pawn '' , or कम commonly ( using वर्णनात्मक संकेतन ) , `` श्वेत 's किंग 's बिशप साहूकार '' or ``  Black 's queen 's knight pawn '' .
It  is भी आम to refer to a rook साहूकार , अर्थ कोई साहूकार on the a- or h-file , a नाईट साहूकार ( on the b- or g-file ) , a बिशप साहूकार  ( on the c- or f-file ) , a queen pawn ( on the d-file ) , a king pawn ( on the e-file ) , and a central pawn ( on either the d- or e-file ) .
the सैन्य शक्तियां of the संसार have differing approaches to the enlistment  of homosexual ( gay and lesbian ) and bisexual individuals .
The armed forces of most developed countries have now  removed नीतियों excluding non-heterosexual individuals ( साथ सख्त नीतियों  on sexual harassment ) .
Nations  कि परमिट gay लोगों to serve खुलकर in the सैन्य शामिल the 4 of the 5 सदस्यों of the un सुरक्षा परिषद ( संयुक्त राज्य , संयुक्त  Kingdom , France , and Russia ) , the Republic of China ( Taiwan ) , Australia , Israel , South Africa , Argentina , and all NATO members excluding Turkey .
Hydrogen production is  the परिवार of औद्योगिक विधि लिये generating हाइड्रोजन .
Currently the dominant technology for  सीधा उत्पादन is भाप reforming इससे hydrocarbons .
Many other methods are known  सहित electrolysis और thermolysis  .
In 2006 , the United States was estimated to  have a उत्पादन क्षमता of 11 लाख टन of हाइड्रोजन .
5  लाख टन of हाइड्रोजन यहूद खपत on-site in आयल शोधन  , and in the production of ammonia ( Haber process ) and methanol ( reduction of carbon monoxide ) .
0.4 million tonnes were an  incidental by-product of the chlor-alkali  process .
Hydrogen  उत्पादन is an अनुमानित $ 100 अरब उद्योग  .
A  आधार पाइंट ( प्रायः denoted as bp , colloquially referred to in the बहुवचन as `` bips '' , भी ज्ञात as a `` बीप ''  ) is a unit equal to one hundredth of a percentage point , or one part per ten thousand , 1/10000 .
The same unit is also ( rarely ) called a permyriad , literally meaning 'for ( every ) myriad (  टेन हजार ) ' , और in कि कॉन्टेक्स्ट is लिखा साथ जिससे looks जैसे a प्रतिशत चिह्न ( % ) साथ दो अतिरिक्त zeroes at the समाप्त ( जैसे a stylized रूप of the चार zeros in the denominator , हालांकि it originates  as a natural extension of the percent ( % ) and permille ( ‰ ) signs ) .
A basis point  is पारिभाषित as:
1 basis  पाइंट = 1 permyriad  = one one-hundredth percent
1 bp = 1 = 0.01 % =  0.1‰ = 10−4 = = 0.0001
1  % = 100 bp  = 100
आधार अंक हैं प्रयुक्त as a सुविधाजनक ईकाई of मापन in contexts जहाँ प्रतिशत मतभेद  of less than 1 % are discussed .
The most common  उदाहरण is ब्याज दरों , जहाँ मतभेद in ब्याज दरों of कम than 1 % प्रति  year are usually meaningful to talk about .
For example ,  a अंतर of 0.10 प्रतिशत अंक is समतुल्य to a बदलें of 10 आधार अंक ( e.g . a 4.67 % रेट increases  by 10 basis points to 4.77 % ) .
Like percentage points , basis points  avoid the ambiguity between सापेक्ष और निरपेक्ष चर्चाएँ परिचय ब्याज दरों by dealing तभी साथ the निरपेक्ष बदलें in न्यूमेरिक  value of a rate .
For example , if a report says there has been a `` 1 % increase '' from a 10 % interest rate , this could refer to  an बढ़ाएँ either इससे 10 % to 10.1 % ( सापेक्ष , 1 % of 10 % ) , or इससे 10 % to 11 % ( निरपेक्ष , 1 % प्लस  10 % ) .
If , however , the report says there has been a `` 10 basis point increase ''  इससे a 10 % ब्याज रेट , तब we जान कि the ब्याज रेट of 10 % रै increased by 0.10 % ( the निरपेक्ष बदलें  ) to a 10.1 % rate .
It is common practice in the financial industry to use basis points to denote a rate change in a financial instrument , or the difference ( spread ) between two  ब्याज दरों , सहित the yields of fixed-income प्रतिभूति  .
Since certain loans and bonds  may commonly be कोटेड in संबंध to कुछ अनुक्रमणिका or underlying सुरक्षा  , they will often be quoted as a spread over ( or under ) the index .
For example , a loan that bears interest of 0.50 % per annum above the London Interbank  offered रेट ( libor ) is कहा to be 50 आधार अंक over libor , जिससे is commonly expressed as `` l+50bps '' or  simply `` L+50 '' .
The term `` basis point '' has its  origins in व्यापार the `` आधार '' or the स्प्रेड between दो ब्याज  rates .
Since the basis is  प्रायः छोटी , ये हैं कोटेड multiplied up by 10000 , और hence a `` पूरा पाइंट '' गति in  the `` basis '' is a basis point .
Contrast  साथ pips in fx आगे बाज़ार  .
The relationship between percentage changes and basis points  can be summarized as फ़ॉलो : 1 प्रतिशत पाइंट बदलें = 100 आधार अंक , और  0.01 percentage points = 1 basis point .
So , a bond whose yield increases from 5 % to 5.5 % is said to increase by  50 आधार अंक ; or ब्याज दरों कि have risen 1 प्रतिशत पाइंट हैं कहा to have increased by 100 आधार  points .
The British Royal  परिवार is the समूह of बंद रिश्तेदारों of the monarch  of the United Kingdom .
The term is also  commonly लागू to the वही समूह of लोगों जो हैं the संबंध of the monarch in उसके or उसके भूमिका as sovereign of कोई  of the other Commonwealth realms , thus sometimes at variance with official national terms for the family .
Members of the Royal Family belong to , either by birth or  विवाह , the हाउस of विंडसर , चूंकि 1917 , जब जार्ज v बदला the नाम of the royal हाउस इससे saxe-coburg  and Gotha .
This decision was primarily taken because Britain and her Empire were at  युद्ध साथ जर्मनी और दिए the अंग्रेजों royal परिवार 's दमदार जर्मनी ancestry ; it थी लगा कि इसके पब्लिक चित्र could be improved by चुनना a अधिक अंग्रेजों  house name .
The new name  चुनी , विंडसर , था बिल्कुल no कनेक्शन अन्य than as the नाम of the किला जिससे  was and continues to be a royal residence .
Although in the United Kingdom there is no strict legal or formal definition of who is or is not a member of the Royal Family , and different lists will include different people , those carrying the style Her or His Majesty ( HM ) , or Her or His Royal Highness ( HRH ) are always considered members  , जिससे प्रायः परिणाम in the अनुप्रयोग of the पद to the monarch , the consort of the monarch , the विधवा consorts of पिछला monarchs , the children of the monarch और पिछला monarchs , the male-line grandchildren of the monarch और पिछला monarchs , और the spouses और the widows of a monarch 's और पिछला monarch 's बेटे  and male-line grandsons .
On 30 November 1917 ,  किंग जार्ज v जारी अक्षर पेटेंट धमक जो हैं सदस्यों of the royal परिवार  ; the text of the notice from the London Gazette is as follows:
In 1996 , Her Majesty The Queen modified these Letters Patent , as was  evidenced by इस सूचना इससे the लंदन gazette:
In 2013 Letters Patent were issued to extend a title and  a स्टाइल borne by सदस्यों of the royal परिवार to अतिरिक्त व्यक्तियों to be born , evidenced by इस  Notice from the London Gazette:
Members and relatives  of the अंग्रेजों royal परिवार historically represented the monarch in विभिन्न स्थान throughout the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य , sometimes लिये विस्तारित  periods as viceroys , or for specific ceremonies or events .
Today , they often perform ceremonial and social  कर्तव्य throughout the संयुक्त किंगडम और विदेश on निमित्त of the संयुक्त  Kingdom .
Aside from the monarch , their only constitutional role in the affairs of government is to serve ,  if योग्य और जब नियुक्त by अक्षर पेटेंट , as a काउंसलर of राज्य , दो or अधिक of जिसको कसरत the प्राधिकार of the क्राउन ( भीतर stipulated हद )  in the indisposal or absence from the British realm of the monarch .
In the other  realms of the राष्ट्रमंडल रॉयल्टी do नहीं serve  as Counsellors of State .
However in each such realm the monarch 's family members  may अधिनियम on निमित्त of , हैं वित्तपोषित by , और represent the sovereign of कि particular  state , and not the United Kingdom .
The Queen , her consort , her children and grandchildren , as well as all former sovereigns ' children and grandchildren  थाम स्थान in the पहला भाग of the आधिकारिक आदेश of पूर्वता in इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स , स्कॉटलैंड , और  Northern Ireland .
Wives of the said enjoy their  पतियों ' पूर्वता , और पतियों of राजकुमारियों हैं unofficially लकिन habitually लगाई  with their wives as well .
However , the Queen changed the private order  of पूर्वता in the royal परिवार in पक्ष of राजकुमारियों ऐनी और एलेक्जेंड्रा , जो henceforth लो निजी पूर्वता over the duchess of कॉर्नवॉल , जो is  otherwise the realm 's highest ranking woman after the Queen herself .
She did not alter the relative  पूर्वता of अन्य born-princesses , ऐसे as the बेटियां of उसके  younger sons .
Haiti ( ; Haitian Creole Ayiti ) ,  officially the गणतंत्र of हैती ( ; ) , is a  Caribbean country .
It occupies the western ,  छोटी portion of the द्वीप of हिस्पानिओला , in the वृहद antillean द्वीपसमूह , जिससे it साझा  with the Dominican Republic .
Ayiti ( land of high mountains )  थी the स्वदेशी taíno or amerindian नाम लिये the  island .
The country  's उच्चतम पाइंट is pic  la Selle , at .
The total area of Haiti  is और इसके पूंजी is port-au-prince  .
Haitian  क्रियोल और फ्रेंच हैं the आधिकारिक  languages .
Haiti 's regional , historical  , और ethno-linguistic स्थिति is अद्वितीय लिये अनेक  reasons .
It was the first independent nation of Latin America and the Caribbean , the first  ब्लैक -led गणतंत्र in the संसार , और the दूसरी गणतंत्र in the americas जब it gained स्वतंत्रता in 1804 as भाग  of a successful slave revolution lasting nearly a decade .
In  2012 , हैती घोषित इसके इरादे to तलाश संबद्ध  membership status in the African Union .
हैती is the सबसे populous of the predominantly  Francophone independent nations in the Americas .
It is one of only two independent nations in the Americas ( along with Canada ) to  designate फ्रेंच as an आधिकारिक भाषा ; the अन्य french-speaking क्षेत्रों हैं सब विदेशी départements  , or collectivités , of France .
Haiti is the most  populous पूरा member-state of the caribbean जातियाँ  ( CARICOM ) .
It is the poorest country in the  americas as measured by the इंसान विकास  Index .
Political  हिंसा रै occurred regularly throughout इसके इतिहास  , leading to government instability .
Most recently , in February 2004 , a coup d'état originating  in the उत्तर of the देश मजबूर the इस्तीफा और निर्वासन of अध्यक्ष jean-bertrand  Aristide .
A provisional government took control with security provided by the  संयुक्त राष्ट्र स्थिरीकरण मिशन in हैती ( minustah  ) .
Michel Martelly ,  the वर्तमान अध्यक्ष , थी निर्वाचित in the haitian  general election , 2011 .
The island  रै था a इतिहास of destructive  earthquakes .
A  7.0 परिमाण भूकंप struck हैती on 12 जनवरी  2010 and devastated Port-au-Prince .
The  उच्चतम विश्वसनीय मौत गिनती थी अनुमानित  at 220,000 .
Haitian  सरकारी estimates यहूद  higher .
The Presidential palace , Parliament and many other important structures were destroyed , along  साथ अनगिनत घरों और व्यवसायों , leaving सैंकड़ों of हज़ारों of लोगों बेघर  .
The  देश रै yet to रिकवर इससे the 2010 भूकंप ( और subsequent incidents ) due to दोनो the गंभीरता of the क्षति हैती endured in 2010  , as well as a government that was ineffective well before the earthquake .
संयुक्त राज्य सहायता संगठन  have donated $ 2 billion .
Combined with other  अंतरराष्ट्रीय दान , ये निधि हैं intended to योगदान to the पुनर्निर्माण of  the country .
the खूनी beetroots is the pseudonym of सर bob कॉर्नेलियस rifo , the  Italian electro house and dance-punk music producer , DJ and photographer .
The Bloody Beetroots is  well-known लिये the ब्लैक venom मुखौटा he wears  during performances .
In fact , the only identifying public  विशेषता of rifo is the साल `` 1977 '' tattooed आरपार उसके छाती , जिससे  is both the year that the producer and punk-rock was born .
`` The  खूनी beetroots dj नियत '' contains सर bob  Cornelius Rifo and Tommy Tea .
A Motorola  सलाहकार alphanumeric पेजर प्रयुक्त in ब्राज़ील in the 1990s ,  operated by Teletrim
A pager is a  बेतार दूरसंचार यंत्र कि receives और प्रदर्शक न्यूमेरिक or टेक्स्ट संदेश  , or receives and announces voice messages .
One-way pagers can only receive  संदेश , जबकि जवाब pagers और two-way pagers can भी acknowledge , जवाब to , और originate  messages using an internal transmitter .
Pagers operate as part  of a paging प्रणाली जिससे शामिल एक or अधिक फिक्स्ड ट्रांसमीटरों ( or in the मामला of जवाब pagers और two-way pagers , एक or अधिक आधार स्टेशन ) , as खूब as  a number of pagers carried by mobile users .
These systems can range from a restaurant  प्रणाली साथ a सिंगल low-power ट्रांसमीटर , to a देशभर प्रणाली साथ हज़ारों of high-power  base stations .
One of the first  व्यावहारिक paging सेवाएं थी शुभारम्भ in 1950  for physicians in the New York City area .
Physicians paid US  $ 12 प्रति माह लिये the सेवा और carried a ( 6 oz ) पेजर कि होता प्राप्त  phone messages within ( 25 mi ) of a single transmitter tower .
The system was manufactured by the  reevesound कम्पनी और संचालित by telanswerphone  .
In 1960 , John Francis Mitchell combined elements of Motorola 's Walkie Talkie and automobile radio technologies to  बनाएँ the पहला transistorized पेजर , और इससे इस पाइंट , paging प्रौद्योगिकी जारी to अग्रिम  , and pager adoption continued to expand , until the early 1990s .
However , by the mid-1990s , as cellular technologies became cheaper and more  widely उपलब्धियाँ , उन्नत सेवाएं began to displace paging as a वाणिज्यिक  product .
Today  , pagers मौजूद largely as niche उत्पाद , ढूंढना preferential उपयोग in अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as  hospitals , public safety , and retail locations where their simplicity , high reliability , and low cost represent significant advantages .
reevesville is a कस्बा in dorchester  County , South Carolina , United States .
the जनसांख्यिकी थी  196 at the 2010 census .
As defined by the U.S. Office of Management and Budget , and used by the U.S. Census Bureau for statistical purposes  तभी , reevesville is शामिल भीतर the charleston-north charleston-summerville महानगर  area .
Frida Kahlo de Rivera ( born Magdalena Carmen Frieda Kahlo y Calderón ; July 6 ,  1907 – जुलाई 13 , 1954 ) थी a मैक्सिकन चित्रकार , born in coyoacán , जो is  best known for her self-portraits .
Kahlo 's life began and ended in  मैक्सिको नगर , in उसके घर ज्ञात as the ब्लू  House .
She gave  उसके जनम तिथि as जुलाई 7 , 1910 , लकिन उसके जनम प्रमाणपत्र shows जुलाई  6 , 1907 .
Kahlo had allegedly wanted  the साल of उसके जनम to coincide साथ the साल of the शुरूआत of the मैक्सिकन क्रान्ति so कि उसके जीवन  would begin with the birth of modern Mexico .
Her work has been celebrated in Mexico as emblematic of national and indigenous tradition , and by  नारीवादी लिये इसके uncompromising चित्रण of the मादा अनुभव और रूप  .
Mexican culture  और amerindian सांस्कृतिक परंपरा हैं महत्वपूर्ण in उसके कार्य , जिससे रै  been sometimes characterized as Naïve art or folk art .
Her work has also been described as  `` surrealist '' , और in 1938 आंद्रे ब्रेटन , प्रिंसिपल initiator of the surrealist गति , वर्णित  Kahlo 's art as a `` ribbon around a bomb '' .
Kahlo had a  volatile विवाह साथ the प्रसिद्ध मैक्सिकन कलाकार  Diego Rivera .
She suffered  lifelong स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं  .
Many of her health problems were  the परिणाम of a ट्रैफ़िक दुर्घटना वो बच  as a teenager .
Recovering from her injuries  पृथक उसके इससे अन्य लोगों और इस अलगाव बहकावे उसके works , अनेक of जिससे हैं  self-portraits of one sort or another .
Kahlo suggested , `` I paint myself because I am so  प्रायः अलोन और क्युकी i am the विषय i जान बेहतरीन  . ''
She also  stated , `` i थी born  a bitch .
i थी born  a painter . ''

theresienwiese on the दिन पहले oktoberfest  2006
Oktoberfest is a 16-day festival celebrating beer held  annually in म्यूनिख , बायर्न , जर्मनी , कार्यशील इससे लेट सितंबर to the पहला  weekend in October .
It is one of the most famous events in  जर्मनी और is the संसार 's largest मेला , साथ अधिक than 6 लाख लोगों इससे  around the world attending the event every year .
To the locals , it is not called  oktoberfest , लकिन `` die wiesn '' , बाद the colloquial  name of the fairgrounds themselves .
The Oktoberfest is an  महत्वपूर्ण भाग of bar संस्कृति , having महरूम  held since 1810 .
Other cities across the world  भी थाम oktoberfest जश्न , modeled बाद  the original Munich event .
The Munich Oktoberfest originally took place  दौरान the सोलह दिनों up to , और सहित , the पहला संडे in अक्तूबर  .
In 1994 , the schedule was modified in response to German  reunification so कि if the पहला संडे in अक्तूबर जलप्रपात on the 1st or 2nd , तब the पर्व होता go on जबतक  October 3 ( German Unity Day ) .
यूँ , the पर्व is अभी 17 दिनों जब the पहला संडे is  October 2 and 18 days when it is October 1 .
In 2010 , the festival lasted until the first  सोमवार in अक्तूबर , to चिह्नित the वर्षगांठ  of the event .
The festival is held in an area named the  theresienwiese ( फ़ील्ड , or मर्ग , of therese ) , प्रायः पुकारा wiesn लिये छोटी , स्तिथ  near Munich 's center .
Large quantities  of oktoberfest बियर हैं खपत , साथ लगभग 7 लाख liters परोसा  during the 16 day festival in 2007 .
विज़िटर may भी आनंद a चौड़ी किस्में of परंपरागत खाना ऐसे as hendl ( मुर्गा ) , schweinebraten ( रोस्ट पोर्क ) , schweinshaxe ( ग्रील्ड हैम ओल ) , steckerlfisch ( ग्रील्ड मछली on a स्टिक ) , würstl ( sausages ) साथ साथ brezeln ( pretzel ) , knödel ( आलू or ब्रैड पकौड़ी ) , käsespätzle ( चीज नूडल्स ) , reiberdatschi  ( potato pancakes ) , Sauerkraut or Rotkohl/Blaukraut ( red cabbage ) along with such Bavarian delicacies as Obatzda ( a spiced cheese-butter spread ) and Weisswurst ( a white sausage ) .
A platter with cheese  और garnishes
Wheels  of gouda
Cheese is a  जेनेरिक पद लिये a विविध समूह of  milk-based food products .
Cheese is  उत्पादित in wide-ranging  flavors , textures , and forms .
Cheese consists of  प्रोटीन और मोटे इससे मिल्क , प्रायः the मिल्क of गायों , भैंस  , goats , or sheep .
It is produced  by जामन of the मिल्क प्रोटीन  casein .
Typically , the milk  is acidified और जोड of the एंजाइम  rennet causes coagulation .
The  solids हैं अलग और दबाया into फाइनल  form .
Some cheeses have  molds on the rind or throughout  .
Most cheeses melt at  कुकिंग तापमान  .
Hundreds  of प्रकार of चीज इससे विभिन्न देशों  are produced .
Their styles  , बनावट और जायका निर्भर on the उत्पत्ति of the मिल्क ( सहित the एनिमल 's आहार ) , whether वे have महरूम pasteurized , the butterfat  content , the bacteria and mold , the processing , and aging .
Herbs ,  मसाले , or लकडी धुँआ may be प्रयुक्त as  flavoring agents .
The yellow to  रेड रंग of अनेक cheeses , ऐसे as रेड लीसेस्टर  , is normally formed from adding annatto .
For a  few cheeses , the मिल्क is curdled by adding  acids such as vinegar or lemon juice .
Most cheeses are  acidified to a lesser उपाधि by जीवाणु , जिससे फेरे मिल्क  sugars into lactic acid , then the addition of rennet completes the curdling .
शाकाहारी विकल्प to rennet हैं उपलब्धियाँ ; सबसे हैं उत्पादित by fermentation of the कवक mucor miehei  , but others have been extracted from various species of the Cynara thistle family .
Cheese  is valued लिये इसके पोर्टेबिलिटी , long जीवन , और ऊँची सामग्री of  fat , protein , calcium , and phosphorus .
Cheese is more compact and has a longer shelf life than milk , although how long a cheese will keep may  निर्भर on the प्रकार of चीज ; लेबल्स on पैकेट्स of चीज प्रायः अर्जी कि a चीज चाहिए be खपत भीतर तीन to पाँच दिनों of खोलने  .
generally बोलना , मुश्किल cheeses पिछला longer  than soft cheeses , such as Brie or goat 's milk cheese .
Cheesemakers near a dairy  प्रदेश may लाभ इससे fresher , lower-priced मिल्क  , and lower shipping costs .
The long  भंडार जीवन of कुछ चीज , विशेषकर if it is encased in a सुरक्षात्मक  rind , allows selling when markets are favorable .
अतिरिक्त संघटक may be added to कुछ cheeses , ऐसे as ब्लैक मिर्च , लहसुन  , chives or cranberries .
A  विशेषज्ञ विक्रेता of चीज is sometimes ज्ञात  as a cheesemonger .
To become an expert in this field , like wine  or कुकिंग , requires कुछ औपचारिक शिक्षा और सालो of चख और hands-on  experience .
This position is  typically जिम्मेदार लिये सब पहलुओं of the चीज inventory ; selecting  the cheese menu , purchasing , receiving , storage , and ripening .
Legal  citation सिग्नल हैं a नियत of ब्रैड abbreviated वाक्यांश or शब्द प्रयुक्त to clarify  the authority or significance of a legal citation as it relates to a proposition .
Signals  सहायता a रीडर जल्दी discern अर्थ or उपयोगिता of a particular सन्दर्भ  when the reference itself does not provide adequate information .
सबसे citation सिग्नल हैं  placed in front of the citation to which they apply .
For example , in the  अनुच्छेद जब लिखने a विधिक तर्क , it is महत्वपूर्ण to refer  to primary sources .
To  assist पाठक in locating ये स्त्रोत , it is  desirable to use a standardized citation format .
See generally  हार्वर्ड विधि पुनर्विलोकन संघ , the bluebook : a वर्दी प्रणाली of citation (  18th ed . 2005 ) .
Note , however  , कि कुछ न्यायालयों may आवश्यकता कोई विधिक papers कि हैं सुपुर्द to उन्हें to  conform to a different citation format .
the signal is the phrase `` see generally , '' which indicates that the citation `` The Bluebook : A Uniform System  of citation ( 18th ed . 2005 ) '' provides सामान्य पृष्ठभूमि सूचना on  the topic .
Neil Alden Armstrong ( August 5 , 1930 –  अगस्त 25 , 2012 ) थी an अमरीकी astronaut और the पहला व्यक्ति to चलना  on the Moon .
He was  भी an aerospace इंजीनियर , नवल एविएटर  , test pilot , and university professor .
Before becoming an astronaut ,  आर्मस्ट्रांग थी an अधिकारी in the u.S. नेवी और परोसा in the  Korean War .
After the war , he earned his bachelor 's degree at Purdue  विश्वविद्यालयों और परोसा as a परीक्षण पायलट at the नेशनल सलाहकार कमेटी लिये aeronautics high-speed उड़ान स्टेशन , अभी ज्ञात as the ड्राइडेन उड़ान शोध बीच  , where he logged over 900 flights .
He later completed  ग्रैजुएट अध्ययन at the विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिणी  California .
A  भागीदार in the u.S. एयर फ़ोर्स 's man in स्पेस soonest और x-20 dyna-soar इंसान spaceflight  programs , Armstrong joined the NASA Astronaut Corps in 1962 .
he बना उसके पहला स्पेस उड़ान , as कमांड पायलट of मिथुन 8 , in 1966 , बनने  NASA 's first civilian astronaut to fly in space .
On this mission , he  performed the पहला डॉकिंग of दो spacecraft , साथ पायलट दाउद  Scott .
Armstrong 's second and last spaceflight was as  मिशन कमांडर of the अपोलो 11 चंद्रमा लैंडिंग , in जुलाई  1969 .
On this mission , Armstrong and Buzz  एल्ड्रिन descended to the चंद्र सतह और खर्च दो और a हाफ  hours exploring , while Michael Collins remained in lunar orbit in the Command Module .
Along with Collins and Aldrin , Armstrong was awarded the  अध्यक्षीय पदक of स्वतंत्रता by अध्यक्ष रिचर्ड निक्सन ; in 1978 , अध्यक्ष jimmy कार्टर प्रस्तुत आर्मस्ट्रांग the congressional स्पेस पदक of सम्मान in 1978  ; he and his former crewmates received the Congressional Gold Medal in 2009 .
Armstrong died in  सिनसिनाटी , ओहियो , on अगस्त 25 , 2012 , at the आयु of 82 , बाद जटिलताओं  from coronary artery bypass surgery .
Secretariat  ( कूच 30 , 1970 – अक्तूबर 4 , 1989 ) थी an अमरीकी thoroughbred racehorse कि  in 1973 became the first U.S . Triple Crown champion in 25 years .
He set race  रिकॉर्ड in सब तीन कार्यक्रम in the श्रेणी — the केंटकी डर्बी ( 1:59.4 ) , the preakness stakes ( 1:53 ) , और  the Belmont Stakes ( 2:24 ) — records that still stand today .
He is considered to  be एक of the महानतम thoroughbreds  of all time .
In 1999 ,  ईएसपीएन क्रमित सचिवालय the 35th बेहतरीन खिलाड़ी of the 20th सदी , the उच्चतम  ranking racehorse on the list URL_http .
He  क्रमित दूसरी पीछे man o ' युद्ध in the blood-horse 's सूची of the शीर्ष  100 U.S. Racehorses of the 20th Century .
सचिवालय थी sired by बिंदास शासक आउट of somethingroyal  , by Princequillo .
He was  foaled at the मर्ग in कैरोलीन  County , Virginia .
Like  उसके प्रसिद्ध पूर्ववर्ती man o ' युद्ध , सचिवालय थी a विशाल शाहबलूत टट्टू और थी दिए  the same nickname , `` Big Red . ''
Secretariat 's grandsire , Nasrullah , is also the  great-great-grandsire of 1977 ट्रिपल क्राउन विजेता  Seattle Slew .
Owned by Penny Chenery  , he थी प्रशिक्षित by lucien laurin और मुख्यतः ridden by कनाडाई jockey रॉन turcotte , साथ साथ प्रशिक्षु jockey पॉल फेलिसियानो ( पहला  two races ) , and veteran Eddie Maple ( last race ) .
He  raced in chenery 's मर्ग stable 's ब्लू  and white checkered colors and his groom was Eddie Sweat .
Secretariat stood  लगभग लम्बा , और weighed , साथ a 75-inch girth , in उसके रेसिंग प्रधान  .
Madrid ( , ) is the  पूंजी और largest नगर  of Spain .
The population of the city is roughly 3.3 million and the entire  जनसांख्यिकी of the मैड्रिड महानगर क्षेत्रफल is गणना to be around 6.5 लाख  .
It is the third-largest city in  the यूरोपीय संघ , बाद लंदन और बर्लिन , और इसके महानगर क्षेत्रफल is the third-largest  in the European Union after London and Paris .
The city  spans a कुल of  .
The city is located on the Manzanares  नदी in the केन्द्र of दोनो the देश और the जातियाँ of मैड्रिड ( जिससे comprises the नगर of मैड्रिड , इसके conurbation और विस्तारित उपनगरों और गांवों )  ; this community is bordered by the autonomous communities of Castile and León and Castile-La Mancha .
As the capital  नगर of स्पेन , सीट of सरकारी , और निवास of the स्पेनी monarch , मैड्रिड  is also the political , economic and cultural centre of Spain .
The  वर्तमान महापौर is ana botella इससे the लोगों 's पार्टी  ( PP ) .
The Madrid urban agglomeration has the third-largest GDP in the  यूरोपीय संघ और इसके प्रभाव in राजनीती , शिक्षा , entertainment , पर्यावरण , मीडिया , फ़ैशन , विज्ञान , संस्कृति , और the कला सब योगदान  to its status as one of the world 's major global cities .
Due to its economic output , high standard of living  , और मार्केट आकार , मैड्रिड is माना the प्रमुख वित्तीय केन्द्र of दक्षिणी यूरोपीय और the इबेरिया प्रायद्वीप ; it होस्ट the सिर कार्यालयों of the विशाल बहुमत  of the major Spanish companies , such as Telefónica , Iberia or Repsol .
Madrid is the most touristic city of Spain , the fourth-most  touristic of the महाद्वीप , और the सातवाँ सबसे visited नगर in the संसार according to  Forbes .
Is the 10th most livable  नगर in the संसार according to monocle पत्रिका , in इसके 2010  index .
Madrid also ranks  among the 12 greenest यूरोपीय शहरों in 2010. < संदर्भ name= '' एचटीटीपी : //www.citymayors.com/environment/greenest-cities-europe.html '' > मैड्रिड is फिलहाल  a Candidate City for the 2020 Summer Olympics .
मैड्रिड घरों the मुख्यालय of the संसार पर्यटन संगठन ( wto ) , belonging to the संयुक्त राष्ट्र संगठन ( un ) , the  SEGIB , the Organization of Ibero-American States ( OEI ) , and the Public Interest Oversight Board ( PIOB ) .
It also hosts major international  संस्थानों regulators of स्पेनी : the खड़ा कमेटी of the संघ of स्पेनी भाषा अकादमियों , मुख्यालय of the royal स्पेनी अकादमी ( rae ) ,  the Cervantes Institute and the Foundation of Urgent Spanish ( Fundéu ) .
Madrid organizes  मेलों as fitur , आरको , simo tci और the cibeles मैड्रिड  Fashion Week .
While Madrid possesses  a आधुनिक अवसंरचना , it रै preserved the dekh और महसूस of  many of its historic neighbourhoods and streets .
Its landmarks include the Royal Palace of Madrid ;  the teatro रियल ( royal थिएटर ) साथ इसके लौटी 1850 ओपेरा हाउस ; the buen retiro पार्क , संस्थापित in 1631 ; the 19th-century नेशनल पुस्तकालयों भवन ( संस्थापित in 1712 ) containing कुछ of स्पेन 's ऐतिहासिक अभिलेख ; a विशाल क्रमांक of नेशनल संग्रहालय , और the सुनहरी त्रिभुज of आर्ट , स्तिथ साथ the paseo डेल प्राडो  and comprising three art museums : Prado Museum , the Museo Nacional Centro de Arte Reina Sofía , a museum of modern art , and the Thyssen-Bornemisza Museum , which completes the shortcomings of the other two museums .
Cibeles  राजमहल और फव्वारा have become the स्मारक  symbol of the city .
The path  of the via appia और of the via appia  Traiana .
Remains of the Appian  रास्ता in रोम , निकट quarto miglio
निकट रोम  .
The Appian Way ( Latin and Italian : Via Appia  ) थी एक of the earliest और रणनीतिक सबसे महत्वपूर्ण रोमन सड़कें of the प्राचीन  republic .
It connected  रोम to brindisi , apulia , in southeast  Italy .
Its importance is  indicated by इसके आम नाम , अंकित by statius  :
Appia  teritur रेजिना longarum  viarum
`` the Appian  रास्ता is the महारानी of the long  roads ''
The road is named after Appius Claudius Caecus , the Roman censor who began and  समाप्त the पहला खण्ड as a सैन्य सड़क to the दक्षिण in 312 bc दौरान  the Samnite Wars .
The  draupner वेव , a सिंगल दानव वेव measured on नई साल 's दिन 1995 , आखिरकार पुष्टि the अस्तित्व of freak लहरें , जिससे था  previously been considered near-mythical
Rogue waves ( also known as freak waves , monster waves , killer  लहरें , चरम लहरें , और असामान्य लहरें ) हैं अपेक्षाकृत विशाल और spontaneous समंदर सतह लहरें कि occur दूर आउट at समुद्र , और  are a threat even to large ships and ocean liners .
In oceanography , they  हैं अधिक precisely पारिभाषित as लहरें जिनकी ऊँचाई is अधिक than twice the significant वेव ऊँचाई ( swh ) , जिससे is itself पारिभाषित as the  mean of the largest third of waves in a wave record .
इसलिए दुष्ट लहरें हैं नहीं necessarily the biggest लहरें मिला at समुद्र  ; they are , rather , surprisingly large waves for a given sea state .
Rogue waves seem not to have a single distinct cause  , लकिन occur जहाँ शारीरिक कारकों ऐसे as ऊँची हवाएँ और दमदार currents कारण लहरें to  merge to create a single exceptionally large wave .
Electress  sophia of हनोवर ( 1630–1714 )
the लकीर of उत्तराधिकार to the अंग्रेजों सिंहासन is the ordered अनुक्रम of सब those लोगों  eligible to succeed to the throne of the United Kingdom and the other 15 Commonwealth realms .
The Act of Settlement 1701 bestowed succession on  the electress sophia of हनोवर और उसके वंशजों  while excluding Roman Catholics .
The  अंग्रेजों सरकारी करता नहीं प्रकाशित an आधिकारिक सूची of सब those in लकीर to सफल , लकिन the कार्य of genealogical लेखक और amateur  researchers suggests that there are several thousand people potentially in line .
At a summit in Perth , Western Australia  in 2011 , the heads of सरकारी of सब 16 राष्ट्रमंडल realms सहमत to लो कदम to अपनाना निरपेक्ष primogeniture ,  end the exclusion of people married to Roman Catholics , and make other changes in the succession rules .
The line of succession is  भी प्रयुक्त to चुनें the counsellors of राज्य ( और a रीजेंट if the need arises ) अंतर्गत  the provisions of the Regency Act 1937 .
लिये पहले संस्करण of the लकीर of उत्तराधिकार  , see History of the British line of succession .
Edward Montgomery Clift ( October 17 , 1920July 23 ,  1966 ) थी an अमरीकी फिल्मी और स्टेज कर्ता the नई यॉर्क times’ obituary विख्यात  his portrayal of `` moody , sensitive young men '' .
He often played outsiders and `` victim-heroes '' ; examples include the social climber in George Stevens 's A Place in  the सूर्य , the anguished कैथोलिक पुजारी in हिचकॉक 's i कबूल , the doomed नियमित सिपाही रॉबर्ट E. ली prewitt in फ्रेड zinnemann 's इससे यहाँ to शाश्वत , और the यहूदी gi bullied by antisemites in एडवर्ड dmytryk  's The Young Lions .
बाद , बाद a disfiguring car क्रैश in 1956 , और दारू और नुस्खा  drug abuse , he became erratic .
Nevertheless important roles were still his , including  `` the लापरवाह , alcoholic , mother-fixated रोडियो यजमान '' in जॉन हस्टन 's the misfits , the शीर्षक भूमिका in हस्टन 's , और the विशेषज्ञता शिविर  victim in Stanley Kramer 's Judgment at Nuremberg . ''
Clift received four  अकादमी पुरस्कार nominations दौरान उसके करियर , तीन लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता  and one for Best Supporting Actor .
The War on Terror ( also known as the Global War on Terrorism ) is a term commonly applied  to an अंतरराष्ट्रीय सैन्य अभियान जिससे प्रारंभ as a परिणाम of the 11 सितंबर 2001 आतंकवादी हमले on the संयुक्त  States .
This  resulted in an अंतरराष्ट्रीय सैन्य अभियान to eliminate al-qaeda और अन्य  militant organizations .
The  संयुक्त किंगडम और अनेक अन्य नाटो और non-nato राष्ट्र participate  in the conflict .
the phrase 'war on आतंक ' थी पहला प्रयुक्त by us अध्यक्ष  George W. Bush on 20 September 2001 .
The Bush administration and the Western media have since used the term to  signify a वैश्विक सैन्य , राजनैतिक , lawful , और conceptual struggle—targeting दोनो संगठन  designated as terrorist and regimes accused of supporting them .
It  थी typically प्रयुक्त साथ a particular फ़ोकस on उग्रवादी islamists  , al-Qaeda , and other jihadi groups .
Although the term is not officially used by the administration of US President Barack Obama ( which instead uses the term Overseas  आकस्मिकता आपरेशन ) , it is स्टिल commonly प्रयुक्त by राजनेता , in the मीडिया और by कुछ पहलुओं of सरकारी officially , ऐसे as the संयुक्त  States ' Global War on Terrorism Service Medal .
German  battleship schleswig-holstein , westerplatte  , September 1 , 1939
Destroyer USS Shaw exploding after her forward magazine  थी detonated दौरान the आक्रमण on पर्ल हार्बर
The main causes of World War II were nationalistic issues ,  अनसुलझे मुद्दे , और resentments resulting इससे संसार युद्ध i और the interwar काल in  Europe , in addition to the effects of the Great Depression in the 1930s .
the culmination of कार्यक्रम कि led to the outbreak of युद्ध हैं generally समझा to be the  1939 invasion of Poland by Germany and Soviet Russia and the 1937 invasion of the Republic of China by the Empire of Japan .
These military aggressions were the  परिणाम of निर्णय बना by the सत्तावादी सत्ताधारी नाजी elite in जर्मनी और by the नेतृत्व  of the Kwantung Army in Japan .
World War II started after these aggressive actions were met with  an आधिकारिक घोषणा of युद्ध and/or हथियारबंद प्रतिरोध  .
The  following is a सूची of देवताओं और अन्य दैवी और semi-divine आंकड़े  from Greek mythology .
