The list does not include  जीव ; लिये ये , देखिए सूची of यूनानी पौराणिक  creatures .
The  मित्सुबिशी galant is an ऑटोमोबाइल manufactured by मित्सुबिशी  Motors between 1969 and 2012 .
the नाम थी निकला इससे the फ्रेंच शब्द galant  , meaning `` chivalrous '' .
There have been  नौ पृथक पीढियां , और संचयी बिक्री अभी exceed  five million .
It began as a compact  सेडान , लकिन over the कोर्स of इसके जीवन रै  evolved into a larger mid-size car .
आरंभिक उत्पादन थी तभी आधारित in जापानी , लकिन चूंकि 1994 the अमरीकी मार्केट रै महरूम  served by vehicles assembled at the former Diamond-Star Motors ( DSM ) facility in Normal , Illinois .
Blood pressure ( BP ) , sometimes referred to as arterial blood  दबाव , is the दबाव exerted by circulating रक्त upon the दीवारें of रक्त बरतन , और is एक of  the principal vital signs .
जब प्रयुक्त बगैर further specification , `` रक्त दबाव '' प्रायः refers to the arterial  pressure of the systemic circulation .
During  प्रत्येक धड़कन , रक्त दबाव varies between a अधिकतम  ( systolic ) and a minimum ( diastolic ) pressure .
the रक्त दबाव in the परिसंचरण is प्रधानतया  due to the pumping action of the heart .
मतभेद in औसत रक्त दबाव हैं जिम्मेदार लिये  blood flow from one location to another in the circulation .
The rate of mean  रक्त प्रवाह depends on the प्रतिरोध to प्रवाह प्रस्तुत by the  blood vessels .
Mean blood pressure decreases  as the circulating रक्त चालें दूर इससे the दिल through धमनियों और capillaries due to  viscous losses of energy .
Mean blood pressure drops over the whole circulation ,  हालांकि सबसे of the पतन occurs साथ the छोटी धमनियों और arterioles  .
Gravity affects blood pressure via hydrostatic forces ( e.g. , during standing ) and  valves in रगों , श्वास , और pumping इससे संकुचन of skeletal मांसपेशियां भी influence रक्त दबाव  in veins .
Blood pressure without  further specification प्रायः refers to the प्रणालीगत arterial दबाव measured at a व्यक्ति 's अपर भुजा और is a माप of  the pressure in the brachial artery , the major artery in the upper arm .
A person’s blood pressure is usually  expressed in शर्तें of the systolic दबाव over diastolic दबाव और is  measured in millimetres of mercury ( mmHg ) , for example 120/80 .
A veto – Latin for `` I forbid '' – is  the शक्ति ( प्रयुक्त by an अधिकारी of the राज्य , लिये उदाहरण ) to unilaterally रोकें an आधिकारिक कार्रवाई , विशेषकर  the enactment of legislation .
A veto can be absolute , as for  उदाहरण in the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा परिषद , जिनकी स्थाई सदस्यों ( चीन , फ़्रांस , रूस , संयुक्त किंगडम  , United States of America ) can block any resolution .
Or it can  be सीमित , as in the विधान प्रक्रम of the संयुक्त राज्य , जहाँ a two-thirds vote in दोनो the  House and Senate may override a Presidential veto of legislation .
A veto only gives power to stop changes , not  to अपनाना उन्हें ( मगर लिये the विरल `` amendatory  veto '' ) .
Thus a veto  allows इसके होल्डर to protect the औकात quo  .
The concept of a veto body  originated साथ the रोमन consuls और tribunes  .
Either of the two consuls  पकड़कर दफ्तर in a दिए साल could ब्लाक a सैन्य or सिविल निर्णय by the अन्य ; कोई  tribune had the power to unilaterally block legislation passed by the Roman Senate .
Sulfur dioxide ( also  गंधक डाइऑक्साइड ) is the रासायनिक  compound with the formula .
It is a toxic gas with a pungent , irritating smell ,  कि is released by ज्वालामुखी और in विभिन्न औद्योगिक प्रक्रियाओं .
Since coal and petroleum often contain sulfur compounds ,  उनके दहन generates गंधक डाइऑक्साइड जबतक the गंधक यौगिकों हैं removed पहले burning  the fuel .
Further oxidation of SO2  , प्रायः in the उपस्थिति of a उत्प्रेरक ऐसे as no2 , फ़ॉर्म  H2SO4 , and thus acid rain .
Sulfur  डाइऑक्साइड emissions हैं भी a precursor to अभिकण  in the atmosphere .
Both of  ये impacts हैं कारण लिये चिंता over the पर्यावरणीय प्रभाव  of these fuels .
Myasthenia gravis ( from Greek μύς `` muscle '' , `` weakness '' , and `` serious '' ; abbreviated MG ) is an autoimmune  neuromuscular बीमारी अग्रणी to fluctuating मांसपेशी कमज़ोरी और fatigability  .
It is an autoimmune disorder , in which  कमज़ोरी is caused by circulating antibodies कि ब्लाक acetylcholine receptors at the postsynaptic  neuromuscular junction , inhibiting the excitatory effects of the neurotransmitter acetylcholine on nicotinic receptors throughout neuromuscular junctions .
myasthenia is treated medically साथ acetylcholinesterase  inhibitors or immunosuppressants , and , in selected cases , thymectomy .
The disease incidence is 3–30 cases per million per  साल और उठती as a परिणाम of increased जागरूकता  .
MG must be  विशिष्ट इससे जन्मजात myasthenic syndromes कि can उपस्थित समान  symptoms but offer no response to immunosuppressive treatments .
Reflective  मुड़ nematic द्रव क्रिस्टल  display .
Polarizing filter  फिल्मी साथ a लंबवत अक्ष to polarize  light as it enters .
Glass  substrate साथ ito electrodes  .
The shapes of these electrodes  होगा determine the आकार कि होगा appear जब the एलसीडी is turned  ON .
लंबवत ridges etched on the  surface are smooth .
मुड़ nematic द्रव  crystal .
कांच substrate साथ आम एलेक्ट्रोड फिल्मी ( ito ) साथ आड़ा ridges to लकीर up साथ  the horizontal filter .
Polarizing filter  फिल्मी साथ a आड़ा  axis to block/pass light .
परावर्तक सतह to भेजें  light back to viewer .
( In a backlit LCD , this  परत is replaced साथ a लाइट सोर्स  . )
A liquid-crystal display (  एलसीडी ) is a चपटा फलक प्रदर्शक , इलेक्ट्रॉनिक विज़ुअल प्रदर्शक , or वीडियो  display that uses the light modulating properties of liquid crystals .
द्रव crystals do नहीं emit लाइट  directly .
LCDs are available to display arbitrary images ( as in a  general-purpose कंप्यूटर प्रदर्शक ) or फिक्स्ड बिंब जिससे can be प्रदर्शित or छुपा , ऐसे as preset शब्द , अंक , और 7-segment  displays as in a digital clock .
They use the same basic technology , except that arbitrary images are  बना up of a विशाल क्रमांक of छोटी पिक्सेल , जबकि अन्य प्रदर्शक have larger तत्व  .
LCDs are used in a  चौड़ी दायरा of अनुप्रयोग सहित कंप्यूटर मॉनीटर , टेलीविज़न , यंत्र panels , वायुयान  cockpit displays , and signage .
They are common in  उपभोक्ता डिवाइस ऐसे as वीडियो खिलाड़ी , गेमिंग डिवाइस , घड़ियाँ , घड़ियाँ , calculators , और telephones ,  and have replaced cathode ray tube ( CRT ) displays in most applications .
They are  उपलब्धियाँ in a wider दायरा of स्क्रीन आकार than crt और प्लाज्मा प्रदर्शक , और चूंकि वे  do not use phosphors , they do not suffer image burn-in .
LCDs are  , however , susceptible to चित्र  persistence .
The LCD screen  is अधिक उर्जा कुशल और can be disposed  of more safely than a CRT .
Its low electrical power consumption  enables it to be प्रयुक्त in बैटरी -powered इलेक्ट्रॉनिक उपकरण  .
It is an electronically modulated optical device made up of any  क्रमांक of खण्ड भर साथ द्रव crystals और arrayed in सामने of a लाइट सोर्स ( backlight ) or reflector to उपज बिंब in रंग or  monochrome .
Liquid  crystals यहूद पहला खोजा in  1888 .
By 2008 , worldwide sales of  टेलीविज़न साथ एलसीडी screens exceeded सालाना बिक्री of crt इकाई ; the crt became  obsolete for most purposes .
The Borgata Hotel  कसीनो और स्पा is a लक्ज़री होटल , कसीनो , और स्पा in अटलांटिक नगर  , New Jersey , United States .
It is owned by Marina District Development , a joint venture between  boyd गेमिंग और a divesture विश्वास स्थापित by mgm रिसॉर्ट अंतरराष्ट्रीय  .
The $  1.1 अरब कसीनो होटल सुविधाएँ 2,002 कक्ष और is the  largest hotel in New Jersey .
The Borgata  खोली in जुलाई 2003 as a लास vegas-style megaresort और is  the top-grossing casino in Atlantic City .
A bottle  of ऊँची potency b-complex विटामिन  supplement pills .
A vitamin (  or ) is an सशुल्क यौगिक जरूरी by an सजीव as a vital  nutrient in limited amounts .
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of  यौगिकों ) is पुकारा a विटामिन जब it can नहीं be synthesized in sufficient quantities  by an organism , and must be obtained from the diet .
यूँ , the पद is सशर्त दोनो on the हालातों  and on the particular organism .
लिये उदाहरण , एस्कॉर्बिक एसिड ( विटामिन c ) is a विटामिन लिये इंसानो , लकिन नहीं लिये सबसे अन्य पशु , और biotin और विटामिन  D are required in the human diet only in certain circumstances .
By convention , the term vitamin includes neither other  अनिवार्य nutrients , ऐसे as dietary खनिज , अनिवार्य वसीय acids , or अनिवार्य अमीनो acids ( जिससे हैं needed in larger amounts than विटामिन ) nor the विशाल क्रमांक of अन्य nutrients  that promote health but are otherwise required less often .
Thirteen  विटामिन हैं universally  recognized at present .
विटामिन हैं वर्गीकृत by उनके biological और रासायनिक कार्यकलाप  , not their structure .
Thus , each `` vitamin '' refers  to a क्रमांक of vitamer यौगिकों कि सब दिखाएँ the biological कार्यकलाप संबद्ध  with a particular vitamin .
Such a set of  रसायन is grouped अंतर्गत an alphabetized विटामिन `` जेनेरिक वर्णनकर्ता '' शीर्षक , ऐसे as `` विटामिन a `` , जिससे शामिल  the compounds retinal , retinol , and four known carotenoids .
Vitamers by  परिभाषा हैं convertible to the क्रियाशील रूप of the विटामिन in the  body , and are sometimes inter-convertible to one another , as well .
Vitamins  have विविध biochemical  functions .
Some have hormone-like  कृत्यों as regulators of खनिज चयापचय ( ऐसे as विटामिन d ) , or regulators  of cell and tissue growth and differentiation ( such as some forms of vitamin A ) .
Others function as  antioxidants ( e.g. , विटामिन e और sometimes विटामिन  C ) .
The largest number of vitamins ( such as  b जटिल विटामिन ) फलन as precursors लिये एंजाइम cofactors , कि सहायता एंजाइमों in उनके कार्य as catalysts in  metabolism .
In  इस भूमिका , विटामिन may be tightly बंधी to एंजाइमों as भाग of prosthetic समूह  : For example , biotin is part of enzymes involved in making fatty acids .
Vitamins may also be less tightly  बंधी to एंजाइम catalysts as coenzymes , detachable अणुओं कि फलन to carry रासायनिक समूह or electrons  between molecules .
For example , folic acid may  carry मिथाइल , formyl , और methylene समूह  in the cell .
Although these roles in assisting  enzyme-substrate प्रतिक्रियाएँ हैं विटामिन ' best-known फलन , the अन्य विटामिन कृत्यों  are equally important .
Until the mid-1930s , when the first commercial yeast-extract  विटामिन b जटिल और semi-synthetic विटामिन c संपूरक टैबलेट यहूद बेची , विटामिन यहूद प्राप्त solely through खाना सेवन , और परिवर्तन in आहार ( जिससे , लिये उदाहरण , could occur दौरान a particular  growing season ) usually greatly altered the types and amounts of vitamins ingested .
However , vitamins have been produced as commodity chemicals and made widely available as  inexpensive semisynthetic और synthetic-source multivitamin dietary और खाना पूरक और एडिटिव , चूंकि the मध्य of  the 20th century .
World Muslim  जनसांख्यिकी by प्रतिशत ( pew शोध  Center , 2009 )
संसार मुस्लिम जनसांख्यिकी  in millions
Islam is the world 's  दूसरी largest धर्म बाद christianity  .
According to a 2010 study , Islam has  1.62 अरब adherents , बनाना up over 23 % of the संसार जनसांख्यिकी  .
Islam is the predominant religion in the Middle East , in Sahel ,  in the सींग of अफ़्रीकी और उत्तरी अफ़्रीकी , और in कुछ भाग of एशिया  .
Large communities  of मुसलमान हैं भी मिला in चीन , the  Balkans , and Russia .
Other parts of the world host large Muslim immigrant communities ; in Western Europe , for instance ,  islam is the दूसरी largest धर्म बाद christianity , जहाँ it represents  6 % of the total population .
according to the pew शोध बीच in 2010 वहीँ  were 49 Muslim-majority countries .
Around 62 % of the world 's Muslims  सजीव in दक्षिण और southeast एशिया ,  with over 1 billion adherents .
The largest Muslim country is Indonesia , home to 12.7 % of the world 's Muslims  , followed by पाकिस्तानी ( 11.0 % ) , इण्डिया ( 10.9 % ) , और बांग्लादेश ( 9.2 %  ) .
About 20 %  of मुसलमान सजीव in अरब देशों  .
In the Middle East , the  non-arab देशों of तुर्कों और इरान हैं the largest muslim-majority देशों ; in अफ़्रीकी , मिश्र और सीरियल have the  most populous Muslim communities .
A study conducted  by the pew शोध बीच in 2010 और released जनवरी 2011  found that there are 1.62 billion Muslims around the world .
The study found more Muslims in the United  किंगडम than in लेबनान और अधिक in चीन  than in Syria .
Rhode Island ( or ) , officially the State of Rhode Island and  विधाता बागानों , is a राज्य in the नई इंग्लैण्ड प्रदेश of the संयुक्त राज्य  .
Rhode Island is  the smallest in क्षेत्रफल , the आठवीं तनिक populous , लकिन the दूसरी  most densely populated of the 50 US states behind New Jersey .
Rhode  द्वीप is bordered by कनेक्टिकट to the वेस्ट और मैसाचुसेट्स to the उत्तर  and east , and it shares a water boundary with New York 's Long Island to the southwest .
Rhode Island was the first of the  13 असली colonies to घोषित स्वतंत्रता इससे अंग्रेजों नियम , declaring itself स्वतंत्र on may 4 , 1776 , दो महीने पहले  any other colony .
The State was also the last of  the तेरह असली colonies to ratify the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान  .
Rhode Island 's official  उपनाम is `` the समंदर राज्य '' , a सन्दर्भ to the राज्य 's भूगोल , चूंकि rhode  Island has several large bays and inlets that amount to about 14 % of its total area .
Its land  क्षेत्रफल is , लकिन इसके कुल क्षेत्रफल is significantly  larger .
Dubai ( ; ' , ) is a city in  the संयुक्त अरब अमीरात , स्तिथ भीतर the  emirate of the same name .
The emirate of Dubai is located on the  southeast coast of the पारसी गल्फ on the arabian प्रायद्वीप और is एक of the सात अमीरात  that make up the country .
It has  the largest जनसांख्यिकी in the uae ( 2,106,177 )  and the second-largest land territory by area ( 4,114 km2 ) after Abu Dhabi .
Dubai and Abu Dhabi , the national capital  , हैं the तभी दो अमीरात to have वीटो शक्ति over नाजुक matters of नेशनल महत्व in the देश 's विधानमंडल  .
The city of Dubai is located on the emirate  's उत्तरी तटरेखा और heads up the dubai-sharjah-ajman महानगर  area .
Dubai is nowadays often  misperceived as a देश or city-state और , in कुछ मामले , the uae as a पूरे रै  been described as 'Dubai ' .
The earliest mention of Dubai  is in 1095 ad , और the earliest अंकित उपनिवेश in the प्रदेश तिथियाँ  from 1799 .
The  sheikhdom of दुबई थी formally स्थापित in 1833 by शेख़ maktoum बिन butti al-maktoum जब he persuaded around 800 सदस्यों of उसके जनजाति of the bani yas , जीना in  what was then the Second Saudi State and now part of Saudi Arabia , to follow him to the Dubai Creek by the Abu Falasa clan of the Bani Yas .
It  remained अंतर्गत the जनजाति 's कंट्रोल जब the संयुक्त किंगडम assumed सुरक्षा of  the Sheikhdom in 1892 and joined the nascent United Arab Emirates upon independence in 1971 as the country 's second emirate .
Its strategic geographic location made the town an  महत्वपूर्ण व्यापार हब और by the शुरूआत of the 20th सदी , दुबई थी already  an important regional port .
Today , Dubai has emerged as a cosmopolitan metropolis that has grown steadily  to become a वैश्विक नगर और a कारोबार और सांस्कृतिक हब of the मध्य ईस्ट और the पारसी गल्फ प्रदेश  .
Although Dubai 's economy was historically built on the oil industry , the emirate 's  western-style मॉडल of कारोबार ड्राइव इसके अर्थव्यवस्था साथ the प्रमुख revenues अभी coming इससे पर्यटन , रियल एस्टेट , और वित्तीय सेवाएं  .
दुबई रै recently आकर्षित संसार ध्यान through अनेक अभिनव विशाल  construction projects and sports events .
The city has become symbolic for its skyscrapers  और high-rise इमारतें , ऐसे as the संसार 's tallest burj खलीफा , in जोड to महत्वाकांक्षी विकास प्रोजेक्ट सहित man-made आइलैंड्स , होटल , और  some of the largest shopping malls in the region and the world .
This  increased ध्यान रै भी highlighted मजदूर और इंसान अधिकारों मुद्दे concerning the नगर 's largely  South Asian paid workforce .
Dubai 's property market experienced a major  deterioration in 2008–2009 as a परिणाम of the विश्वव्यापी आर्थिक downturn following the वित्तीय  crisis of 2007-2008 .
However , Dubai  रै बना a स्थिर और क्रमिक रिकवरी साथ सहायता  coming from neighboring emirates .
The handful of new projects that are in  the पाइपलाइन have महरूम समर्थ to सहायता दुबई रियल एस्टेट मेक a  comeback .
As of 2012  , दुबई is the 22nd सबसे महंगी नगर in the संसार , और the सबसे महंगी  city in the Middle East , surpassing Israel 's Tel Aviv ( 31st ) .
Dubai has also been rated as one of the best places to live  in the मध्य ईस्ट , सहित by us अमरीकी वैश्विक परामर्श कड़ मर्सर जो रेटेड the नगर as the बेहतरीन प्लेस to सजीव in the मध्य  East in 2011 .
The following  is a सूची of कॉलेजों और विश्वविद्यालयों  in the U.S. state of Illinois .
Surface of the Atlantic  समंदर बैठक the धरती 's ग्रहीय boundary परत और क्षोभमण्डल  .
लहरें on an समंदर  coast .
This animation uses Earth science data from a variety  of सेंसर on नासा धरती observing satellites to माप शारीरिक oceanography पैरामीटर्स ऐसे as  ocean currents , ocean winds , sea surface height and sea surface temperature .
An ocean ( ; the  संसार समंदर of शास्त्रीय प्राचीनता ) is a देह of saline जल कि  composes a large part of a planet 's hydrosphere .
In the  कॉन्टेक्स्ट of धरती , it refers to एक or सब of the प्रमुख विभाजन of the ग्रह 's संसार समंदर – वे हैं , in descending अनुक्रम of क्षेत्रफल , the प्रशांत  , Atlantic , Indian , Southern ( Antarctic ) , and Arctic Oceans .
The  शब्द `` समुद्र `` is प्रायः प्रयुक्त interchangeably साथ `` समंदर '' , लकिन सख्ती बोलना  a sea is a body of saline water ( possibly a division of the World Ocean ) partly or fully enclosed by land .
Earth is the only planet known to have  an समंदर ( or कोई विशाल amounts of खोलें द्रव जल )  .
Approximately 72 % of the planet 's surface ( ~3.6x108 km2 ) is  covered by saline जल कि is customarily विभाजित into अनेक प्रिंसिपल महासागर और छोटी समंदर , साथ the समंदर covering लगभग 71 % of  the Earth 's surface .
In terms of the hydrosphere of the  धरती , the समंदर contains 97 % of the धरती 's  water .
Oceanographers have stated that out of 97  % , तभी 5 % of the समंदर as a पूरे on धरती  has been explored .
Because it is the principal  घटक of धरती 's जलमंडल , the संसार समंदर is अभिन्न to सब ज्ञात जीवन , फ़ॉर्म भाग of the कार्बन  cycle , and influences climate and weather patterns .
The total volume  is लगभग 1.3 अरब घन किलोमीटर ( 310  million cu mi ) with an average depth of .
it is the आवास of 230,000 ज्ञात प्रजाति , हालांकि much of the समंदर 's गहराइयों remain unexplored  and it is estimated that over two million marine species exist .
The origin of Earth 's oceans is still unknown , but oceans are believed  to have formed in the hadean काल और may have महरूम the impetus लिये the emergence of जीवन  .
Extraterrestrial oceans may  be रचित of a चौड़ी दायरा of तत्व और यौगिकों  .
The only confirmed large stable bodies of extraterrestrial surface liquids are the lakes of  टाइटन , हालांकि वहीँ is प्रमाण लिये the अस्तित्व of महासागर elsewhere in the  Solar System .
Early in their geologic histories , Mars and  शुक्र हैं theorized to have था विशाल जल  oceans .
The Mars  समंदर परिकल्पना suggests कि nearly a तीसरा of the सतह of मंगल थी एकबार covered by जल , हालांकि  the water on Mars is no longer oceanic , and a runaway greenhouse effect may have boiled away the global ocean of Venus .
Compounds such as salts and ammonia dissolved in water lower its  जमने पाइंट , so कि जल might मौजूद in विशाल quantities in extraterrestrial environments as brine  or convecting ice .
अपुष्ट महासागर हैं speculated beneath the सतह of अनेक बौना ग्रह और प्राकृतिक satellites ; notably , the  ocean of Europa is believed to have over twice the water volume of Earth .
The Solar System 's gas giant planets are also believed to possess  द्रव वायुमंडलीय परतों of yet to be पुष्टि रचनाएं  .
Oceans may also exist on exoplanets  और exomoons , सहित सतह महासागर of द्रव जल भीतर a परितारकीय  habitable zone .
Ocean planets are a  काल्पनिक प्रकार of ग्रह साथ a सतह completely covered  with liquid .
Elvis Aaron Presley ( January 8 , 1935 –  अगस्त 16 , 1977 ) थी an अमरीकी सिंगर और कर्ता  .
A  सांस्कृतिक प्रतीक , he is commonly ज्ञात by  the single name Elvis .
One of the most popular musicians of the 20th  सदी , he is प्रायः referred to as the `` किंग of चट्टान और फेंकें ''  or `` the King '' .
Born in Tupelo , Mississippi ,  प्रेस्ली स्थानांतरित to मेम्फिस , टेनेसी , साथ उसके परिवार  at the age of 13 .
He began his career there in 1954 , working with Sun Records owner Sam Phillips , who wanted to  लाओ the ध्वनि of african-american म्यूज़िक to  a wider audience .
Accompanied by guitarist Scotty Moore and  bassist विधेयक ब्लैक , प्रेस्ली थी the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण popularizer of rockabilly , an uptempo  , backbeat -driven fusion of country and rhythm and blues .
RCA Victor acquired  उसके अनुबंध in a सौदे arranged by कर्नल tom पार्कर , जो गई on to मैनेज the सिंगर लिये over दो दशकों  .
Presley 's  पहला आरसीए सिंगल , `` heartbreak होटल `` , released  in January 1956 , was a number-one hit .
He became the  अग्रणी फिगर of the newly लोकप्रिय ध्वनि of चट्टान और फेंकें  with a series of network television appearances and chart-topping records .
His energized interpretations of songs , many from African-American sources , and his  uninhibited प्रदर्शन स्टाइल बना उसे enormously popular—and विवादास्पद  .
In  नवम्बर 1956 , he बना उसके फिल्मी डेब्यू  in Love Me Tender .
Drafted into military service in 1958 ,  प्रेस्ली relaunched उसके रिकॉर्डिंग करियर दो सालो बाद साथ कुछ of उसके सबसे commercially कामयाब  work .
He staged few concerts however , and guided by Parker , proceeded to  devote much of the 1960s to बनाना हॉलीवुड फिल्मों और साउंडट्रैक एल्बम , सबसे of उन्हें critically derided  .
In  1968 , बाद सात सालो दूर इससे the स्टेज , he लौटे to सजीव प्रदर्शन in a मनाये वापसी  television special that led to an extended Las Vegas concert residency and a string of profitable tours .
In 1973  प्रेस्ली मंचन the पहला कॉन्सर्ट ब्रॉडकास्ट globally via उपग्रह  , Aloha from Hawaii .
Prescription drug abuse  severely deteriorated उसके स्वास्थ्य , और he died एकाएक in 1977 at the आयु  of 42 .
Presley is regarded as one of the  सबसे महत्वपूर्ण आंकड़े of 20th-century लोकप्रिय संस्कृति  .
He had a versatile voice and  unusually चौड़ी कामयाबी encompassing अनेक जाति , सहित देश , पॉप ballads , इन्जील , और ब्लूज़  .
He is the best-selling solo  कलाकार in the इतिहास of लोकप्रिय  music .
Nominated for 14  प्रतिस्पर्धी grammys , he जीती तीन , और प्राप्त the ग्रैमी आजीवन उपलब्धि  Award at age 36 .
He has  महरूम inducted into अनेक म्यूज़िक हॉल  of fame .
A  कांच of रूट बियर साथ  foam
Root beer is a carbonated , sweetened beverage , originally made  using the रूट of a sassafras संयंत्र ( or the छाल of a sassafras पेड़ ) as the प्राथमिक स्वाद  .
Root beer , popularized in  उत्तर अमेरिका , आता in दो फ़ॉर्म : alcoholic  and soft drink .
The historical root beer was  analogous to छोटी बियर in कि the प्रक्रम provided a पेय  with a very low alcohol content .
हालांकि जड़ें हैं प्रयुक्त as the सोर्स of अनेक नरम  drinks throughout the world , often different names are used .
Fluorescent minerals  emit दृश्य लाइट जब उजागर to पराबैंगनी लाइट
प्रतिदीप्ति is the उत्सर्जन of लाइट by a पदार्थ कि रै अवशोषित  light or other electromagnetic radiation .
It  is a रूप of  luminescence .
In most cases , the emitted light has a longer  wavelength , और इसलिए निम्नतर उर्जा , than the अवशोषित विकिरण  .
However , when the absorbed electromagnetic radiation is intense , it is possible  लिये एक इलेक्ट्रॉन to अवशोषित दो photons ; इस two-photon अवशोषण can सीसे to उत्सर्जन of विकिरण having a shorter wavelength than the  absorbed radiation .
The emitted radiation may also be of the  वही wavelength as the अवशोषित विकिरण , termed `` अनुनाद  fluorescence '' .
The most striking examples of fluorescence occur  जब the अवशोषित विकिरण is in the पराबैंगनी प्रदेश of the वर्णक्रम , और यूँ अदृश्य to the  human eye , and the emitted light is in the visible region .
Fluorescence has many practical applications , including mineralogy , gemology , chemical  सेंसर ( प्रतिदीप्ति स्पेक्ट्रमिकी ) , fluorescent लेबलिंग , dyes , biological डिटेक्टरों , और , सबसे commonly , fluorescent  lamps .
Informal logic , intuitively ,  refers to the सिद्धान्त of लॉजिक और लॉजिकल विचार बाहर of  a formal setting .
however , शायद क्युकी of the अनौपचारिक in the शीर्षक , the  precise definition of informal logic is a matter of some dispute .
Ralph H. Johnson and J. Anthony Blair define informal logic as `` a branch of logic whose task is to develop non-formal standards ,  मापदण्ड , प्रक्रियाओं लिये the विश्लेषण , निर्वचन , मूल्यांकन ,  criticism and construction of argumentation . ''
This definition reflects what had been implicit in their  अभ्यास और कया अन्य यहूद doing in उनके अनौपचारिक लॉजिक ग्रन्थ .
Informal logic is associated with ( informal ) fallacies , critical thinking , the  सोच कौशल गति और the interdisciplinary पूछताछ ज्ञात as argumentation  theory .
Frans H. van Eemeren writes that the label `` informal logic '' covers a `` collection of normative  approaches to the पढ़ाई of तर्क in ordinary भाषा कि remain करीब to the अभ्यास of argumentation than औपचारिक  logic . ''
USA annual real GDP 1910–60 , with the years of  the ग्रेट अवसाद ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted  .
Unemployment rate in the  us 1910–1960 , साथ the सालो of the ग्रेट अवसाद  ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted .
The Great Depression began in August of 1929 ,  जब the संयुक्त राज्य अर्थव्यवस्था पहला गई into an आर्थिक मंदी  .
हालांकि the देश खर्च दो महीने साथ घटती जीडीपी , it थी नहीं जबतक the वॉल गली क्रैश of अक्तूबर  , 1929 that the effects of a declining economy were felt , and a major worldwide economic downturn ensued .
the मार्केट क्रैश चिह्नित the शुरूआत of a दशक of ऊँची बेरोजगारी  , poverty , low profits , deflation , plunging farm incomes , and lost opportunities for economic growth and personal advancement .
Although its causes are still uncertain and controversial , the net  प्रभाव थी a अचानक और सामान्य घाटा of विश्वास in the आर्थिक भविष्य  .
The usual explanations include numerous factors , especially high consumer debt , ill-regulated markets  कि permitted overoptimistic लोन by बैंको और निवेशकों , और the कमी of high-growth नई उद्योग , सब interacting to बनाएँ a downward आर्थिक सर्पिल of घटाया बिता , गिरना विश्वास , और lowered  production .
Industries that suffered the  सबसे शामिल निर्माण , कृषि as dust-bowl शर्तें persisted in the agricultural heartland , शिपिंग , खनन , और लॉगिंग as खूब as टिकाऊ goods जैसे ऑटोमोबाइल  and appliances that could be postponed .
The economy reached bottom in the winter of  1932–33 ; तब आए चार सालो of बहुत रैपिड विकास जबतक 1937 , जब the मंदी of 1937 brought  back 1934 levels of unemployment .
The  अवसाद caused प्रमुख  political changes in America .
Three years into the  अवसाद , हर्बर्ट हूवर खोया the 1932 अध्यक्षीय चुनाव  to Franklin Delano Roosevelt in a sweeping landslide .
Roosevelt 's economic recovery plan , the New Deal , instituted  unprecedented कार्यक्रम लिये राहत , रिकवरी और सुधार , और brought परिचय a प्रमुख realignment of अमरीकी  politics .
The  अवसाद भी resulted in an बढ़ाएँ of करणों of लोगों to अन्य देशों  for the first time in American history .
For example , some immigrants went back to their  देशी देशों , और कुछ देशी us नागरिकों गई to कनाडा , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , और दक्षिण  Africa .
It also resulted in  the द्रव्यमान माइग्रेशन of लोगों इससे badly hit क्षेत्रों in the ग्रेट मैदान और the दक्षिण to स्थान ऐसे as कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the उत्तर , क्रमशः ( देखिए  Okies and the Great Migration of African Americans ) .
Racial  तनाव भी increased दौरान  this time .
by the 1940s आव्रजन था लौटे  back to normal , and emigration declined .
A well-known  उदाहरण of an emigrant थी फ़्रैंक mccourt , जो गई to  Ireland , as recounted in his book Angela 's Ashes .
The memory of the Depression also shaped modern  theories of अर्थशास्त्र और resulted in अनेक परिवर्तन in कैसा the सरकारी dealt साथ आर्थिक downturns , ऐसे as the उपयोग of stimulus पैकेज  , Keynesian economics , and Social Security .
It also shaped modern American literature ,  resulting in प्रसिद्ध novels ऐसे as जॉन steinbeck 's `` the अंगूर of प्रकोप `` और ``  Of Mice and Men `` .
The Great  अवसाद of the 1930s प्रारंभ साथ the भण्डार मार्केट  crash of October 1929 .
तुर्कों ( ) , officially the गणतंत्र of तुर्कों , is a transcontinental देश , स्तिथ ज़्यादातर  on Anatolia in Western Asia and on East Thrace in Southeastern Europe .
Turkey is bordered by eight countries : Bulgaria to  the उत्तरपश्चिम ; यूनानियों to the वेस्ट ; जॉर्जिया to the पूर्वोत्तर ; अर्मेनिया , इरान और the अज़रबैजानी exclave  of Nakhchivan to the east ; and Iraq and Syria to the southeast .
The  भूमध्यसागरीय समुद्र is to the दक्षिण ; the ईजियन समुद्र is to the वेस्ट  ; and the Black Sea is to the north .
The Sea of Marmara , the Bosphorus and the  dardanelles ( जिससे साथ रूप the तुर्की straits ) demarcate the boundary between thrace और आनातोलिया ; वे भी पृथक  Europe and Asia .
Turkey 's  स्थान at the क्रॉसरोड्स of यूरोपीय और एशिया makes  it a country of significant geostrategic importance .
The country 's official language is Turkish , a Turkic  भाषा , जिससे is बोला by लगभग 85 % of the जनसांख्यिकी  as mother tongue .
The most numerous ethnic group is the Turks , who constitute between 70 % and 75 % of the  जनसांख्यिकी according to the संसार factbook  .
Kurds are the largest ethnic minority and , according to the same source  , क्रमांक around 18 % of the जनसांख्यिकी जबकि अन्य जातीय अल्पसंख्यकों हैं अनुमानित to be  at 7–12 % .
the विशाल बहुमत of the जनसांख्यिकी  is Muslim .
The area now called Turkey has  महरूम inhabited चूंकि the paleolithic , सहित विभिन्न प्राचीन आनातोलियाई सभ्यताओं  and Thracian peoples .
After  सिकंदर the ग्रेट 's conquest , the क्षेत्रफल थी hellenized , जिससे जारी साथ the रोमन नियम  and the transition into the Byzantine Empire .
The  सलजूक़ turks began migrating into the क्षेत्रफल in the 11th सदी , starting  the process of Turkification , which was greatly accelerated by the Seljuk victory over the Byzantines at the Battle of Manzikert in 1071 .
The Seljuk  सल्तनत of rûm शासित आनातोलिया जबतक the mongol आक्रमण in 1243 , upon जिससे it  disintegrated into several small Turkish beyliks .
Starting from the late 13th century , the Ottoman beylik united Anatolia and  निर्मित an साम्राज्य encompassing much of southeastern यूरोपीय , पश्चिमी एशिया और उत्तर  Africa .
बाद the उस्मानी साम्राज्य collapsed following इसके शिकस्त in संसार  War I , parts of it were occupied by the victorious Allies .
A cadre of young military officers , led by Mustafa Kemal Atatürk and his colleagues ,  व्यवस्थित a कामयाब प्रतिरोध to the allies ; in 1923 वे स्थापित the आधुनिक गणतंत्र of तुर्कों , साथ अतातुर्क  as its first president .
Turkey is a  लोकतांत्रिक , धर्मनिरपेक्ष , एकात्मक , संवैधानिक गणतंत्र  with a diverse cultural heritage .
Turkey has become increasingly integrated with the West through  सदस्यता in संगठनों ऐसे as the परिषद of यूरोपीय , नाटो , oecd , osce और the g-20 प्रमुख  economies .
Turkey began full membership negotiations with the European Union in 2005 , having been an associate  सदस्य of the यूरोपीय आर्थिक जातियाँ चूंकि 1963 और having joined the eu कस्टम संघ in 1995  .
Turkey has also fostered close cultural ,  राजनैतिक और आर्थिक संबंध साथ the मध्य ईस्ट , काकेशस , the turkic राज्य of सेंट्रल एशिया और the अफ़्रीकी देशों through सदस्यता in संगठनों ऐसे as the turkic  Council , Joint Administration of Turkic Arts and Culture , Organisation of Islamic Cooperation and the Economic Cooperation Organisation .
तुर्कों 's growing अर्थव्यवस्था और राजनयिक पहलों have  led to its recognition as a regional power .
Turkey is the  संसार 's 17th largest अर्थव्यवस्था by नाममात्र जीडीपी और the 16th largest  by purchasing power parity .
Caryn Elaine Johnson , best known as  whoopi गोल्डबर्ग ( , ( born नवम्बर 13 , 1955 ) is an अमरीकी comedienne , अभिनेत्री  , singer-songwriter , political activist , author and talk show host .
Goldberg made her film  डेब्यू in the रंग जामुनी ( 1985 ) , playing celie , a mistreated ब्लैक  woman in the Deep South .
She received a  नामांकन लिये the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री और जीती उसके पहला सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये उसके भूमिका  in the film .
In  1990 , वो निभाई oda mae भूरा , a wacky मानसिक helping a slain man (  Patrick Swayze ) save his lover ( Demi Moore ) in the blockbuster Ghost .
This performance won her a second Golden Globe and an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress ; this  बना गोल्डबर्ग तभी the दूसरी ब्लैक स्त्री in the इतिहास of the अकादमी पुरस्कार to जीत an एक्टिंग oscar—the पहला होने हैटी mcdaniel  who won for Gone With the Wind in 1939 .
notable बाद films शामिल सिस्टर अधिनियम और सिस्टर अधिनियम 2 , the खिलाड़ी , बना in अमेरिका  , How Stella Got Her Groove Back , Girl , Interrupted and Rat Race .
She is also acclaimed for her roles as the bartender  guinan in स्टार ट्रेक : the अगला पीढी , as टेरी doolittle in jumpin ' जोकर फ्लैश , और as कार्मेन tibideaux in ग्ली , as खूब as the  voice of Shenzi the hyena in The Lion King .
गोल्डबर्ग रै महरूम मनोनीत लिये  13 Emmy Awards for her work in television .
She was co-producer of the popular game show  हॉलीवुड वर्गों इससे 1998 to  2004 .
वो रै महरूम the मॉडरेटर of the दिन  talk show The View since 2007 .
Goldberg  रै a ग्रैमी , दो दिन emmys , दो सुनहरी ग्लोब्स ,  a Tony ( for production , not acting ) , and an Oscar .
In addition , Goldberg has a British Academy Film Award , four People 's Choice  पुरस्कार , और रै महरूम सम्मानित साथ a स्टार on the हॉलीवुड चलना of कीर्ति  .
She is one of the few  मनोरंजनकर्ता जो have जीती an एमी , ग्रैमी , ऑस्कर , और टोनी पुरस्कार  .
Augusta is a consolidated city in the U.S. state of Georgia , located at  the पतन लकीर of the savannah नदी , at the सिर of इसके navigable  portion .
As of the 2010 census ,  the augusta– रिचमंड काउंटी जनसांख्यिकी थी 195,844 नहीं गिनती the unconsolidated शहरों of hephzibah  and Blythe .
Augusta is the principal city of the Augusta – Richmond County Metropolitan  सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल , जिससे as of 2010 था an अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी of 556,877 , बनाना it दोनो the second-largest नगर और the second-largest  metro area in the state after Atlanta .
It is the 116th-largest  नगर in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
Internationally  , augusta is बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये होस्टिंग the  Masters Tournament in golf each spring .
A  cd-rom ( ) is a pre-pressed कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क  which contains data .
The name is an  एक्रोनिम जिससे स्टैंड लिये `` कॉम्पैक्ट डिस्क read-only  memory `` .
Computers  can पढ़ा cd-roms , लकिन can नहीं लिखें  on them .
cd-roms हैं popularly प्रयुक्त to वितरित कंप्यूटर तन्त्र , सहित वीडियो खेल और  multimedia applications , though any data can be stored ( up to the capacity limit of a disc ) .
Some CDs , called enhanced CDs , hold both  कंप्यूटर आंकड़ा और ऑडियो साथ the latter सक्षम of होने निभाई on a cd खिलाड़ी , जबकि आंकड़ा ( ऐसे as तन्त्र or डिजिटल वीडियो ) is तभी usable on a कंप्यूटर ( ऐसे  as ISO 9660 format PC CD-ROMs ) .
the पीला किताब is the तकनीकी मानक  that defines the format of CD-ROMs .
एक of a नियत of color-bound किताबे कि contain the तकनीकी विशेषताएँ लिये सब cd स्वरुप , the पीला किताब , निर्मित by सोनी  and Philips , was the first extension of Compact Disc Digital Audio .
It  adapted the स्वरूप to  hold any form of data .
The Chicago Blackhawks ( spelled as Black Hawks before 1986 , and  ज्ञात colloquially as the चीलों ) हैं a पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी  team based in Chicago , Illinois .
They are members of the Central  प्रभाग of the पश्चिमी सम्मेलन of the नेशनल हॉकी लीग (  NHL ) .
They have won  चार स्टेनली कप championships चूंकि उनके founding in 1926 , सबसे  recently in 2009–10 .
The Blackhawks are one of the Original Six NHL teams , along with the  डेट्रॉयट रेड विंग्स , मॉन्ट्रियल canadiens , टोरंटो मेपल leafs , बोस्टन bruins और नई  York Rangers .
Since the  ब्लैकहॉक्स have निभाई उनके घर खेल at the संयुक्त बीच बाद having खर्च 65 सालो playing  at Chicago Stadium .
Lent  याजकों carrying आउट a गली  procession during Holy Week .
The violet  रंग is प्रायः संबद्ध साथ penance  and detachment .
Similar  ईसाई penitential अभ्यास is देखी in अन्य कैथोलिक देशों , sometimes  associated with mortification of the flesh .
Granada  , निकारागुआ .
Lent ( Latin : Quadragesima ) is a solemn  observance in the liturgical साल of अनेक ईसाई denominations , स्थायी लिये a  period of approximately six weeks leading up to Easter Sunday .
In the general Latin-rite and  सबसे पश्चिमी denominations lent is लिया to चलाएं इससे राख बुधवार to maundy गुरुवार  ( Holy Thursday ) morning or to Easter Eve .
In the Catholic Church , Lent  lasts जबतक पावन गुरुवार , जबकि अन्य denominations चलाएं  until Easter Eve .
The traditional  purpose of lent is the तैयारी of the आस्तिक through दुआ , penance , तौबा , almsgiving  , and self-denial .
Its institutional purpose is heightened in the annual commemoration of Holy Week  , अंकन the मौत , दफ़न और क़यामत of यीशु , जिससे recalls the कार्यक्रम of the बाइबल जब यीशु is crucified on शुभ शुक्रवार , जिससे तब culminates in the जश्न on ईस्टर  Sunday of the Resurrection of Jesus Christ .
During Lent , many  of the वफादार कमिट to उपवास or giving up निश्चित  types of luxuries as a form of penitence .
The  स्टेशन of the क्रॉस , a devotional commemoration of मसीह 's carrying the क्रॉस और of उसके निष्पादन  , are often observed .
Many Roman Catholic and some Protestant  चर्च हटाएँ पुष्प इससे उनके altars , जबकि crucifixes , धार्मिक मूर्तियाँ , और  other elaborate religious symbols are often veiled in violet fabrics in solemn observance of the event .
In certain pious Catholic  देशों , कुछ adherents चिह्नित the ऋतु साथ the परंपरागत abstention  from the consumption of meat .
In some countries , grand religious processions and cultural  कस्टम हैं observed , और the वफादार attempt to विज़िट सात चर्च दौरान पावन सप्ताह in सम्मान of यीशु मसीह heading to माउंट  Calvary .
Lent is traditionally described as  स्थायी लिये चालीस दिनों , in commemoration of the चालीस दिनों जिससे , according to the gospels  of Matthew , Mark and Luke , Jesus spent fasting in the desert before the beginning of his public ministry , where he endured temptation by the Devil .
However ,  अलग ईसाई denominations गणना the चालीस दिनों of lent differently  .
In most Western traditions the Sundays are not counted as part of  lent ; यूँ the काल इससे राख बुधवार जबतक ईस्टर consists of 40 दिनों जब the  Sundays are excluded .
however in the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर lent is अभी लिया to समाप्त on पावन गुरुवार बल्कि than ईस्टर संध्या , और hence  lasts 38 days excluding Sundays , or 44 days in total .
This event , along with  इसके परहेज़गारों कस्टम हैं observed by catholics , lutherans , methodists  , Presbyterians , and Anglicans .
स्थान of chernobyl नाभिकीय शक्ति  plant
The abandoned  नगर of pripyat साथ chernobyl संयंत्र in the  distance
abandoned आवास  blocks in Pripyat
The Chernobyl disaster ( , Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a catastrophic nuclear accident that occurred on  26 अप्रैल 1986 at the chernobyl नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in युक्त ( तब officially the यूक्रेनी ssr ) , जिससे थी अंतर्गत the सीधा क्षेत्राधिकार of the सेंट्रल अधिकारियों of the  Soviet Union .
An explosion and fire released  विशाल quantities of रेडियोसक्रिय अणु into the माहौल , जिससे स्प्रेड  over much of the western USSR and Europe .
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst nuclear power plant  दुर्घटना in इतिहास , और is एक of तभी दो वर्गीकृत as a स्तर 7 इवेंट on the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नाभिकीय इवेंट स्केल ( the अन्य होने  the Fukushima Daiichi nuclear disaster in 2011 ) .
The battle to contain the contamination and avert a greater  प्रलय ultimately शामिल over 500,000 मजदूर और लागत an अनुमानित 18 अरब  rubles .
The official Soviet casualty count of 31  मौतों रै महरूम विवादित , और long-term प्रभाव ऐसे as cancers और deformities हैं स्टिल होने accounted लिये  .
In grammar , a subject complement is a  predicative अभिव्यक्ति कि फ़ॉलो a linking क्रिया ( copula ) और कि complements ( completes  ) the subject of the sentence by either ( 1 ) renaming it or ( 2 ) describing it .
in the पूर्व मामला , a renaming संज्ञा phrase ऐसे as a संज्ञा or सर्वनाम is  called a predicative nominal .
An adjective  following the copula और describing the विषय  is called a predicative adjective .
In either case the predicative  पूरक in प्रभाव mirrors the विषय  .
Subject complements are  प्रयुक्त साथ a छोटी क्लास of क्रियाएँ पुकारा linking क्रियाएँ or copula  , of which be is the most common .
Since copula  हैं stative क्रियाएँ , विषय complements हैं  not affected by any action of the verb .
Subject complements are typically  नहीं clause वितर्क , nor हैं वे clause  adjuncts .
Throughout the  fifty-five साल इतिहास of the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , अनेक  significant records have been set .
इस पेज तभी शामिल the प्रतिस्पर्धी पुरस्कार  won by various artists .
This does not include the various special awards that are presented by the National  अकादमी of रिकॉर्डिंग कला और sciences ऐसे as आजीवन उपलब्धि पुरस्कार , trustees पुरस्कार ,  Technical Awards or Legend Awards .
The page however does include other non-performance related Grammys ( known as the  शिल्प & उत्पादन फ़ील्ड ) कि may have महरूम प्रस्तुत to  the artist ( s ) .
Marshall Bruce  mathers iii ( born अक्तूबर 17 , 1972 ) , बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम एमिनेम ( stylized as eminǝm  ) and by his alter ego Slim Shady , is an American rapper , record producer , songwriter and actor .
Eminem , along with his solo career , is a member of his group  d12 , और भी एक हाफ of the हिप हॉप duo ख़राब meets दुष्ट , साथ रॉयस  da 5'9 '' .
Eminem is  एक of the best-selling कलाकारों in the संसार और is the best-selling  artist of the 2000s .
He has been listed and ranked as one of the  महानतम कलाकारों of सब समय by अनेक मैगज़ीन , सहित रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका जिससे क्रमित  him 82nd on its list of The 100 Greatest Artists of All Time .
The  वही पत्रिका घोषित उसे the किंग  of Hip Hop .
Including his work with D12 and Bad Meets Evil ,  एमिनेम रै हासिल टेन number-one एल्बम on  the Billboard 200 .
He has sold more than 100 million records  विश्वव्यापी , सहित 42 लाख ट्रैक्स और 49.1 लाख एल्बम  in the United States .
As an  भूमिगत rapper एमिनेम released उसके डेब्यू  solo album , Infinite in 1996 .
The  एल्बम थी a नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक  failure .
He gained mainstream popularity in 1999  बाद the रिलीज of उसके major-label डेब्यू एल्बम the पतला  Shady LP .
the lp भी अर्जित एमिनेम उसके पहला  Grammy Award for Best Rap Album .
His next two records The Marshall Mathers LP , and The Eminem Show , also won Best Rap  एल्बम ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , बनाना एमिनेम the पहला कलाकार to जीत बेहतरीन रैप एल्बम लिये तीन लगातार एलपी  .
इस थी followed by another स्टुडियो रिलीज  in 2004 titled Encore .
Eminem  तब गई on अंतराल बाद touring in  2005 .
He released his first album in five  सालो titled पतन , on may 15 ,  2009 .
In 2010 , Eminem released his  सातवाँ स्टुडियो एल्बम रिकवरी  .
Recovery was an  अंतरराष्ट्रीय कामयाबी और थी नामित the बेहतरीन selling एल्बम of 2010 विश्वव्यापी , joining  The Eminem Show , which was the best seller of 2002 .
Eminem won Grammy  पुरस्कार लिये दोनो पतन और रिकवरी , giving  him a total of 13 Grammys in his career .
Eminem has opened other  ventures , सहित उसके अपना रिकार्ड लेबल छायादार रिकॉर्ड  with his manager Paul Rosenberg .
He also  रै उसके अपना रेडियो चैनल , शेड 45 on sirius  XM Radio .
Eminem began an acting  करियर in 2002 , जब he स्ट्रक्चर in the हिप हॉप  drama film 8 Mile .
He won the  अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन असली सोंग , बनने the पहला  rap artist ever to win the award .
He has also made  कैमियो दिखावे in the धो ( 2001 ) , मजेदार लोगों ( 2009  ) and the television series Entourage .
The acre is a unit of  क्षेत्रफल प्रयुक्त in the इम्पीरियल और u.S. प्रथागत  systems .
An  एकड़ is परिचय 40 % of a हेक्टेयर – थोड़ा  smaller than an American football field .
The acre is no longer commonly used , although a few notable exceptions  शामिल the संयुक्त राज्य , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , बर्मा और the संयुक्त किंगडम ( as of 2010 , the एकड़ is no longer officially प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त किंगडम , हालांकि is स्टिल प्रयुक्त in  real estate descriptions ) .
it is स्टिल प्रयुक्त , to  some extent , in Canada .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतीक of the एकड़ is ac , और is पारिभाषित as 1/640  of a square mile .
The most commonly used acre today  is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़  .
in the संयुक्त राज्य दोनो the अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ और the  slightly different US survey acre are in use .
The most common  उपयोग of the एकड़ is to माप  tracts of land .
One  अंतरराष्ट्रीय एकड़ is पारिभाषित as 4046.8564224  square metres .
During the Middle  आयु , an एकड़ थी the राशि of जमीन कि could be plowed in एक दिन साथ  a yoke of oxen .
Antoine Lavoisier 's discovery of  the विधि of संरक्षण of द्रव्यमान led to अनेक नई निष्कर्षों in the 19th  century .
Joseph Proust 's law of  definite proportions और जॉन डाल्टन 's परमाणु सिद्धान्त branched इससे the discoveries  of Antoine Lavoisier .
लाव्वाज़्ये 's quantitative प्रयोग नाज़िल कि दहन शामिल ऑक्सीजन बल्कि than कया थी previously  thought to be phlogiston .
The law of conservation of mass , or principle of mass conservation , states that for any system closed to all transfers of matter and  उर्जा ( दोनो of जिससे have द्रव्यमान ) , the द्रव्यमान of the प्रणाली जरूर remain निरंतर over समय , as प्रणाली द्रव्यमान can नहीं बदलें मात्रा if it is नहीं  added or removed .
Hence , the quantity of  द्रव्यमान is `` conserved '' over समय  .
The law implies that mass can neither be created nor destroyed , although  it may be rearranged in स्पेस , or the entities संबद्ध साथ it may be बदला in रूप , as लिये उदाहरण जब लाइट or शारीरिक  work is transformed into particles that contribute the same mass to the system as the light or work had contributed .
The law  implies ( requires ) कि दौरान कोई रासायनिक प्रतिक्रिया , नाभिकीय प्रतिक्रिया , or रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय in an पृथक प्रणाली , the द्रव्यमान of the reactants  or starting material must equal the mass of the products .
The  अवधारणा of द्रव्यमान संरक्षण is widely प्रयुक्त in अनेक फ़ील्ड ऐसे as रसायन ,  mechanics , and fluid dynamics .
Historically , mass conservation was discovered in  रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ by एंटोनी लाव्वाज़्ये in the लेट 18th सदी , और थी of निर्णायक महत्व in the प्रगति इससे alchemy to the आधुनिक प्राकृतिक विज्ञान  of chemistry .
The closely related concept of matter conservation was found to hold good in chemistry to  ऐसे ऊँची सन्निकटन कि it विफल तभी लिये the ऊँची energies treated by the बाद refinements of आपेक्षिकता सिद्धान्त , लकिन वरना remains उपयोगी और fear सटीक लिये सबसे रासायनिक calculations  , even in modern practice .
In special relativity , needed for accuracy when large energy transfers between systems is involved , the difference between thermodynamically closed and isolated systems  becomes महत्वपूर्ण , चूंकि संरक्षण of द्रव्यमान is सख्ती और perfectly upheld तभी लिये so-called पृथक प्रणालियों , i.e . those completely पृथक इससे सब exchanges साथ  the environment .
In this circumstance , the mass-energy equivalence theorem states  कि द्रव्यमान संरक्षण is समतुल्य to कुल उर्जा संरक्षण , जिससे is the पहला विधि of ऊष्मागतिकी  .
By contrast , for a thermodynamically closed system ( i.e. , one which is  बंद to exchanges of पदार्थ , लकिन खोलें to exchanges of non-material उर्जा , ऐसे as ऊष्मा और कार्य , साथ the परिवेश ) द्रव्यमान  is ( usually ) only approximately conserved .
The input or output of non-material energy must change the mass of the system in relativity theory , although the change is usually small , since  अपेक्षाकृत विशाल amounts of ऐसे उर्जा ( by तुलना साथ ordinary अनुभव ) carry तभी a छोटी राशि of द्रव्यमान ( again by ordinary मानकों of  measurement ) .
In special relativity , mass is not converted to energy , since energy in all of its forms always retains  इसके समतुल्य राशि of द्रव्यमान throughout कोई परिवर्तन or translocation into , or  out of , a system .
However , certain types of matter (  a अलग अवधारणा ) may be परिवर्तित to उर्जा , so long as the द्रव्यमान of  the system is unchanged in the process .
However , if such  उर्जा is removed इससे प्रणालियों , वे जरूर खोना the द्रव्यमान कि  is associated with it .
In general relativity , mass ( and energy )  संरक्षण in expanding आयतन of स्पेस is a जटिल अवधारणा , विषय to अलग परिभाषाएं , और neither द्रव्यमान nor उर्जा is as सख्ती और बस conserved as is the मामला in खास आपेक्षिकता  and in Minkowski space .
For a discussion  , देखिए द्रव्यमान in सामान्य आपेक्षिकता  .
A pig is any of the animals in the genus  सस , भीतर the suidae परिवार of even-toed  ungulates .
सूअर शामिल the घरेलू सुअर ,  its ancestor the wild boar , and several other wild relatives .
Young and  छोटी सूअर हैं ज्ञात as  piglets .
Pigs are  omnivores और हैं अत्यधिक सोशल और बुद्धिमान  animals .
8-inch , -inch  , और -inch फ्लॉपी  disks
8-inch , -inch ( पूरा ऊँचाई  ) , and -inch drives
A 3.5-inch diskette 's `` floppy ''  चुम्बकीय सामग्री , removed इससे इसके आवास
A floppy disk , or diskette , is a disk storage  मीडियम रचित of a डिस्क of पतला और लचीली चुम्बकीय भंडार मीडियम , sealed in a आयताकार प्लास्टिक वाहक  lined with fabric that removes dust particles .
They are read and  लिखा by a फ्लॉपी डिस्क ड्राइव (  FDD ) .
Floppy disks , initially as media and later in and 3.5-inch ( 90 mm ) sizes , were a ubiquitous form of data  भंडार और एक्सचेंज इससे the mid-1970s खूब into the पहला दशक of the 21st सदी  .
By 2010 , computer motherboards were rarely manufactured  साथ फ्लॉपी ड्राइव support ; `` floppies could be प्रयुक्त as an बाह्य usb ड्राइव , लकिन `` , 8 `` , और non-standard ड्राइव could तभी  be handled by old equipment .
While floppy disk drives still have some limited uses , especially with legacy industrial computer equipment , they have been superseded by data  भंडार विधि साथ much वृहद क्षमता , ऐसे as usb फ्लैश ड्राइव , पोर्टेबल बाह्य मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव , ऑप्टिकल discs , मेमोरी  cards , and computer networks .
an एनिमेटेड आरेख  of a cutter
In baseball , a cutter , or cut fastball , is a type of fastball which breaks  थोड़ा toward the पिचर 's दस्ताने पक्ष as it पहुँच घर  plate .
This pitch is somewhere between a slider and a fastball , as it is  प्रायः thrown तेज़ than a स्लाइडर लकिन साथ अधिक गति than a ठेठ fastball  .
कुछ pitchers उपयोग a कटर as a रास्ता  to prevent hitters from expecting their regular fastballs .
A common technique used to throw a cutter is to use a four-seam  fastball पकड़ साथ the बेसबॉल नियत थोड़ा बंद बीच in the हाथ  .
When a batter is able to hit a  कटर पिच , it प्रायः परिणाम in नरम सम्पर्क और an आसान आउट , due to the पिच 's गति keeping the बॉल दूर  from the bat 's sweet spot .
the कटर is typically 2–5 किमी धीमा  than a pitcher 's four-seam fastball .
In 2010 , the  औसत पिच वर्गीकृत as a कटर by pitchf/x thrown by a right-handed  pitcher was 88.6 mph ; the average four-seamer was 92.1 mph .
``  कया it takes '' is a शक्ति ballad by अमरीकी मुश्किल चट्टान बैंड  Aerosmith .
It was written by Steven  टायलर , जो पेरी , और डेसमंड चाइल्ड  .
It was released in 1990 as the third  सिंगल इससे एरोस्मिथ 's critically और commercially कामयाब 1989 एल्बम  Pump .
In the video The  बनाना of पंप , a & r man जॉन kalodner वर्णित the सोंग  as `` a masterpiece '' .
During live performances , Tyler sings  the पहला श्लोक a cappella और बेल्ट आउट एक of उसके हस्ताक्षर चिल्लाती  right before the chorus .
The album  संस्करण of the सोंग is followed by an बेनाम छुपा  track .
Head of  odysseus इससे a यूनानी 2nd सदी bc संगमरमर समूह representing odysseus blinding polyphemus , मिला at the विला of  Tiberius at Sperlonga
Detail  of an प्राचीन रोमन मोज़ेक of ulysses  in Tunisia
Odysseus ( or ; Greek : , ) , also known by the  रोमन नाम ulysses ( ; ) , थी a legendary यूनानी किंग of ithaca और a नायिका of होमर  's epic poem the Odyssey .
odysseus भी plays a कुंजी भूमिका in होमर 's इलियड और अन्य works  in that same Epic Cycle .
Husband of Penelope , father  of telemachus , और बेटे of laërtes ( or sisyphus ) और anticlea , odysseus is प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके brilliance ,  guile , and versatility ( polytropos ) , and is hence known by the epithet Odysseus the Cunning ( mētis , or `` cunning intelligence `` ) .
He is  सबसे प्रसिद्ध लिये the टेन eventful सालो he took to वापसी घर बाद  the decade-long Trojan War and his famous Trojan Horse ploy to capture the city of Troy .
Erie is  a statutory कस्बा in बोल्डर और वेल्ड काउंटी in the u.S.  state of Colorado .
The population according to the 2010 census is  18,135 और थी अंकित as 6,291 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी  .
The Town of Erie is located just west of I-25 for easy  अभिगम to i-70 , डेनवर अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र और कोलोराडो 's संपूर्ण  Front Range .
Erie 's Planning Area spans 48 square miles , extending from  the उत्तर पक्ष of राज्य राजमार्ग 52 दक्षिण to राज्य राजमार्ग 7 , और between us 287 on the वेस्ट और अंतरराज्यीय  25 to the east .
Erie is approximately 35 minutes from Denver  अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र , 25 मिनट्स to डेनवर और 20 मिनट्स  from Boulder .
The Board of Trustees serves as the legislative and governing body  of the कस्बा of erie और is जिम्मेदार लिये establishing कस्बा नीतियों और लक्ष्य  .
The Board has the  प्राधिकार to अपनाना कानून , ordinances और रिज़ॉल्यूशन as needed to conduct the कारोबार of the कस्बा , और by अध्यादेश  may enter into contracts or intergovernmental agreements to furnish , receive services or to provide for cooperative service delivery .
Appointed by and serving at the pleasure of the Board of Trustees , the Town Administrator is the chief operating and  प्रशासनिक अधिकारी of the कस्बा और is जिम्मेदार लिये providing पेशेवर नेतृत्व in the प्रशासन और निष्पादन of नीतियों और उद्देश्य  formulated by the Board .
The mission of the Erie Police Department is to communicate and  कार्य साथ the जातियाँ to maintain a सुरक्षित पर्यावरण , prevent अपराधों और enforce  the law , while protecting the rights of all .
Erie Municipal Airport (  eik ) is स्वामित्व और संचालित by the कस्बा of erie और is रणनीतिक स्तिथ in  the Denver-Boulder metropolitan area on Colorado Highway 7 , a little over three miles west of Interstate 25 .
The main runway is concrete  प्रशस्त और 4,700 फीट long .
The is  a घर वीडियो खेल कंसोल उत्पादित by सोनी  Computer Entertainment .
It  is the successor to the प्लेस्टेशन  2 , as part of the PlayStation series .
The PlayStation 3 competes with Microsoft 's  एक्सबॉक्स 360 और निन्टेंडो 's वी as भाग of the सातवाँ पीढी  of video game consoles .
It was first released on November 11 , 2006 , in  जापानी , साथ अंतरराष्ट्रीय बाज़ार following shortly thereafter  .
The  कंसोल थी पहला officially घोषित at  E3 2005 .
Originally set for a spring 2006 release date , it was delayed several times until  आखिरकार hitting स्टोर्स at the समाप्त of the साल  .
It was the first and currently  तभी कंसोल to उपयोग blu-ray डिस्क as इसके प्राथमिक  storage medium .
Major features of the console include its unified  ऑनलाइन गेमिंग सेवा , the प्लेस्टेशन संजाल , और इसके कनेक्टिविटी साथ the प्लेस्टेशन पोर्टेबल  and PlayStation Vita , In September 2009 the updated PlayStation 3 Slim , was released .
This Slim is lighter and thinner than the original  संस्करण , हालांकि it lacks प्लेस्टेशन 2 पीछे संगतता ( removed on बाद असली मॉडल ) ,  but notably featured a re-designed logo and marketing design .
As of  नवम्बर 4 , 2012 , 70 लाख प्लेस्टेशन 3s  have been sold worldwide .
Its  successor , प्लेस्टेशन 4 , is नियत लिये  a Q4 2013 release .
Salvador Domingo Felipe Jacinto Dalí i Domènech , 1st Marqués de Dalí de Pubol (  may 11 , 1904january 23 , 1989 ) , ज्ञात as साल्वाडोर dalí ( ) , थी a prominent स्पेनी surrealist चित्रकार born in figueres , स्पेन  .
Dalí was a skilled draftsman , best known  लिये the striking और विचित्र बिंब in उसके surrealist  work .
His painterly skills are  प्रायः attributed to the influence of पुनर्जागरण  masters .
His best-known  कार्य , the हठ of मेमोरी ,  was completed in 1931 .
dalí 's expansive कलाकारी रंगमंडल शामिल फिल्मी , मूर्तिकला , और छायाचित्र , in सहयोग साथ  a range of artists in a variety of media .
Dalí attributed his `` love of  सबकुछ कि is gilded और excessive , my जुनून लिये लक्ज़री और my प्रेम of प्राच्य कपडे '' to a self-styled `` अरब lineage  '' , claiming that his ancestors were descended from the Moors .
Dalí was highly  कल्पनाशील , और भी enjoyed indulging in असामान्य  and grandiose behavior .
His eccentric manner and  attention-grabbing पब्लिक क्रियाएँ sometimes खींचा अधिक ध्यान than उसके कलाकृति , to the dismay of those जो आयोजित उसके कार्य  in high esteem , and to the irritation of his critics .
पारस प्लेटो by  Silanion
The humanities are academic disciplines that study  इंसान संस्कृति , using विधि कि हैं primarily विश्लेषणात्मक , नाजुक , or सट्टे , और having a significant ऐतिहासिक  element , as distinguished from the mainly empirical approaches of the natural sciences .
The humanities  शामिल प्राचीन और आधुनिक भाषाएं , साहित्य  , philosophy , religion , and visual and performing arts such as music and theatre .
The humanities that are also regarded as  सोशल sciences शामिल इतिहास , मानवशास्त्र , क्षेत्रफल अध्ययन , संचार अध्ययन , सांस्कृतिक अध्ययन , विधि ,  economics and linguistics .
Scholars working in the humanities are  sometimes वर्णित as `` humanists  '' .
However , that  पद भी describes the philosophical स्थिति of मानवतावाद  , which some `` antihumanist `` scholars in the humanities reject .
Some  द्वितीयक स्कूलों प्रस्ताव मानवता वर्ग , प्रायः consisting  of English literature , global studies , and art .
Human disciplines like history , cultural anthropology and psychoanalysis study subject matters to which the experimental method  करता नहीं लागू , और वे have अभिगम बजाय to the तुलनात्मक विधि और तुलनात्मक शोध  .
The  2005 ब्लू रूम क्रिसमस  Tree
The White House Christmas Tree , also known as the Blue Room Christmas Tree ,  is the आधिकारिक अंदर क्रिसमस पेड़ at the निवास of the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ,  the White House .
The first indoor Christmas tree was installed in the White  हाउस sometime in the 19th सदी ( वहीँ हैं varying दावा as to the सटीक साल ) और चूंकि 1961 the पेड़ रै था a प्रसंग  motif at the discretion of the First Lady of the United States .
The President of the United States of America (  potus ) is the सिर of राज्य और सिर of सरकारी  of the United States .
The president leads the executive branch of  the संघीय सरकारी और is the commander-in-chief of the संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद शक्तियां  .
Article II of the U.S. Constitution vests the executive power of the United States in  the अध्यक्ष और आरोप उसे साथ the निष्पादन of संघीय विधि , alongside the जिम्मेदारी of appointing संघीय कार्यपालिका , राजनयिक , नियामक , और न्यायिक अधिकारियों , और concluding treaties साथ विदेशी शक्तियां  , with the advice and consent of the Senate .
The president is further empowered to grant federal  pardons और reprieves , और to convene और adjourn either  or both houses of Congress under extraordinary circumstances .
Since the founding of the United States , the power of the president and the federal  सरकारी have grown substantially और प्रत्येक आधुनिक अध्यक्ष , despite possessing no औपचारिक विधान शक्तियां परे हस्ताक्षर or vetoing congressionally passed बिल्स , is largely जिम्मेदार लिये  dictating the legislative agenda of his party and the foreign and domestic policy of the United States .
The president is frequently described as the  सबसे शक्तिशाली व्यक्ति in the संसार  .
The president is indirectly elected by the people through the Electoral College to a  four-year पद , और is एक of तभी दो nationally निर्वाचित संघीय अधिकारियों , the अन्य होने the वाइस  President of the United States .
The  twenty-second amendment , अपनाया in 1951 , prohibits anyone इससे कभी  being elected to the presidency for a third full term .
It also prohibits a person from being elected to the  प्रेसिडेंसी अधिक than एकबार if कि व्यक्ति previously था परोसा as अध्यक्ष , or एक्टिंग अध्यक्ष , लिये अधिक than दो सालो of another व्यक्ति  's term as president .
In all , 43  individuals have परोसा 55 four-year शर्तें  .
On January  20 , 2009 , बराक ओबामा became the 44th और वर्तमान  president .
On November 6 , 2012 , he was  re-elected और is अनुसूचित to serve जबतक जनवरी  20 , 2017 .
Senses are  physiological capacities of जीवों कि provide आंकड़ा लिये  perception .
The senses and their operation ,  वर्गीकरण , और सिद्धान्त हैं अतिव्यापी विषय पढ़ाई by a किस्में of फ़ील्ड , सबसे notably neuroscience , संज्ञानात्मक मनोविज्ञान ( or संज्ञानात्मक विज्ञान  ) , and philosophy of perception .
The nervous system has a specific sensory system or  अंग , समर्पित to प्रत्येक भाव .
Humans have a  multitude of होश  .
sight ( ophthalmoception ) , सुनना ( audioception ) , स्वाद ( gustaoception ) , महकते ( olfacoception  or olfacception ) , and touch ( tactioception ) are the five traditionally recognized .
While the ability to detect other stimuli beyond those governed by  the परंपरागत होश exists , सहित तापमान ( thermoception ) , kinesthetic भाव ( proprioception ) , पीड़ा ( nociception ) , संतुलन ( equilibrioception ) , त्वरण ( kinesthesioception )  , and various internal stimuli ( e.g . the different chemoreceptors for detecting salt and carbon dioxide concentrations in the blood ) , only a small number of these can safely be classified as separate senses in and of themselves .
कया constitutes a भाव is a पदार्थ of कुछ बहस , अग्रणी  to difficulties in defining what exactly a sense is .
पशु भी have receptors to भाव the संसार around उन्हें , साथ डिग्री  of capability varying greatly between species .
Humans have a comparatively weak sense of smell ,  जबकि कुछ पशु may कमी एक or अधिक of the परंपरागत पाँच होश  .
Some animals may also intake and  interpret संवेदी stimuli in बहुत अलग  ways .
Some species of  पशु हैं समर्थ to भाव the संसार in a रास्ता कि इंसानो can नहीं , साथ कुछ प्रजाति समर्थ to भाव विद्युत और चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड  , and detect water pressure and currents .
Spiders (  अनुक्रम araneae ) हैं air-breathing arthropods कि have  eight legs and chelicerae with fangs that inject venom .
They are the largest order of  arachnids और रैंक सातवाँ in कुल प्रजाति विविधता  among all other groups of organisms .
Spiders are found worldwide on every continent  मगर लिये अंटार्कटिक , और have become स्थापित in nearly प्रत्येक  habitat with the exception of air and sea colonization .
As of 2008 , at least 43,678 spider  प्रजाति , और 109 परिवारों have महरूम अंकित by taxonomists ; however , वहीँ रै महरूम भ्रम भीतर the वैज्ञानिक जातियाँ as to कैसा सब ये परिवारों  should be classified , as evidenced by the over 20 different classifications that have been proposed since 1900 .
Anatomically , spiders differ from other arthropods in that the usual body  खण्ड हैं fused into दो tagmata , the cephalothorax और उदर , और joined  by a small , cylindrical pedicel .
Unlike  कीट , मकड़ियों do नहीं  have antennae .
In all except  the सबसे आदिम समूह , the mesothelae , मकड़ियों have the सबसे centralized बेचैन प्रणालियों of सब arthropods , as सब उनके ganglia  are fused into one mass in the cephalothorax .
नापसंद सबसे arthropods , मकड़ियों have no extensor  muscles in their limbs and instead extend them by hydraulic pressure .
Their abdomens bear appendages that have been  परिवर्धित into spinnerets कि extrude रेशा इससे up to छह प्रकार of रेशा ग्रंथियों भीतर उनके  abdomen .
Spider webs vary widely  in आकार , आकार और the राशि of स्टिकी  thread used .
It now appears that the spiral orb web may be one of the earliest  फ़ॉर्म , और मकड़ियों कि उपज उलझे cobwebs हैं अधिक abundant और विविध than orb-web मकड़ियों  .
spider-like arachnids साथ silk-producing spigots appeared in the devonian काल  about , but these animals apparently lacked spinnerets .
True spiders have been found in  carboniferous रॉक्स इससे , और हैं बहुत समान to the सबसे आदिम surviving अनुक्रम ,  the Mesothelae .
The main  समूह of आधुनिक मकड़ियों , mygalomorphae और araneomorphae , पहला  appeared in the Triassic period , before .
A herbivorous species , Bagheera kiplingi , was described in 2008 , but  सब अन्य ज्ञात प्रजाति हैं परभक्षी , ज़्यादातर preying on कीट और on अन्य मकड़ियों , हालांकि a few विशाल प्रजाति भी लो पक्षियों  and lizards .
मकड़ियों उपयोग a चौड़ी दायरा of रणनीति to कैप्चर शिकार : trapping it in स्टिकी webs , lassoing it साथ स्टिकी bolas  , mimicking the prey to avoid detection , or running it down .
Most detect prey mainly by sensing  कंपन , लकिन the क्रियाशील hunters have अधि दृष्टि , और hunters of the genus portia दिखाएँ लक्षण of प्रज्ञा in  their choice of tactics and ability to develop new ones .
Spiders ' guts are too narrow to take solids , and they liquidize their food by flooding  it साथ digestive एंजाइमों और पीस it साथ the bases of उनके pedipalps , as वे  do not have true jaws .
Male spiders identify themselves by a variety of complex  प्रेमालाप संस्कार to avoid होने खाया by the महिलाओं  .
Males of most  प्रजाति जीवित a few matings , सीमित मुख्यतः by उनके  short life spans .
महिलाओं बुनते रेशा egg-cases , प्रत्येक of जिससे may contain  hundreds of eggs .
Females of many species care for their young , for example  by carrying उन्हें around or by sharing खाना साथ उन्हें  .
A minority of species are  सोशल , भवन सांप्रदायिक webs कि may हाउस anywhere इससे a few  to 50,000 individuals .
सोशल बर्ताव सीमाएँ इससे precarious toleration , as in the विधवा मकड़ियों  , to co-operative hunting and food-sharing .
Although most spiders live  लिये at सबसे दो सालो , tarantulas और अन्य mygalomorph मकड़ियों can सजीव  up to 25 years in captivity .
जबकि the venom of a few प्रजाति is खतरनाक to इंसानो , वैज्ञानिकों हैं अभी researching the उपयोग  of spider venom in medicine and as non-polluting pesticides .
Spider silk provides a  संयोजन of lightness , शक्ति और लोच कि is श्रेष्ठ to कि of सिंथेटिक सामग्री , और मकड़ी रेशा जीनों have महरूम  inserted into mammals and plants to see if these can be used as silk factories .
As a result of their wide range of behaviors , spiders have become common symbols in art and  mythology symbolizing विभिन्न combinations of सब्र , क्रूरता और रचनात्मक शक्तियां  .
Grey 's Anatomy is an  अमरीकी टेलीविज़न चिकित्सा नाटक कि premiered on the अमरीकी प्रसारण कम्पनी ( एबीसी ) ,  as a mid-season replacement on March 27 , 2005 .
The series has aired nine seasons , and focuses on the fictional  जीवनदान of सर्जिकल interns और निवासियों as वे धीरे evolve into seasoned डॉक्टर , जबकि trying to maintain निजी  lives .
The show 's premise originated with Shonda Rhimes , who serves as an executive  निर्माता , साथ साथ बेट्सी beers , चिह्नित गॉर्डन , क्रिस्टा vernoff , रोब मकई ,  Mark Wilding , and Allan Heinberg .
The  श्रेणी थी निर्मित to be racially विविध ,  utilizing a color-blind casting technique .
It is primarily filmed  in लॉस एंजिल्स , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
The series ' protagonist is Dr. Meredith Grey ( Ellen Pompeo )  , जो originally is स्वीकृत into the रेसिडेंसी कार्यक्रम at the fictional सिएटल  Grace Hospital .
Meredith is assigned to work under Dr. Miranda Bailey (  चन्द्रा विल्सन ) , साथ साथ dr. क्रिस्टीना यांग ( सैंड्रा oh ) , dr. जार्ज o'malley ( T. R.  Knight ) , Dr. Izzie Stevens ( Katherine Heigl ) , and Dr. Alex Karev ( Justin Chambers ) .
Following O'Malley 's death and  स्टीवंस ' प्रस्थान , the हॉस्पिटल 's विलय साथ रहमत वेस्ट brings in dr. जैक्सन एवेरी ( जेसी विलियम्स  ) and Dr. April Kepner ( Sarah Drew ) , in the sixth season .
The  सर्जिकल wing is primarily पर्यवेक्षित by dr. रिचर्ड webber ( जेम्स pickens , jr. ) , जो  is eventually replaced by Dr. Derek Shepherd ( Patrick Dempsey ) , and later Dr. Owen Hunt ( Kevin McKidd ) .
Dr. Preston  बुर्के ( यशायाह वॉशिंगटन ) प्रस्थान at the निष्कर्ष of the तीसरा ऋतु , और is replaced by dr. एरिका hahn ( ब्रुक स्मिथ ) , जो पत्ते the दिखाएँ दौरान  the fifth season , and later Dr. Teddy Altman ( Kim Raver ) , who departs at the end of the eighth season .
Introduced in the second  ऋतु is dr. एडीसन मोंटगोमरी ( केट वाल्श ) , जो पत्ते the दिखाएँ at the समाप्त of the तीसरा ऋतु , in अनुक्रम to लॉन्च उसके अपना spin-off  medical drama Private Practice .
Dr. Callie Torres ( Sara Ramirez ) and Dr. Mark Sloan (  eric डेन ) भी डालें the दिखाएँ in the दूसरी ऋतु , जबकि the latter मरता in the प्रीमियर  of the ninth season .
Meredith 's half-sister  , dr. lexie धूसर ( chyler leigh ) , appears इससे ऋतु तीन  and dies at the end of season eight .
Dr. Arizona Robbins ( Jessica  capshaw ) is दिए श्रेणी नियमित औकात at the शुरूआत  of the sixth season .
Grey 's Anatomy is the  highest-rated नाटक in the कुंजी 18–49 जनसांख्यिकी  .
Previously among the  overall top-ten रेटेड shows in the संयुक्त राज्य , धूसर 's anatomy रै महरूम खूब प्राप्त  by critics .
Considered an  प्रभाव on संस्कृति , the श्रेणी रै प्राप्त numerous पुरस्कार , और  has also been included in various critics ' top ten lists .
The  दिखाएँ रै उत्पादित अनेक specials , as खूब as वितरित सब सीज़न to dvd , और released a संग्रहण of  merchandise .
In 2012 , Grey 's Anatomy was named  the fifth-highest आय कमाई दिखाएँ , in शर्तें  of advertising per half-hour .
On May 11 , 2012 ,  the श्रेणी थी नवीनीकृत लिये a नवीं ऋतु , जिससे  premiered on September 27 , 2012 .
Schizophrenia ( or )  is a दिमागी विकार characterized by a विश्लेषण of विचार प्रक्रियाओं और by a deficit of  typical emotional responses .
Common symptoms include auditory  मति , paranoid or विचित्र delusions , or disorganized वाक और सोच , और it is accompanied  by significant social or occupational dysfunction .
The  onset of लक्षण typically occurs in यंग adulthood , साथ  a global lifetime prevalence of about 0.3–0.7 % .
Diagnosis is based on  observed बर्ताव और the रोगी 's reported  experiences .
Genetics ,  जल्दी पर्यावरण , neurobiology , और मनोवैज्ञानिक और सोशल प्रक्रियाओं appear to be महत्वपूर्ण contributory कारकों  ; some recreational and prescription drugs appear to cause or worsen symptoms .
Current research is focused on  the भूमिका of neurobiology , हालांकि no सिंगल पृथक  organic cause has been found .
The many possible combinations of symptoms have triggered debate  परिचय whether the निदान represents a सिंगल विकार or a क्रमांक of अलहदा  syndromes .
Despite the etymology of the term from the Greek roots skhizein ( σχίζειν , `` to split '' ) and phrēn , phren- ( φρήν , φρεν- ; `` mind '' ) , schizophrenia  करता नहीं imply a `` विभाजित व्यक्तित्व '' , or `` अनेक व्यक्तित्व विकार '' ( जिससे is ज्ञात ये दिनों as dissociative पहचान विकार ) —a कंडीशन साथ जिससे it is प्रायः उलझन  in public perception .
बल्कि , the पद अर्थात् a `` splitting of दिमागी कृत्यों  '' , because of the symptomatic presentation of the illness .
The mainstay of treatment is antipsychotic medication ,  जिससे primarily दबा dopamine ( और sometimes serotonin ) receptor  activity .
Psychotherapy and  वोकेशनल और सोशल पुनर्वास हैं भी महत्वपूर्ण in  treatment .
In more serious cases—where there is risk to self and others— involuntary  hospitalization may be जरुरी , हालांकि हॉस्पिटल stays हैं अभी shorter और कम बारंबार  than they once were .
The disorder is  विचार मुख्यतः to affect संज्ञान , लकिन it भी प्रायः contributes  to chronic problems with behavior and emotion .
People with schizophrenia are likely to have additional ( comorbid ) conditions ,  सहित प्रमुख अवसाद और चिंता विकार ; the आजीवन occurrence of पदार्थ  use disorder is almost 50 % .
Social  समस्याएं , ऐसे as long-term बेरोजगारी , गरीबी , और  homelessness are common .
The average life expectancy of people with the  विकार is 12 to 15 सालो कम than those बगैर , the परिणाम of increased  physical health problems and a higher suicide rate ( about 5 % ) .
Paul Leslie Snider ( April 15 ,  1951–august 14 , 1980 ) थी the estranged husband और मैनेजर of प्लेबॉय मॉडल डोरोथी stratten , जिसको he murdered  before killing himself the same day .
The Epic  of gilgamesh , an एपिक कविता इससे मेसोपोटामिया  , is amongst the earliest surviving works of literature .
the साहित्यिक इतिहास of gilgamesh begins साथ पाँच स्वतंत्र  Sumerian poems about 'Bilgamesh ' ( Sumerian for Gilgamesh ) , king of Uruk .
Four  of ये यहूद प्रयुक्त as सोर्स सामग्री  for a combined epic in Akkadian .
This first combined epic , known as the `` Old  babylonian '' संस्करण , तिथियाँ to the 18th सदी bc और is titled बाद इसके incipit , shūtur एली sharrī ( `` surpassing  All Other Kings '' ) .
Only a  few fragments of it have  survived .
The later ``  मानक babylonian '' संस्करण तिथियाँ इससे the 13th to the 10th सदियां bc और bears  the incipit Sha naqba īmuru ( `` He who Saw the Deep '' ) .
Fragments of approximately  दो तिहाई of इस longer , twelve-tablet संस्करण  have been recovered .
Some of the best  नक़ल यहूद खोजा in the पुस्तकालयों तबाह of the 7th-century  BC Assyrian king Ashurbanipal .
The story centers on a  दोस्ती between gilgamesh और  Enkidu .
Enkidu is a wild man created by the  देवताओं as gilgamesh 's बराबर to distract उसे इससे oppressing the लोगों  of Uruk .
साथ , वे यात्रा to the देवदार पहाड़ to शिकस्त humbaba  , its monstrous guardian .
Later they kill the Bull  of स्वर्ग , जिससे the देवी इश्तार भेजना to सजा gilgamesh  for spurning her advances .
As a punishment  लिये ये क्रियाएँ , the देवताओं वाक्य enkidu  to death .
The  दूसरी हाफ of the एपिक focuses on gilgamesh 's तकलीफ at enkidu 's मौत , और  his quest for immortality .
In order to learn  the रहस्य of अनन्त जीवन , gilgamesh undertakes a long  and perilous journey .
he learns कि `` the जीवन कि तुम हैं  seeking you will never find .
When the gods created  man वे आवंटित to उसे मौत , लकिन जीवन वे  retained in their own keeping . ''
This quote was originally attributed to Siduri in the Old  babylonian संस्करण of the एपिक , और तब attributed to the अमर बाढ़ नायिका utnapishtim in the अक्कादी  version of the epic .
Nevertheless , Gilgamesh 's fame lived on after his death , because of  उसके ग्रेट भवन प्रोजेक्ट , और उसके खाता of कया utnapishtim बताई उसे happened  during the flood .
The story has been translated into many  अलग भाषाएं , और gilgamesh रै चूंकि become adapted in works  of popular fiction .
A  सुकेन्द्रिक ( or ) is an सजीव जिनकी कोशिकाएं contain जटिल structures  enclosed within membranes .
eukaryotes may अधिक formally be referred to as the  taxon Eukarya or Eukaryota .
The defining membrane-bound structure that sets eukaryotic cells apart from prokaryotic cells is the  केंद्रक , or नाभिकीय लिफाफा , भीतर जिससे the जेनेटिक सामग्री is carried  .
The presence of a nucleus gives  eukaryotes उनके नाम , जिससे आता इससे the यूनानी ( eu , `` शुभ '' ) और  ( karyon , `` nut '' or `` kernel '' ) .
Most eukaryotic cells also  contain अन्य membrane-bound organelles ऐसे as mitochondria  , chloroplasts and the Golgi apparatus .
सब विशाल जटिल जीवों हैं eukaryotes , सहित  animals , plants and fungi .
The group  भी शामिल अनेक एककोशिकीय  organisms .
Cell division in eukaryotes is  अलग इससे कि in जीवों बगैर a केंद्रक  ( Prokaryote ) .
It involves separating the  duplicated गुणसूत्रों , through आंदोलनों निर्देशित by microtubules  .
There are two  प्रकार of प्रभाग प्रक्रियाओं .
In mitosis , one cell  divides to उपज दो genetically  identical cells .
In meiosis , which is required in sexual reproduction , one diploid cell ( having two  उदाहरण of प्रत्येक chromosome , एक इससे प्रत्येक जनक ) undergoes recombination of प्रत्येक जोड़ी of parental गुणसूत्रों , और तब दो चरण of कोशिका प्रभाग , resulting  in four haploid cells ( gametes ) .
Each gamete has just one complement of chromosomes ,  प्रत्येक a अद्वितीय मिक्सर of the सम्बन्धित जोड़ी of parental गुणसूत्रों  .
eukaryota appears to be monophyletic , और so  makes up one of the three domains of life .
The two other domains , Bacteria and  आर्किया , हैं prokaryotes और have none of the ऊपर सुविधाएँ  .
eukaryotes represent a छोटा अल्पसंख्यक of सब जीना बाते ; भी in a इंसान देह वहीँ  are 10 times more microbes than human cells .
However , due to their  much larger आकार उनके सामूहिक विश्वव्यापी बायोमास  is estimated at about equal to that of prokaryotes .
They  हैं माना to have पहला विकसित  approximately 1.6–2.1 billion years ago .
The use of Internet  सेवाएं or तन्त्र साथ अंतरजाल अभिगम to defraud पीड़ितों or to वरना लो लाभ of उन्हें , लिये उदाहरण by चोरी निजी सूचना  , which can even lead to identity theft .
A very common form of Internet fraud is  the वितरण of दुष्ट सुरक्षा  software .
Internet services can be used to present  बेईमान solicitations to prospective पीड़ितों , to conduct बेईमान ट्रांजेक्शन , or to संचारण  the proceeds of fraud to financial institutions or to others connected with the scheme .
Internet fraud can occur in chat  कक्ष , ईमेल , संदेश फलक ,  or on websites .
The International Security Assistance Force ( ISAF ) is a NATO -led  सुरक्षा मिशन in अफगानिस्तान कि थी स्थापित by the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा परिषद in दिसम्बर 2001 by रेज़ोल्यूशन 1386 , as envisaged by  the Bonn Agreement .
Its main purpose is to train the Afghan National Security Forces ( ANSF ) and assist Afghanistan  in पुनर्निर्माण कुंजी सरकारी संस्थानों लकिन is भी सगाई in the 2001-present युद्ध साथ बागी समूह  .
ISAF was initially charged with securing Kabul and surrounding  क्षेत्रों इससे the तालिबान , al qaeda और factional warlords , so  as to allow for the establishment of the Afghan Transitional Administration headed by Hamid Karzai .
In October 2003 , the UN Security Council authorized the expansion  of the isaf मिशन throughout अफगानिस्तान , और isaf subsequently विस्तारित the मिशन in चार प्रमुख चरण over the  whole of the country .
From 2006 to 2011 ,  isaf था महरूम शामिल in increasingly अधिक intensive कॉम्बैट परिचालन in दक्षिणी  and eastern Afghanistan .
Troop contributors include from  the संयुक्त राज्य , संयुक्त किंगडम , नाटो सदस्य राज्य  and a number of other countries .
The intensity of the combat faced by contributing nations varies greatly , with the  संयुक्त राज्य , संयुक्त किंगडम , और कनाडा sustaining the बहुमत of हताहत in intensive कॉम्बैट परिचालन  , with other contributors sustaining significantly less .
As of early 2010 , there were at least 700 military  bases अंदर अफगानिस्तान लकिन अधिक यहूद अपेक्षित to be निर्मित in the coming सालो  .
About  400 of ये यहूद प्रयुक्त by american‐led नाटो शक्तियां  and 300 by ANSF .
कोका ( benzoylmethylecgonine ) ( इन ) is a crystalline  tropane alkaloid that is obtained from the leaves of the coca plant .
The  नाम आता इससे `` कोका '' और the एल्कलॉएड  suffix -ine , forming cocaine .
It is a  उत्तेजक , an भूख suppressant , और a topical  anesthetic .
Biologically , cocaine acts as a  serotonin–norepinephrine–dopamine reuptake inhibitor , भी ज्ञात as a ट्रिपल reuptake  inhibitor ( TRI ) .
It is  addictive क्युकी of इसके प्रभाव on  the mesolimbic reward pathway .
Unlike most  अणुओं , कोका रै pockets साथ दोनो ऊँची hydrophilic और lipophilic दक्षता ,  violating the rule of hydrophilic-lipophilic balance .
This causes it to  क्रॉस the blood–brain अवरोध दूर बेहतर than अन्य psychoactive रसायन और may भी induce blood-brain  barrier breakdown .
It is illegal to possess , produce ,  or वितरित कोका लिये non-medicinal और non-government-sanctioned उद्देश्य in लगभग प्रत्येक  country .
Whole  बीफ tri-tip rump , roasted  medium rare
the tri-tip is a काटें of बीफ इससे the नीचे  sirloin primal cut .
It is a small triangular  मांसपेशी , प्रायः 1.5 to 2.5 पाउंड . ( 675  to 1,150g ) per side of beef .
The scientific name of this muscle is tensor fasciae latae , inserted in the fascia lata , the connective tissue covering  the quadriceps femoris , भी पुकारा quadriceps extensor , a समूह of चार मांसपेशियां जिससे in फेरे प्रविष्ट  in the patella , or knee cap of the animal .
Willmar is a city in , and  the काउंटी सीट of , kandiyohi काउंटी , मिनेसोटा ,  United States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 19,610 at the 2010  census .
willmar रै महरूम आबंटित zip कोड 56201  by the United States Postal Service .
U.S .  रूट 12 और 71 और मिनेसोटा राज्य राजमार्गों 23 और 40 हैं  four of the main routes in the city .
The Speaker of the United States House of Representatives ( or  स्पीकर of the हाउस ) is the पीठासीन अधिकारी of the कक्ष  .
The office was established in 1789 by Article I , Section 2 of  the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान , जिससे राज्य in भाग , `` the हाउस of  Representatives shall chuse their Speaker ... ''
The current Speaker is John Boehner , a  रिपब्लिकन जो represents ओहियो 's 8th  congressional district .
The Constitution does not require that the  स्पीकर be a सदस्य of कॉंग्रेस , लकिन no non-member रै कभी महरूम निर्वाचित to  the office .
The Speaker is second in the United States presidential line  of उत्तराधिकार , बाद the वाइस अध्यक्ष और ahead of the अध्यक्ष प्रो tempore  of the U.S. Senate .
