Unlike some Westminster system parliaments , in which the office of  स्पीकर is माना non-partisan , in the संयुक्त राज्य the स्पीकर of the हाउस is a नेतृत्व स्थिति और the office-holder actively works to  set the majority party 's legislative agenda .
The Speaker  प्रायः करता नहीं personally preside over debates , बजाय delegating  the duty to members of the House from the majority party .
Aside from duties relating to heading the House and the majority political party , the  स्पीकर भी performs प्रशासनिक और प्रक्रियात्मक कृत्यों , और represents उसके or उसके congressional ज़िला  .
A bicycle frame is the main  घटक of a सायकिल , on to जिससे पहियों  and other components are fitted .
The modern and most common frame  डिज़ाइन लिये an कतरा सायकिल is आधारित on the सुरक्षा सायकिल , और consists of दो त्रिकोण  , a main triangle and a paired rear triangle .
इस is ज्ञात as the डायमंड  frame .
Frames are  जरूरी to be दमदार , stiff और लाइट , जिससे वे  do by combining different materials and shapes .
`` Simple gravity pendulum ''  मॉडल assumes no घर्षण or एयर प्रतिरोध  .
An  exemplar एनिमेशन of a लोलक प्रर्दशित the  velocity and acceleration vectors
A pendulum is a  वज़न निलंबित इससे a so कि it can झूले freely  .
When a pendulum is  विस्थापित बगलों इससे इसके resting संतुलन स्थिति , it is विषय to a restoring फ़ोर्स due to गम्भीरता कि होगा accelerate it वापस  toward the equilibrium position .
When released , the restoring force combined  साथ the लोलक 's द्रव्यमान कल्याणकारी it to oscillate परिचय the संतुलन स्थिति , सुहाने वापस  and forth .
The  समय लिये एक पूरा साईकिल , a बाएँ झूले और  a right swing , is called the period .
A pendulum swings with a  विशिष्ट काल जिससे depends (  mainly ) on its length .
From its discovery around 1602 by Galileo  गैलिली the नियमित गति of pendulums थी प्रयुक्त लिये timekeeping , और थी the संसार 's सबसे सटीक timekeeping  technology until the 1930s .
Pendulums are used to regulate pendulum  घड़ियाँ , और हैं प्रयुक्त in वैज्ञानिक यंत्र ऐसे as accelerometers  and seismometers .
historically वे यहूद प्रयुक्त as gravimeters to माप the त्वरण of गम्भीरता in geophysical  surveys , and even as a standard of length .
The  शब्द 'pendulum ' is नई लैटिन , इससे the लैटिन  pendulus , meaning 'hanging ' .
The simple gravity  लोलक is an idealized गणितीय मॉडल of a लोलक  .
This is  a वज़न ( or bob ) on the समाप्त  of a massless cord suspended from a , without friction .
When given an  आरंभिक धक्का , it होगा झूले वापस और forth at  a constant amplitude .
Real pendulums are subject to  घर्षण और एयर खीचें , so the आयाम of उनके swings गिरावट  .
The First  बैटल of सांड चलाएं , भी ज्ञात as पहला manassas ( the नाम प्रयुक्त by confederate शक्तियां ) , थी लड़ा on जुलाई 21 , 1861  , in Prince William County , Virginia , near the city of Manassas .
It was the  पहला प्रमुख जमीन बैटल of the अमरीकी  Civil War .
Just months  बाद the प्रारंभ of the युद्ध at फोर्ट sumter , the उत्तरी पब्लिक clamored लिये a कूच विरूद्ध the confederate  capital of Richmond , Virginia , which they expected to bring an early end to the rebellion .
Yielding to political pressure ,  ब्रिगेडियर . gen. irvin mcdowell led उसके unseasoned संघ फौज आरपार सांड चलाएं विरूद्ध the बराबर अनुभवहीन  Confederate Army of Brig . Gen. P. G. T. Beauregard camped near Manassas Junction .
McDowell 's ambitious plan for a surprise flank  आक्रमण on the confederate बाएँ थी poorly चलाया by उसके अधिकारियों और मेन ; nevertheless , the confederates , जो था महरूम नियोजन  to attack the Union left flank , found themselves at an initial disadvantage .
Confederate reinforcements under Brig . Gen. Joseph E. Johnston  arrived इससे the shenandoah घाटी by रेलरोड और the कोर्स of the बैटल जल्दी  changed .
A brigade of Virginians under a relatively unknown colonel from the  वर्जिनिया सैन्य संस्थान , थामस J. जैक्सन , stood उनके  ground and Jackson received his famous nickname , `` Stonewall Jackson '' .
The Confederates then  शुभारम्भ a दमदार counterattack , और as the संघ सैनिकों began withdrawing अंतर्गत आग , अनेक panicked और it turned into a rout as mcdowell 's मेन frantically भागा बगैर  order in the direction of Washington , D.C .
Both armies were sobered by the  fierce लड़ और अनेक हताहत , और एहसास the युद्ध थी going to be much longer  and bloodier than either had anticipated .

Weather is the state  of the माहौल , to the उपाधि कि it is hot or ठंडा  , wet or dry , calm or stormy , clear or cloudy .
Most weather  phenomena occur in the क्षोभमण्डल , बस नीचे the stratosphere  .
Weather generally refers to day-to-day temperature and precipitation  कार्यकलाप , whereas जलवायु is the पद लिये the औसत वायुमंडलीय  conditions over longer periods of time .
When used without  योग्यता , `` मौसम '' is समझा to be the मौसम  of Earth .
Weather is  चलित by एयर दबाव ( तापमान और नमी ) मतभेद between  one place and another .
These pressure and  तापमान मतभेद can occur due to the सूर्य कोण at कोई  particular spot , which varies by latitude from the tropics .
The strong  तापमान कंट्रास्ट between ध्रुवीय और तीव्र एयर देता  rise to the jet stream .
Weather  प्रणालियों in the mid-latitudes , ऐसे as extratropical cyclones , हैं  caused by instabilities of the jet stream flow .
Because the  धरती 's अक्ष is tilted सापेक्ष to इसके कक्षीय प्लेन , धूप is घटना  at different angles at different times of the year .
On  धरती 's सतह , temperatures प्रायः दायरा ±40  °C ( −40 °F to 100 °F ) annually .
Over thousands of years , changes in Earth 's orbit affect the amount and  वितरण of सौर उर्जा प्राप्त by the धरती और influence long-term  climate and global climate change .
Surface temperature  मतभेद in फेरे कारण दबाव मतभेद  .
Higher altitudes are cooler than  निम्नतर altitudes due to मतभेद in compressional  heating .
Weather forecasting is the application of science and technology to  भविष्यवाणी the राज्य of the माहौल लिये a भविष्य समय और a दिए स्थान  .
The atmosphere  is a chaotic प्रणाली , so छोटी परिवर्तन to एक भाग of the प्रणाली can grow to  have large effects on the system as a whole .
Human attempts to  कंट्रोल the मौसम have occurred throughout इंसान इतिहास , और वहीँ is प्रमाण कि इंसान कार्यकलाप ऐसे  as agriculture and industry has inadvertently modified weather patterns .
Studying how the weather works on  अन्य ग्रह रै महरूम सहायक in समझना कैसा मौसम works on  Earth .
A famous landmark  in the सौर प्रणाली , बृहस्पति 's ग्रेट रेड स्पॉट , is an anticyclonic तूफ़ान  known to have existed for at least 300 years .
however , मौसम is नहीं सीमित to  planetary bodies .
A star 's corona is constantly being lost to space  , बनाना कया is essentially a बहुत पतला माहौल throughout  the Solar System .
The  गति of द्रव्यमान ejected इससे the सूर्य is ज्ञात  as the solar wind .
Katy  पेरी is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter इससे सांता  Barbara , California .
वो हस्ताक्षरित साथ कैपिटल  Records .
Perry has released three  स्टुडियो एल्बम , सहित उसके डेब्यू ईसाई प्रयत्न कैटी हडसन , एक  of the Boys , and Teenage Dream .
Perry 's  मुख्यधारा करियर थी kicked बंद साथ the विशाल चार्ट कामयाबी  of her debut single `` I Kissed a Girl `` .
During her career ,  पेरी रै महरूम मनोनीत लिये numerous प्रमुख म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार , primarily लिये teenage सपना  and One of the Boys .
The following is a list of sovereign states and territories where English is an  आधिकारिक भाषा or भाषा of सरकारी  .
In 2012 , there were 88 states in total (  60 sovereign राज्य और 28 non-sovereign  states ) .
In many countries English  is the प्रबल भाषा , लकिन करता नहीं have आधिकारिक  status .
In Australia , English is  बोला by the विशाल बहुमत of the जनसांख्यिकी और is the तभी भाषा प्रयुक्त in सरकारी  institutions , but Australia does not have an official language .
The case is the same in the United Kingdom and the  संयुक्त राज्य , हालांकि अनेक राज्य और regions भीतर the u.S. do have  English as an official language .
English is the dominant language of New Zealand and an  आधिकारिक भाषा of कनाडा ( साथ साथ फ्रेंच ) , इण्डिया ( साथ साथ हिंदी और अनेक अन्य भाषाएं ) , आयरलैंड ( साथ  with Irish ) , and the Philippines ( along with Tagalog ) .
English is the sole official language of the  राष्ट्रमंडल of राष्ट्र और the राष्ट्रमंडल खेल  .
अंग्रेज़ी is एक of the आधिकारिक भाषाएं of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र , the यूरोपीय  Union and the International Olympic Committee .
Many of  ये देशों हैं वर्तमान or पूर्व colonies or dependencies of the संयुक्त किंगडम ( देखिए भी अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य  ) , or of the United States , itself a former colony of the UK .
Notable exceptions include  रवांडा , जिससे थी a पूर्व belgian उपनिवेश और इरित्रिया , जिससे थी an इतालवी उपनिवेश जहाँ the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य spanned  its control only in World War II and shortly after ( 1941-1952 ) .
India 's  भाषाई चित्र is जटिल  .
According to the Constitution of India , `` Hindi in the Devanagari script '' is the official language of the union ; and  अंग्रेज़ी the 'subsidiary आधिकारिक भाषा ' ; however , अंग्रेज़ी is mandated लिये the authoritative ग्रन्थ of सब संघीय कानून और परम् अदालत निर्णय और ( साथ साथ हिंदी ) is एक of the दो भाषाएं of the भारतीय  Parliament .
English is used  लगभग exclusively लिये उच्चतर शिक्षा , कारोबार और  science .
Courses in majority of the  स्कूलों हैं सिखाया exclusively  in English .
English  is extensively प्रयुक्त लिये प्रशासनिक  purposes in India .
इण्डिया is the second-largest english-speaking देश in the संसार by क्रमांक of अध्यक्षों , बाद the  United States .
As such , many  consider अंग्रेज़ी to be the de facto  official language of India .
See  आधिकारिक भाषाएं  of India .
The  भाषाई मेकअप of पाकिस्तानी is similarly जटिल  .
While the national language is  उर्दू , अंग्रेज़ी is an आधिकारिक भाषा और प्रयुक्त in कारोबार  , government and law .
English is a  अनिवार्य भाषा in स्कूलों  .
All school  पाठ्यक्रम हैं सिखाया in  English .
Pakistan is the 9th largest English-speaking  देश in the संसार by जनसांख्यिकी  .
दक्षिणी कोन ( , ) is a भौगोलिक प्रदेश रचित of the  southernmost areas of South America , south of the Tropic of Capricorn .
Although geographically  इस शामिल दक्षिणी और भाग of southeast ( são पाउलो ) of ब्राज़ील , in शर्तें of  political geography the Southern cone has traditionally comprised Argentina , Chile , Paraguay , and Uruguay .
In the narrowest sense , it only covers Argentina , Chile and Uruguay , bounded on the north by the states of Brazil ,  पैराग्वे , बोलीविया और पेरू , on the वेस्ट by the प्रशांत समंदर , और दक्षिण to the जंक्शन between the प्रशांत और अटलांटिक  Oceans , which it is the closest continental area of Antarctica ( 1000 km ) .
High life expectancy , the highest Human Development Index of Latin America , high  मानक of जीना , significant भागीदारी in the वैश्विक बाज़ार और the उभरते अर्थव्यवस्था of इसके सदस्यों मेक the दक्षिणी कोन the सबसे prosperous macro-region  in South America .
For multi-event athletic  प्रतियोगिताओं देखिए track और फ़ील्ड प्रतियोगिताओं  , section `` Meetings '' .
Meetings are  sometimes आयोजित  around conference tables .
In a meeting , two or  अधिक लोगों आइये साथ to discuss एक or अधिक विषय , प्रायः in a औपचारिक  setting .
An official game in baseball , also sometimes called  a विनियमन खेल , is a खेल कि रै progressed परे the पाइंट at जिससे it can be माना  complete if necessary .
This is  लगभग the halfway पाइंट of the खेल  .
In the case of  inclement मौसम , कोई खेल जिससे रै पहुँचे इस पाइंट may be रोका और shortened as needed , साथ the परिणाम होने फाइनल ,  and all records and statistics counted .
A game which has not reached this point before being stopped is either considered a  निलंबित खेल ( to be जारी at a बाद तिथि इससे the पाइंट of stoppage ) , or is बस रद्द और replayed इससे the प्रारंभ  .
( This depends on  the नियम of प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत लीग  . )
In either case ,  no आंकडे हैं गिने जबतक the खेल becomes  official .
Since most professional  बेसबॉल खेल हैं नौ पारी long , the पांचवां inning is प्रयुक्त as the दहलीज  for an official game .
If the visiting team is leading , or the game  is tied , the समाप्त of the पांचवां inning marks इस  point .
If the home team ( which bats last )  is already ahead in the स्कोर , और theoretically होता नहीं need इसके हाफ of the पांचवां inning , तब 41⁄2 पारी ( i.e. , the  middle of the fifth ) is considered an official game .
The game is also considered official if  the घर टोली स्कोर to लो the सीसे in the नीचे of the पांचवां inning , चूंकि the खेल होता समाप्त तत्काल if the वही बात happened in  the ninth .
In nearly all cases , the `` official game ''  औकात is प्रयुक्त to determine whether a बरसात जाँच होगा be सम्मानित लिये प्रशंसक पकड़कर  tickets .
If a game is started but does  नहीं पहुँचें the पाइंट of बनने आधिकारिक , प्रशंसक हैं हकदार to a नई टिकट लिये the make-up खेल or ( in सबसे मामले  ) any other available game of their choice .
If a game is halted  बाद it becomes आधिकारिक , the खेल is बस shortened और no बरसात जाँच is दिए  .
The ``  आधिकारिक खेल '' statistic प्राप्त कुछ ध्यान दौरान the 1995 ऋतु , जब कैलोरी ripken , jr.  was approaching the record for consecutive games played , previously held by Lou Gehrig .
Large  संख्याएँ यहूद लटका on the पक्ष of the b & o गोदाम at oriole पार्क at camden  Yards to show the number of games in Ripken 's streak .
Each day , a new number was  unfurled दौरान the पांचवां inning बाद प्रत्येक खेल था become आधिकारिक  ( since the statistic would not have counted if the game had been stopped before that point ) .
A similar practice has been used to count down toward the demolition of several stadiums ( including  दिग्गजों स्टेडियम in फिलाडेल्फिया in 2003 , बुच मेमोरियल स्टेडियम in st. लुई in 2005 , और the असली यांकी स्टेडियम और shea स्टेडियम in नई यॉर्क नगर in 2008 ) ; as प्रत्येक खेल became आधिकारिक , the  team would unveil a new ( lower ) number showing the number of games left to be played in the stadium .
A telephone  क्रमांक or फोन क्रमांक is a अनुक्रम of अंक प्रयुक्त to कॉल इससे एक टेलीफोन लकीर to another  in a public switched telephone network .
जब टेलीफोन संख्याएँ यहूद invented , वे यहूद छोटी — as few as एक , दो or तीन अंक  — and were given orally to a switchboard operator .
As  फोन प्रणालियों have grown और interconnected  to encompass the world , telephone numbers have become longer .
In addition to telephones , they now access  अन्य डिवाइस , ऐसे as कंप्यूटर और फैक्स मशीने  .
The number contains the  सूचना जरुरी to पहचानो uniquely the intended  endpoint for the telephone call .
Each such  endpoint जरूर have a अद्वितीय क्रमांक भीतर the पब्लिक switched टेलीफोन  network .
Most countries use fixed length  संख्याएँ ( लिये सामान्य लाइनों at तनिक ) और इसलिए the क्रमांक of endpoints  determines the necessary length of the telephone number .
It is also possible for each subscriber to have a set of  shorter संख्याएँ लिये the endpoints सबसे प्रायः  used .
These `` shorthand '' or  `` गति कॉलिंग '' संख्याएँ हैं automatically अनूदित to अद्वितीय टेलीफोन संख्याएँ पहले the  call can be connected .
Some special services have their own short numbers ( e.g. , 1-1-9 , 9-1-1 , 0-0-0 ,  9-9-9 , 1-1-1 , और 1-1-2 होने the आपात सेवाएं संख्याएँ लिये चीन , जापानी , दक्षिण कोरियाई , ताईवान और श्री लंका ; कनाडा और the संयुक्त राज्य ; ऑस्ट्रेलिया ; the संयुक्त किंगडम , आयरलैंड , दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी , कैंडल , सऊदी अरब , the संयुक्त अरब अमीरात , मोरक्को , मकाओ , बहरीन , क़तर , बांग्लादेश , बोत्सवाना , घाना , कीनिया , हांग काँग , मलेशिया , मॉरीशस , सिंगापुर  , Zimbabwe , Trinidad , Tobago ; New Zealand ; Kuwait and the European Union , respectively . )
Many systems also allow calls within  a लोकल क्षेत्रफल to be बना बगैर डायलिंग the  local area code .
For example  , a फोन क्रमांक in उत्तर अमेरिका होगा प्रारंभ साथ तीन संख्याएँ ( ऐसे as 661 ) , जिससे is the  area code , followed by seven digits split into sections of three and four ( such as 550-1212 ) , which is the local number .
Some  क्षेत्रों अभी have अनिवार्य ten-digit डायलिंग  in place , even for local calls .
Most telephone networks today ( exceptions being private intercom and  सुरक्षित फोन संजाल ) हैं interconnected in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय टेलीफोन संजाल , जहाँ the स्वरूप of टेलीफोन संख्याएँ is मानकीकृत by itu-t in the अनुशंसा  E.164 .
This specifies that the entire number should be 15 digits or  shorter , और शुरू साथ a देश उपसर्ग  .
For most countries  , इस is followed by an क्षेत्रफल कोड or नगर कोड और the सदस्य क्रमांक , जिससे  might consist of the code for a particular telephone exchange .
ITU-T recommendation E.123 describes how to represent an international telephone number in  लिखने or छपाई , starting साथ a प्लस चिह्न ( `` + '' ) और the देश  code .
जब कॉलिंग an अंतरराष्ट्रीय क्रमांक इससे a फिक्स्ड लकीर फोन , the + जरूर be replaced  with the international call prefix chosen by the country the call is being made from .
Some mobile  फोन allow the + to be डाला  directly .
the स्वरूप और आवंटन of लोकल फोन संख्याएँ हैं नियंत्रित by प्रत्येक स्वदेश 's संबंधित सरकारी , either सीधे or by  sponsored organizations ( such as NANPA overseen by NeuStar Inc. ) .
पहले a टेलीफोन कॉल is कनेक्ट , the टेलीफोन क्रमांक जरूर  be dialed by the calling party or Caller .
The called party might have equipment that  presents कॉलर id पहले the  call is answered .
A  संग्रहण एजेंसी is a कारोबार कि pursues भुगतान of debts owed  by individuals or businesses .
Most  संग्रहण एजेंसियों operate as एजेंटों of लेनदारों और collect  debts for a fee or percentage of the total amount owed .
There are many  प्रकार of संग्रहण  agencies .
First-party agencies are  oftentimes subsidiaries of the असली कम्पनी the कर्ज़  is owed to .
third-party एजेंसियों हैं पृथक कंपनियाँ contracted by a कम्पनी to collect debts  on their behalf for a fee .
Debt  खरीदार खरीदें the कर्ज़ at a प्रतिशत  of its value , then attempt to collect it .
Each  देश रै इसके अपना नियम और regulations  regarding them .
कैनबिस पुष्प साथ दृश्य  trichomes
Cannabis , also known as marijuana ( from  the मैक्सिकन स्पेनी marihuana ) , और by अन्य names , is a तैयारी of the कैनबिस  plant intended for use as a psychoactive drug and as medicine .
Pharmacologically , the principal  psychoactive constituent of कैनबिस is tetrahydrocannabinol ( thc ) ; it is एक of 483 ज्ञात यौगिकों in the संयंत्र  , including at least 84 other cannabinoids , such as cannabidiol ( CBD ) , cannabinol ( CBN ) , tetrahydrocannabivarin ( THCV ) .
and  cannabigerol ( cbg  ) .
This is a list of American football quarterbacks who have started for the Washington Redskins , as  खूब as इसके पूर्ववर्तियों the बोस्टन braves ( 1932 ) और बोस्टन redskins ( 1933 – 1936 ) , in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल )  .
The Washington Redskins franchise was originally founded in Boston ,  मैसाचुसेट्स as the बोस्टन braves , नामित बाद the लोकल बेसबॉल मताधिकार .
The name was changed  the following साल to the redskins  .
In  1937 , the मताधिकार स्थानांतरित to वॉशिंगटन  , D.C .
Of  the 49 redskins starting quarterbacks , दो have महरूम inducted into the प्रो फ़ुटबॉल हॉल  of Fame : Sammy Baugh and Sonny Jurgensen .

1st Special Forces  operational detachment-delta ( 1st sfod-d ) , popularly ज्ञात as डेल्टा फ़ोर्स , is एक of the संयुक्त राज्य  ' four secretive tier-one counter-terrorism and Special Mission Units .
It was formerly listed as the  कॉम्बैट अनुप्रयोग समूह by the विभाग of रक्षा लकिन रै चूंकि महरूम officially re-designated the  Army Compartmented Elements ( ACE ) .
While 1st SFOD-D is administratively  समर्थित by usasoc , it जलप्रपात अंतर्गत the operational कंट्रोल of the संयुक्त खास परिचालन  Command .
Delta Force and its Navy counterpart , the Naval  खास warfare विकास समूह , हैं the संयुक्त राज्य सैन्य 's प्राथमिक  counter-terrorism units .
Delta Force 's  प्राथमिक कार्य हैं counter-terrorism , सीधा कार्रवाई , और नेशनल हस्तक्षेप परिचालन , हालांकि it is an अत्यधिक  versatile group capable of conducting many types of covert missions , including , but not limited to , hostage rescues and raids .
The Central Intelligence Agency 's highly secretive Special Activities Division ( SAD ) and more  specifically इसके elite खास परिचालन समूह ( sog ) प्रायः works साथ – और रंगरूटों – ऑपरेटर इससे  Delta Force .
Alpha decay is one example type of radioactive  क्षय , in जिससे an परमाणु केंद्रक emits an अल्फा कण , और thereby परिणत ( or 'क्षयs ' ) into an अणु साथ  a mass number 4 less and atomic number 2 less .
अनेक अन्य प्रकार of decays हैं  possible .
Radioactive decay , also known  as नाभिकीय क्षय or radioactivity , is the प्रक्रम by जिससे a केंद्रक of an अस्थिर अणु loses उर्जा  by emitting particles of ionizing radiation .
A material that spontaneously emits this  दयालु of विकिरण — जिससे शामिल the उत्सर्जन of ऊर्जावान अल्फा अणु , बीटा अणु ,  and gamma rays — is considered radioactive .
There  हैं अनेक अलग प्रकार of रेडियोसक्रिय  decay ( see table below ) .
A  क्षय , or घाटा of उर्जा , परिणाम जब an अणु साथ एक प्रकार of केंद्रक , पुकारा the जनक radionuclide , परिणत to an अणु साथ  a nucleus in a different state , or to a different nucleus containing different numbers of protons and neutrons .
either of ये उत्पाद is नामित the  daughter nuclide .
In some decays the parent and daughter are different chemical elements ,  और यूँ the क्षय प्रक्रम परिणाम in नाभिकीय transmutation ( सृष्टि of an अणु of a नई  element ) .
The first decay  प्रक्रियाओं to be खोजा यहूद अल्फा क्षय , बीटा क्षय  , and gamma decay .
Alpha decay occurs when the  केंद्रक ejects an अल्फा कण ( हीलियम केंद्रक )  .
This is the most  आम प्रक्रम of emitting nucleons , लकिन in rarer प्रकार of decays , nuclei can eject protons , or  specific nuclei of other elements ( in the process called cluster decay ) .
Beta decay occurs when the nucleus emits an  इलेक्ट्रॉन or positron और a प्रकार of न्यूट्रिनो , in a प्रक्रम कि परिवर्तन a प्रोटॉन to a  neutron or the other way around .
The nucleus may capture  an orbiting इलेक्ट्रॉन , converting a प्रोटॉन into a न्यूट्रॉन ( इलेक्ट्रॉन कैप्चर  ) .
All of these  प्रक्रियाओं परिणाम in नाभिकीय transmutation  .
by कंट्रास्ट , वहीँ मौजूद रेडियोसक्रिय  decay processes that do not result in transmutation .
The energy of an excited nucleus may be emitted as a gamma ray in gamma decay , or used to eject an  कक्षीय इलेक्ट्रॉन by बातचीत साथ the उत्साहित केंद्रक in a प्रक्रम पुकारा आतंरिक परिवर्तन  .
Radioisotopes  occasionally emit neutrons , और इस परिणाम in a बदलें in an तत्व इससे एक समस्थानिक to another  .
One type of  रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय परिणाम in उत्पाद जिससे हैं नहीं पारिभाषित  , but appear in a range of `` pieces '' of the original nucleus .
This  क्षय is पुकारा spontaneous परिवर्द्धन .
This decay happens when a large unstable nucleus spontaneously splits  into दो ( और occasionally तीन ) छोटी बेटी nuclei , और प्रायः emits गामा किरणें , neutrons , or अन्य अणु  as a consequence .
Radioactive decay is a stochastic ( i.e. , random ) process at the level  of सिंगल अणु , in कि , according to क्वांटम सिद्धान्त , it is नामुमकिन to भविष्यवाणी  when a particular atom will decay .
However , the  मौका कि a दिए अणु होगा क्षय  is constant over time .
For a large number of atoms ,  the क्षय रेट लिये the संग्रहण is computable इससे the measured क्षय स्थिरांक of the न्यूक्लाइड  ( or equivalently from the half-lifes ) .
Waxing is a form of  semi-permanent बाल हटाना जिससे removes the बाल इससे the  root .
New hair will not grow back in the  previously waxed क्षेत्रफल लिये दो to आठ सप्ताह , हालांकि कुछ लोगों होगा प्रारंभ to देखिए  regrowth in only a week .
Almost any area of the body can be waxed ,  सहित eyebrows , फेस , बिकिनी क्षेत्रफल , टाँगे , बाहें , वापस , उदर  and feet .
There are many types of waxing  उपयुक्त लिये निकालना अनावश्यक बाल  .
Strip waxing is  संपन्नता by spreading a मोम thinly over the  skin .
A cloth or paper  स्ट्रिप is तब दबाया on the शीर्ष और ripped बंद the  direction of hair growth .
This removes  the मोम साथ साथ the बाल  .
Strip wax can also be made at home  using नीबू रस , जल , शुगर और मधु  .
hot वैक्सिंग utilizes hot मोम  ( as opposed to strip wax ) .
In this  मामला , the मोम is लागू somewhat thickly और साथ no  cloth or paper strips .
The wax then hardens when it cools , thus allowing  the आसान हटाना by a चिकित्सक बगैर the सहायता of  cloths .
This  वैक्सिंग विधि is बहुत फायदेमंद  to people who have sensitive skin .
Wall  पेंटिंग ( 1st सदी ad ) इससे pompeii depicting  a multigenerational banquet
Ancient Roman  संस्कृति existed throughout the लगभग 1200-year इतिहास of the  civilization of Ancient Rome .
The term refers to the culture  of the रोमन गणतंत्र , बाद the रोमन साम्राज्य , जिससे , at इसके शिखर , covered an क्षेत्रफल इससे lowland स्कॉटलैंड  and Morocco to the Euphrates .
Life in ancient Rome revolved around the city of Rome , its famed seven hills , and its monumental structures such as the Flavian  amphitheatre ( अभी पुकारा the कोलोसियम ) , the फ़ोरम of त्राजान , और the pantheon  .
the नगर भी था अनेक थिएटर , gymnasiums , और अनेक taverns  , baths , and brothels .
Throughout the territory  अंतर्गत प्राचीन रोम 's कंट्रोल , आवासीय वास्तुकला ranged इससे बहुत modest घरों to देश विला , और in the पूंजी नगर of रोम , वहीँ यहूद इम्पीरियल  residences on the elegant Palatine Hill , from which the word palace is derived .
The vast majority of the  जनसांख्यिकी जिया in the नगर बीच , packed into insulae ( अपार्टमेंट ब्लॉक  ) .
The city of Rome was the largest megalopolis of  कि समय , साथ a जनसांख्यिकी कि may खूब have exceeded एक लाख लोगों , साथ a ऊँची समाप्त  estimate of 3.6 million and a low end estimate of 450,000 .
Historical  estimates indicate कि around 30 प्रतिशत of the जनसांख्यिकी अंतर्गत the नगर 's क्षेत्राधिकार जिया in innumerable शहरी centers , साथ  population of at least 10,000 and several military settlements , a very high rate of urbanization by pre-industrial standards .
The most urbanized part of the Empire was Italy ,  जिससे था an अनुमानित रेट of शहरी of 32 % , the वही रेट of शहरी of इंग्लैण्ड  in 1800 .
सबसे रोमन कस्बों और शहरों था a फ़ोरम , मंदिरों और the वही प्रकार of  buildings , on a smaller scale , as found in Rome .
The large urban population required an endless  सप्लाई of खाना जिससे थी a जटिल logistical कार्य , सहित acquiring , transporting , storing और वितरण of खाना लिये रोम और अन्य  urban centers .
Italian farms  supplied सब्जियां और फल , लकिन मछली और मांस  were luxuries .
Aqueducts were  निर्मित to लाओ जल to शहरी centers और वाइन और आयल यहूद आयातित  from Hispania , Gaul and Africa .
There was a  बहुत विशाल राशि of कॉमर्स between the प्रांतों of the रोमन  Empire , since its transportation technology was very efficient .
The average costs of  हस्तांतरण और the प्रौद्योगिकी यहूद comparable  with 18th-century Europe .
The later city of Rome did not fill  the स्पेस भीतर इसके प्राचीन aurelian दीवारें जबतक बाद  1870 .
Eighty percent of the  जनसांख्यिकी अंतर्गत the क्षेत्राधिकार of प्राचीन रोम जिया in the  countryside in settlements with less than 10 thousand inhabitants .
जमींदार generally resided in शहरों और उनके estates  were left in the care of farm managers .
The plight of  ग्रामीण स्लेव थी generally बदतर than  their counterparts working in urban aristocratic households .
To stimulate a higher labor productivity  सबसे जमींदार freed a विशाल क्रमांक of स्लेव और अनेक प्राप्त मजदूरी  .
Some records indicate that `` as many as 42 people lived in one  छोटी फार्म हट in मिश्र , जबकि छह परिवारों स्वामित्व a सिंगल ज़ैतून पेड़ .  '' .
Such a  ग्रामीण पर्यावरण जारी to induce माइग्रेशन of जनसांख्यिकी to शहरी centers जबतक the जल्दी 2nd सदी , जब the शहरी जनसांख्यिकी  stopped growing and started to decline .
starting in the मध्य of the 2nd सदी bc , निजी यूनानी संस्कृति थी increasingly  in ascendancy , in spite of tirades against the `` softening '' effects of Hellenized culture from the conservative moralists .
By the time of Augustus , cultured Greek  household स्लेव सिखाया the रोमन यंग ( sometimes भी the लड़कियों ) ; शेफ़ , decorators , secretaries ,  doctors , and hairdressers—all came from the Greek East .
Greek sculptures adorned Hellenistic  लैंडस्केप बागवानी on the palatine or in the विला , or यहूद imitated in रोमन  sculpture yards by Greek slaves .
The Roman cuisine preserved  in the cookery किताबे ascribed to apicius is essentially  Greek .
Roman writers disdained Latin  लिये a संस्कारी यूनानी स्टाइल  .
तभी in विधि और शासन थी the तिरछा प्रकृति of रोम 's  accretive culture supreme .
Against this human background , both the urban and rural setting  , एक of इतिहास 's सबसे influential सभ्यताओं took आकार , leaving पीछे  a cultural legacy that survives in part today .
James Joseph `` Duffy '' Waldorf ,  jr. ( born अगस्त 20 , 1962 ) is an अमरीकी पेशेवर मनःस्थिति  .
Glass bottles ( for  खीरा स्लाइस ) on शिपिंग pallets
A  सोवियत मेयोनेज़  jar
A  आधुनिक `` फ्रेंच kilner  '' jar
Glass production involves two main methods – the float glass  प्रक्रम , जिससे produces चादर कांच , और glassblowing जिससे produces बोतलों और अन्य containers  .
A season is a subdivision of the year , marked  by परिवर्तन in मौसम , पारिस्थितिकी , और घंटों of daylight  .
Seasons result from the yearly revolution of  the धरती around the सूर्य और the झुकाव of the धरती 's अक्ष सापेक्ष to the प्लेन of क्रान्ति  .
In temperate and polar regions , the seasons are marked by changes in the intensity of sunlight that reaches the Earth 's surface ,  विसंगतियाँ of जिससे may कारण पशु to go into शीतनिष्क्रियता or to  migrate , and plants to be dormant .
During May , June and July  , the उत्तरी गोलार्ध is उजागर to अधिक सीधा  sunlight because the hemisphere faces the sun .
The same is true of  the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध in नवम्बर , दिसम्बर और जनवरी  .
It is the tilt of the Earth that  कल्याणकारी the सूर्य to be उच्चतर in the आसमान दौरान the गर्मियाँ महीने  which increases the solar flux .
However , due to seasonal lag , June , July and August are the  hottest महीने in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध और दिसम्बर , जनवरी और फ़रवरी हैं the hottest महीने in the दक्षिणी  hemisphere .
In temperate and  subpolar regions , generally चार पंचांग -आधारd सीज़न ( साथ उनके adjectives ) हैं पहचाना : वसन्त ( vernal  ) , summer ( estival ) , autumn ( autumnal ) and winter ( hibernal ) .
However , ecologists mostly  उपयोग a छह ऋतु मॉडल लिये शीतोष्ण जलवायु regions कि शामिल pre-spring ( prevernal ) और लेट गर्मियाँ ( serotinal ) as पृथक  seasons along with the traditional four .
Hot regions have two or three seasons ; the  बरसात ( or गीला , or मानसून ) ऋतु और the शुष्क ऋतु , और in कुछ तीव्र  areas , a cool or mild season .
In some parts of the world ,  खास `` सीज़न '' हैं loosely पारिभाषित आधारित on महत्वपूर्ण कार्यक्रम ऐसे as a hurricane ऋतु ,  tornado season or a wildfire season .
the छह ecological  seasons
The  चार पंचांग सीज़न , चित्रित in an प्राचीन  Roman mosaic from Tunisia
The Battle of Fort Sumter (  अप्रैल 12–14 , 1861 ) थी the बमबारी और आत्मसमर्पण of फोर्ट sumter ,  near Charleston , South Carolina , that started the American Civil War .
Following declarations of secession by seven Southern  राज्य , दक्षिण कैरोलिना मांगे कि the u.S. फौज लापरवाही इसके सुविधाएं in चार्ल्सटन  Harbor .
On December 26 , 1860 , U.S. Major Robert Anderson surreptitiously moved his  छोटी कमांड इससे the indefensible फोर्ट moultrie on सुलीवान 's द्वीप to फोर्ट sumter , a substantial किला controlling  the entrance of Charleston Harbor .
An attempt by U.S. President James Buchanan to reinforce and resupply Anderson , using the unarmed merchant  जलयान स्टार of the वेस्ट , विफल जब it थी fired upon by shore बैटरी on जनवरी 9 ,  1861 .
South Carolina  अधिकारियों तब जब्त सब संघीय प्रॉपर्टी in the चार्ल्सटन  area , except for Fort Sumter .
During the  जल्दी महीने of 1861 , the हालात around फोर्ट  Sumter increasingly began to resemble a siege .
In March , Brig . Gen. P. G. T. Beauregard , the first general  अधिकारी of the newly formed confederate राज्य of अमेरिका , थी लगाई in कमांड of confederate  forces in Charleston .
Beauregard  energetically निर्देशित the strengthening of बैटरी around  Charleston harbor aimed at Fort Sumter .
Conditions in the fort  grew dire as the संघ सैनिको rushed to पूरा the संस्थापना of अतिरिक्त  guns .
Anderson  थी छोटी of मेन , खाना , और  supplies .
The  resupply of फोर्ट sumter became the पहला संकट  of the administration of President Abraham Lincoln .
He notified the Governor of South Carolina , Francis W.  pickens , कि he थी sending सप्लाई जहाजों , जिससे resulted in an ultimatum इससे the confederate सरकारी : evacuate  Fort Sumter immediately .
प्रमुख एंडरसन refused to आत्मसमर्पण  .
Beginning at 4:30 a.m. on  अप्रैल 12 , the confederates bombarded the  fort from artillery batteries surrounding the harbor .
Although the Union  गैरीसन लौटे आग , वे यहूद significantly outgunned और , बाद 34  hours , Major Anderson agreed to evacuate .
There was no loss of life on either side  as a सीधा परिणाम of इस सगाई , हालांकि a गन विस्फोट  during the surrender ceremonies on April 14 caused two Union deaths .
Following the battle , there was widespread  support इससे दोनो उत्तर और दक्षिण लिये further सैन्य कार्रवाई  .
Lincoln 's immediate call for 75,000  स्वयंसेवक to दबाने the विद्रोह resulted in an अतिरिक्त चार दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य भी declaring  their secession and joining the Confederacy .
The Civil  युद्ध था begun  .
3G , short for third Generation , is  the तीसरा पीढी of मोबाईल दूरसंचार प्रौद्योगिकी  .
3G  दूरसंचार संजाल support सेवाएं कि provide an सूचना  transfer rate of at least 200 kbit/s .
however , अनेक सेवाएं advertised as 3g provide उच्चतर  speed than the minimum technical requirements for a 3G service .
Recent 3G releases , often  denoted 3.5g और 3.75g , भी provide मोबाईल ब्रॉडबैंड अभिगम of अनेक  Mbit/s to smartphones and mobile modems in laptop computers .
3G  पाता अनुप्रयोग in बेतार आवाज़ telephony , मोबाईल अंतरजाल अभिगम  , fixed wireless Internet access , video calls and mobile TV .
`` mazel tov ! '' लिखा on a  wine glass tag
traditionally , बाद the दूल्हे ब्रेक the कांच , the  guests shout `` Mazel Tov ! `` .
A birthday  केक , आइस्ड साथ the शब्द `` מזל טוב '' ( mazal tov )  , as is often done in Israel .
Here the phrase is  लिखा in यहूदी कर्सिव  .
`` Mazel tov '' or `` mazal tov '' ( Hebrew / Yiddish : ``  מזל טוב '' , यहूदी : `` mazal tov '' ; यहूदी : `` mazel tov ''  ; lit .
`` good luck '' ) is a phrase used  to एक्स्प्रेस बधाई लिये a प्रसन्न और significant अवसर or इवेंट .
hepatitis c is an संक्रामक बीमारी affecting primarily  the liver , caused by the hepatitis C virus ( HCV ) .
The infection  is प्रायः asymptomatic , लकिन दीर्घकालिक संक्रमण can सीसे to scarring of the जिगर और ultimately  to cirrhosis , which is generally apparent after many years .
In some  मामले , those साथ cirrhosis होगा go on to develop जिगर विफलता , जिगर कर्कट or life-threatening  esophageal and gastric varices .
HCV is spread  primarily by blood-to-blood सम्पर्क संबद्ध साथ intravenous ड्रग उपयोग  , poorly sterilized medical equipment and transfusions .
An estimated 130–200  लाख लोगों विश्वव्यापी हैं संक्रमित साथ  .
The  अस्तित्व of ( originally `` non- a non- b hepatitis '' ) थी postulated  in the 1970s and proven in 1989 .
only  infects इंसानो और chimpanzees  .
The  वायरस persists in the जिगर in परिचय  85 % of those infected .
This persistent infection can be treated with  दवा : the मानक चिकित्सा is a संयोजन of peginterferon और ribavirin , साथ  either boceprevir or telaprevir added in some cases .
Overall  , 50–80 % of लोगों treated  are cured .
Those who  develop cirrhosis or जिगर कर्कट may आवश्यकता  a liver transplant .
is the leading cause of liver  प्रत्यारोपण , हालांकि the वायरस प्रायः बारंबार बाद प्रत्यारोपण .
No  टीका विरूद्ध is  available .
A flexible spending account ( FSA ) , also known as a flexible spending  व्यवस्था , is एक of a क्रमांक of tax-advantaged वित्तीय खाते कि can be नियत up through a कैफेटेरिया योजना  of an employer in the United States .
An FSA allows an employee to set aside a portion of earnings to pay for  योग्य खर्च as स्थापित in the कैफेटेरिया योजना , सबसे commonly लिये चिकित्सा खर्च  but often for dependent care or other expenses .
Money  deducted इससे an कर्मचारी 's अदा into an fsa is नहीं विषय to payroll कर  , resulting in substantial payroll tax savings .
One significant disadvantage  to using an fsa is कि निधि नहीं प्रयुक्त by the समाप्त of the योजना साल हैं खोया to the कर्मचारी , ज्ञात as the `` उपयोग  it or lose it '' rule .
The most common type of flexible spending account , the medical expense FSA (  भी चिकित्सा fsa or स्वास्थ्य fsa ) , is समान to a स्वास्थ्य बचत खाता ( hsa ) or a स्वास्थ्य reimbursement  account ( HRA ) .
however , जबकि hsas और hras हैं लगभग exclusively प्रयुक्त as components of a  consumer driven health care plan , medical FSAs are commonly offered with more traditional health plans as well .
In addition , funds in a  स्वास्थ्य बचत खाता हैं नहीं खोया जब the योजना साल is over  , unlike funds in an FSA .
पेपर फ़ॉर्म or an fsa डेबिट कार्ड , भी ज्ञात as a  Flexcard , may be used to access the account funds .
टेनेसी ( ) ( ) is a u.S.  state located in the Southeastern United States .
टेनेसी is the 36th सबसे extensive और the 17th सबसे populous  of the 50 United States .
Tennessee is bordered by Kentucky and Virginia to the north , North Carolina to the east ,  जॉर्जिया , अलबामा , और मिसिसिपी to the दक्षिण , और अरकंसास और मिसौरी to the  west .
The  एपलाशियन kyu dominate the पूर्वी भाग of the राज्य , और the मिसिसिपी  River forms the state 's western border .
Tennessee 's capital and  दूसरी largest नगर is नैशविले , जिससे रै a  population of 609,644 .
Memphis is the state  's largest नगर , साथ a जनसांख्यिकी of  652,050 .
The state of Tennessee  is rooted in the watauga संघ , a 1772 frontier अनुबंध generally regarded as the  first constitutional government west of the Appalachians .
What is now Tennessee  थी initially भाग of उत्तर कैरोलिना , और बाद भाग of the दक्षिणपश्चिम  Territory .
Tennessee was  admitted to the संघ as the 16th  state on June 1 , 1796 .
Tennessee was the last state to  छोड़ the संघ और जुड़ें the confederacy at the outbreak of the u.S. सिविल युद्ध in 1861 , और the पहला राज्य to be readmitted  to the Union at the end of the war .
Tennessee furnished more  सैनिको लिये the confederate फौज than कोई अन्य राज्य , और अधिक सैनिको  for the Union Army than any other Southern state .
In  the 20th सदी , टेनेसी transitioned इससे an कृषिक अर्थव्यवस्था to a अधिक diversified  economy , aided at times by federal entities such as the Tennessee Valley Authority .
In the early 1940s , the city of Oak Ridge was  स्थापित to हाउस the मैनहटन प्रोजेक्ट 's यूरेनियम संवर्धन सुविधाएं  , helping to build the world 's first atomic bomb .
Tennessee has played a critical role in the development of many forms  of अमरीकी लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक , सहित चट्टान और फेंकें , ब्लूज़ , देश , और rockabilly .
Beale Street in Memphis is considered by many to be the birthplace of the  ब्लूज़ , साथ संगीतकारों ऐसे as w.c . सुलभ performing in  its clubs as early as 1909 .
Memphis was also home to Sun Records ,  जहाँ संगीतकारों ऐसे as एल्विस प्रेस्ली , इसहाक़ हेज़ , जॉनी नकदी , कार्ल perkins , जेरी ली लुईस , रॉय orbison , और चार्ली समृद्ध began उनके  recording careers , and where rock and roll took shape in the 1950s .
The 1927 Victor  रिकॉर्डिंग सत्र in ब्रिस्टल generally चिह्नित the शुरूआत of the देश म्यूज़िक विधा और the वृद्धि of the  Grand Ole Opry in the 1930s helped make Nashville the center of the country music recording industry .
Three bricks and mortar museums recognize  टेनेसी 's भूमिका in nurturing विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म of लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक : the मेम्फिस चट्टान n ' आत्मा संग्रहालय , the देश म्यूज़िक हॉल of कीर्ति और संग्रहालय  in Nashville , and the International Rock-A-Billy Museum in Jackson .
In addition ,  the rockabilly हॉल of कीर्ति , an ऑनलाइन साईट recognizing the विकास of rockabilly  in which Tennessee played a crucial role , is based in Nashville .
Tennessee 's  प्रमुख उद्योग शामिल कृषि , निर्माण , और पर्यटन  .
Poultry ,  soybeans , और चौपायों हैं the राज्य 's प्राथमिक agricultural उत्पाद , और प्रमुख  manufacturing exports include chemicals , transportation equipment , and electrical equipment .
The Great  smoky kyu नेशनल पार्क , the स्वदेश 's सबसे visited नेशनल पार्क , is headquartered in the पूर्वी भाग of the राज्य , और a खण्ड of the एपलाशियन ट्रेल  roughly follows the Tennessee-North Carolina border .
Other major  पर्यटक आकर्षण शामिल the टेनेसी एक्वेरियम in चट्टानूगा , the sunsphere in knoxville , dollywood in कबूतर forge , the पार्थेनन , the देश म्यूज़िक हॉल of कीर्ति और  Museum , and Ryman Auditorium in Nashville , and Elvis Presley 's Graceland residence and tomb in Memphis .
One design  रूपांतर of a मुर्गा  ring .
A cock ring is a ring that can be placed around a man 's  शिश्न , प्रायः at the आधार , primarily to slow the प्रवाह of रक्त इससे the वीर्यपात penile ऊतक , यूँ maintaining an स्तंभन लिये a much longer  period of time .
Cock rings can be worn around just the penis or both  the शिश्न और scrotum , or बस the scrotum अलोन , हालांकि इस is प्रायः पुकारा  a testicle cuff .
Rings can be made of a variety  of अलग सामग्री , सबसे commonly चमड़े , रबर , or silicone , हालांकि नायलॉन  and metal are also used either as the main component or part of the closure .
The term  मुर्गा रिंग is sometimes प्रयुक्त as a पर्याय लिये a प्रिंस अल्बर्ट piercing , a piercing of the  penis that is usually , though not always , a metal ring .
When used in cases of erectile  dysfunction वे हैं ज्ञात by विभिन्न names ऐसे as `` स्तंभन रिंग '' और `` टेंशन  ring '' .
The  मुख्यालय of प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल at 245 पार्क एवेन्यू , midtown मैनहटन ,  New York City , USA .
Major League Baseball ( MLB ) is a professional  बेसबॉल लीग , consisting of टीमों कि खेल in the नेशनल लीग और the अमरीकी  League .
Dating to 1876 and 1901  क्रमशः , the दो लीग मिलाया in 2000 into a सिंगल संगठन led by the कमिश्नर  of Baseball , after 100 years as separate legal entities .
MLB constitutes one of the major professional sports  लीग of the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा  .
it is रचित of 30 टीमों — 29 in the संयुक्त  States and one in Canada .
Teams in MLB play 162 games each  ऋतु over छह महीने ( अप्रैल through सितंबर  ) .
Five teams in each  लीग अग्रिम to a four-round postseason टूर्नामेंट कि culminates in the संसार श्रेणी , a best-of-seven-games  championship series between the two league champions which dates to 1903 .
The organization oversees many minor-league  बेसबॉल लीग जिससे operate परिचय 240 टीमों संबद्ध साथ the  major-league clubs .
With the International Baseball Federation  , the लीग भी manages the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संसार बेसबॉल  Classic tournament .
MLB has the highest season attendance of any sports league in  the संसार साथ nearly 75 लाख spectators in 2012 .
Delaware ( ) is a U.S. state  स्तिथ on the अटलांटिक coast in the mid-atlantic  region of the United States .
It is bordered to  the दक्षिण और वेस्ट by मेरीलैंड , to the पूर्वोत्तर by नई जर्सी , और to the उत्तर by  Pennsylvania .
The  राज्य takes इसके नाम इससे थामस वेस्ट , 3rd सामन्त de la warr , an अंग्रेज़ी nobleman और वर्जिनिया 's पहला  colonial governor , after whom what is now called Cape Henlopen was originally named .
Delaware  is स्तिथ in the northeastern portion of the delmarva प्रायद्वीप और is the दूसरी smallest , the छठे तनिक  populous , but the sixth most densely populated of the fifty United States .
Delaware is  विभाजित into तीन काउंटी  .
From  उत्तर to दक्षिण , ये तीन काउंटी हैं नई किला  , Kent , and Sussex .
While the southern two counties have  historically महरूम predominantly agricultural , नई किला काउंटी रै महरूम अधिक industrialized  .
Before its coastline was explored by  europeans in the 16th सदी , डेलावेयर थी inhabited by अनेक समूह of देशी अमेरिकी , सहित the lenape in  the north and Nanticoke in the south .
It was initially  colonized by डच व्यापारियों at zwaanendael , स्तिथ निकट the उपस्थित  town of Lewes , in 1631 .
Delaware was one of the 13 colonies participating in the  अमरीकी क्रान्ति और on दिसम्बर 7 , 1787 , became the पहला राज्य to ratify the संविधान of the संयुक्त राज्य , thereby बनने ज्ञात as the पहला राज्य  .
Energy  परिवर्तन in उर्जा प्रणालियों भाषा
Energy  परिवर्तन or उर्जा परिवर्तन is the प्रक्रम of बदलना एक रूप of उर्जा  to another .
In physics , the term energy describes the capacity to produce certain  परिवर्तन भीतर a प्रणाली , बगैर लिहाज़ to सीमाएं in परिवर्तन  imposed by Entropy .
Changes in total energy of  प्रणालियों can तभी be संपन्नता by adding or subtracting उर्जा इससे उन्हें , as उर्जा is a मात्रा जिससे is conserved , according to the  first law of thermodynamics .
According to special  आपेक्षिकता , परिवर्तन in the उर्जा of प्रणालियों होगा भी coincide साथ परिवर्तन in the  system 's mass , and the total amount of mass of a system is a measure of its energy .
Energy in a  प्रणाली may be रूपांतरित so कि it resides in a अलग राज्य , or  a different type of energy .
Energy in many states  may be प्रयुक्त to do अनेक किस्में of शारीरिक  work .
उर्जा may be प्रयुक्त in प्राकृतिक प्रक्रियाओं or मशीने , or else to provide कुछ  service to society ( such as heat , light , or motion ) .
For example , an internal combustion  इंजन converts the संभावित रासायनिक उर्जा in गैसोलीन और ऑक्सीजन into ऊष्मा , जिससे is तब रूपांतरित  into the propulsive energy ( kinetic energy that moves a vehicle ) .
A solar cell  converts सौर विकिरण into विद्युत उर्जा कि can तब be प्रयुक्त to लाइट  a bulb or power a computer .
The generic name for a device which converts energy  इससे एक रूप to another , is a ट्रान्सड्यूसर  .
In general , most  प्रकार of उर्जा , सहेजें लिये थर्मल उर्जा , may be  converted efficiently to any other kind of energy .
Sometimes this occurs with an efficiency of essentially 100 % , such as when potential  उर्जा is परिवर्तित to गतिज उर्जा as an ऑब्जेक्ट जलप्रपात in वैक्यूम , or जब it orbits nearer or दूर इससे another  object , in space .
Conversion of other types of  energies to ऊष्मा may भी occurs साथ nearly पूर्ण दक्षता  ( many types of friction do this ) .
Exceptions  लिये पूर्ण परिवर्तन दक्षता ( भी लिये पृथक प्रणालियों ) occur जब उर्जा रै already महरूम partly वितरित among अनेक उपलब्धियाँ क्वांटम राज्य लिये a संग्रहण of अणु , जिससे हैं freely  allowed to explore any state of momentum and position ( phase space ) .
In  ऐसे हालातों , a माप पुकारा एन्ट्रॉपी , or evening-out of उर्जा वितरण in ऐसे राज्य  , dictates that future states of the system must be of at least equal evenness in energy distribution .
( There is no  रास्ता , लेने the ब्रह्मांड as a पूरे , to collect उर्जा into कम राज्य  , once it has spread to them ) .
A consequence of this requirement is that there are limitations  to the दक्षता साथ जिससे थर्मल उर्जा can be परिवर्तित to अन्य kinds of उर्जा , चूंकि थर्मल उर्जा in संतुलन at a दिए  temperature already represents the maximal evening-out of energy between all possible states .
Such energy is sometimes  माना `` degraded उर्जा , '' क्युकी it is नहीं entirely  usable .
The second law of thermodynamics is a way of stating that , for this reason , thermal energy in a system may be converted to other kinds of energy with efficiencies approaching 100 % , only if the entropy ( even-ness or disorder ) of  the ब्रह्मांड is increased by अन्य अर्थात् , to compensate लिये the घटी in एन्ट्रॉपी संबद्ध साथ the disappearance of the थर्मल उर्जा और इसके एन्ट्रॉपी  content .
Otherwise , only a part of thermal energy may be converted to other kinds of energy ( and  यूँ , उपयोगी कार्य ) , चूंकि the शेष of the ऊष्मा जरूर be सुरक्षित to be transferred to a थर्मल टंकी at a निम्नतर तापमान , in ऐसे a रास्ता कि the बढ़ाएँ in एन्ट्रॉपी लिये इस प्रक्रम अधिक than  compensates for the entropy decrease associated with transformation of the rest of the heat into other types of energy .
The National Hockey League ( NHL ; ) is an ``  unincorporated not-for-profit संघ '' जिससे operates a प्रमुख पेशेवर बर्फ हॉकी लीग of 30 franchised सदस्य क्लब , of जिससे सात हैं फिलहाल स्तिथ  in Canada and 23 in the United States .
Headquartered in New York City , the NHL is widely considered to be the premier professional ice  हॉकी लीग in the संसार , और एक of the प्रमुख पेशेवर खेल लीग in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा  .
The Stanley Cup , the oldest  पेशेवर खेल ट्रॉफी in उत्तर अमेरिका , is awarded annually to the लीग playoff  champion at the end of each season .
The league was  व्यवस्थित on नवम्बर 26 , 1917 , in मॉन्ट्रियल , क्यूबेक , कनाडा , बाद the बर्खास्तगी  of operations of its predecessor organization , the National Hockey Association ( NHA ) , which had been founded in 1909 .
It  प्रारंभ साथ चार टीमों और , through a श्रेणी of expansions , contractions , और relocations  , the league is now composed of 30 active franchises .
The nation to which the name  of the लीग originally referred थी कनाडा , हालांकि the लीग रै अभी महरूम  binational since 1924 when it expanded into the United States .
After a labour dispute  कि led to the रद्दीकरण of the संपूर्ण 2004–05 ऋतु , the लीग resumed खेल  under a new collective bargaining agreement that included a salary cap .
In 2009 ,  the एनएचएल enjoyed रिकार्ड highs in शर्तें of sponsorships , उपस्थिति  , and television audiences .
The NHL  draws अनेक अत्यधिक skilled खिलाड़ी इससे सब over the संसार  and currently has players from about 20 different countries .
Although  canadians have historically गठित the बहुमत of the खिलाड़ी in the एनएचएल , over the पास्ट चार प्लस दशकों the percentages of us और यूरोपीय खिलाड़ी have increased दोनो क्युकी of the एनएचएल 's जारी  expansion from six to thirty clubs since 1967 , and the increased availability of highly skilled European players .
This is the complete list of the ratified and  unratified amendments to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान जिससे प्राप्त the स्वीकृति of the संयुक्त  States Congress .
twenty-seven amendments have महरूम ratified चूंकि the असली हस्ताक्षर of the संविधान , the पहला टेन of  which are known collectively as the Bill of Rights .
The procedure for amending the United States  संविधान is governed by आलेख v of the असली  text .
There have been many other proposals for  amendments to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान introduced in कॉंग्रेस , लकिन नहीं सुपुर्द to  the states .
Before an amendment can take effect , it must be  प्रस्तावित to the राज्य by a two-thirds vote of दोनो घरों of कॉंग्रेस or by a सम्मेलन ( ज्ञात as an आलेख v सम्मेलन ) पुकारा by two-thirds of the राज्य , और ratified by three-fourths of the  states or by three-fourths of conventions thereof , the method of ratification being determined by Congress at the time of proposal .
To date , no convention for proposing amendments  रै महरूम पुकारा by the राज्य , और तभी once—in 1933 लिये the अनुसमर्थन of the twenty-first amendment —has the सम्मेलन विधि  of ratification been employed .
FMR LLC (  वफ़ादारी प्रबन्धन और शोध ) or वफ़ादारी निवेश is an अमरीकी  multinational financial services corporation .
It is one of the largest mutual fund and  वित्तीय सेवाएं समूह in the संसार  .
It was  संस्थापित in 1946 और serves उत्तर  American investors .
वफ़ादारी ventures is  its venture capital arm .
Fidelity International Limited ( FIL ) , was an international affiliate founded in  1969 , सेवारत सबसे देशों in the बाकी of the  world .
In  सितंबर 2011 , फील थी rebranded as 'fidelity  Worldwide Investment ' .
Fidelity Investments manages a large family of mutual funds , provides fund distribution  और निवेश सलाह सेवाएं , as खूब as providing छूट brokerage सेवाएं , रिटायरमेंट सेवाएं , माल प्रबन्धन , प्रतिभूति  execution and clearance , life insurance and a number of other services .

Sociology is the  वैज्ञानिक पढ़ाई of इंसान समाज और इसके origins , विकास  , organizations , and institutions .
It is a social  विज्ञान जिससे उपयोग विभिन्न विधि of अनुभवजन्य छानबीन और नाजुक विश्लेषण to develop a देह of ज्ञान  about human social activity , structures , and functions .
A goal for many sociologists is to conduct research which may be applied  सीधे to सोशल नीति और welfare , जबकि अन्य फ़ोकस primarily on शोधन the सैद्धांतिक समझना  of social processes .
Subject matter ranges from the micro level of individual agency and  बातचीत to the मैक्रो स्तर of प्रणालियों और the सोशल ढांचा  .
The traditional focuses  of समाजशास्त्र शामिल सोशल स्तरीकरण , सोशल क्लास , संस्कृति , रेस और नस्ल , लिंग  and sexuality , social mobility , religion , secularization , law , and deviance .
As all spheres of human activity are affected by the interplay between social structure  और व्यक्तिगत एजेंसी , समाजशास्त्र रै धीरे विस्तारित इसके फ़ोकस to further विषय , ऐसे as स्वास्थ्य , चिकित्सा , सैन्य और penal संस्थानों , the अंतरजाल , पर्यावरणीय समाजशास्त्र  , political economy and the role of social activity in the development of scientific knowledge .
The  दायरा of सोशल वैज्ञानिक विधि रै  also expanded .
सोशल शोधकर्ताओं चित्रण upon a किस्में of गुणात्मक  and quantitative techniques .
The linguistic and cultural  turns of the mid-twentieth सदी led to increasingly interpretative , hermeneutic  , and philosophic approaches to the analysis of society .
Conversely , recent decades have seen the rise of new  analytically , mathematically और computationally कठोर तकनीकों , ऐसे  as agent-based modelling and social network analysis .
Sociology should not be confused with various general  सोशल अध्ययन पाठ्यक्रम जिससे भालू छोटी संबंध to समाजशास्त्रीय सिद्धान्त or सोशल  science research methodology .
Thunder  is the ध्वनि caused by बिजली  .
Depending on the nature of the lightning and distance of the listener , thunder can range from a  शार्प , लाउड क्रैक to a long , कम rumble ( brontide ) .
The sudden increase in  दबाव और तापमान इससे बिजली produces रैपिड विस्तार of the एयर surrounding  and within a bolt of lightning .
In turn ,  इस विस्तार of एयर creates a सोनिक शॉक वेव , समान to a सोनिक बूम , जिससे produces the ध्वनि of थंडर , प्रायः referred to as a clap  , crack , or peal of thunder .
The distance of the  बिजली can be गणना by the श्रोता आधारित on the समय अंतराल इससे जब  the lightning is seen to when the sound is heard .
Palma ( , ,  ) , in पूरा पालमा de mallorca , is the प्रमुख नगर और बंदरगाहों on the द्वीप of majorca ( mallorca ) और पूंजी  city of the autonomous community of the Balearic Islands in Spain .
The names Ciutat de Mallorca ( City of Majorca ) and Ciutat (  नगर ) यहूद प्रयुक्त पहले the युद्ध of the स्पेनी उत्तराधिकार और हैं स्टिल प्रयुक्त by लोगों in majorca  .
however , the आधिकारिक नाम थी mallorca  , the same as the island .
It is situated on  the दक्षिण coast of the द्वीप on  the Bay of Palma .
As of the 2009 census , the population of the city of Palma  उचित थी 401,270 , और the जनसांख्यिकी of the संपूर्ण शहरी क्षेत्रफल थी 517,285 , रैंकिंग as the बारहवीं largest  urban area of Spain .
Almost  हाफ of the कुल जनसांख्यिकी of majorca  live in Palma .
The  cabrera द्वीपसमूह , हालांकि widely अलग इससे पालमा उचित , is administratively  considered part of the municipality .
Its  विमानक्षेत्र , बेटे सन्त जोन , serves over  22 million passengers each year .
The  marivent राजमहल थी offered by the नगर  to the then Prince Juan Carlos I of Spain .
The royals have since spent their  गर्मियाँ छुट्टियाँ in पालमा  .
luthor redirects  here .
For other  उपयोग , देखिए लूथर ( बहुविकल्पी  ) .
Alexander Joseph `` Lex '' Luthor is  a fictional अक्षर , a supervillain appearing in कॉमिक किताबे प्रकाशित  by DC Comics .
Luthor is the  archenemy of सुपरमैन , और as a high-status supervillain , रै भी आइये into विरोध  with Batman and other superheroes in the DC Universe .
Created  by जेरी siegel और जो shuster , the अक्षर पहला  appeared in Action Comics # 23 ( April 1940 ) .
Luthor is described as `` a  power-mad , दुष्ट वैज्ञानिक '' of ऊँची प्रज्ञा और अविश्वसनीय technological prowess  .
Luthor 's goals typically  बीच on हत्या सुपरमैन , the foremost बाधा to achieving the विलेन  's megalomaniacal goals .
Despite periodically wearing a powered  बहि , luthor रै traditionally lacked superpowers or a  dual identity .
The character was originally  चित्रित as a mad वैज्ञानिक जो , in the रग of गूदा novels , wreaks कहर on the संसार  with his futuristic weaponry .
In his earliest appearances ,  luthor is दिखाया साथ a पूरा सिर of रेड बाल  .
Despite this , the character later became  hairless as the परिणाम of an कलाकार  's mistake .
A 1960 story by Jerry Siegel expanded upon Luthor 's origin and motivations ,  revealing उसे to be a बाल्यकाल dost of सुपरमैन 's जो खोया उसके बाल जब a आग नष्ट उसके प्रयोगशाला  ; Luthor vowed revenge .
following the 1985 सीमित श्रेणी संकट on अनन्त earths , the अक्षर थी re-imagined as a machiavellian उद्योगपति  and white-collar criminal , even briefly serving as President of the United States .
In recent years ,  विभिन्न लेखक have revived luthor 's mad वैज्ञानिक  persona from the 1940s .
The character was ranked as the 8th  महानतम विलेन by जादूगर on इसके 100 महानतम खलनायक  of All Time list .
IGN 's list of the Top  100 कॉमिक किताब खलनायक of सब समय क्रमित luthor as  # 4 .
luthor is भी वर्णित as a `` megavillain '' by कॉमिक किताब आलोचक पीटर sanderson , एक of a few genre-crossing खलनायक जिनकी adventures लो प्लेस `` in a संसार in जिससे the ordinary कानून of प्रकृति हैं थोड़ा निलंबित '' ; वर्ण ऐसे as प्राध्यापक moriarty , गिनती ड्रैकुला , hannibal lecter  , Doctor Doom , and Darth Vader , also fit this description .
Martin Luther King , Jr. Day is a United States  संघीय अवकाश अंकन the जन्मदिवस of रेव . dr. मार्टिन लूथर किंग  , Jr .
It is observed on  the तीसरा सोमवार of जनवरी प्रत्येक साल , जिससे is around  the time of King 's birthday , January 15 .
the फ्लोटिंग अवकाश is समान to छुट्टियाँ नियत अंतर्गत the वर्दी सोमवार अवकाश  Act , though the act predated the establishment of Martin Luther King , Jr. Day by 15 years .
King  थी the मुख्य प्रवक्ता लिये nonviolent सक्रियता in the सिविल अधिकारों गति , जिससे सफलतापूर्वक  protested racial discrimination in federal and state law .
The  अभियान लिये a संघीय अवकाश in किंग 's सम्मान began  soon after his assassination in 1968 .
Ronald  reagan हस्ताक्षरित the अवकाश into विधि in 1983 , और it थी पहला  observed on January 20 , 1986 .
At  पहला , कुछ राज्य resisted observing the अवकाश as ऐसे , giving it वैकल्पिक  names or combining it with other holidays .
It was  officially observed in सब 50 राज्य लिये the पहला  time in 2000 .
The camera phone  समाधान allows तत्काल sharing of तस्वीरें  .
As it 's  स्वचालित और तत्काल , the उपयोक्ता करता नहीं have to उपयोग a केबल or removable मीडिया  to connect to a personal computer .
A camera phone is a mobile  फोन जिससे is समर्थ to कैप्चर स्टिल छायाचित्र (  and usually video ) .
Since  जल्दी in the 21st सदी the बहुमत of मोबाईल फोन  in use are camera phones .
Most  कैमरा फोन हैं simpler than पृथक  digital cameras .
Their usual fixed focus lenses and  छोटी सेंसर सीमा उनके प्रदर्शन in ग़रीब  lighting .
lacking a शारीरिक शटर , सबसे  have a long shutter lag .
फ्लैश , जहाँ उपस्थित , is प्रायः  weak .
Optical  जूम और तिपाई screws  are rare .
Some also lack a USB connection , removable memory card , or  अन्य रास्ता of transferring उनके तस्वीरें अधिक जल्दी than by the फोन 's अंतर्निहित संचार  feature .
Some of the more expensive camera  फोन have तभी a few of ये तकनीकी disadvantages , जिससे लागू सबसे acutely in कम लाइट शर्तें और in  any case have not inhibited their widespread use .
Most model lines  improve in ये प्रणाम प्रत्येक  year or two .
Some , such as the Droid Incredible only have a  मेनू चुनाव to प्रारंभ an अनुप्रयोग कार्यक्रम  to activate the camera .
Others , such as the BlackBerry Storm 2 , Droid X ,  मोटोरोला v980 और नोकिया 5800 भी have a पृथक कैमरा बटन लिये quickness  and convenience .
Windows Phones can be configured to  operate as a कैमरा भी if the फोन is asleep  .
Some camera phones are designed to resemble separate low-end digital compact  कैमरे in रूप और to कुछ extent in सुविधाएँ और चित्र विशेषता , और हैं ब्रांडेड as दोनो मोबाईल फोन और कैमरे , सहित निश्चित सोनी फोन  .
The principal advantages of camera phones are  लागत और compactness ; बेशक लिये a उपयोक्ता जो carries a मोबाईल फोन वैसे  , the additional size and cost are negligible .
Smartphones that are camera phones may run mobile  अनुप्रयोग to add सामर्थ्य ऐसे as geotagging और चित्र stitching  .
A few high end phones can use their touch screen to  सीधा उनके कैमरा to फ़ोकस on a particular ऑब्जेक्ट in the फ़ील्ड of दृश्य , giving भी an अनुभवहीन उपयोक्ता a उपाधि of फ़ोकस कंट्रोल exceeded तभी  by seasoned photographers using manual focus .
`` Whatever Happened to the Man  of कल ? '' is a 1986 कॉमिक किताब स्टोरी featuring the dc कॉमिक्स  character of Superman .
Written by Alan Moore with  सहायता इससे long-time , और जल्द to be retiring , सुपरमैन एडिटर , जूलियस schwartz , the स्टोरी थी प्रकाशित in दो भाग , शुरूआत in  Superman # 423 and ending in Action Comics # 583 , both published in September 1986 .
The story was drawn by  long-time कलाकार रूखा swan , in उसके फाइनल प्रमुख योगदान to the सुपरमैन शीर्षक , और थी inked by जार्ज pérez in the समस्या  of Superman and Kurt Schaffenberger in the issue of Action Comics .
The story was an imaginary tale which told the final story of the Silver Age  सुपरमैन और उसके long इतिहास , जिससे थी होने rebooted following the कार्यक्रम of संकट on अनन्त earths , पहले  his modern introduction in the John Byrne series , The Man of Steel .
Moore wanted  उसके प्लाट to सम्मान the long इतिहास of the अक्षर और to serve as  a complete conclusion to his mythology .
The story is a frame story set  टेन सालो बाद सुपरमैन थी पिछला देखी , जहाँ लोइस लेन recounts the टेल of the समाप्त of सुपरमैन 's करियर to a रिपोर्टर  from the Daily Planet .
Her story includes numerous violent attacks against Superman by his enemies , the  पब्लिक रहस्योद्घाटन of उसके रहस्य पहचान of  Clark Kent and a number of deaths of those closest to him .
The story has been cited as one of the best stories of the character of  सुपरमैन , और आलोचकों और ऑडियंस अक्सर चुनें it as एक of the सबसे  memorable comics ever published .
it is प्रयुक्त as an उदाहरण of कैसा to बंद the long-time  continuity of a comic book character .
The story 's  विरासत रै endured साथ समान कहानियां  written as tributes to it .
The title is a reference to one  of the nicknames of सुपरमैन as the man of कल , और  was used in the title of another Superman .
The Bugatti Veyron EB 16.4 is a  mid-engined ग्रैंड touring car , designed और विकसित by the volkswagen समूह  and manufactured in Molsheim , France by Bugatti Automobiles S.A.S .
The Super  खेल संस्करण of the veyron is the तीव्रतम street-legal उत्पादन car in  the world , with a top speed of .
the असली संस्करण रै a शीर्ष  speed of .
It was named Car  of the दशक ( 2000–2009 ) by the बीबीसी टेलीविज़न  programme Top Gear .
The standard Veyron  जीती शीर्ष गियर्स बेहतरीन car चलित सब साल पुरस्कार  in 2005 .
On 6 April 2013 , Bugatti set  the रिकार्ड लिये the तीव्रतम roadster in the संसार साथ the veyron ग्रैंड खेल vitesse , reaching  on average a top speed of .
The Veyron 's chief designer was  hartmut warkuss , और the exterior थी designed by jozef kabaň of volkswagen , साथ much of the  engineering work being conducted under the guidance of engineering chief Wolfgang Schreiber .
A number  of खास विसंगतियाँ have  been produced .
In  दिसम्बर 2010 , bugatti began offering prospective खरीदार the क्षमता to मनपसंद exterior और इंटीरियर्स  colours by using the Veyron 16.4 Configurator application on the marque 's official website .
The institution of the Eucharist  रै महरूम a कुंजी थीम in the depictions of the पिछला भोजन in ईसाई आर्ट , as in इस 16th-century  Juan de Juanes painting .
``  at the पिछला भोजन , on the रात्रि he थी गद्दारी , हमारी रक्षक instituted the eucharistic  sacrifice of his Body and Blood . ''
( Catechism  of the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर  1323 )
Eucharist in the Catholic Church refers to both the celebration of the Mass , that is ,  the eucharist liturgy , और the ब्रैड और वाइन जिससे बाद the प्रतिष्ठापना हैं transubstantiated ( बदला  in substance ) into the body and blood of Jesus Christ , Lord and God , a declaration formulated by the Council of Trent with an anathema against anyone who denied this .
Blessed Sacrament is a  devotional पद प्रयुक्त in the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर to refer  to the Eucharistic species ( the Body and Blood of Christ ) .
