A short story is  a ब्रैड कार्य of साहित्य , प्रायः  written in narrative prose .
Emerging from earlier oral storytelling  परंपराओं in the 17th सदी , the छोटी स्टोरी रै grown to encompass a देह of कार्य so विविध as to defy  easy characterization .
At its most prototypical the short story features a small  डाल of नामित वर्ण , और focuses on a self-contained घटना साथ the intent of evoking a `` सिंगल  effect '' or mood .
In so  doing , छोटी कहानियां मेक उपयोग of प्लाट , अनुनाद , और अन्य डायनेमिक components  to a far greater degree than is typical of an anecdote , yet to a far lesser degree than a novel .
While the short story is  largely पृथक इससे the अनोखा , लेखक of दोनो generally चित्रण  from a common pool of literary techniques .
Short  कहानियां have no नियत लंबाई  .
In terms of word count there is no official  demarcation between an किस्सा , a छोटी स्टोरी , और  a novel .
Rather , the form 's parameters  हैं दिए by the rhetorical और व्यावहारिक कॉन्टेक्स्ट in जिससे a दिए स्टोरी is उत्पादित और माना , so कि कया constitutes  a short story may differ between genres , countries , eras , and commentators .
Like the novel , the short story 's predominant shape  reflects the मांगे of the उपलब्धियाँ बाज़ार लिये प्रकाशन , और the एवोल्यूशन of the रूप seems closely tied to the एवोल्यूशन of the प्रकाशन उद्योग और the  submission guidelines of its constituent houses .
the छोटी स्टोरी रै महरूम माना दोनो an शिक्षुता रूप preceding अधिक lengthy works ,  and a crafted form in its own right , collected together in books of similar length , price , and distribution as novels .
Short story writers may  define उनके works as भाग of the कलाकारी और निजी  expression of the form .
They  may भी attempt to resist categorization  by genre and fixed form .
क्षेत्रफल कोड in मिशिगन
Area  कोड 810 is the टेलीफोन क्षेत्रफल कोड सेवारत  eastern Michigan .
The raccoon ( , Procyon lotor ) , sometimes  spelled racoon , भी ज्ञात as the आम raccoon , उत्तर अमरीकी raccoon  , northern raccoon and colloquially as coon , is a medium-sized mammal native to North America .
The raccoon is the largest of the  procyonid परिवार , having a देह लंबाई of और a देह वज़न  of .
Its  grayish कोट ज़्यादातर consists of घना underfur जिससे insulates  against cold weather .
Two of the raccoon 's most distinctive features are its  अत्यधिक dexterous सामने पंजे और इसके फेशियल मुखौटा , जिससे हैं विषयवस्तु in the mythology of अनेक देशी  American tribes .
Raccoons are  विख्यात लिये उनके प्रज्ञा , साथ अध्ययन प्रर्दशित कि वे हैं समर्थ to याद  the solution to tasks for up to three years .
The diet of the omnivorous raccoon ,  जिससे is प्रायः nocturnal , consists of परिचय 40 % invertebrates , 33 % संयंत्र  foods , and 27 % vertebrates .
The original habitats of the raccoon are deciduous and mixed forests , but due to  उनके adaptability वे have विस्तारित उनके दायरा to mountainous क्षेत्रों , तटीय marshes , और शहरी क्षेत्रों , जहाँ  some homeowners consider them to be pests .
As a result of escapes and deliberate introductions in the mid-20th century  , raccoons हैं अभी भी वितरित आरपार the यूरोपीय मेनलैंड , the काकेशस  region and Japan .
Though previously thought to be solitary , there is now  प्रमाण कि raccoons engage in gender-specific सोशल बर्ताव  .
Related females often share a common area , while  unrelated males सजीव साथ in समूह of up to चार पशु to maintain उनके स्थितियाँ विरूद्ध विदेशी  males during the mating season , and other potential invaders .
Home range sizes  vary anywhere इससे 3 हेक्टेयर ( 7 एकड़ ) लिये महिलाओं in शहरों to  50 km2 ( 20 sq mi ) for males in prairies .
After a  gestation काल of परिचय 65 दिनों , दो to पाँच यंग  , known as `` kits '' , are born in spring .
The kits are  subsequently उठाया by उनके माँ जबतक  dispersion in late fall .
हालांकि खिलाते raccoons have महरूम ज्ञात to सजीव over 20 सालो , उनके औसत जीवन  expectancy in the wild is only 1.8 to 3.1 years .
In many areas , hunting  और vehicular चोट हैं the दो सबसे  common causes of death .
the 2010 हैती भूकंप थी a अनर्थकारी परिमाण 7.0 mw भूकंप , साथ an उपरिकेंद्र निकट the कस्बा of léogâne (  Ouest Department ) , approximately west of Port-au-Prince , Haiti 's capital .
The earthquake occurred at  16:53 लोकल समय ( 21:53 utc ) on मंगलवार  , 12 January 2010 .
By 24 January , at least 52 aftershocks  measuring 4.5 or वृहद था महरूम अंकित  .
An estimated three  लाख लोगों यहूद प्रभावित  by the quake .
the उच्चतम विश्वसनीय मौत गिनती थी अनुमानित  at 220,000 .
Haitian  सरकारी estimates यहूद  higher .
The government of Haiti estimated that 250,000  निवास और 30,000 वाणिज्यिक इमारतें था collapsed  or were severely damaged .
The earthquake  caused प्रमुख क्षति in port-au-prince , jacmel और  other settlements in the region .
Many notable landmark buildings were significantly damaged or destroyed , including the Presidential  राजमहल , the नेशनल सभा भवन , the port-au-prince गिरजाघर  , and the main jail .
Among those killed were  archbishop of port-au-prince जोसेफ सर्ज miot , और विपक्ष  leader Micha Gaillard .
The headquarters of the United  राष्ट्र स्थिरीकरण मिशन in हैती ( minustah ) , स्तिथ in the पूंजी , collapsed , हत्या  many , including the Mission 's Chief , Hédi Annabi .
Many countries responded to appeals for humanitarian aid , pledging  निधि और dispatching बचाव और चिकित्सा टीमों , इंजीनियर्स और support कर्मियों  .
Communication  प्रणालियों , एयर , जमीन , और समुद्र हस्तांतरण सुविधाएं , अस्पताल , और विद्युत संजाल था महरूम क्षतिग्रस्त by the भूकंप , जिससे hampered बचाव और सहायता प्रयत्न  ; confusion over who was in charge , air traffic congestion , and problems with prioritisation of flights further complicated early relief work .
port-au-prince 's morgues यहूद अभिभूत साथ  tens of thousands of bodies .
ये था to be दफ्न in  mass graves .
As rescues tailed off ,  आपूर्तियाँ , चिकित्सा परवाह और स्वच्छता became  priorities .
देरी in सहायता वितरण led to एंग्री appeals इससे सहायता मजदूर  and survivors , and looting and sporadic violence were observed .
On 22 January  the संयुक्त राष्ट्र विख्यात कि the आपात phase of the राहत आपरेशन थी आरेखण to a बंद , और  on the following day the Haitian government officially called off the search for survivors .
Mister Ed is a fictional talking  घोड़ा , originally appearing in छोटी कहानियां by वाल्टर R. ब्रूक्स , और बाद in an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न हालात कॉमेडी उत्पादित by filmways कि पहला aired in अनुप्रयोग  from January 5 to July 2 , 1961 , and then on CBS from October 1 , 1961 to February 6 , 1966 .
The stars of the show were Mister Ed , a palomino horse who could `` talk '' , played by  gelding बाँसुरी harvester और voiced by पूर्व पश्चिमी स्टार allan लेन ( जो गई uncredited लिये the संपूर्ण लंबाई of the श्रेणी ) , और उसके मालिक , an eccentric और enormously  klutzy , yet friendly , architect named Wilbur Post ( Alan Young ) .
Much of the program 's humor stemmed from the fact Mister Ed  होता बोलो तभी to wilbur , as खूब as ed 's सुर्खी as a troublemaker  .
Other running jokes  केन्द्रित on wilbur 's अक्षर होने a विशाल klutz और inadvertently  causing harm to himself or others .
According to the show 's producer ,  आर्थर lubin , यंग थी चुनी as the सीसे अक्षर क्युकी he `` बस लगा जैसे the  sort of guy a horse would talk to '' .
Lubin , a friend of  mae वेस्ट , scored a तख्तापलट by persuading the स्क्रीन प्रतीक  to guest star in one episode .
In the United States ,  reruns aired on उपनाम at नाइट इससे कूच 3 , 1986 ,  to February 1 , 1993 .
Sister  स्टेशन tv जमीन भी reran the दिखाएँ इससे 1996–98  and again from 2003-06 .
The series is currently  ब्रॉडकास्ट प्रत्येक morning on इस tv , साथ साथ राजमार्ग  Patrol , and The Patty Duke Show .
It is also  फिलहाल ब्रॉडकास्ट on hallmark फिल्म चैनल  .
As of January 1  , 2011 , the पहला दो सीज़न of the  show are available on Hulu .
The Rapture is a term in Christian eschatology which refers to the `` being caught up '' discussed in 1 Thessalonians 4:17 , when the `` dead  in मसीह '' और `` we जो हैं जिंदा और remain '' होगा be `` caught up in the बादल '' to मिलें `` the रब in the  air '' .
The term  `` rapture '' is प्रयुक्त in at तनिक  two senses .
In the pre-tribulation view , a group  of लोगों होगा be बाएँ पीछे on धरती बाद another समूह वस्तुतः पत्ते `` to मिलें  the Lord in the air . ''
इस is अभी the सबसे आम उपयोग of the पद , विशेषकर among  fundamentalist Christians and in the United States .
The other , older use of the  पद `` rapture '' is बस as a पर्याय लिये the फाइनल क़यामत generally , बगैर a विश्वास कि a  group of people is left behind on earth for an extended Tribulation period after the events of 1 Thessalonians 4:17 .
This distinction is important as some types of Christianity never refer to `` the Rapture '' in religious  शिक्षा , लकिन might उपयोग the पुरानी और अधिक सामान्य भाव of the शब्द `` rapture '' in referring to कया happens दौरान the फाइनल क़यामत  .
There  हैं अनेक दृश्य among ईसाइयों regarding the समय of मसीह 's वापसी ( सहित whether it होगा occur in एक इवेंट or दो ) , और विभिन्न दृश्य  regarding the destination of the aerial gathering described in 1 Thessalonians 4 .
Denominations such as Roman Catholics ,  परंपरागत ईसाइयों , लूथरन ईसाइयों , और reformed ईसाइयों मानना in a rapture तभी in the भाव of a सामान्य फाइनल क़यामत  , when Christ returns a single time .
They do not believe that a group of people is left behind on earth for an  विस्तारित tribulation काल बाद the कार्यक्रम of 1 thessalonians 4:17  .
Pre-tribulation rapture theology was  विकसित in the 1830s by जॉन नेल्सन darby और the plymouth brethren , और popularized in the संयुक्त राज्य in the जल्दी 20th सदी by the चौड़ी परिसंचरण of the scofield  Reference Bible .
Kris Nathan  humphries ( born फ़रवरी 6 , 1985 ) is an अमरीकी पेशेवर बास्केट  player with the Brooklyn Nets .
The Philistine  शहरों of गाजा , ashdod , ashkelon , ekron  , and Gath
The Philistines ( , , , or ; , Plištim ) , Pleshet or Peleset , were a people who  as भाग of the समुद्र peoples appeared in the दक्षिणी तटीय क्षेत्रफल of canaan at the शुरूआत of the आयरन आयु ( circa 1175 bc ) , सबसे संभवतः  from the Aegean region .
According to the Bible , they ruled the five city-states ( the ``  philistine pentapolis '' ) of गाजा , ashkelon , ashdod , ekron और gath , इससे wadi गाजा in the दक्षिण to the yarqon नदी in the उत्तर , लकिन साथ no फिक्स्ड  border to the east .
The Bible paints  उन्हें as the किंगडम of इसराईल 's सबसे खतरनाक  enemy .
Originating somewhere in the Aegean ,  उनके जनसांख्यिकी थी around 25,000 in the 12th सदी bc , उठती to a शिखर of 30,000 in the 11th सदी bc , of जिससे the ईजियन तत्व थी  not more than half the total , and perhaps much less .
Nothing is known for certain about the original language or languages of the  philistines , however वे यहूद नहीं भाग of the सामीती canaanite  population .
There is some limited  प्रमाण in पक्ष of the assumption कि the philistines यहूद indo-european-speakers either इससे  Greece and/or Luwian speakers from the coast of Asia Minor .
Philistine-related words  मिला in the बाइबल हैं नहीं सामीती , और can in कुछ मामले ,  with reservations , be traced back to Proto-Indo-European roots .
By the  शुरूआत of the 1st मिलेनियम bce वे था अपनाया the  general Canaanite language of the region .
The Armed Services Vocational Aptitude Battery ( ASVAB ) is a multiple  चुनाव परीक्षण , administered by the संयुक्त राज्य सैन्य प्रवेश प्रसंस्करण कमांड , प्रयुक्त to determine योग्यता  for enlistment in the United States armed forces .
It is often offered to American high school students  जब वे हैं in the 10th , 11th और 12th ग्रेड , हालांकि anyone योग्य लिये enlistment may  take it .
Although the test is administered by the  सैन्य , it is नहीं ( और never रै महरूम ) a आवश्यकता कि a test-taker साथ a qualifying स्कोर enlist in the हथियारबंद शक्तियां  .
In financial accounting ,  a संतुलन चादर or बयान of वित्तीय स्थिति is a सारांश of the वित्तीय balances of a एकमात्र बंदोबस्त , a कारोबार साझेदारी , a  corporation or other business organization , such as an LLC or an LLP .
Assets , liabilities and  स्वामित्व इक्विटी हैं सूचीबद्ध as of a विशिष्ट तिथि , ऐसे as the समाप्त of इसके वित्तीय  year .
A balance sheet  is प्रायः वर्णित as a `` स्नैपशॉट of a कम्पनी 's वित्तीय  condition '' .
Of the four  मौलिक वित्तीय कथन , the संतुलन चादर is the तभी बयान जिससे applies to a  single point in time of a business ' calendar year .
A standard company balance sheet has  तीन भाग : एसेट , देनदारी और स्वामित्व  equity .
The main categories of assets are usually listed first ,  और typically in अनुक्रम of चलनिधि  .
एसेट हैं followed by the  liabilities .
The difference between  the एसेट और the देनदारी is ज्ञात as इक्विटी or the जाल एसेट or the जाल लायक or पूंजी of the कम्पनी और  according to the accounting equation , net worth must equal assets minus liabilities .
Another way to look  at the वही समीकरण is कि एसेट बराबरी देनदारी  plus owner 's equity .
Looking at the equation in  इस रास्ता shows कैसा एसेट यहूद financed : either by उधार धन ( देयता ) or by using  the owner 's money ( owner 's equity ) .
Balance sheets  हैं प्रायः प्रस्तुत साथ एसेट in एक खण्ड और देनदारी और जाल लायक in the अन्य  section with the two sections `` balancing . ''
A business operating entirely in cash can measure its profits by withdrawing  the संपूर्ण बैंको संतुलन at the समाप्त of the काल , प्लस कोई नकदी in हाथ  .
However ,  अनेक व्यवसायों हैं नहीं सशुल्क तत्काल ; वे निर्माण up inventories of goods  and they acquire buildings and equipment .
In other words  : व्यवसायों have एसेट और so वे can नहीं , भी if वे want to , तत्काल  turn these into cash at the end of each period .
Often , these  व्यवसायों owe धन to आपूर्तिकर्ता और to कर अधिकारियों , और the proprietors do नहीं withdraw सब  their original capital and profits at the end of each period .
In other  शब्द व्यवसायों भी have देनदारी  .
.17 Hornady Magnum Rimfire ,  commonly ज्ञात as the .17 hmr , is a rimfire राइफल कार्ट्रिज  developed by the ammunition company Hornady in 2002 .
It descended from the .22 Magnum by necking  bas the .22 मैग्नम मामला to लो a .17 कैलिबर ( 4.5 mm ) गोली , और it is अधिक costly to shoot than  traditional .22 caliber rimfire cartridges .
Commonly  loaded साथ a 17 अनाज ( 1.1 g ) गोली , it can उद्धार muzzle  velocities in excess of 2550 ft/s ( 775 m/s ) .
The Schaumburg Flyers were  a पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली आधारित in schaumburg , इलिनोइस  , in the United States .
The Flyers were to be a charter member of the North American League , which is not affiliated with Major  लीग बेसबॉल , however , the टोली folded in कूच 2011 , पहले वे began खेल in the nal  .
From the 1999 season to the 2010  ऋतु , the flyers निभाई उनके घर खेल at alexian फ़ील्ड , निकट the एल्गिन o'hare  Expressway .
The  टोली formerly निभाई in थंडर खाड़ी , ओंटारियो , जहाँ  they were known as the Thunder Bay Whiskey Jacks .
The team  थी originally a सदस्य of the उत्तरी लीग  from 1993 to 2010 .
On July 27 , 2009 , the Flyers played host to  बैटल of the लिंगों ii , जिससे pitted the flyers विरूद्ध the नेशनल प्रो fastpitch सॉफ्टबॉल champions , the  Chicago Bandits .
Played by official softball rules , the game was seen  by an अतिप्रवाह रिकार्ड भीड of 8,918 , और थी जीती by the  Bandits 4-2 .
In  1999 , the flyers नियुक्त उनके पहला मैनेजर  , Ron Kittle .
Kittle is best known for his  playing दिनों साथ the शिकागो श्वेत sox , और पूर्व शिकागो शावक और श्वेत sox खिलाड़ी  Greg Hibbard was the pitching coach .
During the early years of the franchise ,  kittle किया a श्रेणी of tv commercials to प्रचार the टोली , using the gimmick `` ma kittle  . '' where he played both himself and his `` Ma . ''
The ads  यहूद कामयाब at sparking कुछ आरंभिक ब्याज in the टोली as the flyers hoped to चोरी दूर प्रशंसक इससे the आसपास केन काउंटी  Cougars .
The ad mimicked the highly successful  converse विज्ञापन जहाँ लैरी जॉनसन स्ट्रक्चर as दोनो खुद और `` gramama  . ''
At the end of the 2001 season , however , Kittle  resigned इससे उसके managerial स्थिति , और जिम boynewicz थी नियुक्त to बदलें  him .
In 2004 , the  flyers बना it to the उत्तरी लीग चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी विरूद्ध the st.  Paul Saints .
Despite leading the  five-game श्रेणी 2-1 , schaumburg आखिरकार  lost the series .
In Game 5 , Flyers relief  पिचर lyle prempas अनुमत a खेल जीतना ग्रैंड स्लैम by st. पॉल infielder मार्क mirizzi  in the ninth inning .
The Flyers appeared in the Northern  लीग playoffs चार टाइम्स ( 1999 , 2003 , 2004 , 2006 ) लकिन never जीती the  championship .
Some famous players who played for the Flyers were former Oakland A 's  outfielder ozzie canseco और पूर्व शिकागो शावक outfielder ड्वाइट स्मिथ  .
Rachel Hannah Weisz ( / vice / ;  born 7 कूच 1970 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी फिल्मी और थिएटर अभिनेत्री  and former fashion model .
Weisz began her acting career at Trinity Hall , Cambridge in  the जल्दी 1990s , तब प्रारंभ working in टेलीविज़न , appearing in इंस्पेक्टर मोर्स , the अंग्रेजों mini-series स्कारलेट और ब्लैक , और  the television film Advocates II .
She made her film début in the film Death Machine ( 1994 ) , but her  भेदन भूमिका आए in the फिल्मी कड़ी प्रतिक्रिया ( 1996 ) , अग्रणी to a high-profile भूमिका as एवलिन carnahan-o'connell in the films the मम्मी  ( 1999 ) and The Mummy Returns ( 2001 ) .
Other notable  films featuring वाइज़ हैं दुश्मन at the गेट्स , परिचय a लड़के , constantine , the फव्वारा और the निरंतर माली , लिये जिससे वो प्राप्त an अकादमी पुरस्कार , a सुनहरी ग्लोब और a स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं ' गिल्ड  award for her supporting role as Tessa Quayle .
She has been  labelled an `` अंग्रेज़ी रोज़ '' चूंकि उसके नाबालिग  role in Stealing Beauty ( 1996 ) .
वाइज़ भी works  in theatre .
Her stage breakthrough was the 1994 revival of Noël Coward 's play  डिज़ाइन लिये जीना , जिससे अर्जित उसके the लंदन आलोचकों वृत्त पुरस्कार लिये the सबसे होनहार newcomer  .
वाइज़ 's प्रदर्शन भी शामिल the 1999 donmar गोदाम उत्पादन of टेनेसी विलियम्स ' एकाएक , पिछला गर्मियाँ , और  their 2009 revival of A Streetcar Named Desire .
Her  portrayal of blanche dubois in the latter खेल अर्जित उसके the आलोचकों '  Circle Theatre Award for Best Actress .
She has recently  निभाई evanora in oz the ग्रेट और  Powerful .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a civil war fought  इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि घोषित उनके secession और formed  the Confederate States of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had  इसके उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of गुलामी , विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन  of slavery into the western territories .
विदेशी शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene  .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South 's  अवसंरचना , the confederacy collapsed , गुलामी थी abolished , और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of restoring नेशनल एकता और guaranteeing अधिकारों to the freed  slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential  चुनाव , republicans , led by अब्राहम lincoln , opposed expanding गुलामी  into United States ' territories .
Lincoln won , but  पहले उसके उद्घाटन on कूच 4 , 1861 , सात cotton-based स्लेव राज्य  formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing  लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans  rejected secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's  inaugural पता घोषित उसके प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate  civil war .
Eight  बाकी स्लेव राज्य जारी  to reject calls for secession .
Confederate forces  जब्त numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by the confederacy  .
A Peace  सम्मेलन विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह , और दोनो पहलू prepared  for war .
The  confederates assumed कि यूरोपीय देशों यहूद so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene  ; none did and none recognized the new Confederate States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861 , when  confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट sumter , a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by संघ सैनिकों in दक्षिण  Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to provide troops to retake the fort  ; नतीजतन , चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the confederacy , bringing उनके  total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the border  राज्य और स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the दक्षिणी अर्थव्यवस्था  .
The Eastern  थिएटर थी inconclusive  in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862  confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate  retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation  उदघोषणा , जिससे बना समाप्ति गुलामी a युद्ध लक्ष्य  .
To the west , by  गर्मियाँ 1862 the संघ नष्ट the confederate नदी नेवी ,  then much of their western armies , and the Union at Vicksburg split the Confederacy in two at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert  E. ली 's confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the  Battle of Gettysburg .
पश्चिमी सफलताओं led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट  command of all Union armies in 1864 .
In the  पश्चिमी थिएटर , विलियम T. शरमन drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the समुद्र , destroying  Confederate infrastructure along the way .
The Union marshaled the resources and manpower to attack the  confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश , और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through the overland अभियान towards रिचमंड , the confederate  capital .
The defending Confederate army failed ,  अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox  Court House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American  सिविल युद्ध थी एक of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक  wars .
railroads , the टेलीग्राफ , steamships , और mass-produced हथियार  were employed extensively .
The  mobilization of civilian कारखानों , खानों , shipyards , बैंको , परिवहन  and food supplies all foreshadowed World War I .
It  remains the deadliest युद्ध in अमरीकी इतिहास , resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित  750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian  जॉन huddleston estimates the मौत टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45  years old , and 30 percent of all Southern white males aged 18–40 .
Potato bread is a form  of ब्रैड in जिससे आलू replaces a portion of the नियमित  wheat flour .
It is cooked in a variety of methods  , सहित by बेकिंग it  on a hot griddle or pan , or in an oven .
It  may be leavened or unleavened , और may have  a variety of other ingredients baked into it .
The ratio of potato to wheat flour  varies significantly इससे रेसिपी to रेसिपी , साथ कुछ व्यंजनों having a बहुमत of  potato , and others having a majority of wheat flour .
Some recipes call for mashed  आलू , साथ अन्य कॉलिंग लिये निर्जलित आलू flakes  .
It is available as a commercial product in many countries , with similar  विसंगतियाँ in संघटक , कुकिंग विधि , और अन्य  variables .
The Pacific  समय मण्डल observes मानक समय by subtracting आठ घंटों  from Coordinated Universal Time ( ) .
The clock time in this zone is based on  the औसत सौर समय of the 120th मध्याह्न वेस्ट of the ग्रीनविच  Observatory .
दौरान daylight छायांकन समय ,  its time offset is .
In the United States and Canada , this time zone  is generically पुकारा प्रशांत  Time ( PT ) .
Specifically , it is Pacific Standard  समय ( pst ) जब observing मानक समय ( शीत ) , और प्रशांत daylight समय ( पीडीटी ) जब observing daylight छायांकन  time ( summer ) .
Most of  कनाडा उपयोग daylight छायांकन  time .
In Mexico the UTC−8 time  मण्डल is ज्ञात as the उत्तरपश्चिम मण्डल , जिससे is synchronized साथ the  U.S. PDT daylight saving schedule .
The largest city in the Pacific Time Zone  is लॉस एंजिल्स in कैलिफ़ोर्निया इससे यूएसए ; the नगर 's महानगर क्षेत्रफल is the largest in  the zone .
The zone is one hour ahead of the Alaska Time Zone , one hour behind the  पहाड़ समय मण्डल और तीन घंटों पीछे the पूर्वी समय मण्डल .
Stereo 8  , commonly ज्ञात as the eight-track कार्ट्रिज , eight-track टेप , or बस  eight-track , is a magnetic tape sound recording technology .
It  थी लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त राज्य इससे the mid-1960s through to the जल्दी 1980s , लकिन  was relatively unknown in many European countries .
It was  , however , बहुत लोकप्रिय in the संयुक्त  Kingdom during this period .
Stereo 8 was created in 1964 by a consortium led by Bill Lear of Lear Jet Corporation , along with Ampex , Ford Motor  कम्पनी , सामान्य मोटर्स , मोटोरोला , और आरसीए विक्टर रिकॉर्ड ( आरसीए )  .
It was a further development of the similar  stereo-pak four-track कार्ट्रिज निर्मित by अर्ल `` madman '' muntz  .
A later  quadraphonic संस्करण of the स्वरूप थी घोषित by आरसीए in अप्रैल 1970 और पहला  known as Quad-8 , then later changed to just Q8 .
Ramesses II ( 1303 BC – July or August 1213 BC ; Egyptian : , alternatively transcribed as Rameses and Ramses or ) , referred to  as रामेसेस the ग्रेट , थी the तीसरा मिश्र pharaoh ( reigned 1279 bc – 1213 bc ) of the उन्नीसवीं  dynasty .
He is often regarded as the  महानतम , सबसे मनाये , और सबसे शक्तिशाली pharaoh  of the Egyptian Empire .
His successors and  बाद उन्होंने पुकारा उसे the `` ग्रेट पूर्वज  . ''
Ramesses II led several military  रिझाने into the levant , re-asserting मिश्र  control over Canaan .
He also led expeditions to the  दक्षिण , into नुबिया , commemorated in inscriptions at beit el-wali  and Gerf Hussein .
at आयु चौदह , रामेसेस थी नियुक्त  Prince Regent by his father Seti I .
He is believed to have taken the throne in his late teens and is known to have ruled  मिश्र इससे 1279 bc to 1213 bc लिये 66 सालो और 2 महीने , according to दोनो manetho और मिश्र 's समकालीन ऐतिहासिक  records .
He was  एकबार कहा to have जिया to be 99 सालो बूढ़ा , लकिन it is अधिक संभावित कि he died  in his 90th or 91st year .
If he became Pharaoh in 1279 BC as most Egyptologists  आज मानना , he होता have assumed the सिंहासन on may 31 , 1279 bc , आधारित on उसके ज्ञात accession  date of III Shemu day 27 .
Ramesses II celebrated an unprecedented 14 sed  त्यौहार ( the पहला आयोजित बाद तीस सालो of a pharaoh 's शासनकाल , और तब प्रत्येक तीन सालो ) दौरान उसके reign—more than कोई अन्य  pharaoh .
On his death , he was buried in a  मकबरा in the घाटी of the किंग्स ; उसके देह थी बाद स्थानांतरित to a royal संचय जहाँ it थी खोजा  in 1881 , and is now on display in the Cairo Museum .
The  जल्दी भाग of उसके शासनकाल थी केन्द्रित on भवन शहरों  , temples and monuments .
He established  the नगर of pi-ramesses in the nile डेल्टा as उसके नई पूंजी और प्रमुख आधार लिये  his campaigns in Syria .
This city was built on the remains of the city  of avaris , the पूंजी of the हिक्सोस जब वे took  over , and was the location of the main Temple of Set .
He is also known as Ozymandias in the Greek sources ,  इससे a लिप्यन्तरण into यूनानी of a भाग of रामेसेस 's सिंहासन नाम , , `` ra 's  mighty truth , chosen of Ra '' .
The Texas Rangers are a  पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली स्तिथ in the dallas-fort लायक metroplex , आधारित  in Arlington , Texas .
The Rangers franchise is currently a member of the Western  प्रभाग of प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल 's अमरीकी  League .
Since  , the रेंजरों have निभाई in रेंजरों ballpark  in Arlington in Arlington , Texas .
the टोली 's नाम is उधार इससे the प्रसिद्ध  law enforcement agency of the same name .
The franchise was established in 1961 by the name of the  वॉशिंगटन सीनेटरों , an विस्तार टोली awarded to वॉशिंगटन , d.C. , बाद the नगर 's पहला ballclub , the असली वॉशिंगटन  Senators , moved to Minnesota and became the Twins .
After  the ऋतु , the नई सीनेटरों स्थानांतरित to आर्लिंगटन , टेक्सास ,  and debuted as the Rangers the following spring .
The Texas Rangers Baseball Club has made  छह दिखावे in the एमएलबी postseason , सब following प्रभाग championships , in 1996 , 1998  , 1999 , 2010 , 2011 and 2012 .
In 2010 , the  रेंजरों उन्नत पास्ट the प्रभाग श्रेणी लिये the पहला समय ,  defeating the Tampa Bay Rays .
टेक्सास तब brought घर उनके पहला अमरीकी लीग pennant  after beating the New York Yankees in six games .
In the 2010 World Series , the franchise  's पहला , the रेंजरों गिरी to the सैन फ्रांसिस्को  Giants in five games .
Their lone victory made them the first Texas  टोली to जीत a संसार श्रेणी खेल , the ह्यूस्टन एस्टर्स having महरूम swept in उनके 2005 संसार श्रेणी रूप  .
They repeated as  अमरीकी लीग champions the following साल , तब खोया the 2011 संसार श्रेणी  to the St. Louis Cardinals in seven games .
Gaius Julius Caesar ( , July 100 BC – 15 March 44  bc ) थी a रोमन सामान्य , statesman , कौंसुल और notable लेखक of लैटिन  prose .
He played a critical role in the events  कि led to the निधन of the रोमन गणतंत्र और the वृद्धि of the रोमन  Empire .
In 60  bc , सीज़र , crassus और pompey formed a राजनैतिक गठबंधन कि  was to dominate Roman politics for several years .
Their attempts to  amass शक्ति through populist tactics यहूद opposed by the रूढ़िवादी elite भीतर the रोमन सीनेट , among उन्हें केटो the younger साथ  the frequent support of Cicero .
सीज़र 's conquest of gaul , समाप्त by 51 bc , विस्तारित रोम 's territory  to the English Channel and the Rhine .
Caesar became  the पहला रोमन सामान्य to क्रॉस दोनो जब he निर्मित a सेतु आरपार the राइन  and conducted the first invasion of Britain .
These achievements granted him unmatched  सैन्य शक्ति और threatened to ग्रहण the खड़ा of pompey , जो था realigned खुद साथ the सीनेट  after the death of Crassus in 53 BC .
साथ the gallic युद्धों concluded , the सीनेट ordered  Caesar to lay down his military command and return to Rome .
Caesar refused , and marked his defiance in 49 BC by crossing  the rubicon साथ a लीजन , leaving उसके प्रांत और illegally प्रवेश रोमन territory अंतर्गत  arms .
सिविल युद्ध resulted , इससे जिससे he उभरा as the unrivaled नेता  of Rome .
After assuming  कंट्रोल of सरकारी , सीज़र began a कार्यक्रम of सोशल और सरकारी reforms  , including the creation of the Julian calendar .
He centralised the bureaucracy of the Republic and was  आखिरकार proclaimed `` तानाशाह in perpetuity  '' .
But the underlying political conflicts had not been resolved  , और on the ides of कूच ( 15 कूच ) 44 bc , सीज़र थी assassinated by a समूह of सीनेटरों  led by Marcus Junius Brutus .
A new series of civil wars broke out , and the  संवैधानिक सरकारी of the गणतंत्र थी never लौटी  .
Caesar 's  अपनाया वारिस octavian , बाद ज्ञात as augustus , रोज़ to एकमात्र  power , and the era of the Roman Empire began .
Much of Caesar  's जीवन is ज्ञात इससे उसके अपना खाते of उसके सैन्य अभियान , और  from other contemporary sources , mainly the letters and speeches of Cicero and the historical writings of Sallust .
the बाद biographies of सीज़र by suetonius और प्लूटार्क हैं  also major sources .
सीज़र is deemed to be एक of the महानतम  military commanders of history .
भाषाई मैप of सीरियल  , Cameroon , and Benin .
Sign  in अंग्रेज़ी , बाहर the विश्वविद्यालयों  of Lagos
There are hundreds of  भाषाएं बोला in सीरियल  .
The major languages are  योरूबा , हौसा , इग्बो , ईदो ,  Fulfulde , Kanuri , and Ibibio .
The official language of  सीरियल , अंग्रेज़ी , the पूर्व औपनिवेशिक भाषा , थी चुनी to सुकर the  cultural and linguistic unity of the country .
अंग्रेज़ी , however , remains an विशेष बचाना of the देश 's शहरी elite , और is नहीं widely बोला  in rural areas , which comprise three quarters of the countries population .
Nigeria 's linguistic diversity is a microcosm of  अफ़्रीकी as a पूरे , encompassing तीन प्रमुख अफ़्रीकी  languages families : Afroasiatic , Nilo-Saharan , and Niger–Congo .
Nigeria also has several  as-yet unclassified भाषाएं , ऐसे as cen tuum , जिससे may represent a relic of an भी वृहद विविधता prior to the स्प्रेड of the  current language families .
Daucus carota ( common names include wild carrot , ( UK ) bird 's nest , bishop 's lace , and Queen  ऐनी 's फीता ( उत्तर अमेरिका ) ) is a flowering संयंत्र in the परिवार apiaceae , देशी to शीतोष्ण regions of यूरोपीय , दक्षिणपश्चिम एशिया और naturalised  to North America and Australia .
Domesticated carrots are cultivars of a  subspecies , daucus carota subsp . sativus  .
In the United States , the title of federal judge usually means a  न्यायधीश नियुक्त by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य और पुष्टि by the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट  pursuant to the Appointments Clause in Article II of the United States Constitution .
In  जोड to the परम् अदालत of the संयुक्त राज्य , जिनकी अस्तित्व और कुछ पहलुओं of जिनकी क्षेत्राधिकार हैं परे the संवैधानिक शक्ति of कॉंग्रेस to  alter , acts of Congress have established 13 courts of appeals ( also called `` circuit courts '' ) with appellate jurisdiction over different regions of the United States , and 94 United States district courts .
Every judge appointed to such a court may be categorized as  a संघीय न्यायधीश ; ऐसे स्थितियाँ शामिल the मुख्य इंसाफ और संबद्ध justices of the परम् अदालत , सर्किट न्यायाधीशों of the न्यायालयों of appeals , और ज़िला  judges of the United States district courts .
All of these judges  वर्णित यूँ दूर हैं referred to sometimes as `` आलेख iii न्यायाधीशों '' क्युकी वे कसरत the न्यायिक शक्ति vested in the न्यायिक शाखा  of the federal government by Article III of the U.S. Constitution .
In  जोड , न्यायाधीशों of the अदालत of अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार  exercise judicial power pursuant to Article III .
Other judges serving in  the संघीय न्यायालयों , सहित मजिस्ट्रेट न्यायाधीशों और दिवालियापन न्यायाधीशों , हैं भी sometimes referred to as `` संघीय न्यायाधीशों '' ; however  , they are neither appointed by the President nor confirmed by the Senate , and their power derives from Article I instead .
देखिए आलेख i और आलेख iii  tribunals .
Nelly Kim  फ़र्टाडो ( born दिसम्बर 2 , 1978 ) is a कनाडाई सिंगर  , songwriter and actress .
She has sold 20 million albums  विश्वव्यापी और अधिक 20 लाख singles , bringing उसके कुल बिक्री to over 40 लाख रिकॉर्ड around  the world .
Furtado first gained  कीर्ति साथ उसके डेब्यू एल्बम , वाह  , Nelly !
, which spawned two successful  singles , `` i 'm जैसे a बर्ड `` और `` फेरे  Off the Light `` . ``
I 'm  जैसे a बर्ड '' जीती a 2001 juno पुरस्कार लिये  Single of the Year and a 2002 Grammy Award for Best Female Pop Vocal Performance .
In 2003 , Furtado released Folklore , which produced three  अंतरराष्ट्रीय singles— `` powerless ( कह कया तुम want ) `` , `` कोशिश `` और `` força  `` .
Three years later she released  ढीला , a विश्वव्यापी वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी  .
The album spawned  चार number-one हिट्स : `` promiscuous `` , `` maneater `` , ``  Say It Right `` and `` All Good Things ( Come to an End ) `` .
After a  three-year ब्रेक , वो released उसके पहला full-length स्पेनी एल्बम , mi योजना , और फ़र्टाडो प्राप्त a लैटिन ग्रैमी  for Best Female Pop Vocal Album .
In 2012 , Furtado 's fourth English-language studio  एल्बम , the स्पिरिट अविनाशी थी  released .
Furtado 's  कार्य रै अर्जित उसके numerous पुरस्कार और accolades , सहित 2 ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , 10 juno पुरस्कार , 3 muchmusic  Video Awards and a star on Canada 's Walk of Fame .
Creatures of the Night is  the दसवाँ स्टुडियो एल्बम by चुंबन  .
It is the band 's last album for Casablanca Records ,  the तभी लेबल the समूह था कभी अंकित लिये at कि पाइंट .
The album was dedicated to the memory of Casablanca  संस्थापक और जल्दी चुंबन समर्थक neil bogart , जो था died of कर्कट दौरान the रिकॉर्डिंग  sessions .
It is also the band 's last album recorded with Ace Frehley credited as an official  सदस्य ( जबतक 1998 's psycho सर्कस ) , और इसके पहला एल्बम साथ vinnie विंसेंट as the initially uncredited सीसे guitarist ( विंसेंट  would later be credited , but not featured pictorially on the cover , of 1985 's reissue of the album ) .
Touch is a crucial  अर्थात् of receiving सूचना  .
इस फ़ोटो shows tactile markings identifying सीढ़ियाँ  for visually impaired people .
The somatosensory system is a diverse sensory system  comprising the receptors और प्रसंस्करण केंद्रों to उपज the संवेदी modalities ऐसे as टच , तापमान , proprioception  ( body position ) , and nociception ( pain ) .
The sensory receptors cover the skin and epithelia ,  skeletal मांसपेशियां , हड्डियों और joints , आतंरिक अंगों , और the cardiovascular  system .
While  टच is माना एक of the पाँच परंपरागत होश , the  impression of touch is formed from several modalities .
In medicine , the  colloquial पद `` टच '' is प्रायः replaced साथ `` दैहिक होश '' to बेहतर प्रतिबिंबित the  variety of mechanisms involved .
Somatic senses are  sometimes referred to as somesthetic होश , साथ the समझना कि somesthesis शामिल टच , proprioception  and ( depending on usage ) also haptic perception .
The system reacts to diverse stimuli  using अलग receptors : thermoreceptors  , nociceptors , mechanoreceptors and chemoreceptors .
Transmission of information  इससे the receptors गुजरता via संवेदी nerves through tracts in the स्पाइनल cord और into the दिमाग  .
Processing primarily  occurs in the प्राथमिक somatosensory क्षेत्रफल in the  parietal lobe of the cerebral cortex .
The  cortical homunculus थी devised by वाइल्डर  Penfield .
At  इसके सरलतम , the प्रणाली works जब कार्यकलाप in a संवेदी न्यूरॉन is triggered by a विशिष्ट stimulus ऐसे as ऊष्मा ; इस सिग्नल आखिरकार गुजरता to an क्षेत्रफल in the दिमाग  uniquely attributed to that area on the body—this allows the processed stimulus to be felt at the correct location .
The point-to-point mapping of the body  सतहों in the दिमाग is पुकारा a homunculus और is अनिवार्य in the सृष्टि  of a body image .
This  brain-surface ( `` cortical '' ) मैप is नहीं अपरिवर्तनीय  , however .
Dramatic shifts can  occur in जवाब to स्ट्रोक  or injury .
magnolia is a विशाल genus of परिचय 210 flowering संयंत्र प्रजाति in the subfamily  Magnolioideae of the family Magnoliaceae .
It is  नामित बाद फ्रेंच वनस्पतिशास्त्री पियरे magnol  .
magnolia is an प्राचीन  genus .
appearing पहले मधुमक्खियों किया , the पुष्प विकसित  to encourage pollination by beetles .
to avoid क्षति इससे pollinating भृंग , the carpels of magnolia पुष्प  are extremely tough .
fossilised नमूनों of magnolia acuminata have महरूम मिला डेटिंग to 20 लाख सालो पहले ,  and of plants identifiably belonging to the Magnoliaceae dating to 95 million years ago .
Another  पहलू of magnolias कि is माना to represent an ancestral राज्य is कि the पुष्प कली is enclosed in a bract बल्कि than in sepals  ; the perianth parts are undifferentiated and called tepals rather than distinct sepals and petals .
Magnolia shares the tepal characteristic with several other  flowering पौधे निकट the आधार of the flowering संयंत्र lineage ऐसे as amborella और nymphaea ( as खूब as साथ अनेक अधिक  recently derived plants such as Lilium ) .
The natural range of  magnolia प्रजाति is a disjunct वितरण , साथ a प्रमुख केन्द्र in ईस्ट और southeast  Asia and a secondary centre in eastern North America , Central America , the West Indies , and some species in South America .
अंगूठा
`` White Christmas '' is  an इरविंग बर्लिन सोंग reminiscing परिचय an old-fashioned क्रिसमस  setting .
According to the Guinness Book of World Records , the version sung  by bing crosby is the best-selling सिंगल of सब समय , साथ अनुमानित बिक्री  in excess of 50 million copies worldwide .
Accounts  vary as to जब और जहाँ बर्लिन  wrote the song .
One story is that he wrote it in 1940  , in गरम la quinta , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , जबकि रहकर at the la quinta होटल , a बारंबार हॉलीवुड रिट्रीट भी favored by writer-producer  Frank Capra , although the Arizona Biltmore also claims the song was written there .
He  प्रायः ठहरे up सब रात्रि लिखने — he बताई उसके  secretary , `` Grab your pen and take down this song .
I just wrote the best song I 've  कभी लिखा — हेक , i बस लिखा the बेहतरीन सोंग  that anybody 's ever written ! ''
Cross-country skiing  ( or xc स्कीइंग ) is a रूप of स्की touring in जिससे भागीदार propel themselves आरपार  snow-covered terrain using skis and poles .
The activity is popular in many  स्थान साथ विशाल snowfields , primarily उत्तरी यूरोपीय ,  Canada , and Alaska .
Cross-country skiing is part of the Nordic skiing sport family , which includes ski jumping ,  nordic संयुक्त ( cross-country स्कीइंग और स्की कूद ) , biathlon ( स्कीइंग और राइफल marksmanship ) और ski-orienteering ( जिससे  includes map navigation along snow trails and tracks ) .
Cross-country skiing is the  आधुनिक स्टाइल of स्कीइंग कि सबसे resembles प्रागैतिहासिक स्कीइंग  , particularly when done in the backcountry .
It  is भी सम्बन्धित to telemark  skiing .
A use tax in United States is  पूरक to बिक्री कर जिससे अर्थात् , if तुम ख़रीदे a taxable product/services बगैर  paying any Sales tax to vendor , you owe use tax .
तुम जरूर स्वः assess उपयोग कर और अदा it सीधे to the राज्य जहाँ the उत्पाद  were consumed or services were rendered .
Use tax typically is a tax  on खपत लकिन if तुम ख़रीदे an मद ( बगैर paying बिक्री कर ) और  store it in your warehouse initially , use tax applies to that location where goods were stored .
Later on when the final  खपत takes प्लेस at कुछ अन्य स्थान , तुम हैं जरूरी to अदा the अवकल of कर  rate to the jurisdiction of ultimate place of consumption .
This really means that you do n't  have to अदा दोनो बिक्री कर as खूब as उपयोग कर on  one transaction .
It is only one or the other that you are required to pay  on खरीदें of taxable products/services  .
If  विक्रेता करता n't चार्ज कोई बिक्री कर on इसके चालान तब it is the दायित्व of the खरीदार to स्वः assess  Use tax and pay it to the appropriate Jurisdication .
Use Tax is generally charged at  the वही कर रेट of बिक्री कर लकिन in कुछ राज्य the कर रेट is अलग  .
Use tax is  भी termed as `` खपत कर '' or  `` Consumer Use Tax '' .
A  उपयोग कर is a प्रकार of excise कर levied in the संयुक्त राज्य  by numerous state governments .
It is assessed upon tangible personal property purchased by a resident of the  assessing राज्य लिये उपयोग , भंडार , or खपत in कि राज्य ( नहीं लिये पुनर्विक्रय ) , regardless of जहाँ the खरीदें took प्लेस  .
If a resident of a state makes a  खरीदें भीतर उसके घर राज्य , पूरा बिक्री कर is सशुल्क at the समय  of the transaction .
The use  कर applies जब a निवासी of the assessing राज्य  purchases an item that is not subject to his home state 's sales tax .
Usually , this is  due to out-of-state purchases , as खूब as ordering वस्तुएं through the मेल , by फोन ,  or over the Internet from other states .
The use tax is typically assessed at the same rate as  the बिक्री कर कि होता have महरूम owed ( if कोई ) था the वही goods महरूम खरीदा in the राज्य of  residence .
For example , a resident of Massachusetts , with a 6.25 % `` sales and use  कर '' on निश्चित goods और सेवाएं , purchases non-exempt goods or सेवाएं in नई हैम्पशायर लिये उपयोग , भंडार or अन्य  consumption in Massachusetts .
Under New Hampshire law , the New Hampshire vendor  collects no बिक्री कर on the goods , लकिन the मैसाचुसेट्स purchaser/user जरूर स्टिल अदा 6.25  % of the sales price directly to the Department of Revenue in Massachusetts as a use tax .
If the same goods are purchased in a US state that does collect  बिक्री कर लिये ऐसे goods at समय of खरीदें , whatever कर यहूद सशुल्क by the क्रेता to कि राज्य can be deducted ( as a कर क्रेडिट ) इससे the 6.25 % owed लिये subsequent उपयोग , भंडार  or consumption in Massachusetts .
With few exceptions , no state 's vendors will charge the  देशी राज्य 's बिक्री कर on goods shipped आउट of राज्य , अर्थ सब goods ordered इससे  out-of-state are essentially free of sales tax .
The purchaser is therefore required to declare and pay  the उपयोग कर to उसके घर राज्य on ये ordered goods  .
The assessing jurisdiction may make the  उपयोग कर देय annually , लकिन कुछ राज्य  require a monthly payment .
For example , where a Vermont resident has not paid at least 6 %  बिक्री कर on प्रॉपर्टी brought in लिये उपयोग in the राज्य , वर्मांट विधि requires दाखिल a कर वापसी ( रूप su-452 और भुगतान ) by the 20th दिन of the माह following non-exempt purchases to avoid a $ 50 लेट शुल्क , a 5 % दंड प्रति माह ,  to a maximum of 25 % , plus statutory interest on the unpaid tax and penalties .
Typical  छूटों शामिल purchases by charitable non-profit संगठन  or governmental agencies , purchases for resale in commerce , and purchases via `` casual sales '' by individuals not in the ordinary course of business .
Also note  कि वहीँ हैं हज़ारों of कर jurisdictions in the u.S. और अनेक have ever-changing  lists of specific types of goods and services that are not taxable .
As an illustration of the complexities : a 2006 Massachusetts law requires payment  of कर on `` pre-written '' ( नहीं कस्टम ) तन्त्र खरीदा और डाउनलोड over the अंतरजाल लिये संस्थापना और उपयोग in मैसाचुसेट्स  , regardless of where it originates .
However , the actual use of the same  तन्त्र डाउनलोड by a मैसाचुसेट्स निवासी to a सर्वर in another राज्य  remains a non-taxed `` service '' .
In contrast , Arkansas generally does not tax anything delivered  over the अंतरजाल ( ऐसे as डाउनलोड तन्त्र or म्यूज़िक ) , मगर voip जिससे is specifically पारिभाषित  as taxable `` telecommunications services '' .
Software ( pre-written or custom ) `` delivered thru a tangible  मीडियम '' ( i.e. , on डिस्क ) in अरकंसास is taxable भी if ordered ऑनलाइन , मगर `` कस्टम तन्त्र लिये a particular ग्राहक '' जिससे is non-taxable `` प्रोग्रामिंग  services '' even if delivered on a disk .
In most cases , this complexity is part of the underlying sales tax laws ; but while  a brick-and-mortar स्टोर रै to सौदे साथ तभी the बिक्री कर कानून of इसके अपना स्थान , रिमोट विक्रेता have to सौदे साथ the उपयोग कर कानून of अनेक jurisdictions—up to  every US state and locality that assesses them , if the company has a presence or `` nexus '' in every state ( as large `` brick-and-mortar '' sellers like Wal-Mart and Best Buy do ) .
In medicine , pulmonary hypertension ( PH ) is an  बढ़ाएँ of रक्त दबाव in the pulmonary धमनी , pulmonary रग , or pulmonary capillaries , साथ ज्ञात as the फेफड़ों vasculature , अग्रणी to shortness of साँस , dizziness , fainting  , and other symptoms , all of which are exacerbated by exertion .
Pulmonary hypertension can be  a कठोर बीमारी साथ a markedly decreased कसरत सहिष्णुता और दिल विफलता  .
it थी पहला पहचाना by dr. अर्नस्ट वोन  Romberg in 1891 .
according to the सबसे हाल वर्गीकरण , it can be एक of पाँच अलग प्रकार : arterial , venous  , hypoxic , thromboembolic or miscellaneous .

Sanuk , a division of Deckers Outdoor  निगम , is a जूते ब्रांड आधारित in दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
Sanuk , the Thai word for fun , was founded by Southern California  देशी जेफ़ kelley जब he प्रारंभ बनाना चप्पल  out of indoor-outdoor carpet .
The first product created was green carpeted  और हकदार the `` फर रियल '' बाद एक दूकान मालिक पूछा if the विलक्षणता चन्दन थी `` लिये रियल  . ''
the फर रियल पहला became a runaway hit through बुटीक स्टोर्स  and not the intended surf shops .
The novelty act was followed up by a sandal wrapped in wire mesh , a leopard  छपाई संस्करण , और शैलियाँ बना आउट of a poncho सामग्री in a किस्में  of colors .
Sanuk has grown to include style options for men ,  महिलाओं और युवावस्था और is वितरित आरपार the संयुक्त राज्य और in over 50 देशों throughout यूरोपीय , एशिया , दक्षिण अमेरिका  and Australia .
sanuk centers itself around a धनात्मक जीवनशैली वकालत the स्लोगन , ``  Smile , Pass it on ! `` .
In  कंप्यूटर विज्ञान , सरणी प्रोग्रामिंग भाषाएं ( भी ज्ञात as वेक्टर or multidimensional भाषाएं ) generalize परिचालन  on scalars to apply transparently to vectors , matrices , and higher dimensional arrays .
Array  प्रोग्रामिंग primitives concisely एक्स्प्रेस व्यापक विचार परिचय आंकड़ा  manipulation .
The  स्तर of conciseness can be नाटकीय in निश्चित मामले : it is नहीं uncommon to ढूँढें  array programming language one-liners that require more than a couple of pages of Java code .
APL , designed by Ken  iverson , थी the पहला प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा to provide  array programming capabilities .
The mnemonic APL refers to the title of his seminal book `` A  प्रोग्रामिंग भाषा '' और नहीं to arrays प्रति se . iverson 's योगदान to rigor और स्पष्टता थी संभवतः अधिक महत्वपूर्ण than the सरल एक्सटेंशन  of dimensions to functions .
In the United States an annuity contract is created when an insured party ,  प्रायः an व्यक्तिगत , pays a जीवन बीमे कम्पनी a सिंगल प्रीमियम कि होगा बाद  be distributed back to the insured party over time .
Annuity contracts traditionally provide  a गारंटी वितरण of आय over समय , ऐसे as via फिक्स्ड भुगतान , जबतक the मौत of the व्यक्ति  or persons named in the contract or until a final date , whichever comes first .
However ,  the बहुमत of आधुनिक annuity ग्राहक उपयोग annuities तभी to accumulate निधि फ़्री of आय और पूंजी gains कर और to  later take lump-sum withdrawals without using the guaranteed-income-for-life feature .
अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा  .
Barack Obama with his first  परम् अदालत nominee , सोनिया सोटोमायोर  .
Following is a  सूची of सब संयुक्त राज्य संघीय न्यायाधीशों नियुक्त by अध्यक्ष बराक  Obama during his presidency .
As of April 30 , 2013 , 187 Obama nominees to Article III judgeships have been confirmed by the United  राज्य सीनेट , namely दो justices to the परम् अदालत of the संयुक्त राज्य , 35 न्यायाधीशों to the संयुक्त राज्य न्यायालयों of appeals और 150 न्यायाधीशों  to the United States district courts .
25 further  nominations हैं फिलहाल प्रतीक्षारत  Senate action .
There are currently 16 vacancies on the United States Courts of  appeals , 67 vacancies on the संयुक्त राज्य ज़िला न्यायालयों और 22 अतिरिक्त संघीय न्यायपालिका  vacancies that are anticipated to occur before the end of Obama 's second term .
Obama has  नहीं बना कोई recess नियुक्ति to the संघीय  courts .
Obama has made  दो nominations to the संयुक्त राज्य अदालत of अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार , an आलेख  III tribunal .
Obama also designated sitting judge Emily  C. हेविट of the संयुक्त राज्य अदालत of संघीय दावा , an आलेख i अदालत , to be मुख्य न्यायधीश of कि अदालत  .
This is a  सूची of एयरपोर्ट in मैक्सिको , sorted  by location .
Mexico has about 1,834 airports  , रैंकिंग 2nd in क्रमांक of एयरपोर्ट in उत्तर  America , and 3rd in the world .
Only major  नेशनल और अंतरराष्ट्रीय एयरपोर्ट हैं दिखाया  .
एजेंसी कर्ज़ भी ज्ञात as an एजेंसी बंध is a सुरक्षा , प्रायः a  bond , issued by a U.S. government-sponsored agency .
The offerings of these agencies  हैं समर्थित लकिन नहीं गारंटी by the us सरकारी चूंकि the  agencies are private entities .
Some prominent issuers of these securities are Student Loan Marketing Association (  sallie mae ) , संघीय नेशनल बंधक संघ ( fannie mae ) और संघीय घर ऋण  Mortgage Corporation ( Freddie Mac ) .
Agency securities  हैं प्रायः exempt इससे राज्य और लोकल कर  , but not federal tax .
Agency debt  is भी पुकारा an एजेंसी  security .
The Susquehanna  भाप इलेक्ट्रिक स्टेशन , a खौलते  water reactor .
The  रिएक्टरों हैं स्तिथ अंदर the आयताकार containment इमारतें  towards the front of the cooling towers .
Three  nuclear-powered अमरीकी warships , ( शीर्ष to नीचे ) नाभिकीय cruisers uss bainbridge और uss long बीच साथ uss  Enterprise the first nuclear-powered aircraft carrier in 1964 .
Crew members are  स्पेलिंग आउट आइंस्टीन 's mass-energy equivalence सूत्र e = mc2  on the flight deck .
The Russian nuclear-powered icebreaker NS  yamal on a 1994 संयुक्त expedition साथ  the NSF .
Nuclear power is the use of sustained  नाभिकीय परिवर्द्धन to generate ऊष्मा और विद्युत  .
नाभिकीय शक्ति पौधे provided परिचय 5.7 % of the संसार 's उर्जा और  13 % of the world 's electricity , in 2012 .
In 2013 , the IAEA report that there are 437 operational  नाभिकीय शक्ति रिएक्टरों ( हालांकि नहीं सब हैं producing विद्युत ) , in 31 देशों  .
In addition , there are approximately 140 naval vessels  using नाभिकीय नोदन in आपरेशन , संचालित by कुछ 180 रिएक्टरों  .
There  is an जारी बहस परिचय the उपयोग  of nuclear energy .
proponents , ऐसे as the संसार नाभिकीय संघ , the iaea और पर्यावरणविद लिये नाभिकीय  Energy contend that nuclear power is a sustainable energy source that reduces carbon emissions .
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों , ऐसे as ग्रीनपीस अंतरराष्ट्रीय और nirs , मानना कि  nuclear power poses many threats to people and the environment .
Nuclear power plant accidents include the  chernobyl विपत्ति ( 1986 ) , फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति ( 2011 ) , और  the Three Mile Island accident ( 1979 ) .
There have  भी महरूम कुछ nuclear-powered पनडुब्बी mishaps  .
Research into safety  सुधार is continuing और नाभिकीय संलयन , believed to be safer  , may be used in the future .
As of  2012 , according to the iaea , विश्वव्यापी वहीँ यहूद 68 सिविल नाभिकीय शक्ति रिएक्टरों  under construction in 15 countries .
In the  us the पंक्तियां of लगभग हाफ इसके रिएक्टरों have महरूम विस्तारित to 60 सालो , और योजनाएँ  to build another dozen are under serious consideration .
However , Japan 's 2011 Fukushima Daiichi  नाभिकीय विपत्ति prompted a पुनर्विचार of नाभिकीय उर्जा नीति in अनेक देशों  .
Germany decided  to बंद सब इसके रिएक्टरों by 2022 , और इटली रै  banned nuclear power .
Following Fukushima , the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय उर्जा एजेंसी halved इसके अनुमान of अतिरिक्त नाभिकीय generating क्षमता to  be built by 2035 .
Photograph of the Berlin  वॉल लिया इससे the वेस्ट पक्ष  .
the वॉल थी निर्मित in 1961 to prevent  East Germans from fleeing from Communism .
It was an iconic  प्रतीक of the ठंडा युद्ध और इसके पतन in 1989 चिह्नित  the end of the War .
The Cold War , often dated from 1947 to 1991 , was a sustained state of  राजनैतिक और सैन्य टेंशन between शक्तियां in the पश्चिमी bloc , वर्चस्व by the संयुक्त राज्य साथ नाटो among इसके allies , और शक्तियां in  the Eastern Bloc , dominated by the Soviet Union along with the Warsaw Pact .
इस began बाद the कामयाबी of उनके अस्थाई wartime गठबंधन विरूद्ध नाजी जर्मनी  , leaving the USSR and the US as two superpowers with profound economic and political differences .
A neutral faction arose with the Non-Aligned  गति संस्थापित by मिश्र , इण्डिया , और यूगोस्लाविया ; इस गुट अस्वीकृत संघ साथ  either the US-led West or the Soviet-led East .
The Cold War was so named because  the दो प्रमुख powers—each possessing नाभिकीय हथियार और thereby threatened साथ परस्पर assured विनाश —never  met in direct military combat .
बजाय , in उनके संघर्ष लिये वैश्विक influence वे सगाई in जारी मनोवैज्ञानिक warfare और in नियमित  indirect confrontations through proxy wars .
Cycles of relative calm would  be followed by ऊँची टेंशन , जिससे could have  led to world war .
The tensest  टाइम्स यहूद दौरान the बर्लिन नाकेबंदी ( 1948–1949 ) , the कोरियाई युद्ध ( 1950–1953 ) , the स्वेज संकट ( 1956 ) , the बर्लिन संकट of 1961 , the क्यूबन मिसाइल संकट ( 1962 ) , the वियतनाम युद्ध ( 1959–1975 ) , the योम kippur युद्ध ( 1973 ) , the सोवियत युद्ध in अफगानिस्तान ( 1979–1989 ) , the सोवियत downing  of Korean Air Lines Flight 007 ( 1983 ) , and the `` Able Archer '' NATO military exercises ( 1983 ) .
The conflict was expressed through military coalitions , strategic conventional force deployments ,  extensive सहायता to क्लाएंट राज्य , espionage , विशाल प्रचार अभियान , conventional और नाभिकीय बाहें दौड़ , appeals to न्यूट्रल राष्ट्र , फंसने at खेल कार्यक्रम ( in particular the ओलंपिक ) , और technological  competitions such as the Space Race .
The US and USSR became involved in political and military conflicts in the  तीसरा संसार देशों of लैटिन अमेरिका , अफ़्रीकी , the मध्य ईस्ट , और southeast  Asia .
To alleviate the risk of a potential nuclear  युद्ध , दोनो पहलू sought राहत of राजनैतिक तनाव through  détente in the 1970s .
In the 1980s , the United States increased diplomatic , military , and  आर्थिक pressures on the सोवियत संघ , at a समय जब the कम्युनिस्ट राज्य थी  already suffering from economic stagnation .
In the mid-1980s , the new Soviet President Mikhail  गोर्बाचेव introduced the liberalizing reforms of perestroika ( `` reorganization '' , 1987 ) और ग्लास्नोस्त ( `` खुलेपन  '' , ca . 1985 ) .
Pressures  लिये नेशनल स्वतंत्रता grew stronger in पूर्वी यूरोपीय  , especially Poland .
They reached a breaking  पाइंट जब गोर्बाचेव refused to उपयोग सोवियत सैनिकों to support the faltering सरकारी of ईस्ट जर्मनी  in late 1989 .
Within weeks all the  उपग्रह राज्य broke फ़्री इससे मास्को in a शांतिपूर्ण वेव of revolutions ( वहीँ थी कुछ हिंसा in रोमानिया  ) .
The pressures escalated  अंदर the सोवियत संघ , जहाँ साम्यवादी गिरी और the ussr थी formally  dissolved in late 1991 .
the संयुक्त राज्य remained  as the world 's only superpower .
The Cold War and its events have left a significant legacy , and it  is प्रायः referred to in लोकप्रिय संस्कृति , विशेषकर in मीडिया  featuring themes of espionage and the threat of nuclear warfare .
Pikes Peak State Park is a state  पार्क of आयोवा , यूएसए , featuring a bluff निहार the अपर मिसिसिपी नदी विपरीत  the confluence of the Wisconsin River .
The park is operated by the Iowa  विभाग of प्राकृतिक संसाधन  .
it is nearly a हजार एकड़ (  4 km2 ) in extent .
The  निकटतम नगर is मैकग्रेगर  , Iowa .
Iowa Highway 76  लगभग defines इसके उत्तरी boundary  .
It gets its name from the Iowa incarnation of Pikes Peak , a particularly high  पाइंट निहार the gorge of the अपर मिसिसिपी , और जैसे pikes शिखर in कोलोराडो  , is named for Zebulon Pike .
There are hiking  trails , campgrounds और rv  facilities .
Mountain bikes  हैं permitted in निश्चित portions of the  park .
Aside  इससे recreational विकास , the जमीन in the पार्क थी never साफ और to a विशाल extent  remains as it was before the advent of white settlement .
It is part of a larger complex  of पार्क , reserves और refuges जिससे शामिल पुतला mounds नेशनल स्मारक , the विभिन्न components of the पीला नदी राज्य वन , the विशाल  Upper Mississippi River National Wildlife and Fish Refuge and much smaller , much less well known Driftless Area National Wildlife Refuge .
The Northeast Iowa Legacy Trail System  is undergoing विकास , और होगा कनेक्ट तत्व of ये साइट  .
Zac Brown Band is an American  country/folk बैंड आधारित in अटलांटा , जॉर्जिया  .
The  लाइनअप consists of zac भूरा ( सीसे vocals , गिटार ) , jimmy de मार्टिनी ( चलाऊ , vocals ) , जॉन driskell हॉपकिंस ( बास गिटार , vocals ) , coy  Bowles ( guitar , keyboards ) , Chris Fryar ( drums ) , Clay Cook ( guitar , keyboards , mandolin , steel guitar , vocals ) , and Daniel de los Reyes ( percussion ) .
The band has toured throughout the  संयुक्त राज्य , सहित a स्लॉट on the 2009 और  2010 Bonnaroo Music Festival .
They have also recorded five studio albums , and charted nine Number One singles on the  बिलबोर्ड देश चार्ट : `` मुर्गा fried `` , `` toes `` , `` राजमार्ग 20 सवारी `` , `` फ़्री `` , `` as वो 's चलना दूर `` , `` colder मौसम `` , `` घुटना गहन `` , `` रखना me in दिमाग `` , और `` अलविदा in उसके आँखें `` in जोड to the singles `` whatever it is ``  and `` No Hurry `` , which peaked at number 2 on the same chart .
Talk  रेडियो is a रेडियो स्वरूप containing  discussion about topical issues .
Most shows are regularly  hosted by a सिंगल व्यक्तिगत , और प्रायः विशेषता साक्षात्कार साथ a क्रमांक of अलग  guests .
Talk radio typically  शामिल an तत्व of श्रोता भागीदारी , प्रायः by प्रसारण सजीव बातचीत between the मेजबान और श्रोता  who `` call in '' ( usually via telephone ) to the show .
Listener  योगदान हैं प्रायः screened by a दिखाएँ 's निर्माता ( s ) in अनुक्रम to अधिकतम दर्शक ब्याज और , in the मामला of वाणिज्यिक  talk radio , attract advertisers .
Generally , the shows are organized into segments , each separated by a  ठहराना लिये विज्ञापन ; however , in पब्लिक or non-commercial रेडियो , म्यूज़िक is sometimes निभाई  in place of commercials to separate the program segments .
Variations of talk radio  शामिल रूढ़िवादी बात , hot बात , उदार बात  and sports talk .
While talk radio has  historically महरूम संबद्ध साथ am/fm , starting around 2005 the प्रौद्योगिकी लिये internet-based talk-radio  shows became cost effective in the form of podcasts .
Now , it is possible for an individual to use a variety of  सेवाएं to मेजबान an internet-based talk-radio दिखाएँ बगैर carriage by a  traditional radio station .
In addition  tv प्रोग्रामिंग इससे बात और न्यूज आउटलेट ऐसे as बीबीसी , सीएनएन , ब्लूमबर्ग और फॉक्स हैं अभी प्रायः उपलब्धियाँ  expanding the world of talk radio further .
Talk radio listening is now enjoyed not only on radios , but a wide variety  of अन्य डिवाइस और सेवाएं सहित pcs using itunes , स्टेशन निर्देशिका ऐसे as tunein , दिखाएँ  directory smartphones with apps such as Stitcher .
Hippa is a genus of decapod  crustaceans in the परिवार hippidae , containing the following  species:
Hippa  adactyla fabricius  , 1787
Hippa  admirabilis ( thallwitz , 1892  )
Hippa  alcimede ( de man  , 1902 )
hippa australis  Hale , 1927
Hippa carcineutes  holthuis & मैनिंग , 1970
hippa celaeno ( de man  , 1896 )
Hippa  granulatus ( borradaile  , 1904 )
hippa hirtipes ( दाना  , 1852 )
hippa इंडिका haig , मुरुगन &  Balakrishnan Nair , 1986
hippa marmorata ( hombron  & Jacquinot , 1846 )
hippa ovalis ( A. milne-edwards  , 1862 )
hippa picta ( heller  , 1861 )
Hippa  strigillata ( stimpson , 1860  )
Hippa  testudinaria (  Herbst , 1791 )
hippa truncatifrons  ( Miers , 1878 )
It is closely related to the genus Emerita , and species  have प्रायः महरूम transferred between the दो genera  .
Jakarta  ( ) , officially ज्ञात as the खास पूंजी प्रदेश of जकार्ता ( ) , is  the capital and largest city of Indonesia .
Located on the northwest  coast of जावा , जकार्ता is the देश 's आर्थिक , सांस्कृतिक और राजनैतिक केन्द्र , और साथ a जनसांख्यिकी of 10,187,595 as of नवम्बर 2011 , it is the सबसे populous नगर in इंडोनेशिया  and in Southeast Asia , and is the thirteenth most populated city in the world .
The official metropolitan area , known as Jabodetabek ( a name formed by combining the initial syllables of  जकार्ता , bogor , depok , tangerang और bekasi ) , is the दूसरी largest in the संसार , yet the metropolis 's उपनगरों  still continue beyond it .
Jakarta is listed as a global city in the 2008  वैश्वीकरण और संसार शहरों पढ़ाई समूह और संजाल ( gawc ) शोध  .
और रै an क्षेत्रफल  of .
This area has population of well over 28 million , making it one of the  संसार 's largest conurbations in शर्तें of क्रमांक of निवासियों  .
In  2011 , जकार्ता क्रमित 17th among the संसार 's 200 largest शहरों  , a jump from its 2007 ranking of 171 .
Jakarta has grown more  rapidly than kuala lumpur , बीजिंग और बैंकॉक  .
Established  in the चौथी सदी , the नगर became an महत्वपूर्ण व्यापार बंदरगाहों लिये  the Kingdom of Sunda .
It was the de facto capital of the Dutch East Indies ( when it was known as Batavia ) and  रै जारी as the पूंजी of इंडोनेशिया चूंकि the देश 's स्वतंत्रता थी घोषित in 1945 .
The city is  the सीट of the आसियान सचिवालय  .
जकार्ता is परोसा by the soekarno–hatta अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र , हलीम perdanakusuma अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र , और tanjung priok harbour ; it is कनेक्ट by अनेक intercity  and commuter railways , and served by several bus lines running on reserved busways .
a ठेठ घर एयर कंडीशनिंग  window unit .
Air conditioning is the process of altering the  गुण of एयर ( primarily तापमान और आर्द्रता ) to अधिक favourable शर्तें .
More generally , air conditioning  can refer to कोई रूप of technological कूलिंग , हीटिंग , वेंटिलेशन , or कीटाणुशोधन  that modifies the condition of air .
An air conditioner ( often referred to as air con , AC or A/C ,  और नहीं to be उलझन साथ the संक्षिप्त लिये प्रत्यावर्ती वर्तमान ) is a प्रमुख or घर appliance , प्रणाली , or यांत्रिकी designed to बदलें the एयर तापमान और आर्द्रता भीतर an क्षेत्रफल ( प्रयुक्त लिये कूलिंग  and sometimes heating depending on the air properties at a given time ) .
The cooling is typically done using a  सरल प्रशीतन साईकिल , लकिन sometimes वाष्पीकरण is प्रयुक्त , commonly लिये सुकून कूलिंग in इमारतें  and motor vehicles .
In construction , a  पूरा प्रणाली of हीटिंग , वेंटिलेशन और एयर कंडीशनिंग is referred to as ``  HVAC `` .
`` 6 पैर 7 पैर '' ( भी styled as `` 6'7 '' ) is a सोंग by अमरीकी rapper  Lil Wayne featuring label mate , Cory Gunz .
It is taken from his ninth  स्टुडियो एल्बम , tha कार्टर iv ( 2011  ) .
It was  officially released on itunes  on December 16 , 2010 .
It was produced  by `` a milli `` निर्माता  Bangladesh .
The  सोंग नमूने `` day-o ( the banana नाव सोंग )  `` by Harry Belafonte .
DC Talk ( styled as dc Talk ) , is a Grammy  -winning ईसाई रैप तिकड़ी  .
The group  थी formed in lynchburg , वर्जिनिया in 1987 by टोबी mckeehan  , Michael Tait , and Kevin Max Smith .
वे have released पाँच प्रमुख स्टुडियो एल्बम साथ : dc बात ( 1989 ) , nu थांग ( 1990 ) ,  Free at Last ( 1992 ) , Jesus Freak ( 1995 ) , and Supernatural ( 1998 ) .
In 2002 , the Encyclopedia  of समकालीन ईसाई म्यूज़िक पुकारा dc बात `` the सबसे लोकप्रिय  overtly Christian act of all time . ''
In 2000 , the group released an EP  titled सोलो जिससे contained दो सोलो  songs from each member .
Since that  समय , dc बात रै महरूम on an indefinite अंतराल , और the तीन बैंड सदस्यों  have each led solo careers .
They have performed and recorded individual songs  साथ अनेक टाइम्स दौरान the 2000s , हालांकि the समूह never officially reunited  or disbanded .
The group 's  musical स्टाइल विकसित significantly throughout  their career .
Their  पहला दो रिलीज , dc बात और nu थांग , यहूद  of the hip hop genre .
DC Talk 's third album , Free at Last , also mainly took  influence इससे the हिप हॉप स्टाइल , हालांकि उनके म्यूज़िक began लेने  on a rock sound .
The  तिकड़ी 's पिछला दो एल्बम , यीशु freak और अलौकिक ,  were predominantly pop rock .
The Bible is a  संकलन of अनेक shorter किताबे लिखा at अलग टाइम्स और बाद समवेत  into the biblical canon .
All but the shortest of these  किताबे have महरूम विभाजित into अध्याय , generally a पेज or so in लंबाई  , since the early 13th century .
Since  the mid-16th सदी , प्रत्येक अध्याय रै महरूम further विभाजित  into `` verses '' of a few short lines or sentences .
Sometimes a sentence spans more  than एक श्लोक , as in the मामला of , और sometimes वहीँ is अधिक than एक वाक्य in a सिंगल श्लोक  , as in the case of .
As the chapter and verse divisions were not  भाग of the असली ग्रन्थ , वे रूप भाग of the paratext of the बाइबल  .
The Jewish  विभाजन of the यहूदी टेक्स्ट differ at विभिन्न अंक  from those used by Christians .
For instance , in Jewish tradition , the ascriptions to many Psalms are regarded as independent verses ,  बनाना 116 अधिक आयतें , whereas the स्थापित ईसाई अभ्यास is to गिनती और क्रमांक प्रत्येक psalm ascription साथ साथ the पहला श्लोक following  it .
Some chapter divisions also occur  in अलग स्थान , e.g . in यहूदी bibles is गिने as  in Christian translations .
An index ( plural : indexes  ) is a सूची of शब्द or वाक्यांश ( 'headings ' ) और संबद्ध संकेतक ( 'लोकेटरs ' ) to जहाँ उपयोगी सामग्री  relating to that heading can be found in a document .
In a traditional back-of-the-book index  the headings होगा शामिल names of लोगों , स्थान और कार्यक्रम , और अवधारणाओं चयनित by a व्यक्ति as होने प्रासंगिक और of ब्याज to a संभावित  reader of the book .
The  संकेतक हैं typically पेज संख्याएँ , अनुच्छेद संख्याएँ  or section numbers .
In a library  कैटलॉग the शब्द हैं लेखक , शीर्षक , विषय headings , etc. , और  the pointers are call numbers .
अंतरजाल ढूंढें इंजन , ऐसे as google , और पूरा टेक्स्ट searching सहायता provide अभिगम to सूचना लकिन हैं नहीं as चयनात्मक  as an index , as they provide non-relevant links , and may miss relevant information if it is not phrased in exactly the way they expect .
In United States financial regulation , a suspicious activity report ( or SAR ) is a report made by a financial institution to the Financial Crimes Enforcement  संजाल ( fincen ) , an एजेंसी of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of the राजकोष , regarding संदिग्ध or potentially संदिग्ध कार्यकलाप  .
फेसबुक on the ad-tech 2010
Facebook is an online social networking service ,  जिनकी नाम तना इससे the colloquial नाम लिये the किताब दिए to विद्यार्थी at the प्रारंभ of the अकादमिक साल by कुछ विश्वविद्यालयों administrations  in the United States to help students get to know each other .
It was founded in February 2004 by Mark  zuckerberg साथ उसके कॉलेज roommates और fellow हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों विद्यार्थी एडुआर्डो saverin , एंड्रयू  McCollum , Dustin Moskovitz and Chris Hughes .
The website 's membership was initially limited by the  संस्थापकों to हार्वर्ड विद्यार्थी , लकिन थी विस्तारित to अन्य कॉलेजों in the बोस्टन क्षेत्रफल , the आइवी लीग , और स्टैनफोर्ड  University .
It gradually added support for  विद्यार्थी at विभिन्न अन्य विश्वविद्यालयों पहले खोलने to ऊँची स्कूल विद्यार्थी , और आखिरकार to anyone  aged 13 and over .
Facebook now allows any users who  घोषित themselves to be at तनिक 13 सालो बूढ़ा to become पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता  of the site .
Users must register before using the site , after which they may create a  निजी प्रोफ़ाइल , add अन्य उपयोक्ता as मित्रों , और एक्सचेंज संदेश , सहित स्वचालित सूचनाएं जब वे  update their profile .
additionally , उपयोक्ता may जुड़ें common-interest उपयोक्ता समूह , व्यवस्थित by कार्यस्थल , स्कूल or कॉलेज , or अन्य विशेषताएँ , और categorize उनके  friends into lists such as `` People From Work '' or `` Close Friends '' .
As  of सितंबर 2012 , फेसबुक रै over एक  billion active users .
according to a may 2011 उपभोक्ता रिपोर्ट्स सर्वेक्षण , वहीँ हैं 7.5 लाख children अंतर्गत  13 with accounts and 5 million under 10 , violating the site 's terms of service .
In  may 2005 , accel साझेदार invested $ 12.7 लाख in फेसबुक , और  Jim Breyer added $ 1 million of his own money to the pot .
A  जनवरी 2009 compete.com पढ़ाई क्रमित फेसबुक as the सबसे  used social networking service by worldwide monthly active users .
Entertainment Weekly included the site on its end-of-the-decade ``  best-of '' सूची , saying , `` कैसा on धरती किया we stalk हमारी exes , याद हमारी co-workers ' जन्मदिन , कीड़ा हमारी मित्रों , और खेल a rousing खेल  of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
Critics ,  ऐसे as फेसबुक detox , राज्य कि फेसबुक रै turned into a नेशनल  obsession in the United States , resulting in vast amounts of time lost and encouraging narcissism .
Quantcast  estimates फेसबुक रै 138.9 लाख मासिक अद्वितीय u.S. विज़िटर  in May 2011 .
According to Social Media  आज , in अप्रैल 2010 an अनुमानित 41.6 % ( 129.5 लाख ) of the u.S.  population had a Facebook account .
nevertheless , फेसबुक 's मार्केट विकास प्रारंभ to स्टाल in कुछ  regions , with the site losing 7 million active users in the United States and Canada in May 2011 .
Facebook eventually filed for an initial public offering  on फ़रवरी 1 , 2012 , और थी headquartered in मेनलो  Park , California .
Facebook  inc. began selling भण्डार to the पब्लिक और व्यापार on  the NASDAQ on May 18 , 2012 .
सल्फोनेमाइड कार्यात्मक  group
Hydrochlorothiazide  is a सल्फोनेमाइड और a thiazide  .
furosemide is a सल्फोनेमाइड , लकिन नहीं  a thiazide .
सल्फोनेमाइड or sulphonamide is the आधार of अनेक  groups of drugs .
the असली जीवाणुरोधी sulfonamides ( sometimes पुकारा sulfa दवाएँ or sulpha  drugs ) are synthetic antimicrobial agents that contain the sulfonamide group .
Some sulfonamides  हैं भी विहीन of जीवाणुरोधी कार्यकलाप , e.g. ,  the anticonvulsant sultiame .
The sulfonylureas and thiazide diuretics are newer drug  समूह आधारित on the जीवाणुरोधी sulfonamides  .
Sulfa allergies are common , hence medications  containing sulfonamides हैं विहित carefully  .
It is important to make a distinction between sulfa drugs and other sulfur-containing drugs and additives ,  ऐसे as sulfates और sulfites , जिससे हैं chemically unrelated to the सल्फोनेमाइड समूह , और do नहीं कारण the वही hypersensitivity प्रतिक्रियाएँ  seen in the sulfonamides .
This is a  सूची of वर्ण इससे  George Lopez .
Domestic geese ( Anser anser domesticus or Anser cygnoides ) are domesticated grey geese (  either ग्रेलैग geese or swan geese ) रखा as मुर्गीपालन लिये उनके मांस , अंडे , और bas feathers  since ancient times .
30 Seconds  to मंगल is an अमरीकी चट्टान बैंड इससे लॉस  Angeles , formed in 1998 .
Since 2007 , the band has consisted of  कर्ता jared leto ( सीसे vocals , लय गिटार , songwriter ) , शैनन leto ( ड्रम , percussion ) और tomo miličević  ( lead guitar , keyboards ) .
Following the departure of Matt Wachter ( now of Angels & Airwaves ) in 2007 , Tim Kelleher became the bassist for the group ,  performing सजीव तभी साथ दोनो jared और miličević रिकॉर्डिंग बास लिये स्टुडियो रिकार्डिंग , जबकि braxton olita ( keyboards ) थी added to the  touring lineup in 2009 .
previously , the समूह भी प्रदर्शित guitarists solon bixler ( अभी  of Great Northern ) and Kevin Drake ( now of Polaroid Kiss ) .
To date , 30 Seconds to Mars have released three studio albums – 30 Seconds to Mars ( 2002 ) , A Beautiful Lie (  2005 ) , इस is युद्ध ( 2009 ) और तीन विस्तारित plays – एओएल सत्र अंडरकवर ( 2007 ) , to the किनारे of the धरती ( 2008 ) , और एमटीवी unplugged : 30 सेकेंड to मंगल  ( 2011 ) .
30 Seconds to Mars ' music has been associated  ज़्यादातर साथ neo-prog , प्रगतिशील मेटल और post-grunge , लकिन वे have भी शामिल भावनाएं , screamo , स्पेस चट्टान और synthrock  into their music .
They have been compared to Pink Floyd ( who were an influence on their work ) and Tool because of their use of  philosophical और आध्यात्मिक गीत , अवधारणा एल्बम  and their use of experimental music .
A Christmas  स्टोरी is a 1983 अमरीकी क्रिसमस कॉमेडी फिल्मी आधारित on the छोटी कहानियां और semi-fictional उपाख्यानों of लेखक और raconteur जां गड़रिये , आधारित on उसके किताब in परमेश्वर we विश्वास  , All Others Pay Cash , with some elements derived from Wanda Hickey 's Night of Golden Memories .
it थी निर्देशित by  Bob Clark .
The film has since  become a अवकाश क्लासिक और is दिखाया numerous टाइम्स on टेलीविज़न दौरान the क्रिसमस  season on the network TBS , often in a 24-hour marathon .
In 2012 , the film was selected for  संरक्षण in the नेशनल फिल्मी रजिस्ट्री by the पुस्तकालयों of कॉंग्रेस लिये होने `` culturally  , historically , or aesthetically significant '' .
A Joe 's  केकड़ा shack शाखा in सैन  Diego , CA .
The building was  initially a rowing क्लबों और थी बाद परिवर्तित  into the restaurant .
Joe 's Crab Shack is an American  कड़ी of beach-themed seafood कैज़ुअल डाइनिंग रेस्तरां स्वामित्व  by Ignite Restaurant Group .
Founded in  ह्यूस्टन , टेक्सास , the रेस्तरां अभी operates स्थितियाँ  all across the United States of America .
It serves seafood  और अमरीकी भोजन  .
The restaurants also have a gift shop  कि बिकता facetious t-shirts featuring वाक्यांश विज्ञापन जो 's seafood  choices .
it is आधारित in  Houston , Texas .
New  यॉर्क नगर क्रूज लाइनर टर्मिनल in नरक  's Kitchen at 52nd Street .
The  नई यॉर्क यात्री जलयान टर्मिनल ( भी ज्ञात as the लक्ज़री लाइनर पंक्ति or मैनहटन क्रूज टर्मिनल  or New York Cruise Terminal ) is a terminal for ocean-going passenger ships on Manhattan 's west side .
The terminal consists of North River Piers 88 , 90 , 92 and 94 on the Hudson River  between वेस्ट 46th और वेस्ट 54th गली  .
( As a general rule , pier  संख्याएँ in मैनहटन can be संकल्पित by  adding 40 to the corresponding cross-street . )
Ships  अभी डॉक at पियर 88 , 90  and 92 .
Pier 94 on the north  पक्ष is अभी प्रयुक्त लिये प्रदर्शनी स्पेस  .
Pier 86 , once used  by संयुक्त राज्य लाइनों , is अभी घर to the uss intrepid  .
In 2003 , the  टर्मिनल संभाला 900,000 यात्री  .
the नगर is forecasting कि 1.5 लाख  will use the terminal by 2017 .
the पियर हैं long  and apart .
They were  पहला समाप्त in 1935 to बदलें the चेल्सी पियर as the नगर 's  luxury liner terminal .
The  नई टर्मिनल थी निर्मित to हैंडल बडे  ships that had outgrown the Chelsea Piers .
The piers were  संवर in 1970 और हैं फिलहाल undergoing another  $ 150 million renovation .
The renovated plans call for it to  हैंडल तीन विशाल जहाजों at a समय .
in doing renovations , the नगर is भी considering  decommissioning Pier 92 .
Logo of the  नई यॉर्क क्रूज terminal.for
decades the terminal was the  तभी ocean-going यात्री टर्मिनल in नई यॉर्क  harbor .
With an  upsurge in क्रूज जलयान ट्रैफ़िक और the टर्मिनल 's क्षमता to हैंडल comfortably तभी तीन विशाल जहाजों at a समय , दो नई terminals have खोली in the हार्बर — the केप स्वतंत्रता क्रूज बंदरगाहों खोली in 2004 in bayonne , नई जर्सी ( प्रयुक्त by royal caribbean क्रूज लकीर , हस्ती क्रूज़ और azamara क्रूज़  ) , and the Brooklyn Cruise Terminal ( used by the Queen Mary 2 and other ships of the Carnival Corporation cruise brands ) opened in 2006 in Brooklyn , New York .
The West Side Highway  takes a छोटी जोग ईस्ट इससे the पियर to नीचे वेस्ट 42nd गली क्युकी जब the टर्मिनल थी निर्मित जमीन था to  be taken away from Manhattan to allow for longer piers .
The US Army Corps of Engineers , who control the waterfront dimension , would not extend the pierhead  लकीर दूर into the नदी , so the नगर विस्तारित the बांध by कटिंग दूर at the जमीन .
The city earlier did this for the Chelsea Piers ;  however in चेल्सी तभी लैंडफिल थी लिया दूर  .
At the  यात्री टर्मिनल वास्तविक मैनहटन schist थी लिया  away .
इससे डाउनस्ट्रीम in  the river

Christian right is a term used in the United  राज्य to describe right-wing ईसाई राजनैतिक समूह कि हैं characterized by उनके दमदार support of socially  conservative policies .
Christian conservatives principally seek to  लागू उनके समझना of the शिक्षाओं of christianity to राजनीती और पब्लिक नीति by proclaiming the मान of those शिक्षाओं and/or  by seeking to use those teachings to influence law and public policy .
In the U.S. , the Christian right is an informal coalition formed around a core of evangelical  protestants कि draws `` support इससे नीतियां रूढ़िवादी catholics , यहूदियों , mormons , और occasionally secularists '' जो share  their goals .
The movement has its roots in  अमरीकी राजनीती going वापस as दूर the 1940s और रै महरूम  especially influential since the 1970s .
Their influence draws , in  भाग , इससे grassroots सक्रियता as खूब as उनके फ़ोकस on सोशल मुद्दे  and ability to motivate the electorate around those issues .
The Christian right is notable  आज लिये advancing socially रूढ़िवादी स्थितियाँ on मुद्दे सहित स्कूल दुआ , स्टेम कोशिका शोध  , homosexuality , contraception , abortion , and pornography .
Although the Christian  सही is प्रायः संबद्ध साथ the u.S. , the गति रै महरूम a कुंजी फ़ैक्टर in the राजनीती of कनाडा , the नीदरलैंड्स , उत्तरी  Ireland and Australia , among others .
Far East Movement ( stylized as Far★East Movement or abbreviated FM )  is an अमरीकी हिप हॉप बैंड quartet आधारित in  Los Angeles .
The group  formed in 2003 और consists of kev nish ( केविन nishimura ) , prohgress ( जेम्स roh ) , j-splif ( jae  Choung ) , and DJ Virman ( Virman Coquia ) .
Far East Movement 's first claim to fame was their song `` Round Round '' featured in the  हॉलीवुड फिल्म , the तेज़ और the क्रोधित : टोकियो बहाव , और इसके subsequent साउंडट्रैक  , video game and DVD .
Since `` Round Round  '' , the समूह रै महरूम प्रदर्शित on विभिन्न संजाल shows सहित , , अनुगामी , गपशप लड़की  , and Finishing the Game ( a featured film at Sundance 2007 ) .
Their single ``  जैसे a g6 `` hit क्रमांक एक on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 चार्ट  and on iTunes as well in late October 2010 .
दूर ईस्ट गति भी रै the भेद of होने the पहला asian-american समूह to  earn a # 1 hit on the Billboard Hot 100 in the United States .
LR44 is the  आईईसी नामांकन लिये an क्षारीय 1.5 वोल्ट बटन कोशिका , commonly प्रयुक्त in छोटी led flashlights  , digital thermometers , calculators , calipers , watches , clocks , toys and laser pointers .
LR44  क्षारीय कोशिका
The battery nomenclature is defined by the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय विद्युततकनीकी आयोग ( आईईसी ) in इसके 60086-3 मानक ( प्राथमिक बैटरी  , part 3 Watch batteries ) .
The letter L indicates the electrochemical system used ; a  जस्ता ऋणात्मक एलेक्ट्रोड , मैंगनीज डाइऑक्साइड depolarizer और धनात्मक एलेक्ट्रोड , और an क्षारीय electrolyte  .
R44 indicates a round cell  11.4±0.2 mm व्यास और 5.2±0.2 mm ऊँचाई as पारिभाषित by the  IEC standard 60086 .
Manufacturers have their own part numbers for IEC type  lr44 बैटरी including:
lr44 , lr44g , lr44gd  , LR44H
LR1154 , L1154 ,  l1154c , l1154f , l1154g , l1154h
6135-99-792-8475 ( nsn  )

157 , 303  , 357
A76 , GDA76 , GP76A  , gpa7 , gpa75 , gpa76 , gps76A,
1128MP , 208-904 , A-76 , CA18  , ca19 , cr44 , d76a , ka , ka76 , ms76h , px76a , px675a  , RPX675 , RW82 , SB-F9 , V13GA
4.5-volt , D , C , AA  , aaa , aaaa , a23 , 9-volt , cr2032  and LR44 batteries
Other  प्रकार of बैटरी हैं or यहूद बना  in the R44 size .
Formerly , mercury batteries  यहूद बना as बटन कोशिकाएं  ( types MR44 and NR44 ) .
zinc-air बैटरी प्रकार pr44  require air to work .
silver-oxide बैटरी प्रकार sr44 may provide अतिरिक्त क्षमता compared  to LR44 types but have slightly different voltage characteristics .
Performance of a device meant to  उपयोग a silver-oxide बैटरी may be degraded साथ प्रतिस्थापन  of LR44 types .
