Hurricane  कैटरीना थी the deadliest और सबसे destructive अटलांटिक hurricane of the 2005  Atlantic hurricane season .
It was the costliest  प्राकृतिक विपत्ति , as खूब as एक of the पाँच deadliest hurricanes ,  in the history of the United States .
Among recorded  अटलांटिक hurricanes , it थी the छठे strongest overall  .
At least 1,833 people died in  the hurricane और subsequent floods , बनाना it the deadliest u.S. hurricane चूंकि the 1928 okeechobee hurricane ; कुल प्रॉपर्टी क्षति थी  estimated at $ 81 billion ( 2005 USD ) , nearly triple the damage brought by Hurricane Andrew in 1992 .
Hurricane Katrina formed over the Bahamas on August 23  , 2005 और crossed दक्षिणी फ्लोरिडा as a मॉडरेट श्रेणी 1 hurricane , causing कुछ मौतों और बाढ़ वहीँ पहले strengthening rapidly  in the Gulf of Mexico .
The hurricane strengthened to a Category 5  hurricane over the गरम गल्फ जल , लकिन weakened पहले बनाना इसके दूसरी landfall as a श्रेणी 3 hurricane  on the morning of Monday , August 29 in southeast Louisiana .
it caused कठोर विनाश साथ the गल्फ coast इससे सेंट्रल फ्लोरिडा  to Texas , much of it due to the storm surge .
The  सबसे significant क्रमांक of मौतों occurred in नई ऑरलियन्स , louisiana , जिससे flooded as  the levee system catastrophically failed , in many cases hours after the storm had moved inland .
Eventually 80 % of the city and large tracts of  neighboring parishes became flooded , और the floodwaters lingered  for weeks .
However ,  the worst प्रॉपर्टी क्षति occurred in तटीय क्षेत्रों , ऐसे as सब मिसिसिपी beachfront कस्बों , जिससे यहूद flooded over 90 % in घंटों , as नौकाएँ और  casino barges rammed buildings , pushing cars and houses inland , with waters reaching 6–12 miles ( 10–19 km ) from the beach .
The hurricane surge protection failures in New Orleans are  माना the worst सिविल अभियान्त्रिकी विपत्ति in u.S. इतिहास और prompted a मुकदमा विरूद्ध the u.S. फौज corps of इंजीनियर्स (  USACE ) , the designers and builders of the levee system as mandated by the Flood Control Act of 1965 .
Responsibility for the failures and flooding was laid squarely on the Army Corps in  जनवरी 2008 by न्यायधीश stanwood डुवल , u.S. ज़िला अदालत , लकिन the संघीय एजेंसी could नहीं be आयोजित financially liable due to sovereign प्रतिरक्षण in  the Flood Control Act of 1928 .
There was also an investigation of the responses from federal , state and local governments , resulting in the  इस्तीफा of संघीय आपात प्रबन्धन एजेंसी ( fema ) निदेशक माइकल D. भूरा , और of नई ऑरलियन्स पुलिस विभाग  ( NOPD ) Superintendent Eddie Compass .
अनेक एजेंसियों सहित the संयुक्त राज्य coast गार्ड ( uscg ) , नेशनल hurricane बीच  ( NHC ) , and National Weather Service ( NWS ) were commended for their actions .
They provided  सटीक hurricane मौसम ट्रैकिंग forecasts  with sufficient lead time .
Even the  सबसे insistent appeals इससे नेशनल , राज्य और लोकल पब्लिक officials  to residents to evacuate before the storm did not warn that the levees could breach and fail .
U.S.  कर्ज़ इससे 1940 to 2011  .
Red lines indicate  the `` कर्ज़ आयोजित by the पब्लिक '' और ब्लैक लाइनों indicate the कुल  national debt or gross public debt .
The difference is the `` intragovernmental debt ,  '' जिससे शामिल दायित्वों to सरकारी कार्यक्रम ऐसे as सोशल  Security .
Stated as a  सूत्र , नेशनल कर्ज़ = कर्ज़ आयोजित by the पब्लिक + intragovernmental  Debt .
The second panel shows the two debt figures  as a प्रतिशत of u.S. जीडीपी ( डालर मान of u.S. आर्थिक उत्पादन लिये कि  year ) .
The top panel is deflated so  प्रत्येक साल is in 2010 डॉलर .
The United States public debt is the money borrowed by the federal government of the United  राज्य through the issuing of प्रतिभूति by the राजकोष और अन्य संघीय सरकारी एजेंसियों  .
US public debt  consists of दो घटकs:
Debt held by the public includes  राजकोष प्रतिभूति आयोजित by निवेशकों बाहर the संघीय सरकारी , सहित कि आयोजित by individuals , corporations ,  the Federal Reserve System and foreign , state and local governments .
Debt held by government accounts  or intragovernmental कर्ज़ शामिल non-marketable राजकोष प्रतिभूति आयोजित in खाते administered by  the federal government that are owed to program beneficiaries , such as the Social Security Trust Fund .
Debt held by government accounts represents the cumulative  surpluses , सहित ब्याज आय , of ये खाते कि have महरूम invested  in Treasury securities .
Public debt increases or  decreases as a परिणाम of the सालाना एकीकृत बजट deficit  or surplus .
The federal government budget deficit or surplus is the  अंतर between सरकारी रसीदें और बिता , ignoring  intra-governmental transfers .
However ,  कुछ बिता कि is excluded इससे the deficit ( supplemental appropriations  ) also adds to the debt .
Historically , the US public debt as  a share of जीडीपी increased दौरान युद्धों और recessions , और subsequently  declined .
For example , debt held  by the पब्लिक as a share of जीडीपी peaked बस बाद संसार युद्ध ii ( 113 %  of GDP in 1945 ) , but then fell over the following 30 years .
In recent  दशकों , however , विशाल बजट deficits और the resulting increases in कर्ज़ have led to चिंता  about the long-term sustainability of the federal government 's fiscal policies .
On 2 April  2013 , कर्ज़ आयोजित by the पब्लिक थी लगभग $ 11.959 खरब or  about 75 % of GDP .
Intragovernmental holdings stood  at $ 4.846 खरब , giving a संयुक्त कुल पब्लिक कर्ज़  of $ 16.805 trillion .
As of  जनवरी 2013 , $ 5.6 खरब or लगभग 47 % of the कर्ज़ आयोजित by the पब्लिक थी स्वामित्व by विदेशी निवेशकों  , the largest of which were the People 's Republic of China and Japan at just over $ 1.1 trillion each .
In basketball , an assist is attributed to a player who passes the  बॉल to a teammate in a रास्ता कि लीड to a स्कोर by फ़ील्ड लक्ष्य , अर्थ कि he or वो थी `` assisting ''  in the basket .
वहीँ is कुछ निर्णय शामिल in deciding whether a passer  should be credited with an assist .
an assist can be scored लिये the passer भी if the खिलाड़ी जो  receives the pass makes a basket after dribbling the ball .
however , the असली परिभाषा of an assist किया नहीं शामिल ऐसे परिस्थितियों , so  the comparison of assist statistics across eras is a complex matter .
तभी the pass सीधे पहले the स्कोर may be गिने as an assist , so no अधिक than एक  assist can be recorded per field goal ( unlike in other sports , such as ice hockey ) .
A pass that leads to a shooting foul and scoring by free  throws करता नहीं गिनती as an assist in the एनबीए , लकिन करता in fiba खेल ( तभी एक assist is awarded प्रति नियत  of free throws in which at least one free throw is made ) .
Point guards tend to get the most assists  प्रति खेल ( apg ) , as उनके भूमिका is primarily कि of a passer  and ballhandler .
Centers tend to get fewer assists , but centers  साथ शुभ मंजिल उपस्थिति और अदालत दृष्टि can dominate a टोली by assisting  .
Being inside the  कुंजी , the बीच प्रायः रै the बेहतरीन कोण और the बेहतरीन स्थिति लिये  `` dishes '' and other short passes in the scoring area .
Center  wilt चेम्बरलेन led the एनबीए in assists  in 1968 .
A strong center with inside-scoring prowess , such as  पूर्व एनबीए बीच hakeem olajuwon , can भी be an प्रभावी assistor क्युकी the रक्षा 's double-teaming tends to खोलें  up offense in the form of shooters .
the एनबीए single-game assist रिकार्ड is 30 , आयोजित by स्कॉट skiles of the  Orlando Magic against the Denver Nuggets , on December 30 , 1990 .
The NBA record for most  करियर assists is आयोजित by जॉन  Stockton with 15,806 .
The mill or mille ( ) ( sometimes mil in the UK , when discussing property taxes in the United  राज्य , or previously in साइप्रस और माल्टा ) is a now-abstract ईकाई of करेंसी प्रयुक्त sometimes in  accounting .
In the United  राज्य , it is a notional ईकाई समतुल्य to  of a United States dollar ( a tenth of a cent ) .
In the  संयुक्त किंगडम it थी प्रस्तावित दौरान the दशकों of चर्चा on the decimalization of the पाउंड  as a division of the pound sterling .
Several other currencies  प्रयुक्त the मिल , ऐसे as the maltese  lira .
the पद आता इससे the लैटिन `` millesimum '' , अर्थ  `` thousandth part '' .
The Greco-Persian Wars ( also often called the Persian Wars )  यहूद a श्रेणी of विरोध between the हख़ामनी साम्राज्य of फारस और city-states of the हैलेनिक  world that started in 499 BC and lasted until 449 BC .
The collision  between the fractious राजनैतिक संसार of the यूनानियों और the विशाल साम्राज्य of the फारसियों began जब सायरस the ग्रेट  conquered Ionia in 547 BC .
Struggling to rule the  independent-minded शहरों of ionia , the फारसियों नियुक्त उत्पीड़क  to rule each of them .
This would prove to  be the सोर्स of much ट्रबल लिये the यूनानियों  and Persians alike .
In 499 BC , the then tyrant of Miletus , Aristagoras , embarked on an expedition to conquer the island of Naxos , with Persian support ; however , the expedition was a debacle  और , pre-empting उसके dismissal , aristagoras incited सब of हैलेनिक एशिया नाबालिग into विद्रोह विरूद्ध the फारसियों  .
This was the beginning of the Ionian  विद्रोह , जिससे होता पिछला जबतक 493 bc , progressively आरेखण अधिक regions of एशिया नाबालिग  into the conflict .
Aristagoras secured military support  इससे एथेंस और eretria , और in 498 bc ये शक्तियां helped to कैप्चर और बर्न the पारसी क्षेत्रीय  capital of Sardis .
The Persian  किंग दारा the ग्रेट vowed to have बदला on एथेंस  and Eretria for this act .
The revolt  जारी , साथ the दो पहलू effectively stalemated throughout  497–495 BC .
In 494 BC , the Persians  regrouped , और attacked the epicentre  of the revolt in Miletus .
At the Battle of Lade , the Ionians suffered a decisive defeat  , और the विद्रोह collapsed , साथ the फाइनल सदस्यों होने  stamped out the following year .
Seeking  to सुरक्षित उसके साम्राज्य इससे further revolts और इससे the हस्तक्षेप of the मेनलैंड यूनानियों , दारा embarked on  a scheme to conquer Greece and to punish Athens and Eretria for burning Sardis .
The first  पारसी आक्रमण of यूनानियों began in 492 bc , साथ the पारसी सामान्य  Mardonius conquering Thrace and Macedon before several mishaps forced an early end to the campaign .
In 490 BC a  दूसरी फ़ोर्स थी भेजा to यूनानियों , इस समय आरपार the ईजियन समुद्र , अंतर्गत the कमांड  of Datis and Artaphernes .
This  expedition subjugated the cyclades , पहले besieging , capturing  and razing Eretria .
however , जबकि en रूट to आक्रमण एथेंस , the पारसी फ़ोर्स थी decisively पराजित  by the Athenians at the Battle of Marathon , ending Persian efforts for the time being .
Darius then began to plan to complete  the conquest of यूनानियों , लकिन died in 486 bc और जिम्मेदारी लिये the conquest passed to उसके बेटे  Xerxes I .
In 480 BC , Xerxes personally led the second  पारसी आक्रमण of यूनानियों साथ एक of the largest प्राचीन सेना  ever assembled .
Victory over the 'Allied ' Greek states ( led by  स्पार्टा और एथेंस ) at the बैटल of thermopylae अनुमत the फारसियों to मशाल  Athens and overrun most of Greece .
However , while seeking to destroy the  संयुक्त यूनानी बेड़े , the फारसियों suffered a कठोर शिकस्त at the बैटल of salamis  .
The following year , the confederated Greeks went on the offensive ,  defeating the पारसी फौज at the बैटल of plataea , और समाप्ति the आक्रमण of  Greece .
The allied Greeks followed up their success by destroying the rest of the Persian fleet at  the बैटल of mycale , पहले expelling पारसी garrisons इससे sestos ( 479 bc ) और  Byzantium ( 478 BC ) .
The actions of the general Pausanias at the siege of Byzantium alienated many of the  यूनानी राज्य इससे the spartans , और the anti-persian गठबंधन थी इसलिए reconstituted around athenian नेतृत्व , as the so-called delian लीग  .
The Delian League continued  to अभियान विरूद्ध फारस लिये the अगला तीन दशकों , शुरूआत साथ the expulsion of the  remaining Persian garrisons from Europe .
At the Battle of the Eurymedon in 466 BC ,  the लीग जीती a दोगुना विजय कि आखिरकार secured स्वतंत्रता  for the cities of Ionia .
However , the League 's involvement in an  मिश्र विद्रोह ( इससे 460–454 bc ) resulted in a विनाशकारी शिकस्त , और further campaigning थी  suspended .
A  बेड़े थी भेजा to साइप्रस in 451 bc , लकिन हासिल छोटी , और जब it  withdrew the Greco-Persian Wars drew to a quiet end .
Some historical sources suggest the end of  hostilities थी चिह्नित by a सलाम सन्धि between एथेंस और फारस  , the so-called Peace of Callias .
Hooverville near  पोर्टलैंड , ऑरेगॉन
A ``  hooverville '' is the लोकप्रिय नाम लिये shanty कस्बों निर्मित by बेघर  people during the Great Depression .
They were named after Herbert Hoover , who was President of the United  राज्य दौरान the onset of the अवसाद और widely blamed लिये it .
The term was coined  by चार्ल्स माइकेल्सन , publicity मुख्य of the लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल कमेटी  .
Matthew Michael Hasselbeck (  born सितंबर 25 , 1975 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक लिये the इंडियानापोलिस  Colts of the National Football League ( NFL ) .
He was  drafted in the छठे गोलाकार of the 1998 एनएफएल  Draft by the Green Bay Packers .
After a  ऋतु on the अभ्यास स्क्वाड और दो  seasons backing up Brett Favre , he was traded to the Seattle Seahawks in 2001 .
Hasselbeck gained the starting role in 2003 , and led  सिएटल to छह playoff दिखावे और a सुपर कटोरी रूप ; he थी चयनित to तीन प्रो प्याले और an all-pro  selection .
Following ten seasons with  the सीहॉक्स , hasselbeck joined the टेनेसी टाइटन्स in 2011  .
Hasselbeck then signed a contract with the Indianapolis Colts in  2013 कम than 24 घंटों बाद होने released by the टेनेसी टाइटन्स  .
ICT is  inevitably सम्बन्धित to the कंप्यूटर  network .
सूचना और संचार प्रौद्योगिकी or ( आईसीटी ) , is प्रायः प्रयुक्त as an विस्तारित पर्याय लिये सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी ( it ) , लकिन is a अधिक विशिष्ट पद कि तनावों the भूमिका of एकीकृत संचार और the संयोजन  of telecommunications ( telephone lines and wireless signals ) , computers as well as necessary enterprise software , middleware , storage , and audio-visual systems , which enable users to access , store , transmit , and manipulate information .
The phrase ICT had been used by academic researchers since the 1980s , but it  became लोकप्रिय बाद it थी प्रयुक्त in a रपट to the uk सरकारी by डेनिस stevenson in 1997 और in the संशोधित नेशनल curriculum लिये इंग्लैण्ड  , Wales and Northern Ireland in 2000 .
The term ICT is  अभी भी प्रयुक्त to refer to the अभिसरण of audio-visual और टेलीफोन  networks with computer networks through a single cabling or link system .
There are large economic  प्रोत्साहन ( विशाल लागत बचत due to विलोपन of the टेलीफोन संजाल ) to विलय the audio-visual , भवन प्रबन्धन और टेलीफोन संजाल  with the computer network system using a single unified system of cabling , signal distribution and management .
The term Infocommunications is used in some cases as a  shorter रूप of सूचना और संचार ( s ) प्रौद्योगिकी .
In fact  infocommunications is the विस्तार of दूरसंचार साथ सूचना प्रसंस्करण और सामग्री  handling functions on a common digital technology base .
For a  तुलना of ये और अन्य  terms , see .
For  आईसीटी विकास अनुक्रमणिका around the  world , see .
This is a  सूची of वर्ण इससे जार्ज लोपेज़  .
A schematic presentation of the plum pudding model of the  अणु ; in thomson 's गणितीय मॉडल the `` corpuscles '' ( or आधुनिक  electrons ) were arranged non-randomly , in rotating rings
The current model of the sub-atomic structure  involves a घना केंद्रक घिरी by a probabilistic  `` cloud '' of electrons
The plum pudding model of the atom by J. J.  thomson , जो खोजा the इलेक्ट्रॉन in 1897 , थी प्रस्तावित in 1904 पहले the डिस्कवरी of the परमाणु केंद्रक in अनुक्रम to add the  electron to the atomic model .
In this model , the atom is composed of electrons ( which Thomson still called `` corpuscles '' ,  हालांकि G. J. stoney था प्रस्तावित कि अणु of विद्युत be पुकारा electrons in 1894 ) घिरी by a सूप of धनात्मक चार्ज to संतुलन the electrons ' ऋणात्मक आरोप , जैसे negatively चार्ज `` plums `` घिरी by positively  charged `` pudding `` .
The  electrons ( as we जान उन्हें आज ) यहूद विचार to be positioned throughout the अणु , लकिन साथ अनेक structures संभावित लिये positioning  multiple electrons , particularly rotating rings of electrons ( see below ) .
Instead  of a सूप , the अणु थी भी sometimes  said to have had a `` cloud '' of positive charge .
With this  मॉडल , thomson abandoned उसके पहले `` nebular अणु '' परिकल्पना in जिससे the अणु  was composed of immaterial vortices .
Now , at least  भाग of the अणु थी to be रचित of thomson 's particulate ऋणात्मक corpuscles , हालांकि the बाकी of the positively चार्ज  part of the atom remained somewhat nebulous and ill-defined .
The 1904  thomson मॉडल थी disproved by the 1909 सुनहरा foil प्रयोग  of Hans Geiger and Ernest Marsden .
इस थी interpreted  by Ernest Rutherford in 1911
to imply a very small nucleus of the atom containing a very high  धनात्मक चार्ज ( in the मामला of सुनहरा , पर्याप्त to संतुलन परिचय 100 electrons ) , यूँ अग्रणी to the रदरफोर्ड  model of the atom .
Although gold has  an परमाणु क्रमांक of 79 , तत्काल बाद रदरफोर्ड 's पेपर appeared in  1911 Antonius Van den Broek made the intuitive suggestion that atomic number is nuclear charge .
the पदार्थ जरूरी प्रयोग  to decide .
Henry Moseley 's work showed  experimentally in 1913 ( देखिए moseley 's विधि ) कि the प्रभावी नाभिकीय चार्ज थी बहुत बंद to the परमाणु क्रमांक ( moseley मिला तभी  one unit difference ) , and Moseley referenced only the papers of Van den Broek and Rutherford .
This work culminated in the solar-system-like ( but quantum-limited ) Bohr model of the atom in the same  साल , in जिससे a केंद्रक containing an परमाणु क्रमांक of धनात्मक चार्ज is घिरी  by an equal number of electrons in orbital shells .
Bohr had also  प्रेरित moseley 's कार्य  .
thomson 's मॉडल थी compared ( हालांकि नहीं by thomson  ) to a British dessert called plum pudding , hence the name .
Thomson 's paper was published in the March 1904 edition of the  philosophical पत्रिका , the अग्रणी अंग्रेजों  science journal of the day .
In Thomson 's view : ... the  अणु of the तत्व consist of a क्रमांक of negatively electrified corpuscles enclosed in a गोला  of uniform positive electrification , ...
In this model , the electrons were free to rotate within the  blob or बादल of धनात्मक पदार्थ .
These orbits were stabilized in the model by the fact that when an electron moved  दूर इससे the बीच of the धनात्मक बादल , it लगा a larger जाल धनात्मक inward फ़ोर्स , क्युकी वहीँ थी अधिक सामग्री of विपरीत चार्ज , अंदर  its orbit ( see Gauss 's law ) .
In Thomson 's model  , electrons यहूद फ़्री to घूर्णन in बजती जिससे यहूद further stabilized by interactions between the electrons , और  spectra were to be accounted for by energy differences of different ring orbits .
Thomson  attempted to मेक उसके मॉडल खाता लिये कुछ of the प्रमुख spectral लाइनों  known for some elements , but was not notably successful at this .
Still , Thomson 's model ( along with a similar Saturnian ring model  लिये परमाणु electrons , भी put आगे in 1904 by nagaoka बाद जेम्स क्लर्क मैक्सवेल 's मॉडल of शनि 's  rings ) , were earlier harbingers of the later and more successful solar-system-like Bohr model of the atom .
Typical  स्ट्रिप of बेकन .
बेकन is a cured मांस prepared  from a pig .
It is first cured using large quantities of salt , either in a brine  or in a शुष्क पैकिंग ; the परिणाम is भैस बेकन ( भी ज्ञात as ग्रीन बेकन  ) .
Fresh bacon may then be further  सूखी लिये सप्ताह or महीने in ठंडा एयर , or it may be boiled or स्मोक्ड  .
Fresh and dried bacon  is typically पकाया पहले खाने  .
boiled बेकन is तैयार to खा , as is कुछ स्मोक्ड बेकन , लकिन may  be cooked further before eating .
Bacon is  prepared इससे अनेक अलग कटौती of  meat .
It is usually made from side and back cuts of pork ,  मगर in the संयुक्त राज्य , जहाँ it is लगभग सदा prepared इससे पोर्क पेट ( typically referred to as `` streaky '' ,  `` fatty '' , or `` American style '' outside of the US and Canada ) .
The  पक्ष काटें रै अधिक मांस और कम  fat than the belly .
Bacon may be prepared from either of two  पृथक वापस कटौती : fatback , जिससे is लगभग pure मोटे , और पोर्क  loin , which is very lean .
Bacon-cured  पोर्क loin is ज्ञात as वापस बेकन  .
Uncooked pork belly  बेकन स्ट्रिप्स  .
Bacon may be eaten smoked , boiled  , fried , baked , or ग्रील्ड , or प्रयुक्त as a नाबालिग संघटक to स्वाद बर्तन  .
Bacon is also used for  barding और larding roasts , विशेषकर खेल , e.g . venison  , pheasant .
The word is derived from the Old High German bacho , meaning ``  buttock '' , `` हैम '' or `` पक्ष of बेकन '' , और cognate साथ the बूढ़ा  French bacon .
In continental Europe , this part of the pig is usually not smoked like bacon is in the United States ; it  is प्रयुक्त primarily in घन ( lardons ) as a कुकिंग संघटक , valued दोनो as a सोर्स of मोटे और लिये  its flavor .
In Italy , this is called  pancetta और is प्रायः पकाया in छोटी घन or परोसा uncooked  and thinly sliced as part of an antipasto .
Meat from other animals , such as beef , lamb , chicken , goat , or turkey , may  भी be काटें , cured , or वरना prepared to resemble बेकन , और may भी be  referred to as `` bacon '' .
Such use is common in areas with  significant यहूदी और मुस्लिम populations  .
The USDA defines bacon as `` the cured belly of a swine carcass  '' ; अन्य कटौती और विशेषताएँ जरूर be separately योग्य ( e.g. , `` स्मोक्ड पोर्क loin बेकन  '' ) .
For safety , bacon must  be treated to prevent trichinosis , caused by trichinella , a parasitic roundworm जिससे  can be destroyed by heating , freezing , drying , or smoking .
Bacon is distinguished from  नमक पोर्क और हैम by मतभेद in the  brine ( or dry packing ) .
Bacon brine has added curing ingredients , most notably sodium  नाइट्राइट , और occasionally सोडियम नाइट्रेट or पोटैशियम नाइट्रेट ( साल्टपीटर ) ; सोडियम ascorbate or erythorbate हैं added to accelerate  curing and stabilize color .
flavorings ऐसे as भूरा शुगर or मेपल  are used for some products .
If used  , सोडियम polyphosphates हैं added to improve sliceability और  reduce spattering when the bacon is pan fried .
Today , a brine for  हैम , लकिन नहीं बेकन , शामिल a विशाल  amount of sugar .
Historically , `` ham  '' और `` बेकन '' referred to अलग कटौती of मांस कि यहूद brined  or packed identically , often together in the same barrel .
The Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (  erisa ) ( , संहिताबद्ध in भाग at ) is a संघीय विधि जिससे establishes न्यूनतम मानकों लिये पेंशन योजनाएँ in निजी उद्योग और provides लिये extensive नियम on the  federal income tax effects of transactions associated with employee benefit plans .
ERISA was enacted to protect the  रूचि of कर्मचारी लाभ योजना भागीदार और उनके  beneficiaries by:
requiring the प्रकटीकरण of वित्तीय और अन्य सूचना concerning  the plan to beneficiaries ;
Establishing standards of  conduct लिये योजना fiduciaries ;
providing लिये उचित  remedies and access to the federal courts .
ERISA is sometimes used to refer to the full body  of कानून regulating कर्मचारी लाभ योजनाएँ , जिससे हैं मिला मुख्यतः in the आतंरिक आय कोड और  ERISA itself .
Responsibility for the interpretation and enforcement of ERISA is divided among the Department of  मजदूर , the विभाग of the राजकोष ( विशेषकर the आतंरिक आय सेवा ) , और the पेंशन लाभ  Guaranty Corporation .
Illegal immigration to the United States is the act of foreign nationals entering the United States , without government permission and in violation of United  राज्य राष्ट्रीयता विधि , or रहकर परे the termination तिथि of a वीज़ा , भी in  violation of the law .
A warning sign  at the अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary between the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा  in Point Roberts , Washington .
A much  अलग दृष्टिकोण at the u.s.-mexico किनारा निकट  El Paso , Texas
The undocumented immigrant  जनसांख्यिकी of the संयुक्त राज्य in 2008 थी अनुमानित by the बीच लिये आव्रजन अध्ययन to be परिचय 11 लाख लोगों , bas इससे 12.5 लाख लोगों in 2007  .
Other  estimates दायरा इससे 7  to 20 million .
According to a  2005 pew हिस्पैनिक बीच रपट , 56 % of undocumented आप्रवासियों यहूद इससे मैक्सिको ; 22 % यहूद इससे अन्य लैटिन अमरीकी देशों ; 13 % यहूद  from Asia ; 6 % were from Europe and Canada ; and 3 % were from Africa and the rest of the world .
Alvin Independent School  ज़िला is a स्कूल ज़िला आधारित in एल्विन , टेक्सास  ( USA ) .
Alvin ISD is a  विशाल suburban स्कूल ज़िला दक्षिण of ह्यूस्टन in the समुदायों of एल्विन , manvel  , Pearland , Hillcrest , Rosharon , Iowa Colony , Liverpool , and Amsterdam .
AISD serves Pearland city 's  rapidly growing पश्चिमी portion of the नगर सहित the नई विशाल master-planned समुदायों of छाया क्रीक ranch , दक्षिण  Fork , and Southern Trails .
एल्विन isd कवर  of land .
In human  anatomy , the ulnar तंत्रिका is a तंत्रिका जिससे रनों  near the ulna bone .
the ulnar collateral स्नायु of कोहनी  joint is in relation with the ulnar nerve .
The nerve is the largest  unprotected तंत्रिका in the इंसान देह ( अर्थ unprotected by मांसपेशी  or bone ) , so injury is common .
This nerve is directly connected to the little  उंगली , और the सटा हाफ of the रिंग उंगली , supplying the palmar पक्ष of ये उंगलियाँ , सहित दोनो सामने  and back of the tips , perhaps as far back as the fingernail beds .
एक विधि of injuring the तंत्रिका is to स्ट्राइक the medial epicondyle  of the humerus from posteriorly , or inferiorly with the elbow flexed .
The  ulnar तंत्रिका is फंस between the अस्थि और the overlying स्किन at  this point .
This is  commonly referred to as bumping एक 's ``  funny bone '' .
This name is thought to be a pun , based on  the ध्वनि प्रतिरूप between the नाम of the अस्थि of the अपर भुजा , the `` humerus  `` and the word `` humorous `` .
alternatively , according to the ऑक्सफोर्ड अंग्रेज़ी शब्दकोष it may refer to ``  the peculiar sensation experienced when it is struck '' .
Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry , shortened Hogwarts , is a fictional British  स्कूल of जादू लिये विद्यार्थी aged ग्यारह to अठारह , और is the प्राथमिक सेटिंग लिये the पहला छह किताबे in j.K. रोलिंग 's हैरी कुम्हार  series .
रोलिंग रै सुझाया कि वो may have inadvertently लिया the नाम इससे the hogwort संयंत्र ( croton capitatus ) , जिससे वो था देखी at kew gardens कुछ  time before writing the series , although the names `` The Hogwarts '' and `` Hoggwart '' appear in the 1954 Nigel Molesworth book How To Be Topp by Geoffrey Willans .
Hogwarts school was  voted as the 36th बेहतरीन स्कॉटिश शैक्षणिक स्थापना in a 2008 ऑनलाइन  ranking , outranking Edinburgh 's Loretto School .
According to a director of the  स्वतंत्र स्कूलों संजाल rankings , it थी added to the स्कूलों लिस्टिंग  `` for fun '' and was then voted on .
The U.S. subprime mortgage crisis was a set of events and conditions  कि led to a वित्तीय संकट और subsequent मंदी कि began in 2008  .
it थी characterized by a वृद्धि in subprime बंधक delinquencies और foreclosures  , and the resulting decline of securities backed by said mortgages .
Several major financial institutions collapsed in September  2008 , साथ significant disruption in the प्रवाह of क्रेडिट to व्यवसायों और उपभोक्ता और the onset  of a severe global recession .
There were many causes of the crisis , with commentators  assigning अलग स्तर of दोष to वित्तीय संस्थानों , regulators , क्रेडिट एजेंसियों , सरकारी आवास नीतियों , और उपभोक्ता  , among others .
A proximate cause  थी the वृद्धि in subprime lending  .
The percentage of lower-quality subprime mortgages originated during a given year rose from the  ऐतिहासिक 8 % or निम्नतर दायरा to लगभग 20 % इससे 2004 to 2006 , साथ much उच्चतर ratios in कुछ भाग  of the U.S .
A high  प्रतिशत of ये subprime mortgages , over 90 % in 2006 लिये  example , were adjustable-rate mortgages .
These  दो परिवर्तन यहूद भाग of a broader ट्रेंड of lowered lending मानकों  and higher-risk mortgage products .
Further , U.S. households had become  increasingly ऋणी , साथ the अनुपात of कर्ज़ to डिस्पोजेबल निजी आय उठती इससे 77 % in 1990 to 127 % at the  end of 2007 , much of this increase mortgage-related .
When U.S. home prices declined  steeply बाद peaking in mid-2006 , borrowers ' क्षमता to  refinance their loans became more difficult .
As  adjustable-rate mortgages began to रीसेट at उच्चतर ब्याज दरों ( causing उच्चतर  monthly payments ) , mortgage delinquencies soared .
Securities backed with  mortgages , सहित subprime mortgages , widely आयोजित by वित्तीय firms  globally , lost most of their value .
Global investors also drastically reduced  purchases of mortgage-backed कर्ज़ और अन्य प्रतिभूति as भाग of a मनाही in the क्षमता और willingness of the निजी  financial system to support lending .
Concerns about the soundness of  u.S. क्रेडिट और वित्तीय बाज़ार led to tightening क्रेडिट around the संसार  and slowing economic growth in the U.S. and Europe .
The crisis had severe ,  long-lasting consequences लिये the u.S.  and European economies .
The  u.S. डाला a गहन मंदी , साथ nearly 9 लाख कार्य खोया  during 2008 and 2009 , roughly 6 % of the workforce .
U.S.  आवास कीमतें गिरी nearly 30 % on औसत और the  U.S. stock market fell approximately 50 % by early 2009 .
As of early 2013 , the U.S. stock market had recovered to its pre-crisis peak but  आवास कीमतें remained निकट उनके कम पाइंट और बेरोजगारी  remained elevated .
आर्थिक विकास remained नीचे pre-crisis  levels .
Europe  भी जारी to संघर्ष साथ इसके  own economic crisis .
Carl Jung  in 1910  .
Myers  और briggs extrapolated उनके mbti सिद्धान्त इससे जंग 's कृतियाँ in उसके  book Psychological Types .
The Myers-Briggs Type Indicator ( MBTI )  मूल्यांकन is a psychometric प्रश्नावली designed to माप  psychological preferences in how people perceive the world and make decisions .
These  वरीयताओं यहूद extrapolated इससे the typological theories प्रस्तावित by कार्ल गुस्ताव जंग और पहला प्रकाशित in उसके 1921  book Psychological Types ( English edition , 1923 ) .
जंग theorized कि वहीँ हैं चार प्रिंसिपल मनोवैज्ञानिक कृत्यों by जिससे we अनुभव  the world : sensation , intuition , feeling , and thinking .
One of these four  कृत्यों is प्रबल सबसे of the समय  .
The original developers of the personality inventory were Katharine Cook Briggs and  उसके बेटी , इसाबेल briggs मायर्स ; ये दो , having पढ़ाई extensively the कार्य of जंग , turned उनके ब्याज of इंसान बर्ताव into a भक्ति of turning the सिद्धान्त of मनोवैज्ञानिक  types to practical use .
They began  बनाना the indicator दौरान संसार युद्ध ii , believing कि a ज्ञान of व्यक्तित्व वरीयताओं  would help women who were entering the industrial workforce for the first time to identify the sort of war-time jobs that would be `` most comfortable and effective '' .
The  आरंभिक प्रश्नावली grew into the myers-briggs प्रकार  Indicator , which was first published in 1962 .
The MBTI focuses on normal populations and  emphasizes the मान of naturally occurring  differences .
Robert Kaplan and Dennis Saccuzzo believe `` the underlying assumption of the MBTI  is कि we सब have विशिष्ट वरीयताओं in the रास्ता we construe हमारी अनुभवों , और ये वरीयताओं underlie हमारी रूचि , needs , मान , और  motivation '' ( p. 499 ) .
`` Judas '' is a  सोंग by अमरीकी रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार महिला गागा , इससे उसके दूसरी  studio album Born This Way ( 2011 ) .
It was released by Interscope Records on April 15 ,  2011 , चार दिनों ahead of इसके अनुसूचित रिलीज  .
Written and  उत्पादित by महिला गागा और redone , `` यहूदा ''  is a dance and electro house song about a woman in love with a man who betrayed her .
It embodies the incidents that have haunted Gaga  in the पास्ट , और इसके कोर अर्थ refers to the ऋणात्मक भाग of उसके  life that she ca n't escape .
Gaga  रै further समझाया कि the सोंग थी भी परिचय honoring एक  's inner darkness in order to bring oneself into the light .
the कलाकृति लिये the सिंगल थी  designed by Gaga in Microsoft Word .
In spite of a polarizing impact on several religious groups , the  सोंग थी generally खूब प्राप्त by आलोचकों , जो likened the सोंग to `` ख़राब रोमांस `` साथ कुछ noting it चाहिए have महरूम the एल्बम  's lead single .
The song has a similar sound to  गागा 's पिछला redone-produced ट्रैक्स , सहित `` पोकर फेस `` , `` lovegame `` , `` ख़राब रोमांस  '' , and `` Alejandro `` .
It contains  तीन पृथक hooks और a हाउस -influenced ब्रेक  down .
Gaga explained that the lines  बोला दौरान the विश्लेषण बात परिचय उसके as परे मोचन , regarding the  traditional views of what a woman should be .
`` Judas '' initially had a  दमदार बिक्री खोलने , लकिन थी कम कामयाब commercially in तुलना  to Gaga 's previous singles .
The song reached the top ten of the  चार्ट in सबसे प्रमुख म्यूज़िक बाज़ार , और भी पहुँचे the शीर्ष of  the charts in South Korea .
A music video for the song was filmed in April 2011 ,  co-directed by गागा और laurieann गिब्सन और co-starring नॉर्मन reedus  .
It  रै a biblical कथानक जहाँ reedus निभाई यहूदा  Iscariot and Gaga played Mary Magdalene .
The  वीडियो portrays उन्हें as आधुनिक दिन प्रचारकों going  to Jerusalem .
It included the Biblical story of  यहूदा betraying यीशु , और ended साथ गागा as magdalene  getting stoned to death .
Before its release , the Catholic  लीग condemned गागा लिये the कथित उपयोग of धार्मिक  imagery and her role in the video .
However , critics generally  praised the वीडियो , नहीं ढूंढना कोई अप्रिय  content .
The video was nominated  लिये दो पुरस्कार at the 2011 एमटीवी वीडियो  Music Awards .
Gaga has performed `` Judas '' on a number of television shows , including The Graham Norton Show ,  शनिवार रात्रि सजीव , शुभ morning americas `` गर्मियाँ कॉन्सर्ट श्रेणी '' , the फ्रेंच x फ़ैक्टर as खूब as on the एलेन degeneres दिखाएँ .
Marvin Gaye ( April 2 , 1939April 1 , 1984 ) , born Marvin  pentz gay , jr. , थी an अमरीकी singer-songwriter  and musician .
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s with a string of hits  सहित `` कैसा मीठी it is ( to be loved by तुम ) `` और `` i सुना it through the grapevine `` और duet रिकार्डिंग साथ मरियम कुएं और tammi terrell , बाद कमाई the शीर्षक `` प्रिंस  of Motown '' and `` Prince of Soul '' .
During the 1970s ,  gaye अंकित the अवधारणा एल्बम कया 's going on और let 's मिलेंगी it on और became among the  first artists in Motown to break away from the reins of its production company .
Gaye 's  बाद रिकार्डिंग बहकावे अनेक r & b subgenres ऐसे  as quiet storm and neo-soul .
Following a period in Europe under a tax exile in the  जल्दी 1980s , gaye released the 1982 ग्रैमी award-winning hit `` यौन healing  `` and the Midnight Love album .
Since his death in 1984 , Gaye has been posthumously honored by many  संस्थानों , सहित the ग्रैमी आजीवन उपलब्धि पुरस्कार और the चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल  of Fame .
The Academy Award for Best Picture is one of the Academy Awards of Merit presented annually by the Academy of  गति चित्र कला और sciences ( ampas ) to निर्माता working in the गति चित्र उद्योग और is the तभी श्रेणी in जिससे प्रत्येक सदस्य is योग्य to मनोनीत  for .
Best Picture is  माना the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण of the अकादमी पुरस्कार , as it represents सब the directing , एक्टिंग , म्यूज़िक composing , लिखने ,  editing and other efforts put forth into a film .
Consequently , Best Picture is the  फाइनल पुरस्कार और the निष्कर्ष of the सालाना अकादमी पुरस्कार  ceremony .
The Grand Staircase columns at the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles , where the Academy Awards ceremonies have been held  चूंकि 2002 , शोकेस प्रत्येक फिल्मी कि रै जीती the बेहतरीन चित्र शीर्षक चूंकि the पुरस्कार 's inception 85 सालो पहले .
Heavy  बरसात is an इंटरैक्टिव नाटक action-adventure वीडियो खेल निर्मित by फ्रेंच डेवलपर quantic  Dream exclusively for the PlayStation 3 .
the खेल is लिखा और निर्देशित by quantic  Dream 's founder and CEO David Cage .
Heavy Rains story is a dramatic thriller  modelled बाद फिल्मी noir , featuring चार protagonists शामिल साथ the रहस्य of the origami कातिल , a सीरियल कातिल  who uses extended periods of rainfall to drown his victims .
Ethan Mars is trying to save his  बेटे इससे होने the अगला शिकार , जबकि investigative पत्रकार मैडिसन paige , एफबीआई profiler नॉर्मन jayden , और निजी जासूस स्कॉट शेल्बी हैं प्रत्येक trying  to track down clues to the Origami Killer 's identity .
The player interacts with the game by performing actions  highlighted on स्क्रीन सम्बन्धित to motions on the नियंत्रक , और in कुछ मामले ,  performing a series of quick time events during fast-paced action sequences .
the खिलाड़ी 's निर्णय और क्रियाएँ दौरान the खेल  will affect the narrative .
The  प्रमुख वर्ण can be मारे , और निश्चित क्रियाएँ may सीसे to अलग  scenes and endings .
A  playable डेमो थी released  on 11 February 2010 .
The demo was  released prior to इस तिथि लिये लोगों जो took भाग in a चार दिन चुनौती on 5 फ़रवरी  2010 .
A patch to allow use of the  प्लेस्टेशन मूव नियंत्रक to खेल the खेल थी released in सितंबर 2010  .
Heavy Rain  थी critically acclaimed और  has sold over two million copies .
It won  2010 's खेल of the साल इससे सीएनएन और गेमिंग संघ , और बेहतरीन  PS3 Game of 2010 by GameSpy and IGN .
A modified version of the game was released  titled भारी बरसात संस्करण modifiée exclusively in फ़्रांस , aimed towards  a younger audience .
In 2010 , the game  थी शामिल in the किताब 1001 वीडियो खेल  You Must Play Before You Die .
Total  superannuation उद्योग देनदारी : सदस्यों निधि और  reserves ( A $ millions ) since 1988 .
सालाना कुल superannuation  industry asset growth 1996-2005 .
Superannuation in Australia refers  to the इंतजाम जिससे लोगों मेक in ऑस्ट्रेलिया to have निधि उपलब्धियाँ  for them in retirement .
In Australia , superannuation  इंतजाम हैं government-supported और प्रोत्साहित , और न्यूनतम प्रावधानों  are compulsory for employees .
For example , employers are required to pay a proportion  of an कर्मचारी 's salaries और मजदूरी ( फिलहाल 9 % ) into a superannuation निधि , लकिन लोगों हैं प्रोत्साहित to put aside अतिरिक्त निधि into superannuation  .
The minimum  दायित्व जरूरी by नियोक्ता is नियत to बढ़ाएँ to 12 % धीरे stepping  annually from 2013 to 2020 .
An individual can  withdraw निधि आउट of a superannuation निधि जब the व्यक्ति meets एक of the शर्तें of रिलीज contained in अनुसूची 1 of the  Superannuation Industry ( Supervision ) Regulations 1994 .
This is a list  of the वर्ण इससे the अमरीकी comedy-drama  television series The Game .
Electoral College map  प्रर्दशित the परिणाम of the 2012 u.S. अध्यक्षीय  election .
President Barack Obama ( D - IL ) won the  लोकप्रिय vote in 26 राज्य और the ज़िला of कोलंबिया ( denoted in ब्लू ) to कैप्चर 332 चुनावी  votes .
Former Governor Mitt Romney  ( r - ma ) जीती the लोकप्रिय vote in 24 राज्य ( denoted in रेड ) to कैप्चर 206 चुनावी मत  .
Cartogram representation of the Electoral  कॉलेज vote लिये the 2012 चुनाव , साथ प्रत्येक वर्गाकार representing  one electoral vote .
the संयुक्त राज्य चुनावी कॉलेज is the संस्था कि officially elects the अध्यक्ष  and Vice President of the United States every four years .
The President and  वाइस अध्यक्ष हैं नहीं निर्वाचित सीधे by the मतदाता  .
Instead , they are elected by `` electors '' who are  चुनी by लोकप्रिय vote on a state-by-state आधार  .
Electors are  apportioned to प्रत्येक राज्य और the ज़िला of कोलंबिया , लकिन नहीं to territorial possessions  of the United States , such as Puerto Rico and Guam .
the क्रमांक of निर्वाचक in प्रत्येक राज्य is बराबर  to the number of members of Congress to which the state is entitled .
The Twenty-third  amendment रै सदा resulted in the ज़िला of कोलंबिया  having three electors .
There are 538 electors , based on there being 435  प्रतिनिधि और 100 सीनेटरों , प्लस the तीन निर्वाचक इससे the ज़िला of कोलंबिया  .
Electors are pledged to  particular अध्यक्षीय और वाइस अध्यक्षीय उम्मीदवार , हालांकि unpledged  electors are possible .
In all states , except Maine and Nebraska ,  निर्वाचक हैं निर्वाचित on a `` winner-take-all  '' basis .
That is , all electors  pledged to the अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी जो विन्स the सबसे  votes in a state become electors for that state .
Maine and Nebraska use the `` congressional district method '' , selecting one elector within each congressional  ज़िला by लोकप्रिय vote और selecting the बाकी दो निर्वाचक by a राज्यव्यापी लोकप्रिय  vote .
Although  no elector is जरूरी by संघीय विधि to सम्मान a प्रतिज्ञा , वहीँ have  only been very few occasions when an elector voted contrary to a pledge .
The Twelfth  amendment specifies कैसा a अध्यक्ष और वाइस अध्यक्ष हैं निर्वाचित और requires  each elector to cast one vote for President and another vote for Vice President .
आलोचकों argue कि the चुनावी कॉलेज is inherently undemocratic और देता झूले राज्य अनुपातहीन  influence in electing the President and Vice President .
the चुनावी कॉलेज देता a न्यूमेरिक लाभ in the चुनाव of the अध्यक्ष to the छोटी राज्य , as the  minimum number of electors for the small states is three compared to one for the election of representatives .
On the other hand  , the winner-take-all विधि of मतदान favors  the larger states .
A number of constitutional amendments have  महरूम प्रस्तावित seeking to alter the चुनावी कॉलेज or बदलें it  with a direct popular vote .
Barack Hussein Obama II ( ; born August 4 , 1961 ) is the 44th  और वर्तमान अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य , the पहला अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी to  hold the office .
Born in Honolulu  , हवाई , ओबामा is a ग्रैजुएट of कोलंबिया विश्वविद्यालयों और  Harvard Law School , where he was president of the Harvard Law Review .
He was a  जातियाँ आयोजक in शिकागो पहले  earning his law degree .
He  worked as a सिविल अधिकारों attorney in शिकागो और सिखाया संवैधानिक  law at the University of Chicago Law School from 1992 to 2004 .
He served three terms representing the 13th District in the Illinois  सीनेट इससे 1997 to 2004 , कार्यशील unsuccessfully लिये the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस  of Representatives in 2000 .
In 2004 , Obama received national attention during his campaign to represent Illinois in the  संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट साथ उसके विजय in the कूच लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी प्राथमिक , उसके keynote पता at the  Democratic National Convention in July , and his election to the Senate in November .
He began his presidential campaign in 2007 ,  और in 2008 , बाद a बंद प्राथमिक अभियान विरूद्ध हिलेरी rodham क्लिंटन , he जीती sufficient delegates in  the Democratic Party primaries to receive the presidential nomination .
He then defeated Republican nominee John McCain in the general  चुनाव , और थी उदघाटन as अध्यक्ष on जनवरी 20 , 2009  .
Nine months later , Obama was  नामित the 2009 नोबेल सलाम पुरस्कार laureate  .
He was re-elected president in November 2012 ,  defeating रिपब्लिकन nominee mitt romney , और थी sworn in लिये a दूसरी पद on जनवरी  20 , 2013 .
जल्दी in उसके पहला पद in दफ्तर , ओबामा हस्ताक्षरित into विधि आर्थिक stimulus विधान in जवाब to the ग्रेट मंदी  in the form of the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 and the Tax Relief , Unemployment Insurance Reauthorization , and Job Creation Act of 2010 .
Other major domestic initiatives in his presidency include the Patient Protection  और सस्ती परवाह अधिनियम , प्रायः referred to as `` obamacare '' ; the dodd–frank वॉल गली सुधार और उपभोक्ता सुरक्षा अधिनियम ; the do n't पूछो , do n't बताना repeal अधिनियम of 2010 ; the बजट  Control Act of 2011 ; and the American Taxpayer Relief Act of 2012 .
In May 2012 , he became the first sitting U.S. president to publicly support same-sex  विवाह और in 2013 उसके प्रशासन दायर briefs जिससे urged the परम् अदालत to नियम in एहसान of same-sex युगल in दो high-profile मामले .
In foreign policy , Obama ended U.S. military involvement in the Iraq War , increased troop levels  in अफगानिस्तान , हस्ताक्षरित the नई प्रारंभ बाहें कंट्रोल सन्धि साथ रूस , ordered u.S. सैन्य भागीदारी in लीबिया , और ordered the सैन्य आपरेशन कि resulted in the  death of Osama bin Laden .
The Honda CBR1100XX Super  blackbird थी a होंडा मोटरसाइकिल बना इससे 1996  to 2007 .
The bike was developed to  चुनौती the कावासाकी निंजा zx-11 as the संसार 's तीव्रतम उत्पादन मोटरसाइकिल , और होंडा succeeded  with a top speed of .
Two years later the  शीर्षक passed to the suzuki hayabusa , जिससे  reached .
The  blackbird is नामित बाद the लॉकहीड sr-71 , भी  a speed record holder .
Sample view of an  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य रिकार्ड आधारित  on images
नमूना दृश्य of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  health record
An electronic health record ( EHR ) is an evolving concept defined as a  व्यवस्थित संग्रहण of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य सूचना परिचय व्यक्तिगत मरीजों or populations  .
It is a record in digital format that is theoretically  सक्षम of होने साझा आरपार अलग स्वास्थ्य परवाह जमावट  .
In some  मामले इस sharing can occur by रास्ता of network-connected enterprise-wide  information systems and other information networks or exchanges .
EHRs may  शामिल a दायरा of आंकड़ा , सहित जनसांख्यिकी , चिकित्सा इतिहास , दवा और allergies , immunization  status , laboratory test results , radiology images , vital signs , personal stats like age and weight , and billing information .
The Mariner up  on the mast in a तूफ़ान  .
One of the  wood-engraved illustrations by gustave  Doré .
The Rime of the Ancient Mariner  ( originally the rime of the ancyent marinere ) is the longest प्रमुख कविता by the अंग्रेज़ी कवि सैमुएल टेलर कॉलरिज , लिखा in 1797–98 और प्रकाशित  in 1798 in the first edition of Lyrical Ballads .
आधुनिक संस्करण उपयोग a बाद संशोधित संस्करण मुद्रित in 1817  that featured a gloss .
Along with other poems in Lyrical Ballads , it was a signal  शिफ़्ट to आधुनिक काव्य और the शुरूआत of अंग्रेजों रोमांटिक साहित्य  .
A proxy auto-config (  pac ) संचिका defines कैसा वेब browsers और अन्य उपयोक्ता एजेंटों can automatically चुनें the उचित प्रॉक्सी सर्वर  ( access method ) for fetching a given URL .
A PAC file contains a JavaScript  फलन “findproxyforurl ( url ,  host ) ” .
This function  रिटर्न a स्ट्रिंग साथ एक or अधिक अभिगम  method specifications .
ये विशेषताएँ कारण the उपयोक्ता एजेंट to उपयोग a  particular proxy server or to connect directly .
Multiple specifications provide a fall-back  जब a प्रॉक्सी fails to respond  .
The browser fetches this  pac संचिका पहले requesting अन्य यूआरएल  .
The URL of  the pac संचिका is either विन्यस्त हस्तचालित or संकल्पित automatically by  the Web Proxy Autodiscovery Protocol .
Zendaya  कोलमैन ( born सितंबर 1 , 1996 ) , ज्ञात mononymously as zendaya  , is an American actress , singer and dancer .
she  सितारों on the डिज़्नी चैनल sitcom शेक it up  as Rocky Blue .
She has starred in  दो films और निभाई एक of the सीसे भूमिकाएँ  in the film Frenemies as Halley Brandon .
वो voiced फर्न in the pixie  Hollow Games .
She appeared in Good Luck Charlie  as रॉकी ब्लू और in a शुभ लक चार्ली और शेक it up क्रॉसओवर शीर्षक चार्ली शेक it  Up .
She  appeared on prankstars as herself in the एपीसोड `` चलना the शरारत '' और  on A.N.T . Farm as Sequoia Jones in the episode `` Creative ConsultANT . ''
zendaya is भी a संगीतकार  .
She signed a deal with Hollywood  रिकॉर्ड on अगस्त 8 , 2012 और प्रारंभ रिकॉर्डिंग गीतों लिये उसके डेब्यू एल्बम on अगस्त  12 , 2012 .
She released a single from an independent label called `` Swag It Out  `` और another सिंगल साथ बेला thorne पुकारा `` देखें me , '' जिससे  is featured on the Break It Down album .
On March 20 , 2012 ,  zendaya और बेला thorne released an एल्बम साथ पुकारा शेक it up : सजीव 2 नृत्य , प्रत्येक have उनके अपना सोंग on it , साथ साथ  a mash-up of both songs together as one .
On  अगस्त 21 , 2012 , zendaya और बेला thorne released  an EP called Shake It Up : Made In Japan .
Zendaya has a Christmas song called ``  शेक सांता शेक , '' जिससे is on the डिज़्नी चैनल अवकाश प्लेलिस्ट cd , जिससे  was released on October 2 , 2012 .
On March 5 , 2013 the third Shake It Up soundtrack was released , entitled I < 3 Dance ; on it , Zendaya has two songs with Bella - ``  संक्रामक प्रेम '' और `` इस is my नृत्य मंजिल '' - as खूब as एक सोलो सोंग , `` ताल of my ढोल  . ''
This is a list of  एयरपोर्ट in पेन्सिलवेनिया ( a u.S. राज्य ) , grouped by  type and sorted by location .
It contains all  public-use और सैन्य एयरपोर्ट in the  state .
Some  private-use और पूर्व एयरपोर्ट may be शामिल जहाँ notable , ऐसे as एयरपोर्ट कि यहूद previously public-use  , those with commercial enplanements recorded by the FAA or airports assigned an IATA airport code .
iOS ( previously iPhone OS ) is a mobile operating system developed and distributed by Apple Inc .  originally released in 2007 लिये the iphone और ipod टच प्लेटफ़ॉर्म , it रै महरूम विस्तारित to support अन्य ठहराना डिवाइस ऐसे as the ipad और ठहराना tv .
Unlike Microsoft 's  खिड़कियाँ फोन और google 's एंड्रॉइड , ठहराना करता नहीं अनुज्ञा आईओएस लिये संस्थापना  on non-Apple hardware .
, Apple 's App Store  contained अधिक than 700,000 आईओएस अनुप्रयोग , जिससे have collectively महरूम डाउनलोड  more than 30 billion times .
it था a 21 % share of the स्मार्टफोन मोबाईल ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली इकाई shipped in  the fourth quarter of 2012 , behind only Google 's Android .
In June 2012 , it accounted for 65 % of mobile  वेब आंकड़ा खपत ( सहित उपयोग on दोनो the ipod टच  and the iPad ) .
At  the हाफ of 2012 , वहीँ यहूद 410  million devices activated .
According to the special media event held by Apple  on सितंबर 12 , 2012 , 400 लाख डिवाइस have महरूम बेची through  June 2012 .
The user interface of  आईओएस is आधारित on the अवधारणा of सीधा हेरफेर , using  multi-touch gestures .
Interface  कंट्रोल तत्व consist of sliders , switches  , and buttons .
Interaction with the OS  शामिल इशारों ऐसे as swipe , tap , पिंच , और रिवर्स पिंच , सब of जिससे have विशिष्ट परिभाषाएं भीतर the कॉन्टेक्स्ट  of the iOS operating system and its multi-touch interface .
Internal accelerometers are used by some applications to respond to  shaking the यंत्र ( एक आम परिणाम is the undo कमांड ) or घूर्णन it in तीन आयाम ( एक आम परिणाम is switching इससे  portrait to landscape mode ) .
आईओएस is निकला इससे os x , साथ जिससे it  shares the Darwin foundation .
iOS is Apple 's mobile version  of the os x ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली प्रयुक्त on ठहराना कंप्यूटर  .
In iOS , there are four abstraction layers : the  कोर os परत , the कोर सेवाएं परत , the मीडिया परत , और  the Cocoa Touch layer .
The current version of the operating system ( iOS 6.1.3 ) dedicates 1-1.5 GB of the  यंत्र 's फ्लैश मेमोरी लिये the प्रणाली विभाजन , using roughly 800 mb of कि विभाजन ( varying by मॉडल )  for iOS itself .
iOS currently  रनों on iphone , ipad , ipod टच और ठहराना  TV .

1987 Audi Sport QuattroS1  साथ इसके विशाल विंग्स at pikes  Peak
a बिगाड़ने is an ऑटोमोटिव aerodynamic यंत्र जिनकी intended डिज़ाइन फलन is to 'spoil ' प्रतिकूल एयर गति आरपार a देह  of a vehicle in motion , usually described as turbulence or drag .
Spoilers on  the सामने of a गाडी हैं प्रायः पुकारा एयर dams , क्युकी in जोड to directing एयर प्रवाह वे भी reduce the राशि of एयर बहती underneath  the vehicle which generally reduces aerodynamic lift and drag .
Spoilers are often fitted  to रेस और high-performance खेल गाड़ियाँ , हालांकि वे have become आम on यात्री  vehicles as well .
Some spoilers are added  to गाड़ियाँ primarily लिये स्टाइलिंग उद्देश्य और have either छोटी aerodynamic  benefit or even make the aerodynamics worse .
विघ्न लिये गाड़ियाँ हैं प्रायः incorrectly उलझन साथ , or the पद प्रयुक्त  interchangeably with , wings .
Automotive wings are devices  जिनकी intended डिज़ाइन is to generate downforce as एयर गुजरता around उन्हें , नहीं  simply disrupt existing airflow patterns .
Mario , who serves as Nintendo 's  शुभंकर , is a fictional अक्षर निर्मित by खेल पंक्तियां शिगेरू miyamoto और voiced by चार्ल्स  Martinet .
This is a list of video games where the character Mario plays a part , either as  the समर्थक , विपक्षी , supporting अक्षर , as भाग of an ensemble डाल , as a कैमियो , or in a खेल भीतर  a game .
It does not include simple references to the character , such as the portraits of Mario  मिला in the लेजेंड of zelda : a कड़ी to the  Past .
The year indicated is the year the game was  पहला released , सबसे commonly in जापानी ; खेल  were sometimes released years later in other regions of the world .
The  सूची शामिल पोर्ट , remakes और  compilations .
It  करता n't शामिल कोई आभासी कंसोल  re-releases .
`` Man of Constant Sorrow '' ( also known as `` I Am A Man of Constant Sorrow '' ) is a traditional American  लोक सोंग पहला अंकित by लंड burnett , a partially अँधा  fiddler from Kentucky .
The song was originally  अंकित by burnett as `` विदाई सोंग '' मुद्रित in a रिचर्ड  Burnett songbook , circa 1913 .
An  जल्दी संस्करण थी अंकित by emry  Arthur in 1928 ( Vocalion Vo 5208 ) .
Public interest in the song was renewed after the  रिलीज of the 2000 फिल्मी o bhai , जहाँ आर्ट  Thou ?
, as it  plays a सेंट्रल भूमिका in the फिल्मी  's plot .
The  सोंग थी भी शामिल in the फिल्मी 's अत्यधिक कामयाब , multiple-platinum  selling soundtrack .

The volt ( symbol : V ) is the SI derived unit for  इलेक्ट्रिक संभावित ( वोल्टेज ) , इलेक्ट्रिक संभावित अंतर , और विद्युतवाहक  force .
The volt is named in honor of the Italian  physicist alessandro volta ( 1745–1827 ) , जो invented the वोल्टायिक  pile , possibly the first chemical battery .
A plaque commemorating the location of the Sarajevo assassination and steps of Gavrilo Princip (  चित्र लिया in 1987 , पहले कदम यहूद removed in 1992 और प्लैक बदला  from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A plaque commemorating the location of the  साराजेवो हत्या ( चित्र लिया  in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914 , Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , heir presumptive  to the austro-hungarian सिंहासन , और उसके बीवी , सोफी , duchess of hohenberg , यहूद शॉट मुर्दे in साराजेवो , by gavrilo princip , एक of a समूह of छह बोस्नियाई  Serb assassins coordinated by Danilo Ilić .
The political objective of the assassination was to break off  austria-hungary 's south-slav प्रांतों so वे could be संयुक्त into a वृहद सर्बिया or a यूगोस्लाविया  .
The  हत्यारे ' motives यहूद सतत साथ the गति कि  later became known as Young Bosnia .
सर्बियाई सैन्य अधिकारियों stood पीछे  the attack .
At the top of these Serbian military conspirators was Chief of Serbian Military Intelligence Dragutin  dimitrijević , उसके righthand man प्रमुख vojislav tankosić , और masterspy rade malobabić  .
Major Tankosić armed the  हत्यारे साथ बम और pistols और प्रशिक्षित उन्हें  .
The assassins were given access to the same  clandestine टनल of safe-houses और एजेंटों कि rade malobabić प्रयुक्त लिये the घुसपैठ  of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary .
The assassins , the key members of the clandestine tunnel , and the key  सर्बियाई सैन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों जो यहूद स्टिल जिंदा यहूद गिरफ्तार , आजमाया , convicted और punished .
Those who were arrested in  बोस्निया यहूद आजमाया in साराजेवो in अक्तूबर  1914 .
The other conspirators were arrested and tried before a Serbian kangaroo  अदालत on the french-controlled salonika सामने in 1916–1917 on unrelated गलत आरोप ; सर्बिया चलाया तीन  of the top military conspirators .
Much of what  is ज्ञात परिचय the assassinations आता इससे ये  two trials and related records .
Assignment of responsibility for the bombing and murders of 28 June is highly  विवादास्पद क्युकी the आक्रमण led to the outbreak of संसार युद्ध i एक माह  later .
मिशन सैन जुआन capistrano थी a स्पेनी मिशन in दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , located in present-day San Juan Capistrano .
it थी संस्थापित on सब संतो ' दिन नवम्बर  1 , 1776 , by Spanish Catholics of the Franciscan Order .
Named for Giovanni da Capistrano , a 15th century theologian and  `` योद्धा पुजारी '' जो resided in the abruzzo प्रदेश of इटली , सैन जुआन capistrano रै the भेद of होने घर  to the oldest building in California still in use , a chapel built in 1782 .
Known alternately as `` Serra 's Chapel '' and `` Father Serra 's Church , '' it is the only extant structure where  it रै महरूम प्रलेखित कि the padre junipero सेरा मनाये  mass .
One of the  बेहतरीन ज्ञात of the alta कैलिफ़ोर्निया मिशन ( और एक of the few मिशन to have दरअसल महरूम संस्थापित twice—others  being Mission San Gabriel Arcángel and Mission La Purísima Concepción ) .
The site was originally consecrated on  अक्तूबर 30 , 1775 , by पिता fermín lasuén , लकिन थी जल्दी abandoned  due to unrest among the indigenous population in San Diego .
The success of  the उपनिवेश is evident in इसके ऐतिहासिक  records .
Prior to the arrival of the  प्रचारकों , कुछ 550 natives यहूद बिखरे throughout the  local area .
By 1790 , the number of converted  ईसाइयों था grown to 700 , और बस छह सालो बाद nearly 1,000 `` neophytes `` ( हाल converts  ) lived in or around the Mission compound .
1,649 baptisms were conducted that year alone ,  आउट of the कुल 4,639 souls परिवर्तित between 1776 और 1847  .
More than 2,000 former inhabitants (  ज़्यादातर juaneño इंडियंस ) हैं दफ्न in unmarked क़ब्रों in the मिशन  's cemetery ( campo santo ) .
The remains of Father ( later Monsignor ) St. John  o'sullivan , जो पहचाना the प्रॉपर्टी 's ऐतिहासिक मान और working tirelessly to conserve और rebuild इसके structures , हैं दफ्न  at the entrance to the cemetery on the west side of the property , and a statue raised in his honor stands at the head of the crypt .
The surviving chapel also serves as the final resting place of three padres who passed on while serving at the Mission : Fathers José  barona , विसेंट fustér , और विसेंट पास्कुआल oliva हैं सब entombed beneath the अभयारण्य  floor .
The Criolla or `` Mission grape , '' was first planted  at सैन जुआन capistrano in 1779 ; in 1783 , the पहला वाइन उत्पादित in alta कैलिफ़ोर्निया उभरा इससे the मिशन 's वाइनरी  .
The  मिशन डाला a long काल of क्रमिक मनाही  after secularization in 1833 .
Numerous efforts were made over the  सालो to restore the मिशन to इसके पूर्व महिमा , लकिन none मिले साथ ग्रेट कामयाबी जबतक the आगमन of पिता  O'Sullivan in 1910 .
बहाली प्रयत्न continue , और `` सेरा 's चैपल '' is स्टिल  used for religious services .
About  half-a-million विज़िटर , सहित 80,000 स्कूल children  , come to the Mission each year .
And while the ruins of ``  the ग्रेट स्टोन गिरिजाघर '' ( जिससे थी सब लकिन leveled by an 1812 भूकंप ) हैं a प्रसिद्ध architectural अचरज , the मिशन is शायद बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये the  annual `` Return of the Swallows '' which is traditionally observed every March 19 ( Saint Joseph 's Day ) .
Mission San Juan Capistrano has served as a favorite  विषय लिये अनेक notable कलाकारों , और रै महरूम immortalized in साहित्य और on फिल्मी numerous  times , perhaps more than any other mission .
In 1984 , a modern church complex was constructed  बस उत्तर और वेस्ट of the मिशन यौगिक और is अभी ज्ञात as मिशन basilica  San Juan Capistrano .
Today , the mission  यौगिक serves as a संग्रहालय , साथ the सेरा चैपल भीतर the यौगिक सेवारत  as a chapel for the mission parish .
Better Off Dead is a  1985 अमरीकी टीन रोमांटिक कॉमेडी फिल्मी अभिनीत जॉन cusack और लिखा और  directed by Savage Steve Holland .
it tells the स्टोरी of ऊँची स्कूल छात्र लेन myer  who is suicidal after his girlfriend breaks up with him .
Mercedes-Benz Superdome ( originally Louisiana Superdome  और commonly the superdome ) is a खेल और प्रदर्शनी स्टेडियम , स्तिथ in the सेंट्रल कारोबार ज़िला of नई ऑरलियन्स  , Louisiana , USA .
योजनाएँ यहूद drawn up in 1967 , by the नई ऑरलियन्स modernist architectural  firm of Curtis and Davis .
Its  स्टील फ़्रेम कवर a  expanse .
Its dome is made of a  lamella multi-ringed फ़्रेम और रै a व्यास of , बनाना  it the largest fixed domed structure in the world .
It is home to the NFL 's New Orleans Saints , the NCAA 's Division I-A Tulane Green Wave  फ़ुटबॉल टोली ( the largest फ़ुटबॉल स्टेडियम in सम्मेलन यूएसए ) , the राज्य फार्म bayou क्लासिक , the r+l वाहक नई ऑरलियन्स कटोरी , the allstate  Sugar Bowl and , every fourth year , the BCS National Championship Game .
Because of the size and location  in एक of the प्रमुख पर्यटक गंतव्यों in the संयुक्त राज्य , the superdome routinely makes the `` छोटी सूची '' of  candidates being considered for major sporting events , such as the Super Bowl and the Final Four .
In 2005 , the Superdome gained international attention of a  अलग प्रकार जब it housed हज़ारों of लोगों seeking आश्रय इससे hurricane कैटरीना  .
the भवन suffered extensive क्षति as a परिणाम of  the storm , and was closed for many months afterward .
On October 3 , 2011 , it  थी घोषित कि जर्मनी automaker mercedes-benz खरीदा नामकरण अधिकारों  to the stadium .
the नई नाम took प्रभाव  on October 23 , 2011 .
It is the third stadium  कि रै नामकरण अधिकारों इससे mercedes-benz ( और पहला in the संयुक्त राज्य ) , बाद the mercedes-benz एरिना , the स्टेडियम of bundesliga क्लबों vfb stuttgart ,  in Stuttgart , Germany and the Mercedes-Benz Arena in Shanghai , China .
