Disney 's Animal Kingdom Lodge is an African-themed  डीलक्स रिज़ॉर्ट at the वॉल्ट डिज़्नी संसार रिज़ॉर्ट .
It  खोली on अप्रैल  16 , 2001 .
The resort is owned and  संचालित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी पार्क और रिसॉर्ट  .
Disney 's Animal Kingdom Lodge is located in the  एनिमल किंगडम रिज़ॉर्ट क्षेत्रफल , सटा to डिज़्नी 's एनिमल  Kingdom .
It gives  अतिथि the अवसर to दृश्य चरने वन्यजीव बाहर उनके कक्ष और पब्लिक क्षेत्रों in the  resort within proximity of the animals , conveying the feeling of being in an African savanna .
The People 's Party , also known as the `` Populists '' , was a short-lived political party in  the संयुक्त राज्य स्थापित in 1891 दौरान the populist गति ( संयुक्त राज्य , 19th सदी )  .
It was  सबसे महत्वपूर्ण in 1892-96 , और तब  rapidly faded away .
Based among poor , white cotton farmers in the  दक्षिण ( विशेषकर उत्तर कैरोलिना , अलबामा , और टेक्सास ) और hard-pressed गेहूं किसानो in the मैदान राज्य ( विशेषकर कान्सास और नेब्रास्का ) , it represented a कट्टरपंथी crusading रूप of agrarianism  and hostility to banks , railroads , and elites generally .
It sometimes formed  coalitions साथ मजदूर संघ , और in 1896 the डेमोक्रेट endorsed उनके  presidential nominee , William Jennings Bryan .
The terms `` populist '' and ``  populism `` हैं commonly प्रयुक्त लिये anti-elitist appeals in विपक्ष to स्थापित रूचि और मुख्यधारा  parties .
भाषाई मैप of सीरियल , कैमरून  , and Benin .
Sign in English , outside the  विश्वविद्यालयों of लागोस
There are hundreds  of भाषाएं बोला in सीरियल  .
the प्रमुख भाषाएं हैं योरूबा , हौसा , इग्बो ,  Edo , Fulfulde , Kanuri , and Ibibio .
The official language of Nigeria , English , the  पूर्व औपनिवेशिक भाषा , थी चुनी to सुकर the सांस्कृतिक और भाषाई एकता of the  country .
English , however , remains an exclusive preserve of the country 's urban elite , and  is नहीं widely बोला in ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों , जिससे comprise तीन quarters of the देशों जनसांख्यिकी  .
Nigeria 's  भाषाई विविधता is a microcosm of अफ़्रीकी as a पूरे , encompassing तीन प्रमुख अफ़्रीकी भाषाएं  families : Afroasiatic , Nilo-Saharan , and Niger–Congo .
Nigeria also has several  as-yet unclassified भाषाएं , ऐसे as cen tuum , जिससे may represent a relic of an भी वृहद विविधता  prior to the spread of the current language families .
A  श्रेणी of कार्यक्रम led to the आक्रमण  on Pearl Harbor .
War between Japan and the United States  था महरूम a सम्भावना कि प्रत्येक स्वदेश 's सैन्य शक्तियां नियोजित लिये चूंकि the 1920s , हालांकि रियल टेंशन किया  not begin until the 1931 invasion of Manchuria by Japan .
Over the next decade , Japan  विस्तारित धीरे into चीन , अग्रणी to सब आउट  war between the two in 1937 .
In 1940 Japan invaded  फ्रेंच इंडोचायना in an प्रयत्न to embargo सब imports into चीन , सहित  war supplies purchased from the U.S .
This move  prompted the संयुक्त राज्य to embargo सब आयल निर्यात , अग्रणी the इम्पीरियल जापानी नेवी to अनुमान कि it था कम than  two years of bunker oil remaining and to support the existing plans to seize oil resources in the Dutch East Indies .
Planning had been  underway लिये कुछ समय on an आक्रमण on the `` दक्षिणी संसाधन क्षेत्रफल '' to add it to the वृहद  East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere that Japan envisioned in the Pacific .
The Philippine islands , at that time an American  territory , यहूद भी a जापानी  target .
the जापानी सैन्य concluded कि an आक्रमण of  the Philippines would provoke an American military response .
Rather than seize and fortify the islands , and wait for the inevitable US counterattack , Japan 's military leaders  बजाय decided on the pre-emptive पर्ल हार्बर आक्रमण , जिससे वे assumed होता negate the अमरीकी शक्तियां needed लिये the मुक्ति और  reconquest of the islands .
Planning for the  आक्रमण था begun in बहुत जल्दी 1941 , by admiral  Isoroku Yamamoto .
He finally won assent from the  नवल ऊँची कमांड by , among अन्य बाते , threatening  to resign .
The attack was approved in the summer at  an इम्पीरियल सम्मेलन और again at a दूसरी सम्मेलन in the  fall .
Simultaneously over the year  , पायलटों यहूद प्रशिक्षित , और जहाजों prepared लिये  its execution .
Authority for the attack was granted at the  दूसरी इम्पीरियल सम्मेलन if a राजनयिक परिणाम संतोषजनक to  Japan was not reached .
After final approval by Emperor Hirohito the order  to आक्रमण थी जारी at the शुरूआत of दिसम्बर .
A common  दफ्तर stapler
A  आम स्कूल  stapler
A stapler is  a mechanical यंत्र कि joins चादरें of पेपर or समान सामग्री by ड्राइविंग  a thin metal staple through the sheets and folding the ends .
Staplers are widely  प्रयुक्त in सरकारी , कारोबार , कार्यालयों  , homes and schools .
The word `` stapler '' can actually  refer to a क्रमांक of अलग डिवाइस of varying  uses .
In addition to joining paper sheets together , staplers can also be used in a surgical setting to join  ऊतक साथ साथ सर्जिकल स्टेपल्स to बंद a सर्जिकल घाव ( much in the वही रास्ता as टांके or sutures  ) .
Typically ,  सबसे staplers हैं प्रयुक्त to जुड़ें अनेक चादरें of पेपर  .
Paper staplers come in two  पृथक प्रकार : हस्तचालित और इलेक्ट्रिक  .
हस्तचालित staplers हैं सामान्यतः hand-held , हालांकि मॉडल कि हैं  used while set on a desk or other surface are not uncommon .
Electric staplers  मौजूद in a किस्में of अलग डिजाइन और  models .
Their primary operating  फलन is to जुड़ें विशाल संख्याएँ of पेपर चादरें  together in rapid succession .
Some  इलेक्ट्रिक staplers can जुड़ें up to  20 sheets at a time .
Swallowing , known scientifically as deglutition , is the process in  the इंसान or एनिमल देह कि makes कुछ pass इससे the मुँह , to the pharynx , और into the ग्रासनाल ,  while shutting the epiglottis .
If this  fails और the ऑब्जेक्ट goes through the श्वासनली , तब choking  or pulmonary aspiration can occur .
In the human body it is  नियंत्रित by the swallowing reflex  .
Thaddeus Stevens ( April 4 , 1792 –  अगस्त 11 , 1868 ) , of पेन्सिलवेनिया , थी a नेता of the कट्टरपंथी रिपब्लिकन  faction of the Republican Party and a fierce opponent of slavery .
he थी एक of the सबसे influential सदस्यों  in the history of Congress .
As chairman of the powerful House Ways  और अर्थात् कमेटी , स्टीवंस , a witty , व्यंग्यात्मक स्पीकर और flamboyant पार्टी नेता , वर्चस्व the हाउस इससे 1861  until his death .
He wrote much of the  वित्तीय विधान कि सशुल्क लिये the अमरीकी  Civil War .
Stevens and Senator Charles Sumner  यहूद the प्रधान नेताओ of the कट्टरपंथी republicans दौरान the युद्ध और पुनर्निर्माण  era .
Scholarly views of Stevens have  swung sharply चूंकि उसके मौत as interpretations of पुनर्निर्माण  have changed .
Historians of the Dunning School (  1890s–1940s ) आयोजित स्टीवंस जिम्मेदार लिये demanding हर्ष उपचार of the श्वेत दक्षिण और violating अमरीकी परंपराओं of republicanism ,  depicting Stevens as a villain for his advocacy of harsh measures in the South such as disfranchising all ex-Confederates .
This  अत्यधिक ऋणात्मक characterization  held sway into the 1950s .
The rise of the neo-abolitionist  स्कूल in the 1950s led to a दमदार धनात्मक सराहना of स्टीवंस ' कार्य on सिविल अधिकारों  for Freedmen .
A recent biographer characterizes him as , `` The Great  commoner , रक्षक of फ़्री पब्लिक शिक्षा in पेन्सिलवेनिया , नेशनल रिपब्लिकन नेता in the struggles विरूद्ध गुलामी in the संयुक्त राज्य और intrepid mainstay of the attempt to सुरक्षित  racial justice for the Freedmen during Reconstruction , the only member of the House of Representatives ever to have been known as the 'dictator ' of Congress . ''
Overview  of the अनुवाद of eukaryotic  messenger RNA
आरेख प्रर्दशित the अनुवाद of mrna और the  synthesis of proteins by a ribosome
In molecular biology and genetics ,  अनुवाद is the प्रक्रम through जिससे सेल्यूलर  ribosomes manufacture proteins .
It  is भाग of the प्रक्रम of  gene expression .
In translation , messenger RNA ( mRNA ) produced by transcription is decoded by the  राइबोसोम to उपज a विशिष्ट अमीनो एसिड कड़ी , or polypeptide , कि होगा  later fold into an active protein .
In bacteria ,  अनुवाद occurs in the कोशिका 's कोशिकाद्रव्य , जहाँ the  large and small subunits of the ribosome are located , and bind to the mRNA .
In  eukaryotes , अनुवाद occurs आरपार the  membrane of the endoplasmic reticulum in a process called vectorial synthesis .
The ribosome facilitates decoding by inducing  the बाइंडिंग of trnas साथ पूरक anticodon sequences  to that of the mRNA .
The tRNAs carry specific amino acids  कि हैं chained साथ into a polypeptide as the mrna गुजरता through और is `` पढ़ा '' by the  ribosome in a fashion reminiscent to that of a stock ticker and ticker tape .
In many  उदाहरण , the संपूर्ण ribosome/mrna जटिल बांधता to the बाहरी झिल्ली of the अशिष्ट endoplasmic reticulum और रिलीज  the nascent protein polypeptide inside for later vesicle transport and secretion outside of the cell .
Many types of transcribed RNA , such as  ट्रांसफ़र rna , ribosomal rna , और छोटी नाभिकीय rna , do नहीं undergo अनुवाद into प्रोटीन .
Translation proceeds in four phases : initiation , elongation , translocation and termination (  सब describing the विकास of the अमीनो एसिड कड़ी , or polypeptide कि is the  product of translation ) .
अमीनो acids हैं brought to ribosomes और समवेत  into proteins .
In activation , the correct  अमीनो एसिड is covalently बंधुआ to the सही ट्रांसफ़र  RNA ( tRNA ) .
The  अमीनो एसिड is joined by इसके carboxyl समूह to the 3 ' oh of the trna by an ester  bond .
जब the trna रै an अमीनो  acid linked to it , it is termed `` charged '' .
Initiation  involves the छोटी subunit of the राइबोसोम बाइंडिंग to the 5 ' समाप्त of mrna साथ  the help of initiation factors ( IF ) .
termination of the polypeptide happens जब the a साईट of the राइबोसोम  faces a stop codon ( UAA , UAG , or UGA ) .
No tRNA can  recognize or bind to इस codon  .
Instead , the stop codon induces the binding of a release  फ़ैक्टर प्रोटीन कि prompts the disassembly of the  entire ribosome/mRNA complex .
A number of antibiotics act by inhibiting  अनुवाद ; ये शामिल anisomycin , cycloheximide , chloramphenicol , tetracycline , streptomycin , erythromycin  , and puromycin , among others .
Prokaryotic ribosomes have a different structure from that of eukaryotic ribosomes , and  यूँ एंटीबायोटिक can specifically निशाना बैक्टीरियल infections बगैर कोई detriment to a eukaryotic मेजबान  's cells .
A  मल्टीमीडिया संदेश on a मोबाईल फोन  .
Multimedia Messaging Service ( MMS ) is a standard way to send  संदेश कि शामिल मल्टीमीडिया सामग्री to और इससे मोबाईल फोन  .
It extends the core SMS ( Short  संदेश सेवा ) काबिलियत कि अनुमत एक्सचेंज of टेक्स्ट संदेश तभी  up to 160 characters in length .
The most popular  उपयोग is to भेजें छायाचित्र इससे camera-equipped handsets , हालांकि it is भी लोकप्रिय as a विधि of delivering न्यूज और entertainment सामग्री  including videos , pictures , text pages and ringtones .
The standard is developed by the Open  मोबाईल गठबंधन ( ओमो ) , हालांकि दौरान विकास it थी भाग of the 3gpp  and WAP groups .
Smallpox was an  संक्रामक बीमारी अद्वितीय to इंसानो , caused by either of दो वायरस विसंगतियाँ , variola प्रमुख  and Variola minor .
the बीमारी is भी ज्ञात by the लैटिन names variola or variola  vera , derived from varius ( `` spotted '' ) or varus ( `` pimple '' ) .
The disease  थी originally ज्ञात in अंग्रेज़ी as the `` चेचक '' or `` रेड प्लेग '' ; the पद `` smallpox '' थी पहला  used in Britain in the 15th century to distinguish variola from the `` great pox '' ( syphilis ) .
The last naturally  occurring मामला of smallpox ( variola नाबालिग ) थी diagnosed on 26 अक्तूबर  1977 .
Smallpox  स्थानीयकृत in छोटी रक्त बरतन of the स्किन और in the मुँह  and throat .
In the skin it  resulted in a characteristic maculopapular खाज और , बाद  , raised fluid-filled blisters .
V.  प्रमुख produces a अधिक गंभीर बीमारी और  has an overall mortality rate of 30–35 % .
V.  नाबालिग कल्याणकारी a milder रूप of बीमारी ( भी ज्ञात as alastrim , cottonpox , milkpox  , whitepox , and Cuban itch ) which kills about 1 % of its victims .
Long-term complications of V. major infection  शामिल characteristic scars , commonly on the फेस , जिससे occur in 65–85 % of survivors  .
Blindness resulting from corneal  ulceration और scarring , और limb deformities due to गठिया और osteomyelitis हैं कम आम  complications , seen in about 2–5 % of cases .
Smallpox is believed to  have उभरा in इंसान populations परिचय 10,000 bc  .
The earliest physical evidence of it is  संभवतः the pustular खाज on the mummified देह of pharaoh ramses  V of Egypt .
The disease killed an estimated  400,000 europeans annually दौरान the closing सालो of the 18th सदी ( सहित पाँच reigning monarchs ) ,  and was responsible for a third of all blindness .
Of all  those संक्रमित , 20–60 % —and over 80 % of संक्रमित  children—died from the disease .
Smallpox was  जिम्मेदार लिये an अनुमानित 300–500 लाख मौतों  during the 20th century .
As recently as 1967 , the World Health Organization  ( जो ) अनुमानित कि 15 लाख लोगों contracted the बीमारी और कि दो लाख died in  that year .
After  टीकाकरण अभियान throughout the 19th और 20th सदियां  , the WHO certified the eradication of smallpox in 1979 .
smallpox is एक of दो संक्रामक रोगों to have महरूम eradicated , the अन्य होने  rinderpest , which was declared eradicated in 2011 .
`` I Want to Hold Your Hand '' is a song  by the अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान बैंड the बीटल्स  .
लिखा by जॉन लेनन और पॉल mccartney , और अंकित in अक्तूबर 1963 , it थी the पहला  Beatles record to be made using four-track equipment .
With advance orders exceeding one million copies in the United Kingdom ,  `` i want to थाम अपना हाथ '' होता साधारणतया have गए सीधा to the शीर्ष of the अंग्रेजों रिकार्ड चार्ट on इसके दिन of रिलीज ( 29 नवम्बर 1963 ) था it नहीं महरूम अवरोधित by the समूह 's पहला लाख विक्रेता `` वो loves  You `` , the Beatles ' previous UK single , which was having a resurgent spell in the top position following intense media coverage of the group .
Taking two weeks to  dislodge इसके पूर्ववर्ती , `` i want to थाम अपना हाथ '' ठहरे at क्रमांक एक लिये  five weeks and remained in the UK top fifty for twenty-one weeks in total .
It was also the group 's first American number one , entering the Billboard Hot 100 chart on  18 जनवरी 1964 at क्रमांक forty-five और starting the अंग्रेजों आक्रमण of the अमरीकी म्यूज़िक  industry .
By 1 February it held the number one spot — for seven weeks  — पहले होने replaced by `` वो loves तुम '' , a रिवर्स परिदृश्य of कया था occurred in ब्रिटेन , और remained in the us चार्ट लिये a कुल  of fifteen weeks .
`` I Want to Hold Your Hand ''  became the बीटल्स ' best-selling सिंगल  worldwide .
A gasser was a type of hot rod originating on the  dragstrips of the संयुक्त राज्य in the लेट 1950s और जारी जबतक the जल्दी  1970s .
Gassers were based on production models from the 1930s to mid-1960s , which have been stripped of  extraneous वज़न और jacked up using a ट्रक बीम धुरी to provide बेहतर वज़न वितरण on त्वरण ( बीम axles हैं भी हल्का than an स्वतंत्र सामने बर्खास्तगी  ) , though a raised stock front suspension is common as well .
Common weight reduction techniques include  fiberglass देह panels , stripped इंटीरियर्स और plexiglass  windows ( sometimes color tinted ) .
Because they were primarily built for racing , these cars  typically था the इंजन swapped to a larger or अधिक शक्तिशाली एक , the मौजूदा भण्डार  engine modified ( often heavily ) or both .
It was very  आम to अनुरूप a जड़ें supercharger और mechanical ईंधन इंजेक्शन  , such as one from Algon , Hilborn , or Crower .
With form being dictated by function , their appearance is often  बहुत शीर्ष भारी और ungainly , largely due to सामने ends होने उठाया उच्चतर than भण्डार , to assist in the वज़न ट्रांसफ़र दौरान  rapid acceleration ( racing ) .
Having their exhaust pipes exit through the front fender well is a  आम characteristic of gassers , as is having लाशें चित्रित in flamboyant metalflakes , मोती , और कैंडी finishes complemented by lettering in जंगली  fonts .
The name arose  क्युकी वे competed in a गैसोलीन -fueled खीचें रेसिंग क्लास  , rather than one using methanol or nitromethane .
The gasser is  the पूर्ववर्ती of the आधुनिक मजेदार car  .
Twelve-lead  ईकेजी of a 26-year-old  male
electrocardiography ( ईसीजी or ईकेजी इससे ) is a transthoracic ( आरपार the वक्ष or छाती ) निर्वचन of the विद्युत कार्यकलाप of the दिल over a काल of समय , as  detected by electrodes attached to the surface of the skin and recorded by a device external to the body .
The  रिकॉर्डिंग उत्पादित by इस noninvasive कार्यविधि is  termed an electrocardiogram ( also ECG or EKG ) .
An ECG is used to measure the rate and regularity of heartbeats , as well as the size and  स्थिति of the कक्षों , the उपस्थिति of कोई क्षति to the दिल , और the प्रभाव of दवाएँ or डिवाइस प्रयुक्त to विनियमित the दिल , ऐसे  as a pacemaker .
Most ECGs are performed for diagnostic or  शोध उद्देश्य on इंसान दिल , लकिन may भी be performed on पशु , प्रायः लिये निदान of दिल abnormalities  or research .
Donald John Trump  , sr. ( born जून 14 , 1946 ) is an अमरीकी  business magnate , television personality and author .
He is the chairman and  अध्यक्ष of the ट्रम्प संगठन और the संस्थापक of ट्रम्प entertainment रिसॉर्ट  .
Trump 's extravagant lifestyle , outspoken  manner , और भूमिका on the एनबीसी वास्तविकता दिखाएँ the प्रशिक्षु have बना उसे a well-known हस्ती  who was No . 14 on the 2012 Forbes Celebrity 100 list .
ट्रम्प is the बेटे of फ्रेड ट्रम्प ,  a wealthy New York City real-estate developer .
He worked for his father 's  कड़ , एलिज़ाबेथ ट्रम्प & बेटे , जबकि उपस्थित the व्हार्टन स्कूल of the विश्वविद्यालयों  of Pennsylvania , and in 1968 officially joined the company .
He was given control of the  कम्पनी in 1971 और renamed it the ट्रम्प संगठन  .
In 2010 , Trump expressed an interest in  बनने a प्रत्याशी लिये अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य in the 2012 चुनाव , हालांकि in may 2011 , he घोषित he होता  not be a candidate .
In December 2011 , Trump was suggested as a possible  वाइस अध्यक्षीय चयन by मिशेल bachmann , if वो यहूद to जीत the  Republican nomination .
`` A Change Is Gon na  आइये '' is a 1964 सिंगल by r & b singer-songwriter sam cooke , लिखा और पहला अंकित in 1963 और released अंतर्गत the  RCA Victor label shortly after his death in late 1964 .
हालांकि तभी a modest hit लिये cooke in तुलना साथ उसके पिछला singles  , the song came to exemplify the 1960s ' Civil Rights Movement .
The song has gained in popularity and  नाजुक acclaim in the दशकों चूंकि इसके रिलीज , और is # 12 on रोलिंग स्टोन 's 500 महानतम  Songs of All Time .
Steam rising  इससे the nesjavellir geothermal शक्ति स्टेशन in  Iceland .
Geothermal energy is  थर्मल उर्जा उत्पन्न और भंडारित in the  Earth .
थर्मल उर्जा is the उर्जा कि determines  the temperature of matter .
The Geothermal  उर्जा of the धरती 's क्रस्ट originates इससे the असली गठन of the ग्रह ( 20 % ) और इससे रेडियोसक्रिय  decay of minerals ( 80 % ) .
The geothermal gradient , which is  the अंतर in तापमान between the कोर of the ग्रह और इसके सतह , ड्राइव a निरन्तर conduction of थर्मल उर्जा in the रूप  of heat from the core to the surface .
The adjective geothermal  originates इससे the यूनानी जड़ें γη ( ge ) , अर्थ धरती , और θερμος ( thermos )  , meaning hot .
At the core of the Earth , thermal energy  is निर्मित by रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय और temperatures may पहुँचें over  5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ) .
ऊष्मा conducts इससे the कोर to surrounding  cooler rock .
The high  तापमान और दबाव कारण कुछ चट्टान to melt , बनाना मैग्मा संवहन upward  since it is lighter than the solid rock .
The magma  heats चट्टान और जल in the क्रस्ट , sometimes  up to 370 °C ( 700 °F ) .
From hot springs , geothermal energy has been used for bathing since Paleolithic times and for  स्पेस हीटिंग चूंकि प्राचीन रोमन टाइम्स , लकिन it is अभी बेहतर ज्ञात लिये विद्युत पीढी  .
Worldwide , about 10,715 megawatts ( MW ) of geothermal power  is ऑनलाइन in 24 देशों  .
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct  geothermal हीटिंग क्षमता is संस्थापित लिये ज़िला हीटिंग , स्पेस हीटिंग , स्पा , औद्योगिक प्रक्रियाओं , desalination और agricultural  applications .
Geothermal power is cost  प्रभावी , विश्वसनीय , चिरस्थायी , और environmentally दोस्ताना , लकिन रै historically  been limited to areas near tectonic plate boundaries .
Recent  technological अग्रिम have dramatically विस्तारित the दायरा और आकार of सुगठित संसाधन , विशेषकर  for applications such as home heating , opening a potential for widespread exploitation .
Geothermal wells release greenhouse gases  फंस गहन भीतर the धरती , लकिन ये emissions हैं much निम्नतर प्रति उर्जा ईकाई than those  of fossil fuels .
As a  परिणाम , geothermal शक्ति रै the संभावित to सहायता mitigate वैश्विक वार्मिंग if widely  deployed in place of fossil fuels .
The Earth 's  geothermal संसाधन हैं theoretically अधिक than पर्याप्त to सप्लाई मानवता 's उर्जा  needs , but only a very small fraction may be profitably exploited .
Drilling and  खोजी लिये गहन संसाधन is बहुत महंगी  .
Forecasts for the  भविष्य of geothermal शक्ति निर्भर on assumptions परिचय प्रौद्योगिकी , उर्जा कीमतें ,  subsidies , and interest rates .
पायलट कार्यक्रम जैसे eweb 's ग्राहक ऑप्ट in ग्रीन शक्ति कार्यक्रम दिखाएँ कि ग्राहक होता be willing to अदा a छोटी अधिक लिये a  renewable energy source like geothermal .
But as a result  of सरकारी assisted शोध और उद्योग अनुभव , the लागत of generating  geothermal power has decreased by 25 % over the past two decades .
In  2001 , geothermal उर्जा लागत between  two and ten cents per kwh .
Ownership of property may be  निजी , सामूहिक , or आम और the प्रॉपर्टी  may be objects , land/real estate , or intellectual property .
Determining ownership in law  involves determining जो रै निश्चित अधिकारों और कर्तव्य over the  property .
These rights and duties  , sometimes पुकारा a 'bundle of अधिकारों ' , can be अलग और आयोजित by अलग  parties .
The  सवाल of स्वामित्व पहुँच वापस to the प्राचीन  philosophers , Plato and Aristotle , who held different opinions on the subject .
Plato ( 428/427  bc – 348/347 bc ) विचार निजी प्रॉपर्टी निर्मित divisive inequalities , जबकि अरस्तू ( 384 bc – 322 bc )  thought private property enabled people to receive the full benefit of their labor .
Private property can  circumvent कया is अभी referred to as the “ त्रासदी of the कॉमन्स ” प्रॉब्लम , जहाँ लोगों tend to रुसवा  common property more than they do private property .
Given a short-sighted owner , however , a private property system can make these tragedies  worse—for उदाहरण , a निजी मालिक of a टुकड़ा of oil-rich प्रॉपर्टी , depending on उसके worldview , might be अधिक दिलचस्पी in short-term वित्तीय लाभ than वृद्धिशील उपयोग साथ an नजर toward अन्य 's चिंताएं ( e.g.  , those of future generations , the disenfranchised , etc . ) .
While Aristotle justified the existence of private ownership , he left open questions of ( 1 )  कैसा to allocate प्रॉपर्टी between कया is निजी और आम और ( 2 ) कैसा to allocate the निजी प्रॉपर्टी भीतर  society .
Over the millennia , and across  संस्कृतियों कया can be प्रॉपर्टी और कैसा it is regarded culturally  have varied widely .
Ownership is the basis for many other concepts  कि रूप the मूलाधार of प्राचीन और आधुनिक समाजों ऐसे as धन , व्यापार , कर्ज़ , दिवालियापन  , the criminality of theft , and private vs. public property .
Ownership is  the कुंजी भवन ब्लाक in the विकास of the पूंजीवादी  socio-economic system .
Adam  स्मिथ stated कि एक of the पवित्र कानून of इंसाफ थी to गार्ड a  person 's property and possessions .
The  प्रक्रम और यांत्रिकी of स्वामित्व हैं fairly जटिल : एक can लाभ  , transfer and lose ownership of property in a number of ways .
To acquire property one can purchase it with money ,  व्यापार it लिये अन्य प्रॉपर्टी , प्राप्त it as a तोहफा , चोरी it , ढूँढें it  , make , it or homestead it .
One can transfer or lose ownership of property by selling it for money , exchanging it for other property , giving it as a  तोहफा , होने robbed of it , it , or having it stripped इससे एक 's स्वामित्व through विधिक अर्थात् ऐसे as eviction ,  foreclosure , seizure , or taking .
स्वामित्व is self-propagating in कि the मालिक of कोई प्रॉपर्टी होगा भी  own the economic benefits of that property .
`` What 's My Name ? ''  is a सोंग अंकित by barbadian रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार रिहाना , लिये उसके  fifth studio album Loud ( 2010 ) .
Featuring guest vocals  इससे कनाडाई rapper ड्रेक , the सोंग थी released as the दूसरी सिंगल  from Loud on October 29 , 2010 through Def Jam Recordings .
The R & B song was produced by the Norwegian  उत्पादन duo स्टारगेट , और थी लिखा by the duo साथ साथ ester  Dean , Traci Hale , and Drake .
Lyrically , it incorporates themes  of यौन मैथुन और रोमांस  .
म्यूज़िक आलोचकों दिया the सोंग धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ , citing it कुछ of रिहाना 's बेहतरीन गायन कार्य to तिथि ; वहीँ थी  a praise regarding its romantic nature , as well as its sexual tones .
`` What 's My Name ? '' was a commercial success and topped the US Billboard  hot 100 चार्ट , giving रिहाना उसके तीसरा number-one सिंगल in 2010 , as खूब as उसके आठवीं  overall on the chart .
The song also topped the  चार्ट in हंगेरियाई और the संयुक्त किंगडम और पहुँचे the शीर्ष पाँच in कनाडा  , Ireland , New Zealand , Norway and Slovakia .
The song received a nomination at the  54th ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन rap/sung सहयोग  .
An accompanying music video , directed by Philip Andelman , portrays a romantic  एनकाउंटर between रिहाना और ड्रेक in a किराना स्टोर साथ साथ रोमांटिक दृश्यों between the जोड़ी और रिहाना चलना  through Manhattan 's Lower East Side .
`` What 's My  नाम ? '' थी प्रचारित साथ सजीव प्रदर्शन आरपार दोनो पहलू of the अटलांटिक  , including Saturday Night Live in America and the series seven finale of The X Factor in the United Kingdom .
The latter performance resulted in an  छानबीन इससे the देश 's मीडिया नियामक , ofcom  , for the raunchy nature of Rihanna 's outfit .
A  गणितीय निरंतर is a खास क्रमांक , प्रायः a रियल क्रमांक , कि  is `` significantly interesting in some way '' .
Constants  उठता in अनेक अलग क्षेत्रों of गणित , साथ स्थिरांक ऐसे as e ( गणितीय निरंतर ) | और pi| occurring  in such diverse contexts as geometry , number theory and calculus .
What it means for a constant to arise `` naturally '' ,  और कया makes a निरंतर `` दिलचस्प '' , is ultimately a पदार्थ of स्वाद  , and some mathematical constants are notable more for historical reasons than for their intrinsic mathematical interest .
The  अधिक लोकप्रिय स्थिरांक have महरूम पढ़ाई throughout  the ages and computed to many decimal places .
All  गणितीय स्थिरांक हैं definable संख्याएँ और प्रायः हैं भी computable संख्याएँ ( chaitin  's constant being a significant exception ) .
Elections to the United States  सीनेट यहूद आयोजित on नवम्बर 2 , 2010 , लिये 37 of the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट 's  100 seats .
( A special election on January  19 , 2010 in मैसाचुसेट्स थी आयोजित पहले in the  year . )
Thirty-four of the seats were for six-year terms to the Senate  's `` क्लास तीन '' , और तीन यहूद खास चुनावों लिये  shorter terms .
Of the 37 elections , 19 featured incumbent Democrats ( 7 of whom retired or  यहूद पराजित in the प्राथमिक ) और 18 प्रदर्शित लाज़िम republicans ( आठ of जिसको रिटायर्ड  or were defeated in the primary ) .
After the previous elections ( in  2008 ) , the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट थी रचित of 58 डेमोक्रेट , 40 republicans , और 2 independents  who caucus with the Democrats .
Republicans won four seats  आयोजित by retiring डेमोक्रेट और republicans पराजित  two incumbent Democrats .
This was  the largest क्रमांक of republicans gains चूंकि the 1994 चुनावों और भी the पहला समय चूंकि कि चुनाव कि  Republicans successfully defended all of their own seats .
This was the  चौथी लगातार चुनाव of `` क्लास 3 '' सीनेटरों जहाँ डेमोक्रेट have विफल  to gain seats and the third consecutive mid-term election held in a president 's first term where Republicans have picked-up seats .
Despite these Republican wins , however , the Democrats  retained a बहुमत of the सीनेट साथ 51 सीटे प्लस 2 independents  who caucus with them , compared to the 47 Republicans .
A solstice is an astronomical event that occurs twice each year as the Sun reaches  इसके उच्चतम or न्यूनतम excursion सापेक्ष to the celestial equator on the celestial गोला  .
As a result , on the day of the solstice , the Sun appears to  have पहुँचे इसके उच्चतम or न्यूनतम सालाना ऊँचाई in the आसमान ऊपर the क्षितिज at लोकल  solar noon .
The word solstice is derived from the Latin sol (  सूर्य ) और sistere ( to स्टैंड स्टिल ) , क्युकी at the solstices , the सूर्य स्टैंड स्टिल in उतार ; कि is , the मौसमी गति of the सूर्य 's पाथ ( as देखी इससे धरती  ) comes to a stop before reversing direction .
The solstices , together with  the equinoxes , हैं कनेक्ट साथ the  seasons .
In  अनेक संस्कृतियों the solstices चिह्नित either the  beginning or the midpoint of winter and summer .
The term  संक्रांति can भी be प्रयुक्त in a broader भाव , as the तिथि ( दिन ) जब  this occurs .
The day of the solstice is either the longest day of the year (  in गर्मियाँ ) or the shortest दिन of the साल ( in शीत ) लिये कोई प्लेस  outside of the tropics .
Jerry  ली लुईस ( born सितंबर 29 , 1935 ) is an अमरीकी  rock and roll and country music singer-songwriter and pianist .
He is known by the nickname  `` the कातिल '' और is प्रायः viewed as “rock & फेंकें 's पहला ग्रेट  wild man” .
An early pioneer of rock and roll music  , in 1956 लुईस बना उसके पहला रिकार्डिंग  at Sun Records .
`` Crazy Arms `` sold 300,000 copies in the South , but it  थी उसके 1957 hit `` पूरे lotta shakin ' going on `` कि शॉट लुईस to कीर्ति विश्वव्यापी  .
Lewis followed this in that same year when  he अंकित गीतों ऐसे as `` ग्रेट गेंदें of आग `` , `` breathless `` और `` ऊँची स्कूल गोपनीय  `` .
लुईस बेची अधिक रिकॉर्ड than एल्विस प्रेस्ली  at this time .
However , Lewis ' rock 'n '  फेंकें करियर faltered in the वेक of उसके विवाह to उसके  young cousin .
He  था छोटी कामयाबी in the चार्ट following  the scandal and his popularity quickly faded .
His live  प्रदर्शन शुल्क plummeted इससे $ 10,000 प्रति रात्रि to $ 250  .
In the  meantime he थी संकल्पित to लाभ वापस  some of his popularity .
दौरान the जल्दी 60’s he किया n't have much चार्ट  success with few exceptions such as `` What 'd I Say `` .
His live  प्रदर्शन at इस समय यहूद increasingly  wild and energetic .
His  एल्बम सजीव at the स्टार क्लबों , हैम्बर्ग इससे 1964 is प्रायः regarded by  many music journalists and fans as one of the wildest and greatest rock and roll concert albums ever .
After recording songs such as `` I 'm on Fire '' for several years with little success  , in 1968 लुईस बना a परिवर्तन into देश म्यूज़िक और था हिट्स साथ गीतों ऐसे as `` another प्लेस , another समय ''  .
इस reignited उसके करियर और throughout the लेट '60s और '70s he  regularly topped the country-western charts .
His # 1 country hits  शामिल `` to मेक प्रेम मीठी लिये तुम `` , `` वहीँ जरूर be अधिक to प्रेम than इस `` , `` होता तुम लो  Another Chance on Me `` and `` Me And Bobby McGee `` .
लुईस 's सफलताओं जारी throughout the दशक और he embraced उसके चट्टान 'n ' फेंकें पास्ट साथ गीतों ऐसे as a कवर of the बिग bopper 's `` chantilly  Lace `` and `` Rockin ' My Life Away `` .
In  the 21st सदी लुईस continues to दौरे to ऑडियंस around the संसार  and still releases new albums .
One such album , titled Last Man Standing ,  is उसके बेहतरीन selling to तिथि at over a लाख  copies sold worldwide .
इस थी followed by औसत बूढ़ा man जिससे रै प्राप्त  some of the best sales of Lewis’s career .
Lewis has had a dozen gold records  in दोनो चट्टान और देश , जीती अनेक ग्रैमी पुरस्कार ,  including a Lifetime Achievement Award .
Lewis was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall  of कीर्ति in 1986 , और उसके pioneering योगदान to the विधा रै महरूम पहचाना by the rockabilly हॉल  of Fame .
in 1989 , उसके जीवन थी chronicled in the फिल्म ग्रेट  Balls of Fire , starring Dennis Quaid .
In 2003 , Rolling Stone Magazine listed his box set All  कातिल , no फिलर : the anthology क्रमांक 242 on उनके सूची of `` 500 महानतम  albums of all time `` .
In 2004 , they ranked him  क्रमांक 24 on उनके सूची of the 100 महानतम कलाकारों of सब समय  .
Lewis is the last surviving member of Sun Records ' Million Dollar  quartet और the क्लास of '55 एल्बम , जिससे भी शामिल जॉनी नकदी , कार्ल perkins , रॉय  Orbison and Elvis Presley .
Henry Louis Stephens , untitled watercolor  ( 1863 ) of a man पढना a  newspaper with headline `` Presidential Proclamation / Slavery '' .
The Emancipation Proclamation was an  अनुक्रम जारी to सब खण्ड of the कार्यपालिका शाखा ( सहित the फौज और नेवी ) of the संयुक्त राज्य by अध्यक्ष अब्राहम lincoln on जनवरी 1 , 1863 , दौरान the अमरीकी  Civil War .
It was based on the president 's constitutional authority as  कमांडर in मुख्य of the हथियारबंद शक्तियां ; it थी नहीं a विधि passed by कॉंग्रेस  .
It proclaimed all those enslaved in Confederate territory to be forever free ,  और ordered the फौज ( और सब खण्ड of the कार्यपालिका शाखा ) to दावत as फ़्री सब those enslaved in टेन राज्य कि यहूद स्टिल in विद्रोह , यूँ applying  to 3.1 million of the 4 million slaves in the U.S .
The Proclamation could not be enforced in areas still under rebellion , but as the army took  कंट्रोल of confederate regions , the स्लेव in those regions यहूद emancipated बल्कि than लौटे  to their masters .
From 20,000 to 50,000 former slaves in regions where  विद्रोह था already महरूम subdued यहूद तत्काल emancipated , और over 3 लाख अधिक  were emancipated as the Union army advanced .
The Proclamation did not apply to the five slave states that were not in rebellion , nor to most regions already controlled by the Union army ; emancipation  वहीँ होता आइये बाद पृथक राज्य क्रियाएँ and/or the दिसम्बर 1865 अनुसमर्थन of the तेरहवीं amendment , जिससे बना गुलामी illegal everywhere  in the U.S .
the उदघोषणा किया नहीं compensate the स्वामी , किया नहीं itself गैरकानूनी गुलामी , और किया नहीं मेक  the ex-slaves ( called freedmen ) citizens .
It made the eradication  of गुलामी an सुस्पष्ट युद्ध लक्ष्य , in जोड to the  goal of reuniting the Union .
On September 22 , 1862 , Lincoln had issued a  प्रारंभिक उदघोषणा कि he होता अनुक्रम the emancipation of सब स्लेव in कोई राज्य of the confederate राज्य of अमेरिका कि किया नहीं  return to Union control by January 1 , 1863 .
None returned , and the order , signed and issued January 1 ,  1863 , took प्रभाव मगर in स्थितियाँ जहाँ the संघ था already ज़्यादातर  regained control .
The Proclamation outraged white Southerners who envisioned a race war , angered some Northern  डेमोक्रेट , सक्रिय anti-slavery शक्तियां , और weakened शक्तियां in यूरोपीय कि चाही to intervene to सहायता the confederacy  .
It also lifted the spirits of African Americans both  in the दक्षिणी और उत्तरी राज्य , और led to अनेक स्लेव escaping उनके मास्टर्स और कार्यशील पीछे संघ लाइनों in अनुक्रम to have  their emancipation enforced .
Sucker Punch is a 2011 American  काल्पनिक कार्रवाई फिल्मी निर्देशित by zack स्नाइडर और co-written by उसे  and Steve Shibuya .
It is  स्नाइडर 's पहला फिल्मी आधारित on an  original script .
The film stars Emily Browning ,  abbie cornish , जेना malone , वैनेसा हजेंस , जेमी चुंग  , and Carla Gugino .
the कथानक फ़ॉलो the कल्पनाओं of a यंग स्त्री जो is वचनबद्ध to a दिमागी संस्था ,  as she makes a plan to escape the hospital before suffering a lobotomy .
The film was released in both conventional and IMAX  थिएटर in the संयुक्त राज्य at मध्यरात्रि on कूच 25 , 2011  .
It received generally  ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों , लकिन थी a मॉडरेट बक्सा  office success .
Front  और वापस of canon powershot a95 , a ठेठ pocket-size  digital camera
Haselblad 503CW with Ixpress  v96c डिजिटल वापस , an उदाहरण of a पेशेवर  digital camera system
A digital camera  ( or digicam ) is a कैमरा कि takes वीडियो or स्टिल छायाचित्र by  recording images on an electronic image sensor .
Most cameras sold today are digital ,  और डिजिटल कैमरे हैं incorporated into अनेक डिवाइस ranging इससे गुस्से और मोबाईल फोन  ( called camera phones ) to vehicles .
Digital and film  कैमरे share an ऑप्टिकल प्रणाली , typically using a लेंस साथ a परिवर्तनीय  diaphragm to focus light onto an image pickup device .
The diaphragm  और शटर admit the सही राशि of लाइट to the imager , बस as साथ फिल्मी लकिन the चित्र पिकअप  device is electronic rather than chemical .
However , unlike film cameras , digital cameras can display images on a screen  तत्काल बाद होने अंकित , और स्टोर और हटाएँ बिंब इससे मेमोरी  .
Many digital cameras  can भी रिकार्ड चलती वीडियो  with sound .
कुछ डिजिटल कैमरे can क्रॉप और सिलाई  pictures and perform other elementary image editing .
the अंदर और सामने of a डेल  PowerEdge web server , a computer designed for rack mounting
Multiple  वेब सर्वर may be प्रयुक्त लिये a ऊँची ट्रैफ़िक जालस्थल , यहाँ चार सूर्य आग  X4200 servers are installed together
Web server can  refer to either the हार्डवेयर ( the कंप्यूटर ) or the तन्त्र ( the कंप्यूटर अनुप्रयोग ) कि helps  to deliver web content that can be accessed through the Internet .
The most common use of web  सर्वर is to मेजबान वेबसाइटों , लकिन वहीँ हैं अन्य उपयोग ऐसे as गेमिंग , आंकड़ा भंडार or कार्यशील एंटरप्राइज़  applications .
The American Red Cross ( ARC ) , also known as the American National Red Cross , is a humanitarian  संगठन कि provides आपात सहायता , विपत्ति राहत और शिक्षा अंदर the संयुक्त राज्य  .
It is the designated U.S. affiliate of  the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ of रेड क्रॉस और रेड crescent समाजों  .
Today , in addition to domestic disaster  राहत , the अमरीकी रेड क्रॉस offers सेवाएं in पाँच अन्य क्षेत्रों : जातियाँ सेवाएं कि सहायता the मोहताज ; संचार सेवाएं और सुकून लिये सैन्य सदस्यों और उनके परिवार सदस्यों ; the संग्रहण , प्रसंस्करण और वितरण of रक्त  and blood products ; educational programs on preparedness , health , and safety ; and international relief and development programs .
Issued a corporate charter by the  संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस अंतर्गत शीर्षक 36 of the संयुक्त राज्य कोड , खण्ड 3001 , the अमरीकी नेशनल रेड क्रॉस is governed by स्वयंसेवक और समर्थित by जातियाँ दान  , income from health and safety training and products , and income from blood products .
The American Red  क्रॉस is headquartered in वॉशिंगटन  , D.C .
The Chairman of the Board of  राज्यपालों , सेवारत उसके दूसरी three-year पद , is bonnie mcelveen-hunter  .
The current  अध्यक्ष और मुख्य कार्यपालिका  Officer is Gail J. McGovern .

A rooster ( also  पुकारा a cockerel or मुर्गा ) is a पुरूष gallinaceous  bird .
It  प्रायः refers to a पुरूष मुर्गा  ( Gallus gallus ) .
Immature male chickens less than  एक साल बूढ़ा हैं पुकारा cockerels  .
The  पद `` मुर्गा '' originates in the संयुक्त राज्य , और the पद is widely प्रयुक्त  throughout North America , as well as Australia and New Zealand .
In the United Kingdom  और आयरलैंड the पुरानी पद `` cockerel '' is  more commonly used .
`` Cock '' is in general use as the name  लिये a पुरूष of अन्य प्रजाति of बर्ड , लिये  example `` Cock sparrow '' .
``  roosting '' is the कार्रवाई of perching aloft to नींद at रात्रि , और is किया  by both sexes .
The rooster is polygamous ,  लकिन can नहीं गार्ड अनेक nests of अंडे at  once .
He guards the  सामान्य क्षेत्रफल जहाँ उसके मुर्गियां हैं nesting , और होगा  attack other roosters that enter his territory .
During the daytime , he usually sits on a high perch  , प्रायः 3–5 फीट बंद the मैदान to serve as a lookout लिये उसके झुण्ड  .
He will sound a distinctive  सचेतक कॉल if परभक्षी हैं आसपास  .
The Pokémon Trading Card Game ( Pokémon TCG ) is a  collectible कार्ड खेल आधारित on the पोकीमॉन वीडियो खेल श्रेणी , पहला प्रकाशित in अक्तूबर 1996 by मीडिया फैक्टरी in जापानी  .
In the US , it was initially published by Wizards  of the coast , the कम्पनी कि produces , in दिसम्बर 1998  .
Nintendo  took over प्रकाशन in जून  2003 .
It is one of Nintendo 's  पिछला बाकी दमदार कड़ी to इसके विरासत as a playing  card company .
जमीन रोवर is a अंग्रेजों car निर्माता साथ इसके मुख्यालय in gaydon  , Warwickshire , United Kingdom which specialises in four-wheel-drive vehicles .
It is  भाग of the जैगुआर जमीन रोवर समूह , a subsidiary  of Tata Motors of India .
It is the second  oldest four-wheel-drive car ब्रांड in the  world ( after Jeep ) .
The Land Rover name was originally used  by the रोवर कम्पनी लिये एक विशिष्ट गाडी मॉडल , नामित बस the जमीन रोवर  , launched by Rover in 1948 .
Over the following years it developed into a marque  encompassing a दायरा of four-wheel-drive मॉडल , सहित the defender , डिस्कवरी  , Freelander , Range Rover , Range Rover Sport and Range Rover Evoque .
Land Rovers are currently  समवेत in the कम्पनी 's halewood और solihull पौधे , साथ शोध और विकास  taking place at JLR 's Gaydon and Whitley engineering centres .
Land  रोवर बेची 194,000 वाहनों विश्वव्यापी  in 2009 .
Although the brand originates  इससे the असली 1948 मॉडल , जमीन रोवर as a कम्पनी रै तभी existed चूंकि  1978 .
Prior to this , it was a product line of the Rover Company which was subsequently  अवशोषित into the rover-triumph प्रभाग of the अंग्रेजों leyland मोटर निगम ( bl ) following leyland मोटर निगम ’s कब्ज़ा of रोवर  in 1967 .
The ongoing commercial success of the original Land Rover series models , and latterly the Range Rover in the 1970s in the midst of BL’s well documented  कारोबार परेशानियों prompted the स्थापना of a पृथक जमीन रोवर कम्पनी लकिन स्टिल अंतर्गत the bl छतरियाँ , बाकी भाग of the subsequent रोवर समूह in 1988 , अंतर्गत the स्वामित्व of अंग्रेजों aerospace बाद the remains of अंग्रेजों leyland  were broken up and privatised .
In  1994 रोवर समूह पीएलसी थी acquired  by BMW .
In 2000 , Rover Group was broken-up by BMW and Land Rover was sold  to घाट मोटर कम्पनी , बनने भाग of इसके प्रीमियर ऑटोमोटिव समूह .
In 2006 Ford purchased the Rover  ब्रांड इससे bmw लिये around £6 लाख .
इस reunited the रोवर और जमीन रोवर ब्रांड्स लिये the पहला समय चूंकि 2000  when the Rover group was broken up by BMW .
In June 2008 , Ford sold both Land  रोवर और जैगुआर गाड़ियाँ to tata  Motors .
इस बिक्री भी शामिल the  dormant Rover brand
The cover of the first  dvd संकलन released  by Aniplex of The New Captain Shūsuke Amagai arc
The  नवीं ऋतु of the ब्लीच दुश्मनी श्रेणी  is named .
The series is based on  tite kubo 's manga साथ वही नाम  .
The episodes are directed by  noriyuki abe और उत्पादित by tv टोकियो , dentsu , और स्टुडियो  Pierrot .
The episodes ' plot focuses on the introduction of a new  आत्मा reaper कप्तान , shūsuke amagai , और the रहस्य surrounding the kasumiōji गोत्र , एक of the परिवारों कि constitute  the nobility of Soul Society .
The season began  airing on अप्रैल 23 , 2008 in जापानी on tv टोकियो और ended  on October 7 , 2008 .
The English adaptation of the Bleach anime is licensed by Viz Media , and this  चाप began airing on अगस्त 28 , 2010 on कार्टून संजाल 's वयस्क तैरना , और समाप्त on जनवरी 29 , 2011  .
Five  dvd compilations , प्रत्येक containing चार एपीसोड of the ऋतु , have महरूम released by aniplex  ; the first DVD compilation was released on November 26 , 2008 and the fifth on March 25 , 2009 .
A  dvd बक्सा होगा be प्रकाशित by  Viz Media on December 13 , 2011 .
The episodes  उपयोग तीन टुकड़े of थीम म्यूज़िक : एक खोलने थीम और दो  closing themes .
The opening theme is ``  chu-bura `` by kelun .
The first  closing थीम is `` नारंगी '' by lil'b , प्रयुक्त लिये एपीसोड 168 to 179 , और the दूसरी closing  theme is `` Gallop '' by pe'zmoku , used for the remainder of the episodes .
The regulation of prostitution in the United States is not among the enumerated powers of the federal government ; Under the Tenth Amendment to the United States Constitution , it is therefore exclusively the domain of the states to  परमिट , prohibit , or वरना विनियमित वाणिज्यिक sex , मगर insofar as कॉंग्रेस may विनियमित it as भाग of अंतरराज्यीय कॉमर्स साथ कानून जैसे  the Mann Act .
In most  राज्य , वेश्यावृति is माना a misdemeanor in the श्रेणी of पब्लिक  order crime , a crime that disrupts the order of a community .
It was at one time considered  to be a vagrancy अपराधों  .
Currently , Nevada is  the तभी राज्य to allow वेश्यालय वेश्यावृति , the शर्तें of जिससे  are stipulated in the Nevada Revised Statutes .
Only 8 counties  फिलहाल contain क्रियाशील brothels  .
All forms of prostitution are illegal in Clark County ( which  contains the लास vegas–paradise महानगर क्षेत्रफल ) , washoe काउंटी ( जिससे contains रेनो )  , Carson City , Douglas County , and Lincoln County .
The other counties theoretically allow brothel  वेश्यावृति , लकिन कुछ of ये काउंटी फिलहाल  have no active brothels .
Street prostitution  , `` pandering , '' और जीना बंद of the proceeds of a वेश्या remain illegal  under Nevada law , as elsewhere in the country .
As with other  देशों , वेश्यावृति in the संयुक्त राज्य can be विभाजित into तीन व्यापक श्रेणी  : street prostitution , brothel prostitution , and escort prostitution .
The East Coast of the United States , also known as the Eastern Seaboard or the Atlantic Seaboard and  commonly shortened to ईस्ट coast , refers to the easternmost coast of the संयुक्त राज्य साथ the अटलांटिक  Ocean .
The states which have shoreline on the East Coast are , from north to south , the U.S. states of Maine  , नई हैम्पशायर , मैसाचुसेट्स , rhode द्वीप , कनेक्टिकट , नई यॉर्क , नई जर्सी , डेलावेयर , मेरीलैंड , वर्जिनिया , उत्तर कैरोलिना , दक्षिण कैरोलिना , जॉर्जिया , और फ्लोरिडा  .
Richard Milhous Nixon ( January 9 , 1913 – April 22 , 1994 ) was  the 37th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य , सेवारत इससे 1969 to 1974 , जब he became the तभी अध्यक्ष  to resign the office .
Nixon had previously served as a Republican U.S. representative and  सीनेटर इससे कैलिफ़ोर्निया और as the 36th वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य  from 1953 to 1961 .
Nixon was born in Yorba  लिंडा , कैलिफ़ोर्निया .
He  ग्रैजुएट इससे whittier कॉलेज in 1934 और ड्यूक विश्वविद्यालयों स्कूल of विधि in 1937 , returning  to California to practice law .
He  और उसके बीवी , पैट निक्सन , स्थानांतरित to वॉशिंगटन to कार्य  for the federal government in 1942 .
He subsequently  परोसा in the संयुक्त राज्य नेवी दौरान  World War II .
Nixon was elected in California to the House of  प्रतिनिधि in 1946 और to the सीनेट in 1950  .
His pursuit of the Alger Hiss case established his  प्रतिष्ठा as a अग्रणी anti-communist , और elevated उसे to नेशनल  prominence .
He was the running  mate of ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर , the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी अध्यक्षीय  nominee in the 1952 election .
निक्सन परोसा लिये आठ सालो as  vice president .
He waged  an unsuccessful अध्यक्षीय अभियान in 1960 , narrowly खोने to जॉन F. कैनेडी  , and lost a race for Governor of California in 1962 .
In  1968 , he भागा again लिये the प्रेसिडेंसी और  was elected .
Although Nixon  initially escalated अमेरिका 's भागीदारी in the वियतनाम युद्ध , he subsequently  ended U.S. involvement in 1973 .
निक्सन 's विज़िट to the लोगों 's गणतंत्र of चीन in 1972 खोली राजनयिक संबंध between the दो राष्ट्र , और he initiated  détente and the Anti-Ballistic Missile Treaty with the Soviet Union the same year .
Domestically , his administration generally embraced policies  कि transferred शक्ति इससे वॉशिंगटन to the राज्य  .
Among other things  , he शुभारम्भ पहलों to लड़ो कर्कट और illegal दवाएँ , imposed मजदूरी और दाम नियंत्रण , enforced desegregation of कुछ दक्षिणी स्कूलों  , and established the Environmental Protection Agency .
Though he presided over  the चंद्र अवतरण शुरूआत साथ अपोलो  11 , he scaled back manned space exploration .
He was  re-elected by a भूस्खलन  in 1972 .
Nixon 's second term saw an Arab oil embargo ,  the इस्तीफा of उसके वाइस अध्यक्ष , spiro agnew , और a continuing श्रेणी of खुलासे परिचय the वाटरगेट कांड और  other misconduct by members of the administration .
The scandal escalated , costing Nixon much  of उसके राजनैतिक support , और on अगस्त 9 , 1974 , he resigned in the फेस of लगभग निश्चित  impeachment and removal from office .
After his resignation , he  controversially प्राप्त a pardon जारी by उसके successor , जेराल्ड  Ford .
In retirement ,  निक्सन 's कार्य as an elder statesman , authoring अनेक किताबे और undertaking अनेक विदेशी  trips , helped to rehabilitate his public image .
He suffered a  debilitating स्ट्रोक on अप्रैल 18 , 1994 , और died चार दिनों  later at the age of 81 .
Sertraline hydrochloride (  व्यापार names zoloft , lustral ) is an antidepressant of  the selective serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SSRI ) class .
it थी introduced to the मार्केट  by Pfizer in 1991 .
Sertraline is primarily prescribed for major depressive disorder in  वयस्क outpatients as खूब as obsessive–compulsive , दहशत , और सोशल चिंता विकार in  both adults and children .
In 2011 , it was  the second-most विहित antidepressant on the u.S. खुदरा मार्केट , साथ  37,208,000 prescriptions .
The  efficacy of sertraline लिये अवसाद is समान to कि of पुरानी tricyclic  antidepressants , but its side effects are much less pronounced .
Differences  साथ नए antidepressants हैं subtler  and also mostly confined to side effects .
Evidence suggests that  sertraline may कार्य बेहतर than fluoxetine ( prozac ) लिये कुछ  subtypes of depression .
Treatment of panic disorder  साथ sertraline परिणाम in a significant घटी of the क्रमांक of दहशत हमले  and in improved quality of life .
For obsessive-compulsive disorder , sertraline is not as effective as cognitive  behavioral चिकित्सा ; the बेहतरीन परिणाम have महरूम हासिल by combining ये दो उपचार  .
Although  स्वीकृत लिये सोशल phobia और posttraumatic तनाव विकार , sertraline लीड to तभी modest  improvement in these conditions .
Sertraline  भी alleviates the लक्षण of premenstrual dysphoric विकार और can be प्रयुक्त in  sub-therapeutic doses or intermittently for its treatment .
Sertraline shares the common side effects and  contraindications of अन्य ssris , साथ ऊँची दरों of मतली , अतिसार , अनिद्रा , और यौन पक्ष प्रभाव ; however  , it does not cause weight gain , and its effects on both cognition and vigilance are relatively mild .
In pregnant women taking sertraline , the drug was present in significant concentrations  in fetal रक्त , और थी भी संबद्ध साथ a उच्चतर रेट of विभिन्न जनम दोषों  .
similarly to अन्य antidepressants , the उपयोग of sertraline लिये अवसाद  may be associated with a higher rate of suicidality .
The Five Heartbeats is a  1991 musical नाटक फिल्मी निर्देशित by रॉबर्ट टाउनसेंड  , who co-wrote the script with Keenan Ivory Wayans .
Distributed by 20th Century Fox , the  फिल्मी 's प्रमुख डाल शामिल टाउनसेंड , माइकल राइट , लिओन रॉबिन्सन , हैरी J. lennix , tico कुएं , हेरोल्ड निकोलस of the निकोलस भाइयो , और  Diahann Carroll .
The plot of the film ( which is  loosely आधारित on the जीवनदान of अनेक कलाकारों : the dells , the temptations , चार टॉप , विल्सन पिकेट  , James Brown , Frankie Lymon , Sam Cooke and others ) follows the three decade career of the R & B vocal group The Five Heartbeats .
The film depicts the rise and fall of a Motown inspired  आत्मा अधिनियम through the आँखें of the फिल्मी 's प्रमुख समर्थक , डोनाल्ड `` बतख '' matthews ( portrayed by टाउनसेंड ) , जो serves  as a narrator throughout the film .
However , a  बहुमत of the सिनेमा is प्रस्तुत in a लगातार समय लकीर as opposed  to traditional flash backs .
The film includes a significant amount of original music conceived by various artists for the  फिल्मी 's साउंडट्रैक , सहित singles ऐसे as `` a दिल is a हाउस लिये प्रेम `` , `` we have n't समाप्त yet '' , और `` nothing लकिन प्रेम '' .
The film was released to most North American audiences March 29  , 1991 however it थी नहीं बना उपलब्धियाँ to ऑडियंस in अन्य महाद्वीपों जबतक 2002 जब a dvd थी released prior to another dvd रिलीज  in 2006 for the film 's 15th anniversary .
The movie received  मिश्रित समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों  .
Secretariat ( March 30 , 1970 – October  4 , 1989 ) थी an अमरीकी thoroughbred racehorse कि in 1973 became the पहला u.s . ट्रिपल क्राउन चैंपियन  in 25 years .
He set race records in all three  कार्यक्रम in the श्रेणी — the केंटकी डर्बी ( 1:59.4 ) , the preakness stakes ( 1:53 ) , और the belmont  Stakes ( 2:24 ) — records that still stand today .
He is considered to be  एक of the महानतम thoroughbreds of  all time .
In 1999 , ESPN ranked Secretariat the 35th best athlete of  the 20th सदी , the उच्चतम रैंकिंग racehorse on the  list URL_http .
He ranked second  पीछे man o ' युद्ध in the blood-horse 's सूची of the शीर्ष  100 U.S. Racehorses of the 20th Century .
Secretariat  थी sired by बिंदास शासक आउट of somethingroyal , by  Princequillo .
He was  foaled at the मर्ग in कैरोलीन काउंटी  , Virginia .
Like his famous predecessor Man o ' War ,  सचिवालय थी a विशाल शाहबलूत टट्टू और थी दिए the वही उपनाम , `` बिग रेड . ''
Secretariat 's grandsire , Nasrullah , is also the  great-great-grandsire of 1977 ट्रिपल क्राउन विजेता सिएटल  Slew .
Owned by Penny Chenery , he was trained by Lucien Laurin and mainly ridden by Canadian  jockey रॉन turcotte , साथ साथ प्रशिक्षु jockey पॉल फेलिसियानो ( पहला दो दौड़ ) , और दिग्गज एडी मेपल ( पिछला रेस )  .
He  raced in chenery 's मर्ग stable 's ब्लू और श्वेत checkered रंगों और उसके दूल्हे  was Eddie Sweat .
Secretariat  stood लगभग लम्बा , और weighed , साथ  a 75-inch girth , in his racing prime .
a ठेठ 12 v ,  40 Ah Lead-acid car battery
An  ऑटोमोटिव बैटरी is a प्रकार of rechargeable बैटरी कि आपूर्तियाँ इलेक्ट्रिक  energy to an automobile .
Usually this refers to an SLI battery ( starting ,  lighting , प्रज्वलन ) to शक्ति the प्रारंभ मोटर , the लाइट्स , और the प्रज्वलन  system of a vehicle’s engine .
Automotive SLI batteries are usually  lead-acid प्रकार , और हैं बना of छह गैल्वानी कोशिकाएं in श्रेणी to  provide a 12 volt system .
Each cell provides  2.1 volts लिये a कुल of 12.6 वोल्ट at पूरा  charge .
Heavy vehicles such as highway trucks or tractors , often  equipped साथ डीज़ल इंजन , may have दो बैटरी in श्रेणी लिये a 24 वोल्ट प्रणाली , or may have समानांतर  strings of batteries .
Lead-acid batteries  हैं बना up of प्लेटों of सीसे और पृथक प्लेटों of सीसे डाइऑक्साइड , जिससे हैं submerged  into an electrolyte solution of about 38 % sulfuric acid and 62 % water .
This causes a chemical reaction that releases  electrons , allowing उन्हें to प्रवाह through conductors to उपज  electricity .
As the battery  discharges , the एसिड of the electrolyte प्रतिक्रियाएँ साथ the सामग्री of the प्लेटों  , changing their surface to lead sulfate .
When the battery is recharged ,  the रासायनिक प्रतिक्रिया is reversed : the सीसे सल्फेट reforms into  lead dioxide and lead .
With  the प्लेटों लौटी to उनके असली कंडीशन ,  the process may now be repeated .
Battery  रीसाइक्लिंग of ऑटोमोटिव बैटरी reduces the need लिये संसाधन जरूरी लिये manufacture of नई बैटरी  , diverts toxic lead from landfills , and prevents risk of improper disposal .
Full-time employment is  नियुक्ति in जिससे a व्यक्ति works a न्यूनतम क्रमांक of घंटों पारिभाषित  as such by his/her employer .
Full-time employment often comes  साथ लाभ कि हैं नहीं typically offered to part-time , अस्थाई , or लचीली मजदूर , ऐसे as सालाना छोड़ , sickleave  , and health insurance .
full-time कार्य हैं प्रायः माना  careers .
वे generally अदा अधिक than part-time कार्य , और  usually carry more hours per week .
The Fair Labor Standards Act (  flsa ) करता नहीं define full-time नियुक्ति or part-time नियुक्ति  .
This is a matter generally  to be संकल्पित by the नियोक्ता ( us विभाग of मजदूर  ) .
The  परिभाषा by नियोक्ता can vary और is generally  published in a company 's Employee Handbook .
Companies commonly  आवश्यकता इससे 30–35 or 40 घंटों प्रति सप्ताह to be पारिभाषित as full-time और इसलिए योग्य लिये  benefits .
Full-Time status  varies between कम्पनी और is प्रायः आधारित on the शिफ़्ट the कर्मचारी जरूर कार्य दौरान प्रत्येक कार्य सप्ताह  .
The `` standard '' work week consists of  पाँच eight-hour दिनों , commonly परोसा between 9:00am to 5:00pm totaling 40 घंटों  .
While a four-day week  generally consists of चार ten-hour दिनों ; it may भी consist of as छोटी as नौ घंटों लिये  a total of a 36 hour work week .
Twelve-hour shifts are  प्रायः तीन दिनों प्रति सप्ताह , जबतक the कम्पनी रै the इरादे of  paying out the employee overtime .
Overtime is legally paid out anytime  an कर्मचारी works अधिक than 40 घंटों  per week .
The  विधिक न्यूनतम लिये ओवरटाइम starts  at Base Pay + One-Half .
The  increased भुगतान is माना to compensate थोड़ा लिये the increased  fatigue which a person experiences on such long shifts .
Shifts can also be very  irregular , as in खुदरा , लकिन हैं स्टिल full-time if the जरूरी क्रमांक  of hours is reached .
There are  कुछ परिस्थितियों जहाँ a व्यक्ति जो needs full-time कार्य is dropped to part-time , जिससे is  sometimes a form of constructive dismissal to avoid paying unemployment benefits to a laid-off worker .
Seahorse is  the शीर्षक दिए to 54 प्रजाति of समुद्री मछली in the  genus Hippocampus .
``  हिप्पोकैम्पस '' आता इससे the प्राचीन यूनानी hippos अर्थ `` घोड़ा  '' and kampos meaning `` sea monster '' .
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted into law by the Congress of the United  राज्य as शीर्षक ii of the व्यापक ड्रग गाली रोकथाम और कंट्रोल अधिनियम  of 1970 .
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug  नीति अंतर्गत जिससे the manufacture , importation , कब्ज़ा , उपयोग और वितरण of निश्चित substances  is regulated .
The Act also  परोसा as the नेशनल implementing विधान लिये the सिंगल सम्मेलन on  Narcotic Drugs .
The legislation created  पाँच schedules ( classifications ) , साथ varying योग्यता लिये a पदार्थ  to be included in each .
Two federal agencies , the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration , determine which substances are added to or removed from the various schedules , though the statute passed by Congress created the initial listing , and Congress has sometimes  अनुसूचित अन्य substances through विधान ऐसे as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000 , जिससे लगाई गामा hydroxybutyrate in अनुसूची i . वर्गीकरण निर्णय हैं जरूरी to be बना on मापदण्ड सहित संभावित लिये गाली ( an अपरिभाषित पद ) , फिलहाल स्वीकृत चिकित्सा उपयोग in उपचार in the संयुक्त राज्य , और अंतरराष्ट्रीय  treaties .
माया numerals
Maya numerals are a vigesimal ( base -  बीस ) numeral प्रणाली प्रयुक्त by the pre-columbian माया सभ्यता  .
The  numerals हैं बना up of तीन प्रतीकों ; शून्य ( शेल आकार )  , one ( a dot ) and five ( a bar ) .
लिये उदाहरण , तेरह is लिखा as तीन dots in a आड़ा  row above two horizontal lines stacked above each other .
Lyndon  baines जॉनसन ( अगस्त 27 , 1908 – जनवरी 22 , 1973 ) , प्रायः referred to as lbj , थी the 36th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त  States ( 1963–1969 ) , a position he assumed after his service as the 37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ) .
He is one of only  चार लोगों जो परोसा in सब चार निर्वाचित संघीय कार्यालयों of the संयुक्त राज्य : प्रतिनिधि , सीनेटर  , Vice President , and President .
Johnson , a Democrat from Texas , served as a United States  प्रतिनिधि इससे 1937–1949 और as a सीनेटर इससे 1949–1961 , सहित छह सालो as संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट  Majority Leader , two as Senate Minority Leader and two as Senate Majority Whip .
After campaigning unsuccessfully for the Democratic nomination in 1960 , Johnson  थी पूछा by जॉन F. कैनेडी to be उसके कार्यशील mate लिये the 1960  presidential election .
Johnson  succeeded to the प्रेसिडेंसी following the हत्या of जॉन F. कैनेडी on नवम्बर 22 , 1963 , समाप्त कैनेडी 's पद और थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष in उसके  own right , winning by a large margin over Barry Goldwater in the 1964 election .
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic Party and as President , he was  जिम्मेदार लिये डिजाइनिंग the `` ग्रेट समाज `` विधान कि शामिल कानून कि upheld सिविल अधिकारों , पब्लिक प्रसारण , medicare , medicaid , पर्यावरणीय  protection , aid to education , and his `` War on Poverty . ''
Johnson was  प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके domineering व्यक्तित्व और the `` जॉनसन उपचार , '' उसके coercion of शक्तिशाली  politicians in order to advance legislation .
Meanwhile , Johnson escalated American involvement in the  वियतनाम युद्ध , इससे 16,000 अमरीकी advisors/soldiers in 1963 to 550,000 कॉम्बैट सैनिकों in जल्दी 1968 , as  American casualties soared and the peace process bogged down .
The involvement stimulated a large angry antiwar  गति आधारित विशेषकर on विश्वविद्यालयों campuses in the  U.S. and abroad .
Summer riots broke out in most major cities  बाद 1965 , और अपराधों दरों soared , as उसके प्रतिद्वंद्वियों उठाया मांगे  for `` law and order '' policies .
The Democratic Party split in  अनेक feuding गिरोहों , और बाद जॉनसन किया poorly in the 1968  New Hampshire primary , he ended his bid for reelection .
रिपब्लिकन रिचर्ड निक्सन थी निर्वाचित  to succeed him .
Historians argue  कि जॉनसन 's प्रेसिडेंसी चिह्नित the शिखर of आधुनिक उदारतावाद  in the United States after the New Deal era .
जॉनसन is क्रमित favorably by कुछ इतिहासकारों  because of his domestic policies .
Progesterone also known as P4 ( pregn-4-ene-3,20-dione ) is a C-21 steroid hormone  शामिल in the मादा menstrual साईकिल , गर्भावस्था ( supports gestation ) और embryogenesis of इंसानो और अन्य प्रजाति  .
Progesterone belongs to a class of hormones  पुकारा progestogens , और is the प्रमुख naturally  occurring human progestogen .
Big Bird is a  समर्थक of the children 's टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ  Sesame Street .
Officially performed by Caroll Spinney since 1969 , he is an  eight-foot two-inch ( 249 cm ) लम्बा उज्जवल primrose-yellow  bird .
He can roller skate , ice  स्केट , नृत्य , गाओ , लिखें काव्य , चित्रण और भी  ride a unicycle .
But despite this wide array of talents , he is prone to frequent misunderstandings , on one occasion even singing the alphabet as one big long  शब्द ( इससे the सोंग पुकारा `` abc-def-ghi , '' सुनाया `` ab-keddef-gajihkel-monop-quristuv-wixyz  '' ) , pondering what it could ever mean .
He lives in a large nest behind the 123  तिल गली brownstone और रै a टेडी भालू नामित  Radar .
Webtrends is a private  कम्पनी headquartered in पोर्टलैंड , ऑरेगॉन , संयुक्त  States .
It provides web , social , and mobile  analytics और अन्य तन्त्र समाधान सम्बन्धित to विपणन प्रज्ञा  .
The company was founded in 1993 and now serves more than 10,000  विशाल और छोटी कड़s. < संदर्भ name='intelligent एंटरप्राइज़ 2007-05-21  ' >
The Second Crusade (  1145–1149 ) थी the दूसरी प्रमुख crusade शुभारम्भ इससे यूरोपीय  .
The Second  crusade थी प्रारंभ in जवाब to the पतन of the काउंटी of  Edessa the previous year to the forces of Zengi .
The county had been founded during the First  crusade ( 1096–1099 ) by baldwin of  Boulogne in 1098 .
While it was the first Crusader  राज्य to be संस्थापित , it थी भी the पहला to  fall .
The Second Crusade was  घोषित by पोप यूजीन iii , और थी the पहला of the क्रूसेड to be led by यूरोपीय किंग्स , namely लुई सात of फ़्रांस और कोनराड  III of Germany , with help from a number of other European nobles .
The armies of  the दो किंग्स marched separately  across Europe .
After crossing Byzantine  territory into आनातोलिया , दोनो सेना यहूद separately पराजित by the seljuq turks  .
The main Western Christian source , Odo of Deuil , and Syriac  ईसाई स्त्रोत अर्जी कि the बीज़ान्टिन सम्राट मैनुएल i comnenus secretly hindered the crusaders ' प्रगति , विशेषकर in आनातोलिया जहाँ he is  alleged to have deliberately ordered Turks to attack them .
Louis and  कोनराड और the remnants of उनके सेना पहुँचे जेरूसलम और , in 1148 , participated  in an ill-advised attack on Damascus .
The crusade in the east was a  विफलता लिये the crusaders और a ग्रेट विजय लिये the  Muslims .
It would ultimately have a key  influence on the पतन of जेरूसलम और दे वृद्धि to the तीसरा crusade at the समाप्त of  the 12th century .
The only success of the Second  crusade आए to a संयुक्त फ़ोर्स of 13,000 फ्लेमिश , frisian , नॉर्मन  , English , Scottish , and German crusaders in 1147 .
Travelling from England , by ship , to the Holy Land , the army stopped and  helped the छोटी ( 7,000 ) पुर्तगाली फौज in the कैप्चर of लिस्बन , expelling इसके मूरिश occupants  .
wal-mart स्टोर्स , inc. ( ) , ब्रांडेड as walmart , is an अमरीकी बहुराष्ट्रीय खुदरा निगम कि रनों  chains of large discount department stores and warehouse stores .
The company is the world 's third largest public corporation , according to the Fortune Global 500 list in  2012 , the biggest निजी नियोक्ता in the संसार साथ over दो लाख  employees , and is the largest retailer in the world .
Walmart remains a family-owned business , as the company  is नियंत्रित by the वाल्टन परिवार , जो अपना a 48 प्रतिशत हिस्सेदारी in walmart  .
It  is भी एक of the संसार 's सबसे मूल्यवान  companies .
The company was  संस्थापित by sam वाल्टन in 1962 , incorporated on अक्तूबर 31 , 1969 , और सरेआम traded  on the New York Stock Exchange in 1972 .
It is headquartered in  bentonville , अरकंसास  .
Walmart is  भी the largest किराना रिटेलर  in the United States .
In  2009 , it उत्पन्न 51 प्रतिशत of इसके us $ 258 अरब बिक्री  in the U.S. from grocery business .
It also owns and operates the Sam  's क्लबों खुदरा warehouses in उत्तर  America .
By 1988 , Wal-Mart was  the सबसे लाभप्रद रिटेलर in the us , और by नवम्बर 1990 ,  it outsold K-mart .
By  1991 it outsold सियर्स in खुदरा , बनाना it  America 's largest retailer , a distinction it still holds .
Walmart  रै 8,500 स्टोर्स in 15 देशों ,  under 55 different names .
The company  operates अंतर्गत the walmart नाम in the संयुक्त राज्य , सहित  the 50 states and Puerto Rico .
It operates in Mexico as Walmex ,  in the संयुक्त किंगडम as asda , in जापानी as seiyu  , and in India as Best Price .
It has wholly owned operations  in अर्जेंटीना , ब्राज़ील , और कनाडा  .
Walmart 's investments outside North America have had mixed results : its operations in the United Kingdom , South  अमेरिका , और चीन हैं अत्यधिक कामयाब , whereas ventures in जर्मनी और  South Korea were unsuccessful .
रॉबर्ट विलियम गेरी मूर ( 4 अप्रैल 1952 – 6 फ़रवरी 2011 ) , थी a उत्तरी  Irish musician , most widely recognised as a singer and guitarist .
in a करियर डेटिंग वापस to the 1960s , मूर निभाई साथ कलाकारों सहित फिल lynott और ब्रायन downey दौरान उसके किशोर , अग्रणी  him to memberships with the Irish bands Skid Row and Thin Lizzy on three separate occasions .
Moore shared the stage with  ऐसे ब्लूज़ और चट्टान luminaries as b.b . किंग , अल्बर्ट किंग , कोलोसियम ii , जार्ज हैरिसन  and Greg Lake , as well as having a successful solo career .
He guested on a number of albums recorded by high  प्रोफ़ाइल संगीतकारों , सहित a कैमियो रूप playing the सीसे गिटार सोलो on `` वो 's my baby `` इससे traveling wilburys  Vol . 3 .
An  उदाहरण of रैक आरोहित सर्वर
A web  होस्टिंग सेवा is a प्रकार of अंतरजाल होस्टिंग सेवा कि allows individuals और संगठन  to make their website accessible via the World Wide Web .
Web hosts are companies that provide  स्पेस on a सर्वर स्वामित्व or leased लिये उपयोग by क्लाइंट , as खूब as providing अंतरजाल  connectivity , typically in a data center .
Web hosts can also provide data center space and connectivity to the Internet for  अन्य सर्वर स्तिथ in उनके आंकड़ा बीच , पुकारा colocation , भी ज्ञात as आवास in लैटिन अमेरिका or  France .
The scope of  वेब होस्टिंग सेवाएं varies greatly  .
The  सबसे मौलिक is वेब पेज और small-scale संचिका होस्टिंग , जहाँ फाइलें  can be uploaded via File Transfer Protocol ( FTP ) or a Web interface .
The files are usually delivered to the  वेब `` as is '' or साथ minimal प्रसंस्करण  .
Many Internet  सेवा प्रदाताओं ( isps ) प्रस्ताव इस  service free to subscribers .
Individuals and organizations may also obtain Web page  होस्टिंग इससे वैकल्पिक सेवा प्रदाताओं  .
Personal web site  होस्टिंग is typically फ़्री , advertisement-sponsored  , or inexpensive .
Business web site hosting often has a higher  व्यय depending upon the आकार और प्रकार of the जालस्थल  .
Single page hosting is  generally sufficient लिये निजी वेब  pages .
A complex site calls for a more comprehensive package that provides  डेटाबेस support और अनुप्रयोग विकास प्लेटफ़ॉर्म ( e.g . पीएचपी , जावा , माणिक्य on rails , coldfusion  , or ASP.NET ) .
These  सुविधाएं allow ग्राहक to लिखें or स्थापना स्क्रिप्ट लिये अनुप्रयोग  like forums and content management .
Also , Secure Sockets Layer  ( एसएसएल ) is typically प्रयुक्त लिये e-commerce  .
The host may also provide an  इंटरफ़ेस or कंट्रोल फलक लिये मैनेजिंग the वेब सर्वर और installing स्क्रिप्ट , as खूब  as other modules and service applications like e-mail .
Some hosts specialize in certain software or  सेवाएं ( e.g . e-commerce ) , जिससे हैं commonly प्रयुक्त by larger कंपनियाँ कि  outsource network infrastructure .
Obstetrics ( from the Latin obstare , `` to stand by '' ) is the medical specialty dealing with the care of all women 's  reproductive tracts और उनके children दौरान गर्भावस्था ( prenatal काल ) , प्रसव और the postnatal काल  .
Many  obstetricians हैं भी स्त्रीरोग , अर्थ  they perform in both specialties .
In the United  राज्य , ये physicians हैं  commonly referred to as OB/GYNs .
The Wright brothers , Orville ( August 19 , 1871 –  जनवरी 30 , 1948 ) और wilbur ( अप्रैल 16 , 1867 – may 30 , 1912 ) , यहूद दो अमरीकी भाइयो , आविष्कारक , और विमानन pioneers जो यहूद credited साथ inventing और भवन the संसार 's पहला कामयाब वायुयान और बनाना  the first controlled , powered and sustained heavier-than-air human flight , on December 17 , 1903 .
From 1905 to 1907 , the brothers developed their flying  यंत्र into the पहला व्यावहारिक fixed-wing  aircraft .
Although not the first to build and fly experimental aircraft , the Wright brothers were the  पहला to इफ़तेरा वायुयान नियंत्रण कि बना fixed-wing संचालित उड़ान संभावित  .
The brothers ' fundamental breakthrough was  उनके आविष्कार of three-axis कंट्रोल , जिससे सक्रिय the पायलट to steer the वायुयान effectively और to maintain इसके संतुलन  .
This method became standard and  remains मानक on fixed-wing वायुयान of सब kinds  .
From the beginning of their  aeronautical कार्य , the राइट भाइयो केन्द्रित on विकासशील a विश्वसनीय विधि of पायलट कंट्रोल as the कुंजी to solving `` the  flying problem '' .
This approach  differed significantly इससे अन्य experimenters of the समय जो put अधिक जोर  on developing powerful engines .
Using a small  homebuilt हवा टनल , the wrights भी एकत्रित अधिक सटीक आंकड़ा than कोई पहले , enabling उन्हें to डिज़ाइन और निर्माण विंग्स और propellers  that were more efficient than any before .
Their first U.S. patent , 821,393 , did not claim invention of a flying machine , but rather ,  the आविष्कार of a प्रणाली of aerodynamic कंट्रोल कि manipulated a उड़ती यंत्र 's सतहों  .
They gained the mechanical skills essential for their success by working  लिये सालो in उनके दूकान साथ मुद्रण दबाता , साइकिल , मोटर्स , और अन्य  machinery .
Their work with  साइकिल in particular बहकावे उनके विश्वास कि an अस्थिर गाडी जैसे a उड़ती यंत्र could be नियंत्रित  and balanced with practice .
इससे 1900 जबतक उनके पहला संचालित फ़्लाइट in लेट 1903 , वे conducted extensive glider  tests that also developed their skills as pilots .
Their bicycle shop employee Charlie Taylor became an  महत्वपूर्ण भाग of the टोली , भवन उनके पहला वायुयान इंजन in  close collaboration with the brothers .
The Wright brothers ' status as inventors of the airplane has been subject  to counter-claims by  various parties .
much विवाद persists over the अनेक  competing claims of early aviators .
अमेरिका 's अगला शीर्ष मॉडल , साईकिल 12 is the बारहवीं साईकिल of अमेरिका 's अगला शीर्ष मॉडल और the  sixth season to air on The CW network .
It  premiered on कूच 4 , 2009  .
The  साईकिल 's कैच phrase  is `` Get In The Fold . ''
The cycle  's promotional सोंग is महिला  Gaga 's `` The Fame '' .
The prizes  लिये इस साईकिल are:
A modeling  अनुबंध साथ elite मॉडल  Management .
A  फ़ैशन स्प्रेड और कवर  in Seventeen .
A 100,000  अनुबंध साथ covergirl कॉस्मेटिक्स  .
The first  हाफ of the साईकिल took प्लेस in नई यॉर्क नगर , चलती  the show back from Los Angeles last season .
The international destination for this cycle  is são पाउलो , ब्राज़ील , the श्रेणी पहला विज़िट to दक्षिण  America .
The number of girls was reduced to  13 , the पहला समय चूंकि साईकिल 9 , बाद होने कायम  at 14 in the last two cycles .
इस थी the पिछला समय paulina porizkova  participated as judge .
The winner was 20-year-old  teyona एंडरसन इससे woodstown , नई जर्सी  .
This season  averaged 4.35 लाख दर्शक  per episode .
Exxon Mobil Corporation , or ExxonMobil , is an American  बहुराष्ट्रीय आयल और गैस निगम headquartered in इरविंग  , Texas , United States .
It is a direct descendant of John D.  rockefeller 's मानक आयल कम्पनी , और थी formed on नवम्बर 30 , 1999 , by the विलय of exxon और  Mobil .
It is  संबद्ध साथ इम्पीरियल  Oil which operates in Canada .
ExxonMobil is the world 's largest company by revenue and in 2013 , became the largest publicly  traded कम्पनी by मार्केट capitalization in the संसार .
The company is ranked # 5  globally in फोर्ब्स वैश्विक 2000 सूची in  2013 .
Exxon Mobil 's reserves were 72  अरब oil-equivalent barrels at the समाप्त of 2007 और , at तब ( 2007 ) दरों of उत्पादन , हैं अपेक्षित to पिछला over 14 सालो  .
With 37  आयल refineries in 21 देशों constituting a संयुक्त रोज़ शोधन क्षमता of , exxon mobil is the largest refiner in the संसार  , a title that was also associated with Standard Oil since its incorporation in 1870 .
ExxonMobil is the largest of the world 's supermajors with daily production of 3.921 million BOE  ( barrels of आयल समतुल्य )  .
in 2008 , इस थी लगभग 3 % of संसार उत्पादन , जिससे is  less than several of the largest state-owned petroleum companies .
When ranked by oil and gas  reserves it is 14th in the संसार साथ कम than 1 %  of the total .
A 2012 article in The Daily Telegraph says that ExxonMobil has `` grown into one of the  planet’s सबसे hated corporations , समर्थ to determine अमरीकी विदेशी नीति और the भाग्य of संपूर्ण  nations '' .
In terms of its environmental record , ExxonMobil increasingly drills in terrains leased to  उन्हें by dictatorships , ऐसे as those in chad और भूमध्यरेखीय  Guinea .
Lee Raymond , the corporation’s chief executive until 2005 , was ``  notoriously sceptical परिचय जलवायु बदलें और disliked सरकारी हस्तक्षेप at कोई  level '' .
The company was widely criticized for its  slow जवाब to सफ़ाई इसके 1989 valdez आयल  spill in Alaska .
This article is  परिचय the ग्लोब थिएटर of शेक्सपियर  .
For the  आधुनिक पुनर्निर्माण in लंदन , देखिए शेक्सपियर  's Globe .
For  अन्य उपयोग , देखिए ग्लोब थिएटर ( बहुविकल्पी  ) .
the ग्लोब थिएटर थी a थिएटर in लंदन संबद्ध  with William Shakespeare .
It was built in 1599 by Shakespeare  's playing कम्पनी , the रब चेम्बरलेन 's मेन , on जमीन स्वामित्व by थामस brend  and inherited by his son , Nicholas Brend and grandson Sir Matthew Brend , and was destroyed by fire on 29 June 1613 .
A second Globe  थिएटर थी निर्मित on the वही साईट by जून 1614 और  closed in 1642 .
A modern reconstruction of the Globe , named ``  शेक्सपियर 's ग्लोब `` , खोली in 1997 लगभग इससे the साईट of the असली  theatre .
it 's a अद्भुत जीवन is a 1946 अमरीकी क्रिसमस नाटक फिल्मी उत्पादित और निर्देशित by फ़्रैंक capra , आधारित on the छोटी  story `` The Greatest Gift `` , which Philip Van Doren Stern wrote in 1939 and privately published in 1945 .
The film is considered  एक of the सबसे loved films in अमरीकी सिनेमा और रै become परंपरागत देखने दौरान the क्रिसमस ऋतु ,  alongside popular classics such as Charles Dickens ' A Christmas Carol .
The film stars James Stewart as George Bailey , a man who has given up his dreams in order to help others and  जिनकी निकट आत्महत्या on क्रिसमस संध्या brings परिचय the हस्तक्षेप of उसके संरक्षक देवदूत , क्लेरेंस odbody ( हेनरी  Travers ) .
Clarence shows George all the lives he has  छुआ और कैसा अलग जीवन in उसके जातियाँ of bedford जलप्रपात होता be था he never  been born .
Despite initially performing poorly at the box office due to high production costs and stiff competition at the  समय of इसके रिलीज , the फिल्मी रै आइये to be regarded as a क्लासिक और is a स्टेपल of क्रिसमस टेलीविज़न around  the world .
Theatrically , the film 's break-even point was  दरअसल $ 6.3 लाख , लगभग twice the उत्पादन लागत , a फिगर it never आए बंद to achieving in  its initial release .
An appraisal in 2006 reported : `` Although it was not the complete box office failure that today everyone believes  ... it थी initially a प्रमुख निराशा और पुष्टि , at तनिक to the studios , कि capra थी no longer सक्षम of turning आउट the populist सुविधाएँ कि बना उसके films the must-see , money-making कार्यक्रम  they once were . ''
The film was nominated for five Oscars and has been recognized by the  अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान as एक of the 100 बेहतरीन अमरीकी films कभी बना , रखकर क्रमांक 11 on इसके आरंभिक 1998 महानतम फिल्म सूची , और होता भी प्लेस क्रमांक एक on इसके सूची  of the most inspirational American films of all time .
आंकड़ा गोदाम  Overview
In computing  , a आंकड़ा गोदाम or एंटरप्राइज़ आंकड़ा गोदाम ( dw , dwh , or edw )  is a database used for reporting and data analysis .
it is a सेंट्रल repository of आंकड़ा जिससे is निर्मित by integrating  data from one or more disparate sources .
Data warehouses store current as well as  ऐतिहासिक आंकड़ा और हैं प्रयुक्त लिये बनाना चर्चित रिपोर्ट्स लिये वरिष्ठ प्रबन्धन  reporting such as annual and quarterly comparisons .
The data stored in  the गोदाम हैं अपलोड इससे the operational प्रणालियों ( ऐसे  as marketing , sales etc. , shown in the figure to the right ) .
The  आंकड़ा may pass through an operational आंकड़ा स्टोर लिये अतिरिक्त परिचालन पहले वे  are used in the DW for reporting .
The  ठेठ etl -आधारd आंकड़ा गोदाम उपयोग स्टेजिंग , आंकड़ा संयोजन  , and access layers to house its key functions .
The staging layer or staging database  स्टोर्स कच्चा आंकड़ा निकाली इससे प्रत्येक of the disparate  source data systems .
The integration layer integrates the disparate data sets by transforming  the आंकड़ा इससे the स्टेजिंग परत प्रायः storing इस रूपांतरित आंकड़ा in an operational आंकड़ा स्टोर ( ods ) डेटाबेस  .
The integrated data are then moved to yet another database , often called the  आंकड़ा गोदाम डेटाबेस , जहाँ the आंकड़ा is arranged into hierarchical समूह प्रायः पुकारा आयाम और into तथ्य और कुल तथ्य  .
The combination of  तथ्य और आयाम is sometimes पुकारा  a star schema .
The  अभिगम परत helps उपयोक्ता  retrieve data .
A data warehouse  constructed इससे an एकीकृत आंकड़ा सोर्स प्रणालियों करता नहीं आवश्यकता etl , स्टेजिंग databases  , or operational data store databases .
The integrated data  सोर्स प्रणालियों may be माना to be a भाग of a वितरित  operational data store layer .
Data federation methods or data virtualization methods may be used to access the  वितरित एकीकृत सोर्स आंकड़ा प्रणालियों to consolidate और कुल आंकड़ा सीधे into the आंकड़ा गोदाम  database tables .
Unlike the ETL-based data  गोदाम , the एकीकृत सोर्स आंकड़ा प्रणालियों और the आंकड़ा गोदाम हैं सब एकीकृत चूंकि वहीँ is no परिवर्तन  of dimensional or reference data .
This  एकीकृत आंकड़ा गोदाम वास्तुकला supports the ड्रिल bas इससे the कुल आंकड़ा  of the data warehouse to the transactional data of the integrated source data systems .
आंकड़ा warehouses can be subdivided into  data marts .
Data marts  स्टोर subsets of आंकड़ा इससे  a warehouse .
This  परिभाषा of the आंकड़ा गोदाम  focuses on data storage .
The main source of  the आंकड़ा is cleaned , रूपांतरित , cataloged और बना उपलब्धियाँ लिये उपयोग by प्रबंधक और अन्य कारोबार पेशेवर  for data mining , online analytical processing , market research and decision support ( Marakas & O'Brien 2009 ) .
However , the means to retrieve and  analyze आंकड़ा , to निकालें , रूपांतरण और लोड आंकड़ा , और to मैनेज the आंकड़ा  dictionary are also considered essential components of a data warehousing system .
Many  सन्दर्भ to आंकड़ा warehousing उपयोग इस  broader context .
Thus , an expanded  परिभाषा लिये आंकड़ा warehousing शामिल कारोबार प्रज्ञा टूल्स , टूल्स to निकालें , रूपांतरण और लोड  data into the repository , and tools to manage and retrieve metadata .
Portland stone quarry  on the आइल of पोर्टलैंड  , England
an abandoned निर्माण कुल पाषाण  near Adelaide , South Australia
A  पाषाण is a प्रकार of open-pit मेरा इससे जिससे  rock or minerals are extracted .
Quarries are  generally प्रयुक्त लिये extracting भवन सामग्री , ऐसे as आयाम स्टोन , निर्माण  aggregate , riprap , sand , and gravel .
They are often collocated with concrete and asphalt  पौधे due to the आवश्यकता लिये विशाल amounts of कुल in those  materials .
Open mines that produce  खनिज हैं typically referred to as  open pit mines .
The word  पाषाण can शामिल भूमिगत quarrying लिये स्टोन ,  such as Bath stone .
Mormons ( ) are a religious and cultural group related to  mormonism , the प्रिंसिपल शाखा of the latter दिन संत गति of restorationist christianity , जिससे began  with the visions of Joseph Smith in upstate New York during the 1820s .
After Smith 's death in 1844 the  mormons followed ब्रिघम यंग to कया होता become the यूटा  Territory .
Today  mormons हैं समझा to be सदस्यों of the गिरिजाघर of यीशु मसीह  of Latter-day Saints ( LDS Church ) .
Some Mormons are also  either स्वतंत्र or non-practicing  .
