The  बीच of mormon सांस्कृतिक influence is in यूटा , और उत्तर अमेरिका रै अधिक mormons than कोई अन्य  continent , though the majority of Mormons live outside the United States .
Mormons have developed a  दमदार भाव of communality कि तना इससे उनके  doctrine and history .
During the 19th century Mormon  converts tended to एकत्रित to a सेंट्रल भौगोलिक स्थान , और between 1852 और 1890 a अल्पसंख्यक of mormons खुलकर practiced बहुवचन विवाह , a रूप of धार्मिक polygamy  .
Mormons dedicate large amounts of time and  संसाधन to सेवारत in उनके गिरिजाघर , और अनेक यंग mormons चुनें to serve a full-time proselytizing  mission .
mormons have a स्वास्थ्य कोड कि eschews alcoholic पेय , तम्बाकू , कॉफी  , tea , and other addictive substances .
They tend to be very family-oriented , and have strong  कनेक्शन्स आरपार पीढियां और साथ विस्तारित परिवार , परावर्तक of उनके विश्वास कि परिवारों can be sealed साथ  beyond death and throughout eternity .
mormons भी have a सख्त विधि of शुद्धता , requiring abstention इससे यौन संबंध बाहर  of marriage and strict fidelity within marriage .
Mormons self-identify as Christian , though  कुछ of उनके मान्यताओं differ इससे मुख्यधारा christianity  .
Mormons believe  in the बाइबल , as खूब as अन्य किताबे of scripture , ऐसे  as the Book of Mormon .
They have a  अद्वितीय दृश्य of cosmology , और मानना  that all people are spirit-children of God .
Mormons believe that returning  to परमेश्वर requires following the उदाहरण of यीशु मसीह , और accepting उसके प्रायश्चित through ordinances  such as baptism .
They  मानना कि मसीह 's गिरिजाघर थी लौटी through जोसेफ स्मिथ  , and is guided by living prophets and apostles .
Central to  mormon आस्था is the विश्वास कि परमेश्वर बोलती  to his children and answers their prayers .
In  वित्तीय हिसाब , एसेट हैं आर्थिक  resources .
Anything tangible or intangible that is capable of being owned or controlled to produce value and  कि is आयोजित to have धनात्मक आर्थिक मान is माना an  asset .
Simply stated ,  एसेट represent मान of स्वामित्व कि can be परिवर्तित into नकदी  ( although cash itself is also considered an asset ) .
The balance sheet  of a कड़ रिकॉर्ड the monetaryj  .
G. Siegel , N. Dauber & J. K. Shim , `` The Vest Pocket CPA '' , Wiley , 2005.There are different methods  of assessing the मौद्रिक मान of the एसेट अंकित on the संतुलन चादर  .
in कुछ मामले , the ऐतिहासिक लागत is प्रयुक्त ; ऐसे कि the मान of the एसेट जब it थी खरीदा  in the past is used as the monetary value .
In other  उदाहरण , the उपस्थित मेला मार्केट मान of the एसेट is प्रयुक्त to determine the  value shown on the balance sheet .
value of the  एसेट स्वामित्व by the कड़  .
It  is धन और अन्य valuables belonging  to an individual or business .
Two major asset  वर्ग हैं ठोस एसेट और intangible एसेट  .
ठोस एसेट contain विभिन्न subclasses , सहित वर्तमान  assets and fixed assets.J .
Downes , J.E . Goodman , `` Dictionary of Finance & Investment Terms '' , Baron 's Financial Guides , 2003 Current assets include inventory , while fixed assets include such items as buildings and  उपकरण .J . downes , j.e . गुडमैन , `` शब्दकोष of वित्त & निवेश शर्तें '' , सामन्त 's वित्तीय मार्गदर्शिका , 2003 ; और J. G. siegel , N. dauber & J. K.  Shim , `` The Vest Pocket CPA '' , Wiley , 2005 .
Intangible assets are nonphysical resources and  अधिकारों कि have a मान to the कड़ क्युकी वे दे the कड़ कुछ दयालु of लाभ  in the market place .
Examples of intangible assets  हैं साख , copyrights , trademarks , patents और कंप्यूटर कार्यक्रम , और वित्तीय एसेट , सहित ऐसे वस्तुएं as खाते  receivable , bonds and stocks .
A neuron ( or ;  भी ज्ञात as a neurone or तंत्रिका कोशिका ) is an electrically excitable कोशिका कि प्रक्रियाओं और transmits सूचना through  electrical and chemical signals .
A chemical  सिग्नल occurs via a अन्तर्ग्रथन , a specialized कनेक्शन साथ अन्य  cells .
Neurons  कनेक्ट to प्रत्येक अन्य to रूप neural  networks .
Neurons are the core  components of the बेचैन प्रणाली , जिससे शामिल the दिमाग , स्पाइनल cord  , and peripheral ganglia .
A number of specialized  प्रकार of न्यूरॉन्स मौजूद : संवेदी न्यूरॉन्स respond to टच , ध्वनि , लाइट और numerous अन्य stimuli affecting कोशिकाएं of  the sensory organs that then send signals to the spinal cord and brain .
Motor neurons receive signals from the brain and  स्पाइनल cord , कारण मांसपेशी contractions , और affect ग्रंथियों  .
Interneurons connect  न्यूरॉन्स to अन्य न्यूरॉन्स भीतर the वही प्रदेश of  the brain or spinal cord .
A typical neuron possesses a  कोशिका देह ( प्रायः पुकारा the सोम ) , dendrites ,  and an axon .
Dendrites are thin structures that arise from the cell body , often  extending लिये सैंकड़ों of micrometres और branching अनेक  times , giving rise to a complex `` dendritic tree '' .
An axon is a special cellular extension that arises from  the कोशिका देह at a साईट पुकारा the axon उभरकर और ट्रेवल्स लिये a अलहदा , as दूर as 1 मीटर  in humans or even more in other species .
The cell body of a neuron frequently  देता वृद्धि to अनेक dendrites , लकिन never to अधिक than एक axon , हालांकि the axon may शाखा सैंकड़ों  of times before it terminates .
At the majority of synapses ,  सिग्नल हैं भेजा इससे the axon of एक न्यूरॉन to a dendrite of  another .
There are , however ,  अनेक अपवाद to ये नियम : न्यूरॉन्स कि कमी dendrites , न्यूरॉन्स कि have no axon , synapses कि  connect an axon to another axon or a dendrite to another dendrite , etc .
All neurons are electrically excitable , maintaining voltage gradients across their  झिल्लियों by अर्थात् of metabolically चलित आयन पंपों , जिससे combine साथ आयन चैनल्स अंतःस्थापित in the झिल्ली to generate intracellular-versus-extracellular विशेषज्ञता मतभेद  of ions such as sodium , potassium , chloride , and calcium .
Changes in  the cross-membrane वोल्टेज can alter the फलन of voltage-dependent  ion channels .
If the voltage changes by a large enough amount , an all-or-none  electrochemical पल्स पुकारा an कार्रवाई संभावित is उत्पन्न , जिससे ट्रेवल्स rapidly साथ the कोशिका 's axon , और activates सिनेप्टिक  connections with other cells when it arrives .
Neurons  do नहीं undergo कोशिका प्रभाग  .
In most cases , neurons are  उत्पन्न by खास प्रकार of स्टेम  cells .
Astrocytes , a type of  glial कोशिका , have भी महरूम observed to फेरे into न्यूरॉन्स by पुण्य of the स्टेम कोशिका  characteristic pluripotency .
In humans , neurogenesis largely ceases  दौरान adulthood—but in दो दिमाग क्षेत्रों , the हिप्पोकैम्पस और घ्राण बल्ब , वहीँ is दमदार  evidence for generation of substantial numbers of new neurons .
Super Bowl XLIII was an American football game between the American  फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) चैंपियन पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स और the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन  ( NFC ) champion Arizona Cardinals to decide the National Football League ( NFL ) champion for the 2008 season .
the स्टीलर्स पराजित the कार्डिनल्स  by the score of 27–23 .
The game  थी निभाई on फ़रवरी 1 , 2009 , at रेमंड  James Stadium in Tampa , Florida .
With this win , the Steelers became the  पहला टोली to जीत छह सुपर  Bowls .
Pittsburgh , who finished the regular  ऋतु साथ a 12–4 रिकार्ड , भी जीती उनके दूसरी सुपर कटोरी in चार सालो बाद जीतना  Super Bowl XL at the end of the 2005 season .
The Cardinals entered  the खेल seeking उनके पहला एनएफएल शीर्षक चूंकि 1947 , the longest चैंपियनशिप  drought in the league .
The  क्लबों became an अनपेक्षित विजेता दौरान the नियमित ऋतु , compiling a 9–7 रिकार्ड , और the playoffs साथ the सहायता of सिर कोच केन whisenhunt , जो थी the स्टीलर्स ' अप्रिय  coordinator in Super Bowl XL , and the re-emergence of quarterback Kurt Warner , who was the Super Bowl MVP in Super Bowl XXXIV with his former team , St. Louis Rams .
Pittsburgh jumped to a 17–7 halftime lead , aided by linebacker James Harrison 's Super Bowl  रिकार्ड 100-yard interception वापसी लिये a touchdown  .
trailing 20–7 at the प्रारंभ of the चौथी क्वार्टर , एरिज़ोना scored 16 अनुत्तरित अंक , सहित चौड़ी receiver लैरी fitzgerald 's 64-yard touchdown  reception , to take the lead with 2:37 remaining in the game .
लकिन the स्टीलर्स marched 78 गज to स्कोर on चौड़ी receiver santonio holmes ' 6-yard  game-winning touchdown catch with 35 seconds left .
Holmes , who caught nine passes for 131 yards and a touchdown ,  सहित चार receptions लिये 73 गज on कि फाइनल game-winning ड्राइव ,  was named Super Bowl MVP .
He became the sixth wide receiver  to जीत the पुरस्कार , और भी थी the तीसरा पिट्सबर्ग receiver to जीत the  award , following Lynn Swann and Hines Ward .
Despite the global financial crisis and limited amount of ancillary festivities that  हैं सामान्यतः आयोजित पहले the खेल , the एनबीसी टेलीविज़न संजाल ब्रॉडकास्ट आकर्षित an औसत u.S. दर्शक of 98.7 लाख दर्शक , बनाना  it the most watched Super Bowl in history to that point .
A diagram of the electromagnetic  वर्णक्रम , प्रर्दशित विभिन्न गुण आरपार the दायरा of बारंबारता और  wavelengths
the इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम is the दायरा of सब  possible frequencies of electromagnetic radiation .
The `` electromagnetic spectrum '' of an object has a different meaning , and is  बजाय the characteristic वितरण of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक विकिरण उत्सर्जित or अवशोषित by कि particular ऑब्जेक्ट  .
The electromagnetic spectrum extends from below  the कम बारंबारता प्रयुक्त लिये आधुनिक रेडियो संचार to गामा विकिरण at the short- wavelength ( high-frequency ) समाप्त , thereby covering wavelengths इससे हज़ारों  of kilometers down to a fraction of the size of an atom .
The limit for long  wavelengths is the आकार of the ब्रह्मांड itself , जबकि it is विचार कि the छोटी wavelength सीमा is in the vicinity of the  Planck length , although in principle the spectrum is infinite and continuous .
Most parts of the  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक वर्णक्रम हैं प्रयुक्त in विज्ञान लिये spectroscopic और अन्य probing interactions  , as ways to study and characterize matter .
In  जोड , विकिरण इससे विभिन्न भाग of the वर्णक्रम रै मिला अनेक अन्य उपयोग लिये संचार और निर्माण  ( see electromagnetic radiation for more applications ) .
लेजेंड
marchantia , a liverwort
Bryophyte is a traditional name used to refer  to सब embryophytes ( जमीन पौधे ) कि do नहीं have सच्चा vascular ऊतक और हैं इसलिए पुकारा  ' non-vascular plants ' .
Some bryophytes do have  specialized ऊतकों लिये the हस्तांतरण of जल ; however चूंकि ये do नहीं contain lignin  , they are not considered to be true vascular tissue .
Currently  bryophytes हैं विचार नहीं to be a प्राकृतिक or monophyletic समूह ; however the नाम is सुविधाजनक और remains  in use as a collective term for mosses , hornworts , and liverworts .
bryophytes उपज enclosed reproductive structures ( gametangia और sporangia ) , लकिन वे उपज  neither flowers nor seeds , reproducing via spores .
The term bryophyte  आता इससे यूनानी βρύον , bryon , `` tree-moss , oyster-green '' + φυτόν  - phyton `` plant '' .
A bank is a financial institution  और a वित्तीय intermediary कि स्वीकृत जमा और चैनल्स those जमा into lending क्रियाएँ , either सीधे by loaning  or indirectly through capital markets .
A bank is the connection  between ग्राहक कि have पूंजी deficits  and customers with capital surpluses .
Due to their influence within a  वित्तीय प्रणाली और an अर्थव्यवस्था , बैंको हैं generally अत्यधिक  regulated in most countries .
Most banks operate under a system known as fractional reserve banking  जहाँ वे थाम तभी a छोटी आरक्षित of the निधि deposited और lend आउट the बाकी  for profit .
They are generally subject to minimum  पूंजी आवश्यकताएँ जिससे हैं आधारित on an अंतरराष्ट्रीय नियत of पूंजी  standards , known as the Basel Accords .
The oldest bank still in existence is Monte dei Paschi di Siena ,  headquartered in सियेना , इटली , जिससे रै महरूम ऑपरेटिंग  continuously since 1472 .
It  is followed by berenberg बैंको of हैम्बर्ग ( 1590  ) and Sveriges Riksbank of Sweden ( 1668 ) .
Banking  in इसके आधुनिक भाव विकसित in समृद्ध शहरों of पुनर्जागरण  Italy , such as Florence , Venice and Genoa .
In the history of banking , a number of banking dynasties —among them notably Medici , Fugger , Welser , Berenberg  , baring और रोथ्सचाइल्ड —have निभाई a सेंट्रल भूमिका over अनेक सदियां  .
The Xbox is a  वीडियो खेल कंसोल  manufactured by Microsoft .
It was released on November 15 , 2001 in North America , February 22 , 2002 in  जापानी , और कूच 14 , 2002 in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और यूरोपीय .
It was Microsoft  's पहला foray into the गेमिंग  console market .
As part of  the sixth-generation of गेमिंग , the एक्सबॉक्स competed साथ सोनी 's प्लेस्टेशन 2 , sega 's dreamcast ( जिससे रोका अमरीकी बिक्री  before the Xbox went on sale ) , and Nintendo 's GameCube .
The Xbox was the first  कंसोल offered by an अमरीकी कम्पनी बाद the atari जैगुआर रोका बिक्री in  1996 .
The integrated Xbox Live service launched in  नवम्बर 2002 अनुमत खिलाड़ी to खेल खेल ऑनलाइन साथ a ब्रॉडबैंड  connection .
It first competed  साथ dreamcast 's ऑनलाइन सेवा लकिन बाद primarily  competed with PlayStation 2 's online service .
Although these two are  फ़्री जबकि एक्सबॉक्स सजीव जरूरी a सब्सक्रिप्शन , as खूब as broadband-only कनेक्शन जिससे थी नहीं completely अपनाया yet , एक्सबॉक्स सजीव थी a कामयाबी due to बेहतर सर्वर , सुविधाएँ ऐसे as a दोस्त सूची , और पड़ाव  titles like Halo 2 released in November 2004 , which is the best-selling Xbox video game and was by far the most popular online game for years .
Xbox 's  successor , the एक्सबॉक्स 360 , थी शुभारम्भ in नवम्बर  2005 .
The Xbox was  discontinued in लेट 2005 in जापानी जहाँ  sales were poor .
It was  discontinued in लेट 2006 in यूरोपीय और जल्दी  2007 in North America .
The last Xbox game in Europe  थी टोनी हॉक 's प्रोजेक्ट 8 released in नवम्बर 2006 , और the पिछला खेल in उत्तर अमेरिका  was Madden NFL 09 released in August 2008 .
Support for out-of-warranty Xbox consoles was  discontinued on कूच 2 , 2009 , stating कि कोई in-warranty मरम्मत अभी needed होगा नहीं  be undertaken .
Xbox access to  एक्सबॉक्स सजीव थी रोका on अप्रैल 15 , 2010  .
The Gospel According to John ( Greek τὸ κατὰ Ἰωάννην εὐαγγέλιον ) , commonly referred to as the  इन्जील of जॉन or बस जॉन और प्रायः referred to in नई वसीयत स्कॉलरशिप as the चौथी  Gospel , is an account of the public ministry of Jesus .
It begins with the witness and  प्रतिज्ञान by जॉन the बैपटिस्ट और concludes साथ the मौत , दफ़न , क़यामत ,  and post-resurrection appearances of Jesus .
This account is fourth of  the canonical gospels , बाद the  synoptics Matthew , Mark and Luke .
राज्य कि the किताब गर्भाशयी इससे the गवाही  of the ' disciple whom Jesus loved . '
Along with Peter , the  बेनाम शिष्य is विशेषकर बंद to यीशु , और early-church परंपरा पहचाना  him as John the Apostle , one of Jesus ' Twelve Apostles .
The gospel is closely related in style and content to the three surviving Epistles of  जॉन ऐसे कि टीकाकारों दावत the चार किताबे साथ , yet , according to सबसे आधुनिक विद्वानों , जॉन थी नहीं the लेखक of कोई of  these books .
Recent Christian Scripture scholarship more and  अधिक रै लगाई जॉन भीतर a first-century यहूदी कॉन्टेक्स्ट  .
Raymond E. Brown did pioneering work to trace the  विकास of the परंपरा  from which the gospel arose .
The discourses seem to be concerned with the actual  मुद्दे of the church-and-synagogue बहस at the समय जब  the Gospel was written .
It is notable that  , in the इन्जील , the जातियाँ स्टिल appears to define itself primarily विरूद्ध  Judaism , rather than as part of a wider Christian church .
Though Christianity started as a movement within Judaism , gradually  ईसाइयों और यहूदियों became bitterly opposed  .
John presents a `` higher '' Christology than the synoptics , meaning  कि it describes यीशु as the अवतार of the दैवी लोगो through जिसको सब बाते यहूद बना , as the ऑब्जेक्ट of veneration , और अधिक explicitly  as God incarnate .
Only in John does Jesus talk at  लंबाई परिचय खुद और उसके दैवी भूमिका , प्रायः साझा साथ the शिष्यों तभी  .
Against the synoptics  , जॉन focuses largely on अलग चमत्कार ( सहित resurrecting lazarus ) , दिए as लक्षण meant to engender  faith .
Synoptic  तत्व ऐसे as parables और exorcisms हैं  not found in John .
It presents a  एहसास eschatology in जिससे मोक्ष is already उपस्थित  for the believer .
The Plagues of Egypt ( )  , भी पुकारा the टेन plagues ( ) or the biblical plagues , यहूद टेन calamities कि , according to the biblical किताब of exodus  , Israel 's God , Yahweh , inflicted upon Egypt to persuade Pharaoh to release the ill-treated Israelites from slavery .
Pharaoh capitulated  बाद the दसवाँ प्लेग , triggering the exodus of the यहूदी  people .
The plagues  यहूद designed to कंट्रास्ट the शक्ति of yahweh साथ the नपुंसकता  of Egypt 's various gods .
Some commentators have associated several of  the plagues साथ निर्णय on विशिष्ट देवताओं संबद्ध साथ the nile  , fertility and natural phenomena .
the plagues of मिश्र हैं भी उल्लेखित  in the Quran ( 7,133–136 ) .
According  to the किताब of exodus , परमेश्वर proclaims कि सब the देवताओं  of Egypt will be judged through the tenth and final plague:
John  मार्टिन 's पेंटिंग of the प्लेग of  hail and fire ( 1823 ) .
A role-playing  खेल ( आरपीजी और sometimes roleplaying खेल ) is a खेल in जिससे खिलाड़ी assume the भूमिकाएँ  of characters in a fictional setting .
Players take responsibility for acting out these roles within a  कथा , either through शाब्दिक एक्टिंग or through a प्रक्रम of संरचित decision-making  or character development .
Actions taken within many games  सफल or असफल according to a औपचारिक प्रणाली of नियम और दिशानिर्देश  .
वहीँ हैं अनेक  forms of RPG .
The original form , sometimes called the tabletop RPG , is conducted through  चर्चा , whereas in सजीव कार्रवाई role-playing खेल ( larp ) खिलाड़ी physically perform उनके वर्ण  ' actions .
In both of these forms , an arranger called a game master ( GM )  प्रायः decides on the नियम और सेटिंग to be प्रयुक्त और अधिनियमों as रेफरी , जबकि प्रत्येक of the अन्य खिलाड़ी plays the भूमिका of a सिंगल अक्षर  .
Several varieties of RPG also exist  in इलेक्ट्रॉनिक मीडिया , ऐसे as multi-player text-based muds और उनके graphics-based successors , massively एकाधिक  online role-playing games ( MMORPGs ) .
Role-playing games also include single-player offline role-playing  वीडियो खेल in जिससे खिलाड़ी कंट्रोल a अक्षर or टोली जो undertake quests , और may शामिल सामर्थ्य कि अग्रिम using सांख्यिकीय यांत्रिकी  .
These games often  share जमावट और नियम साथ tabletop rpgs , लकिन emphasize अक्षर  advancement more than collaborative storytelling .
despite इस किस्में of फ़ॉर्म , कुछ खेल फ़ॉर्म ऐसे as व्यापार कार्ड खेल और wargames कि हैं सम्बन्धित to role-playing खेल  may not be included .
Role-playing activity may  sometimes be उपस्थित in ऐसे खेल , लकिन it is नहीं the प्राथमिक  focus .
The term is  भी sometimes प्रयुक्त to describe लिए सिमुलेशन खेल और exercises प्रयुक्त in  teaching , training , and academic research .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a civil war  लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि घोषित उनके secession और formed the confederate राज्य of अमेरिका ( the `` confederacy  '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its origin in  the समस्या of गुलामी , विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन  of slavery into the western territories .
Foreign  शक्तियां किया नहीं  intervene .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000 soldiers dead and destroyed much of the South  's अवसंरचना , the confederacy collapsed , गुलामी थी abolished , और the मुश्किल पुनर्निर्माण प्रक्रम of  restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans , led  by अब्राहम lincoln , opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त  States ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before  उसके उद्घाटन on कूच 4 , 1861 , सात cotton-based  slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic  अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत secession  as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural  पता घोषित उसके प्रशासन होता नहीं  initiate civil war .
आठ बाकी स्लेव राज्य जारी to अस्वीकृत  calls for secession .
Confederate forces seized numerous federal forts within  territory claimed by the confederacy  .
A Peace Conference  विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह , और दोनो पहलू prepared  for war .
The Confederates assumed  कि यूरोपीय देशों यहूद so निर्भर on `` किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना the नई confederate  States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 ,  1861 , जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट sumter , a कुंजी फोर्ट  held by Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to  provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन , चार अधिक स्लेव  states joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon  नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी  that crippled the southern economy .
The Eastern  थिएटर थी inconclusive in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate  अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल of  Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
Lincoln issued the  emancipation उदघोषणा , जिससे बना समाप्ति  slavery a war goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union  नष्ट the confederate नदी नेवी , तब much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना , और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in दो at the  Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert E.  ली 's confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the बैटल of gettysburg  .
Western successes led  to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब संघ सेना  in 1864 .
In the Western  थिएटर , विलियम T. शरमन drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the समुद्र , destroying confederate  infrastructure along the way .
The  संघ marshaled the संसाधन और जनशक्ति to आक्रमण the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश , और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों  of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army  विफल , अग्रणी to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox अदालत  House on April 9 , 1865 .
The American  सिविल युद्ध थी एक of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक  wars .
Railroads , the  टेलीग्राफ , steamships , और mass-produced हथियार यहूद employed extensively  .
The mobilization of civilian factories , mines , shipyards , banks , transportation  और खाना आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed संसार  War I .
It remains the deadliest war in  अमरीकी इतिहास , resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined क्रमांक of  civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the death toll at ten  प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा , और 30 प्रतिशत of सब दक्षिणी श्वेत males aged  18–40 .
The  परिभाषा of the संसार 's व्यस्ततम विमानक्षेत्र रै महरूम निर्दिष्ट  by the Airports Council International in Geneva , Switzerland .
the aci defines और उपायों the following  three types of airport traffic:
Passenger traffic :  कुल यात्री emplaned और deplaned , यात्री  in transit counted once
कार्गो ट्रैफ़िक : loaded और मोड भाड़ा और मेल  in metric tonnes
ट्रैफ़िक आंदोलनों : अवतरण और  take-offs of aircraft
World War I ( WWI  ) थी a वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in यूरोपीय कि began on 28 जुलाई 1914  and lasted until 11 November 1918 .
It was  predominantly पुकारा the संसार युद्ध or the ग्रेट युद्ध इससे इसके occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939 , और the पहला  World War or World War I thereafter .
It involved all the world 's great powers , which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the  allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम , फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल गठबंधन of जर्मनी , austria-hungary  and Italy ; but , as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy did not enter into the war ) .
These alliances were both  reorganised और विस्तारित as अधिक राष्ट्र डाला the युद्ध : इटली , जापानी  and the United States joined the Allies , and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
Ultimately , more than 70 million military personnel , including 60  लाख europeans , यहूद mobilised in एक of the largest युद्धों in इतिहास  .
More than 9 million combatants were killed  , largely क्युकी of technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases in the lethality of हथियार बगैर सम्बन्धित  improvements in protection or mobility .
It was the  fifth- deadliest विरोध in संसार इतिहास , subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न  political changes , such as revolutions in many of the nations involved .
One of the long-term  कल्याणकारी of the युद्ध थी the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी नीतियों of  the great powers of Europe .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to  the सिंहासन of austria-hungary , on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक संकट जब austria-hungary subsequently वितरित an ultimatum to the किंगडम  of Serbia .
अनेक alliances formed over the पिछला दशकों  were invoked .
Within weeks  , the प्रमुख शक्तियां यहूद at युद्ध और , via उनके colonies , the  conflict soon spread around the world .
On 28 July , the Austro-Hungarians fired  the पहला गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as तैयारी लिये the आक्रमण of  Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans invaded neutral  बेल्जियम और ध्वज on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस , providing a casus belli  for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany .
बाद the जर्मनी कूच on पेरिस थी brought to a halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the marne —the पश्चिमी सामने settled  into a static battle of attrition with a trench line that changed little until 1917 .
On the Eastern Front , the Russian army was  कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians , लकिन थी रोका in इसके आक्रमण of ईस्ट  Prussia by the Germans .
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the war  , खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस , मेसोपोटामिया और  the Sinai .
Italy and  बुल्गारिया गई to युद्ध in 1915 और रोमानिया  in 1916 .
In Russia , the tsar 's government  collapsed in कूच 1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर brought the russians to शर्तें साथ  the Central Powers .
बाद a 1918 जर्मनी अप्रिय साथ the पश्चिमी सामने , the allies drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी of कामयाब offensives और अमरीकी  forces began entering the trenches .
Germany , which had its own trouble with  क्रांतिकारियों , सहमत to an armistice on 11 नवम्बर  1918 .
The war  ended in विजय लिये  the Allies .
Events on the home fronts  यहूद as उग्र as on the बैटल fronts , as the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और आर्थिक  resources to fight a total war .
By the  समाप्त of the युद्ध , चार प्रमुख इम्पीरियल powers—the जर्मनी , रूसी , austro-hungarian  and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist .
The  successor राज्य of the पूर्व दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory , जबकि the latter दो  were dismantled entirely .
The map of  सेंट्रल यूरोपीय थी redrawn into  several smaller states .
The League of Nations was  formed in the आशा of preventing  another such conflict .
The  यूरोपीय राष्ट्रवाद शाखित by the युद्ध और the ब्रेकअप of empires , the परखना of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं  with the Treaty of Versailles are agreed to be factors contributing to World War II .
The Deepwater Horizon oil spill ( also referred to as the  bp आयल spill , the bp आयल विपत्ति , the गल्फ of मैक्सिको आयल spill , और the macondo blowout ) थी an आयल spill in the गल्फ of मैक्सिको on the bp -operated macondo prospect , माना the  largest accidental marine oil spill in the history of the petroleum industry , estimated to be between 8 % and 31 % larger in volume than the earlier Ixtoc I oil spill .
Following the explosion and sinking of  the deepwater क्षितिज आयल रिग , जिससे claimed 11 जीवनदान , a sea-floor आयल gusher flowed unabated लिये 87 दिनों , जबतक it थी capped  on 15 July 2010 .
The total  निर्वहन is अनुमानित  at .
A massive response ensued to protect beaches ,  वेटलैंड्स और मुहानों इससे the spreading आयल utilizing skimmer जहाजों , फ्लोटिंग booms , नियंत्रित  burns and of Corexit oil dispersant .
After several failed efforts  to contain the प्रवाह , the खूब थी घोषित sealed on 19 सितंबर  2010 .
कुछ रिपोर्ट्स indicate the खूब साईट  continues to leak .
Due to the months-long spill , along with adverse effects from the response and  क्लीनअप क्रियाएँ , extensive क्षति to समुद्री और वन्यजीव habitats , फ़िशिंग और पर्यटन उद्योग , और इंसान स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं have जारी through 2013.three सालो बाद the spill , तारकोल गेंदें could स्टिल  be found on the Mississippi coast .
Numerous  investigations छान the कल्याणकारी of the  explosion and record-setting spill .
Notably , the U.S. government 's September 2011 report pointed  to defective सीमेंट on the खूब , faulting ज़्यादातर bp , लकिन भी खूब ऑपरेटर transocean और ठेकेदार halliburton  .
Earlier in 2011 , a White House commission likewise blamed BP and its partners for a series of  cost-cutting निर्णय और an अपर्याप्त सुरक्षा प्रणाली , लकिन भी concluded कि the spill resulted इससे `` प्रणालीगत '' रूट कल्याणकारी और `` अनुपस्थित significant सुधार in दोनो उद्योग practices  and government policies , might well recur '' .
In November 2012 , BP and the United States Department of  इंसाफ settled संघीय दण्ड आरोप साथ bp pleading अपराधी to 11 रिश्तो of  manslaughter , two misdemeanors , and a felony count of lying to Congress .
BP also agreed to  चार सालो of सरकारी निगरानी of इसके सुरक्षा practices और आचार , और the पर्यावरणीय  Protection Agency announced that BP would be temporarily banned from new contracts with the US government .
BP and the  विभाग of इंसाफ सहमत to a record-setting $ 4.525 अरब in जुर्माना और अन्य भुगतान लकिन further विधिक कार्यवाही  not expected to conclude until 2014 are ongoing to determine payouts and fines under the Clean Water Act and the Natural Resources Damage Assessment .
As of February 2013 , criminal and civil settlements  और भुगतान to a विश्वास निधि था लागत the कम्पनी $ 42.2 अरब  .
``  जहाँ the गलियों have  No Name '' is a song by rock band U2 .
It is the opening track from their 1987 album The  जोशुआ पेड़ और थी released as the एल्बम 's तीसरा सिंगल in अगस्त  1987 .
The song 's hook is a repeating guitar arpeggio  using a विलंब प्रभाव , निभाई दौरान the सोंग 's परिचय  and again at the end .
Lead vocalist Bono wrote the lyrics in response to the notion that  it is संभावित to पहचानो a व्यक्ति 's धर्म और आय आधारित on the  street on which they lived , particularly in Belfast .
During the band 's difficulties  रिकॉर्डिंग the सोंग , निर्माता ब्रायन eno माना  erasing the song 's tapes to have them start from scratch .
`` Where the Streets Have No Name '' was  praised by आलोचकों और became a वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी , peaking at क्रमांक तेरह in the us , क्रमांक चौदह in कनाडा , क्रमांक टेन in the  Netherlands , and number four in the United Kingdom .
The song has become one of  the बैंड 's सबसे लोकप्रिय गीतों और रै remained a स्टेपल of उनके सजीव अधिनियम चूंकि the सोंग  debuted in 1987 on The Joshua Tree Tour .
The song was notably performed on  a लॉस एंजिल्स छत लिये the फिल्मांकन of इसके म्यूज़िक वीडियो , जिससे जीती a ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन प्रदर्शन म्यूज़िक वीडियो  .Recently the song has been used by the NFL 's Baltimore Ravens as their entrance song in Super Bowl XLVII
Thomas Jeffrey `` Tom '' Hanks ( born July 9 , 1956 ) is an  अमरीकी कर्ता , निर्माता , लेखक , और निदेशक  .
Hanks is known  लिये उसके भूमिकाएँ in अपोलो 13 , बिग , कि  Thing You Do !
, The Green Mile , You 've Got Mail , Sleepless  in सिएटल , चार्ली विल्सन 's युद्ध , कैच me if तुम can , फॉरेस्ट गंप , डाल दूर , a लीग of उनके अपना , the da विंची कोड , फ़रिश्ते & राक्षसों , as खूब as एनिमेटेड films  like the Toy Story film series , The Polar Express , and The Simpsons Movie .
He has earned and been nominated for numerous awards during his career , including winning a Golden Globe for Best Actor and an Academy Award for Best Actor for his role in  फिलाडेल्फिया और a सुनहरी ग्लोब , an अकादमी पुरस्कार , a स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं गिल्ड पुरस्कार , और a लोगों 's चुनाव पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन कर्ता लिये उसके भूमिका in फॉरेस्ट गंप , और कमाई the स्टेनली kubrick  Britannia Award for Excellence in Film from the BAFTAs in 2004 .
Hanks is also  ज्ञात लिये उसके सहयोग साथ फिल्मी निदेशक स्टीवन स्पिलबर्ग on छायांकन निजी रयान और the mini-series  Band of Brothers , which launched Hanks also as a successful director , producer and writer .
As of 2012 , Hanks ' films have grossed over $ 4.2 billion at  the संयुक्त राज्य बक्सा दफ्तर अलोन , और over $ 8.5 अरब विश्वव्यापी बनाना उसे the उच्चतम all-time  box office star .
the केप is an अमरीकी सुपरहीरो  drama series .
It premiered on NBC during the 2010–2011 television season as a mid-season  बदलना शुरूआत साथ a two-hour पायलट एपीसोड on संडे , जनवरी 9 , 2011 at 9 pm पूर्वी और प्रशांत  Time .
An encore played on Monday , January 10 , with follow-up episodes  continuing on सोमवार evenings in the 9 pm timeslot शुरूआत on जनवरी 17  .
NBC  subsequently काटें the कुल क्रमांक of एपीसोड to  be aired from 13 to 10 as a result of low ratings .
On March  2 , 2011 , एनबीसी घोषित कि the श्रेणी finale होता तभी be aired on the संजाल  's website .
Halley 's  धूमकेतु or धूमकेतु हैली ( or ) , officially designated 1p/halley , is the best-known of the  short-period comets and is visible from Earth every 75–76 years .
Halley is the only short-period comet that is  clearly दृश्य to the नग्न नजर इससे धरती , और यूँ the तभी naked-eye धूमकेतु कि might appear  twice in a human lifetime .
अन्य naked-eye धूमकेतुओं may be उज्जवल और अधिक spectacular , लकिन होगा  appear only once in thousands of years .
हैली 's रिटर्न to the भीतरी सौर प्रणाली have महरूम observed और अंकित by खगोलशास्त्रियों चूंकि  at least 240 BCE .
Clear records of the comet  's दिखावे यहूद बना by चाइनीज , babylonian , और मध्यकालीन यूरोपीय chroniclers , लकिन यहूद नहीं पहचाना  as reappearances of the same object at the time .
The comet 's  periodicity थी पहला संकल्पित in 1705 by अंग्रेज़ी astronomer edmond  Halley , after whom it is now named .
Halley 's Comet last  appeared in the भीतरी सौर प्रणाली in 1986 और होगा अगला  appear in mid-2061 .
During its  1986 apparition , हैली became the पहला धूमकेतु to be observed in विवरण by spacecraft , providing the पहला observational  data on the structure of a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma and tail formation .
These observations supported a number of longstanding hypotheses about comet  निर्माण , विशेषकर फ्रेड whipple 's `` गंदा स्नोबॉल '' मॉडल , जिससे correctly पूर्वानुमानित कि हैली होता be रचित of a मिश्रण of volatile ices – ऐसे as जल , कार्बन  dioxide and ammonia – and dust .
The missions also provided data which substantially reformed and reconfigured these ideas ; for instance it is now understood that Halley 's  सतह is largely रचित of dusty , non-volatile सामग्री , और कि तभी a छोटी portion of it  is icy .
The following is  a सूची of the सबसे populous incorporated स्थान of the संयुक्त राज्य  of America .
As  पारिभाषित by the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो , an `` incorporated प्लेस ``  includes a variety of designations , including city , town , village , borough , and municipality .
A few  असाधारण जनसांख्यिकी designated स्थान ( cdps ) हैं भी शामिल in the जनसांख्यिकी  Bureau 's listing of incorporated places .
संचित city-counties represent a पृथक प्रकार of सरकारी कि शामिल  the entire population of a county , or county equivalent .
Some consolidated  city-counties , however , शामिल अनेक incorporated  places .
This list presents only that  portion ( or `` संतुलन '' ) of ऐसे संचित city-counties कि हैं नहीं a भाग of another incorporated  place .
Note that this list refers only to the population of individual municipalities within  उनके पारिभाषित हद , जिससे करता नहीं शामिल अन्य municipalities or unincorporated suburban क्षेत्रों भीतर शहरी  agglomerations .
A different ranking  is evident जब considering u.S.  metropolitan area populations .
The Mayflower was the ship that in  1620 transported 102 अंग्रेज़ी तीर्थयात्रियों , सहित a कोर समूह of separatists ,  to New England .
Their story is one of  travail और अस्तित्व in a हर्ष नई संसार  environment .
A New Zealand forward ( in white ) takes a shot  on लक्ष्य विरूद्ध कैमरून in the 2011  FIFA U-20 World Cup .
Forwards ,  भी ज्ञात as strikers , हैं the खिलाड़ी on a टोली in संघ फ़ुटबॉल जो खेल निकटतम to the opposing टोली 's  goal , and are therefore principally responsible for scoring goals .
This very advanced  स्थिति और इसके सीमित रक्षात्मक जिम्मेदारियों औसत आगे सामान्यतः स्कोर अधिक लक्ष्य  than other players .
This  स्थिति requires प्रज्ञा , गति , और शक्ति , दोनो of निष्पादन  and of thought , to perform the role well .
Modern team  formations प्रायः शामिल एक to तीन आगे ;  two is the most common .
Coaches typically field one striker who plays in an advanced position ( the  केन्द्र आगे ) , और another attacking आगे जो plays somewhat deeper और assists in बनाना लक्ष्य as खूब as स्कोरिंग ( the दूसरी  striker ) .
it चाहिए be विख्यात कि अंदर आगे develop इससे attacking  midfield positions and hence are naturally midfielders .
बार्सिलोना fc स्टार लियोनेल मेस्सी is a ठेठ attacking मिडफील्डर  seen as a forward due to his shot accuracy .
a कैलिफ़ोर्निया घरेलू साझेदारी is a विधिक संबंध उपलब्धियाँ to same-sex युगल , और to निश्चित  opposite-sex couples in which at least one party is at least 18 years of age .
It affords the couple `` the  वही अधिकारों , protections , और लाभ , और ... the वही जिम्मेदारियों  , obligations , and duties under law ... '' as married spouses .
Enacted in 1999 , the domestic  साझेदारी रजिस्ट्री थी the पहला of इसके दयालु in the  United States created by a legislature without court intervention .
Initially , domestic  partnerships enjoyed बहुत few privileges—principally बस hospital-visitation अधिकारों और the सही to be claimed  as a next of kin of the estate of a deceased partner .
The legislature has since expanded the scope of California  घरेलू partnerships to शामिल सब of the अधिकारों और जिम्मेदारियों  common to marriage .
As such , California domestic  partnerships हैं functionally समतुल्य to सिविल संघ offered in अनेक  other states .
Although  the कार्यक्रम enjoys व्यापक support in कैलिफ़ोर्निया , it रै महरूम  the source of some controversy .
Groups  opposed to the मान्यता of same-sex परिवारों  have challenged the expansion of domestic partnerships in court .
Conversely , advocates of same-sex marriage contend that  anything कम than पूरा विवाह अधिकारों विस्तारित to same-sex साझेदार is analogous to the `` पृथक लकिन बराबर '' जातिगत कानून of the  Jim Crow era .
Mark A. Jackson ( born April 1 ,  1965 ) is an अमरीकी बास्केट कोच , और पूर्व खिलाड़ी जो is the वर्तमान  head coach of the Golden State Warriors of the NBA .
A point guard from St. John 's University , he  निभाई लिये the नई यॉर्क knicks , इंडियाना पेसर्स , लॉस एंजिल्स क्लिपर्स , डेनवर टेंडर्स , टोरंटो रैपटर्स , यूटा जैज़ और ह्यूस्टन  Rockets in the NBA in a career spanning from 1987 to 2004 .
Jackson has also worked as a commentator for  ईएसपीएन और एबीसी alongside उसके पूर्व कोच जेफ़ वैन gundy और play-by-play man माइक  Breen .
He was previously an NBA  विश्लेषक लिये the यस संजाल 's नई जर्सी  Nets games .
South Africa has eleven official languages : Afrikaans ,  अंग्रेज़ी , ndebele , उत्तरी sotho , sotho , swazi , tswana , सोंगा , venda  , Xhosa and Zulu .
Fewer than two percent of  दक्षिण africans बोलो a पहला भाषा  other than an official one .
सबसे दक्षिण africans can बोलो  more than one language .
Dutch and English were the  पहला आधिकारिक भाषाएं of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी इससे  1910 to 1925 .
अफ्रीकी थी added as a भाग of डच  in 1925 .
Dutch was replaced by Afrikaans when South Africa became a republic  in 1961 , और डच थी dropped in 1983 , so between 1983 और 1994 , दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी था दो आधिकारिक भाषाएं :  English and Afrikaans .
The English version of the South African constitution refers to the languages by  the names in those भाषाएं : isizulu , isixhosa , अफ्रीकी , sepedi ( referring to उत्तरी sotho ) , setswana , अंग्रेज़ी  , Sesotho ( referring to Southern Sotho ) , Xitsonga , Siswati , Tshivenda and isiNdebele ( referring to Southern Ndebele ) .
In South Africa , Southern Ndebele is known  बस as ndebele , as सबसे अध्यक्षों of उत्तरी ndebele  live in Zimbabwe .
The 1993 version of the Constitution  referred to उत्तरी sotho as sesotho sa leboa , लकिन the 1996 संस्करण referred to the  language as Sepedi .
Different government  विभाग और आधिकारिक लाशें उपयोग अलग शर्तें to denote उत्तरी  Sotho .
The  प्रमुख भाषा of सरकारी is अंग्रेज़ी भी if दक्षिण africans प्रायः  take pride in using indigenous languages for any purpose .
Afrikaans also features prominently  in कॉमर्स साथ साथ अंग्रेज़ी as the भाषाएं साथ the उच्चतम क्रमांक  of fluent speakers are Afrikaans and English .
In terms of linguistic classification ,  the आधिकारिक भाषाएं शामिल दो west-germanic भाषाएं ( अंग्रेज़ी और अफ्रीकी ) और नौ bantu  languages .
Four of these are Nguni languages ( Zulu , Xhosa , Swati and Ndebele ) and three are  sotho–tswana भाषाएं ( उत्तरी sotho , दक्षिणी sotho और tswana  ) .
सोंगा is a tswa–ronga भाषा  .
दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी चिह्न भाषा is a पृथक हालांकि incompletely उभरा नेशनल मानक भाषा जिससे  also subsumes a cluster of semi-standardised dialects .
Aluminium nitrate is a salt of aluminium and  नाइट्रिक एसिड , मौजूदा सामान्यतः as a crystalline हाइड्रेट , सबसे commonly as एल्युमिनियम  nitrate nonahydrate , Al ( NO3 ) 3·9H2O .
The New York Jets are a  पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल टोली headquartered in florham पार्क , नई जर्सी , representing  the New York metropolitan area .
The team  is a सदस्य of the पूर्वी प्रभाग of the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc  ) in the National Football League ( NFL ) .
In a unique arrangement for the league , the  jets share metlife स्टेडियम in ईस्ट रदरफोर्ड , नई जर्सी साथ the नई  York Giants .
The franchise is legally  और corporately पंजीकृत as नई यॉर्क jets , llc  .
The team was founded in 1959 as the Titans of New York , an  असली सदस्य of the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल लीग ; बाद , the मताधिकार joined the एनएफएल in  the AFL–NFL merger .
The team began  to खेल in 1960 at the पोलो grounds  .
Under new  स्वामित्व , the वर्तमान नाम थी अपनाया in 1963 और the मताधिकार थी relocated to shea स्टेडियम in  1964 and then to the Meadowlands Sports Complex in 1984 .
The Jets advanced to the playoffs for the first time in 1968 and went on to compete  in सुपर कटोरी iii जहाँ वे पराजित the बाल्टीमोर कोल्टस , बनने the पहला afl टोली to शिकस्त an एनएफएल क्लबों  in an AFL-NFL World Championship Game .
Since 1968 , the Jets have appeared in the playoffs thirteen  टाइम्स , और in the afc चैंपियनशिप खेल चार टाइम्स , सबसे recently खोने to the पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स  in 2010 .
However , the Jets have never returned to the  सुपर कटोरी , बनाना उन्हें एक of तीन एनएफएल टीमों to जीत उनके लोन सुपर कटोरी रूप , साथ साथ the नई ऑरलियन्स  Saints and Tampa Bay Buccaneers .
The team 's training facility , Atlantic Health Jets  प्रशिक्षण बीच , जिससे खोली in 2008 , is स्तिथ in florham पार्क  .
The team currently holds their annual training camp sessions on the campus of the  राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों of नई यॉर्क at cortland in cortland , नई यॉर्क जबकि पकड़कर occasional  sessions at the Florham Park complex .
psilocybe semilanceata
Psilocybin mushrooms , also known as psychedelic  मशरूम , हैं fungi कि contain psychoactive indole alkaloids  .
There are multiple  colloquial शर्तें लिये psilocybin मशरूम , the  most common being shrooms and magic mushrooms .
Biological genera containing psilocybin mushrooms include Agrocybe ,  conocybe , copelandia , galerina , gerronema , gymnopilus , hypholoma , inocybe , mycena , panaeolus  , Pluteus , and Psilocybe .
There are approximately 190  प्रजाति of psilocybin मशरूम और सबसे  of them fall in the genus Psilocybe .
Psilocybin mushrooms have likely  महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्रागैतिहासिक टाइम्स और may have  been depicted in rock art .
Many cultures have  प्रयुक्त ये मशरूम in धार्मिक संस्कार  .
In  आधुनिक पश्चिमी समाज वे हैं प्रयुक्त  recreationally for their psychedelic effects .
Recent studies done at Imperial College London and Johns Hopkins School of  आयुर्विज्ञान conclude कि जब प्रयुक्त properly , psilocybin अधिनियमों as an anti-depressant as सुझाया  by fMRI brain scans .
Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States , situated in the northwest extremity of the North  अमरीकी महाद्वीप , साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary साथ कनाडा to the ईस्ट , the आर्कटिक समंदर to the उत्तर , और the प्रशांत समंदर to the वेस्ट और दक्षिण , साथ रूस further  west across the Bering Strait .
Alaska is the  largest राज्य in the संयुक्त राज्य by क्षेत्रफल , the 4th तनिक populous  and the least densely populated of the 50 United States .
लगभग हाफ of अलास्का 's 731,449 निवासियों सजीव भीतर  the Anchorage metropolitan area .
Alaska 's economy is  वर्चस्व by the आयल , प्राकृतिक गैस , और फ़िशिंग उद्योग  ; it has these resources in abundance .
Alaska was purchased from Russia on  कूच 30 , 1867 , लिये $ 7.2 लाख ( $ समायोजित लिये महंगाई ) at लगभग  two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ) .
The land went through several administrative changes before becoming an organized  ( or incorporated ) territory on may 11 , 1912 , और the 49th राज्य of the u.S. on जनवरी 3 ,  1959 .
The name `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced in  the रूसी औपनिवेशिक काल , जब it थी प्रयुक्त तभी लिये the प्रायद्वीप और is निकला इससे the aleut alaxsxaq , अर्थ `` the मेनलैंड '' or , अधिक वस्तुतः , `` the ऑब्जेक्ट towards जिससे  the action of the sea is directed '' .
It is also known as Alyeska , the ``  ग्रेट जमीन '' , an aleut शब्द निकला इससे the वही  root .
The 101 French  विभाग हैं विभाजित into 342 arrondissements , जिससे may be अनूदित  into English as districts .
the पूंजी of an arrondissement/district  is called a subprefecture .
When an arrondissement contains the prefecture ( capital ) of the department ,  कि प्रीफ़ेक्चर is the पूंजी of the arrondissement , एक्टिंग दोनो as  a prefecture and as a subprefecture .
Arrondissements are further  विभाजित into cantons और communes .
The vagina ( from Latin  vāgīna , वस्तुतः `` म्यान '' or `` म्यान `` ) is a tubular ट्रैक्ट जिससे is a sex अंग और रै  two main functions ; sexual intercourse and childbirth .
In humans , this passage leads from the opening of the  भग to the गर्भाशय ( गर्भ ) , लकिन the vaginal ट्रैक्ट ends at  the cervix .
Unlike  मेन , जो have तभी एक genital orifice , महिलाओं have दो , the urethra  and the vagina .
The vaginal opening is  much larger than the urethral खोलने , और दोनो उद्घाटन  are protected by the labia .
The inner mould of  the योनि रै a foldy बनावट जिससे can बनाएँ  friction for the penis during intercourse .
During arousal , the vagina gets  नम to सुकर the प्रवेश of the  penis .
The Latinate  बहुवचन `` vaginae '' is rarely प्रयुक्त in अंग्रेज़ी  .
Colloquially , the word  योनि is प्रायः प्रयुक्त to refer to the भग or to the मादा गुप्तांग  in general .
however , by इसके शब्दकोष और anatomical परिभाषाएं , योनि refers  exclusively to the specific internal structure .
The Cincinnati Reds are a  प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल टोली आधारित in सिनसिनाटी  , Ohio .
They are  सदस्यों of the नेशनल लीग सेंट्रल  Division .
Established in 1881 as an independent club , the team became a charter  सदस्य of the अमरीकी संघ in 1882 , और joined the नेशनल लीग  in 1890 .
The club  traditionally traces इसके उत्पत्ति to बेसबॉल 's  first openly professional team in 1869 .
the लाल have जीती पाँच संसार श्रेणी शीर्षक , एक अमरीकी संघ  pennant , nine National League pennants and ten division titles .
The Reds played in the National League West  between 1969 और 1993 और have महरूम in the नेशनल लीग सेंट्रल  since 1994 .
Since 2003 , the  लाल have निभाई at ग्रेट अमरीकी बॉल पार्क , निर्मित अगला  to their home from 1970 to 2002 , Riverfront Stadium .
Bob Castellini  रै स्वामित्व the सिनसिनाटी लाल  since 2006 .
A  शरारत बदबू बमबारी  .
A stink bomb is a  यंत्र designed to  create an unpleasant smell .
They range  in प्रभावकारिता इससे सरल pranks to सैन्य ग्रेड malodorants  or riot control chemical agents .
the गिनीज किताब of रिकॉर्ड सूचियाँ  two smelliest substances .
One is `` US Government  मानक बाथरूम malodor '' ; a मिश्रण of आठ रसायन साथ a stench resembling इंसान मल  , only much stronger , designed to test the efficacy of deodorizers and air fresheners .
another एक , `` जो me ? `` , is a मिश्रण of पाँच sulfur-containing रसायन और खुश्बू  like rotting food and carcasses .
the कहावत `` a चित्र is लायक a हजार शब्द '' refers to the ख़्याल कि  a complex idea can be conveyed with just a single still image .
It also aptly characterizes  एक of the प्रमुख लक्ष्य of कल्पना , namely बनाना  it possible to absorb large amounts of data quickly .
The expression  `` उपयोग a चित्र  .
It 's worth a thousand  शब्द . '' appears in a 1911 समाचारपत्र आलेख quoting समाचारपत्र एडिटर आर्थर ब्रिसबेन discussing पत्रकारिता और publicity  .
1913 समाचारपत्र विज्ञापन
A similar phrase , `` One Look Is Worth A  हजार शब्द '' , appears in a 1913 समाचारपत्र विज्ञापन लिये the piqua स्वचालित सप्लाई  House of Piqua , Ohio .
An early use of the exact phrase appears in an  1918 समाचारपत्र विज्ञापन लिये the सैन अंतोनियो लाइट जिससे says : एक of the स्वदेश 's महानतम सम्पादक says : एक चित्र is लायक  a Thousand Words The San Antonio Light 's Pictorial Magazine of the War Exemplifies the truth of the above statement -- judging from the warm reception it has received at the hands of the Sunday Light readers .
It is believed by some that the modern use of the  phrase तना इससे an आलेख by फ्रेड R. बर्नार्ड in the विज्ञापन व्यापार जर्नल मुद्रक ' स्याही , promoting the उपयोग of बिंब in  advertisements that appeared on the sides of streetcars .
The December 8 , 1921  समस्या carries an ad हकदार , `` एक dekh is लायक a हजार  Words . ''
Another ad by Barnard appears  in the कूच 10 , 1927 समस्या साथ the phrase `` एक चित्र लायक टेन हजार शब्द , '' जहाँ it is labeled a चाइनीज  proverb ( 一圖勝萬言 ) .
The Home Book of  proverbs , maxims , और परिचित वाक्यांश उद्धरण बर्नार्ड as saying he पुकारा it `` a  Chinese proverb , so that people would take it seriously . ''
Soon after , the  कहावत होता become popularly attributed  to Confucius .
The discussion of `` One Picture Worth Thousand Words '' versus `` One Picture  लायक टेन हजार शब्द '' wan येन i hua और 10.000 मील लायक 10.000 किताबे is cited  in Information graphics where the concept of many in different disciplines and cultures .
A  चित्र is लायक a हजार  words
despite इस आधुनिक उत्पत्ति of the लोकप्रिय phrase , the भावना  has been expressed by earlier writers .
लिये उदाहरण the रूसी लेखक इवान तुर्गेन्येव लिखा ( in fathers और बेटे  in 1862 ) , `` A picture shows me at a glance what it takes dozens of pages of a book to expound . ''
Computer programmer and  लेखक फ्रेड ब्रूक्स makes an विपरीत बयान regarding प्रोग्रामिंग in the mythical man-month : `` दिखाएँ me अपना flowcharts और  conceal your tables , and I shall continue to be mystified .
Show me your  टेबल , और i won’t प्रायः need अपना flowcharts ; they’ll  be obvious . ''
The phrase has also been spoofed  by जॉन मैकार्थी , the प्रसिद्ध कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक , to मेक the विपरीत पाइंट  : `` As the Chinese say , 1001 words is worth more than a picture . ''
A  ऋतु is a subdivision of the साल , चिह्नित by परिवर्तन in मौसम  , ecology , and hours of daylight .
Seasons result from the yearly revolution  of the धरती around the सूर्य और the झुकाव of the धरती 's अक्ष सापेक्ष to the  plane of revolution .
In temperate and polar regions , the seasons are marked by changes in the intensity of sunlight that reaches the Earth  's सतह , विसंगतियाँ of जिससे may कारण पशु to go into शीतनिष्क्रियता or to migrate , और पौधे to be dormant  .
During  may , जून और जुलाई , the उत्तरी गोलार्ध is उजागर to अधिक सीधा धूप क्युकी  the hemisphere faces the sun .
The  वही is सच्चा of the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध in नवम्बर  , December and January .
It is the tilt of the Earth that causes the Sun to  be उच्चतर in the आसमान दौरान the गर्मियाँ महीने जिससे increases the सौर फ्लक्स  .
However , due to seasonal  lag , जून , जुलाई और अगस्त हैं the hottest महीने in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध और दिसम्बर , जनवरी और फ़रवरी  are the hottest months in the southern hemisphere .
In temperate and subpolar regions , generally four calendar -based seasons ( with their  adjectives ) हैं पहचाना : वसन्त ( vernal ) , गर्मियाँ ( estival ) , पतझड़ ( autumnal ) और शीत ( hibernal ) .
However , ecologists mostly use a six season model for temperate climate  regions कि शामिल pre-spring ( prevernal ) और लेट गर्मियाँ ( serotinal ) as पृथक सीज़न  along with the traditional four .
Hot regions have two or three seasons ; the rainy ( or wet , or monsoon )  ऋतु और the शुष्क ऋतु , और in कुछ तीव्र क्षेत्रों , a कूल or mild  season .
In some parts of the  संसार , खास `` सीज़न '' हैं loosely पारिभाषित आधारित on महत्वपूर्ण कार्यक्रम ऐसे as a hurricane  season , tornado season or a wildfire season .
The six  ecological सीज़न
The four calendar seasons ,  चित्रित in an प्राचीन रोमन मोज़ेक इससे ट्यूनीशिया
डच निर्यात  in 2006
At the time of writing the  नीदरलैंड्स is the 17th largest अर्थव्यवस्था of the  world .
( see :  सूची of देशों by जीडीपी ( नाममात्र  ) )
GDP per capita is roughly $ 42,000 which puts it in  the शीर्ष 10 of richest राष्ट्र in the संसार ( देखिए : सूची of देशों by जीडीपी ( ppp  ) per capita ) .
Between 1996 and 2000  सालाना आर्थिक विकास ( जीडीपी ) averaged over 4 % , खूब ऊपर  the European average .
Growth slowed  considerably in 2001-05 as भाग of the वैश्विक  economic slowdown .
2006 and 2007 however  दिखाया आर्थिक विकास of 3.4 % और 3.9  % .
The Dutch economy was hit  considerably by the जारी वैश्विक वित्तीय संकट और the ensuing यूरोपीय  debt crisis .
Several banks  गई दिवालिया , और a क्रमांक of अन्य था  to receive governmental aid .
In 2009 the economy  अस्वीकृत साथ 3.5 % , followed by दो सालो of mild विकास  .
The Dutch economy is  फिलहाल in a मंदी again , साथ an आर्थिक मनाही of 0.5 % in 2012  .
Inflation  is at 3.2 % in फ़रवरी 2013 .
Unemployment has  महरूम अपेक्षाकृत कम compared to अन्य eu राष्ट्र लिये दशकों लकिन बाद mid-2012 it रै  seen a fast increase and in February 2013 it has hit 7.7 % .
the नीदरलैंड्स प्रबंधित to maintain इसके aaa  rating at least until March 2013 according to the three major credit rating agencies .
historically , the डच introduced और invented the भण्डार मार्केट by the merchandise व्यापार  through Dutch West India Company .
The Netherlands is a  founding सदस्य of the यूरोपीय संघ , the oecd और  the World Trade Organization .
Loyal to the  खेल is the दसवाँ स्टुडियो एल्बम और छठे स्टुडियो  album by Tupac Shakur .
It contains remixes of previously  unreleased म्यूज़िक अंकित by shakur पहले उसके मौत in  1996 .
Released  in the संयुक्त राज्य on दिसम्बर 14 , 2004 ( दिसम्बर 12 in the संयुक्त किंगडम  ) , Loyal to the Game was produced by Eminem .
The original panel of The  दृश्य ; मेरेडिथ vieira , स्टार जोन्स , डिब्बी matenopoulos  and Barbara Walters in 1997 .
The View  is an अमरीकी बात दिखाएँ ब्रॉडकास्ट on एबीसी कि debuted in 1997 as भाग  of the network 's daytime programming block .
Created by Barbara  walters और विधेयक geddie , जो दोनो भी serve as the दिखाएँ 's कार्यपालिका निर्माता  , the program features a panel of women as co-hosts .
Along with Walters , the  वर्तमान फलक शामिल whoopi गोल्डबर्ग , जो serves as the मॉडरेटर , आनन्द  Behar , Elisabeth Hasselbeck , and Sherri Shepherd .
International versions of the  कार्यक्रम हैं aired in अनेक देशों  .
As of the 2012–13 season , its 16th , The View is the  fourth-longest कार्यशील नेशनल दिन बात दिखाएँ in इतिहास , पीछे the फिल donahue दिखाएँ ( 29 ) , the variously-named  Live !
कार्यक्रम ( 25 ) , और the  Oprah Winfrey Show ( 25 ) .
Prunus virginiana , commonly called  bitter-berry , chokecherry , वर्जिनिया बर्ड चेरी और पश्चिमी chokecherry ( भी ब्लैक chokecherry लिये P. virginiana var . demissa ) , is a प्रजाति of बर्ड चेरी ( prunus subgenus  Padus ) native to North America ; the natural historic range of P. virginiana includes most of the continent , except for the far north and far south .
Los Angeles International Airport is the primary  विमानक्षेत्र सेवारत the वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल , the second-most आबादी  metropolitan area in the United States .
It is most often referred to by its  iata विमानक्षेत्र कोड lax , साथ the अक्षर सुनाया  individually .
lax is स्तिथ in southwestern लॉस एंजिल्स साथ the प्रशांत coast in the पड़ोस of westchester , इससे the शहर कोर और is the प्राथमिक विमानक्षेत्र of लॉस एंजिल्स संसार एयरपोर्ट ( lawa ) , an एजेंसी of  the Los Angeles city government formerly known as the Department of Airports .
In 2011 , LAX was the sixth busiest airport in the world  बाद hartsfield-jackson अटलांटा अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र , बीजिंग पूंजी अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र , लंदन हीथ्रो  Airport , Chicago O'Hare International Airport , and Tokyo Haneda International Airport with 61,862,052 passengers .
The airport holds the claim for `` the world 's busiest  उत्पत्ति और गंतव्य ( o & d ) विमानक्षेत्र '' in 2011 कि involves non-connecting यात्री ट्रैफ़िक .
It is also the only  विमानक्षेत्र to रैंक among the शीर्ष पाँच  U.S. airports for both passenger and cargo traffic .
LAX is the busiest airport in the Greater Los Angeles Area , but other  एयरपोर्ट सहित bob आशा विमानक्षेत्र , जॉन वेन विमानक्षेत्र , long बीच विमानक्षेत्र , la/ontario अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र , और ताड़ स्रोतों अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र  also serve the region .
LAX is also the  व्यस्ततम विमानक्षेत्र in कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the वेस्ट coast of the संयुक्त राज्य in शर्तें of उड़ान परिचालन , यात्री ट्रैफ़िक और एयर कार्गो कार्यकलाप  , leading it to be referred to as the `` Gateway to the Pacific Rim `` .
Peyton Williams Manning ( born March 24 , 1976 ) is an American  फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक लिये the डेनवर broncos of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल  ) .
He  निभाई लिये the इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस लिये 14 सीज़न  from 1998 to 2011 .
He is the son of former NFL quarterback  आर्ची मैनिंग और an elder bhai of नई यॉर्क दिग्गज क्वार्टरबैक  Eli Manning .
Manning played college  फ़ुटबॉल लिये the विश्वविद्यालयों of टेनेसी , अग्रणी the स्वयंसेवक to the 1997 सेक चैंपियनशिप  in his senior season .
However , No . 3 Tennessee lost to the No . 2 Nebraska Cornhuskers 42-17 in  the नारंगी कटोरी giving नेब्रास्का और tom ओसबोर्न उनके 3rd नेशनल चैंपियनशिप  in 4 years .
He was chosen by the  इंडियानापोलिस कोल्टस साथ the पहला overall चुनें in the 1998 एनएफएल  Draft .
From 1998 to 2010 , he led the Colts to eight ( seven AFC South and one AFC  ईस्ट ) प्रभाग championships , दो afc championships , और to a सुपर कटोरी  championship ( Super Bowl XLI ) .
He has won a  रिकार्ड चार लीग सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी पुरस्कार , थी the सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी of सुपर कटोरी xli , रै महरूम नामित to बारह प्रो प्याले , रै  twelve 4,000-yard passing seasons , and is the Indianapolis Colts ' all-time leader in passing yards ( 54,828 ) and touchdown passes ( 399 ) .
In 2009 , he was named the best player in the NFL  और फॉक्स खेल साथ साथ खेल illustrated नामित उसे the एनएफएल खिलाड़ी  of the decade of the 2000s .
In May 2011 , he  underwent गर्दन सर्जरी to alleviate गर्दन पीड़ा और भुजा कमज़ोरी he dealt साथ दौरान the पिछला few सीज़न पहले हस्ताक्षर a five-year , $ 90  million contract extension with the Colts in July 2011 .
Manning had hoped to play in the 2011 season , but in September  2011 , he underwent a much अधिक गंभीर दूसरी सर्जरी : a स्तर एक सर्वाइकल संलयन  procedure .
Manning had never missed an NFL game in  उसके करियर , लकिन थी मजबूर to मिस the संपूर्ण 2011 ऋतु  .
he थी released by the कोल्टस on कूच 7 , 2012 , और बाद an लगभग two-week काल जहाँ he visited  with and worked out for several NFL teams , he signed with the Denver Broncos on March 20 , 2012 .
Manning 's pre-snap routine has earned him the nickname , `` The Sheriff  '' और is एक of the सबसे recognizable और parodied in the एनएफएल .
The Indianapolis Colts ' almost exclusive use of the  hurry-up ठोकर led to मैनिंग using an सरणी of इशारों और मौखिक कमांड to कॉल the खेल at the लकीर  of scrimmage rather than in the huddle .
The America Tower of the  अमरीकी सामान्य बीच , the मुख्यालय  of Baker Hughes
Baker Hughes is one  of the संसार 's largest oilfield  services companies .
It operates in over 90 countries ,  providing the आयल और गैस उद्योग साथ उत्पाद और सेवाएं लिये खुदाई , गठन मूल्यांकन , पूर्णता , उत्पादन और  reservoir consulting .
Baker Hughes has its  मुख्यालय in the अमेरिका मीनार in the अमरीकी सामान्य  Center in Neartown , Houston .
Baker Hughes Incorporated  थी formed जब बेकर अंतरराष्ट्रीय और ह्यूजेस औजार कम्पनी मिलाया in 1987  .
Baker Hughes operates worldwide with major offices in Liverpool , United  किंगडम ; सिंगापुर ; दुबई ; a शोध और मेंटेनेंस सुविधा in celle , जर्मनी ; lafayette , louisiana ; ह्यूस्टन , टेक्सास ; pescara , इटली ; और  Kuala Lumpur , Malaysia .
The company is administered broadly in two hemispheres : the eastern hemisphere with five regions ( Europe ,  अफ़्रीकी , the मध्य ईस्ट , एशिया प्रशांत और russia/caspian ) और the पश्चिमी गोलार्ध साथ चार regions ( कनाडा , us जमीन , us गल्फ , और  Latin America ) .
Each of these  regions is subdivided into बाज़ार  .
The United States one-  cent सिक्का , commonly ज्ञात as a पैनी , is a ईकाई of करेंसी equaling  one one-hundredth of a United States dollar .
The cent 's  प्रतीक is ¢  .
Its obverse has featured  the प्रोफ़ाइल of अध्यक्ष अब्राहम lincoln चूंकि 1909 , the  centennial of his birth .
From 1959 ( the sesquicentennial  of lincoln 's जनम ) to 2008 , the रिवर्स प्रदर्शित  the Lincoln Memorial .
Four different  रिवर्स डिजाइन in 2009 सम्मानित lincoln 's 200th जन्मदिवस और a नई  , permanent reverse – the Union Shield – was introduced in 2010 .
The coin is 0.75 inches ( 19.05 mm  ) in व्यास और 0.061 इंच ( 1.55 mm ) in  thickness .
The U.S. Mint  's आधिकारिक नाम लिये a पैनी is `` '' और the u.S. राजकोष 's आधिकारिक नाम  is `` one cent piece '' .
The colloquial term penny derives from the British coin of  the वही नाम , the pre-decimal संस्करण of जिससे था a समान मान  .
in अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी , कौड़ी is the बहुवचन रूप , अन्य बहुवचन फ़ॉर्म पेंस और पेशाब ( मानक उपयोग in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी  ) are not used .
As of 2012 , it costs the U.S. Mint 2.00  सेंट to मेक a cent क्युकी of the लागत of सामग्री और उत्पादन  .
This figure includes the Mint’s fixed  components लिये वितरण और fabrication , अनुमानित at  $ 13 million in FY 2011 .
It also  शामिल मिंट ओवरहेड आबंटित to the पैनी , जिससे थी  $ 17.7 million for 2011 .
Fixed costs and overhead would have  to be अवशोषित by अन्य circulating सिक्के बगैर the पैनी  .
The loss in profitability due to producing the one cent coin  in the संयुक्त राज्य लिये the साल of 2012 थी $ 58,000,000  .
This was a slight decrease from 2011  , the साल पहले , जिससे था a उत्पादन घाटा of $ 60,200,000  .
or more specifically , are ornamental varieties of domesticated  आम कार्प ( cyprinus carpio ) कि हैं रखा लिये सजावटी उद्देश्य in बाहरी कोई  ponds or water gardens .
Koi varieties are  विशिष्ट by coloration , patterning , और scalation  .
कुछ of the प्रमुख रंगों हैं श्वेत , ब्लैक , रेड  , yellow , blue , and cream .
The  सबसे लोकप्रिय श्रेणी of कोई is the gosanke , जिससे is बना up of  the Kohaku , Taisho Sanshoku , and Showa Sanshoku varieties .
The American Federation of Government Employees ( AFGE ) is an American labor union representing over 650,000 employees of the  संघीय सरकारी , परिचय 5,000 कर्मचारी of the ज़िला of कोलंबिया , और a few सौ निजी सेक्टर कर्मचारी , ज़्यादातर in और around संघीय सुविधाएं  .
AFGE is the largest union for  civilian , non- डाक संघीय कर्मचारी और the largest संघ लिये ज़िला of कोलंबिया कर्मचारी जो रपट सीधे  to the mayor ( i.e. , outside of D.C. public schools ) .
It is  संबद्ध साथ the afl-cio  .
