The evolution of plants has  resulted in increasing स्तर of जटिलता , इससे  the earliest algal mats , through bryophytes , lycopods , ferns to the complex gymnosperms and angiosperms of today .
जबकि अनेक of the समूह जिससे appeared पहले continue to thrive , विशेषकर in the environments in जिससे वे विकसित , लिये a  time each new grade of organisation became more `` successful '' than its predecessors .
In the  ordovician काल , around , the  first land plants appeared .
These began to  diversify in the लेट सिल्यूरियन काल , around , और the परिणाम of उनके diversification  are displayed in remarkable detail in an early Devonian fossil assemblage from the Rhynie chert .
This  chert preserved जल्दी पौधे in सेल्यूलर विवरण , petrified  in volcanic springs .
By the middle of the Devonian Period , most of the features recognised in plants today are present  , सहित जड़ें , पत्ते और द्वितीयक लकडी ; और , by लेट devonian टाइम्स , बीज  had evolved .
Late  devonian पौधे था thereby पहुँचे a उपाधि of परिष्कार  that allowed them to form forests of tall trees .
Evolutionary  नवीनता जारी into the carboniferous काल  and is still ongoing today .
Most plant groups were relatively unscathed by the Permo-Triassic extinction event ,  हालांकि the structures of समुदायों बदला  .
This may have set the scene for the appearance of the flowering  पौधे in the triassic ( ~ ) , और उनके बाद diversification in the cretaceous और paleogene  .
The latest major group of plants to evolve  यहूद the grasses , जिससे became महत्वपूर्ण in the mid-paleogene , इससे around  .
The grasses , as well as many other  समूह , विकसित नई mechanisms of चयापचय to जीवित the कम और गरम ,  dry conditions of the tropics over the last .
The winning  सुपर कटोरी टोली receives the विंस  Lombardi Trophy .
The Super Bowl is an annual American  फ़ुटबॉल खेल कि determines the चैंपियन of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल  ) .
The contest is held  in an अमरीकी नगर कि is चुनी तीन to चार सालो beforehand , प्रायः  in warm-weather or domed sites .
Since 1971 , the  विजेता of the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) चैंपियनशिप खेल रै faced the विजेता of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) चैंपियनशिप खेल in the culmination  of the NFL playoffs .
Before the 1970 merger  between the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( afl ) और the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल  League ( NFL ) , the two leagues met in four such contests .
The first two were known as the ``  afl-nfl संसार चैंपियनशिप खेल .  ''
Super Bowl III in 1969 was the first such game  कि carried the `` सुपर कटोरी '' moniker , the names `` सुपर कटोरी i `` और `` सुपर कटोरी ii `` यहूद retroactively  applied to the first two games .
The NFC /NFL leads in Super Bowl wins with  25 , जबकि the afc /afL रै जीती 22  .
Eighteen different  franchises , सहित टीमों कि relocated to another नगर , have जीती the सुपर कटोरी  .
The Pittsburgh Steelers have won the  सबसे सुपर प्याले साथ छह championships ( रिकार्ड 6–2 ) , जबकि दोनो the डलास cowboys और सैन फ्रांसिस्को 49ers have पाँच विन्स प्रत्येक ( cowboys 5–3 ; 49ers  5–1 ) .
Dallas and Pittsburgh have the most Super  कटोरी दिखावे साथ आठ , जबकि the भैंस बिल्स have the सबसे लगातार  appearances with four losses in a row from 1990 to 1993 .
The New England Patriots , Denver  broncos और मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स have भी खोया a रिकार्ड चार सुपर  Bowls .
Buffalo and  मिनेसोटा हैं दोनो 0–4 , डेनवर is 2–4 और  New England is 3–4 .
The record for consecutive wins is two and is shared by seven franchises : the 1966-67 Green Bay Packers , the 1972-73  मियामी डॉल्फिन , the 1974-75 और 1978-79 पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स ( the तभी टोली to accomplish इस feat twice ) , the 1988-89 सैन फ्रांसिस्को 49ers , the 1992-93 डलास cowboys , the 1997-98 डेनवर  Broncos , and the 2003-04 New England Patriots .
The only team with multiple Super Bowl appearances and no losses is the Baltimore  ravens , जो in जीतना सुपर कटोरी xlvii unseated और replaced the 49ers in कि स्थिति  .
Four current NFL teams have never appeared in a Super Bowl , including  मताधिकार relocations और renaming : the क्लीवलैंड भूरा , डेट्रॉयट शेर , jacksonville jaguars , और ह्यूस्टन texans , हालांकि दोनो the भूरा  and Lions had won NFL Championship games prior to the creation of the Super Bowl .
Martin County is a  काउंटी स्तिथ in the u.S. राज्य  of Texas .
As of the  2010 जनसांख्यिकी , इसके जनसांख्यिकी थी  4,799 .
Its  सीट is stanton  .
The county is  नामित लिये wylie मार्टिन , an जल्दी settler  .
Martin County is one of 30  निषेध , or entirely शुष्क , काउंटी in  the state of Texas .
Alkaline phosphatase ( ALP , ALKP ) ( ) is a  hydrolase एंजाइम जिम्मेदार लिये निकालना फास्फेट समूह इससे अनेक  types of molecules , including nucleotides , proteins , and alkaloids .
The process of removing the  फास्फेट समूह is पुकारा dephosphorylation  .
As the name suggests ,  क्षारीय phosphatases हैं सबसे प्रभावी in  an alkaline environment .
It  is sometimes प्रयुक्त synonymously as मौलिक  phosphatase .
Triticale ( ×  triticosecale ) , ( ) is a संकर of गेहूं (  Triticum ) and rye ( Secale ) first bred in laboratories during the late 19th century .
The grain  थी originally करवाया in स्कॉटलैंड  and Sweden .
Commercially available triticale is almost  सदा a दूसरी पीढी संकर , i.e. , a क्रॉस between दो kinds of प्राथमिक ( पहला क्रॉस ) triticales  .
As a rule , triticale combines the yield potential and grain quality of wheat with the  बीमारी और पर्यावरणीय सहिष्णुता ( सहित मृदा शर्तें  ) of rye .
तभी recently रै it महरूम विकसित into a commercially  viable crop .
Depending on the  cultivar , triticale can अधिक or कम resemble either  of its parents .
it is grown ज़्यादातर लिये forage or चारा , हालांकि कुछ triticale-based भोजन can be खरीदा at स्वास्थ्य  food stores or are to be found in some breakfast cereals .
When crossing wheat and rye , wheat is used as the female  जनक और rye as the पुरूष जनक ( पराग दाता  ) .
The resulting  संकर is बंध्य , और जरूर be treated साथ colchicine to induce polyploidy और यूँ the क्षमता  to reproduce itself .
The primary producers of triticale are  कैंडल , जर्मनी , फ़्रांस , बेलारूस और ऑस्ट्रेलिया  .
In 2009 ,  according to the खाना और कृषि संगठन ( fao ) , 15.0 लाख टन यहूद harvested in 29 देशों  across the world .
the triticale संकरण हैं सब amphidiploid , जिससे अर्थात् the संयंत्र is द्विगुणित लिये दो  genomes derived from different species .
In other  शब्द , triticale is an allotetraploid  .
In earlier years  , सबसे कार्य थी किया on octoploid  triticale .
Different  ploidy स्तर have महरूम निर्मित  and evaluated over time .
The tetraploids showed little promise , but  hexaploid triticale थी कामयाब पर्याप्त to ढूँढें वाणिज्यिक अनुप्रयोग  .
The CIMMYT triticale  सुधार कार्यक्रम चाही to improve खाना उत्पादन और पोषण  in developing countries .
Triticale has  संभावित in the उत्पादन of ब्रैड और अन्य खाना उत्पाद , ऐसे as कुकीज़  , pasta , pizza dough and breakfast cereals .
The protein  सामग्री is उच्चतर than कि of गेहूं , हालांकि the  glutenin fraction is less .
The  अनाज रै भी महरूम stated to have उच्चतर स्तर  of lysine than wheat .
Assuming increased acceptance , the milling industry will have to adapt to triticale ,  as the मिलिंग तकनीकों employed लिये गेहूं हैं मुलम्मा to triticale  .
Sell et al  . मिला triticale could be प्रयुक्त as a फीड अनाज , और बाद शोध मिला  its starch was particularly readily digested .
As a feed  अनाज , triticale is already खूब  established and of high economic importance .
It has received attention as a potential energy  क्रॉप , और शोध is फिलहाल होने conducted on the उपयोग of the क्रॉप 's बायोमास in bioethanol उत्पादन  .
``  कश , the जादू ड्रैगन '' is a सोंग लिखा by लियोनार्ड lipton और पीटर yarrow , और  made popular by Yarrow 's group Peter , Paul and Mary in a 1963 recording .
The  सोंग हासिल ग्रेट लोकप्रियता  .
A college football national  चैंपियनशिप in the उच्चतम स्तर of कॉलेजिएट खेल in the संयुक्त राज्य , फिलहाल the नेशनल कॉलेजिएट एथलेटिक संघ ( ncaa ) प्रभाग i फ़ुटबॉल कटोरी subdivision ( fbs ) , is a नामांकन awarded annually  by various third-party organizations to their selection ( s ) of the best college football team ( s ) .
Division I FBS ( formerly Division I-A )  फ़ुटबॉल is the तभी ncaa खेल in जिससे a वार्षिक चैंपियन is नहीं संकल्पित by an ncaa  sanctioned championship event .
Because the  चैंपियनशिप टोली is नहीं संकल्पित by a ncaa चैंपियनशिप or टूर्नामेंट इवेंट , it is  sometimes unofficially referred to as a `` mythical national championship `` .
Since the NCAA , the sport 's governing body ,  करता नहीं determine or घोषित a नेशनल चैंपियन in इस फ़ील्ड , determination of ऐसे रै प्रायः engendered  controversy .
A championship  टोली is independently घोषित by विभिन्न individuals और संगठन ,  often referred to as `` selectors '' .
ये चुनाव हैं sometimes at हालात  with each other .
While the NCAA has never officially  endorsed an सालाना चैंपियनशिप टोली , it रै प्रलेखित the चुनाव of अनेक  selectors in the official NCAA Football Bowl Subdivision Records .
In addition , various third party  विश्लेषकों have independently प्रकाशित उनके अपना सूचियाँ of कया वे have संकल्पित to be the सबसे  legitimate selections for each season .
These are also often at odds with each other as well as  व्यक्तिगत स्कूल 's दावा on नेशनल championships , जिससे , लिये कोई particular ऋतु , may or may नहीं correlate to the  selections published elsewhere .
Currently , two widely recognized national champions selectors are the Associated Press , which conducts a poll of football sportswriters , and the USA Today Coaches ' Poll , a poll of  अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल कोच संघ क्रियाशील कोच कि is contractually obligated to नाम the विजेता of the कटोरी चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी चैंपियनशिप खेल as इसके नेशनल चैंपियन .
The Milwaukee Brewers are a  पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली आधारित in मिल्वौकी , विस्कॉन्सिन  .
The team is a member of the Central Division of Major League  बेसबॉल 's नेशनल लीग और plays इसके घर खेल at मिलर पार्क  .
The team is so  नामित क्युकी of the नगर 's संघ साथ  the brewing industry .
The Washington Nationals are a  पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली आधारित in वॉशिंगटन  , D.C .
The  नागरिकों हैं a सदस्य of the ईस्ट प्रभाग of the नेशनल लीग  of Major League Baseball ( MLB ) .
The team  's घर ballpark is नागरिकों पार्क , स्तिथ on दक्षिण कैपिटल गली in southeast  D.C. , near the Anacostia River .
The park opened in  2008 , replacing rfk स्टेडियम , the टोली 's घर  from 2005 to 2007 .
The Nationals ' name derives from the former  वॉशिंगटन बेसबॉल टोली कि था the वही नाम ( प्रयुक्त interchangeably साथ सीनेटरों  ) .
Their nickname  is `` the nats '' —a shortened संस्करण  that was also used by the old D.C. teams .
An expansion franchise , the club was founded in as the  मॉन्ट्रियल expos , the पहला प्रमुख लीग टोली in कनाडा  .
They were  आधारित in मॉन्ट्रियल , क्यूबेक , और निभाई उनके घर  games at Jarry Park Stadium and later in Olympic Stadium .
In , the Expos won a division championship , won their first-ever playoff series by defeating the Philadelphia Phillies ,  3–2 , और उन्नत to the नेशनल लीग चैंपियनशिप श्रेणी , जहाँ वे होता go on to खोना to the लॉस एंजिल्स डॉजर्स , 3–2 , in उनके तभी postseason  appearance during the strike-shortened season .
The Expos had their highest winning  प्रतिशत in the strike-shortened ऋतु of , जब the टोली था the बेहतरीन रिकार्ड in बेसबॉल  .
The team 's subsequent shedding  of खिलाड़ी caused प्रशंसक ब्याज to बूँद बंद  .
After the 2001 season , MLB considered revoking the team 's  मताधिकार , साथ साथ either the मिनेसोटा जुड़वा or the tampa खाड़ी शैतान  Rays .
After being purchased by  एमएलबी in 2002 , the टोली थी स्थानांतरित पहले the ऋतु to वॉशिंगटन और renamed the नागरिकों , the पहला relocation  since the second Washington Senators moved to Arlington , Texas , and became the Texas Rangers in .
The Nationals are one of  दो एमएलबी franchises , और the तभी एक in the नेशनल लीग , कि रै never निभाई in  a World Series ( the Seattle Mariners are the other ) .
A contingent  शुल्क ( in the संयुक्त राज्य ) or सशर्त शुल्क ( in इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स ) is कोई शुल्क लिये सेवाएं  provided where the fee is payable only if there is a favourable result .
In the law , it is defined as a `` fee charged for a lawyer 's services only  if the मुकदमा is कामयाब or is favorably settled  out of court ... .
Contingent fees are usually  गणना as a प्रतिशत of the क्लाएंट 's जाल रिकवरी . ''
In the English legal  प्रणाली , it is generally referred to as no जीत  no fee .
A  सशर्त शुल्क अनुबंध between a विधि कड़ और  a client .
The usual form of  इस अनुबंध is कि the solicitor होगा लो a विधि मामला on the समझना  that if lost , no payment is made .
However , if  the मामला is जीती , the वकील होगा be हकदार to the सामान्य शुल्क आधारित on hourly  billing , plus a success fee .
The success fee in  इंग्लैण्ड जरूर be as a प्रतिशत no वृहद  than 100 % of the normal fee .
This contrasts with the contingency fee in the US , which gives the successful  attorney a प्रतिशत of the क्षतिपूर्ति awarded in एहसान  of his client .
This makes it easier for the poor to pursue their civil rights since otherwise , to  मुकदमा किसी लिये a अपकृत्य , एक जरूर पहला be धनवान पर्याप्त to pursue ऐसे वाद in  the first place .
However , because of the high risk , few  attorneys होगा लो मामले on a आकस्मिकता आधार जबतक वे महसूस the मामला रै शुभ मेरिट  .
According  to a 2004 किताब by विधि प्राध्यापक हर्बर्ट kritzer , निर्भर शुल्क यहूद अनुमत as of कि साल in the following देशों : ऑस्ट्रेलिया , ब्राज़ील , कनाडा ,  the Dominican Republic , France , Greece , Ireland , Japan , New Zealand , the United Kingdom and the United States .
They are also allowed in  निजी चोट क्रियाएँ in लिथुआनिया .
Recently , they have  महरूम अनुमत in बेल्जियम  as well .
A Convocation ( Latin 'calling together ' , translating the Greek ecclesia ) is a group  of लोगों formally समवेत लिये a खास purpose  .
Sons of Anarchy is a television drama series created by Kurt  sutter परिचय the जीवनदान of a close-knit गैरकानूनी मोटरसाइकिल क्लबों ऑपरेटिंग in आकर्षक , a fictional कस्बा  in California 's Central Valley .
The show centers on protagonist  जैक्सन `` जैक्स '' teller ( चार्ली hunnam ) , the then-vice अध्यक्ष of the क्लबों  , who begins questioning the club and himself .
Sons of Anarchy  premiered on सितंबर 3 , 2008  , on cable network FX .
The third season of the  श्रेणी आकर्षित an औसत of 4.9 लाख दर्शक प्रति सप्ताह , बनाना it fx 's उच्चतम रेटेड  series ever , surpassing FX 's other hits The Shield , Nip/Tuck , and Rescue Me .
On February 3 , 2012 ,  बेटे of अराजकता थी नवीनीकृत लिये दो अतिरिक्त सीज़न , a  fifth and a sixth .
Those involved in the production of the  श्रेणी imply कि a सातवाँ और फाइनल ऋतु is निर्माता  Kurt Sutter 's plan .
The Grímsvötn sub-glacial lakes ( ;  vötn = `` waters '' , एकवचन : ) और the ज्वालामुखी of the  same name are in South-East Iceland .
वे हैं in the हाइलैंड्स of आइसलैंड at the  northwestern side of the Vatnajökull ice-cap .
The  झीलों हैं at , at an उन्नयन  of .
Beneath the lakes is  the मैग्मा कक्ष of the grímsvötn  volcano .
Grímsvötn is a basaltic volcano which has the highest eruption frequency  of सब the ज्वालामुखी in आइसलैंड और रै a southwest-northeast-trending  fissure system .
The  विशाल climate-impacting laki फिशर फटना of 1783–1784  was a part of the same fissure system .
Grímsvötn  थी erupting at the वही समय as laki दौरान 1783  , but continued to erupt until 1785 .
Because most of the volcano  झूठ underneath vatnajökull , सबसे of इसके eruptions have महरूम subglacial और the बातचीत of मैग्मा और  meltwater from the ice causes phreatomagmatic explosive activity .
On 21 May 2011 at 19:25 UTC , an eruption began , with high plumes accompanied by multiple earthquakes ,  resulting in रद्दीकरण of 900 फ़्लाइट in आइसलैंड , और in the संयुक्त किंगडम , ग्रीनलैंड , जर्मनी  , Ireland and Norway on 22–25 May .
Until 25 May the eruption scale had  महरूम larger than कि of the 2010 फटना of eyjafjallajökull  .
The eruption stopped at 02:40 UTC on 25 May 2011 , although there  थी कुछ विस्फोटक कार्यकलाप इससे the tephra vents affecting तभी the क्षेत्रफल  around the crater .
Vetting is the  प्रक्रम of performing a पृष्ठभूमि जाँच on किसी पहले offering उन्हें नियुक्ति , डाक्टरेट  an award , etc .
A prospective  व्यक्ति or प्रोजेक्ट may be vetted पहले  making a hiring decision .
In addition , in intelligence gathering  , एसेट हैं vetted to determine उनके उपयोगिता  .
पूर्व मुख्यालय  and current corporate offices
Caesars Entertainment Corporation (  formerly harrah 's entertainment इससे 1995 to 2010 ) is an अमरीकी पब्लिक गेमिंग निगम कि owns और operates  over 50 casinos , hotels , and seven golf courses under several brands .
The company , based in Paradise , Nevada , is the  largest गेमिंग कम्पनी in the संसार , साथ सालाना revenues of $  8.9 billion ( 2010 ) .
Caesars is a public company , with a joint venture of Apollo Global Management and  टेक्सास प्रशांत समूह ownig a विशाल portion of the स्टेक और blackstone समूह भी पकड़कर a significant  stake .
The name  बदलें इससे `` harrah 's entertainment inc. '' to `` caesars  Entertainment Corporation '' was made official on November 23 , 2010 .
Harrah 's  remains a कुंजी ब्रांड in the  company .
On November 5 , 2010 , Harrah 's announced an initial  पब्लिक offering of 31,250,000 साझा लकिन retracted इस offering  on November 19 .
A Permanent Resident in Canada is a  व्यक्ति जो is नहीं a कनाडाई नागरिक लकिन जो रै महरूम granted अनुमति to सजीव और  work in Canada without any time limit on his or her stay .
A permanent resident must live in Canada for two years  आउट of प्रत्येक पाँच or रिस्क खोने कि औकात  .
A Permanent Resident holds many of the same rights and responsibilities as a  कनाडाई नागरिक , among अन्य the सही to कार्य लिये कोई एंटरप्राइज़ as खूब as लिये the संघीय or प्रांतीय सरकारी ( अंतर्गत प्रतिबंध  of access rights to certain regulated professions ) .
The main  मतभेद हैं कि निवासियों can नहीं  :
vote in चुनावों in कनाडा  ;
चलाएं लिये निर्वाचित  office ;
थाम कनाडाई passports  ;
In addition  , वे may be अनुमत to जुड़ें कनाडा 's हथियारबंद शक्तियां if the नेशनल  interest would not be prejudiced .
Permanent  निवासियों भी रिस्क प्रत्यर्पण लिये गंभीर अपराधों वचनबद्ध  while resident in Canada .
स्थाई निवासियों may लागू लिये कनाडाई नागरिकता बाद तीन सालो in कनाडा  ; however this is not mandatory .
Erica Kane is a  fictional अक्षर इससे the अमरीकी एबीसी दिन साबुन ओपेरा सब my children  .
The character was portrayed by actress Susan Lucci from her debut on January  16 , 1970 जबतक the पिछला ब्रॉडकास्ट टेलीविज़न एपीसोड aired on सितंबर  23 , 2011 .
On February 11  , 2013 , it थी घोषित कि lucci होगा guest-star on the prospect  Park 's continuation of All My Children .
In the U.S. , Erica is  माना to be the सबसे लोकप्रिय अक्षर in साबुन ओपेरा  history .
Regarding the  north-american मार्केट , tv मार्गदर्शिका काल्स उसके `` unequivocally the सबसे प्रसिद्ध साबुन ओपेरा अक्षर in the इतिहास of दिन  TV '' , and included her in their 2013 list of The 60 Nastiest Villains of All Time .
A graph of the US CPI from  1913 to 2006 ( in ब्लू ) , और इसके प्रतिशत सालाना बदलें ( in रेड  )
A consumer price  अनुक्रमणिका ( cpi ) उपायों परिवर्तन in the दाम स्तर of a मार्केट बास्केट  of consumer goods and services purchased by households .
The CPI in the United States is defined by the Bureau of  मजदूर आंकडे as `` a माप of the औसत बदलें over समय in the कीमतें सशुल्क by शहरी उपभोक्ता  for a market basket of consumer goods and services . ''
The CPI is a statistical estimate constructed  using the कीमतें of a नमूना of प्रतिनिधि वस्तुएं जिनकी कीमतें हैं एकत्रित periodically  .
Sub-indexes and sub-sub-indexes are computed for  अलग श्रेणी और sub-categories of goods और सेवाएं , होने संयुक्त to उपज the overall अनुक्रमणिका साथ weights reflecting  their shares in the total of the consumer expenditures covered by the index .
It is one of several price  indices गणना by सबसे नेशनल सांख्यिकीय एजेंसियों  .
The  सालाना प्रतिशत बदलें in a cpi  is used as a measure of inflation .
A CPI can be used to index ( i.e. , adjust for  the प्रभाव of महंगाई ) the रियल मान of मजदूरी , salaries , pensions , लिये regulating कीमतें और लिये deflating मौद्रिक  magnitudes to show changes in real values .
In most countries , the CPI is , along with the population census and the USA  नेशनल आय और उत्पाद खाते , एक of the सबसे closely देखी नेशनल आर्थिक  statistics .
Knocking on wood , or to touch wood , refers to the  apotropaic परंपरा in पश्चिमी लोकगीत of वस्तुतः touching/knocking on लकडी , or merely stating कि तुम हैं doing or intend वही , in अनुक्रम to avoid `` tempting भाग्य  `` after making a favourable observation , a boast , or declaration concerning one 's own death .
रॉकर भुजा
Generally referred to within the context of the internal combustion engine  of ऑटोमोटिव , समुद्री , मोटरसाइकिल और प्रत्यागमनी विमानन इंजन , the रॉकर भुजा is an oscillating लीवर कि conveys रेडियल  movement from the cam lobe into linear movement at the poppet valve to open it .
One end is raised and lowered by a  घूर्णन पालि of the camshaft ( either सीधे or via a tappet ( lifter  ) and pushrod ) while the other end acts on the valve stem .
When the camshaft lobe raises the outside of the  भुजा , the अंदर दबाता bas on the वाल्व स्टेम , खोलने the  valve .
When the outside of the arm is permitted to return due to the camshafts  रोटेशन , the अंदर उदय , allowing the वाल्व वसन्त  to close the valve .
the ड्राइव कैम is चलित  by the camshaft .
This  pushes the रॉकर भुजा up और bas  about the trunnion pin or rocker shaft .
Friction may be reduced at the  पाइंट of सम्पर्क साथ the वाल्व स्टेम by a रोलर कैम  follower .
A similar arrangement transfers the  गति via another रोलर कैम अनुसरणकर्ता to a दूसरी रॉकर भुजा  .
This  घुमाता परिचय the रॉकर शाफ्ट , और हस्तांतरण the गति via a tappet  to the poppet valve .
In  इस मामला इस opens the सेवन वाल्व to  the cylinder head .
The effective leverage of the arm ( and thus the  फ़ोर्स it can exert on the वाल्व स्टेम ) is संकल्पित by the रॉकर भुजा अनुपात , the अनुपात of the अलहदा इससे the रॉकर भुजा 's बीच of रोटेशन to the टिप विभाजित by the अलहदा  from the center of rotation to the point acted on by the camshaft or pushrod .
वर्तमान ऑटोमोटिव डिज़ाइन favors रॉकर भुजा ratios of  about 1.5:1 to 1.8:1 .
However , in the past smaller positive ratios (  the वाल्व लिफ्ट is वृहद than the कैम लिफ्ट ) और भी ऋणात्मक ratios ( वाल्व  lift smaller than the cam lift ) have been used .
Many  pre-ww2 इंजन उपयोग 1:1 ( न्यूट्रल  ) ratios .
For car engines the  रॉकर बाहें हैं generally स्टील stampings , providing a उचित  balance of strength , weight and economical cost .
Because the rocker arms are , in  भाग , प्रत्यागमनी वज़न , excessive द्रव्यमान विशेषकर at the लीवर  ends limits the engine 's ability to reach high operating speeds .
`` The Night the Lights Went Out in Georgia '' is a Southern Gothic song written by  songwriter bobby रसेल और performed in 1972 by उसके then-wife vicki लॉरेंस  .
Reba  mcentire बाद covered it in  1991 .
Recorded in late October 1972 in United/Western Studios on Sunset in Hollywood and released less than two weeks later  in नवम्बर 1972 , the सोंग centers around the पुरानी bhai of the narrator , falsely convicted of और चलाया लिये a हत्या , जिससे the narrator herself  has committed .
In postal mail , a return  पता is an सुस्पष्ट समावेश of the पता of the व्यक्ति sending  the message .
It provides the recipient ( and sometimes authorized intermediaries ) with a means to  determine कैसा to respond to the प्रेषक of the  message if needed .
The return address need not include a sender 's name , but should  शामिल पता or p.o . बक्सा विवरण in the वही रास्ता as the डिलीवरी पता चाहिए .
In some countries , the return address is  conventionally स्तिथ in the अपर बाएँ हाथ कोने of the लिफाफा , कार्ड , or लेबल  .
In the United Kingdom  , the वापसी पता is प्रायः लगाई  on the reverse of the envelope , near the top .
व्यवसायों प्रायः उपयोग लिफाफे preprinted  with a return address .
अनेक individuals have चादरें of चिपकने लेबल्स preprinted साथ उनके  home address to affix to their correspondence .
धर्मार्थ sometimes शामिल ऐसे चादरें in  mailshots .
Rolls of Return  पता लेबल्स can be खरीदा इससे कंपनियाँ कि बेचें personalized लेबल्स to provide individuals an आसान रास्ता  to peel and stick return address labels to their envelopes .
The return  पता is नहीं जरूरी  on postal mail .
However , lack of a return address prevents the postal service from being able to  वापसी the मद if it proves undeliverable ; ऐसे as इससे क्षति , postage due , or  invalid destination .
Such  मेल may यूँ become  dead letter mail .
चाहिए the वापसी पता be of a अलग राज्य or देश ,  the mail may be routed through that location for ease of return .
A nerve guidance conduit ( also  referred to as an कृत्रिम तंत्रिका conduit or कृत्रिम तंत्रिका graft , as opposed to an autograft ) is an कृत्रिम अर्थात् of guiding axonal  regrowth to facilitate nerve regeneration and is one of several clinical treatments for nerve injuries .
When direct suturing of the two stumps of a  severed तंत्रिका can नहीं be संपन्नता बगैर टेंशन , the मानक नैदानिक उपचार लिये परिधीय तंत्रिका चोटों is autologous  nerve grafting .
Due to the limited availability of donor tissue and functional recovery in autologous nerve grafting , neural tissue  अभियान्त्रिकी शोध रै केन्द्रित on the विकास of bioartificial तंत्रिका मार्गदर्शन conduits as an वैकल्पिक  treatment , especially for large defects .
Similar techniques are  भी होने छान लिये तंत्रिका मरम्मत in the स्पाइनल cord लकिन तंत्रिका regeneration in the सेंट्रल बेचैन प्रणाली मुद्राएँ a वृहद चुनौती क्युकी इसके axons do नहीं regenerate  appreciably in their native environment .
The creation of artificial conduits is also known as entubulation  क्युकी the तंत्रिका ends और intervening गैप हैं enclosed भीतर a ट्यूब रचित of biological  or synthetic materials .
Whether the conduit is in the form of a  biologic ट्यूब , सिंथेटिक ट्यूब or tissue-engineered conduit , it चाहिए सुकर neurotropic और neurotrophic संचार  between the proximal and distal ends of the nerve gap , block external inhibitory factors , and provide a physical guidance for axonal regrowth .
The most basic objective of a nerve guidance conduit is to  combine शारीरिक , रासायनिक , और biological cues अंतर्गत शर्तें  that will foster tissue formation .
Materials that have been used to make biologic tubes include blood  बरतन और skeletal मांसपेशियां , जबकि nonabsorbable और bioabsorbable सिंथेटिक tubes have महरूम बना इससे silicone और polyglycolide  respectively .
Tissue-engineered nerve guidance conduits are a  संयोजन of अनेक तत्व : scaffold ढांचा , scaffold सामग्री , सेल्यूलर therapies , neurotrophic कारकों  and biomimetic materials .
The  चुनाव of जिससे शारीरिक , रासायनिक और biological cues to उपयोग is आधारित on the गुण  of the nerve environment , which is critical in creating the most desirable environment for axon regeneration .
The factors that control material  चयन शामिल biocompatibility , biodegradability , mechanical अखंडता  , controllability during nerve growth , implantation and sterilization .
हार्डकोर साहूकार is an अमरीकी वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी उत्पादित by rdf यूएसए ( बाद zodiak यूएसए ) और रिचर्ड dominick प्रोडक्शन्स लिये trutv परिचय the day-to-day परिचालन of अमरीकी आभूषण  and Loan , a family-owned pawn shop located at 20450 Greenfield Road , between 8 Mile Road and the John C. Lodge Freeway in Detroit , Michigan .
The series premiered on  अगस्त 16 , 2010 , delivering दो लाख दर्शक , सेटिंग a रिकार्ड as trutv 's most-watched  series premiere ever .
amoxicillin  BP
Amoxicillin ( INN ) , formerly amoxycillin ( BAN )  , और abbreviated amox , is a moderate-spectrum , bacteriolytic , β-lactam antibiotic प्रयुक्त to दावत  bacterial infections caused by susceptible microorganisms .
It is usually the drug of choice within the class  क्युकी it is बेहतर अवशोषित , following मौखिक प्रशासन , than अन्य β-lactam एंटीबायोटिक  .
Amoxicillin is  एक of the सबसे आम एंटीबायोटिक  prescribed for children .
The drug  became उपलब्धियाँ in 1972  .
Amoxicillin is susceptible to  degradation by β-lactamase -producing जीवाणु , जिससे हैं resistant to a व्यापक वर्णक्रम of β-lactam एंटीबायोटिक , ऐसे as पेनिसिलीन  .
For  इस कारण , it is प्रायः संयुक्त  with clavulanic acid , a β-lactamase inhibitor .
This  increases प्रभावकारिता by reducing इसके susceptibility  to β-lactamase resistance .
Lyndon Baines Johnson ( August 27 , 1908 –  जनवरी 22 , 1973 ) , प्रायः referred to as lbj , थी the 36th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1963–1969 ) , a स्थिति he assumed बाद उसके  service as the 37th Vice President of the United States ( 1961–1963 ) .
He is one of only four  लोगों जो परोसा in सब चार निर्वाचित संघीय कार्यालयों of the संयुक्त राज्य : प्रतिनिधि , सीनेटर  , Vice President , and President .
Johnson , a Democrat from Texas , served as a United States Representative  इससे 1937–1949 और as a सीनेटर इससे 1949–1961 , सहित छह सालो  as United States Senate Majority Leader , two as Senate Minority Leader and two as Senate Majority Whip .
After campaigning unsuccessfully for the  लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन in 1960 , जॉनसन थी पूछा by जॉन F. कैनेडी to be उसके कार्यशील mate लिये  the 1960 presidential election .
Johnson succeeded to the presidency following the assassination of John F. Kennedy on November 22 ,  1963 , समाप्त कैनेडी 's पद और थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष in उसके अपना सही , जीतना by a विशाल हाशिया over बैरी  Goldwater in the 1964 election .
Johnson was greatly supported by the Democratic Party and  as अध्यक्ष , he थी जिम्मेदार लिये डिजाइनिंग the `` ग्रेट समाज `` विधान कि शामिल कानून कि upheld सिविल अधिकारों , पब्लिक प्रसारण , medicare , medicaid , पर्यावरणीय  protection , aid to education , and his `` War on Poverty . ''
Johnson  थी प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके domineering व्यक्तित्व और the `` जॉनसन उपचार , ''  his coercion of powerful politicians in order to advance legislation .
meanwhile , जॉनसन escalated अमरीकी भागीदारी in the वियतनाम युद्ध , इससे 16,000 अमरीकी advisors/soldiers in 1963 to  550,000 combat troops in early 1968 , as American casualties soared and the peace process bogged down .
The involvement  stimulated a विशाल एंग्री antiwar गति आधारित विशेषकर on विश्वविद्यालयों  campuses in the U.S. and abroad .
Summer riots broke  आउट in सबसे प्रमुख शहरों बाद 1965 , और अपराधों  rates soared , as his opponents raised demands for `` law and order '' policies .
The Democratic Party split in multiple feuding  गिरोहों , और बाद जॉनसन किया poorly in the 1968 नई हैम्पशायर प्राथमिक  , he ended his bid for reelection .
Republican  रिचर्ड निक्सन थी निर्वाचित to  succeed him .
Historians argue that  जॉनसन 's प्रेसिडेंसी चिह्नित the शिखर of आधुनिक उदारतावाद in the संयुक्त राज्य बाद the नई सौदे era .
Johnson is  क्रमित favorably by कुछ इतिहासकारों क्युकी of उसके  domestic policies .
The Big Bang  सिद्धान्त डाल at कॉमिक कॉन 2009 , इससे बाएँ : कुणाल नय्यर , साइमन helberg  , Kaley Cuoco , Jim Parsons , and Johnny Galecki
The American sitcom The Big  बंग सिद्धान्त , निर्मित और कार्यपालिका उत्पादित by चक lorre और विधेयक prady  , premiered on CBS on September 24 , 2007 .
The show centers on five characters : roommates Sheldon Cooper and Leonard  hofstadter , दो caltech physicists ; पैनी , a वेट्रेस और aspiring अभिनेत्री जो जीवनदान आरपार the हॉल ; और लियोनार्ड और शेल्डन 's मित्रों और co-workers  aerospace engineer Howard Wolowitz , and astrophysicist Rajesh Koothrappali .
Over time , several supporting characters have been promoted to starring roles : Leslie Winkle ( season 1 recurring ; season 2 regular ; season 3 guest ) , a physicist  सहयोगी , और , at अलग टाइम्स , a प्रेमी of दोनो लियोनार्ड और हावर्ड ; bernadette rostenkowski-wolowitz ( ऋतु 3 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ) , a microbiologist , हावर्ड 's fiancée और subsequent बीवी , और पूर्व part-time वेट्रेस alongside पैनी ; neuroscientist एमी farrah fowler ( ऋतु 3 अतिथि  ; season 4 recurring ; season 4-present regular ) , who joins the group after being matched to Sheldon on a dating website ; and comic book store-owner , Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ) , who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space .
The show also features numerous supporting  वर्ण , प्रत्येक of जिसको plays a prominent भूमिका  in a small group of episodes .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see  नामकरण ) , थी a सिविल युद्ध लड़ा इससे 1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि घोषित उनके secession और formed the confederate राज्य of अमेरिका  ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its  उत्पत्ति in the समस्या of गुलामी , विशेषकर the एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into  the western territories .
Foreign powers  किया नहीं intervene  .
बाद चार सालो of खूनी कॉम्बैट कि बाएँ over 600,000 सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना , the confederacy collapsed , गुलामी थी abolished  , and the difficult Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential election , Republicans , led by  अब्राहम lincoln , opposed expanding गुलामी into संयुक्त राज्य  ' territories .
Lincoln won  , लकिन पहले उसके उद्घाटन on कूच 4 , 1861 , सात cotton-based  slave states formed the Confederacy .
Outgoing Democratic  अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans अस्वीकृत secession  as illegal .
Lincoln 's inaugural address declared  उसके प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate सिविल युद्ध  .
Eight remaining slave states  जारी to अस्वीकृत काल्स लिये secession  .
Confederate forces  जब्त numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed by  the Confederacy .
A Peace  सम्मेलन विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह ,  and both sides prepared for war .
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on `` King  कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना the नई confederate  States of America .
hostilities began on अप्रैल 12 , 1861 , जब confederate शक्तियां fired  upon Fort Sumter , a key fort held by Union troops in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each  राज्य to provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन , चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य  joined the Confederacy , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon controlled the border states and  स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी कि अबोध the दक्षिणी अर्थव्यवस्था  .
The  पूर्वी थिएटर  was inconclusive in 1861–62 .
The autumn 1862 Confederate  अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate  retreat at the Battle of Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation  उदघोषणा , जिससे बना समाप्ति गुलामी a युद्ध  goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the  confederate नदी नेवी , तब much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना , और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in दो  at the Mississippi River .
In 1863 , Robert E. Lee 's  confederate incursion उत्तर ended at the बैटल  of Gettysburg .
Western successes led to Ulysses  S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब संघ सेना in  1864 .
In the Western Theater , William T. Sherman drove east to capture  अटलांटा और marched to the समुद्र , destroying confederate अवसंरचना साथ the रास्ता .
the संघ marshaled the संसाधन और जनशक्ति to आक्रमण the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश , और  could afford to fight battles of attrition through the Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
the defending confederate फौज विफल , अग्रणी  to Lee 's surrender to Grant at Appomattox Court House on April 9 , 1865 .
The  अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध थी एक of the earliest सच्चा औद्योगिक  wars .
railroads , the टेलीग्राफ , steamships ,  and mass-produced weapons were employed extensively .
The mobilization of  civilian कारखानों , खानों , shipyards , बैंको , परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ  all foreshadowed World War I .
It remains the deadliest war in American  इतिहास , resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित 750,000 सैनिको और an undetermined क्रमांक of civilian  casualties .
Historian John  huddleston estimates the मौत टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा , और 30 प्रतिशत of सब दक्षिणी  white males aged 18–40 .
Human evolution refers to  the विकासवादी प्रक्रम अग्रणी up to the रूप  of modern humans .
While it began with the last common ancestor  of सब जीवन , the टॉपिक प्रायः कवर तभी the विकासवादी इतिहास of primates , in particular the genus होमो , और the emergence of होमो sapiens  as a distinct species of hominids ( or `` great apes '' ) .
The study of human evolution  involves अनेक वैज्ञानिक disciplines , सहित शारीरिक मानवशास्त्र , primatology , पुरातत्व  , linguistics , evolutionary psychology , embryology and genetics .
According to genetic studies , primates diverged from  अन्य स्तनधारियों परिचय in the लेट cretaceous काल , और the earliest  fossils appear in the Paleocene , around .
The family Hominidae diverged from the  hylobatidae ( गिबन ) परिवार 15-20 लाख सालो पहले , और around , the ponginae (  orangutans ) , diverged from the Hominidae family .
Bipedalism is the basic adaption of the Hominin line , and the earliest bipedal Hominin  is माना to be either sahelanthropus or orrorin , साथ ardipithecus , a पूरा bipedal , coming  somewhat later .
The gorilla and chimpanzee diverged around the same  समय , परिचय 4-6 लाख सालो पहले , और either sahelanthropus or orrorin may be हमारी  last shared ancestor with them .
The  जल्दी bipedals आखिरकार विकसित into the australopithecines और बाद the genus  Homo .
The earliest documented  सदस्यों of the genus होमो हैं होमो habilis जिससे विकसित around ; the earliest प्रजाति लिये जिससे वहीँ is  positive evidence of use of stone tools .
The brains of these early  hominins यहूद परिचय the वही आकार as कि of  a chimpanzee .
During the next million years a process of  encephalization began , और साथ the आगमन of होमो इरेक्टस in the चट्टान रिकार्ड , cranial क्षमता था doubled  to 850 cm3 .
होमो इरेक्टस और होमो ergaster यहूद the पहला of the hominina to छोड़ अफ़्रीकी , और  these species spread through Africa , Asia , and Europe between .
It is believed that these  प्रजाति यहूद the पहला to उपयोग आग और जटिल  tools .
According to the Recent African Ancestry theory , modern humans  विकसित in अफ़्रीकी संभवतः इससे होमो heidelbergensis , होमो rhodesiensis or होमो antecessor  and migrated out of the continent some 50,000 to 100,000 years ago , replacing local populations of Homo erectus , Homo denisova , Homo floresiensis and Homo neanderthalensis .
archaic होमो sapiens , the forerunner of anatomically आधुनिक इंसानो , विकसित between  400,000 and 250,000 years ago .
Recent DNA evidence suggests that several haplotypes of Neanderthal origin  हैं उपस्थित among सब non-african populations , और neanderthals और अन्य hominids , ऐसे as denisova hominin may have contributed up to 6 % of उनके genome to present-day इंसानs. < संदर्भ name= '' 10.1126/science.1209202  '' > Anatomically modern humans evolved from archaic Homo sapiens in the Middle Paleolithic , about 200,000 years ago .
The transition to behavioral modernity with the development  of सांकेतिक संस्कृति , भाषा , और specialized lithic प्रौद्योगिकी happened around 50,000 सालो पहले according to अनेक विज्ञानियों हालांकि कुछ सुझाएँ  a gradual change in behavior over a longer time span .
Lisa Cuddy , M.D . , is a fictional  अक्षर on the फॉक्स संजाल चिकित्सा नाटक हाउस  .
She is  portrayed by लिसा edelstein  .
Cuddy was the Dean of  आयुर्विज्ञान और हॉस्पिटल व्यवस्थापक of the fictional princeton-plainsboro  Teaching Hospital in New Jersey .
She also becomes House 's love interest  through the सालो to प्रारंभ a संबंध साथ उसे in ऋतु  seven .
cuddy छोड़ो उसके जॉब बाद the कार्यक्रम of ऋतु सात 's  finale `` Moving On `` .
Track and  फ़ील्ड is a खेल comprising विभिन्न प्रतिस्पर्धी एथलेटिक प्रतियोगिताओं  based on running , jumping , and throwing .
the नाम of the खेल गर्भाशयी इससे the प्रतियोगिता स्थान : a स्टेडियम  with an oval running track around a grass field .
The throwing and jumping  कार्यक्रम generally लो प्लेस in the सेंट्रल  enclosed area .
Track and  फ़ील्ड जलप्रपात अंतर्गत the छतरियाँ खेल of एथलेटिक्स , जिससे भी शामिल  road running , cross country running , and race walking .
The two most prestigious  अंतरराष्ट्रीय track और फ़ील्ड प्रतियोगिताओं हैं आयोजित अंतर्गत the ध्वज of एथलेटिक्स : the एथलेटिक्स प्रतियोगिता at the ओलम्पिक खेल  and the IAAF World Championships in Athletics .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ of एथलेटिक्स federations is the अंतरराष्ट्रीय शासी  body for track and field .
Track and  फ़ील्ड कार्यक्रम हैं generally व्यक्तिगत खेल साथ एथलीट  challenging each other to decide a single victor .
The racing events are won by the  खिलाड़ी साथ the तीव्रतम समय , जबकि the कूद और फेंकना कार्यक्रम हैं जीती by the  athlete who has achieved the greatest distance or height in the contest .
The running events are categorised as sprints , middle and  long-distance कार्यक्रम , relays , और hurdling  .
नियमित कूद कार्यक्रम शामिल long जम्प , ट्रिपल जम्प , ऊँची जम्प और ध्रुव वॉल्ट , जबकि the सबसे आम  throwing events are shot put , javelin , discus and hammer .
वहीँ हैं भी `` संयुक्त कार्यक्रम '' , ऐसे as heptathlon और decathlon  , in which athletes compete in a number of the above events .
Records are kept of the best performances in  विशिष्ट कार्यक्रम , at संसार और नेशनल स्तर , सही bas to a निजी  level .
However , if athletes  हैं deemed to have violated the इवेंट 's नियम or regulations , वे हैं disqualified  from the competition and their marks are erased .
In North America , the term track and field may be used to refer to athletics  in सामान्य , बल्कि than specifically track और फ़ील्ड कार्यक्रम  .
The Gulf War ( 2 August 1990 – 28 February 1991 ) , codenamed  आपरेशन मरुस्थल तूफ़ान ( 17 जनवरी 1991 – 28 फ़रवरी 1991 ) थी a युद्ध waged by a u.n.-authorized गठबन्धन फ़ोर्स इससे 34 राष्ट्र led by the संयुक्त राज्य , विरूद्ध इराकी in जवाब to इराकी 's आक्रमण और annexation of कुवैत  .
The war is also known under other names , such as the  पारसी गल्फ युद्ध , पहला गल्फ युद्ध , गल्फ युद्ध i , or the पहला इराकी युद्ध , पहले the पद `` इराकी युद्ध '' became पहचाना बजाय साथ the 2003 इराकी युद्ध ( भी referred  to in the U.S. as `` Operation Iraqi Freedom '' ) .
Kuwait 's invasion by Iraqi troops that began 2 August 1990 was met with  अंतरराष्ट्रीय condemnation , और brought तात्कालिक आर्थिक प्रतिबंधों विरूद्ध इराकी by सदस्यों of the u.N. सुरक्षा  Council .
U.S. President George H. W. Bush deployed U.S.  शक्तियां into सऊदी अरब , और urged अन्य देशों to भेजें उनके  own forces to the scene .
An  सरणी of राष्ट्र  joined the Coalition .
The great majority of the Coalition 's military forces were from the U.S. , with  सऊदी अरब , the संयुक्त किंगडम और मिश्र as अग्रणी योगदानकर्ता , in कि  order .
Saudi Arabia  सशुल्क around us $ 36 अरब of  the US $ 60 billion cost .
The war was marked by  the शुरूआत of सजीव न्यूज on the सामने लाइनों of the लड़ो , साथ  the primacy of the U.S. network CNN .
The war has also earned the nickname Video Game War after the daily broadcast  बिंब on फलक the u.S. बमवर्षक दौरान आपरेशन  Desert Storm .
The initial  विरोध to निकाल इराकी सैनिकों इससे कुवैत began साथ an aerial  bombardment on 17 January 1991 .
This was followed by a ground  उत्पीड़न on 24 फ़रवरी .
This was a decisive victory for the Coalition  शक्तियां , जो liberated कुवैत और उन्नत into इराकी territory  .
The Coalition ceased their advance , and  घोषित a cease-fire 100 घंटों बाद the मैदान अभियान प्रारंभ  .
Aerial and ground combat was confined to  इराकी , कुवैत , और क्षेत्रों on सऊदी अरब 's किनारा  .
Iraq launched Scud  मिसाइलें विरूद्ध गठबन्धन सैन्य लक्ष्य in सऊदी अरब और विरूद्ध  Israel .
The nickel , in American usage ,  is a five- cent सिक्का जारी by the संयुक्त राज्य  Mint .
Composed of  75 % तांबे और 25 % निकल , the टुकड़ा  has been struck since 1866 .
The silver half dime , equal to five  सेंट , था महरूम जारी चूंकि the 1790s  .
The American  सिविल युद्ध caused आर्थिक hardship , ड्राइविंग सुनहरा और चांदी इससे परिसंचरण ; in जवाब , in प्लेस of low-value सिक्के  , the government at first issued paper currency .
In 1865 , Congress abolished  the five-cent fractional करेंसी नोट बाद स्पेंसर M. क्लार्क , सिर of the करेंसी ब्यूरो ( आज the ब्यूरो of नक्काशी और मुद्रण ) , लगाई  his own portrait on the denomination .
After successful introduction of two-cent and three-cent pieces , without precious metal , Congress also  प्राधिकृत a five-cent टुकड़ा consisting of आधार मेटल ; the मिंट began striking इस  version in 1866 .
The initial  डिज़ाइन of the शील्ड निकल थी struck जबतक 1883 , तब  replaced by the Liberty Head nickel .
The Buffalo nickel was introduced in 1913 as  भाग of a ड्राइव to बढ़ाएँ the सौंदर्य of अमरीकी coinage ; in 1938 , the  Jefferson nickel followed .
In  2004 और 2005 , खास डिजाइन in सम्मान of the bicentennial of  the Lewis and Clark Expedition were issued .
In 2006 , the Mint reverted to using Jefferson nickel designer Felix Schlag 's  असली रिवर्स ( or `` tails '' पक्ष ) , हालांकि a नई obverse , by जेमी franki , थी substituted  .
As of 2013 , it costs more than eleven cents  to उपज a निकल ; the मिंट is exploring the सम्भावना of reducing  cost by using less expensive metals .
A poster with flowers or clusters of flowers produced by  बारह प्रजाति of flowering पौधे इससे अलग  families
A flower , sometimes known as a bloom or  खिलना , is the reproductive ढांचा मिला in flowering पौधे ( पौधे of the प्रभाग  Magnoliophyta , also called angiosperms ) .
The biological function  of a पुष्प is to प्रभाव जनन , प्रायः by providing a यांत्रिकी  for the union of sperm with eggs .
पुष्प may सुकर outcrossing ( संलयन of शुक्राणु और अंडे इससे अलग  individuals in a population ) or allow selfing ( fusion of sperm and egg from the same flower ) .
Some flowers  उपज diaspores बगैर fertilization ( parthenocarpy  ) .
Flowers  contain sporangia और हैं the साईट जहाँ gametophytes  develop .
Flowers  दे वृद्धि to फल और  seeds .
अनेक पुष्प have विकसित to be आकर्षक to पशु , so as to  cause them to be vectors for the transfer of pollen .
In addition to  facilitating the जनन of flowering पौधे , पुष्प have long महरूम admired और प्रयुक्त by इंसानो to beautify उनके पर्यावरण , और भी as वस्तुएँ  of romance , ritual , religion , medicine and as a source of food .
The McDonnell Douglas ( now Boeing ) F-15 Eagle is a  twin-engine , all-weather रणनीतिक सेनानी designed by mcdonnell डगलस to लाभ और maintain एयर बड़प्पन  in aerial combat .
It is  माना among the सबसे कामयाब आधुनिक सेनानी , साथ over 100 aerial कॉम्बैट  victories with no losses in dogfights .
Following reviews of proposals , the United States Air Force selected McDonnell  डगलस ' डिज़ाइन in 1967 to मिलें the सेवा 's need लिये a समर्पित एयर बड़प्पन  fighter .
The Eagle  पहला उड़ाया in जुलाई 1972 , और डाला  service in 1976 .
चूंकि the 1970s , the त्रिभुज रै महरूम exported to इसराईल , जापानी  , Saudi Arabia , and other nations .
The F-15  थी originally envisioned as a pure  air superiority aircraft .
इसके डिज़ाइन शामिल a द्वितीयक ground-attack  capability that was largely unused .
The design proved flexible enough that an  all-weather स्ट्राइक डेरिवेटिव , the f-15e स्ट्राइक त्रिभुज ,  was later developed , and entered service in 1989 .
The F-15  त्रिभुज is अपेक्षित to be in सेवा साथ the  U.S. Air Force past 2025 .
mimio is a ब्रांड नाम of a लकीर of प्रौद्योगिकी उत्पाद aimed  at the education market .
the प्राथमिक उत्पाद हैं केन्द्रित around कंप्यूटर whiteboard  interactive teaching devices .
MimioCapture  डिवाइस भी allow उपयोक्ता to कैप्चर सब of the स्याही स्ट्रोक्स कि हैं  written on the whiteboard .
When used in  संयोजन साथ a वीडियो प्रोजेक्टर it turns the ordinary whiteboard  surface into a fully interactive whiteboard .
The product line was  originally designed  by Virtual Ink .
On October 4 , 2006  newell rubbermaid acquired the mimio इंटरैक्टिव whiteboard ( iwb  ) product line .
rahab of जेरिको
Rahab , ( ; ; ) was , according  to the किताब of जोशुआ , a स्त्री जो जिया in जेरिको in the promised  Land and assisted the Israelites in capturing the city .
Nearly all English translations of  जोशुआ describe उसके as a बदचलन or  prostitute .
The Organization of American  राज्य ( स्पेनी : organización de लॉस estados americanos , पुर्तगाली : organização डॉस estados americanos , फ्रेंच : संगठन देस états  américains ) , or the OAS , is a regional international organization .
The OAS was founded on 30 April  1948 , और रै इसके मुख्यालय in वॉशिंगटन , d.C. , संयुक्त  States .
Its members are the  35 स्वतंत्र राज्य of the americas  .
Since 26 May 2005 , the Secretary  सामान्य of oas रै महरूम जोस  Miguel Insulza .
Christopher Columbus ( Italian : Cristoforo  कोलोन ; स्पेनी : cristóbal colón ; पुर्तगाली : cristóvão कोलोन ; पहले 31 अक्तूबर 145120 may 1506 ) थी an इतालवी एक्सप्लोरर , नाविक , और colonizer , born in the गणतंत्र  of Genoa , in what is today northwestern Italy .
Under  the auspices of the कैथोलिक monarchs of स्पेन , he समाप्त चार voyages आरपार the अटलांटिक समंदर कि led to सामान्य  European awareness of the American continents .
Those voyages , and his efforts to establish permanent settlements  on the द्वीप of हिस्पानिओला , initiated the स्पेनी colonization of the नई  World .
In the context of emerging western imperialism and economic competition between European kingdoms seeking wealth through the establishment of trade routes and colonies , Columbus 's speculative proposal , to reach the East Indies by sailing westward , eventually  प्राप्त the support of the स्पेनी क्राउन , जिससे देखी in it a वादा , however रिमोट , of gaining the अपर हाथ over प्रतिद्वंद्वी शक्तियां in the प्रतियोगिता लिये the lucrative मसाला व्यापार  with Asia .
During his  पहला voyage in 1492 , बजाय of reaching जापानी as he था intended , कोलंबस उतरा in the बहामा द्वीपसमूह  , at a locale he named San Salvador .
Over the course of three more voyages ,  कोलंबस visited the वृहद और lesser antilles , as खूब as the caribbean coast of वेनेजुएला और सेंट्रल अमेरिका , claiming  them for the Spanish Empire .
Though Columbus was not the first European explorer to reach the Americas (  having महरूम preceded by the नॉर्स expedition led by leif ericson in the 11th सदी ) , कोलंबस 's voyages led to the पहला स्थायी  European contact with the Americas , inaugurating a period of European exploration , conquest , and colonization that lasted for several centuries .
They had , therefore , an  विशाल प्रभाव in the ऐतिहासिक विकास of the  modern Western world .
Columbus himself saw his accomplishments primarily in the  लाइट of the spreading of the ईसाई धर्म  .
Never admitting that he had reached a continent previously unknown to Europeans , rather than the East Indies he  था नियत आउट लिये , कोलंबस पुकारा the निवासियों of the  lands he visited indios ( Spanish for `` Indians `` ) .
Columbus 's strained relationship with the Spanish crown and its appointed colonial  प्रशासकों in अमेरिका led to उसके गिरफ़्तार और dismissal as राज्यपाल of the settlements on the द्वीप of हिस्पानिओला in 1500 , और बाद to protracted वाद  over the benefits which Columbus and his heirs claimed were owed to them by the crown .
Bred in Germany , the Boxer is a  नस्ल of stocky , medium-sized , short-haired  dogs .
The coat is smooth and tight-fitting ; colors  हैं fawn or brindled , साथ or बगैर श्वेत markings , जिससे  may cover the entire body .
Boxers are  brachycephalic ( वे have व्यापक , छोटी skulls ) , और have a वर्गाकार muzzle , mandibular prognathism ( an underbite ) , बहुत दमदार  jaws , and a powerful bite ideal for hanging on to large prey .
The Boxer  थी करवाया इससे the बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी बुल और the  now extinct Bullenbeisser , and is part of the Molosser group .
Boxers were first exhibited in a dog  दिखाएँ लिये st. bernards in म्यूनिख in 1895 , the पहला boxer क्लबों होने संस्थापित  the next year .
Based on 2012 American Kennel Club statistics ,  मुक्केबाज आयोजित स्थिर as the सातवाँ सबसे लोकप्रिय नस्ल of श्वान in the संयुक्त राज्य लिये the तीसरा  consecutive year .
Serial ATA ( SATA ) is a computer bus interface  कि connects मेजबान बस adapters to द्रव्यमान भंडार डिवाइस  such as hard disk drives and optical drives .
Serial ATA replaces  the पुरानी at अनुलग्नक मानक ( ata ; बाद referred to as समानांतर ata or pata ) , offering अनेक लाभ over the पुरानी इंटरफ़ेस : घटाया  cable size and cost ( seven conductors instead of 40 ) , native hot swapping , faster data transfer through higher signalling rates , and more efficient transfer through an ( optional ) I/O queuing protocol .
SATA host  adapters और डिवाइस communicate via a high-speed सीरियल केबल  over two pairs of conductors .
In contrast , parallel ATA ( the  redesignation लिये the विरासत ata विशेषताएँ ) प्रयुक्त a 16-bit चौड़ी आंकड़ा बस साथ अनेक अतिरिक्त support और कंट्रोल सिग्नल , सब  operating at much lower frequency .
To ensure backward compatibility with legacy ATA  तन्त्र और अनुप्रयोग , sata उपयोग the वही मौलिक ata और atapi command-set  as legacy ATA devices .
SATA  रै replaced समानांतर ata in उपभोक्ता डेस्कटॉप और लैपटॉप कंप्यूटर  , and has largely replaced PATA in new embedded applications .
SATA 's  मार्केट share in the डेस्कटॉप pc मार्केट थी 99 % in  2008 .
PATA remains widely used  in औद्योगिक और अंतःस्थापित अनुप्रयोग कि उपयोग compactflash भंडार , भी हालांकि the नई cfast  standard is based on SATA .
Serial ATA industry  संगतता विशेषताएँ originate इससे the सीरियल ata अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Organization ( aka .
sata-io , serialata.org  ) .
The SATA-IO group collaboratively creates , reviews ,  ratifies , और publishes the interoperability विशेषताएँ , the परीक्षण मामले , और plug-fests  .
As  साथ अनेक अन्य उद्योग संगतता मानकों , the sata सामग्री स्वामित्व is transferred to अन्य उद्योग  bodies : primarily the INCITS T13 subcommittee ATA , the INCITS T10 subcommittee ( SCSI ) ; a subgroup of T10 responsible for Serial Attached SCSI ( SAS ) .
The complete  specification इससे  SATA-IO .
The remainder of this article  होगा कोशिश to उपयोग the शब्दावली  and specifications of SATA-IO .
The history of the Internet began with the development of  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कंप्यूटर in the 1950s .
The public was first introduced to the concepts that would lead to the Internet when a message was sent over the ARPANet from computer science Professor Leonard Kleinrock 's  प्रयोगशाला at विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया , लॉस एंजिल्स ( ucla ) , बाद the दूसरी टुकड़ा of संजाल उपकरण थी संस्थापित at स्टैनफोर्ड शोध  Institute ( SRI ) .
Packet switched networks such as ARPANET , Mark I at  npl in the uk , cyclades , मेरिट संजाल , tymnet , और telenet , यहूद विकसित in the  late 1960s and early 1970s using a variety of protocols .
The ARPANET in  particular led to the विकास of प्रोटोकॉल लिये internetworking , in जिससे अनेक पृथक  networks could be joined together into a network of networks .
In 1982 , the  अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल सुइट ( tcp/ip ) थी मानकीकृत , और नतीजतन , the अवधारणा of a world-wide संजाल of  interconnected TCP/IP networks , called the Internet , was introduced .
Access to the ARPANET was expanded in 1981 when the National Science Foundation ( NSF ) developed the  कंप्यूटर विज्ञान संजाल ( csnet ) और again in 1986 जब nsfnet provided अभिगम to महासंगणक साइट in the संयुक्त राज्य इससे शोध और शिक्षा संगठन  .
वाणिज्यिक अंतरजाल सेवा प्रदाताओं ( isps ) began to emerge in the  late 1980s and early 1990s .
The ARPANET  थी decommissioned in 1990 .
The  अंतरजाल थी commercialized in 1995 जब nsfnet थी decommissioned , निकालना  the last restrictions on the use of the Internet to carry commercial traffic .
Since the mid-1990s , the Internet has had a revolutionary impact on culture and commerce , including the rise of near-instant communication by electronic mail , instant messaging , Voice  over अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( voip ) `` फोन काल्स '' , two-way इंटरैक्टिव वीडियो काल्स , और the संसार चौड़ी वेब साथ इसके चर्चा forums , ब्लॉग , सोशल नेटवर्किंग  , and online shopping sites .
The research and education community  continues to develop और उपयोग उन्नत संजाल ऐसे as nsf 's बहुत ऊँची गति रीढ़ संजाल सेवा  ( vBNS ) , Internet2 , and National LambdaRail .
Increasing amounts of  आंकड़ा हैं transmitted at उच्चतर और उच्चतर speeds over रेशा ऑप्टिक संजाल ऑपरेटिंग  at 1-Gbit/s , 10-Gbit/s , or more .
The Internet 's takeover over the global communication landscape was almost instant in historical  शर्तें : it तभी communicated 1 % of the सूचना बहती through two-way दूरसंचार संजाल in the साल 1993 , already  51 % by 2000 , and more than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007 .
Today the Internet continues to grow , driven by ever greater amounts of online  सूचना , कॉमर्स , entertainment , और सोशल  networking .

on 30  नवम्बर 2011 , the एल्बम प्राप्त a नामांकन in 54th ग्रैमी पुरस्कार  for Best Traditional Pop Vocal Album .
`` This Is Just To  कह '' ( 1934 ) is a प्रसिद्ध imagist कविता by विलियम कार्लोस विलियम्स  .
Professor Albus Percival Wulfric Brian Dumbledore is a major character  और समर्थक of J. K. रोलिंग 's हैरी कुम्हार श्रेणी  .
For  सबसे of the श्रेणी , he is the  headmaster of the wizarding school Hogwarts .
As part of  उसके backstory , it is नाज़िल कि he is the संस्थापक और नेता of the अनुक्रम of the  Phoenix , an organisation dedicated to fighting the main antagonist of the series , Lord Voldemort .
Dumbledore is portrayed by  रिचर्ड हैरिस in the फिल्मी adaptions of हैरी कुम्हार और the  Philosopher 's Stone and Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets .
After Harris ' death ,  माइकल gambon portrayed डम्बल्डोर लिये सब of the बाकी  films .
Rowling stated she chose the name Dumbledore ,  जिससे is an जल्दी आधुनिक अंग्रेज़ी शब्द लिये `` bumblebee `` , क्युकी of डम्बल्डोर 's प्रेम of म्यूज़िक : वो imagined उसे  walking around `` humming to himself a lot '' .
Calcitonin ( also known as thyrocalcitonin ) is a 32-amino acid linear polypeptide hormone that is  उत्पादित in इंसानो primarily by the parafollicular कोशिकाएं ( भी ज्ञात as c-cells ) of the थायराइड , और in अनेक अन्य पशु in  the ultimobranchial body .
It acts to  reduce रक्त कैल्सियम ( ca2+ ) , opposing the  effects of parathyroid hormone ( PTH ) .
Calcitonin has  महरूम मिला in मछली , सरीसृपों , पक्षियों  , and mammals .
इसके महत्व in इंसानो रै नहीं महरूम as खूब स्थापित as इसके महत्व  in other animals , as its function is usually not significant in the regulation of normal calcium homeostasis .
It  belongs to calcitonin-like  protein family .
A mousepad  साथ a padded कलाई बाकी .
A mousepad ( US ) or mouse mat ( UK ) is a surface for  रखकर और चलती a कंप्यूटर चूहा .
A mousepad  enhances the उपयोगिता of the चूहा compared to using a चूहा सीधे on a तालिका by providing a सतह to allow the ट्रैकिंग led or बॉल ( in पूर्व  models ) to measure movement accurately and without jitter .
Some  mousepads बढ़ाएँ ergonomics by  providing a padded wrist rest .

The Riverfront  स्टेडियम साईट in जून , 2006  .
इस फ़ोटो थी लिया इससे the पश्चिमी concourse of  Great American Ball Park .
A small portion of the Riverfront Stadium site is now occupied by the Reds ' Hall of  कीर्ति और संग्रहालय और प्रमुख गली , जिससे थी विस्तारित जब the नई पार्क थी निर्मित  .
the सिनसिनाटी bengals ' पॉल भूरा  Stadium is in the distance .
riverfront स्टेडियम ( 1970–1995 ) , बाद ज्ञात as cinergy फ़ील्ड ( 1996–2002 ) , थी the घर of the सिनसिनाटी  Reds National League baseball team and the Cincinnati Bengals National Football League team .
Located on the Ohio River in downtown Cincinnati , the  स्टेडियम थी बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the घर of `` the बिग रेड यंत्र  `` , as the Reds were often called in the 1970s .
Construction began on February 1 , 1968 ,  और थी समाप्त at a लागत of कम than $ 50 लाख  .
On June 30 , 1970 , the Reds hosted the Atlanta  braves in उनके ग्रैंड खोलने , साथ हांक आरोन hitting the पहला कभी  home run at Riverfront .
Two weeks later on July 14 , 1970 ,  riverfront hosted the 1970 प्रमुख लीग  Baseball All-Star Game .
This  खेल is बेहतरीन remembered लिये the often-replayed टक्कर at घर थाली between लाल  star Pete Rose and catcher Ray Fosse of the Cleveland Indians .
In September 1996 , Riverfront Stadium  थी renamed `` cinergy फ़ील्ड '' in a प्रायोजन सौदे साथ वृहद सिनसिनाटी 's उर्जा  company , Cinergy Corporation .
In 2001 ,  to मेक रूम लिये ग्रेट अमरीकी बॉल पार्क , the seating क्षमता  at Cinergy Field was reduced to 39,000 .
There was a huge wall in Center Field visible  बाद the renovations , to serve as the बैटर 's  eye .
The stadium  थी demolished by implosion  on December 29 , 2002 .
nexen टायर is a टायर निर्माता , headquartered in yangsan , दक्षिण gyeongsang  Province , and Seoul , both in South Korea .
Its  प्रमुख घरेलू प्रतिस्पर्धी हैं hankook  Tire and Kumho Tires .
The company 's name is  reflected in the कम्पनी स्लोगन , `` अगला सदी  Tire . ''
The silent majority is an  अनिर्दिष्ट विशाल बहुमत of लोगों in a देश or समूह जो do नहीं  express their opinions publicly .
The term was popularized ( though not first used ) by U.S. President Richard  निक्सन in a नवम्बर 3 , 1969 , वाक in जिससे he कहा , `` और so tonight—to तुम , the ग्रेट मूक बहुमत of my fellow  Americans—I ask for your support . ''
In this usage it referred to those Americans who did not join  in the विशाल demonstrations विरूद्ध the वियतनाम युद्ध at the समय , जो किया नहीं  join in the counterculture , and who did not participate in public discourse .
Nixon along with many others saw this group of  मध्य अमेरिकी as होने निष्प्रभ in the मीडिया by the अधिक गायन अल्पसंख्यक  .
The phrase was used in the 19th century as a euphemism referring to all the  लोगों जो have died , और अन्य have प्रयुक्त it पहले और  after Nixon to refer to groups of voters in various nations of the world .
Sam  , a rhesus मंकी , उड़ाया to an ऊँचाई of  88 km in 1959 .
( नासा  )
पहले इंसानो गई into स्पेस , अनेक पशु यहूद शुभारम्भ into स्पेस , सहित  numerous monkeys , so that scientists could investigate the biological effects of space travel .
The United States  शुभारम्भ फ़्लाइट containing primate कार्गो primarily between 1948-1961  with one flight in 1969 and one in 1985 .
France launched two  monkey-carrying फ़्लाइट in 1967  .
The Soviet Union and Russia  शुभारम्भ बंदरों between 1983 और 1996  .
Most monkeys  यहूद anesthetized पहले lift-off  .
Overall  thirty-two बंदरों उड़ाया in the स्पेस कार्यक्रम ;  none flew more than once .
numerous back-up बंदरों भी गई through  the programs but never flew .
Monkeys from several species  यहूद प्रयुक्त , सहित rhesus बंदरों , cynomolgus बंदरों , गिलहरी बंदरों  , and pig-tailed macaques .
Some chimpanzees ( which are  apes बल्कि than बंदरों ) यहूद  also used .
RAID ( redundant array of independent disks  , originally अनावश्यक सरणी of inexpensive डिस्क ) is a भंडार प्रौद्योगिकी कि  combines multiple disk drive components into a logical unit .
Data is distributed across the drives in one  of अनेक तरीके पुकारा `` रेड स्तर '' , depending on the स्तर of अतिरेक और प्रदर्शन  required .
The term `` RAID '' was  पहला पारिभाषित by दाउद पैटरसन , garth A. गिब्सन , और रैंडी katz at the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , Berkeley in 1987 .
Marketers representing industry RAID manufacturers  बाद attempted to reinvent the पद to describe a अनावश्यक सरणी of स्वतंत्र डिस्क as a अर्थात् of disassociating a low-cost अपेक्षा  from RAID technology .
RAID is now used as  an छतरियाँ पद लिये कंप्यूटर आंकड़ा भंडार योजनाएं कि can divide और replicate आंकड़ा among अनेक शारीरिक ड्राइव : रेड is an उदाहरण of भंडार आभासीकरण  and the array can be accessed by the operating system as one single drive .
the अलग योजनाएं or architectures हैं नामित  by the word RAID followed by a number ( e.g . RAID 0 , RAID 1 ) .
Each scheme provides a different balance between the  कुंजी लक्ष्य : विश्वसनीयता और उपलब्धता , प्रदर्शन और क्षमता  .
RAID levels greater than RAID 0 provide protection against  unrecoverable ( सेक्टर ) पढ़ा त्रुटियाँ , as खूब as पूरे डिस्क  failure .
A  lymphocyte is a प्रकार of श्वेत रक्त कोशिका in the vertebrate प्रतिरक्षा  system .
Under the  सूक्ष्मदर्शी , lymphocytes can be विभाजित into  large lymphocytes and small lymphocytes .
Large granular  lymphocytes शामिल प्राकृतिक कातिल कोशिकाएं ( nk  cells ) .
छोटी lymphocytes consist of t कोशिकाएं और  B cells .
The Big  lebowski is a 1998 अंधेरा कॉमेडी फिल्मी लिखा और निर्देशित by जोएल  and Ethan Coen .
Jeff Bridges stars as Jeff Lebowski , an  बेरोजगार लॉस एंजिल्स slacker और avid बॉलर , nicknamed `` the यार  . ''
बाद a मामला of mistaken पहचान , the यार is introduced to a करोड़पति भी  named Jeffrey Lebowski .
When the millionaire Lebowski 's trophy wife is later kidnapped , he  आयोग the यार to उद्धार the फिरौती to सुरक्षित उसके रिलीज  .
The plan goes awry when The  यार 's dost वाल्टर sobchak ( जॉन गुडमैन ) योजनाएं to रखना the पूरा फिरौती  .
स्टीव buscemi , फिलिप seymour हॉफमन , दाउद huddleston , julianne मूर , tara reid , और जॉन turturro भी स्टार in the  film , which is narrated by a cowboy known only as `` The Stranger '' , played by Sam Elliott .
The film is loosely inspired by  the कार्य of रेमंड चांडलर  .
Joel Coen stated : `` We wanted to do a  चांडलर दयालु of स्टोरी – कैसा it चालें episodically , और सौदे साथ the वर्ण trying to सुलझाना a रहस्य , as खूब  as having a hopelessly complex plot that 's ultimately unimportant . ''
The original score was  रचित by कार्टर burwell , a longtime collaborator of the  Coen Brothers .
the बिग lebowski थी a निराशा at the u.S. बक्सा दफ्तर  and received mixed reviews at the time of its release .
Reviews have  trended towards the धनात्मक over समय , और the फिल्मी रै become a cult पसंदीदा , विख्यात लिये इसके idiosyncratic  characters , dream sequences , unconventional dialogue , and eclectic soundtrack .
Severus Snape is a  fictional अक्षर in the हैरी कुम्हार किताब श्रेणी लिखा by j.K. रोलिंग  .
In the first  अनोखा of the श्रेणी , he is शत्रु toward हैरी और is निर्मित up to be the प्राथमिक  antagonist until the final chapters .
As the series  progresses , snape 's अक्षर becomes अधिक परतदार  and complex .
रोलिंग करता नहीं fully खुलासा the विवरण of उसके सच्चा loyalties जबतक the समाप्त of the फाइनल किताब ,  Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows .
over the कोर्स of the श्रेणी , snape 's portrayal evolves इससे कि of a दुर्भावनापूर्ण और दलगत टीचर  to that of a pivotal character of considerable complexity and moral ambiguity .
Snape  primarily सिखाती potions at हॉग्वार्ट्स , हालांकि in the छठे अनोखा he सिखाती रक्षा विरूद्ध the अंधेरा कला , a स्थिति  which he was known to have desired throughout the series .
He  ultimately becomes हेडमास्टर of हॉग्वार्ट्स  in the final novel .
Rowling  रै वर्णित उसे as `` a तोहफा of  a character '' .
Grits refers to a ground-corn  खाना of देशी अमरीकी उत्पत्ति , कि is आम in the  Southern United States and mainly eaten at breakfast .
Modern  grits हैं commonly बना of  alkali-treated corn known as hominy .
Grits are similar to other thick maize-based porridges from  around the संसार ऐसे as polenta or the thinner farina  .
`` Instant grits  '' have महरूम processed to गति  cooking .
The word ``  grits '' गर्भाशयी इससे the बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी शब्द ``  grytt , '' meaning coarse meal .
इस शब्द originally referred to गेहूं और अन्य porridges  now known as groats in parts of the U.K..
Maize , unknown in  यूरोपीय in the मध्य आयु , is a खाना निकला इससे मकई ( a नई संसार संयंत्र ) और `` मकई '' था महरूम प्रयुक्त to describe  wheat products in many European regions .
`` Grits '' may  be either एकवचन or बहुवचन ; historically , in the अमरीकी दक्षिण the शब्द थी invariably एकवचन notwithstanding इसके बहुवचन  form ( cf . such food names as `` spaghetti '' or `` linguine '' , likewise plural in form , but singular in use ) .
Sometimes  , grits हैं पुकारा sofkee or sofkey  ( from a native American Muskogee word ) .
In molecular biology , human  chorionic gonadotropin ( hcg ) is a हार्मोन उत्पादित by the निषेचित अंडा  after conception .
Later during pregnancy  it is बना by the विकासशील placenta , और बाद by the placental घटक syncytiotrophoblast  .
Some cancerous tumors produce this  हार्मोन ; इसलिए , elevated स्तर measured जब the रोगी is नहीं गर्भवती  can lead to a cancer diagnosis .
However , it is not known  whether इस उत्पादन is a contributing कारण or an प्रभाव of tumorigenesis  .
The pituitary analogue of hCG , known as  luteinizing हार्मोन ( lh ) , is उत्पादित in the pituitary  gland of males and females of all ages .
, the FDA has prohibited  the बिक्री of `` होम्योपैथिक '' और over the काउंटर hcg आहार उत्पाद  and declared them fraudulent and illegal .
The Las  वेगास स्ट्रिप संसार of coca-cola संग्रहालय  in 2003
coca-cola is a कार्बोनेटेड नरम पेय बेची in स्टोर्स , रेस्तरां , और वेंडिंग  machines in every country except Cuba and North Korea .
It is  उत्पादित by the coca-cola कम्पनी of अटलांटा , जॉर्जिया , और is प्रायः referred to बस as कोक ( a पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क  of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March 27 , 1944 ) .
Originally intended as a patent  आयुर्विज्ञान जब it थी invented in the लेट 19th सदी by जॉन pemberton , coca-cola थी खरीदा आउट by बिजनेसमैन asa griggs candler , जिनकी विपणन tactics led कोक to इसके दबदबा of the  world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century .
The  कम्पनी produces concentrate , जिससे is तब बेची to licensed  Coca-Cola bottlers throughout the world .
the bottlers , जो थाम territorially विशेष अनुबंध साथ the कम्पनी , उपज  finished product in cans and bottles from the concentrate in combination with filtered water and sweeteners .
The bottlers  तब बेचें , वितरित और merchandise coca-cola to  retail stores and vending machines .
Such bottlers include Coca-Cola  उद्यमों , जिससे is the largest सिंगल coca-cola bottler in उत्तर अमेरिका  and western Europe .
The Coca-Cola Company also sells  concentrate लिये सोडा स्रोतों to प्रमुख रेस्तरां और खाना सेवा  distributors .
The Coca-Cola Company  रै , on अवसर , introduced अन्य कोला पेय अंतर्गत  the Coke brand name .
The most common of these is Diet Coke  , साथ अन्य सहित caffeine-free coca-cola , आहार कोक caffeine-free , coca-cola चेरी , coca-cola शून्य , coca-cola वैनिला , और खास संस्करण  with lemon , lime or coffee .
Based on  interbrand 's बेहतरीन वैश्विक ब्रांड 2011 , coca-cola थी the संसार  's most valuable brand .
An ombudsman  is an आधिकारिक , प्रायः नियुक्त by the सरकारी or by पार्लियामेंट लकिन साथ a significant उपाधि of स्वतंत्रता , जो is चार्ज साथ representing the रूचि  of the public by investigating and addressing complaints of maladministration or violation of rights .
In some countries an Inspector General ,  नागरिक एडवोकेट or अन्य आधिकारिक may have कर्तव्य समान to those of a नेशनल ombudsman ,  and may also be appointed by the legislature .
Below the national level an ombudsman may be appointed by a state , local or  नगरपालिका सरकारी , और unofficial ombudsmen may be नियुक्त by , or भी कार्य लिये , a निगम ऐसे as a यूटिलिटी प्रदायक or a समाचारपत्र  , for an NGO , or for a professional regulatory body .
Whether  नियुक्त by the विधानमंडल , the कार्यपालिका , or an संगठन ( or , कम अक्सर , निर्वाचित by the constituency कि he or वो serves ) , the ठेठ कर्तव्य of  an ombudsman are to investigate complaints and attempt to resolve them , usually through recommendations ( binding or not ) or mediation .
Ombudsmen  sometimes भी उद्देश्य to पहचानो प्रणालीगत मुद्दे अग्रणी to ग़रीब सेवा or breaches  of people 's rights .
At the national level , most ombudsmen have a wide mandate to deal  साथ the संपूर्ण पब्लिक सेक्टर , और sometimes भी तत्व of  the private sector ( for example , contracted service providers ) .
In some cases , there is a more  प्रतिबंधित जनादेश , लिये उदाहरण साथ particular सेक्टर  of society .
More recent developments have included the creation of  specialised children 's ombudsman और सूचना कमिश्नर  agencies .
In some jurisdictions an  ombudsman चार्ज साथ the हैंडलिंग of चिंताएं परिचय नेशनल सरकारी is अधिक formally referred to as the `` संसदीय कमिश्नर '' ( e.g . the  United Kingdom Parliamentary Commissioner for Administration , and the Western Australian state Ombudsman ) .
In  अनेक देशों जहाँ the ombudsman 's remit extends परे dealing साथ कथित  maladministration to promoting and protecting human rights , the ombudsman is recognised as the national human rights institution .
The post of ombudsman had by  the समाप्त of the 20th सदी महरूम instituted by सबसे सरकारें और by कुछ intergovernmental  organizations such as the European Union .
Making a complaint to an  ombudsman is प्रायः फ़्री  of charge .
