Fall foliage  in the कस्बा of स्टो ,  Vermont
New England is a region in the  northeastern कोने of the संयुक्त राज्य consisting of the छह राज्य of maine , नई हैम्पशायर  , Vermont , Massachusetts , Rhode Island , and Connecticut .
New England is bordered by New York state  to the दक्षिणपश्चिम , क्यूबेक to the उत्तरपश्चिम , और नई ब्रंसविक और the अटलांटिक समंदर to  the east .
In one of  the earliest अंग्रेज़ी settlements in उत्तर अमेरिका , तीर्थयात्रियों इससे इंग्लैण्ड पहला settled  in New England in 1620 , to form Plymouth Colony .
Ten years later , the  puritans settled उत्तर of plymouth उपनिवेश in बोस्टन , यूँ  forming Massachusetts Bay Colony .
Over the next 130 years , New England  लड़ा in चार फ्रेंच और भारतीय युद्धों , जबतक the अंग्रेजों पराजित the फ्रेंच और  their native allies in North America .
In the late 18th century , the New England Colonies initiated the resistance to the  अंग्रेजों पार्लियामेंट 's प्रयत्न to थोपने नई कर बगैर the सहमति of the colonists  .
The Boston Tea Party was a protest to which  ग्रेट ब्रिटेन responded साथ a श्रेणी of दंडात्मक कानून stripping मैसाचुसेट्स of self-government  , which were termed the `` Intolerable Acts `` by the colonists .
The confrontation led  to खोलें warfare in 1775 , the expulsion of the अंग्रेजों अधिकारियों इससे नई इंग्लैण्ड  in spring 1776 , and the Declaration of Independence in July 1776 .
Some of the first movements of  अमरीकी साहित्य , दर्शनशास्त्र , और शिक्षा originated in नई इंग्लैण्ड  .
The region played a  prominent भूमिका in the गति to abolish गुलामी , और थी the पहला प्रदेश of the संयुक्त राज्य to be रूपांतरित  by the Industrial Revolution .
Today , New England is a major world center of  शिक्षा , ऊँची प्रौद्योगिकी , बीमे , और आयुर्विज्ञान  .
बोस्टन is इसके सांस्कृतिक , वित्तीय , शैक्षणिक  , medical and transportation center .
Each state is principally subdivided into small incorporated municipalities  ज्ञात as नई इंग्लैण्ड कस्बों , जिससे हैं प्रायः  governed by town meeting .
The only unincorporated territory in New England exists in  the sparse , उत्तरी regions of वर्मांट , नई हैम्पशायर , और maine  .
Since 1970 , voters have more  प्रायः समर्थित उदार उम्मीदवार at the राज्य और संघीय स्तर  than those of any other region in the United States .
New England  is the तभी एक of the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो 's नौ क्षेत्रीय विभाजन जिनकी नाम करता नहीं derive इससे  its geography , and it is the only multi-state region with clear , consistent boundaries .
It maintains a strong sense of  सांस्कृतिक पहचान नियत अलावा इससे the बाकी of the देश , हालांकि the शर्तें of इस पहचान हैं प्रायः लडे , combining puritanism साथ उदारतावाद , कृषिक जीवन साथ उद्योग , और अलगाव  with immigration .
आपात !
is an American television  श्रेणी कि combines the चिकित्सा नाटक और action-adventure  genres .
It was produced by  चिह्नित सात सीमित और वितरित by सार्वभौमिक studios  .
It debuted as a midseason replacement on  जनवरी 15 , 1972 , on एनबीसी , replacing the दो short-lived श्रेणी the साझेदार और the शुभ जीवन , और भागा जबतक सितंबर 3 , 1977 , साथ छह अतिरिक्त  two-hour television films during the following two years .
आपात  !
was created and produced by Jack  webb और रॉबर्ट A. cinader , दोनो of जिसको यहूद भी जिम्मेदार लिये the पुलिस  dramas Adam-12 and Dragnet .
The Eastern Time Zone ( ET  ) encompasses 17 u.S. राज्य in the पूर्वी भाग of the संलग्न संयुक्त राज्य , भाग of कनाडा और  three countries in South America .
Places that use Eastern  मानक समय ( est ) जब observing मानक समय ( autumn/winter ) हैं 5 घंटों पीछे समन्वित  Universal Time ( ) .
Eastern Daylight Time ( EDT ) , when observing daylight saving time (  spring/summer ) is 4 घंटों पीछे समन्वित सार्वभौमिक समय ( )  .
In the northern parts of the time zone , during the second Sunday in  कूच , at 2:00 a.m. est , घड़ियाँ हैं उन्नत to 3:00 a.m. edt leaving a एक घंटा `` गैप  . ''
During the first Sunday in  नवम्बर , at 2:00 a.m. edt , घड़ियाँ हैं स्थानांतरित वापस to 1:00 a.m. est ,  thus `` duplicating '' one hour .
Southern parts of the zone (  पनामा और the caribbean ) do नहीं observe daylight  saving .
मानक रूप of the आवधिक  table .
The colors represent  अलग श्रेणी of तत्व  explained below .
The periodic table is a tabular  प्रदर्शक of the रासायनिक तत्व , व्यवस्थित on the आधार of उनके परमाणु संख्याएँ ,  electron configurations , and recurring chemical properties .
Elements are presented  in अनुक्रम of increasing परमाणु क्रमांक  ( number of protons ) .
the मानक रूप of तालिका comprises an 18 × 7 ग्रिड  or main body of elements , positioned above a smaller double row of elements .
The table can also be deconstructed into four rectangular blocks : the  s-block to the बाएँ , the p-block to the सही , the d-block in the मध्य , और the f-block  below that .
The rows of the table are called periods ; the columns  of the s- , d- , और p-blocks हैं पुकारा समूह , साथ कुछ of ये having names ऐसे as the हैलोजन्स  or the noble gases .
Since , by definition , a periodic table incorporates recurring trends , any such table can be  प्रयुक्त to derive संबंध between the गुण of the तत्व और भविष्यवाणी the गुण of नई , yet to be खोजा or synthesized  , elements .
As a result , a periodic table—whether in the standard form or  कुछ अन्य variant—provides a उपयोगी फ्रेमवर्क लिये analyzing रासायनिक बर्ताव , और ऐसे टेबल  are widely used in chemistry and other sciences .
Although precursors exist , Dmitri Mendeleev  is generally credited साथ the प्रकाशन , in 1869 , of the पहला widely  recognized periodic table .
He  विकसित उसके तालिका to illustrate आवधिक  trends in the properties of the then-known elements .
Mendeleev also predicted some  गुण of then-unknown तत्व कि होता be अपेक्षित  to fill gaps in this table .
Most of his  पूर्वानुमान यहूद proved सही जब the तत्व in सवाल यहूद  subsequently discovered .
Mendeleev 's periodic table has since been expanded  और परिष्कृत साथ the डिस्कवरी or संश्लेषण of further नई तत्व और the विकास of नई सैद्धांतिक मॉडल to बताइये रासायनिक बर्ताव  .
All  तत्व इससे परमाणु संख्याएँ 1 ( हाइड्रोजन ) to 118  ( ununoctium ) have been discovered or synthesized .
The elements from 1 to 98 ( californium ) have been found to exist naturally , although some are found only in trace  amounts और यहूद initially खोजा by संश्लेषण in laboratories  .
The elements  बाद 98 have तभी महरूम synthesized  in laboratories .
उत्पादन of तत्व परे ununoctium is होने धड़ा , साथ the सवाल of कैसा the आवधिक तालिका may need to be परिवर्धित to accommodate  any such additions being a matter of ongoing debate .
Numerous synthetic  radionuclides of naturally occurring तत्व have भी महरूम उत्पादित  in laboratories .
Minecraft is a  सैंडबॉक्स इंडी खेल originally निर्मित by स्वीडिश प्रोग्रामर markus `` पायदान '' persson और बाद  developed and published by Mojang .
It was publicly released  लिये the pc on may 17 , 2009 , as a developmental अल्फा संस्करण और , बाद क्रमिक अद्यतन  , was published as a full release version on November 18 , 2011 .
A version for Android was  released a माह पहले on अक्तूबर 7 , और an आईओएस संस्करण थी released on नवम्बर  17 , 2011 .
On May 9 , 2012 , the game was released on Xbox  360 as an एक्सबॉक्स सजीव आर्केड खेल , co-developed by 4j studios  .
All  संस्करण of minecraft प्राप्त  periodic updates .
The creative and building aspects of Minecraft allow players to build  constructions आउट of textured घन in a 3d procedurally उत्पन्न संसार .
Other activities in the game  शामिल खोजी , महफ़िल संसाधन , crafting  and combat .
Gameplay in its commercial release has two  प्रिंसिपल मोड्स : अस्तित्व , जिससे requires खिलाड़ी to acquire संसाधन और maintain उनके स्वास्थ्य और भूख ; और रचनात्मक  , where players have an unlimited supply of resources , the ability to fly , and no health or hunger .
A third gameplay mode named hardcore is the same as survival , differing only in difficulty ; it is  नियत to hardest सेटिंग और respawning is निष्क्रिय , forcing खिलाड़ी to हटाएँ उनके संसार upon मौत  .
Minecraft received five awards from the 2011 Game Developers Conference : it was awarded the Innovation Award , Best Downloadable Game Award , and the Best Debut  खेल पुरस्कार इससे the खेल डेवलपर चुनाव पुरस्कार ; और the दर्शक पुरस्कार , as खूब as the seumas mcnally ग्रैंड पुरस्कार , इससे the स्वतंत्र  Games Festival in 2011 .
In 2012 ,  minecraft थी awarded a सुनहरी जॉयस्टिक पुरस्कार in the श्रेणी बेहतरीन  Downloadable Game .
As of April 8 , 2013 , the game has sold over 10 million copies  on pc और as of जनवरी 22 , 2013 , over 20 लाख नक़ल आरपार  all platforms .
The  अंधेरा नाईट is a 2008 british-american सुपरहीरो फिल्मी निर्देशित , उत्पादित , और co-written  by Christopher Nolan .
Based on the  dc कॉमिक्स अक्षर बैटमैन , the फिल्मी is the दूसरी भाग of  Nolan 's Batman film series and a sequel to 2005 's Batman Begins .
Christian Bale reprises the lead role  of ब्रूस wayne/batman , साथ a returning डाल of माइकल caine as अल्फ्रेड pennyworth , गेरी  Oldman as James Gordon and Morgan Freeman as Lucius Fox .
The film introduces the character of Harvey Dent ( Aaron Eckhart ) , Gotham 's newly elected District Attorney and the consort of  ब्रूस वेन 's बाल्यकाल dost रेचल dawes ( मैगी जिलएनहॉल ) , जो joins बैटमैन और the पुलिस in combating the नई उठती threat of a दण्ड मास्टरमाइंड कॉलिंग  himself `` The Joker `` ( Heath Ledger ) .
Nolan 's inspiration for the film was the Joker 's  कॉमिक किताब डेब्यू in 1940 , the 1988 ग्राफिक अनोखा , और the 1996 श्रेणी , जिससे retold two-face  's origin .
The  उपनाम `` the अंधेरा नाईट '' थी पहला लागू to बैटमैन in बैटमैन no . 1 ( 1940 ) , in a  story written by Bill Finger .
The  अंधेरा नाईट थी फिल्माया primarily in शिकागो , as खूब as in अनेक  other locations in the United States , the United Kingdom , and Hong Kong .
Nolan used  an imax कैमरा to फिल्मी कुछ  sequences , including the Joker 's first appearance in the film .
On January 22 , 2008 , some months after he had completed filming on The  अंधेरा नाईट और छह महीने पहले the फिल्मी 's रिलीज , झाड़ लेजर died इससे a विषाक्त संयोजन of नुस्खा  drugs , leading to intense attention from the press and movie-going public .
Warner Bros.  था initially निर्मित a वाइरल विपणन अभियान लिये the अंधेरा नाईट , विकासशील promotional वेबसाइटों और trailers highlighting स्क्रीन  shots of Ledger as the Joker , but after Ledger 's death , the studio refocused its promotional campaign .
The Dark Knight was released on July 16 ,  2008 in ऑस्ट्रेलिया , on जुलाई 18 , 2008 in उत्तर अमेरिका ,  and on July 24 , 2008 in the United Kingdom .
Considered  एक of the बेहतरीन films of the 2000s और एक of the बेहतरीन सुपरहीरो films कभी बना , the फिल्मी प्राप्त अत्यधिक धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ और नियत  numerous records during its theatrical run .
With over $ 1 billion in revenue worldwide , it is the  14th-highest-grossing फिल्मी of सब समय , unadjusted लिये महंगाई  .
The film received eight Academy Award nominations ; it won  the पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन ध्वनि संपादन और लेजर थी मरणोपरांत awarded बेहतरीन  Supporting Actor .
The Dark Knight Rises , the final part of  the त्रयी , थी released on जुलाई 20  , 2012 .
The timeline of  रेडियो सूचियाँ भीतर the इतिहास of रेडियो , the प्रौद्योगिकी और कार्यक्रम कि उत्पादित यंत्र कि उपयोग रेडियो लहरें और क्रियाएँ  that people undertook .
बाद , the इतिहास is वर्चस्व by प्रोग्रामिंग और  contents , which is closer to general history .
The Sydney Opera House is a  multi-venue performing कला केन्द्र in नई दक्षिण वेल्स  , Australia .
It was conceived and largely built by Danish  वास्तु jørn utzon , खोलने in 1973 बाद a long gestation कि began साथ उसके competition-winning  design in 1957 .
Joseph Cahill 's  नई दक्षिण वेल्स सरकारी दिया the go-ahead लिये कार्य  to begin in 1958 .
The government 's  बिंदास निर्णय to चुनें utzon 's डिज़ाइन is प्रायः निष्प्रभ  by the scandal that followed .
It is on Bennelong Point in Sydney  harbour , बंद to the सिडनी harbour  Bridge .
It sits at the northeastern tip of  the सिडनी सेंट्रल कारोबार ज़िला ( the सीबीडी ) , घिरी on तीन पहलू by the harbour  ( Sydney Cove and Farm Cove ) and inland by the Royal Botanic Gardens .
contrary to इसके नाम , it घरों अनेक  performance venues .
It is among the busiest performing arts centres in the world , hosting over 1,500  प्रदर्शन प्रत्येक साल attended by कुछ 1.2 लाख  people .
It provides a venue for many performing-arts companies , including the four key  निवासी कंपनियाँ ओपेरा ऑस्ट्रेलिया , the ऑस्ट्रेलियाई बैले , the सिडनी थिएटर कम्पनी और the सिडनी सिंफनी ऑर्केस्ट्रा , और presents a चौड़ी दायरा of  productions on its own account .
It is also one of  the सबसे लोकप्रिय आगंतुक आकर्षण in ऑस्ट्रेलिया , साथ अधिक than सात लाख लोगों visiting  each year , 300,000 of whom take a guided tour .
It is  administered by the सिडनी ओपेरा हाउस विश्वास , अंतर्गत the नई दक्षिण  Wales Ministry of the Arts .
On 28  जून 2007 , it थी बना a  UNESCO World Heritage Site .
It is one  of the 20th सदी 's सबसे distinctive इमारतें और एक of the सबसे  famous performing arts centres in the world .
A  आलेख of देह द्रव्यमान अनुक्रमणिका as a फलन of देह द्रव्यमान और  body height is shown above .
The  dashed लाइनों represent subdivisions भीतर a प्रमुख  class .
For instance the `` Underweight ''  वर्गीकरण is further विभाजित into `` कठोर '' , `` मॉडरेट  '' , and `` mild '' subclasses .
The  देह द्रव्यमान अनुक्रमणिका ( बीएमआई ) , or quetelet अनुक्रमणिका , is a माप  for human body shape based on an individual 's weight and height .
It was devised between 1830 and 1850 by the  belgian बहुश्रुत adolphe quetelet दौरान the कोर्स of विकासशील `` सोशल  physics '' .
Body mass index is  पारिभाषित as the व्यक्तिगत 's देह द्रव्यमान विभाजित by the वर्गाकार  of their height .
The  formulae universally प्रयुक्त in आयुर्विज्ञान  produce a unit of measure of kg/m2 .
BMI can also be determined using a BMI chart , which displays  बीएमआई as a फलन of वज़न ( आड़ा अक्ष ) और ऊँचाई ( लंबवत अक्ष ) using रुपरेखा लाइनों  for different values of BMI or colors for different BMI categories .
† The factor for UK/US units is more  precisely 703.06957964 , लकिन कि स्तर of परिशुद्धता is नहीं सार्थक  for this calculation .
To work from stone and pounds  पहला गुणा the स्टोन by 14 तब add the पाउंड to दे the पूरे द्रव्यमान in पाउंड ; to कार्य  from feet and inches first multiply the feet by 12 then add the inches to give the whole height in inches .
Thomas Paine ( January 29 ,  1737 ( ns फ़रवरी 9 , 1737 ) – जून 8 , 1809 ) थी an english-american राजनैतिक activist ,  author , political theorist and revolutionary .
As the author of  दो अत्यधिक influential pamphlets at the प्रारंभ of the अमरीकी  Revolution , he inspired the Patriots in 1776 to declare independence from Britain .
उसके विचार reflected आत्मज्ञान era बयानबाजी of transnational  human rights .
He has been called `` a  corsetmaker by व्यापार , a पत्रकार by व्यवसायिक , और a propagandist  by inclination . ''
Born in Thetford , England , in the county of Norfolk , Paine emigrated to the British American  colonies in 1774 साथ the सहायता of बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन और he arrived in समय  to participate in the American Revolution .
उसके प्रिंसिपल योगदान यहूद the शक्तिशाली , widely पढ़ा pamphlet आम भाव ( 1776 ) , the all-time best-selling अमरीकी किताब कि advocated  colonial America 's independence from the Kingdom of Great Britain , and The American Crisis ( 1776–83 ) , a pro-revolutionary pamphlet series .
Common Sense was so influential that John  एडम्स कहा , `` बगैर the कलम of the लेखक of आम भाव  , the sword of Washington would have been raised in vain.”
paine जिया in फ़्रांस लिये सबसे of the 1790s , बनने deeply  involved in the French Revolution .
He wrote the Rights of Man ( 1791 ) ,  in भाग a रक्षा of the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति  against its critics .
His attacks on British  लेखक एडमंड बुर्के led to a विचारण और conviction in absentia in 1792 लिये the  crime of seditious libel .
In 1792 , despite not being able to speak French  , he थी निर्वाचित to the फ्रेंच नेशनल सम्मेलन  .
The  girondists regarded उसे as an ally  .
नतीजतन , the montagnards , विशेषकर robespierre  , regarded him as an enemy .
In December 1793 , he was  गिरफ्तार और imprisoned in पेरिस , तब released in 1794  .
He became notorious because of The Age of Reason ( 1793–94 ) , his book that advocates  देववाद , promotes कारण और freethinking , और argues विरूद्ध institutionalized  religion in general and Christian doctrine in particular .
He also wrote the pamphlet Agrarian Justice ( 1795 ) , discussing the  origins of प्रॉपर्टी , और introduced the अवधारणा of a गारंटी  minimum income .
In 1802 , he  लौटे to अमेरिका जहाँ he died on जून  8 , 1809 .
Only six people attended  उसके अंत्येष्टि as he था महरूम ostracized  for his ridicule of Christianity .
Clinical trials are sets of tests in medical research and drug development  कि generate सुरक्षा और efficacy आंकड़ा ( or अधिक specifically , सूचना परिचय प्रतिकूल ड्रग प्रतिक्रियाएँ और प्रतिकूल प्रभाव of अन्य उपचार ) लिये स्वास्थ्य interventions (  e.g. , drugs , diagnostics , devices , therapy protocols ) .
They are conducted only after satisfactory information has been gathered on the quality of the non clinical  सुरक्षा , और स्वास्थ्य authority/ethics कमेटी स्वीकृति is granted in the देश जहाँ स्वीकृति of the ड्रग or यंत्र is  sought .
Previously , many  उभरते देशों किया नहीं आवश्यकता लोकल ट्रायल लिये उत्पाद  approvals .
Now , though  उभरते देशों स्टिल accept आंकड़ा इससे u.s./europe , वे भी आवश्यकता कुछ  local trials .
Depending on the type of product  और the स्टेज of इसके विकास , जांचकर्ताओं initially enroll स्वयंसेवक and/or मरीजों into छोटी पायलट अध्ययन , और subsequently conduct larger स्केल अध्ययन in  patients that often compare the new product with others already approved for the affliction of interest .
As positive safety and efficacy data are  gathered , the क्रमांक of मरीजों is typically  increased .
नैदानिक ट्रायल can vary in आकार , और can involve a सिंगल शोध एंटिटी in एक देश  or many such entities in multiple countries .
A full  श्रेणी of ट्रायल may incur sizable लागत , और the बोझ of paying लिये सब the जरुरी लोगों और सेवाएं is प्रायः borne  by the sponsor , which may be a governmental organization or a pharmaceutical , biotechnology or medical device company .
When the diversity of required support roles exceeds the resources of  the प्रायोजक , a नैदानिक विचारण is प्रबंधित by an outsourced संगी , ऐसे as a अनुबंध शोध संगठन or a नैदानिक ट्रायल  unit in the academic sector .
The Green Bay Packers are an  अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल टोली आधारित in ग्रीन खाड़ी  , Wisconsin .
They are  सदस्यों of the उत्तर प्रभाग of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) in  the National Football League ( NFL ) .
Green Bay  is the third-oldest मताधिकार in the एनएफएल , having महरूम व्यवस्थित  and playing in 1919 .
The Packers  हैं the तभी non-profit , community-owned प्रमुख लीग  professional sports team in the United States .
the पैकर्स हैं the पिछला vestige of `` छोटी कस्बा टीमों '' कि यहूद एकबार आम  in the NFL during the 1920s and 1930s .
संस्थापित in 1919 by अर्ल `` घुंघराले '' lambeau ( hence the नाम lambeau फ़ील्ड on जिससे the टोली plays ) और  George Whitney Calhoun , the Green Bay Packers can trace their lineage to other semi-professional teams in Green Bay dating back to 1896 .
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a  semi-professional फ़ुटबॉल टोली विरूद्ध क्लब इससे around विस्कॉन्सिन  and the Midwest .
They joined the American Professional  फ़ुटबॉल संघ ( apfa ) in 1921 , the forerunner to कया is ज्ञात आज as the नेशनल  Football League ( NFL ) .
Although Green Bay is the last NFL ``  छोटी कस्बा '' टोली , इसके लोकल प्रशंसक आधार और मीडिया extends into आसपास मिल्वौकी ; the टोली भी  played selected home games there between 1933 and 1994 .
The Green Bay Packers have won 13 league championships ( more than any other team in the NFL ) , including nine NFL championships prior to the Super Bowl era  और चार सुपर कटोरी victories —in 1967 ( सुपर कटोरी i ) , 1968 ( सुपर कटोरी ii ) , 1997 ( सुपर कटोरी xxxi ) और 2011 ( सुपर कटोरी xlv )  .
The Packers have long-standing , bitter rivalries with their NFC  उत्तर ( formerly the nfc सेंट्रल ) प्रतिद्वंद्वियों , the शिकागो bears , मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स  and the Detroit Lions .
The  bears-packers फंसने is एक of the oldest rivalries in एनएफएल इतिहास  , dating back to 1921 .
Ethanol fuel is ethanol ( ethyl alcohol  ) , the वही प्रकार of दारू मिला in alcoholic पेय  .
It is  सबसे प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a मोटर ईंधन , मुख्यतः as a biofuel योगात्मक  for gasoline .
World ethanol  उत्पादन लिये हस्तांतरण ईंधन tripled between 2000  and 2007 from 17 billion to more than 52 billion liters .
From 2007 to 2008 , the share  of इथेनॉल in वैश्विक गैसोलीन प्रकार ईंधन उपयोग increased  from 3.7 % to 5.4 % .
In 2011 worldwide ethanol fuel production reached 22.36 billion U.S. liquid gallons ( bg ) ( 84.6 billion liters ) , with  the संयुक्त राज्य as the शीर्ष निर्माता साथ 13.9 bg ( 52.6 अरब liters ) , हिसाब लिये 62.2 % of वैश्विक उत्पादन , followed  by Brazil with 5.6 bg ( 21.1 billion liters ) .
Ethanol fuel has a ``  गैसोलीन गैलन equivalency `` ( gge ) मान of , जिससे अर्थात् 1.5 गैलन of इथेनॉल उपज the  energy of one gallon of gasoline .
Ethanol fuel is widely used  in ब्राज़ील और in the संयुक्त राज्य , और साथ दोनो देशों यहूद जिम्मेदार  for 87.1 % of the world 's ethanol fuel production in 2011 .
Most cars  on the सड़क आज in the u.S. can चलाएं on मिश्रणों of up to 10 % इथेनॉल , और इथेनॉल  represented 10 % of the U.S. gasoline fuel supply derived from domestic sources in 2011 .
Since 1976 the Brazilian government has made it mandatory to blend ethanol with gasoline , and  चूंकि 2007 the विधिक मिश्रण is around 25 % इथेनॉल और 75 % गैसोलीन ( e25 )  .
By December 2011 Brazil had a fleet of 14.8 million flex-fuel automobiles and light trucks and  1.5 लाख flex-fuel मोटरसाइकिल कि regularly उपयोग neat इथेनॉल ईंधन ( ज्ञात as e100  ) .
Bioethanol is a form of renewable energy  कि can be उत्पादित इससे agricultural feedstocks  .
It can be  बना इससे बहुत आम फसलों ऐसे as शुगर cane  , potato , manioc and corn .
वहीँ रै महरूम considerable बहस परिचय कैसा उपयोगी bioethanol  will be in replacing gasoline .
Concerns about its production and use  सुनाना to increased खाना कीमतें due to the विशाल राशि of arable जमीन जरूरी लिये फसलों , as खूब as the उर्जा और प्रदूषण संतुलन of the पूरे  cycle of ethanol production , especially from corn .
Recent developments with cellulosic ethanol  उत्पादन और व्यावसायीकरण may allay कुछ of ये  concerns .
Cellulosic ethanol offers promise  क्युकी cellulose मछली , a प्रमुख और सार्वभौमिक घटक in  plant cells walls , can be used to produce ethanol .
According to the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय उर्जा एजेंसी , cellulosic इथेनॉल could allow इथेनॉल fuels to खेल a much बडे  role in the future than previously thought .
साब 9-3 sportcombi  BioPower .
The second E85 flexifuel model  introduced by साब in the स्वीडिश मार्केट  .
A  प्लैक commemorating the स्थान of the साराजेवो हत्या और कदम of gavrilo princip ( चित्र लिया in 1987 , पहले कदम यहूद removed in 1992 और प्लैक  changed from Cyrillic to Latin script )
A plaque  commemorating the स्थान of the साराजेवो हत्या ( चित्र  taken in 2009 )
On 28 June 1914 , Archduke Franz Ferdinand of  ऑस्ट्रिया , वारिस presumptive to the austro-hungarian सिंहासन , और उसके बीवी , सोफी , duchess of hohenberg , यहूद शॉट मुर्दे in साराजेवो , by gavrilo princip  , one of a group of six Bosnian Serb assassins coordinated by Danilo Ilić .
The  राजनैतिक उद्देश्य of the हत्या थी to ब्रेक बंद austria-hungary 's  south-Slav provinces so they could be combined into a Greater Serbia or a Yugoslavia .
The assassins ' motives  यहूद सतत साथ the गति कि बाद became ज्ञात  as Young Bosnia .
Serbian military  अधिकारियों stood पीछे the आक्रमण  .
At the top of these Serbian military conspirators was Chief of Serbian Military Intelligence Dragutin  dimitrijević , उसके righthand man प्रमुख vojislav tankosić , और masterspy rade malobabić  .
Major Tankosić  हथियारबंद the हत्यारे साथ बम और pistols  and trained them .
The assassins were given access to the same  clandestine टनल of safe-houses और एजेंटों कि rade malobabić प्रयुक्त लिये the घुसपैठ  of weapons and operatives into Austria-Hungary .
The assassins , the key members  of the clandestine टनल , और the कुंजी सर्बियाई सैन्य षड्यंत्रकारियों जो यहूद स्टिल जिंदा यहूद गिरफ्तार  , tried , convicted and punished .
Those who were  गिरफ्तार in बोस्निया यहूद आजमाया in साराजेवो in अक्तूबर  1914 .
The other conspirators were arrested and tried before a Serbian kangaroo  अदालत on the french-controlled salonika सामने in 1916–1917 on unrelated गलत आरोप ; सर्बिया चलाया तीन of the  top military conspirators .
Much of what  is ज्ञात परिचय the assassinations आता इससे ये दो ट्रायल और सम्बन्धित  records .
Assignment of  जिम्मेदारी लिये the bombing और हत्याएं of 28 जून is अत्यधिक विवादास्पद क्युकी  the attack led to the outbreak of World War I one month later .
Renée Kathleen  zellweger ( born अप्रैल 25 , 1969 ) is an अमरीकी  actress and producer .
Zellweger first gained widespread attention for her role in the film Jerry  मैग्वायर ( 1996 ) , और subsequently प्राप्त दो nominations लिये the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री लिये उसके भूमिकाएँ as ब्रिजेट जोन्स in the कॉमेडी ब्रिजेट जोन्स 's डायरी ( 2001 ) ,  and as Roxie Hart in the musical Chicago ( 2002 ) .
She won the Academy Award for Best  supporting अभिनेत्री लिये उसके प्रदर्शन in the नाटक ठंडा पहाड़ (  2003 ) .
She has won an Academy Award , three Golden Globe Awards , three Screen Actors Guild Awards , and a BAFTA Award ; was  नामित hasty खीर 's स्त्री of the साल in 2009 ; और स्थापित herself as एक of the highest-paid  Hollywood actresses as of 2007 .
The  ossicles ( भी पुकारा auditory ossicles ) हैं the तीन smallest हड्डियों in the इंसान देह  , the malleus , the incus and the stapes .
They are contained within the middle ear space and  serve to संचारण ध्वनि इससे the एयर to the fluid-filled व्यामोह ( cochlea  ) .
The absence of the auditory  ossicles होता constitute a moderate-to-severe सुनना  loss .
The term `` ossicles  '' वस्तुतः अर्थात् `` छोटा हड्डियों '' और commonly refers to the auditory ossicles , हालांकि the पद may  refer to any small bone throughout the body .
The New Covenant ( Hebrew • • — Greek • •  diatheke kaine ) is a biblical निर्वचन originally निकला इससे a phrase in the किताब of यिर्मयाह  , in the Hebrew Scriptures .
It is often thought of as an  eschatological मुक्तिदाता आयु or संसार to आइये और is सम्बन्धित to the biblical अवधारणा  of the Kingdom of God .
Generally , Christians believe that the New Covenant was instituted at the  पिछला भोजन as भाग of the eucharist , जिससे in the इन्जील of जॉन शामिल the नई commandment  .
There are several Christian eschatologies that  further define the नई वचन , as an उदाहरण an उदघाटन eschatology defines और describes the नई वचन as an जारी संबंध between ईसाई ईमानवालों और परमेश्वर कि होगा be in पूरा फलीभूत  after the Second Coming of Christ ; that is , it will not only be in full fruition in believing hearts , but in the future external world as well .
The connection between the Blood of Christ and the  नई वचन is देखी in सबसे आधुनिक अंग्रेज़ी अनुवाद of the नई वसीयत साथ the saying : `` इस कप कि is poured आउट  for you is the new covenant in my blood '' .
Christians  मानना कि यीशु is the मध्यस्थ of the नई वचन , और कि the रक्त of मसीह शेड  at his crucifixion is the required blood of the covenant .
As with  सब covenants between परमेश्वर और man वर्णित in the बाइबल , the नई वचन  is considered `` a bond in blood sovereignly administered by God . ''
It has been  theorized कि the नई वचन is the विधि of मसीह  as spoken during his Sermon on the Mount .
The following List of people pardoned  or granted दया by the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त  States documents the most prominent cases of each presidency .
As granted by the Constitution ( Article II , Section 2 , Clause 1 )  , राष्ट्रपतियों have the शक्ति to ग्रान्ट दया in एक or अधिक of the following तरीके : the क्षमता to ग्रान्ट a पूरा pardon  , to commute a sentence , or to rescind a fine .
U.S. Presidents have  no शक्ति to ग्रान्ट दया लिये अपराधों prosecuted  under state law .
As to the  अंतर between a pardon और a commutation:
A pardon is an executive  अनुक्रम vacating a conviction .
A commutation is the mitigation of the sentence of someone  फिलहाल सेवारत a वाक्य लिये a अपराधों pursuant to a conviction , बगैर  vacating the conviction itself .
Approximately 20,000 pardons and  clemencies यहूद जारी by u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों in the 20th सदी अलोन  .
The  रिकॉर्ड of अधिनियमों of दया यहूद  public until 1934 .
In  1981 the दफ्तर of the pardon attorney थी निर्मित और रिकॉर्ड इससे  President H. W. Bush forward are now listed .
This list  शामिल pardons और commutations  .
Tampa (  ) is a नगर in the u.S. राज्य of  Florida .
It serves as the county seat for Hillsborough County  और is स्तिथ on the वेस्ट coast of फ्लोरिडा , on tampa खाड़ी निकट  the Gulf of Mexico .
The  जनसांख्यिकी of tampa in 2011 थी 346,037  .
The current location of Tampa was once inhabited by indigenous peoples of  the सुरक्षा हार्बर संस्कृति , सबसे notably the tocobaga और the pohoy , जो जिया साथ the shores of  Tampa Bay .
It was  briefly छान by स्पेनी explorers in the जल्दी 16th सदी , लकिन वहीँ यहूद no स्थाई अमरीकी or यूरोपीय settlements  within today 's city limits until after the United States had acquired Florida from Spain in 1819 .
in 1824 , the संयुक्त राज्य फौज स्थापित a frontier चौकी पुकारा फोर्ट ब्रुक at the मुँह of  the Hillsborough River , near the site of today 's Tampa Convention Center .
The first civilian  निवासियों यहूद pioneers जो settled निकट the फोर्ट लिये सुरक्षा  from the nearby Seminole population .
The town grew  धीरे जबतक the 1880s , जब रेलरोड कड़ी , the डिस्कवरी of फास्फेट , और the आगमन of the सिगार उद्योग jump-started  Tampa 's development and helped it to grow into an important city by the early 1900s .
आज , tampa is a भाग of the महानगर क्षेत्रफल  most commonly referred to as the Tampa Bay Area .
For U.S. Census purposes  , tampa is भाग of the tampa-st. petersburg-clearwater , फ्लोरिडा महानगर सांख्यिकीय  Area .
The four-county area is composed of roughly 2.7 million  निवासियों , बनाना it the दूसरी largest महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल ( एमएसए ) in the राज्य , और the चौथी largest in the southeastern  United States , behind Miami , Washington , D.C. , and Atlanta .
The Greater Tampa Bay area has just over  4 लाख निवासियों और generally शामिल the tampa  and Sarasota metro areas .
The Tampa Bay Partnership and U.S. Census data showed  an औसत सालाना विकास of 2.47 प्रतिशत , or a लाभ of लगभग 97,000 निवासियों प्रति साल  .
Between 2000 and 2006 , the Greater  tampa खाड़ी मार्केट अनुभवी a संयुक्त विकास रेट of 14.8 प्रतिशत , growing इससे 3.4 लाख to 3.9 लाख और hitting  the 4 million people mark on April 1 , 2007 .
A 2012 estimate shows the Tampa Bay  क्षेत्रफल जनसांख्यिकी to have 4,310,524 लोगों और a 2017 प्रक्षेप of 4,536,854 लोगों  .
Tampa has a number of sports teams ,  ऐसे as the tampa खाड़ी buccaneers of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग , the tampa खाड़ी बिजली of the  National Hockey League , and the Tampa Bay Storm of the Arena Football League .
The Tampa Bay Rays in Major League Baseball and the Tampa Bay  rowdies of the उत्तर अमरीकी सॉकर लीग खेल उनके घर खेल in  neighboring St. Petersburg , Florida .
In 2008 , Tampa was  क्रमित as the 5th बेहतरीन बाहरी  city by Forbes .
A 2004 survey by the NYU newspaper Washington Square News ranked Tampa  as a शीर्ष नगर लिये `` twenty-somethings .  ''
Tampa is now ranked  as a `` गामा '' संसार नगर  by Loughborough University .
According to Loughborough , Tampa ranks alongside other world  शहरों ऐसे as फीनिक्स , सेंटो डोमिंगो , और  Osaka .
In recent years Tampa has seen a  notable upsurge in high-market माँग इससे उपभोक्ता , signaling  more wealth concentrated in the area .
Tampa hosted the 2012  रिपब्लिकन नेशनल सम्मेलन  .
The Chevrolet Cavalier  थी a कॉम्पैक्ट ऑटोमोबाइल उत्पादित इससे 1982 to 2005 by  General Motors .
निर्मित on the कम्पनी 's j मंच , the cavalier उत्पादित the  highest sales in 1984 .
AT & T  गतिशीलता llc ब्रांडेड और referred to as at & t ( formerly cingular बेतार llc ) , is a wholly स्वामित्व subsidiary of at & t inc. कि provides बेतार सेवाएं to 107 लाख सदस्य in the संयुक्त राज्य  , including Puerto Rico and the U.S. Virgin Islands .
AT & T Mobility is the second largest wireless  दूरसंचार प्रदाता in the संयुक्त राज्य और प्यूर्टो रीको , पीछे verizon  Wireless , which serves 115.78 million customers as of the fourth quarter of 2012 .
AT & T Mobility is headquartered in the Lenox  पार्क क्षेत्रफल of dekalb co. जॉर्जिया , बस बाहर  Atlanta .
Originally Cingular Wireless LLC from 2000 to 2007 , a joint  venture between sbc संचार और bellsouth , the कम्पनी acquired the बूढ़ा at & t बेतार in 2004 ; sbc बाद acquired  the original AT & T and re-branded as `` AT & T '' .
Cingular became  wholly स्वामित्व by at & t in दिसम्बर 2006 as a परिणाम of at & t 's  acquisition of BellSouth .
in जनवरी 2007 , cingular पुष्टि it होता re-brand  itself under the AT & T name .
Although the legal corporate name change occurred immediately , for  दोनो नियामक और brand-awareness कारण दोनो ब्रांड्स यहूद प्रयुक्त in the कम्पनी 's साइनेज और विज्ञापन दौरान  a transition period .
The transition concluded in late June , just  prior to the rollout of the ठहराना iphone .
On March 20 , 2011 , AT & T  गतिशीलता घोषित इसके इरादे to acquire t-mobile यूएसए इससे  Deutsche Telekom for $ 39 billion .
If it  था प्राप्त सरकारी और नियामक स्वीकृति , at  & T would have had more than 130 million subscribers .
However , the U.S. Department of Justice , the Federal Communications Commission , and  at & t गतिशीलता 's प्रतिस्पर्धी ( ऐसे as स्प्रिंट nextel ) opposed the मूव on the grounds कि it होता reduce प्रतियोगिता in the सेल्यूलर संचार मार्केट  .
In December 2011 , in the face of both governmental and  फैली उपभोक्ता विपक्ष , at & t withdrew उनके प्रस्ताव  to complete the merger .
Martin Luther King , Jr. ( January 15 , 1929  – अप्रैल 4 , 1968 ) थी an अमरीकी clergyman , activist , और नेता in the african-american  Civil Rights Movement .
He is best known for  उसके भूमिका in the उन्नति of सिविल अधिकारों using nonviolent  civil disobedience .
King has  become a नेशनल प्रतीक in the इतिहास of अमरीकी प्रगतिवाद  .
A Baptist minister ,  किंग became a सिविल अधिकारों activist जल्दी in उसके  career .
He led the 1955 Montgomery Bus  बहिष्कार और helped मिला the दक्षिणी ईसाई नेतृत्व सम्मेलन (  SCLC ) in 1957 , serving as its first president .
With the SCLC , King led an  unsuccessful संघर्ष विरूद्ध पृथक्करण in albany , जॉर्जिया , in 1962 , और व्यवस्थित nonviolent विरोध in बर्मिंघम , अलबामा , कि आकर्षित नेशनल ध्यान  following television news coverage of the brutal police response .
किंग भी helped to व्यवस्थित the 1963 कूच on वॉशिंगटन  , where he delivered his `` I Have a Dream `` speech .
वहीँ , he स्थापित उसके प्रतिष्ठा as एक  of the greatest orators in American history .
He also established his  प्रतिष्ठा as a कट्टरपंथी , और became an ऑब्जेक्ट of the संघीय ब्यूरो of छानबीन 's cointelpro  for the rest of his life .
FBI agents investigated him for possible communist ties , recorded his  extramarital liaisons और reported on उन्हें to सरकारी officials , और on एक अवसर , mailed किंग a threatening बेनाम अक्षर कि he interpreted as an attempt to मेक उसे कमिट  suicide .
On October 14 , 1964 , King received the Nobel Peace  पुरस्कार लिये combating जातिगत असमानता through nonviolence  .
In 1965 , he and the SCLC helped to  व्यवस्थित the selma to मोंटगोमरी marches और the following साल , he took  the movement north to Chicago .
In the final years of his life , King expanded his focus to include poverty and the Vietnam War ,  alienating अनेक of उसके उदार allies साथ a 1967 वाक titled `` परे  Vietnam '' .
King was planning a national occupation of  वॉशिंगटन , d.C. , पुकारा the ग़रीब  People 's Campaign .
King was  assassinated on अप्रैल 4 , 1968 , in मेम्फिस , टेनेसी  .
His death was  followed by दंगे in अनेक u.S.  cities .
Allegations that James Earl Ray , the man convicted of  हत्या किंग , था महरूम framed or acted in कॉन्सर्ट साथ सरकारी एजेंटों persisted लिये दशकों बाद the शूटिंग ,  and the jury of a 1999 civil trial found Loyd Jowers to be complicit in a conspiracy against King .
King was awarded the  अध्यक्षीय पदक of स्वतंत्रता और the congressional सुनहरा पदक  posthumously .
Martin Luther King , Jr. Day was  स्थापित as a u.S. संघीय अवकाश in 1986  .
Hundreds of streets in the  u.S. have महरूम renamed in उसके सम्मान  .
A memorial statue on  the नेशनल मॉल थी खोली to the पब्लिक  in 2011 .
The  बाघ ( पेंथेरा tigris ) is the largest बिल्ली प्रजाति , reaching  a total body length of up to and weighing up to .
It is the third largest land carnivore ( behind only  the ध्रुवीय भालू और the भूरा भालू  ) .
Its  सबसे recognizable विशेषता is a पैटर्न of अंधेरा लंबवत धारियाँ  on reddish-orange fur with a lighter underside .
it रै exceptional stout दांत , और the canines हैं the  longest among living felids with a crown height of as much as or even .
In zoos ,  टाइगर्स have जिया लिये 20 to 26 सालो , जिससे भी seems to be उनके  longevity in the wild .
They  हैं territorial और generally एकान्त लकिन सोशल पशु , प्रायः requiring विशाल  contiguous areas of habitat that support their prey requirements .
This , coupled with the fact that they are  स्वदेशी to कुछ of the अधिक densely आबादी स्थान on धरती , रै caused significant  conflicts with humans .
Tigers once ranged widely across Asia , from  तुर्कों in the वेस्ट to the पूर्वी coast of रूस  .
Over the past 100 years  , वे have खोया 93 % of उनके ऐतिहासिक दायरा , और have महरूम extirpated इससे दक्षिणपश्चिम और सेंट्रल एशिया , इससे the आइलैंड्स  of Java and Bali , and from large areas of Southeast and Eastern Asia .
Today ,  वे दायरा इससे the siberian ताइगा to खोलें grasslands  and tropical mangrove swamps .
The remaining six tiger subspecies have  महरूम वर्गीकृत as endangered by आईयूसीएन  .
The global population in the wild is estimated to number  between 3,062 और 3,948 individuals , bas इससे around 100,000 at the प्रारंभ of the 20th सदी , साथ सबसे बाकी populations occurring in छोटी  pockets isolated from each other .
Major reasons for  जनसांख्यिकी मनाही शामिल आवास विनाश , आवास fragmentation  and poaching .
The extent of area occupied by  टाइगर्स is अनुमानित at कम than , a 41 % मनाही इससे the क्षेत्रफल अनुमानित in the mid-1990s  .
Tigers are among the most  recognisable और लोकप्रिय of the संसार 's charismatic महाप्राणी  .
They have featured prominently in ancient  mythology और लोकगीत , और continue to be चित्रित in आधुनिक films और साहित्य  .
Tigers appear on many flags ,  coats of बाहें , और as mascots लिये sporting टीमों  .
The Bengal  बाघ is the नेशनल एनिमल of दोनो इण्डिया  and Bangladesh .
The simplified  आतंरिक ढांचा of a  chloroplast
Overview of  the calvin साईकिल और  carbon fixation
the light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ of photosynthesis हैं रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ कि  convert carbon dioxide and other compounds into glucose .
These  प्रतिक्रियाएँ occur in the stroma , the fluid-filled क्षेत्रफल of a हरितलवक बाहर  of the thylakoid membranes .
These reactions take  the light-dependent प्रतिक्रियाएँ और perform further  chemical processes on them .
There  हैं तीन phases to the light-independent प्रतिक्रियाएँ , collectively पुकारा the calvin साईकिल : कार्बन fixation , कटौती  reactions , and ribulose 1,5-bisphosphate ( RuBP ) regeneration .
Despite its name ,  इस प्रक्रम occurs तभी जब लाइट is उपलब्धियाँ  .
Plants do not  carry आउट the calvin साईकिल by रात्रि  .
They  , बजाय , रिलीज sucrose  into the phloem from their starch reserves .
This process happens when light is available independent of the kind of  photosynthesis ( c3 कार्बन fixation , c4 कार्बन fixation , और crassulacean एसिड चयापचय ) ; कैम पौधे स्टोर malic एसिड in उनके vacuoles प्रत्येक रात्रि और रिलीज it by दिन in अनुक्रम to मेक इस प्रक्रम  work .
A linen handkerchief  साथ खींचा लड़ी कढ़ाई around the  edges
Linen cloth  बरामद इससे qumran गुफा 1 निकट the मुर्दे समुद्र  .
Linen ( ) is a  वस्त्र बना इससे the मछली of the flax संयंत्र , linum  usitatissimum .
Linen is labor-intensive to  manufacture , लकिन जब it is बना into garments , it is valued लिये इसके  exceptional coolness and freshness in hot weather .
The  शब्द `` लिनेन '' is of वेस्ट germanic उत्पत्ति और cognates साथ  the Latin name for the flax plant linum , and the earlier Greek λινόν ( linon ) .
This word history has given rise to a number of  अन्य शर्तें in अंग्रेज़ी , the सबसे notable of जिससे is the अंग्रेज़ी शब्द लकीर , निकला इससे the उपयोग of a लिनेन ( flax ) लड़ी to determine  a straight line .
Textiles in a linen  बुनते बनावट , भी जब बना of कपास , गांजा और अन्य non-flax मछली हैं  also loosely referred to as `` linen '' .
Such fabrics generally have their  अपना विशिष्ट names अन्य than लिनेन ; लिये उदाहरण , ठीक कपास धागे in a  linen-style weave is called Madapolam .
The collective term ``  linens `` is स्टिल प्रायः प्रयुक्त generically to describe a क्लास of woven  and even knitted bed , bath , table and kitchen textiles .
The name  linens is retained क्युकी traditionally , लिनेन थी प्रयुक्त  for many of these items .
In the past , the word  `` linens '' थी भी प्रयुक्त to औसत lightweight undergarments ऐसे as शर्ट , chemises , waistshirts , lingerie ( a शब्द भी cognate  with linen ) , and detachable shirt collars and cuffs , which were historically made almost exclusively out of linen .
The inside cloth layer of fine composite clothing garments ( as for  उदाहरण jackets ) थी traditionally बना of लिनेन , और इस is  the origin of the word lining .
Linen textiles appear to  be कुछ of the oldest in the संसार : उनके इतिहास goes वापस अनेक  thousands of years .
Fragments of straw , seeds , fibers , yarns , and  विभिन्न प्रकार of fabrics जिससे तिथि वापस to  about 8000 BC have been found in Swiss lake dwellings .
Dyed flax fibers  मिला in a प्रागैतिहासिक गुफा in जॉर्जिया सुझाएँ the उपयोग of woven लिनेन fabrics  from wild flax may date back even earlier to 36,000 BP .
Linen was sometimes used as  करेंसी in प्राचीन मिश्र  .
Egyptian mummies were wrapped in linen because  it थी देखी as a प्रतीक of लाइट और पवित्रता , और as a प्रदर्शक  of wealth .
Some of these fabrics ,  woven इससे हाथ spun yarns , यहूद बहुत ठीक लिये उनके  day , but are coarse compared to modern linen .
Today ,  लिनेन is प्रायः an महंगी वस्त्र , और is उत्पादित  in relatively small quantities .
It  रै a long `` स्टेपल '' ( व्यक्तिगत रेशा लंबाई ) सापेक्ष  to cotton and other natural fibers .
Many  उत्पाद हैं बना of लिनेन : aprons , बैग , तौलिये ( swimmers , नहाना , बीच , देह और धो तौलिये )  , napkins , bed linens , linen tablecloths , runners , chair covers , and men 's & women 's wear .
The FIFA  संसार कप , प्रायः बस the संसार कप , is an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ फ़ुटबॉल प्रतियोगिता लडे by the वरिष्ठ  men 's national teams of the members of Fédération Internationale de Football Association ( FIFA ) , the sport 's global governing body .
The championship has been  awarded प्रत्येक चार सालो चूंकि the inaugural टूर्नामेंट in 1930 , मगर in 1942 और 1946  when it was not held because of the Second World War .
The current champions  हैं स्पेन , जो जीती the 2010 टूर्नामेंट  .
The current format of the tournament involves 32 teams competing for the title at venues within the host  स्वदेश ( s ) over a काल of परिचय a माह ; इस phase is प्रायः पुकारा the संसार कप  Finals .
A qualification phase , which currently takes place  over the preceding तीन सालो , is प्रयुक्त to determine जिससे टीमों qualify  for the tournament together with the host nation ( s ) .
The 19  संसार कप tournaments have महरूम जीती by आठ अलग  national teams .
Brazil have  जीती पाँच टाइम्स , और वे हैं the तभी टोली to have निभाई  in every tournament .
The other World Cup winners are Italy , with four titles ; Germany  , साथ तीन शीर्षक ; अर्जेंटीना और inaugural विजेता उरुग्वे , साथ दो शीर्षक प्रत्येक ; और इंग्लैण्ड , फ़्रांस , और स्पेन  , with one title each .
The World Cup is the  संसार 's सबसे widely viewed sporting इवेंट ; an अनुमानित 715.1 लाख लोगों  watched the final match of the 2006 FIFA World Cup held in Germany .
The next three World Cups will be hosted by  ब्राज़ील in 2014 , रूस in 2018 , और क़तर in 2022  .
The is an expansion  यंत्र लिये the वी रिमोट वीडियो खेल नियंत्रक लिये the वी कि allows it to अधिक accurately  capture complex motion .
According  to निन्टेंडो , the सेंसर in the यंत्र पूरक the accelerometer और सेंसर बार  capabilities of the Wii Remote to enable actions to be rendered identically on the screen in real time .
the वी 's successor कंसोल , the वी u , supports the वी motionplus और  its peripherals in games where use of its touchscreen-built-in primary controller is not necessary .
Majulah Singapura ( Onward  सिंगापुर ) is the नेशनल गान of सिंगापुर  .
Composed by Zubir Said in 1958 as a theme song for official functions of the City Council of Singapore  , the सोंग थी चयनित in 1959 as the द्वीप 's गान जब  it attained self-government .
Upon full independence in 1965  , majulah singapura थी formally अपनाया as सिंगापुर  's national anthem .
By law the anthem may only be sung with its  असली मलय गीत , हालांकि वहीँ मौजूद प्राधिकृत अनुवाद of the गीत of the गान  in Singapore 's three other official languages : English , Mandarin and Tamil .
Originally composed in the key of G major , in  2001 the नेशनल गान थी officially relaunched in the निम्नतर कुंजी of f प्रमुख as इस थी  said to allow for a `` grander and more inspiring arrangement '' .
The national anthem is regularly performed  or सुंग in स्कूलों और हथियारबंद शक्तियां शिविरों at ceremonies आयोजित at the शुरूआत and/or the  end of each day , during which the national flag is also raised and lowered and the national pledge is taken .
Singaporeans are especially encouraged to sing the national anthem on occasions of national celebration or national significance such as at the National Day Parade , at National  दिन observance ceremonies conducted by शैक्षणिक संस्थानों और सरकारी विभाग , और at sporting कार्यक्रम at जिससे सिंगापुर  teams are participating .
An expedition 's shipwrights  भवन  a brigantine , 1541 .
shipbuilding is the निर्माण of जहाजों और फ्लोटिंग  vessels .
It  सामान्यतः takes प्लेस in a specialized सुविधा  known as a shipyard .
shipbuilders , भी पुकारा shipwrights , follow a specialized occupation  that traces its roots to before recorded history .
Shipbuilding  और जलयान मरम्मत , दोनो वाणिज्यिक और सैन्य , हैं  referred to as `` naval engineering '' .
The  निर्माण of नौकाएँ is a समान कार्यकलाप पुकारा  boat building .
the dismantling of जहाजों is पुकारा  ship breaking .
Wakonda is a town in  मिट्टी काउंटी , दक्षिण डकोटा , संयुक्त  States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 321 at the  2010 census .
The following is a list of  the सबसे populous incorporated स्थान  of the United States of America .
As defined by the United States Census Bureau , an `` incorporated  प्लेस `` शामिल a किस्में of designations , सहित नगर , कस्बा , गाँव , बरो  , and municipality .
A few exceptional Census  designated स्थान ( cdps ) हैं भी शामिल in the जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो 's लिस्टिंग  of incorporated places .
Consolidated  city-counties represent a पृथक प्रकार of सरकारी कि शामिल the संपूर्ण जनसांख्यिकी  of a county , or county equivalent .
Some  संचित city-counties , however , शामिल अनेक incorporated  places .
This list presents only that portion ( or `` balance '' ) of such  संचित city-counties कि हैं नहीं a भाग of another incorporated  place .
Note that this list refers only to the  जनसांख्यिकी of व्यक्तिगत municipalities भीतर उनके पारिभाषित हद , जिससे करता नहीं शामिल अन्य municipalities or unincorporated  suburban areas within urban agglomerations .
A  अलग रैंकिंग is evident जब considering u.S.  metropolitan area populations .
alt=larger flashcart , दिखाया साथ छोटी कार्ड और  U.S. quarter for size
Nintendo DS storage devices are devices used to store a licensed developer 's  work-in-progress बिंब , homebrew वीडियो खेल और डाउनलोड वाणिज्यिक खेल ( चूंकि the निन्टेंडो ds is नहीं बेची साथ a  rewritable storage medium ) .
Licensed developers , however ,  can उपयोग a ब्लू बुद्धिमान प्रणालियों नाइट्रो emulator बक्सा to फ्लैश  cards .
These  डिवाइस हैं भी ज्ञात as `` flashcarts '' or `` flashcards  '' .
There are two main classes of  flashcarts : पुरानी डिवाइस जिससे अनुरूप in slot-2 ( the खेल लड़के अग्रिम खेल पाक स्लॉट ) और नए  devices that fit in Slot-1 ( the DS Game Card slot ) .
Slot-2 ( or first-generation ) devices have been historically cheaper due  to economies of स्केल ( inherited इससे उनके उपयोग साथ खेल लड़के अग्रिम ) , लकिन आवश्यकता a booting  tool in Slot-1 in order to use the touch screen and other DS features .
Second-generation devices ( those which  तभी उपयोग slot-1 ) do नहीं कार्य साथ gba homebrew , लकिन became कम महंगी और easier  to use , rivaling many Slot-2 devices in price .
First-generation devices include  gba फ्लैश कारतूस , gbamp cf , supercard  , and M3 .
Second-generation devices  शामिल r4 क्रान्ति , cyclods , g6 रियल और  DS-X .
The  भंडार यंत्र either contains फ्लैश मेमोरी or a  slot for a memory card to store homebrew .
Storage devices with a memory-card slot usually have  अधिक भंडार क्षमता than flash-memory डिवाइस  .
Although  flash-memory क्षमता is प्रायः measured in megabits ( mb ) , memory-card क्षमता is प्रायः  measured in megabytes ( MB ) ( where 8 Mb is 1 MB ) .
Storage-device brands differ in their support for  homebrew ; ds और खेल लड़के अग्रिम roms ; खास सुविधाएँ ( ऐसे as क्षमता to  play media files ) ; physical size and cost .
Strictly speaking , a storage device is not necessary for DS with  flashme संस्थापित क्युकी homebrew can be भेजा to the ds  using WMB .
However , this is not  an easily-portable विधि क्युकी the ds needs to be भीतर  range of a suitable Wi-Fi card .
are American  लोगों of जापानी विरासत  .
Japanese Americans have historically been among the  तीन largest एशियाई अमरीकी समुदायों , लकिन in हाल दशकों , it रै become  the sixth largest group at roughly 1,304,286 , including those of mixed-race or mixed-ethnicity .
In the 2010 census , the largest Japanese  अमरीकी समुदायों यहूद मिला in कैलिफ़ोर्निया साथ 272,528 , हवाई साथ 185,502 , नई यॉर्क साथ 37,780  , Washington with 35,008 , and Illinois with 17,542 .
Southern  कैलिफ़ोर्निया रै the largest japanese-american जनसांख्यिकी  in North America .

This is a comprehensive listing which highlights significant  उपलब्धियाँ और माइलस्टोन आधारित upon बिलबोर्ड पत्रिका 's singles चार्ट , सबसे notably the  Billboard Hot 100 .
This list spans from the  समस्या दिनाँक जनवरी 1 , 1955 to  present .
The Billboard Hot 100 began with the issue  दिनाँक अगस्त 4 , 1958 , और is फिलहाल the मानक लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक चार्ट in  the United States .
Prior to the creation of the Hot  100 , बिलबोर्ड प्रकाशित चार singles चार्ट : `` बेहतरीन विक्रेता in स्टोर्स '' , `` सबसे निभाई by jockeys '' , ``  Most Played in Jukeboxes '' and `` The Top 100 '' .
These charts , which ranged from 20  to 100 स्लॉट , यहूद phased आउट at अलग टाइम्स between 1957 और 1958  .
हालांकि technically नहीं भाग of the hot 100 चार्ट इतिहास , उनके आंकड़ा is शामिल  for computational purposes , and to avoid unenlightening or misleading characterizations .
All items listed  नीचे हैं इससे the hot 100 era , जबतक वरना  noted ( pre-Hot 100 charts ) .
V is an American science fiction  टेलीविज़न श्रेणी कि भागा लिये दो सीज़न on एबीसी , इससे नवम्बर 3 , 2009  to March 15 , 2011 .
A remake of the 1983  miniseries निर्मित by केनेथ जॉनसन , the नई श्रेणी क्रॉनिकल्स the आगमन on धरती of a technologically  advanced alien species which ostensibly comes in peace , but actually has sinister motives .
V stars Morena  baccarin , lourdes benedicto , मॉरिस शाहबलूत , जोएल gretsch , लोगन huffman , चार्ल्स mesure , एलिज़ाबेथ  Mitchell , Laura Vandervoort and Scott Wolf , and was executive produced by Scott Rosenbaum , Yves Simoneau , Scott Peters , and Jace Hall .
The series was  उत्पादित by the स्कॉट पीटर्स कम्पनी , hdfilms और  Warner Bros. Television .
Geocaching is an outdoor recreational  कार्यकलाप , in जिससे the भागीदार उपयोग a वैश्विक positioning प्रणाली ( gps ) receiver or मोबाईल यंत्र और अन्य navigational तकनीकों to छुपा और तलाश containers , पुकारा `` geocaches '' or  `` caches '' , anywhere in the world .
A typical cache is a small waterproof container containing a logbook  जहाँ the geocacher enters the तिथि वे मिला it और लक्षण it साथ उनके स्थापित  code name .
After signing into the log , the  संचय जरूर be लगाई वापस exactly जहाँ the व्यक्ति मिला it  .
Larger containers such as plastic storage containers ( Tupperware or similar  ) or ammunition बाक्स can भी contain वस्तुएं लिये व्यापार , प्रायः खिलौने or trinkets  of little value .
Geocaching shares many aspects with benchmarking , trigpointing , orienteering  , treasure-hunting , letterboxing , और waymarking  .
Boogie Down Productions was a hip hop  समूह कि थी originally रचित of krs-one , d-nice , और dj स्कॉट  La Rock .
DJ Scott La Rock was murdered on  अगस्त 27 , 1987 , महीने बाद the रिलीज of  BDP 's debut album , Criminal Minded .
The name of the group  , बोगी bas , गर्भाशयी इससे a उपनाम लिये the दक्षिण bronx खण्ड of the bronx , एक  of the five boroughs of New York City .
The group pioneered the fusion of dancehall reggae  और हिप हॉप म्यूज़िक और उनके डेब्यू lp दण्ड minded contained फ़्रैंक descriptions of जीवन in the  South Bronx of the late 1980s thus setting the stage for what would eventually become gangsta rap .
A  नगरपालिका बंध is a बंध जारी by a लोकल सरकारी  , or their agencies .
Potential issuers of municipal bonds include states , cities , counties , redevelopment agencies ,  special-purpose जिले , स्कूल जिले , पब्लिक यूटिलिटी जिले , सरेआम स्वामित्व एयरपोर्ट और seaports , और कोई अन्य सरकारी एंटिटी ( or समूह of सरकारें ) at or  below the state level .
Municipal  bonds may be सामान्य दायित्वों of the जारीकर्ता  or secured by specified revenues .
In the United States , interest income received by holders of municipal bonds is often exempt from the federal income tax and from the income tax of the  राज्य in जिससे वे हैं जारी , हालांकि नगरपालिका bonds जारी लिये निश्चित उद्देश्य may नहीं be कर  exempt .
Unlike new issue stocks that are brought to market with price restrictions until the deal is sold ,  नगरपालिका bonds हैं फ़्री to व्यापार at कोई समय एकबार वे हैं खरीदा  by the investor .
Professional traders  regularly व्यापार और retrade the वही bonds अनेक टाइम्स a सप्ताह  .
`` Gim me Some  lovin ' '' is a सोंग लिखा by स्टीव winwood , स्पेंसर डेविस और muff winwood , और originally  performed by The Spencer Davis Group .
The basic riff of the song was borrowed from the  होमर बैंको सोंग `` ( ai n't कि ) a लॉट of प्रेम '' , लिखा by बैंको और  Willie Dean `` Deanie '' Parker .
`` Gim me  कुछ lovin ' '' थी a uk # 2 in the पतझड़  of 1966 and a US # 7 .
The song is ranked # 247 on  the रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका 's सूची of the 500 महानतम  Songs of All Time .
The version issued in the UK (  और संभवतः सबसे of यूरोपीय ) is अलग इससे कि जारी in the us on the संयुक्त कलाकारों लेबल , होने धीमा , और lacking  the backing vocals and `` live sounding '' performance found on the US single .
( The US version  रै अधिक प्रायः महरूम प्रयुक्त on reissue cds  , even those coming from Europe . )
The single features  the ध्वनि of the हैमंड b-3 अंग  .
The Internet Movie Database ( IMDb ) is an online database of information  सम्बन्धित to films , टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम , और वीडियो खेल  .
This includes actors , production  क्रू कर्मियों , और fictional वर्ण प्रदर्शित in ये तीन विज़ुअल entertainment  media .
It is one of the most popular online entertainment  गंतव्यों , साथ over 100 लाख अद्वितीय उपयोक्ता प्रत्येक माह और a ठोस और rapidly  growing mobile presence .
IMDb was launched on October 17 ,  1990 , और in 1998 थी acquired by  Amazon.com .
as of अप्रैल 27 , 2013 , आईएमडीबी था 2,503,783 शीर्षक ( शामिल एपीसोड )  and 5,192,493 personalities in its database , as well as 43 million registered users .
the जालस्थल रै an एलेक्सा  rank of 48 .
Fibre Channel  मेजबान बस एडाप्टर ( 64-bit pci-x कार्ड  )
SCSI Host Bus  एडाप्टर ( 16-bit isa  card )
In computer hardware , a host controller , host adapter , or  मेजबान बस एडाप्टर ( hba ) connects a मेजबान प्रणाली ( the कंप्यूटर ) to अन्य संजाल और भंडार डिवाइस  .
The terms are primarily used to  refer to डिवाइस लिये connecting scsi , fibre चैनल  and eSATA devices .
However , devices for connecting to IDE ,  ईथरनेट , firewire , usb और अन्य प्रणालियों may भी be पुकारा मेजबान adapters  .
Recently , the advent of iSCSI and Fibre Channel over Ethernet has brought about  ईथरनेट hbas , जिससे हैं अलग इससे ईथरनेट nics in कि वे शामिल टीसीपी offload  Engines .
There are also converged HBAs that  support दोनो ईथरनेट और fibre चैनल पुकारा converged संजाल  Adapters ( CNAs ) .
cashmere स्कार्फ
Modern men 's  cashmere sweaters लिये बिक्री  .
Cashmere wool , usually  बस ज्ञात as cashmere , is a रेशा प्राप्त इससे cashmere बकरियों  and other types of goat .
The word cashmere  गर्भाशयी इससे an बूढ़ा  spelling of Kashmir .
Cashmere is fine  in बनावट , दमदार , लाइट , और  soft .
Garments made  इससे it provide बेहतरीन इन्सुलेशन  .
In the United States , under the U.S . Wool Products Labeling Act of 1939 , as  amended , ( 15 uction 68b ( a ) ( 6 ) ) , राज्य कि a ऊन or वस्त्र उत्पाद may नहीं be labeled as containing cashmere unless:
such wool product is the  ठीक ( dehaired ) undercoat मछली उत्पादित by a cashmere बकरी ( capra  hircus laniger ) ;
the average diameter of the  रेशा of ऐसे ऊन उत्पाद करता नहीं exceed  19 microns ; and
such wool product does not contain  अधिक than 3 प्रतिशत ( by वज़न ) of cashmere मछली साथ औसत diameters कि exceed  30 microns .
the औसत रेशा व्यास may be विषय to a गुणांक of विभिन्नता around the औसत कि  shall not exceed 24 percent .
जेनिफर convertibles inc. is the मालिक और licensor of sofabed और चमड़े specialty खुदरा स्टोर्स in the संयुक्त राज्य , साथ स्टोर्स स्तिथ throughout the पूर्वी  seaboard , in the Midwest , on the West Coast and in the Southwest .
the कम्पनी थी संस्थापित in 1975 और is आधारित  in Woodbury , New York .
On July 19 , 2010 , the  कम्पनी घोषित कि it था दायर लिये दिवालियापन as a consequence of `` substantial  losses '' .
According to Furniture Today the  कम्पनी थी क्रमांक 48 among फर्नीचर रिटेलर साथ us $ 114 लाख  in sales for the year ending August 29 , 2009 .
it subsequently उभरा इससे अध्याय 11 अंतर्गत the कंट्रोल of इसके  major supplier , the Haining Mengnu Group .
Egg roll is a term used for many  अलग भोजन around the संसार .
2__egg_roll __ किस्में of अंडा रोल्स हैं मिला in मेनलैंड चीन , अनेक chinese-speaking regions  of Asia , and Chinese immigrant communities around the world .
Egg rolls as  referred to in चीन .
In Guangdong and Hong Kong  , अंडा फेंकें प्रायः refers to बिस्किट फेंकें .
इस is a प्रकार of बिस्किट  .
the संघटक शामिल  egg , flour and sugar .
Egg roll also is a dish in  कैण्टन और हांग काँग , इस is प्रायः बना साथ सब्ज़ी  .
Within  चीन अंडा रोल्स हैं खाया predominantly in the southeast और हैं नहीं as commonly  consumed in the north and western parts of China .
In American Chinese  भोजन , an अंडा फेंकें is a savory डिश typically परोसा  as an appetizer .
It is usually stuffed with chicken , pork or shrimp , cabbage ,  गाजर , टमाटर , सेम sprouts और अन्य सब्जियां , और तब गहन fried  .
This variety  of the अंडा फेंकें is बहुत आम और लोकप्रिय , आरपार भी क्षेत्रीय किस्में of अमरीकी चाइनीज खाना  , and is often included as part of a `` combination platter '' .
In Montreal , Canada ,  open-ended eggrolls हैं a jewish-chinese संलयन डिश  .
They can be either  कोषेर certified or merely कोषेर  style .
Pain and suffering is the legal  पद लिये the शारीरिक और emotional तनाव caused इससे an चोट ( देखिए भी पीड़ा  and suffering ) .
Some  क्षतिपूर्ति कि might be अंतर्गत इस श्रेणी होता be : aches , अस्थाई और स्थाई सीमाएं on कार्यकलाप  , potential shortening of life , depression or scarring .
When filing a lawsuit as a result of an injury , it is common for  किसी to तलाश धन दोनो in मुआवजे लिये वास्तविक धन कि is खोया और लिये the  pain and stress associated with virtually any injury .
In a suit ,  पीड़ा और कष्ट is भाग of the `` सामान्य क्षतिपूर्ति '' खण्ड of the claimant 's अर्जी , or , alternatively , it is an तत्व of `` compensatory '' non-economic क्षतिपूर्ति कि allows  recovery for the mental anguish and/or physical pain endured by the claimant as a result of injury for which the plaintiff seeks redress .
Apart from money  क्षतिपूर्ति awarded in विचारण , धन क्षतिपूर्ति हैं भी दिए informally बाहर the न्यायिक प्रणाली in mediations , मध्यस्थता ( दोनो of जिससे may be अदालत annexed or गैर litigated  claims ) as well as in routine insurance settlements .
व्यक्तिगत claimants or those represented by वकील प्रायः  present demands to insurers to settle for money .
These  माँग लिये bodily चोट मुआवजे monies प्रायः  set out damages that are similarly used in the court litigated pleadings .
Demands are  प्रायः लिखा summaries of a claimant 's चिकित्सा  care and the facts which resulted in the injury .
नमूना of a medallion हस्ताक्षर गारंटी  stampIn
the United States  और कनाडा , a medallion हस्ताक्षर गारंटी is a खास हस्ताक्षर  guarantee for the transfer of securities .
It is a guarantee by the transferring financial institution that the  हस्ताक्षर is वास्तविक और the वित्तीय संस्था स्वीकृत देयता लिये कोई जालसाजी  .
Signature guarantees protect shareholders by preventing  अनधिकृत हस्तांतरण और संभावित  investor losses .
They also  सीमा the देयता of the ट्रांसफ़र एजेंट  who accepts the certificates .
Different institutions have different policies as to what type of  पहचान वे आवश्यकता to provide the गारंटी और whether वे चार्ज a शुल्क लिये ऐसे  service ( usually nominal if any ) .
Most institutions will not guarantee a signature  of किसी जो रै नहीं already महरूम उनके ग्राहक  .
A medallion signature  गारंटी is नहीं the वही as an acknowledgment by a नोटरी पब्लिक , in the भाव कि a `` हस्ताक्षर गारंटी '' is a प्रमाणन by the संस्था  that the signature is authentic , and an acknowledgment is a certification by a notary public attesting that the signer signed a document voluntarily .
Some banks may no longer provide this service , however ,  अनेक स्टिल do as खूब as अन्य वित्तीय संस्थानों ऐसे as a बचत और लोन  and Credit Unions .
At their sole discretion , these institutions may  स्टिल मनाही to provide the medallion हस्ताक्षर guarantees  .
When US citizens are  विदेश , कुछ वित्तीय संस्थानों may accept संयुक्त राज्य दूतावास seals ,  in place of the Medallion Signature Guarantee Stamp .
Pacific Electric Railway streetcars  stacked at a junkyard on टर्मिनल द्वीप , लॉस एंजिल्स काउंटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , March 1956
The General Motors streetcar  षड्यंत्र ( भी ज्ञात as the ग्रेट अमरीकी स्ट्रीटकार कांड ) refers to दोषारोपण और convictions in संबंध to a कार्यक्रम by सामान्य मोटर्स ( gm ) और अन्य  companies who purchased and then dismantled streetcar and electric train systems in many American cities .
Between 1936 and 1950 , National City Lines and  प्रशांत नगर लाइनों —with निवेश इससे gm , firestone टायर , मानक आयल of कैलिफ़ोर्निया , phillips पेट्रोलियम , mack ट्रक , और the संघीय अभियान्त्रिकी corporation—bought over 100 इलेक्ट्रिक surface-traction प्रणालियों in 45 शहरों सहित बाल्टीमोर , न्यूर्क , लॉस एंजिल्स , नई  York City , Oakland and San Diego and converted them into bus operation .
अनेक of the कंपनियाँ शामिल यहूद convicted in 1949 of षड्यंत्र to monopolize अंतरराज्यीय कॉमर्स लकिन यहूद acquitted  of conspiring to monopolize the ownership of these companies .
Some suggest that this program played a key role in the decline of public transit in cities across the United States ; notably  एडविन J. quinby , जो पहला खींचा ध्यान to the कार्यक्रम in 1946 , और तब ब्रैडफोर्ड C. snell , an anti-trust attorney लिये the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट जिनकी विवादास्पद 1974  testimony to a Senate inquiry brought the issue to national awareness .
Both Quinby and Snell argued that the deliberate destruction  of streetcars थी भाग of a larger रणनीति to धक्का the संयुक्त राज्य into  automobile dependency .
Others say that independent economic factors brought about changes in the transit  प्रणाली , सहित the ग्रेट अवसाद , the पब्लिक यूटिलिटी पकड़कर कम्पनी अधिनियम of 1935 , मजदूर अशांति , मार्केट शक्तियां , rapidly increasing ट्रैफ़िक जमघट , शहरी sprawl , कराधान नीतियों कि favored निजी गाडी स्वामित्व , और सामान्य  enthusiasm for the automobile .
One writer on the subject has suggested that Snell and others fell into  simplistic षड्यंत्र सिद्धान्त सोच , bordering on paranoid delusions saying `` clearly , gm waged a युद्ध  on electric traction .
It was indeed an  सब आउट उत्पीड़न , लकिन by no अर्थात् the सिंगल कारण  for the failure of rapid transit .
Also , it is just as clear that actions and inactions by government contributed  significantly to the विलोपन of इलेक्ट्रिक  traction . ''
Only a small handful of U.S. cities have surviving  प्रभावी rail-based शहरी हस्तांतरण प्रणालियों आधारित on streetcars or trams , सहित न्यूर्क , फिलाडेल्फिया , सैन फ्रांसिस्को  , Pittsburgh , and Boston ; others are re-introducing them .
The story has  महरूम छान अनेक टाइम्स in छपाई , फिल्मी और अन्य मीडिया , notably  in Who Framed Roger Rabbit , Taken for a Ride and The End of Suburbia .
Corwin House , Salem ,  मैसाचुसेट्स , निर्मित ca . 1660 , पहला काल अंग्रेज़ी
American colonial architecture  शामिल अनेक भवन डिज़ाइन शैलियाँ संबद्ध साथ the औपनिवेशिक काल of the संयुक्त राज्य , सहित पहला काल अंग्रेज़ी ( late-medieval ) , फ्रेंच  Colonial , Spanish Colonial , Dutch Colonial and Georgian .
These styles are associated with the houses ,  चर्च और सरकारी इमारतें of the काल इससे परिचय 1600 through  the 19th century .
`` In the Mood '' is a big band era  # 1 hit अंकित by अमरीकी bandleader ग्लेन  Miller .
It topped the charts in 1940  in the u.S. और एक साल बाद थी प्रदर्शित in the फिल्म  Sun Valley Serenade .
In 1999 , National Public Radio (  npr ) शामिल the 1939 ग्लेन मिलर रिकॉर्डिंग on आरसीए bluebird on the npr 100 , the सूची of ``  The 100 most important American musical works of the 20th century '' .
वरुण लोगो
The NEPTUNE  कनाडा प्रोजेक्ट is the world’s पहला regional-scale भाटे समंदर वेधशाला  that plugs directly into the Internet .
Since December 2009 , it has allowed people to `` surf '' the  seafloor जबकि समंदर वैज्ञानिकों चलाएं deep-water प्रयोग इससे लैब्स और विश्वविद्यालयों around  the world .
साथ साथ इसके सिस्टर प्रोजेक्ट , शुक्र , वरुण  offers a unique approach to ocean science .
Traditionally , ocean scientists have relied on infrequent ship cruises or space-based satellites to  carry आउट उनके शोध , जबकि the वरुण प्रोजेक्ट उपयोग a remotely संचालित  crawler .
A gramophone record , commonly  ज्ञात as a फोनोग्राफ रिकार्ड ( in अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी ) , विनाइल रिकार्ड ( in सन्दर्भ to विनाइल , the सामग्री  most commonly used after about 1950 ) , or colloquially , `` a record '' , is an analog sound storage medium consisting of a flat disc with an inscribed , modulated spiral groove .
The groove usually  starts निकट the periphery और ends निकट  the center of the disc .
Phonograph  रिकॉर्ड हैं generally वर्णित by उनके व्यास in इंच ( 12-inch , 10-inch , 7-inch , इत्यादि . ) , the rotational गति at जिससे वे हैं निभाई ( `` 33 आरपीएम `` , `` 78 '' , `` 45 '' , इत्यादि . ) , उनके समय क्षमता ( `` long playing '' ) , उनके reproductive  accuracy , or `` fidelity `` ( `` high fidelity '' , `` Orthophonic '' , `` full-range '' , etc . ) , and the number of channels of audio provided ( `` mono `` , `` stereo `` , `` quadraphonic `` , etc . ) .
Phonograph records were the primary medium used  लिये म्यूज़िक जनन लिये सबसे of the 20th सदी , replacing the फोनोग्राफ बेलन  , with which it had co-existed , by the 1920s .
By the late 1980s ,  डिजिटल मीडिया था gained a larger मार्केट share , और the विनाइल रिकार्ड  left the mainstream in 1991 .
They continue to be  manufactured और बेची in the 21st  century .
In 2008 , nearly 2.9 million units shipped ,  the सबसे in कोई साल चूंकि 1998 और the स्वरूप रै जारी to धीरे regain लोकप्रियता  .
They are especially used by  djs और audiophiles लिये  many types of music .
As  of 2013 , विनाइल रिकॉर्ड continue to be प्रयुक्त  for distribution .

Grasslands are areas  जहाँ the वनस्पति is वर्चस्व by grasses ( पोएसी ) , however  sedge ( Cyperaceae ) and rush ( Juncaceae ) families can also be found .
grasslands occur naturally on सब महाद्वीपों  except Antarctica .
In temperate latitudes , such as  northwestern यूरोपीय और the ग्रेट मैदान और कैलिफ़ोर्निया in उत्तर अमेरिका , देशी grasslands हैं वर्चस्व by बारहमासी गुच्छा ग्रास प्रजाति , whereas in warmer climates सालाना  species form a greater component of the vegetation .
grasslands हैं मिला in सबसे ecoregions  of the Earth .
For example there are five terrestrial ecoregion classifications  ( subdivisions ) of the शीतोष्ण grasslands , savannas , और shrublands बायोम ( ' ecosystem ' ) , जिससे is एक of आठ स्थलीय ecozones  of the Earth 's surface .
हिना ( lawsonia inermis , भी पुकारा हिना पेड़ ) or हिना is a flowering संयंत्र , the एकमात्र  species in the genus Lawsonia in the family Lythraceae .
The  अंग्रेज़ी नाम `` हिना '' आता इससे the अरबी ( ala-lc : ḥinnāʾ / सुनाया  ) or colloquially , loosely pronounced .
The name is also used for dye preparations derived from  the संयंत्र , और लिये the आर्ट of अस्थाई गोदना आधारित on those  dyes .
Henna has been used since  प्राचीनता to डाई स्किन , बाल , और fingernails , as खूब as fabrics सहित  Silk , wool and leather .
Additionally , the name is misused for other skin and hair dyes ,  ऐसे as ब्लैक हिना or न्यूट्रल हिना , जिससे हैं नहीं निकला इससे  the plant .
A thin film is a layer of  सामग्री ranging इससे भिन्नों of a nanometer ( monolayer ) to अनेक  micrometers in thickness .
इलेक्ट्रॉनिक सेमीकंडक्टर डिवाइस और ऑप्टिकल coatings हैं the प्रमुख अनुप्रयोग  benefiting from thin-film construction .
A familiar application of thin films is the  household दर्पण , जिससे typically रै a पतला मेटल कोटिंग on the वापस of  a sheet of glass to form a reflective interface .
the प्रक्रम of silvering थी  once commonly used to produce mirrors .
A very-thin-film coating  ( कम than a nanometer मोटा ) is प्रयुक्त to उपज two-way mirrors  .
The performance of optical coatings ( e.g .  antireflective , or ar , coatings ) हैं typically उन्नत जब the thin-film कोटिंग consists of अनेक परतों having  varying thicknesses and refractive indices .
Similarly , a periodic structure of alternating thin films  of अलग सामग्री may collectively रूप a so-called superlattice  which exploits the phenomenon of quantum confinement by restricting electronic phenomena to two-dimensions .
Work is being done with ferromagnetic and  ferroelectric पतला films लिये उपयोग as कंप्यूटर मेमोरी  .
It is  भी होने लागू to दवाएँ  , via thin-film drug delivery .
Thin-films  हैं प्रयुक्त to उपज thin-film  batteries .
Thin films are  भी प्रयुक्त in dye-sensitized  solar cells .
सिरेमिक पतला films हैं in चौड़ी  use .
The relatively high hardness and inertness of ceramic materials make this type of thin coating of interest  लिये सुरक्षा of substrate सामग्री विरूद्ध संक्षारण ,  oxidation and wear .
In particular , the use of such coatings on  कटिंग टूल्स can extend the जीवन of ये वस्तुएं by अनेक आदेश  of magnitude .
Research is being done on a new class of thin-film  अकार्बनिक ऑक्साइड सामग्री , पुकारा amorphous heavy-metal cation multicomponent आक्साइड , जिससे could be प्रयुक्त to मेक पारदर्शी  transistors that are inexpensive , stable , and environmentally benign .
Gears of War is a military  विज्ञान fiction third-person शूटर वीडियो खेल विकसित  by Epic Games and published by Microsoft Game Studios .
It was initially released as an exclusive title for the Xbox 360 in November 2005 in North  अमेरिका , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , और सबसे of यूरोपीय और शामिल a `` सीमित कलेक्टर 's संस्करण '' साथ added सामग्री और an आर्ट किताब titled नष्ट सौंदर्य  that detailed much of the game 's back-story .
Despite the initial statements of Xbox 360 exclusivity , a Microsoft Windows version of the game was developed in conjunction with People Can Fly and released a year  बाद , featuring नई सामग्री सहित अतिरिक्त अभियान स्तर , a नई एकाधिक खेल विधि , और खेल  for Windows Live functionality .
The game  focuses on the सैनिकों of डेल्टा स्क्वाड as वे wield a हताश , last-ditch attempt to सहेजें the बाकी इंसान निवासियों  of the fictional planet Sera from a relentless and seemingly unstoppable subterranean enemy known as the Locust Horde .
The player assumes the role of  मार्कस fenix ( लकिन can भी खेल as डोमिनिक सैंटियागो ) , a  former prisoner and war-hardened soldier .
The game is  आधारित on the उपयोग of कवर और रणनीतिक आग लिये the खिलाड़ी to अग्रिम through the scenarios ; a दूसरी  player can play cooperatively through the main campaign to assist .
The  खेल भी सुविधाएँ अनेक ऑनलाइन एकाधिक  game modes for up to eight players .
Gears of War sold over three million copies  in बस टेन सप्ताह और थी the fastest-selling वीडियो खेल of 2005 as खूब as  the second-most played game over Xbox Live during .
It currently  स्टैंड as the 5th बेहतरीन selling एक्सबॉक्स  360 game of all time .
The game has since  बेची over पाँच लाख नक़ल by सितंबर 2008  .
The game was  खूब प्राप्त by आलोचकों , जो praised इसके gameplay और विस्तृत visuals ,  and it won several `` Game of the Year '' awards in 2006 .
The success of the game has led to the development of the Gears of War franchise , including the 2008 sequel Gears of War 2 and its follow-up , Gears of War 3 ,  जिससे थी released on सितंबर 20 , 2011 , बाद having initially महरूम नियत to have महरूम released on अप्रैल 5 , 2011 , the तिथि upon जिससे एपिक खेल ' चट्टान bleszinski  was a guest on Late Night with Jimmy Fallon .
adaptations to किताबे , कॉमिक्स ,  as well as a feature film are to be expected .
A Tree Grows in Brooklyn is a 1943  अनोखा लिखा by बेट्टी स्मिथ  .
The story  focuses on an irish-american परिवार in williamsburg , ब्रुकलीन ,  New York City .
The  अनोखा is नियत in the पहला और दूसरी दशकों  of the 20th century .
The  किताब थी an immense कामयाबी  .
The main  रूपक of the किताब is the हार्डी पेड़ of स्वर्ग , देशी to चीन और ताईवान , अभी माना हृदयरोग  , and common in the vacant lots of New York City .
संसार मैप साथ the intertropical  zone highlighted in red .
Tropical climate zones of the  धरती जहाँ सब बारह महीने have औसत temperatures  above 18 °C ( 64 °F ) .
The  ऊष्णकटिबन्ध is a प्रदेश of the धरती  surrounding the Equator .
It  is सीमित in अक्षांश by the tropic of कर्कट in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध at लगभग n और the  Tropic of Capricorn in the southern hemisphere at S ; these latitudes correspond to the axial tilt of the Earth .
The tropics are  भी referred to as the तीव्र मण्डल और the torrid  zone ( see geographical zone ) .
The tropics include all the areas on the Earth where the Sun  पहुँच a पाइंट सीधे ओवरहेड at तनिक एकबार दौरान  the solar year .
The  ऊष्णकटिबन्ध हैं विशिष्ट इससे the अन्य climatic और biomatic regions of धरती , the  middle latitudes and the polar regions on either side of the equatorial zone .
