`` What You Need '' is an episode  of the अमरीकी टेलीविज़न anthology  series The Twilight Zone .
It is based on the  छोटी स्टोरी of the वही नाम by लुईस padgett ( हेनरी kuttner  and C. L. Moore ) .
PlayhouseSquare , in the  क्लीवलैंड थिएटर ज़िला in शहर क्लीवलैंड , ओहियो , is the  second-largest theater complex in the United States , second only to New York City 's Lincoln Center ) .
Constructed in a span of 19  महीने in the जल्दी 1920s , the थिएटर यहूद subsequently बंद bas , लकिन यहूद  revived through a grassroots effort .
Their renovation and reopening helped usher in a new era  of शहर पुनरोद्धार in क्लीवलैंड , और थी पुकारा `` एक of the शीर्ष टेन सफलताओं  in Cleveland history . ''
The driver and passenger  सामने airbags , बाद having महरूम तैनात , in a अंग्रेजों  Peugeot 306 car .
An  एयरबैग is a गाडी सुरक्षा  device .
It is an occupant  संयम प्रणाली consisting of a लचीली कपड़ा लिफाफा or cushion designed to inflate  rapidly during an automobile collision .
इसके purpose is to cushion occupants दौरान a क्रैश और provide सुरक्षा  to their bodies when they strike interior objects such as the steering wheel or a window .
आधुनिक वाहनों may contain अनेक एयरबैग मौड्यूल in विभिन्न पक्ष और frontal स्थितियाँ of the यात्री seating स्थितियाँ , और सेंसर may तैनात एक or अधिक  airbags in an impact zone at variable rates based on the type , angle and severity of impact ; the airbag is designed to only inflate in moderate to severe frontal crashes .
Airbags are normally designed with the intention of supplementing  the सुरक्षा of an occupant जो is correctly restrained  with a seatbelt .
सबसे डिजाइन हैं inflated through pyrotechnic  means and can only be operated once .
Newer side-impact airbag modules consist of  संपीडित एयर सिलेंडर कि हैं triggered in the इवेंट of a पक्ष प्रभाव गाडी प्रभाव  .
The first commercial designs were  introduced in यात्री ऑटोमोबाइल दौरान the 1970s साथ  limited success .
Broad commercial adoption of airbags occurred in many markets during the late 1980s and early 1990s with a  ड्राइवर एयरबैग , और a सामने यात्री एयरबैग as खूब on कुछ गाड़ियाँ ; और अनेक आधुनिक  vehicles now include four or more units .
IRS tax forms are used for taxpayers and tax-exempt organizations to  रपट वित्तीय सूचना to the आतंरिक आय सेवा ( irs ) of the संयुक्त राज्य  .
They are used to report income , calculate  कर to be सशुल्क to the संघीय सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य , और ज़ाहिर अन्य सूचना  as required by the Internal Revenue Code ( IRC ) .
There are over 800 various  फ़ॉर्म और schedules .
the best-known of ये is रूप 1040  used by individuals .
In the United States , driver 's licenses are  जारी by प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत राज्य ( सहित वॉशिंगटन , d.C. और territories  ) , rather than the federal government because of the political concept of federalism .
ड्राइवर हैं सामान्यतः जरूरी to obtain a अनुज्ञा इससे उनके राज्य of निवास और सब राज्य recognize प्रत्येक अन्य 's पंक्तियां  for temporary visitors subject to normal age requirements .
A  राज्य may भी बर्खास्तगी an व्यक्तिगत 's ड्राइविंग विशेषाधिकार  within its borders for traffic violations .
Many states share a common system of license classes ,  साथ कुछ अपवाद , और वाणिज्यिक अनुज्ञा वर्ग हैं मानकीकृत  by federal regulation at 49 CFR part 383 .
China has been  the सोर्स of अनेक आविष्कारों , सहित the चार ग्रेट आविष्कारों  : papermaking , the compass , gunpowder , and printing ( both woodblock and movable type ) .
The  सूची नीचे contains ये और अन्य  inventions .
The Chinese  invented technologies involving यांत्रिकी , hydraulics , और गणित लागू to  horology , metallurgy , astronomy , agriculture , engineering , music theory , craftsmanship , nautics , and warfare .
By  the युद्धरत राज्य काल ( 403–221 bc ) , वे था उन्नत metallurgic प्रौद्योगिकी , सहित the धमाका भट्टी और cupola भट्टी  , while the finery forge and puddling process were known by the Han Dynasty ( 202 BC – AD 220 ) .
A sophisticated economic  प्रणाली in चीन दिया जनम to आविष्कारों ऐसे as पेपर धन दौरान the सोंग राजवंश  ( 960–1279 ) .
The invention of gunpowder by the 10th century led to an  सरणी of आविष्कारों ऐसे as the आग तलवार , जमीन मेरा , नवल मेरा , हाथ तोपों , exploding गोलों , multistage प्रक्षेपास्त्र , और प्रक्षेपास्त्र बम साथ  aerodynamic wings and explosive payloads .
With the navigational aid of the  11th-century कम्पास और क्षमता to steer at ऊँची समुद्र साथ the 1st-century sternpost अरित्र , premodern चाइनीज  sailors sailed as far as East Africa and Egypt .
In water-powered clockworks , the premodern Chinese had used the escapement  यांत्रिकी चूंकि the 8th सदी और the अंतहीन power-transmitting कड़ी ड्राइव in the 11th सदी  .
They also made large mechanical puppet theaters driven by  waterwheels और carriage पहियों और wine-serving automatons चलित by चप्पू  wheel boats .
The  contemporaneous peiligang और pengtoushan संस्कृतियों represent the oldest पाषाणकालीन संस्कृतियों of  China and were formed around 7000 BC .
Some of the first inventions of Neolithic , prehistoric China include semilunar and rectangular stone knives , stone hoes and spades , the cultivation of millet ,  राइस और the सोयाबीन , the refinement of sericulture , the भवन of rammed धरती structures साथ लाइम -plastered हाउस floors , the सृष्टि of the कुम्हार 's व्हील , the सृष्टि of pottery साथ cord-mat-basket डिजाइन , the सृष्टि of pottery tripods और pottery steamers , और the विकास  of ceremonial vessels and scapulimancy for purposes of divination .
Francesca Bray argues that the domestication of the ox and buffalo during the Longshan culture ( c. 3000–c . 2000 BC ) period , the absence of Longshan-era irrigation or high-yield crops , full  प्रमाण of longshan cultivation of dry-land खाद्यान्न फसलों जिससे दिया ऊँची yields `` तभी जब the मृदा थी carefully cultivated , '' सुझाएँ कि the हल थी ज्ञात at तनिक by the longshan संस्कृति काल और explains the ऊँची agricultural  production yields which allowed the rise of Chinese civilization during the Shang Dynasty ( c. 1600–c . 1050 BC ) .
With later inventions such as the multiple-tube seed drill and heavy moldboard iron plow  , चीन 's agricultural आउटपुट could sustain a much larger जनसांख्यिकी  .
For the purposes of this list , inventions are  regarded as technological firsts विकसित in चीन , और as ऐसे करता नहीं शामिल विदेशी technologies जिससे the चाइनीज acquired through सम्पर्क ,  such as the windmill from the Middle East or the telescope from Early modern Europe .
It also does not include technologies developed elsewhere  और बाद invented separately by the चाइनीज , ऐसे as the ओडोमीटर  and chain pump .
Scientific , mathematic or natural  discoveries , परिवर्तन in नाबालिग अवधारणाओं of डिज़ाइन or स्टाइल और कलाकारी नवप्रवर्तनों can नहीं be regarded as आविष्कारों  and do not appear on the list .
Gross domestic product in 2011 US dollars per capita , adjusted for  महंगाई और खरीदना शक्ति पैरिटी ( log स्केल ) इससे 1860 to 2011 , साथ जनसांख्यिकी ( डिस्क  area ) for the US ( yellow ) , UK ( orange ) , Japan ( red ) , China ( red ) , and India ( blue ) .
Globalization ( or  globalisation—see स्पेलिंग मतभेद ) is the प्रक्रम of अंतरराष्ट्रीय संयोजन arising इससे the इंटरचेंज of संसार  views , products , ideas , and other aspects of culture .
Put in simple terms  , वैश्वीकरण refers to प्रक्रियाओं कि प्रचार world-wide exchanges of नेशनल  and cultural resources .
Advances in transportation  और दूरसंचार अवसंरचना , सहित the वृद्धि of the अंतरजाल , हैं प्रमुख कारकों in वैश्वीकरण , generating further interdependence  of economic and cultural activities .
Though several scholars place the origins of globalization in modern times , others  ट्रेस इसके इतिहास long पहले the यूरोपीय आयु of डिस्कवरी और voyages to the  New World .
Some even trace the  origins to the तीसरा मिलेनियम  BCE .
Since the beginning of the 20th century , the pace of globalization has  intensified at a रैपिड रेट , विशेषकर दौरान the पोस्ट ठंडा युद्ध  era .
The term  वैश्वीकरण रै महरूम in increasing उपयोग चूंकि the mid-1980s और विशेषकर  since the mid-1990s .
In 2000 , the International Monetary Fund  ( imf ) पहचाना चार मौलिक पहलुओं of वैश्वीकरण : व्यापार और ट्रांजेक्शन , पूंजी और निवेश आंदोलनों ,  migration and movement of people and the dissemination of knowledge .
Further ,  पर्यावरणीय चुनौतियां ऐसे as जलवायु बदलें , cross-boundary जल और एयर प्रदूषण , और over-fishing of the समंदर  are linked with globalization .
Globalizing processes affect and are affected by  कारोबार और कार्य संगठन , अर्थशास्त्र , socio-cultural संसाधन ,  and the natural environment .
The Replacements is a 2000  अमरीकी खेल कॉमेडी फिल्मी निर्देशित by हावर्ड  Deutch .
It stars Keanu  रीव्स , जीन hackman , और ब्रुक langton  .
An American  एयरलाइंस वायुयान takes बंद इससे dallas/fort लायक  International Airport .
This  विमानक्षेत्र is the एयरलाइन  's largest hub .
American Airlines flies to 79 domestic  गंतव्यों और 78 अंतरराष्ट्रीय गंतव्यों in 48 देशों  .
( as of  दिसम्बर 2012 )
The list includes the city , country , the codes of the International Air Transport Association ( IATA airport  कोड ) और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय सिविल विमानन संगठन ( icao विमानक्षेत्र कोड ) , और the विमानक्षेत्र 's नाम , साथ the एयरलाइन 's hubs , फ़ोकस शहरों  and seasonal destinations marked .
The list also contains  गंतव्यों no longer परोसा by the एयरलाइन , जिससे हैं  marked as terminated destinations .
It  करता नहीं शामिल गंतव्यों परोसा लिये अमरीकी एयरलाइंस by इसके क्षेत्रीय affiliates  American Eagle Airlines , Executive Airlines , and AmericanConnection .
`` Day-O ( The Banana Boat Song ) '' is a  परंपरागत jamaican mento लोक सोंग , the best-known संस्करण of जिससे थी सुंग by हैरी belafonte और an वैकल्पिक संस्करण interspersed साथ another  Jamaican folksong , Hill and Gully Rider , by Dame Shirley Bassey .
Despite the song 's  mento प्रभाव , `` day-o ( the banana नाव सोंग )  '' is widely known as an example of calypso music .
it is a कार्य सोंग , इससे the पाइंट of दृश्य of डॉक मजदूर working  the night shift loading bananas onto ships .
Daylight has come , the shift is over and they want  उनके कार्य to be गिने up so कि वे can go  home .
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war  केंद्रित in यूरोपीय कि began on 28 जुलाई 1914 और lasted जबतक  11 November 1918 .
It was predominantly called the World War or  the ग्रेट युद्ध इससे इसके occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939 ,  and the First World War or World War I thereafter .
It involved all the  संसार 's ग्रेट शक्तियां , जिससे यहूद समवेत in दो opposing alliances : the allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम , फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल गठबंधन of जर्मनी , austria-hungary और इटली  ; but , as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy did not enter into the war ) .
These alliances were both  reorganised और विस्तारित as अधिक राष्ट्र डाला the युद्ध : इटली , जापानी और the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies , और the उस्मानी  Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
ultimately , अधिक than 70 लाख सैन्य कर्मियों , सहित 60 लाख europeans , यहूद mobilised  in one of the largest wars in history .
More than 9 million combatants were killed ,  largely क्युकी of technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases in the lethality  of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility .
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict  in संसार इतिहास , subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न राजनैतिक परिवर्तन , ऐसे as revolutions  in many of the nations involved .
One of the long-term causes of  the युद्ध थी the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी नीतियों of the  great powers of Europe .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to the throne of Austria-Hungary , on 28 June 1914 by Yugoslav  राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक संकट जब austria-hungary subsequently वितरित an ultimatum to the किंगडम of  Serbia .
Several  alliances formed over the पिछला दशकों यहूद invoked  .
Within weeks , the major  शक्तियां यहूद at युद्ध और , via उनके colonies , the विरोध जल्द स्प्रेड around the संसार  .
On  28 जुलाई , the austro-hungarians fired the पहला गोलियाँ of  the war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to France , providing  a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's घोषणा of युद्ध विरूद्ध  Germany .
After the German march on Paris was brought to a  halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the marne —the पश्चिमी सामने settled into a स्थिर बैटल of अपघर्षण साथ  a trench line that changed little until 1917 .
On the Eastern Front , the Russian army was  कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians , लकिन थी रोका in इसके आक्रमण of ईस्ट  Prussia by the Germans .
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the war ,  खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस , मेसोपोटामिया और  the Sinai .
Italy and Bulgaria went  to युद्ध in 1915 और रोमानिया  in 1916 .
In Russia , the tsar 's government collapsed in  कूच 1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर brought the russians to शर्तें  with the Central Powers .
After a 1918 German offensive along the  पश्चिमी सामने , the allies drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी of कामयाब offensives और अमरीकी  forces began entering the trenches .
Germany  , जिससे था इसके अपना ट्रबल साथ क्रांतिकारियों , सहमत to an  armistice on 11 November 1918 .
The war ended in  विजय लिये the allies  .
Events on the home fronts  यहूद as उग्र as on the बैटल fronts , as the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और आर्थिक  resources to fight a total war .
By the end  of the युद्ध , चार प्रमुख इम्पीरियल powers—the जर्मनी , रूसी , austro-hungarian  and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist .
The  successor राज्य of the पूर्व दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory  , while the latter two were dismantled entirely .
The map of  सेंट्रल यूरोपीय थी redrawn into अनेक  smaller states .
The League of Nations was  formed in the आशा of preventing another  such conflict .
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires , the  परखना of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं साथ the सन्धि of versailles हैं सहमत to be कारकों contributing to संसार युद्ध ii  .
Nurse  जैकी is an अमरीकी श्रेणी कि premiered on जून 8 , 2009 , on showtime  , Movie Central and The Movie Network .
the श्रेणी सितारों edie falco as the शीर्षक अक्षर जैकी peyton , an आपात  department nurse at All Saints ' Hospital in New York City .
For Jackie , `` Every day is a high wire act of juggling patients ,  डॉक्टर , fellow नर्स और उसके अपना indiscretions .  ''
Keeping Up with the  kardashians ( प्रायः referred to बस as the kardashians ) is an अमरीकी वास्तविकता  television series that premiered on October 14 , 2007 , on E ! .
It follows the  जीवनदान of the kardashian/jenner परिवार , सहित बहनों कोर्टनी  , Kim , and Khloé Kardashian .
The series  ' कामयाबी रै led to the spin-offs कोर्टनी और किम लो नई यॉर्क , khloé  & Lamar , Kourtney and Khloé Take Miami , and Kourtney and Kim Take Miami .
Afghanistan ( ; ; ) ,  officially the इस्लामी गणतंत्र of अफगानिस्तान , is a landlocked sovereign राज्य forming भाग of दक्षिण एशिया , सेंट्रल एशिया  , and to some extent Western Asia .
It has a  जनसांख्यिकी of around 30 लाख inhabiting an  area of approximately , making it the 42nd most populous and 41st largest nation in the world .
It is bordered by Pakistan in the south and  the ईस्ट , इरान in the वेस्ट , तुर्कमेनिस्तान , उज़्बेकिस्तान और ताजिकिस्तान in the  north , and China in the far northeast .
Afghanistan  रै महरूम an प्राचीन फोकल पाइंट of the रेशा सड़क  and human migration .
archaeologists have मिला प्रमाण of इंसान habitation  from as far back as the Middle Paleolithic .
शहरी सभ्यता may have begun in the क्षेत्रफल  as early as 3,000 to 2,000 BCE .
Sitting at an important geostrategic location that connects the Middle  ईस्ट संस्कृति साथ सेंट्रल एशिया और the भारतीय उपमहाद्वीप , the जमीन रै महरूम घर to विभिन्न peoples through the आयु और witnessed अनेक सैन्य अभियान , notably by सिकंदर the ग्रेट  , Genghis Khan , and in modern era Western forces .
The land also served as a source from which the  greco-bactrians , kushans , hephthalites , saffarids , ghaznavids , ghorids , khiljis , timurids , मुगलों , durranis , और अन्य have  risen to form major empires .
The political history of the modern state of Afghanistan begins in  1709 , जब the hotaki राजवंश थी स्थापित in कांधार followed by अहमद शाह  Durrani 's rise to power in 1747 .
In the late 19th century ,  अफगानिस्तान became a बफ़र राज्य in the `` ग्रेट खेल `` between  the British and Russian empires .
Following the 1919 Anglo-Afghan War ,  किंग अमानुल्ला began a यूरोपीय स्टाइल modernization of the देश लकिन थी रोका  by the ultra-conservatives .
During the Cold War , after the withdrawal of the British from  neighboring इण्डिया in 1947 , the संयुक्त राज्य और the सोवियत संघ began spreading प्रभाव in अफगानिस्तान , जिससे led to a खूनी युद्ध between the us-backed मुजाहिदीन शक्तियां और the soviet-backed अफगान  government in which over a million Afghans lost their lives .
This was  followed by the 1990s सिविल युद्ध , the वृद्धि और पतन of  the extremist Taliban government and the 2001–present war .
In December 2001 ,  the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा परिषद प्राधिकृत the सृष्टि of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय सुरक्षा  Assistance Force ( ISAF ) to help maintain security in Afghanistan and assist the Karzai administration .
Three decades of war made Afghanistan  एक of the संसार 's सबसे खतरनाक देशों , सहित the largest  producer of refugees and asylum seekers .
While the international community is  पुनर्निर्माण war-torn अफगानिस्तान , आतंकवादी समूह ऐसे as the हक्कानी संजाल और hezbi islami हैं actively शामिल in a देशभर तालिबान -led  insurgency , which includes hundreds of assassinations and suicide attacks .
According to the United Nations , the insurgents were  जिम्मेदार लिये 80 % of civilian हताहत in 2011 और 2012  .
The American Civil War ( ACW ) , also known as the War between the States or simply the Civil War ( see naming ) , was a civil war fought from  1861 to 1865 between the संयुक्त राज्य ( the `` संघ '' or the `` उत्तर '' ) और अनेक दक्षिणी स्लेव राज्य कि घोषित उनके secession और formed the confederate राज्य  of America ( the `` Confederacy '' or the `` South '' ) .
The war had its origin in the issue of slavery , especially the  एक्सटेंशन of गुलामी into the पश्चिमी territories  .
Foreign  शक्तियां किया नहीं intervene  .
After four years of bloody combat that left over 600,000  सैनिको मुर्दे और नष्ट much of the दक्षिण 's अवसंरचना , the confederacy collapsed , गुलामी थी abolished , और the मुश्किल  Reconstruction process of restoring national unity and guaranteeing rights to the freed slaves began .
In the 1860 presidential  चुनाव , republicans , led by अब्राहम lincoln , opposed  expanding slavery into United States ' territories .
Lincoln won , but before his inauguration on March 4 ,  1861 , सात cotton-based स्लेव राज्य formed  the Confederacy .
Outgoing  लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्ष जेम्स बुकानन और the आवक republicans  rejected secession as illegal .
Lincoln 's  inaugural पता घोषित उसके प्रशासन होता नहीं initiate  civil war .
Eight  बाकी स्लेव राज्य जारी  to reject calls for secession .
Confederate  शक्तियां जब्त numerous संघीय दुर्गों भीतर territory claimed  by the Confederacy .
A Peace  सम्मेलन विफल to ढूँढें a सुलह , और दोनो पहलू  prepared for war .
The Confederates assumed that European countries were so dependent on ``  किंग कपास `` कि वे होता intervene ; none किया और none पहचाना the नई confederate  States of America .
Hostilities began on April 12 , 1861  , जब confederate शक्तियां fired upon फोर्ट sumter , a कुंजी फोर्ट आयोजित by संघ सैनिकों  in South Carolina .
Lincoln called for each state to  provide सैनिकों to retake the फोर्ट ; नतीजतन , चार अधिक स्लेव राज्य joined the confederacy  , bringing their total to eleven .
The Union soon  नियंत्रित the किनारा राज्य और स्थापित a नवल नाकेबंदी  that crippled the southern economy .
The Eastern  थिएटर थी inconclusive in 1861–62  .
The autumn 1862  confederate अभियान into मेरीलैंड ( a संघ राज्य ) ended साथ confederate रिट्रीट at the बैटल  of Antietam , dissuading British intervention .
Lincoln issued the Emancipation Proclamation ,  जिससे बना समाप्ति गुलामी a युद्ध  goal .
To the west , by summer 1862 the Union destroyed the Confederate river navy  , तब much of उनके पश्चिमी सेना , और the संघ at vicksburg विभाजित the confederacy in दो at the मिसिसिपी नदी  .
In 1863 , Robert  E. ली 's confederate incursion उत्तर  ended at the Battle of Gettysburg .
पश्चिमी सफलताओं led to ulysses S. ग्रान्ट कमांड of सब  Union armies in 1864 .
In the Western Theater ,  विलियम T. शरमन drove ईस्ट to कैप्चर अटलांटा और marched to the समुद्र , destroying confederate  infrastructure along the way .
the संघ marshaled the संसाधन और जनशक्ति to आक्रमण the confederacy इससे सब दिशानिर्देश , और could afford to लड़ो लड़ाइयों of अपघर्षण through  the Overland Campaign towards Richmond , the Confederate capital .
The defending Confederate army failed , leading  to ली 's आत्मसमर्पण to ग्रान्ट at appomattox अदालत हाउस on  April 9 , 1865 .
The American  सिविल युद्ध थी एक of the earliest  true industrial wars .
Railroads , the telegraph , steamships  , और mass-produced हथियार यहूद employed extensively .
The mobilization of civilian factories  , खानों , shipyards , बैंको , परिवहन और खाना आपूर्तियाँ सब foreshadowed  World War I .
it remains the deadliest युद्ध in अमरीकी इतिहास , resulting in the मौतों of an अनुमानित  750,000 soldiers and an undetermined number of civilian casualties .
Historian John Huddleston estimates the  मौत टोल at टेन प्रतिशत of सब उत्तरी males 20–45 सालो बूढ़ा , और 30 प्रतिशत of सब दक्षिणी श्वेत  males aged 18–40 .
Cost of goods sold (  cogs ) refer to the inventory लागत of those goods a कारोबार रै  sold during a particular period .
Costs are associated with particular goods using one of  अनेक formulas , सहित विशिष्ट पहचान , first-in first-out ( fifo ) , or औसत लागत  .
Costs include all costs  of खरीदें , लागत of परिवर्तन और अन्य लागत incurred in bringing the inventories  to their present location and condition .
Costs of goods  बना by the कारोबार शामिल सामग्री , मजदूर , और  allocated overhead .
The costs of those goods not yet sold are deferred as  लागत of inventory जबतक the inventory is बेची or लिखा  down in value .
Freak  lunchbox कैंडी स्टोर in  Halifax , Nova Scotia
A  confectionery स्टोर ( अधिक commonly referred to as a मीठी दूकान in the संयुक्त किंगडम , a कैंडी स्टोर in the उत्तर अमेरिका , or a lolly दूकान in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ) बिकता confectionery  and is usually targeted to children .
Most confectionery stores  हैं भर साथ an assortment of मिठाई दूर larger than a पंसारी or convenience  store could accommodate .
They often  प्रस्ताव a चयन of बूढ़ा fashioned ट्रीट , और मिठाई इससे  different countries .
Very often unchanged in layout since their  inception , confectioneries हैं ज्ञात लिये उनके वार्मिंग और उदासीन  feel .
The village of Pateley Bridge claims to have the  oldest confectionery  store in England .

ओक्लाहोमा ( ) ( pawnee : uukuhuúwa , cay : gahnawiyoˀgeh ) is a राज्य  located in West South Central United States .
Oklahoma  is the 20th सबसे extensive और the 28th सबसे populous  of the 50 United States .
The state 's name is derived from  the choctaw शब्द okla और humma , अर्थ `` रेड लोगों '' , और it is ज्ञात  informally by its nickname , The Sooner State .
Formed by the combination of Oklahoma Territory and Indian  territory on नवम्बर 16 , 1907 , ओक्लाहोमा थी the 46th राज्य to डालें the  union .
Its residents are known as Oklahomans or , informally `` Okies '' ,  और इसके पूंजी और largest नगर is ओक्लाहोमा नगर  .
A major producer of natural gas , oil , and  कृषि , ओक्लाहोमा relies on an आर्थिक आधार of विमानन , उर्जा  , telecommunications , and biotechnology .
It has one of the fastest growing economies in the  स्वदेश , रैंकिंग among the शीर्ष राज्य in प्रति capita आय विकास और सकल घरेलू  product growth .
Oklahoma City and Tulsa serve as Oklahoma 's primary economic anchors , with  nearly दो तिहाई of oklahomans जीना भीतर उनके महानगर सांख्यिकीय  areas .
With small  पहाड़ सीमाएँ , प्रेयरी , mesas , और पूर्वी वनों , सबसे of ओक्लाहोमा झूठ in the ग्रेट मैदान और the u.s . आंतरिक हाइलैंड्स —a प्रदेश विशेषकर  prone to severe weather .
In addition  to having a व्यापकता of अंग्रेज़ी , जर्मनी , स्कॉटिश , आयरिश  and Native American ancestry , more than 25 Native American languages are spoken in Oklahoma , second only to California .
Oklahoma is located on a confluence of three major American cultural regions and  historically परोसा as a रूट लिये चौपायों ड्राइव , a गंतव्य लिये दक्षिणी settlers , और a government-sanctioned  territory for Native Americans .
stacked और खड़ा  car tires
A  टायर ( or टायर ) is a ring-shaped covering कि fits around a  wheel 's rim to protect it and enable better vehicle performance .
Most tires  , ऐसे as those लिये ऑटोमोबाइल और साइकिल , provide कर्षण between the गाडी और  the road while providing a flexible cushion that absorbs shock .
The  सामग्री of आधुनिक न्यूमेटिक टायर हैं सिंथेटिक रबर , प्राकृतिक रबर  , fabric and wire , along with carbon black and other chemical compounds .
वे consist of a tread  and a body .
The tread provides  कर्षण जबकि the देह provides containment लिये a मात्रा of संपीडित एयर  .
Before rubber was developed , the first  संस्करण of टायर यहूद बस bands of मेटल कि fitted around लकड़ी पहियों to prevent पहनें और  tear .
Early rubber  टायर यहूद ठोस ( नहीं न्यूमेटिक  ) .
Today , the majority of tires are pneumatic inflatable structures , comprising  a doughnut-shaped देह of रस्सियाँ और wires encased in रबर और generally भर साथ संपीडित एयर to रूप an inflatable  cushion .
Pneumatic tires are used on many  प्रकार of वाहनों , सहित गाड़ियाँ , साइकिल , मोटरसाइकिल , ट्रक  , earthmovers , and aircraft .
मेटल टायर हैं स्टिल प्रयुक्त on इंजनों और railcars , और ठोस रबर ( or अन्य पॉलिमर  ) tires are still used in various non-automotive applications , such as some casters , carts , lawnmowers , and wheelbarrows .
Dr. Joseph Warren ( June 11 , 1741 – June 17 , 1775 ) was an American doctor who played a leading role in American Patriot organizations  in बोस्टन in जल्दी दिनों of the अमरीकी क्रान्ति , आखिरकार सेवारत as अध्यक्ष of the क्रांतिकारी मैसाचुसेट्स प्रांतीय कॉंग्रेस  .
Warren enlisted Paul Revere and William Dawes on April 18 , 1775 , to leave Boston and spread the alarm that the British garrison in  बोस्टन थी सेटिंग आउट to रेड the कस्बा of concord और गिरफ़्तार विद्रोही नेताओ जॉन hancock और  Samuel Adams .
Warren participated in the next day 's Battles of Lexington and Concord  , जिससे हैं commonly माना to be the खोलने engagements of the अमरीकी  Revolutionary War .
Warren had been commissioned a  प्रमुख सामान्य in the उपनिवेश 's मिलिशिया shortly पहले the  June 17 , 1775 Battle of Bunker Hill .
Rather than exercising his rank  , वारेन परोसा in the बैटल as a निजी सिपाही , और थी मारे in कॉम्बैट जब  British troops stormed the redoubt atop Breed 's Hill .
His death , immortalized in John Trumbull 's painting , The Death of General Warren at the  बैटल of बंकर 's हिल , जून 17 , 1775 , जस्ती the विद्रोही शक्तियां , और he रै महरूम स्मरणीय  in many place names in the United States .
STM image of self-assembled supramolecular chains of the  सशुल्क सेमीकंडक्टर quinacridone on ग्रेफाइट  .
An organic  सेमीकंडक्टर is an सशुल्क सामग्री साथ सेमीकंडक्टर गुण , कि is , साथ  an electrical conductivity between that of insulators and that of metals .
Single molecules ,  छोटी कड़ी ( oligomers ) और सशुल्क polymers can be semiconductive  .
semiconducting छोटी अणुओं ( खुशबूदार hydrocarbons ) शामिल the  polycyclic aromatic compounds pentacene , anthracene , and rubrene .
polymeric सशुल्क semiconductors शामिल बहु ( 3-hexylthiophene  ) , poly ( p-phenylene vinylene ) , as well as polyacetylene and its derivatives .
वहीँ हैं दो प्रमुख अतिव्यापी  classes of organic semiconductors .
These are organic  charge-transfer देवालय और विभिन्न linear-backbone conductive polymers निकला  from polyacetylene .
Linear backbone organic semiconductors include  polyacetylene itself और इसके डेरिवेटिव polypyrrole , और polyaniline .
At  तनिक locally , charge-transfer देवालय प्रायः प्रदर्शनी  similar conduction mechanisms to inorganic semiconductors .
ऐसे mechanisms उठता इससे the उपस्थिति of छेद और इलेक्ट्रॉन  conduction layers separated by a band gap .
While such classic mechanisms are important  locally , as साथ अकार्बनिक amorphous semiconductors , tunnelling , स्थानीयकृत राज्य , गतिशीलता गैप , और phonon -assisted hopping  also significantly contribute to conduction , particularly in polyacetylenes .
Like inorganic  semiconductors , सशुल्क semiconductors  can be doped .
Organic semiconductors susceptible to doping such as  polyaniline ( ormecon ) और हैं भी ज्ञात as सशुल्क धातुओं  .
Typical current  वाहक in सशुल्क semiconductors हैं छेद और electrons  in π-bonds .
Almost all  सशुल्क solids हैं insulators  .
But when their constituent molecules have π-conjugate systems ,  electrons can मूव via π-electron बादल overlaps , विशेषकर by hopping , tunnelling और सम्बन्धित mechanisms  .
Polycyclic  खुशबूदार hydrocarbons और phthalocyanine नमक crystals हैं उदाहरण of  this type of organic semiconductor .
मुख्यतः due to कम गतिशीलता , भी unpaired electrons  may be stable in charge-transfer complexes .
ऐसे unpaired electrons can फलन  as current carriers .
This type of semiconductor is also  प्राप्त by pairing an इलेक्ट्रॉन दाता अणु साथ an इलेक्ट्रॉन acceptor  molecule .
Female  स्खलन is the expulsion of द्रव by इंसान महिलाओं इससे the paraurethral नलिकाएं through  and around the female urethra during or before an orgasm .
It is  भी ज्ञात colloquially as gushing or squirting , हालांकि ये हैं माना to be अलग  phenomena in some research publications .
The exact source and nature of the fluid continue to be a topic of debate among medical  पेशेवर , जिससे is भी सम्बन्धित to संदेह over the अस्तित्व of the g-spot  .
The FIFA Women 's World Cup is an international association football competition  लडे by the वरिष्ठ महिलाओं 's नेशनल टीमों of the सदस्यों of fédération internationale  de Football Association ( FIFA ) , the sport 's global governing body .
The championship has been awarded every  चार सालो चूंकि the inaugural टूर्नामेंट  in 1991 .
Japan won the  2011 टूर्नामेंट in a दंड गोलीबारी  .
The current format of the tournament  involves 16 टीमों स्पर्धा लिये the शीर्षक at venues भीतर the मेजबान स्वदेश ( s ) over a काल of परिचय तीन सप्ताह  ; – this phase is often called the World Cup Finals .
A qualification phase , which currently takes place over the preceding three years , is used to determine which  टीमों qualify लिये the टूर्नामेंट साथ साथ the मेजबान स्वदेश  ( s ) .
The FIFA Women 's World Cup is recognized as the  सबसे महत्वपूर्ण अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतियोगिता in महिलाओं 's फ़ुटबॉल और is निभाई amongst महिलाओं 's नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल टीमों of the सदस्य  states of FIFA , the sport 's global governing body .
The first  महिलाओं 's संसार कप टूर्नामेंट , नामित the महिलाओं 's संसार चैंपियनशिप , थी आयोजित in 1991  , sixty-one years after the men 's first FIFA World Cup tournament in 1930 .
The  छह संसार कप tournaments have महरूम जीती by चार अलग  national teams .
The  अगला संसार कप होगा be hosted  by Canada in 2015 .
Scorpions is a young adult novel  लिखा by वाल्टर डीन मायर्स , पहला प्रकाशित in the संयुक्त राज्य by हार्पर  & Row on June 20 , 1988 .

'Son  of man ' is the अनुवाद of विभिन्न यहूदी और यूनानी वाक्यांश  used in both the Hebrew Bible and the New Testament .
It has diverse meanings , ranging from a normal  इंसान होने to a prophesied अनन्त  , divine ruler .
The Hebrew expression `` son of  man '' ( בן–אדם i.e . ben-'adam ) appears एक सौ और सात टाइम्स  in the Hebrew Bible .
This is the most common Hebrew  निर्माण लिये the एकवचन लकिन is प्रयुक्त ज़्यादातर in ezekiel ( 93 टाइम्स  ) and 14 times elsewhere .
In thirty two  मामले the phrase appears in इंटरमीडिएट बहुवचन  form `` sons of men '' , i.e . human beings .
As generally interpreted by  यहूदियों , it denotes humankind generally  .
In the Koine Greek of the  नई वसीयत , `` the बेटे of man '' is invariably प्रयुक्त as ``  ὁ υἱὸς τοὺ ἀνθρώπου '' with a definite article .
The use of the definite article in `` the son of man  '' in the ईसाई gospels is अनोखा , और पहले इसके उपयोग वहीँ , no रिकॉर्ड of इसके उपयोग in कोई of the surviving  Greek documents of antiquity exist .
Geza Vermes has  stated कि `` the बेटे of man '' in the ईसाई gospels is unrelated to  Hebrew Bible usages .
In Christian usage , unlike the Son of God title , which has been an essential element of Christian creeds since  the अपोस्टोलिक आयु , the उदघोषणा of `` यीशु as the बेटे of man '' रै never महरूम an आलेख of आस्था in  Christianity .
The interpretation of the use of `` the Son of man  '' in the नई वसीयत रै remained चुनौतीपूर्ण और बाद 150 सालो of  debate no consensus on the issue has emerged among scholars .
Master of  foxhounds लीड the फ़ील्ड इससे powderham किला in देवों , इंग्लैण्ड , साथ  the hounds in front .
Fox hunting is an activity involving the tracking , chase , and sometimes killing of a fox , traditionally a red fox , by  प्रशिक्षित foxhounds or अन्य सैंट hounds , और a समूह of निहत्थे अनुसरणकर्ता led by a निपुण of foxhounds , जो follow the hounds on पैर or on horseback  .
Fox hunting originated in the form practised until recently in the United Kingdom in the 16th  सदी , लकिन is practised सब over the संसार , सहित in ऑस्ट्रेलिया , कनाडा  , France , Ireland , Italy and the United States .
In Australia , the term  भी refers to the शिकार of foxes साथ firearms समान to spotlighting or हिरण शिकार  .
In much of the world hunting in general is understood to relate to any game  पशु or हथियार ( e.g. , हिरण शिकार साथ धनुष और तीर ) ; in ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड , `` शिकार '' बगैर योग्यता implies फॉक्स शिकार ( or अन्य फ़ॉर्म of शिकार  with hounds- beagling , stag hunting , mink hunting , drag hunting or hunting the clean boot ) as described here .
The sport is  विवादास्पद , विशेषकर in the uk , जहाँ it थी बैन in स्कॉटलैंड in 2002 , और in इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स  in November 2004 ( law enforced from February 2005 ) , though shooting foxes as vermin remained legal .
Proponents of  फॉक्स शिकार दृश्य it as an महत्वपूर्ण भाग of ग्रामीण संस्कृति और उपयोगी लिये कारण of संरक्षण और pest कंट्रोल  , while opponents argue that it is cruel and unnecessary .
Tobacco advertising is the  विज्ञापन of तम्बाकू उत्पाद or उपयोग ( typically सिगरेट धूम्रपान ) by the तम्बाकू उद्योग  through a variety of media including sponsorship , particularly of sporting events .
It  is अभी एक of the सबसे अत्यधिक  regulated forms of marketing .
Some or  सब फ़ॉर्म of तम्बाकू विज्ञापन हैं बैन  in many countries .
Bally Technologies ,  inc. is a निर्माता of स्लॉट मशीने और अन्य गेमिंग प्रौद्योगिकी आधारित  in Las Vegas , Nevada .
the कम्पनी थी संस्थापित in 1968 as  Advanced Patent Technology .
It eventually changed its name to Alliance Gaming and acquired , in 1996 , Bally  गेमिंग अंतरराष्ट्रीय , a पूर्व प्रभाग of बल्ली निर्माण  .
In 2006 , the entire company adopted the  बल्ली नाम , a ट्रेडमार्क कि originated in 1932 by the बल्ली निर्माण  Corporation .
Gustave Doré 's engravings  illustrated the दैवी कॉमेडी ( 1861–1868 ) ; यहाँ , दांते is खोया  in Canto 1 of the Inferno .
inferno ( इतालवी लिये `` नरक `` ) is the पहला भाग of दांते एलीगियरी  's 14th-century epic poem Divine Comedy .
It is  followed by purgatorio और paradiso  .
It is an  allegory telling of the यात्रा of दांते  through Hell , guided by the Roman poet Virgil .
In the poem , Hell is  चित्रित as नौ वृत्त of कष्ट स्तिथ  within the Earth .
Allegorically , the Divine Comedy represents the journey of the soul  towards परमेश्वर , साथ the inferno describing the मान्यता और अस्वीकृति  of sin .
Smirnoff is  a ब्रांड of वोदका स्वामित्व और उत्पादित by the  British company Diageo .
The Smirnoff brand began with a vodka  डिस्टिलरी संस्थापित in मास्को by pyotr arsenievich smirnov ( 1831–1898  ) .
it is अभी वितरित  in 130 countries .
It is produced in several countries  सहित इण्डिया , आयरलैंड , इटली , the संयुक्त किंगडम और  the United States .
Smirnoff products  शामिल वोदका , flavoured वोदका , और malt पेय  .
In March 2006 ,  diageo उत्तर अमेरिका claimed कि स्मरनॉफ  vodka was the best-selling distilled spirit brand in the world .
Big Brown ( foaled April 10 , 2005  in केंटकी ) is a रिटायर्ड चैंपियन अमरीकी thoroughbred racehorse और विजेता of the 2008  Kentucky Derby and 2008 Preakness Stakes .
Bred by Dr. Gary B.  नैप 's monticule खेतो in lexington , केंटकी , he  won his first five race starts .
He was sired by Grade III winner  boundary , a बेटे of उत्तर अमरीकी चैंपियन sire danzig , a बेटे of उत्तरी  Dancer .
Big Brown 's dam was  mien , भी a पोती of उत्तरी नर्तकी through उसके sire  , Nureyev .
The Serenity Prayer is the common name for an originally  बेनाम दुआ by the अमरीकी theologian reinhold niebuhr ( 1892–1971 ) .
It has been adopted by Alcoholics  बेनाम और अन्य twelve-step  programs .
The best-known form is : God , grant me the  serenity to accept the बाते i can नहीं change,
The courage to  बदलें the बाते i  can,
And wisdom  to जान the अंतर  .
The Declaration and Resolves of the First Continental Congress ( also known as the Declaration of Colonial Rights , or the Declaration of Rights ) , was a  बयान अपनाया by the पहला महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस on अक्तूबर 14 , 1774 , in जवाब to the असहनीय अधिनियमों passed  by the British Parliament .
The Declaration outlined colonial  आपत्ति to the असहनीय अधिनियमों , सूचीबद्ध a औपनिवेशिक विधेयक of अधिकारों , और provided a विस्तृत सूची  of grievances .
It was similar to the Declaration of Rights and  grievances , passed by the स्टैम्प अधिनियम कॉंग्रेस a दशक  earlier .
The Declaration concluded with an  रूपरेखा of कॉंग्रेस 's योजनाएँ : to डालें into a बहिष्कार of अंग्रेजों व्यापार ( the महाद्वीपीय संघ ) जबतक उनके grievances  were redressed , to publish addresses to the people of Great Britain and British America , and to send a petition to the King .
Pulse pressure is the pressure that is  लगा जब अहसास the पल्स .
Measured in millimeters of  पारा ( mmhg ) , the दबाव अंतर between the systolic और diastolic pressures  is the pressure change to create the pulse , which is the pulse pressure .
If resting blood pressure is (  systolic/diastolic ) 120/80 millimeters of पारा ( mmhg ) , पल्स दबाव is 40 .
The Hills is a reality  टेलीविज़न श्रेणी जिससे originally aired on एमटीवी इससे may 31 , 2006 जबतक जुलाई  13 , 2010 .
The show uses a reality television format ,  following the निजी जीवनदान of अनेक यंग वयस्कों जीना in लॉस एंजिल्स , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , but tends towards a narrative format more commonly found in scripted genres such as soap operas .
The  श्रेणी originally followed the निजी जीवन of पूर्व लगुना बीच स्टार लॉरेन कोनराड  and her friends ' new lives in Los Angeles .
After five seasons , Conrad left the series and was replaced by another former Laguna Beach star  , kristin cavallari , शुरूआत in the दूसरी हाफ of the पांचवां  season .
The series  concluded at the समाप्त of the छठे ऋतु  .
Entertainment  साप्ताहिक क्रमित the पहाड़ियाँ 82nd on उनके सूची of `` the 100 बेहतरीन shows of the पिछला 25 सालो , '' stating कि the श्रेणी  was a `` New Classic . ''
एओएल tv पुकारा it tv 's biggest  Guilty Pleasure .
the श्रेणी premiered in अनुप्रयोग in the पतन  of 2009 alongside Laguna Beach : The Real Orange County .
In  पोकर , ख़राब ताल is a subjective पद लिये a हाथ in  which a player with what appear to be strong cards nevertheless loses .
It most often occurs where one  खिलाड़ी bets the clearly stronger हाथ और उनके प्रतिद्वन्दी makes a ग़रीब कॉल कि आखिरकार  `` hits '' and wins .
There is no consensus among poker players as to what exactly  constitutes a ख़राब ताल और प्रायः खिलाड़ी होगा असहमत परिचय whether a particular  hand was a bad beat .
The goldfish ( Carassius auratus  auratus ) is a freshwater मछली in the परिवार cyprinidae  of order Cypriniformes .
it थी एक of the earliest मछली to be domesticated , और is एक of  the most commonly kept aquarium fish .
A relatively small member of the carp  परिवार ( जिससे भी शामिल the कोई कार्प और the crucian कार्प ) , the goldfish  is a domesticated version of a less-colorful carp ( Carassius auratus ) native to east Asia .
It was first  domesticated in चीन अधिक than a हजार सालो पहले , और अनेक पृथक breeds  have since been developed .
Goldfish breeds  vary greatly in आकार , देह आकार , जोडे विन्यास और coloration ( विभिन्न combinations of श्वेत  , yellow , orange , red , brown , and black are known ) .
uncooked  Rouladen
Rouladen (  or rinderroulade , एकवचन : roulade ) is a जर्मनी मांस roulade प्रायः consisting  of bacon , onions , mustard and pickles wrapped in thinly sliced beef which is then cooked .
In some  देशों , the roulade is भी ज्ञात as `` बीफ  olive '' .
Beef or veal  is प्रयुक्त as मांस हालांकि कुछ खाना विद्वानों tend to मानना कि the असली संस्करण  was probably venison or pork , and pork is still popular in some areas .
The beef  rouladen as we जान उन्हें आज have become लोकप्रिय  over the last century .
The cut  is प्रायः topside बीफ or silverside चूंकि इस is  the cheaper cut .
The more expensive version  होता be the गोलाकार स्टीक , भी ज्ञात as  rump steak .
The  मांस is काटें into विशाल , पतला  slices .
The filling is a  मिश्रण of स्मोक्ड और पकाया पोर्क पेट , कटा प्याज और कटा अचार ( gurken ) जिससे  is at times varied by adding minced meat , sausage meat , pine nuts and mustard .
The  मिश्रण varies इससे प्रदेश  to region .
Rouladen  हैं traditionally परोसा लिये डिनर  .
Red wine is  प्रायः परोसा साथ  this dish .
Typical  eukaryotic कोशिका .
Cellular respiration is the set of the metabolic reactions  और प्रक्रियाओं कि लो प्लेस in the कोशिकाएं of जीवों to बदलें biochemical उर्जा इससे nutrients into एडीनोसिन  triphosphate ( ATP ) , and then release waste products .
the प्रतिक्रियाएँ शामिल in श्वसन हैं catabolic प्रतिक्रियाएँ , जिससे  break large molecules into smaller ones , releasing energy in the process as weak so-called `` high-energy '' bonds are replaced by stronger bonds in the products .
Respiration is one of  the कुंजी तरीके a कोशिका gains उपयोगी उर्जा to  fuel cellular activity .
सेल्यूलर श्वसन is  considered an exothermic redox reaction .
The overall reaction is broken into many smaller ones when it occurs  in the देह , सबसे of जिससे हैं रेडॉक्स प्रतिक्रियाएँ themselves  .
Although  technically , सेल्यूलर श्वसन is a दहन प्रतिक्रिया , it clearly करता नहीं  resemble one when it occurs in a living cell .
This  अंतर is क्युकी it occurs in अनेक पृथक  steps .
While  the overall प्रतिक्रिया is a दहन प्रतिक्रिया , no सिंगल प्रतिक्रिया  that comprises it is a combustion reaction .
Nutrients that are commonly used by animal and  संयंत्र कोशिकाएं in श्वसन शामिल शुगर , अमीनो acids और वसीय acids , और a  common oxidizing agent ( electron acceptor ) is molecular oxygen ( O2 ) .
The  उर्जा भंडारित in एटीपी ( इसके तीसरा फास्फेट समूह is weakly बंधुआ to the बाकी of the अणु और is cheaply टूटा allowing stronger bonds to रूप , thereby  transferring energy for use by the cell ) can then be used to drive processes requiring energy , including biosynthesis , locomotion or transportation of molecules across cell membranes .
देशों by 2011 जीडीपी ( नाममात्र ) according  to the CIA World Factbook .
This  आलेख शामिल a सूची of देशों in the संसार sorted by उनके सकल घरेलू उत्पाद ( जीडीपी ) , the  market value of all final goods and services from a nation in a given year .
The GDP dollar estimates  प्रस्तुत यहाँ हैं गणना at मार्केट or सरकारी  official exchange rates .
Several economies which are not considered to be countries ( world , the  eu , और कुछ निर्भर territories ) हैं शामिल in the सूचियाँ  because they appear in the sources .
These economies are not ranked in the charts here , but are  सूचीबद्ध जहाँ लागू  .
The figures presented here do not take into account  मतभेद in the लागत of जीना in अलग देशों , और the परिणाम can vary greatly इससे  one year to another based on fluctuations in the exchange rates of the country 's currency .
Such  fluctuations may बदलें a देश 's रैंकिंग इससे एक साल to the  next , even though they often make little or no difference to the standard of living of its population .
Therefore  ये आंकड़े चाहिए be प्रयुक्त  with caution .
Some  countries/regions may have नागरिकों जिससे हैं on  average wealthy .
These  countries/regions could appear in इस  list as having a small GDP .
This would be because the country/region  सूचीबद्ध रै a छोटी जनसांख्यिकी , और इसलिए छोटी कुल अर्थव्यवस्था ; the जीडीपी is गणना  as the population times the wealth per capita .
comparisons of नेशनल माल हैं भी अक्सर बना on the आधार of खरीदना शक्ति पैरिटी ( ppp ) , to समायोजन लिये  differences in the cost of living in different countries .
( See  सूची of देशों by जीडीपी ( ppp )  )
PPP largely removes the  एक्सचेंज रेट प्रॉब्लम , लकिन रै इसके अपना कमियां ; it करता नहीं प्रतिबिंबित the मान of आर्थिक आउटपुट in अंतरराष्ट्रीय व्यापार , और  it also requires more estimation than nominal GDP .
On the whole , PPP per capita  आंकड़े हैं अधिक narrowly स्प्रेड than नाममात्र जीडीपी प्रति capita  figures .
The first  सूची शामिल आंकड़ा compiled by the  United Nations Statistics Division for 2011 .
The  दूसरी सूची largely शामिल आंकड़ा ( अनुमान ) compiled by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मौद्रिक  Fund for 2012 .
The third list shows the World Bank 's mostly 2011 estimates , and the  चौथी सूची शामिल ज़्यादातर 2012 estimates इससे the सीआईए संसार factbook .
Lapping is a  machining प्रक्रम , in जिससे दो सतहों हैं मला साथ साथ an अक्खड़ between उन्हें , by  hand movement or by way of a machine .
This  can लो  two forms .
The first type of lapping ( traditionally called grinding ) , typically involves rubbing a brittle  सामग्री ऐसे as कांच विरूद्ध a सतह ऐसे as आयरन or कांच itself ( भी ज्ञात as the `` गोद '' or पीस औजार ) साथ an अक्खड़ ऐसे as एल्यूमिनियम ऑक्साइड , जौहरियों 's रूज  , optician 's rouge , emery , silicon carbide , diamond , etc. , in between them .
This produces microscopic conchoidal  fractures as the अक्खड़ रोल्स परिचय between the दो सतहों और removes सामग्री  from both .
The other form of lapping involves a  softer सामग्री ऐसे as पिच or a सिरेमिक लिये the गोद , जिससे is `` चार्ज '' साथ  the abrasive .
The lap is  तब प्रयुक्त to काटें a harder material—the  workpiece .
The  अक्खड़ embeds भीतर the softer सामग्री जिससे holds it और permits  it to score across and cut the harder material .
Taken to a finer limit , this will produce a polished surface such as with a  पॉलिशिंग cloth on an ऑटोमोबाइल , or a पॉलिशिंग cloth or पॉलिशिंग पिच upon कांच or स्टील  .
Taken to the ultimate limit , with the aid of accurate interferometry and  specialized पॉलिशिंग मशीने or skilled हाथ पॉलिशिंग , lensmakers can उपज सतहों कि हैं  flat to better than 30 nanometers .
This is one twentieth  of the wavelength of लाइट इससे the commonly  used 632.8 nm helium neon laser light source .
Surfaces this flat can be molecularly bonded (  optically contacted ) by bringing उन्हें साथ अंतर्गत the सही  conditions .
( This is not the same as the wringing  प्रभाव of जोहानसन ब्लॉक , हालांकि it is  similar ) .
The term `` America 's Team '' is a popular nickname in the United  राज्य कि refers to the डलास cowboys in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल  League .
The nickname originated with the team 's 1978  हाइलाइट फिल्मी , जहाँ the narrator opens साथ the following परिचय : the पद is पहचाना और प्रायः प्रयुक्त by मीडिया आउटलेट , सहित ईएसपीएन , याहू ! , एचबीओ खेल , और खेल illustrated  .
My Babysitter 's a Vampire ( French : Ma gardienne est un vampire ) is a 2011 Canadian  टेलीविज़न श्रेणी , आधारित on the टेलीविज़न फिल्मी of the वही  name .
In Canada , the series premiered in French on  télétoon on फ़रवरी 28 , 2011 , in अंग्रेज़ी on teletoon on कूच 14 , 2011 , और on डिज़्नी चैनल in the संयुक्त  States on June 27 , 2011 .
the दिखाएँ थी निर्मित by भैस tv , creators of 6teen  and Total Drama .
The show follows Ethan Morgan ( Matthew  नाईट ) , जो , in the टेलीविज़न फिल्मी , learns कि उसके  babysitter Sarah ( Vanessa Morgan ) is a vampire .
in the फिल्मी , he learns he is समर्थ to have visions और उसके बेहतरीन dost  Benny Weir ( Atticus Mitchell ) is a spellmaster .
The series follows the three as they take  on अलौकिक शक्तियां और have adventures , साथ occasional सहायता इससे fellow vampires रोरी ( cameron कैनेडी ) और एरिका ( केट टॉड ) ,  while dealing with the troubles of regular high school life .
A second season was confirmed to start production in  सितंबर 2011 और it पहला premiered on डिज़्नी चैनल on जून 29 , 2012 , it premiered  on Teletoon September 6 , 2012 .
