Dodge B Series utility  circa 1950 , चलित by अल्बर्ट  Namatjira
A pickup  ट्रक or pick-up , प्रायः बस referred  to as a pickup , is a light motor vehicle with an open-top , rear cargo area ( bed ) .
In North America , the term pickup is used for light  ट्रक साथ a हल्का ड्यूटी chassis और फैक्टरी निर्मित , एकीकृत bed , as खूब as लिये coupé यूटिलिटी वाहनों , प्रायः आधारित on a निजी car chassis , लकिन भी प्रायः on a खास समर्पित chassi  for such use .
Some countries have their own terms similar to pickup , such  as ute in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई जीलैंड , or bakkie in  South Africa .
Large pickup  ट्रक हैं somewhat विरल in यूरोपीय , जहाँ वैन और लाइट lorries  are commonly used for similar roles .
The President of  the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका ( potus ) is the सिर of  state and head of government of the United States .
The president leads the executive branch  of the संघीय सरकारी और is the commander-in-chief of  the United States Armed Forces .
Article II of the U.S. Constitution vests the executive power of the United States in the president and charges him with the  निष्पादन of संघीय विधि , alongside the जिम्मेदारी of appointing संघीय कार्यपालिका , राजनयिक , नियामक , और न्यायिक अधिकारियों , और concluding treaties साथ विदेशी शक्तियां , साथ the सलाह  and consent of the Senate .
The president is further empowered to grant federal pardons and reprieves , and  to convene और adjourn either or दोनो घरों of कॉंग्रेस अंतर्गत असाधारण  circumstances .
चूंकि the founding of the संयुक्त राज्य , the शक्ति of the अध्यक्ष और the संघीय सरकारी have grown substantially और प्रत्येक आधुनिक अध्यक्ष  , despite possessing no formal legislative powers beyond signing or vetoing congressionally passed bills , is largely responsible for dictating the legislative agenda of his party and the foreign and domestic policy of the United States .
The  अध्यक्ष is अक्सर वर्णित as the सबसे शक्तिशाली  person in the world .
The president is indirectly elected by the people  through the चुनावी कॉलेज to a four-year पद , और is एक of तभी दो nationally निर्वाचित संघीय  officers , the other being the Vice President of the United States .
The Twenty-second Amendment , adopted in 1951  , prohibits anyone इससे कभी होने निर्वाचित to the प्रेसिडेंसी लिये  a third full term .
It also prohibits a person from being elected to the presidency more than once if  कि व्यक्ति previously था परोसा as अध्यक्ष , or एक्टिंग अध्यक्ष , लिये अधिक than दो सालो of another व्यक्ति 's  term as president .
In all , 43 individuals  have परोसा 55 four-year शर्तें  .
On  जनवरी 20 , 2009 , बराक ओबामा  became the 44th and current president .
On November 6 ,  2012 , he थी re-elected और is अनुसूचित to serve  until January 20 , 2017 .
बोतलबंद खनिज  water
Bottled water is drinking  जल ( e.g. , खूब जल , आसुत जल , खनिज जल  , or spring water ) packaged in plastic or glass water bottles .
बोतलबंद जल may be कार्बोनेटेड  or not .
Sizes range from small  सिंगल सेवारत बोतलों to विशाल carboys  for water coolers .
Map  of the प्रमुख नदियाँ , झीलों ,  and reservoirs in India
Map showing  नदियाँ और बाढ़ prone क्षेत्रों  in India
Rivers of  इण्डिया खेल an महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in the जीवनदान of  the Indian people .
The river systems provide irrigation , potable water , cheap transportation ,  विद्युत , और the livelihoods लिये a विशाल क्रमांक of लोगों सब over the देश और to  rural areas .
This easily explains why  nearly सब the प्रमुख शहरों of इण्डिया हैं स्तिथ by the बैंको  of rivers .
The rivers also have an  महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in हिन्दू mythology और हैं माना पावन by सब  Hindus in the country .
Seven  प्रमुख नदियाँ साथ साथ उनके numerous tributaries मेक  up the river system of India .
Most of the rivers pour their waters into the Bay of Bengal ; however , some of the rivers  जिनकी पाठ्यक्रम लो उन्हें through the पश्चिमी भाग of the देश और towards the ईस्ट of the राज्य of himachal pradesh खाली into  the Arabian Sea .
Parts of Ladakh ,  उत्तरी भाग of the aravlli दायरा और the arid भाग of  the Thar Desert have inland drainage .
dr.francis बुकानन surveyed the पाठ्यक्रम of the नदियाँ of इण्डिया साथ साथ उनके  tributaries and branches in 1810-11 AD and presented a minute account of it .
The shifting of the  पाठ्यक्रम और bed over the सदियां is बहुत उल्लेखनीय  .
Many of the channels  उल्लेखित in कि सर्वेक्षण have अभी become मुर्दे ,  dried or even extinct .
All  प्रमुख नदियाँ of इण्डिया originate  from one of the three main watersheds :
The  हिमालय और the काराकोरम सीमाएँ
Vindhya  और satpura सीमाएँ और chotanagpur पठार  in central India
Sahyadri or  पश्चिमी ghats in पश्चिमी इण्डिया
The  bretton वुड्स प्रणाली of मौद्रिक प्रबन्धन स्थापित the नियम लिये वाणिज्यिक और वित्तीय  relations among the world 's major industrial states in the mid-20th century .
The Bretton Woods system was the first example  of a fully negotiated मौद्रिक अनुक्रम intended to govern मौद्रिक संबंध among  independent nation-states .
Preparing to rebuild the international economic system as World  युद्ध ii थी स्टिल raging , 730 delegates इससे सब 44 अलाइड राष्ट्र gathered at the माउंट वॉशिंगटन होटल in bretton वुड्स , नई हैम्पशायर  , United States , for the United Nations Monetary and Financial Conference .
The delegates  deliberated दौरान 1–22 जुलाई 1944 , और हस्ताक्षरित  the Agreement on its final day .
Setting up a system of rules , institutions , and procedures to  विनियमित the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मौद्रिक प्रणाली , the planners at bretton वुड्स स्थापित the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मौद्रिक निधि ( imf ) और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय बैंको लिये पुनर्निर्माण और विकास  ( IBRD ) , which today is part of the World Bank Group .
These organizations became operational in 1945 after a  sufficient क्रमांक of देशों था ratified the अनुबंध  .
The chief features of the Bretton Woods  प्रणाली यहूद an दायित्व लिये प्रत्येक देश to अपनाना a मौद्रिक नीति कि कायम the एक्सचेंज रेट by tying इसके करेंसी  to the U.S. dollar and the ability of the IMF to bridge temporary imbalances of payments .
On 15 August 1971 , the United  राज्य unilaterally terminated convertibility  of the US $ to gold .
इस brought the bretton वुड्स प्रणाली  to an end and saw the dollar become fiat currency .
This action , referred to as the Nixon shock , created  the हालात in जिससे the संयुक्त राज्य डालर became a आरक्षित करेंसी प्रयुक्त  by many states .
At the same  समय , अनेक फिक्स्ड मुद्राएँ ( ऐसे as gbp , लिये उदाहरण  ) , also became free floating .
Ducati Motor Holding S.p.A. is an  इतालवी कम्पनी कि डिजाइन और manufactures मोटरसाइकिल  .
Headquartered in Bologna , Italy , Ducati is  स्वामित्व by audi through इसके इतालवी subsidiary लेम्बोर्गिनी  .
A credit score is a  numerical अभिव्यक्ति आधारित on a सांख्यिकीय विश्लेषण of a व्यक्ति 's क्रेडिट फाइलें , to represent  the creditworthiness of that person .
A credit score is  primarily आधारित on क्रेडिट रपट सूचना typically sourced इससे क्रेडिट  bureaus .
Lenders , such as banks and credit  कार्ड कंपनियाँ , उपयोग क्रेडिट स्कोर to evaluate the संभावित रिस्क posed by lending धन to उपभोक्ता और  to mitigate losses due to bad debt .
Lenders use credit scores to  determine जो qualifies लिये a ऋण , at कया  interest rate , and what credit limits .
Lenders also use  क्रेडिट स्कोर to determine जिससे ग्राहक हैं संभावित to लाओ in the सबसे  revenue .
The use of credit or  पहचान स्कोरिंग prior to authorizing अभिगम or granting क्रेडिट  is an implementation of a trusted system .
Credit  स्कोरिंग is नहीं सीमित to  banks .
Other organizations , such as mobile phone companies , insurance  कंपनियाँ , जमींदार , और सरकारी विभाग employ the वही तकनीकों  .
क्रेडिट स्कोरिंग भी रै a लॉट of ओवरलैप  with data mining , which uses many similar techniques .
These techniques combine thousands  of कारकों लकिन वे हैं अधिक or कम  similar or the same .
The seven SI base units and the  interdependency of उनके परिभाषाएं : लिये उदाहरण , to निकालें the परिभाषा of the मीटर इससे the गति of लाइट , the परिभाषा of the दूसरी जरूर be ज्ञात जबकि the ampere और candela हैं  both dependent on the definition of energy which in turn is defined in terms of length , mass and time .
The International  प्रणाली of इकाई ( si ) defines सात इकाई of माप as a मौलिक  set from which all other SI units are derived .
These SI base units and  उनके शारीरिक quantities are:
metre  लिये लंबाई ( us अंग्रेज़ी  : meter )
किलोग्राम लिये द्रव्यमान ( नोट :  not the gram )
दूसरी लिये  time
ampere लिये इलेक्ट्रिक  current
kelvin  लिये तापमान
candela लिये चमकदार  intensity
mole for the  राशि of पदार्थ  .
The SI base quantities form a set of mutually  स्वतंत्र आयाम as जरूरी by आयामी विश्लेषण commonly  employed in science and technology .
However , in a given realization of these units they  may खूब be interdependent , i.e . पारिभाषित in शर्तें  of each other .
The names of SI units are written in lowercase characters (  the 'degree सेल्सियस ' meets इस नियम , as 'degree ' is the ईकाई  , and 'Celsius ' is a modifier ) .
The symbols of units are written in lowercase ( e.g . metre has the symbol m ) , except that symbols  लिये इकाई नामित बाद व्यक्तियों हैं लिखा साथ an आरंभिक पूंजी अक्षर ( e.g. , the हर्ट्ज़ रै the अपरकेस प्रतीक hz  ) .
Many other units , such as the litre ( US  अंग्रेज़ी : लीनियर ) , हैं formally नहीं भाग of the si , लकिन हैं स्वीकृत  for use with SI .
स्मारक  Canyon
कोलोराडो नेशनल स्मारक ( locally referred to as the स्मारक ) is a भाग of the नेशनल पार्क सेवा निकट the नगर of ग्रैंड  Junction , Colorado .
Spectacular canyons cut deep into  sandstone और भी granite–gneiss–schist चट्टान formations  , in some areas .
This is an  क्षेत्रफल of मरुस्थल जमीन ऊँची on the कोलोराडो पठार , साथ पिनियन और juniper  forests on the plateau .
the पार्क होस्ट a चौड़ी दायरा of वन्यजीव , सहित red-tailed चीलों और सुनहरी ईगल्स , ravens  , jays , desert bighorn sheep , and coyotes .
क्रियाएँ शामिल चढ़ाई , horseback सवारी , सड़क bicycling , और दर्शनीय ड्राइव ; a आगंतुक बीच on the वेस्ट  side contains a natural history museum and gift shop .
There are magnificent views from trails and the Rim Rock  ड्राइव , जिससे हवाएँ साथ the पठार  .
आसपास हैं the किताब cliffs , और  the largest flat-topped mountain in the world , the Grand Mesa .
Its feature attraction is Monument Canyon , which  रनों the चौडाई of the पार्क , और शामिल चट्टान formations ऐसे as स्वतंत्रता स्मारक , the चुंबन युगल , और कोक  Ovens .
the स्मारक शामिल 20,500 एकड़ ( 32 वर्गाकार मील ) , much of जिससे  has been recommended to Congress for designation as wilderness .
left to right : Utility Uniform , Blue Dress  वर्दी , सेवा वर्दी , और संध्या पोशाक  uniforms
The  वर्दी of the संयुक्त राज्य समुद्री corps serve to फर्क  Marines from members of other services .
Among current uniforms in the  संयुक्त राज्य हथियारबंद शक्तियां , the marines ' वर्दी have  been in service the longest .
The Marine Dress Blue  वर्दी रै , साथ few परिवर्तन , महरूम worn in essentially इसके वर्तमान रूप  since the 19th century .
North American telephone area codes  419 और 567 serve the उत्तरपश्चिम quadrant  of the U.S. state of Ohio .
The largest city served by these  क्षेत्रफल कोड is टोलेडो ( और इसके उपनगरों of हॉलैंड , maumee , northwood , ऑरेगॉन , ओटावा पहाड़ियाँ , perrysburg , rossford  , Sylvania , Swanton , Waterville , and Whitehouse ) .
Other cities served by these area codes include Ada , Ashland , Bellevue , Bluffton , Bowling Green , Bryan , Bucyrus , Celina , Clyde , Crestline , Defiance , Delphos ,  एडिसन , erastus , findlay , fostoria , fremont , galion , kenton , लीमा , मैन्सफील्ड , माउंट gilead , नेपोलियन , नॉरवॉक , ओक हार्बर , बंदरगाहों क्लिंटन , sandusky , शेल्बी , st. marys , tiffin , अपर sandusky  , Van Wert , Wapakoneta , Wauseon , Willard .
अन्य क्षेत्रों परोसा शामिल the झील erie आइलैंड्स उत्तर of बंदरगाहों  Clinton and west of Sandusky .
The main area  कोड , 419 , थी निर्मित as एक of the असली क्षेत्रफल कोड in अक्तूबर 1947 ; the ओवरले क्षेत्रफल कोड  567 was created on January 1 , 2002 .
Despite the presence of Toledo , the state 's fourth-largest city , 419 was the  पिछला of ओहियो 's असली चार क्षेत्रफल कोड to have महरूम विभाजित or overlaid  .
Mickey Leroy Gilley ( born March 9 ,  1936 ) is an अमरीकी देश  music singer and musician .
Although he started out  गायन straight-up देश और पश्चिमी सामग्री in the 1970s , he स्थानांतरित towards a अधिक पॉप -friendly  sound in the 1980s , bringing him further success on not just the country charts , but the pop charts as well .
Among his biggest hits are `` Room Full of Roses , '' `` Do n't the  लड़कियों सब मिलेंगी prettier at closing समय , '' और the रीमेक  of the Soul hit `` Stand by Me `` .
He is also the cousin of Jerry  ली लुईस , कार्ल mcvoy , जिम  Gilley and Jimmy Swaggart .
According to the Federal Aviation Administration , Gilley is a licensed pilot , who holds an instrument  दरजा साथ वाणिज्यिक पायलट privileges लिये multi-engine airplanes , as खूब as निजी पायलट privileges लिये  single engine aircraft .
The September 11 attacks ( also referred to as September 11 , September 11th ,  or 9/11 ) यहूद a श्रेणी of चार समन्वित आतंकवादी हमले शुभारम्भ by the इस्लामी आतंकवादी समूह al-qaeda upon the संयुक्त राज्य  in New York City and the Washington , D.C. area on September 11 , 2001 .
Four passenger airliners were  hijacked by 19 al-qaeda आतंकवादी so वे could be flown into  buildings in suicide attacks .
Two of those planes , American Airlines Flight 11 and United Airlines Flight 175 , were crashed into the North and  दक्षिण मीनारें , क्रमशः , of the संसार व्यापार बीच जटिल in नई यॉर्क नगर .
Within two  घंटों , दोनो मीनारें collapsed साथ मलबा और the resulting फ़ायर causing आंशिक or पूरा पतन of सब अन्य इमारतें in  the WTC complex , as well as major damage to ten other large surrounding structures .
A third plane , American Airlines Flight  77 , थी क्रैश into the प्रस्तुतीकरण ( the मुख्यालय of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of रक्षा ) , अग्रणी to a आंशिक पतन  in its western side .
the चौथी प्लेन , संयुक्त एयरलाइंस उड़ान 93 , थी targeted at the संयुक्त राज्य कैपिटल  in Washington , D.C. , but crashed into a field near Shanksville , Pennsylvania , after its passengers tried to overcome the hijackers .
In total , almost 3,000 people died in the  हमले , सहित the 227 नागरिकों और 19 hijackers सवार the चार  planes .
suspicion जल्दी गिरी  on al-Qaeda .
Although the group 's leader , Osama bin  लादेन , initially अस्वीकृत कोई भागीदारी , in 2004 he claimed जिम्मेदारी  for the attacks .
al-qaeda और बिन लादेन cited u.S. support of इसराईल , the उपस्थिति of u.S. सैनिकों  in Saudi Arabia , and sanctions against Iraq as motives for the attacks .
The United States responded to the attacks by  शुभारंभ the युद्ध on आतंक और आक्रमणकारी अफगानिस्तान to depose the तालिबान , जिससे था harbored al-qaeda  .
Many countries strengthened their  anti-terrorism विधान और विस्तारित विधि प्रवर्तन शक्तियां  .
Having evaded capture for years ,  बिन लादेन थी स्तिथ और मारे by u.S. शक्तियां  in May 2011 .
The destruction of the Twin  मीनारें और अन्य गुण caused गंभीर क्षति to the अर्थव्यवस्था of निम्नतर मैनहटन  and had a significant effect on global markets .
Cleanup of the World Trade Center site  थी समाप्त in may 2002 , और the प्रस्तुतीकरण थी repaired भीतर a साल .
Numerous memorials have been constructed ,  सहित the नेशनल सितंबर 11 मेमोरियल & संग्रहालय in नई यॉर्क , the प्रस्तुतीकरण मेमोरियल , और the उड़ान  93 National Memorial in Pennsylvania .
After a lengthy delay , the One World Trade Center is  अपेक्षित to be समाप्त at मैदान शून्य in नई यॉर्क नगर  in 2013 .
Finding Nemo is a  2003 अमरीकी computer-animated comedy-drama एडवेंचर फिल्मी लिखा और निर्देशित by एंड्रयू stanton , released by  Walt Disney Pictures , and the fifth film produced by Pixar Animation Studios .
It tells the story  of the over-protective clownfish नामित marlin ( अल्बर्ट ब्रूक्स ) जो , साथ साथ a राजसी तंग नामित dory ( एलेन degeneres ) , खोज  for his abducted son Nemo ( Alexander Gould ) all the way to Sydney Harbour .
Along the way , Marlin  learns to लो risks और let nemo लो परवाह  of himself .
It is Pixar 's first film  to be released in cinemas in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध गर्मियाँ  .
The film was re-released for the first  समय in 3d on सितंबर 14 , 2012 , और it थी released on blu-ray on दिसम्बर  4 , 2012 .
A sequel ,  ढूंढना dory , is फिलहाल in विकास , नियत to be released  on November 25 , 2015 .
The film received universal critical acclaim  और जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन एनिमेटेड विशेषता , और थी मनोनीत in तीन अधिक  categories including Best Original Screenplay .
It was the second highest-grossing film of  2003 , कमाई a कुल of $ 921 लाख विश्वव्यापी  .
Finding Nemo is also the best-selling DVD of all time , with over 40 million copies sold as of 2006 , and was the  highest-grossing g-rated फिल्मी of सब समय पहले पिक्चर्स 's अपना खिलौना स्टोरी 3  overtook it .
It is also the 23rd  highest-grossing फिल्मी of सब समय , as खूब as the 3rd highest-grossing  animated film .
In 2008  , the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान नामित it the दसवाँ महानतम एनिमेटेड फिल्मी  ever made during their Top 10 .
The sixth season  of अमेरिका 's बेहतरीन नृत्य क्रू , भी ज्ञात as अमेरिका 's बेहतरीन नृत्य क्रू : ऋतु of the सुपरस्टार , premiered  on April 7 , 2011 and concluded on June 5 , 2011 .
Auditions were held in four cities from  जनवरी 21 through फ़रवरी 5 : शिकागो , ह्यूस्टन , नई यॉर्क , और  Los Angeles .
इस ऋतु takes a अलग रूट  from past seasons .
The crews must perform to the music of one  विशिष्ट कलाकार प्रत्येक सप्ताह , सहित रिहाना , लील वेन , और अन्य  popular stars .
This season also features special guest appearances by various  म्यूज़िक हस्तियाँ सहित जस्टिन बीबर , the ब्लैक eyed मटर , कैटी पेरी , kesha , निकी minaj , और kanye  West .
Dominic `` D-Trix '' Sandoval , a former member of Quest Crew ,  the विजेता of the तीसरा ऋतु of अमेरिका 's बेहतरीन नृत्य क्रू , joins  returning judges Lil Mama and JC Chasez as the newest judge .
In the season finale , I aM mE  थी घोषित the विजेता of ऋतु 6 और प्राप्त the $ 100,000  ( USD ) prize .
In the  संयुक्त राज्य , सोशल सुरक्षा refers to the old-age , survivors ,  and Disability Insurance ( OASDI ) federal program .
The original Social Security Act ( 1935 ) and the current  संस्करण of the अधिनियम , as amended , encompass अनेक सोशल welfare और सोशल बीमे कार्यक्रम  .
सोशल सुरक्षा is primarily वित्तपोषित through समर्पित payroll कर पुकारा संघीय बीमे  Contributions Act tax ( FICA ) .
Tax deposits  हैं formally entrusted to the संघीय old-age और survivors बीमे विश्वास निधि , the संघीय विकलांगता बीमे विश्वास निधि , the संघीय हॉस्पिटल बीमे विश्वास निधि , or  the Federal Supplementary Medical Insurance Trust Fund which comprise the Social Security Trust Fund .
Upward  redistribution of आय is जिम्मेदार लिये परिचय 43 % of the  projected Social Security shortfall over the next 75 years .
According to economist Martin Feldstein , the combined spending for  सब सोशल बीमे कार्यक्रम in 2003 गठित 37 % of सरकारी व्यय  and 7 % of the gross domestic product .
Social Security is currently estimated to keep roughly 40  प्रतिशत of सब अमेरिकी आयु 65  or older out of poverty .
The  सोशल सुरक्षा प्रशासन is headquartered in woodlawn  , Maryland , just west of Baltimore .
The alcohol  by आवाज़ दिखाया on a बोतल of  absinthe .
Alcohol by volume (  abbreviated as abv , abv , or alc/vol ) is a मानक माप of कैसा much दारू ( इथेनॉल ) is contained in  an alcoholic beverage ( expressed as a percentage of total volume ) .
The  abv मानक is प्रयुक्त  worldwide .
In some countries , alcohol by volume  is referred to as डिग्री gay-lussac ( बाद the फ्रेंच केमिस्ट जोसेफ  Louis Gay-Lussac ) .
Laurel Hollow is a  गाँव in the कस्बा of सीप खाड़ी in nassau काउंटी , नई यॉर्क in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 1,952  at the 2010 census .
Charles  जॉन huffam डिकेंस ( ; 7 फ़रवरी 1812 – 9 जून 1870 ) थी  an English writer and social critic .
He created some of the  संसार 's सबसे यादगार fictional वर्ण और is generally  regarded as the greatest novelist of the Victorian period .
During his life , his works enjoyed unprecedented fame  , और by the बीसवीं सदी उसके साहित्यिक प्रतिभाशाली थी broadly acknowledged  by critics and scholars .
His  novels और छोटी कहानियां continue  to be widely popular .
Born in Portsmouth , England , Dickens left school  to कार्य in a फैक्टरी बाद उसके पिता थी thrown  into debtors ' prison .
Although he had little  औपचारिक शिक्षा , उसके जल्दी impoverishment  drove him to succeed .
Over his career he edited a weekly journal for 20 years , wrote 15 novels , 5 novellas and hundreds of short stories and  non-fiction आलेख , lectured और performed extensively , थी an indefatigable अक्षर लेखक , और campaigned vigorously लिये children 's अधिकारों , शिक्षा , और अन्य सोशल reforms  .
Dickens sprang to fame with  the 1836 सीरियल प्रकाशन of the pickwick  Papers .
Within a few years he had become an international  साहित्यिक हस्ती , प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके ह्यूमर , व्यंग्य , और keen अवलोकन of अक्षर और  society .
His novels , most published in monthly or weekly instalments ,  pioneered the सीरियल प्रकाशन of कथा fiction , जिससे became the प्रबल विक्टोरियन विधि लिये अनोखा  publication .
The instalment format allowed Dickens to evaluate his audience 's  प्रतिक्रिया , और he प्रायः परिवर्धित उसके प्लाट और अक्षर विकास आधारित on  such feedback .
For example , when his wife 's chiropodist expressed distress at the way Miss  mowcher in दाउद कॉपरफील्ड लगा to प्रतिबिंबित उसके disabilities , डिकेंस गई on to improve the अक्षर साथ धनात्मक  lineaments .
Fagin in Oliver Twist apparently mirrors the famous fence  ikey सुलेमान ; उसके कैरीकेचर of leigh हंट in the फिगर of mr skimpole in bleak हाउस थी likewise toned bas on सलाह इससे कुछ of उसके मित्रों , as वे पढ़ा  episodes .
in the वही अनोखा , दोनो लॉरेंस boythorne और मूनी the beadle हैं drawn इससे रियल जीवन – boythorne  from Walter Savage Landor and Mooney from 'Looney ' , a beadle at Salisbury Square .
His plots were carefully  constructed , और डिकेंस प्रायः wove in तत्व इससे topical कार्यक्रम into उसके कहानियां  .
Masses of the  अनपढ़ ग़रीब chipped in ha'pennies to have प्रत्येक नई मासिक एपीसोड पढ़ा to उन्हें ,  opening up and inspiring a new class of readers .
डिकेंस थी regarded as the साहित्यिक colossus  of his age .
His 1843 novella , A Christmas Carol , is one of the most influential works  कभी लिखा , और it remains लोकप्रिय और continues to inspire adaptations  in every artistic genre .
His creative genius has been praised by fellow writers—from Leo Tolstoy to G.  K. चेस्टरटन और जार्ज ऑरवेल —for इसके यथार्थवाद , कॉमेडी , गद्य स्टाइल , अद्वितीय characterisations , और सोशल  criticism .
On the other hand Oscar Wilde , Henry James and  वर्जिनिया woolf complained of a कमी of मनोवैज्ञानिक गहराई  , loose writing , and a vein of saccharine sentimentalism .
Martin Luther King and  अन्य सिविल अधिकारों नेताओ in सामने of the प्रतिमा of अब्राहम lincoln  , August 28 , 1963
The civil  अधिकारों गति थी a श्रेणी of विश्वव्यापी राजनैतिक आंदोलनों  for equality before the law that peaked in the 1960s .
In many situations it  took the रूप of अभियान of सिविल प्रतिरोध aimed at achieving बदलें  by nonviolent forms of resistance .
In some situations it was  accompanied , or followed , by सिविल अशांति और हथियारबंद  rebellion .
The process was long and tenuous  in अनेक देशों , और अनेक of ये आंदोलनों किया नहीं fully achieve उनके लक्ष्य हालांकि , the प्रयत्न of ये  movements did lead to improvements in the legal rights of previously oppressed groups of people .
The main aim  of the सिविल अधिकारों गति शामिल , और शामिल , ensuring कि the अधिकारों of सब लोगों हैं बराबर सुरक्षित  by the law , including the rights of minorities .
Civil rights  आंदोलनों ranging इससे the वैश्विक lgbt अधिकारों गति to  the global Women 's rights movement to various racial minority rights movements around the world continue .
The 2010 FIFA World Cup was  the 19th फीफा संसार कप , the संसार चैंपियनशिप  for men 's national association football teams .
It took place in  दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी इससे 11 जून to 11 जुलाई  2010 .
The bidding process for  होस्टिंग the टूर्नामेंट फाइनल थी खोलें तभी to अफ़्रीकी राष्ट्र ; in 2004 , the अंतरराष्ट्रीय फ़ुटबॉल संघ , फीफा  , selected South Africa over Egypt and Morocco to become the first African nation to host the finals .
The matches were played in ten  स्टेडियम in नौ मेजबान शहरों around the देश , साथ the फाइनल निभाई at the सॉकर नगर स्टेडियम in दक्षिण  Africa 's largest city , Johannesburg .
Thirty-two teams were selected for  भागीदारी via a विश्वव्यापी योग्यता टूर्नामेंट कि began in  August 2007 .
In the first round of the tournament finals , the teams competed in  round-robin समूह of चार टीमों लिये अंक , साथ the शीर्ष दो टीमों in प्रत्येक समूह  proceeding .
These  सोलह टीमों उन्नत to the नॉकआउट स्टेज , जहाँ तीन rounds  of play decided which teams would participate in the final .
In the final , Spain , the European champions ,  पराजित third-time finalists the नीदरलैंड्स 1–0 बाद अतिरिक्त समय , साथ आन्द्रेस iniesta 's लक्ष्य in the 116th मिनट giving स्पेन उनके पहला संसार शीर्षक , बनने the आठवीं स्वदेश to जीत the टूर्नामेंट , और the पहला  European nation to win the tournament outside its home continent .
Host nation South Africa ,  2006 संसार champions इटली और 2006 runners-up फ़्रांस यहूद सब eliminated  in the first round of the tournament .
It was the  पहला समय कि the होस्ट यहूद  eliminated in the first round .
New  जीलैंड साथ उनके तीन draws यहूद the तभी  undefeated team in the tournament , but were also eliminated in the first round .
The McMuffin is a family of breakfast sandwiches in various  आकार और configurations , बेची by the fast-food रेस्तरां  chain McDonald 's .
The Egg McMuffin is the signature breakfast  सैंडविच ; it थी invented by the लेट मैकडोनाल्ड 's वाल हर्ब पीटरसन in the लेट  1960s and was introduced nationwide in 1972 .
जॉन लेनन थी an अंग्रेज़ी संगीतकार जो gained विश्वव्यापी कीर्ति as एक of the संस्थापकों of the बीटल्स , लिये उसके subsequent  solo career , and for his political activism and pacifism .
He was shot by Mark David Chapman at the  प्रवेश of the भवन जहाँ he जिया ,  The Dakota , in New York City on 8 December 1980 .
Lennon had just  लौटे इससे रिकार्ड संयंत्र स्टुडियो साथ उसके बीवी ,  Yoko Ono .
Lennon was pronounced dead on arrival at St.  luke's-roosevelt हॉस्पिटल बीच , जहाँ it थी stated कि nobody could have जिया लिये अधिक than a few मिनट्स बाद sustaining  such injuries .
Shortly after local news stations reported Lennon 's death ,  crowds gathered at रूज़वेल्ट हॉस्पिटल और in सामने  of the Dakota .
Lennon was cremated on 10 December  1980 at the ferncliff कब्रिस्तान in hartsdale , नई यॉर्क ; the राख यहूद दिए to ओनो  , who chose not to hold a funeral for him .
the पहला रपट of लेनन 's मौत to a u.S. नेशनल दर्शक थी घोषित by हावर्ड  Cosell , on ABC 's Monday Night Football .
New Orleans ( or , locally or ; ) is a major United  राज्य बंदरगाहों और the largest नगर और महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the राज्य  of Louisiana .
The population of the city  थी 343,829 as of the 2010 u.S. जनसांख्यिकी  .
The New Orleans metropolitan area ( New Orleans–Metairie–Kenner Metropolitan Statistical Area ) had a  जनसांख्यिकी of 1,167,764 in 2010 और थी the 46th largest in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
The New Orleans–Metairie–Bogalusa  संयुक्त सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल , a larger व्यापार क्षेत्रफल , था a 2010  population of 1,214,932 .
The city is named after Orléans , a city located on the Loire River  in केन्द्र , फ़्रांस , और is खूब ज्ञात लिये इसके पृथक फ्रेंच क्रियोल वास्तुकला , as खूब as इसके cross-cultural  and multilingual heritage .
New Orleans is also famous for its cuisine , music ( particularly as the birthplace of jazz ) , and  इसके सालाना जश्न और त्यौहार , सबसे notably mardi  Gras .
The city is often referred to as the  `` सबसे अद्वितीय '' in अमेरिका  .
New  ऑरलियन्स is स्तिथ in southeastern louisiana , straddling  the Mississippi River .
The  नगर और ऑरलियन्स मोहल्ला ( )  are .
The city and parish are bounded by the parishes of St. Tammany to  the उत्तर , st. बर्नार्ड to the ईस्ट , plaquemines to the दक्षिण और जेफरसन to the दक्षिण और  west .
Lake Pontchartrain ,  भाग of जिससे is शामिल in the नगर हद , झूठ to the  north and Lake Borgne lies to the east .
The United States presidential election of 1968  थी the 46th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव , आयोजित on मंगलवार  , November 5 , 1968 .
the रिपब्लिकन nominee , पूर्व vice-president रिचर्ड निक्सन , जीती the चुनाव over the लोकतांत्रिक nominee  , incumbent Vice-President Hubert Humphrey .
Nixon ran on a campaign that promised to  restore विधि और अनुक्रम to the स्वदेश 's शहरों  , torn by riots and crime .
Analysts have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning election as it  permanently disrupted the नई सौदे गठबन्धन कि था वर्चस्व अध्यक्षीय राजनीती  for 36 years .
Coming four years after Democrat Lyndon B. Johnson  जीती in a ऐतिहासिक भूस्खलन , the चुनाव देखी the लाज़िम अध्यक्ष मजबूर आउट of the रेस और a रिपब्लिकन  elected for the first time in twelve years .
It was a wrenching national experience , conducted during a year of violence that included the  हत्या of सिविल अधिकारों नेता मार्टिन लूथर किंग , jr. , और subsequent रेस दंगे आरपार the स्वदेश , the assasination of लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी रॉबर्ट F. कैनेडी , फैली विपक्ष to the वियतनाम युद्ध आरपार विश्वविद्यालयों campuses  , and violent confrontations between police and anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic National Convention as the Democratic party split again and again .
The election featured the  strongest तीसरा पार्टी प्रयत्न चूंकि 1912 by पूर्व अलबामा राज्यपाल जार्ज वालेस  , a Democrat .
Because Wallace 's campaign opposed federal  हस्तक्षेप in the दक्षिण to समाप्त स्कूल पृथक्करण , he carried the गहन दक्षिण और भागा  well in ethnic industrial districts in the North .
This was the last  चुनाव in जिससे नई यॉर्क था the सबसे मत in the  electoral college ( 43 votes ) .
बाद the 1970 जनसांख्यिकी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया gained the सबसे चुनावी  votes and has remained the most populous state since then .
This is the latest election where a presidential  टिकट जीती बगैर carrying the वाइस अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी 's  home state .
Karak ( ; also known as Garak , Garrak , and  gorg ) is a गाँव in gamasiyab ग्रामीण ज़िला , in the सेंट्रल ज़िला  of Nahavand County , Hamadan Province , Iran .
At the 2006 census ,  इसके जनसांख्यिकी थी 294 , in 65 परिवारों  .
Kurt 's  हस्ताक्षर
Kurt Donald Cobain ( February 20 , 1967 –  अप्रैल 5 , 1994 ) थी an अमरीकी संगीतकार और कलाकार , बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the सीसे सिंगर , guitarist और प्राथमिक  songwriter of the grunge band Nirvana .
Cobain formed Nirvana  साथ krist novoselic in एबरडीन , वॉशिंगटन in 1985 और स्थापित  it as part of the Seattle music scene , having its debut album Bleach released on the independent record label Sub Pop in 1989 .
After signing with major label DGC Records , the band found breakthrough success with ``  खुश्बू जैसे टीन स्पिरिट `` इससे इसके दूसरी एल्बम nevermind ( 1991  ) .
Following the  कामयाबी of nevermind , निर्वाण थी labeled `` the फ्लैगशिप बैंड '' of पीढी  X , and Cobain hailed as `` the spokesman of a generation '' .
Cobain , however , was often uncomfortable and frustrated ,  believing उसके संदेश और कलाकारी दृष्टि to have महरूम misinterpreted by the पब्लिक , साथ उसके निजी मुद्दे प्रायः  subject to media attention .
He challenged  निर्वाण 's दर्शक साथ इसके फाइनल स्टुडियो एल्बम in  Utero ( 1993 ) .
During  the पिछला सालो of उसके जीवन , कोबेन struggled साथ हेरोइन व्यसन  , illness and depression .
He also had difficulty coping with his fame and public image , and the professional and lifelong personal  pressures surrounding खुद और उसके बीवी , संगीतकार कोर्टनी प्रेम  .
On  अप्रैल 8 , 1994 , कोबेन थी मिला मुर्दे at उसके घर in सिएटल , the शिकार  of what was officially ruled a suicide by a self-inflicted shotgun wound to the head .
The circumstances of his  मौत at आयु 27 have become a टॉपिक of पब्लिक fascination  and debate .
Since their debut , Nirvana ,  साथ कोबेन as a songwriter , रै बेची over 25 लाख एल्बम in the u.S. , और over 50 लाख विश्वव्यापी  .
A millwright is a craftsman or  tradesman सगाई साथ the निर्माण और मेंटेनेंस  of machinery .
More  generally in the अंग्रेज़ी बोलना संसार , जल्दी millwrights यहूद विशेषज्ञ बढ़ई  who erected machines used in agriculture , food processing and processing lumber and paper .
In the early  भाग of the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति , उनके कौशल यहूद दबाया into  service building the earliest powered textile mills .
आधुनिक millwrights कार्य साथ स्टील और अन्य सामग्री in जोड to लकडी और जरूर प्रायः combine the कौशल of अनेक skilled ट्रेड in अनुक्रम to सफलतापूर्वक  fabricate industrial machinery or to assemble machines from pre-fabricated parts .
The modern millwright must also be able to read  blueprints और अन्य schematics to सहायता उसे in the निर्माण of जटिल  systems .
millwrights हैं अक्सर unionized , साथ around 45 % unionized in the us , हालांकि अनुभवी  millwrights often set themselves up as independent contractors .
The Adjustment Bureau is a 2011  अमरीकी रोमांटिक कार्रवाई थ्रिलर फिल्मी loosely आधारित on the फिलिप K. लंड छोटी स्टोरी  , `` Adjustment Team `` .
The film was written and  निर्देशित by जार्ज nolfi और सितारों मैट डैमन  and Emily Blunt .
the डाल भी शामिल एंथोनी mackie  , John Slattery , Michael Kelly , and Terence Stamp .
The score was composed by Thomas Newman ,  साथ दो गीतों by रिचर्ड ashcroft ( `` भविष्य 's उज्जवल '' लिये the खोलने अनुक्रम ; ``  Are You Ready ? '' for the closing credits ) .
सोडियम azide is the अकार्बनिक यौगिक  with the formula NaN3 .
This colorless  नमक is the gas-forming घटक in अनेक  car airbag systems .
It is used for the  तैयारी of अन्य azide  compounds .
It is an  ionic पदार्थ , is अत्यधिक घुलनशील in जल , और  is very acutely toxic .
Double  रेनबो और supernumerary rainbows  on the inside of the primary arc .
The shadow of the photographer 's head on the bottom  marks the केन्द्र of the रेनबो वृत्त (  antisolar point ) .
A rainbow is an  ऑप्टिकल और meteorological घटना कि is caused by प्रतिबिंब of लाइट in जल droplets in the धरती 's माहौल  , resulting in a spectrum of light appearing in the sky .
It takes the form  of a multicoloured चाप  .
Rainbows  caused by धूप सदा appear in the खण्ड  of sky directly opposite the sun .
In a ``  प्राथमिक रेनबो '' , the चाप shows रेड on the बाहरी भाग  and violet on the inner side .
This rainbow is caused by light being refracted  जबकि प्रवेश a droplet of जल , तब reflected अंदर on the वापस of the droplet  and refracted again when leaving it .
In a double rainbow , a  दूसरी चाप is देखी बाहर the प्राथमिक चाप , और रै the अनुक्रम of इसके रंग  reversed , red facing toward the other one , in both rainbows .
This second rainbow is caused  by लाइट reflecting twice अंदर जल droplets  .
The Conservative  पार्टी , officially the रूढ़िवादी और यूनियनिस्ट पार्टी और colloquially referred to as the tory पार्टी or  the Tories , is a centre-right political party in the United Kingdom that espouses the philosophies of conservatism and British unionism .
it is the largest political  पार्टी in the संयुक्त किंगडम , होने the largest सिंगल पार्टी in the हाउस of  Commons with 303 MPs , the largest party in local government with 9,391 councillors , and the largest British party in the European Parliament with 25 MEPs .
it governs in गठबन्धन साथ the उदार डेमोक्रेट ,  with party leader David Cameron as Prime Minister .
The  रूढ़िवादी पार्टी थी संस्थापित in 1834 , और थी एक of दो प्रबल पार्टियों  in the 19th century , along with the Liberal Party .
It changed its name to the  रूढ़िवादी और यूनियनिस्ट पार्टी in 1912 बाद विलय साथ the उदार यूनियनिस्ट पार्टी  , although that name is rarely used and it is generally referred to as simply the Conservative Party .
in the 1920s , the उदार vote greatly  diminished and the Labour Party became the Conservatives ' main rivals .
Conservative Prime Ministers led governments for 57  सालो of the 20th सदी , सहित विंस्टन चर्चिल ( 1940–45 , 1951–55 ) और मार्गरेट थैचर  ( 1979–90 ) .
Thatcher 's tenure led to wide-ranging  आर्थिक उदारीकरण और देखी the conservatives become the सबसे eurosceptic  of the three major parties .
The party was returned to government in coalition , having  विफल to जीत a बहुमत , in 2010 अंतर्गत the अधिक `` उदार '' नेतृत्व  of David Cameron .
In the European Parliament , the Conservatives are the largest British party with 25 MEPs , who sit with the soft eurosceptic  यूरोपीय conservatives और reformists ( ecr ) संसदीय समूह , जबकि the पार्टी itself is a सदस्य of the गठबंधन of यूरोपीय conservatives और reformists  ( AECR ) Europarty .
वे हैं the third-largest पार्टी in the स्कॉटिश पार्लियामेंट  and second-largest in the Welsh Assembly .
They were formally allied to the Ulster Unionist Party ( UUP ) as part of the  ulster conservatives और unionists व्यवस्था , साथ the uup फिलहाल participating in the five-party उत्तरी  Ireland Executive .
Destiny 's Child was an American R & B girl group whose  फाइनल , और शायद सबसे recognizable , line-up comprised बेयोंस नॉलेस , केली rowland और मिशेल  Williams .
Formed in 1990 in Houston , Texas , Destiny 's Child members began their  musical endeavors as लड़की 's टीमे comprising , among अन्य , नॉलेस , rowland , latavia roberson और letoya luckett  .
After years of limited success  , वे यहूद हस्ताक्षरित to कोलंबिया रिकॉर्ड as  Destiny 's Child .
Destiny 's Child  थी शुभारम्भ into मुख्यधारा मान्यता following the रिलीज of उनके best-selling दूसरी एल्बम , the लिखने 's on the वॉल  , which contained the number-one singles `` Bills , Bills , Bills `` and `` Say My Name `` .
Despite critical and commercial success , the group was  plagued by आतंरिक विरोध और विधिक turmoil , as roberson और luckett attempted to विभाजित इससे the समूह 's मैनेजर mathew नॉलेस , citing favoritism of नॉलेस और rowland  , his daughter and niece , respectively .
Both Roberson and Luckett were soon replaced with  विलियम्स और farrah फ्रैंकलिन ; however , in 2000 , फ्रैंकलिन थी बर्खास्त , leaving उन्हें  as a trio .
Their third album , Survivor , which contains themes the public interpreted as a channel to the group 's experience , contains the  विश्वव्यापी हिट्स `` स्वतंत्र महिलाओं `` , `` उत्तरजीवी `` और `` bootylicious ``  .
In 2002 , they announced a hiatus and re-united two  सालो बाद लिये the रिलीज of उनके चौथी स्टुडियो एल्बम , नियति fulfilled ( 2004 )  .
Destiny 's  चाइल्ड रै बेची अधिक than 50 लाख  records worldwide to date .
Billboard magazine ranks the group as one of the greatest  musical trios of सब समय , the नवीं सबसे कामयाब artist/band of the 2000s , और लगाई the समूह 68th in इसके all-time hot  100 Artists list in 2008 .
The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention ( CDC ) is a United States federal agency  अंतर्गत the विभाग of स्वास्थ्य और इंसान सेवाएं headquartered in druid पहाड़ियाँ , unincorporated dekalb काउंटी  , Georgia , in Greater Atlanta .
It  works to protect पब्लिक स्वास्थ्य और सुरक्षा by providing सूचना to बढ़ाएँ स्वास्थ्य निर्णय , और it promotes  health through partnerships with state health departments and other organizations .
The CDC focus national attention on developing and applying disease prevention and control ( especially infectious diseases and  foodborne pathogens और अन्य सूक्ष्मजैविक infections ) , पर्यावरणीय स्वास्थ्य , occupational सुरक्षा और स्वास्थ्य , स्वास्थ्य प्रमोशन , चोट रोकथाम और शिक्षा क्रियाएँ designed to  improve the health of the people of the United States .
The CDC is the United States ' national public health institute and  is a founding सदस्य of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ of नेशनल  Public Health Institutes .
Earthquake  भविष्यवाणी `` is प्रायः पारिभाषित as the specification of the समय , स्थान , और परिमाण  of a future earthquake within stated limits '' , and particularly of `` the next strong earthquake to occur in a region . ''
This can be distinguished from earthquake  forecasting , जिससे is the probabilistic मूल्यांकन of सामान्य भूकंप जोखिम , सहित the आवृत्ति और परिमाण of  damaging earthquakes , in a given area over periods of years or decades .
This can be further distinguished  इससे real-time भूकंप चेतावनी प्रणालियों , जिससे , upon डिटेक्शन of a कठोर भूकंप , can provide neighboring  regions a few seconds warning of potentially significant shaking .
To be useful , an  भूकंप भविष्यवाणी जरूर be precise पर्याप्त to वारंट the लागत of increased एहतियात , सहित disruption of ordinary क्रियाएँ और कॉमर्स ,  and timely enough that preparation can be made .
Predictions must also be reliable ,  as गलत सचेतक और रद्द सचेतक हैं नहीं तभी economically costly , लकिन seriously undermine विश्वास in , और  thereby the effectiveness of , any kind of warning .
With over 7,000 earthquakes around the world  प्रत्येक साल साथ a परिमाण of 4.0 or वृहद , नगण्य कामयाबी in भूकंप भविष्यवाणी is easily  obtained using sufficiently broad parameters of time , location , or magnitude .
however , ऐसे नगण्य `` कामयाब  predictions '' are not useful .
Major  भूकंप हैं प्रायः followed by रिपोर्ट्स कि वे यहूद पूर्वानुमानित , or at तनिक anticipated , लकिन no अर्जी of  a successful prediction of a major earthquake has survived close inquiry .
In the 1970s there was intense optimism amongst scientists that some  विधि of predicting भूकंप might be मिला , लकिन by the 1990s continuing विफलता led अनेक वैज्ञानिकों to सवाल whether it थी  even possible .
जबकि अनेक वैज्ञानिकों स्टिल थाम कि , दिए पर्याप्त संसाधन , भविष्यवाणी  might be possible , many others maintain that earthquake prediction is inherently impossible .
डेबोरा ऐन `` debby '' रयान ( born may 13 , 1993 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री  , singer , musician , songwriter and record producer .
Ryan is best known for starring as  बेली पिकेट in the डिज़्नी चैनल असली श्रेणी the सुइट  Life on Deck .
In 2008 , The Suite  जीवन on डेक क्रमित as tv 's शीर्ष श्रेणी among बच्चे 6-11 और the no .  2 scripted series among tweens 9-14 .
Ryan started acting in professional theatres at the age of seven ; in  2007 वो appeared in the बार्नी & मित्रों straight-to-dvd फिल्मी बार्नी : let 's go to the फायरहाउस और तब थी खोजा  in a nationwide search by Disney .
वो is भी ज्ञात लिये appearing in the 2008 विशेषता फिल्मी  The Longshots as Edith .
In 2009 , she guest starred in an episode of Wizards  of waverly प्लेस in wizards on डेक साथ हन्ना मोंटाना as बेली पिकेट साथ साथ उसके  other cast mates from The Suite Life on Deck .
Then , in 2010 , she starred in the film 16  बधाइयां , जिससे थी the सबसे देखी केबल कार्यक्रम on the दिन of इसके प्रीमियर on the डिज़्नी  Channel .
16 Wishes introduced Ryan to new audiences ;  the फिल्म प्राप्त ऊँची viewership in the वयस्कों  demographic ( 18-34 ) .
जल्द बाद कि , रयान स्ट्रक्चर in the स्वतंत्र नाट्य  film , What If ... , which premiered on August 20 , 2010 .
Ryan also starred in the new Disney  चैनल असली फिल्म , रेडियो विद्रोही , जहाँ वो portrays the भूमिका of tara एडम्स , a शर्मीले 17-year-old लड़की जो adopts  the radio personality , Radio Rebel .
Released  फ़रवरी 17 ,  2012 .
Ryan stars in  the titular भूमिका in the डिज़्नी चैनल  Original Series , Jessie .
stührling tourbillon  Movement ( ) .
In horology ,  a tourbillon ( ; `` whirlwind '' ) is an  addition to the mechanics of a watch escapement .
विकसित around 1795 by the french-swiss घड़ीसाज़ abraham-louis breguet इससे an पहले विचार by the अंग्रेज़ी chronometer मेकर जॉन अर्नाल्ड , a tourbillon aims to काउंटर the प्रभाव of गम्भीरता  by mounting the escapement and balance wheel in a rotating cage , to negate the effect of gravity when the timepiece ( thus the escapement ) is stuck in a certain position .
Originally an attempt to improve accuracy , tourbillons are still included  in कुछ महंगी आधुनिक घड़ियाँ as a विलक्षणता और demonstration of watchmaking  virtuosity .
The mechanism is usually  उजागर on the देखें 's फेस to दिखाएँ  it off .
The Windows Installer (  previously ज्ञात as microsoft installer ) is a तन्त्र घटक प्रयुक्त लिये the संस्थापना , मेंटेनेंस , और हटाना of तन्त्र on  modern Microsoft Windows systems .
The installation information , and often the files themselves , are packaged in installation packages , loosely  रिलेशनल databases संरचित as com संरचित storages और commonly ज्ञात as `` msi फाइलें '' , इससे उनके  default file extension .
Windows Installer  contains significant परिवर्तन इससे इसके पूर्ववर्ती , सेटअप  API .
New features include a GUI framework and  स्वचालित पीढी of the uninstallation अनुक्रम  .
Windows Installer is positioned as an alternative to stand-alone  executable installer frameworks ऐसे as पुरानी संस्करण of installshield  and NSIS .
Microsoft encourages third parties to use Windows Installer as the basis for  संस्थापना frameworks , so कि वे synchronize correctly साथ अन्य installers और रखना the आतंरिक डेटाबेस  of installed products consistent .
Important features  ऐसे as rollback और versioning निर्भर on a सतत आतंरिक  database for reliable operation .
furthermore , खिड़कियाँ installer facilitates the principle of तनिक विशेषाधिकार  by performing software installations by proxy for unprivileged users .
Four Loko is a line of alcoholic  पेय , originally marketed as उर्जा पेय , बेची by phusion प्रोजेक्ट  of Chicago , Illinois .
phusion operates as पेय चार brewing  Company .
Four Loko , the company 's most  लोकप्रिय पेय , debuted in the संयुक्त  States market in 2005 .
It is now  बेची in 48 राज्य , और in कनाडा , the बहामा  , Bolivia , Honduras , and Europe .
The name `` Four '' is derived from  the असली उर्जा पेय 's चार प्रमुख संघटक :  alcohol , caffeine , taurine , and guarana .
Four branded  उत्पाद have महरूम the ऑब्जेक्ट of विधिक , नैतिक , और स्वास्थ्य चिंताएं सम्बन्धित to the कम्पनी allegedly विपणन उन्हें to the underaged  and the purported danger of combining alcohol and caffeine .
After the beverage  थी बैन in अनेक राज्य , a उत्पाद reintroduction in दिसम्बर 2010 removed कैफीन  , taurine , and guarana as ingredients , and the malt beverage is no longer marketed as an energy drink .
the गर्दन of a गिटार प्रर्दशित the नट ( in the पृष्ठभूमि ,  coloured white ) and first four metal frets .
A  fret is a उठाया तत्व on  the neck of a stringed instrument .
Frets  प्रायः extend आरपार the पूरा  width of the neck .
On most modern western fretted  यंत्र , frets हैं मेटल स्ट्रिप्स inserted into the fingerboard  .
on कुछ ऐतिहासिक यंत्र और non-european यंत्र  , frets are made of pieces of string tied around the neck .
Frets divide  the गर्दन into फिक्स्ड खण्ड at intervals सम्बन्धित to  a musical framework .
On instruments such as guitars , each fret represents one semitone in the standard western  प्रणाली जहाँ एक अष्टक is विभाजित into बारह  semitones .
Fret is often used as a verb , meaning  बस `` to दबायें bas the स्ट्रिंग पीछे a fret  . ''
Fretting often refers to the  frets and/or उनके प्रणाली of अवस्थिति  .
There was  खपत of दारू दोनो दौरान  and after prohibition .
The 18th  amendment निषिद्ध the उत्पादन , वितरण और बिक्री of alcoholic  beverages in the United States and was widely supported by the American public when it went into effect in 1920 .
The temperance movement had popularized the belief that  दारू थी the प्रमुख कारण of सबसे निजी और सोशल समस्याएं और निषेध थी देखी as the समाधान to the स्वदेश  's poverty , crime , violence , and other ills .
Upon ratification of the amendment ,  the प्रसिद्ध इंजीलवादी बिली संडे कहा कि `` the slums होगा जल्द be तभी a मेमोरी  .
We will turn our  जेलों into कारखानों और हमारी jails into storehouses और corncribs  . ''
(  compare christianity और  alcohol . )
चूंकि दारू थी to be बैन और चूंकि it थी देखी as the कारण  of most , if not all , crime , some communities sold their jails .
The nation was highly  आशावादी और the अग्रणी prohibitionist in the संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस confidently asserted कि `` वहीँ is as much मौका of repealing the eighteenth amendment as वहीँ is लिये a हमिंगबर्ड to मक्खी to the ग्रह मंगल साथ the वॉशिंगटन स्मारक tied  to its tail.”
The metre ( meter  in अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी ) , ( si ईकाई प्रतीक : m ; si आयाम प्रतीक : l ) , is the आधारभूत ईकाई of  length in the International System of Units ( SI ) .
Originally intended to be one ten-millionth of the distance from the Earth 's equator to the North Pole ( at sea level ) , its  परिभाषा रै महरूम periodically परिष्कृत to प्रतिबिंबित growing ज्ञान  of metrology .
Since 1983 , it has been defined as `` the length  of the पाथ travelled by लाइट in वैक्यूम दौरान a समय अंतराल of 1/299,792,458 of a  second . ''
geologists exploring jurassic sedimentary रॉक्स  in Makhtesh Gadol , Negev Desert , Israel
Geologists explaining the importance  of volcanic राख परतों to विद्यार्थी on फ़ील्ड  in Iceland
A geologist is a  वैज्ञानिक जो अध्ययन the ठोस और द्रव पदार्थ कि constitutes the धरती as  well as the processes and history that has shaped it .
geologists प्रायः engage in  studying geology .
Geologists  , अध्ययन अधिक of an लागू विज्ञान than a सैद्धांतिक एक , जरूर दृष्टिकोण भूविज्ञान using भौतिकी , रसायन  and biology as well as other sciences .
Geologists , compared to  वैज्ञानिकों सगाई in अन्य फ़ील्ड , हैं generally अधिक उजागर to the बाहरी than रहकर in  laboratories ; although some geologists prefer to perform most of their studies in the lab .
geologists हैं सगाई in खोजी लिये खनन कंपनियाँ in ढूंढें of धातुओं  , oils , and other Earth resources .
They are also in the forefront of  प्राकृतिक जोखिमों और आपदाओं चेतावनी और शमन , अध्ययन भूकंप , volcanic कार्यकलाप , tsunamis , मौसम तूफ़ान , और the जैसे ; उनके अध्ययन हैं प्रयुक्त to warn  the general public of the occurrence of these events .
Currently ,  geologists हैं भी सगाई in the चर्चा of जलवायु बदलें , as वे पढ़ाई  the history and evidence for this Earth process .
Below  is a व्यापक ड्रिल और tap आकार चार्ट लिये सब drills , इम्पीरियल और मीट्रिक  , and taps up to 36.5 mm .
Modern vacuum  tubes , ज़्यादातर miniature स्टाइल
In  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स , a वैक्यूम ट्यूब , इलेक्ट्रॉन ट्यूब ( in उत्तर अमेरिका ) , तापायनिक वाल्व , ट्यूब , or वाल्व is a यंत्र controlling  electric current through a vacuum in a sealed container .
The container is often thin transparent  कांच in a roughly बेलनाकार आकार .
The simplest vacuum tube , the diode , is  essentially an incandescent लाइट बल्ब साथ an added एलेक्ट्रोड अंदर  .
When the bulb 's  फिलामेंट is heated white-hot , electrons हैं `` boiled '' बंद इसके सतह  and into the vacuum inside the bulb .
If the electrode -- called a `` plate '' or `` anode '' -- is made more positive than the hot filament  , a सीधा वर्तमान बहती through the वैक्यूम to the एलेक्ट्रोड ( a demonstration of the एडिसन प्रभाव ) .
as the वर्तमान तभी बहती in एक दिशा , it makes it संभावित to बदलें an प्रत्यावर्ती  current applied to the filament to direct current .
The  परिचय of a तीसरा एलेक्ट्रोड , a ग्रिड between the  filament and the plate , yields another function .
A voltage  लागू to the ग्रिड नियंत्रण the वर्तमान बहती इससे the फिलामेंट  to the plate .
यूँ , it allows the यंत्र to  be used as an electronic amplifier .
Vacuum tubes are thus used for rectification ,  प्रवर्धन , switching , or समान प्रसंस्करण or सृष्टि of विद्युत सिग्नल  .
The vast majority  of आधुनिक दिन tubes consist of a sealed संग्राहक साथ a वैक्यूम अंदर , और essentially rely on तापायनिक उत्सर्जन of electrons  from a hot filament or a cathode heated by the filament .
Some  अपवाद to इस हैं dealt साथ in the खण्ड  about gas-filled tubes below .
Vacuum tubes were critical to the development of electronic technology ,  जिससे drove the विस्तार और व्यावसायीकरण of रेडियो प्रसारण , टेलीविज़न , रडार , ध्वनि reinforcement , ध्वनि रिकॉर्डिंग और जनन ,  large telephone networks , analog and digital computers , and industrial process control .
Although some applications had counterparts using  पहले technologies ऐसे as the चिंगारी गैप ट्रांसमीटर or mechanical कंप्यूटर , it थी the आविष्कार of the वैक्यूम ट्यूब साथ तीन electrodes ( पुकारा a ट्रायोड ) और इसके काबिलियत of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक प्रवर्धन कि बना ये technologies  widespread and practical .
In most applications , solid-state devices such  as transistors और अन्य सेमीकंडक्टर डिवाइस have replaced  tubes .
solid-state डिवाइस पिछला longer और हैं छोटी , अधिक कुशल , अधिक  reliable , and cheaper than tubes .
Tubes can be fragile , sometimes generate significant unwanted heat , and can take many  seconds—many मिनट्स in नाजुक applications—after powering on to गरम to a तापमान जहाँ वे perform  within operational tolerance .
however , tubes स्टिल ढूँढें उपयोग जहाँ solid-state डिवाइस have नहीं महरूम विकसित , हैं अव्यवहारिक , or जहाँ  a tube has superior performance , as with some devices in professional audio and high-power radio transmitters .
Tubes are  स्टिल उत्पादित लिये ऐसे अनुप्रयोग  .
Tubes are less likely than semiconductor devices to be destroyed by the  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक पल्स उत्पादित by नाभिकीय विस्फोट और geomagnetic तूफ़ान उत्पादित by दानव सौर  flares .
Skittles is a brand of fruit-flavoured sweets ,  फिलहाल उत्पादित और marketed by the wm . wrigley jr. कम्पनी , a प्रभाग  of Mars , Inc .
They  have मुश्किल शुगर शेल जिससे  carry the letter S .
The  अंदर is मुख्यतः शुगर , मकई सिरप , और hydrogenated ताड़ कर्नेल आयल साथ  with fruit juice , citric acid , and natural and artificial flavours .
the confectionery रै महरूम बेची in a किस्में of  flavour collections , such as Tropical and Wild Berry .
Sir Winston Leonard Spencer-Churchill , ( 30 November 1874 – 24 January 1965 ) was a British politician who was the Prime  मंत्री of the संयुक्त किंगडम इससे 1940 to 1945 और again इससे  1951 to 1955 .
Widely regarded as one of the greatest wartime leaders of the 20th century ,  चर्चिल थी भी an अधिकारी in the अंग्रेजों फौज , a इतिहासकार , a लेखक  , and an artist .
he is the तभी अंग्रेजों प्रधान मंत्री in इतिहास to have प्राप्त  the Nobel Prize in Literature , and was also the first person to be made an Honorary Citizen of the United States .
Churchill was born into an  वैभवशाली परिवार as the पोता of the  7th Duke of Marlborough .
His father , Lord  randolph चर्चिल , थी a charismatic राजनेता जो परोसा as चांसलर of the exchequer  ; his mother , Jennie Jerome , was an American socialite .
As a young army  अधिकारी , he देखी कार्रवाई in अंग्रेजों इण्डिया , the सूडान , और  the Second Boer War .
He gained fame as a war  correspondent और लिखा किताबे परिचय उसके अभियान  .
At the forefront of politics for  पचास सालो , he आयोजित अनेक राजनैतिक और कैबिनेट स्थितियाँ  .
Before the First World War , he  परोसा as अध्यक्ष of the फलक of व्यापार , घर सचिव , और पहला रब of the admiralty as  part of the Asquith Liberal government .
दौरान the युद्ध , he जारी as पहला रब of the admiralty जबतक  the disastrous Gallipoli Campaign caused his departure from government .
he तब briefly resumed क्रियाशील फौज सेवा on the पश्चिमी सामने as कमांडर of the 6th बटालियन of the royal  Scots Fusiliers .
He returned to government as Minister of Munitions , Secretary  of राज्य लिये युद्ध , और सचिव of राज्य लिये एयर  .
After the War , Churchill served as  चांसलर of the exchequer in the रूढ़िवादी ( baldwin ) सरकारी of 1924–29 , controversially returning the पाउंड स्टर्लिंग in 1925 to the सुनहरा  standard at its pre-war parity , a move widely seen as creating deflationary pressure on the UK economy .
Also controversial was his opposition  to increased घर नियम लिये इण्डिया और उसके प्रतिरोध to the 1936 abdication of  Edward VIII .
Out of office and politically `` in the  wilderness '' दौरान the 1930s , चर्चिल took the सीसे  in warning about Nazi Germany and in campaigning for rearmament .
On the outbreak of the  दूसरी संसार युद्ध , he थी again नियुक्त पहला  Lord of the Admiralty .
following the इस्तीफा of नेविली चेम्बरलेन on 10  May 1940 , Churchill became Prime Minister .
His steadfast refusal to  consider शिकस्त , आत्मसमर्पण , or a सुलह सलाम helped inspire अंग्रेजों प्रतिरोध , विशेषकर दौरान the मुश्किल जल्दी दिनों of the युद्ध जब ब्रिटेन stood अलोन among यूरोपीय  countries in its active opposition to Adolf Hitler .
Churchill was particularly noted for his  भाषणों और रेडियो प्रसारण , जिससे helped inspire the अंग्रेजों लोगों  .
He led  ब्रिटेन as प्रधान मंत्री जबतक विजय over  Nazi Germany had been secured .
बाद the रूढ़िवादी पार्टी खोया the 1945 चुनाव ,  he became Leader of the Opposition to the Labour ( Attlee ) government .
After winning the 1951 election , he again  became प्रधान मंत्री , पहले retiring in 1955  .
Upon his death , Elizabeth II granted him the honour of a state funeral ,  जिससे देखी एक of the largest सभाओं of संसार कूटनीतिज्ञों in इतिहास  .
Named the  महानतम briton of सब समय in a 2002 पोल , चर्चिल is widely regarded as होने among the सबसे  influential people in British history .
Ruby Gloom  is an एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ आधारित  on an apparel franchise .
The show is produced by  nelvana और began airing on अक्तूबर 13 , 2006 in  Canada on the network YTV .
It stars the voices of Sarah  gadon , एमिली हैम्पशायर , और पीटर keleghan  .
the घाट फ़ोकस is a कॉम्पैक्ट car ( c-segment in यूरोपीय  ) manufactured by the Ford Motor Company since 1998 .
Ford began sales  of the फ़ोकस to यूरोपीय in जुलाई 1998 और in  North America during 1999 for the 2000 model year .
In Europe , South America , North America and South Africa , the Focus replaced  the विभिन्न संस्करण of the घाट अनुरक्षण बेची in those बाज़ार  .
in एशिया और australasia , it  replaced the Ford Laser .
As of the first  हाफ of 2012 , the फ़ोकस surpassed the टोयोटा कोरोला to become the संसार 's बेहतरीन  selling automobile nameplate .
The Focus has been  माना एक of the 50 महानतम गाड़ियाँ of the पास्ट पचास  years by British magazine CAR .
An agar plate -- an  उदाहरण of a बैक्टीरियल विकास  medium .
specifically , it is a streak थाली ; the नारंगी लाइनों और dots  are formed by bacterial colonies .
A growth medium or culture  मीडियम is a द्रव or gel designed to support the विकास of microorganisms  or cells , or small plants like the moss Physcomitrella patens .
There are  अलग प्रकार of मीडिया लिये growing अलग  types of cells .
There are two major types of growth media : those  प्रयुक्त लिये कोशिका संस्कृति , जिससे उपयोग विशिष्ट कोशिका प्रकार निकला इससे पौधे or पशु , और microbiological संस्कृति , जिससे हैं प्रयुक्त लिये growing microorganisms , ऐसे  as bacteria or yeast .
The most common growth media for microorganisms are  nutrient broths और आगर प्लेटों ; specialized मीडिया हैं sometimes  required for microorganism and cell culture growth .
Some organisms , termed fastidious organisms , require  specialized environments due to जटिल nutritional  requirements .
Viruses , for example , are obligate intracellular  परजीवी और आवश्यकता a विकास  medium containing living cells .
A talent agent , or booking agent , is a person who finds jobs for actors , authors , film directors ,  संगीतकारों , मॉडल , निर्माता , पेशेवर एथलीट , लेखक और  other people in various entertainment businesses .
An agent also  defends , supports और promotes the ब्याज of  his/her clients .
एजेंटों can नहीं उपज उनके  own shows due to conflict of interest .
A talent agent  जरूर be परिचित साथ उनके  clients .
An agent has to know  कया दयालु of कार्य the क्लाएंट can और can नहीं do in अनुक्रम  to match them with various jobs .
Having  an एजेंट is नहीं जरूरी , लकिन करता  help the artist in getting jobs .
In many  मामले ढलाई निर्देशकों , or अन्य व्यवसायों , go  to talent agencies to find artists they are looking for .
The agent is paid a  प्रतिशत of the स्टार 's आय ( typically 10  % ) .
Agents  sometimes होगा be referred to as `` 10  percenters . ''
There  हैं अलग regulations कि govern अलग प्रकार of एजेंटों कि हैं स्थापित by कलाकार 's संघ और the  legal jurisdiction in which the agent operates .
There are also  पेशेवर संगठन कि अनुज्ञा हुनर  agencies .
चूंकि the मनाही in viewership in थिएटर , इससे the 1950s to 1960s , इस caused a स्मारकीय  shift in how studios would produce films and thus reducing the cost of exclusive and expensive actors .
Actors and actresses were working for the  studios लकिन यहूद नहीं स्वामित्व by एक प्रमुख स्टुडियो एंटिटी और so यहूद  able to work on within their time and with other studios .
Because of this , agents  यहूद अभी देखी as a necessity बजाय of an विकल्प  .
Agents now became third parties that  negotiated between studios और क्लाइंट , इस बनाना उनके सेवाएं  imperative between each party .
Since talent agencies are working with lucrative contracts , all talent agencies must be licensed under special  भाग of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया मजदूर कोड , जिससे काल्स an एजेंट a `` व्यक्ति or निगम जो engages in the occupation of procuring , offering , होनहार  , or attempting to procure employment for artist or artists . ''
Mars has two known  moons , phobos और deimos , जिससे  are thought to be captured asteroids .
दोनो satellites यहूद खोजा in 1877 by asaph हॉल और हैं नामित बाद the वर्ण phobos ( panic/fear ) और deimos  ( terror/dread ) who , in Greek mythology , accompanied their father Ares , god of war , into battle .
Ares was  ज्ञात as मंगल to the  Romans .
It is possible  कि मंगल may have moons छोटी than 50 - 100 मीटर और a धूल रिंग between  Phobos and Deimos may be present but none have been discovered .
In law enforcement parlance ,  the पद हत्या किताब refers to the मामला संचिका of a हत्या छानबीन  .
Typically , murder books include crime  झाँकी छायाचित्र और sketches , पोस्टमार्टम और forensic रिपोर्ट्स , transcripts of  investigators ' notes and witness interviews .
The murder book encapsulates the complete paper trail of a murder  छानबीन , इससे the समय the हत्या is पहला reported through the गिरफ़्तार of a suspect  .
Law enforcement agencies typically guard murder books carefully , and it is unusual for  नागरिकों to be दिए आज़ाद अभिगम to ये kinds of रिकॉर्ड , विशेषकर लिये अनसुलझा  cases .
a melon  baller
Melon balls are balls of melon made using a melon baller  कि varies इससे around 1 centimeter to 3 सेंटीमीटर ( परिचय 3/8 इंच  to 1 inch ) .
They are generally  प्रयुक्त in फल सलाद .
A KSA , or Knowledge , Skills , and  abilities , is a श्रेणी of कथा कथन कि हैं जरूरी जब applying to संयुक्त राज्य संघीय सरकारी  job openings .
KSAs are used to determine , along with resumes , who the  बेहतरीन आवेदकों हैं जब अनेक उम्मीदवार qualify  for a job .
The knowledge ,  कौशल और abilities ( ksas ) जरुरी लिये the कामयाब प्रदर्शन of a स्थिति हैं contained on प्रत्येक जॉब रिक्ति  announcement .
In 2009 the Office of Personal Management asked  संघीय एजेंसियों to रोकें requiring जॉब आवेदकों to भरण आउट the questionnaires , to be phased आउट भीतर  a year .
KSAs are brief  और केन्द्रित essays परिचय एक 's करियर और शैक्षणिक पृष्ठभूमि कि presumably qualify  one to perform the duties of the position being applied for .
A knowledge , skills , and  abilities ( ksa ) is a संक्षिप्त निबन्ध परिचय एक 's हुनर और विशेषज्ञता और सम्बन्धित  experiences ( work , education , volunteer ) and accomplishments .
A series of KSA statements are usually required when applying for most  संघीय सरकारी और कुछ राज्य और नगर सरकारी कार्य .
KSAs are used as a yardstick to assess the  सामर्थ्य of a prospective आवेदक in शर्तें of संभावित क्षमता to perform  the duties of the job .
Most  सरकारी भर्ती officials dekh लिये a छोटी , कुरकुरे और  clear KSA that emphasizes results or accomplishments obtained in previous work .
KSA  कथन हैं भी ज्ञात as  Evaluation Factors .
Other agencies sometimes call them ``  दरजा कारकों '' , `` विशेषता रैंकिंग कारकों '' , `` ज्ञान , abilities , कौशल  and Other Characteristics '' , or `` Job Elements '' .
The  नाम can be बस a नाम लकिन प्रायः it  influences content and length of the essay .
Every agency has its own regulations but most of the time the  प्रत्येक ksa फ़ैक्टर चाहिए be 1/2 to 11⁄2 पृष्ठों  long .
the नीचे परिभाषाएं हैं पारिभाषित  by the U.S. Office of Personnel Management :
Knowledge , Skills , and Abilities (  ksas ) - the गुण जरूरी to perform a जॉब और हैं generally demonstrated through qualifying सेवा , शिक्षा , or प्रशिक्षण  .
Knowledge - Is a body of  सूचना लागू सीधे to the प्रदर्शन  of a function .
Skill - Is an  observable competence to perform a सीखे  psychomotor act .
Ability - Is  competence to perform an observable बर्ताव or a बर्ताव कि परिणाम  in an observable product .
The scoring of KSA essays is  आधारित on a स्केल of इससे एक to 100 .
जॉब आवेदकों जरूर स्कोर ऊपर 70 to be  considered for the position .
High scores are derived through answering the KSA  सवाल as specifically as संभावित , providing उदाहरण इससे पिछला नियुक्ति or प्रशिक्षण कि clearly  demonstrate you meet the qualifications .
When applying to federal government positions  , a संघीय पुनरारंभ is प्रायः जरूरी in जोड to ksa कथन  .

Love  सदा is the डेब्यू एल्बम of अमरीकी r & b duo k-ci &  JoJo , released on June 17 , 1997 , by MCA Records .
It was recorded at  विभिन्न studios in नई यॉर्क और the लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल in 1996 और  1997 .
It was produced by JoJo and several others ,  सहित devante झूले , जेम्स mtume , और जेफ़  Redd .
The duo were originally a part of  jodeci पहले इस एल्बम  .
The album peaked at sixth on the  us बिलबोर्ड 200 और भी appeared on  international charts .
The single `` All My Life  `` charted क्रमांक एक in अनेक देशों , और सब चार of the एल्बम 's singles peaked ऊपर the शीर्ष 25 in the us hot r & b/hip-hop  Songs and the New Zealand Top 40 Singles .
Love  सदा थी प्राप्त favorably by आलोचकों , जो praised the भाइयो  ' singing ability and the production .
The album has been certified three times platinum by the Recording  उद्योग संघ of अमेरिका ( riaa ) और सुनहरा by म्यूज़िक कनाडा और ifpi  Sweden .
As of June  1999 it था बेची 2.9 लाख  copies in the United States .
A variable-rate mortgage , adjustable-rate mortgage ( ARM ) , or tracker mortgage is a mortgage loan  साथ the ब्याज रेट on the नोट periodically समायोजित आधारित on an अनुक्रमणिका जिससे reflects the लागत to the lender of उधार  on the credit markets .
The loan may be offered at the  lender 's मानक परिवर्तनीय चूहाe/ आधार  rate .
There may be a direct and legally-defined link to the  underlying अनुक्रमणिका , लकिन जहाँ the lender offers no विशिष्ट कड़ी to the underlying मार्केट or अनुक्रमणिका  the rate can be changed at the lender 's discretion .
The term ``  variable-rate बंधक '' is सबसे आम बाहर the संयुक्त राज्य , whilst in the संयुक्त राज्य , `` adjustable-rate बंधक '' is सबसे आम , और  implies a mortgage regulated by the Federal government , with caps on charges .
In many countries  , समायोज्य रेट mortgages हैं the norm , और in ऐसे स्थान  , may simply be referred to as mortgages .
Among the  सबसे आम indices हैं the दरों on 1-year constant-maturity राजकोष ( cmt ) प्रतिभूति , the लागत  of Funds Index ( COFI ) , and the London Interbank Offered Rate ( LIBOR ) .
A few  lenders उपयोग उनके अपना लागत of निधि as an  index , rather than using other indices .
This  is किया to ensure a स्थिर हाशिया लिये the lender , जिनकी अपना लागत of funding  will usually be related to the index .
नतीजतन , भुगतान बना by the borrower may बदलें over समय  with the changing interest rate ( alternatively , the term of the loan may change ) .
This is  पृथक इससे the ग्रैजुएट भुगतान बंधक , जिससे offers बदलना भुगतान  amounts but a fixed interest rate .
Other forms of mortgage loan include the interest  तभी बंधक , the फिक्स्ड रेट बंधक , the ऋणात्मक amortization बंधक , और the  balloon payment mortgage .
Adjustable rates transfer  भाग of the ब्याज रेट रिस्क इससे  the lender to the borrower .
They can be used where  मनमौजी ब्याज दरों मेक फिक्स्ड रेट लोन मुश्किल to obtain  .
The borrower  लाभ if the ब्याज रेट जलप्रपात लकिन loses if  the interest rate increases .
The borrower  लाभ इससे घटाया मार्जिन to the underlying लागत of उधार compared  to fixed or capped rate mortgages .
The assassination of Robert  फ्रांसिस `` bobby '' कैनेडी , a संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटर और bhai of assassinated अध्यक्ष जॉन fitzgerald `` जोकर '' कैनेडी , took प्लेस shortly बाद मध्यरात्रि on जून 5 , 1968 , in लॉस एंजिल्स , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  , during the campaign season for the United States Presidential election , 1968 .
After winning the California and South Dakota primary elections for the Democratic nomination for President of  the संयुक्त राज्य , कैनेडी थी शॉट as he walked through the रसोईघर of the दूत होटल और died in the शुभ सामरी हॉस्पिटल  twenty-six hours later .
Sirhan Sirhan , a  24-year-old फिलीस्तीनी / जार्डन अप्रवासी , थी convicted of कैनेडी  's murder and is serving a life sentence for the crime .
Sirhan 's  वकील have released कथन claiming प्रमाण  that he was framed .
The shooting was recorded on  ऑडियो टेप by a freelance समाचारपत्र रिपोर्टर , और  the aftermath was captured on film .
Kennedy 's body lay in repose at St. Patrick 's Cathedral in New  यॉर्क लिये दो दिनों पहले a अंत्येष्टि द्रव्यमान  was held on June 8 .
His body was interred  निकट उसके bhai जॉन at आर्लिंगटन नेशनल  Cemetery .
His death prompted the  सुरक्षा of अध्यक्षीय उम्मीदवार by the संयुक्त राज्य रहस्य  Service .
Hubert Humphrey  गई on to जीत the लोकतांत्रिक नामांकन लिये the प्रेसिडेंसी , लकिन ultimately  narrowly lost the election to Richard Nixon .
As with his brother  जोकर 's मौत , bobby 's हत्या और the हालातों surrounding it have शाखित a किस्में  of conspiracy theories .
As of  2013 कैनेडी remains एक of तभी दो बैठे संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटरों  to be assassinated ( the other being Huey Long ) .
The Modern Age of Comic Books is an informal name for the  काल in the इतिहास of मुख्यधारा अमरीकी कॉमिक किताबे generally माना to पिछला इससे the mid-1980s  until present day .
In this period , comic book characters generally became darker and more psychologically complex  , creators became better-known और क्रियाशील in बदलना the उद्योग , स्वतंत्र कॉमिक्स flourished , और larger प्रकाशन घरों  became more commercialized .
An alternate name  लिये इस काल is the अंधेरा आयु of कॉमिक किताबे , due to the लोकप्रियता और  artistic influence of grim titles , such as and Watchmen .
When Harry Met Sally ... is a 1989  अमरीकी रोमांटिक कॉमेडी फिल्मी लिखा by नोरा ephron और निर्देशित  by Rob Reiner .
It stars  बिली क्रिस्टल as हैरी और मेग रयान as  Sally .
The story follows the title characters from  the समय वे मिलें बस पहले sharing a cross-country ड्राइव , through बारह सालो or so of मौका  encounters in New York City .
The film raises the question `` Can men and women ever just  be मित्रों ? '' और अग्रिम अनेक विचार परिचय संबंध कि became household अवधारणाओं , ऐसे as those  of the `` '' girlfriend and the `` transitional person '' .
the origins of the फिल्मी आए इससे reiner  's return to single life after a divorce .
An interview Ephron  conducted साथ reiner provided the आधार लिये हैरी  .
Sally was based  on ephron और कुछ of उसके मित्रों  .
Crystal  आए on फलक और बना उसके अपना योगदान to  the screenplay , making Harry funnier .
ephron supplied the ढांचा of the फिल्मी साथ much of the संवाद आधारित on  the real-life friendship between Reiner and Crystal .
The soundtrack consists of standards performed by  हैरी connick , jr. , साथ a बिग बैंड और ऑर्केस्ट्रा arranged  by Marc Shaiman .
connick जीती उसके पहला ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन  Jazz Male Vocal Performance .
Columbia Pictures released the film  using the `` मंच '' तकनीक , जिससे शामिल खोलने it in a few चुनें शहरों , letting धनात्मक शब्द of मुँह generate ब्याज , और तब धीरे expanding वितरण  over subsequent weeks .
When Harry Met Sally  ... grossed a कुल of us $ 92 .8 लाख in उत्तर  America .
Ephron received a British Academy Film Award  , an ऑस्कर नामांकन , और a लेखक गिल्ड of अमेरिका पुरस्कार नामांकन  for her screenplay .
The film is ranked 23rd on AFI 's 100 Years ... 100 Laughs list of the top  कॉमेडी films in अमरीकी सिनेमा और क्रमांक 60 on ब्रावो 's `` 100 funniest फिल्मों ''  .
In early 2004 , the film was adapted  लिये the स्टेज in a उत्पादन अभिनीत ल्यूक  Perry and Alyson Hannigan .

हैमबर्गर हेल्पर is a लकीर of packaged खाना उत्पाद primarily consisting  of boxed pasta bundled with a packet or packets of powdered sauce or seasonings .
The contents of each  बक्सा हैं संयुक्त साथ browned मैदान बीफ , जल और  milk to create a complete dish .
The product line also  सुविधाएँ उत्पाद साथ अन्य starches ऐसे as राइस or आलू बजाय  of pasta .
It is  बना by सामान्य  Mills .
Although the classic boxed Hamburger Helper  उत्पाद तभी सप्लाई the मंड मद और the सॉस पैकेट्स , कुछ किस्में of the उत्पाद  include ground beef .
These include a  frozen खाना लकीर , जिससे सुविधाएँ कुछ of the ब्रांड 's क्लासिक किस्में in a पूरा  meal kit form , with frozen ground beef and frozen sauce packaged separately from the noodles in the same bag .
There is also an `` instant '' version of Hamburger  हेल्पर containing निर्जलित मांस , नूडल्स और seasonings in a छोटी थैली , requiring तभी जल  to be added .
The Hamburger Helper mascot is the `` Helping  हाथ '' , an anthropomorphic एनिमेटेड , चार fingered left-hand दस्ताने , जिससे appears in the उत्पाद 's टेलीविज़न  commercials and on the packages .
Ceres as seen  साथ the हबल स्पेस दूरदर्शी  .
