A dwarf planet is a planetary-mass  ऑब्जेक्ट कि is neither a ग्रह nor a उपग्रह  .
More explicitly , the International Astronomical Union  ( iau ) defines a बौना ग्रह as a celestial देह in सीधा कक्षा of the सूर्य कि is विशाल पर्याप्त लिये इसके आकार to be नियंत्रित by gravitation , लकिन  that unlike a planet has not cleared its orbital region of other objects .
The term dwarf planet was adopted in 2006 as part of a three-way categorization of bodies orbiting the Sun , brought about by an  बढ़ाएँ in discoveries of trans-neptunian वस्तुएँ कि rivaled प्लूटो in आकार , और आखिरकार precipitated by the डिस्कवरी of an भी अधिक विशाल  object , Eris .
This classification states that bodies large enough to  have साफ the neighbourhood of उनके कक्षा हैं पारिभाषित as ग्रह , जबकि those कि हैं नहीं विशाल पर्याप्त to be rounded by उनके अपना गम्भीरता  are defined as small Solar System bodies .
बौना ग्रह आइये  in between .
The exclusion of dwarf planets from the roster of planets by the IAU has  महरूम दोनो praised और criticized ; it थी कहा to be the `` सही निर्णय '' by माइक भूरा , जो खोजा और अन्य नई बौना ग्रह , लकिन रै महरूम अस्वीकृत by एलन stern , जो था coined the पद बौना ग्रह  in 1990 .
The  iau फिलहाल recognizes पाँच बौना ग्रह  in the Solar System : , Pluto , , , and .
However , only two of these bodies ,  ceres और प्लूटो , have महरूम observed in पर्याप्त विवरण to demonstrate कि वे अनुरूप the परिभाषा  .
Eris has  महरूम स्वीकृत as a बौना ग्रह क्युकी it is अधिक  massive than Pluto .
The IAU subsequently decided that unnamed trans-Neptunian objects with an absolute magnitude brighter than +1 ( and hence a  व्यास of ≥838 km assuming a ज्यामितीय ऐल्बीडो of ≤1 ) हैं to be नामित अंतर्गत the assumption कि वे हैं बौना  planets .
The only two  ऐसे वस्तुएँ ज्ञात at the समय , माकेमाके और हउमेया , गई through इस नामकरण  procedure and were declared to be dwarf planets .
It is  suspected कि another सौ or so ज्ञात वस्तुएँ in the  Solar System are dwarf planets .
Estimates are that up to 200 dwarf planets may be found when the entire region  ज्ञात as the kuiper बेल्ट is छान , और कि the क्रमांक may exceed 10,000 जब वस्तुएँ बिखरे बाहर the kuiper बेल्ट हैं माना  .
Individual astronomers recognize several of these , and in August 2011 Mike Brown  प्रकाशित a सूची of 390 प्रत्याशी वस्तुएँ , ranging इससे `` nearly निश्चित '' to `` संभावित '' बौना  planets . '
Brown identifies nine known objects – the five accepted by the IAU plus , ,  , और – as `` वस्तुतः निश्चित '' , साथ another दो दर्जन अत्यधिक संभावित , और वहीँ हैं  probably a hundred or so such objects in total .
The classification of bodies in other planetary systems with the  विशेषताएँ of बौना ग्रह रै नहीं महरूम  addressed .
A debit card ( also known as  a बैंको कार्ड or जाँच कार्ड ) is a प्लास्टिक भुगतान कार्ड कि provides the cardholder इलेक्ट्रॉनिक अभिगम  to his or her bank account ( s ) at a financial institution .
Some cards have a stored value with which a payment is  बना , जबकि सबसे रिले a संदेश to the cardholder 's बैंको to withdraw निधि इससे  a payee 's designated bank account .
The card ,  जहाँ स्वीकृत , can be प्रयुक्त बजाय of नकदी जब बनाना  purchases .
In some cases , the primary account  क्रमांक is आबंटित exclusively लिये उपयोग on the अंतरजाल और वहीँ  is no physical card .
In many countries ,  the उपयोग of डेबिट ताश रै become so फैली कि उनके आवाज़ रै  overtaken or entirely replaced cheques and , in some instances , cash transactions .
The development of debit cards , unlike credit cards and charge  ताश , रै generally महरूम देश विशिष्ट resulting in a क्रमांक of अलग प्रणालियों around the संसार , जिससे यहूद प्रायः असंगत  .
Since the mid-2000s , a number of initiatives have allowed debit cards issued in one  देश to be प्रयुक्त in अन्य देशों और अनुमत उनके उपयोग लिये अंतरजाल और फोन  purchases .
Unlike credit and charge cards , payments using a debit card are immediately transferred  इससे the cardholder 's designated बैंको खाता , बजाय of उन्हें paying the धन वापस at a बाद  date .
Debit cards usually also allow for instant withdrawal  of नकदी , एक्टिंग as the एटीएम कार्ड लिये withdrawing  cash .
Merchants may also offer cashback  सुविधाएं to ग्राहक , जहाँ a ग्राहक can withdraw नकदी साथ साथ उनके खरीदें  .
Francois Henri ``  जोकर '' lalanne ( सितंबर 26 , 1914 - जनवरी 23 , 2011 ) थी an अमरीकी फ़िटनेस , कसरत , और nutritional विशेषज्ञ और प्रेरक स्पीकर जो is sometimes पुकारा ``  the godfather of fitness '' and the `` first fitness superhero . ''
He  वर्णित खुद as होने a `` sugarholic '' और a ``  junk food junkie '' until he was 15 .
He also had behavioral problems , but ``  turned उसके जीवन around '' बाद सुनना to a पब्लिक लेक्चर  by Paul Bragg , a well-known nutrition speaker .
During his career , he came to believe that the country 's overall health depended on the  स्वास्थ्य of इसके जनसांख्यिकी , लिखने कि `` शारीरिक संस्कृति और पोषण — is the मोक्ष  of America . ''
Decades before health and  फ़िटनेस began होने प्रचारित by हस्तियाँ जैसे जेन फोंडा और रिचर्ड सीमन्स , lalanne थी already widely पहचाना लिये सरेआम उपदेश the स्वास्थ्य लाभ of नियमित  exercise and a good diet .
He  प्रकाशित numerous किताबे on फ़िटनेस और hosted  a fitness television show between 1953 and 1985 .
As early  as 1936 , at आयु 21 , he खोली एक of the स्वदेश 's पहला  fitness gyms in Oakland , California , which became a prototype for dozens of similar gyms using his name .
One of his 1950s television exercise  कार्यक्रम थी aimed toward महिलाओं , जिसको he भी प्रोत्साहित to जुड़ें उसके  health clubs .
He invented a number of  कसरत मशीने , सहित leg-extension और चरखी डिवाइस  .
Besides producing his own series of videos , he coached the elderly and  निष्क्रिय नहीं to forgo कसरत , believing it होता enable उन्हें to बढ़ाएँ  their strength .
LaLanne also gained  मान्यता लिये उसके कामयाबी as a bodybuilder ,  as well as for his prodigious feats of strength .
Arnold Schwarzenegger once stated ,  `` कि जोकर lalanne 's an एनिमल ! , '' बाद lalanne , at 54  , beat a 21-year-old Schwarzenegger `` badly '' in an informal contest .
On  the अवसर of lalanne 's मौत , श्वार्ज़नेगर credited lalanne लिये होने `` an apostle लिये फ़िटनेस '' by प्रेरणादायी `` अरबों सब over the संसार to सजीव healthier  lives , '' and , as governor of California , had earlier placed him on his Governor 's Council on Physical Fitness .
Steve Reeves  credited lalanne as उसके प्रेरणा to निर्माण उसके muscular physique  while keeping a slim waist .
He was inducted to the  कैलिफ़ोर्निया हॉल of कीर्ति और रै a स्टार on the हॉलीवुड चलना of कीर्ति  .
Air forces of most  of the देशों उपयोग प्रणाली समान to सेना  .
However , the RAF and the air forces of many  राष्ट्रमंडल देशों , or those formerly अंतर्गत a अंग्रेजों influence , उपयोग a अलग नियत of बाँधने loosely आधारित on नवल समतुल्यता ; लेफ्टिनेंट , कमांडर , कप्तान और commodore हैं prefixed लिये एयर फ़ोर्स  use with Flight , Wing , Group and Air , respectively ( the first three being the units that they used to command ) .
Penélope Cruz Sánchez ( ;  born अप्रैल 28 , 1974 ) is a स्पेनी अभिनेत्री  .
Signed by an agent at age 15 , she made  उसके एक्टिंग डेब्यू at 16 on टेलीविज़न और उसके विशेषता फिल्मी डेब्यू the following साल in jamón , jamón ( 1992 ) , to  critical acclaim .
Her subsequent roles in the 1990s and  2000s शामिल खोलें अपना आँखें ( 1997 ) , the hi-lo देश ( 1999 ) , the लड़की of अपना  Dreams ( 2000 ) and Woman on Top ( 2000 ) .
Cruz achieved recognition for  उसके सीसे भूमिकाएँ in the 2001 films वैनिला आसमान और  Blow .
She has since built a successful  करियर , appearing in films इससे a चौड़ी दायरा of जाति , सहित the कॉमेडी waking up in रेनो ( 2002 ) , the थ्रिलर  Gothika ( 2003 ) , the Christmas movie Noel ( 2004 ) , and the action adventure Sahara ( 2005 ) .
She has received critical acclaim for her roles in  volver ( 2006 ) और नौ ( 2009 ) receiving सुनहरी ग्लोब और अकादमी  Award nominations for each .
वो जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री  in 2008 for Vicky Cristina Barcelona .
She was the first Spanish actress  in इतिहास to प्राप्त an अकादमी पुरस्कार और the पहला स्पेनी अभिनेत्री to प्राप्त a स्टार at the  Hollywood Walk of Fame .
Cruz has  modeled लिये कंपनियाँ ऐसे as आम , ralph लॉरेन  and L'Oréal .
Penélope and her younger sister Mónica  क्रूज़ have designed वस्तुएं लिये आम .
She has donated both  उसके समय और धन to धर्मार्थ  .
Cruz has volunteered in Uganda and India , where she spent one week working for Mother Teresa ; she donated her salary  इससे ' to सहायता निधि the लेट नन 's मिशन  .
A wax sculpture  of क्रूज़ होगा be लगाई in a प्रीमियर स्पॉट in the grevin मोम संग्रहालय in  Paris .
File Explorer , previously known as Windows Explorer , is a file manager  अनुप्रयोग और भी a नेविगेशन औजार कि is शामिल साथ रिलीज of the microsoft खिड़कियाँ  operating system from Windows 95 onwards .
it provides a आलेखीय उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस  for accessing the file systems .
It  is भी the घटक of the ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली कि presents अनेक उपयोक्ता इंटरफ़ेस वस्तुएं on the मॉनिटर  such as the taskbar and desktop .
Controlling the computer is possible without Windows Explorer running ( for example , the File | Run  कमांड in कार्य मैनेजर on nt-derived संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ होगा फलन बगैर it , as होगा कमांड typed  in a command prompt window ) .
Located in the C : \Windows directory ,  it is sometimes referred to as the खिड़कियाँ शेल , explorer.exe , or बस “explorer”  .
The Care Bears are characters  निर्मित by अमरीकी बधाई in 1981 लिये उपयोग on ग्रीटिंग  cards .
The original artwork for the cards was  चित्रित by कलाकार एलेना kucharik  .
In 1983 , Kenner turned the  परवाह bears into plush टेडी bears  .
The Care Bears appeared in their own TV  specials पुकारा the परवाह bears in the जमीन बगैर जज्बात ( 1983 ) और the परवाह bears बैटल the फ्रीज यंत्र  ( 1984 ) .
They also had their own television series from  1985 to 1988 , in जोड to तीन विशेषता films : the परवाह bears फिल्म ( 1985 ) , परवाह bears फिल्म  II : A New Generation ( 1986 ) , and The Care Bears Adventure in Wonderland ( 1987 ) .
Each Care  भालू आता in a अलग रंग और रै a specialized तमगा  on its belly that represents its duty and personality .
इस तमगा थी ज्ञात as उनके ``  tummy symbol . ''
However , the  फिल्म परवाह bears : oopsy करता it ! renamed उन्हें `` पेट बैज  '' .
Adding to the Care Bear family are the `` Care Bear Cousins '' , which feature a  शेर , खरगोश , पेंगुइन , raccoon , और अन्य ऐसे पशु निर्मित in the वही स्टाइल as the टेडी bears  .
In 2002 ,  the bears यहूद reintroduced  with new toys .
Made by Play-Along Toys , the new toys offered features  ऐसे as illuminated bellies upon टच , एरोबिक  bears , and glow-in-the-dark bears .
As part of this comeback , the Bears have appeared in two  computer-animated फिल्मों : परवाह bears : यात्रा to joke-a-lot ( 2004 ) और the परवाह bears ' बिग काश फिल्म ( 2005  ) .
In 2007 , the franchise  मनाये इसके 25th वर्षगांठ ; another relaunch took प्लेस , as खूब  as the release of Care Bears : Oopsy Does It ! .
In mid-2011 ,  ag घोषित a पुनरुद्धार tv एनिमेटेड श्रेणी titled `` परवाह bears :  Welcome to Care-a-Lot `` .
The  प्रीमियर of the श्रेणी utilizes `` 30  years of caring '' .
It  premiered on the हब on जून 2 ,  2012 .
As of 2013  , परवाह bears merchandise  is still being marketed .
During 2008 and 2009 , Canada 's Cookie Jar  समूह और फ़्रांस 's moonscoop समूह attempted to acquire the मताधिकार इससे agc , साथ no apparent  success .
अंतरराज्यीय 70 ( i-70 ) is an अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग in the संयुक्त राज्य कि रनों इससे  Interstate 15 near Cove Fort , Utah , to a Park and Ride near Baltimore , Maryland .
it थी the पहला अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग  project in the United States .
I-70  लगभग traces the पाथ of u.S. रूट 40 ( और भी the  old National Road ) east of the Rocky Mountains .
West of the Rockies  , the रूट of i-70 थी निकला इससे अनेक स्त्रोत  .
I-70 is the fifth longest  अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग , बाद i-90 , i-80 , i-40  , and I-10 .
The construction of I-70 in Colorado and Utah is considered an  अभियान्त्रिकी आश्चर्य as the रूट गुजरता through the आइज़नहावर टनल , glenwood canyon , और the  San Rafael Swell .
The Eisenhower  टनल is the उच्चतम पाइंट साथ the अंतरराज्यीय राजमार्ग  system with an elevation of .
the भाग of the अंतरराज्यीय in मिसौरी  and Kansas have laid claim to be the first interstate in the United States .
Though disputed , the Federal Highway Administration has claimed the section of I-70 through Glenwood  canyon , समाप्त in 1992 , थी the पिछला टुकड़ा of the अंतरराज्यीय  Highway system , as originally planned , to open to traffic .
फ़ोटो of 1999 कुल  eclipse
As seen from the Earth , a solar eclipse occurs when the Moon passes between the Sun and Earth  , और the चंद्रमा fully or partially ब्लॉक ( `` occults  `` ) the Sun .
इस can happen तभी at नई चंद्रमा , जब the सूर्य और the चंद्रमा हैं in संयोजन  as seen from Earth in an alignment referred to as syzygy .
In a total eclipse , the disk of  the सूर्य is fully obscured by the चंद्रमा  .
In partial and  annular eclipses तभी भाग of the  Sun is obscured .
If the Moon were in a perfectly circular  कक्षा , a छोटी करीब to the धरती , और in the वही कक्षीय प्लेन , वहीँ होता be कुल सौर eclipses  every single month .
However , the Moon 's orbit is inclined ( tilted ) at  अधिक than 5 डिग्री to धरती 's कक्षा around the सूर्य ( देखिए ecliptic ) so इसके छाया  at new moon usually misses Earth .
Earth 's orbit is called the ecliptic plane as the  चंद्रमा 's कक्षा जरूर क्रॉस इस प्लेन in अनुक्रम लिये an ग्रहण ( दोनो सौर as खूब as चंद्र ) to occur  .
In addition ,  the चंद्रमा 's वास्तविक कक्षा is अंडाकार , प्रायः लेने it दूर पर्याप्त दूर इससे धरती कि इसके apparent आकार  is not large enough to block the Sun totally .
The  कक्षीय planes क्रॉस प्रत्येक साल at a लकीर of नोड resulting in at तनिक दो , और up to पाँच , सौर eclipses occurring  each year ; no more than two of which can be total eclipses .
However , total solar eclipses are rare at any particular location because  totality exists तभी साथ a सीमित पाथ on धरती 's सतह traced by the चंद्रमा 's छाया or  umbra .
An eclipse is a  प्राकृतिक घटना  .
Nevertheless , in some ancient and modern cultures , solar  eclipses have महरूम attributed to अलौकिक कल्याणकारी or regarded as ख़राब  omens .
A total solar eclipse can be  frightening to लोगों जो हैं बेखबर of इसके खगोलीय स्पष्टीकरण , as the सूर्य seems to गायब  during the day and the sky darkens in a matter of minutes .
Because  it is खतरनाक to dekh सीधे at the सूर्य , observers चाहिए उपयोग खास नजर सुरक्षा or अप्रत्यक्ष देखने तकनीकों जब देखने  a partial eclipse , or the partial phases of a total eclipse .
It is safe to view the total phase of a  कुल सौर ग्रहण साथ the unaided नजर और बगैर सुरक्षा  , however .
People referred to as eclipse chasers or umbraphiles  होगा सफर to रिमोट स्थितियाँ to observe or गवाह पूर्वानुमानित सेंट्रल सौर  eclipses .
A political party ( from , Genitive partis , `` part '' , `` portion '' ) is a political  संगठन कि typically seeks to influence , or entirely कंट्रोल , सरकारी नीति , प्रायः by nominating उम्मीदवार साथ लकीर राजनैतिक दृश्य और trying  to seat them in political office .
Parties  participate in चुनावी अभियान और शैक्षणिक मंगवाने or विरोध  actions .
Parties often espouse an ideology or vision ,  expressed in a पार्टी कार्यक्रम , bolstered by a लिखा मंच साथ विशिष्ट लक्ष्य , forming a गठबन्धन  among disparate interests .
The mango is a fleshy stone fruit belonging to  the genus mangifera , consisting of numerous तीव्र fruiting पेड़ in the flowering  plant family Anacardiaceae .
the आम is देशी to दक्षिण एशिया , इससे जहाँ it रै महरूम वितरित विश्वव्यापी  to become one of the most cultivated fruits in the tropics .
While other  mangifera प्रजाति ( e.g . घोड़ा आम , M. foetida ) हैं भी grown on a अधिक स्थानीयकृत आधार  , Mangifera indica – the 'common mango ' or 'Indian mango ' – is the only mango tree commonly cultivated in many tropical and subtropical regions .
It is the national  फल of इण्डिया , पाकिस्तानी और फिलीपीन  .
In  अनेक संस्कृतियों , इसके फल और पत्ते हैं ritually प्रयुक्त as पुष्पक सजावट at विवाह  , public celebrations and religious ceremonies .
Gill Arnette Byrd , < ref name > http :  //www.pro-football-reference.com/players/b/byrdgi00.htm ( born फ़रवरी 20 , 1961 in सैन फ्रांसिस्को , कैलिफ़ोर्निया ) is a पूर्व पेशेवर  American football player .
He was a two time Pro Bowl cornerback in  1991 और 1992 लिये the सैन डिएगो chargers बाद graduating इससे सैन जोस राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों  .
Byrd was inducted  into the chargers हॉल of कीर्ति  in 1998 .
He was an  all-city कार्यशील वापस और रक्षात्मक वापस at लोवेल ऊँची स्कूल ( सैन फ्रांसिस्को ) , helping to सीसे  the Cardinals to the city championship in his senior season of 1978 .
World map  प्रर्दशित the tropic  of Cancer
The Tropic of Cancer , also referred  to as the उत्तरी tropic , is the वृत्त of अक्षांश on the धरती कि marks the सबसे  northerly position at which the Sun may appear directly overhead at its zenith .
This  इवेंट occurs एकबार प्रति साल , at the समय of the जून संक्रांति , जब the  Northern Hemisphere is tilted toward the Sun to its maximum extent .
It currently ( Year 2013 ) lies  at 23° 26′ 15.143′′ उत्तर of the equator  .
Its Southern Hemisphere counterpart , marking  the सबसे southerly स्थिति at जिससे the सूर्य may appear सीधे ओवरहेड , is the tropic  of Capricorn .
These tropics  हैं दो of the पाँच प्रमुख उपाधि उपायों or प्रमुख वृत्त of अक्षांश कि चिह्नित मानचित्र of the धरती ,  besides the Arctic and Antarctic Circles and the Equator .
The positions of these circles of latitude (  अन्य than the equator ) हैं लिखवाई by the झुकाव of the धरती 's अक्ष of रोटेशन  relative to the plane of its orbit .
DVD-Video is a  उपभोक्ता वीडियो स्वरूप प्रयुक्त to स्टोर डिजिटल वीडियो on dvd discs , और is फिलहाल the प्रबल  consumer video format in Asia , North America , Europe , and Australia .
discs using the dvd-video specification आवश्यकता a dvd ड्राइव और  an H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 decoder ( e.g. , a DVD player , or a computer DVD drive with a software DVD player ) .
Commercial DVD movies are encoded using a combination of H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2 compressed  वीडियो और ऑडियो of varying स्वरुप ( प्रायः multi-channel स्वरुप as वर्णित नीचे  ) .
Typically , the data rate for DVD  फिल्मों सीमाएँ इससे 3 mbit/s to 9.5 mbit/s , और the बिट रेट is प्रायः अनुकूली  .
It was  पहला उपलब्धियाँ लिये खुदरा around  1997 .
the dvd-video specification थी निर्मित by dvd फ़ोरम और can be प्राप्त इससे dvd format/logo  Licensing Corporation for a fee of $ 5,000 .
The specification is not publicly  उपलब्धियाँ , क्युकी प्रत्येक सदस्य जरूर चिह्न a non-disclosure अनुबंध  .
Certain information in the  dvd किताब is मालिकाना और गोपनीय  .
In computing and specifically Internet , a leech is one who benefits , usually  deliberately , इससे अन्य ' सूचना or प्रयत्न लकिन करता नहीं प्रस्ताव anything in वापसी , or makes तभी टोकन offerings in an attempt to avoid होने  called a leech .
In economics , this type of  बर्ताव is पुकारा `` फ़्री सवारी '' और is संबद्ध साथ the  free rider problem .
Depending on context , leeching does not necessarily refer to illegal use of computer resources , but often instead to greedy use according to etiquette : to  wit , using too much of कया is freely दिए बगैर contributing a उचित राशि वापस to the जातियाँ कि  provides it .
The name derives from the  जोंक , an एनिमल कि झंझट रक्त और तब कोशिशें  to leave unnoticed .
Other terms are used , such as ``  freeloader '' , लकिन जोंक is the सबसे आम  .
The full eagle logo , used in  विभिन्न संस्करण इससे 1970 to 1993 .
The United States Postal Service ( USPS ) , also known as the Post Office and U.S.  मेल , is an स्वतंत्र एजेंसी of the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय सरकारी जिम्मेदार लिये providing डाक सेवा in  the United States .
It is one of the few government  एजेंसियों explicitly प्राधिकृत  by the United States Constitution .
The USPS  traces इसके जड़ें to 1775 दौरान the दूसरी महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस , जहाँ  Benjamin Franklin was appointed the first postmaster general .
The cabinet-level Post  दफ्तर विभाग थी निर्मित in 1792 इससे फ्रैंकलिन 's आपरेशन और रूपांतरित into इसके वर्तमान  form in 1971 under the Postal Reorganization Act .
The USPS  employs over 574,000 मजदूर और operates  over 260,000 vehicles .
The USPS is the  ऑपरेटर of the largest गाडी बेड़े in the संसार  .
The USPS is legally  obligated to serve सब अमेरिकी , regardless of  geography , at uniform price and quality .
The USPS has exclusive access to letter boxes marked `` U.S. Mail '' and personal letterboxes in  the संयुक्त राज्य , लकिन स्टिल competes विरूद्ध निजी पैकेज डिलीवरी सेवाएं , ऐसे as यूपीएस और fedex  .
The USPS has not directly received  taxpayer-dollars चूंकि the जल्दी 1980s साथ the नाबालिग एक्सेप्शन of subsidies लिये लागत संबद्ध  with the disabled and overseas voters .
चूंकि the 2006 all-time शिखर मेल आवाज़ , बाद जिससे कॉंग्रेस passed the डाक जवाबदेही और enhancement अधिनियम `` , ( जिससे mandated $ 5.5 अरब प्रति साल to be सशुल्क into an खाता to pre-fund retiree health-care , 75 सालो into the भविष्य  , a requirement unique among organizations and businesses in the U.S. ) , revenue dropped sharply due to recession-influenced declining mail volume , prompting the postal service to look to other sources of revenue while cutting costs to reduce its budget deficit .
Washington  , d.C. रै महरूम the पूंजी of the संयुक्त राज्य  since 1800 .
आठ अन्य शहरों have परोसा as the बैठक प्लेस लिये कॉंग्रेस और हैं इसलिए माना to have एकबार महरूम  the capital of the United States .
In  जोड , प्रत्येक of the 50 u.S. राज्य और the पाँच प्रिंसिपल territories  of the United States maintains its own capital .
राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड नियत  in a ring
The Princess cut is the  दूसरी सबसे लोकप्रिय काटें आकार लिये ईंट , अगला to a गोलाकार शानदार  .
The face-up  आकार of the राजकुमारी काटें is वर्गाकार or आयताकार और the प्रोफ़ाइल or side-on आकार  is similar to that of an inverted pyramid with four beveled sides .
The princess cut is a relatively new  डायमंड काटें , having महरूम निर्मित in  the 1960s .
It has gained  in लोकप्रियता in हाल सालो as a अधिक distinctive वैकल्पिक to the अधिक लोकप्रिय गोलाकार शानदार काटें , in जिससे the शीर्ष of डायमंड , पुकारा the क्राउन  , is cut with a round face-up shape and the bottom , called the pavilion , is shaped similar to a cone .
A princess cut with the same width as the diameter of a round  शानदार होगा तौल अधिक as it रै चार किनारे जिससे होता वरना have महरूम काटें बंद और rounded to रूप a गोलाकार शानदार  .
The  राजकुमारी काटें is sometimes referred to as a वर्गाकार  modified brilliant .
However  , जबकि displaying the वही ऊँची उपाधि of brilliance , इसके faceting स्टाइल is अद्वितीय और completely  different from that of a round brilliant .
The Princess cut had its origins in the early `` French '' cut , having a  step-modified `` double-french '' or `` क्रॉस '' काटें क्राउन और a श्रेणी of अद्वितीय , chevron-shaped facets in the मण्डप जिससे combine to दे a पृथक cross-shaped प्रतिबिंब जब the स्टोन is  viewed directly through the table .
Effectively , the  राजकुमारी काटें combines the ऊँची उपाधि of लाइट वापसी of a गोलाकार शानदार काटें साथ a distinctive  square or rectangular shape .
The square princess cut diamond is usually  थोड़ा सस्ता than गोलाकार शानदार काटें ईंट of the वही कैरेट वज़न क्युकी it retains परिचय 80 % of the अशिष्ट डायमंड  , as opposed to the round brilliant which retains only about 50 % of the rough .
The ability to retain more  क्रिस्टल वज़न makes इस आकार लोकप्रिय amongst डायमंड  cutters .
Accredited  gem appraisers ( आगा ) और अमरीकी gem समाज प्रयोगशाला ( agsl ) और यूरोपीय gem laboratories-usa  ( EGL-USA ) are currently the only labs that grade the Princess cut for cut .
There is no  सार्वभौमिक परिभाषा of कया माप मेक an आदर्श राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड और अनेक डायमंड निर्माताओं मार्केट  ideal diamonds with differing facet patterns and angles as `` ideal cut '' .
In contrast to the AGSL , AGA , and EGL-USA the Gemological Institute of America ( GIA ) has  stated कि वहीँ is नहीं पर्याप्त उद्योग सर्वसम्मति or अनुभवजन्य आंकड़ा to बताएँ काटें ग्रेडिंग मानकों लिये राजकुमारी काटें ईंट और to do so is at the रिस्क of उपभोक्ता जो may be धोखे  by diamonds accompanied by unqualified Ideal or Excellent cut grades .
The name ``  राजकुमारी काटें '' थी originally प्रयुक्त in कनेक्शन साथ another डायमंड काटें , वरना ज्ञात as the `` प्रोफ़ाइल '' काटें , designed by  Arpad Nagy , a London cutter , in 1961 .
The same  नाम थी बाद प्रयुक्त और बना लोकप्रिय by ygal पर्लमैन , betzalel ambar , और  Israel Itzkowitz in Israel in 1979 .
A similar cut with only 49  facets , as opposed to the असली 58 facets of the राजकुमारी काटें , थी बाद ब्रांडेड the  `` Quadrillion '' and initially distributed by Ambar Diamonds in Los Angeles .
Three  सालो of ऑप्टिकल शोध yielded a वर्गाकार स्टोन साथ faceting  similar to that of a round brilliant cut diamond .
A  तुलना
the क्रमांक of chevrons can affect the overall आउटलुक  of a princess cut diamond .
This can usually  be संकल्पित by the तार आरेख कि is plotted in  diamond grading reports .
By adding more chevrons on the  मण्डप पक्ष of the डायमंड , the व्यक्तिगत facets of the डायमंड होगा अभी  be broken down into smaller facets .
As a result , it can  दे a राजकुमारी काटें डायमंड  a `` crushed ice '' look .
Vice versa , when a princess cut diamond  रै lesser chevrons , it tends to दे the डायमंड a चंकी आउटलुक  due to broader facets .
the घरेलू श्वान ( canis lupus familiaris ) is a subspecies of the धूसर  wolf ( Canis lupus ) , a member of the Canidae family of the mammalian order Carnivora .
The  पद `` घरेलू श्वान '' is generally प्रयुक्त लिये दोनो domesticated  and feral varieties .
The dog has been the first  एनिमल to be domesticated और रै महरूम the सबसे widely रखा working , शिकार , और पालतु  animal in human history .
The word `` dog '' may  भी औसत the पुरूष of a canine प्रजाति , as opposed to the शब्द `` कुतिया  '' for the female of the species .
MtDNA evidence shows an evolutionary split between the modern dog 's lineage and the modern  भेड़िया 's lineage around 100,000 सालो पहले लकिन , , the oldest चट्टान नमूनों genetically linked to the आधुनिक श्वान 's lineage तिथि  to approximately 33,000-36,000 years ago .
Dogs ' value to early human  hunter-gatherers led to उन्हें जल्दी बनने सर्वव्यापी आरपार  world cultures .
Dogs perform  अनेक भूमिकाएँ लिये लोगों , ऐसे as शिकार , herding , pulling loads , सुरक्षा , assisting पुलिस और सैन्य , companionship  , and , more recently , aiding handicapped individuals .
This impact on human society has given them the  उपनाम `` man 's बेहतरीन dost '' in the पश्चिमी संसार  .
In some cultures , dogs  हैं भी a सोर्स of मांस  .
In  2001 , वहीँ यहूद अनुमानित to be 400  million dogs in the world .
Most breeds of dogs are  at सबसे a few सौ सालो बूढ़ा , having महरूम artificially चयनित लिये particular morphologies और व्यवहार  by people for specific functional roles .
Through this selective breeding , the dog has  विकसित into सैंकड़ों of varied breeds , और shows अधिक behavioral और morphological  variation than any other land mammal .
For example , height measured to the withers ranges from  in the चिहुआहुआ to परिचय in the आयरिश wolfhound ; रंग varies इससे श्वेत through grays ( प्रायः पुकारा `` ब्लू '' ) to ब्लैक , और भूरा इससे  light ( tan ) to dark ( `` red '' or `` chocolate '' ) in a wide variation of patterns ; coats can be short or long , coarse-haired to wool-like , straight , curly , or smooth .
It  is आम लिये सबसे breeds  to shed this coat .
Diagram of a  हस्तांतरण इलेक्ट्रॉन सूक्ष्मदर्शी
A 1973 Siemens  इलेक्ट्रॉन सूक्ष्मदर्शी , musée देस कला et  Métiers , Paris
An electron microscope ( EM ) is a type of  सूक्ष्मदर्शी कि उपयोग an इलेक्ट्रॉन बीम to illuminate a नमूना और उपज a magnified  image .
an em रै वृहद resolving शक्ति than a लाइट सूक्ष्मदर्शी और can खुलासा the ढांचा of छोटी वस्तुएँ क्युकी  electrons have wavelengths about 100,000 times shorter than visible light photons .
They can achieve better than 50  pm रेज़ोल्यूशन और magnifications of up to परिचय 10,000,000x whereas ordinary , non-confocal लाइट microscopes हैं सीमित  by diffraction to about 200 nm resolution and useful magnifications below 2000x .
The  इलेक्ट्रॉन सूक्ष्मदर्शी उपयोग electrostatic और इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक lenses to कंट्रोल  the electron beam and focus it to form an image .
These electron optical lenses are analogous to  the कांच lenses of a लाइट ऑप्टिकल सूक्ष्मदर्शी  .
Electron microscopes are used to investigate the ultrastructure of a wide range of  biological और अकार्बनिक नमूनों सहित microorganisms , कोशिकाएं , विशाल अणुओं , biopsy नमूने , धातुओं  , and crystals .
Industrially , the electron microscope is  प्रायः प्रयुक्त लिये विशेषता कंट्रोल और विफलता विश्लेषण .
Modern electron microscopes  उपज इलेक्ट्रॉन micrographs , using specialized डिजिटल कैमरे or फ़्रेम grabbers  to capture the image .
Popeyes Louisiana Kitchen is a chain of fried chicken  तेज़ खाना रेस्तरां संस्थापित in 1972 in नई ऑरलियन्स  , Louisiana .
Often referred to as Popeyes and sometimes as Popeyes  मुर्गा & बिस्कुट or popeyes मुर्गा & seafood , it थी acquired by sandy स्रोतों , जॉर्जिया -आधारd afc उद्यमों  , originally America 's Favorite Chicken Company , in 1993 .
according to a कम्पनी दबायें रिलीज दिनाँक जून 29 , 2007 , popeyes is the second-largest `` quick-service मुर्गा रेस्तरां समूह , measured by क्रमांक of इकाई '' , साथ अधिक than 1,800 रेस्तरां in अधिक than 40 राज्य और the ज़िला of कोलंबिया , और over 22 देशों विश्वव्यापी सहित तुर्कों , उत्तरी साइप्रस , बहरीन , चीन , हांग काँग , इराकी , इंडोनेशिया  , Jordan , Kuwait , United Arab Emirates , Japan , Malaysia , Saudi Arabia , South Korea , Singapore , Canada , Jamaica , Guyana , Suriname , Mexico , Trinidad , Puerto Rico , Honduras , Vietnam , Panama , Peru , and Costa Rica .
About thirty  स्थितियाँ हैं company-owned , the बाकी franchised  .
The leg  दबायें is a वज़न प्रशिक्षण कसरत in जिससे the व्यक्तिगत pushes a वज़न  or resistance away from them using their legs .
The  पद लेग दबायें भी refers to the apparatus प्रयुक्त  to perform this exercise .
The leg press can be  प्रयुक्त to evaluate an खिलाड़ी 's overall निम्नतर देह शक्ति  ( from knee joint to hip ) .
Using the  तिर्यक sled-type लेग दबायें  machine .
There  हैं दो प्रमुख प्रकार of  leg press:
The diagonal or  लंबवत 'sled ' प्रकार लेग दबायें  .
Weight disks  ( प्लेटों ) हैं संलग्न सीधे to the sled ,  which is mounted on rails .
The user  sits नीचे the sled और pushes it upward  with their feet .
These  मशीने सामान्यतः शामिल समायोज्य सुरक्षा कोष्ठक कि prevent the उपयोक्ता इससे  being trapped under the weight .
The 'cable ' type  लेग दबायें , or 'seated लेग दबायें ' , commonly  found on multigyms .
The user  sits कतरा और pushes आगे साथ उनके फीट onto a थाली कि is संलग्न to the  weight stack by means of a long steel cable .
Wendy Williams Hunter (  born वेन्डी जोन विलियम्स ; जुलाई 18 , 1964 ) is an अमरीकी  media personality , actress and author .
She hosts a  syndicated टेलीविज़न बात दिखाएँ , the वेन्डी विलियम्स दिखाएँ  .
Prior to television , Williams  थी a `` शॉक jockette `` on अनेक  radio shows .
Williams has gained  सुर्खी लिये उसके on-air spats साथ हस्तियाँ  .
She was the subject of the 2006 VH1 reality TV series called  the वेन्डी विलियम्स अनुभव जिससे ब्रॉडकास्ट कार्यक्रम surrounding  her radio show .
वो रै लिखा an आत्मकथा और अनेक अन्य किताबे , और  has created a product line called Adorn by Wendy Williams .
Patrick Henry ``  देशद्रोह '' वाक पहले the हाउस of burgesses in an 1851  painting by Peter F. Rothermel
``  दे me स्वतंत्रता , or दे me मौत ! '' is a quotation attributed to पैट्रिक हेनरी  from a speech he made to the Virginia Convention .
On that day , at St. John 's Church in Richmond , Virginia  , और is credited साथ having swung the संतुलन in convincing the वर्जिनिया हाउस of burgesses to pass a रेज़ोल्यूशन delivering the वर्जिनिया  troops to the Revolutionary War .
among the delegates to the सम्मेलन यहूद भविष्य us राष्ट्रपतियों थामस  Jefferson and George Washington .
Newfoundland  और labrador ( , locally ) is the easternmost  province of Canada .
situated in the देश 's अटलांटिक प्रदेश , it incorporates the द्वीप  of Newfoundland and mainland Labrador to the northwest , with a combined area of .
In 2011 ,  the प्रांत 's जनसांख्यिकी थी 514,536  .
Approximately 92 percent of the  प्रांत 's जनसांख्यिकी जीवनदान on the द्वीप of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड ( सहित इसके संबद्ध  smaller islands ) , of which more than half live on the Avalon Peninsula .
The province is Canada 's most  linguistically homogenous , साथ 97.6 % of निवासियों रिपोर्टिंग अंग्रेज़ी ( न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  English ) as their mother tongue in the 2006 census ; .
Historically , Newfoundland was also home to unique  किस्में of फ्रेंच , और आयरिश , as खूब as the now-extinct beothuk  language .
In  labrador , लोकल dialects of innu-aimun और inuktitut  are also spoken .
Newfoundland and Labrador 's capital and largest city , St. John 's , is  कनाडा 's 20th-largest जनसांख्यिकी महानगर क्षेत्रफल , और is घर to लगभग 40 प्रतिशत of the प्रांत  's population .
St. John 's is the seat of government , home to the House of  सभा of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador और the उच्चतम अदालत in the क्षेत्राधिकार , the न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड  and Labrador Court of Appeal .
A former colony and dominion of the United  किंगडम , न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और labrador became the दसवाँ प्रांत to डालें the कनाडाई कनफेडरेशन  on March 31 , 1949 , as Newfoundland .
On December 6 , 2001 ,  an amendment थी बना to the संविधान of कनाडा to बदलें the प्रांत 's आधिकारिक नाम to  Newfoundland and Labrador .
In day-to-day  वार्तालाप , however , canadians generally स्टिल refer to the प्रांत itself as न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड और  to the region on the Canadian mainland as Labrador .
थियोडोर ``  T.R . ''
Roosevelt , Jr. ( ; October 27 , 1858—January 6 , 1919 ) was the 26th  अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1901–1909 )  .
He is  विख्यात लिये उसके समृद्ध व्यक्तित्व , दायरा of रूचि और उपलब्धियाँ , और उसके नेतृत्व  of the Progressive Movement , as well as his `` cowboy `` persona and robust masculinity .
He was a leader of the Republican  पार्टी और संस्थापक of the पहला अवतार of the short-lived प्रगतिशील  ( `` Bull Moose '' ) Party of 1912 .
Before becoming President , he held  कार्यालयों at the नगर , राज्य , और संघीय स्तर  .
रूज़वेल्ट 's उपलब्धियाँ as a naturalist , एक्सप्लोरर , शिकारी , लेखक , और सिपाही हैं as much  a part of his fame as any office he held as a politician .
Roosevelt was 42 years old when sworn in as President of the United  राज्य in 1901 , बनाना उसे the youngest अध्यक्ष कभी ; he ताल आउट the youngest निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष , जॉन F. कैनेडी ,  by only one year .
Roosevelt was also the first of  तभी तीन बैठे राष्ट्रपतियों to have जीती the  Nobel Peace Prize .
The Teddy bear is named  बाद उसे , despite उसके अवमानना लिये होने  called `` Teddy '' .
Born into a wealthy family in New York City ,  रूज़वेल्ट थी a sickly चाइल्ड जो suffered इससे दमा और ठहरे at घर अध्ययन प्राकृतिक  history .
To overcome his  शारीरिक कमज़ोरी , he embraced a  strenuous life .
home-schooled , he became an eager  student of nature .
He attended Harvard University , where  he पढ़ाई जीवविज्ञान , boxed और विकसित an ब्याज in नवल  affairs .
In 1881 , one year out of Harvard , he was elected to  the नई यॉर्क राज्य सभा , जहाँ he became a नेता of the सुधार गुट of उसके रिपब्लिकन  Party ( the `` GOP '' ) .
His The Naval War of 1812 ( 1882 )  स्थापित उसके पेशेवर प्रतिष्ठा as a गंभीर इतिहासकार ; he लिखा numerous किताबे on शिकार , the बाहरी , और वर्तमान राजनैतिक मुद्दे , as खूब  as frontier history .
In 1884 , his first wife  और उसके माँ died on the वही  day .
He  temporarily बाएँ राजनीती और गई to the frontier , बनने a rancher  in the `` Badlands '' in the Dakotas .
Returning to New York City , he ran  लिये महापौर in 1886 , finishing तीसरा साथ 60,000  votes .
He later  gained कीर्ति by लेने vigorous चार्ज  of the city police .
At the national level ,  he थी a नेता in सिविल सेवा सुधार  .
The  spanish–american युद्ध broke आउट in 1898 जबकि  Roosevelt was , effectively , running the Department of the Navy .
He promptly resigned and  formed the अशिष्ट राइडर्स – a स्वयंसेवी प्यादे रेजीमेंट कि लड़ा  in Cuba .
The war hero was elected  राज्यपाल in 1898 और in 1900 थी मनोनीत लिये वाइस  president .
He successfully energized the GOP base as a highly  दृश्य प्रचारक to reelect अध्यक्ष विलियम mckinley on a मंच of ऊँची tariffs , the सुनहरा मानक , साम्राज्यवाद , समृद्धि at घर और विजय  abroad .
In 1901 , President William McKinley was  assassinated और रूज़वेल्ट became अध्यक्ष  .
He attempted to  मूव the रिपब्लिकन पार्टी ( gop ) toward प्रगतिवाद , सहित विश्वास busting  and increased regulation of businesses .
Roosevelt became the first person elected to a term in his own right in 1904 after having ascended  to the प्रेसिडेंसी ( इससे the vice-presidency ) upon the मौत of उसके पूर्ववर्ती , जीतना the largest प्रतिशत of the  popular vote since the uncontested election of 1820 .
रूज़वेल्ट coined the phrase `` वर्गाकार सौदे `` to describe उसके घरेलू कार्यसूची  , emphasizing that the average citizen would get a fair share under his policies .
As an  outdoorsman और naturalist , he प्रचारित the संरक्षण  movement .
On the world stage , Roosevelt 's  नीतियों यहूद characterized by उसके स्लोगन , `` बोलो softly  and carry a big stick `` .
A cousin is a relative with whom a person shares one or more common ancestor ( s ) ( other than a  जनक , child/descendant , सहोदर , child/descendant of a सहोदर , or सहोदर of a parent/ancestor  ) .
However in  आम parlance , `` cousin '' सामान्यतः specifically  means `` first cousin '' .
Systems of `` degrees '' and `` removals '' are used in the English-speaking  संसार to describe the सटीक संबंध between दो cousins ( in the व्यापक भाव ) और the पूर्वज वे have in  common .
Various governmental entities have established systems for legal use that can more precisely specify kinships with common ancestors existing any number of  पीढियां in the पास्ट , हालांकि आम उपयोग प्रायः eliminates the डिग्री और removals और refers to लोगों साथ आम ancestry  as simply `` distant cousins '' or `` relatives '' .
Webster is an American situation comedy that  aired on एबीसी इससे सितंबर 16 , 1983 जबतक may 8 , 1987 , और in first-run अनुप्रयोग इससे सितंबर 21 , 1987 जबतक  March 10 , 1989 .
the श्रेणी थी निर्मित  by Stu Silver .
The show stars Emmanuel Lewis in the title role as a young boy who , after losing his parents ,  is अपनाया by उसके एनएफएल -pro गॉडफादर , portrayed by एलेक्स karras , और उसके नई socialite बीवी  , played by Susan Clark .
The focus was largely on how this impulsively married couple had to adjust to their new lives and  अचानक parenthood , लकिन it थी the अनुकूल वेबस्टर खुद जो drove much of  the plot .
The series was  उत्पादित by जॉर्जियाई खाड़ी ltd. , emmanuel लुईस entertainment उद्यमों , inc. ( 1986-1989 ) और  Paramount Television .
Like NBC 's  पहले hit diff'rent स्ट्रोक्स , वेबस्टर प्रदर्शित a यंग african-american लड़के अपनाया  by a white family .
तीन प्रकार of कोशिका  division
Cell division is the  प्रक्रम by जिससे a जनक कोशिका divides into  two or more daughter cells .
कोशिका प्रभाग प्रायः occurs as भाग  of a larger cell cycle .
In eukaryotes , there are two distinct type of cell division : a vegetative division ,  whereby प्रत्येक बेटी कोशिका is genetically एकसमान to the जनक कोशिका ( समसूत्रण ) , और a reductive कोशिका प्रभाग , whereby the क्रमांक of गुणसूत्रों in the बेटी कोशिकाएं is घटाया  by half , to produce haploid gametes ( meiosis ) .
Both of these cell division cycles are required in sexually reproducing organisms at some  पाइंट in उनके जीवन साईकिल , और दोनो हैं believed to be उपस्थित in the पिछला eukaryotic आम पूर्वज prokaryotes भी undergo  a vegetative cell division known as binary fission , where their genetic material is segregated equally into two daughter cells .
सब कोशिका विभाजन , regardless of सजीव , हैं preceded by  a single round of DNA replication .
For simple unicellular organisms such as the amoeba , one cell  प्रभाग is समतुल्य to जनन – an संपूर्ण नई सजीव  is created .
On a larger scale  , mitotic कोशिका प्रभाग can बनाएँ progeny इससे बहुकोशिकीय  organisms , such as plants that grow from cuttings .
Cell division  भी enables sexually reproducing जीवों to develop इससे the one-celled zygote , जिससे itself  was produced by cell division from gametes .
And after growth , cell  प्रभाग allows लिये continual निर्माण और मरम्मत  of the organism .
A human being 's body  अनुभवों परिचय 10,000 खरब कोशिका  divisions in a lifetime .
कोशिका प्रभाग रै महरूम modeled  by finite subdivision rules .
The  प्राथमिक चिंता of कोशिका प्रभाग is the मेंटेनेंस of the असली  cell 's genome .
Before division can occur , the genomic information  कि is भंडारित in गुणसूत्रों जरूर be replicated , और the duplicated  genome must be separated cleanly between cells .
A  ग्रेट सौदे of सेल्यूलर अवसंरचना is शामिल in keeping genomic सूचना सतत  between `` generations '' .
Mountain  सीमाएँ of मैसाचुसेट्स , संयुक्त  States .
Howard Jones ( born John Howard Jones , 23 February 1955 ,  southampton , हैम्पशायर , इंग्लैण्ड ) is a अंग्रेजों संगीतकार , सिंगर  and songwriter .
According to the  गिनीज किताब of अंग्रेजों hit singles & एल्बम , `` जोन्स is an संपन्नता singer-songwriter जो थी a नियमित चार्ट  visitor in the mid-1980s with his brand of synthpop .
Jones , who was  बराबर लोकप्रिय in the u.S. , appeared at सजीव  Aid `` .
Allmusic journalist , Stephen  थामस erlewine adds , `` जोन्स थी एक of the धमक आंकड़े of mid-1980s synthpop  .
His music merged  the प्रौद्योगिकी intensive ध्वनि of नई वेव साथ  the cheery optimism of hippies and late 1960s pop .
Jones  racked up a स्ट्रिंग of हिट्स in the मिड और लेट 1980s , पहले he retreated into होने  a cult figure in the 1990s '' .
The International Isle of Man TT ( Tourist Trophy ) Race is a motorcycle racing event held  on the आइल of man और थी लिये अनेक सालो the सबसे prestigious मोटरसाइकिल रेस in the संसार  .
The event was part of the FIM Motorcycle Grand Prix World Championship  दौरान the काल 1949–1976 पहले होने transferred to the संयुक्त किंगडम बाद सुरक्षा चिंताएं और चलाएं by the fim as the  British Grand Prix for the 1977 season .
The Isle of Man TT Races became part of the  tt सूत्र 1 चैंपियनशिप इससे 1977 to 1990 to बचाना the इवेंट 's रेसिंग औकात  .
From  1989 the रेसिंग रै महरूम विकसित by the आइल of  Man Department of Tourism as the Isle of Man TT Festival .
The race is run in a  time-trial स्वरूप on पब्लिक सड़कें बंद लिये रेसिंग by the प्रावधानों of an अधिनियम of tynwald  ( the parliament of the Isle of Man ) .
The first race was held  on मंगलवार 28 may 1907 और थी पुकारा the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Auto-Cycle Tourist Trophy .
The  इवेंट थी संगठित by the auto-cycle क्लबों over 10 गोद of the st जॉन 's छोटी कोर्स of 15 मील 1,470 गज लिये  road-legal touring motorcycles with exhaust silencers , saddles , pedals and mud-guards .
The winner of the single-cylinder class ,  और overall विजेता of the पहला इवेंट in 1907 , थी चार्ली collier सवारी a matchless मोटरसाइकिल in a समय of 4 घंटों , 8 मिनट्स और 8 सेकेंड  at an average race speed of 38.21 mph .
The winner of the  twin-cylinder क्लास थी rem fowler सवारी a peugeot एंजिन नॉर्टन in a समय of 4 घंटों 21 मिनट्स  and 52 seconds at an average race speed of 36.21 mph .
The trophy presented to Charlie Collier as the winner of the  1907 आइल of man tt रेस , थी दान by the बिल्ले de  Mouzilly St. Mars .
It featured a stylised version of Olympic God Hermes by  giovanni da बोलोग्ना as a चांदी figurine astride a winged  wheel .
The trophy was similar in design to the 18 carat gold Montague Trophy presented to  जॉन नेपियर ( arrol-johnston ) as the inaugural विजेता of the आइल of man पर्यटक ट्रॉफी car रेस in 1905 अभी ज्ञात  as the RAC Tourist Trophy .
The Marquis de Mouzilly St. Mars Trophy is now  प्रस्तुत annually to the विजेता of the आइल of man वरिष्ठ  TT Motor-Cycle Race .
The  2007 आइल of man tt थी the centenary इवेंट जिससे भागा between 26 may और 8 जून 2007 और प्रदर्शित a खास re-enactment  of the 1907 Isle of Man TT Race held on the village green next to Tynwald Hill in St John 's on Monday 28 May 2007 .
The vintage parade of 100 classic  मोटरसाइकिल लिये the centenary re-enactment on the असली st जॉन 's छोटी  Course was flagged away by former World Motor-Cycle Champion Geoff Duke .
The first of the participants to be flagged away was  the recently लौटी twin-cylinder peugeot-norton ridden by rem fowler दौरान the पहला आइल  of Man TT Race in 1907 .
Also participating in the 2007  re-enactment थी tt रेस प्रतिस्पर्धी guy मार्टिन सवारी a 1938 triumph बाघ 100 500 cc और अन्य पूर्व tt प्रतिस्पर्धी सहित एलन cathcart , सैमी मिलर , उपनाम jefferies और  Mick Grant also completed the Re-enactment lap .

बेरोजगारी ( or joblessness ) occurs जब  people are without work and actively seeking work .
The unemployment rate is a measure of the prevalence of unemployment and it is calculated as  a प्रतिशत by dividing the क्रमांक of बेरोजगार individuals by सब individuals फिलहाल in the मजदूर  force .
दौरान अवधि of मंदी , an अर्थव्यवस्था प्रायः अनुभवों  a relatively high unemployment rate .
According to International Labour  संगठन रपट , अधिक than 197 लाख लोगों globally हैं आउट of कार्य or 6 % of the संसार  's workforce were without a job in 2012 .
There  remains considerable सैद्धांतिक बहस regarding  the causes , consequences and solutions for unemployment .
Classical  अर्थशास्त्र , नई शास्त्रीय अर्थशास्त्र , और the आस्ट्रिया स्कूल of अर्थशास्त्र argue कि मार्केट mechanisms  are reliable means of resolving unemployment .
These theories argue against  interventions imposed on the मजदूर मार्केट इससे the बाहर , ऐसे as unionization , न्यूनतम मजदूरी कानून , कर , और अन्य regulations कि वे अर्जी discourage  the hiring of workers .
Keynesian economics emphasizes the cyclical  प्रकृति of बेरोजगारी और अनुशंसा सरकारी interventions in the अर्थव्यवस्था कि it दावा होगा  reduce unemployment during recessions .
This theory focuses on recurrent shocks that suddenly reduce aggregate  माँग लिये goods और सेवाएं और यूँ reduce माँग लिये मजदूर  .
Keynesian models recommend government interventions designed to increase  माँग लिये मजदूर ; ये can शामिल वित्तीय stimuli , सरेआम वित्तपोषित जॉब सृष्टि , और expansionist मौद्रिक  policies .
In addition to these comprehensive theories of unemployment , there are a few  categorizations of बेरोजगारी कि हैं प्रयुक्त to अधिक precisely मॉडल the प्रभाव of बेरोजगारी भीतर  the economic system .
The main types of  बेरोजगारी शामिल संरचनात्मक बेरोजगारी जिससे focuses on संरचनात्मक समस्याएं in the अर्थव्यवस्था और inefficiencies  inherent in labour markets , including a mismatch between the supply and demand of laborers with necessary skill sets .
संरचनात्मक वितर्क emphasize कल्याणकारी और समाधान  related to disruptive technologies and globalization .
चर्चाएँ of frictional बेरोजगारी फ़ोकस on voluntary निर्णय to कार्य आधारित on प्रत्येक individuals ' valuation of उनके अपना कार्य और कैसा कि compares to वर्तमान मजदूरी दरों प्लस  the time and effort required to find a job .
Causes and  समाधान लिये frictional बेरोजगारी प्रायः पता जॉब  entry threshold and wage rates .
Behavioral economists highlight individual biases  in निर्णय बनाना , और प्रायः involve समस्याएं और समाधान concerning स्टिकी मजदूरी  and efficiency wages .
collectivism is कोई philosophic , राजनैतिक , धार्मिक , आर्थिक , or सोशल आउटलुक कि emphasizes the interdependence of प्रत्येक इंसान होने in a समाज or सभ्यता  .
Collectivism is a  मौलिक सांस्कृतिक तत्व कि exists as the रिवर्स of व्यक्तिगत in इंसान प्रकृति  ( in the same way high context culture exists as the reverse of low context culture ) .
Collectivist orientations stress the importance of cohesion within social groups ( such as an `` in-group '' , in  कया विशिष्ट कॉन्टेक्स्ट it is पारिभाषित ) और in कुछ मामले , the प्रधानता of समूह लक्ष्य over  individual goals .
collectivists प्रायः फ़ोकस on जातियाँ  , society , nation or country .
It has been  प्रयुक्त as an तत्व in अनेक अलग और विविध प्रकार of सरकारी और राजनैतिक , आर्थिक और शैक्षणिक तत्त्वज्ञान throughout  history and most human societies in practice contain elements of both individualism and collectivism .
Some examples of  collectivist संस्कृतियों शामिल  India and Japan .
Collectivism can be divided into horizontal  collectivism और लंबवत collectivism  .
Horizontal collectivism stresses  सामूहिक decision-making among बराबर individuals , और is यूँ प्रायः आधारित on decentralization और समतावाद  .
Vertical collectivism is based on hierarchical structures of power  और on moral और सांस्कृतिक conformity , और is इसलिए आधारित on centralization और पदानुक्रम  .
A cooperative enterprise would be an  उदाहरण of आड़ा collectivism , whereas a सैन्य पदानुक्रम होता be an उदाहरण of लंबवत  collectivism .
Acute  disseminated encephalomyelitis ( adem ) is an प्रतिरक्षा mediated बीमारी of the  brain .
It  प्रायः occurs following a वाइरल संक्रमण लकिन may appear following टीकाकरण , बैक्टीरियल or parasitic  infection , or even appear spontaneously .
As it involves autoimmune  demyelination , it is समान to अनेक काठिन्य , और is माना भाग of the अनेक काठिन्य borderline  diseases .
The incidence rate  is परिचय 8 प्रति 1,000,000 लोगों प्रति  year .
Although it occurs in all ages , most reported cases are in  children और adolescents , साथ the औसत आयु around 5 to 8 सालो  old .
The mortality rate may be as high as 5 % , full recovery is seen in 50 to  75 % of मामले , जबकि up to 70 to 90 % रिकवर साथ कुछ नाबालिग अवशेष विकलांगता  .
The average  समय to रिकवर is एक to छह महीने  .
ADEM  produces अनेक जलन lesions in the दिमाग और स्पाइनल cord  , particularly in the white matter .
Usually these are found in the subcortical and central white  पदार्थ और cortical gray-white जंक्शन of दोनो दिमागी बांटती , cerebellum , brainstem , और स्पाइनल cord , लकिन periventricular श्वेत पदार्थ और धूसर पदार्थ  of the cortex , thalami and basal ganglia may also be involved .
When the  रोगी पीड़ित अधिक than एक demyelinating एपीसोड , it is पुकारा तूल disseminated  encephalomyelitis or multiphasic disseminated encephalomyelitis ( MDEM ) .
The stomach is a muscular , hollow , dilated part of the digestion system which  कृत्यों as an महत्वपूर्ण अंग of the digestive ट्रैक्ट in कुछ पशु , सहित vertebrates  , echinoderms , insects ( mid-gut ) , and molluscs .
It is  शामिल in the दूसरी phase of पाचन , following  mastication ( chewing ) .
The stomach is located  between the ग्रासनाल और the छोटी आंत  .
It  secretes protein-digesting एंजाइमों पुकारा protease और दमदार acids to सहायता in खाना पाचन , ( भेजा to it via esophageal peristalsis ) through चिकना muscular contortions  ( called segmentation ) before sending partially digested food ( chyme ) to the small intestines .
The word stomach is derived from the Latin stomachus which is derived from  the यूनानी शब्द stomachos ( στόμαχος  ) , ultimately from stoma ( ) , `` mouth '' .
The words gastro- and  gastric ( अर्थ सम्बन्धित to the पेट )  are both derived from the Greek word gaster ( ) .
1940 pontiac खास श्रेणी  25 Woodie
A woodie is a car body style , especially a station wagon , where the  पश्च bodywork is constructed of लकडी फ्रेमवर्क साथ infill panels of  wood or painted metal .
After  the निधन of वास्तविक लकडी निर्माण , निर्माताओं प्रयुक्त अनुकरण woodgrain चादर vinyl—sometimes augmented साथ three-dimensional  , simulated framework—to recall wood construction .
In 2008 , wood  निर्माण थी जगाई abstractly on the घाट फ्लेक्स साथ a श्रेणी of पक्ष और पश्च  horizontal grooves .
A pearl is a hard object produced within the soft tissue (  specifically the mantle ) of a जीना shelled mollusc  .
Just like the shell of a clam , a pearl is made up of  कैल्सियम कार्बोनेट in मिनट crystalline रूप , जिससे रै महरूम deposited in केंद्रिय  layers .
The ideal pearl  is perfectly गोलाकार और चिकना , लकिन अनेक अन्य आकार of मोती  ( baroque pearls ) occur .
The finest quality natural pearls have  महरूम अत्यधिक valued as रत्नों और वस्तुएँ of सौंदर्य लिये अनेक सदियां , और क्युकी of इस , the शब्द पर्ल रै become a रूपक  for something very rare , fine , admirable , and valuable .
The most valuable  मोती occur अनायास in the जंगली , लकिन वे हैं  extremely rare .
ये जंगली मोती हैं  referred to as natural pearls .
Cultured or farmed  मोती इससे पर्ल oysters और freshwater mussels मेक up the बहुमत  of those that are currently sold .
Imitation pearls are  भी widely बेची in inexpensive आभूषण , लकिन the विशेषता of उनके iridescence is प्रायः बहुत ग़रीब , और प्रायः , कृत्रिम  pearls are easily distinguished from genuine pearls .
Pearls have  महरूम harvested और cultivated primarily लिये उपयोग in आभूषण , लकिन in the पास्ट वे यहूद भी  stitched onto lavish clothing .
Pearls have also been  कुचल और प्रयुक्त in कॉस्मेटिक्स , दवाइयाँ , और in पेंट formulations  .
Whether wild or cultured , gem quality  मोती हैं लगभग सदा nacreous और , as is the आंतरिक of the शेल  that produces them .
However , almost all species of shelled molluscs are capable of producing  मोती ( formally referred to as `` calcareous concretions '' by कुछ स्त्रोत ) of lesser चमक  or less spherical shape .
Although these may  भी be legitimately referred to as `` मोती '' by gemological लैब्स और भी अंतर्गत u.S. संघीय व्यापार आयोग नियम ,  and are formed in the same way , most of them have no value , except as curiosities .
bing ( ज्ञात previously as सजीव ढूंढें , खिड़कियाँ सजीव ढूंढें , और एमएसएन ढूंढें ) is a वेब ढूंढें इंजन ( advertised  as a `` decision engine `` ) from Microsoft .
Bing was unveiled by  microsoft सीईओ स्टीव बाल्मर on may 28 , 2009 at the सब बाते डिजिटल सम्मेलन  in San Diego for release on June 1 .
notable परिवर्तन शामिल the लिस्टिंग of ढूंढें सुझाव जबकि प्रश्नों हैं डाला और a सूची of सम्बन्धित  searches ( called `` Explore pane '' ) based on semantic technology from Powerset which Microsoft purchased in 2008 .
On July 29  , 2009 , microsoft और याहू ! घोषित a सौदे in जिससे  Bing would power Yahoo ! Search .
All  याहू ! ढूंढें वैश्विक ग्राहक और साझेदार हैं अपेक्षित  to have made the transition by early 2012 .
In October 2011 , Bing announced it was working  on नई back-end ढूंढें अवसंरचना , साथ the लक्ष्य of delivering तेज़ और थोड़ा  more relevant search results for users .
Known as `` Tiger '' , the new  index-serving प्रौद्योगिकी रै महरूम incorporated into bing globally  , since August 2011 .
In May 2012 , Bing announced another redesign of its search engine that  शामिल `` साइडबार '' , a सोशल विशेषता कि खोज उपयोक्ता ' सोशल संजाल लिये  information relevant to the search query .
A diagram showing  an i गठन on ठोकर और a 4-3 गठन  on defense
In American  फ़ुटबॉल , प्रत्येक टोली रै ग्यारह खिलाड़ी  on the field at one time .
The specific role that a  खिलाड़ी takes on the फ़ील्ड is पुकारा उनके स्थिति  .
Under the modern rules of American football , teams are allowed unlimited  subsititutions , कि is टीमों may बदलें कोई क्रमांक of खिलाड़ी बाद कोई खेल  .
This has resulted in the development of three `` platoons '' of players  , the ठोकर ( the टोली साथ the बॉल , जो is trying to स्कोर ) , the रक्षा ( the टोली trying to prevent the अन्य टोली इससे स्कोरिंग , और to लो the बॉल इससे उन्हें ) , और the  special teams ( who play in kicking situations ) .
Within those platoons , various specific positions  मौजूद depending on कया the खिलाड़ी 's प्रमुख जॉब  is .
The Irish people ( or na hÉireannaigh ; Ulster-Scots :  airish fowk ) हैं an जातीय समूह जो originate in आयरलैंड , an द्वीप in northwestern यूरोपीय  .
Ireland has been populated  लिये around 9,000 सालो ( according to पुरातत्व  studies , see Prehistoric Ireland ) .
The Irish people 's earliest ancestors  हैं अंकित in महापुरूष – वे हैं claimed to be descended इससे समूह ऐसे as the nemedians , fomorians , fir bolg , tuatha  Dé Danann and the Milesians .
Lebor Gabála Érenn , a book of Irish  mythology tells कि milesians यहूद स्काइथियन  descendants .
The main groups that  interacted साथ the आयरिश in the मध्य आयु  include the Picts , Scots , and the Vikings .
Due to this  सम्पर्क , icelanders हैं विख्यात लिये having कुछ आयरिश  descent .
The Anglo-Norman invasion of the High Middle Ages , the English plantations and  the subsequent अंग्रेज़ी नियम of the देश introduced the normans और फ्लेमिश into आयरलैंड  .
वेल्श , picts , bretons , और छोटी पार्टियों of gauls और भी anglo-saxons  are known in Ireland from much earlier times .
There have been  अनेक notable आयरिश लोगों throughout  history .
The 6th century Irish monk and missionary Columbanus is  regarded as एक of the `` fathers of यूरोपीय '' , followed by kilian of würzburg  and Vergilius of Salzburg .
The scientist Robert Boyle is considered  the `` पिता of रसायन ``  .
Famous  आयरिश explorers शामिल ब्रेंडन the नाविक , रॉबर्ट  McClure , Ernest Shackleton and Tom Crean .
By some accounts , the first European child born in North America had Irish  descent on दोनो पहलू ; और an irishman थी the पहला यूरोपीय to नियत पैर on अमरीकी मृदा in कोलंबस ' expedition of 1492  .
There are descendants of Irish  लोगों जीना in अनेक पश्चिमी देशों , विशेषकर  in English-speaking countries .
Historically , emigration has been caused  by राजनीती , अकाल और आर्थिक  issues .
An estimated 50 to 80 million people are  वंशजों of आयरिश लोगों , primarily in the संयुक्त किंगडम , the संयुक्त राज्य , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , कनाडा और आइसलैंड ; वहीँ हैं भी छोटी संख्याएँ in  Argentina , Chile , Mexico , Jamaica , Barbados , South Africa , New Zealand , France , Germany and Brazil .
The largest number of  वंशजों of आयरिश लोगों  live in the United States .
The number of people  जीना in ऑस्ट्रेलिया जो हैं of आयरिश descent is उच्चतर , as a प्रतिशत  of total population , than that of any other country .
Approximately forty percent of the  उपनिवेश जनसांख्यिकी of आइसलैंड आए इससे आयरलैंड or स्कॉटलैंड  .
The very  पहला निवासियों of आइसलैंड यहूद  Irish .
The Hubble Space Telescope  ( hst ) is a स्पेस दूरदर्शी कि थी carried into कक्षा by a स्पेस  Shuttle in 1990 and remains in operation .
A aperture telescope in  कम धरती कक्षा , हबल 's चार प्रमुख यंत्र observe in the निकट पराबैंगनी  , visible , and near infrared .
The  दूरदर्शी is नामित बाद the astronomer एडविन  Hubble .
Hubble 's  कक्षा बाहर the distortion of धरती 's माहौल allows  it to take extremely sharp images with almost no background light .
Hubble 's Deep Field have been some of the most  विस्तृत visible-light बिंब कभी , allowing a गहन दृश्य into स्पेस और समय  .
Many Hubble observations have led to breakthroughs in astrophysics ,  ऐसे as accurately determining the रेट of विस्तार of the  universe .
Although not the first  स्पेस दूरदर्शी , हबल is एक of the largest और सबसे बहुमुखी , और is खूब ज्ञात as दोनो a vital शोध औजार और  a public relations boon for astronomy .
The HST was built by the United States space agency NASA , with  योगदान इससे the यूरोपीय स्पेस एजेंसी , और is संचालित by the स्पेस दूरदर्शी विज्ञान  Institute .
The HST  is एक of नासा 's ग्रेट observatories , साथ साथ  the Compton Gamma Ray Observatory , the Chandra X-ray Observatory , and the Spitzer Space Telescope .
स्पेस telescopes यहूद प्रस्तावित  as early as 1923 .
Hubble  थी वित्तपोषित in the 1970s , साथ a प्रस्तावित लॉन्च in 1983 , लकिन the प्रोजेक्ट थी घिरा by तकनीकी देरी , बजट समस्याएं  , and the Challenger disaster .
When finally launched in  1990 , वैज्ञानिकों मिला कि the प्रमुख दर्पण था महरूम मैदान incorrectly  , compromising the telescope 's capabilities .
the दूरदर्शी थी लौटी to इसके intended  quality by a servicing mission in 1993 .
Hubble is the  तभी दूरदर्शी designed to be सर्विस in स्पेस by astronauts  .
Between 1993 and 2002 , four missions  repaired , upgraded , और replaced प्रणालियों on the दूरदर्शी ; a पांचवां मिशन थी  canceled on safety grounds following the Columbia disaster .
However , after  spirited पब्लिक चर्चा , नासा व्यवस्थापक माइक griffin स्वीकृत एक फाइनल सर्विसिंग  mission , completed in 2009 by Space Shuttle Atlantis .
The telescope is now  अपेक्षित to फलन जबतक at तनिक  2013 .
Its  वैज्ञानिक successor , the जेम्स webb स्पेस दूरदर्शी  ( JWST ) , is to be launched in 2018 or possibly later .
Anti-inflammatory refers  to the प्रॉपर्टी of a पदार्थ or उपचार  that reduces inflammation .
anti-inflammatory दवाएँ मेक up परिचय हाफ of analgesics , remedying पीड़ा by reducing  inflammation as opposed to opioids , which affect the central nervous system .
The Tonight Show is a US  late-night बात दिखाएँ कि रै aired on एनबीसी  since 1954 .
It is the longest currently running regularly scheduled entertainment program in  the us और the तीसरा longest-running दिखाएँ on एनबीसी बाद मिलें the दबायें और आज .
The Tonight Show was hosted by Steve Allen ( 1954–1957 ) , Jack Paar ( 1957–1962 ) , Johnny  कार्सन ( 1962–1992 ) , jay लीनो ( 1992–2009 , 2010–present ) , और कोनन  O'Brien ( 2009–2010 ) .
Several guest hosts also appeared ,  विशेषकर दौरान the paar और कार्सन eras .
The  longest-serving मेजबान to तिथि थी जॉनी कार्सन , जो hosted the tonight दिखाएँ अभिनीत जॉनी कार्सन लिये 30 सीज़न  from the fall of 1962 through the spring of 1992 .
The current host  of the दिखाएँ is jay लीनो , जो था previously hosted the दिखाएँ इससे  1992 to 2009 and began his second tenure on March 1 , 2010 .
On April 3 , 2013 , NBC  घोषित jimmy fallon होता become  the new host of The Tonight Show .
The  tonight दिखाएँ साथ jimmy fallon होगा प्रीमियर फ़रवरी 24 , 2014 , the दिन बाद  the closing ceremonies of the 2014 Winter Olympics .
ss एंड्रिया डोरिया  .
Pronounced was  an समंदर लाइनर लिये the इतालवी लकीर ( società di navigazione इटालिया ) घर ported in जेनोआ , इटली , सबसे प्रसिद्ध  for its sinking in 1956 , when 52 people died ( 51 from immediate impact ) .
Named after the 16th-century Genoese admiral Andrea Doria , the ship had a  सकल पंजीकरण tonnage of 29,100 और a क्षमता of परिचय 1,200 यात्री  and 500 crew .
For a country attempting to rebuild its economy and  प्रतिष्ठा बाद संसार युद्ध ii , एंड्रिया डोरिया थी an प्रतीक of  Italian national pride .
Of all Italy 's ships at the time , Andrea  डोरिया थी the largest , तीव्रतम और माना safest  .
Launched on 16 June  1951 , the जलयान undertook इसके maiden voyage  on 14 January 1953 .
On 25 July 1956 , while the Andrea Doria was approaching the coast of Nantucket , Massachusetts , bound for New York City , the  eastbound of the स्वीडिश अमरीकी लकीर collided साथ it in कया became एक of इतिहास 's सबसे infamous  maritime disasters .
Struck in the side , the  top-heavy एंड्रिया डोरिया तत्काल प्रारंभ to सूची severely to स्टारबोर्ड ,  which left half of its lifeboats unusable .
The consequent shortage of lifeboats might have resulted  in significant घाटा of जीवन , लकिन the दक्षता of the जलयान 's तकनीकी डिज़ाइन अनुमत it to रहो afloat लिये over 11  hours after the ramming .
The good behavior of the crew , improvements in communications and the rapid  जवाब of अन्य जहाजों averted a विपत्ति समान in स्केल to कि  of the in 1912 .
1,660 passengers and  क्रू यहूद बचाया और बच , जबकि 46 लोगों died  as a consequence of the collision .
The evacuated luxury  लाइनर capsized और sank the following  morning .
This accident remains the worst  मेरीटाइम विपत्ति to occur in संयुक्त राज्य waters चूंकि  the sinking of the in 1915 .
The incident  और इसके aftermath यहूद heavily covered  by the news media .
While the  बचाव प्रयत्न यहूद दोनो कामयाब और commendable , the कारण of the टक्कर साथ the स्टॉकहोम और the  loss of Andrea Doria generated much interest in the media and many lawsuits .
Largely because of an out-of-court  उपनिवेश अनुबंध between the दो शिपिंग कंपनियाँ दौरान hearings तत्काल बाद the विपत्ति , no determination  of the cause ( s ) was ever formally published .
Although greater  दोष appeared initially to पतन on the इतालवी लाइनर , अधिक हाल discoveries have indicated  that a misreading of radar on the Swedish ship may have initiated the collision course , leading to errors on both ships .
Andrea Doria was  the पिछला प्रमुख transatlantic यात्री पोत to डूबना पहले वायुयान became the पसन्दीदा विधि  of travel .
डायलिसिस tubing
Dialysis tubing is a type of semi- or partially permeable  झिल्ली tubing बना इससे regenerated cellulose or सेलोफेन  .
It can be used for  diffusion साथ solutes or परासरण if प्रयुक्त साथ जल  only .
परासरण is जब जल गुजरता through  a semi-permeable layer to reach equilibrium .
Diffusion  , on the अन्य हाथ , allows the गति of अणुओं इससे ऊँची  concentration to low concentration .
It will only allow molecules to pass through a semi-permeable  झिल्ली or परत if the अणु is छोटी पर्याप्त to अनुरूप through the झिल्ली or a झिल्ली  's pore .
This usually results with the  प्रभाव of diffusion through a झिल्ली तभी वाकई affects छोटी अणुओं  , and almost never larger molecules .
Dialysis tubing is  प्रयुक्त in नैदानिक हालातों to ensure a filtered प्रवाह of अणुओं , preventing  the flow of larger solute molecules .
छोटी अणुओं can be `` धोया '' आउट of a समाधान जिससे is उत्तेजित through the tubing into a solvent  , usually water , which surrounds it and in which they can be flushed away .
In demonstrations of semi-permeable membranes , a  समाधान containing अनेक प्रकार of अणुओं , प्रायः ग्लूकोज और मंड , is लगाई into a semi-permeable डायलिसिस थैला , ऐसे as a cellulose झिल्ली साथ  pores , and the bag is sealed with a knot or elastic band .
The sealed dialysis bag is  लगाई in a संग्राहक of a अलग समाधान , or जल  .
Molecules small enough to pass through the tubing  ( जल , लवण , monosaccharides , और अन्य छोटी अणुओं ) tend to मूव into or आउट of the डायलिसिस थैला in the दिशा of  decreasing concentration , therefore displaying diffusion .
Larger molecules ( such as  प्रोटीन , or polysaccharides ) कि have आयाम significantly वृहद  than the pore diameter are retained inside the dialysis bag .
The water and smaller solutes in a hypotonic solution ( a solution that has a lesser solute concentration than the solution it is  संदर्भित to ) होगा क्रॉस a semi-permeable झिल्ली , जैसे डायलिसिस tubing , into a hypertonic समाधान ( a समाधान कि रै a उच्चतर solute विशेषज्ञता than the समाधान it is संदर्भित to ) in an attempt to पहुँचें  equilibrium , where the solute concentration of each solution is in equilibrium .
पारा प्रयोगशाला  thermometer
A thermometer ( from the Greek ,  thermos , अर्थ `` hot '' और μἐτρον , metron , `` माप '' ) is a यंत्र कि उपायों तापमान  or temperature gradient using a variety of different principles .
A thermometer has two  महत्वपूर्ण तत्व : the तापमान सेंसर ( e.g . the बल्ब on a mercury-in-glass थर्मामीटर ) in जिससे कुछ शारीरिक बदलें occurs साथ  temperature , plus some means of converting this physical change into a numerical value ( e.g . the visible scale that is marked on a mercury-in-glass thermometer ) .
There are many types and  अनेक उपयोग लिये thermometers , as विस्तृत  below in sections of this article .
Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs is a  1937 अमरीकी एनिमेटेड musical काल्पनिक फिल्मी उत्पादित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी  and released by RKO Radio Pictures .
Based on the German fairy tale by the Brothers Grimm , it is the first  full-length cel एनिमेटेड विशेषता फिल्मी और the earliest in the वॉल्ट डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड क्लासिक श्रेणी  .
The story was adapted by storyboard artists  डोरोथी ऐन रिक्त , रिचर्ड creedon , मेरिल de मारिस , ओटो englander , अर्ल hurd , लंड rickard , टेड सियर्स  and Webb Smith .
David Hand was the supervising director , while William Cottrell , Wilfred Jackson  , लैरी morey , perce pearce , और बेन sharpsteen निर्देशित the  film 's individual sequences .
Snow White premiered at the Carthay Circle Theatre on December 21 , 1937 , followed by a nationwide release on February 4 , 1938  , और साथ अंतरराष्ट्रीय आय of $ 8 लाख दौरान इसके आरंभिक रिलीज briefly assumed the रिकार्ड of उच्चतम grossing ध्वनि फिल्मी  at the time .
The popularity of the film has  led to it होने re-released theatrically अनेक टाइम्स , जबतक इसके घर वीडियो रिलीज  in the 1990s .
समायोजित लिये महंगाई , it is एक of the शीर्ष टेन performers at the  North American box office .
At the 11th Academy  पुरस्कार , वॉल्ट डिज़्नी थी awarded an मानद ऑस्कर , और the फिल्मी थी  nominated for Best Musical Score .
It was added to the United States National Film Registry  in 1989 और is क्रमित in the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान 's सूची of the 100 महानतम अमरीकी films , जो भी नामित the फिल्मी as the महानतम अमरीकी एनिमेटेड  film of all time in 2008 .
Disney 's take on the fairy tale has had a big cultural impact ,  resulting in a लोकप्रिय थीम पार्क आकर्षण , a वीडियो खेल , और a ब्रॉडवे  musical .
Childbirth , labour ,  डिलीवरी , जनम , partus , or parturition is the culmination of a गर्भावस्था काल साथ the expulsion of एक or  more newborn infants from a woman 's uterus .
The process of normal  प्रसव is categorized in तीन चरण of श्रमिक : the shortening और  dilation of the cervix , descent and birth of the infant , and birth of the placenta .
In many cases and with increasing frequency ,  प्रसव is हासिल through प्रेरण of मजदूर or caesarean खण्ड , जिससे is the हटाना of the neonate  through a surgical incision in the abdomen , rather than through vaginal birth .
Childbirth  by c-sections increased 50 % in the u.S. इससे 1996 to 2006 , और comprise nearly  32 % of births in the U.S. and Canada .
With respect to induced labor , more than 22 % of women  undergo प्रेरण of श्रमिक in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
Medical professional policy makers find that induced  births और elective cesarean can be नुकसानदेह to the भ्रूण और neonate as खूब as नुकसानदेह or बगैर लाभ to the माँ ,  and have established strict guidelines for non-medically indicated induced births and elective cesarean before 39 weeks .
Viva La Bam was an MTV & Viva show which followed Bam Margera  और उसके क्रू as वे undertook चुनौतियां , performed स्टंट और  traveled the world .
The show ran for 5 seasons  between 2003 और 2005  .
Flushed Away is a 2006 British/American computer  एनिमेटेड कार्रवाई / एडवेंचर कॉमेडी फिल्मी निर्देशित by दाउद bowers  and Sam Fell .
It was made in the partnership between Aardman  एनिमेशन और ड्रीमवर्क्स एनिमेशन , और is aardman 's पहला completely computer-animated  feature as opposed to the usual stop-motion .
The film stars the voice talents of  ह्यूज जैकमैन , केट विंसलेट , एंडी serkis , विधेयक nighy , इयान mckellen , शेन richie और जां रेनो  .
The story was by Sam Fell , Peter Lord , Dick Clement  , और इयान la frenais , और the पटकथा थी लिखा by लंड सहनशील , इयान la frenais , क्रिस्टोफर  Lloyd , Joe Keenan , and William Davies .
The film was released in US on 3 November 2006 , and in UK on December 1 2006 , and was distributed  by सर्वोपरि तस्वीरें , मगर लिये स्विट्ज़रलैंड , स्पेन , और the नीदरलैंड्स , जिससे यहूद संभाला by  Universal Pictures .
The Atlanta Braves are a  पेशेवर बेसबॉल टोली आधारित in अटलांटा  .
The Braves are a member of the  पूर्वी प्रभाग of प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल 's  National League .
The Braves  have निभाई in टर्नर फ़ील्ड चूंकि  1997 .
The `` Braves '' name , which was first used in  1912 , originates इससे a पद लिये a देशी अमरीकी  warrior .
They are  nicknamed `` the bravos '' , और प्रायः referred to as `` अमेरिका 's टोली `` in सन्दर्भ to the  team 's games being broadcast on the nationally available TBS from the 1970s until 2007 , gaining a wide fanbase .
From 1991 to 2005 the Braves were one of the most successful franchises in baseball , winning division  शीर्षक an unprecedented 14 लगातार टाइम्स in कि काल ( omitting the strike-shortened 1994 ऋतु in जिससे वहीँ यहूद no  official division champions ) .
The Braves won the NL  वेस्ट 1991–93 और the nl ईस्ट 1995–2005 , और लौटे to the playoffs as the नेशनल  League Wild Card in 2010 .
the braves उन्नत to the संसार श्रेणी पाँच टाइम्स in  the 1990s , winning the title in 1995 .
Since their  डेब्यू in the नेशनल लीग in 1876 , the मताधिकार रै जीती 16 डिवीजनल शीर्षक , 17 नेशनल लीग pennants , as खूब as तीन संसार  Series championships—in 1914 as the Boston Braves , in 1957 as the Milwaukee Braves , and in 1995 in Atlanta .
The Braves are the only MLB  मताधिकार to have जीती the संसार श्रेणी in तीन अलग  home cities .
The club is one of the National League 's two remaining charter franchises ( the other being the Chicago Cubs ) and was founded in  बोस्टन , मैसाचुसेट्स , in 1871 as the बोस्टन रेड stockings ( नहीं to be उलझन साथ the अमरीकी  League 's Boston Red Sox ) .
They are considered `` the oldest  लगातार playing टोली in प्रमुख उत्तर अमरीकी  sports . ''
There is an argument as to who is actually  पुरानी क्युकी हालांकि the शावक हैं a पूरा ऋतु `` पुरानी '' ( formed as the शिकागो श्वेत stockings in 1870 ) शिकागो खोया  two seasons to the Great Chicago Fire , thus the Braves have played more consecutive seasons .
After various name changes ( such as the Boston Beaneaters )  , the टोली संचालित as the बोस्टन braves लिये सबसे of the पहला हाफ of the 20th  century .
In 1953 , the  टोली स्थानांतरित to मिल्वौकी , विस्कॉन्सिन और became the मिल्वौकी braves , followed by the  move to Atlanta in 1966 .
The team 's tenure in Atlanta is famous for Hank Aaron breaking Babe Ruth 's career home run record in 1974 ,  हालांकि the बहुमत of आरोन 's घर रनों यहूद hit जबकि the टोली थी in मिल्वौकी  .
His  रिकार्ड stood जबतक 2007 , जब सैन फ्रांसिस्को बाएँ  fielder Barry Bonds broke the record .
The  पत्ते of a beech  tree
3D  रेंडरिंग of a μct स्कैन of a  leaf piece , resolution circa 40 μm/ voxel .
A leaf is an organ of a vascular plant , as defined in  वनस्पति शर्तें , और in particular in संयंत्र  morphology .
Foliage is a mass noun  कि refers to पत्ते as a विशेषता  of plants .
Typically a leaf is a thin , flattened organ borne above ground and specialized for photosynthesis , but many types of leaves are adapted in ways almost unrecognisable in those terms : some are  नहीं चपटा ( लिये उदाहरण अनेक रसीले पत्ते और conifers ) , कुछ हैं नहीं ऊपर मैदान ( ऐसे as बल्ब तराजू ) , और कुछ हैं बगैर प्रमुख photosynthetic फलन ( consider लिये उदाहरण cataphylls , कांटे , और  cotyledons ) .
Conversely , many structures of non-vascular plants , or even of some lichens ,  जिससे हैं नहीं पौधे at सब ( in the भाव of होने सदस्यों of the किंगडम plantae ) , do dekh और फलन much  like leaves .
Furthermore , several  structures मिला in vascular पौधे dekh जैसे पत्ते लकिन हैं नहीं दरअसल पत्ते ; वे  differ from leaves in their structures and origins .
उदाहरण शामिल phyllodes , cladodes  , and phylloclades .
Title  कार्ड लिये the 1937 हमारी गिरोह कॉमेडी  Rushin ' Ballet .
Our Gang ( also known as The Little Rascals or Hal Roach 's Rascals ) are a series of American comedy short films  परिचय a समूह of ग़रीब पड़ोस children और उनके adventures  .
Created by comedy producer Hal Roach , the  श्रेणी is विख्यात लिये प्रर्दशित children behaving in a अपेक्षाकृत प्राकृतिक रास्ता , as रोच और असली निदेशक रॉबर्ट F. mcgowan  worked to film the unaffected , raw nuances apparent in regular children rather than have them imitate adult acting styles .
In addition , Our Gang  notably put लड़कों , लड़कियों , whites और अश्वेतों साथ in a समूह as बराबरी , कुछ कि `` broke नई मैदान , '' according to फिल्मी इतिहासकार  Leonard Maltin .
Such a  बात था never महरूम किया पहले in सिनेमा लकिन रै चूंकि महरूम  repeated after the success of Our Gang .
The  पहला उत्पादन at the रोच स्टुडियो in 1922 थी a श्रेणी  of silent short subjects .
When Roach changed distributors from Pathé to  metro-goldwyn-mayer ( mgm ) in 1927 , और परिवर्तित the श्रेणी to ध्वनि in 1929 , the श्रेणी took  off even further .
Production continued at the Roach studio until 1938 ,  जब the श्रेणी थी बेची to mgm , जो तब जारी producing the comedies जबतक  1944 .
The Our Gang series  शामिल a कुल of 220 शॉर्ट्स और एक विशेषता फिल्मी , सामान्य spanky , featuring  over forty-one child actors .
As MGM retained the rights to the Our Gang  ट्रेडमार्क following उनके खरीदें of the उत्पादन अधिकारों , the 80 roach-produced `` टॉकीज़ '' यहूद syndicated लिये टेलीविज़न अंतर्गत  the title The Little Rascals beginning in 1955 .
Both Roach 's The Little Rascals package ( now owned by CBS Television Distribution ) and  mgm 's हमारी गिरोह पैकेज ( अभी स्वामित्व by warner भाईs. entertainment ) have चूंकि remained in अनुप्रयोग , साथ आवधिक नई प्रोडक्शन्स आधारित on the शॉर्ट्स surfacing over the सालो , सहित a 1994 छोटी  Rascals feature film released by Universal Pictures .
Zacharias Janssen ( also Zacharias Jansen or Sacharias Jansen ) (  b.1580-88 , d.pre-1632 to 1638 ) थी a डच spectacle-maker इससे middelburg संबद्ध साथ the आविष्कार of the पहला ऑप्टिकल दूरदर्शी  .
Janssen is  sometimes भी credited लिये inventing the  first truly compound microscope .
However , the  उत्पत्ति of the सूक्ष्मदर्शी , बस जैसे the उत्पत्ति of the  telescope , is a matter of debate .
Lake Tahoe ( ; Washo : dáʔaw ) is a  विशाल freshwater झील in the सिएरा नेवाडा of the संयुक्त  States .
At a surface elevation  of , it is स्तिथ साथ the किनारा between कैलिफ़ोर्निया और नेवाडा  , west of Carson City .
Lake  tahoe is the largest अल्पाइन  lake in North America .
Its depth is , making it the United State 's second-deepest (  the deepest is crater झील in ऑरेगॉन , होने deeper  , at ) .
Additionally , Lake Tahoe is  सूचीबद्ध as the 26th largest झील by आवाज़ in the संसार  at .
The lake was  formed परिचय 2 लाख सालो पहले और is a भाग of the झील tahoe जलाशय  with the modern lake being shaped during the ice ages .
It is  ज्ञात लिये the स्पष्टता of इसके जल और  the panorama of surrounding mountains on all sides .
The area  surrounding the झील is भी referred to as झील  Tahoe , or simply Tahoe .
Lake Tahoe is a major tourist  आकर्षण in दोनो नेवाडा और कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
It is home  to a क्रमांक of स्की रिसॉर्ट , गर्मियाँ बाहरी मनोरंजन  , and tourist attractions .
Snow and skiing are a  significant भाग of the क्षेत्रफल 's अर्थव्यवस्था  and reputation .
पहाड़ और झील नजारा हैं आकर्षण  throughout the year .
The Nevada side also  शामिल विशाल कसीनो  .
Highways provide  year-round अभिगम इससे रेनो , कार्सन  City , and Sacramento .

The Twenty-seventh Amendment ( Amendment XXVII )  prohibits कोई विधि कि increases or decreases the सैलरी of सदस्यों of the कॉंग्रेस इससे लेने प्रभाव जबतक  the start of the next set of terms of office for Representatives .
It is  the सबसे हाल amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य  Constitution .
It was submitted  to the राज्य लिये अनुसमर्थन in 1789 और थी  adopted in 1992 .
“First they came ... ” is a famous statement and provocative poem attributed to  पादरी मार्टिन niemöller ( 1892–1984 ) परिचय the सुस्ती of जर्मनी intellectuals following the nazis ' वृद्धि to शक्ति और the subsequent purging of उनके चुनी लक्ष्य , समूह बाद समूह .
There is some disagreement over the exact wording of the  quotation और जब it थी निर्मित ; the सामग्री of the quotation may have महरूम प्रस्तुत differently by niemöller  on different occasions .
This list of islands by area includes  सब आइलैंड्स in the संसार वृहद than 2,500 km2 ( ) और अनेक अन्य आइलैंड्स over 500 km2 ( ) , sorted in  descending order by area .
