Four  तिहाई लोगो
The Four Thirds system is a  मानक निर्मित by ओलम्पस और कोडक लिये डिजिटल single-lens reflex  camera ( DSLR ) design and development. < ref name='DPReview.com 2001-02-13 ' >
The system provides a standard that , with digital cameras and  lenses उपलब्धियाँ इससे अनेक निर्माताओं , allows लिये the इंटरचेंज of lenses  and bodies from different manufacturers .
seems to कवर the मानक  .
Proponents describe  it as an खोलें मानक , लकिन कंपनियाँ may तभी उपयोग it  under a non-disclosure agreement .
Unlike older SLR  प्रणालियों , चार तिहाई रै महरूम designed इससे the मैदान  up to be entirely digital .
अनेक lenses हैं extensively computerized , to the पाइंट कि ओलम्पस offers  firmware updates for many of them .
Lens design has been tailored to the requirements of  डिजिटल सेंसर , सबसे notably through telecentric  designs .
The size of the sensor is  significantly छोटी than लिये सबसे dslrs और इस implies कि  lenses , especially telephoto lenses , can be smaller .
For  उदाहरण , a चार तिहाई लेंस साथ a 300 mm फोकल लंबाई होता कवर परिचय the वही कोण of दृश्य as a 600  mm focal length lens for the 35 mm film standard , and is correspondingly more compact .
Thus , the Four Thirds System has crop factor ( focal length multiplier ) of  परिचय 2 , और जबकि इस enables longer फोकल लंबाई लिये वृहद आवर्धन , it करता n't सहायता the manufacture  of wide angle lenses .
The image sensor format , generally  इंटरमीडिएट between those of larger slrs और छोटी कॉम्पैक्ट कैमरे , generally देता स्तर of लागत  , performance and convenience intermediate between those two classes .
HVAC systems use ventilation air ducts installed  throughout a भवन to सप्लाई conditioned एयर to a रूम through आउटलेट vents , पुकारा diffusers ; और नलिकाएं to हटाएँ एयर through return-air  grilles .
HVAC ( heating , ventilation , and air  कंडीशनिंग ) is the प्रौद्योगिकी of अंदर और ऑटोमोटिव पर्यावरणीय  comfort .
HVAC system design is a subdiscipline of  mechanical अभियान्त्रिकी , आधारित on the सिद्धान्त of ऊष्मागतिकी , द्रव यांत्रिकी  , and heat transfer .
Refrigeration is  sometimes added to the फ़ील्ड 's संक्षिप्त as hvac & r or hvacr , or ventilating is dropped as in hacr ( ऐसे as the नामांकन  of HACR-rated circuit breakers ) .
HVAC is important  in the डिज़ाइन of मीडियम to विशाल औद्योगिक और दफ्तर इमारतें ऐसे as skyscrapers और in समुद्री environments ऐसे as एक्वैरियम , जहाँ सुरक्षित  and healthy building conditions are regulated with respect to temperature and humidity , using fresh air from outdoors .
Ventilation on the downdraught system , by  impulsion , or the 'plenum ' principle , लागू to schoolrooms  ( 1899 )
Heating , ventilating , and  एयर कंडीशनिंग is आधारित on आविष्कारों और discoveries बना by निकोलय lvov , माइकल फैराडे , विलिस वाहक , reuben trane , जेम्स जूल , विलियम rankine  , Sadi Carnot , and many others .
The invention of the components of  hvac प्रणालियों गई hand-in-hand साथ the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति , और नई विधि of modernization , उच्चतर दक्षता , और प्रणाली कंट्रोल हैं constantly introduced  by companies and inventors worldwide .
The three central functions of heating , ventilating , and air-conditioning are interrelated , especially with the need  to provide थर्मल सुकून और स्वीकार्य अंदर एयर विशेषता भीतर उचित संस्थापना  , operation , and maintenance costs .
HVAC systems can provide  वेंटिलेशन , reduce एयर घुसपैठ , और maintain दबाव संबंध between  spaces .
The means of air  डिलीवरी और हटाना इससे स्पेसेस is ज्ञात as  room air distribution .
The starting point in carrying out an estimate both for cooling and  हीटिंग depends on the exterior जलवायु और आंतरिक निर्दिष्ट  conditions .
however पहले लेने up the ऊष्मा लोड गणना , it is जरुरी to ढूँढें भैस एयर आवश्यकताएँ  for each area in detail , as pressurization is an important consideration .
In modern buildings the design , installation  , और कंट्रोल प्रणालियों of ये कृत्यों हैं एकीकृत into एक or अधिक hvac प्रणालियों  .
For very small  इमारतें , ठेकेदारों सामान्यतः क्षमता इंजीनियर और चुनें  HVAC systems and equipment .
For larger buildings , building  सेवाएं designers और इंजीनियर्स , ऐसे as mechanical , architectural , or भवन सेवाएं इंजीनियर्स analyze  , design , and specify the HVAC systems , and specialty mechanical contractors fabricate and commission them .
Building permits and code-compliance inspections  of the संस्थापना हैं सामान्यतः जरूरी  for all sizes of buildings .
The HVAC industry is a worldwide  एंटरप्राइज़ , साथ भूमिकाएँ सहित आपरेशन और मेंटेनेंस , प्रणाली डिज़ाइन और  construction , equipment manufacturing and sales , and in education and research .
The HVAC industry was historically regulated by the manufacturers of HVAC equipment , but regulating and standards  संगठन ऐसे as hardi , ashrae , smacna , एसीसीए , वर्दी mechanical कोड , अंतरराष्ट्रीय mechanical कोड , और amca have महरूम स्थापित to support the उद्योग  and encourage high standards and achievement .
Royal Navy Commander James Bond , CMG , RNVR , is a  fictional अक्षर निर्मित by अंग्रेजों पत्रकार और उपन्यासकार  Ian Fleming in 1953 .
He is the protagonist of  the जेम्स बंध श्रेणी of novels , films , कॉमिक्स  and video games .
Fleming wrote twelve Bond novels and two short story collections before his death ,  हालांकि the पिछला दो books— the man साथ the सुनहरी गन और octopussy और the जीना daylights —were प्रकाशित  posthumously .
The Bond character is a Secret Service agent  , कोड क्रमांक 007 ,  residing in London but active internationally .
Bond was a composite character who was based on a number of commandos whom Fleming knew  दौरान उसके सेवा in the नवल प्रज्ञा प्रभाग दौरान संसार युद्ध ii , to जिसको फ्लेमिंग added उसके अपना स्टाइल और a क्रमांक of उसके  own tastes ; Bond 's name was appropriated from American ornithologist James Bond .
Bond has a number of character traits which run throughout the books , including an  enjoyment of गाड़ियाँ , a प्रेम of खाना और पेय , और an औसत सेवन of साठ custom-made  cigarettes a day .
Since Fleming 's death in 1964 , there have been other  authorised लेखक of बंध सामग्री , सहित जॉन गार्डनर , जो लिखा चौदह novels और दो novelizations और रेमंड बेंसन , जो लिखा छह  novels , three novelizations and three short stories .
There have also been three authors who wrote one  किताब प्रत्येक , किंग्सले एमिस ( लिखने as रॉबर्ट markham ) , सेबेस्टियन faulks  and Jeffery Deaver .
Additionally a series of  novels आधारित on बंध 's youth— यंग बंध —was  written by Charlie Higson .
As spin-offs from the literary works , there was  a टेलीविज़न अनुकूलन of the पहला अनोखा , कसीनो royale , in जिससे बंध थी निभाई as  an American agent .
A comic strip series  भी भागा in the रोज़  Express newspaper .
There have  भी महरूम twenty-five बंध films ; सात अभिनेताओं have निभाई  Bond in these films .
``  प्रकृति लड़के '' is a सोंग by ईडन ahbez ,  published in 1947 .
The song tells a fantasy of a `` strange enchanted boy ... who wandered very far ''  तभी to सीख कि `` the महानतम बात ... थी बस to प्रेम और be loved in  return '' .
Nat King Cole 's 1948 recording of the song was a major hit and `` Nature  लड़के '' रै चूंकि become a पॉप और जैज़ मानक , साथ  dozens of major artists interpreting the song .
Louisiana ( or ; , ; Louisiana Creole : Léta de la  lwizyàn ) is a राज्य स्तिथ in the दक्षिणी प्रदेश of the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका  .
Louisiana  is the 31st सबसे extensive और the  25th most populous of the 50 United States .
Its  पूंजी is baton रूज और largest नगर  is New Orleans .
Louisiana is  the तभी राज्य in the u.S. साथ राजनैतिक subdivisions termed parishes , जिससे हैं लोकल सरकारी 's  equivalent to counties .
The largest parish by population is East Baton  रूज मोहल्ला , और the largest by जमीन क्षेत्रफल is cameron  Parish .
Much of the state 's  lands यहूद formed इससे sediment धोया bas the मिसिसिपी नदी , leaving विशाल  deltas and vast areas of coastal marsh and swamp .
These  contain a समृद्ध दक्षिणी biota ; ठेठ उदाहरण शामिल  birds such as ibis and egrets .
There are also many species of  पेड़ मेंढक , और मछली ऐसे as sturgeon और  paddlefish .
in अधिक elevated क्षेत्रों , आग is a प्राकृतिक प्रक्रम in the लैंडस्केप , और रै उत्पादित  extensive areas of longleaf pine forest and wet savannas .
These support an  exceptional विशाल क्रमांक of संयंत्र प्रजाति , सहित अनेक प्रजाति of orchids और मांसाहारी  plants .
Some Louisiana urban environments have a  multicultural , बहुभाषी विरासत , होने so strongly बहकावे by an जिसमें of 18th-century फ्रेंच , स्पेनी , देशी अमरीकी ( भारतीय  ) and African cultures that they are considered to be somewhat exceptional in the U.S .
Before the  अमरीकी खरीदें of the territory , the वर्तमान louisiana  State had been both a Spanish and French colony .
In addition , the pattern of development included  importing numerous अफ़्रीकी स्लेव in the 18th सदी , साथ अनेक इससे the वही प्रदेश of वेस्ट  Africa , thus concentrating their culture .
In the post-Civil War environment , Anglo-Americans increased the  दबाव लिये anglicization , और in 1915 , अंग्रेज़ी थी बना the तभी आधिकारिक भाषा  of the state .
Women  's अधिकारों हैं the अधिकारों और entitlements claimed लिये महिलाओं और लड़कियों  of many societies worldwide .
In some places  ये अधिकारों हैं institutionalized or समर्थित by विधि , लोकल कस्टम , और आचरण , whereas in  others they may be ignored or suppressed .
They differ from broader notions of human rights through  दावा of an अंतर्निहित ऐतिहासिक और परंपरागत पूर्वाग्रह विरूद्ध the कसरत of अधिकारों by महिलाओं और लड़कियों in  favour of men and boys .
Issues commonly associated with notions of  महिलाओं 's अधिकारों शामिल , हालांकि हैं नहीं सीमित to , the सही : to bodily अखंडता और स्वायत्तता ; to vote ( suffrage ) ; to थाम पब्लिक दफ्तर ; to कार्य ; to मेला मजदूरी or बराबर अदा ; to अपना प्रॉपर्टी ; to शिक्षा ; to serve in the सैन्य or be conscripted  ; to enter into legal contracts ; and to have marital , parental and religious rights .
The laws of  विज्ञान or वैज्ञानिक कानून हैं कथन कि describe , भविष्यवाणी , और शायद बताइये क्यों , a दायरा of  phenomena behave as they appear to in nature .
The term `` law '' has diverse usage in many cases : approximate , accurate  , व्यापक or सीमित theories , in सब प्राकृतिक वैज्ञानिक disciplines ( भौतिकी , रसायन , जीवविज्ञान , भूविज्ञान , खगोलशास्त्र  etc . ) .
An analogous  पद लिये a वैज्ञानिक विधि is a principle  .
वैज्ञानिक विधिs:
summarize a  विशाल संग्रहण of तथ्य संकल्पित by प्रयोग into a सिंगल  statement,
can usually be formulated mathematically as one or  अनेक कथन or समीकरण , or at तनिक stated in a सिंगल वाक्य , so कि it can be प्रयुक्त to भविष्यवाणी the निष्कर्ष of an प्रयोग , दिए the आरंभिक , boundary , और अन्य शारीरिक शर्तें of the प्रक्रियाओं  which take place,
are strongly  समर्थित by अनुभवजन्य प्रमाण - वे हैं वैज्ञानिक ज्ञान  that experiments have repeatedly verified ( and never falsified ) .
Their  सटीकता करता नहीं बदलें जब नई theories हैं worked आउट , लकिन बल्कि the पैमाना of अनुप्रयोग , चूंकि the समीकरण  ( if any ) representing the law does not change .
As with other scientific knowledge , they do not have absolute certainty like mathematical theorems or  पहचान , और it is सदा संभावित लिये a विधि to be विकल by भविष्य observations  .
हैं प्रायः कोटेड as a आधारभूत controlling influence बल्कि  than a description of observed facts .
I.e .  `` the कानून of गति  require that ''
Laws differ from hypotheses and postulates , which are  प्रस्तावित दौरान the वैज्ञानिक प्रक्रम पहले और दौरान validation by प्रयोग और अवलोकन  .
These are not laws  चूंकि वे have नहीं महरूम सत्यापित to the वही उपाधि और may नहीं be fear सामान्य , हालांकि  they may lead to the formulation of laws .
A law is a more  solidified और औपचारिक बयान , आसुत इससे दोहराया प्रयोग  .
Although the concepts of a  विधि or principle in प्रकृति is borderline to दर्शनशास्त्र , और presents the गहराई to जिससे गणित can describe प्रकृति , वैज्ञानिक कानून हैं माना इससे a वैज्ञानिक परिप्रेक्ष्य और follow the  scientific method ; they `` serve their purpose '' rather than `` questioning reality '' ( philosophical ) or `` statements of logical absolution '' ( mathematical ) .
For example ,  whether a विधि `` refers to वास्तविकता '' is a philosophical  issue , rather than scientific .
Fundamentally , all scientific laws follow from physics , laws which occur in other  sciences ultimately follow इससे शारीरिक कानून  .
Often , from  mathematically आधारभूत viewpoints , सार्वभौमिक स्थिरांक emerge  from scientific laws .
The launch of the PlayStation 3 into the Japanese market on  10 नवम्बर 2006 चिह्नित the दूसरी प्रमुख सातवाँ पीढी entertainment प्रणाली to  be released .
The system was  released सात दिनों बाद on 17 नवम्बर  in the United States .
Introduction into other world markets was  विलम्बित by a shortage of diodes लिये उपयोग in the blu-ray डिस्क खिलाड़ी ; the यंत्र थी शुभारम्भ in यूरोपीय और  other world markets in the first half of 2007 .
लॉरेन fenmore baldwin ( formerly विलियम्स और grainger ) is a fictional अक्षर इससे the सीबीएस साबुन operas the यंग और the बेचैन  and The Bold and the Beautiful , portrayed by Tracey E. Bregman .
She made her debut during the  एपीसोड airing on जनवरी 21 , 1983  .
In 1992 , Bregman began making sporadic appearances  on the बिंदास और the खूबसूरत , बाद resulting in the अक्षर migrating वहीँ fully in 1995  .
Following a guest appearance in 2000 ,  bregman लौटे to the यंग और the बेचैन on अगस्त 24 , 2001 , बाकी  on recurring status .
In  2013 , it थी घोषित कि bregman था  been placed on contract .
Much of Lauren 's history has  revolved around उसके romances साथ पॉल विलियम्स , स्कॉट grainger , sr. , और माइकल baldwin  among many others causing a fierce rivalry with Traci Abbott Connolly .
Lauren is also famous  लिये उसके long , हिंसक फंसने साथ शीला  Carter .
The  2010 एनबीए फाइनल थी the नेशनल बास्केट संघ ( एनबीए ) चैंपियनशिप  series for the 2009–10 season .
The best-of-seven playoff was contested between the Los Angeles Lakers ,  champions of the पश्चिमी सम्मेलन और defending एनबीए champions , और the बोस्टन सेल्टिक्स , champions  of the Eastern Conference .
the लेकर्स पराजित the सेल्टिक्स , चार खेल to  three , to win the franchise 's 16th NBA championship .
The 64th edition of the championship series was played  between जून 3 और जून 17 , थी ब्रॉडकास्ट on एबीसी , और थी देखी by an औसत of 18.1 लाख  people .
The Celtics earned their  berth into the playoffs by जीतना  the Atlantic Division .
The  लेकर्स जीती the प्रशांत प्रभाग to  earn their berth .
The Celtics reached the NBA Finals by defeating the Miami Heat in the best-of-seven Eastern Conference First Round , the Cleveland Cavaliers in the  best-of-seven पूर्वी सम्मेलन semifinals , और defending पूर्वी सम्मेलन चैंपियन ऑरलैंडो जादू in the best-of-seven  Eastern Conference Finals .
The Lakers reached the NBA Finals by  defeating the ओक्लाहोमा नगर थंडर in the best-of-seven पश्चिमी सम्मेलन पहला गोलाकार , the यूटा जैज़ in the best-of-seven पश्चिमी सम्मेलन  Semifinals , and the Phoenix Suns in the best-of-seven Western Conference Finals .
The NBA Finals were  अनुसूचित in the प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल संसार श्रेणी 2–3–2 सात खेल स्वरूप , साथ the लेकर्स possessing home-court लाभ  as a reward for finishing with better regular season record than the Celtics .
Repeated baskets  इससे स्टार्टर कोबे ब्रायंट , pau gasol , और रॉन artest brought the लेकर्स बंद to विजय  in Game 1 .
A record breaking performance from  रे एलन 's आठ three-point baskets ensured the सेल्टिक्स  a Game 2 triumph .
Derek Fisher ’s  11 अंक in the चौथी क्वार्टर helped the  Lakers win Game 3 .
The Celtics won Game 4 ; it did n't hurt that they netted an  बेहतरीन प्रदर्शन in baskets by the team’s reserves , जबकि पॉल पियर्स led the टोली to a खेल 5 जीत साथ 27 अंक on 57 % शूटिंग इससे the मंजिल  .
The Lakers  avoided विलोपन by जीतना a निर्णायक खेल 6 साथ 24 अंक contributed  by their bench .
Although they  trailed the सेल्टिक्स by 13 अंक जल्दी in the तीसरा क्वार्टर , the लेकर्स rallied और जीती उनके दूसरी लगातार चैंपियनशिप  by taking over an exciting Game 7 aided by late contributions on offense by Pau Gasol and Artest and rebounding .
Bryant was named Most  मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी of the फाइनल लिये उसके दूसरी  consecutive trophy .
This was the first NBA Finals to go the full seven  खेल चूंकि और तभी the चौथी चूंकि the एनबीए फाइनल लौटे to  a 2–3–2 format in .
The Laker franchise has 16  एनबीए championships ( पाँच in मिनियापोलिस , 11 in लॉस एंजिल्स ) trailing the सेल्टिक्स ' सत्रह championships  .
The NBA Finals used the  `` संसार श्रेणी '' स्वरूप in 1949 मिनियापोलिस लेकर्स पराजित the वॉशिंगटन capitols 4 खेल to 2 ; in 1953 मिनियापोलिस पराजित the नई यॉर्क knicks 4 खेल to 1 ; in 1954 मिनियापोलिस  defeated the Syracuse Nationals 4 games to 3 ; and in 1955 Syracuse Nationals defeated the Fort Wayne Pistons 4 games to 3 .
The NBA would  वापसी to the 2–2–1–1–1 नेशनल हॉकी  League seven game series format until 1985 .
Black pepper ( Piper nigrum ) is a flowering vine in the  परिवार piperaceae , cultivated लिये इसके फल , जिससे is प्रायः सूखी  and used as a spice and seasoning .
the फल , ज्ञात as a peppercorn जब सूखी , is लगभग in व्यास , अंधेरा रेड जब fully  mature , and , like all drupes , contains a single seed .
peppercorns , और the मैदान pepper निकला इससे उन्हें , may be वर्णित बस as pepper , or अधिक precisely as ब्लैक pepper ( पकाया और सूखी unripe  fruit ) , green pepper ( dried unripe fruit ) and white pepper ( dried ripe seeds ) .
Black pepper is native to south  इण्डिया , और is extensively cultivated वहीँ और elsewhere in तीव्र  regions .
Currently Vietnam is the world 's largest producer  और निर्यातक of pepper , producing 34 % of the संसार 's  Piper nigrum crop as of 2008 .
Dried ground pepper has  महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्राचीनता लिये दोनो इसके फ्लेवर और as a  medicine .
Black pepper is the  संसार 's सबसे traded मसाला  .
It is one of  the सबसे आम मसाले added to यूरोपीय भोजन और इसके वंशजों  .
The  spiciness of ब्लैक pepper is due to the रासायनिक piperine , नहीं to be उलझन  with the capsaicin that gives fleshy peppers theirs .
It is in the  आधुनिक संसार , प्रायः युग्म  with salt .
In cardiovascular physiology ,  ejection भिन्न ( ef ) represents the आयतनी भिन्न of रक्त उत्तेजित आउट of the ventricle ( दिल )  with each heart beat or cardiac cycle .
It can be applied  to either the सही ventricle जिससे ejects via the pulmonary वाल्व into the pulmonary परिसंचरण or the बाएँ ventricle  which ejects via the aortic valve into the systemic circulation .
Imaging of the physiology of the mammalian  दिल is the आर्ट कि allows सार्थक गणितीय अभिव्यक्ति  defining EF .
noninvasive हृदय इमेजिंग रै become a विश्वव्यापी यूटिलिटी enabling पढ़ाई of  cardiac performance reproducibly and inexpensively .
Simplified ,  ejection भिन्न is a गणितीय उत्पाद अनुमत  by cardiac imaging .
As a mathematical term , Ejection Fraction is an  एक्सटेंशन of the कार्य of एडाल्फ फिक in हृदय आउटपुट  .
Dedicated technology such as Echocardiography , Computed Tomography , Magnetic Resonance  इमेजिंग और muga स्कैनिंग have definitively अनुमत clinically प्रासंगिक गणित  regarding Ischemia , Congenital Heart Disease and Heart Failure .
The prosecutor is the chief legal representative of  the अभियोजन in देशों साथ either the आम विधि adversarial प्रणाली , or the सिविल विधि  inquisitorial system .
The  अभियोजन is the विधिक पार्टी जिम्मेदार लिये पेश the मामला in a दण्ड  trial against an individual accused of breaking the law .
स्ट्रॉबेरी shortcake सबसे commonly अर्थात् a मिठाई in  the shortcake family of cakes .
Strawberry  shortcake may भी refer  to:
Strawberry Shortcake  , a अक्षर और मताधिकार निर्मित by अमरीकी  Greetings
The  shortened शीर्षक of स्ट्रॉबेरी on the  Shortcake , a Japanese romance movie .
Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim ( ) (  circa| 570 – circa| 8 जून 632 ) , भी transliterated as मुहम्मद ( ) , थी a धार्मिक , राजनैतिक , और सैन्य नेता इससे मक्का जो एकीकृत अरब into a सिंगल  religious polity under Islam .
He is  believed by मुसलमान और bahá'ís to be a मेसेंजर और  prophet of God .
मुहम्मद is लगभग universally माना by मुसलमान as the पिछला नबी  sent by God for mankind .
non-muslims लिहाज़ मुहम्मद as the  founder of Islam .
Muslims consider him to be the restorer of an unaltered  असली monotheistic आस्था of आदम , नूह , अब्राहम , मूसा , यीशु ,  and other prophets .
Born in about 570 CE in the Arabian city of  मक्का , he थी अनाथ at an जल्दी आयु और brought up अंतर्गत the परवाह of उसके ताऊ  Abu Talib .
He later worked mostly as a merchant  , as खूब as a गड़रिये , और थी पहला  married by age 25 .
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a cave in the  surrounding kyu लिये अनेक नाइट्स of seclusion और दुआ , he बाद reported कि it थी वहीँ , at आयु 40 , कि he प्राप्त उसके पहला रहस्योद्घाटन इससे  God .
तीन सालो बाद इस इवेंट मुहम्मद प्रारंभ उपदेश ये खुलासे सरेआम , proclaiming  that `` God is One `` , that complete `` surrender '' to Him ( lit .
islām  ) is the तभी रास्ता ( dīn ) स्वीकार्य to परमेश्वर , और कि he खुद थी a नबी और मेसेंजर  of God , in the same vein as other Islamic prophets .
Muhammad  gained few अनुसरणकर्ता जल्दी on , और थी मिले साथ दुश्मनी इससे कुछ meccan जनजातियों  ; he and his followers were treated harshly .
To  एस्केप persecution , मुहम्मद भेजा कुछ of उसके अनुसरणकर्ता to अबीसीनिया पहले he और उसके अनुसरणकर्ता in  Mecca migrated to Medina ( then known as Yathrib ) in the year 622 .
इस इवेंट , the हिज्र , marks the शुरूआत  of the Islamic calendar , which is also known as the Hijri Calendar .
In Medina ,  मुहम्मद संयुक्त the जनजातियों  under the Constitution of Medina .
After eight years of fighting with the Meccan tribes , his followers , who  by तब था grown to 10,000 , took कंट्रोल of मक्का in the largely शांतिपूर्ण conquest  of Mecca .
He destroyed the pagan  मूर्तियों in the नगर और तब भेजा उसके अनुसरणकर्ता आउट to नष्ट सब of the बाकी  pagan temples in Eastern Arabia .
In 632 , a few months after  returning to मदीना इससे the विदाई यात्राएं , मुहम्मद  fell ill and died .
By the time of his death , most of the Arabian Peninsula had converted to Islam ,  और he था संयुक्त अरब into a सिंगल मुस्लिम धार्मिक polity  .
The  खुलासे ( or ayah  , lit .
`` Signs [ of  परमेश्वर ] '' ) — जिससे मुहम्मद reported receiving जबतक उसके मौत – रूप the आयतें of the  Quran , regarded by Muslims as the `` Word of God '' and around which the religion is based .
Besides the Quran , Muhammad 's life ( sira ) and traditions  ( सुन्नत ) हैं भी upheld by मुसलमान as the स्त्रोत  of sharia law .
They discuss Muhammad and other prophets of  islam साथ reverence , adding the phrase सलाम be upon उसे whenever उनके names हैं उल्लेखित  .
While conceptions of Muhammad in medieval Christendom and premodern times were  largely ऋणात्मक , appraisals in आधुनिक इतिहास have महरूम दूर  less so .
The Great Books  ( दूसरी संस्करण  )
Great Books of the Western World is a series  of किताबे originally प्रकाशित in the संयुक्त राज्य in 1952 by ब्रिटैनिका विश्वकोष inc. to उपस्थित  the Great Books in a single package of 54 volumes .
The  श्रेणी is अभी in इसके दूसरी संस्करण और contains  60 volumes .
The original editors of the series chose three criteria for inclusion : a book must be relevant to contemporary issues , and not only  महत्वपूर्ण in इसके ऐतिहासिक कॉन्टेक्स्ट ; it जरूर बदला rereading ; और it जरूर be a भाग of `` the ग्रेट वार्तालाप परिचय the ग्रेट विचार , '' प्रासंगिक to at तनिक 25  of the 102 great ideas identified by the editors .
Books  यहूद नहीं चुनी on the आधार of जातीय or सांस्कृतिक inclusiveness , ऐतिहासिक influence , or the सम्पादक  ' agreement with the views expressed .
`` Cocaine '' is a  सोंग लिखा और अंकित by jj cale in 1976 , लकिन भी ज्ञात as a कवर संस्करण  recorded by Eric Clapton .
Allmusic  काल्स the latter `` among [ क्लैप्टन 's ] सबसे enduringly लोकप्रिय  hits '' and notes that `` even for an artist like Clapton with a huge body of high-quality work , 'Cocaine ' ranks among his best . ''
Glyn Johns  , जो था previously worked साथ the जो , led zeppelin और the  Rolling Stones , produced the Clapton recording , which was released on Clapton 's 1977 album Slowhand and as a single in 1980 .
The live version of `` Cocaine '' , from the Just One Night album  अंकित in टोकियो , charted on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 as the b-side of `` तुलसा  Time `` , which was a No . 30 hit in 1980. ``
Cocaine '' was one of several of  cale 's गीतों अंकित by क्लैप्टन , सहित `` बाद मध्यरात्रि  `` and `` Travelin ' Light '' .
The attack on Pearl Harbor ( called Hawaii Operation or  आपरेशन ai by the जापानी इम्पीरियल सामान्य मुख्यालय ( आपरेशन z in नियोजन ) और the बैटल of पर्ल हार्बर ) थी a आश्चर्य सैन्य स्ट्राइक conducted by the इम्पीरियल जापानी  Navy against the United States naval base at Pearl Harbor , Hawaii , on the morning of December 7 , 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ) .
From  the standpoint of the defenders , the आक्रमण commenced  at 7:48 a.m. Hawaiian Time .
The attack was intended as a preventive  कार्रवाई in अनुक्रम to रखना the u.S. प्रशांत बेड़े इससे दखल साथ सैन्य क्रियाएँ the साम्राज्य of जापानी थी नियोजन in southeast एशिया विरूद्ध  overseas territories of the United Kingdom , the Netherlands , and the United States .
The base was attacked by 353  जापानी सेनानी , बमवर्षक और torpedo planes in दो लहरें , शुभारम्भ इससे छह वायुयान  carriers .
All  आठ u.S. नेवी battleships यहूद  damaged , with four being sunk .
Two of these were  बाद उठाया , और साथ the बाकी चार repaired , छह battleships लौटे  to service later in the war .
The Japanese also sank or damaged three  cruisers , तीन destroyers , an anti-aircraft प्रशिक्षण  ship , and one minelayer .
188 U.S.  वायुयान यहूद नष्ट ; 2,402 अमेरिकी  were killed and 1,282 wounded .
Important base  संस्थापना ऐसे as the शक्ति स्टेशन , डॉकयार्ड , मेंटेनेंस , और ईंधन और torpedo भंडार सुविधाएं , as खूब as the पनडुब्बी पियर  and headquarters building ( also home of the intelligence section ) were not attacked .
Japanese losses were  लाइट : 29 वायुयान और पाँच midget submarines  lost , and 65 servicemen killed or wounded .
One Japanese sailor  थी captured .
The attack came as a profound shock to the American  लोगों और led सीधे to the अमरीकी प्रविष्टि into संसार युद्ध ii in दोनो the प्रशांत और यूरोपीय  theaters .
The following day (  दिसम्बर 8 ) , the संयुक्त राज्य घोषित  war on Japan .
Domestic  support लिये non-interventionism , जिससे  had been strong , disappeared .
Clandestine support of Britain (  लिये उदाहरण the neutrality पैट्रोल ) थी  replaced by active alliance .
Subsequent  परिचालन by the u.S. prompted जर्मनी और इटली to घोषित  war on the U.S. on December 11 , which was reciprocated by the U.S. the same day .
There were numerous historical precedents for  unannounced सैन्य कार्रवाई by  Japan .
However , the lack  of कोई औपचारिक चेतावनी , विशेषकर जबकि negotiations यहूद स्टिल जाहिर जारी , led अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन  D. Roosevelt to proclaim December 7 , 1941 , `` a date which will live in infamy `` .
प्रोजेक्ट रनवे ऋतु 2 थी the दूसरी ऋतु of ब्रावो 's कामयाब  Project Runway , a reality competition for fashion designers .
Season 2 began  airing on दिसम्बर 7  , 2005 .
Following a nationwide search  पहले in the साल , सोलह designers यहूद चुनी as semi-finalists और brought to नई यॉर्क नगर in जून  , 2005 .
After the first challenge , called ``  सड़क to the रनवे '' , चौदह गई on to compete  as finalists .
The winning  पंक्तियां , क्लो dao , प्राप्त $ 100,000 in बीज धन to सहायता लॉन्च उसके अपना लकीर  , a 2007 Saturn Sky roadster , a spread in ELLE magazine , and a mentorship with the Banana Republic Design Team .
Winning  alongside dao थी उसके मॉडल , अनुग्रह kelsey , जो प्राप्त the elle  Magazine spread .
Michael Kors and  नीना गार्सिया लौटे as न्यायाधीशों  for the second season .
The  चौथी judging सीट घुमाया प्रत्येक सप्ताह , आधारित on  the challenge .
टिम gunn , फ़ैशन कुर्सी at पार्सन्स the नई स्कूल लिये डिज़ाइन , लौटे  as a mentor for the designers .
कारा janx बाद appeared in प्रोजेक्ट रनवे : सब सितारों  in 2012 , where she finished 7th out of 13 .
andrae gonzalo , in the वही साल , competed in the दूसरी ऋतु  of the All Stars edition placing 10th out of 13 .
an उदाहरण of a  Heraclius mule
In numismatics , a  खच्चर is a सिक्का or पदक minted साथ obverse और रिवर्स डिजाइन नहीं सामान्यतः  seen on the same piece .
These  can be जानबूझकर or उत्पादित by गलती  .
इस प्रकार of गलती is अत्यधिक sought बाद , और उदाहरण  can fetch steep prices from collectors .
The  earliest mules हैं मिला among प्राचीन यूनानी और  Roman coins .
Opinion is divided between those who think that they are accidental , the  परिणाम of an गलत संयोजन of a नई die साथ एक कि था officially महरूम withdrawn इससे उपयोग , or the कार्य of  coiners working with dies stolen from an official mint , perhaps at a time when one of them should have been destroyed .
The name derives from the mule , the  संकर औलाद of a घोड़ा और a गधा , due to ऐसे a सिक्का having दो पहलू intended लिये अलग सिक्के  , much as a mule has parents of two different species .
This page  दस्तावेज़ the tornadoes और बवंडर  outbreaks of 2010 .
The majority of tornadoes form in the U.S.  , लकिन वे can occur लगभग anywhere अंतर्गत  the right conditions .
A lesser number occur  बाहर the u.S. , सबसे notably in भाग of neighboring दक्षिणी कनाडा दौरान the उत्तरी गोलार्ध 's गर्मियाँ  season , but are also known in South America , Europe , Asia , and Australia .
There were 1,531 tornadoes reported in the United  राज्य in 2010 ( of जिससे at तनिक 1,266 यहूद पुष्टि ) , साथ  45 confirmed fatalities .
Elsewhere in  the संसार , 11 लोगों यहूद मारे in tornadoes , छह in अर्जेंटीना  , three in the Bahamas , one in Bangladesh , and one in Germany .
The year was near average for tornadoes despite an extremely quiet early spring  काल , however ऐसे बदला बाद a विशाल upswing starting in लेट अप्रैल और a व्यस्त लेट वसन्त और  summer period .
The autumn  महीने यहूद थोड़ा ऊपर औसत  .
A  lymphocyte is a प्रकार of श्वेत रक्त कोशिका in the  vertebrate immune system .
Under the microscope , lymphocytes can be  विभाजित into विशाल lymphocytes और छोटी lymphocytes  .
Large granular  lymphocytes शामिल प्राकृतिक  killer cells ( NK cells ) .
Small lymphocytes consist of  t कोशिकाएं और b कोशिकाएं .
Windows PowerShell is Microsoft 's task automation  फ्रेमवर्क , consisting of a command-line शेल और संबद्ध एनक्रिप्शन भाषा निर्मित on  .NET Framework .
PowerShell provides full access to COM  और wmi , enabling प्रशासकों to perform प्रशासनिक कार्य on दोनो लोकल  and remote Windows systems .
In PowerShell , administrative tasks are  generally performed by cmdlets ( सुनाया command-lets ) , जिससे हैं specialized .neT वर्ग implementing  a particular operation .
Sets of cmdlets may be combined together in scripts , executables ( which  हैं स्टैंडअलोन अनुप्रयोग ) , or by instantiating नियमित .neT वर्ग ( or wmi/com वस्तुएँ )  .
These work by  accessing आंकड़ा in अलग आंकड़ा स्टोर्स , जैसे the filesystem or रजिस्ट्री , जिससे हैं बना उपलब्धियाँ to  the PowerShell runtime via Windows PowerShell providers .
Windows PowerShell also provides a hosting API with  जिससे the खिड़कियाँ powershell runtime can be अंतःस्थापित अंदर अन्य अनुप्रयोग  .
These applications can then use Windows PowerShell  कार्यक्षमता to implement निश्चित परिचालन , सहित those उजागर via  the graphical interface .
This capability has been used by Microsoft Exchange Server 2007 to expose its management functionality as  powershell cmdlets और प्रदाताओं और implement the आलेखीय प्रबन्धन टूल्स as powershell होस्ट जिससे invoke the  necessary cmdlets .
Other Microsoft applications  सहित microsoft एसक्यूएल सर्वर 2008 भी expose उनके प्रबन्धन इंटरफ़ेस via  PowerShell cmdlets .
With  powershell , आलेखीय interface-based प्रबन्धन अनुप्रयोग on खिड़कियाँ हैं  layered on top of Windows PowerShell .
A PowerShell  एनक्रिप्शन इंटरफ़ेस लिये खिड़कियाँ उत्पाद is mandated by  the Common Engineering Criteria .
Windows PowerShell includes its own  extensive , console-based सहायता , समान to man पृष्ठों in यूनिक्स शेल , via the get-help  cmdlet .
Mary Poppins is a 1964 musical  फिल्मी अभिनीत जूली एंड्रयूज , लंड वैन dyke , दाउद tomlinson , और glynis जॉन्स , उत्पादित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी , और आधारित on the मरियम poppins  books series by P. L. Travers .
the फिल्मी थी निर्देशित by रॉबर्ट stevenson और लिखा by विधेयक वाल्श और डॉन dagradi  , with songs by the Sherman Brothers .
It was shot at Walt  डिज़्नी studios in burbank , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
Julie Andrews won the Academy Award for Best Actress for her performance as Mary Poppins and the film also  जीती ऑस्कर लिये बेहतरीन फिल्मी संपादन , असली म्यूज़िक स्कोर , बेहतरीन सोंग लिये `` chim chim cher-ee '' और बेहतरीन विज़ुअल  Effects , and received a total of 13 nominations .
a स्टोरी चाप is an विस्तारित or continuing कथानक in episodic storytelling मीडिया ऐसे as टेलीविज़न , कॉमिक किताबे , कॉमिक स्ट्रिप्स  , boardgames , video games , and in some cases , films .
On a television program , for  उदाहरण , the स्टोरी होता unfold over अनेक एपीसोड  .
In television , the use of the story  चाप is much अधिक आम in dramas than in comedies , विशेषकर  in soap operas .
Webcomics are more likely to use story arcs than newspaper comics , as most web  कॉमिक्स have पठनीय अभिलेख ऑनलाइन कि a newcomer to the स्ट्रिप can पढ़ा in अनुक्रम to समझे कया is going on  .
हालांकि स्टोरी arcs have existed लिये दशकों , the पद `` स्टोरी चाप '' थी coined  in 1988 in relation to the television series Wiseguy , and was quickly adapted for other uses .
Many American comic book series are now written in  चार or six-issue arcs , भीतर a continuing श्रेणी  .
Short story arcs are  easier to पैकेज as व्यापार paperbacks लिये पुनर्विक्रय , और अधिक accessible to the कैज़ुअल रीडर than the never-ending  continuity that once characterised comics .
Black Friday is  the दिन following थैंक्सगिविंग दिन in the संयुक्त राज्य , प्रायः regarded as the  beginning of the Christmas shopping season .
In recent years , most major retailers have opened extremely  जल्दी और offered promotional बिक्री to लात बंद the अवकाश खरीदारी ऋतु , समान to मुक्केबाज़ी दिन बिक्री in अनेक राष्ट्रमंडल राष्ट्र .
Black Friday  is नहीं an आधिकारिक पब्लिक अवकाश as ऐसे , लकिन अनेक non-retail कर्मचारी और स्कूलों have दोनो थैंक्सगिविंग और  the day after off , followed by a weekend , thereby increasing the number of potential shoppers .
It has routinely been the busiest shopping day of the year since 2005 , although news reports ,  जिससे at कि समय यहूद inaccurate , have वर्णित it as the व्यस्ततम खरीदारी दिन of the साल लिये a much longer  period of time .
the दिन 's नाम originated in फिलाडेल्फिया , जहाँ it originally थी प्रयुक्त to describe the भारी और  disruptive pedestrian and vehicle traffic which would occur on the day after Thanksgiving .
Use of the term started before 1961 and  began to देखिए broader उपयोग बाहर फिलाडेल्फिया around  1975 .
Later an alternative  स्पष्टीकरण began to be offered : कि `` ब्लैक शुक्रवार '' indicates  the point at which retailers begin to turn a profit , or are `` '' .
For many years , it  थी आम लिये रिटेलर to खोलें at 6:00 a.m. , लकिन in the लेट 2000s अनेक था  crept to 5:00 or even 4:00 .
This was taken to a new extreme in 2011 , when several retailers ( including  निशाना , kohl 's , macy 's , बेहतरीन ख़रीदे , और bealls ) खोली at मध्यरात्रि लिये  the first time .
In 2012 , Walmart and several other retailers announced that they would open most of their stores at 8:00 p.m. on Thanksgiving Day ( except in states where  खोलने on थैंक्सगिविंग is निषिद्ध due to ब्लू कानून , ऐसे as मैसाचुसेट्स जहाँ वे स्टिल खोली around मध्यरात्रि ) ,  prompting calls for a walkout among some workers .
Black Friday shopping is known for attracting aggressive crowds , with annual  रिपोर्ट्स of assaults , shootings , और throngs of लोगों trampling on अन्य shoppers in an attempt  to get the best deal on a product before supplies run out .
The Family That Preys is a 2008 American movie  नाटक लिखा , उत्पादित , और निर्देशित by टायलर पेरी .
The screenplay  focuses on दो परिवारों , एक धनवान और the अन्य working क्लास ,  whose lives are intertwined in both love and business .
The movie is the second of four  in जिससे पेरी 's हस्ताक्षर अक्षर , madea , करता नहीं  make an appearance .
it is भी the दूसरी perry-directed फिल्मी ( alongside पापा 's छोटी लड़कियों ) कि is  not based on any of the filmmaker 's stage plays .
Net 10 , Net 15 ,  जाल 30 और जाल 60 ( भी जाल 10 दिनों , et al ) हैं फ़ॉर्म of व्यापार क्रेडिट जिससे बताएँ कि the जाल राशि ( the कुल बकाया on the चालान ) is अपेक्षित to be सशुल्क in पूरा  and received by the seller within 10 , 15 , 30 or 60 days after the goods are dispatched or service is completed .
Net 30 or Net 60 terms are  प्रायः coupled साथ a क्रेडिट लिये जल्दी भुगतान  .
The word net  in इस भाव अर्थात् `` कुल बाद सब छूट  . ''
It originally derives from the  लैटिन nitere ( to चमक ) और nitidus ( सुरुचिपूर्ण , trim ) , और अधिक recently इससे the फ्रेंच  net ( sharp , neat , clean ) .
roadtown , tortola
The British West Indies were  the आइलैंड्स in और around the caribbean कि यहूद भाग of the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य  .
In 1912 , the British West Indies were divided into eight colonies : The Bahamas , Barbados ,  अंग्रेजों guiana , अंग्रेजों होंडुरास , जमैका ( साथ इसके dependencies the turks और caicos आइलैंड्स और the केमन आइलैंड्स ) , त्रिनिदाद और टोबैगो , the windward आइलैंड्स और the leeward  Islands .
Between 1958 and 1962 , all of the island territories except the British Virgin Islands , the  बहामा , अंग्रेजों होंडुरास और अंग्रेजों guiana यहूद संगठित into the वेस्ट इंडीज  Federation .
It was hoped that the Federation would become  स्वतंत्र as a सिंगल स्वदेश , लकिन it था सीमित शक्तियां , अनेक व्यावहारिक समस्याएं , और a कमी of लोकप्रिय  support .
नतीजतन , the वेस्ट इंडीज संघ  was dissolved .
Most of the territories , including all the larger ones , are now independent as separate countries , with membership to many international forums  ऐसे as the संगठन of अमरीकी राज्य , the संघ of caribbean राज्य , the संसार व्यापार संगठन , the संयुक्त राष्ट्र , the caribbean जातियाँ , the राष्ट्रमंडल  of Nations and the Caribbean Development Bank among others .
The  शेष हैं अंग्रेजों  overseas territories .
All the former nations of the  अंग्रेजों वेस्ट इंडीज , मगर the राष्ट्रमंडल of डोमिनिकन , गुयाना और त्रिनिदाद और  Tobago , are Commonwealth Realms .
The term is still used for British  विदेशी territories in the caribbean , ऐसे as the केमन आइलैंड्स  .
the बाकी अंग्रेजों  West Indies
`` What a Wonderful World '' is  a सोंग लिखा by bob thiele ( as `` जार्ज डगलस '' )  and George David Weiss .
It was first recorded  by लुई आर्मस्ट्रांग और released as a सिंगल in  1967 .
Thiele and Weiss were both  prominent in the म्यूज़िक संसार ( thiele as a निर्माता और वेइस as a composer/performer  ) .
Armstrong 's recording was inducted in  the ग्रैमी हॉल of कीर्ति in 1999  .
the प्रकाशन लिये इस सोंग is नियंत्रित by मेमोरी लेन म्यूज़िक  Group , Carlin Music Corp. , and Bug Music , Inc .
उद्घाटन दिन 2009 on the वेस्ट कदम of the  U.S. Capitol .
President George W. Bush and First  महिला लौरा बुश सीसे the inaugural परेड bas पेन्सिलवेनिया एवेन्यू to the  White House , 2005
The inauguration of the president  of the संयुक्त राज्य is a ceremonial इवेंट अंकन the शुरुआत of a नई four-year पद  of a president of the United States .
The  दिन a अध्यक्षीय उद्घाटन occurs is ज्ञात as `` उद्घाटन दिन '' और occurs  on January 20 ( or 21st if the 20th is a Sunday ) .
( Prior to the Twentieth Amendment , the date was March 4 , the day of the year on which the  संविधान of the संयुक्त राज्य पहला took प्रभाव in 1789 ; the पिछला उद्घाटन to लो प्लेस on the पुरानी तिथि थी फ्रैंकलिन  D. Roosevelt 's first one on March 4 , 1933 . )
The  सबसे हाल पब्लिक अध्यक्षीय उद्घाटन रस्म , the swearing in of अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा to शुरू उसके दूसरी four-year  term in office , took place on Monday , January 21 , 2013 .
The only inauguration element mandated by the  संयुक्त राज्य संविधान is कि the अध्यक्ष मेक an शपथ or प्रतिज्ञान पहले कि व्यक्ति can `` डालें on the निष्पादन ''  of the office of the presidency .
However , over the years , various traditions have arisen that have expanded the  उद्घाटन इससे a सरल oath-taking रस्म to a day-long इवेंट , सहित parades , भाषणों , और गेंदें  .
From the  प्रेसिडेंसी of एंड्रयू जैक्सन through कि of jimmy कार्टर , the  primary Inauguration Day ceremony took place on the Capitol 's East Portico .
Since the 1981  उद्घाटन of रोनाल्ड reagan , the रस्म रै महरूम आयोजित at the कैपिटल  's West Front .
the inaugurations of विलियम हावर्ड taft in  1909 and Reagan in 1985 were moved indoors at the Capitol due to cold weather .
the युद्ध of 1812 और संसार युद्ध ii caused दो inaugurations to be आयोजित  at other locations in Washington , D.C .
When George Washington was inaugurated , the oath  थी administered by रॉबर्ट livingston , चांसलर of नई यॉर्क राज्य , in 1789 , और by विलियम cushing , संबद्ध इंसाफ of the  Supreme Court , in 1793 .
Since Chief Justice Oliver  एल्सवर्थ swore in अध्यक्ष जॉन एडम्स , no मुख्य इंसाफ रै  missed an Inauguration Day .
जब उद्घाटन दिन रै गिरे on a संडे , the मुख्य इंसाफ रै administered the शपथ to the  president on the Sunday privately and then again the next day publicly .
जब a नई अध्यक्ष takes over mid-term due to the मौत or इस्तीफा of a अध्यक्ष  , the oath of office is administered but formal , public inauguration events have not been held .
stefani जोआन एंजेलीना germanotta ( ; born कूच 28 , 1986 ) , ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम महिला गागा , is an अमरीकी सिंगर , songwriter , रिकार्ड निर्माता ,  dancer , activist , businesswoman , fashion designer , actress and philanthropist .
Born and raised in New York City , she primarily studied at the Convent of  the पवित्र दिल और briefly attended नई यॉर्क विश्वविद्यालयों 's tisch स्कूल of the कला पहले withdrawing to फ़ोकस on उसके musical  career .
She soon  began performing in the चट्टान म्यूज़िक झाँकी of मैनहटन  's Lower East Side .
By  the समाप्त of 2007 , रिकार्ड कार्यपालिका और निर्माता विंसेंट  Herbert signed her to his label Streamline Records , an imprint of Interscope Records .
initially working as a songwriter at interscope रिकॉर्ड , उसके गायन abilities captured the ध्यान of रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार एकॉन , जो भी हस्ताक्षरित  her to Kon Live Distribution , his own label under Interscope .
Lady Gaga came to prominence as a recording artist following the release of her debut album , The Fame ( 2008 ) , which was a critical and commercial success that topped charts  around the संसार और शामिल the अंतरराष्ट्रीय number-one singles `` बस नृत्य `` और `` पोकर  Face `` .
After embarking on the The  कीर्ति बॉल दौरे , वो followed the एल्बम साथ the कीर्ति दानव ( 2009 ) , जिससे शाखित the विश्वव्यापी hit singles  `` Bad Romance `` , `` Telephone `` , and `` Alejandro `` .
The Fame Monsters success allowed her to embark on  the eighteen-month long दानव बॉल दौरे , जिससे बाद became एक of the highest-grossing  concert tours of all time .
Her most recent album , Born This Way ( 2011 ) ,  अव्वल the चार्ट of सबसे प्रमुख बाज़ार और उत्पन्न अधिक अंतरराष्ट्रीय chart-topping singles , सहित `` born इस रास्ता `` , ``  Judas `` , and `` The Edge of Glory `` .
Influenced by Britney Spears , David Bowie , Michael Jackson , Madonna , and Queen , Lady Gaga is recognized for her flamboyant  , विविध और outré योगदान to the म्यूज़िक उद्योग through उसके फ़ैशन , प्रदर्शन और म्यूज़िक वीडियो  .
As of October 2011 , she has sold an estimated 23  लाख एल्बम और 64 लाख singles विश्वव्यापी और उसके singles हैं कुछ of the best-selling विश्वव्यापी  .
Her  उपलब्धियाँ शामिल पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार और  13 MTV Video Music Awards .
Lady Gaga has consecutively appeared on Billboard magazine 's Artists of the Year ( scoring the definitive title in 2010 ) , ranked fourth in VH1 's list of 100 Greatest Women in Music , is the sixth best selling digital  singles कलाकार in us according to riaa , is regularly लगाई on सूचियाँ रचित by फोर्ब्स पत्रिका और थी नामित एक of the सबसे influential लोगों in the संसार by  Time magazine .
Besides her musical career ,  वो involves herself साथ humanitarian कल्याणकारी  and LGBT activism .
mckethan स्टेडियम घर  of Gator baseball
A  चित्र of the 1924 बेसबॉल  team
The Florida  gators बेसबॉल टोली represents the विश्वविद्यालयों of फ्लोरिडा  in the sport of baseball .
The Florida Gators compete in Division I of the National Collegiate  एथलेटिक्स संघ ( ncaa ) , और the पूर्वी प्रभाग of the  Southeastern Conference ( SEC ) .
They play their home games in Alfred A.  mckethan स्टेडियम on the विश्वविद्यालयों 's gainesville  , Florida campus , and are currently led by head coach Kevin O'Sullivan .
In the ninety-eight season history of the Gators baseball program , the  टोली रै जीती बारह सेक championships और रै appeared in आठ कॉलेज संसार  Series tournaments .
``  electioneering ''  redirects here .
लिये the radiohead  song , see OK Computer .
Presidential campaign  बटन लिये अब्राहम lincoln , 1860  .
the रिवर्स पक्ष of the बटन shows a पोर्ट्रेट of उसके  running mate Hannibal Hamlin .
A political campaign is  an व्यवस्थित प्रयत्न जिससे seeks to influence the निर्णय बनाना प्रक्रम  within a specific group .
In  democracies , राजनैतिक अभियान प्रायः refer to चुनावी अभियान , wherein प्रतिनिधि  are chosen or referendums are decided .
In modern politics , the most high profile political  अभियान हैं केन्द्रित on उम्मीदवार लिये सिर of राज्य or सिर of सरकारी , प्रायः a अध्यक्ष or प्रधान मंत्री  .
एलिज़ाबेथ cady stanton और उसके  daughter , Harriot
Elizabeth Cady Stanton ( November 12 , 1815 – October 26  , 1902 ) थी an अमरीकी सोशल activist , abolitionist , और अग्रणी फिगर of the जल्दी  women 's rights movement .
Her Declaration of Sentiments , presented at the first women 's rights convention held in  1848 in seneca जलप्रपात , नई यॉर्क , is प्रायः credited साथ initiating the पहला व्यवस्थित महिलाओं 's अधिकारों और  women 's suffrage movements in the United States .
Before Stanton  narrowed उसके राजनैतिक फ़ोकस लगभग exclusively to महिलाओं 's अधिकारों , वो थी an क्रियाशील abolitionist साथ  with her husband , Henry Brewster Stanton and cousin , Gerrit Smith .
Unlike many of  those शामिल in the महिलाओं 's अधिकारों गति , stanton addressed विभिन्न मुद्दे pertaining  to women beyond voting rights .
Her concerns included women 's parental and custody rights ,  प्रॉपर्टी अधिकारों , नियुक्ति और आय अधिकारों , तलाक , the आर्थिक स्वास्थ्य of the परिवार ,  and birth control .
She was also an outspoken supporter of the  19th-century temperance गति  .
After the American Civil War , Stanton 's  प्रतिबद्धता to मादा suffrage caused a schism in the महिलाओं 's अधिकारों गति जब वो , साथ साथ सुसान B. एंथोनी , अस्वीकृत  to support passage of the Fourteenth and Fifteenth Amendments to the United States Constitution .
She opposed giving added legal protection and voting rights to  अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी मेन जबकि महिलाओं , ब्लैक और श्वेत , यहूद अस्वीकृत  those same rights .
Her position on this issue , together with her thoughts on organized  christianity और महिलाओं 's मुद्दे परे मतदान अधिकारों , led to the गठन of दो पृथक महिलाओं 's अधिकारों संगठन कि यहूद आखिरकार rejoined , साथ stanton as अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त संगठन , लगभग  twenty years after her break from the original women 's suffrage movement .
Stanton died in  1902 having authored दोनो the स्त्री 's बाइबल और उसके आत्मकथा , साथ  with many articles and pamphlets concerning female suffrage and women 's rights .
My Fair Lady is a  musical आधारित upon जार्ज बर्नार्ड शॉ 's pygmalion और साथ किताब और  lyrics by Alan Jay Lerner and music by Frederick Loewe .
The story concerns Eliza Doolittle , a Cockney flower girl  जो takes वाक lessons इससे प्राध्यापक हेनरी हिगिंस , a phoneticist , so कि वो may  pass as a well-born lady .
The musical 's 1956 Broadway production was a hit , setting what was then the record  लिये the longest चलाएं of कोई प्रमुख musical थिएटर उत्पादन in इतिहास  .
It was followed by a  hit लंदन उत्पादन , a लोकप्रिय फिल्मी संस्करण  , and numerous revivals .
It has been  पुकारा `` the पूर्ण musical  '' .

It is therefore opposite of  विनियमन , जिससे refers to the प्रक्रम of the सरकारी regulating निश्चित  activities .

For the poem by Sara Teasdale ,  देखिए वहीँ होगा आइये नरम  Rains .
`` There Will Come Soft Rains '' is a  छोटी स्टोरी by विज्ञान fiction लेखक रे bradbury जिससे थी  first published in the May 6 , 1950 issue of Collier 's .
Later that same year  the स्टोरी थी शामिल in bradbury 's the martian  Chronicles ( 1950 ) .
With  over 1.2 अरब लोगों , हान चाइनीज is the largest जातीय  group in the world .

वे क्रमांक around  50 million .
The Korowai people  of पापुआ गिने बस around 3,000  people , and were uncontacted until the 1970s .
Ethnicity or ethnic group is  a socially पारिभाषित श्रेणी आधारित on आम संस्कृति or  nationality .
Ethnicity can , but does not have to , include common  ancestry , रूप , भोजन , ड्रेसिंग स्टाइल , विरासत , इतिहास , भाषा or dialect , धर्म  , symbols , traditions , or other cultural factor .
Ethnic identity is constantly reinforced  through आम विशेषताएँ जिससे नियत the समूह अलावा  from other groups .
The  19.9 mw gemasolar सौर संयंत्र in स्पेन सुविधाएँ 15 घंटों of भंडार  and can supply power 24 hours a day .
Solar energy , radiant light and heat from the  सूर्य , रै महरूम harnessed by इंसानो चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स using  a range of ever-evolving technologies .
Solar energy technologies include solar heating , solar photovoltaics , solar thermal electricity ,  सौर वास्तुकला और कृत्रिम photosynthesis , जिससे can मेक considerable योगदान to solving कुछ of the सबसे तात्कालिक उर्जा समस्याएं the संसार  now faces .
Solar  technologies हैं broadly characterized as either passive सौर or क्रियाशील सौर depending on the रास्ता वे कैप्चर  , convert and distribute solar energy .
Active solar techniques include the use of photovoltaic panels  और सौर थर्मल collectors to दोहन the  energy .
Passive solar techniques include  orienting a भवन to the सूर्य , selecting सामग्री साथ अनुकूल थर्मल द्रव्यमान or लाइट dispersing गुण , और डिजाइनिंग  spaces that naturally circulate air .
In 2011 , the International Energy Agency said that `` the development of affordable , inexhaustible  और साफ सौर उर्जा technologies होगा have विशाल longer-term लाभ  .
It will increase countries’ energy security through reliance on an indigenous , inexhaustible and mostly import-independent resource , enhance  स्थिरता , reduce प्रदूषण , निम्नतर the लागत of mitigating जलवायु बदलें , और रखना चट्टान ईंधन  prices lower than otherwise .
These  लाभ हैं वैश्विक  .
Hence the additional costs of the incentives for  जल्दी deployment चाहिए be माना सीखना निवेश ; वे जरूर be  wisely spent and need to be widely shared '' .
The classical Latin alphabet or Roman alphabet evolved from a  पश्चिमी किस्में of the यूनानी वर्णमाला पुकारा the cumaean वर्णमाला , जिससे थी अपनाया और परिवर्धित by the etruscans  who ruled early Rome .
The Etruscan alphabet was in turn adopted and  further परिवर्धित by the प्राचीन romans to लिखें the  Latin language .
During the Middle Ages , the Latin  वर्णमाला थी adapted to रोमांस भाषाएं , सीधा वंशजों of लैटिन  , as well as to Celtic , Germanic , Baltic , and some Slavic languages .
With the  आयु of उपनिवेशवाद और ईसाई इंजीलवाद , the लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट थी स्प्रेड विदेशी , और लागू to स्वदेशी  American , Australian , Austronesian , Austroasiatic , and African languages .
More  recently , linguists have भी tended to prefer the लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट or the अंतरराष्ट्रीय ध्वन्यात्मक वर्णमाला ( itself largely आधारित on लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट ) जब transcribing or बनाना लिखा मानकों  for non-European languages , such as the African reference alphabet .
The term Latin alphabet may  refer to either the वर्णमाला प्रयुक्त to लिखें लैटिन ( as वर्णित in इस आलेख ) , or अन्य alphabets आधारित on the लैटिन स्क्रिप्ट  , which is the basic set of letters common to the various alphabets descended from the classical Latin one , such as the English alphabet .
These Latin-derived alphabets may  छोड़ें अक्षर , जैसे the rotokas वर्णमाला , or add नई अक्षर , जैसे the डैनिश और नॉर्वेजियाई  alphabet .
Letter shapes  have बदला over the सदियां , सहित the सृष्टि लिये मध्यकालीन लैटिन  of lower case forms which did not exist in the Classical period .
The assassination of United States President Abraham Lincoln took place on Good Friday  , अप्रैल 14 , 1865 , as the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध थी आरेखण  to a close .
The assassination occurred  पाँच दिनों बाद the कमांडर of the confederate फौज of उत्तरी वर्जिनिया , सामान्य रॉबर्ट E. ली  , surrendered to Lieutenant General Ulysses S. Grant and the Union Army of the Potomac .
Lincoln was the first American president to be  assassinated , हालांकि an unsuccessful attempt था महरूम बना on एंड्रयू जैक्सन 30 सालो पहले  in 1835 .
The  हत्या थी नियोजित और carried आउट by the well-known स्टेज कर्ता जॉन wilkes बूथ , as भाग of  a larger conspiracy in a bid to revive the Confederate cause .
Booth 's co-conspirators were Lewis Powell and David Herold , who  यहूद आबंटित to मार सचिव of राज्य विलियम H. seward , और जार्ज atzerodt  who was to kill Vice President Andrew Johnson .
By simultaneously  eliminating the शीर्ष तीन लोगों in the प्रशासन , बूथ और उसके co-conspirators  hoped to sever the continuity of the United States government .
Lincoln was shot while watching the play Our American  cousin साथ उसके बीवी मरियम टॉड lincoln at घाट 's थिएटर in वॉशिंगटन , d.C. on the रात्रि of अप्रैल 14  , 1865 .
He died early  the अगला morning  .
The  बाकी of the षड्यंत्रकारियों ' प्लाट विफल ; पावेल तभी प्रबंधित to घाव seward , जबकि  Atzerodt , Johnson 's would-be assassin , lost his nerve and fled Washington .
add-on might  mean:
Plug-in ( computing ) , a  टुकड़ा of तन्त्र जिससे enhances another तन्त्र अनुप्रयोग और प्रायः  can not be run independently
ब्राउजर एक्सटेंशन , जिससे modifies the  interface and/or behavior of web browsers
add-on ( मोज़िला ) , a टुकड़ा of तन्त्र कि enhances और customizes  Mozilla-based applications
Add-ons for Firefox (  addons.mozilla.org ) , the आधिकारिक मोज़िला न्यास वेब साईट जिससे serves as a repository of add-ons लिये mozilla-based  applications
Peripheral , an optional  कंप्यूटर हार्डवेयर घटक कि significantly पूरक or enhances  the functionality of the original unit
Video game accessory , a piece of  हार्डवेयर प्रयुक्त in संयोजन साथ a वीडियो खेल कंसोल लिये playing वीडियो खेल
Club level seating is a special  खण्ड of seating in आधुनिक खेल  stadiums .
The Club Level is  प्रायः स्तिथ towards the मध्य of the स्टेज of seating भाग  , above the lower deck but below the upper deck .
They are  प्रायः सही अगला to the लक्ज़री बाक्स , either सही ऊपर , सही नीचे , or sandwiched  between two levels of Luxury Boxes .
Club Level seating is considered as higher class than  बैठे anywhere else in the एरिना , लकिन निम्नतर क्लास compared  to the Luxury Boxes .
Unlike the Luxury Boxes , most club levels  do नहीं रैप entirely around the एरिना .
Some club levels  रोकें at a निश्चित पाइंट , giving रास्ता to an विस्तार of the मेज़ानाइन , जबकि अन्य दे रास्ता to निम्नतर  class Luxury Boxes ( such as `` Party Suites '' ) .
A notable exception to this is Emirates Stadium in London  , जिससे रै a पूरा टियर of क्लबों seating  .
Club Levels  allow प्रशंसक अनेक स्तर of entertainment  .
Club Level seating is open to the elements , as opposed to the  entirely enclosed लक्ज़री बाक्स , जिससे देता अधिक of an बाहरी छाप at roofless  and open-roof stadiums and arenas .
Club Level seating is  सामान्यतः खरीदा on a अनुबंध आधार to allow लिये अधिकतम लाभ  on the part of the stadium .
The Club Level  provides प्रशंसक साथ खास अभिगम to an अंदर भाग of the  arena exclusive to fans with special tickets .
These areas are air conditioned and allow  अभिगम to खास रेस्तरां , merchandise स्टैंड , और लाउंज क्षेत्रों of the स्टेडियम  that are not otherwise available .
Concession stands and vendors on  the क्लबों स्तर भी प्रायः प्रस्ताव अलग मेनू than in अन्य स्टैंड to दे अधिक of a खास महसूस to  the Club .
These areas are closed off to the rest of the stadium , and they  प्रायः can तभी be पहुँचा through the विशेष , निजी क्लबों entrances  .
Sophia Loren ( ; born  सोफिया villani scicolone ; 20 सितंबर  1934 ) is an Italian actress .
लोरेन is widely पहचाना as इटली 's सबसे  renowned and honored actress .
She was the first actress of the talkie era to win an Academy Award for a non-English-speaking  प्रदर्शन , लिये उसके portrayal of cesira in vittorio de सिका 's दो महिलाओं  .
Her other awards include a Grammy Award ,  पाँच खास सुनहरी ग्लोब्स , a bafta पुरस्कार और a लॉरेल पुरस्कार  .
In 1995 she  प्राप्त the सेसिल B. demille पुरस्कार लिये आजीवन उपलब्धियाँ  , one of many such awards .
Her  films शामिल : houseboat ( 1958 ) , el सीआईडी ( 1961 ) , कल , आज और कल ( 1963 ) , विवाह  Italian-Style ( 1964 ) , and A Special Day ( 1977 ) .
In later years she has appeared in  अमरीकी blockbusters ऐसे as grumpier बूढ़ा मेन ( 1995 ) , और  Nine ( 2009 ) .
In  1994 वो स्ट्रक्चर in रॉबर्ट altman 's prêt-à-porter , जिससे अर्जित उसके a सुनहरी  Globe nomination the same year .
She has also achieved  नाजुक और वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी in tv फिल्मों ऐसे as हिम्मत  ( 1986 ) .
Deaths  लिये self-inflicted चोटों प्रति 100,000 निवासियों  in 2004 .
Incidence of suicide is underreported due to both  धार्मिक और सोशल pressures , और संभवतः completely  unreported in some areas .
Nevertheless , from  reported मामले , निश्चित रुझान हैं  apparent .
Since  the आंकड़ा is skewed , comparing आत्महत्या दरों between राष्ट्र is statistically  unsound .
The  रुझान themselves हैं नहीं the कारण , लकिन may  be indicative of a root cause .
The Oprah Winfrey Leadership Academy for Girls - South  अफ़्रीकी is a मादा बोर्डिंग स्कूल संस्थापित in जनवरी 2007 और स्तिथ in henley on klip निकट meyerton  , south of Johannesburg , South Africa .
The academy was founded by Oprah  विनफ्रे साथ the लक्ष्य of providing शैक्षणिक और नेतृत्व अवसर  for academically gifted girls from impoverished backgrounds .

Digicel is a mobile phone  संजाल प्रदाता ऑपरेटिंग in 31 बाज़ार आरपार the caribbean  , Central America , and Oceania regions .
The company is owned by Irishman Denis  o'brien , is incorporated in बरमूडा , और आधारित in  Jamaica .
It has  परिचय 13 लाख बेतार उपयोक्ता  .
As of 2012 , Digicel 's markets comprise : Anguilla , Antigua  और बारबूडा , अरूबा , बारबाडोस , बरमूडा , bonaire , the अंग्रेजों वर्जिन आइलैंड्स , the केमन आइलैंड्स , कुराकाओ , डोमिनिकन , el साल्वाडोर , फिजी , फ्रेंच guiana , हरा , guadeloupe , गुयाना , हैती , जमैका , मार्टीनिक , प्रकृति , पनामा  , Papua New Guinea , Samoa , Saint Kitts and Nevis , Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent and the Grenadines , Suriname , Tonga , Trinidad & Tobago , Turks and Caicos , and Vanuatu .
This is a  सूची of रिकॉर्ड of the फीफा संसार कप और इसके  qualification matches .
Hospital Emergency  कोड हैं प्रयुक्त in अस्पताल विश्वव्यापी to चेतावनी  staff to various emergencies .
The  उपयोग of कोड is intended to convey अनिवार्य सूचना जल्दी और साथ  minimal misunderstanding to staff , while preventing stress and panic among visitors to the hospital .
These codes may be posted on placards throughout  the हॉस्पिटल , or मुद्रित on कर्मचारी पहचान बैज लिये तैयार सन्दर्भ  .
Back of a  हॉस्पिटल id बैज  showing disaster codes .
Hospital  आपात कोड may denote अलग कार्यक्रम at  different hospitals , including nearby ones .
क्युकी अनेक physicians कार्य at अधिक than एक सुविधा , इस may सीसे to भ्रम  in emergencies , so uniform systems have been proposed .
the रूट of the eifel जलसेतु ,  with its average slope .
The Eifel  जलसेतु थी एक of the longest aqueducts  of the Roman Empire .
The  जलसेतु , constructed in ad 80 , carried जल कुछ इससे the hilly eifel प्रदेश of कया is अभी जर्मनी  to the ancient city of Colonia Claudia Ara Agrippinensium ( present-day Cologne ) .
If the auxiliary  स्पर्स to अतिरिक्त स्रोतों हैं शामिल , the  length was .
The construction was almost entirely  नीचे मैदान , और the प्रवाह of the जल थी उत्पादित entirely  by gravity .
A  few पुलों , सहित एक up to in लंबाई  , were needed to pass over valleys .
Unlike some of the other famous Roman aqueducts , the Eifel aqueduct was specifically  designed to minimize the above-ground portion to protect it इससे क्षति और जमने  .
In chemistry , a disulfide  बंध ( br.e . disulphide बंध ) is a covalent बंध , प्रायः निकला  by the coupling of two thiol groups .
The linkage is  भी पुकारा an ss-bond or disulfide  bridge .
The overall  कनेक्टिविटी is इसलिए r-s-s-r  .
the शब्दावली is widely प्रयुक्त  in biochemistry .
In formal terms , the  कनेक्शन is a persulfide , in सादृश्य to इसके congener , परऑक्साइड ( r-o-o-r ) , लकिन इस शब्दावली is अस्पष्ट और  is no longer used ( except in reference to R-S-S-H or H-S-S-H compounds ) .
Formal  चित्रण of disulfide बंध गठन as an ऑक्सीकरण  .
Westminster Abbey is  प्रयुक्त लिये the राजतिलक of अंग्रेजों monarchs
Religion in the United Kingdom and in the countries that preceded it , has been dominated ,  लिये over 1,400 सालो , by विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म of christianity  .
According to some surveys , a majority of citizens still identify with Christianity , although regular  गिरिजाघर उपस्थिति रै गिरे dramatically चूंकि the मध्य of the 20th सदी , और आव्रजन और जनसांख्यिकी बदलें have contributed  to the growth of other faiths .
Religious affiliations of UK  नागरिकों हैं अंकित by नियमित सर्वेक्षण , the चार प्रमुख ones होने the uk जनसांख्यिकी , the श्रमिक फ़ोर्स सर्वेक्षण , the अंग्रेजों सोशल attitudes  survey and the European Social Survey .
According to the 2001 UK census , Christianity is the major religion , followed by Islam ,  हिंदुत्व , sikhism , judaism और buddhism in शर्तें of क्रमांक of  adherents .
This , and the relatively large number of individuals with nominal or  no धार्मिक संबद्धों रै led टीकाकारों to variously describe the संयुक्त किंगडम as a multi-faith , secularised , or post-christian  society .
The United Kingdom was formed by the union of previously independent countries from  1707 , और नतीजतन सबसे of the largest धार्मिक समूह do नहीं have uk-wide organisational  structures .
While some groups have separate structures for the individual countries of the  संयुक्त किंगडम , अन्य may have a सिंगल ढांचा covering इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स or ग्रेट  Britain .
Similarly , due to  the अपेक्षाकृत हाल सृष्टि of उत्तरी आयरलैंड in 1921 , सबसे प्रमुख धार्मिक समूह in उत्तरी आयरलैंड हैं संगठित  on an all-Ireland basis .
The  1967 न्यूर्क दंगे यहूद a प्रमुख सिविल disturbance कि occurred in the नगर of न्यूर्क  , New Jersey between July 12 and July 17 , 1967 .
The six days of rioting ,  लूटने , और विनाश बाएँ 26 मुर्दे और सैंकड़ों  injured .
In United States college athletics , redshirt  is a विलंब or बर्खास्तगी of an खिलाड़ी 's भागीदारी in अनुक्रम to lengthen उसके or उसके काल  of eligibility .
Typically , a student  's एथलेटिक पात्रता in a दिए खेल is चार सीज़न , a क्रमांक निकला इससे the चार सालो of अकादमिक  classes that are normally required to obtain a bachelor 's degree at an American college or university .
However , a student athlete may be offered the opportunity to  redshirt लिये up to दो सालो , जिससे allows the खिलाड़ी to स्प्रेड those चार सालो of पात्रता over पाँच , or sometimes छह  years .
In a redshirt  साल , a छात्र खिलाड़ी may attend वर्ग at the कॉलेज or विश्वविद्यालयों , अभ्यास साथ an एथलेटिक टोली , और पोशाक लिये खेल  but he or she may not compete during the game .
Using this  यांत्रिकी , a छात्र खिलाड़ी रै up to पाँच अकादमिक सालो to उपयोग the चार सालो of पात्रता  , thus becoming a fifth-year senior .
The term is used  as a क्रिया , संज्ञा , और क्रियाशील  .
For example , a coach may choose to  redshirt a खिलाड़ी जो is तब referred to as a redshirt freshman or बस  a redshirt .
The  विपरीत of इस is a ``  true freshman . ''
World War I ( WWI ) was  a वैश्विक युद्ध केंद्रित in यूरोपीय कि began on 28 जुलाई 1914 और lasted  until 11 November 1918 .
It was predominantly called the  संसार युद्ध or the ग्रेट युद्ध इससे इसके occurrence जबतक the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939 , और the  First World War or World War I thereafter .
It involved all the world 's great  शक्तियां , जिससे यहूद समवेत in दो opposing alliances : the allies ( आधारित on the ट्रिपल entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम , फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल गठबंधन of  Germany , Austria-Hungary and Italy ; but , as Austria–Hungary had taken the offensive against the agreement , Italy did not enter into the war ) .
These alliances were both  reorganised और विस्तारित as अधिक राष्ट्र डाला the युद्ध : इटली , जापानी और the संयुक्त राज्य  joined the Allies , and the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
Ultimately , more  than 70 लाख सैन्य कर्मियों , सहित 60 लाख europeans , यहूद mobilised in एक of the largest  wars in history .
More than 9  लाख combatants यहूद मारे , largely क्युकी of technological advancements कि led to विशाल  increases in the lethality of weapons without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility .
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in world  इतिहास , subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न राजनैतिक परिवर्तन , ऐसे as revolutions in अनेक of the राष्ट्र शामिल  .
One of the long-term causes of the war was  the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the विदेशी नीतियों of the ग्रेट शक्तियां of यूरोपीय  .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of  ऑस्ट्रिया , the वारिस to the सिंहासन of austria-hungary , on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered a राजनयिक  crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia .
Several  alliances formed over the पिछला दशकों  were invoked .
Within weeks , the major powers  यहूद at युद्ध और , via उनके colonies , the विरोध जल्द स्प्रेड  around the world .
On  28 जुलाई , the austro-hungarians fired the पहला गोलियाँ of the  war as preparation for the invasion of Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans invaded neutral Belgium and Luxembourg on the way to France ,  providing a casus belli लिये ब्रिटेन 's घोषणा of युद्ध विरूद्ध जर्मनी  .
After the German march on Paris was brought to a halt—the  so-called चमत्कार of the marne —the पश्चिमी सामने settled into a स्थिर बैटल of अपघर्षण साथ a गर्त लकीर  that changed little until 1917 .
On the Eastern Front , the  रूसी फौज थी कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians , लकिन थी रोका in इसके आक्रमण  of East Prussia by the Germans .
In November  the उस्मानी साम्राज्य joined the युद्ध , खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस  , Mesopotamia and the Sinai .
इटली और बुल्गारिया गई to युद्ध  in 1915 and Romania in 1916 .
In Russia , the tsar 's government collapsed in March  1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति in नवम्बर  brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers .
After a 1918  जर्मनी अप्रिय साथ the पश्चिमी सामने , the allies drove वापस the germans in a श्रेणी of कामयाब offensives  and American forces began entering the trenches .
जर्मनी , जिससे था इसके अपना ट्रबल साथ क्रांतिकारियों , सहमत to an armistice  on 11 November 1918 .
The  युद्ध ended in विजय लिये  the Allies .
Events on the home  fronts यहूद as उग्र as on the बैटल fronts , as the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और  economic resources to fight a total war .
By the end of the war , four major  इम्पीरियल powers—the जर्मनी , रूसी , austro-hungarian  and Ottoman empires—ceased to exist .
The successor states of the former  दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory , जबकि the latter दो यहूद dismantled entirely  .
the मैप of सेंट्रल यूरोपीय थी redrawn into अनेक  smaller states .
The League  of राष्ट्र थी formed in the आशा of preventing another ऐसे  conflict .
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires , the  परखना of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं साथ the सन्धि of versailles हैं सहमत to be कारकों contributing  to World War II .
Map of countries that declared  themselves to be समाजवादी राज्य अंतर्गत the marxist–leninist or माओवादी परिभाषा - कि is to कह , ``  Communist states '' - between 1979 and 1983 .
This period marked  the महानतम territorial extent of कम्युनिस्ट  states .
A  कम्युनिस्ट राज्य is a राज्य जहाँ the  means of production are collectively owned by the society .
It has a form of government characterized by  single-party नियम or dominant-party नियम of a कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी ( referred as तानाशाही of the proletariat by इसके proponents ) और a professed निष्ठा  to a Leninist or Marxist–Leninist ideology as the guiding principle of the state .
Technically , `` communist state '' is a contradictio in terminis as  a कम्युनिस्ट समाज as पारिभाषित by दोनो माक्र्सवादी और anarcho-communists is in principle  stateless .
From this  परिप्रेक्ष्य , the पद marxist-leninist  state is more appropriate .
Historically , a `` communist state '' referred to a system where public ownership of all or most means of production by the Communist party -run state is  deemed जरुरी to further the रूचि of the working क्लास ; आज , a कम्युनिस्ट राज्य can भी , लिये उदाहरण , refer to समकालीन चीन और वियतनाम , जहाँ a कम्युनिस्ट party-run राज्य exists alongside a मिश्रित  economy .
According to Marxist–Leninists , the state is a tool in the hands of the ruling  क्लास , जिससे in a समाजवादी समाज is the working क्लास , so a समाजवादी राज्य is , according to leninists , a राज्य  of the working class .
In  अभ्यास , कम्युनिस्ट राज्य do नहीं दरअसल refer to themselves  as such .
They do this not  to भेस the फैक्ट कि the सत्ताधारी पार्टी is कम्युनिस्ट , लकिन बल्कि क्युकी  they do not consider themselves to be a communist society at present .
Instead , they  constitutionally पहचानो themselves as समाजवादी राज्य or मजदूर ' राज्य  .
The primary  लक्ष्य of ये राज्य , जिससे भी explains उनके आधिकारिक नाम , is to मार्गदर्शिका  their respective countries in the process of building socialism , ultimately leading to communism .
Communist states may have  अनेक विधिक राजनैतिक पार्टियों , लकिन the कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी is प्रायः granted a खास or प्रबल भूमिका in सरकारी , प्रायः by statute or अंतर्गत  the constitution .
Consequently , the institutions of  the राज्य और of the कम्युनिस्ट पार्टी become intimately entwined , ऐसे as in the विकास  of parallel institutions .
In the 20th century ,  सबसे कम्युनिस्ट राज्य अपनाया नियोजित economies  .
However , there were exceptions : The Soviet Union during the 1920s and late 1980s and Yugoslavia after World War II allowed  सीमित बाज़ार और a उपाधि of कार्यकर्ता self-management , जबकि चीन , वियतनाम और लाओस introduced far-reaching मार्केट reforms  after the 1980s .
In  the 21st सदी , चीन और वियतनाम  have allowed a mixed economy to develop .
The fundamental  अवधारणाओं of कम्युनिस्ट राज्य प्रायः diverge इससे the असली socio-economic  ideologies from which they develop .
As a  परिणाम , अनेक adherents of ये विचारधाराओं प्रायः  oppose the political systems commonly associated with these states .
For example , dissenting communists such as Trotskyists were  प्रायः opposed to the कम्युनिस्ट राज्य of the 20th सदी , claiming either कि वे था nothing to do साथ `` रियल '' साम्यवादी or कि the विचारधारा  of such states had reached a point of irrevocable corruption .
Michael Fred Phelps II ( born June  30 , 1985 ) is a रिटायर्ड अमरीकी तैराक और the सबसे सजा ओलंपियन of सब समय , साथ a कुल of  22 medals .
Phelps also holds the all-time records for Olympic gold medals ( 18  , दोगुना the दूसरी उच्चतम रिकार्ड धारकों ) , ओलम्पिक सुनहरा medals in व्यक्तिगत कार्यक्रम ( 11 ) , और  Olympic medals in individual events for a male ( 13 ) .
In winning eight gold  medals at the 2008 बीजिंग खेल , फेल्प्स took the रिकार्ड लिये the सबसे first-place  finishes at any single Olympic Games .
Five of those  victories यहूद in व्यक्तिगत कार्यक्रम  , tying the single Games record .
In the 2012 Summer Olympics in London , Phelps won four golds and two silver medals  , बनाना उसे the सबसे कामयाब खिलाड़ी of the खेल लिये the तीसरा  Olympics in a row .
Phelps is the long course world recordholder in the 100-meter butterfly , 200-meter  तितली और 400-meter व्यक्तिगत medley as खूब as the पूर्व long कोर्स संसार recordholder in the  200-meter freestyle and 200-meter individual medley .
he रै जीती a कुल of 71 medals in प्रमुख अंतरराष्ट्रीय long-course प्रतियोगिता , 57 सुनहरा , 11 चांदी , और तीन कांस्य spanning  the Olympics , the World , and the Pan Pacific Championships .
Phelps 's international titles and record-breaking performances have  अर्जित उसे the संसार तैराक of the साल पुरस्कार सात टाइम्स और अमरीकी तैराक of the साल पुरस्कार नौ टाइम्स as खूब as the फिना तैराक of  the Year Award in 2012 .
His unprecedented Olympic success in 2008  अर्जित फेल्प्स खेल illustrated पत्रिका 's sportsman of the साल पुरस्कार  .
After  the 2008 गर्मियाँ ओलंपिक , फेल्प्स प्रारंभ the माइकल फेल्प्स न्यास  , which focuses on growing the sport of swimming and promoting healthier lifestyles .
He expects to do  further कार्य साथ उसके न्यास बाद the 2012 ओलंपिक , जिससे he रै कहा  will be his last .
Lenovo Group Limited ( ) is a Chinese  बहुराष्ट्रीय कंप्यूटर हार्डवेयर और इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स कम्पनी साथ इसके मुख्यालय in बीजिंग , चीन और  Morrisville , North Carolina and its registered office in Hong Kong , China .
Its products include personal computers , tablet  कंप्यूटर , मोबाईल फोन , workstations , सर्वर , इलेक्ट्रॉनिक भंडार डिवाइस , it प्रबन्धन तन्त्र  and smart televisions .
लेनोवो is the संसार 's second-largest pc विक्रेता  by 2012 unit sales .
It markets the ThinkPad line of  कोपी कंप्यूटर और the thinkcentre लकीर of desktops  .
लेनोवो रै परिचालन in अधिक than 60 देशों  and sells its products in around 160 countries .
Lenovo was founded in Beijing in 1984 and  incorporated in हांग काँग in 1988 अंतर्गत इसके पिछला नाम  , Legend .
Lenovo is listed  on the हांग काँग भण्डार एक्सचेंज और is a constituent of the हैंग सेंग  China-Affiliated Corporations Index .
Slug is  a आम नाम लिये an जाहिर shell-less स्थलीय  gastropod mollusk .
The word `` slug '' is also often used as part of the common  नाम of कोई gastropod mollusc कि रै no शेल , रै a बहुत घटाया शेल , or रै तभी a छोटी आतंरिक शेल  .
( This is in contrast to the common name `` snail ``  , जिससे is लागू to gastropods कि have a नतीजे शेल कि is विशाल पर्याप्त कि the नरम भाग of the एनिमल  can retract fully into it . )
Slugs exist on land and  in the समुद्र , और वहीँ is भी एक genus of freshwater  slugs , Acochlidium .
The unadorned word `` slug '' is  however लागू primarily to जमीन slugs , whereas slugs इससे the समुद्र or इससे  freshwater are usually referred to as `` sea slugs `` and `` freshwater slugs '' .
Land gastropods with a shell that is not  काफी vestigial , लकिन is too छोटी to retract into ( जैसे अनेक in the परिवार  Urocyclidae ) , are known as semislugs .
The various taxonomic families of slugs form part of several quite  अलग विकासवादी lineages जिससे भी शामिल  snails .
Thus , for example , the various families of land slugs are  नहीं बहुत closely सम्बन्धित to एक another , despite a सतही समानता in the overall  body form .
The shell-less condition has  arisen अनेक टाइम्स independently दौरान the विकासवादी पास्ट , और यूँ the श्रेणी  `` slug '' is emphatically a polyphyletic one .
slugs , जैसे सब अन्य gastropods , undergo torsion ( a 180° टेढ़ी of the  internal organs ) during development .
Internally , slug anatomy clearly shows the effects of this  रोटेशन , लकिन externally the लाशें of जमीन slugs appear to be अधिक or कम सममित , मगर लिये the positioning of the pneumostome , जिससे is on एक पक्ष of the एनिमल , सामान्यतः the सही  hand side .
The soft , slimy bodies of slugs are prone to  desiccation , so land-living slugs हैं confined to नम environments और जरूर  retreat to damp hiding places when the weather is dry .
the subsequent सूचना in इस  article applies to land slugs .
is a Latin word that means `` thus '' or ,  in लिखने , `` it थी यूँ in the सोर्स सामग्री ''  .
sic may भी  refer to:
sic , cluj ,  a commune in Romania
SIC , the regional  कोड लिये सिसिली
Sic ( noise  कलाकार ) , styled as [ sic ] , स्टेज नाम of जेनिफर  Morris , a Canadian noise artist
Sic ( band ) is a modern  hardcore/thrash मेटल बैंड इससे torshavn , the पूंजी of  the Faroe Islands
`` ( sic ) '' ,  a सोंग by अमरीकी बैंड slipknot on the एल्बम  Slipknot
SIC ,  the आरंभिक of मार्को  Simoncelli .
SIC  as an एक्रोनिम may  stand for:
SiC , Silicon carbide , a  semiconducting सामग्री , भी प्रयुक्त to  make metalworking tools
sic ( cyclecar ) ( società इटालियाना  Cyclecars )

International  मानक औद्योगिक वर्गीकरण a un  system for economic activities
शेटलैंड आइलैंड्स  Council
the Swiss  interbank clearing  system
San  isidro क्लबों , an अर्जेंटाइन  rugby union club
Standing Interpretation Committee , a committee  समर्पित to the निर्वचन of अंतरराष्ट्रीय हिसाब मानकों ifrs
Schwarz information  मानदंड in the फ़ील्ड of आंकडे
second-in-command in the फ़ील्ड of  aviation
sistema interconectado सेंट्रल  power grid in Chile
Sociedade  independente de comunicação ( sic ) , a टेलीविज़न  channel in Portugal

Segmented  पूर्णांक काउंटर विधि , a विधि of  operation in cryptography
sepang अंतरराष्ट्रीय सर्किट , a  high-end racetrack that hosts the Malaysian round of Formula 1
Shanghai International Circuit , a  मोटर रेसिंग स्थान in शंघाई ,  China
