SIC ( Sons Idées Couleurs ) , an early  twentieth-century आर्ट पत्रिका उत्पादित by फ्रेंच लेखक पियरे albert-birot
southeastern इलिनोइस कॉलेज , a दो साल जूनियर कॉलेज in harrisburg  , Illinois , United States
Specific inductive capacity , abbreviated to SIC , which is more  commonly ज्ञात as the सापेक्ष विद्युतशीलता or the  dielectric constant
St Ignatius  ' कॉलेज , riverview , a जेसुइट स्कूल  in Sydney , Australia
इम्पीरियल मानक of  Napoleon I
नेपोलियन बोनापार्ट ( , ; 15 अगस्त 1769 – 5 may 1821 ) थी a फ्रेंच सैन्य और राजनैतिक नेता  who rose to prominence during the latter stages of the French Revolution and its associated wars in Europe .
As Napoleon I ,  he थी सम्राट of the फ्रेंच इससे  1804 to 1815 .
His  विधिक सुधार , the napoleonic कोड , रै महरूम a प्रमुख influence on अनेक सिविल विधि jurisdictions विश्वव्यापी  , but he is best remembered for his role in the wars led against France by a series of coalitions , the so-called Napoleonic Wars .
He established hegemony over most of continental Europe  और sought to स्प्रेड the आदर्शों of the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति , जबकि consolidating an इम्पीरियल साम्राज्य जिससे लौटी पहलुओं of the अपदस्थ  Ancien Régime .
Due to his success in these wars , often against numerically superior enemies , he is generally regarded as  एक of the महानतम सैन्य कमांडरों of सब समय , और उसके अभियान हैं पढ़ाई at सैन्य अकादमियों विश्वव्यापी  .
Napoleon was born  at ajaccio in corsica in a परिवार of प्रतिष्ठित इतालवी ancestry जिससे  had settled Corsica in the 16th century .
He trained as an artillery  अधिकारी in मेनलैंड फ़्रांस  .
He rose to prominence under the French First Republic  और led कामयाब अभियान विरूद्ध the पहला और दूसरी coalitions arrayed  against France .
He led a successful  आक्रमण of the इतालवी प्रायद्वीप  .
In 1799 , he staged a coup d'état and installed himself as First  कौंसुल ; पाँच सालो बाद the फ्रेंच सीनेट proclaimed उसे सम्राट , following a plebiscite in उसके  favour .
In the first decade of the 19th  सदी , the फ्रेंच साम्राज्य अंतर्गत नेपोलियन सगाई in a श्रेणी of conflicts—the napoleonic  Wars —that involved every major European power .
After a streak of  victories , फ़्रांस secured a प्रबल स्थिति in महाद्वीपीय यूरोपीय , और नेपोलियन कायम the फ्रेंच गोला of influence through the गठन of extensive  alliances and the appointment of friends and family members to rule other European countries as French client states .
The  प्रायद्वीपीय युद्ध और 1812 फ्रेंच आक्रमण of रूस चिह्नित  turning points in Napoleon 's fortunes .
His  ग्रांडे armée थी badly क्षतिग्रस्त  in the campaign and never fully recovered .
In  1813 , the छठे गठबन्धन पराजित उसके शक्तियां at लिपजिग ; the following साल the गठबन्धन invaded  France , forced Napoleon to abdicate and exiled him to the island of Elba .
Less than a year later  , he फरार एल्बा और लौटे to शक्ति , लकिन थी पराजित  at the Battle of Waterloo in June 1815 .
Napoleon  खर्च the पिछला छह सालो of उसके जीवन in कारावास by the अंग्रेजों on the द्वीप  of Saint Helena .
An autopsy concluded he died of stomach cancer , but there has been some debate about the  कारण of उसके मौत , as कुछ विद्वानों have speculated कि he थी a शिकार of आर्सेनिक विषाक्तता  .
This is  a कालानुक्रमिक लिस्टिंग of the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटरों इससे  Pennsylvania .
संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटरों हैं popularly निर्वाचित , लिये a six-year  term , beginning January 3 .
चुनावों हैं आयोजित the पहला मंगलवार  after November 1 .
Before 1914 , they  यहूद चुनी by the पेन्सिलवेनिया सामान्य सभा , और पहले 1935  , their terms began March 4 .
The South  अफ़्रीकी नेशनल रग्बी संघ टोली ( ज्ञात as the springboks )  represents South Africa in rugby union .
They compete in the annual  रग्बी चैंपियनशिप , साथ साथ southern-hemisphere counterparts अर्जेंटीना  , Australia and New Zealand .
They have won this  चैंपियनशिप on तीन अवसरों in सोलह सालो  .
They  हैं फिलहाल क्रमित दूसरी in the संसार by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय रग्बी फलक , और यहूद नामित 2008  World Team of the Year at the Laureus World Sports Awards .
हालांकि दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी थी इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in the सृष्टि of the रग्बी संसार कप प्रतियोगिता , the springboks किया नहीं compete in the पहला दो  World Cups in 1987 and 1991 because of anti-apartheid sporting boycotts of South Africa .
The team  बना इसके संसार कप डेब्यू in 1995 , जब the newly लोकतांत्रिक  South Africa hosted the tournament .
The Springboks then defeated the All Blacks 15–12 in the final , which is now  remembered as एक of the महानतम पल in दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी 's sporting इतिहास  , and a watershed moment in the post-Apartheid nation-building process .
South Africa regained  उनके शीर्षक as champions 12 सालो बाद , जब वे पराजित इंग्लैण्ड 15–6 in the  2007 final .
as a परिणाम of the 2007 संसार कप टूर्नामेंट the springboks यहूद प्रचारित to पहला  place in the IRB World Rankings , a position they held until July the following year when New Zealand regained the top spot .
The  springboks खेल in ग्रीन और सुनहरा jerseys , और उनके प्रतीक हैं the springbok  and the Protea .
The side has been playing international rugby since 1891 , when a  अंग्रेजों isles पक्ष toured the स्वदेश , playing दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी in  their first Test on 30 July .
South Africa was coached by Jake  श्वेत , जो led the boks to the 2007 संसार कप शीर्षक , announcing उसके इस्तीफा effectively  from the end of 2007 .
His replacement 's ( Peter de Villiers ) contract expired in 2011 ,  following a 11–9 शिकस्त to ऑस्ट्रेलिया in the रग्बी संसार कप quarter-final , जो तब stated he होता नहीं be हस्ताक्षर a नई  deal .
The previous captain was John Smit , who before he  रिटायर्ड in 2011 निभाई वेश्या लिये सबसे of उसके करियर , हालांकि he  has also been a prop , mainly in 2008 and 2009 .
Due to Smit being unavailable for  the नवम्बर 2010 परीक्षण बाद सर्जरी , ताला विक्टर matfield  took Smit 's place as captain for that tour .
The current captain is  जां de villiers  .
The Battle of Gettysburg ( ,  साथ an ध्वनि ) , थी लड़ा जुलाई 1–3 , 1863 , in और around the कस्बा of gettysburg , पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
It was the  बैटल साथ the largest क्रमांक of हताहत in the  American Civil War and is often described as the war 's turning point .
Union Maj. Gen. George Gordon Meade 's Army of the Potomac  पराजित हमले by confederate gen. रॉबर्ट E. ली 's फौज of उत्तरी वर्जिनिया , समाप्ति  Lee 's invasion of the North .
After his success at Chancellorsville in Virginia in May 1863 ,  ली led उसके फौज through the shenandoah घाटी to शुरू उसके दूसरी आक्रमण of the north—the  Gettysburg Campaign .
With his army in high spirits  , ली intended to शिफ़्ट the फ़ोकस of the गर्मियाँ अभियान इससे war-ravaged उत्तरी वर्जिनिया और hoped to influence उत्तरी राजनेता to दे up उनके अभियोजन  of the war by penetrating as far as Harrisburg , Pennsylvania , or even Philadelphia .
Prodded by President Abraham  lincoln , maj. gen. जोसेफ वेश्या स्थानांतरित उसके फौज in pursuit , लकिन थी सुकून बस  three days before the battle and replaced by Meade .
Elements of the two armies initially collided at Gettysburg  on जुलाई 1 , 1863 , as ली तत्काल concentrated उसके शक्तियां वहीँ , उसके उद्देश्य होने  to engage the Union army and destroy it .
Low ridges to the northwest of town were defended initially by a Union  प्यादे प्रभाग अंतर्गत ब्रिगेडियर . gen. जॉन buford , और जल्द reinforced साथ दो corps of संघ  infantry .
However , two large Confederate corps assaulted them from the northwest  और उत्तर , collapsing the hastily विकसित संघ लाइनों , sending the defenders retreating through the गलियों  of town to the hills just to the south .
On the  दूसरी दिन of बैटल , सबसे of दोनो सेना  had assembled .
the संघ लकीर थी रखी आउट in  a defensive formation resembling a fishhook .
In the late afternoon of July 2 , Lee launched a heavy assault on the Union  बाएँ पार्श्व , और fierce लड़ raged at छोटी गोलाकार शीर्ष , the wheatfield , शैतान 's डेन , और the आड़ू  Orchard .
On the  संघ सही , demonstrations escalated into full-scale  assaults on Culp 's Hill and Cemetery Hill .
All across the battlefield , despite significant losses , the  संघ defenders आयोजित उनके लाइनों  .
On the third day of battle , July 3 , fighting resumed on Culp 's Hill , and cavalry  लड़ाइयों raged to the ईस्ट और दक्षिण , लकिन the प्रमुख इवेंट थी a नाटकीय infantry उत्पीड़न by 12,500 confederates विरूद्ध the बीच of the संघ लकीर on  Cemetery Ridge , known as Pickett 's Charge .
The  चार्ज थी repulsed by संघ राइफल और तोपखाने  fire , at great losses to the Confederate army .
Lee led his army on a  torturous रिट्रीट वापस to वर्जिनिया .
Between 46,000 and 51,000 soldiers from  दोनो सेना यहूद हताहत in the three-day बैटल  .
That November , President Lincoln used the dedication ceremony for the  gettysburg नेशनल कब्रिस्तान to सम्मान the गिरे संघ सैनिको और redefine the purpose of the युद्ध in उसके ऐतिहासिक  Gettysburg Address .
An academic discipline , or field of  पढ़ाई , is a शाखा of ज्ञान कि is सिखाया और शोधकार्य  at the college or university level .
Disciplines are defined ( in part ) , and recognized by the academic journals in which  शोध is प्रकाशित , और the सीखे समाजों और अकादमिक विभाग or faculties to जिससे उनके practitioners  belong .
However , there exists no formal criteria for when  शैक्षणिक कार्यक्रम और scholarly जर्नल्स रूप an अकादमिक अनुशासन  .
A huge difference  exists between , on the एक हाथ , खूब स्थापित disciplines कि मौजूद in लगभग सब विश्वविद्यालयों सब over the संसार , have a long इतिहास , और have a खूब स्थापित नियत of जर्नल्स और सम्मेलनों , और , on the अन्य हाथ , सुझाव लिये नई फ़ील्ड समर्थित तभी by  few universities and publications .
Fields of study usually  have अनेक sub-disciplines or शाखाओं , और the distinguishing लाइनों between  these are often both arbitrary and ambiguous .
PHP  is a server-side एनक्रिप्शन भाषा designed लिये वेब विकास  but also used as a general-purpose programming language .
PHP is now installed on more  than 244 लाख वेबसाइटों और 2.1 लाख वेब सर्वर  .
originally निर्मित by rasmus lerdorf in 1995 , the सन्दर्भ  implementation of PHP is now produced by The PHP Group .
While PHP originally stood for  निजी घर पेज , it अभी स्टैंड लिये पीएचपी : हाइपरटेक्स्ट  Preprocessor , a recursive acronym .
PHP code is interpreted by a web server with a PHP processor  मोड्यूल जिससे generates the resulting वेब पेज : पीएचपी कमांड can be अंतःस्थापित सीधे into an एचटीएमएल सोर्स दस्तावेज़ बल्कि than कॉलिंग an  external file to process data .
It has also evolved to include  a command-line इंटरफ़ेस काबिलियत और can be  used in standalone graphical applications .
PHP is free software released under the PHP  अनुज्ञा , जिससे is असंगत साथ the ग्नू सामान्य पब्लिक अनुज्ञा ( जीपीएल )  due to restrictions on the usage of the term PHP .
PHP can be deployed on most web servers and  भी as a स्टैंडअलोन शेल on लगभग प्रत्येक ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली और मंच  , free of charge .
John Fitzgerald  `` जोकर '' कैनेडी ( may 29 , 1917 – नवम्बर 22 , 1963 ) , प्रायः referred to by  his initials JFK , was the 35th President of the United States , serving from 1961 until his death in 1963 .
After military service as commander of the Motor Torpedo Boats PT-109 and PT-59 during World War II in the South  प्रशांत , कैनेडी represented मैसाचुसेट्स ' 11th congressional ज़िला in the u.S. हाउस of प्रतिनिधि इससे  1947 to 1953 as a Democrat .
thereafter , he परोसा in the u.S. सीनेट इससे  1953 until 1960 .
Kennedy defeated Vice  अध्यक्ष और रिपब्लिकन प्रत्याशी रिचर्ड निक्सन in  the 1960 U.S. presidential election .
At 43  सालो of आयु , he is the youngest to have महरूम निर्वाचित to the दफ्तर , the second-youngest  President ( after Theodore Roosevelt ) , and the first person born in the 20th century to serve as president .
A Catholic , Kennedy is  the तभी non- प्रोटोस्टेंट अध्यक्ष , और is the तभी  president to have won a Pulitzer Prize .
Events during his presidency  शामिल the खाड़ी of सूअर आक्रमण , the क्यूबन मिसाइल संकट , the भवन of the बर्लिन वॉल , the स्पेस रेस , the african-american  Civil Rights Movement , and early stages of the Vietnam War .
Therein , Kennedy  increased the क्रमांक of सैन्य advisers , खास आपरेशन शक्तियां , और helicopters in an प्रयत्न  to curb the spread of communism in South East Asia .
The Kennedy administration adopted the  नीति of the रणनीतिक हैमलेट कार्यक्रम जिससे थी implemented by  the South Vietnamese government .
It involved certain  मजबूर relocation , गाँव internment , और पृथक्करण of ग्रामीण दक्षिण वियतनामी  from the northern and southern communist insurgents .
Kennedy was  assassinated on नवम्बर 22 , 1963  in Dallas , Texas .
Lee Harvey  ओसवाल्ड थी चार्ज साथ the अपराधों , लकिन he थी शॉट  and killed by Jack Ruby two days later , before a trial could take place .
The FBI and the Warren Commission  officially concluded कि ओसवाल्ड थी the लोन हत्यारे  .
However ,  the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस चुनें कमेटी on assassinations ( hsca  ) concluded that those investigations were flawed and that Kennedy was probably assassinated as the result of a conspiracy .
However  , एबीसी न्यूज in उनके छानबीन , the कैनेडी हत्या : परे षड्यंत्र , पुष्टि the निष्कर्षों of the  Warren Commission ; having concluded Oswald acted alone .
Kennedy 's controversial Department of Defense TFX fighter  bomber कार्यक्रम led to a congressional छानबीन  that lasted from 1963 to 1970 .
Since  the 1960s सूचना concerning कैनेडी  's private life has come to light .
Details of Kennedy 's health problems in which he  struggled have become बेहतर ज्ञात  , especially since the 1990s .
Although initially  रखा रहस्य इससे the सामान्य पब्लिक , रिपोर्ट्स of कैनेडी 's philandering  have garnered much press .
Kennedy ranks highly in public  राय दरजा of u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों .
`` Stand by Me ''  is a सोंग originally performed by बेन E. किंग और लिखा by किंग , जेरी leiber , और माइक stoller , प्रेरित  by the spiritual `` Lord Stand by Me , '' plus two lines rooted in Psalms 46:2–3 .
There  have महरूम over 400 अंकित संस्करण  of the song .
A political cartoon from an 1894  पक पत्रिका by इलस्ट्रेटर s.d . ehrhart , shows a फार्म स्त्री labeled `` लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी  '' sheltering from a tornado of political change .
A  रूपक is a फिगर of वाक कि describes a विषय by asserting कि it is  , on some point of comparison , the same as another otherwise unrelated object .
Metaphor is a type of analogy and is closely related  to अन्य rhetorical आंकड़े of वाक कि achieve उनके प्रभाव via संघ , तुलना or  resemblance including allegory , hyperbole , and simile .
In simpler terms , a  रूपक compares दो वस्तुएँ or बाते बगैर using the शब्द  `` like '' or `` as '' .
One of the most prominent examples of a metaphor in  अंग्रेज़ी साहित्य is the सब the संसार 's a स्टेज monologue इससे as  You Like It :
सब the संसार  's a stage,
और सब the मेन और महिलाओं  merely players ;
They have their exits and their  entrances ; — विलियम शेक्सपियर , as तुम जैसे it ,  2/7
This quote is a metaphor  क्युकी the संसार is नहीं वस्तुतः a स्टेज  .
By  figuratively asserting कि the संसार is a स्टेज , शेक्सपियर उपयोग the अंक of तुलना between the संसार और a स्टेज to convey an समझना  about the mechanics of the world and the lives of the people within it .
माउंट फुजी , इससे the thirty-six दृश्य of माउंट फुजी , रंग  woodcut by Katsushika Hokusai
Rembrandt van  rijn , self-portrait , etching , c.1630
Francisco Goya  , वहीँ is no एक to सहायता उन्हें , आपदाओं of युद्ध श्रेणी  , aquatint c.1810
Felix  vallotton , la raison probante ( the cogent कारण  ) , woodcut from the series Intimités , 1898
Printmaking is the  प्रक्रम of बनाना artworks by मुद्रण , सामान्यतः  on paper .
Printmaking normally  कवर तभी the प्रक्रम of बनाना prints साथ an तत्व of मौलिकता , बल्कि  than just being a photographic reproduction of a painting .
Except in the case of  monotyping , the प्रक्रम is सक्षम of producing multiples of the वही  piece , which is called a print .
Each print produced is not considered a  `` नक़ल '' लकिन बल्कि is माना an `` असली  '' .
This is because typically each print varies to an extent due to variables intrinsic to the printmaking process , and also because the imagery of a  छपाई is typically नहीं बस a जनन of another कार्य लकिन बल्कि is प्रायः a अद्वितीय चित्र designed इससे the प्रारंभ to be expressed in a particular printmaking तकनीक  .
A  छपाई may be ज्ञात  as an impression .
Printmaking ( other than monotyping  ) is नहीं चुनी तभी लिये इसके क्षमता to उपज अनेक impressions , लकिन  rather for the unique qualities that each of the printmaking processes lends itself to .
Prints are created  by transferring स्याही इससे a मेट्रिक्स or through a prepared स्क्रीन to a चादर  of paper or other material .
Common types of matrices include : metal plates , usually  तांबे or जस्ता , or पॉलिमर प्लेटों लिये नक्काशी or etching ; स्टोन , एल्यूमिनियम , or पॉलिमर लिये lithography ; ब्लॉक of लकडी लिये woodcuts  and wood engravings ; and linoleum for linocuts .
Screens made of silk  or सिंथेटिक fabrics हैं प्रयुक्त  for the screenprinting process .
Other types of  मेट्रिक्स substrates और सम्बन्धित प्रक्रियाओं हैं  discussed below .
Multiple  impressions मुद्रित इससे the वही मेट्रिक्स रूप an  edition .
Since the late 19th century ,  कलाकारों have generally हस्ताक्षरित व्यक्तिगत impressions इससे an संस्करण और  often number the impressions to form a limited edition .
prints may भी be मुद्रित in किताब रूप , ऐसे as illustrated  books or artist 's books .
Il Divo is  an अंग्रेज़ी बहुराष्ट्रीय operatic पॉप गायन समूह निर्मित  by music manager , executive , and reality TV star Simon Cowell .
Formed  in the संयुक्त किंगडम , वे हैं भी हस्ताक्षरित  to Cowell 's record label , Syco Music .
Il Divo is a group of four male singers : French  पॉप सिंगर सेबेस्तियन izambard , स्पेनी baritone कार्लोस marín , अमरीकी टेनर दाउद  Miller , and Swiss tenor Urs Bühler .
To  तिथि , वे have बेची अधिक than 26 लाख  albums worldwide .
Su-15 , one of the  प्रिंसिपल सोवियत एयर रक्षा interceptors  in the 1970s and 1980s
An interceptor aircraft ( or simply  interceptor ) is a प्रकार of सेनानी वायुयान designed specifically to prevent मिशन  of enemy aircraft , particularly bombers and reconnaissance aircraft , and destroy them , relying usually on great speed and powerful armament .
Being used since the  पहला संसार युद्ध , बाद the लेट 1960s , interceptors became कम महत्वपूर्ण due to shifting इससे बमवर्षक to इंटरकांटिनेंटल  ballistic missiles ( ICBMs ) for nuclear warfare .
A  वियतनामी अमरीकी ( ) is an अमरीकी of वियतनामी  descent .
They make up  परिचय हाफ of सब विदेशी वियतनामी ( người việt hải ngoại ) और  are the fourth-largest Asian American group .
Mass Vietnamese immigration to the United  राज्य प्रारंभ बाद 1975 , बाद the समाप्त of the  Vietnam War .
Early immigrants were  शरणार्थी नाव लोगों fleeing persecution or गरीबी  .
Forced to flee from their homeland and often thrust into poor urban neighborhoods , these newcomers have  nevertheless प्रबंधित to स्थापित दमदार समुदायों in a छोटी राशि of समय .
More than sixty percent of Vietnamese  अमेरिकी reside in the राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया , टेक्सास , वॉशिंगटन , फ्लोरिडा , और वर्जिनिया  .
Front page of the U.S.  हथियारबंद शक्तियां समाचारपत्र , सितारों और धारियाँ  , 2 May 1945
Adolf Hitler committed suicide  by gunshot on 30 अप्रैल 1945 in उसके führerbunker in बर्लिन  .
His  बीवी एवा ( née braun ) वचनबद्ध आत्महत्या साथ उसे by  ingesting cyanide .
That afternoon , in accordance with Hitler 's prior instructions ,  उनके remains यहूद carried up the सीढ़ियाँ through the बंकर 's आपात निकास , doused in पेट्रोल और नियत alight in the reich chancellery गार्डन  outside the bunker .
The Soviet archives record that their burnt remains  यहूद बरामद और interred in successive स्थितियाँ जबतक 1970 जब वे यहूद again exhumed  , cremated and the ashes scattered .
Accounts differ as to the  कारण of मौत ; एक कि he died by ज़हर तभी और another कि he died by a self-inflicted gunshot ,  while biting down on a cyanide capsule .
Contemporary  इतिहासकारों have अस्वीकृत ये खाते as होने either सोवियत प्रचार or an attempted सुलह in  order to reconcile the different conclusions .
One  eye-witness अंकित कि the देह दिखाया लक्षण of having महरूम  shot through the mouth , but this has been proven unlikely .
There is also  विवाद regarding the authenticity of कपाल  and jaw fragments which were recovered .
In 2009 , DNA  परीक्षण यहूद performed on a कपाल सोवियत officials था long believed  to be Hitler 's .
The  परीक्षण नाज़िल कि the कपाल थी दरअसल कि of a स्त्री कम  than 40 years old .
स्थान of मिसौरी
The alcohol laws of  मिसौरी हैं among the तनिक प्रतिबंधक और सबसे lax और permissive in the संयुक्त  States .
Missouri is known throughout the  मिडवेस्ट लिये इसके largely laissez-faire दृष्टिकोण to दारू विनियमन , in शार्प कंट्रास्ट to the बहुत सख्त दारू कानून  of some of its neighbors , like Kansas and Oklahoma .
Necrotizing fasciitis ( or ) or NF , commonly known as  flesh-eating बीमारी or flesh-eating जीवाणु सिंड्रोम , is a विरल संक्रमण of the deeper परतों  of skin and subcutaneous tissues , easily spreading across the fascial plane within the subcutaneous tissue .
Necrotizing fasciitis is quickly  progressing , having वृहद रिस्क of विकासशील in the immunocompromised due to शर्तें  like diabetes , cancer , etc .
It is a severe disease of sudden onset and  is प्रायः treated तत्काल साथ ऊँची doses of intravenous  antibiotics .
Type I describes a polymicrobial  संक्रमण , whereas प्रकार ii describes a monomicrobial  infection .
Many types of bacteria can cause necrotizing fasciitis ( e.g. , Group A  streptococcus ( streptococcus pyogenes ) , staphylococcus aureus , clostridium perfringens , bacteroides fragilis , aeromonas  hydrophila ) .
Such infections are more likely to  occur in लोगों साथ compromised  immune systems .
Historically , Group A  streptococcus बना up सबसे मामले of प्रकार ii infections  .
However , since as early as 2001 , another serious form of  monomicrobial necrotizing fasciitis रै महरूम observed साथ increasing आवृत्ति , caused by methicillin-resistant staphylococcus aureus  ( MRSA ) .
Some published  मामला रिपोर्ट्स have implied a संभावित कड़ी between उपयोग of non-steroidal anti-inflammatory दवाएँ और nf , हालांकि the प्रमाण of the कड़ी थी कहा to be कमजोर क्युकी  of a small number of case patients and it was unclear whether the drugs just masked the symptoms of a secondary infection or were a cause per se .
World War II ( WWII or WW2  ) , भी ज्ञात as the दूसरी संसार युद्ध , थी a वैश्विक युद्ध कि lasted इससे  1939 to 1945 .
It involved the vast majority of the world 's  राष्ट्र —including सब of the ग्रेट शक्तियां —eventually forming दो opposing सैन्य alliances  : the Allies and the Axis .
It was the most widespread war in history , with more than  100 लाख लोगों सेवारत in सैन्य इकाई इससे over 30 अलग देशों  .
In a  राज्य of `` कुल युद्ध `` , the प्रमुख भागीदार लगाई उनके संपूर्ण आर्थिक , औद्योगिक , और वैज्ञानिक सामर्थ्य at  the service of the war effort , erasing the distinction between civilian and military resources .
Marked  by द्रव्यमान मौतों of नागरिकों , सहित the holocaust और the तभी उपयोग of नाभिकीय हथियार in warfare , it resulted in 50  million to over 75 million fatalities .
These deaths make World War  ii by दूर the deadliest विरोध in इंसान  history .
The Empire of Japan aimed to dominate East Asia and was already at war with  the गणतंत्र of चीन in 1937 , लकिन the संसार युद्ध is generally कहा to have begun on 1 सितंबर 1939 साथ the आक्रमण of कैंडल by जर्मनी  and subsequent declarations of war on Germany by France and Britain .
From late 1939 to early 1941 , in  a श्रेणी of अभियान और treaties , जर्मनी formed the अक्ष गठबंधन  with Italy , conquering or subduing much of continental Europe .
Following the Molotov–Ribbentrop Pact , Germany and  the सोवियत संघ partitioned और annexed territories between themselves of उनके यूरोपीय  neighbours , including Poland .
The United Kingdom and the other members of the British Commonwealth  यहूद the तभी प्रमुख अलाइड शक्तियां continuing the लड़ो विरूद्ध the अक्ष , साथ लड़ाइयों लेने प्लेस in उत्तर अफ़्रीकी  as well as the long-running Battle of the Atlantic .
In June 1941 , the European Axis  शुभारम्भ an आक्रमण of the सोवियत संघ , giving a प्रारंभ to the largest जमीन थिएटर of युद्ध in इतिहास , जिससे tied bas  the major part of the Axis ' military forces for the rest of the war .
In December 1941 , Japan joined the Axis ,  attacked the संयुक्त राज्य और यूरोपीय territories in the प्रशांत समंदर , और जल्दी conquered  much of the Western Pacific .
The Axis advance was stopped in 1942 ,  बाद जापानी खोया a श्रेणी of नवल लड़ाइयों और यूरोपीय अक्ष सैनिकों यहूद पराजित in  North Africa and , decisively , at Stalingrad .
In 1943 , with a series  of जर्मनी defeats in पूर्वी यूरोपीय , the अलाइड आक्रमण of इटली , और अमरीकी victories in the प्रशांत , the अक्ष खोया the पहल  and undertook strategic retreat on all fronts .
In  1944 , the पश्चिमी allies invaded फ़्रांस ,  while the Soviet Union regained all of its territorial losses and invaded Germany and its allies .
During 1944 and 1945 the United  राज्य पराजित the जापानी नेवी और captured कुंजी पश्चिमी  Pacific islands .
The war in  यूरोपीय ended साथ the कैप्चर of बर्लिन by सोवियत और पॉलिश सैनिकों और the subsequent जर्मनी  unconditional surrender on 8 May 1945 .
Following  the पॉट्सडैम घोषणा by the allies on 26 जुलाई 1945 , the संयुक्त राज्य dropped परमाणु बम  on the Japanese cities of Hiroshima on 6 August , and Nagasaki on 9 August .
With an invasion of the Japanese  द्वीपसमूह निकट , और the सोवियत संघ having घोषित युद्ध on जापानी by आक्रमणकारी मंचूरिया ,  Japan surrendered on 15 August 1945 , ending the war in Asia and cementing the total victory of the Allies over the Axis .
World War II altered the  राजनैतिक संरेखण और सोशल ढांचा of the संसार .
The United  राष्ट्र ( un ) थी स्थापित to फोस्टर अंतरराष्ट्रीय  cooperation and prevent future conflicts .
The great powers that were the victors of the war—the United States , the Soviet Union , China , the  संयुक्त किंगडम , और france—became the स्थाई सदस्यों of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र सुरक्षा  Council .
The Soviet Union and the United  राज्य उभरा as प्रतिद्वंद्वी superpowers , सेटिंग the स्टेज लिये the ठंडा युद्ध , जिससे lasted  for the next 46 years .
Meanwhile , the influence of European great powers  प्रारंभ to मनाही , जबकि the decolonisation of एशिया  and Africa began .
Most countries  जिनकी उद्योग था महरूम क्षतिग्रस्त स्थानांतरित towards  economic recovery .
Political integration ,  विशेषकर in यूरोपीय , उभरा as an प्रयत्न to stabilise postwar संबंध और लड़ो अधिक  effectively in the Cold War .
A limited liability  कम्पनी ( llc ) is a लचीली रूप of एंटरप्राइज़ कि मिश्रणों तत्व of साझेदारी  and corporate structures .
Note than an LLC is not a  निगम , और कॉलिंग an llc a निगम is technically  incorrect .
An LLC is a legal form of company that  provides सीमित देयता to इसके स्वामी in the विशाल बहुमत of संयुक्त राज्य  jurisdictions .
LLCs do  नहीं need to be व्यवस्थित लिये लाभ  .
पाँच  K-Cups
The inside of a used K-Cup ,  साथ the शीर्ष foil और the प्रयुक्त कॉफी grounds removed  .
इस shows the फिल्टर अंदर  the K-Cup .
K-Cup portion packs are used with  keurig or अन्य सिंगल कप brewing प्रणालियों to काढ़ा a कप of कॉफी  , tea , or hot chocolate .
Each K-Cup is a  प्लास्टिक संग्राहक साथ a कॉफी फिल्टर  inside .
मैदान कॉफी सेम हैं packed in the k-cup और sealed air-tight  with a combination plastic and foil lid .
When the K-Cup is placed in a Keurig brewer , the brewer  punctures the foil ढक्कन और the नीचे of the k-cup और शक्तियां hot जल  under pressure through the K-Cup and into a mug .
Keurig licenses its K-Cup technology to coffee roasters and tea makers such as Green Mountain Coffee  roasters , diedrich/ ग्लोरिया जीन्स , टिमोथी 's संसार कॉफी , वैन houtte , हिरण कॉफी , celestial seasonings , bigelow चाय कम्पनी , twinings , टली 's , कॉफी  People and Newman 's Own .
keurig 's patents on the असली k-cup डिज़ाइन समाप्त  in September 2012 .
Keurig holds at least one additional , still-active  us पेटेंट और another पेटेंट अनुप्रयोग , detailing सुधार कि have  subsequently been incorporated in their K-Cup design .
Electa  जेब chronograph ( ca . 1890s ) manufactured by the gallet देखें  Company in La Chaux-de-Fonds , Switzerland .
gallet multichron astronomic ( ca . 1959 ) —complex mechanical chronograph साथ 12  hour recoding capabilities , automatic day , date , month , and moon phase display
A modern Seiko  क्वार्ट्ज wristwatch using the chronograph फलन  ( movement 7T92 ) .
Citizen Atessa  eco-drive atv53-3023 analog-digital chronograph साथ 4 क्षेत्रफल रेडियो नियंत्रित रिसेप्शन ( उत्तर अमेरिका  , Europe , China , Japan ) .
A  chronograph is a विशिष्ट प्रकार of देखें कि  is used as a stopwatch combined with a display watch .
A basic chronograph has an independent sweep second hand  ; it can be प्रारंभ , रोका , और लौटे to शून्य by successive दबाव on the  stem .
Louis  moinet invented the chronograph  in 1816
Conventional PCI ( PCI is an  initialism formed इससे परिधीय घटक इंटरकनेक्ट , भाग of the पीसीआई लोकल बस मानक और प्रायः shortened  to just PCI ) is a local computer bus for attaching hardware devices in a computer .
The PCI bus supports the functions found on a  प्रोसेसर बस , लकिन in a मानकीकृत स्वरूप कि is स्वतंत्र of  any particular processor .
Devices  कनेक्ट to the बस appear to the प्रोसेसर to be कनेक्ट सीधे to  the processor bus , and are assigned addresses in the processor 's address space .
Attached devices can take either the form of  an एकीकृत सर्किट fitted onto the मदरबोर्ड itself , पुकारा a planar यंत्र in the पीसीआई specification  , or an expansion card that fits into a slot .
The PCI  लोकल बस थी पहला implemented in ibm pc compatibles , जहाँ it विस्थापित  the combination of ISA plus one VESA Local Bus as the bus configuration .
It has  subsequently महरूम अपनाया लिये अन्य कंप्यूटर  types .
PCI and PCI-X are being replaced by PCI Express , but , most  motherboards हैं स्टिल बना साथ एक or अधिक पीसीआई स्लॉट , जिससे हैं sufficient लिये अनेक  uses .
The PCI specification covers the physical size of the bus (  सहित the आकार और अंतरण of the सर्किट फलक किनारे विद्युत सम्पर्क ) , विद्युत विशेषताएँ , बस समय  , and protocols .
The specification can be purchased from  the पीसीआई खास ब्याज समूह ( pci-sig  ) .
Typical PCI cards used in PCs include : network  ताश , ध्वनि ताश , modems , अतिरिक्त पोर्ट ऐसे as usb or सीरियल , tv ट्यूनर ताश और डिस्क  controllers .
PCI video cards  replaced isa और vesa ताश , जबतक growing बैंडविड्थ आवश्यकताएँ outgrew the सामर्थ्य of पीसीआई ; the पसन्दीदा  interface for video cards became AGP , and then PCI Express .
PCI video  ताश remain उपलब्धियाँ लिये उपयोग साथ  old PCs without AGP or PCI Express slots .
अनेक डिवाइस previously provided on पीसीआई विस्तार ताश हैं अभी commonly एकीकृत onto motherboards  or available in universal serial bus and PCI Express versions .
माइकल whitaker स्मिथ ( born अक्तूबर 7 , 1957 ) is an अमरीकी समकालीन ईसाई संगीतकार  , who has charted primarily in the contemporary Christian and occasionally in the mainstream charts .
His biggest success in mainstream music was in 1991 when `` Place  in इस संसार '' hit no . 6 on the बिलबोर्ड  Hot 100 .
Smith is a three-time  ग्रैमी पुरस्कार विजेता , और रै  earned 40 Dove Awards .
Over the course of his career ,  he बेची अधिक than 13 लाख एल्बम और अंकित 29 no . 1 hit गीतों , चौदह सुनहरा  albums , and five platinum albums .
Smith is an American Music Award  प्राप्तकर्ता ; he थी भी नामित एक of लोगों पत्रिका 's `` सबसे खूबसूरत लोगों  '' .
an अमरीकी पोस्टर इससे the संसार युद्ध ii -era कि थी प्रयुक्त to inform लोगों  about what they should do if they suspect sabotage .
Sabotage is a deliberate action aimed at  weakening another एंटिटी through subversion , रुकावट , disruption , or  destruction .
In a workplace  सेटिंग , तोड़फोड़ is the सचेत वापसी  of efficiency generally directed at causing some change in workplace conditions .
One who engages  in तोड़फोड़ is a saboteur  .
As a rule , saboteurs try to conceal  उनके पहचान क्युकी of the consequences of उनके क्रियाएँ  .
For example , whereas  an पर्यावरणीय दबाव समूह might be प्रसन्न to be पहचाना साथ an अधिनियम of तोड़फोड़  , it would not want the individual identities of the perpetrators known .
Patrick Henry College ( PHC ) is a private , independent college with an Evangelical Christian basis  कि focuses on शिक्षण शास्त्रीय उदार कला और सरकारी , स्तिथ in purcellville , वर्जिनिया , संयुक्त  States .
Patrick Henry is known for  इसके रूढ़िवादी धर्मान्तरण  Christian focus .
As of April 17 , 2007 , the  कॉलेज थी accredited by the transnational संघ of ईसाई कॉलेजों और स्कूलों , a नेशनल faith-related accrediting  organization recognized by the Department of Education and the Council for Higher Education Accreditation .
The school was  संस्थापित साथ the सहायता of the घर स्कूल विधिक रक्षा संघ , और अभी serves  as the headquarters for the organization , with which it is still closely connected .
The history of television comprises the  कार्य of numerous इंजीनियर्स और आविष्कारक in अनेक देशों over अनेक  decades .
The earliest proposal was in 1908 , in a paper by A . A.  campbell-swinton और postulated the उपयोग of कैथोड  rays .
The first practical demonstrations of television , however ,  यहूद विकसित using electromechanical विधि to स्कैन , संचारण , और reproduce  an image .
As electronic camera and display  tubes यहूद perfected , electromechanical टेलीविज़न दिया रास्ता to all-electronic प्रणालियों in nearly  all applications .
L'Idéal Cinéma - Jacques Tati at Aniche opened November 23rd  1905 ; the oldest still-active फिल्म थिएटर in the  world
A  सिनेमा in ऑस्ट्रेलिया
A  ठेठ मल्टीप्लेक्स ( एएमसी सैर 16  in Woodland Hills , Los Angeles , U.S. )
A movie theater ( also called a  सिनेमा , फिल्म हाउस , फिल्मी हाउस , फिल्मी थिएटर or चित्र हाउस ) is a स्थान ,  usually a building , for viewing films .
Most but not all movie theaters are commercial  परिचालन केटरिंग to the सामान्य पब्लिक , जो attend by खरीदना a टिकट  .
The movie is projected with a movie  प्रोजेक्टर onto a विशाल प्रक्षेप स्क्रीन at the सामने of the ऑडिटोरियम  .
Most movie theaters are now equipped  लिये डिजिटल सिनेमा प्रक्षेप , निकालना the need to बनाएँ और हस्तांतरण a शारीरिक  film print .
Southern California Norton  मालिक 's क्लबों on कैलिफ़ोर्निया राज्य रूट 41 ,  near Creston .
A  मोटरसाइकिल क्लबों is a समूह of individuals जिनकी प्राथमिक ब्याज और क्रियाएँ  involve motorcycles .
lyme बीमारी , lyme borreliosis is an संक्रामक बीमारी caused by at तनिक  three species of bacteria belonging to the genus Borrelia .
Borrelia burgdorferi sensu stricto is the main cause of Lyme disease in  उत्तर अमेरिका , whereas borrelia afzelii और borrelia garinii कारण सबसे यूरोपीय  cases .
The disease is named after  the कस्बों of lyme और बूढ़ा lyme , कनेक्टिकट , यूएसए , जहाँ a क्रमांक of मामले यहूद पहचाना  in 1975 .
हालांकि एलन steere एहसास कि lyme बीमारी थी a tick-borne बीमारी in 1978 ,  the cause of the disease remained a mystery until 1981 , when B. burgdorferi was identified by Willy Burgdorfer .
Lyme disease  is the सबसे आम tick-borne बीमारी in the उत्तरी  Hemisphere .
Borrelia is transmitted to humans by the  काटना of संक्रमित ticks belonging to a few प्रजाति of the genus  Ixodes ( `` hard ticks '' ) .
Early  लक्षण may शामिल ज्वर , सिरदर्द , थकान , अवसाद , और a characteristic  circular skin rash called erythema migrans ( EM ) .
Left untreated , later symptoms may  involve the joints , दिल , और सेंट्रल बेचैन प्रणाली  .
In most cases , the  संक्रमण और इसके लक्षण हैं eliminated by एंटीबायोटिक , विशेषकर if the बीमारी  is treated early .
Delayed or inadequate treatment can  सीसे to अधिक गंभीर लक्षण , जिससे can be disabling और  difficult to treat .
Penises of minke  whales on प्रदर्शक at the आइसलैंडिक  Phallological Museum
Penis ( plural penises  or penes ) is a सामान्य पद लिये the अंगों साथ जिससे पुरूष और उभयलिंगी पशु introduce  sperm into receptive females during copulation .
Such organs occur in many animals , both vertebrate and invertebrate , but males  do नहीं भालू a शिश्न in प्रत्येक एनिमल प्रजाति , और in those प्रजाति in जिससे the पुरूष करता भालू a so-called शिश्न  , the penes in the various species are not necessarily homologous .
For example , the penis of a mammal is  at सबसे analogous to the शिश्न of a पुरूष कीट  or barnacle .
The term penis applies to many  reproductive intromittent अंगों , लकिन नहीं to सब ; लिये उदाहरण the intromittent अंग of सबसे cephalopoda  is the hectocotylus , a specialised arm , and male spiders use their pedipalps .
In most species of animals in which there is an organ that might reasonably be described as a penis , it has no major function other than intromission , or  at तनिक conveying the शुक्राणु to the मादा , लकिन in the placental स्तनधारियों the शिश्न bears the distal भाग of the urethra , जिससे discharges दोनो मूत्र दौरान urination और वीर्य दौरान  copulation as the occasion requires .
Artists and repertoire ( A & R ) is the division of a record label or music publishing  कम्पनी कि is जिम्मेदार लिये हुनर बालचर और overseeing the कलाकारी विकास of रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकारों  and/or songwriters .
It also acts as a liaison between artists and the record label or publishing  कम्पनी ; प्रत्येक कार्यकलाप involving कलाकारों to the पाइंट of एल्बम रिलीज is generally माना अंतर्गत the purview of , और जिम्मेदारी of ,  A & R .
A furlong is a measure of distance  in इम्पीरियल इकाई और u.S. प्रथागत इकाई बराबर to one-eighth of a मील , समतुल्य  to 220 yards , 660 feet , 40 rods , or 10 chains .
The exact value of the  furlong varies थोड़ा among english-speaking  countries .
Five furlongs are approximately 1  किलोमीटर ( 1.0058 km is a करीब सन्निकटन  ) .
Since the original definition of the  मीटर थी one-quarter of एक ten-millionth of the परिधि of the धरती ( साथ the ग्रेट वृत्त coincident साथ the मध्याह्न of देशांतर गुजर through पेरिस ) , the परिधि of the धरती is परिचय 40,000 km or परिचय  200,000 furlongs .
cr2032 लिथियम बटन कोशिका  battery
लिथियम 9 वोल्ट , aa , & aaa आकार
Lithium  बैटरी हैं डिस्पोजेबल ( प्राथमिक ) बैटरी कि have लिथियम  metal or lithium compounds as an anode .
They stand apart from other batteries in their high  चार्ज घनत्व ( long जीवन ) और ऊँची लागत प्रति ईकाई  .
Depending on the design and chemical compounds used , lithium cells can produce voltages from 1.5 V ( comparable to a  zinc–carbon or क्षारीय बैटरी ) to परिचय 3.7 V. लिथियम बैटरी हैं widely प्रयुक्त in उत्पाद ऐसे  as portable consumer electronic devices .
Raymond `` Ray '' Charles Jack LaMontagne  ( ; born जून 18 , 1973 ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter .
LaMontagne has released four  स्टुडियो एल्बम , ट्रबल , तक the सूर्य turns ब्लैक , गपशप in the अनाज  and God Willin ' & the Creek Do n't Rise .
He was born in New  हैम्पशायर और थी प्रेरित to बनाएँ म्यूज़िक बाद सुनना an एल्बम  by Stephen Stills .
Critics have compared  lamontagne 's म्यूज़िक to कि of the बैंड , वैन  Morrison , Nick Drake , and Tim Buckley .
He lives  in मैसाचुसेट्स साथ उसके बीवी और दो  children .
When the Wind Blows is  a अनोखा by जेम्स पैटरसन  .
It is the  precursor to the झील हाउस और प्रेरित the अधिकतम सवारी श्रेणी  .
The novel is  फिलहाल नियत to be adapted  into a movie .
The  पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स यहूद संस्थापित  in 1933 .
Over the course of the team 's history , the team has had several logos while  wearing वस्तुतः the वही वर्दी over the सालो , साथ हल्का परिवर्तन बना to दे the वर्दी an अद्यतनीकृत dekh  .
The team colors ,  वर्दी , और लोगो हैं प्रायः  ranked as being among the best in the NFL .
फेसबुक on  the Ad-tech 2010
Facebook is an online  सोशल नेटवर्किंग सेवा , जिनकी नाम तना इससे the colloquial नाम लिये the किताब दिए to विद्यार्थी at the प्रारंभ of the अकादमिक  year by some university administrations in the United States to help students get to know each other .
It was founded in February 2004 by  चिह्नित zuckerberg साथ उसके कॉलेज roommates और fellow हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों विद्यार्थी एडुआर्डो saverin , एंड्रयू mccollum , डस्टिन  Moskovitz and Chris Hughes .
The website 's membership was initially limited by the founders to Harvard students , but was  विस्तारित to अन्य कॉलेजों in the बोस्टन क्षेत्रफल , the आइवी लीग , और स्टैनफोर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों  .
It gradually added  support लिये विद्यार्थी at विभिन्न अन्य विश्वविद्यालयों पहले खोलने to ऊँची स्कूल विद्यार्थी ,  and eventually to anyone aged 13 and over .
Facebook now allows any users who declare  themselves to be at तनिक 13 सालो बूढ़ा to become पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता of the साईट  .
Users must register before using the site , after which they may  बनाएँ a निजी प्रोफ़ाइल , add अन्य उपयोक्ता as मित्रों , और एक्सचेंज  messages , including automatic notifications when they update their profile .
Additionally , users may join common-interest user groups , organized by workplace , school  or कॉलेज , or अन्य विशेषताएँ , और categorize उनके मित्रों into सूचियाँ ऐसे as `` लोगों इससे कार्य '' or `` बंद  Friends '' .
As of  सितंबर 2012 , फेसबुक रै over  one billion active users .
According to a May 2011 Consumer Reports survey , there are 7.5  लाख children अंतर्गत 13 साथ खाते और 5 लाख अंतर्गत 10 , violating  the site 's terms of service .
In May  2005 , accel साझेदार invested $ 12.7 लाख in फेसबुक , और जिम breyer added $ 1 लाख  of his own money to the pot .
A January 2009 Compete.com study ranked  फेसबुक as the सबसे प्रयुक्त सोशल नेटवर्किंग सेवा by विश्वव्यापी  monthly active users .
Entertainment Weekly included the site on its end-of-the-decade `` best-of '' list , saying , `` How on earth did we  stalk हमारी exes , याद हमारी co-workers ' जन्मदिन , कीड़ा हमारी मित्रों , और खेल a rousing  game of Scrabulous before Facebook ? ''
Critics , such as Facebook Detox , state that Facebook has turned  into a नेशनल obsession in the संयुक्त राज्य , resulting in विशाल amounts of समय खोया और प्रोत्साहित आत्ममोह  .
Quantcast  estimates फेसबुक रै 138.9 लाख मासिक अद्वितीय  U.S. visitors in May 2011 .
According to Social Media Today , in April 2010 an estimated  41.6 % ( 129.5 लाख ) of the u.S. जनसांख्यिकी था a फेसबुक  account .
Nevertheless , Facebook 's market growth started to stall in some  regions , साथ the साईट खोने 7 लाख क्रियाशील उपयोक्ता in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा  in May 2011 .
Facebook  आखिरकार दायर लिये an आरंभिक पब्लिक offering on फ़रवरी  1 , 2012 , and was headquartered in Menlo Park , California .
Facebook Inc.  began selling भण्डार to the पब्लिक और व्यापार  on the NASDAQ on May 18 , 2012 .
Erwin Johannes Eugen Rommel (  15 नवम्बर 1891 – 14 अक्तूबर 1944 ) , popularly ज्ञात as the मरुस्थल फॉक्स ( wüstenfuchs  , ) , was a German Field Marshal of World War II .
He earned the respect of  दोनो उसके अपना सैनिकों और the दुश्मनों  he fought .
Rommel was a highly decorated officer in World War  i और थी awarded the डालना le mérite लिये उसके कारनामे on the  Italian front .
In World War II , he  further विशिष्ट खुद as the कमांडर of the 7th panzer प्रभाग दौरान  the 1940 invasion of France .
His leadership of German and Italian forces in the North  अफ़्रीकी अभियान स्थापित उसे as एक of the सबसे समर्थ कमांडरों of the युद्ध , और अर्जित उसे the appellation of the मरुस्थल फॉक्स .
He is  regarded as एक of the सबसे skilled कमांडरों  of desert warfare in the conflict .
He  बाद commanded the जर्मनी शक्तियां opposing  the Allied cross-channel invasion in Normandy .
His  कार्यभार never took उसे to the  Eastern Front .
Rommel is  regarded as having महरूम a दयालु और पेशेवर  officer .
His Afrika  कोर्प्स थी never अभियुक्त of युद्ध अपराधों , और सैनिको captured दौरान उसके  Africa campaign were reported to have been treated humanely .
Orders to  मार यहूदी सैनिको , नागरिकों और captured  commandos were ignored .
Late in the war ,  ख़बरों थी linked to the षड्यंत्र to  assassinate Adolf Hitler .
Since  ख़बरों थी a नेशनल नायिका , हिटलर  desired to eliminate him quietly .
he मजबूर ख़बरों to कमिट आत्महत्या साथ a साइनाइड गोली , in वापसी लिये आश्वासनों कि  Rommel 's family would not be persecuted following his death .
Stained glass  प्रतिनिधित्व of the पावन स्पिरिट  as a dove , c. 1660 .
The seven gifts of the Holy Spirit  is an enumeration of सात आध्यात्मिक उपहार originating साथ patristic लेखक , बाद elaborated by पाँच  intellectual virtues and four other groups of ethical characteristics .
They are  : अक्ल , समझना , अचरज और डरते ( भय of the रब ) , counsel  , knowledge , fortitude , and piety ( reverence ) .
The Earth Day Flag , the  नवीनतम प्रस्ताव of जॉन mcconnell लिये a  flag of Earth Day
Earth Day is an annual event , celebrated on April 22 , on which  कार्यक्रम हैं आयोजित विश्वव्यापी to demonstrate support लिये पर्यावरणीय  protection .
It was first celebrated  in 1970 , और is अभी समन्वित globally by the धरती दिन संजाल  , and celebrated in more than 192 countries each year .
In 1969 at a UNESCO Conference in San Francisco , the  तिथि प्रस्तावित थी कूच 21 , 1970 , the पहला दिन  of spring in the northern hemisphere .
This day of nature 's  equipoise थी बाद मंजूर in a उदघोषणा हस्ताक्षरित by सचिव  General U Thant at the United Nations .
A month later a separate Earth Day  थी संस्थापित by संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटर gaylord नेल्सन  as an environmental teach-in first held on April 22 , 1970 .
नेल्सन थी बाद awarded the अध्यक्षीय पदक of स्वतंत्रता पुरस्कार in मान्यता  of his work .
While this April 22 Earth Day was focused on the United States , an  संगठन शुभारम्भ by डेनिस हेज़ , जो थी the असली नेशनल समन्वयक in 1970 , took it  international in 1990 and organized events in 141 nations .
Numerous communities  celebrate धरती सप्ताह , an संपूर्ण सप्ताह of क्रियाएँ केन्द्रित on पर्यावरणीय  issues .
Iodine is a  रासायनिक तत्व साथ प्रतीक i और परमाणु क्रमांक  53 .
The name is  इससे यूनानी ioeidēs , अर्थ बैंगनी or जामुनी , due to the  color of elemental iodine vapor .
Iodine and its compounds are primarily  प्रयुक्त in पोषण , और industrially in the उत्पादन of एसिटिक  acid and certain polymers .
Iodine 's relatively high atomic number , low  toxicity , और आसानी of अनुलग्नक to सशुल्क यौगिकों have बना it a भाग of अनेक x-ray कंट्रास्ट सामग्री in आधुनिक  medicine .
आयोडीन रै तभी एक  stable isotope .
A number of iodine  radioisotopes हैं भी प्रयुक्त in चिकित्सा  applications .
Iodine is found on Earth mainly as the highly  water-soluble आयोडाइड आयन , i− , जिससे concentrates it in महासागर और brine  pools .
Like the other  हैलोजन्स , फ़्री आयोडीन occurs मुख्यतः as a diatomic अणु i2 , और तब तभी momentarily बाद होने  oxidized from iodide by an oxidant like free oxygen .
In the universe and on Earth , iodine 's high  परमाणु क्रमांक makes it a अपेक्षाकृत विरल तत्व  .
however , इसके उपस्थिति in समंदर जल रै दिए  it a role in biology .
It is the heaviest essential element utilized widely by life in biological functions (  तभी टंगस्टन , employed in एंजाइमों by a few प्रजाति of जीवाणु , is अत्यधिक  ) .
आयोडीन 's rarity in अनेक soils , due to आरंभिक कम प्रचुरता as a crust-element , और भी leaching  of soluble iodide by rainwater , has led to many deficiency problems in land animals and inland human populations .
आयोडीन कमियां affects परिचय दो अरब लोगों और is the अग्रणी  preventable cause of intellectual disabilities .
Iodine is required by higher  पशु , जिससे उपयोग it to synthesize  thyroid hormones , which contain the element .
Because of this function ,  radioisotopes of आयोडीन हैं concentrated in the थायराइड  gland along with nonradioactive iodine .
If inhaled , the radioisotope iodine-131 , which has a high fission product  उपज , concentrates in the थायराइड , लकिन is easily remedied साथ पोटैशियम आयोडाइड उपचार  .
Lobbying ( also lobby ) is  the अधिनियम of attempting to influence निर्णय बना by officials in the  government , most often legislators or members of regulatory agencies .
Lobbying is done by many different types of  लोगों और व्यवस्थित समूह , सहित individuals in the निजी सेक्टर , corporations  , fellow legislators or government officials , or advocacy groups ( interest groups ) .
Lobbyists may be among a legislator 's constituencies ,  अर्थ a वोटर or bloc of मतदाता  within his or her electoral district , or not ; they may engage in lobbying as a business , or not .
Professional lobbyists are people whose business is trying to influence legislation on behalf of a  समूह or व्यक्तिगत जो  hires them .
Individuals and nonprofit organizations can also lobby as an act of  स्वयंसेवा or as a छोटी भाग of उनके सामान्य जॉब ( लिये उदाहरण , a सीईओ बैठक साथ a प्रतिनिधि परिचय a प्रोजेक्ट महत्वपूर्ण to his/her कम्पनी , or an activist बैठक साथ his/her विधायक in  an unpaid capacity ) .
Governments often define and regulate  व्यवस्थित समूह lobbying कि रै become influential  .
The  आचार और नैतिकता of lobbying  are .
Lobbying is often spoken of with  अवमानना , जब the implication is कि लोगों साथ अत्यधिक socioeconomic शक्ति हैं corrupting the विधि ( टेढ़ी it दूर इससे निष्पक्षता ) in अनुक्रम  to serve their own conflict of interest .
But another side of lobbying is making sure that others ' interests are duly defended against others ' corruption , or even simply  बनाना यकीनन कि अल्पसंख्यक रूचि हैं fairly defended विरूद्ध mere जुल्म of the बहुमत  .
For example , a  चिकित्सा संघ , or a व्यापार संघ of स्वास्थ्य बीमे कंपनियाँ , may लॉबी a विधानमंडल in अनुक्रम to counteract the influence of तम्बाकू कंपनियाँ , in जिससे मामला the lobbying होता  be viewed by most people as justified ( duly defending against others ' corruption ) .
The difficulty in drawing objective lines between which lobbyists are `` good lobbyists  '' और जिससे ones हैं `` ख़राब ones '' is compounded by the cleverness साथ जिससे lobbyists or उनके क्लाइंट can argue कि  their own lobbying is of the `` good '' kind .
At heart  , the प्रयत्न to influence विधान is a शक्ति संघर्ष  .
As in other forms of power struggle , such as war or law enforcement , motives range  इससे to self-defense to लड़ लिये इंसाफ , और the dividing लकीर between predation और इंसाफ is  subject to rationalization .
Sunshine  of अपना प्रेम गिटार रिफ
Cream were a 1960s British rock supergroup consisting of  bassist/vocalist जोकर ब्रूस , guitarist/vocalist eric क्लैप्टन , और वादक  Ginger Baker .
Their sound was characterised by a hybrid of blues rock , hard rock and  साइकेडेलिक चट्टान , combining the psychedelia-themed गीत , eric क्लैप्टन 's ब्लूज़ गिटार playing और vocals , जोकर ब्रूस 's आवाज़ और  prominent bass playing and Ginger Baker 's jazz -influenced drumming .
The group 's  तीसरा एल्बम , पहियों of आग , थी the संसार 's पहला  platinum-selling double album .
Cream are widely  regarded as होने the संसार 's पहला कामयाब  supergroup .
In their career  , वे बेची over 15 लाख  albums worldwide .
मलाई 's म्यूज़िक शामिल गीतों आधारित on परंपरागत ब्लूज़ ऐसे as `` क्रॉसरोड्स `` और `` spoonful `` , और आधुनिक ब्लूज़ ऐसे as  `` Born Under a Bad Sign `` , as well as more eccentric songs such as `` Strange Brew `` , `` Tales of Brave Ulysses `` and `` Toad `` .
Cream 's biggest  हिट्स यहूद `` i महसूस फ़्री `` ( uk , क्रमांक 11 ) , `` सनशाइन of अपना प्रेम `` ( us , क्रमांक 5 ) , `` श्वेत रूम `` ( us ,  number 6 ) , `` Crossroads '' ( US , number 28 ) , and `` Badge `` ( UK , number 18 ) .
Cream made a significant impact on the popular music of  the समय , और , साथ साथ जिमि हेंड्रिक्स , और टेरी कठ of शिकागो , popularised the उपयोग of the wah-wah  pedal .
वे provided a भारी yet technically निपुण musical थीम कि foreshadowed और बहकावे  the emergence of British bands such as The Jeff Beck Group in the late 1960s .
The  बैंड 's सजीव प्रदर्शन बहकावे प्रगतिशील चट्टान अधिनियमों  such as Rush .
Cream  यहूद inducted into the चट्टान और फेंकें हॉल of कीर्ति in  1993 .
They were included in both Rolling Stone and VH1  's सूचियाँ of the `` 100 महानतम कलाकारों of सब समय  '' .
They were  भी क्रमित क्रमांक 16 on vh1 's `` 100  Greatest Artists of Hard Rock '' .
Hairspray is a 1988 comedy film written and directed by John Waters , and starring Ricki Lake , Sonny Bono , Debbie Harry ,  माइकल st. जेरार्ड , shawn थॉम्पसन , colleen fitzpatrick , जेरी stiller , और in उसके पिछला फिल्मी भूमिका ,  Divine .
Hairspray  थी a नाटकीय प्रस्थान इससे waters ' पहले  works , with a much broader intended audience .
In fact , Hairsprays PG is the mildest rating a Waters  फिल्मी रै प्राप्त ; सबसे of उसके पिछला films यहूद रेटेड x  by the MPAA .
Set in 1962  बाल्टीमोर , मेरीलैंड , the फिल्मी घूमती around self-proclaimed `` pleasantly plump '' किशोरावस्था ट्रेसी turnblad as वो pursues स्टारडम  as a dancer on a local TV show and rallies against racial segregation .
Hairspray was only a  मॉडरेट कामयाबी upon इसके आरंभिक नाट्य रिलीज , कमाई a modest  gross of $ 8 million .
however , it प्रबंधित to आकर्षित a larger दर्शक on घर  video in the early 1990s and became a cult classic .
Most critics  praised the फिल्मी , हालांकि कुछ यहूद displeased साथ  the overall campiness .
In 2002 ,  the फिल्मी थी adapted into a ब्रॉडवे musical of the  same name , which won eight Tony Awards , including Best Musical in 2003 .
A second film version of Hairspray , an adaptation of the stage musical , was also released by New  लकीर सिनेमा in 2007 , जिससे शामिल अनेक परिवर्तन of scripted वस्तुएं इससे the असली .
The  फिल्मी भी बाँधने # 444 on साम्राज्य पत्रिका 's 2008 सूची of  the 500 greatest movies of all time .
A Christian denomination is an identifiable religious body under a  आम नाम , ढांचा , और doctrine भीतर christianity  .
Some groups included do not  consider themselves a denomination ( e.g. , the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर considers itself  the one true church and the Apostolic See , and as pre-denominational ) .
Some groups viewed by non-adherents as denominational actively resist being called a denomination and do not have any formal  denominational ढांचा , प्राधिकार , or record-keeping परे the लोकल सभा ; अनेक समूह भीतर बहाली गति पतन into इस  category .
Some groups are large ( e.g . Catholics ,  lutherans , anglicans or baptists ) , जबकि अन्य हैं बस a few छोटी  churches , and in most cases the relative size is not evident in this list .
Modern movements such as Fundamentalist Christianity , Pietism , Evangelicalism , Pentecostalism  और the पवित्रता गति sometimes क्रॉस denominational लाइनों , or in कुछ मामले बनाएँ नई denominations आउट of दो or अधिक  continuing groups , ( as is the case for many United and uniting churches , for example ) .
Such subtleties and  complexities हैं नहीं clearly चित्रित यहाँ  .
प्रमुख विभाजन भीतर  Christianity .
Note : This is not a  पूरा सूची , लकिन aims to provide a comprehensible अवलोकन of the  diversity among denominations of Christianity .
As there are reported to be approximately 41,000 Christian denominations , many of which  can नहीं be सत्यापित to be significant , तभी those denominations साथ विकिपीडिया आलेख होगा be सूचीबद्ध in अनुक्रम to ensure कि सब प्रविष्टियां on इस सूची हैं notable  and verifiable .
Between denominations , theologians , and comparative  religionists वहीँ हैं considerable मतभिन्नता परिचय जिससे समूह can be properly पुकारा ईसाई , मतभिन्नता arising primarily  from doctrinal differences between groups .
For the purpose of simplicity ,  इस सूची is intended to प्रतिबिंबित the self-understanding of प्रत्येक denomination  .
Explanations of different opinions  concerning उनके औकात as ईसाई denominations can be मिला at उनके  respective articles .
There is no official recognition in most parts of the world for religious  लाशें , और वहीँ is no आधिकारिक clearinghouse जिससे could determine the औकात or respectability of धार्मिक  bodies .
Often there is  considerable असहमति between विभिन्न चर्च परिचय whether अन्य चर्च चाहिए be labeled  with pejorative terms such as `` cult '' , or about whether this or that group enjoys some measure of respectability .
Such considerations often vary from place to place , where  एक धार्मिक समूह may आनंद बहुमत औकात in एक प्रदेश , लकिन  be widely regarded as a `` dangerous cult '' in another part of the world .
Inclusion on this list does not indicate any judgment about  the आकार , महत्व , or अक्षर of a समूह or इसके सदस्यों .
1804 map of  `` louisiana `` , edged on the वेस्ट by the रॉकी kyu  .
The  louisiana खरीदें ( `` बिक्री of louisiana '' ) थी the अधिग्रहण  by the United States of America in 1803 of of France 's claim to the territory of Louisiana .
The U.S. paid 50 million francs ( $ 11 ,250,000 ) plus cancellation of debts worth 18 million francs (  $ 3,750,000 ) , लिये a कुल योग of 15 लाख डॉलर ( कम than 3 सेंट प्रति एकड़ ) लिये the louisiana territory ( $ लाख in डॉलर , कम than  42 cents per acre ) .
The  louisiana territory encompassed सब or भाग of 15  present U.S. states and two Canadian provinces .
The land purchased contained all of  present-day अरकंसास , मिसौरी , आयोवा , ओक्लाहोमा , कान्सास , और नेब्रास्का ; भाग of मिनेसोटा कि यहूद वेस्ट of the मिसिसिपी नदी ; सबसे of उत्तर डकोटा ; सबसे of दक्षिण डकोटा ; northeastern नई मैक्सिको ; उत्तरी टेक्सास ; the portions of मोंटाना , व्योमिंग , और कोलोराडो ईस्ट of the महाद्वीपीय divide ; louisiana वेस्ट of the मिसिसिपी नदी , सहित the  city of New Orleans ; and small portions of land that would eventually become part of the Canadian provinces of Alberta and Saskatchewan .
France controlled this vast area  इससे 1699 जबतक 1762 , the साल it दिया the territory  to its ally Spain .
Under Napoleon Bonaparte ,  फ़्रांस took वापस the territory in 1800 in the आशा of भवन an साम्राज्य  in North America .
A slave revolt in Haiti and an impending war with Britain , however , led France to abandon these plans  और बेचें the संपूर्ण territory to the संयुक्त राज्य , जो था originally intended तभी to तलाश the खरीदें of नई ऑरलियन्स और इसके सटा lands  .
The purchase of the territory of  louisiana took प्लेस दौरान the प्रेसिडेंसी of थामस  Jefferson .
At the time , the purchase faced  घरेलू विपक्ष क्युकी it थी विचार to be असंवैधानिक  .
Although he agreed that the U.S. Constitution did not contain provisions for acquiring territory , Jefferson decided to go ahead with the  खरीदें वैसे in अनुक्रम to हटाएँ फ़्रांस 's उपस्थिति in the प्रदेश और to protect दोनो u.S. व्यापार अभिगम to the बंदरगाहों of नई ऑरलियन्स और फ़्री ड्योढ़ी on the मिसिसिपी नदी  .
Ceremony at Place d'Armes , New  ऑरलियन्स अंकन ट्रांसफ़र of louisiana to the संयुक्त राज्य , 10 कूच 1804  , as depicted by Thure de Thulstrup .
`` Cool Jerk '' is a  लोकप्रिय सोंग लिखा by डोनाल्ड storball और originally performed  by The Capitols .
Released in 1966 , it reached  no . 2 on the अमरीकी r & b चार्ट और no . 7 on the पॉप चार्ट  .
the बैकिंग track लिये इस सोंग थी दरअसल  recorded ( secretly ) by the Motown house band The Funk Brothers .
Per one of the Funk  भाइयो , the सोंग थी originally to be  called `` Pimp Jerk . ''
This was taken from watching neighborhood pimps , who would  नृत्य in the क्लब , लकिन यहूद too `` कूल '' to do the झटका जैसे नियमित  folks .
उनके संस्करण थी subsequently  named `` the Pimp Jerk . ''
The producer was afraid that a song with the word pimp in the title would be  बैन or नहीं प्राप्त much धनात्मक ध्यान , और था the शीर्षक बदला to इसके वर्तमान  form .
The Go-Go 's , Todd Rundgren , Big Trouble , Human Sexual  जवाब , the la de da 's , the सृष्टि , और the coasters have covered  the song .
Todd Rundgren did his version in  an विषम समय हस्ताक्षर ( 7/4 ) , giving an obviously jerky महसूस to the सोंग  .
The Go-Go 's covered  the सोंग लिये उनके 1982 एल्बम अवकाश और बाद re-recorded  it for their 1990 album Greatest .
In the feature film  घर अलोन 2 : खोया in नई यॉर्क , ताऊ फ़्रैंक ( gerry bamman ) गाती  `` Cool Jerk '' in the shower .
A version of the song with different lyrics  ( `` do the कूल चाबुक '' ) is प्रयुक्त in कूल चाबुक commercials .
A recording of `` Cool Jerk '' by Ricardo Ray is  प्रदर्शित in the विशेषता फिल्मी donnie brasco  ( 1997 ) .
The song features in the  फिल्मी खड़ा in the साए of motown , performed by the दुर्गंध भाइयो  with lead vocals by Bootsy Collins .
The song is  सुना briefly in the एनिमेटेड विशेषता , मेडागास्कर  3 : Europe 's Most Wanted .
despite इस कारण , it is सूचीबद्ध in  some variations of the film 's soundtrack .
A  लीग is a ईकाई of लंबाई ( or , rarely  , area ) .
It was long common in  यूरोपीय और लैटिन अमेरिका , लकिन it is no longer an आधिकारिक ईकाई in कोई  nation .
The  लीग originally referred to the अलहदा a व्यक्ति could  walk in an hour .
Since  the मध्य आयु , अनेक मान  have been specified in several countries .
In the context of nautical distances , the 3 mile ( 4.8  km ) अलहदा corresponds to कैसा दूर an निरीक्षक of औसत ऊँचाई ( 5'9 '' or 1.78 m ) can देखिए जब खड़ा at  sea level .
Thus , a ship traveling one `` league '' has  पहुँचे कया थी previously the farthest दृश्य  distance on the horizon .
The lack of a historical and global  मानक लिये the सटीक माप of a `` लीग '' can be accounted लिये by the परिवर्तनीय उन्नयन of the निरीक्षक ( i.e.  , sightings from a ship 's deck vs. masthead ) .
The Irish state came into  होने in 1922 as the आयरिश फ़्री राज्य , a डोमिनियन of the अंग्रेजों राष्ट्रमंडल , having seceded इससे the संयुक्त  Kingdom under the Anglo-Irish Treaty .
It comprises 26 of  आयरलैंड 's 32 काउंटी  .
Since 1949 it  रै existed as the गणतंत्र of आयरलैंड  .
From its foundation , the Irish Free State was  embroiled in a सिविल युद्ध between राष्ट्रवादियों supporting the सन्धि  and opponents who supported a republic .
The pro-Treaty side , organised as Cumann na  ngaedheal उभरा विजयी इससे the विरोध और जीती subsequent  elections .
They formed the government of the  राज्य जबतक 1932 , जब वे शांतिपूर्वक हात over शक्ति to the anti-treaty गुट in fianna fáil , जो पराजित उन्हें in  an election .
the आयरिश राज्य , despite इसके हिंसक beginnings , रै remained a उदार  democracy throughout its existence .
A new constitution in 1937 removed many of the  कड़ी साथ ब्रिटेन स्थापित अंतर्गत the सन्धि और आयरलैंड 's neutrality in  the Second World War demonstrated its independence in foreign policy matters from Britain .
In 1948  आयरलैंड formally बाएँ the अंग्रेजों राष्ट्रमंडल  and adopted the title of `` Republic '' .
In the economic sphere , the Irish state  रै था a मिश्रित प्रदर्शन  .
On  स्वतंत्रता , it थी एक of the wealthier देशों in  Europe per head of population .
However it also inherited from British rule the  समस्याएं of बेरोजगारी , करणों , uneven भौगोलिक विकास  and lack of a native industrial base .
For much of its history ,  the राज्य struggled to rectify  these problems .
Particular peaks of emigration were  अंकित दौरान the लेट 1930s , 1950s और 1980s , जब the आयरिश अर्थव्यवस्था अंकित  little growth .
In the 1930s , Fianna Fáil  सरकारें attempted to बनाएँ आयरिश घरेलू उद्योग using subsidies  and protective tarifs .
In the late 1950s , these  नीतियों यहूद dropped in पक्ष of फ़्री व्यापार साथ चयनित देशों और प्रोत्साहित of  foreign investment with low taxes .
This was expanded when Ireland entered the  यूरोपीय आर्थिक जातियाँ in 1972 .
In the 1990s and 2000s , Ireland experienced an economic boom  ज्ञात as the सेल्टिक बाघ , in जिससे the देश 's जीडीपी surpassed अनेक of इसके यूरोपीय पड़ोसी  .
Immigration also  surpassed करणों , bringing the राज्य 's जनसांख्यिकी up to  over 4 million .
However , since 2008 , Ireland has experienced a severe crisis in the  बैंकिंग सेक्टर और साथ sovereign  debt .
The resultant  आर्थिक slump रै deepened the प्रभाव  of the world recession on Ireland .
From 1937 to  1998 , the आयरिश संविधान शामिल a अर्जी on उत्तरी आयरलैंड  as a part of the national territory .
However , the state also opposed and used its security forces against those  हथियारबंद समूह - प्रधानतया the अस्थायी आयरिश रिपब्लिकन फौज , जो  tried to unite Ireland by force .
This  occurred in the 1950s , throughout the 1970s  and 1980s and has continued on a reduced scale .
Irish governments meanwhile tried to  दलाली an अनुबंध to the विरोध ज्ञात as the परेशानियों भीतर उत्तरी  Ireland from 1968 to the late 1990s .
The British government officially recognised the right of  the आयरिश सरकारी to be a पार्टी to the उत्तरी negotiations in the anglo-irish  Agreement of 1985 .
In 1998 , as part of the Good Friday Agreement , the Irish constitution was  altered by referendum to हटाएँ the territorial अर्जी to उत्तरी आयरलैंड और बजाय extend the सही of आयरिश नागरिकता to सब  the people of the island should they wish to have it .
John Quincy Adams ( July 11 ,  1767february 23 , 1848 ) थी the छठे अध्यक्ष of the  United States ( 1825–1829 ) .
He served  as अमरीकी राजनयिक , सीनेटर , और congressional  representative .
He was a member of the Federalist ,  democratic-republican , नेशनल रिपब्लिकन , और बाद anti-masonic और whig पार्टियों  .
Adams was the son of former  अध्यक्ष जॉन एडम्स और अबीगैल एडम्स  .
As a diplomat , Adams played an  महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in negotiating अनेक अंतरराष्ट्रीय treaties , सबसे notably the सन्धि  of Ghent , which ended the War of 1812 .
As Secretary of State , he negotiated with the United Kingdom  over अमेरिका 's उत्तरी किनारा साथ कनाडा , negotiated साथ स्पेन the annexation of फ्लोरिडा , और authored the मुनरो  Doctrine .
Historians agree he was one of the greatest  राजनयिकों और secretaries of राज्य in अमरीकी  history .
As president ,  he sought to modernize the अमरीकी अर्थव्यवस्था  and promoted education .
Adams enacted a part of his agenda and  सशुल्क बंद much of the नेशनल कर्ज़ .
He was stymied by a Congress  नियंत्रित by उसके दुश्मनों , और उसके कमी of patronage संजाल helped राजनेता eager to undercut  him .
He lost his  1828 बोली लिये re-election to एंड्रयू  Jackson .
In doing so , he became the first  अध्यक्ष चूंकि उसके पिता to serve a सिंगल  term .
Adams is best known as a diplomat who shaped America 's foreign policy in line  साथ उसके ardently राष्ट्रवादी प्रतिबद्धता to अमेरिका 's रिपब्लिकन मान  .
More recently Howe ( 2007 ) portrayed Adams as the  exemplar और moral नेता in an era of modernization  .
During Adams '  आजीवन , technological नवप्रवर्तनों और नई अर्थात् of संचार स्प्रेड संदेश of धार्मिक  revival , social reform , and party politics .
Goods  , धन , और लोगों traveled अधिक rapidly और efficiently  than ever before .
Adams was elected a U.S. Representative from Massachusetts  बाद leaving दफ्तर , सेवारत लिये the पिछला 17 सालो of उसके जीवन साथ दूर  greater acclamation than he had achieved as president .
He is , so far , the only  अध्यक्ष बाद निर्वाचित to the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि ( हालांकि जॉन टायलर थी निर्वाचित to the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  of the Confederate States just before his death in 1862 ) .
Animated by his  growing revulsion विरूद्ध गुलामी , एडम्स became a अग्रणी  opponent of the Slave Power .
He predicted that if a civil war were to break  आउट , the अध्यक्ष could abolish गुलामी by using उसके युद्ध शक्तियां  .
Adams  भी पूर्वानुमानित the संघ 's विच्छेद over the गुलामी समस्या , लकिन कहा कि if the दक्षिण became स्वतंत्र वहीँ  would be a series of bloody slave revolts .
खिड़कियाँ अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर 9 ( ie9 ) is a संस्करण of  the Internet Explorer web browser from Microsoft .
It was  released to the पब्लिक on कूच 14  , 2011 .
Microsoft has released Internet  एक्सप्लोरर 9 as a प्रमुख out-of-band संस्करण कि is नहीं tied to the रिलीज अनुसूची of कोई particular  version of Windows , unlike previous versions .
It is the first version since Internet  एक्सप्लोरर 2 to नहीं be bundled साथ a खिड़कियाँ ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली , हालांकि कुछ oems have संस्थापित it साथ खिड़कियाँ 7 on उनके pcs  , as well as new Windows 7 laptops .
The system requirements for Internet Explorer 9 are  खिड़कियाँ 7 , खिड़कियाँ सर्वर 2008 r2 , खिड़कियाँ विस्टा सेवा पैक 2 or खिड़कियाँ सर्वर 2008  SP2 with the Platform Update .
Windows XP  और पहले हैं नहीं  supported .
Internet Explorer 9 is the last version  of अंतरजाल एक्सप्लोरर to be समर्थित  on Windows Vista .
Both IA-32  और x64 builds हैं उपलब्धियाँ  .
Internet Explorer 9 supports several CSS 3 properties  , अंतःस्थापित आईसीसी v2 or v4 रंग प्रोफ़ाइल support via खिड़कियाँ रंग प्रणाली , और  has improved JavaScript performance .
It is the last of the five major web browsers to  implement support लिये स्केलेबल वेक्टर ग्राफिक्स ( svg  ) .
It also features hardware-accelerated graphics rendering using Direct2D , hardware-accelerated text rendering using DirectWrite , hardware-accelerated video rendering using Media Foundation , imaging support  provided by खिड़कियाँ इमेजिंग घटक , और ऊँची वफ़ादारी मुद्रण संचालित by the xml पेपर specification ( xps ) छपाई पाइपलाइन .
Internet Explorer 9 also  supports the html5 वीडियो और ऑडियो टैग और the वेब  Open Font Format .
Alka-Seltzer is an effervescent antacid  और पीड़ा reliever पहला marketed by the dr . मील आयुर्विज्ञान  Company .
It was developed by Maurice Treener , head  केमिस्ट at मील , in elkhart , इंडियाना .
alka-seltzer is marketed लिये राहत of नाबालिग aches , pains , सूजन , ज्वर , सिरदर्द , heartburn , खट्टा पेट  , indigestion , and hangovers , while neutralizing excess stomach acid .
It  थी शुभारम्भ  in 1931 .
A  spin-off of alka-seltzer बना to relieve जुकाम और फ्लू , alka-seltzer  Plus , was later introduced .
A short-lived antacid  non-aspirin रूपांतर , alka-mints , थी introduced in  1994 and discontinued in 1997 .
alka-seltzer is फिलहाल  owned by Bayer Schering Pharma AG , Germany .
The name `` Alka-Seltzer '' has been extended to incorporate  an संपूर्ण लकीर of medications बेची over the काउंटर और लिया by अर्थात् of rapidly dissolving टैबलेट कि रूप  a carbonated solution in water .

A stalactite ( , ; from the Greek stalasso , ( σταλάσσω ) , `` to drip  '' , और अर्थ `` कि जिससे drips '' ) is a प्रकार of speleothem ( द्वितीयक  mineral ) that hangs from the ceiling of limestone caves .
It  is a प्रकार of dripstone  .
The corresponding  गठन on the मंजिल of the गुफा is ज्ञात as a stalagmite  .
Degree abbreviations are used as an alternative way to specify an academic degree instead of spelling  आउट the शीर्षक in पूरा , ऐसे as in सन्दर्भ किताबे जैसे जो 's जो और on कारोबार ताश .
Many degrees have  अधिक than एक संक्षिप्त  .
In  the uk , it is नहीं generally the कस्टम to punctuate abbreviations लिये डिग्री  with full stops ( e.g . `` BSc '' rather than `` B.Sc . `` .
Race is a classification system used to categorize humans  into विशाल और पृथक populations or समूह by anatomical , सांस्कृतिक , जातीय , जेनेटिक , भौगोलिक  , historical , linguistic , religious , or social affiliation .
First  प्रयुक्त to denote नेशनल संबद्धों , the पद began to be प्रयुक्त  to relate to physical traits in the 17th century .
In the early 20th century the term was often used , in a taxonomic sense , to denote genetically  differentiated इंसान populations पारिभाषित by phenotype  .
While biologists  sometimes उपयोग the अवधारणा of रेस to मेक भेद among फजी सेट of traits , अन्य in the वैज्ञानिक जातियाँ सुझाएँ कि the विचार of रेस प्रायः is प्रयुक्त in a भोली or simplistic रास्ता , i.e  . that among humans , race has no taxonomic significance : all living humans belong to the same species , Homo sapiens and subspecies , Homo sapiens sapiens .
Social conceptions and  groupings of दौड़ vary over समय , involving  folk taxonomies
that define of individuals  आधारित on आभास traits  .
वैज्ञानिकों consider biological essentialism obsolete , और generally discourage जातिगत स्पष्टीकरण लिये सामूहिक  differentiation in both physical and behavioral traits .
Since the second half of the 20th century the  एसोसिएशन of रेस साथ the विचारधाराओं और theories कि grew आउट of the कार्य of 19th-century विज्ञानियों और physiologists रै led to the उपयोग of the शब्द  race itself becoming problematic .
Although still used in general  contexts , it is अभी प्रायः replaced by अन्य शब्द जिससे हैं कम अस्पष्ट और emotionally चार्ज , ऐसे  as populations , people ( s ) , ethnic groups or communities depending on context .
Lucy Stone ( August  13 , 1818 – अक्तूबर 19 , 1893 ) थी a prominent अमरीकी abolitionist और suffragist  , and a vocal advocate and organizer promoting rights for women .
In 1847 , Stone became the  पहला स्त्री इससे मैसाचुसेट्स  to earn a college degree .
She spoke out for  महिलाओं 's अधिकारों और विरूद्ध गुलामी at a समय जब महिलाओं यहूद हतोत्साहित  and prevented from public speaking .
Stone was the first recorded American  स्त्री to retain उसके अपना पिछला नाम बाद  marriage .
Stone 's organizational activities for  the कारण of महिलाओं 's अधिकारों yielded ठोस gains in the मुश्किल राजनैतिक पर्यावरण  of the 19th century .
स्टोन helped initiate the पहला नेशनल महिलाओं 's अधिकारों सम्मेलन और वो समर्थित और sustained it annually साथ साथ a क्रमांक of अन्य  local , state and regional activist conventions .
Stone  spoke in सामने of a क्रमांक of विधान लाशें to प्रचार  laws giving more rights to women .
She assisted in establishing the Woman 's National Loyal League to help pass the Thirteenth Amendment and thereby abolish slavery , after which she helped  रूप the largest समूह of like-minded महिलाओं 's अधिकारों reformers , the नीतियां मॉडरेट अमरीकी स्त्री suffrage संघ , जिससे worked लिये  decades at the state level in favor of women 's right to vote .
Stone wrote extensively about a wide range of women 's rights  , प्रकाशन और distributing भाषणों by herself और  others , and convention proceedings .
In the long-running and  influential स्त्री 's जर्नल , a साप्ताहिक periodical कि वो स्थापित और प्रचारित  , Stone aired both her own and differing views about women 's rights .
Called `` the orator '' and `` the morning star of  the स्त्री 's अधिकारों गति '' , स्टोन वितरित a वाक जिससे sparked सुसान B. एंथोनी to लो up the कारण  of women 's suffrage .
Elizabeth Cady  stanton लिखा कि `` लुसी स्टोन थी the पहला व्यक्ति by जिसको the दिल  of the American public was deeply stirred on the woman question . ''
Together , Anthony , Stanton , and Stone have been  पुकारा the 19th सदी `` triumvirate `` of महिलाओं 's suffrage  and feminism .
In  वित्त , a बंध is an यंत्र of indebtedness of the  bond issuer to the holders .
It is a debt security , under which the issuer owes the holders a debt and , depending on the terms of the bond , is obliged to pay them interest  ( the कूपन ) or to repay the प्रिंसिपल at a बाद तिथि , termed the  maturity .
Interest is  प्रायः देय at फिक्स्ड intervals ( semiannual , सालाना , sometimes  monthly ) .
Very often the bond is negotiable , i.e . the ownership of  the यंत्र can be transferred in the द्वितीयक  market .
Thus a bond is a form of loan or IOU : the holder of the  बंध is the lender ( creditor ) , the जारीकर्ता of the बंध is the borrower ( debtor ) , और the कूपन  is the interest .
Bonds provide the borrower with external funds to finance  long-term निवेश , or , in the मामला of सरकारी bonds , to वित्त वर्तमान व्यय  .
Certificates of deposit ( CDs ) or short term commercial paper are  माना to be धन मार्केट यंत्र और नहीं bonds : the प्रमुख अंतर is  in the length of the term of the instrument .
Bonds and stocks are both  प्रतिभूति , लकिन the प्रमुख अंतर between the दो is कि ( पूंजी ) stockholders have an इक्विटी हिस्सेदारी in the कम्पनी ( i.e . वे हैं स्वामी ) , whereas  bondholders have a creditor stake in the company ( i.e . they are lenders ) .
another अंतर is कि bonds प्रायः have a पारिभाषित पद , or परिपक्वता , बाद जिससे the बंध  is redeemed , whereas stocks may be outstanding indefinitely .
An exception is an irredeemable bond , such as  consols , जिससे is a perpetuity , i.e . a बंध साथ no परिपक्वता  .
a स्केल मॉडल of the मीनार  of London .
This  मॉडल can be मिला अंदर  the tower .
