A scale model is a physical model , a  प्रतिनिधित्व or नक़ल of an ऑब्जेक्ट कि is larger or छोटी than the वास्तविक आकार of the ऑब्जेक्ट , जिससे  seeks to maintain the relative proportions ( the scale factor ) of the physical size of the original object .
Very often the scale model is used as a guide  to बनाना the ऑब्जेक्ट in पूरा आकार  .
Scale models are built  or एकत्रित लिये अनेक कारण  .
the zune hd थी a पोर्टेबल मीडिया खिलाड़ी in the zune उत्पाद परिवार  released on September 15 , 2009 by Microsoft .
It was a direct competitor  साथ the ठहराना ipod और iphone श्रेणी of मोबाईल  devices .
It was initially released  in 16 और 32 gb capacities  .
A 64 GB version  थी released on अप्रैल 9 , 2010  .
It utilized a  टचस्क्रीन इंटरफ़ेस लिये नेविगेशन और शामिल wi-fi लिये तुल्यकालन , अभिगम  to the Zune Marketplace and Web browsing .
The Zune HD utilized the Nvidia Tegra APX 2600 chip , allowing it to play 720p  वीडियो through the वैकल्पिक hdmi zune डॉक on a high-definition  television .
Otherwise , content  होता be scaled bas to 480x272 पिक्सेल on the खिलाड़ी 's  OLED touchscreen .
Old  sparky , the इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी प्रयुक्त  at Sing Sing prison
Execution by electrocution , usually  performed using an इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी , is an निष्पादन विधि originating in the संयुक्त राज्य in जिससे the condemned व्यक्ति is strapped to a विशेषकर निर्मित  wooden chair and electrocuted through electrodes placed on the body .
This execution method was created by employees of  थामस एडिसन दौरान the युद्ध of currents , और रै महरूम प्रयुक्त तभी in the संयुक्त राज्य और , लिये a काल of अनेक  decades , in the Philippines ( its first use there in 1924 under American occupation , last in 1976 ) .
historically , एकबार the condemned व्यक्ति थी संलग्न to the कुर्सी , विभिन्न चक्र ( differing in वोल्टेज और अवधि ) of प्रत्यावर्ती वर्तमान होता be passed  through the individual 's body , in order to cause fatal damage to the internal organs ( including the brain ) .
The first jolt of electric current was designed to cause  तात्कालिक unconsciousness और दिमाग मौत ; the दूसरी एक थी designed to कारण fatal  damage to the vital organs .
Death  थी अक्सर caused by विद्युत  overstimulation of the heart .
Although in the United States the  इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी रै become a प्रतीक of the मौत दंड , इसके उपयोग is in मनाही due to the वृद्धि of lethal इंजेक्शन , जिससे is  widely believed to be a more humane method of execution .
Although some states still maintain electrocution as a method of execution , today it is only maintained as  a द्वितीयक विधि कि may be चुनी over lethal इंजेक्शन at the निवेदन of the कैदी .
As of 2010 , electrocution is an optional  रूप of निष्पादन in अलबामा , फ्लोरिडा , दक्षिण कैरोलिना और  Virginia .
They  allow the कैदी to चुनें lethal  injection as an alternative method .
In the states of Kentucky and Tennessee , the electric  कुर्सी रै महरूम रिटायर्ड मगर लिये those जिनकी पूंजी अपराधों यहूद वचनबद्ध prior to legislated तिथियाँ  in 1998 ( Kentucky : March 31 , 1998 ; Tennessee : December 31 , 1998 ) and who chose electrocution .
In both states , inmates who do not choose electrocution or inmates who committed their  अपराधों बाद the designated तिथि हैं मारे by lethal इंजेक्शन  .
The electric chair is an  वैकल्पिक रूप of निष्पादन स्वीकृत लिये संभावित उपयोग in अरकंसास और ओक्लाहोमा if अन्य फ़ॉर्म of निष्पादन हैं  found unconstitutional in the state at the time of execution .
It is the sole method  of निष्पादन in वर्मांट , जहाँ देशद्रोह is the तभी पूंजी अपराधों  .
On February 8 , 2008 , the Nebraska Supreme Court determined that  निष्पादन by इलेक्ट्रिक कुर्सी थी a `` बेदर्द और असामान्य दंड '' अंतर्गत the राज्य 's संविधान  .
This brought executions of  इस प्रकार to an समाप्त in नेब्रास्का , the तभी बाकी राज्य to retain electrocution  as its sole method of execution for murder .
The Maryland House of Delegates is the lower house of the  सामान्य सभा , the राज्य विधानमंडल of the अमरीकी राज्य of मेरीलैंड , और is रचित of 141 delegates  elected from 47 districts .
The  हाउस of delegates कक्ष is स्तिथ in the मेरीलैंड राज्य हाउस ( राज्य कैपिटल ) on  State Circle in Annapolis , which is the state capital .
The State House also houses the Maryland State Senate Chamber and  the कार्यालयों of the राज्यपाल और लेफ्टिनेंट राज्यपाल of the  State of Maryland .
Each Delegate has offices in Annapolis , in  the आसपास कैस्पर R. टेलर , jr. हाउस  Office Building .
The Liberation of Paris ( also known as the Battle for Paris )  took प्लेस दौरान संसार युद्ध ii इससे 19 अगस्त 1944 जबतक the आत्मसमर्पण of the occupying जर्मनी गैरीसन on 25 अगस्त  .
The Liberation of Paris started with an  uprising by the फ्रेंच प्रतिरोध विरूद्ध the जर्मनी गैरीसन  .
On  24 अगस्त , the फ्रेंच शक्तियां of the आंतरिक ( शक्तियां françaises de l'intérieur , ffi ) प्राप्त सुदृढीकरण  from the Free French Army of Liberation and from the U.S. Third Army under General Patton .
The capital region of France had been governed by Nazi Germany since the signing of the Second Compiègne Armistice  in जून 1940 , जब the जर्मनी फौज occupied उत्तरी और westernmost फ़्रांस , और जब the कठपुतली शासन of vichy  France was established in the town of Vichy in central France .
This battle marked the liberation of Paris and the  निर्वासन of the vichy सरकारी to sigmaringen  in Germany .
However  , वहीँ थी स्टिल much भारी लड़ to be किया पहले फ़्रांस थी liberated , सहित the अभियान in दक्षिणी फ़्रांस दौरान august-september ( in provence और extending into the southwestern प्रदेश of the vosges kyu ) , साथ the german-held seaports of पश्चिमी फ़्रांस  ( such as at Brest and Dunkirk ) , in Alsace and Lorraine in eastern France , and in northeastern France , such as along the Rhine and Moder Rivers .
The German  फौज और ss लड़ा doggedly in ये क्षेत्रों लिये the शेष  of 1944 and into 1945 .
`` Feelin ' Alright ? '' also known as ``  अहसास alright '' is a सोंग लिखा by डेव मेसन of the अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान बैंड ट्रैफ़िक इससे उनके  eponymous 1968 album , Traffic .
The song was also a hit single for several performers :  जो cocker ( 1969 , # 69 , recharted in 1972 , us # 33 ) , mongo santamaría  ( 1969 , # 95 ) and Grand Funk Railroad ( 1971 , US # 54 ) .
It has also been  अंकित by तीन श्वान रात्रि ( 1969 ) , the 5th आयाम ( 1970 ) , लू राल्स , फ्रेडी किंग , पॉल weller , lulu , chairmen of the फलक ( 1970 ) , विरल धरती , the इलेक्ट्रिक  Concept Orchestra , Mother 's Finest ( 1973 ) , The Ohio Players ( 1971 ) , Diana Ross with the Jackson 5 ( 1971 ) , Maceo Parker , Gladys Knight & the Pips , Widespread Panic and The Black Crowes .
A Steel Drum  संस्करण by त्रिनिदाद आयल कम्पनी थी reissued on the dancefloor  jazz compilation Blue Juice 2 .
It was also featured in  the 2000 फिल्मी duets , सुंग by huey  Lewis .
Both the original and the Joe Cocker cover were  प्रदर्शित in the फिल्म उड़ान , अभिनीत डेंज़ल वॉशिंगटन  .
देवों werkheiser ( born कूच 8,1991 ) is an अमरीकी कर्ता , आवाज़ कर्ता , सिंगर , songwriter और संगीतकार , बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके अभिनीत भूमिका as ned bigby on  the Nickelodeon sitcom Ned 's Declassified School Survival Guide and for his role in the 2007 TV Movie Shredderman Rules , as the lead character Nolan Byrd .
Werkheiser also played Peter  parkes in the चौथी और फाइनल ऋतु of the एबीसी परिवार  show Greek .
Sample view of an  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य रिकार्ड आधारित  on images
Sample view  of an इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य  record
An electronic  स्वास्थ्य रिकार्ड ( ehr ) is an evolving अवधारणा पारिभाषित as a व्यवस्थित संग्रहण of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक स्वास्थ्य सूचना  about individual patients or populations .
It is a record in digital  स्वरूप कि is theoretically सक्षम of होने साझा आरपार  different health care settings .
In some cases this sharing can occur by way of network-connected  enterprise-wide सूचना प्रणालियों और अन्य सूचना संजाल or exchanges  .
EHRs may include a range of data , including demographics ,  चिकित्सा इतिहास , दवा और allergies , immunization औकात , प्रयोगशाला परीक्षण परिणाम , radiology  images , vital signs , personal stats like age and weight , and billing information .
Loan origination is the process by which a  borrower applies लिये a नई ऋण , और a lender प्रक्रियाओं कि अनुप्रयोग  .
Origination generally includes all the steps  इससे लेने a ऋण अनुप्रयोग up to disbursal of निधि ( or घटती  the application ) .
Loan servicing  कवर सबकुछ बाद disbursing the निधि जबतक  the loan is fully paid off .
Loan origination is a  specialized संस्करण of नई खाता खोलने लिये वित्तीय  services organizations .
Certain  लोगों और संगठन specialize  in loan origination .
Mortgage  brokers और अन्य बंधक originator कंपनियाँ  serve as a prominent example .
There are many  अलग प्रकार of लोन  .
For more information on  ऋण प्रकार , देखिए the ऋण और उपभोक्ता lending आलेख  .
Steps  शामिल in originating a ऋण vary by ऋण प्रकार , विभिन्न kinds of ऋण  risk , regulator , lender policy , and other factors .
Top left : The  टेनेसी घाटी प्राधिकार , भाग of the नई सौदे , होने हस्ताक्षरित  into law in 1933 .
Top right : Franklin Delano Roosevelt ,  जो थी जिम्मेदार लिये पहलों और कार्यक्रम collectively  known as the New Deal .
Bottom : A public mural from one of the  कलाकारों employed by the नई सौदे  .
The New Deal was a series  of आर्थिक कार्यक्रम enacted in the संयुक्त राज्य between  1933 and 1936 .
They involved presidential executive  आदेश or कानून passed by कॉंग्रेस दौरान the पहला पद of अध्यक्ष  Franklin D. Roosevelt .
The programs were in response to the Great Depression , and focused on  कया इतिहासकारों कॉल the `` 3 rs '' : राहत , रिकवरी  , and Reform .
That is Relief for the unemployed and poor ; Recovery of the economy to normal levels ; and  सुधार of the वित्तीय प्रणाली to prevent a repeat  depression .
The New Deal produced a political  realignment , बनाना the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी the बहुमत ( as खूब as the पार्टी कि आयोजित the श्वेत  House for seven out of nine Presidential terms from 1933 to 1969 ) , with its base in liberal ideas , the white South , traditional Democrats , big city machines , and the newly empowered labor unions and ethnic minorities .
The Republicans were split  , साथ conservatives opposing the संपूर्ण नई सौदे as an दुश्मन of कारोबार और विकास ,  and liberals accepting some of it and promising to make it more efficient .
The realignment crystallized  into the नई सौदे गठबन्धन कि वर्चस्व सबसे अध्यक्षीय चुनावों into the 1960s , जबकि  the opposition Conservative Coalition largely controlled Congress from 1937 to 1963 .
By 1936 the term `` liberal '' typically was used for supporters of the New  सौदे , और `` रूढ़िवादी `` लिये इसके प्रतिद्वंद्वियों  .
इससे 1934 to 1938 , रूज़वेल्ट थी assisted in उसके endeavours by a “pro-spender” बहुमत in कॉंग्रेस  ( drawn from two-party , competitive , non-machine , Progressive , and Left party districts ) .
As noted by Alexander Hicks , “Roosevelt , backed by rare , non-Southern Democrat  majorities — 270 non-southern डेमोक्रेट प्रतिनिधि और 71 non-southern डेमोक्रेट सीनेटरों — spelled दूसरी  New Deal reform.”
Many historians distinguish between a `` First New Deal '' ( 1933–34  ) और a `` दूसरी नई सौदे '' ( 1935–38 ) , साथ the दूसरी एक अधिक उदार और अधिक  controversial .
the `` पहला नई सौदे '' ( 1933–34 ) dealt साथ विविध समूह , इससे  banking and railroads to industry and farming , all of which demanded help for economic survival .
The Federal Emergency Relief Administration , for instance , provided $ 500 million  लिये राहत परिचालन by राज्य और शहरों , जबकि the short-lived cwa ( सिविल works प्रशासन ) दिया बस्तियों धन  to operate make-work projects in 1933-34 .
The `` Second New Deal `` in 1935–38 included the Wagner Act to promote labor unions , the Works Progress  प्रशासन ( wpa ) राहत कार्यक्रम ( जिससे बना the संघीय सरकारी by दूर the largest सिंगल नियोक्ता in the स्वदेश ) , the सोशल सुरक्षा  Act , and new programs to aid tenant farmers and migrant workers .
The final major  वस्तुएं of नई सौदे विधान यहूद the सृष्टि of the संयुक्त राज्य आवास प्राधिकार और फार्म सुरक्षा  Administration , both in 1937 , and the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 , which set maximum hours and minimum wages for most categories of workers .
The economic downturn of  1937–38 , और the कड़वा विभाजित between the afl और cio मजदूर संघ led to प्रमुख  Republican gains in Congress in 1938 .
Conservative Republicans  और डेमोक्रेट in कॉंग्रेस joined in the अनौपचारिक रूढ़िवादी  Coalition .
By 1942–43  वे shut bas राहत कार्यक्रम ऐसे as the wpa और  CCC and blocked major liberal proposals .
रूज़वेल्ट खुद turned उसके ध्यान to the युद्ध प्रयत्न , और  won reelection in 1940 and 1944 .
The Supreme Court declared the  नेशनल रिकवरी प्रशासन ( nra ) और the पहला संस्करण of the agricultural समायोजन अधिनियम ( aaa ) असंवैधानिक , however  the AAA was rewritten and then upheld .
As the first Republican president elected after FDR ,  ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर ( 1953–61 ) बाएँ the नई सौदे largely बरकरार ,  even expanding it in some areas .
In the 1960s , Lyndon B. Johnson 's  ग्रेट समाज प्रयुक्त the नई सौदे as प्रेरणा लिये a नाटकीय विस्तार of उदार कार्यक्रम , जिससे रिपब्लिकन रिचर्ड M. निक्सन generally  retained .
बाद 1974 , however , the कॉल लिये deregulation  of the economy gained bipartisan support .
The New  सौदे विनियमन of बैंकिंग ( glass–steagall अधिनियम  ) was suspended in the 1990s .
Many New Deal programs remain active , with some still operating  अंतर्गत the असली names , सहित the संघीय जमा बीमे निगम ( fdic ) , the संघीय  Crop Insurance Corporation ( FCIC ) , the Federal Housing Administration ( FHA ) , and the Tennessee Valley Authority ( TVA ) .
The largest programs still in existence today are the  सोशल सुरक्षा प्रणाली और the प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज आयोग  ( SEC ) .
A woman ( )  , pl : महिलाओं ( ) is a मादा इंसान  .
The term woman is usually  सुरक्षित लिये an वयस्क , साथ the पद लड़की होने the usual पद लिये a मादा  child or adolescent .
However , the term woman is also sometimes used  to पहचानो a मादा इंसान , regardless of आयु , as in वाक्यांश ऐसे as `` महिलाओं 's अधिकारों  `` .
महिलाओं हैं typically सक्षम of giving जनम , हालांकि पुरानी  women who have gone through menopause and some intersex women can not .
`` I Do n't Want to Miss a Thing '' is a song  performed by अमरीकी चट्टान बैंड एरोस्मिथ लिये the 1998 फिल्मी armageddon .
Written by Diane Warren , the  सोंग debuted at क्रमांक एक on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 ( the पहला # 1 लिये the बैंड बाद 28 सालो  together ) .
the सोंग ठहरे at क्रमांक एक लिये चार सप्ताह  from September 5 to September 26 , 1998 .
The song  भी ठहरे at क्रमांक 1 लिये अनेक सप्ताह in  several other countries .
In the UK , the song peaked at  क्रमांक चार , बनने एरोस्मिथ 's उच्चतम charting सोंग in the uk , जहाँ it थी the  17th best-selling single of 1998 , and has sold over a million copies .
Although not used  by the बहुमत of the संसार 's देशों , daylight छायांकन समय  is common in the Western world .
Daylight saving time ( DST ) —also summer time in British  अंग्रेज़ी — is the अभ्यास of advancing घड़ियाँ दौरान the हल्का महीने so कि evenings have  more daylight and mornings have less .
Typically clocks are adjusted forward one hour near the  प्रारंभ of वसन्त और हैं समायोजित पिछड़ा in  autumn .
The  आधुनिक विचार of daylight छायांकन थी पहला प्रस्तावित in 1895 by जार्ज vernon हडसन और  it was first implemented during the First World War .
Many countries have used  it at विभिन्न टाइम्स चूंकि तब  .
Much of  the संयुक्त राज्य प्रयुक्त dst in the 1950s और 1960s , और dst उपयोग विस्तारित following the 1970s उर्जा संकट और रै  been widely used in North America and Europe since then .
The  अभ्यास रै महरूम दोनो praised और  criticized .
Adding daylight to evenings  लाभ retailing , खेल , और अन्य क्रियाएँ कि exploit धूप बाद working घंटों , लकिन can कारण समस्याएं  for evening entertainment and other occupations tied to the sun .
Although  an जल्दी लक्ष्य of dst थी to reduce संध्या उपयोग of incandescent lighting ( formerly a प्राथमिक उपयोग of विद्युत ) , आधुनिक हीटिंग और कूलिंग उपयोग पैटर्न  differ greatly , and research about how DST currently affects energy use is limited or contradictory .
DST clock shifts  उपस्थित अन्य चुनौतियां  .
They  complicate timekeeping , और can disrupt बैठक , सफर , बिलिंग , रिकार्ड  keeping , medical devices , heavy equipment , and sleep patterns .
Software can often adjust  कंप्यूटर घड़ियाँ automatically , लकिन इस can be सीमित और error-prone  , particularly when DST dates are changed .
floorplan of the château de montargis
montargis is a कम्यून in the loiret विभाग in north-central फ़्रांस  on the Loing river .
the कस्बा is स्तिथ परिचय दक्षिण of पेरिस  and east of Orléans in the Gâtinais .
Montargis is the  दूसरी largest नगर in the loiret , बाद  Orléans .
It is near a large  वन , और contains लाइट उद्योग और खेती , सहित  saffron .
Due to its numerous canals and bridges , Montargis sometimes bills  itself as the `` वेनिस of the gâtinais . ''
Though quite modern , it retains a  मध्यकालीन आकर्षण in इसके शहर  area .
In computer storage , a logical  ईकाई क्रमांक , or lun , is a क्रमांक प्रयुक्त to पहचानो a लॉजिकल ईकाई , जिससे is a यंत्र addressed by the scsi  protocol or protocols which encapsulate SCSI , such as Fibre Channel or iSCSI .
A LUN may be used with any  यंत्र जिससे supports read/write परिचालन , ऐसे as a टेप ड्राइव , लकिन is सबसे  often used to refer to a logical disk as created on a SAN .
Though not  technically सही , the पद `` lun '' is प्रायः भी प्रयुक्त to refer  to the logical disk itself .
The  इन्जील according to चिह्नित ( , , to euangelion kata markon ) , commonly shortened to the इन्जील of चिह्नित or बस चिह्नित , is the दूसरी  book of the New Testament .
This canonical account of the  जीवन of यीशु of नासरत is एक of the तीन  synoptic gospels .
It was thought to be an  निचोड़ , जिससे खाते लिये इसके प्लेस as the  second gospel in the Bible .
However , most  समकालीन विद्वानों अभी लिहाज़ it as  the earliest of the canonical gospels ( c 70 ) .
That Mark was used as a source for the other  synoptic gospels इन्जील of मैथ्यू और इन्जील of ल्यूक is widely आयोजित by अनेक , हालांकि  not all , New Testament scholars .
The Gospel of Mark narrates the Ministry of Jesus  इससे उसके बपतिस्मा by जॉन the बैपटिस्ट to उसके मौत  and resurrection .
It  focuses विशेषकर on the पिछला सप्ताह of उसके जीवन ( अध्याय  11–16 ) in Jerusalem .
Its  स्विफ्ट कथा portrays यीशु as a वीर man of कार्रवाई , an exorcist  , healer and miracle worker .
An important  थीम of चिह्नित is the मुक्तिदाता  Secret .
Jesus silences the  demoniacs he heals , कोशिशें unsuccessfully to रखना उसके मुक्तिदाता पहचान रहस्य , और conceals  his message with parables .
Meanwhile , the disciples fail to  समझे दोनो the implication of the चमत्कार of यीशु और the अर्थ of the बाते he predicts  about his arrest , death and resurrection .
Most scholars  मानना कि the असली टेक्स्ट of the इन्जील ends at चिह्नित 16:8 साथ the डिस्कवरी of यीशु ' खाली मकबरा और कि the following  account of his resurrection appearances is a later addition .
according to परंपरा और कुछ जल्दी गिरिजाघर लेखक , the  author is Mark the Evangelist , the companion of the apostle Peter .
The gospel ,  however , appears to rely on अनेक underlying स्त्रोत , varying in रूप और in धर्मशास्त्र , जिससे tells  against the tradition that the gospel was based on Peter 's preaching .
The text is a compilation which may include eye-witness accounts as well as known apostolic preachings , and pre-existing written records that do  नहीं मौजूद आज लकिन can be पुष्टि इससे 2nd-century टीकाकारों  .
Some of the stories  in the इन्जील may have महरूम transmitted  orally before being written down .
Various elements within the  इन्जील सुझाएँ कि the लेखक लिखा in सीरियाई or फिलिस्तीन  for a non-Jewish Christian community .
The Lord of the Rings is an epic high fantasy  अनोखा लिखा by अंग्रेज़ी भाषाशास्त्री और विश्वविद्यालयों of ऑक्सफोर्ड प्राध्यापक  J. R. R. Tolkien .
The story began as a sequel to Tolkien 's 1937  children 's काल्पनिक अनोखा the होब्बिट , लकिन आखिरकार विकसित into a much larger कार्य  .
It was written in stages between 1937  और 1949 , much of it दौरान संसार युद्ध ii  .
It is the second  best-selling अनोखा कभी लिखा , साथ over 150 लाख नक़ल बेची  .
The title of the novel refers to the story 's main  विपक्षी , the अंधेरा रब sauron , जो था in an पहले आयु निर्मित the एक रिंग to नियम the अन्य बजती of शक्ति as the परम हथियार in उसके अभियान to जीतें और  rule all of Middle-earth .
From quiet beginnings in the Shire , a Hobbit land not unlike the English  countryside , the स्टोरी सीमाएँ आरपार north-west middle-earth , following the कोर्स of the युद्ध of the रिंग through the आँखें of इसके वर्ण , notably the hobbits frodo baggins , samwise `` sam '' gamgee , meriadoc `` मैरी '' brandybuck और peregrin `` pippin '' took  , but also the hobbits ' chief allies and travelling companions : Aragorn , a Human Ranger ; Boromir , a man from Gondor ; Gimli , a Dwarf warrior ; Legolas , an Elven prince ; and Gandalf , a Wizard .
The work was initially intended by Tolkien to be one volume of a  two-volume नियत , साथ the अन्य होने the silmarillion , लकिन इस विचार थी बर्खास्त by उसके प्रकाशक  .
It was decided for economic reasons to publish The Lord of the  बजती as तीन आयतन over the कोर्स of a साल इससे 29 जुलाई 1954 to 20 अक्तूबर 1955 , यूँ बनाना  the now familiar Lord of the Rings trilogy .
The three volumes were entitled The Fellowship  of the रिंग , the दो मीनारें , और the वापसी of the किंग  .
structurally , the अनोखा is विभाजित internally into छह किताबे , दो प्रति  volume , with several appendices of background material included at the end of the third volume .
The Lord of the Rings has since been reprinted  numerous टाइम्स और अनूदित into अनेक भाषाएं  .
Tolkien  's कार्य रै महरूम the विषय of extensive  analysis of its themes and origins .
Although a major work in itself , the story was only the last  गति of a larger एपिक tolkien था worked on चूंकि 1917 , in a प्रक्रम he  described as mythopoeia .
प्रभाव on इस पहले कार्य , और on the स्टोरी of the रब of the बजती , शामिल philology , mythology , धर्म और the लेखक  's distaste for the effects of industrialization , as well as earlier fantasy works and Tolkien 's experiences in World War I .
The Lord of the Rings in its turn is considered to have had a great effect on modern fantasy ; the impact of Tolkien 's works is such that  the उपयोग of the शब्द `` tolkienian '' और `` tolkienesque '' have महरूम अंकित in the ऑक्सफोर्ड अंग्रेज़ी  Dictionary .
The enduring popularity of The Lord of the Rings has  led to numerous सन्दर्भ in लोकप्रिय संस्कृति , the founding of अनेक समाजों by प्रशंसक of tolkien 's works , और the प्रकाशन of अनेक किताबे परिचय tolkien और उसके works  .
The Lord of the Rings has inspired ,  और continues to inspire , कलाकृति , म्यूज़िक , films और टेलीविज़न , वीडियो खेल , और subsequent  literature .
Award-winning  adaptations of the रब of the बजती have महरूम  made for radio , theatre , and film .
The following is an  एपीसोड सूची लिये the निकलोडियन sitcom ड्रेक  & Josh .
The series  debuted on जनवरी 11 , 2004  .
A TV film Merry Christmas , Drake & Josh  थी बना अलावा इससे the नियमित श्रेणी on  December 5 , 2008 .
There are a total of 60  एपीसोड यहूद उत्पादित spanning चार सीज़न  .
Drake  घंटी , जोश पेक , और मिरांडा cosgrove यहूद the तभी अभिनेताओं to appear in सब  60 episodes .
The San Francisco 49ers conduct  प्रशिक्षण शिविर at the टोली 's मुख्यालय और अभ्यास सुविधा in सांता क्लारा , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  in August 2010 .
The offense is wearing red jerseys with the exception of  क्वार्टरबैक एलेक्स स्मिथ , जो is in a ब्लैक जर्सी ; the रक्षा  in white .
In the National Football League ,  प्रशिक्षण शिविर refers to the समय पहले the ऋतु  commences .
During this time , teams will sometimes  congregate at an बाहर स्थान , प्रायः a विश्वविद्यालयों , to conduct प्रशिक्षण  camp for at least the first few weeks .
इस is समान to बेसबॉल 's  spring training .
Training camp is  प्रयुक्त in अनेक अलग  ways .
New players and  कोच उपयोग it to acclimate themselves to नई teammates  and systems .
For  younger खिलाड़ी , it serves as a काल of मूल्यांकन ;  for veterans , it is time to round back into form .
प्रशिक्षण शिविर is विभाजित into अनेक  different components .
The  पहला is scrimmages  .
These  हैं pseudo-games जहाँ टीमों चलाएं nearly पूरा  games ' worth of plays .
Sometimes , two practice  सत्र हैं आयोजित on the वही दिन .
This concept is  referred to as two-a-days  .
Other parts of training camp include drills , meetings  साथ कोच और अन्य खिलाड़ी at एक 's स्थिति , वज़न प्रशिक्षण , और pre-season खेल .
The latter half of  प्रशिक्षण शिविर लीड सीधे into the प्रदर्शनी  season .
With NFL training camps starting  in late-july , the biggest चिंता रै महरूम निर्जलीकरण  .
In 2001 ,  मिनेसोटा वाइकिंग्स खिलाड़ी korey stringer died of a चिकित्सा कंडीशन आधारित इससे  dehydration and heatstroke .
The  मौत of stringer prompted the एनएफएल to बदलें उनके प्रशिक्षण  policies .
At each practice , every  टोली जरूर have the टोली डॉक्टर और प्रशिक्षकों on the फ़ील्ड ; additionally ,  an ambulance must be present during practices .
With NFL training camps  शुरूआत in लेट जुलाई , कठोर मौसम can affect  practice and exhibition games .
In 2002 , a Cleveland Browns exhibition game  ended due to बिजली निकट क्लीवलैंड भूरा स्टेडियम , और कठोर तूफ़ान have  been known to disrupt training camps .
Fans are often able to visit their favorite team 's training  शिविर to कैच an जल्दी dekh at the खिलाड़ी ; प्रवेश to practices is प्रायः फ़्री or substantially कम महंगी than a खेल टिकट , बनाना प्रशिक्षण शिविर यात्राएँ a लोकप्रिय विकल्प लिये प्रशंसक जो can नहीं attend अनेक खेल due to वित्तीय or  other reasons .
NFL teams often sell souvenirs and concessions at camp  साइट साथ साथ offering क्रियाएँ और कार्यक्रम to मेक प्रशिक्षण शिविर a अधिक fan-friendly  experience .
In computing , a file system ( or filesystem ) is a  प्रकार of आंकड़ा स्टोर जिससे can be प्रयुक्त to स्टोर , retrieve और अद्यतन a नियत of  files .
The term could refer to the abstract data structures  प्रयुक्त to define फाइलें , or to the वास्तविक तन्त्र or फर्मवेयर components कि implement the  abstract ideas .
Some file systems are used on local data storage devices ;  अन्य provide संचिका अभिगम via a संजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( e.g . nfs , smb , or  9P clients ) .
Some file systems are `` virtual '' , in that the `` files ''  supplied हैं computed on निवेदन ( e.g . procfs ) or हैं merely a मानचित्रण into a अलग  file system used as a backing store .
The file system manages access to both the content of  फाइलें और the मेटाडेटा परिचय those फाइलें  .
It is responsible for arranging storage space ; reliability ,  दक्षता , और ट्यूनिंग साथ लिहाज़ to the शारीरिक भंडार मीडियम हैं महत्वपूर्ण डिज़ाइन considerations  .
विलियम हावर्ड taft ( सितंबर 15 , 1857 – कूच 8 , 1930 ) थी the 27th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त  States ( 1909–1913 ) and later the tenth Chief Justice of the United States ( 1921–1930 ) .
He is the only  व्यक्ति to have परोसा in दोनो of ये  offices .
Before becoming  अध्यक्ष , taft , a रिपब्लिकन , थी चयनित to serve on the श्रेष्ठ अदालत  of Cincinnati in 1887 .
In 1890 , Taft was appointed  solicitor सामान्य of the संयुक्त राज्य और in 1891 a न्यायधीश on the संयुक्त राज्य अदालत of appeals  for the Sixth Circuit .
In 1900 , President William  mckinley नियुक्त taft governor-general of the  Philippines .
In 1904 ,  अध्यक्ष थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट नियुक्त taft सचिव of युद्ध in an प्रयत्न to दूल्हे taft , तब उसके बंद  political ally , into his handpicked presidential successor .
Taft assumed a prominent role in problem solving , assuming on some occasions the role of  एक्टिंग सचिव of राज्य , जबकि घटती दोहराया offers इससे रूज़वेल्ट to serve on  the Supreme Court .
Riding a wave of popular support for fellow  रिपब्लिकन रूज़वेल्ट , taft जीती an आसान विजय in उसके 1908 बोली  for the presidency .
In his only term , Taft 's domestic agenda  emphasized trust-busting , सिविल सेवा सुधार , strengthening the अंतरराज्यीय कॉमर्स आयोग , improving the प्रदर्शन of  the postal service , and passage of the Sixteenth Amendment .
Abroad ,  taft sought to further the आर्थिक विकास of राष्ट्र in लैटिन अमेरिका  and Asia through `` Dollar Diplomacy `` , and showed decisiveness and restraint in response to revolution in Mexico .
The task-oriented Taft was oblivious to the political  ramifications of उसके निर्णय , प्रायः alienated उसके अपना कुंजी constituencies , और थी overwhelmingly पराजित in उसके बोली लिये a दूसरी पद in the अध्यक्षीय  election of 1912 .
In  सर्वेक्षण of अध्यक्षीय विद्वानों , taft is प्रायः क्रमित निकट the मध्य  of lists of all American Presidents .
After leaving office , Taft spent his time in academia ,  मध्यस्थता , और the ढूंढें लिये संसार सलाम through उसके self-founded लीग to enforce सलाम  .
In 1921 , after the First World War ,  अध्यक्ष वारेन G. हार्डिंग नियुक्त taft मुख्य इंसाफ of  the United States .
Taft  परोसा in इस क्षमता जबतक shortly पहले उसके मौत  in 1930 .
The Ten Commandments is  a 1956 एपिक फिल्मी उत्पादित और निर्देशित by सेसिल B. demille कि dramatized the biblical स्टोरी of the exodus , in जिससे the hebrew-born  Moses , an adopted Egyptian prince , becomes the deliverer of the Hebrew slaves .
It starred Charlton Heston in the lead role ,  yul brynner as उसके adoptive bhai , pharaoh rameses ii , ऐनी बैक्सटर as nefretiri , एडवर्ड G. रॉबिन्सन as dathan , yvonne de कार्लो as sephora , डेबरा  Paget as Lilia , and John Derek as Joshua .
The supporting cast includes Sir Cedric Hardwicke  as pharaoh सेती i , नीना foch as bithiah , मार्था स्कॉट as yoshebel , जूडिथ एंडरसन as memnet , विंसेंट दाम as baka , और जॉन carradine as आरोन  .
The film was  released by सर्वोपरि तस्वीरें in vistavision on अक्तूबर  5 , 1956 .
The Ten Commandments , which DeMille narrated ,  थी the पिछला फिल्मी कि he निर्देशित  .
He was set to direct the 1958 remake of his 1938  फिल्मी the buccaneer , लकिन उसके फाइनल बीमारी मजबूर उसे to बाज़ the directing chores to उसके son-in-law , कर्ता  Anthony Quinn .
DeMille had also planned to film the life of Lord  baden पावेल , the संस्थापक of the स्काउट गति , साथ दाउद niven ; इस प्रोजेक्ट थी  never realized .
the टेन आयतें is a आंशिक रीमेक  of DeMille 's 1923 silent film .
Some of the cast and  क्रू of the 1956 संस्करण worked on the असली  .
It has since  महरूम remade as a टेलीविज़न miniseries ब्रॉडकास्ट  in April 2006 .
The  टेन आयतें is एक of the सबसे financially  successful films ever made , grossing over $ 65 million at the U.S. box office .
Adjusting for inflation , this makes it the sixth  highest-grossing फिल्मी domestically , साथ an समायोजित कुल of $ 1,025,730,000 in 2012  .
The  बक्सा दफ्तर जालस्थल `` the संख्याएँ '' सूचियाँ  the domestic gross at $ 80 million .
In 1999 , The Ten Commandments was selected for preservation in the United States  नेशनल फिल्मी रजिस्ट्री by the पुस्तकालयों of कॉंग्रेस as होने `` culturally , historically , or aesthetically significant  '' .
In June 2008 , the American Film  संस्थान नाज़िल इसके `` टेन शीर्ष टेन `` —the बेहतरीन टेन films in टेन अमरीकी फिल्मी genres—after polling over 1,500 लोगों इससे  the creative community .
The Ten  आयतें थी सूचीबद्ध as the दसवाँ  best film in the epic genre .
The film received  सात अकादमी पुरस्कार nominations सहित बेहतरीन चित्र , और जीती the अकादमी  Award for Best Visual Effects .
Charlton Heston was  मनोनीत लिये a सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन गति  Picture Actor in the drama category .
Yul Brynner won the National Board of Review Award for Best  कर्ता लिये उसके भूमिका as rameses , साथ साथ उसके अन्य भूमिकाएँ in the  King and I and Anastasia .
Louisville ( ,  or ) is a प्रमुख नगर और the largest नगर in the u.S. राज्य of केंटकी और the  county seat of Jefferson County .
Since 2003 , the city  's सीमायें have महरूम साथ those of the काउंटी क्युकी  of a city-county merger .
The city 's total  संचित जनसांख्यिकी at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी थी 741,096 ( louisville 's संतुलन कुल , 602,011 , excludes semi-autonomous कस्बों  and is the population listed in most sources and national rankings ) .
As of 2010 , the Louisville metropolitan area  ( एमएसए ) था a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,307,647 रैंकिंग 42nd nationally  .
The metro area includes Louisville-Jefferson County and 12 surrounding counties , eight in  केंटकी और चार in दक्षिणी इंडियाना ( देखिए भूगोल  below ) .
The Louisville  संयुक्त सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल , having a जनसांख्यिकी of 1,451,564 , शामिल the एमएसए , hardin काउंटी और larue  County in Kentucky , and Scott County , Indiana .
An important internal shipping port in the 19th century , Louisville  आज is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the स्थान of the केंटकी डर्बी , the पहला of तीन  annual thoroughbred horse races making up the Triple Crown .
A  ठेठ प्रायोगिक सेटअप  for an aldol reaction .
Both flasks are submerged in a dry ice/acetone cooling bath ( −78 °C ) the  तापमान of जिससे is होने monitored by a तापयुग्म  ( the wire on the left ) .
A cooling bath , in laboratory chemistry ( often but not always organic chemistry ) practice , is a  द्रव मिश्रण जिससे is प्रयुक्त to maintain कम temperatures , typically between  13 °C and −196 °C .
These low temperatures are used to collect liquids after distillation , to remove solvents using a  रोटरी evaporator , or to perform a रासायनिक प्रतिक्रिया नीचे रूम तापमान ( देखिए : गतिज कंट्रोल  ) .
Cooling baths are generally one of two types : ( a ) a cold fluid ( particularly liquid nitrogen , water , or even air ) — but most commonly the term refers to ( b ) a mixture of 3  components : ( 1 ) a कूलिंग एजेंट ( ऐसे as शुष्क बर्फ or जल बर्फ ) ; ( b ) a द्रव 'कैरीr ' ( ऐसे as द्रव जल , एथिलीन ग्लाइकोल , एसीटोन , इत्यादि . ) , जिससे हस्तांतरण ऊष्मा between the नहाना और the पोत ; ; और ( c ) an योगात्मक to गुमसुम the melting-point of the solid/liquid  system .
( A familiar example  of इस is the उपयोग of an ice/rock-salt मिश्रण to फ्रीज  ice cream .
The phase-change of ice  into द्रव जल requires उर्जा , 'pulling ' ऊष्मा इससे  the system .
Adding salt lowers the temp at  जिससे इस happens , अर्थ अधिक उर्जा रै to be अवशोषित  from the environment in order to melt the ice .
इस effectively makes the बर्फ 'colder ' — it जरूर 'pull  ' more heat from its environment to become liquid . )
Eating disorders are  शर्तें पारिभाषित by असामान्य खाने आदतें कि may involve either अपर्याप्त  or excessive food intake to the detriment of an individual 's physical and mental health .
Bulimia nervosa and anorexia nervosa are  the सबसे आम विशिष्ट फ़ॉर्म in the संयुक्त किंगडम .
Other types of eating disorders  शामिल binge खाने विकार और खाने विकार नहीं वरना  specified .
Bulimia nervosa is a  विकार characterized by binge खाने  and purging .
Purging  can शामिल self-induce उल्टी , over-exercising , और the उपयोग of diuretics  , enemas , and laxatives .
एनोरेक्सिया नर्वोज़ा is characterized by चरम खाना प्रतिबंध  to the point of self-starvation and excessive weight loss .
Though primarily thought of as affecting females ( an estimated 5–10  लाख होने प्रभावित in the u.K. ) , खाने विकार affect males as खूब  .
An estimated 10 – 15 % of people with  खाने विकार हैं males ( गोर्गान , 1999  ) .
( an estimated 1  लाख u.K. males होने प्रभावित  ) .
Although  खाने विकार हैं increasing सब over the संसार among दोनो मेन और महिलाओं , वहीँ is प्रमाण to सुझाएँ कि it is महिलाओं in the पश्चिमी संसार जो हैं at the उच्चतम रिस्क of विकासशील  them and the degree of westernization increases the risk .
nearly हाफ of सब अमेरिकी personally जान किसी  with an eating disorder .
The skill to comprehend the central processes of appetite has increased  tremendously चूंकि लेप्टिन थी खोजा , और the कौशल to observe the कृत्यों  of the brain as well .
Interactions between motivational  , homeostatic और self-regulatory कंट्रोल प्रक्रियाओं हैं शामिल in खाने आचरण  , which is a key component in eating disorders .
The precise cause of eating disorders is  नहीं entirely समझा , लकिन वहीँ is प्रमाण कि it may be linked  to other medical conditions and situations .
सांस्कृतिक idealization of thinness और youthfulness have contributed  to eating disorders affecting diverse populations .
One study showed that girls with ADHD have a  वृहद मौका of getting an खाने विकार than those नहीं  affected by ADHD .
Another study suggested that women with PTSD ,  विशेषकर due to sexually सम्बन्धित आघात , हैं अधिक संभावित to  develop anorexia nervosa .
One study showed that  फोस्टर लड़कियों हैं अधिक संभावित to develop bulimia  nervosa .
Some  सोचो कि पीर दबाव और idealized body-types देखी in the मीडिया हैं  also a significant factor .
Some research show that for certain  लोगों वहीँ हैं जेनेटिक कारण क्यों वे may be prone to विकासशील  an eating disorder .
हाल अध्ययन have मिला प्रमाण a सहसंबंध between मरीजों साथ bulimia  nervosa and substance use disorders .
In addition , anxiety  विकार और व्यक्तित्व विकार हैं आम आवृत्ति साथ क्लाइंट of  eating disorders .
While proper treatment can be highly  प्रभावी लिये अनेक कष्ट इससे विशिष्ट प्रकार of खाने विकार , the consequences of खाने विकार can be कठोर  , including death ( whether from direct medical effects of disturbed eating habits or from comorbid conditions such as suicidal thinking ) .
Slavery in the United States existed from the  जल्दी सालो of the औपनिवेशिक काल ; it थी firmly स्थापित by the समय the संयुक्त राज्य  sought independence from Great Britain in 1776 .
However , by 1804 , all states north of the Mason and Dixon  लकीर था either abolished गुलामी outright or passed कानून लिये the क्रमिक  abolition of slavery .
In 1787 Congress prohibited  गुलामी in the उत्तरपश्चिम territory  .
But slavery gained new life in the South with  the कपास उद्योग बाद 1800 , और विस्तारित into the दक्षिणपश्चिम  .
The nation was  polarized into स्लेव और फ़्री राज्य साथ the mason-dixon लकीर , जिससे अलग पेन्सिलवेनिया  and Maryland .
The United States and  ग्रेट ब्रिटेन दोनो निषिद्ध the अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्लेव व्यापार in 1808 , लकिन the घरेलू व्यापार , साथ बिक्री to the गहन दक्षिण , विस्तारित dramatically  , and many captives were shipped by the coastwise slave trade .
Before the 1840s , the  दक्षिण थी vigorously defending गुलामी और इसके विस्तार into  the territories .
In the  उत्तर कुछ abolitionists denounced it as गुनाहगार , और numerous anti-slavery  forces rejected it as detrimental to the rights of free men .
After failed compromises and  अब्राहम lincoln 's चुनाव , in 1861 ग्यारह स्लेव राज्य broke दूर to रूप the confederate राज्य of अमेरिका  , leading to the American Civil War .
the संघीय सरकारी in 1862 बना  abolition of slavery a war goal .
In  जनवरी 1863 अध्यक्ष lincoln freed स्लेव in the confederacy  through the Emancipation Proclamation .
After the war , the Thirteenth Amendment ,  प्रभावी दिसम्बर 1865 , abolished गुलामी throughout the संपूर्ण संयुक्त राज्य , सहित the  Border states and the Indian territories .
इससे the 16th to the 19th सदियां , an अनुमानित 12 लाख africans यहूद shipped  as slaves to the Americas .
See Slavery  in the americas .
The great majority went to the sugar  बागानों of the वेस्ट इंडीज or ब्राज़ील , जहाँ मृत्यु थी ऊँची  .
About 645,000 were  brought to कया is अभी the संयुक्त राज्य  .
By the 1860  संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी , the स्लेव जनसांख्यिकी in the अमरीकी दक्षिण  had grown to four million .
Of all 1,515,605 families in the 15 slave states , nearly  400,000 आयोजित स्लेव ( roughly एक in चार ) , amounting to  8 % of all American families .
While some slaves worked as house servants and urban artisans , the great majority worked on plantations or large farms , cultivating  lucrative नकदी फसलों , ऐसे as राइस , तम्बाकू , शुगर और , बाद 1800 , chiefly  cotton .
By 1860 most  स्लेव यहूद आयोजित in the गहन दक्षिण , जहाँ वे परोसा in work-gangs ;  two-thirds worked in cotton .
In small  परिचालन , वे worked साथ  their owners .
in विशाल बागानों वे यहूद निर्देशित  by white paid overseers .
Under  the प्रणाली कि became chattel गुलामी ( स्वामित्व of a इंसान होने , और of his/her वंशजों ) , a जातिगत तत्व थी आधारभूत :  slaves were blacks of African descent and owned , almost universally , by whites of European descent .
In the 17th century ,  वर्जिनिया , followed by अन्य दक्षिणी colonies , enacted विधि कि children of स्लेव माताओं यहूद born  into slavery .
Slaves could gain freedom only by running away ( which  थी मुश्किल और illegal to do ) , or by manumission by स्वामी , जिससे थी regulated by राज्य ,  and became increasingly difficult or prohibited .
In the earliest era of chattel  गुलामी , the colonies भी व्यवस्थित कार्य by a प्रणाली of बंधुआ मजदूर ज्ञात  as indentured servitude .
This typically lasted for several years for both poor  europeans और africans alike , to अदा बंद the लागत of हस्तांतरण to the colonies  .
They contracted for such  इंतजाम क्युकी of ग़रीब economies in उनके  home countries .
Between 1680  और 1700 , as कम europeans migrated to the colonies , planters began to आयात  more Africans as slaves .
Recognizing the importance of slavery , the House of Burgesses in Virginia enacted a new slave code  in 1705 ; it संयुक्त a किस्में of विधान और added नई प्रावधानों enforcing श्वेत सर्वोच्चता in the  law .
schematic क्रॉस खण्ड of भाग of पत्ता , जाइलम दिखाया  as red circles at figure 8 .
Xylem is one  of the दो प्रकार of हस्तांतरण ऊतक in vascular पौधे ( फ्लोएम  is the other ) .
The word xylem is derived from the Greek word ξύλον ( xylon ) ,  अर्थ `` लकडी '' ; the best-known जाइलम ऊतक is लकडी , हालांकि it is मिला throughout  the plant .
Its basic function is to  हस्तांतरण जल , लकिन it भी transports कुछ nutrients through  the plant .
This clock representation shows some of the  प्रमुख इकाई of geological समय और निर्णायक कार्यक्रम of धरती इतिहास  .
The Hadean eon represents  the समय पहले चट्टान रिकार्ड of जीवन on धरती ; इसके अपर boundary is अभी  regarded as 4.0 Ga ( billion years ago ) .
अन्य subdivisions प्रतिबिंबित the एवोल्यूशन of जीवन ; the archean और proterozoic हैं दोनो eons , the palaeozoic ,  Mesozoic and Cenozoic are eras of the Phanerozoic eon .
The two million year  quaternary काल , the समय of recognizable इंसानो , is too छोटी to  be visible at this scale .
The geologic time scale is a system of chronological measurement that relates stratigraphy to time , and is used by geologists ,  paleontologists , और अन्य धरती वैज्ञानिकों to describe the समय और संबंध between कार्यक्रम कि have occurred throughout  Earth 's history .
The table of geologic time spans presented here agrees with the dates  और नामकरण नियत forth by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय आयोग on स्तरिकी मानक रंग कोड of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय आयोग  on Stratigraphy .
Evidence from radiometric dating  indicates कि the धरती is परिचय 4.54 अरब  years old .
The geology or deep time of Earth 's  पास्ट रै महरूम व्यवस्थित into विभिन्न इकाई according to कार्यक्रम जिससे took  place in each period .
Different spans of time on the GTS are usually delimited by changes  in the संयोजन of strata जिससे correspond to उन्हें , indicating प्रमुख geological or paleontological कार्यक्रम , ऐसे as द्रव्यमान extinctions  .
For  उदाहरण , the boundary between the cretaceous काल और the paleogene काल is पारिभाषित by the cretaceous–paleogene  extinction event , which marked the demise of the dinosaurs and many other groups of life .
पुरानी समय spans जिससे predate the विश्वसनीय चट्टान रिकार्ड  ( before the Proterozoic Eon ) are defined by absolute age .
the ti-82 is a graphing परिपथ  made by Texas Instruments .
The TI-82 was designed in  1993 as a stripped bas , अधिक उपयोक्ता दोस्ताना संस्करण of the ti-85 , और as a बदलना  for the TI-81 .
it थी the सीधा पूर्ववर्ती  of the TI-83 .
It  साझा साथ the ti-85 a 6 mhz zilog  Z80 microprocessor .
Like the TI-81 , the TI-82 features a 96x64  पिक्सेल प्रदर्शक , और the कोर विशेषता नियत of the ti-81 साथ अनेक नई सुविधाएँ  .
the डाल of वर्ण of  The King of Fighters XI .
The King  of सेनानी लड़ खेल श्रेणी , उत्पादित by snk playmore , शामिल a चौड़ी  cast of characters , some of which are taken from other SNK games .
The story takes place in a fictional  ब्रह्मांड in जिससे an सालाना श्रेणी of 3-on-3 or 4-on-4 लड़  tournaments are held .
The first  खेल in the श्रेणी introduces the आरंभिक प्रमुख अक्षर of the श्रेणी , kyo kusanagi , a  young Japanese fighter who is the heir to a powerful group of martial artists having pyrokinetic abilities .
Kyo fights against the Kusanagi clan 's enemies , his  प्रतिद्वंद्वी iori yagami , और the परमेश्वर orochi और इसके इंसान अनुसरणकर्ता  , among others .
The first four games in the series revolve about these fights , while The King of Fighters '99 introduces a new story arc ,  घूमती around k ' , a यंग man जो seeks to नष्ट the रहस्यमय nests संगठन क्युकी वे kidnapped उसे at an जल्दी आयु और stripped उसे of उसके पास्ट यादें , so कि वे could फ़ोर्स उसे to be a सेनानी अंतर्गत उनके  control .
In  the किंग of सेनानी 2003 , a नई अक्षर नामित राख crimson enters the टूर्नामेंट , to चोरी the शक्तियां  of the clans who sealed the Orochi in the past for an unknown reason .
A new group of antagonists , known as Those From the Past , also appears  in the श्रेणी ; वे want to obtain orochi 's शक्ति लिये the purpose of giving it to उनके अनजान निपुण  .
The plot and the characters came  इससे the yamata no orochi लेजेंड .
There are also several characters  in the खेल कि हैं parodies or homages to  several popular anime , manga , and films .
Merchandise based on the characters has also  महरूम released , सहित कार्रवाई आंकड़े और keychains  .
the वर्ण have garnered तारीफ़ इससे अनेक वीडियो खेल publications  for the quality of their designs and movesets .
Comments focused on the lack of  सुधार in कुछ of the वर्ण , लकिन added कि the रोस्टर is greatly  diverse .
Whale Wars is a weekly American documentary-style reality television series  कि premiered on नवम्बर 7 , 2008 on the एनिमल ग्रह केबल  channel .
the कार्यक्रम फ़ॉलो पॉल वाटसन , संस्थापक of the समुद्र गड़रिये संरक्षण समाज , as he और the क्रू  aboard their various vessels harass Japanese whalers off the coast of Antarctica .
On January 5 , 2013 , Animal  ग्रह नवीनीकृत the श्रेणी लिये a छठे  season .
The Harpy Eagle ( Harpia  harpyja ) is a neotropical प्रजाति of  eagle .
It is sometimes known as the American  harpy त्रिभुज to फर्क it इससे the पापुआई त्रिभुज जिससे is sometimes ज्ञात as the नई गिनी harpy  Eagle or Papuan Harpy Eagle .
It is the largest and most  शक्तिशाली रैप्टर मिला in the americas , और among the largest extant  species of eagles in the world .
It usually inhabits tropical  lowland rainforests in the अपर ( emergent ) canopy परत  .
विनाश of इसके प्राकृतिक आवास रै देखी it vanish इससे अनेक भाग of इसके पूर्व दायरा , और it is nearly  extirpated in Central America .
Biological classification , or scientific classification in biology  , is a विधि of वैज्ञानिक taxonomy प्रयुक्त to समूह और categorize जीवों into समूह ऐसे as genus  or species .
These groups are  ज्ञात as taxa ( एकवचन  : taxon ) .
Modern biological classification has its root in the work  of carolus लीनियस , जो grouped प्रजाति according to साझा शारीरिक विशेषताएँ  .
These groupings  have चूंकि महरूम संशोधित to improve संगति साथ the darwinian  principle of common descent .
With  the परिचय of the cladistic विधि in the लेट 20th सदी , phylogenetic taxonomy in जिससे जीवों हैं grouped  based purely on inferred evolutionary relatedness , ignoring morphological similarity , has become common in some areas of biology .
Molecular phylogenetics , which uses DNA sequences  as आंकड़ा , रै भी चलित अनेक हाल revisions और is संभावित to continue  doing so .
biological वर्गीकरण belongs to the विज्ञान  of biological systematics .
Lennon  's हस्ताक्षर
John Winston Ono Lennon , ( born John  विंस्टन लेनन ; 9 अक्तूबर 1940 – 8 दिसम्बर 1980 ) थी an अंग्रेज़ी संगीतकार , सिंगर और songwriter जो रोज़ to विश्वव्यापी कीर्ति as a संस्थापक सदस्य  of the Beatles , one of the most commercially successful and critically acclaimed acts in the history of popular music .
With Paul  mccartney , he formed एक of the सबसे मनाये songwriting  partnerships of the 20th century .
Born and raised in Liverpool  , as a किशोरावस्था लेनन became शामिल in the skiffle craze ; उसके पहला बैंड  , the Quarrymen , evolved into the Beatles in 1960 .
As the group disintegrated towards the end of the decade , Lennon embarked on a solo career that produced  the critically acclaimed एल्बम जॉन lennon/plastic ओनो बैंड और imagine , और iconic गीतों ऐसे as `` दे सलाम a मौका ``  and `` Imagine `` .
After his marriage  to योको ओनो in 1969 , he बदला उसके नाम  to John Ono Lennon .
Lennon  disengaged खुद इससे the म्यूज़िक कारोबार in 1975 to devote समय to उठाने उसके शिशु बेटे  Sean , but re-emerged with Ono in 1980 with the new album Double Fantasy .
He was  murdered तीन सप्ताह बाद  its release .
Lennon revealed a rebellious nature and  acerbic wit in उसके म्यूज़िक , लिखने , drawings , on फिल्मी और in साक्षात्कार  .
Controversial through his political and peace activism , he moved to New  यॉर्क नगर in 1971 , जहाँ उसके आलोचना of the वियतनाम युद्ध resulted in a lengthy attempt by रिचर्ड निक्सन 's प्रशासन to निर्वासन उसे , जबकि कुछ of उसके  songs were adopted as anthems by the anti-war movement .
As of 2012 , Lennon 's solo album sales in the United States exceed 14 million units , and as writer , co-writer or  यजमान , he is जिम्मेदार लिये 25 number-one singles on the us hot 100 चार्ट  .
In 2002 , a BBC poll on the 100 Greatest Britons  voted उसे आठवीं , और in 2008 , रोलिंग स्टोन क्रमित उसे the fifth-greatest सिंगर of  all time .
He was posthumously inducted into the Songwriters  हॉल of कीर्ति in 1987 और into the चट्टान और  Roll Hall of Fame in 1994 .
Statue of  rip वैन winkle in irvington , नई यॉर्क , नहीं  far from `` Sunnyside `` , the home of Washington Irving
`` Rip Van  winkle '' is a छोटी स्टोरी by अमरीकी लेखक वॉशिंगटन इरविंग प्रकाशित in 1819 , as खूब as the नाम of the स्टोरी  's fictional protagonist .
लिखा जबकि इरविंग थी जीना in बर्मिंघम , इंग्लैण्ड  , it was part of a collection entitled The Sketch Book of Geoffrey Crayon .
Although the story is set in New York 's Catskill Mountains  , इरविंग बाद admitted , `` जब i लिखा the स्टोरी , i था never महरूम on the catskills  . ''
Throughout the fifty-five year history of the  ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , अनेक significant रिकॉर्ड have  been set .
This page  तभी शामिल the प्रतिस्पर्धी पुरस्कार जीती by विभिन्न  artists .
This does not include the  विभिन्न खास पुरस्कार कि हैं प्रस्तुत by the नेशनल अकादमी of रिकॉर्डिंग कला और sciences ऐसे as आजीवन उपलब्धि  Awards , Trustees Awards , Technical Awards or Legend Awards .
The page however does include other  non-performance सम्बन्धित grammys ( ज्ञात as the शिल्प & उत्पादन फ़ील्ड ) कि may have महरूम प्रस्तुत  to the artist ( s ) .
Pee-wee Herman is a  कॉमिक fictional अक्षर निर्मित और portrayed by अमरीकी  comedian Paul Reubens .
He is best known for his two television  श्रेणी और फिल्मी श्रेणी दौरान the 1980s  .
The  childlike pee-wee herman अक्षर विकसित as a स्टेज अधिनियम कि जल्दी  led to an HBO special in 1981 .
As the stage performance gained  further लोकप्रियता , reubens took the अक्षर to गति चित्र साथ pee-wee 's बिग एडवेंचर in  1985 , toning down the adult innuendo for the appeal of children .
This paved the way for Pee-wee 's  playhouse , an एमी पुरस्कार जीतना children 's श्रेणी कि भागा on  CBS from 1986-1991 .
Another  फिल्मी , बिग शीर्ष pee-wee  , was released in 1988 .
Due to  ऋणात्मक मीडिया ध्यान following a कांड in 1991 , reubens decided to shelve उसके alter अहंकार दौरान  the 1990s , and then gradually resurrected it during the following decade .
It was at that time that Reubens  addressed योजनाएँ to लिखें a नई pee-wee फिल्मी , pee-wee 's playhouse :  The Movie .
In June 2007 , Reubens appeared as  pee-wee herman लिये the पहला समय चूंकि 1991 at स्पाइक tv 's यारों  ' Choice Awards .
That '70s Show is an American  टेलीविज़न काल sitcom कि centers on the जीवनदान of a समूह of teenage मित्रों जीना in the fictional suburban कस्बा  of Point Place , Wisconsin , from May 17 , 1976 , to December 31 , 1979 .
It debuted on the Fox television  संजाल , पहला airing on अगस्त 23 , 1998 , कार्यशील लिये आठ लगातार सीज़न , और concluding साथ the 200th एपीसोड on may  18 , 2006 .
The main teenage cast  सदस्यों यहूद topher अनुग्रह , mila kunis , एश्टन कूचर , डैनी  Masterson , Laura Prepon , and Wilmer Valderrama .
The main adult cast  सदस्यों यहूद डेबरा jo rupp , kurtwood स्मिथ , डॉन स्टार्क और , दौरान the  first three seasons , Tanya Roberts .
Kansas ( ) is a  u.S. राज्य स्तिथ in the midwestern संयुक्त  States .
It is named after the Kansas River which flows  through it , जिससे in फेरे थी नामित बाद the कंस देशी अमरीकी जनजाति , जिससे inhabited the क्षेत्रफल  .
The tribe 's name ( natively kką : ze ) is often said to mean ``  लोगों of the हवा '' or `` लोगों of the दक्षिण हवा , '' हालांकि इस थी संभवतः नहीं the पद 's असली अर्थ  .
Residents  of कान्सास हैं पुकारा `` kansans  . ''
For thousands of years what is now Kansas  थी घर to numerous और विविध देशी अमरीकी  tribes .
Tribes in the Eastern part of the state  generally जिया in गांवों साथ the नदी घाटियों  .
Tribes  in the पश्चिमी भाग of the राज्य यहूद सेमi- nomadic और hunted  large herds of bison .
Kansas was first settled by European  अमेरिकी in the 1830s , लकिन the pace of उपनिवेश त्वरित in the 1850s , in the midst of  political wars over the slavery issue .
When  officially खोली to उपनिवेश by the u.S. सरकारी in 1854 , abolitionist free-staters इससे नई इंग्लैण्ड और pro-slavery settlers इससे neighboring मिसौरी rushed  to the territory to determine if Kansas would become a free state or a slave state .
Thus , the area was a hotbed of violence and chaos in its early days as these  शक्तियां collided , और थी ज्ञात as bleeding कान्सास  .
The abolitionists eventually  prevailed और on जनवरी 29 , 1861 , कान्सास डाला the  Union as a free state .
After  the सिविल युद्ध , the जनसांख्यिकी of कान्सास grew rapidly , जब लहरें of आप्रवासियों turned  the prairie into farmland .
Today ,  कान्सास is एक of the सबसे उत्पादक agricultural राज्य , producing ऊँची yields of गेहूं  , sorghum and sunflowers .
Kansas is the 15th most extensive and  the 33rd सबसे populous of the 50 संयुक्त राज्य  .
Psychology is an  अकादमिक और लागू अनुशासन कि involves the  scientific study of mental functions and behaviors .
Psychology has the immediate goal of understanding individuals and groups by both  establishing सामान्य सिद्धान्त और researching विशिष्ट मामले , और by अनेक खाते  it ultimately aims to benefit society .
In this field , a professional or  शोधकर्ता is पुकारा a मनोवैज्ञानिक और can be वर्गीकृत as a सोशल , behavioral  , or cognitive scientist .
Psychologists  attempt to समझे the भूमिका of दिमागी कृत्यों in व्यक्तिगत और सोशल बर्ताव , जबकि भी exploring the physiological और neurobiological  processes that underlie certain cognitive functions and behaviors .
Psychologists explore concepts such as  बोध , संज्ञान , ध्यान , जज्बात , phenomenology , प्रेरणा , दिमाग कामकाज  , personality , behavior , and interpersonal relationships .
psychologists of विविध धारियाँ भी consider  the unconscious mind .
psychologists employ अनुभवजन्य विधि to infer causal और correlational संबंध  between psychosocial variables .
In addition , or in opposition , to employing empirical  और निगमनात्मक विधि , some—especially नैदानिक और counseling psychologists—at टाइम्स rely upon सांकेतिक  interpretation and other inductive techniques .
Psychology has been described as a  `` हब विज्ञान '' , साथ मनोवैज्ञानिक निष्कर्षों linking to शोध और perspectives इससे the सोशल sciences  , natural sciences , medicine , and the humanities , such as philosophy .
जबकि मनोवैज्ञानिक ज्ञान is प्रायः लागू to the मूल्यांकन और उपचार of दिमागी स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं , it is भी  directed towards understanding and solving problems in many different spheres of human activity .
The majority of  psychologists हैं शामिल in कुछ दयालु of therapeutic भूमिका , practicing in नैदानिक , counseling  , or school settings .
Many do scientific research on a wide range of topics related to mental processes  और बर्ताव , और typically कार्य in विश्वविद्यालयों मनोविज्ञान विभाग or सिखा in अन्य अकादमिक जमावट ( e.g. , चिकित्सा  schools , hospitals ) .
Some are  employed in औद्योगिक और organizational जमावट , or in अन्य क्षेत्रों ऐसे as इंसान विकास और वृद्धावस्था , खेल , स्वास्थ्य , और  the media , as well as in forensic investigation and other aspects of law .
Thomas Jefferson ( April 13 , 1743 ( April 2 , 1743 O.S. ) – July 4 , 1826 ) was  an अमरीकी founding पिता , the प्रिंसिपल लेखक of the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता ( 1776 ) और the तीसरा अध्यक्ष of the  United States ( 1801–1809 ) .
At the beginning of the American Revolution , he  परोसा in the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस , representing वर्जिनिया और तब परोसा as a wartime राज्यपाल  of Virginia ( 1779–1781 ) .
Just after the war ended , from  mid-1784 जेफरसन परोसा as a राजनयिक , stationed in पेरिस .
In  may 1785 , he became the संयुक्त राज्य मंत्री  to France .
Jefferson was the first  संयुक्त राज्य सचिव of राज्य ( 1790–1793 ) सेवारत अंतर्गत अध्यक्ष  George Washington .
With his close friend James Madison he organized the  democratic-republican पार्टी , और subsequently resigned इससे वॉशिंगटन 's कैबिनेट  .
Elected Vice President in 1796 , when he came  in दूसरी to जॉन एडम्स of the federalists , जेफरसन opposed एडम्स और साथ मैडिसन secretly लिखा the केंटकी और  Virginia Resolutions , which attempted to nullify the Alien and Sedition Acts .
Elected president in what Jefferson called the  क्रान्ति of 1800 , he oversaw the खरीदें of the विशाल louisiana territory इससे फ़्रांस ( 1803 ) , और भेजा the लुईस और क्लार्क expedition ( 1804–1806 ) to  explore the new west .
His second term was beset with troubles at home , such as the  विफल देशद्रोह विचारण of उसके पूर्व वाइस अध्यक्ष  Aaron Burr .
With  escalating ट्रबल साथ ब्रिटेन जो थी चुनौतीपूर्ण अमरीकी neutrality और threatening शिपिंग at समुद्र , he आजमाया आर्थिक warfare साथ उसके  embargo laws which only damaged American trade .
In 1803 , President Jefferson initiated a process of Indian tribal  हटाना और relocation to the louisiana territory वेस्ट of the मिसिसिपी नदी , in अनुक्रम to खोलें  lands for eventual American settlers .
A leader in the Enlightenment , Jefferson was a polymath  जो spoke पाँच भाषाएं धड़ल्ले और थी deeply दिलचस्पी in विज्ञान , आविष्कार , वास्तुकला , धर्म और दर्शनशास्त्र ,  interests that led him to the founding of the University of Virginia after his presidency .
He designed his own large  mansion on a 5,000 एकड़ वृक्षारोपण निकट charlottesville , वर्जिनिया ,  which he named Monticello .
While not a notable orator ,  जेफरसन थी a skilled लेखक और corresponded साथ अनेक influential लोगों in अमेरिका और यूरोपीय throughout  his adult life .
Though Jefferson owned many slaves , he opposed  the संस्था सब उसके जीवन और नतीजतन treated और took परवाह of उन्हें बहुत खूब और अपेक्षित उन्हें to कार्य no अधिक than  free farmers .
Since  1802 इतिहासकारों और अन्य have महरूम विभाजित over the विवाद of whether जेफरसन  was the father of one or more children belonging to Sally Hemings , a slave at Monticello . ''
इतिहासकारों हैं भी in असहमति साथ कैसा much जेफरसन थी  committed to the anti-slavery cause .
In  1807 , अध्यक्ष जेफरसन हस्ताक्षरित into विधि a विधेयक कि बैन the importation of  slaves into the United States .
After Martha Jefferson , his wife of eleven years , died in 1782 ,  जेफरसन remained a विधुर लिये the बाकी of उसके जीवन ; उनके विवाह उत्पादित छह children , of जिसको दो बच to adulthood  .
Though Jefferson has been criticized by many  आधुनिक दिन विद्वानों over the समस्या of गुलामी , he remains रेटेड as एक of the  greatest U.S. presidents .
`` Sun City '' is a 1985 protest song written by Steven Van Zandt  , उत्पादित by वैन zandt और आर्थर बेकर और अंकित by कलाकारों संयुक्त विरूद्ध रंगभेद to convey विपक्ष to the दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी नीति  of apartheid .
The primary means of that  विपक्ष is to घोषित कि सब the कलाकारों शामिल होता इंकार कोई और सब offers to perform at सूर्य नगर , a रिज़ॉर्ट जिससे थी स्तिथ in bantustan of bophuthatswana , एक of a क्रमांक of internationally अपरिचित  supposed `` independent '' states created by the South African government to forcibly relocate its black population .

This is a list of  एनबीए खिलाड़ी साथ सबसे  championships won as a player .
The National Basketball Association (  एनबीए ) is a प्रमुख पेशेवर बास्केट लीग in  North America .
It was founded in 1946 as  the बास्केट संघ of अमेरिका  ( BAA ) .
The league adopted  इसके वर्तमान नाम at the प्रारंभ of the जब it मिलाया साथ the नेशनल  Basketball League ( NBL ) .
The NBA Finals is the championship series for the NBA and the  निष्कर्ष of the खेल 's postseason  .
The winning team of  the श्रेणी receives the लैरी o'brien चैंपियनशिप  Trophy .
Players from the winning team usually  प्राप्त चैंपियनशिप बजती इससे the टोली honoring  their contribution .
However , in some rare occasion , the  टीमों opted to दिया अन्य commemorative वस्तुएं , ऐसे as  wrist watches , instead of rings .
The number of championships won  by एनबीए सुपरस्टार is प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a मापन of उनके विशालता  .
Boston  सेल्टिक्स बीच विधेयक रसेल holds the रिकार्ड लिये the सबसे एनबीए championships  won with 11 titles during his 13-year playing career .
He won his first  चैंपियनशिप साथ the बोस्टन सेल्टिक्स in  his rookie year .
Afterwards , he went on to win  10 championships in the अगला 12 सालो , सहित आठ लगातार  championships from 1959 to 1966 .
He won the last two championships in  1968 और 1969 as player-coach  .
Russell 's teammate , Sam Jones , won 10  championships इससे 1959 to 1969 , the दूसरी सबसे in एनबीए इतिहास  .
Four Celtics  खिलाड़ी , tom heinsohn , K. C. जोन्स , satch सैंडर्स और  John Havlicek , won eight championships each .
Two other Celtics , Jim  loscutoff और फ़्रैंक रैमसे , जीती सात championships  each .

Saul won consecutive championships with the Rochester Royals and the Minneapolis Lakers  in the 1950s , जबकि केर जीती लगातार championships साथ the bulls और the स्पर्स  in the 1990s,
Accuracy indicates proximity of measurement results to the true value ,  परिशुद्धता to the repeatability , or reproducibility  of the measurement
In the fields of science , engineering , industry , and statistics , the  सटीकता of a मापन प्रणाली is the उपाधि of निकटता of माप of a मात्रा to कि मात्रा 's वास्तविक (  true ) value .
The precision of a measurement system , also called reproducibility or  repeatability , is the उपाधि to जिससे दोहराया माप अंतर्गत अपरिवर्तित शर्तें  show the same results .
Although the two words  reproducibility और repeatability can be synonymous in colloquial उपयोग , वे हैं  deliberately contrasted in the context of the scientific method .
A measurement system can be accurate but not precise ,  precise लकिन नहीं सटीक , neither , or दोनो  .
For example ,  if an प्रयोग contains a व्यवस्थित गलती , तब increasing the नमूना आकार generally  increases precision but does not improve accuracy .
The result would be a  सतत yet inaccurate स्ट्रिंग of परिणाम इससे the flawed प्रयोग  .
Eliminating the systematic  गलती improves सटीकता लकिन करता नहीं बदलें परिशुद्धता  .
A  मापन प्रणाली is designated मान्य if it is दोनो  accurate and precise .
Related terms include bias (  non- यादृच्छिक or निर्देशित प्रभाव caused by a फ़ैक्टर or कारकों unrelated  to the independent variable ) and error ( random variability ) .
The terminology is also applied to indirect  measurements—that is , मान प्राप्त by a कम्प्यूटेशनल कार्यविधि इससे observed आंकड़ा  .
In addition to accuracy and precision ,  माप may भी have a मापन रेज़ोल्यूशन , जिससे is the smallest बदलें in the underlying शारीरिक मात्रा  that produces a response in the measurement .
In the case of full reproducibility , such as when rounding a number to a  representable फ्लोटिंग पाइंट क्रमांक , the शब्द परिशुद्धता रै a अर्थ नहीं सम्बन्धित to reproducibility  .
For example , in the  आईईईई 754-2008 मानक it अर्थात् the क्रमांक of बिट्स in the significand , so it is प्रयुक्त as a माप लिये the सापेक्ष  accuracy with which an arbitrary number can be represented .
Fuck in  इसके शाब्दिक अर्थ refers to the  act of sexual intercourse .
It is an English word that  is प्रायः प्रयुक्त as a profanity , either to denote तिरस्कार or as an intensifier  .
The  उत्पत्ति of the शब्द  is obscure .
It is usually considered to be  पहला attested to around 1475 , लकिन it may be considerably  older .
In modern usage , fuck and its derivatives ( such as fucker and fucking ) can  be प्रयुक्त in the स्थिति of a संज्ञा , a क्रिया , an क्रियाशील or an क्रियाविशेषण  .
There are many common phrases which make use of the  शब्द , as खूब as a क्रमांक of यौगिकों incorporating  it , such as motherfucker .
Animated  , color-coded मैप प्रर्दशित the  various continents and regions .
Depending on the convention and model , some continents may be consolidated or  subdivided : लिये उदाहरण , यूरेशिया is सबसे प्रायः subdivided into यूरोपीय और एशिया ( रेड शेड्स ) , जबकि उत्तर और दक्षिण अमेरिका  are sometimes recognized as one American continent ( green shades ) .
A  महाद्वीप is एक of अनेक बहुत विशाल  landmasses on Earth .
They are generally identified by  सम्मेलन बल्कि than कोई सख्त मापदण्ड , साथ up to सात regions commonly regarded as continents—they हैं ( इससे largest in आकार to smallest ) : एशिया , अफ़्रीकी , उत्तर अमेरिका ,  South America , Antarctica , Europe , and Australia .
In geology , continents  हैं वर्णित by अर्थात् of tectonic  plates .
थाली विवर्तनिकी is the प्रक्रम और पढ़ाई of the गति , टक्कर और प्रभाग of महाद्वीपों ,  earlier known as continental drift .

It stars Laurence  फिशबर्न , djimon hounsou , डेरेक ल्यूक , meagan शुभ , और larenz टेट  and is written and directed by Reggie Rock Bythewood .

Community property is a marital property regime that  originated in सिविल विधि jurisdictions और is अभी भी मिला in कुछ आम  law jurisdictions .
The states of the United States  कि recognize जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी हैं primarily in the वेस्ट ; it थी inherited इससे मैक्सिको 's ganancial जातियाँ प्रणाली , जिससे itself थी inherited इससे स्पेनी विधि ( a रोमन -derived सिविल विधि प्रणाली  ) and ultimately from the Visigoths .
While under Spanish  नियम louisiana अपनाया the ganancial जातियाँ प्रणाली of acquests और  gains , which replaced the traditional French community of movables and acquests in its civil law system .
Map of the United States with community  प्रॉपर्टी राज्य highlighted in रेड  .
In addition to the highlighted  राज्य , अलास्का is a पृथक प्रॉपर्टी राज्य कि permits युगल to ऑप्ट into  a community property arrangement .
In a community property jurisdiction , most property  acquired दौरान the विवाह ( मगर लिये उपहार or inheritances ) —the जातियाँ , or communio bonorum—is स्वामित्व jointly by दोनो spouses  and is divided upon divorce , annulment or death .
Joint  स्वामित्व is automatically presumed by विधि in the अनुपस्थिति of विशिष्ट प्रमाण कि होता पाइंट to a contrary निष्कर्ष  for a particular piece of property .
Division of  जातियाँ प्रॉपर्टी may लो प्लेस by मद , by splitting सब वस्तुएं or  by value .
In some jurisdictions , such as California , a 50/50 division of community  प्रॉपर्टी is सख्ती mandated by statute , अर्थ कि the फ़ोकस तब शिफ्ट to whether particular वस्तुएं हैं to be वर्गीकृत  as community or separate property .
In other  jurisdictions , ऐसे as टेक्सास , a तलाक अदालत may डिक्री an `` निष्पक्ष वितरण  `` of community property , which may result in an unequal division of such .
In  non-community प्रॉपर्टी राज्य प्रॉपर्टी may  be divided by equitable distribution .
Generally speaking , the property  कि प्रत्येक संगी brings into the विवाह or receives by तोहफा , bequest or मक्कारी दौरान विवाह is पुकारा  separate property ( i.e. , not community property ) .
देखिए प्रभाग of  property .
Division of  जातियाँ debts may नहीं be the वही as प्रभाग of जातियाँ  property .
For example , in California , community property is  जरूरी to be विभाजित `` बराबर '' जबकि जातियाँ कर्ज़ is जरूरी  to be divided `` equitably '' .
प्रॉपर्टी कि is स्वामित्व by एक जीवनसाथी पहले the विवाह is the पृथक प्रॉपर्टी of कि  spouse , unless the property is `` transmuted '' into community property .
The rules for  इस vary इससे क्षेत्राधिकार to  jurisdiction .
The Duke and Duchess of  कैम्ब्रिज हिलाता to the भीड  at The Mall shortly after the wedding .
The wedding of Prince  विलियम , ड्यूक of कैम्ब्रिज , और कैथरीन मिडलटन took  place on 29 April 2011 at Westminster Abbey in London .
The groom , Prince William , Duke  of कैम्ब्रिज , is the ज्येष्ठ बेटे of चार्ल्स , प्रिंस of वेल्स , और is दूसरी in the लकीर of उत्तराधिकार to  the British Throne and the thrones of fifteen other Commonwealth realms .
The bride , Catherine  `` केट '' मिडलटन is the ज्येष्ठ of तीन children of माइकल और carole मिडलटन  of Bucklebury , Berkshire .
The Dean of Westminster , John Hall , presided at the service ; the Archbishop of Canterbury , Rowan Williams ,  conducted the विवाह ; रिचर्ड chartres , the बिशप of लंदन , preached the उपदेश ; और a पढना थी  given by the bride 's brother , James .
William 's best man was his  bhai , प्रिंस हैरी , जबकि the बहू 's सिस्टर , पिप्पा , थी नौकरानी of इज्ज़त  .
The ceremony was attended by the bride 's and groom 's families , as  खूब as अनेक विदेशी रॉयल्स , राजनयिकों , और the युगल 's चुनी निजी  guests .
After the ceremony , the couple made the traditional  रूप on the बालकनी of बकिंघम राजमहल  .
As Prince  विलियम थी नहीं the वारिस apparent to the सिंहासन , the विवाह थी नहीं a पूरा राज्य अवसर  and many details were left to the couple to decide , such as much of the guest list of about 1,900 .
प्रिंस विलियम और केट मिडलटन  met in 2001 .
Their  सगाई on 20 अक्तूबर 2010 थी घोषित  on 16 November 2010 .
The build-up to the wedding  और the अवसर itself आकर्षित much मीडिया ध्यान , होने compared in अनेक तरीके साथ the 1981 विवाह of  William 's parents .
The occasion was a public holiday in the United Kingdom and featured  अनेक ceremonial पहलुओं , सहित उपयोग of the राज्य carriages  and roles for the Foot Guards and Household Cavalry .
कार्यक्रम यहूद आयोजित around the राष्ट्रमंडल to चिह्नित the विवाह ; संगठनों और होटल आयोजित कार्यक्रम आरपार कनाडा , over 5,000 गली पार्टियों यहूद आयोजित throughout the संयुक्त किंगडम , और एक लाख लोगों lined the रूट between  Westminster Abbey and Buckingham Palace .
The ceremony was  viewed सजीव by tens of लाखो अधिक around the संसार , सहित 72 लाख on the  YouTube Royal Channel .
In the United  किंगडम , टेलीविज़न ऑडियंस peaked at 26.3 लाख दर्शक , साथ a कुल of 36.7 लाख watching भाग  of the coverage .

Minnillo was also  नामित मिस टीन यूएसए in  1998 .
