a हाथ ( मेड . / lat . : manus , pl . manūs ) is a prehensile , multi- fingered extremity  located at the end of an arm or forelimb of primates and humans , chimpanzees , monkeys , and lemurs .
A few other vertebrates such as  the कोआला ( जिससे रै दो opposable thumbs on प्रत्येक `` हाथ '' और फिंगरप्रिंट remarkably समान to इंसान फिंगरप्रिंट )  are often described as having either `` hands '' or `` paws '' on their front limbs .
हैंड्स हैं the प्रमुख structures लिये physically manipulating the पर्यावरण , प्रयुक्त लिये दोनो सकल मोटर कौशल ( ऐसे  as grasping a large object ) and fine motor skills ( such as picking up a small pebble ) .
The fingertips  contain कुछ of the densest क्षेत्रों of तंत्रिका endings on the देह , हैं the richest सोर्स of tactile प्रतिक्रिया ,  and have the greatest positioning capability of the body ; thus the sense of touch is intimately associated with hands .
Like other paired organs ( eyes , feet , legs ) , each hand is dominantly controlled by the opposing brain hemisphere ,  so कि handedness , or the पसन्दीदा हाथ चुनाव लिये single-handed क्रियाएँ ऐसे as लिखने साथ a पेंसिल , reflects व्यक्तिगत दिमाग  functioning .
Some evolutionary anatomists use the  पद हाथ to refer to the appendage of अंक on the forelimb अधिक generally — लिये उदाहरण , in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of whether the तीन  digits of the bird hand involved the same homologous loss of two digits as in the dinosaur hand .
The human  हाथ रै 27 हड्डियों , नहीं सहित the sesamoid हड्डियों  which number varies between people .
14 of which are the phalanges  ( proximal , इंटरमीडिएट और distal  ) of the fingers .
The metacarpals are the bones  कि connects the उंगलियाँ और  the wrist .
प्रत्येक इंसान हाथ रै 5 metacarpals  and 8 carpal bones .
Too Cool was a professional wrestling tag team and former  गुट सबसे notably क्रियाशील in संसार कुश्ती federation/entertainment between 1998 और 2001 और लिये  a short time in 2004 .
मौलिक डिजिटल सचेतक क्लॉक  without a radio .
The mark in the top-left of the display  indicates कि the समय is 4:00pm  , not 4:00am .
A  1969 रेडियो सचेतक क्लॉक ( सोनी digimatic  8FC-59W ) with an early mechanical-digital display .
A digital clock is a type of clock that displays the time  डिजिटली , i.e . in numerals or अन्य प्रतीकों , as opposed to an एनालॉग क्लॉक , जहाँ the समय is indicated by the स्थितियाँ  of rotating hands .
डिजिटल घड़ियाँ हैं प्रायः संबद्ध साथ इलेक्ट्रॉनिक ड्राइव , लकिन the `` डिजिटल '' वर्णन refers  only to the display , not to the drive mechanism .
( Both analog and digital clocks can be driven either  mechanically or electronically , लकिन `` घटीयंत्र '' mechanisms साथ डिजिटल प्रदर्शक  are rare . )
The biggest digital  क्लॉक is the lichtzeitpegel ( `` लाइट समय स्तर '' ) on the टेलीविज़न मीनार rheinturm  Düsseldorf , Germany .
Family  guy निर्माता सेठ macfarlane भी provides the आवाज़ें of पीटर griffin , stewie griffin , ब्रायन  Griffin , and Glenn Quagmire .
Family Guy is an American animated sitcom that features  पाँच प्रमुख आवाज़ अभिनेताओं , और numerous नियमित डाल और पुनरावर्ती अतिथि सितारों  .
The principal voice cast consists of show creator Seth MacFarlane , Alex  borstein , सेठ ग्रीन , mila kunis ( जो replaced लेसी chabert बाद the पहला ऋतु ) और माइक हेनरी और अभी , the  new actor Beau Osborne .
Recurring voice actors include Patrick Warburton , Adam West ,  जॉन G. ब्रेनन , निकोल सुलीवान और जेनिफर tilly , और repeat अतिथि सितारों शामिल फिलिस  Diller , Charles Durning , Rush Limbaugh , and Phil LaMarr .
Many cast  सदस्यों provide आवाज़ें लिये अनेक  characters .
The voice actors , in  portraying the विभिन्न अक्षर personalities on the दिखाएँ , चित्रण प्रेरणा इससे  celebrities and pop culture .
Family Guy  वर्ण have महरूम निभाई by अधिक than एक कर्ता , बाद सदस्यों of the दिखाएँ बाएँ the श्रेणी or  had conflicting obligations .
Kunis was nominated for an Annie Award for voicing Meg Griffin in the season 5 episode `` Barely Legal `` and MacFarlane has also won an Emmy Award for  बकाया voice-over प्रदर्शन और an एनी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन आवाज़ एक्टिंग in an एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न उत्पादन , हालांकि no अन्य डाल सदस्य रै जीती an पुरस्कार लिये उनके कार्य on the  series .
The five sets of the board game Monopoly depicted here  दिखाएँ the एवोल्यूशन of the खेल 's कलाकृति और डिजाइन in  the United States from 1935–2005 .
The history of  the फलक खेल एकाधिकार can be traced वापस to the जल्दी  20th century .
The earliest known design was by the  अमरीकी , एलिज़ाबेथ magie , patented in 1904 लकिन मौजूदा as जल्दी as  1902 .
Magie 's original intent was to publish a board game to  illustrate an आर्थिक principle , namely the georgist अवधारणा of a  single land value tax .
A series of board  खेल यहूद विकसित इससे 1906 through the 1930s कि शामिल the खरीदे और  selling of land and the development of that land .
By  1934 , a फलक खेल था महरूम निर्मित much जैसे the संस्करण of एकाधिकार बेची by पार्कर भाइयो  and its related companies through the rest of the 20th century , and into the 21st .
अनेक लोगों , ज़्यादातर in the midwestern संयुक्त राज्य  and near the East Coast , contributed to the game 's design and evolution .
By the 1970s , the idea that the game had been created solely by Charles Darrow had become popular folklore ; it was printed in the game  's निर्देश लिये अनेक सालो , in a 1974 किताब devoted to एकाधिकार , और थी cited in a सामान्य किताब परिचय खिलौने भी as recently as 2007  .
Even a guide to family  खेल प्रकाशित लिये रीडर 's डाइजेस्ट in 2003 तभी दिया क्रेडिट to darrow और एलिज़ाबेथ magie , erroneously stating कि magie 's असली खेल थी निर्मित in the 1800s , और नहीं acknowledging कोई of  the game 's development between Magie 's creation of the game , and the eventual publication by Parker Brothers .
Also in the 1970s , Professor Ralph Anspach , who had himself published a board game intended to  illustrate the सिद्धान्त of दोनो monopolies और विश्वास busting , लड़ा पार्कर भाइयो और इसके तब जनक कम्पनी , सामान्य मिलों , over  the trademarks of the Monopoly board game .
Through the  शोध of anspach और अन्य , much of the जल्दी इतिहास of the खेल  was `` rediscovered '' .
Anspach confronted Maxine Brady , author of the  1974 किताब the एकाधिकार किताब : रणनीति और tactics of the संसार 's सबसे लोकप्रिय खेल over the वास्तविक इतिहास  of the game on Barry Farber 's New York City talk show in 1975 .
Because of the lengthy court  प्रक्रम , सहित appeals , the विधिक औकात of पार्कर भाइयो ' trademarks  on the game was not settled until 1985 .
The game 's name remains a registered trademark of Parker Brothers ,  as do इसके विशिष्ट डिज़ाइन तत्व  .
At the conclusion of the court case , the game 's  लोगो और ग्राफिक डिज़ाइन तत्व became भाग of a larger एकाधिकार ब्रांड , licensed by पार्कर भाइयो ' जनक कंपनियाँ onto a किस्में  of items through the present day .
Despite the `` rediscovery '' of the board game  's जल्दी इतिहास in the 1970s और 1980s , और अनेक किताबे और जर्नल आलेख on the विषय , हास्ब्रो ( पार्कर भाइयो ' वर्तमान जनक कम्पनी ) किया नहीं acknowledge कोई of the खेल 's  history before Charles Darrow on its official Monopoly website as recently as June 2012 .
Nor did Hasbro  acknowledge anyone अन्य than darrow in सामग्री प्रकाशित or प्रायोजित  by them , at least as recently as 2006 .
International tournaments , first held in the early 1970s , continue to the  उपस्थित , साथ the अगला संसार चैंपियनशिप संभावित अनुसूचित  for 2013 .
Starting in 1985 , a new  पीढी of spin-off फलक खेल और कार्ड खेल appeared on  both sides of the Atlantic Ocean .
In  1989 , the पहला of अनेक वीडियो खेल  and computer game editions was published .
Since 1994 , many official variants  of the खेल , आधारित on स्थितियाँ अन्य than अटलांटिक नगर , नई जर्सी ( the आधिकारिक u.S. सेटिंग ) or लंदन ( the आधिकारिक राष्ट्रमंडल सेटिंग  , excepting Canada ) , have been published by Hasbro or its licensees .
In 2008 , Hasbro permanently changed the color scheme and some of  the gameplay of the मानक u.s . संस्करण of the खेल to मैच the uk संस्करण , हालांकि the u.S. मानक संस्करण maintains the अटलांटिक नगर  property names .
Hasbro also modified the  आधिकारिक लोगो to दे the `` mr . एकाधिकार '' अक्षर a 3-d computer-generated dekh , जिससे रै चूंकि महरूम अपनाया  by licensees USAopoly , Winning Moves and Winning Solutions .
And Hasbro has also been including the Speed Die , introduced in 2006 's  एकाधिकार : the आचमन संस्करण by जीतना चालें खेल , in संस्करण उत्पादित सीधे by हास्ब्रो ( ऐसे as the 2009 चैंपियनशिप  Edition ) .
In baseball , a  बलिदान मक्खी is a batted बॉल कि  satisfies four criteria:
There are fewer than  दो outs जब the बॉल is hit  .
The ball is hit to the  आउटफील्ड ( मेला or बेईमानी ) , or to infield  foul territory .
The batter is put out because an outfielder ( or an infielder running in the outfield , or foul territory )  catches the बॉल on the मक्खी ( alternatively if the बैटर होता have महरूम आउट if नहीं लिये an गलती or if the outfielder बूंदें the बॉल और another  runner is put out ) .
A runner who is  already on आधार स्कोर on the खेल  .
It is called a ``  बलिदान '' मक्खी क्युकी the बैटर presumably intends to कारण a teammate  to score a run , while sacrificing his own ability to do so .
Minnesota  ( ) is a u.S. राज्य स्तिथ in the midwestern  United States .
Minnesota was carved out of the eastern half of the Minnesota  territory और admitted to the संघ as the 32nd राज्य  on May 11 , 1858 .
Known as the `` Land of 10,000 Lakes '' , the  राज्य 's नाम आता इससे a डकोटा शब्द लिये `` sky-tinted जल ''  .
Those waters ,  साथ साथ वनों , पार्क , और wilderness क्षेत्रों , प्रस्ताव निवासियों और पर्यटकों a किस्में  of outdoor recreational opportunities .
Minnesota is the 12th  सबसे extensive और the 21st सबसे populous  of the U.S. states .
Nearly 60 % of its residents live in the Minneapolis–Saint Paul metropolitan area ( known as the `` Twin Cities '' ) , the center of  परिवहन , कारोबार , उद्योग , शिक्षा , सरकारी और घर to an internationally ज्ञात  arts community .
The remainder of the state consists of western prairies now given over to intensive  कृषि ; पतझड़ी वनों in the southeast , अभी साफ , farmed और settled ; और the कम आबादी उत्तर  Woods , used for mining , forestry , and recreation .
Minnesota is known for its relatively mixed social and political orientations  , और रै a ऊँची रेट of नागरिक भागीदारी और वोटर turnout .
Minnesota  बाँधने among the healthiest राज्य , और रै a अत्यधिक  literate population .
The large majority  of निवासियों हैं of scandinavian और जर्मनी  descent .
The state is known as a  बीच of scandinavian अमरीकी संस्कृति  .
जातीय विविधता रै increased  in recent decades .
Substantial influxes of Asian  , अफ़्रीकी , और लैटिन अमरीकी आप्रवासियों have joined the वंशजों of यूरोपीय settlers और the असली देशी  American inhabitants .
Grants are  non-repayable निधि by एक पार्टी ( ग्रान्ट makers ) , प्रायः a सरकारी विभाग , निगम ,  foundation or trust , to a , often ( but not always ) a nonprofit entity , educational institution , business or an individual .
In order to receive a grant , some form of `` Grant Writing ''  प्रायः referred to as either a प्रस्ताव  or an application is usually required .
Most  अनुदान हैं बना to निधि a विशिष्ट प्रोजेक्ट और आवश्यकता कुछ स्तर of अनुपालन  and reporting .
The grant  लिखने प्रक्रम involves an आवेदक submitting a प्रस्ताव ( or सबमिशन ) to a संभावित  funder , either on the applicant 's own initiative or in response to a Request for Proposal from the funder .
Other  अनुदान can be दिए to individuals , ऐसे as पीड़ितों of प्राकृतिक आपदाओं or individuals  who seek to open a small business .
sometimes ग्रान्ट makers आवश्यकता ग्रान्ट जरुरतमंदों to have कुछ रूप of tax-exempt  status , be a registered nonprofit organization or a local government .
For  उदाहरण , tiered funding लिये a फ्रीवे हैं बहुत विशाल अनुदान negotiated  at government policy level .
However smaller grants may be provided by  a सरकारी एजेंसी ( e.g . नगरपालिका सरकारी ) .
project-related funding involving सरकारें , कारोबार , समुदायों , और individuals is प्रायः arranged by अनुप्रयोग  either in writing or online .
naturally occurring कोबाल्ट ( co ) is रचित of 1 stable समस्थानिक , 59co . 28 radioisotopes have महरूम characterized साथ the सबसे stable होने 60co साथ a half-life of 5.2714 सालो , 57co साथ a half-life  of 271.79 days , 56Co with a half-life of 77.27 days , and 58Co with a half-life of 70.86 days .
All of the remaining radioactive  isotopes have half-lives कि हैं कम than 18 घंटों और the बहुमत of ये have half-lives  that are less than 1 second .
This element also has 11 meta  राज्य , सब of जिससे have half-lives कम than 15  minutes .
The isotopes  of कोबाल्ट दायरा in परमाणु वज़न  from 47Co to 75Co .
The primary decay mode for isotopes with  परमाणु द्रव्यमान ईकाई मान कम than कि of the सबसे abundant stable समस्थानिक , 59co , is इलेक्ट्रॉन कैप्चर और the प्राथमिक विधि of क्षय लिये those of वृहद  than 59 atomic mass units is beta decay .
The primary decay products before  59co हैं आयरन isotopes और the प्राथमिक उत्पाद बाद हैं  nickel isotopes .
Standard  परमाणु द्रव्यमान : 58.933195  ( 5 ) u
Who  स्थानांतरित my चीज  ?
An Amazing Way to Deal  साथ बदलें in अपना कार्य और in अपना जीवन , प्रकाशित in 1998 , is a प्रेरक किताब by स्पेंसर जॉनसन लिखा in the स्टाइल  of a parable or business fable .
It describes change in one 's work and life , and four typical reactions to  कहा बदलें by दो चूहे और दो `` littlepeople '' , दौरान उनके हंट लिये चीज  .
A New York Times  कारोबार बेस्टसेलर चूंकि रिलीज , जो  Moved My Cheese ?
remained on the सूची लिये लगभग पाँच सालो और खर्च over 200 सप्ताह  on Publishers Weekly 's hardcover nonfiction list .
It has sold more than 26 million copies worldwide in 37 languages and remains  to be एक of the best-selling कारोबार किताबे  .
Nikita Sergeyevich Khrushchev  ( – सितंबर 11 , 1971 ) led the सोवियत संघ दौरान  part of the Cold War .
He served as First Secretary of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union from 1953 to 1964  , और as अध्यक्ष of the परिषद of मंत्रियों , or प्रीमियर , इससे 1958 to 1964 .
Khrushchev was responsible for  the आंशिक de-stalinization of the सोवियत संघ , लिये बैकिंग the प्रगति of the जल्दी सोवियत स्पेस कार्यक्रम  , and for several relatively liberal reforms in areas of domestic policy .
Khrushchev  's पार्टी सहयोगियों removed उसे इससे शक्ति in 1964 , replacing उसे साथ लियोनिद  Brezhnev as First Secretary and Alexei Kosygin as Premier .
Khrushchev was born in the Russian village of Kalinovka  in 1894 , बंद to the present-day किनारा between  Russia and Ukraine .
He was employed as a metalworker  in उसके युवावस्था , और दौरान the रूसी सिविल युद्ध थी a राजनैतिक  commissar .
With the help of  lazar kaganovich , he worked उसके रास्ता up the सोवियत पदानुक्रम  .
He supported Joseph Stalin  's purges , और स्वीकृत हज़ारों of रखवाले  .
In 1939 , Stalin  भेजा उसे to govern युक्त , और he जारी the purges  there .
During what was known in the Soviet Union as the Great Patriotic  युद्ध ( पूर्वी सामने of संसार युद्ध ii ) , khrushchev थी again a commissar , सेवारत as  an intermediary between Stalin and his generals .
Khrushchev  थी उपस्थित at the खूनी रक्षा of stalingrad , a फैक्ट he took ग्रेट  pride in throughout his life .
बाद the युद्ध , he लौटे to युक्त पहले होने  recalled to Moscow as one of Stalin 's close advisers .
In the power struggle triggered by Stalin 's death in 1953  , khrushchev , बाद अनेक सालो , उभरा विजयी  .
On February 25 , 1956 , at  the 20th पार्टी कॉंग्रेस , he वितरित the `` रहस्य वाक , '' denouncing स्टालिन 's purges और ushering in a  less repressive era in the Soviet Union .
His domestic  नीतियों , aimed at bettering the जीवनदान of ordinary नागरिकों , यहूद प्रायः अप्रभावी ,  especially in the area of agriculture .
Hoping eventually to rely on missiles for  नेशनल रक्षा , khrushchev ordered प्रमुख कटौती in  conventional forces .
Despite the cuts , Khrushchev 's rule saw the tensest  सालो of the ठंडा युद्ध , culminating in the क्यूबन  Missile Crisis .
Some of Khrushchev 's policies were seen as erratic , particularly by his emerging rivals ,  जो चुपचाप रोज़ in शक्ति और अपदस्थ उसे in अक्तूबर 1964  .
He did not suffer the deadly fate of some previous losers of  सोवियत शक्ति struggles , लकिन थी pensioned बंद साथ an अपार्टमेंट in मास्को और a dacha in the  countryside .
His lengthy memoirs were  smuggled to the वेस्ट और प्रकाशित in भाग  in 1970 .
khrushchev died in 1971 of दिल  disease .
Upper  जठरांत्र ( gi ) bleeding refers to hemorrhage in the  upper gastrointestinal tract .
The anatomic cut-off for upper GI  bleeding is the स्नायु of treitz , जिससे connects the चौथी portion of the duodenum to the diaphragm निकट the  splenic flexure of the colon .
Upper GI bleeds  हैं माना चिकित्सा emergencies , और आवश्यकता  admission to hospital for urgent diagnosis and management .
Due  to अग्रिम in medications और endoscopy , अपर  GI hemorrhage is now usually treated without surgery .
World population  estimates इससे 1800 to 2100 , आधारित on un 2010 projections ( रेड , नारंगी  , green ) and US Census Bureau historical estimates ( black ) .
Actual  अंकित जनसांख्यिकी आंकड़े हैं in  blue .
according to the उच्चतम अनुमान , the संसार जनसांख्यिकी may वृद्धि to 16 अरब by 2100 ; according  to the lowest estimate , it may decline to 6 billion .
The world  जनसांख्यिकी is the कुल क्रमांक of  living humans on Earth .
As of today , it is estimated to number billion by the  संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी ब्यूरो ( uscb ) .
The USCB estimates that the world  जनसांख्यिकी exceeded 7 अरब on कूच  12 , 2012 .
According to a separate estimate by the United  राष्ट्र जनसांख्यिकी निधि , it पहुँचे इस पड़ाव on अक्तूबर  31 , 2011 .
The  संसार जनसांख्यिकी रै अनुभवी निरन्तर विकास चूंकि the समाप्त of the ग्रेट  Famine and the Black Death in 1350 , when it stood at around 370 million .
The highest rates of growth – global population increases above 1.8 % per year – were seen briefly  दौरान the 1950s , और लिये a longer काल दौरान the 1960s और 1970s .
The growth rate peaked at 2.2 %  in 1963 , और था अस्वीकृत to  1.1 % by 2011 .
Total annual births were highest in the late 1980s at about 138  लाख , और हैं अभी अपेक्षित to remain essentially निरंतर at उनके 2011 स्तर of 134 लाख , जबकि मौतों क्रमांक 56 लाख प्रति साल , और हैं अपेक्षित  to increase to 80 million per year by 2040 .
Current projections show a continued increase in  जनसांख्यिकी in the निकट भविष्य ( लकिन a स्थिर मनाही in the जनसांख्यिकी विकास रेट ) , साथ the  global population expected to reach between 7.5 and 10.5 billion by 2050 .
Various longer-term estimates predict further growth ,  stagnation , or भी overall मनाही in the वैश्विक जनसांख्यिकी by 2150  .
Some  विश्लेषकों have questioned the स्थिरता of further संसार जनसांख्यिकी विकास , citing the growing pressures  on the environment , global food supplies , and energy resources .
Philips Lumileds Lighting Company  is the निर्माता of a चौड़ी दायरा of high-power/high-efficiency light-emitting  diodes ( LEDs ) .
It is  a अभी a fully स्वामित्व प्रभाग of  Philips Lighting .
Knuckle mnemonic for the  क्रमांक of दिनों in प्रत्येक माह of the gregorian पंचांग  .
Each projecting  knuckle represents a 31-day  month .
A mnemonic ( ,  साथ a मूक `` m '' ) , or mnemonic यंत्र , is कोई सीखना तकनीक  that aids information retention .
mnemonics उद्देश्य to अनुवाद सूचना into a रूप कि  the human brain can retain better than its original form .
Even the  प्रक्रम of applying इस परिवर्तन might already सहायता the ट्रांसफ़र of सूचना  to long-term memory .
Commonly encountered mnemonics are often for lists and in  auditory रूप , ऐसे as छोटी कविताएं , acronyms , or यादगार वाक्यांश , लकिन mnemonics can भी be लिये अन्य  types of information and in visual or kinesthetic forms .
Their use is based on the observation that the human mind more easily  remembers स्थानिक , निजी , आश्चर्यजनक , शारीरिक , यौन , humorous , or वरना 'relatable ' सूचना  , rather than more abstract or impersonal forms of information .
The  शब्द mnemonic is निकला इससे the प्राचीन यूनानी शब्द μνημονικός ( mnēmonikos ) , अर्थ `` of मेमोरी ''  and is related to Mnemosyne ( `` remembrance '' ) , the name of the goddess of memory in Greek mythology .
Both of these words are derived from μνήμη  ( mnēmē ) , `` स्मरण , मेमोरी ''  .
Mnemonics in antiquity  यहूद सबसे प्रायः माना in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of कया is आज ज्ञात  as the Art of memory .
Ancient Greeks  और romans विशिष्ट between दो प्रकार of मेमोरी : the  'natural ' memory and the 'artificial ' memory .
The former is inborn , and is the one that everyone  उपयोग automatically और बगैर सोच  .
The artificial memory in contrast has to be trained and developed  through the सीखना और practicing of a किस्में of mnemonic तकनीकों  .
mnemonic प्रणालियों हैं खास तकनीकों or रणनीति consciously प्रयुक्त to improve मेमोरी , it  helps employ information already stored in long-term memory to make memorization an easier task .
President Bush signing the No Child Left  पीछे अधिनियम at हैमिल्टन h.s . in हैमिल्टन , ओहियो  .
The No Child Left Behind  अधिनियम of 2001 ( nclb ) is a संयुक्त राज्य अधिनियम of कॉंग्रेस कि is a reauthorization of the elementary और द्वितीयक शिक्षा अधिनियम , जिससे  included Title I , the government 's flagship aid program for disadvantaged students .
NCLB supports standards-based  शिक्षा सुधार आधारित on the आधार कि सेटिंग ऊँची मानकों और establishing measurable लक्ष्य  can improve individual outcomes in education .
the अधिनियम requires राज्य to  develop assessments in basic skills .
States must give these assessments to all students at select  ग्रेड स्तर in अनुक्रम to प्राप्त  federal school funding .
The Act does not assert a  नेशनल उपलब्धि मानक ; मानकों हैं नियत by प्रत्येक  individual state .
NCLB expanded the federal  भूमिका in पब्लिक शिक्षा through सालाना परीक्षण , सालाना अकादमिक प्रगति , रपट ताश , टीचर योग्यता  , and funding changes .
The bill  passed in the u.S. कॉंग्रेस  with bipartisan support .
Dodge B Series  यूटिलिटी circa 1950 , चलित by अल्बर्ट  Namatjira
A  पिकअप ट्रक or pick-up , प्रायः बस referred to as a पिकअप , is a लाइट मोटर गाडी साथ  an open-top , rear cargo area ( bed ) .
In North America , the term pickup is used for light trucks with a lighter duty chassis and factory  निर्मित , एकीकृत bed , as खूब as लिये coupé यूटिलिटी वाहनों , प्रायः आधारित on a निजी car chassis , लकिन भी प्रायः on a खास समर्पित chassi  for such use .
Some countries have  उनके अपना शर्तें समान to पिकअप , ऐसे as ute in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और नई जीलैंड ,  or bakkie in South Africa .
Large pickup trucks  हैं somewhat विरल in यूरोपीय , जहाँ वैन और लाइट lorries हैं commonly  used for similar roles .
This 15th-century  चित्रण of शारलेमेन और पोप एड्रियन i shows a well-bred मध्यकालीन घोड़ा  with arched neck , refined head and elegant gait .
घोड़े in the मध्य आयु differed in आकार , निर्माण और  breed from the modern horse , and were , on average , smaller .
They were also more central to society than their  आधुनिक counterparts , होने अनिवार्य लिये युद्ध , कृषि  , and transport .
Consequently , specific types of  घोड़ा विकसित , अनेक of जिससे have no आधुनिक समतुल्य  .
While an understanding of modern horse breeds and equestrianism is vital for any  विश्लेषण of the मध्यकालीन घोड़ा , शोधकर्ताओं भी need to consider वृत्तचित्र ( दोनो लिखा  and pictorial ) and archaeological evidence .
Horses in the Middle  आयु यहूद rarely differentiated by नस्ल  , but rather by use .
This led them to be  वर्णित , लिये उदाहरण , as `` chargers `` ( युद्ध घोड़े ) , `` palfreys `` ( सवारी घोड़े ) ,  cart horses or packhorses .
Reference is also given to their  प्लेस of उत्पत्ति , ऐसे as `` स्पेनी घोड़े , '' लकिन whether इस referred to एक नस्ल  or several is unknown .
Another difficulty arising during any study  of मध्यकालीन दस्तावेज़ or साहित्य is the लचीलापन of the मध्यकालीन भाषाएं , जहाँ अनेक शब्द can be प्रयुक्त लिये एक बात ( or , conversely , अनेक  objects are referred to by one word ) .
Words such as ' courser ' and 'charger ' are used interchangeably ( even within one document ) ,  और जहाँ एक एपिक may बोलो disparagingly of a rouncey , another गुणगान इसके कौशल और swiftness  .
Significant technological advances in equestrian equipment , often introduced  इससे अन्य संस्कृतियों , अनुमत लिये significant परिवर्तन in दोनो warfare और कृषि  .
In particular , improved designs for  the solid-treed काठी as खूब as the आगमन of the रकाब , नाल और घोड़ा कॉलर यहूद  significant advances in medieval society .
Consequently , the assumptions and theories developed by historians are not  निर्णायक , और बहस स्टिल rages on अनेक मुद्दे , ऐसे as the प्रजनन or आकार of  the horse , and a number of sources must be consulted in order to understand the breadth of the subject .
The Music Man is a  musical साथ किताब , म्यूज़िक , और गीत by मेरेडिथ willson , आधारित on a स्टोरी by  Willson and Franklin Lacey .
The plot concerns con man Harold Hill , who poses as a boys ' band  आयोजक और नेता और बिकता बैंड यंत्र और वर्दी to भोली townsfolk पहले  skipping town with the cash .
In River City , Iowa , prim librarian and piano  टीचर marian paroo sees through उसे , लकिन जब हिल helps उसके younger bhai overcome उसके भय  of social interactions due to his lisp , Marian begins to fall in love with Harold .
Harold , in  फेरे गिरना लिये marian , risks  being caught to win her .
In 1957 , the show became a hit on Broadway , winning five Tony Awards ,  सहित बेहतरीन musical , और कार्यशील लिये 1,375 प्रदर्शन  .
The cast album won the first  ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये `` बेहतरीन असली डाल एल्बम '' और थी क्रमांक  one on the Billboard charts for 245 weeks .
The show 's  कामयाबी led to revivals और a लोकप्रिय 1962 फिल्मी अनुकूलन  and a 2003 television remake .
It frequently is  उत्पादित by दोनो पेशेवर और amateur थिएटर कंपनियाँ  .
निरीक्षक 's  wheel
A  निरीक्षक 's व्हील , भी पुकारा a clickwheel , hodometer , waywiser , trundle व्हील , measuring व्हील ,  or perambulator is a device for measuring distance .
Largest  non-polar रेगिस्तान
Sand dunes in the  rub ' al खली ( `` खाली क्वार्टर ''  ) of Saudi Arabia .
makhtesh रेमन , negev मरुस्थल  , Israel
A desert is a landscape or region of land that is very dry because of low rainfall amounts ( precipitation ) ,  प्रायः रै छोटी कवरेज by पौधे , और in जिससे स्ट्रीम शुष्क up जबतक वे हैं supplied by जल इससे बाहर क्षेत्रों  .
रेगिस्तान can भी be वर्णित as क्षेत्रों जहाँ अधिक जल is खोया by evapotranspiration  than falls as precipitation .
Desert plants must  have खास adaptations to जीवित  with this little water .
Deserts generally  प्राप्त कम than 25 cm of बरसात  ( precipitation ) each year .
Semideserts or  steppes हैं regions जिससे प्राप्त between  and .
In the Köppen climate classification system  , रेगिस्तान हैं classed as bwh ( hot मरुस्थल ) or bwk  ( temperate desert ) .
In the Thornthwaite climate  वर्गीकरण प्रणाली , रेगिस्तान होता be वर्गीकृत as arid megathermal  climates .
World War I ( WWI ) was a global war  केंद्रित in यूरोपीय कि began on 28 जुलाई 1914 और lasted जबतक 11 नवम्बर  1918 .
It was predominantly called the World War or the Great War from its occurrence until  the प्रारंभ of संसार युद्ध ii in 1939 , और the पहला संसार युद्ध or संसार  War I thereafter .
It involved all the world 's great powers , which were assembled in two opposing alliances : the Allies ( based on the Triple  entente of the संयुक्त किंगडम , फ़्रांस और रूस ) और the सेंट्रल शक्तियां ( originally the ट्रिपल गठबंधन of जर्मनी , austria-hungary और इटली ; लकिन , as austria–hungary था लिया the अप्रिय  against the agreement , Italy did not enter into the war ) .
These alliances were both reorganised and expanded as more  राष्ट्र डाला the युद्ध : इटली , जापानी और the संयुक्त राज्य joined the allies , और  the Ottoman Empire and Bulgaria the Central Powers .
Ultimately , more than 70 million military personnel  , सहित 60 लाख europeans , यहूद mobilised in एक of  the largest wars in history .
More than 9 million combatants were  मारे , largely क्युकी of technological advancements कि led to विशाल increases in the lethality of हथियार  without corresponding improvements in protection or mobility .
It was the fifth- deadliest conflict in  संसार इतिहास , subsequently paving the रास्ता लिये विभिन्न राजनैतिक परिवर्तन , ऐसे as revolutions  in many of the nations involved .
One of the  long-term कल्याणकारी of the युद्ध थी the पुनरुत्थान of साम्राज्यवाद in the  foreign policies of the great powers of Europe .
More immediately , the assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria , the heir to the throne of  austria-hungary , on 28 जून 1914 by यूगोस्लाव राष्ट्रवादी gavrilo princip in साराजेवो triggered  a diplomatic crisis when Austria-Hungary subsequently delivered an ultimatum to the Kingdom of Serbia .
Several alliances formed  over the पिछला दशकों यहूद  invoked .
भीतर सप्ताह , the प्रमुख शक्तियां यहूद at युद्ध और , via  their colonies , the conflict soon spread around the world .
On 28 July , the Austro-Hungarians  fired the पहला गोलियाँ of the युद्ध as तैयारी  for the invasion of Serbia .
While the Russians mobilised , the Germans  invaded न्यूट्रल बेल्जियम और ध्वज on the रास्ता to फ़्रांस , providing  a casus belli for Britain 's declaration of war against Germany .
After  the जर्मनी कूच on पेरिस थी brought to a halt—the so-called चमत्कार of the marne —the पश्चिमी सामने settled into a  static battle of attrition with a trench line that changed little until 1917 .
On the Eastern Front , the  रूसी फौज थी कामयाब विरूद्ध the austro-hungarians , लकिन  was stopped in its invasion of East Prussia by the Germans .
In November the Ottoman Empire joined the  युद्ध , खोलने up fronts in the काकेशस , मेसोपोटामिया  and the Sinai .
Italy and  बुल्गारिया गई to युद्ध in 1915 और रोमानिया  in 1916 .
In Russia , the tsar 's government collapsed  in कूच 1917 और a subsequent क्रान्ति  in November brought the Russians to terms with the Central Powers .
After a 1918 German offensive along the western front , the Allies drove back the Germans in a series  of कामयाब offensives और अमरीकी शक्तियां began प्रवेश the trenches  .
Germany , which had its own trouble with  क्रांतिकारियों , सहमत to an armistice on 11 नवम्बर  1918 .
The  युद्ध ended in विजय  for the Allies .
Events on  the घर fronts यहूद as उग्र as on the बैटल fronts , as the भागीदार आजमाया to mobilize उनके जनशक्ति और आर्थिक संसाधन  to fight a total war .
By the end of the war , four major imperial  powers—the जर्मनी , रूसी , austro-hungarian और उस्मानी empires—ceased to मौजूद  .
The successor states  of the पूर्व दो खोया a ग्रेट राशि of territory , जबकि the latter  two were dismantled entirely .
the मैप of सेंट्रल यूरोपीय थी redrawn into  several smaller states .
The  लीग of राष्ट्र थी formed in the  hope of preventing another such conflict .
The European nationalism spawned by the war and the breakup of empires  , the परखना of जर्मनी 's शिकस्त और समस्याएं साथ the सन्धि of versailles हैं सहमत to be कारकों contributing  to World War II .
`` Girls Just Want to Have Fun '' is a 1979  सोंग originally लिखा by रॉबर्ट जोखिम और बना प्रसिद्ध by सिंगर cyndi lauper  .
It was the first major single released by Lauper as a  सोलो कलाकार और the lead-off सिंगल इससे उसके डेब्यू एल्बम वो 's so असामान्य  .
lauper’s संस्करण gained मान्यता as a feminist  anthem and promoted by an award-winning video .
It has been covered on  either an एल्बम or in सजीव कॉन्सर्ट by  over 30 other artists .
The single was Lauper 's breakthrough hit , reaching  # 2 on the बिलबोर्ड hot 100 और बनने a विश्वव्यापी hit throughout लेट  1983 and early 1984 .
It remains one of Lauper 's  हस्ताक्षर गीतों और थी a widely लोकप्रिय सोंग दौरान the  era of its release , the 1980s .
The `` Rolling Stone & MTV : '100 Greatest Pop Songs ' : 1-50 '' , `` Rolling Stone : `` The 100 Top  म्यूज़िक वीडियो '' '' और the `` vh1 : 100 महानतम वीडियो '' सूचियाँ क्रमित the सोंग at # 22 , # 39 और # 45 , क्रमशः  .
The song received a Grammy Award  नामांकन लिये रिकार्ड of the साल और बेहतरीन मादा  Pop Vocal Performance .
View of  defibrillator एलेक्ट्रोड स्थिति  and placement .
Defibrillation is a  आम उपचार लिये life-threatening हृदय dysrhythmias , ventricular fibrillation , और pulseless  ventricular tachycardia .
defibrillation consists of delivering a therapeutic खुराक of विद्युत उर्जा  to the affected heart with a device called a defibrillator .
This  depolarizes a नाजुक द्रव्यमान of the दिल मांसपेशी , terminates the dysrhythmia , और allows सामान्य sinus लय  to be reestablished by the body 's natural pacemaker , in the sinoatrial node of the heart .
Defibrillators can be  बाह्य , transvenous , or implanted , depending on the प्रकार  of device used or needed .
Some external units , known as automated external defibrillators ( AEDs ) , automate the diagnosis of treatable rhythms , meaning that lay  responders or bystanders हैं समर्थ to उपयोग उन्हें सफलतापूर्वक साथ छोटी , or in कुछ मामले no प्रशिक्षण at सब  .
The Cato Institute is an  अमरीकी libertarian सोचो टैंक headquartered in वॉशिंगटन  , D.C .
It was founded as the  चार्ल्स koch न्यास in 1974 by मरे rothbard , ed क्रेन और चार्ल्स koch , अध्यक्ष of the फलक और मुख्य कार्यपालिका अधिकारी  of the conglomerate Koch Industries , Inc. .
In July 1976 ,  the नाम थी बदला to the केटो संस्थान  .
According to the 2011 Global Go To  सोचो टैंक अनुक्रमणिका , केटो is the 6th सबसे influential us आधारित सोचो टैंक , रैंकिंग 3rd in  Economic Policy and 2nd in Social Policy .
The Institute 's stated mission is `` to increase the understanding of public policies based on the principles of  सीमित सरकारी , फ़्री बाज़ार , व्यक्तिगत  liberty , and peace .
The Institute will use the most effective means to originate , advocate ,  प्रचार , और disseminate लागू नीति प्रस्ताव कि बनाएँ फ़्री , खोलें , और सिविल समाजों in the संयुक्त राज्य और  throughout the world . ''
Cato scholars were critical of  जार्ज W. बुश 's रिपब्लिकन प्रशासन ( 2001–2009 ) on अनेक मुद्दे , सहित the इराकी युद्ध , सिविल लिबर्टीज , शिक्षा , कृषि  , energy policy , and excessive government spending .
On other issues , they supported Bush administration  पहलों , सबसे notably स्वास्थ्य परवाह , सोशल सुरक्षा , वैश्विक वार्मिंग , कर नीति , और  immigration .
During the 2008 U.S. presidential election , Cato  विद्वानों criticized दोनो major-party उम्मीदवार , जॉन मैक्केन और बराक  Obama .
Cato has criticized President Obama 's stances on policy issues since his inauguration , such as fiscal stimulus ,  healthcare सुधार , विदेशी नीति , और the युद्ध on दवाएँ , जबकि supporting उसके stance on the repeal of do n't पूछो , do n't बताना और उदार आव्रजन नीति  .
ड्रैकुला is an 1897 गोथिक हॉरर अनोखा by आयरिश  author Bram Stoker .
Famous for introducing the character of the vampire Count  ड्रैकुला , the अनोखा tells the स्टोरी of ड्रैकुला 's attempt to relocate इससे transylvania to इंग्लैण्ड , और the बैटल between ड्रैकुला और a छोटी समूह of मेन और महिलाओं  led by Professor Abraham Van Helsing .
ड्रैकुला रै महरूम आबंटित to अनेक साहित्यिक जाति सहित पिशाच साहित्य , हॉरर fiction  , the gothic novel and invasion literature .
The novel touches on themes such as the role of women in Victorian  संस्कृति , यौन प्रथाओं , आव्रजन , उपनिवेशवाद , और post-colonialism  .
हालांकि स्टोकर किया नहीं इफ़तेरा the पिशाच , he पारिभाषित  its modern form , and the novel has spawned numerous theatrical , film and television interpretations .
Quidditch is a  प्रतिस्पर्धी खेल in the wizarding संसार of the हैरी कुम्हार ब्रह्मांड , और is इससे  the series of children 's novels and movies .
It is an  अत्यधिक अशिष्ट लकिन बहुत लोकप्रिय semi-contact खेल , निभाई  by wizards and witches .
Matches are played between two teams of seven players riding flying broomsticks ,  using चार गेंदें और छह elevated ring-shaped लक्ष्य , तीन on प्रत्येक पक्ष of the quidditch पिच  ( field ) .
In the Harry Potter universe , Quidditch holds a fervent  following समान to the स्थिति कि संघ फ़ुटबॉल holds  as a globally popular sport .
The sport is monumental throughout  the wizarding संसार .
Harry plays an important position for his house team at Hogwarts : he is  the seeker और becomes the कप्तान in उसके छठे साल वहीँ .
Regional and  अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतियोगिताओं हैं उल्लेखित throughout  the series .
In Goblet of Fire , Quidditch at Hogwarts is cancelled for the  tri-wizard टूर्नामेंट , लकिन हैरी और the weasleys attend  the Quidditch World Cup .
In addition , Harry uses his Quidditch skills to capture a golden egg from a dragon called the Hungarian Horntail ( in the first task of the Tri-Wizard  टूर्नामेंट ) , to कैप्चर a उड़ती कुंजी in पारस 's स्टोन , और on दो कुंजी अवसरों in deathly hallows — getting थाम of ravenclaw 's diadem , और दौरान the फाइनल लड़ो  with Voldemort — the `` unerring skill of the Seeker '' is useful to him in snatching the Elder Wand out of the air .
Harry Potter  रै स्वामित्व दो broomsticks , the nimbus 2000 और the firebolt , दोनो of जिससे  are destroyed by the series ' end .
The game has been adopted in  the रियल संसार in the रूप of मगलू  Quidditch .
The United States Congress is the bicameral legislature of the federal  सरकारी of the संयुक्त राज्य consisting of दो घरों : the निम्नतर हाउस ज्ञात as the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  and the upper house known as the Senate .
कॉंग्रेस meets in the कैपिटल in वॉशिंगटन  , D.C .
Both  प्रतिनिधि और सीनेटरों हैं चुनी through  direct election .
Congress has a total of 535 voting members :  435 सदस्यों in the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि और 100 सदस्यों  in the Senate .
Members of the  हाउस of प्रतिनिधि serve two-year शर्तें representing  the people of a district .
Congressional districts are apportioned to states by  जनसांख्यिकी using the संयुक्त राज्य जनसांख्यिकी परिणाम , प्रत्येक राज्य in the संघ having at तनिक  one representative in the House of Representatives .
Regardless of population , each of the  50 राज्य रै दो सीनेटरों ; the 100 सीनेटरों प्रत्येक serve  a six-year term .
The  शर्तें हैं लड़खड़ाते so प्रत्येक दो  years approximately one-third of the Senate is up for election .
Each staggered  समूह of one-third of the सीनेटरों  are called 'classes ' .
No state of the United  राज्य रै दो सीनेटरों इससे the वही क्लास  .
Most incumbents seek  re-election , और उनके ऐतिहासिक likelihood of जीतना subsequent चुनावों exceeds 90  percent .
In August 2012 , a Gallup poll reported that  congress’s स्वीकृति दरजा amongst अमेरिकी थी at 10 % , मिलान a 38-year कम पहुँचे  in November 2011 .
`` A Little More Country Than That '' is the  शीर्षक of a सोंग लिखा by जॉय + रोरी 's रोरी ली feek , व्यान varble , और डॉन poythress , और अंकित  by American country artist Easton Corbin .
It was released in August  2009 as कोर्बिन 's डेब्यू सिंगल और is शामिल on उसके self-titled  debut album .
In April 2010 , the song  पहुँचे क्रमांक एक on the देश म्यूज़िक चार्ट , बनाना कोर्बिन the पहला पुरूष सोलो कलाकार in  seven years to send a debut single to Number One .
It has been  certified सुनहरा by the riaa  .
The BlackBerry is a line of wireless handheld devices and  सेवाएं designed और marketed by शोध in गति सीमित ( रिम ) ऑपरेटिंग  as BlackBerry .
The first BlackBerry device , an email  पेजर , थी released in 1999 ; the सबसे हाल ब्लैकबेरी डिवाइस , the z10 और q10 , यहूद घोषित on जनवरी 30  , 2013 .
The user  इंटरफ़ेस varies by मॉडल ; सबसे विशेषता a शारीरिक क्वर्टी कुंजीपटल  , while newer generations have relied on a multi-touch screen and virtual keyboard .
A BlackBerry can shoot  वीडियो , लो फ़ोटो , खेल म्यूज़िक , और perform ऑनलाइन कृत्यों  such as web-browsing and emailing .
They can also send and receive  धक्का ईमेल और तत्काल संदेश जबकि maintaining a ऊँची स्तर of सुरक्षा through on-device संदेश एन्क्रिप्शन , और हैं designed to फलन as  personal digital assistants .
ब्लैकबेरी डिवाइस support a विशाल किस्में of तत्काल messaging सुविधाएँ , साथ the  most popular being the proprietary BlackBerry Messenger service .
The BlackBerry  playbook is a टैब्लेट कंप्यूटर offered  by the company .
The 100 millionth  ब्लैकबेरी स्मार्टफोन थी shipped in जून क्वार्टर of 2010 और the 200 millionth स्मार्टफोन  was shipped in September quarter of 2012 .
BlackBerry  खाते लिये 3 % of मोबाईल यंत्र बिक्री विश्वव्यापी in 2011 , बनाना इसके निर्माता the छठे सबसे लोकप्रिय यंत्र  maker ( 25 % of mobile device sales are smartphones ) .
The consumer BlackBerry Internet Service is available in 91 countries  विश्वव्यापी on over 500 मोबाईल सेवा ऑपरेटर using विभिन्न  mobile technologies .
As of September  2012 , वहीँ यहूद अस्सी लाख सदस्य विश्वव्यापी to ब्लैकबेरी  .
In 2011 the Caribbean and Latin America had the highest  penetrations of ब्लैकबेरी स्मार्टफ़ोन विश्वव्यापी , साथ up to परिचय 45 प्रति cent in the प्रदेश having a  RIM device .
BlackBerry , iPhone , Android , and  खिड़कियाँ फोन हैं माना the चार प्रमुख स्मार्टफोन  brands .
BlackBerry is widely referred to as `` CrackBerry  '' in the संयुक्त राज्य , जिससे alludes to इसके excessive उपयोग by इसके स्वामी और is a सन्दर्भ to the addictiveness  of crack cocaine .
Use of the term CrackBerry  became so फैली कि in नवम्बर 2006 वेबस्टर 's नई संसार कॉलेज शब्दकोष नामित `` crackberry  '' the `` New Word of the Year . ''
an उदाहरण of a माँग वक्र  shifting .
The shift from D1 To  d2 अर्थात् an बढ़ाएँ in माँग साथ consequences  for the other variables
In economics , the demand curve is  the आलेख depicting the संबंध between the दाम of a निश्चित कमोडिटी और the राशि of it कि उपभोक्ता हैं willing और समर्थ  to purchase at that given price .
It is a graphic  प्रतिनिधित्व of a माँग अनुसूची  .
The demand curve for all consumers  साथ फ़ॉलो इससे the माँग वक्र of प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत उपभोक्ता : the व्यक्तिगत मांगे at प्रत्येक दाम हैं added साथ  .
Demand curves are used to estimate behaviors in competitive markets , and are often combined with supply curves to estimate the equilibrium price ( the price at which sellers together are willing to sell  the वही राशि as खरीदार साथ हैं willing to ख़रीदे , भी ज्ञात as मार्केट clearing दाम ) और the संतुलन मात्रा ( the राशि of कि शुभ or सेवा कि होगा be उत्पादित और खरीदा बगैर surplus/excess सप्लाई or shortage/excess  demand ) of that market .
In a monopolistic  मार्केट , the माँग वक्र facing the monopolist is बस  the market demand curve .
historia
by nikolaos gysis  ( 1892 )
History ( from Greek - historia , meaning `` inquiry , knowledge acquired by investigation '' ) is an  छतरियाँ पद कि relates to पास्ट कार्यक्रम as खूब as the डिस्कवरी , संग्रहण , संगठन , और प्रस्तुतीकरण  of information about these events .
The term includes cosmic , geologic , and organic  इतिहास , लकिन is प्रायः generically implied  to mean human history .
Scholars who  लिखें परिचय इतिहास हैं पुकारा इतिहासकारों  .
History can also refer to the academic discipline which uses a  कथा to जाँचें और analyse a अनुक्रम of पास्ट कार्यक्रम , और objectively determine the पैटर्न of कारण और  effect that determine them .
Historians sometimes debate the nature of history and its usefulness by  discussing the पढ़ाई of the अनुशासन as an समाप्त in itself और as a रास्ता of providing `` परिप्रेक्ष्य '' on the समस्याएं of  the present .
Stories common to a particular culture , but not supported by external sources ( such as the tales surrounding King  आर्थर ) हैं प्रायः वर्गीकृत as सांस्कृतिक विरासत or महापुरूष , क्युकी वे do नहीं support the `` disinterested छानबीन '' जरूरी of the अनुशासन of  history .
Events occurring prior to  लिखा रिकार्ड हैं माना प्रागितिहास  .
Herodotus , a 5th century B.C . Greek historian is considered  भीतर the पश्चिमी परंपरा to be the `` पिता of इतिहास '' , और , साथ साथ उसके समकालीन thucydides , helped रूप the  foundations for the modern study of human history .
Their work  continues to be पढ़ा आज और the divide between the culture-focused हिरोडोटस और the military-focused thucydides remains a पाइंट of contention  or approach in modern historical writing .
In the Eastern tradition , a state chronicle the  वसन्त और पतझड़ annals थी ज्ञात to be compiled इससे as जल्दी as 722 bce हालांकि तभी 2nd सदी bce ग्रन्थ  survived .
Ancient influences have helped spawn  रूपांतर interpretations of the प्रकृति of इतिहास जिससे have विकसित over the सदियां और continue to  change today .
The modern study of  इतिहास is wide-ranging , और शामिल the पढ़ाई of विशिष्ट regions और the पढ़ाई of निश्चित  topical or thematical elements of historical investigation .
Often history is taught as part of  प्राथमिक और द्वितीयक शिक्षा , और the अकादमिक पढ़ाई of इतिहास is a प्रमुख अनुशासन  in University studies .
Malcolm X ( ; May 19 , 1925February 21 , 1965  ) , born मैल्कम छोटी और भी ज्ञात as el-hajj malik el-shabazz ( )  , was an African-American Muslim minister and human rights activist .
To his admirers , he was a courageous advocate for the rights of blacks , a  man जो indicted श्वेत अमेरिका in the harshest शर्तें लिये इसके अपराधों विरूद्ध ब्लैक  Americans .
Detractors accused him of  उपदेश जातिवाद , ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता , और  violence .
He has been called  एक of the महानतम और सबसे influential अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी  in history .
Malcolm X 's father  died—killed by श्वेत supremacists , it थी rumored—when he थी यंग , और  at least one of his uncles was lynched .
When he was 13 , his mother was  लगाई in a दिमागी हॉस्पिटल , और he थी लगाई in a श्रेणी  of foster homes .
In  1946 , at आयु 20 , he गई to थाना  for breaking and entering .
In prison , Malcolm X became a member of the Nation of  islam ; बाद उसके पैरोल in 1952 , he जल्दी रोज़ to become एक of इसके  leaders .
For a dozen years , Malcolm X was the public face of the controversial group , but disillusionment with Nation of  islam सिर इलियास मुहम्मद led उसे to छोड़ the स्वदेश in कूच  1964 .
After a period of travel in Africa and the Middle East , he returned  to the संयुक्त राज्य , जहाँ he संस्थापित मुस्लिम मस्जिदे , inc. और the संगठन of afro-american एकता  .
in फ़रवरी 1965 , कम than a साल बाद leaving the स्वदेश of islam  , he was assassinated by three members of the group .
मैल्कम x 's expressed मान्यताओं बदला  substantially over time .
As a spokesman for  the स्वदेश of islam he सिखाया ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता और advocated विरह of ब्लैक और श्वेत अमेरिकी —in कंट्रास्ट  to the civil rights movement 's emphasis on integration .
After breaking with the Nation of Islam in 1964—saying of his association  साथ it , `` i किया अनेक बाते as a [ ब्लैक ] मुस्लिम कि i 'm sorry लिये अभी .
I was a zombie then ... pointed in a certain direction and told to march '' —and becoming a Sunni  मुस्लिम , he disavowed जातिवाद और expressed willingness to कार्य साथ सिविल अधिकारों नेताओ , he जारी to emphasize pan-africanism  , black self-determination , and self-defense .
Henry Merritt `` Hank '' Paulson , Jr. ( born March 28 , 1946 ) is  an अमरीकी बैंकर जो परोसा as the 74th संयुक्त राज्य सचिव of  the Treasury .
He had served as the  अध्यक्ष और मुख्य कार्यपालिका अधिकारी of गोल्डमैन sachs , और is अभी अध्यक्ष of the paulson संस्थान , जिससे he संस्थापित in 2011 to प्रचार चिरस्थायी आर्थिक विकास और a क्लीनर पर्यावरण  around the world , with an initial focus on the United States and China .
A virtual machine ( VM ) is a  तन्त्र implemented abstraction of the underlying हार्डवेयर , जिससे is प्रस्तुत  to the application layer of the system .
Virtual machines may be based on specifications of a  काल्पनिक कंप्यूटर or emulate the कंप्यूटर वास्तुकला और कृत्यों of a रियल संसार कंप्यूटर  .
Spiders ( order Araneae ) are  air-breathing arthropods कि have आठ टाँगे और chelicerae साथ  fangs that inject venom .
They are the largest order of arachnids and  रैंक सातवाँ in कुल प्रजाति विविधता among सब अन्य समूह of जीवों  .
Spiders are found worldwide on every continent except for  अंटार्कटिक , और have become स्थापित in nearly प्रत्येक आवास साथ the एक्सेप्शन of एयर और समुद्र colonization .
As of 2008 , at least 43,678 spider species , and 109 families have been recorded by taxonomists  ; however , वहीँ रै महरूम भ्रम भीतर the वैज्ञानिक जातियाँ as to कैसा सब ये परिवारों चाहिए be वर्गीकृत , as evidenced by the over 20  different classifications that have been proposed since 1900 .
Anatomically , spiders differ from other  arthropods in कि the usual देह खण्ड हैं fused into दो tagmata , the cephalothorax और उदर , और joined by a छोटी , बेलनाकार  pedicel .
नापसंद कीट , मकड़ियों do नहीं  have antennae .
In all except the most  आदिम समूह , the mesothelae , मकड़ियों have the सबसे centralized बेचैन प्रणालियों of सब arthropods , as सब उनके ganglia हैं fused  into one mass in the cephalothorax .
Unlike most arthropods , spiders have no  extensor मांसपेशियां in उनके limbs और बजाय extend उन्हें by हाइड्रोलिक  pressure .
Their abdomens bear appendages that have been modified into spinnerets that  extrude रेशा इससे up to छह प्रकार of रेशा ग्रंथियों भीतर उनके उदर  .
Spider webs vary  widely in आकार , आकार और the राशि of स्टिकी  thread used .
It  अभी appears कि the सर्पिल orb वेब may be एक of the earliest फ़ॉर्म  , and spiders that produce tangled cobwebs are more abundant and diverse than orb-web spiders .
Spider-like arachnids with  silk-producing spigots appeared in the devonian काल परिचय , लकिन ये पशु  apparently lacked spinnerets .
True spiders have been found in  carboniferous रॉक्स इससे , और हैं बहुत समान to the सबसे आदिम surviving अनुक्रम , the  Mesothelae .
The main  समूह of आधुनिक मकड़ियों , mygalomorphae और araneomorphae , पहला appeared in the triassic  period , before .
A herbivorous species , Bagheera kiplingi , was described in 2008 ,  लकिन सब अन्य ज्ञात प्रजाति हैं परभक्षी , ज़्यादातर preying on कीट और on अन्य मकड़ियों , हालांकि a few विशाल प्रजाति भी  take birds and lizards .
Spiders use a wide range of strategies to  कैप्चर शिकार : trapping it in स्टिकी webs , lassoing it साथ स्टिकी bolas , mimicking the  prey to avoid detection , or running it down .
Most detect prey mainly by sensing vibrations , but the active hunters have acute  दृष्टि , और hunters of the genus portia दिखाएँ लक्षण of प्रज्ञा in उनके चुनाव of tactics और क्षमता to develop नई  ones .
मकड़ियों ' गुस्ताखी हैं too सीमित to लो solids , और वे liquidize उनके खाना by बाढ़ it साथ digestive एंजाइमों  and grinding it with the bases of their pedipalps , as they do not have true jaws .
Male spiders identify  themselves by a किस्में of जटिल प्रेमालाप संस्कार to avoid होने खाया by  the females .
Males  of सबसे प्रजाति जीवित a few matings , सीमित मुख्यतः  by their short life spans .
महिलाओं बुनते रेशा egg-cases , प्रत्येक of  which may contain hundreds of eggs .
Females of many species care for their  यंग , लिये उदाहरण by carrying उन्हें around or by sharing  food with them .
A  अल्पसंख्यक of प्रजाति हैं सोशल , भवन सांप्रदायिक webs कि may  house anywhere from a few to 50,000 individuals .
Social behavior ranges from precarious toleration , as in the widow  मकड़ियों , to co-operative शिकार और food-sharing  .
हालांकि सबसे मकड़ियों सजीव लिये at सबसे दो सालो , tarantulas और अन्य mygalomorph  spiders can live up to 25 years in captivity .
While the venom of a few species is dangerous to humans  , वैज्ञानिकों हैं अभी researching the उपयोग of मकड़ी venom in आयुर्विज्ञान और as non-polluting  pesticides .
Spider silk provides a combination of lightness , strength and elasticity that is superior to that of  सिंथेटिक सामग्री , और मकड़ी रेशा जीनों have महरूम inserted into स्तनधारियों और पौधे to देखिए if ये can be  used as silk factories .
As a result of their wide range of behaviors , spiders have become common symbols in art and  mythology symbolizing विभिन्न combinations of सब्र , क्रूरता और रचनात्मक शक्तियां  .
Donna Marie Pinciotti ( Born February 13 ,  1960 ) is a fictional अक्षर और एक of the दो मादा लीड in the फॉक्स sitcom कि '70s दिखाएँ , appearing in  all eight seasons .
Portrayed  by लौरा prepon , डोना is the प्रेम ब्याज  to Eric Forman .

Household income is a measure commonly  प्रयुक्त by the संयुक्त राज्य सरकारी और निजी संस्थानों  .
Each household is  measured by the आय of प्रत्येक निवासी over the आयु  of 15 .
Income includes wages and  salaries , बेरोजगारी बीमे , विकलांगता भुगतान , चाइल्ड support भुगतान प्राप्त , नियमित rental रसीदें , as खूब as कोई निजी कारोबार , निवेश  , or other kinds of income received routinely .
While inflation-adjusted ( `` real '' )  household आय था महरूम increasing लगभग प्रत्येक साल इससे 1945 to 1999 , it  has since been flat and even decreased recently .
u.S. मध्य household आय गिरी इससे $ 51,144  in 2010 to $ 50,502 in 2011 .
Extreme poverty in the United States , meaning households  जीना on कम than $ 2 प्रति दिन पहले सरकारी लाभ , doubled इससे 1996 to 1.5 लाख households in 2011 , सहित  2.8 million children .
The residents of the household do not have to be  सम्बन्धित to the सिर of the household लिये उनके आय to be माना भाग of the household 's आय  .
As  households tend to share a समान आर्थिक कॉन्टेक्स्ट , the उपयोग of household  income remains among the most widely accepted measures of income .
That the size of a household is not commonly taken into account in such measures may distort any analysis of fluctuations within or among the household income categories  , और may रेंडर सीधा comparisons between quintiles मुश्किल or भी नामुमकिन  .
A registered agent , also known as a resident agent or statutory agent , in United  राज्य कारोबार विधि , is a कारोबार or व्यक्तिगत designated to प्राप्त सेवा of प्रक्रम ( sop ) जब a कारोबार एंटिटी is a पार्टी in a विधिक कार्रवाई ऐसे  as a lawsuit or summons .
The  पंजीकृत एजेंट 's पता may भी be जहाँ the राज्य होगा भेजें the कागजी  for the yearly renewal of the business entity 's charter .
The registered agent for a business entity may  be an व्यक्तिगत सदस्य of the कम्पनी , or ( अधिक प्रायः ) a तीसरा पार्टी , ऐसे as the संगठन 's वकील or a सेवा कम्पनी  .
Failure to  properly maintain a पंजीकृत एजेंट can affect  a company negatively .

`` Life , Liberty , and the  pursuit of सुख '' is a well-known phrase in the संयुक्त राज्य घोषणा  of Independence .
The phrase is meant to exemplify the `` unalienable rights '' with which all human beings  हैं endowed by उनके निर्माता लिये उनके सुरक्षा of जिससे वे संस्थान सरकारें  .
तलवारबाजी , is typically विभाजित into ओलम्पिक तलवारबाजी , शास्त्रीय  fencing and historical fencing , .
The sport of fencing ( commonly called  ओलम्पिक तलवारबाजी or प्रतिस्पर्धी तलवारबाजी ) is विभाजित into तीन हथियार श्रेणी  : foil , sabre and épée .
Classical fencing uses the  वही तीन हथियार , लकिन  approaches fencing as a martial art .
Competitive Fencing is one of five sports which has  महरूम प्रदर्शित at प्रत्येक एक of the आधुनिक ओलम्पिक खेल , the अन्य चार होने एथलेटिक्स , साइकिलिंग , तैराकी , और जिमनास्टिक्स  .
The  quadriceps femoris ( लैटिन लिये `` four-headed मांसपेशी of the femur `` ) , भी पुकारा बस the quadriceps , quadriceps extensor  , quads , is a large muscle group that includes the four prevailing muscles on the front of the thigh .
It is the great extensor muscle of the knee ,  forming a विशाल मांसल द्रव्यमान जिससे कवर the सामने और पहलू of  the femur .
The proper  लैटिन बहुवचन रूप of the क्रियाशील quadriceps  would be quadricipites .
In modern  अंग्रेज़ी उपयोग , quadriceps is प्रयुक्त  in both singular and plural .
the एकवचन रूप quadricep , उत्पादित  by hypercorrection , is frequently used .
RMS Titanic was a British passenger liner that sank in the  उत्तर अटलांटिक समंदर on 15 अप्रैल 1912 बाद colliding साथ an हिमशैल दौरान उसके maiden voyage इससे southampton , uk to  New York City , US .
The sinking of Titanic caused the deaths of  1,502 लोगों in एक of the deadliest peacetime मेरीटाइम आपदाओं  in modern history .
The RMS Titanic was the  largest जलयान afloat at the समय of उसके maiden  voyage .
She was the second of three Olympic class ocean liners operated by the White Star Line  , और वो थी निर्मित by the harland और wolff डॉकयार्ड in belfast साथ थामस एंड्रयूज , जो perished साथ the जलयान , as उसके नवल  architect .
On her  maiden voyage , वो carried 2,224  passengers and crew .
Under the command of Edward  स्मिथ , उसके यात्री शामिल कुछ of the wealthiest लोगों in the संसार , as खूब as सैंकड़ों of emigrants इससे ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड , scandinavia  and elsewhere throughout Europe seeking a new life in North America .
The ship was designed to be the last word in  सुकून और लक्ज़री , साथ an on-board gymnasium , तैराकी पूल , पुस्तकालयों , high-class रेस्तरां  and opulent cabins .
She also had a powerful wireless  टेलीग्राफ provided लिये the convenience of यात्री as खूब as लिये operational  use .
Though she  था उन्नत सुरक्षा सुविधाएँ ऐसे as watertight compartments और remotely activated watertight द्वार , वो lacked  enough lifeboats to accommodate all of those aboard .
Because of outdated  मेरीटाइम सुरक्षा regulations , वो carried तभी पर्याप्त lifeboats लिये 1,178 people—slightly  more than half of the number travelling on the maiden voyage , and one-third her total passenger and crew capacity .
After leaving Southampton on 10 April  1912 , टाइटैनिक पुकारा at cherbourg in फ़्रांस और queenstown (  now Cobh ) in Ireland before heading westwards towards New York .
On 14 April 1912 , four days into the crossing and about 375 miles ( 600 km )  दक्षिण of न्यूफ़ाउंडलैंड , वो hit an हिमशैल at 11:40 pm जलयान 's समय .
The glancing collision caused  titanics हल प्लेटों to बकल inwards साथ उसके स्टारबोर्ड पक्ष और खोली  five of her sixteen watertight compartments to the sea ; the ship gradually filled with water .
meanwhile , यात्री और कुछ क्रू सदस्यों यहूद evacuated  in lifeboats , many of which were launched only partly loaded .
A disproportionate number of men were left aboard  क्युकी of a `` महिलाओं और children पहला `` प्रोटोकॉल followed by कुछ of the अधिकारियों लदान the lifeboats  .
By 2:20 AM , she broke  अलावा और foundered , साथ खूब over एक हजार लोगों  still aboard .
Just under two hours after the Titanic foundered , the  cunard लाइनर rms carpathia arrived on the झाँकी of the  sinking , where she brought aboard an estimated 705 survivors .
The disaster was  greeted साथ विश्वव्यापी शॉक और आक्रोश at the विशाल घाटा  of life and the regulatory and operational failures that had led to it .
Public inquiries in Britain and the United States led  to प्रमुख सुधार in मेरीटाइम सुरक्षा  .
One of their most important legacies was the establishment in 1914 of the  अंतरराष्ट्रीय सम्मेलन लिये the सुरक्षा of जीवन at समुद्र ( solas ) , जिससे स्टिल governs  maritime safety today .
Additionally , several new wireless regulations were passed  around the संसार in an प्रयत्न to सीख इससे the अनेक missteps in बेतार संचार -- -which could have saved  many more passengers .
Many of the survivors lost all of their money and possessions and were  बाएँ अक्षम ; अनेक परिवारों , विशेषकर those of क्रू सदस्यों इससे southampton , खोया उनके प्राथमिक  bread-winners .
They were  helped by an outpouring of पब्लिक सहानुभूति और  charitable donations .
Some of the male survivors were accused of  कायरता लिये leaving the जलयान जबकि लोगों यहूद स्टिल on फलक ; the श्वेत स्टार लकीर 's अध्यक्ष , J. ब्रूस ismay , faced सोशल ostracism  for the rest of his life .
The  रेक of the टाइटैनिक remains on the समुद्रतल , विभाजित in दो और धीरे  disintegrating at a depth of .
चूंकि इसके डिस्कवरी in 1985 , हज़ारों of artefacts have महरूम बरामद और put  on display at museums around the world .
टाइटैनिक रै become एक of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध जहाजों in इतिहास , उसके मेमोरी रखा  alive by numerous books , folk songs , films , exhibits , and memorials .
The human leg is the entire lower extremity or limb of  the इंसान देह , सहित the पैर , जांघ और भी the हिप or gluteal प्रदेश ; however , the precise परिभाषा in इंसान anatomy refers तभी to the खण्ड of  the lower limb extending from the knee to the ankle .
Legs are  प्रयुक्त लिये खड़ा , चलना , कूद , कार्यशील , kicking , और समान क्रियाएँ , और constitute  a significant portion of a person 's mass .
This article is about the demographic features of the population of  तुर्कों , सहित जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व , नस्ल , शिक्षा स्तर , स्वास्थ्य of the populace , आर्थिक औकात , धार्मिक संबद्धों और अन्य पहलुओं of the जनसांख्यिकी .
As of 2010 , the  जनसांख्यिकी of तुर्कों is अनुमानित to be 73.7 लाख साथ a विकास रेट of  1.21 % per annum ( 2009 figure ) .
The  जनसांख्यिकी is अपेक्षाकृत यंग साथ  26.6 % falling in the 0-14 age bracket .
According to the OECD/World Bank population statistics in  तुर्कों the जनसांख्यिकी विकास इससे 1990 to 2008 थी  16 million or 29 % .
