A full-size car is a  विपणन पद प्रयुक्त in उत्तर अमेरिका लिये an ऑटोमोबाइल larger than  a mid-size car .
In the United States , the EPA uses  the पद `` विशाल car '' to denote full-size  cars .
Joel Grey ( born April 11 , 1932 ) is an  अमरीकी स्टेज और स्क्रीन कर्ता , सिंगर , और नर्तकी , ज्ञात लिये उसके भूमिका as the निपुण of ceremonies in दोनो the स्टेज और फिल्मी  adaptation of the Kander & Ebb musical Cabaret .
He  रै जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार , टोनी पुरस्कार  and Golden Globe Award .
he भी originated the भूमिका of जार्ज M. cohan  in the musical George M !
in 1973 , the  जादूगर in the musical दुष्ट  .
Grey  भी स्ट्रक्चर in the ब्रॉडवे revivals of anything goes as  Moonface Martin , and Chicago as Amos Hart .
James Madison , Jr. ( March 16 , 1751 ( O.S  . कूच 5 ) – जून 28 , 1836 ) थी an अमरीकी statesman और राजनैतिक theorist , the चौथी अध्यक्ष  of the United States ( 1809–1817 ) .
He is hailed as the “Father of the Constitution”  लिये होने इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in the drafting of the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान और as the कुंजी चैंपियन और लेखक  of the United States Bill of Rights .
He served as a  राजनेता much of उसके वयस्क  life .
बाद the संविधान था महरूम drafted , मैडिसन became  one of the leaders in the movement to ratify it .
His  सहयोग साथ सिकंदर हैमिल्टन और जॉन  Jay produced the Federalist Papers ( 1788 ) .
Circulated only in New York at the time , they would later be considered among the most important  polemics in support of the संविधान .
He was also a delegate to the Virginia constitutional  ratifying सम्मेलन , और थी इंस्ट्रूमेंटल to the कामयाब अनुसमर्थन प्रयत्न in  Virginia .
Like most of his  contemporaries , मैडिसन बदला उसके राजनैतिक  views during his life .
दौरान the drafting और अनुसमर्थन of the संविधान , he favored a दमदार नेशनल सरकारी , हालांकि  later he grew to favor stronger state governments , before settling between the two extremes late in his life .
In 1789 , Madison became a  नेता in the नई हाउस of प्रतिनिधि , drafting  many basic laws .
he is notable लिये drafting the पहला टेन amendments to the संविधान  , and thus is known as the `` Father of the Bill of Rights `` .
Madison worked closely with  अध्यक्ष जार्ज वॉशिंगटन to व्यवस्थित the नई  federal government .
Breaking with Hamilton and what  became the federalist पार्टी in 1791 , मैडिसन और थामस जेफरसन व्यवस्थित कया वे पुकारा the रिपब्लिकन  Party ( later called by historians the Democratic-Republican Party )
as jefferson’s सचिव of राज्य ( 1801–1809 ) , मैडिसन पर्यवेक्षित  the Louisiana Purchase , which doubled the nation’s size .
बाद उसके चुनाव to the प्रेसिडेंसी , he presided  over renewed prosperity for several years .
As president ( 1809–17 ) , after the  विफलता of राजनयिक विरोध और a व्यापार embargo विरूद्ध ग्रेट ब्रिटेन  , he led the nation into the War of 1812 .
He was responding to British encroachments on American honor and rights ; in addition , he wanted to  समाप्त the influence of the अंग्रेजों among उनके भारतीय allies , जिनकी प्रतिरोध अवरोधित संयुक्त राज्य उपनिवेश in the मिडवेस्ट  around the Great Lakes .
Madison found the war to be an  प्रशासनिक दुःस्वप्न , as the संयुक्त राज्य था neither a दमदार फौज nor वित्तीय प्रणाली ; as a परिणाम , he afterward समर्थित a stronger नेशनल सरकारी  and a strong military , as well as the national bank , which he had long opposed .
Like other Virginia statesmen in the slave society , he was a slaveholder who inherited his  वृक्षारोपण ज्ञात as montpelier , और स्वामित्व सैंकड़ों of स्लेव  during his lifetime to cultivate tobacco and other crops .
Madison  समर्थित the three-fifths सुलह कि अनुमत three-fifths of the enumerated जनसांख्यिकी of स्लेव  to be counted for representation .
`` Roman 's Revenge '' is a song performed  by अमरीकी rapper निकी minaj इससे उसके डेब्यू स्टुडियो एल्बम गुलाबी शुक्रवार  .
It was written by Minaj and rapper Eminem  , जो is भी प्रदर्शित in the सोंग , और थी उत्पादित by swizz  Beatz .
It was released exclusively on October 30 , 2010 through the US  itunes स्टोर , as a promotional रिलीज preceding the एल्बम 's  release .
The song initiated a feud  between लील ' किम और minaj , जहाँ अनेक लोगों लगा the सोंग थी निर्देशित at लील ' किम और regarded around उसके  feelings towards Minaj 's rise to fame .
the सोंग सन्दर्भ minaj 's alter-ego , रोमन zolanski  , and Eminem 's alter-ego , Slim Shady .
The song garnered very positive reviews from  आलोचकों , सबसे of जिससे praised the सोंग as a stand-out track on the एल्बम  .
An official remix featuring Minaj 's mentor  , लील वेन , थी released to the us itunes स्टोर on जनवरी 19 ,  2011 .
The instrumental  थी प्रयुक्त in the सोंग 'firing स्क्वाड '  by Horseshoe G.A.N.G .
हाइड्रोलिक द्रव  being poured .
Hydraulic fluids , also called  हाइड्रोलिक liquids , हैं the मीडियम by जिससे शक्ति is transferred in  hydraulic machinery .
आम हाइड्रोलिक fluids हैं आधारित  on mineral oil or water .
उदाहरण of उपकरण कि might उपयोग हाइड्रोलिक fluids शामिल excavators और backhoes , हाइड्रोलिक brakes , शक्ति परिचालन प्रणालियों , ट्रांसमिशन  , garbage trucks , aircraft flight control systems , lifts , and industrial machinery .
हाइड्रोलिक प्रणालियों जैसे the ones उल्लेखित ऊपर होगा कार्य सबसे efficiently if the  hydraulic fluid used has no compressibility
महिंद्रा ट्रैक्टर
महिंद्रा tractors , the फार्म उपकरण प्रभाग of महिंद्रा & महिंद्रा , builds और स्त्रोत tractors  that are sold worldwide across six continents .
Mahindra is also  among the शीर्ष तीन ट्रैक्टर निर्माताओं  in the world .
Mahindra has a huge  उपभोक्ता आधार in इण्डिया , चीन और अमेरिका और a growing  base in Australia .
The company builds more tractors  in इण्डिया than कोई अन्य निर्माता , और रै the क्षमता to निर्माण 150,000 tractors  a year .
In  1963 , m & m formed a संयुक्त venture साथ अंतरराष्ट्रीय harvester to manufacture  tractors carrying the Mahindra nameplate for the Indian market .
Armed  साथ अभियान्त्रिकी , tooling और निर्माण know-how gained इससे इस  relationship , M & M developed its first tractor , the B-275 .
महिंद्रा tractors साथ बिक्री of nearly 85,000 इकाई annually is एक of the largest ट्रैक्टर कंपनियाँ in the संसार , और is क्रमांक  one in sales in India - the largest tractor market in the world .
To expand into the growing  ट्रैक्टर मार्केट in चीन , महिंद्रा acquired  majority stake in Jiangling .
To raise awareness about Mahindra in the US , Mahindra USA  घोषित इसके नई प्रायोजन in the nascar देशभर श्रेणी साथ r3 मोटरस्पोर्ट , जिससे is participating साथ a # 23 महिंद्रा tractors शेवरलेट  .
The car will be driven by Robert Richardson , Jr. Mahindra USA , Inc.  घोषित a 17-race प्राथमिक और 18-race संबद्ध प्रायोजन लिये the 2009 nascar देशभर  Series .
With this sponsorship ,  महिंद्रा थी the पहला भारतीय कम्पनी to प्रायोजक a car in nascar  .
In 2008 , Mahindra was a sponsor of the McDonald Motorsports team  जिससे भागा the # 81 car in the nascar देशभर श्रेणी  .
The POWER6 is a microprocessor  विकसित by ibm कि implemented the शक्ति  ISA v.2.03 .
When it became available in systems in 2007 ,  it succeeded the शक्ति5+ as ibm 's फ्लैगशिप शक्ति माइक्रोप्रोसेसर  .
It is part of the eCLipz project , said to have a goal of  converging ibm 's सर्वर हार्डवेयर जहाँ व्यावहारिक ( hence `` ipz '' in the एक्रोनिम : iseries  , pSeries , and zSeries ) .
The American middle class is a  सोशल क्लास in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
While the concept is typically ambiguous in popular opinion  और आम भाषा उपयोग , समकालीन सोशल वैज्ञानिकों have put आगे अनेक  , more or less congruent , theories on the American middle class .
Depending on class model used , the  मध्य क्लास may constitute anywhere इससे 25 % to 66 % of households  .
One of the first major studies of the middle class in America  थी श्वेत कॉलर : the अमरीकी मध्य वर्ग , प्रकाशित in 1951 by समाजशास्त्री C. राइट wright_mills  Mills Wright_Mills .
Later  sociologists ऐसे as डेनिस गिल्बर्ट of हैमिल्टन कॉलेज commonly divide the  middle class into two sub-groups .
Constituting roughly 15 % to 20 % of  households is the अपर or पेशेवर मध्य क्लास consisting of  highly educated , salaried professionals and managers .
Constituting roughly one third of  households is the निम्नतर मध्य क्लास consisting ज़्यादातर of semi-professionals , skilled कारीगरों और  lower-level management .
middle-class व्यक्तियों commonly have a आरामदायक मानक of जीना , significant आर्थिक सुरक्षा , considerable कार्य स्वायत्तता  and rely on their expertise to sustain themselves .
सदस्यों of the मध्य क्लास belong to विविध समूह  which overlap with each other .
Overall , middle-class  व्यक्तियों , विशेषकर upper-middle-class individuals , हैं characterized by conceptualizing , बनाना और  consulting .
Thus , college  शिक्षा is एक of the प्रमुख indicators of middle-class  status .
Largely attributed to  the प्रकृति of middle-class occupations , मध्य क्लास मान tend to emphasize स्वतंत्रता , adherence to मूलभूत मानकों  , valuing innovation and respecting non-conformity .
नीतियां अधिक क्रियाशील than अन्य जनसांख्यिकी , कॉलेज शिक्षित मध्य क्लास  professionals are split between the two major parties .
Income varies considerably from near  the नेशनल मध्य to खूब in excess  of $ 100,000 .
Household income figures , however , do not always reflect class status and standard  of जीना , as वे हैं largely बहकावे by the क्रमांक of आय earners और असफल to recognize household आकार  .
It is  इसलिए संभावित लिये a विशाल , dual-earner , निम्नतर मध्य क्लास household to out-earn a छोटी , one-earner , अपर  middle class household .
The middle classes are very  influential , as वे encompass the बहुमत of मतदाता , लेखक , शिक्षक  , journalists , and editors .
Most societal  रुझान in the us originate भीतर the मध्य वर्ग  .
The following is a list of Saturday Night Live  डाल सदस्यों , पास्ट और उपस्थित  .
The cast members of Saturday Night Live  यहूद originally referred to as the `` नहीं तैयार लिये प्रधान समय  Players '' .
the असली डाल ( l to r ) : laraine न्युमैन , जॉन belushi , जेन कर्टिन , gilda radner , डान  Aykroyd , Garrett Morris , and Chevy Chase
Ruins  इससे the 1906 सैन फ्रांसिस्को भूकंप , remembered as एक of the worst  natural disasters in United States history
A disaster is a natural or man-made ( or technological ) hazard  resulting in an इवेंट of substantial extent causing significant शारीरिक क्षति or विनाश , घाटा of जीवन  , or drastic change to the environment .
A disaster can be ostensively defined as any  tragic इवेंट stemming इससे कार्यक्रम ऐसे as भूकंप , floods , अनर्थकारी  accidents , fires , or explosions .
It is a phenomenon that can cause damage to life  और प्रॉपर्टी और नष्ट the आर्थिक , सोशल और सांस्कृतिक  life of people .
In contemporary academia , disasters are  देखी as the consequence of inappropriately प्रबंधित  risk .
These risks  हैं the उत्पाद of a संयोजन of दोनो hazard/s  and vulnerability .
Hazards that strike in areas with low vulnerability will  never become आपदाओं , as is the मामला in uninhabited regions  .
Developing countries suffer the greatest costs when a disaster hits – more than 95 percent of all deaths caused by disasters occur in developing countries , and losses due to  प्राकृतिक आपदाओं हैं 20 टाइम्स वृहद ( as a प्रतिशत of जीडीपी ) in विकासशील देशों than  in industrialized countries .
In computing , booting ( also known as booting up ) is the  आरंभिक नियत of परिचालन कि a कंप्यूटर प्रणाली performs जब विद्युत शक्ति to the cpu  is switched on .
The process begins when a computer is turned on for the first time or is  re-energized बाद होने turned बंद , और ends जब the कंप्यूटर is तैयार to perform इसके  normal operations .
On modern general purpose computers , this can take  tens of सेकेंड और typically involves performing a power-on self-test , locating और initializing  peripheral devices , and then finding , loading and starting an operating system .
Many computer systems also allow these operations to be initiated by a software command without cycling  शक्ति , in कया is ज्ञात as a नरम रिबूट , हालांकि कुछ of the आरंभिक परिचालन might be छोड़ा on a  soft reboot .
A boot loader is a computer program that loads the  प्रमुख ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली or runtime पर्यावरण लिये the कंप्यूटर बाद पूर्णता of  the self-tests .
The  कंप्यूटर पद बूट is छोटी लिये बूटस्ट्रैप or बूटस्ट्रैप लोड  and derives from the phrase to pull oneself up by one 's bootstraps .
The usage calls attention to the requirement that , if most  तन्त्र is loaded onto a कंप्यूटर by अन्य तन्त्र already कार्यशील on the कंप्यूटर  , some mechanism must exist to load initial software onto the computer .
Early computers used a variety of ad-hoc methods to  मिलेंगी a छोटी कार्यक्रम into मेमोरी to solve इस प्रॉब्लम  .
The invention of integrated  सर्किट read-only मेमोरी ( rom ) of विभिन्न प्रकार हल इस विरोधाभास by allowing कंप्यूटर to be shipped साथ a प्रारंभ up कार्यक्रम  that could not be erased .
विकास in the क्षमता of rom रै अनुमत कभी अधिक विस्तृत  start up procedures to be implemented .
On general purpose computers , the boot  प्रक्रम begins साथ the निष्पादन of an आरंभिक कार्यक्रम भंडारित in बूट roms or पढ़ा in another फ़ैशन  .
In some older  कंप्यूटर , the आरंभिक कार्यक्रम might have महरूम the अनुप्रयोग to  run , if no operating system was used , or the operating system .
In other computers , the initial program is a boot  लोडर कि may तब लोड into random-access मेमोरी ( राम ) , इससे nonvolatile द्वितीयक भंडार ( ऐसे as a मुश्किल डिस्क ड्राइव ) or , in कुछ पुरानी कंप्यूटर , इससे a मीडियम ऐसे as punched ताश , punched टेप , or चुम्बकीय टेप in पुरानी कंप्यूटर  , the binary code of an operating system or runtime environment and then execute it .
If  the बूट लोडर is सीमित in इसके आकार और सामर्थ्य , it may , बजाय , लोड a larger और अधिक सक्षम द्वितीयक बूट  loader , which would then load the operating system or runtime environment .
Some embedded systems do not require a noticeable boot  अनुक्रम to शुरू कामकाज और जब turned on may बस चलाएं operational कार्यक्रम कि हैं  stored in ROM .
Firebird is an open source SQL relational database  प्रबन्धन प्रणाली कि रनों on लिनक्स , खिड़कियाँ , और a किस्में of  Unix .
The database  forked इससे borland 's खोलें सोर्स संस्करण of interbase in 2000 , लकिन चूंकि firebird 1.5  the code has been largely rewritten .
Outsourcing is the  contracting आउट of an आतंरिक कारोबार प्रक्रम  to a third-party organization .
The practice of contracting a business  प्रक्रम आउट to a तीसरा पार्टी बल्कि than स्टॉफ it internally is आम  in the modern economy .
The term `` outsourcing '' became popular in  the संयुक्त राज्य निकट the फेरे  of the 21st century .
Outsourcing  sometimes involves transferring कर्मचारी और एसेट इससे एक कड़  to another , but not always .
the परिभाषा of आउटसोर्सिंग शामिल दोनो विदेशी और घरेलू contracting  , and sometimes includes offshoring , which means relocating a business function to another country .
Financial savings from lower  अंतरराष्ट्रीय मजदूर दरों is a बिग प्रेरणा लिये outsourcing/offshoring  .
The opposite of outsourcing is  पुकारा insourcing , जिससे entails bringing प्रक्रियाओं संभाला by third-party firms in-house  , and is sometimes accomplished via vertical integration .
However , a  कारोबार can provide a अनुबंध सेवा to another कारोबार बगैर necessarily  insourcing that business process .
Human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) is a lentivirus ( slowly replicating retrovirus ) that  कल्याणकारी acquired immunodeficiency सिंड्रोम ( एड्स ) , a कंडीशन in इंसानो in जिससे प्रगतिशील विफलता of the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली allows life-threatening opportunistic  infections and cancers to thrive .
संक्रमण साथ hiv occurs by the ट्रांसफ़र of रक्त  , semen , vaginal fluid , pre-ejaculate , or breast milk .
भीतर ये bodily fluids , hiv is उपस्थित as दोनो फ़्री वायरस अणु  and virus within infected immune cells .
HIV infects vital  कोशिकाएं in the इंसान प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली ऐसे as हेल्पर t कोशिकाएं ( specifically cd4 + t कोशिकाएं  ) , macrophages , and dendritic cells .
HIV infection leads to  कम स्तर of cd4+ t कोशिकाएं through a क्रमांक of mechanisms सहित : apoptosis of uninfected bystander कोशिकाएं  , direct viral killing of infected cells , and killing of infected CD4+ T cells by CD8 cytotoxic lymphocytes that recognize infected cells .
जब cd4+ t कोशिका संख्याएँ मनाही नीचे a नाजुक स्तर , cell-mediated प्रतिरक्षण is खोया  , and the body becomes progressively more susceptible to opportunistic infections .
The firepole  in a आग स्टेशन in  Toronto
A fireman 's pole ( also called a sliding pole or firepole ) is a wooden pole or a metal  ट्यूब or पाइप संस्थापित between floors in आग स्टेशन , allowing अग्निशमन responding to an सचेतक to जल्दी descend to the मैदान मंजिल तेज़ than  by using a standard staircase .
The device was invented in the  1870s by दाउद kenyon , in शिकागो , इलिनोइस , हालांकि it is प्रायः incorrectly credited  to the Boston Fire Department .
Mary Poppins  is the शीर्षक अक्षर of a श्रेणी of children 's किताबे लिखा  by P. L. Travers .
Throughout the  मरियम poppins श्रेणी , जिससे lasted इससे 1934 to 1988 , मरियम shepard  was the illustrator and acted as a second author .
The books centre on a  जादुई अंग्रेज़ी नैनी , मरियम  Poppins .
She is blown by the East wind to Number Seventeen  चेरी पेड़ लेन , लंदन , और into the बैंको ' household to परवाह  for their children .
मुठभेड़ों साथ चिमनी sweeps , दुकानदारों और विभिन्न adventures follow  until Mary Poppins abruptly leaves , i.e. , `` pops-out '' .
The  adventures लो प्लेस over a कुल of आठ  books .
However ,  तभी the पहला तीन किताबे विशेषता मरियम poppins  arriving and leaving .
The  बाद पाँच किताबे recount previously unrecorded adventures इससे  her original three visits .
As P. L.  ट्रेवर्स explains in उसके परिचय to मरियम poppins in the पार्क , `` वो can नहीं forever arrive  and depart . ''
The books were adapted in 1964 into a musical Disney film starring  जूली एंड्रयूज और लंड वैन dyke  .
In 2004 ,  डिज़्नी नाट्य उत्पादित a स्टेज musical अनुकूलन in  the West End theatre .
The stage musical was transferred to  ब्रॉडवे in 2006 जहाँ it भागा जबतक इसके closing on  March 3 , 2013 .
It has been highly  कामयाब , as  was the 1964 film .
The Last Song is a  2010 अमरीकी coming of आयु टीन रोमांटिक नाटक फिल्मी विकसित alongside निकोलस  Sparks ' novel by the same name .
The film was  निर्देशित by जूली ऐनी रॉबिन्सन in उसके विशेषता फिल्मी directorial डेब्यू और co-written by स्पार्क्स  and Jeff Van Wie .
The  पिछला सोंग सितारों miley सायरस , लियाम hemsworth , और ग्रेग kinnear और फ़ॉलो a troubled किशोरावस्था as वो reconnects  with her estranged father and falls in love during a summer in a quiet Southern United States beach town .
The film is  वितरित by touchstone तस्वीरें  .
स्पार्क्स थी approached to लिखें दोनो the फिल्मी 's पटकथा  and the novel .
Sparks completed the  पटकथा in जनवरी 2009 , prior to the पूर्णता of the अनोखा , बनाना the पिछला सोंग  his first script to be optioned for film .
The  सेटिंग , originally in उत्तर कैरोलिना जैसे the अनोखा , स्थानांतरित to जॉर्जिया बाद the  states had campaigned for months to host production .
Upon beginning  उत्पादन in tybee द्वीप , जॉर्जिया और आसपास savannah , the पिछला सोंग became the  first movie to be both shot and set in Tybee Island .
Filming lasted from June 15 to August 18 ,  2009 साथ much of it occurring on the द्वीप 's बीच और  pier .
The Last Song was originally scheduled for wide release on January 8 ,  2010 , लकिन थी स्थगित to कूच 31  , 2010 .
लिखा simlish
Simlish is  a fictional भाषा प्रदर्शित in ea खेल ' sim  series of games .
It debuted  in simcopter , और रै महरूम विशेषकर prominent in the सीम  , The Sims 2 and The Sims 3 .
The Sims development team  निर्मित the अद्वितीय simlish भाषा by experimenting साथ fractured यूक्रेनी , फ्रेंच ,  Latin , Finnish , English , Fijian , Cebuano , and Tagalog .
Simlish can  भी be सुना in simcity 4 , simcity समाजों और  SimCity 2013 , but far less frequently .
civilized जीव in spore can भी be सिखाया to बोलो  Simlish .
It is also  प्रदर्शित to an extent in firaxis खेल  ' Sid Meier 's SimGolf .
Designer Will Wright was conscious of the need for  संवाद in the खेल , लकिन विचार कि using a रियल भाषा होता मेक it ध्वनि too दोहराए और होता भी be too costly  to hire translators for world languages .
Initially , inspired by the Native American code talkers of World War II , Sims creator Will Wright and  भाषा विशेषज्ञ मार्क gimbel सुझाया experimenting साथ the navajo भाषा to बनाएँ simlish  .
However , they ultimately decided that Simlish worked best as a  `` भाषा '' बना up of gibberish शब्द कि could n't be अनूदित , so कि इसके अर्थ होता be बाएँ खोलें to the  imagination of the player .
Wright later commented that using `` nonsense language '' turned out to be the right  विकास चुनाव , as लोगों यहूद सक्षम of imagining it अधिक realistically  than a computer could simulate a real one .
the वास्तविक ध्वनि of simlish थी निर्मित improvisationally by आवाज़ अभिनेताओं  Stephen Kearin and Gerri Lawlor .
An  उदाहरण of अल्ट्रासोनिक परीक्षण ( ut ) on ब्लेड जड़ें of a v2500  IAE aircraft engine .
Step 1 : The UT probe is placed  on the रूट of the ब्लेड to be inspected साथ the सहायता of a खास  borescope tool ( video probe ) .
कदम 2 : यंत्र जमावट  are input .
Step 3 : The probe is  scanned over the ब्लेड रूट  .
In this case , an indication ( peak in the data ) through  the रेड लकीर ( or फाटक ) indicates a शुभ ब्लेड ; an indication to the बाएँ of कि  range indicates a crack .
principle of अल्ट्रासोनिक  testing .
LEFT : A probe sends a sound  वेव into a परीक्षण सामग्री .
There  हैं दो indications , एक इससे the आरंभिक पल्स  of the probe , and the second due to the back wall echo .
सही : a defect creates a तीसरा indication और simultaneously reduces the  amplitude of the back wall indication .
The depth  of the defect is संकल्पित by the अनुपात  D/E
In ultrasonic testing ( UT ) , very short  अल्ट्रासोनिक pulse-waves साथ बीच बारंबारता ranging इससे 0.1-15 mhz और occasionally up to 50 mhz हैं शुभारम्भ into  materials to detect internal flaws or to characterize materials .
A common example is ultrasonic  मोटाई मापन , जिससे परीक्षण the मोटाई of the परीक्षण ऑब्जेक्ट  , for example , to monitor pipework corrosion .
Ultrasonic testing is often performed on steel and other metals and  alloys , हालांकि it can भी be प्रयुक्त on कंक्रीट , लकडी और composites , albeit साथ कम रेज़ोल्यूशन  .
It is a  रूप of non-destructive परीक्षण प्रयुक्त in अनेक उद्योग सहित  aerospace , automotive and other transportation sectors .
The vas deferens ( plural : vasa deferentia ) , also called  ductus deferens ( लैटिन : `` carrying-away पोत '' ; बहुवचन : ductus deferentes ) , is भाग of the पुरूष anatomy of अनेक vertebrates ; वे हस्तांतरण शुक्राणु इससे the epididymis  in anticipation of ejaculation .
Vascular ischemia  of the toes साथ characteristic  cyanosis .
In medicine , ischemia , also spelled as ischaemia or  ischæmia , ( ; इससे यूनानी भाषा ισχαιμία , ischaimía ; isch- रूट denoting a प्रतिबंध or thinning or to मेक or grow thin/lean , haema रक्त ) is a प्रतिबंध in  blood supply to tissues , causing a shortage of oxygen and glucose needed for cellular metabolism ( to keep tissue alive ) .
Ischemia is generally caused by  समस्याएं साथ रक्त बरतन , साथ resultant क्षति to or dysfunction  of tissue .
It also means local anemia in a given part of a body  sometimes resulting इससे जमघट ( ऐसे as vasoconstriction , घनास्रता or वाहिकारोध  ) .
Down syndrome ( DS ) or Down 's syndrome , also known as trisomy  21 , is a जेनेटिक विकार caused by the उपस्थिति of सब or भाग of a तीसरा नक़ल of  chromosome 21 .
Down  सिंड्रोम is the सबसे आम chromosome  abnormality in humans .
It is typically associated with a delay in cognitive  क्षमता ( दिमागी retardation , or mr ) और शारीरिक विकास , और a particular नियत of फेशियल विशेषताएँ  .
The average IQ of young  वयस्कों साथ bas सिंड्रोम is around 50 , whereas यंग वयस्कों बगैर the  condition typically have an IQ of 100 .
( MR has  historically महरूम पारिभाषित as an iq नीचे 70 .  )
A large proportion of  individuals साथ bas सिंड्रोम have a कठोर उपाधि of  intellectual disability .
Down syndrome is named after John Langdon Down , the  अंग्रेजों चिकित्सक जो वर्णित the सिंड्रोम  in 1866 .
The condition was clinically described earlier by  जां etienne dominique esquirol in 1838 और edouard seguin  in 1844 .
Down syndrome was identified as a  chromosome 21 trisomy by dr. jérôme lejeune in 1959  .
Down syndrome can be  पहचाना in a baby at जनम or पहले जनम by prenatal स्क्रीनिंग  .
pregnancies साथ इस निदान  are often terminated .
The CDC estimates that  परिचय एक of प्रत्येक 691 शिशु born in the संयुक्त राज्य प्रत्येक साल is born साथ bas  syndrome .
Many children with Down syndrome are educated in  नियमित स्कूल वर्ग जबकि अन्य आवश्यकता specialised शैक्षणिक  facilities .
Some children graduate from high  स्कूल , और , in the us , वहीँ हैं increasing अवसर लिये participating  in post-secondary education .
Education and proper care has been shown  to improve विशेषता of जीवन significantly  .
Many adults with  bas सिंड्रोम हैं समर्थ to कार्य at सशुल्क नियुक्ति in the जातियाँ , जबकि अन्य  require a more sheltered work environment .
Hot flashes ( also known as hot flushes , or night sweats  if वे happen at रात्रि ) हैं a लक्षण जिससे may have अनेक अन्य कल्याणकारी , लकिन जिससे is प्रायः caused by the बदलना  hormone levels that are characteristic of menopause .
The Servicemen 's Readjustment Act of 1944 ( P.L . 78-346 , 58 Stat . 284m ) ,  ज्ञात informally as the g.i . विधेयक , थी a विधि कि provided a दायरा of लाभ लिये returning संसार युद्ध ii दिग्गजों ( commonly referred to as  G.I.s ) .
Benefits included low-cost mortgages , low-interest loans to start a business or farm , cash payments of tuition and living  खर्च to attend कॉलेज , ऊँची स्कूल or वोकेशनल शिक्षा , as खूब as एक साल of बेरोजगारी  compensation .
It was available to every veteran who had been on active  ड्यूटी दौरान the युद्ध सालो लिये at तनिक नब्बे दिनों और था नहीं महरूम dishonorably discharged ; कॉम्बैट थी  not required .
By the end of the program in 1956 , roughly 2.2 million veterans had used the G.I . Bill  शिक्षा लाभ in अनुक्रम to attend कॉलेजों or विश्वविद्यालयों , और an अतिरिक्त 6.6 लाख प्रयुक्त  these benefits for some kind of training program .
Since the  असली 1944 विधि , the पद रै आइये to शामिल अन्य दिग्गज लाभ कार्यक्रम निर्मित to assist  veterans of subsequent wars as well as peacetime service .
Historians and economists consider the G.I . Bill a major political success—especially  in कंट्रास्ट to the उपचार of संसार युद्ध i veterans—and a प्रमुख योगदान to अमेरिका 's भण्डार of इंसान पूंजी  that sped long-term economic growth .
The Watergate scandal was a political scandal that occurred in the United States in the 1970s as a result of the June 17 , 1972 break-in at the Democratic  नेशनल कमेटी मुख्यालय at the वाटरगेट दफ्तर जटिल in वॉशिंगटन , d.C. , और the निक्सन प्रशासन 's attempted cover-up  of its involvement .
The  कांड आखिरकार led to the इस्तीफा of रिचर्ड निक्सन , the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य  , on August 9 , 1974 — the only resignation of a U.S. President .
The scandal also resulted in the  indictment , विचारण , conviction , और incarceration of forty-three व्यक्तियों , दर्जनों of जिसको यहूद  Nixon 's top administration officials .
The affair began with the arrest  of पाँच मेन लिये तोड़कर और प्रवेश into the लोकतांत्रिक नेशनल कमेटी ( dnc ) मुख्यालय  at the Watergate complex on June 17 , 1972 .
The Federal Bureau  of छानबीन ( एफबीआई ) कनेक्ट नकदी मिला on the burglars to a slush निधि प्रयुक्त by the कमेटी लिये the re-election  of the President , the official organization of Nixon 's campaign .
In July 1973 , as evidence mounted against the  अध्यक्ष 's स्टाफ , सहित गवाही provided by पूर्व स्टाफ सदस्यों in an छानबीन conducted by the सीनेट वाटरगेट कमेटी , it थी नाज़िल कि अध्यक्ष निक्सन  had a tape-recording system in his offices and he had recorded many conversations .
रिकार्डिंग इससे ये टेपों implicated the अध्यक्ष , revealing he था attempted to कवर up the questionable ( और illegal ) goings-on कि  had taken place during his administration , both before and after the break-in .
After a protracted series of bitter court battles , the  u.S. परम् अदालत unanimously शासित कि the अध्यक्ष था to हाथ over the टेपों to सरकारी जांचकर्ताओं ; he ultimately  complied .
Facing near-certain impeachment in the House of Representatives and a strong  सम्भावना of a conviction in the सीनेट , निक्सन resigned the प्रेसिडेंसी on अगस्त 9 , 1974  .
His  successor , जेराल्ड घाट , तब जारी a pardon  to him .
Elizabeth Imogene Webber ( formerly Lansing and Spencer ) is a  fictional अक्षर on the एबीसी दिन साबुन ओपेरा सामान्य हॉस्पिटल  .
Elizabeth is the  पोती of dr. स्टीव हार्डी ( जॉन beradino )  , one of the originating core characters of the series .
Rebecca Herbst originated the  अक्षर on अगस्त 1 , 1997 और रै महरूम  the only contract actress to play the role .
Elizabeth is  भाग of दो supercouple pairings , भाग्यशाली स्पेंसर और एलिज़ाबेथ webber और  Jason Morgan and Elizabeth Webber .
The United States presidency of Ronald Reagan , also known as the Reagan administration , was a  रिपब्लिकन प्रशासन headed by रोनाल्ड reagan इससे जनवरी 20 , 1981 , to जनवरी 20 , 1989 .
Domestically , the administration favored reducing  सरकारी कार्यक्रम और introduced the largest across-the-board कर कटौती  in American history .
The economic  नीतियों enacted in 1981 , ज्ञात as `` reaganomics `` , यहूद  an example of supply-side economics .
Reagan aimed to encourage entrepreneurship  और सीमा the विकास of सोशल बिता , as खूब as the कटौती  of regulation and inflation .
Economic growth  देखी a दमदार रिकवरी in the 1980s , helping reagan to जीत a भूस्खलन  re-election .
the नेशनल कर्ज़ increased significantly  , however .
Regarding foreign policy , the administration  थी steadfastly anti-communist , कॉलिंग the सोवियत संघ an `` दुष्ट साम्राज्य `` और समाप्ति 1970s détente .
Reagan accelerated the massive buildup of the military started by his  पूर्ववर्ती , सहित an आक्रमण of हरा , the पहला प्रमुख विदेशी कार्रवाई by u.S. सैनिकों चूंकि  the end of the Vietnam War .
The `` Reagan Doctrine `` controversially granted aid to paramilitary forces seeking to overthrow  कम्युनिस्ट सरकारें , विशेषकर in war-torn सेंट्रल अमेरिका और अफगानिस्तान  .
Reagan also promoted  नई technologies ऐसे as मिसाइल रक्षा प्रणालियों in अनुक्रम to confront the soviets और उनके  allies .
In diplomacy , Reagan forged a strong alliance with UK Prime Minister Margaret Thatcher , and  he मिले साथ सोवियत सामान्य सचिव मिखाइल गोर्बाचेव चार टाइम्स , aiming to shrink the superpowers '  nuclear arsenals .
Reagan 's  प्रेसिडेंसी रै महरूम termed the `` reagan क्रान्ति '' , or the आयु of reagan in मान्यता of the राजनैतिक realignment दोनो भीतर और परे the u.S.  in favor of his brand of conservatism and his faith in free markets .
the reagan प्रशासन worked toward the पतन of सोवियत साम्यवादी , और it  did collapse just as he left office .
Victory in the Cold War led to a  unipolar संसार साथ the u.S. as the संसार 's एकमात्र  superpower .
जबकि the damaging iran-contra affair engulfed अनेक reagan aides दौरान उसके दूसरी पद , reagan खुद बाएँ  office with a 63 percent approval rating , one of the higher approval ratings of departing presidents .
After years of unstinting praise from the right , and  unrelenting आलोचना इससे the बाएँ , इतिहासकार दाउद हेनरी पाता कि by 2009 a सर्वसम्मति था उभरा among विद्वानों कि reagan revived कोसा और turned the स्वदेश to the सही by demonstrating a `` pragmatic कोसा  '' that promoted ideology within the constraints imposed by the divided political system .
Furthermore , says Henry , the consensus viewpoint agrees that he revived faith in the  प्रेसिडेंसी और अमरीकी self-confidence , और contributed critically to समाप्ति the ठंडा युद्ध  .
Crude death  रेट by देश ( 2006  ) .
Mortality rate is a measure of the number of deaths ( in general ,  or due to a विशिष्ट कारण ) in a जनसांख्यिकी  .
scaled to the आकार of कि जनसांख्यिकी , प्रति  unit of time .
Mortality rate is typically  expressed in इकाई of मौतों प्रति 1000 individuals प्रति साल ; यूँ , a मृत्यु रेट of 9.5 ( आउट  of 1000 ) in a population of 1,000 would mean 9.5 deaths per year in that entire population , or 0.95 % out of the total .
It is distinct from morbidity rate , which refers to the number of  individuals in ग़रीब स्वास्थ्य दौरान a दिए समय काल ( the व्यापकता रेट ) or the क्रमांक of newly appearing मामले of the बीमारी  per unit of time ( incidence rate ) .
The term `` mortality `` is also sometimes inappropriately used to  refer to the क्रमांक of मौतों among a नियत of diagnosed हॉस्पिटल मामले लिये a बीमारी or चोट , बल्कि than  for the general population of a country or ethnic group .
This disease  मृत्यु statistic is अधिक precisely referred to as `` मामला fatality  rate `` ( CFR ) .
एक distinguishes:
The crude death rate , the  कुल क्रमांक of मौतों प्रति साल प्रति 1000 लोगों  .
the crude death rate for the whole world is  परिचय 8.37 प्रति 1000 प्रति साल according to the वर्तमान सीआईए संसार  Factbook .
the perinatal मृत्यु रेट , the योग of neonatal मौतों और fetal मौतों ( stillbirths  ) per 1000 births .
The maternal mortality  अनुपात , the क्रमांक of मातृ  deaths per 100,000 live births in same time period .
The maternal mortality rate , the number of maternal deaths per 1,000 women of  reproductive आयु in the जनसांख्यिकी ( generally पारिभाषित as 15–44  years of age ) .
The infant  मृत्यु रेट , the क्रमांक of मौतों of children कम than  1 year old per 1000 live births .
The child mortality rate , the number of deaths of children  कम than 5 सालो बूढ़ा प्रति 1000 सजीव births  .
The standardised mortality ratio ( SMR ) -  इस represents a आंशिक तुलना to the संख्याएँ of मौतों कि होता have महरूम अपेक्षित if the जनसांख्यिकी था महरूम of a मानक  composition in terms of age , gender , etc .
the age-specific मृत्यु रेट ( asmr ) - इस refers to the कुल क्रमांक of मौतों प्रति साल  per 1000 people of a given age ( e.g . age 62 last birthday ) .
In regard to the or failure of medical  उपचार or प्रक्रियाओं , एक होता भी distinguish:
The early mortality  रेट , the कुल क्रमांक of मौतों in the जल्दी चरण of an जारी उपचार  , or in the period immediately following an treatment .
The late mortality rate  , the कुल क्रमांक of मौतों in the लेट चरण of an जारी उपचार , or a significant लंबाई of  time after an acute treatment .
Note that the crude death rate as defined above and  लागू to a पूरे जनसांख्यिकी can दे a भ्रामक छाप  .
The crude death rate depends on the age ( and gender ) specific  मृत्यु दरों और the आयु ( और लिंग ) वितरण of the जनसांख्यिकी  .
The number of deaths per 1000 people can be higher for developed  राष्ट्र than in less-developed देशों , despite जीवन प्रत्याशा होने उच्चतर in विकसित देशों due to मानकों  of health being better .
This happens because developed countries typically have a completely different  जनसांख्यिकी आयु वितरण , साथ a much उच्चतर proportion of पुरानी लोगों , due to दोनो निम्नतर हाल जनम दरों और निम्नतर मृत्यु दरों  .
A more complete  चित्र of मृत्यु is दिए by a  life table which shows the mortality rate separately for each age .
A life table is necessary to give a  शुभ अनुमान of जीवन प्रत्याशा  .
An  otoacoustic उत्सर्जन ( oae ) is a ध्वनि  which is generated from within the inner ear .
Having been predicted by Thomas Gold in 1948 , its existence was first  demonstrated experimentally by दाउद kemp in 1978 और otoacoustic emissions have चूंकि महरूम दिखाया to उठता by a क्रमांक of अलग सेल्यूलर  mechanisms within the inner ear .
Studies have  दिखाया कि oaes गायब बाद the भीतरी कान रै महरूम क्षतिग्रस्त , so oaes हैं प्रायः प्रयुक्त in the प्रयोगशाला और the  clinic as a measure of inner ear health .
Broadly speaking , there are two types of otoacoustic  emissions : spontaneous otoacoustic emissions ( soaes ) , जिससे can occur बगैर बाह्य उत्तेजनाओं  , and evoked otoacoustic emissions ( EOAEs ) , which require an evoking stimulus .
Hurricane Tomas was the  उन्नीसवीं नामित तूफ़ान और बारहवीं hurricane of the 2010  Atlantic hurricane season .
टॉमस विकसित इससे a तीव्र वेव ईस्ट of the windward  Islands on October 29 .
Quickly intensifying into a hurricane , it  स्थानांतरित through the windward आइलैंड्स और passed बहुत निकट  Saint Lucia .
After  reaching श्रेणी 2 औकात on the saffir-simpson स्केल , टॉमस जल्दी weakened to a तीव्र तूफ़ान in  the central Caribbean Sea , due to strong wind shear and dry air .
Tomas later regained hurricane status as it  reorganized निकट the windward ड्योढ़ी  .
Throughout the hurricane 's path , 71 people are known to  have महरूम मारे , 14 of जिसको यहूद in संत लूसिया .
Monetary losses throughout the  windward आइलैंड्स यहूद अनुमानित at us $ 588 लाख , मुख्यतः in संत लूसिया .
In the wake of the storm in Haiti ,  बाढ़ intensified an जारी हैजा outbreak indirectly causing अधिक fatalities  .
According to a report released in December 2010  , 55 लोगों यहूद मारे in क्यूबा और hispanola , हालांकि the वितरण of ये fatalities हैं अनजान  .
Overall damage from the storm  थी at तनिक $ 741 लाख  .
Victoria Jackson ( born August 2 , 1959 )  is an अमरीकी हास्य , अभिनेत्री , satirist , सिंगर और अंतरजाल ब्लॉगर बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a डाल सदस्य of the एनबीसी टेलीविज़न स्केच कॉमेडी श्रेणी  Saturday Night Live ( SNL ) from 1986 to 1992 .
She has received attention as a vocal critic of  अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा , और is an क्रियाशील भागीदार in the चाय पार्टी  movement .
Postmodern literature is literature characterized by  भारी रिलायंस on तकनीकों जैसे fragmentation , विरोधाभास , और questionable narrators , और is प्रायः ( हालांकि  not exclusively ) defined as a style or trend which emerged in the post–World War II era .
Postmodern works are  देखी as a प्रतिक्रिया विरूद्ध आत्मज्ञान सोच और modernist  approaches to literature .
Postmodern  साहित्य , जैसे postmodernism as a पूरे , tends  to resist definition or classification as a `` movement '' .
Indeed , the convergence of postmodern literature with various modes of critical theory , particularly reader-response and  deconstructionist approaches , और the subversions of the अव्यक्त अनुबंध between लेखक , टेक्स्ट और रीडर by जिससे इसके works हैं प्रायः characterised , have led to pre-modern fictions ऐसे as cervantes  ' Don Quixote ( 1605,1615 ) and Laurence Sterne 's eighteenth-century satire Tristram Shandy being retrospectively inducted into the fold .
जबकि वहीँ is छोटी सर्वसम्मति on the precise विशेषताएँ , पैमाना , और  importance of postmodern literature , as is often the case with artistic movements , postmodern literature is commonly defined in relation to a precursor .
For example , a postmodern literary work tends  नहीं to conclude साथ the neatly tied-up समाप्ति as is प्रायः मिला in modernist  literature , but often parodies it .
Postmodern  लेखक tend to celebrate मौका over शिल्प , और further employ  metafiction to undermine the writer 's authority .
Another characteristic of postmodern literature is the questioning of distinctions between  ऊँची और कम संस्कृति through the उपयोग of pastiche , the संयोजन of विषय और जाति नहीं previously  deemed fit for literature .
Enigma is an electronic musical  प्रोजेक्ट संस्थापित in जर्मनी by माइकल cretu , दाउद  Fairstein and Frank Peterson in 1990 .
The  romanian-born cretu conceived the पहेली प्रोजेक्ट जबकि working in जर्मनी , लकिन आधारित उसके रिकॉर्डिंग स्टुडियो a.r.t . studios in ibiza , स्पेन  , from the early 1990s until May 2009 , where he has recorded all of Enigma 's studio releases to date .
Cretu is both the  composer और the निर्माता of the प्रोजेक्ट  .
His former wife , pop singer  सैंड्रा , प्रायः provided vocals on पहेली ट्रैक्स  .
Jens  gad co-arranged और निभाई गिटार  on three of the Enigma albums .
Peter  कॉर्नेलियस भी contributed to पहेली  during the 1990s .
Seven studio albums have  महरूम उत्पादित अंतर्गत the नाम of  the project .
Scooby-Doo is an American animated  कार्टून मताधिकार , comprising अनेक एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न श्रेणी उत्पादित इससे 1969 to  the present day .
The original  श्रेणी , scooby-doo , जहाँ  Are You !
, was created for  hanna-barbera प्रोडक्शन्स by लेखक  Joe Ruby and Ken Spears in 1969 .
This Saturday morning cartoon series featured four teenagers— Fred Jones , Daphne Blake , Velma Dinkley ,  और norville `` shaggy '' रोजर्स — और उनके talking भूरा ग्रेट डेन श्वान नामित scooby-doo , जो solve रहस्यों involving माना अलौकिक जीव through a श्रेणी of हरकतों और  missteps .
Following the success of the original series , Hanna-Barbera and its successor Warner Bros . Animation  have उत्पादित numerous follow-up और spin-off एनिमेटेड श्रेणी और अनेक सम्बन्धित works , सहित टेलीविज़न specials और telefilms , a लकीर of direct-to-video  films , and two Warner Bros. –produced theatrical feature films .
Some versions of Scooby-Doo feature different  विसंगतियाँ on the दिखाएँ 's अलौकिक थीम , और शामिल वर्ण ऐसे as स्कूबी 's cousin scooby-dum और भतीजे  Scrappy-Doo in addition to or instead of some of the original characters .
Scooby-Doo was originally broadcast on  सीबीएस इससे 1969 to 1976 , जब it स्थानांतरित to एबीसी  .
ABC aired the show until  canceling it in 1986 , और प्रस्तुत a spin-off featuring the वर्ण as children , a pup नामित scooby-doo , इससे  1988 until 1991 .

and Shaggy and  scooby-doo मिलेंगी a a सुराग ! ] ] , aired as भाग of बच्चे wb on the wb संजाल और इसके successor  , The CW network , from 2002 until 2008 .

रहस्य incorporated , aired on  Cartoon Network from 2010 to 2013 .

Call of Duty is  a first-person और third-person  shooter computer/ video game franchise .
the श्रेणी began on the pc , और  later expanded to consoles and handhelds .
Several spin-off  खेल have भी महरूम released  .
The earlier  खेल in the श्रेणी हैं नियत primarily in संसार युद्ध ii , इस शामिल : कॉल of  Duty , Call of Duty 2 , and Call of Duty 3 .
Beginning with Modern Warfare ,  जिससे is नियत in आधुनिक टाइम्स , the श्रेणी रै shifted फ़ोकस  away from World War II .
Call of Duty 4 : Modern Warfare ( released November 2007 ) was  followed by कॉल of ड्यूटी : संसार at युद्ध और कॉल of ड्यूटी : आधुनिक warfare  2 .
Black Ops ( released November 2010 ) takes place in the  ठंडा युद्ध , जबकि आधुनिक warfare 3 ( released नवम्बर 2011 ) takes प्लेस in the near-future सेटिंग  .
Black Ops 2 ( Released  नवम्बर 13 , 2012 ) takes प्लेस in the  year 2025 .
The Call of Duty games are published  और स्वामित्व by एक्टिविजन साथ aspyr मीडिया प्रकाशन it लिये ठहराना os  X .
While the  स्टुडियो अनंत वार्ड primarily स्टिल develops उन्हें , treyarch रै भी विकसित  several of the titles with the release of the studios ' games interlaced with each other .
Some games have been  विकसित by धूसर पदार्थ इंटरैक्टिव , चिंगारी असीमित , विस्मित entertainment , n-space , विद्रोह developments  , Ideaworks Game Studio , Sledgehammer Games and nStigate Games .
The games use a variety of  इंजन , सहित the id तकनीक 3 , the treyarch ngl , और  the IW 5.0 .
Other products in the franchise include a line of action  आंकड़े designed by plan-b खिलौने , a कार्ड खेल निर्मित by अपर डेक , और a कॉमिक किताब  mini-series published by WildStorm .
As of  नवम्बर 11 , 2011 , the कॉल of ड्यूटी श्रेणी have बेची  over 100 million copies .
As of March 31 , 2012 there are 40  लाख मासिक क्रियाशील खिलाड़ी आरपार सब of the कॉल of ड्यूटी शीर्षक , साथ 10 लाख कॉल of ड्यूटी : elite उपयोक्ता और 2 लाख  paying annual members .
Over 1.6 billion  घंटों of ऑनलाइन gameplay have महरूम logged आधुनिक warfare  3 since its 2011 release .
the एस्टेट कर in the संयुक्त राज्य is a कर imposed on the ट्रांसफ़र of the `` taxable एस्टेट `` of a मृतक व्यक्ति , whether ऐसे प्रॉपर्टी is transferred via a होगा , according to the राज्य कानून of intestacy or वरना बना as an घटना of  the death of the owner , such as a transfer of property from an intestate estate or trust , or the payment of certain life insurance benefits or financial account sums to beneficiaries .
The  एस्टेट कर is एक भाग of the एकीकृत तोहफा और एस्टेट  Tax system in the United States .
the अन्य भाग of the प्रणाली , the तोहफा कर , imposes a कर on हस्तांतरण of प्रॉपर्टी दौरान  a person 's life ; the gift tax prevents avoidance of the estate tax should a person want to give away his/her estate .
In addition to the federal  सरकारी , अनेक राज्य भी थोपने an एस्टेट कर , साथ the राज्य संस्करण पुकारा either an  estate tax or an inheritance tax .
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों of the एस्टेट कर कॉल it the ``  death tax '' .
If an asset is left to a  जीवनसाथी or a federally पहचाना दान , the कर प्रायः  does not apply .
In addition , up to $ 5,250,000  can be दिए by an व्यक्तिगत , पहले and/or upon उनके मौत , बगैर रूष्ट  federal gift or estate taxes .
Gavin McGregor Rossdale ( born 30 October  1967 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी कर्ता और संगीतकार , ज्ञात as the सीसे सिंगर और लय  guitarist of the rock band Bush .
Following Bush 's separation in 2002 , which  lasted लिये आठ सालो , he थी the सीसे सिंगर और guitarist लिये संस्थान ,  and later began a solo career .
When performing  सोलो , गेविन plays गीतों इससे उसके  extensive musical libraries .
Rossdale has been  क्रमित in the शीर्ष 100 भारी मेटल vocalists by hit parader  ( # 75 ) .
Raffaello Sanzio da Urbino ( April 6 or March 28 , 1483 – April 6 , 1520 ) ,  बेहतर ज्ञात बस as राफेल , थी an इतालवी चित्रकार और वास्तु of the ऊँची पुनर्जागरण  .
His work is  admired लिये इसके स्पष्टता of रूप और आसानी of संयोजन और लिये इसके विज़ुअल  achievement of the Neoplatonic ideal of human grandeur .
Together with Michelangelo  और लियोनार्डो da विंची , he फ़ॉर्म the परंपरागत ट्रिनिटी of ग्रेट  masters of that period .
Raphael  थी enormously उत्पादक , कार्यशील an unusually विशाल कार्यशाला , और despite उसके मौत  at 37 , a large body of his work remains .
Many of his works are found in the Vatican  राजमहल , जहाँ the frescoed राफेल कक्ष यहूद the सेंट्रल  , and the largest , work of his career .
The best known work is The School of  एथेंस in the वेटिकन stanza देला segnatura  .
After his early years in Rome much of his work was  self-designed , लकिन लिये the सबसे भाग चलाया by the कार्यशाला इससे उसके drawings ,  with considerable loss of quality .
He was extremely influential in his lifetime ,  हालांकि बाहर रोम उसके कार्य थी ज़्यादातर ज्ञात इससे उसके  collaborative printmaking .
After his death , the influence of his great rival Michelangelo  थी अधिक फैली जबतक the 18th और 19th सदियां , जब राफेल 's अधिक निर्मल और समन्वयात्मक  qualities were again regarded as the highest models .
His  करियर जलप्रपात naturally into तीन phases और तीन शैलियाँ , पहला वर्णित by giorgio vasari : उसके जल्दी  years in Umbria , then a period of about four years ( from 1504–1508 ) absorbing the artistic traditions of Florence , followed by his last hectic and triumphant twelve years in Rome , working for two Popes and their close associates .
जूलिया फिओना रॉबर्ट्स ( born  October 28 , 1967 ) is an American actress .
She became a Hollywood  स्टार बाद headlining the रोमांटिक कॉमेडी pretty स्त्री ( 1990 ) , जिससे grossed  $ 464 million worldwide .
After receiving Golden Globe Awards and Academy Award nominations  लिये स्टील magnolias ( 1989 ) और pretty स्त्री , वो जीती the अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री  for her performance in Erin Brockovich ( 2000 ) .
Her films The Pelican Brief ( 1993 ) , My Best  dost 's विवाह ( 1997 ) , रहस्यवादी पिज़्ज़ा ( 1988 ) , नॉटिंग हिल ( 1999 ) , runaway बहू ( 1999 ) , समंदर 's ग्यारह ( 2001 ) , समंदर 's बारह ( 2004 ) , चार्ली विल्सन 's युद्ध ( 2007 ) , वेलेंटाइन 's दिन ( 2010 ) , खा दुवा प्रेम ( 2010 ) , और दर्पण दर्पण ( 2012 ) have collectively brought बक्सा दफ्तर  receipts of over $ 2.6 billion , making her one of the most successful actresses in terms of box office receipts .
Roberts had  become एक of the highest-paid अभिनेत्रियों in the संसार , टॉपिंग the हॉलीवुड पत्रकारों  annual `` power list '' of top-earning female stars from 2005 to 2006 .
Her fee for 1990 's Pretty  स्त्री थी $ 300,000 ; in 2003 , वो थी सशुल्क an unprecedented $ 25 लाख लिये  her role in Mona Lisa Smile ( 2003 ) .
As of 2010 , Roberts  's जाल लायक थी अनुमानित to be $ 140  million .
Roberts has been named one of People magazine  's `` 50 सबसे खूबसूरत लोगों in the संसार '' ग्यारह टाइम्स ,  tied with Halle Berry .
In 2011 , she was named one of the  `` 100 hottest महिलाओं of all-time '' by मेन  's Health .
In 2001 , Ladies Home Journal ranked her as  the 11th सबसे शक्तिशाली स्त्री in the संयुक्त राज्य .
Mark Elliot Zuckerberg ( born May 14  , 1984 ) is an अमरीकी कंप्यूटर प्रोग्रामर और अंतरजाल उद्योगों  .
He is best known as  एक of पाँच co-founders of the सोशल नेटवर्किंग जालस्थल  Facebook .
As of April 2013 , Zuckerberg is the chairman and chief  कार्यपालिका of फेसबुक , inc. और in 2013 उसके निजी माल थी अनुमानित to be  US $ 13 .3 billion .
Together with  उसके कॉलेज roommates और fellow हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों विद्यार्थी एडुआर्डो saverin , एंड्रयू mccollum , डस्टिन moskovitz और क्रिस  Hughes , Zuckerberg launched Facebook from Harvard 's dormitory rooms .
The group then  introduced फेसबुक onto अन्य campuses देशभर और स्थानांतरित  to Palo Alto , California , United States ( U.S. ) shortly afterwards .
In 2007 , at the age of twenty-three years  , zuckerberg became a अरबपति as a परिणाम of फेसबुक और the क्रमांक of फेसबुक उपयोक्ता  worldwide reached a total of one billion in 2012 .
Zuckerberg was involved in various legal disputes that were initiated by others in the group , who  claimed a share of the कम्पनी आधारित upon उनके भागीदारी दौरान the विकास phase of फेसबुक  .
चूंकि 2010 , zuckerberg रै महरूम नामित among the 100 wealthiest और सबसे influential  people in the world by Time magazine as a part of its Person of the Year accolade .
zuckerberg थी निभाई by कर्ता जेसी eisenberg in the 2010 हॉलीवुड फिल्मी the  Social Network in which the rise of Facebook is portrayed .
The Mayflower was the ship that in 1620  transported 102 अंग्रेज़ी तीर्थयात्रियों , सहित a कोर समूह of separatists  , to New England .
उनके स्टोरी is एक of travail और अस्तित्व in a हर्ष  New World environment .
