Committee of Ways and Means is the chief tax -writing  कमेटी of the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of  Representatives .
Members of the Ways and Means Committee are not allowed  to serve on कोई अन्य हाउस समितियों जबतक वे लागू लिये a waiver इससे उनके  party 's congressional leadership .
The Committee has  क्षेत्राधिकार over सब कराधान , tariffs और अन्य revenue-raising उपायों , as खूब  as a number of other programs including:
Social  सुरक्षा
बेरोजगारी लाभ
medicare
Enforcement of  चाइल्ड support कानून
अस्थाई सहायता लिये मोहताज परिवारों  , a federal welfare program
Foster  परवाह और अपनाना  programs
the u.S. संविधान requires कि सब बिल्स regarding कराधान  must originate in the House of Representatives .
Since House procedure is that all bills  regarding कराधान जरूर go through इस कमेटी , the कमेटी is बहुत influential , as is इसके सीनेट  counterpart , the U.S. Senate Committee on Finance .
The Ways and Means Committee in the 111th Congress was chaired by Charlie Rangel ,  जो था लिया a छोड़ of अनुपस्थिति as अध्यक्ष जबतक हाउस आचार उल्लंघनों यहूद  resolved .
However , his leave of  अनुपस्थिति as अध्यक्ष थी शासित to be a  resignation .
Pete Stark resigned as acting  अध्यक्ष , so sander levin आयोजित कि स्थिति जबतक the प्रारंभ of the 112th  Congress .
Dave Camp  became the कमेटी कुर्सी लिये the 112th कॉंग्रेस , बाद  the Republicans won control of the House in the 2010 election .
The blue whale (  balaenoptera musculus ) is a समुद्री स्तनधारी belonging to the  suborder of baleen whales ( called Mysticeti ) .
At in length and or  अधिक in वज़न , it is the largest ज्ञात एनिमल  to have ever existed .
Long and  slender , the ब्लू व्हेल 's देह can be विभिन्न शेड्स of bluish-grey dorsally और somewhat हल्का  underneath .
There are at least three distinct subspecies : B. m. musculus of the North Atlantic and North Pacific , B. m. intermedia  of the दक्षिणी समंदर और B. m. brevicauda ( भी ज्ञात as the सानो ब्लू व्हेल ) मिला in the भारतीय समंदर और दक्षिण प्रशांत  Ocean .
B. m. indica , found in the  भारतीय समंदर , may be another  subspecies .
As with other baleen whales , its diet  consists लगभग exclusively of छोटी crustaceans  known as krill .
ब्लू whales यहूद abundant in nearly सब the महासागर  on Earth until the beginning of the twentieth century .
For over a century , they were  hunted लगभग to extinction by whalers जबतक सुरक्षित by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय जातियाँ  in 1966 .
A 2002 report estimated  वहीँ यहूद 5,000 to 12,000 ब्लू whales विश्वव्यापी  , located in at least five groups .
More recent research into the  सानो subspecies suggests इस may be an underestimate  .
Before whaling , the largest population was in  the अंटार्कटिक , क्रमांकन लगभग 239,000 ( दायरा 202,000 to  311,000 ) .
There remain only much smaller (  around 2,000 ) एकाग्रता in प्रत्येक of the पूर्वी उत्तर प्रशांत , अंटार्कटिक  , and Indian Ocean groups .
There  हैं दो अधिक समूह in the उत्तर अटलांटिक , और at तनिक दो in the दक्षिणी  Hemisphere .
The globe artichoke ( Cynara cardunculus var .  scolymus ) is a किस्में of a प्रजाति of thistle cultivated  as a food .
The edible matter is buds that  रूप भीतर the पुष्प heads पहले the पुष्प  come into bloom .
the कलियों go दूर or बदलें to a coarse , मुश्किल खाद्य रूप  when the flower blooms .
The  uncultivated or जंगली किस्में of the प्रजाति is  called a cardoon .
It is a perennial  संयंत्र देशी to the  Mediterranean region .
The United States one hundred-dollar bill ( $  100 ) is a denomination of संयुक्त राज्य  currency .
U.S. statesman , inventor , and diplomat  बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन is फिलहाल प्रदर्शित on the obverse  of the bill .
On the reverse of the  banknote is an चित्र of स्वतंत्रता  Hall .
The $ 100 bill is the largest denomination that has been  मुद्रित चूंकि जुलाई 13 , 1969 , जब the denominations of $ 500 , $ 1,000 , $ 5,000 , और $ 10,000 यहूद रिटायर्ड  .
The Bureau of Engraving  और मुद्रण says the औसत जीवन of a $ 100 विधेयक in परिसंचरण is 90 महीने ( 7.5 सालो ) पहले it  is replaced due to wear and tear .
The bills  हैं भी commonly referred to as `` benjamins '' , in सन्दर्भ to the उपयोग of बेंजामिन  Franklin 's portrait on the denomination , or `` C-Notes '' , based on the Roman numeral for 100 .
The bill is one of two  denominations मुद्रित आज कि करता नहीं विशेषता a अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ; the अन्य is the  $ 10 bill , featuring Alexander Hamilton .
The time on the clock of Independence Hall on the  रिवर्स , according to the u.S. ब्यूरो of नक्काशी और मुद्रण , shows लगभग  4:10 .
One hundred  hundred-dollar बिल्स हैं वितरित by संघीय आरक्षित बैंको in mustard-colored  straps ( $ 10,000 ) .
The Series 2009 $ 100 bill redesign  थी अनावरण on अप्रैल 21 , 2010 , और थी to be जारी to the पब्लिक on फ़रवरी 11 , 2011 , लकिन उत्पादन थी shut bas in दिसम्बर 2010  because as many as 30 % were unusable due to a manufacturing flaw .
A vertical crease in the paper  reveals a रिक्त स्पेस on the विधेयक जब  pulled out .
In their replacement ,  और continuing the ऊँची माँग of इस denomination , the श्रेणी 2006a थी शुभारम्भ  retaining the previous design ( 1996-generation ) .
On April 24 , 2013 , the Federal Reserve announced  the नई $ 100 विधेयक होता डालें परिसंचरण on अक्तूबर 8 , 2013  .
King David in  robes of a बीज़ान्टिन सम्राट  .
miniature इससे  the Paris Psalter .
दाउद ( ; आईएसओ 259-3 dawid ; ' ; दमदार 's : daveed ) according to the यहूदी बाइबल , थी the  second king of the United Kingdom of Israel , and according to the New Testament Gospels of Matthew and Luke , an ancestor of Jesus .
His life is conventionally  दिनाँक to c. 1040–970 bce , उसके शासनकाल over यहूदा c. 1010–1002 bce ,  and his reign over the United Kingdom of Israel c. 1002–970 BCE .
The Books of Samuel , 1 Kings , and 1 Chronicles are the only  स्त्रोत of सूचना on दाउद , हालांकि the tel डान stele ( दिनाँक c. 850–835 bce ) contains the phrase ( bytdwd ) , पढ़ा as `` हाउस of दाउद '' , जिससे सबसे विद्वानों लो as पुष्टि of the अस्तित्व  in the mid-9th century BCE of a Judean royal dynasty called the House of David .
He  is चित्रित as a righteous किंग , हालांकि नहीं बगैर त्रुटियां , as खूब as an acclaimed योद्धा , संगीतकार , और कवि ,  traditionally credited for composing many of the psalms contained in the Book of Psalms .
David is  सेंट्रल to यहूदी , ईसाई , और इस्लामी doctrine  and culture .
Biblical tradition  maintains कि a सीधा वंशज of दाउद होगा be the मसीहा  .
In Islam he is  माना to be a नबी और  the king of a nation .
Kathmandu (  ; ) is the पूंजी और largest शहरी agglomerate  of Nepal .
The agglomerate consists of Kathmandu Metropolitan City at its  कोर , और इसके सिस्टर शहरों patan , kirtipur ,  Thimi , and Bhaktapur .
It also includes the recently recognized  शहरी क्षेत्रों of shankhapur , karyabinayak  , and Champapur .
Banepa , Dhulikhel , and Panauti are satellite  शहरी क्षेत्रों of काठमांडू स्तिथ बस बाहर the काठमांडू  valley .
Kathmandu  is भी ज्ञात informally as `` ktm '' or  the `` tri-city '' .
According to a census conducted in 2011 , Kathmandu  metropolis अलोन रै 975,453 निवासियों ; और the agglomerate रै a जनसांख्यिकी of अधिक than 2.5 लाख  inhabitants .
the महानगर नगर क्षेत्रफल is और रै a जनसांख्यिकी  density of 19,250 per km2 .
The city stands at an elevation of  लगभग in the bowl-shaped काठमांडू घाटी of सेंट्रल  Nepal .
It is surrounded by  चार प्रमुख kyu : shivapuri , phulchoki ,  Nagarjun , and Chandragiri .
Kathmandu Valley is part of three districts ( Kathmandu , Lalitpur ,  और भक्तपुर ) , रै the उच्चतम जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व in the देश , और is घर to परिचय a बारहवीं  of Nepal 's population .
दौरान rana और शाह eras , the नाम `` नेपाल '' referred तभी to the काठमांडू घाटी ; it  was what people who lived outside the valley called it .
During this  काल , अंग्रेजों इतिहासकारों पुकारा the घाटी itself `` नेपाल  Proper '' .
Today , Kathmandu is not  तभी the पूंजी of the संघीय लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of नेपाल , लकिन भी the मुख्यालय of the  Central Development Region of Nepal .
The  सेंट्रल प्रदेश comprises तीन zones :  Bagmati , Narayani , and Janakpur .
Kathmandu is  स्तिथ in the bagmati  Zone .
Kathmandu is  the गेटवे to पर्यटन  in Nepal .
It is also the nerve  बीच of the देश 's अर्थव्यवस्था  .
It has the most advanced infrastructure of any  शहरी क्षेत्रफल in नेपाल , और इसके अर्थव्यवस्था is केन्द्रित on पर्यटन , जिससे accounted लिये 3.8 % of नेपाल  's GDP in 1995–96 .
(  पर्यटन in काठमांडू अस्वीकृत thereafter दौरान a काल of राजनैतिक  unrest , but since then has improved . )
The city has a rich history , spanning nearly 2000  सालो , as inferred इससे inscriptions मिला in  the valley .
Religious and cultural festivities  रूप a प्रमुख भाग of the जीवनदान of लोगों residing  in Kathmandu .
सबसे of काठमांडू 's लोगों follow हिंदुत्व और अनेक अन्य  follow Buddhism .
There are people  of अन्य धार्मिक मान्यताओं as खूब , giving काठमांडू a  cosmopolitan culture .
नेपाली is the सबसे commonly बोला  language in the city .
Nepal  bhasa is the स्वदेशी भाषा बोला  by the Newar people .
Hindi is widely understood and English  is समझा by काठमांडू 's शिक्षित  residents .
The city 's  साक्षरता रेट is 98  % .
Kathmandu 's sister cities ( Lalitpur  patan ) और भक्तपुर हैं अभिन्न to काठमांडू 's सांस्कृतिक विरासत , पर्यटन उद्योग , और अर्थव्यवस्था ; इसलिए युनेस्को 's संसार विरासत साईट सूचियाँ सब तीन शहरों ' स्मारक  and attractions together under one heading , `` Kathmandu Valley- UNESCO World Heritage Site `` .
Field hockey , usually referred to simply as hockey , is a team sport of the hockey family  जिससे is निभाई between दो टीमों of ग्यारह खिलाड़ी साथ हॉकी sticks और a मुश्किल , ठोस  plastic ball .
At the turn of the 21st century , the game is played globally ,  साथ particular लोकप्रियता throughout यूरोपीय , एशिया , महासागरीय , और दक्षिण अमेरिका – in जोड to होने  the national sport of Pakistan and India .
The term `` field hockey '' is used primarily in Canada , the United  राज्य , और अन्य regions of the संसार जहाँ the खेल of बर्फ हॉकी is  more popular .
During play , goal keepers are the  तभी खिलाड़ी जो हैं अनुमत to टच the बॉल साथ कोई भाग of उनके देह ( साथ the एक्सेप्शन of a खिलाड़ी 's हाथ माना 'part of the स्टिक ' ) , साथ इस तभी applying भीतर the शूटिंग वृत्त (  also known as the D , or shooting arc , or just the circle ) , while field players play the ball with the flat side of their stick .
The  टोली कि स्कोर the सबसे लक्ष्य by the समाप्त of  the match wins .
If the score is  tied at the समाप्त of the खेल , either a चित्रण is घोषित or the खेल goes into अतिरिक्त समय and/or a दंड  shootout , depending on the competition 's format .
The governing body of hockey is the International Hockey Federation ( FIH ) , with men and women being represented internationally in  प्रतियोगिताओं सहित the ओलम्पिक खेल , राष्ट्रमंडल खेल , हॉकी संसार कप , champions ट्रॉफी और जूनियर हॉकी संसार कप , साथ अनेक देशों  running extensive junior , senior , and masters ' club competitions .
The FIH is also responsible for organising the  हॉकी नियम फलक और विकासशील the नियम लिये the  sport .
a लोकप्रिय रूपांतर of फ़ील्ड हॉकी is अंदर हॉकी , जिससे differs in a क्रमांक of respects  while embodying the primary principles of hockey .
Indoor  हॉकी is a 6-a-side रूपांतर , साथ a फ़ील्ड जिससे  is reduced to approximately 40m × 20m .
With many of the rules  बाकी the वही , सहित रुकावट और फीट , वहीँ हैं अनेक कुंजी विसंगतियाँ - खिलाड़ी may नहीं उठाएँ the बॉल जबतक शूटिंग on लक्ष्य , खिलाड़ी  may not hit the ball ( instead utilising pushes to transfer the ball ) , and the sidelines are replaced with solid barriers which the ball will rebound off .
Ethan `` Cane  '' ashby ( né एटकिन्सन ) is a fictional अक्षर इससे the अमरीकी  CBS soap opera The Young and the Restless .
He is portrayed by  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई कर्ता डेनियल गोडार्ड , जो originally auditioned लिये ब्रैड स्नाइडर on as the संसार turns लकिन थी अनुशंसित लिये a भूमिका on the यंग और  the Restless instead .
The role was to be  portrayed as an अमरीकी , लकिन गोडार्ड 's ऑस्ट्रेलियाई descent बहकावे the  character 's background .
Former head writer Lynn Marie Latham introduced him during the episode airing on January 12 , 2007 as an  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई बारटेंडर in ढूंढें of उसके परिवार , a डेब्यू कि प्राप्त a मिश्रित जवाब .
Latham created Cane as the son of Phillip  चांसलर ii ( donnelly rhodes ) और jill फोस्टर एबॉट ( जेस वाल्टन ) लकिन the अक्षर 's पृष्ठभूमि थी rewritten by मरिया एरिना  Bell in 2009 , reestablishing him as the son of Colin and Genevieve Atkinson ( Tristan Rogers and Genie Francis ) .
हालांकि characterized as `` रहस्यमय '' , cane is `` वफ़ादार और समर्पित '' , जबकि गोडार्ड वर्णित the अक्षर as  a `` typical Australian , working-class kind of guy '' .
He  थी the पहला सदस्य of the एटकिन्सन परिवार to appear on the श्रेणी , followed by  his parents and identical twin brother .
Soon after his  डेब्यू , he became a अग्रणी अक्षर , a निर्णय praised by दर्शक  and critics .
The character  रै महरूम शामिल साथ एम्बर मूर ( adrienne frantz ) , क्लो मिशेल ( एलिज़ाबेथ hendrickson  ) and most notably Lily Winters ( Christel Khalil ) , a romance that garnered significant fan attention .
In 2009 , Cane and  लिली यहूद शादीशुदा ; वैश्विक bc होता बाद कॉल लिली the  love of Cane 's life .
The pair  था दो children , चार्ली  and Mattie Ashby .
In  2011 , the कर्ता थी fired , और cane थी शॉट to मौत  onscreen .
However , Goddard was rehired soon after viewers campaigned  लिये उसके वापसी , revealing कि cane 's एकसमान जुड़वा bhai थी  in fact the man who died .
This sacrificed  उसके विवाह to लिली , लकिन the युगल यहूद remarried on वेलेंटाइन  's Day in 2012 .
Goddard has been  widely acclaimed लिये उसके portrayal ; canyon न्यूज कहा कि he portrays the अक्षर honestly , और is `` सदा  dependable , on fire and exciting '' .
John  क्रिस्टोफर `` जॉनी '' डेप ii ( born जून 9 , 1963 ) is an अमरीकी  actor , film producer , and musician .
He has won  the सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार और स्क्रीन अभिनेताओं  Guild award for Best Actor .
Depp rose to  prominence on the 1980s टेलीविज़न श्रेणी 21 जम्प गली , बनने a टीन  idol .
Dissatisfied with that status , Depp turned to film for more challenging roles ; he played the title character of the acclaimed Edward Scissorhands ( 1990 ) and later found box office success in  films ऐसे as sleepy खोखला ( 1999 ) , चार्ली और the चॉकलेट फैक्टरी ( 2005 ) , ऐलिस in वंडरलैंड ( 2010 ) , rango ( 2011 ) और the pirates of the caribbean फिल्मी श्रेणी (  2003–present ) .
He has collaborated with director  और dost टिम बर्टन in आठ films  ; the most recent being Dark Shadows ( 2012 ) .
Depp has gained acclaim for his portrayals of such people as Ed Wood in Ed Wood , Joseph D. Pistone in Donnie Brasco ,  शिकारी S. थॉम्पसन in भय और loathing in लास वेगास , जार्ज जंग in उड़ा , और the बैंको डाकू जॉन dillinger in माइकल  Mann 's Public Enemies .
Films  featuring डेप have grossed over $ 3.1 अरब  at the United States box office and over $ 7.6 billion worldwide .
He  रै महरूम मनोनीत लिये शीर्ष पुरस्कार अनेक टाइम्स , जीतना the बेहतरीन कर्ता पुरस्कार इससे the सुनहरी –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy ग्लोब्स –_motion_picture_musical_or_comedy  for Sweeney Todd : The Demon Barber of Fleet Street and from the Screen Actors Guild for Pirates of the Caribbean : The Curse of the Black Pearl .
He also has garnered a sex symbol status in  अमरीकी सिनेमा , होने twice नामित as the `` sexiest man जिंदा ``  by People magazine in 2003 and 2009 .
He has been listed in the 2012 Guinness Book of World  रिकॉर्ड as the उच्चतम सशुल्क कर्ता , साथ $  75 million .
The World Wide Web ( abbreviated as WWW or  w3 , commonly ज्ञात as the वेब ) , is a प्रणाली of interlinked हाइपरटेक्स्ट दस्तावेज़  accessed via the Internet .
With a web browser , one can view web pages that may contain text ,  बिंब , वीडियो , और अन्य मल्टीमीडिया , और navigate between उन्हें via hyperlinks  .
Using concepts from his earlier  हाइपरटेक्स्ट प्रणालियों जैसे enquire , अंग्रेजों इंजीनियर , कंप्यूटर वैज्ञानिक और at कि समय कर्मचारी of the cern , सर टिम berners-lee , अभी निदेशक of the संसार  Wide Web Consortium ( W3C ) , wrote a proposal in March 1989 for what would eventually become the World Wide Web .
At CERN , a European research organisation near Geneva straddling the border between France and Switzerland , Berners-Lee and Belgian computer scientist Robert Cailliau  प्रस्तावित in 1990 to उपयोग हाइपरटेक्स्ट `` to कड़ी और अभिगम सूचना of विभिन्न kinds as a वेब of नोड in जिससे the उपयोक्ता can ब्राउज़ at होगा '' , और वे सरेआम introduced the प्रोजेक्ट in दिसम्बर  of the same year .
Mark Travis John  सांचेज़ ( born नवम्बर 11 , 1986 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल क्वार्टरबैक लिये the नई यॉर्क jets of the नेशनल  Football League ( NFL ) .
He was  drafted in the पहला गोलाकार of the 2009 एनएफएल ड्राफ्ट as the पांचवां overall  selection by the Jets and the second quarterback taken overall .
he निभाई कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल at the विश्वविद्यालयों  of Southern California ( USC ) .
Sanchez grew up  in a well-disciplined और एथलेटिक परिवार  .
In the eighth grade ,  he began to खेल फ़ुटबॉल और सीख the intricacies of the क्वार्टरबैक स्थिति , प्रशिक्षण  with his father , Nick .
A well-regarded prospect , Sanchez committed to  दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया following उसके कामयाब ऊँची स्कूल करियर in जिससे he led उसके टोली to a चैंपियनशिप  title during his final season .
At USC , Sanchez was relegated as the backup quarterback during his first  तीन सालो हालांकि he रोज़ to prominence due to उसके ब्रैड दिखावे on the फ़ील्ड in 2007 due to चोटों  suffered by starting quarterback John David Booty .
Sanchez also became  लोकप्रिय भीतर the जातियाँ due to  his Mexican-American heritage .
Named  the प्रारंभ in 2008 , सांचेज़ led यूएससी to a 12–1 रिकार्ड और  won the Rose Bowl against Penn State for which Sanchez was awarded the Most Valuable Player award for his performance on offense .
Although many  माना उसे too अनुभवहीन , सांचेज़ घोषित उसके  intention to enter the 2009 NFL Draft .
He was selected by the Jets after  वे traded up साथ the क्लीवलैंड भूरा , और थी नामित the starting क्वार्टरबैक prior  to the start of the season .
Despite a subpar performance , Sanchez led the Jets to the AFC Championship Game , a losing effort to the Indianapolis Colts ,  बनने the चौथी रुकी क्वार्टरबैक in एनएफएल इतिहास to जीत उसके पहला playoff खेल और the दूसरी to जीत दो  playoff games .
In his second season , Sanchez  जारी to develop और led the jets to the playoffs और the टोली 's दूसरी लगातार afc चैंपियनशिप खेल जहाँ वे narrowly खोया to the पिट्सबर्ग  Steelers , 24–19 .
With the win over the New England  देशप्रेमी the सप्ताह prior , सांचेज़ tied चार अन्य quarterbacks लिये the दूसरी सबसे  post-season road victories by a quarterback in NFL history .
In leading the Jets to two consecutive  सम्मेलन championships , सांचेज़ joined क्वार्टरबैक बेन roethlisberger as the तभी दो quarterbacks in एनएफएल इतिहास to पहुँचें the सम्मेलन चैंपियनशिप  in their first two seasons in the league .
The next two seasons would be  a स्लोप लिये दोनो the टोली और सांचेज़  as they failed to reach the playoffs .
Fans  और मीडिया आलोचकों पुकारा लिये a struggling  Sanchez to be benched .
He  आखिरकार थी replaced towards  the end of the 2012 season with Greg McElroy .
Paul Avery ( April 2 , 1934December 10 , 2000 ) was an American  पुलिस रिपोर्टर , बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके कहानियां on the infamous सीरियल कातिल ज्ञात as the zodiac , और बाद लिये उसके कार्य on the पेट्रीसिया hearst  kidnapping .
A  छोटी submersible ac sump पंप साथ  a garden hose connector
A sump pump is a pump used to remove  जल कि रै संचित in a जल collecting sump जलाशय , commonly  found in the basement of homes .
The water may enter via the perimeter  नालों of a तहखाने waterproofing प्रणाली , funneling into the जलाशय or क्युकी of बरसात or प्राकृतिक मैदान जल , if the तहखाने  is below the water table level .
Sump  पंपों हैं प्रयुक्त जहाँ तहखाने बाढ़ happens regularly और to उपाय dampness जहाँ the  water table is above the foundation of a home .
Sump pumps send water away from a  हाउस to कोई प्लेस जहाँ it is no longer समस्यापूर्ण , ऐसे as a नगरपालिका तूफ़ान नाली or  a dry well .
Pumps may discharge to the  sanitary सीवर in पुरानी संस्थापना  .
Once considered acceptable , this practice  may अभी violate the plumbing कोड or नगरपालिका bylaws , क्युकी it can overwhelm the नगरपालिका मलजल उपचार  system .
Municipalities urge homeowners to disconnect  और reroute sump पंप निर्वहन दूर इससे sanitary  sewers .
जुर्माना may be imposed लिये  noncompliance .
अनेक homeowners have inherited उनके sump पंप configurations और do नहीं एहसास कि  the pump discharges to the sewer .
If the  निर्वहन is खिलाया to a laundry डूबना in the तहखाने  , it 's likely going to the sewer .
Usually hardwired into a home 's electrical system  , sump पंपों may have a बैटरी बैकअप  .
The home 's pressurized water supply powers some  पंपों , eliminating the need लिये विद्युत at the व्यय of using potable जल , potentially बनाना उन्हें अधिक महंगी  to operate than electrical pumps and creating an additional water disposal problem .
Since a sump basin may overflow if not constantly  उत्तेजित , a बैकअप प्रणाली is महत्वपूर्ण लिये मामले जब the प्रमुख शक्ति is आउट लिये prolonged अवधि  of time , as during a severe storm .
There  हैं generally दो प्रकार  of sump pumps — pedestal and submersible .
The pedestal pump 's motor  is आरोहित ऊपर the sump , जहाँ it is अधिक easily सर्विस , लकिन  is also more conspicuous .
The pump impeller is driven by a long ,  लंबवत एक्सटेंशन शाफ्ट और the impeller is in a स्क्रॉल आवास  in the base of the pump .
The submersible  पंप is entirely आरोहित अंदर the sump , और is विशेषकर sealed  to prevent electrical short circuits .
Sump pump systems  हैं भी utilized in औद्योगिक और वाणिज्यिक अनुप्रयोग to कंट्रोल जल  table -related problems in surface soil .
An artesian  aquifer or आवधिक ऊँची जल तालिका हालात can कारण the मैदान  to become unstable due to water saturation .
As long as  the पंप कृत्यों , the सतह  soil will remain stable .
ये sumps हैं typically टेन फीट in गहराई or अधिक ; lined साथ corrugated मेटल  pipe that contains perforations or drain holes throughout .
They may include electronic control systems with  विज़ुअल और audible सचेतक और हैं प्रायः covered to prevent मलबा और पशु इससे गिरना  in .
Bleeding Kansas , Bloody Kansas or the Border War , was a series of violent political confrontations involving  anti-slavery free-staters और pro-slavery `` किनारा ruffian `` तत्व , कि took प्लेस in the कान्सास territory और the  neighboring towns of Missouri between 1854 and 1861 .
At the heart of the  विरोध थी the सवाल of whether कान्सास होता डालें the संघ as a फ़्री राज्य or स्लेव राज्य  .
As such , Bleeding Kansas was a  प्रॉक्सी युद्ध between northerners और southerners over the समस्या  of slavery in the United States .
The term `` Bleeding Kansas '' was coined by Horace  greeley of the नई यॉर्क ट्रिब्यून ; the कार्यक्रम it encompasses  directly presaged the American Civil War .
Congress had long  struggled to संतुलन the रूचि of pro-slavery शक्तियां और anti-slavery  forces .
The events later known as Bleeding  कान्सास यहूद नियत into गति by the kansas–nebraska अधिनियम of 1854 , जिससे nullified the मिसौरी सुलह और बजाय implemented the अवधारणा  of popular sovereignty .
An  ostensibly लोकतांत्रिक विचार , लोकप्रिय प्रभुता stated कि the निवासियों of प्रत्येक territory or  state should decide whether it would be a free or slave state ; however , this resulted in immigration en masse to Kansas by activists from both sides .
At one point , Kansas had two separate  सरकारें , प्रत्येक साथ इसके अपना संविधान , हालांकि तभी एक थी federally  recognized .
On  जनवरी 29 , 1861 , कान्सास थी admitted to the संघ as a फ़्री राज्य , कम than तीन महीने पहले the बैटल of  Fort Sumter which began the Civil War .
Benzene is an organic  रासायनिक यौगिक साथ the आणविक सूत्र c6 h|hydrogen|h6  .
Its molecule is  रचित of 6 कार्बन अणु joined in a रिंग , साथ 1 हाइड्रोजन  atom attached to each carbon atom .
क्युकी इसके अणुओं contain तभी कार्बन और  hydrogen atoms , benzene is classed as a hydrocarbon .
Benzene is  a प्राकृतिक constituent of crude आयल , और is एक of the सबसे मौलिक  petrochemicals .
Benzene is an aromatic  हाइड्रोकार्बन और the दूसरी [ n ] - annulene ( [ 6 ] -annulene ) , a चक्रीय हाइड्रोकार्बन साथ  a continuous pi bond .
It is  sometimes abbreviated ph –h . बेंजीन is a colorless  and highly flammable liquid with a sweet smell .
It is mainly used as a  precursor to भारी रसायन , ऐसे as ethylbenzene और cumene , जिससे हैं उत्पादित on a अरब  kilogram scale .
Because it has a high octane number , it is an  महत्वपूर्ण घटक of गैसोलीन , composing a few प्रतिशत of इसके द्रव्यमान  .
Most  non-industrial अनुप्रयोग have महरूम सीमित  by benzene 's carcinogenicity .
giovanni virginio स्क्यापारेल्ली ( ; 14 कूच 1835 – 4 जुलाई 1910  ) was an Italian astronomer and science historian .
Wii  homebrew refers to the reuse of निन्टेंडो 's वी खेल कंसोल to  run software that has not been authorized by Nintendo .
it achieves इस by defeating the वी 's नक़ल सुरक्षा और  code signing measures .
In more general  शर्तें , वी homebrew refers to the उपयोग of the वी 's हार्डवेयर , accessories और तन्त्र लिये उद्देश्य  outside those intended by the manufacturer .
Original efforts  केन्द्रित on using the वी रिमोट as a इंगित यंत्र on अन्य ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों , or कार्यशील  web-based games in the built-in web browser .
Subsequent developments in games exploits , such as the `` Twilight hack `` ,  `` bannerbomb '' और इसके बाद अवतार `` letterbomb '' , `` तोड़ स्टेक '' , `` इंडियाना pwns '' , `` yu-gi-owned '' , `` bathaxx '' , और `` वापसी of the  Jodi '' , made installing the `` Homebrew Channel `` possible .
Hadley ( right )  discussing the 2006 israel-lebanon संकट  with Bush and Rice .
Stephen John Hadley ( born  फ़रवरी 13 , 1947 ) थी the 21st u.S. सहायक to the अध्यक्ष लिये नेशनल सुरक्षा अफेयर्स ( commonly referred as नेशनल सुरक्षा सलाहकार ) ,  serving under President George W. Bush .
Take identical growing plants and  दे उर्वरक to हाफ of उन्हें  .
If there are differences  between the निषेचित संयंत्र समूह और the unfertilized `` कंट्रोल '' समूह , ये मतभेद may  be due to the fertilizer .
A scientific  कंट्रोल is an प्रयोग or अवलोकन designed to  minimize the effects of variables other than the single independent variable .
This increases the  विश्वसनीयता of the परिणाम , प्रायः through a तुलना between  control measurements and the other measurements .
Scientific  नियंत्रण हैं a भाग of the  scientific method .
For example , during drug testing , scientists will try to control two groups to keep  उन्हें as एकसमान as संभावित , तब allow एक समूह to कोशिश the ड्रग  .
Another example might be testing plant fertilizer by giving it to only half the plants in a garden :  the पौधे कि प्राप्त no उर्वरक हैं the कंट्रोल समूह , क्युकी वे स्थापित the बेसलाइन स्तर of विकास कि the fertilizer-treated पौधे होगा  be compared against .
Without a control group ,  the प्रयोग can नहीं determine whether the fertilizer-treated  plants grow more than they would have if untreated .
Ideally , all variables in an experiment  होगा be नियंत्रित ( accounted लिये by the कंट्रोल माप ) और none होगा  be uncontrolled .
In such an experiment ,  if सब the नियंत्रण कार्य as अपेक्षित , it is संभावित to conclude कि  the experiment is working as intended and that the results of the experiment are due to the effect of the variable being tested .
That is , scientific controls allow an  अन्वेषक to मेक a अर्जी जैसे `` दो परिस्थितियों यहूद एकसमान जबतक फ़ैक्टर x occurred  .
Since factor X is the only difference between  the दो परिस्थितियों , the नई निष्कर्ष थी  caused by factor X . ''
< <  रासायनिक तत्व आंकड़ा सन्दर्भ
John Adams ( October 30 , 1735 ( O.S . October 19 , 1735 )  – जुलाई 4 , 1826 ) थी the दूसरी अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1797–1801 ) , having पहले परोसा as the पहला वाइस अध्यक्ष of  the United States .
An American  founding पिता , he थी a statesman , राजनयिक , और a अग्रणी एडवोकेट of अमरीकी स्वतंत्रता  from Great Britain .
Well educated , he was an Enlightenment political theorist who promoted republicanism and wrote  prolifically परिचय उसके प्रायः seminal विचार , दोनो in प्रकाशित works और in अक्षर to उसके बीवी और कुंजी adviser अबीगैल as खूब as to अन्य  Founding Fathers .
Adams came to  prominence in the जल्दी चरण of the अमरीकी क्रान्ति  .
A lawyer and  पब्लिक फिगर in बोस्टन , as a प्रतिनिधि इससे मैसाचुसेट्स to the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस , he निभाई  a leading role in persuading Congress to declare independence .
He assisted Thomas Jefferson in drafting the Declaration of  स्वतंत्रता in 1776 , और थी इसके प्राथमिक एडवोकेट in the कॉंग्रेस  .
Later , as a diplomat in Europe , he  helped negotiate the eventual सलाम सन्धि साथ ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , और थी जिम्मेदार लिये obtaining vital सरकारी लोन इससे  Amsterdam bankers .
A political theorist  और इतिहासकार , एडम्स largely लिखा the मैसाचुसेट्स संविधान in 1780 , जिससे साथ साथ उसके पहले विचार on सरकारी  , influenced American political thought .
One of his greatest roles was as a judge of character : in 1775 , he nominated George  वॉशिंगटन to be commander-in-chief , और 25 सालो बाद मनोनीत जॉन मार्शल to be मुख्य इंसाफ of the  United States .
Adams ' revolutionary credentials  secured उसे दो शर्तें as जार्ज वॉशिंगटन 's वाइस अध्यक्ष और उसके अपना चुनाव in 1796 as the दूसरी अध्यक्ष  .
During his one term ,  he encountered ferocious हमले by the jeffersonian republicans , as खूब as the प्रबल गुट in उसके अपना federalist  Party led by his bitter enemy Alexander Hamilton .
Adams signed the controversial Alien and Sedition Acts , and built up the army and navy  विशेषकर in the फेस of an undeclared नवल युद्ध ( पुकारा the `` quasi-war `` ) साथ फ़्रांस  , 1798–1800 .
The major  accomplishment of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी थी उसके शांतिपूर्ण रेज़ोल्यूशन of the विरोध in the फेस  of Hamilton 's opposition .
In  1800 , एडम्स थी पराजित लिये re-election by थामस  Jefferson and retired to Massachusetts .
He  बाद resumed उसके दोस्ती साथ  Jefferson .
He and his  बीवी , अबीगैल एडम्स , संस्थापित an संपन्नता परिवार लकीर of राजनेता  , diplomats , and historians now referred to as the Adams political family .
Adams was the  पिता of जॉन क्विंसी एडम्स , the छठे  President of the United States .
His achievements have received greater recognition in  आधुनिक टाइम्स , हालांकि उसके योगदान यहूद नहीं initially as मनाये  as those of other Founders .
Adams was the first U.S. president to  reside in the भवन कि आखिरकार became ज्ञात as the  White House .
A Watt  भाप इंजन .
the भाप इंजन , fuelled primarily by कोयले , propelled the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति  in Great Britain and the world .
The Industrial Revolution was the  परिवर्तन to नई निर्माण प्रक्रियाओं कि occurred in the काल इससे परिचय 1760 to  some time between 1820 and 1840 .
This transition included going from hand production methods to  मशीने , नई रासायनिक निर्माण और आयरन उत्पादन प्रक्रियाओं , improved दक्षता of जल शक्ति , the increasing उपयोग of भाप शक्ति और विकास  of machine tools .
The transition also included the  बदलें इससे लकडी और अन्य bio-fuels to कोयले  .
The Industrial  क्रान्ति began in ब्रिटेन और भीतर a few दशकों स्प्रेड to पश्चिमी यूरोपीय  and the United States .
The Industrial Revolution marks  a प्रमुख turning पाइंट in इतिहास ; लगभग प्रत्येक पहलू of रोज़ जीवन थी  influenced in some way .
Most notably ,  औसत आय और जनसांख्यिकी began to प्रदर्शनी unprecedented  sustained growth .
In the words of Nobel Prize winner Robert E. Lucas , Jr. , `` For the  पहला समय in इतिहास , the जीना मानकों of the masses of ordinary लोगों have begun to undergo sustained विकास ... nothing remotely जैसे इस आर्थिक बर्ताव is उल्लेखित  by the classical economists , even as a theoretical possibility . ''
विलियम घंटी स्कॉट आयरन और  Coal , 1855-60
The period of time  covered by the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति varies साथ अलग  historians .
Eric  hobsbawm आयोजित कि it 'broke आउट ' in ब्रिटेन in the 1780s और थी नहीं fully लगा जबतक the 1830s or 1840s , जबकि  T. S. Ashton held that it occurred roughly between 1760 and 1830 .
Some 20th-century historians such  as जॉन clapham और निकोलस crafts have argued कि the प्रक्रम of आर्थिक और सोशल बदलें took प्लेस धीरे और  the term revolution is a misnomer .
This is still a  विषय of बहस among इतिहासकारों  .
GDP per capita  थी broadly stable पहले the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति और the emergence  of the modern capitalist economy .
The Industrial Revolution  began an era of per-capita आर्थिक विकास  in capitalist economies .
Economic  इतिहासकारों हैं in अनुबंध कि the onset of the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति is the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण इवेंट in the इतिहास  of humanity since the domestication of animals and plants .
The First Industrial Revolution evolved into the Second Industrial Revolution in the transition years between 1840 and  1870 , जब technological और आर्थिक प्रगति gained आवेग साथ the increasing अपनाना of steam-powered नौकाएँ , जहाजों और रेल , the विशाल स्केल manufacture of यंत्र टूल्स और  the increasing use of steam powered factories .
जूलियट annmarie huddy ( born सितंबर 27 , 1969 ) , is an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न न्यूज रिपोर्टर  , currently appearing on Fox News Channel .
This  सूची बाँधने u.S. शहरों by जमीन क्षेत्रफल ( नहीं सहित  bodies of water ) .
Total areas  ( सहित जल ) हैं भी दिए , लकिन नोट कि , जब क्रमित  by total area , a number of coastal cities appear disproportionately `` larger '' .
San  फ्रांसिस्को is an चरम उदाहरण ; जल makes  up nearly 80 % of its total area of 232 square miles ( 601 km2 ) .
Note also that in many cases a  नगर may be geographically विशाल primarily क्युकी इसके नगरपालिका सरकारी  has merged with the government of the surrounding county .
In some cases the county no longer exists , while in others the arrangement has formed  a संचित city–county ( or city- बरो in अलास्का , or city- मोहल्ला in louisiana )  .

The large intestine ( or bowel , colon ) is the  पिछला भाग of the digestive प्रणाली in vertebrate  animals .
Its function is to absorb  जल इससे the बाकी indigestible खाना पदार्थ , और तब to pass व्यर्थ बर्बाद सामग्री इससे  the body .
This article is primarily about the human  आंत , हालांकि the सूचना परिचय इसके प्रक्रियाओं हैं सीधे  applicable to most mammals .
the विशाल आंत consists of  the cecum , rectum and anal canal .
It starts  in the सही iliac प्रदेश of the pelvis , बस at or नीचे the सही कमर  , where it is joined to the bottom end of the small intestine .
From here it continues up the abdomen , then across the width of the  abdominal गुहा , और तब it turns bas , continuing to इसके endpoint at the गुदा  .
The large intestine is about long , which is about  one-fifth of the पूरे लंबाई of the intestinal कनाल  .
In Terminologia Anatomica the large intestine includes the  cecum , कोलन , मलाशय , और गुदा कनाल .
however , कुछ स्त्रोत exclude  the anal canal .
The Green Bay Packers are an American  फ़ुटबॉल टोली आधारित in ग्रीन खाड़ी , विस्कॉन्सिन  .
They are members of the North Division of the National  फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग  ( NFL ) .
Green  खाड़ी is the third-oldest मताधिकार in the एनएफएल , having  been organized and playing in 1919 .
The  पैकर्स हैं the तभी non-profit , community-owned प्रमुख लीग पेशेवर  sports team in the United States .
The Packers are the last vestige  of `` छोटी कस्बा टीमों '' कि यहूद एकबार आम in  the NFL during the 1920s and 1930s .
Founded in 1919 by Earl `` Curly '' Lambeau ( hence the name Lambeau Field on which the team plays ) and George  व्हिटनी calhoun , the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स can ट्रेस उनके lineage to अन्य semi-professional टीमों in ग्रीन खाड़ी डेटिंग  back to 1896 .
In 1919 and 1920 the Packers competed as a  semi-professional फ़ुटबॉल टोली विरूद्ध क्लब इससे around  Wisconsin and the Midwest .
They joined the  अमरीकी पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल संघ ( apfa ) in 1921  , the forerunner to what is known today as the National Football League ( NFL ) .
Although Green Bay is the last NFL ``  छोटी कस्बा '' टोली , इसके लोकल प्रशंसक आधार और मीडिया extends into आसपास मिल्वौकी ; the टोली भी निभाई चयनित घर  games there between 1933 and 1994 .
The  ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स have जीती 13 लीग championships ( अधिक than कोई अन्य टोली in the एनएफएल ) , सहित नौ एनएफएल championships prior to the सुपर कटोरी era और चार सुपर कटोरी victories  —in 1967 ( Super Bowl I ) , 1968 ( Super Bowl II ) , 1997 ( Super Bowl XXXI ) and 2011 ( Super Bowl XLV ) .
The Packers have  long-standing , कड़वा rivalries साथ उनके nfc उत्तर ( formerly the nfc सेंट्रल ) प्रतिद्वंद्वियों  , the Chicago Bears , Minnesota Vikings and the Detroit Lions .
The Bears-Packers  फंसने is एक of the oldest rivalries in एनएफएल इतिहास  , dating back to 1921 .
The San Fernando  घाटी ( locally ज्ञात as `` the घाटी '' ) is an urbanized घाटी स्तिथ in the लॉस एंजिल्स महानगर क्षेत्रफल of दक्षिणी कैलिफ़ोर्निया , संयुक्त  States , defined by the mountains of the Transverse Ranges circling it .
Home to 1.76 million  लोगों , it झूठ उत्तर of the larger और अधिक  populous Los Angeles Basin .
Nearly two  तिहाई of the घाटी 's जमीन क्षेत्रफल is भाग of the नगर  of Los Angeles .
The other incorporated cities in the valley are Glendale  , burbank , सैन फर्नांडो , छुपा पहाड़ियाँ और  Calabasas .

The World of Coca-Cola ,  is a स्थाई प्रदर्शनी featuring the इतिहास of the coca-cola  Company .
Its well-known advertising as well as a host of entertainment areas and attractions , and is located  in अटलांटा , जॉर्जिया ( जहाँ the कम्पनी 's मुख्यालय हैं स्तिथ ) at pemberton प्लेस ( नामित in सम्मान of जॉन pemberton , the आविष्कारक of coca-cola ) .
as  भाग of जॉर्जिया 's  museums .
the complex located across Baker  गली इससे centennial ओलम्पिक पार्क कि is घर to the  Georgia Aquarium and future Center for Civil & Human Rights .
It opened to the public on May 24 , 2007 , relocating from  और replacing the असली प्रदर्शनी  .
Pretties is a  2005 विज्ञान fiction अनोखा और the दूसरी किताब of the  Uglies Trilogy written by Scott Westerfeld .
It is set  in a भविष्य dystopian संसार in जिससे everyone is turned `` pretty '' by चरम कॉस्मेटिक  surgery upon reaching age 16 .
It tells  the स्टोरी of किशोरावस्था टैली youngblood जो विद्रोहियों विरूद्ध  society 's enforced conformity .
Susan Leigh Vaughan Smith ( born September 26 ,  1971 ) is an अमरीकी स्त्री sentenced to जीवन in थाना लिये murdering  her children .
Born in Union , South  कैरोलिना , और a पूर्व छात्र of the विश्वविद्यालयों of दक्षिण कैरोलिना संघ , वो थी convicted on जुलाई 22 , 1995 लिये murdering उसके दो बेटे , 3-year-old माइकल  Daniel Smith , born October 10 , 1991 , and 14-month-old Alexander Tyler Smith , born August 5 , 1993 .
The  मामला gained विश्वव्यापी ध्यान shortly बाद it विकसित , due to उसके claiming कि  a black man stole her car and kidnapped her sons .
वो बाद claimed कि वो suffered इससे दिमागी स्वास्थ्य मुद्दे कि  impaired her judgment .
According to the South Carolina Department of Corrections , Smith will be eligible for  पैरोल on नवम्बर 4 , 2024 , बाद सेवारत a  minimum of thirty years .
She is incarcerated  at दक्षिण कैरोलिना 's leath correctional  Institution , near Greenwood .
Mount McKinley ( also known as Denali taken from the Inuit Koyukon  athabaskan भाषा अर्थ `` the ग्रेट एक '' ) is the उच्चतम पहाड़ शिखर in the संयुक्त राज्य और in उत्तर  America with a summit elevation of above sea level .
at कुछ , the आधार to शिखर वृद्धि is माना the largest of  any mountain situated entirely above sea level .
Measured by  स्थलाकृतिक prominence , it is the तीसरा  most prominent peak after Mount Everest and Aconcagua .
स्तिथ in the अलास्का दायरा in the आंतरिक of us राज्य of अलास्का  , it is the centerpiece of Denali National Park and Preserve .
The first European to document sighting  the पहाड़ थी जार्ज वैंकूवर in 1794  .
in 1903 , जेम्स wickersham अंकित the पहला attempt at चढ़ाई mckinley  which was unsuccessful .
In 1906 , Frederick  कुक claimed the पहला ascent जिससे थी  later proven to be false .
The first verifiable ascent to McKinley 's summit  थी हासिल on जून 7 , 1913 by चढना हडसन stuck , हैरी karstens , वाल्टर हार्पर , और रॉबर्ट  Tatum .
In 1951 , Bradford  washburn pioneered the वेस्ट buttress रूट माना to be the safest और  easiest route and therefore the most popular currently in use .
The Honda  s600 is an ऑटोमोबाइल manufactured by  Honda .
It was  शुभारम्भ in कूच  1964 .
Available as a roadster – bearing strong resemblance to  the होंडा s500 – और as a fastback coupé – introduced in कूच 1965 – the s600  was the first Honda available in two trim levels .
During its production run up to 1966 , the  मॉडल स्टाइलिंग होता remain pretty much the वही , साथ the सबसे notable परिवर्तन coming to the सामने grille , बम्पर , और headlights  .
Powered by a DOHC , water-cooled ,  four-cylinder इनलाइन इंजन साथ चार carburetors , the इंजन  capacity was increased to 606 cc from the S500 's 531 cc .
The  इंजन उत्पादित at 8,500 आरपीएम और था  a top speed of .
With the convertible weighing in at mere , the extra  चादर मेटल of the कूप तभी added to the overall वज़न  .
Suspension  थी स्वतंत्र साथ sealed रोलर कड़ी  drive to each rear wheel .
the s600 थी the पहला द्रव्यमान  marketed Honda car .
First offered only in right-hand drive , it soon became  उपलब्धियाँ in left-hand ड्राइव to अपील to निर्यात  markets .
There were a few  pre-production s500s manufactured in बाएँ हाथ  drive , two or three even being shown in some early sales brochures .
Both the S600 roadster and coupé were available in standard trim and a special , upgraded package called the SM600 which included , among other items , special paint colors , exclusive badging , a  मानक रेडियो और स्पीकर , a खास एंटीना in the यात्री पक्ष सूर्य छज्जा , मानक reversing लाइट्स , a मानक सिगरेट हल्का , a मानक हीटर , बेहतर cushioned सीटे , और a detachable सीट track लिये जल्दी हटाना of the  passenger seat .
Honda built 3,912 roadsters in 1964 ,  साथ उत्पादन चढ़ाई to 7,261 convertibles और 1,519 coupes  in 1965 .
Production dropped off in 1966 ( as they were shifting to the  s800 ) साथ तभी 111 roadsters और 281 coupes , giving tallies of 11,284 convertibles और 1,800 coupes लिये the 3 साल स्पैन .
everybody hates क्रिस is an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न काल sitcom कि depicts the teenage अनुभवों of हास्य क्रिस चट्टान  ( who is also the narrator ) while growing up in the Bedford-Stuyvesant neighborhood of Brooklyn , New York .
The show is set between 1983 and 1987 ; however , Rock  खुद थी a किशोरावस्था between 1978 और 1983  .
Rock grew up with a boy named Kenny  montero , जिसको he रै प्रायः referred to as the प्रेरणा  for a lot of the episodes .
In  अनेक साक्षात्कार , चट्टान रै वर्णित केनी as  the reason he got into comedy in the first place .
The show 's title  parodies the सीबीएस sitcom everybody loves रेमंड  .
Rock stated  : `` everybody loves रेमंड लकिन everybody  Hates Chris ! `` .
The show 's lead actors are  टायलर जेम्स विलियम्स , टेरी क्रू , tichina अर्नाल्ड , tequan रिचमंड , imani हकीम  , and Vincent Martella .
In Fall 2008 , the  the cw स्थानांतरित everybody hates क्रिस और the खेल  to the Friday night death slot .
The  चौथी ऋतु of the श्रेणी premiered शुक्रवार , अक्तूबर 3 , 2008 , at 8:00pm  Eastern/7:00PM Central .
on may 21 , 2009 , the cw घोषित कि it था  cancelled Everybody Hates Chris .
Prior to this , executive producer Chris  चट्टान घोषित कि the समाप्त of ऋतु 4 matched up साथ उसके अपना past—dropping आउट of ऊँची स्कूल  to become a comedian—and that it was time to end the show .
Pleural effusion is  excess द्रव कि accumulates between the दो pleural परतों , the fluid-filled स्पेस कि surrounds  the lungs .
Excessive  amounts of ऐसे द्रव can impair श्वास by  limiting the expansion of the lungs during ventilation .
Beowulf ( ; in Old English or ) is the conventional title of an Old English heroic epic poem consisting of 3182  alliterative long लाइनों , नियत in scandinavia , commonly cited as एक of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण works of anglo-saxon साहित्य  .
It survives  in a सिंगल पाण्डुलिपि ज्ञात as the nowell  Codex .
Its composition by an  बेनाम anglo-saxon कवि is दिनाँक between the 8th  and the early 11th century .
In 1731 , the manuscript was badly damaged by a fire that swept through a building housing a  संग्रहण of मध्यकालीन पांडुलिपियों समवेत by सर रॉबर्ट ब्रूस कपास  .
The poem fell into obscurity for decades , and  इसके अस्तित्व किया नहीं become widely ज्ञात again जबतक it थी मुद्रित in 1815 in an संस्करण prepared  by the Icelandic-Danish scholar Grímur Jónsson Thorkelin .
In the poem , Beowulf , a hero of the Geats in Scandinavia , comes to the help  of hroðgar , the किंग of the danes , जिनकी मीड हॉल ( in heorot ) रै महरूम अंतर्गत आक्रमण by a दानव ज्ञात as  Grendel .
After Beowulf slays  उसे , grendel 's माँ हमले the हॉल  and is then also defeated .
विजयी , बियोवुल्फ़ goes घर to geatland in स्वीडन  and later becomes king of the Geats .
After a period of fifty years has passed ,  बियोवुल्फ़ defeats a ड्रैगन , लकिन is fatally wounded in the बैटल .
After his  मौत , उसके सेवकों दफनाने उसे in a tumulus ,  a burial mound , in Geatland .
Shem  हैम और japheth by जेम्स  Tissot 1904 .
Shem ( ; Sēm ; Arabic  : sām ; ge'ez : ሴም , sēm ; `` renown ; समृद्धि ; नाम '' ) थी एक of the बेटे of नूह in  the Hebrew Bible as well as in Islamic literature .
He is most popularly  regarded as the ज्येष्ठ बेटे , हालांकि कुछ परंपराओं लिहाज़ उसे as the दूसरी  son .
Genesis 10:21 refers to  सापेक्ष आयु of shem और उसके bhai japheth , लकिन साथ sufficient ambiguity  to have yielded different translations .
The verse is translated  in the kjv as `` unto shem भी , the पिता of सब the children of eber , the bhai of japheth the elder ,  even to him were children born . `` .
However , the New American Standard Bible gives , `` Also to  shem , the पिता of सब the children of eber , और the पुरानी bhai of japheth , children यहूद born  . ''
Genesis 11:10 records that Shem was still 100 years old at the birth of Arphaxad , ( but nearly 101 - see Chronology  नोट , ) दो सालो बाद the बाढ़ , बनाना उसे मुश्किल 99 at the समय the बाढ़ began ; और कि he जिया लिये another 500 सालो बाद इस , बनाना  his age at death 600 years .
The children of Shem were Elam  , asshur , arphaxad , lud , और aram , in जोड to  daughters .
Abraham , the patriarch  of the hebrews और arabs , थी एक of the वंशजों of arphaxad  .
Islamic literature  describes shem as एक of the believing बेटे  of Noah .
Some sources even identify Shem as a  नबी in उसके अपना सही और कि he थी the अगला नबी बाद उसके  father .
In one Muslim legend , Shem was  एक of the लोगों कि परमेश्वर बना यीशु उठाएगा  as a sign to the Children of Israel .
The 1st century historian Flavius Josephus ,  among अनेक अन्य , recounted the परंपरा कि ये पाँच बेटे यहूद the progenitors of the राष्ट्र of ईलम , assyria , chaldea  , Lydia , and Syria , respectively .
Semitic is still a commonly used term for the Semitic languages , as a subset of the  afro-asiatic भाषाएं , denoting the आम भाषाई विरासत of अरबी , aramaic , अक्कादी , ethiopic , यहूदी और  Phoenician languages .
According to some Jewish traditions ( e.g. , B. Talmud Nedarim 32b ; Genesis Rabbah 46:7 ; Genesis Rabbah 56:10 ; Leviticus Rabbah  25:6 ; संख्याएँ rabbah 4:8 . ) , shem is believed to have महरूम melchizedek , किंग of सलेम जिसको अब्राहम is अंकित to have मिले बाद the बैटल of the चार किंग्स  .
In a few of the many  extra-biblical स्त्रोत कि describe उसे ,  Shem is also credited with killing Nimrod , son of Cush .
Shem is mentioned in Genesis 5:32 , 6:10 ; 7:13 ;  9:18,23,26-27 ; 10 ; 11:10 ; भी in 1 क्रॉनिकल्स 1:4  .
Geographic  identifications of flavius josephus , c. 100 ad ; japheth 's बेटे दिखाया in रेड , हैम 's बेटे in ब्लू , shem 's बेटे  in green .
Go Daddy or Go Daddy  समूह inc. is a privately आयोजित कम्पनी कि is primarily an  internet domain registrar and web hosting company .
Go Daddy Group Inc.  दायर लिये an ipo in 2006 , लकिन बाद रद्द it , due to `` मार्केट uncertainties  '' .
In addition to domain registration and hosting  go पापा भी बिकता e-business सम्बन्धित तन्त्र और सेवाएं  .
On June 24 , 2011 , The Wall Street Journal  reported कि private-equity firms केकेआर और चांदी झील साझेदार , साथ साथ a तीसरा निवेशकों , यहूद nearing a सौदे to  buy the company for between $ 2–2.5 billion .
On July 1 , 2011 Go Daddy confirmed that KKR ,  चांदी झील साझेदार और प्रौद्योगिकी क्रॉसओवर ventures था बंद the सौदे  .
Although the purchase price was not officially  घोषित it थी reported to be $ 2.25 अरब , लिये 65 % of the कम्पनी  .
, bob पार्सन्स था ceded the सीईओ भूमिका of go  Daddy to Warren Adelman , who had been with the company for about 10 years .
The  andorran कोट of बाहें at the  Andorran parliament .
Andorra ( ; , ) , officially the  principality of अंडोरा ( ) , भी पुकारा the principality of the घाटियों of अंडोरा , ( ) , is a landlocked microstate in southwestern यूरोपीय , स्तिथ in  the eastern Pyrenees mountains and bordered by Spain and France .
It is the sixth  smallest स्वदेश in यूरोपीय , having an क्षेत्रफल  of and an estimated population of 85,000 in 2012 .
Its capital , Andorra la Vella , is the highest  पूंजी नगर in यूरोपीय , at an उन्नयन of ऊपर समुद्र स्तर  .
The official language is Catalan ,  हालांकि स्पेनी , पुर्तगाली , और फ्रेंच हैं भी  commonly spoken .
निर्मित अंतर्गत a चार्टर in 988 , the उपस्थित principality  was formed in 1278 .
It is known  as a principality as it is a साम्राज्य headed by दो co-princes – the बिशप  of Urgell and the President of France .
Andorra is a prosperous country mainly  क्युकी of इसके पर्यटन उद्योग , जिससे सेवाएं an अनुमानित 10.2 लाख विज़िटर  annually , and also because of its status as a tax haven .
It is not a member of the  यूरोपीय संघ , लकिन the यूरोपियन is the de facto करेंसी  .
The people of Andorra have the 4th highest human life  प्रत्याशा in the संसार — 82 सालो at जनम  .
The George Washington University ( GW , GWU , or George Washington ) is a  व्यापक निजी , coeducational शोध विश्वविद्यालयों स्तिथ in वॉशिंगटन  , D.C. .
It awards certificates ,  स्नातक डिग्री , मास्टर्स डिग्री , और phds आरपार अनेक  dozen disciplines .
The university was  चार्टर्ड by an अधिनियम of कॉंग्रेस on फ़रवरी 9 , 1821 as the columbian  College in the District of Columbia .
Kimberly Noel `` Kim '' Kardashian ( born October 21 ,  1980 ) is an अमरीकी socialite , टेलीविज़न व्यक्तित्व और occasional अभिनेत्री  .
In 2007 , she gained notoriety as the subject of a sex  टेप कि subsequently resulted in a अदालत awarding उसके $ 5 लाख ; बाद in कि वही साल  , she and her family rose to prominence with their E !
reality television series Keeping Up with the Kardashians , and its subsequent  spin-offs , सहित कोर्टनी और किम लो नई यॉर्क और कोर्टनी और किम  Take Miami .
In 2010 , Kardashian was the highest-earning reality  स्टार , साथ अनुमानित आय of $ 6  million .
With sisters Kourtney and  khloé , कार्दशियन co-owns the फ़ैशन बुटीक कड़ी d-a-s-h  .
वो रै महरूम शामिल in the उत्पादन of अनेक  lines of clothing and fragrances .
In August 2011 , Kardashian married  बास्केट खिलाड़ी क्रिस humphries  in a widely publicized ceremony .
That October , Kardashian filed  लिये तलाक following 72 दिनों of विवाह  .
The move garnered significant backlash  इससे the मीडिया , जो labeled it a `` publicity  stunt '' .
After 536 days , Kardashian and Humphries reached an  अघोषित उपनिवेश at the लॉस एंजिल्स श्रेष्ठ अदालत , finalizing the तलाक in अप्रैल  2013 .
Aerial view  of oahu साथ freeways और राजमार्गों ,  3D computer-generated image
fly-around दौरे of the  island
Oahu ( ) or  oahu , ज्ञात as `` the महफ़िल प्लेस '' , is the तीसरा largest of the हवाई आइलैंड्स और the सबसे populous of  the islands in the U.S. state of Hawaii .
The state capital ,  होनोलूलू , is on oahu 's southeast  coast .
Including small close-in offshore islands such as Ford Island and the  आइलैंड्स in kaneohe खाड़ी और बंद the पूर्वी ( windward ) coast , it रै a कुल जमीन क्षेत्रफल of , बनाना it the 20th largest  island in the United States .
in the महानतम आयाम , इस volcanic  island is long and across .
The  लंबाई of the shoreline  is .
The island is the result of two separate shield  ज्वालामुखी : waianae और koolau , साथ a व्यापक `` घाटी '' or काठी ( the सेंट्रल oahu मैदान ) between  them .
The highest point is Mt . Ka'ala  in the waianae दायरा , उठती to ऊपर समुद्र स्तर  .
The  आधार करेंसी of the संयुक्त राज्य is the u.S. डालर , और is मुद्रित  on bills in denominations of $ 1 , $ 2 , $ 5 , $ 10 , $ 20 , $ 50 , and $ 100 .
At one time ,  however , u.S. करेंसी शामिल पाँच larger denominations  .
Notes in the denominations of $ 500 , $  1,000 , $ 5,000 , और $ 10,000 यहूद मुद्रित लिये सामान्य उपयोग , और a $ 100,000 नोट थी मुद्रित  for certain internal transactions .
British Honduras was a  अंग्रेजों उपनिवेश in सेंट्रल अमेरिका .
In 1981 , the colony gained full independence ,  और is अभी the स्वतंत्र स्वदेश of बेलीज़  .
First colonised by Spaniards  in the 17th सदी , the territory on the ईस्ट coast of सेंट्रल अमेरिका , दक्षिण of मैक्सिको , became a  British crown colony in 1862 .
In 1964  , it became a self-governing  colony .
Belize  became fully स्वतंत्र इससे the संयुक्त किंगडम  in 1981 .
Belize was the last  महाद्वीपीय कब्ज़ा of the संयुक्त किंगडम in the americas  .
Spelt , also known as  dinkel गेहूं , or hulled गेहूं , is an प्राचीन प्रजाति of गेहूं इससे the पांचवां  millennium BC .
Spelt  थी an महत्वपूर्ण स्टेपल in भाग of यूरोपीय इससे the कांस्य आयु to मध्यकालीन टाइम्स ; it अभी survives as a relict  crop in Central Europe and northern Spain and has found a new market as a health food .
Spelt is sometimes considered a subspecies  of the closely सम्बन्धित प्रजाति आम गेहूं ( T. aestivum ) , in जिससे मामला इसके वनस्पति  name is considered to be Triticum aestivum subsp . spelta .
it is a hexaploid गेहूं , जिससे अर्थात् it  has six sets of chromosomes .
Sherlock Holmes ( or  ) is a fictional जासूस निर्मित by लेखक और चिकित्सक  Sir Arthur Conan Doyle .
A London-based `` consulting detective '' whose abilities  किनारा on the fantastic , holmes is प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके कुटिल लॉजिकल तर्क , उसके क्षमता to अपनाना लगभग कोई भेस , और उसके उपयोग of forensic विज्ञान  skills to solve difficult cases .
Holmes , who first  appeared in प्रकाशन in 1887 , थी प्रदर्शित  in four novels and 56 short stories .
The first novel , A  पढ़ाई in स्कारलेट , appeared in beeton 's क्रिसमस सालाना in 1887 और the दूसरी , the  Sign of the Four , in Lippincott 's Monthly Magazine in 1890 .
The character grew tremendously in popularity with the first series of  छोटी कहानियां in the strand पत्रिका , शुरूआत साथ a कांड in बोहेमिया in 1891 ; further श्रेणी of छोटी कहानियां  and two novels published in serial form appeared between then and 1927 .
The  कहानियां कवर a काल इससे around  1880 up to 1914 .
All but four stories are narrated by Holmes 's friend and biographer , Dr. John H. Watson ; two are narrated by Holmes himself ( `` The Blanched Soldier `` and `` The Lion 's  माने `` ) और दो अन्य हैं लिखा in the तीसरा व्यक्ति ( `` the mazarin स्टोन `` और `` उसके  Last Bow `` ) .
In two stories (  `` the musgrave अनुष्ठान `` और `` the ग्लोरिया स्कॉट `` ) , holmes tells वाटसन the  main story from his memories , while Watson becomes the narrator of the frame story .
The first and fourth  novels , a पढ़ाई in स्कारलेट और the घाटी of भय , प्रत्येक शामिल a long अंतराल of सर्वज्ञ  narration recounting events unknown to either Holmes or Watson .
The United States House of Representatives is  एक of the दो घरों of the संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस ( a bicameral विधानमंडल )  .
It is  अक्सर referred to as  the House .
The  अन्य हाउस is the  Senate .
The composition and  शक्तियां of the हाउस हैं स्थापित in  Article One of the United States Constitution .
The major power of the House is to pass federal legislation that affects the entire country although its  बिल्स जरूर भी be passed by the सीनेट और further सहमत to by the u.S. अध्यक्ष पहले बनने विधि ( जबतक दोनो the हाउस और सीनेट  re-pass the legislation with a two-thirds majority in each chamber ) .
The House has several exclusive powers : the power to initiate revenue bills , to impeach  officials , और to elect the u.S. अध्यक्ष in मामला वहीँ is no बहुमत in the चुनावी कॉलेज  .
Each U.S. state is  represented in the हाउस in proportion to इसके जनसांख्यिकी लकिन is हकदार to at तनिक एक प्रतिनिधि  .
the सबसे populous राज्य , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , फिलहाल  has 53 representatives .
The total number  of मतदान प्रतिनिधि is फिक्स्ड by विधि  at 435 .
Each  प्रतिनिधि serves लिये a two-year  term .
The Speaker of the United States House of Representatives , who presides over the chamber  , is निर्वाचित by the सदस्यों of the हाउस , और is इसलिए traditionally the नेता of the हाउस लोकतांत्रिक caucus or the हाउस रिपब्लिकन  Conference , whichever party has more voting members .
The House  meets in the दक्षिण wing of the  United States Capitol .
Jell-O is a brand name belonging  to u.s.-based kraft भोजन लिये a क्रमांक of जिलेटिन desserts , सहित फल gels ,  puddings and no-bake cream pies .
The brand 's  लोकप्रियता रै led to it होने प्रयुक्त as a जेनेरिक पद  for gelatin dessert across the U.S. and Canada .
Kennywood is an amusement park located in West Mifflin  , पेन्सिलवेनिया , a उपनगरीय of पिट्सबर्ग  .
The park first opened in 1898 as a `` trolley park ''  आकर्षण at the समाप्त of the mellon परिवार 's monongahela गली रेल  .
The park was purchased in 1906 by F. W. Henninger and  एंड्रयू mcswigan और यूँ began the kennywood entertainment कम्पनी कि रै remained a closely आयोजित परिवार कारोबार  for over 100 years .
This traditional  मनोरंजन पार्क स्टिल रै structures और यात्राएँ डेटिंग वापस to इसके खोलने और the जल्दी  1900s .
Along with Rye Playland Park ,  it is एक of तभी दो मनोरंजन पार्क सूचीबद्ध in the नेशनल पंजीकरण of ऐतिहासिक स्थान  .
kennywood is स्वामित्व by kennywood entertainment कम्पनी , जिससे जबतक दिसम्बर 2007 थी a closely आयोजित परिवार कारोबार  owned by the Henninger and McSwigan families .
Kennywood Entertainment is now operated by California-based Palace  entertainment , a subsidiary of parques reunidos , an अंतरराष्ट्रीय मनोरंजन पार्क कम्पनी  based in Madrid , Spain .
Parque Reunidos is  in फेरे a subsidiary of candover निवेश , an निवेश निधि  based in the UK .
A Social Security  कार्ड जारी by the रेलरोड रिटायरमेंट फलक in 1943 to a  now deceased person .
In the United States , a Social Security number (  ssn ) is a nine-digit क्रमांक जारी to u.S. नागरिकों , स्थाई निवासियों , और अस्थाई ( working ) निवासियों अंतर्गत खण्ड 205 ( c ) ( 2 ) of the  Social Security Act , codified as .
The number is issued to an individual by  the सोशल सुरक्षा प्रशासन , an स्वतंत्र एजेंसी  of the United States government .
Its primary  purpose is to track individuals लिये सोशल सुरक्षा  purposes .
A  सोशल सुरक्षा क्रमांक may be प्राप्त by applying on रूप  SS-5 , `` Application for A Social Security Number Card '' .
Minimalism describes movements in various forms of art and design , especially visual art  और म्यूज़िक , जहाँ the कार्य is नियत आउट to expose the essence or पहचान of a विषय through eliminating सब non-essential फ़ॉर्म ,  features or concepts .
Minimalism is any design or style in which  the सरलतम और fewest तत्व हैं प्रयुक्त to बनाएँ the अधिकतम  effect .
As a specific movement in the arts it is identified with developments  in post–world युद्ध ii पश्चिमी आर्ट , सबसे strongly साथ अमरीकी विज़ुअल कला  in the 1960s and early 1970s .
Prominent artists associated with this  गति शामिल डोनाल्ड judd , जॉन mccracken , agnes मार्टिन , डान flavin , रॉबर्ट मॉरिस , ऐनी truitt , और फ़्रैंक  Stella .
It is rooted in the reductive aspects of Modernism  , और is प्रायः interpreted as a प्रतिक्रिया विरूद्ध अमूर्त अभिव्यंजनावाद और a सेतु to postminimal आर्ट practices  .
The terms have expanded to  encompass a गति in म्यूज़िक जिससे सुविधाएँ repetition और iteration , as in the रचनाएं of la मोंटे यंग , टेरी रिले , स्टीव reich , फिलिप  Glass , and John Adams .
Minimalist compositions are  sometimes ज्ञात as प्रणालियों  music .
The term `` minimalist '' is often applied  colloquially to designate anything कि is अतिरिक्त or stripped to इसके अनिवार्य  .
It has also been used to  describe the plays और novels of सैमुएल beckett , the films of रॉबर्ट bresson , the कहानियां  of Raymond Carver , and even the automobile designs of Colin Chapman .
The word  थी पहला प्रयुक्त in अंग्रेज़ी in the जल्दी 20th सदी to  describe the Mensheviks .
In chemistry and physics , Dalton 's law ( also called Dalton 's law of  आंशिक pressures ) राज्य कि the कुल दबाव exerted by the मिश्रण of non-reactive गैसों is बराबर to the योग of the  partial pressures of individual gases .
This empirical law was  observed by जॉन डाल्टन in 1801 और is सम्बन्धित  to the ideal gas laws .
Mathematically , the pressure of a  मिश्रण of गैसों can be पारिभाषित as the संकलन
or
where represent  the आंशिक दबाव of प्रत्येक  component .
It is assumed that  the गैसों do नहीं प्रतिक्रिया साथ  each other
जहाँ is the mole भिन्न of the i-th घटक  in the total mixture of n components .
The relationship below  provides a रास्ता to determine the आवाज़ आधारित विशेषज्ञता of कोई व्यक्तिगत गैसीय  component
where is the  विशेषज्ञता of the i-th घटक expressed in ppm  .
Dalton 's law  is नहीं exactly followed by रियल गैसों  .
Those  deviations हैं considerably विशाल at ऊँची pressures  .
in ऐसे शर्तें , the आवाज़ occupied by the अणुओं can become significant  compared to the free space between them .
In particular , the short average distances between molecules raises the intensity of intermolecular forces between  गैस अणुओं पर्याप्त to substantially बदलें the दबाव  exerted by them .
Neither of those effects  हैं माना by the आदर्श गैस मॉडल  .
This is a list of the largest United  राज्य कॉलेजों और विश्वविद्यालयों by नामांकन लिये कॉलेजों और विश्वविद्यालयों in the संयुक्त  States .
कया इस सूची  includes:
Colleges  और विश्वविद्यालयों भीतर the संयुक्त  States
University  प्रणालियों if the प्रणाली is चलाएं अंतर्गत a सिंगल  administration
Enrollment is  the योग of the headcount of undergraduate और  graduate students
Enrollment is  गिने by the एकीकृत post-secondary शिक्षा  System within the U.S. Department of Education .
Enrollment is the  12-month unduplicated headcount , indicating the क्रमांक of अद्वितीय विद्यार्थी जो attended  the university during the year .
कया इस सूची करता  not include:
Any indication of how many of the enrolled students are full or  भाग समय ( e.g. , कुछ विश्वविद्यालयों may have a ऊँची नामांकन , लकिन have  most students enrolled in only a single class )
For other lists that measure  विश्वविद्यालयों नामांकन , देखिए the देखिए भी खण्ड  below .
`` Right Round '' is a song performed by American  rapper flo rida , released as the सीसे सिंगल इससे उसके दूसरी स्टुडियो  album , R.O.O.T.S . ( 2009 ) .
The  सोंग सुविधाएँ अतिथि vocals  from Kesha .
It was released to radio on 27 January 2009 and was  डिजिटली released on 10 फ़रवरी by पो लड़के entertainment और  Atlantic Records .
The song lyrically speaks of Flo Rida 's net ball  रेफरी enthusiasm , जबकि adapting the कोरस of the 1984 मुर्दे or जिंदा सोंग `` तुम स्पिन me गोलाकार  ( Like a Record ) `` in its hook .
according to एक of the सोंग 's लेखक , the  chorus refers to oral sex .
Kesha contributed guest vocals to the song , but  in the संयुक्त राज्य , दौरान the चलाएं atop the चार्ट , kesha थी uncredited  .
The song received mostly negative reviews  इससे आलोचकों , जो claimed it थी kitsch और  misogynistic .
however , it थी a वाणिज्यिक कामयाबी , reaching  the top ten of the charts in nineteen countries worldwide .
In the United States , it became Flo Rida 's  दूसरी number-one सिंगल और broke the रिकार्ड लिये first-week बिक्री जब it थी released  to digital retailers .
the सिंगल 's accompanying म्यूज़िक वीडियो थी निर्देशित by मैल्कम  Jones and nominated for an MTV Video Music Award .
The song has been used in  अनेक फिल्मों , ऐसे as the hangover , the भद्दा  Truth and the Telugu movie Pilla Zamindar .
In the movie Pitch  पूर्ण , the सोंग is performed by the a cappella समूह  the Treblemakers .
The  मुख्य इंसाफ of the संयुक्त राज्य is the सिर of the संयुक्त राज्य संघीय अदालत प्रणाली ( the न्यायिक  branch of the federal government of the United States ) and the chief judge of the Supreme Court of the United States .
The Chief Justice is one of nine  परम् अदालत justices ; the अन्य आठ हैं the संबद्ध  Justices of the Supreme Court of the United States .
From  1789 जबतक 1866 , the दफ्तर थी ज्ञात as the  Chief Justice of the Supreme Court .
The Chief Justice is  the उच्चतम न्यायिक अधिकारी in the देश , और अधिनियमों as a मुख्य प्रशासनिक अधिकारी लिये the संघीय न्यायालयों और as सिर of the न्यायिक सम्मेलन  of the United States appoints the director of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts .
The Chief  इंसाफ भी serves as a प्रवक्ता  for the judicial branch .
The Chief Justice leads  the कारोबार of the परम् अदालत  .
He presides over  मौखिक वितर्क पहले the अदालत  .
When the court renders an  राय , the मुख्य justice—when in the majority—decides जो writes  the court 's opinion .
The Chief Justice also has significant  agenda-setting शक्ति over the अदालत 's बैठक  .
In the case of an impeachment of  a अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य , जिससे रै occurred twice , the मुख्य इंसाफ presides over the  trial in the Senate .
In modern tradition , the Chief Justice has the ceremonial  ड्यूटी of administering the शपथ of दफ्तर of the अध्यक्ष  of the United States .
the पहला मुख्य इंसाफ  was John Jay .
The 17th and current Chief  इंसाफ is जॉन G. रॉबर्ट्स , jr  .
हिरण निकट prudhoe  Bay , 1973
Prudhoe Bay Oil Field is a  विशाल आयल फ़ील्ड on अलास्का 's  North Slope .
It is the largest oil field in  दोनो the संयुक्त राज्य और in उत्तर अमेरिका , covering और originally  containing approximately of oil .
The amount of recoverable oil in the field is more than double  कि of the अगला largest फ़ील्ड in the संयुक्त राज्य , the ईस्ट टेक्सास आयल फ़ील्ड  .
The field is operated by  bp ; साझेदार हैं exxonmobil और conocophillips  Alaska .
Labor unions are legally recognized  as प्रतिनिधि of मजदूर in अनेक उद्योग in  the United States .
Their activity today centers on  सामूहिक bargaining over मजदूरी , लाभ , और working शर्तें लिये उनके सदस्यता , और on representing उनके  members in disputes with management over violations of contract provisions .
larger संघ भी typically engage in lobbying क्रियाएँ और  electioneering at the state and federal level .
Most unions in  अमेरिका हैं लकीर साथ एक of दो larger छतरियाँ संगठन : the afl-cio निर्मित in 1955 , और  the Change to Win Federation which split from the AFL-CIO in 2005 .
Both  एडवोकेट नीतियों और विधान on निमित्त of मजदूर in  the United States and Canada , and take an active role in politics .
The  afl-cio is विशेषकर चिंतित  with global trade issues .
In 2010 , the percentage of workers belonging to a union in the  संयुक्त राज्य ( or कुल मजदूर संघ `` घनत्व '' ) थी 11.4 % , compared to 18.4 % in जर्मनी , 27.5 % in कनाडा , और 70 % in  Finland .
Union  सदस्यता in the निजी सेक्टर रै गिरे  under 7 % — levels not seen since 1932 .
संघ allege कि employer-incited विपक्ष रै contributed  to this decline in membership .
The most prominent unions are  among पब्लिक सेक्टर कर्मचारी ऐसे as शिक्षक और पुलिस  .
Members of unions are  disproportionately पुरानी , पुरूष और निवासियों of the पूर्वोत्तर , the  Midwest , and California .
Union workers average 10-30 % higher pay than non-union in America after controlling for  व्यक्तिगत , जॉब , और मजदूर मार्केट विशेषताएँ  .
Although much smaller compared to their peak membership in the 1950s , American unions remain a prominent political factor ,  दोनो through mobilization of उनके अपना सदस्यताएँ और through coalitions साथ like-minded activist संगठन around मुद्दे ऐसे as अप्रवासी अधिकारों , व्यापार नीति , स्वास्थ्य परवाह , और जीना मजदूरी अभियान .
To fight  कथित नियोक्ता anti-union कार्यक्रम , संघ हैं फिलहाल वकालत नई `` कार्ड जाँच `` संघीय विधान कि होता आवश्यकता नियोक्ता to सौदेबाजी  with a union if more than 50 % of workers signed forms , or `` cards , '' stating they wish to be represented by that union .
The current procedure involves waiting 45 to 90 days for a federally supervised  secret-ballot कर्मचारी referendum on the विषय  .
The economist Joseph Stiglitz has asserted that , ``  दमदार संघ have helped to reduce असमानता , whereas weaker संघ have बना it easier लिये ceos , sometimes working साथ मार्केट शक्तियां  that they have helped shape , to increase it . ''
The decline in unionization since WWII in the United  राज्य रै महरूम संबद्ध साथ a सुनाया वृद्धि in आय और  wealth inequality .
a ईसाई lacroix फ़ैशन  boutique
A boutique is a small shopping outlet , especially one  कि specializes in elite और फैशनेबल वस्तुएं ऐसे as कपडे  and jewelry .
The word is French for `` shop '' , via Latin from Greek  ἀποθήκη ( apothēkē ) , `` storehouse  '' .
The term entered into everyday English use in the late 1960s  जब , लिये a ब्रैड काल , लंदन थी the केन्द्र of the फ़ैशन व्यापार  .
Carnaby Street and the Kings Road were  the फ़ोकस of much मीडिया ध्यान as घर to the सबसे फैशनेबल boutiques  of the era .
Now the East of London has been regenerated and more  boutiques पॉप up in फैशनेबल क्षेत्रों , ऐसे as मीनार सेतु सड़क .
It can also refer  to a specialised कड़ ऐसे as a बुटीक निवेश  bank or boutique law firm .
The word is often used to describe a property in the independent section of the  होटल मार्केट ( ऐसे as the rockwell in लंदन ) in अनुक्रम to फर्क themselves इससे larger जंजीरों ( ऐसे as हिल्टन  Hotels ) .
In  ऐसे मामले the establishments उद्देश्य to convey the विचार  that the operation is elite and highly specialised .
In the strictest sense of the word , boutiques would be one-of-a-kind  लकिन अधिक generally बोलना , कुछ जंजीरों can be referred  to as boutiques if they specialize in particular styles .
Recently , the term `` boutique '' has started being applied to  normally-mass-market वस्तुएं कि हैं either niche or उत्पादित in intentionally छोटी संख्याएँ at बहुत ऊँची  prices .
This may be referred to  as बुटीक निर्माण  .
For example , before the release of the Wii , a Time Magazine article suggested that Nintendo could become a `` boutique  video-game कम्पनी '' , producing खेल लिये niche ऑडियंस , बल्कि than trying to compete सीधे साथ microsoft  and Sony .
In the traditional luxury- watch industry Scalfaro International is considered  as the precursor in निर्माण और बिक्री of bespoke घड़ियाँ  .
The Swiss  कम्पनी उपयोग a अत्यधिक लचीली बुटीक निर्माण साईट , जिससे allows producing  small series or even unique timepieces .
Although some boutiques specialise in hand-made items and other truly one-of-a-kind items , others simply produce  t-shirts , स्टिकर , और अन्य फ़ैशन accessories in artificially छोटी रनों और बेचें उन्हें at unusually ऊँची कीमतें  .
In the  जल्दी 1990s सेलिना प्रारंभ निर्माण उसके अपना लकीर  of women 's clothing .
खोलने दो boutiques labeled as `` सेलिना इत्यादि . बुटीक & सैलून '' एक स्तिथ in कॉर्पस christi  and one located in San Antonio , Texas .
One  थी due to खोलें in monterrey , मैक्सिको  , in 1995 but due to her death it was not opened .
Around 1999 the San Antonio  स्थान बंद और the कॉर्पस christi  location was closed in 2009 .
In late 1990s  कुछ यूरोपीय खुदरा व्यापारियों विकसित the विचार of tailoring a दूकान towards a जीवनशैली थीम , in the रूप of `` अवधारणा  stores '' , which specialised in cross-selling without using separate departments .
एक of the पहला अवधारणा स्टोर्स थी 10 कोरसो como in मिलान , इटली followed by  Colette in Paris and Quartier 206 in Berlin .
Several well-known American chains such as Urban Outfitters , D-A-S-H , and The Gap , Australian chain  billabong और , हालांकि कम आम , रब & टेलर adapted to the अवधारणा स्टोर ट्रेंड बाद  2000 .
Navy  संघीय क्रेडिट संघ ( or नेवी संघीय ) is a क्रेडिट संघ headquartered in वियना , वर्जिनिया  , chartered and regulated under the authority of the National Credit Union Administration ( NCUA ) of the U.S. federal government .
Navy Federal is the largest  प्राकृतिक सदस्य ( or खुदरा ) क्रेडिट संघ in the संसार , दोनो in एसेट  size and in membership .
As of  सितंबर 2012 , नेवी संघीय था over $ 50 अरब usd in एसेट  , and over 4 million members .
Stevland Hardaway  मॉरिस ( born may 13 , 1950 as stevland hardaway judkins ) , ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम स्टीवी अचरज , is an अमरीकी सिंगर , songwriter , और multi-instrumentalist  , a child prodigy who developed into one of the most creative musical figures of the late 20th century .
Blind  चूंकि shortly बाद जनम , अचरज हस्ताक्षरित साथ motown 's tamla लेबल at the आयु of ग्यारह , और  continues to perform and record for Motown to this day .
Among Wonder 's best known works are singles such as `` Superstition `` , `` Sir Duke  `` , `` तुम हैं the सनशाइन of my जीवन `` और `` i बस पुकारा to कह i प्रेम तुम  `` .
Well known albums also include Talking Book ,  innervisions और गीतों in the कुंजी of जीवन  .
He has recorded more than thirty U.S. top ten hits and received  twenty-two ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , the सबसे कभी awarded to a पुरूष सोलो  artist .
Wonder is also noted for his work as an activist for  राजनैतिक कल्याणकारी , सहित उसके 1980 अभियान to मेक मार्टिन लूथर किंग , jr. 's जन्मदिवस a अवकाश  in the United States .
In 2009 , Wonder was  नामित a संयुक्त राष्ट्र मेसेंजर  of Peace .
In 2008 , Billboard magazine released a  सूची of the hot 100 all-time शीर्ष कलाकारों to celebrate the us singles चार्ट  's fiftieth anniversary , with Wonder at number five .
By  लोकप्रिय vote , स्टीवी थी inducted into the soulmusic हॉल  of Fame at SoulMusic.com in December 2012 .
Psychosis ( from the Greek ψυχή `` psyche '' , for mind/soul , and -ωσις `` -osis '' , for abnormal condition or derangement ) refers to an abnormal condition of the mind , and is a generic  मनोरोग पद लिये a दिमागी राज्य प्रायः वर्णित as involving a `` घाटा of सम्पर्क साथ वास्तविकता `` .
People suffering from psychosis  हैं वर्णित as psychotic  .
Psychosis is given to the more severe forms of psychiatric disorder ,  दौरान जिससे मति और delusions , सकल उत्तेजना or बेहोशी और  impaired insight may occur .
the पद `` मनस्ताप '' is बहुत व्यापक और can औसत anything इससे अपेक्षाकृत  normal aberrant experiences through to the complex and catatonic expressions of schizophrenia and bipolar type 1 disorder .
Moreover a wide variety of central  बेचैन प्रणाली रोगों , इससे दोनो बाह्य substances और आतंरिक  physiologic illness , can produce symptoms of psychosis .
This  led अनेक पेशेवर to कह कि मनस्ताप is नहीं विशिष्ट  enough as a diagnostic term .
Despite this , `` psychosis '' is generally given to noticeable deficits in  सामान्य बर्ताव ( ऋणात्मक लक्षण ) और अधिक commonly to विविध प्रकार of मति or delusional मान्यताओं ( e.g  . grandiosity , delusions of persecution ) .
Someone exhibiting very obvious signs may be described as `` frankly psychotic '' , whereas  एक exhibiting बहुत हल्का लक्षण could be वर्गीकृत in the श्रेणी of an `` attenuated  psychotic risk syndrome '' .
An excess in  dopaminergic signalling is traditionally linked to the धनात्मक लक्षण of मनस्ताप  , especially those of schizophrenia .
This is thought to occur through a mechanism of  aberrant salience of पर्यावरणीय stimuli  .
Many antipsychotic drugs accordingly target the dopamine system ;  meta-analyses of placebo-controlled ट्रायल of ये दवाएँ , however , दिखाएँ either no significant अंतर between ड्रग और placebo , or a बहुत छोटी प्रभाव आकार , suggesting कि the pathophysiology of मनस्ताप is much अधिक  complex than an overactive dopamine system .
People  experiencing मनस्ताप may प्रदर्शनी कुछ व्यक्तित्व परिवर्तन  and thought disorder .
Depending  on इसके गंभीरता , इस may be accompanied by असामान्य or विचित्र बर्ताव , as खूब as परेशानी साथ सोशल  interaction and impairment in carrying out daily life activities .
General  grievous is a fictional अक्षर in the स्टार युद्धों  universe .
a पुनरावर्ती विपक्षी , he is the परम् कमांडर of the confederacy of  Independent Systems , a political faction of planetary systems waging war on the Galactic Republic .
Trained in  सब सात फ़ॉर्म of lightsaber कॉम्बैट by गिनती dooku , he is a निष्ठुर  and powerful warrior devoted to Jedi 's destruction during the Clone Wars .
His acts of wanton aggression and high Jedi body count  होता संकेत the आकाशगंगा to दे उसे the उपनाम the knightslayer  .
हालांकि the बदनाम जेडी slayer थी the होने in the आकाशगंगा दौरान the क्लोन युद्धों जो था मारे the सबसे  Jedi in single combat , he did not hesitate to flee from battles he knew he would lose .
Statistics  खेल an महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in summarizing बेसबॉल प्रदर्शन और evaluating  players in the sport .
Since the flow of a  बेसबॉल खेल रै प्राकृतिक ब्रेक to it , और सामान्यतः खिलाड़ी अधिनियम individually बल्कि than performing  in clusters , the sport lends itself to easy record-keeping and statistics .
Statistics have been  रखा लिये पेशेवर बेसबॉल चूंकि the सृष्टि of the नेशनल  League and American League , now part of Major League Baseball .
Many statistics are also  उपलब्धियाँ इससे बाहर of प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल , इससे लीग ऐसे as the नेशनल संघ  of Professional Base Ball Players and the Negro Leagues .
Dorothea Lange 's Migrant Mother depicts destitute pea pickers  in कैलिफ़ोर्निया , centering on फ्लोरेंस ओवेन्स थॉम्पसन , आयु 32 , a माँ of सात children , in nipomo  , California , March 1936 .
USA  सालाना रियल जीडीपी इससे 1910–60 , साथ the सालो of the ग्रेट  Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted .
The unemployment  रेट in the us 1910–1960 , साथ the सालो  of the Great Depression ( 1929–1939 ) highlighted .
The Great Depression  थी a कठोर विश्वव्यापी आर्थिक अवसाद in the दशक  preceding World War II .
The timing of the Great Depression  varied आरपार राष्ट्र , लकिन in सबसे देशों it प्रारंभ in 1930 और  lasted until the late 1930s or middle 1940s .
It was  the longest , सबसे फैली , और deepest अवसाद of the  20th century .
In the 21st century , the Great  अवसाद is commonly प्रयुक्त as an उदाहरण of कैसा दूर the संसार 's अर्थव्यवस्था  can decline .
The depression originated in the U.S. , after the fall in stock prices that began around  सितंबर 4 , 1929 , और became विश्वव्यापी न्यूज साथ the भण्डार मार्केट क्रैश of अक्तूबर 29 , 1929 ( ज्ञात  as Black Tuesday ) .
The  ग्रेट अवसाद था विनाशकारी प्रभाव in देशों  rich and poor .
निजी आय , कर आय , profits और कीमतें dropped , जबकि अंतरराष्ट्रीय  trade plunged by more than 50 % .
Unemployment in the U.S. rose to 25  % , और in कुछ देशों रोज़ as ऊँची  as 33 % .
Cities all  around the संसार यहूद hit मुश्किल , विशेषकर those निर्भर on  heavy industry .
Construction  थी वस्तुतः halted in अनेक देशों  .
Farming  और ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों suffered as क्रॉप कीमतें गिरी by लगभग  60 % .
Facing plummeting demand with few alternate sources of jobs , areas  निर्भर on प्राथमिक सेक्टर उद्योग ऐसे as नकदी cropping , खनन  and logging suffered the most .
कुछ economies प्रारंभ to रिकवर  by the mid-1930s .
In many countries , the negative effects of the  ग्रेट अवसाद lasted जबतक the समाप्त of संसार युद्ध ii  .
A premature ventricular contraction ( PVC ) , also known as a premature ventricular complex ,  ventricular असामयिक संकुचन ( or जटिल or देवालय ) ( vpc ) , ventricular असामयिक ताल ( vpb ) , or ventricular extrasystole ( ves ) , is a अपेक्षाकृत आम इवेंट जहाँ the धड़कन is initiated by purkinje मछली  in the ventricles rather than by the sinoatrial node , the normal heartbeat initiator .
The electrical events of the heart detected by  the electrocardiogram allow a पीवीसी to be easily विशिष्ट इससे a सामान्य  heart beat .
A PVC may be perceived  as a `` छोड़ा ताल `` or लगा as palpitations  in the chest .
In a normal heartbeat , the ventricles  अनुबंध बाद the atria have helped to भरण उन्हें by contracting ; in इस रास्ता the ventricles can पंप a maximized राशि  of blood both to the lungs and to the rest of the body .
In a  पीवीसी , the ventricles अनुबंध पहला और पहले the atria have optimally भर the ventricles  with blood , which means that circulation is inefficient .
However , single beat PVC arrhythmias do not  प्रायः पोज़ a खतरे और can be asymptomatic in स्वस्थ individuals  .
William Gary Busey  ( born जून 29 , 1944 ) , बेहतर ज्ञात as गेरी busey , is an  American film and stage actor , and artist .
He has appeared in a variety of films , including Lethal Weapon , Point Break ,  और अंतर्गत घेरा , as खूब as अतिथि दिखावे on gunsmoke , वाकर , टेक्सास रेंजर , विधि &  Order , and Entourage .
He  थी मनोनीत लिये an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये  Best Actor in 1978 for his role in The Buddy Holly Story .
The Anti-Counterfeiting Trade Agreement ( ACTA ) , is a  बहुराष्ट्रीय सन्धि लिये the purpose of establishing अंतरराष्ट्रीय मानकों लिये बौद्धिक प्रॉपर्टी अधिकारों प्रवर्तन .
