The agreement aims to establish an international legal framework for targeting counterfeit goods , generic  दवाइयाँ और कापीराइट infringement on the अंतरजाल , और होता बनाएँ a नई शासी देह बाहर मौजूदा forums , ऐसे as the संसार व्यापार संगठन , the संसार बौद्धिक प्रॉपर्टी संगठन  , or the United Nations .
The agreement was signed in October 2011 by  ऑस्ट्रेलिया , कनाडा , जापानी , मोरक्को , नई जीलैंड , सिंगापुर , दक्षिण कोरियाई ,  and the United States .
In 2012 , Mexico , the  यूरोपीय संघ और 22 देशों जिससे हैं सदस्य राज्य  of the European Union signed as well .
One signatory ( Japan ) has ratified ( formally  स्वीकृत ) the अनुबंध , जिससे होता आइये into फ़ोर्स in देशों कि ratified  it after ratification by six countries .
Supporters have described  the अनुबंध as a जवाब to `` the बढ़ाएँ in वैश्विक व्यापार of नकली  goods and pirated copyright protected works '' .
Trades  संघ representing मजदूर in the म्यूज़िक , फिल्मी और tv उद्योग और विशाल बौद्धिक property-based संगठन ऐसे as the गति चित्र  Association of America and Pharmaceutical Research and Manufacturers of America were active in the treaty 's development .
Opponents say the convention adversely affects  आधारभूत अधिकारों सहित स्वतंत्रता of अभिव्यक्ति और गोपनीयता .
ACTA has also been criticised by Doctors Without  सीमायें लिये endangering अभिगम to दवाइयाँ in विकासशील देशों  .
The secret nature of negotiations has excluded civil society groups , developing countries and the  सामान्य पब्लिक इससे the अनुबंध 's negotiation प्रक्रम और it रै महरूम वर्णित as नीति laundering by आलोचकों सहित the इलेक्ट्रॉनिक frontier न्यास और the entertainment  Consumers Association .
The signature of the EU and many of its member states resulted in  the इस्तीफा in विरोध of the यूरोपीय पार्लियामेंट 's नियुक्त मुख्य अन्वेषक , rapporteur कादर आरिफ  , as well as widespread protests across Europe .
In 2012 the  newly-appointed rapporteur , अंग्रेजों mep दाउद मार्टिन , अनुशंसित विरूद्ध the सन्धि , stating : `` the intended लाभ  of this international agreement are far outweighed by the potential threats to civil liberties '' .
On 4 July 2012 , the European Parliament rejected the agreement  in plenary सत्र , साथ 478 मतदान विरूद्ध the सन्धि , 39 in पक्ष और 165 meps abstaining  .
FAW semi-trailer  ट्रक in चीन
ट्रैक्टर साथ पक्ष डम्प ट्रेलर  semi-trailer
A tractor with  an auto-transport semi-trailer  .
semi-trailer ट्रक साथ स्लीपर पीछे  the cab .
A semi-trailer  ट्रक is an articulated गाडी कि consists of a towing इंजन , ज्ञात as a ट्रैक्टर in the संयुक्त राज्य और ट्रक in अनेक अन्य स्थान , संलग्न to एक  or more semi-trailers to carry freight .
It is also known as a transport in Canada , prime mover in Australia , semi ,  tractor-trailer , ट्रक और ट्रेलर , ट्रांसफ़र ट्रक , 18-wheeler , mack ट्रक , बिग रिग in the संयुक्त राज्य , or artic , छोटी लिये articulated लारी , in ब्रिटेन  and Ireland .
A semi-trailer does not  ट्रेल completely पीछे the towing गाडी , लकिन is संलग्न at a पाइंट कि is बस आगे  of the rear-most axle of the towing unit .
इस is किया so कि a भिन्न of the वज़न  of the trailer is carried by the prime mover .
This  व्यवस्था अर्थात् कि दोनो ट्रैक्टर और semi-trailer होगा have a distinctly  different design than a rigid truck and trailer .
the पिट्सबर्ग स्टीलर्स हैं a पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल टोली आधारित  in Pittsburgh , Pennsylvania .
The team currently belongs to the North Division of the American  फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( afc ) in the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल )  .
Founded in ,  the स्टीलर्स हैं the oldest मताधिकार in  the AFC .
Pittsburgh has won more Super Bowl titles ( six ) , won more AFC Championship Games ( eight ) and  निभाई in ( पंद्रह ) और hosted अधिक ( ग्यारह ) सम्मेलन चैंपियनशिप खेल than कोई अन्य afc or  NFC team .
The  स्टीलर्स share the रिकार्ड लिये सबसे सुपर कटोरी दिखावे साथ the डलास  Cowboys ( eight ) .
The Steelers won  उनके सबसे हाल चैंपियनशिप , सुपर कटोरी  XLIII , on February 1 , 2009 .
The Steelers were  संस्थापित as the पिट्सबर्ग pirates on जुलाई 8 , 1933 , by आर्ट रूनी , लेने इसके असली नाम इससे the बेसबॉल टोली  of the same name , as was common practice for NFL teams to do at the time .
The ownership of  the स्टीलर्स रै remained भीतर the रूनी परिवार चूंकि इसके founding  .
The current owner is Art 's son , Dan  रूनी , जो रै दिए much कंट्रोल of the  franchise to his son Art Rooney II .
Long one  of the एनएफएल 's फ्लैगशिप टीमों , the स्टीलर्स आनंद  a large , widespread fanbase nicknamed Steeler Nation .
The Steelers currently play their home games at Heinz Field on Pittsburgh 's  उत्तर पक्ष in the उत्तर shore पड़ोस , जिससे भी होस्ट the विश्वविद्यालयों of पिट्सबर्ग पैंथर्स  .
Built in  2001 , the स्टेडियम replaced तीन नदियाँ स्टेडियम जिससे  hosted the Steelers for 31 seasons .
Prior to Three Rivers ,  the स्टीलर्स था निभाई उनके खेल in pitt स्टेडियम और फोर्ब्स  Field .
Three different  kinds of गेहूं और rye आटा
Flour is  a चूर्ण जिससे is बना by पीस खाद्यान्न दाने  , or other seeds or roots ( like Cassava ) .
It is the main  संघटक of ब्रैड , जिससे is a स्टेपल खाना लिये अनेक संस्कृतियों , बनाना the उपलब्धता of पर्याप्त आपूर्तियाँ of आटा a  major economic and political issue at various times throughout history .
Wheat flour is one of the most important foods in European , North American  , मध्य पूर्वी , भारतीय और उत्तर अफ़्रीकी संस्कृतियों , और is the धमक संघटक in सबसे of उनके शैलियाँ of  breads and pastries .
While wheat is the most  आम आधार लिये आटा , मकई आटा रै महरूम महत्वपूर्ण in mesoamerican भोजन चूंकि प्राचीन  times , and remains a staple throughout the Americas .
Rye flour is an important constituent of bread  in much of सेंट्रल यूरोपीय , और राइस can भी be प्रयुक्त in आटा , हालांकि इस is अपेक्षाकृत  uncommon .
Heart rate is the  क्रमांक of heartbeats प्रति ईकाई of समय , typically  expressed as beats per minute ( bpm ) .
Heart rate can vary as the body 's need to absorb oxygen and  excrete कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड परिवर्तन , ऐसे as दौरान शारीरिक कसरत , नींद , बीमारी , or as a  result of ingesting drugs :
Central nervous system  stimulants ऐसे as amphetamines बढ़ाएँ दिल रेट  .
सेंट्रल बेचैन प्रणाली depressants or sedatives decreases the दिल रेट ( अलावा इससे कुछ विशेषकर अजीब ones साथ  equally strange effects , such as ketamine which can cause - amongst many other things - stimulant-like effects such as tachycardia ) .
There are many  तरीके in जिससे the दिल रेट speeds up or  slows down .
Most involve stimulant-like  endorphins और हार्मोन होने released in the दिमाग , अनेक of जिससे हैं  those that are 'forced'/'enticed ' out by the ingestion and processing of drugs .
Due to individuals having a constant blood volume , one  of the physiological तरीके to उद्धार अधिक ऑक्सीजन to an अंग is to बढ़ाएँ दिल रेट to परमिट रक्त to pass by the अंग अधिक  often .
सामान्य resting दिल दरों दायरा  from 60-100 bpm .
Bradycardia is  पारिभाषित as a resting दिल रेट नीचे 60  bpm .
However , heart  दरों इससे 50 to 60 bpm हैं आम among स्वस्थ लोगों और do  not necessarily require special attention .
Tachycardia is defined as a resting heart rate above 100 bpm , though persistent  बाकी दरों between 80-100 bpm , मुख्यतः if वे हैं उपस्थित दौरान नींद , may be लक्षण of हाइपरथाइरॉयडिज़्म or रक्ताल्पता  ( see below ) .
Catherine II 's carved  , चित्रित और gilded राजतिलक कोच ( hermitage  Museum )
A carriage is a wheeled vehicle for people , usually  horse-drawn ; litters ( palanquins ) और सेडान कुर्सियां हैं excluded , चूंकि वे हैं wheelless वाहनों  .
The carriage is especially designed  लिये निजी यात्री उपयोग और लिये सुकून or लालित्य , हालांकि कुछ हैं भी  used to transport goods .
It may be light , smart  और तेज़ or भारी , विशाल  and comfortable .
Carriages normally have suspension using leaf  स्रोतों , अंडाकार स्रोतों ( in the 19th सदी ) or चमड़े दीर्घकाय  .
A public passenger vehicle  होता नहीं प्रायः be पुकारा a carriage – शर्तें  for such include stagecoach , charabanc and omnibus .
Working vehicles such as  the ( four-wheeled ) वैगन और ( two-wheeled ) कार्ट share महत्वपूर्ण भाग of the इतिहास  of the carriage , as is the fast ( two-wheeled ) chariot .
The 2004  भारतीय समंदर भूकंप थी an undersea megathrust भूकंप कि occurred at 00:58:53 utc on संडे , 26 दिसम्बर 2004 ,  with an epicentre off the west coast of Sumatra , Indonesia .
The quake  itself is ज्ञात by the वैज्ञानिक जातियाँ as the sumatra–andaman  earthquake .
The resulting  सुनामी थी दिए विभिन्न names , सहित the 2004 भारतीय समंदर सुनामी , दक्षिण एशियाई सुनामी  , Indonesian tsunami , and the Boxing Day tsunami .
The earthquake was  caused by subduction और triggered a श्रेणी of विनाशकारी tsunamis साथ the coasts of सबसे landmasses bordering the भारतीय समंदर  , killing over 230,000 people in fourteen countries , and inundating coastal communities with waves up to high .
It  थी एक of the deadliest प्राकृतिक  disasters in recorded history .
Indonesia was the hardest-hit  देश , followed by श्री लंका , इण्डिया , और थाईलैंड  .
साथ a परिमाण of mw 9.1–9.3 , it is the तीसरा largest  earthquake ever recorded on a seismograph .
The earthquake had the longest duration  of faulting कभी observed , between 8.3 और 10 मिनट्स  .
It caused the entire planet  to हिलना as much as और triggered अन्य भूकंप  as far away as Alaska .
Its epicentre was between Simeulue and  मेनलैंड इंडोनेशिया .
The  दुर्दशा of the प्रभावित लोगों और देशों prompted a विश्वव्यापी  humanitarian response .
In all , the worldwide community  दान अधिक than $ 14 अरब ( 2004 us $ ) in humanitarian  aid .
Steam rising from the  nesjavellir geothermal शक्ति स्टेशन in आइसलैंड .
geothermal उर्जा is थर्मल उर्जा उत्पन्न और  stored in the Earth .
Thermal  उर्जा is the उर्जा कि  determines the temperature of matter .
The Geothermal  उर्जा of the धरती 's क्रस्ट originates इससे the असली गठन of the ग्रह ( 20 %  ) and from radioactive decay of minerals ( 80 % ) .
The geothermal gradient , which is the difference in temperature  between the कोर of the ग्रह और इसके सतह , ड्राइव a निरन्तर conduction of थर्मल  energy in the form of heat from the core to the surface .
The adjective geothermal  originates इससे the यूनानी जड़ें γη ( ge ) , अर्थ धरती , और θερμος ( thermos  ) , meaning hot .
At the core of the  धरती , थर्मल उर्जा is निर्मित by रेडियोसक्रिय क्षय और temperatures may पहुँचें  over 5000 °C ( 9,000 °F ) .
Heat  conducts इससे the कोर to surrounding  cooler rock .
The high temperature and pressure cause some rock to melt ,  बनाना मैग्मा संवहन upward चूंकि it is हल्का than the ठोस  rock .
The magma heats rock and water  in the क्रस्ट , sometimes up to 370 °c  ( 700 °F ) .
From hot springs , geothermal energy has been used for bathing since Paleolithic times and for space heating  चूंकि प्राचीन रोमन टाइम्स , लकिन it is अभी बेहतर ज्ञात लिये विद्युत  generation .
विश्वव्यापी , परिचय 10,715 megawatts ( mw ) of geothermal  power is online in 24 countries .
An additional 28 gigawatts of direct  geothermal हीटिंग क्षमता is संस्थापित लिये ज़िला हीटिंग , स्पेस हीटिंग , स्पा , औद्योगिक  processes , desalination and agricultural applications .
geothermal शक्ति is लागत प्रभावी , विश्वसनीय , चिरस्थायी , और environmentally दोस्ताना , लकिन रै historically महरूम सीमित to क्षेत्रों निकट tectonic  plate boundaries .
Recent technological  अग्रिम have dramatically विस्तारित the दायरा और आकार of सुगठित संसाधन , विशेषकर लिये अनुप्रयोग ऐसे  as home heating , opening a potential for widespread exploitation .
Geothermal  कुएं रिलीज ग्रीनहाउस गैसों फंस गहन भीतर the धरती , लकिन ये emissions  are much lower per energy unit than those of fossil fuels .
As a result , geothermal power has the potential to help mitigate  वैश्विक वार्मिंग if widely तैनात in प्लेस of चट्टान fuels  .
The  धरती 's geothermal संसाधन हैं theoretically अधिक than पर्याप्त to सप्लाई मानवता 's उर्जा  needs , but only a very small fraction may be profitably exploited .
Drilling and  खोजी लिये गहन संसाधन is  very expensive .
Forecasts for the future of geothermal  शक्ति निर्भर on assumptions परिचय प्रौद्योगिकी , उर्जा कीमतें , subsidies ,  and interest rates .
Pilot  कार्यक्रम जैसे eweb 's ग्राहक ऑप्ट in ग्रीन शक्ति कार्यक्रम दिखाएँ कि ग्राहक  would be willing to pay a little more for a renewable energy source like geothermal .
But as a result of government assisted research and  उद्योग अनुभव , the लागत of generating geothermal शक्ति रै decreased by 25 %  over the past two decades .
In 2001 , geothermal energy cost  between दो और टेन सेंट प्रति सम्पात .
The term cubic foot is an Imperial and US  प्रथागत ( non- मीट्रिक ) ईकाई of आवाज़ , प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त राज्य और the संयुक्त  Kingdom .
It is defined as the volume of a cube with  पहलू of एक पैर ( 0.3048 m ) in  length .
To  गणना घन फीट गुणा लंबाई x चौडाई x  height .
Hồ Chí Minh ( Northern Vietnamese pronunciation : , Southern Vietnamese pronunciation : ) ;  19 may 1890 – 2 सितंबर 1969 ) , born nguyễn sinh cung और भी ज्ञात as nguyễn tất thành और nguyễn ái quốc , थी a वियतनामी कम्युनिस्ट क्रांतिकारी नेता जो थी प्रधान मंत्री  ( 1945–1955 ) and president ( 1945–1969 ) of the Democratic Republic of Vietnam ( North Vietnam ) .
He  थी a कुंजी फिगर in the न्यास of the लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of वियतनाम in 1945 , as खूब as the people’s फौज of वियतनाम  ( PAVN ) and the Việt Cộng ( NLF or VC ) during the Vietnam War .
He led the Việt Minh independence movement from 1941 onward , establishing the communist  -नियमd लोकतांत्रिक गणतंत्र of वियतनाम in 1945 और defeating the फ्रेंच संघ in 1954 at the बैटल  of Điện Biên Phủ .
He officially stepped down from power in 1955 due to health problems , but remained a highly visible figurehead and  प्रेरणा लिये those वियतनामी लड़ लिये उसके cause—a संयुक्त , कम्युनिस्ट vietnam—until उसके  death .
After the war , Saigon , capital of the  गणतंत्र of वियतनाम , थी renamed hồ chí मिन्ह नगर  .
All Roads  सीसे घर is a विशेषता फिल्मी released on सितंबर 26  , 2008 .
Directed by Dennis Fallon , it stars  पीटर बॉयल , patton oswalt , जेसन लंदन , vivien cardone , वैनेसा शाखा ,  Peter Coyote , Stephen Milton , and Allan Kayser .
The movie was  फिल्माया in और around कान्सास  City , Missouri .
The movie  बना इसके संसार प्रीमियर जनवरी 27 at the  Santa Barbara International Film Festival .
The film has also  recently महरूम in अनेक फिल्मी त्यौहार , और रै  received bad reviews .
Peter Boyle died  पहले the फिल्म 's रिलीज  .
It was the  पिछला फिल्म he appeared  in .
Sales taxes in the United States are  कर लगाई on the बिक्री or पट्टे of goods और सेवाएं in the  United States .
While no national general sales tax  exists , the संघीय सरकारी levies अनेक नेशनल चयनात्मक बिक्री कर  on the sale or lease of particular goods and services .
Furthermore , forty-five states , the  ज़िला of कोलंबिया , और गुआम थोपने सामान्य बिक्री कर कि लागू to the बिक्री or पट्टे of सबसे goods और कुछ सेवाएं  , and states also may levy selective sales taxes on the sale or lease of particular goods or services .
States may  भी प्रतिनिधि to लोकल सरकारें the प्राधिकार to थोपने अतिरिक्त सामान्य  or selective sales taxes .
Sales tax is  गणना by multiplying the खरीदें  price by the applicable tax rate .
Tax rates vary widely by  क्षेत्राधिकार और दायरा इससे कम  than 1 % to over 10 % .
Sales tax is collected by  the विक्रेता at the समय of  sale .
Use tax is  स्वः assessed by a खरीदार जो रै नहीं सशुल्क बिक्री कर  on a taxable purchase .
Unlike the value  added कर , a बिक्री कर is imposed तभी  once , at the retail level .
However , in cases where items are  बेची at खुदरा अधिक than एकबार , ऐसे as प्रयुक्त गाड़ियाँ , the बिक्री कर can be चार्ज  on the same item indefinitely .
The definition of retail sales and  कया goods और सेवाएं हैं taxable  vary among the states .
nearly सब jurisdictions provide numerous श्रेणी  of goods and services that are exempt from sales tax , or taxed at reduced rates .
The purchase of goods for  further manufacture or लिये पुनर्विक्रय is uniformly exempt इससे बिक्री कर .
Most jurisdictions exempt food sold in  किराना स्टोर्स , नुस्खा medications , और अनेक agricultural आपूर्तियाँ  .
Sales taxes , including those  imposed by लोकल सरकारें , हैं generally administered at the राज्य स्तर .
States imposing sales tax  आवश्यकता खुदरा विक्रेता to collect कर इससे ग्राहक , संचिका रिटर्न  , and remit the tax to the state .
प्रक्रियात्मक नियम  vary widely .
Sellers  generally जरूर collect कर इससे in-state purchasers  unless the purchaser provides an exemption certificate .
सबसे राज्य allow or आवश्यकता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक  remittance .
A  सेंट्रल प्रसंस्करण ईकाई ( cpu ) , भी referred to as a सेंट्रल प्रोसेसर ईकाई , is the हार्डवेयर भीतर a कंप्यूटर कि carries आउट the निर्देश of a कंप्यूटर  program by performing the basic arithmetical , logical , and input/output operations of the system .
The term  रै महरूम in उपयोग in the कंप्यूटर उद्योग at तनिक  since the early 1960s .
The form , design , and implementation of  cpu have बदला over the कोर्स of उनके इतिहास  , but their fundamental operation remains much the same .
A computer can have more  than एक cpu ; इस is पुकारा multiprocessing  .
Some integrated  circuits ( ics ) can contain अनेक cpu on a सिंगल चिप ; those ics हैं  called multi-core processors .
Two typical components of a CPU are the arithmetic logic  ईकाई ( alu ) , जिससे performs गणित और लॉजिकल परिचालन , और the कंट्रोल ईकाई ( cu ) , जिससे extracts निर्देश इससे मेमोरी और  decodes and executes them , calling on the ALU when necessary .
Not all computational systems rely  on a सेंट्रल प्रसंस्करण ईकाई  .
An array processor or vector processor  रै अनेक समानांतर कम्प्यूटिंग तत्व , साथ no  one unit considered the `` center '' .
In  the वितरित कम्प्यूटिंग मॉडल , समस्याएं हैं हल by a  distributed interconnected set of processors .
rfid चिप अगला to a  grain of rice .
This chip contains a  radio-frequency इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड कुंडली कि modulates an बाह्य चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र a coded पहचान क्रमांक जब  queried by a reader device .
This small type is incorporated in  उपभोक्ता उत्पाद , और implanted in पालतु  , for identification purposes .
Radio-frequency identification ( RFID ) is the wireless non-contact use of radio-frequency  इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक फ़ील्ड to ट्रांसफ़र आंकड़ा , लिये the उद्देश्य of automatically identifying और ट्रैकिंग टैग संलग्न to  objects .
The tags contain  electronically भंडारित सूचना  .
Some tags are powered and read at short  सीमाएँ ( a few मीटर ) via चुम्बकीय फ़ील्ड ( इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  induction ) .
Others use a local power  सोर्स ऐसे as a बैटरी , or else have no बैटरी लकिन collect उर्जा इससे the interrogating em फ़ील्ड , और तब अधिनियम as a passive transponder to emit  microwaves or UHF radio waves ( i.e. , electromagnetic radiation at high frequencies ) .
Battery powered tags may  operate at सैंकड़ों of मीटर  .
Unlike a bar code , the tag does not  necessarily need to be भीतर लकीर of sight of the रीडर , और may be अंतःस्थापित in the tracked ऑब्जेक्ट  .
RFID  टैग हैं प्रयुक्त in अनेक उद्योग  .
An RFID tag attached to an automobile  दौरान उत्पादन can be प्रयुक्त to track इसके प्रगति  through the assembly line .
दवाएँ can be tracked  through warehouses .
Livestock and pets may  have टैग injected , allowing धनात्मक पहचान  of the animal .
Since RFID tags can be attached to clothing , possessions , or even implanted  भीतर लोगों , the सम्भावना of पढना personally-linked सूचना बगैर सहमति रै उठाया गोपनीयता चिंताएं  .
Overtime is the  राशि of समय किसी works परे  normal working hours .
Normal  घंटों may be संकल्पित  in several ways:
by  कस्टम ( कया is माना स्वस्थ  or reasonable by society ) ,
by practices  of a दिए व्यापार or  profession,
by legislation,
by अनुबंध between नियोक्ता  and workers or their representatives .
Most nations have overtime labor laws designed to  dissuade or prevent नियोक्ता इससे forcing उनके कर्मचारी to कार्य excessively long घंटों  .
These laws may take into account other considerations than the  humanitarian , ऐसे as preserving the स्वास्थ्य of मजदूर so कि वे may continue to be उत्पादक  , or increasing the overall level of employment in the economy .
One common approach to regulating overtime is to  आवश्यकता नियोक्ता to अदा मजदूर at a उच्चतर hourly रेट लिये ओवरटाइम कार्य  .
Companies may choose to pay workers higher overtime pay  भी if नहीं obliged to do so by विधि , विशेषकर if वे मानना कि वे फेस a पिछड़ा झुकने सप्लाई वक्र  of labour .
Overtime pay rates can cause workers to work  longer घंटों than वे होता at a चपटा hourly रेट  .
Overtime  कानून , attitudes toward ओवरटाइम और घंटों of कार्य vary greatly इससे देश to देश और between  different economic sectors .
कल्पना of कड़ी between पृष्ठों on a विक  using a force-directed layout .
Force-directed graph drawing algorithms are a  क्लास of algorithms लिये आरेखण रेखाचित्र in an aesthetically pleasing  way .
Their purpose is to  स्थिति the नोड of a आलेख in two-dimensional or three-dimensional स्पेस so कि सब the किनारे हैं of अधिक or कम बराबर लंबाई और वहीँ हैं as few क्रासिंग किनारे as संभावित , by assigning शक्तियां among the नियत of किनारे और the नियत of नोड  , based on their relative positions , and then using these forces either to simulate the motion of the edges and nodes or to minimize their energy .
While graph  आरेखण can be a मुश्किल प्रॉब्लम , force-directed algorithms , होने शारीरिक simulations ,  usually require no special knowledge about graph theory such as planarity .
Purchasing power (  sometimes retroactively पुकारा समायोजित लिये महंगाई ) is the राशि of goods or सेवाएं कि can be खरीदा  with a unit of currency .
For example , if you had taken one  डालर to a स्टोर in the 1950s , तुम होता have महरूम समर्थ to ख़रीदे a वृहद क्रमांक of वस्तुएं than तुम होता आज , indicating  that you would have had a greater purchasing power in the 1950s .
Currency can be either a commodity money , like gold or silver  , or fiat करेंसी , or free-floating market-valued करेंसी जैसे us डॉलर  .
As Adam Smith noted , having money gives one  the क्षमता to `` कमांड '' अन्य ' मजदूर , so खरीदना शक्ति to कुछ extent is शक्ति over अन्य लोगों , to the extent कि  they are willing to trade their labor or goods for money or currency .
If one 's monetary income stays the same , but the price  स्तर increases , the खरीदना शक्ति of कि आय  falls .
Inflation does not always imply  गिरना खरीदना शक्ति of एक 's धन आय चूंकि it may वृद्धि तेज़  than the price level .
A higher real income means a  उच्चतर खरीदना शक्ति चूंकि रियल आय refers to the आय समायोजित  for inflation .
For a price  अनुक्रमणिका , इसके मान in the आधार साल is प्रायः सामान्यीकृत to a मान  of 100 .
The purchasing power of a unit of currency , say  a डालर , in a दिए साल , expressed in डॉलर of the आधार साल , is 100/p , जहाँ p is  the price index in that year .
So , by  परिभाषा the खरीदना शक्ति of a डालर decreases  as the price level rises .
The purchasing power in today 's money of an amount C of money , t years into the  भविष्य , can be computed साथ the सूत्र लिये the उपस्थित मान :
where in this  मामला i is an assumed भविष्य सालाना  inflation rate .
Education in South Korea is viewed as being crucial for success and  प्रतियोगिता is नतीजतन बहुत heated और fierce  .
A central administration oversees the  प्रक्रम लिये the शिक्षा of children इससे किंडरगार्टन to the तीसरा और फाइनल  year of high school .
Mathematics , science , Korean ,  अंग्रेज़ी , और सोशल अध्ययन हैं generally माना  to be the most important subjects .
Normally physical education is not  माना महत्वपूर्ण as it is नहीं recognised , by the generally अकादमिक elitist दक्षिण कोरियाई populace , as शिक्षा और इसलिए अनेक स्कूलों  lack high-quality gymnasiums and varsity athletics .
दक्षिण कोरियाई थी the पहला देश in the संसार to provide high-speed अंतरजाल  access to all primary , junior , and high schools .
Although South Korean  विद्यार्थी प्रायः रैंक अत्यधिक on अंतरराष्ट्रीय तुलनात्मक आकलन जब compared to विद्यार्थी of सबसे पश्चिमी शिक्षा प्रणालियों , the दक्षिण कोरियाई शिक्षा  system is criticised for emphasising too much upon passive learning and memorisation .
The South Korean education system is rather notably strict and  overly संरचित as compared to इसके counterparts in सबसे  Western societies .
Also , the prevalence of non-school for-profit private institutes such as academies or cram-schools (  hagwon [ 학원 ] ) , जिससे too emphasise on passive memorisation , as opposed to conceptual समझना , in विद्यार्थी हैं criticised  as a major social problem .
The My Lai Massacre ( , ; , , or ) was the Vietnam War mass murder of between 347 and 504  निहत्थे नागरिकों in दक्षिण वियतनाम on कूच 16 , 1968 , by संयुक्त राज्य फौज सैनिको of `` चार्ली '' कम्पनी of 1st बटालियन , 20th infantry रेजीमेंट  , 11th Brigade of the Americal Division .
Victims included women  , मेन , children , और infants  .
Some of the women were gang-raped  और उनके लाशें यहूद बाद मिला to be mutilated और अनेक महिलाओं यहूद allegedly  raped prior to the killings .
While 26 U.S. soldiers were initially charged with  दण्ड offenses लिये उनके क्रियाएँ at mỹ lai , तभी दूसरी लेफ्टिनेंट विलियम calley , a प्लाटून नेता in चार्ली  Company , was convicted .
Found guilty of killing 22  ग्रामीणों , he थी originally दिए a जीवन वाक्य ,  but only served three and a half years under house arrest .
The  नरसंहार took प्लेस in the hamlets of my lai और my  Khe of Son My village .
the इवेंट is भी ज्ञात as the  Son My Massacre , especially in the Vietnamese state media .
The U.S. military  codeword लिये the `` viet cong stronghold '' थी `` pinkville  '' .
The incident prompted  वैश्विक आक्रोश जब it became पब्लिक ज्ञान  in 1969 .
The massacre also increased domestic  विपक्ष to the u.S. भागीदारी in the वियतनाम  War .
Three U.S. servicemen who had tried to halt the massacre and protect the  wounded यहूद initially denounced by अनेक u.s . कांग्रेसियों as traitors  .
They  प्राप्त नफ़रत मेल और मौत खतरे और मिला mutilated  animals on their doorsteps .
The three were later widely praised and decorated by  the फौज लिये उनके वीर क्रियाएँ  .
The hijackers in the September 11 attacks were  19 मेन संबद्ध साथ al-qaeda , और 15 of the 19 यहूद नागरिकों of  Saudi Arabia .
Others were from  मिश्र , लेबनान , और  the UAE .
The  hijackers यहूद व्यवस्थित into चार टीमों , प्रत्येक led by a pilot-trained hijacker साथ चार `` मांसपेशी hijackers  '' who were trained to help subdue the pilots , passengers , and crew .
The first hijackers to arrive in the United States  यहूद खालिद al-mihdhar और nawaf al-hazmi , जो  settled in the San Diego area in January 2000 .
They were followed by three hijacker-pilots , Mohamed Atta ,  marwan al-shehhi , और ziad jarrah जल्दी in the गर्मियाँ of 2000 to undertake उड़ान  training in south Florida .
The fourth  hijacker-pilot , hani hanjour , arrived in सैन डिएगो  in December 2000 .
The rest of  the `` मांसपेशी hijackers '' arrived in the वसन्त और जल्दी गर्मियाँ of 2001 , बस  months before the September 11 attacks .
Abū al-Qāsim Muḥammad ibn ʿAbd Allāh ibn ʿAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim ( ) ( circa| 570 – circa| 8 June 632 ) , also  transliterated as मुहम्मद ( ) , थी a धार्मिक , राजनैतिक , और सैन्य नेता इससे मक्का जो एकीकृत अरब into a सिंगल धार्मिक  polity under Islam .
He is believed  by मुसलमान और bahá'ís to be  a messenger and prophet of God .
Muhammad is almost  universally माना by मुसलमान as the पिछला नबी  sent by God for mankind .
non-muslims लिहाज़ मुहम्मद as the संस्थापक of  Islam .
Muslims consider him to be the restorer of an  अनछुए असली monotheistic आस्था of आदम , नूह , अब्राहम , मूसा , यीशु , और अन्य नबियों  .
born in परिचय 570 ce in the arabian नगर of मक्का , he थी अनाथ at an जल्दी आयु और  brought up under the care of his uncle Abu Talib .
He later worked mostly as a merchant ,  as खूब as a गड़रिये , और थी पहला शादीशुदा  by age 25 .
Being in the habit of periodically retreating to a cave in the surrounding  kyu लिये अनेक नाइट्स of seclusion और दुआ , he बाद reported कि it थी वहीँ , at आयु 40 , कि he  received his first revelation from God .
Three years after this event Muhammad started preaching these revelations publicly ,  proclaiming कि `` परमेश्वर is एक `` , कि पूरा `` आत्मसमर्पण '' to उसे ( lit  .
islām ) is the only way ( dīn ) acceptable  to परमेश्वर , और कि he खुद थी a नबी और  messenger of God , in the same vein as other Islamic prophets .
Muhammad gained few  अनुसरणकर्ता जल्दी on , और थी मिले साथ  hostility from some Meccan tribes ; he and his followers were treated harshly .
To escape persecution , Muhammad  भेजा कुछ of उसके अनुसरणकर्ता to अबीसीनिया पहले he और उसके अनुसरणकर्ता in मक्का migrated to मदीना  ( then known as Yathrib ) in the year 622 .
This event , the Hijra , marks the beginning of  the इस्लामी पंचांग , जिससे is भी ज्ञात as the hijri पंचांग  .
In Medina ,  मुहम्मद संयुक्त the जनजातियों अंतर्गत  the Constitution of Medina .
After eight years of fighting with the  meccan जनजातियों , उसके अनुसरणकर्ता , जो by तब था grown to 10,000 , took कंट्रोल of मक्का in the largely शांतिपूर्ण  Conquest of Mecca .
He destroyed the  pagan मूर्तियों in the नगर और तब भेजा उसके अनुसरणकर्ता आउट to नष्ट सब  of the remaining pagan temples in Eastern Arabia .
In  632 , a few महीने बाद returning to मदीना इससे the विदाई यात्राएं  , Muhammad fell ill and died .
By the time of  उसके मौत , सबसे of the arabian प्रायद्वीप था परिवर्तित to islam , और he था संयुक्त अरब into  a single Muslim religious polity .
The  खुलासे ( or ayah , lit  .
`` Signs [ of God ] '' ) — which Muhammad  reported receiving जबतक उसके मौत – रूप the आयतें of the कुरान , regarded by मुसलमान as the `` शब्द  of God '' and around which the religion is based .
besides the कुरान , मुहम्मद 's जीवन ( सिरा ) और परंपराओं ( सुन्नत  ) are also upheld by Muslims as the sources of sharia law .
They  discuss मुहम्मद और अन्य नबियों of islam साथ reverence , adding the phrase सलाम be upon उसे  whenever their names are mentioned .
While conceptions of Muhammad in medieval Christendom and premodern times  यहूद largely ऋणात्मक , appraisals in आधुनिक इतिहास have महरूम दूर  less so .
This is a list of  टेबल of the सत्यापित oldest लोगों in the संसार in ordinal  rank , such as oldest person or oldest man .
In these tables , a supercentenarian is considered 'verified '  if उसके or उसके अर्जी रै महरूम validated by an अंतरराष्ट्रीय देह कि specifically सौदे in आयु शोध , ऐसे as the जराविद्या  Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records .
The longest  unambiguously प्रलेखित इंसान जीवनकाल is कि of jeanne calment of फ़्रांस ( 1875–1997  ) , who died at age 122 years , 164 days .
She met  विंसेंट वैन gogh जब वो  was 12 or 13 .
This led  to न्यूज मीडिया ध्यान in 1985 , बाद  Calment turned 110 .
Subsequent investigation found documentation for  calment 's आयु , परे कोई उचित सवाल , in the रिकॉर्ड of उसके देशी नगर , arles , फ़्रांस  .
More evidence of Calment 's lifespan has been produced than for any  अन्य supercentenarian ; उसके मामला serves as an archetype in the methodology लिये verifying the आयु of the  world 's oldest people .
The longest undisputed  जीवनकाल लिये पुरूष supercentenarians is कि of jiroemon  Kimura , who currently lives in Japan and is age as of .
Since the death of  115-year बूढ़ा दीना manfredini of the संयुक्त राज्य , on 17 दिसम्बर 2012 , किमुरा , born 19 अप्रैल 1897 , is  the oldest living person in the world whose age can be documented .
He has also been the oldest  जीना man चूंकि the मौत of 114-year बूढ़ा वाल्टर breuning  on 14 April 2011 .
Since the death of 115-year old Koto Okubo of Japan on 12  जनवरी 2013 , the oldest जीना स्त्री रै महरूम -year-old misao okawa , भी इससे जापानी , born on 5 कूच  1898 .
This is a timeline of the  african-american सिविल अधिकारों गति .
The Civil Rights  गति थी a स्वतंत्रता संघर्ष by अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी in the  1950s and 1960s to gain equality .
The goals of the  गति यहूद स्वतंत्रता इससे पक्षपात , बराबर अवसर in नियुक्ति , शिक्षा और आवास , the सही  to vote and equal access to public facilities .
Heavy metal ( often  referred to as मेटल ) is a विधा of चट्टान म्यूज़िक कि विकसित in the  late 1960s and early 1970s , largely in the United Kingdom and in the United States .
With roots in blues rock and psychedelic rock , the bands that created heavy metal developed a thick , massive sound ,  characterized by अत्यधिक प्रवर्धित distortion , विस्तारित गिटार solos , emphatic बीट्स ,  and overall loudness .
Heavy metal lyrics and performance  शैलियाँ हैं generally संबद्ध साथ मर्दानगी और machismo  .
The first heavy metal bands such  as led zeppelin , गहन जामुनी और ब्लैक sabbath आकर्षित विशाल ऑडियंस , हालांकि वे यहूद प्रायः derided by आलोचकों , a औकात  common throughout the history of the genre .
In the mid-1970s Judas Priest helped spur the genre 's  एवोल्यूशन by discarding much of इसके ब्लूज़ influence ; motörhead introduced a पंक  rock sensibility and an increasing emphasis on speed .
Bands in the New Wave of British  भारी मेटल ऐसे as आयरन maiden followed in a समान  vein .
Before the end of the decade , heavy metal  प्रशंसक became ज्ञात as `` metalheads `` or `` headbangers  `` .
During the  1980s , glam मेटल became a वाणिज्यिक फ़ोर्स साथ समूह  like Mötley Crüe and Poison .
Underground scenes produced an array of more extreme , aggressive  शैलियाँ : thrash मेटल broke into the मुख्यधारा साथ bands ऐसे as मेटालिका , मेगाडेथ , slayer , और एंथ्रेक्स , जबकि अन्य शैलियाँ of the सबसे  extreme subgenres of metal like death metal and black metal remain subcultural phenomena .
Since the mid-1990s , popular styles such as nu metal , which often incorporates elements of grunge and  हिप हॉप ; और metalcore , जिससे मिश्रणों चरम मेटल साथ हार्डकोर पंक , have further विस्तारित the  definition of the genre .
The  far-right ( भी ज्ञात as the चरम सही ) refers to the उच्चतम उपाधि  of rightism in right-wing politics .
Far right politics involves support of strong or complete  सोशल पदानुक्रम in समाज , और supports सर्वोच्चता of निश्चित individuals or समूह deemed to be innately श्रेष्ठ or अस्तबलों जो हैं to be अधिक valued than those deemed  to be innately inferior or undesirable .
The far right 's advocacy of supremacism is based on what its  adherents perceive as स्वाभाविक विशेषताएँ of लोगों कि can नहीं  be changed .
This stands as a  पाइंट of अंतर साथ the centre-right 's आरोपण of behaviours , ऐसे as  laziness or decadence , as the primary sources of social inequalities .
The  केन्द्र right—unlike the दूर right—claims कि लोगों can समाप्त उनके behavioural हीनता through बदलना उनके  habits and choices .
The  असली दूर सही , जिससे उभरा in फ़्रांस बाद the फ्रेंच क्रान्ति , refused to accept the फ्रेंच गणतंत्र  and supported a counter-revolution to restore the French monarchy and aristocracy .
The far right is  commonly संबद्ध साथ व्यक्तियों or समूह जो थाम चरम राष्ट्रवादी  , xenophobic , racist , religious fundamentalist or reactionary views .
The most extreme-right movements have pursued  दमन और नरसंहार विरूद्ध समूह of लोगों on the आधार of उनके कथित हीनता  .
Thomas  hobbes of malmesbury ( 5 अप्रैल 1588 – 4 दिसम्बर 1679 ) , in कुछ पुरानी ग्रन्थ थामस हाब्स  of Malmsbury , was an English philosopher , best known today for his work on political philosophy .
His 1651 book Leviathan established the foundation for most of Western  राजनैतिक दर्शनशास्त्र इससे the परिप्रेक्ष्य of सोशल अनुबंध  theory .
Hobbes was a champion of absolutism for the sovereign , but he also developed some of the fundamentals of European liberal thought  : the सही of the व्यक्तिगत ; the प्राकृतिक समता of सब मेन ; the कृत्रिम अक्षर of the राजनैतिक अनुक्रम ( जिससे led to the बाद भेद between सिविल समाज और the राज्य ) ; the दृश्य कि सब legitimate राजनैतिक शक्ति जरूर be `` प्रतिनिधि '' और आधारित on the सहमति of the लोगों  ; and a liberal interpretation of law which leaves people free to do whatever the law does not explicitly forbid .
He was  एक of the संस्थापकों of आधुनिक राजनैतिक  philosophy .
His understanding of humans as being matter and motion , obeying the same physical laws as  अन्य पदार्थ और गति , remains influential ; और उसके खाता of इंसान प्रकृति as self-interested सहयोग ,  and of political communities as being based upon a `` social contract `` remains one of the major topics of political philosophy .
In addition to political philosophy ,  hobbes भी contributed to a विविध सरणी of अन्य फ़ील्ड , सहित इतिहास , भूगोल , the भौतिकी of गैसों , धर्मशास्त्र  , ethics , and general philosophy .
Emotional intelligence ( EI ) is the ability  to पहचानो , assess , और कंट्रोल the भाव of oneself , of अन्य  , and of groups .
It can be divided  into क्षमता ei  and trait EI .
Ability EI is usually measured using maximum performance tests and has stronger  संबंध साथ परंपरागत प्रज्ञा , whereas trait ei is प्रायः measured using self-report questionnaires और रै stronger  relationships with personality .
Criticisms have centered on whether EI is a real  प्रज्ञा और whether it रै वृद्धिशील वैध over iq और the  Big Five personality traits .
Heredity is  the गुजर of traits to औलाद इससे इसके  parents or ancestor .
इस is the प्रक्रम by जिससे an औलाद कोशिका or सजीव acquires or becomes predisposed to the  characteristics of its parent cell or organism .
Through heredity ,  विसंगतियाँ exhibited by individuals can accumulate और कारण कुछ प्रजाति to evolve  .
The study of heredity in biology is  पुकारा आनुवंशिकी , जिससे शामिल the फ़ील्ड of  epigenetics .
For United  राज्य व्यक्तिगत आय कर , समायोजित सकल आय ( agi ) is कुल  gross income minus specific reductions .
taxable आय is समायोजित सकल आय ऋण भत्तों  for personal exemptions and itemized deductions .
For  सबसे व्यक्तिगत कर उद्देश्य , agi  is more relevant than gross income .
Gross income is sales price of goods  or प्रॉपर्टी , ऋण लागत of the प्रॉपर्टी बेची  , plus other income .
It includes wages ,  ब्याज , dividends , कारोबार आय , rental आय , और सब अन्य प्रकार of  income .
Adjusted  सकल आय is सकल आय कम deductions इससे  a business or rental activity and 21 other specific items .
Several deductions ( e.g . medical expenses and  विविध itemized deductions ) हैं सीमित आधारित on a प्रतिशत of  AGI .
Certain phase outs , including  those of निम्नतर कर दरों और itemized deductions , हैं आधारित on स्तर  of AGI .
Many states  आधार राज्य आय कर on agi साथ निश्चित deductions  .
`` Lazy Eye '' is the  तीसरा सिंगल इससे silversun pickups ' डेब्यू  album Carnavas .
The band performed the song  on the लेट दिखाएँ साथ दाउद लेटरमैन , the tonight दिखाएँ साथ jay लीनो , बाद साथ jools  Holland , and Last Call with Carson Daly .
The song is a  playable track on चट्टान बैंड 2 और गिटार नायिका  : World Tour .
An alternate  संस्करण of the सोंग , साथ a लंबाई of 7:27 , थी निभाई on xmu पहले the shorter  version was played on FM and other XM channels .
This version was featured on their demo  cd ( जिससे प्रदर्शित जल्दी संस्करण of चार ट्रैक्स  ) .
A telephone prefix is the first set of digits of a telephone number ; in the North  अमरीकी क्रमांकन योजना देशों ( देश कोड 1 ) , it is the पहला तीन अंक of a  seven-digit phone number .
In  अन्य देशों दोनो the उपसर्ग और the क्रमांक  may have different lengths .
It shows which exchange  the बाकी संख्याएँ refer to  .
A full telephone number is usually made up of country code ( required for  अंतरराष्ट्रीय काल्स तभी ) , क्षेत्रफल कोड ( जरूरी लिये काल्स between टेलीफोन क्षेत्रों  ) , prefix , and subscriber number .
Some places restrict  निश्चित prefixes to फैक्स संख्याएँ or कोशिका फोन तभी ; in अन्य स्थान  such dedicated prefixes are not used .
As telephone technology advanced , the precise significance of the prefix became blurred in many places ; 485 in London , UK , was once the GULliver  एक्सचेंज , लकिन अभी 44207485xxxx is बस माना एक of अनेक क्रमांक ब्लॉक परोसा by the clken kentish कस्बा एक्सचेंज  ; 4420770703xx is another .
Metformin ( BP , pronounced , ; originally sold as Glucophage  ) is an मौखिक antidiabetic ड्रग in the biguanide क्लास  .
It is  the first-line ड्रग of चुनाव लिये the उपचार of प्रकार 2 मधुमेह , in particular  , in overweight and obese people and those with normal kidney function .
Its use in  गर्भकालीन मधुमेह रै महरूम सीमित by  safety concerns .
It is also used in the treatment of polycystic ovary syndrome ,  और रै महरूम investigated लिये अन्य रोगों जहाँ इंसुलिन प्रतिरोध may  be an important factor .
Metformin works by  suppressing ग्लूकोज उत्पादन by the जिगर  .
Metformin is the only antidiabetic drug  कि रै महरूम conclusively दिखाया to prevent the cardiovascular जटिलताओं of मधुमेह  .
It helps reduce LDL  कोलेस्ट्रॉल और triglyceride स्तर , और is नहीं संबद्ध साथ वज़न  gain .
, metformin is one of only two  मौखिक antidiabetics in the संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन मॉडल सूची of अनिवार्य  Medicines ( the other being glibenclamide ) .
When prescribed appropriately , metformin causes  few प्रतिकूल प्रभाव ( the सबसे आम is जठरांत्र परेशान ) और is संबद्ध  with a low risk of hypoglycemia .
Lactic acidosis ( a buildup of lactate in the blood ) can be a serious concern in overdose and  जब it is विहित to लोगों साथ contraindications , लकिन वरना , वहीँ is no significant रिस्क  .
First synthesized and found to reduce blood sugar in the 1920s , metformin was  forgotten लिये the अगला दो दशकों as शोध shifted to इंसुलिन और अन्य  antidiabetic drugs .
Interest in metformin was rekindled in the late 1940s after several  रिपोर्ट्स कि it could reduce रक्त शुगर स्तर in लोगों , और in 1957 , फ्रेंच चिकित्सक जां sterne  published the first clinical trial of metformin as a treatment for diabetes .
It was  introduced to the संयुक्त किंगडम in 1958 , कनाडा in 1972  , and the United States in 1995 .
Metformin is now believed to be the most widely prescribed antidiabetic drug in the world ; in the United States  अलोन , अधिक than 48 लाख prescriptions यहूद भर in 2010 लिये इसके जेनेरिक formulations  .
The Mount  rushmore नेशनल मेमोरियल is a मूर्तिकला carved into the ग्रेनाइट फेस of माउंट rushmore निकट keystone , दक्षिण डकोटा  , in the United States .
Sculpted by Danish-American Gutzon Borglum and his son ,  lincoln borglum , माउंट rushmore सुविधाएँ sculptures of the heads of चार संयुक्त राज्य राष्ट्रपतियों : जार्ज वॉशिंगटन , थामस जेफरसन , थियोडोर  Roosevelt and Abraham Lincoln .
The  संपूर्ण मेमोरियल कवर  and is above sea level .
The tallest mountain in the  प्रदेश is harney शिखर  ( ) .
South Dakota historian Doane  रॉबिन्सन is credited साथ conceiving the विचार of नक्काशी the likenesses of प्रसिद्ध लोगों into the  Black Hills region of South Dakota in order to promote tourism in the region .
Robinson 's initial idea was to sculpt the Needles ;  however , gutzon borglum अस्वीकृत the needles साईट क्युकी of the ग़रीब विशेषता of the ग्रेनाइट और दमदार विपक्ष इससे पर्यावरणविद  and Native American groups .
वे settled on the माउंट rushmore स्थान , जिससे भी रै the लाभ  of facing southeast for maximum sun exposure .
Robinson wanted it to feature western heroes like Lewis and  क्लार्क , रेड बादल और भैंस विधेयक कोड़ी लकिन borglum decided the मूर्तिकला चाहिए have a अधिक नेशनल फ़ोकस , और chose the चार राष्ट्रपतियों  whose likenesses would be carved into the mountain .
After  securing संघीय funding , निर्माण on the मेमोरियल began in 1927 , और the राष्ट्रपतियों  ' faces were completed between 1934 and 1939 .
Upon Gutzon Borglum 's death in March  1941 , उसके बेटे lincoln borglum took over निर्माण  .
Although the initial concept  पुकारा लिये प्रत्येक अध्यक्ष to be चित्रित इससे सिर to कमर  , lack of funding forced construction to end in late October 1941 .
The U.S. National Park Service took control of the memorial in 1933 , while it  थी स्टिल अंतर्गत निर्माण , और रै प्रबंधित the मेमोरियल to the उपस्थित दिन  .
It attracts  nearly तीन लाख लोगों annually  .
Charvet dress  कमीज़ इससे the 1930s , norsk folkemuseum  , Oslo .
A shirt , dress shirt , button-front , button-front shirt , or  button-up कमीज़ is a परिधान साथ a कॉलर , a full-length खोलने at the सामने इससे the कॉलर to the हेम , और टाँक  with cuffs .
Shirts are  predominantly प्रयुक्त by मेन , चूंकि महिलाओं प्रायः पहनें  blouses .
The front opening  is fastened using बटन or studs , और the  cuffs close with buttons or cuff links .
Shirts are normally made from woven cloth , and are often  accompanied by a जैकेट और टाई , लिये उदाहरण साथ a सूट or formalwear , लकिन शर्ट  are also worn more casually .
In British English , dress shirt means  specifically the अधिक औपचारिक संध्या परिधान worn साथ black- or white- टाई , भी discussed  below .
Some  of ये औपचारिक शर्ट have stiff  fronts and detachable collars attached with collar studs .
The term `` button-down '' ( which refers a type of shirt which has a collar fastened down by buttons  ) is sometimes प्रयुक्त in गलती to लागू to सब शर्ट ( साथ or बगैर buttoned bas छल्लों ) , होने प्रयुक्त as a पर्याय लिये  `` button-up '' or `` button-front '' .
प्रशासनिक पेशेवर दिन ( भी ज्ञात as secretaries दिन or एडमिन दिन ) is an unofficial धर्मनिरपेक्ष अवकाश observed in अनेक देशों to recognize the कार्य of secretaries , प्रशासनिक assistants , receptionists  , and other administrative support professionals .
In North America , it is  मनाये on the बुधवार of the पिछला पूरा सप्ताह of अप्रैल ( अप्रैल  24 in 2013 ) .
in फ़्रांस it is मनाये on the तीसरा गुरुवार  in April ( April 18 in 2013 ) .
In Australia  it is मनाये on the पहला शुक्रवार  in May

Nicolas Poussin ( ; 15 June 1594 – 19 November 1665 )  थी the अग्रणी चित्रकार of the शास्त्रीय फ्रेंच बरॉक स्टाइल , हालांकि  he spent most of his working life in Rome .
His work is characterized by  स्पष्टता , लॉजिक , और अनुक्रम , और  favors line over color .
Until the 20th century he remained a major inspiration for  ऐसे classically उन्मुख कलाकारों as jacques-louis दाउद , jean-auguste-dominique ingres  and Paul Cézanne .
He worked in Rome for a  वृत्त of अग्रणी collectors वहीँ और elsewhere , मगर लिये a छोटी काल जब कार्डिनल रिचलू ordered उसे  back to France to serve as First Painter to the King .
Most of his works are history  paintings of धार्मिक or पौराणिक विषय कि बहुत प्रायः have a विशाल  landscape element .
Jackie Keith Whitley ( July 1 , 1954Stambler , Irwin , and Grelun Landon ( 2000 ) . - Country Music : The Encyclopedia . - New York : St. Martin 's Press . - p.533 . - ISBN  978-0-312-26487-1.—carlin , रिचर्ड ( 2003 ) . - देश म्यूज़िक : a biographical शब्दकोष . - नई यॉर्क : routledge - p.427 . - isbn 978-0-415-93802-0.—larkin , कोलिन ( 1995 ) . - the गिनीज ज्ञानकोष of लोकप्रिय म्यूज़िक . - नई यॉर्क : स्टॉकटन दबायें - p.4462 . - isbn 978-0-85112-662-3.—stanton , स्कॉट ( 2003 ) . - the tombstone पर्यटक : संगीतकारों . - नई यॉर्क : जेब किताबे . - p.395 . - isbn 978-0-7434-6330-0.—hicks , जोकर . - `` सिंगर कैथ whitley 's मेमोरी जिंदा through गीतों , प्रेम in घर कस्बा '' . - the केंटकी पोस्ट . - सितंबर 25 , 1991.—  '' Country Music Star Keith Whitley Dead at 33 '' . - Lexington Herald-Leader . - May 10 , 1989.——Hurst , Jack . - `` Whitley 's Last Days '' . - Chicago Tribune . - May 14 , 1989.— '' Alcohol Kills Country Singer Keith Whitley '' . - United Press International . - ( c/o The San Francisco Chronicle ) . - May 10 , 1989 . — May 9 , 1989 ) , known professionally as Keith Whitley , was an American country music singer .
Whitley 's brief career in  मुख्यधारा देश म्यूज़िक lasted इससे 1984 जबतक उसके मौत in 1989 , लकिन he continues  to influence an entire generation of singers and songwriters .
He charted 19 singles on the Billboard country charts , including five  लगातार क्रमांक ones : `` do n't बंद अपना आँखें `` , `` जब तुम कह nothing at सब `` , `` i 'm no अजनबी to the बरसात `` , `` i अचरज do तुम  Think of Me `` and `` It Ai n't Nothin ' `` ( the last two posthumously ) .
Statute of Grand  duchy of लिथुआनिया , लिखा  in Polish
A statute is a formal  लिखा enactment of a विधान प्राधिकार कि governs a राज्य  , city , or county .
Typically ,  statutes कमांड or prohibit कुछ , or घोषित  policy .
The word is often used to distinguish law made by legislative bodies  इससे मामला विधि , decided by न्यायालयों , और regulations जारी by सरकारी एजेंसियों  .
Statutes are sometimes  referred to as विधान or `` ब्लैक अक्षर  law . ''
As a  सोर्स of विधि , statutes हैं  considered primary authority ( as opposed to secondary authority ) .
Ideally all statutes must be  in सामंजस्य साथ the आधारभूत विधि of the जमीन ( संवैधानिक  ) .
This word is used in  contradistinction to the आम  law .
statutes acquire उनके फ़ोर्स इससे the समय  of their passage , however unless otherwise provided .
statutes हैं of अनेक kinds ; namely  , Public or private .
declaratory or remedial  .
अस्थाई or perpetual  .
A temporary statute is one which is limited  in इसके अवधि at the समय  of its enactment .
It continues in force until the  समय of इसके limitation रै समाप्त , जबतक  sooner repealed .
A perpetual statute is one for the continuance of which there is no limited time  , हालांकि it may नहीं be expressly घोषित to be so  .
If , however , a statute which  किया नहीं itself contain कोई limitation is to be governed by another जिससे is अस्थाई तभी , the पूर्व  will also be temporary and dependent upon the existence of the latter .
पहले a statute becomes विधि in कुछ देशों , it जरूर be सहमत upon  by the highest executive in the government , and finally published as part of a code .
In many countries ,  statutes हैं व्यवस्थित in topical इंतजाम ( or `` संहिताबद्ध '' ) भीतर publications पुकारा  codes , such as the United States Code .
In many nations statutory law is  विशिष्ट इससे और अधीनस्थ to संवैधानिक विधि  .
The  बाह्य iliac धमनियों हैं दो प्रमुख धमनियों जिससे bifurcate बंद the आम  iliac arteries anterior to the sacroiliac joint of the pelvis .
They proceed anterior and inferior along  the medial किनारा of the psoas प्रमुख मांसपेशियां  .
They exit the pelvic  girdle posterior और अवर to the वंक्षण स्नायु परिचय एक तीसरा laterally इससे the प्रविष्ट पाइंट of the वंक्षण स्नायु  on the pubic tubercle at which point they are referred to as the femoral arteries .
The external iliac  धमनी is प्रायः the धमनी प्रयुक्त to संलग्न the renal धमनी to the प्राप्तकर्ता  of a kidney transplant .
Steam is a digital distribution , digital rights management ,  एकाधिक और संचार मंच विकसित by  Valve Corporation .
It is used to  वितरित खेल और सम्बन्धित मीडिया ऑनलाइन , इससे छोटी स्वतंत्र डेवलपर to larger तन्त्र घरों  ; in October 2012 , Valve expanded the service to include non-gaming software .
Steam provides the user  साथ संस्थापना और स्वचालित प्रबन्धन of तन्त्र आरपार अनेक कंप्यूटर , जातियाँ सुविधाएँ  such as friends lists and groups , cloud saving , and in-game voice and chat functionality .
The software provides a freely available application programming interface , Steamworks , that developers can take advantage of to integrate many of  भाप 's कृत्यों भीतर उनके तन्त्र उत्पाद , सहित नक़ल सुरक्षा , नेटवर्किंग और matchmaking , in-game उपलब्धियाँ और micro-transactions , और support लिये user-created सामग्री  through Steam Workshop .
Though initially developed for use on  microsoft खिड़कियाँ , the क्लाएंट रै विस्तारित to शामिल os x और लिनक्स संस्करण , और क्लाइंट साथ सीमित  functionality on the PlayStation 3 console and for both iOS and Android mobile devices .
In addition to being a central hub for gaming  तन्त्र , वाल्व रै निर्मित a संस्करण of भाप साथ altered कार्यक्षमता to be प्रयुक्त in स्कूलों लिये शैक्षणिक तन्त्र , सहित a परिवर्धित संस्करण  of Portal 2 for teaching science and critical thinking lessons .
,  वहीँ हैं nearly 2000 खेल उपलब्धियाँ through भाप  , and 54 million active user accounts .
As  of जनवरी 2013 , भाप रै देखी over 6.6 लाख संयुक्त  players .
Steam has an  अनुमानित 50–70 % share of the डिजिटल वितरण मार्केट लिये वीडियो  games .
The Steam logo is a stylised  left-side fly-crank और लाठी इससे the walschaerts वाल्व गियर of a  steam locomotive .
Jerry Lewis (  born कूच 16 , 1926 ) is an अमरीकी हास्य  , actor , singer , film producer , screenwriter and film director .
He is known for his  slapstick ह्यूमर in फिल्मी , टेलीविज़न , स्टेज और रेडियो  .
He was  originally युग्म up साथ डीन मार्टिन in 1946 , forming the famed  comedy team of Martin and Lewis .
In  जोड to the duo 's लोकप्रिय nightclub कार्य , वे स्ट्रक्चर in a कामयाब  series of comedy films for Paramount Pictures .
Lewis is also known for his  दान fund-raising telethons और स्थिति as नेशनल अध्यक्ष लिये the muscular dystrophy  Association ( MDA ) .
Lewis has won  अनेक पुरस्कार लिये आजीवन उपलब्धियाँ इससे the अमरीकी कॉमेडी पुरस्कार , लॉस एंजिल्स फिल्मी आलोचकों संघ , और वेनिस  Film Festival , and he has two stars on the Hollywood Walk of Fame .
In 2005 , he  प्राप्त the राज्यपालों पुरस्कार of the अकादमी of टेलीविज़न कला & sciences फलक  of Governors , which is the highest Emmy Award presented .
On February 22 , 2009 , the Academy of  गति चित्र कला और sciences awarded लुईस the जां hersholt humanitarian  Award .
The Rhine ( ; ; ) is a European river that runs from the Swiss  कैण्टन of grisons in the southeastern स्विस ऐल्प्स through जर्मनी और आखिरकार बहती into the उत्तर समुद्र coast in the नीदरलैंड्स और is the बारहवीं longest नदी in यूरोपीय , at परिचय , साथ  an average discharge of more than .
The  राइन और the डेन्यूब formed सबसे of the उत्तरी अंतर्देशीय frontier of the रोमन साम्राज्य और , चूंकि those दिनों , the राइन रै महरूम  a vital and navigable waterway carrying trade and goods deep inland .
It has also served as a  रक्षात्मक विशेषता और रै महरूम the आधार लिये क्षेत्रीय और  international borders .
The many castles and  प्रागैतिहासिक fortifications साथ the राइन गवाही to इसके महत्व  as a waterway .
नदी ट्रैफ़िक could be रोका at ये स्थितियाँ , प्रायः लिये the purpose of collecting tolls ,  by the state that controlled that portion of the river .
Sri  ( सिंहली  )
Sri (  देवनागरी : श्री , iast ; śrī ) , भी transliterated as sree or shri or श्री is a शब्द of संस्कृत उत्पत्ति , प्रयुक्त in the भारतीय उपमहाद्वीप as विनम्र रूप of पता समतुल्य to  the English `` Mr. '' in written and spoken language , or as a title of veneration for deities ( usually translated as `` Holy '' ) .
Design of complex structures  जैसे the अंतरराष्ट्रीय स्पेस स्टेशन needs in-depth समझना of संरचनात्मक  Analysis .
Civil engineering is a professional engineering  अनुशासन कि सौदे साथ the डिज़ाइन , निर्माण , और मेंटेनेंस of the शारीरिक और naturally निर्मित पर्यावरण , सहित  works like roads , bridges , canals , dams , and buildings .
Civil engineering is the oldest engineering discipline  बाद सैन्य अभियान्त्रिकी , और it थी पारिभाषित to फर्क non-military  engineering from military engineering .
It is traditionally broken into several sub-disciplines including environmental engineering , geotechnical engineering , geophysics , geodesy , control engineering ,  संरचनात्मक अभियान्त्रिकी , biomechanics , nanotechnology , परिवहन अभियान्त्रिकी , धरती विज्ञान , वायुमंडलीय sciences , forensic अभियान्त्रिकी , नगरपालिका or शहरी अभियान्त्रिकी , जल संसाधन अभियान्त्रिकी , सामग्री अभियान्त्रिकी , तटीय अभियान्त्रिकी , सर्वेक्षण  , and construction engineering .
Civil engineering takes place on all levels : in the public sector from municipal through to national  सरकारें , और in the निजी सेक्टर इससे व्यक्तिगत homeowners through to अंतरराष्ट्रीय कंपनियाँ  .

कैथरीन dunham ( जून 22 , 1909 – may 21 , 2006 ) थी an अमरीकी नर्तकी , कोरियोग्राफर  , author , educator , and social activist .
Dunham had one of the most  कामयाब नृत्य करियर in अमरीकी और यूरोपीय थिएटर of the 20th सदी , और निर्देशित उसके अपना नृत्य कम्पनी  for many years .
She  रै महरूम पुकारा the `` matriarch और  queen mother of black dance '' .
दौरान उसके heyday in the 1940s और 1950s , dunham थी प्रसिद्ध throughout यूरोपीय और लैटिन अमेरिका और थी  widely popular in the United States , where the Washington Post called her `` dancer Katherine the Great '' .
For almost thirty years she maintained the Katherine Dunham Dance Company , the only  self-supported अमरीकी ब्लैक नृत्य troupe at कि समय , और over उसके long करियर वो choreographed अधिक than नब्बे व्यक्तिगत  dances .
Dunham was an innovator in African-American modern dance as  खूब as a नेता in the फ़ील्ड of नृत्य मानवशास्त्र , or ethnochoreology  .
Sphagnum is a genus of between 1510 and 3500  प्रजाति of mosses , commonly पुकारा peat मॉस due to इसके व्यापकता in गीला habitats जहाँ it contributes to the गठन of  peat bogs and mires .
Sphagnum accumulations can store water , since both living and dead plants can hold  विशाल quantities of जल अंदर उनके कोशिकाएं ; पौधे may थाम इससे 16-26 टाइम्स as much जल as उनके शुष्क वज़न depending  on the species .
The  खाली कोशिकाएं सहायता retain  water in drier conditions .
Hence , as sphagnum moss  grows , it can धीरे स्प्रेड into drier शर्तें , forming  larger peatlands , both raised bogs and blanket bogs .
These peat accumulations  तब provide आवास लिये a चौड़ी सरणी of peatland पौधे , सहित sedges  and ericaceous shrubs , as well as orchids and carnivorous plants .
sphagnum और the peat formed इससे it do नहीं क्षय readily क्युकी of the phenolic  compounds embedded in the moss 's cell walls .
In addition , bogs , like all wetlands , develop  अवायवीय मृदा शर्तें , जिससे produces धीमा अवायवीय क्षय बल्कि than एरोबिक  microbial action .
peat मॉस can भी acidify इसके परिवेश by लेने up cations  , such as calcium and magnesium , and releasing hydrogen ions .
Under the  सही शर्तें , peat can accumulate to a  depth of many meters .
अलग प्रजाति of sphagnum have अलग सहिष्णुता हद लिये बाढ़ और ph , so  any one peatland may have a number of different Sphagnum species .
व्यक्तिगत peat मॉस पौधे consist of a प्रमुख स्टेम , साथ tightly arranged क्लस्टर of शाखा fascicles प्रायः  consisting of two or three spreading branches and two to four hanging branches .
The top of the  संयंत्र , or capitulum , रै कॉम्पैक्ट क्लस्टर  of young branches .
Along  the स्टेम हैं बिखरे पत्ते of विभिन्न आकार , नामित स्टेम पत्ते ; the  shape varies according to species .
The leaves consist of two kinds  of कोशिकाएं ; छोटी , ग्रीन , जीना कोशिकाएं ( chlorophyllose कोशिकाएं ) , और विशाल , साफ , संरचनात्मक ,  dead cells ( hyaline cells ) .
The latter  have the विशाल water-holding  capacity .
The earliest version of the  संजाल कार्ड , जारी हस्तचालित बल्कि than through an aptis  machine .
The first APTIS  संस्करण of the संजाल  Card .
This was used from the start of the APTIS era in  1986/1987 जबतक खूब into the 1990s , as स्टॉक्स था to be प्रयुक्त up despite the परिचय of  the new-look orange-banded version in 1991 .
The introduction of the weekday minimum  किराया कंडीशन in 2002 resulted in a नाबालिग बदलें : the रेड `` r '' shows कि इस is the `` संशोधित  '' version of the railcard .
This version is  स्टिल in उपयोग as of  2007 .
The Network Railcard is a discount card  introduced in 1986 by अंग्रेजों रेल , upon the सृष्टि of उनके संजाल southeast क्षेत्रफल around लंदन , इंग्लैण्ड  .
The  कार्ड is intended to प्रोत्साहित अवकाश सफर by रेल by offering छूट लिये वयस्कों और accompanying children on  a wide range of off-peak fares .
The range of discounts available , and the price of the card , have varied since that time , but the card  रै सदा महरूम मान्य लिये a साल 's असीमित उपयोग  .
It can be purchased by any person aged 16 or over from any staffed National Rail station or Rail  नियुक्त सफर एजेंट , by completing an अनुप्रयोग रूप - no फ़ोटोग्राफ़िक पहचान or अन्य दस्तावेज़ीकरण  is needed to buy or use the card .
It is one of a number of  concessionary किराया योजनाएं उपलब्धियाँ on the अंग्रेजों  railway system .
The United  राष्ट्र ( un ; फ्रेंच : संगठन देस राष्ट्र unies , onu ) is  the world 's largest , foremost , and most prominent international organization .
The stated aims of the  संयुक्त राष्ट्र शामिल promoting और facilitating सहयोग in अंतरराष्ट्रीय विधि , अंतरराष्ट्रीय सुरक्षा , आर्थिक विकास , सोशल प्रगति , इंसान अधिकारों  , civil rights , civil liberties , political freedoms , democracy , and the achievement of lasting world peace .
The UN was founded in 1945 after World War II to replace the  लीग of राष्ट्र , to रोकें युद्धों between देशों , और to provide a मंच लिये संवाद  .
It contains  अनेक subsidiary संगठन to  carry out its missions .
At its founding ,  the un था 51 सदस्य राज्य ; as of 2011  , there are 193 .
From its  कार्यालयों around the संसार , the un और इसके specialized एजेंसियों decide  on substantive and administrative issues in regular meetings held throughout the year .
The organization has six principal organs : the General Assembly ( the main deliberative assembly ) ; the Security Council ( for deciding certain resolutions for peace and security ) ; the Economic and Social Council ( for assisting in  promoting अंतरराष्ट्रीय आर्थिक और सोशल सहयोग और विकास ) ; the सचिवालय ( लिये providing अध्ययन , सूचना , और सुविधाएं needed by the un ) ; the अंतरराष्ट्रीय अदालत of इंसाफ ( the प्राथमिक  judicial organ ) ; and the United Nations Trusteeship Council ( which is currently inactive ) .
Other prominent UN System agencies  शामिल the संसार स्वास्थ्य संगठन ( जो ) , the संसार खाना कार्यक्रम ( wfp ) और संयुक्त राष्ट्र  Children 's Fund ( UNICEF ) .
The UN 's  सबसे prominent स्थिति is कि of the दफ्तर of secretary-general जिससे  has been held by Ban Ki-moon of South Korea since 2007 .
The United Nations Headquarters resides  in अंतरराष्ट्रीय territory in नई यॉर्क नगर , साथ further प्रमुख  offices at Geneva , Nairobi , and Vienna .
The organization is financed from assessed  और voluntary योगदान इससे इसके सदस्य राज्य , और रै छह आधिकारिक भाषाएं : अरबी , चाइनीज , अंग्रेज़ी , फ्रेंच , रूसी  , and Spanish .
South Beach , also nicknamed SoBe , is a neighborhood in the  नगर of मियामी बीच , फ्लोरिडा , संयुक्त राज्य , स्तिथ due ईस्ट of मियामी नगर उचित between biscayne खाड़ी और  the Atlantic Ocean .
The area encompasses all of the  अवरोध आइलैंड्स of मियामी बीच दक्षिण of भारतीय  Creek .
This area was the first section of Miami Beach to be developed , starting in the 1910s , thanks to the development efforts of Carl G. Fisher , the Lummus Brothers ,  और जॉन S. कॉलिन्स , the latter जिनकी निर्माण of the कॉलिन्स सेतु provided the पहला vital जमीन कड़ी between मेनलैंड मियामी और the समुद्रतट  .
The  क्षेत्रफल रै गए through numerous कृत्रिम और प्राकृतिक परिवर्तन over the सालो , सहित a booming क्षेत्रीय  economy , increased tourism , and the 1926 hurricane , which destroyed much of the area .
As of 2010 , about 39,186  निवासियों सजीव in दक्षिण बीच  .
The United States presidential election of 1960 was the 44th  quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव , आयोजित on मंगलवार , नवम्बर 8  , 1960 .
The Republican Party nominated incumbent Vice-President Richard Nixon , while the Democratic  पार्टी मनोनीत जॉन F. कैनेडी , सीनेटर इससे मैसाचुसेट्स .
The incumbent President ,  रिपब्लिकन ड्वाइट D. आइज़नहावर , थी नहीं योग्य लिये re-election बाद  serving the maximum two terms allowed by the Twenty-second Amendment .
Kennedy was elected with a lead of 112,827 votes ,  or 0.17 % of the लोकप्रिय vote , giving उसे a विजय of 303 to 219 in the चुनावी कॉलेज ,  the closest since 1916 .
This was the first  चुनाव in जिससे सब पचास of the वर्तमान संयुक्त राज्य participated  .
A  क्रमांक of कारकों बताइये क्यों the चुनाव थी  so close .
Kennedy gained  चूंकि वहीँ थी an आर्थिक मंदी जिससे ठेस the लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन , और he था the लाभ  of 17 million more registered Democrats than Republicans .
Furthermore , the new votes that Kennedy  gained among catholics लगभग neutralized the नई मत निक्सन  gained among Protestants .
Kennedy 's  campaigning कौशल decisively outmatched  Nixon 's .
In the end , Nixon 's  जोर on उसके अनुभव carried छोटी वज़न , और he wasted उर्जा by campaigning in सब 50 राज्य बजाय  of concentrating on the swing states .
Kennedy used his large ,  well-funded अभियान संगठन to जीत the नामांकन , सुरक्षित समर्थन , और , साथ  the aid of the last of the big-city bosses , to get out the vote in the big cities .
He relied on running  mate lyndon B. जॉनसन to थाम the दक्षिण और प्रयुक्त टेलीविज़न effectively  .
This election is notable as being the first time in U.S. history that two sitting U.S . Senators ( Kennedy and Johnson ) were elected as president and vice-president  , a घटना कि रै महरूम दोहराया एकबार , by बराक ओबामा और जो बिडेन in 2008 ( in दोनो मामले , the अध्यक्ष थी the younger , अधिक जूनियर  senator ) .
A poster for a c. 1884 American  उत्पादन of मैकबेथ , अभिनीत थामस W. keene  .
Depicted , counter clockwise from top-left , are  : मैकबेथ और banquo मिलें the witches ; बस बाद the हत्या of डंकन ; banquo 's भुत  ; Macbeth duels Macduff ; and Macbeth .
Macbeth is a play  लिखा by विलियम शेक्सपियर  .
It is  माना एक of उसके darkest और सबसे  powerful tragedies .
Set in Scotland , the play dramatizes the  corroding मनोवैज्ञानिक और राजनैतिक प्रभाव उत्पादित जब इसके समर्थक , the स्कॉटिश रब मैकबेथ  , chooses evil as the way to fulfill his ambition for power .
he commits regicide to become किंग और तब furthers उसके moral descent साथ a शासनकाल of murderous  terror to stay in power , eventually plunging the country into civil war .
in the समाप्त , he loses सबकुछ कि देता अर्थ और purpose to  his life before losing his life itself .
the खेल is believed to have महरूम लिखा between 1603 और  1607 , and is most commonly dated 1606 .
The earliest account of  a प्रदर्शन of कया थी संभवतः शेक्सपियर 's खेल is अप्रैल 1611 , जब साइमन  Forman recorded seeing such a play at the Globe Theatre .
It was first published in the  folio of 1623 , संभवतः इससे a संकेत  book .
It was most  संभावित लिखा दौरान the शासनकाल of जेम्स i , जो था महरूम जेम्स vi of स्कॉटलैंड  before he succeeded to the English throne in 1603 .
James was  a संरक्षक of shakespeare’s एक्टिंग कम्पनी , और of सब the plays शेक्सपियर लिखा दौरान james’s शासनकाल  , Macbeth most clearly reflects the playwright’s relationship with the sovereign .
Macbeth is Shakespeare’s shortest tragedy , and  tells the स्टोरी of a वीर स्कॉटिश सामान्य नामित मैकबेथ जो receives a prophecy  from a trio of witches that one day he will become King of Scotland .
Consumed by ambition and spurred to  कार्रवाई by उसके बीवी , मैकबेथ हत्याएं किंग डंकन और takes  the throne for himself .
His reign is  racked साथ guilt और paranoia , और he जल्द becomes a tyrannical  ruler as he is forced to commit more and more murders to protect himself from enmity and suspicion .
The bloodbath swiftly takes Macbeth  और महिला मैकबेथ into realms of arrogance , दीवानगी  , and death .
Shakespeare 's source for the tragedy is the account of King Macbeth of  स्कॉटलैंड , macduff , और डंकन in holinshed 's क्रॉनिकल्स ( 1587 ) , a इतिहास of इंग्लैण्ड , स्कॉटलैंड और आयरलैंड परिचित to शेक्सपियर और उसके contemporaries  , although the events in the play differ extensively from the history of the real Macbeth .
In the backstage world of theatre , some believe that  the खेल is शापित , और होगा नहीं जिक्र इसके शीर्षक aloud , referring to it बजाय  as `` the Scottish play `` .
Over the course of many centuries , the  खेल रै आकर्षित कुछ of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध अभिनेताओं to the भूमिकाएँ of मैकबेथ और महिला  Macbeth .
It has been adapted to film , television  , ओपेरा , novels , कॉमिक किताबे , और अन्य मीडिया  .
The  मिल्टन hershey स्कूल is a निजी परोपकारी ( pre-k through 12  ) boarding school in Hershey , Pennsylvania .
Originally named the Hershey Industrial School ,  the संस्था थी संस्थापित और वित्तपोषित by चॉकलेट उद्योगपति मिल्टन snavely hershey और उसके बीवी , कैथरीन  Sweeney Hershey .
The school was originally established for impoverished ,  स्वस्थ , caucasian , पुरूष अनाथ , जबकि आज it serves विद्यार्थी of विभिन्न पृष्ठभूमि  .
The Milton Hershey School Trust , which funds the school , owns controlling interest in  the hershey कम्पनी और owns the hershey entertainment और रिसॉर्ट कम्पनी ( herco ) जिससे oversees अनेक  of the area hotels along with a theme park called Hersheypark .
With  over छह अरब डॉलर in एसेट , the मिल्टन hershey स्कूल is एक  of the wealthiest schools in the world .
The  स्कूल is overseen by a फलक  of Managers .
The school  फिलहाल serves 1,818 विद्यार्थी , और योजनाएँ to grow to 2,100 विद्यार्थी  by 2013 .
A  सदस्य of कोर : गठबन्धन लिये आवासीय शिक्षा , it  is the largest residential education program in the US .
