The Controlled  substances अधिनियम ( सीएसए ) थी enacted into विधि by the कॉंग्रेस of the संयुक्त राज्य as शीर्षक ii of the व्यापक  Drug Abuse Prevention and Control Act of 1970 .
The CSA is the federal U.S.  ड्रग नीति अंतर्गत जिससे the manufacture , importation , कब्ज़ा , उपयोग और वितरण of निश्चित  substances is regulated .
The Act also served as the national implementing  विधान लिये the सिंगल सम्मेलन on narcotic दवाएँ  .
The  विधान निर्मित पाँच schedules ( classifications ) , साथ  varying qualifications for a substance to be included in each .
Two federal agencies , the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug Administration , determine which substances are added to or removed from the various  schedules , हालांकि the statute passed by कॉंग्रेस निर्मित the आरंभिक लिस्टिंग , और कॉंग्रेस रै sometimes अनुसूचित अन्य substances through विधान ऐसे as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था reid date-rape रोकथाम अधिनियम of 2000 , जिससे लगाई गामा hydroxybutyrate in अनुसूची i . वर्गीकरण निर्णय हैं जरूरी to be बना on मापदण्ड  including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ) , currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States , and international treaties .
Second-language acquisition or  second-language सीखना is the प्रक्रम by जिससे लोगों सीख a दूसरी भाषा  .
Second-language acquisition (  प्रायः abbreviated to sla ) भी refers to the वैज्ञानिक अनुशासन devoted  to studying that process .
Second language refers to any language learned in addition to a person 's first  भाषा ; हालांकि the अवधारणा is नामित second-language अधिग्रहण , it can भी चरितार्थ the सीखना  of third , fourth , or subsequent languages .
second-language अधिग्रहण refers to कया learners do ; it करता  not refer to practices in language teaching .
The  अकादमिक अनुशासन of second-language अधिग्रहण is a subdiscipline  of applied linguistics .
It is  broad-based और अपेक्षाकृत  new .
As well as the various branches of  भाषाविज्ञान , second-language अधिग्रहण is भी closely सम्बन्धित to मनोविज्ञान , संज्ञानात्मक  psychology , and education .
To separate the academic discipline from the learning process itself , the terms second-language  अधिग्रहण शोध , second-language अध्ययन , और second-language अधिग्रहण अध्ययन हैं भी प्रयुक्त  .
SLA research began as an interdisciplinary  फ़ील्ड , और क्युकी of इस it is मुश्किल to पहचानो a precise starting  date .
however , it करता appear to have विकसित a ग्रेट सौदे  since the mid-1960s .
The term acquisition  थी originally प्रयुक्त to emphasize the अवचेतन प्रकृति of  the learning process , but in recent years learning and acquisition have become largely synonymous .
Second-language acquisition can incorporate heritage  भाषा सीखना , लकिन it करता नहीं प्रायः चरितार्थ bilingualism  .
Most SLA researchers see  bilingualism as होने the समाप्त परिणाम of सीखना a भाषा , नहीं the प्रक्रम  itself , and see the term as referring to native-like fluency .
Writers in fields such as  शिक्षा और मनोविज्ञान , however , प्रायः उपयोग bilingualism loosely to refer  to all forms of multilingualism .
Second-language acquisition is also not to be contrasted with the acquisition of a foreign  भाषा ; बल्कि , the सीखना of दूसरी भाषाएं और the सीखना of विदेशी भाषाएं involve the वही आधारभूत  processes in different situations..
There has been much debate  परिचय exactly कैसा भाषा is सीखे , और अनेक मुद्दे  are still unresolved .
There are many theories of second-language acquisition  , लकिन none हैं स्वीकृत as a पूरा स्पष्टीकरण by सब sla शोधकर्ताओं  .
Due to the interdisciplinary nature of the field of  second-language अधिग्रहण , इस is नहीं अपेक्षित to happen in  the foreseeable future .
Forbes list of billionaires is  an सालाना रैंकिंग of the संसार 's wealthiest लोगों , compiled और प्रकाशित by फोर्ब्स , an अमरीकी  national business magazine .
The total net worth of each individual on the list is estimated ,  in संयुक्त राज्य डॉलर , आधारित on उनके एसेट और हिसाब  for debt .
The list only represents each person 's valuation on a  सिंगल दिन , due to रोज़ fluctuations among एक्सचेंज दरों  and stock valuations .
The United States Secret Service is a U.S.  संघीय विधि प्रवर्तन एजेंसी कि is भाग of the संयुक्त  States Department of Homeland Security .
The sworn members are divided  among the खास एजेंटों और  the Uniformed Division .
Until March 1 , 2003 , the Service was  भाग of the संयुक्त राज्य विभाग of the राजकोष  .
The U.S. Secret Service  रै दो पृथक क्षेत्रों of responsibility:
Financial Crimes , covering missions such  as रोकथाम और छानबीन of counterfeiting of u.S. करेंसी और u.S.  treasury securities , and investigation of major fraud .
Protection , which entails ensuring the safety of current and former national leaders and their families , such as the President , past  राष्ट्रपतियों , वाइस राष्ट्रपतियों , अध्यक्षीय उम्मीदवार , visiting heads of राज्य , और विदेशी embassies ( प्रति an अनुबंध साथ the u.S. राज्य विभाग 's ब्यूरो of राजनयिक सुरक्षा  ( DS ) Office of Foreign Missions ( OFM ) , etc . )
The Secret Service 's initial responsibility was to  investigate counterfeiting of u.S. करेंसी , जिससे  was rampant following the U.S. Civil War .
The  एजेंसी तब विकसित into the संयुक्त राज्य ' पहला घरेलू  intelligence and counterintelligence agency .
Many of the agency 's missions were later taken over by subsequent agencies such as the Federal Bureau of Investigation ( FBI ) , Bureau of  दारू , तम्बाकू , firearms और विस्फोटक ( atf ) , आव्रजन और कस्टम प्रवर्तन ( बर्फ ) , और आतंरिक आय सेवा ( irs ) .
`` Me and Bobby McGee '' is a song  लिखा by क्रिस kristofferson और फ्रेड फोस्टर , originally performed by रोजर मिलर  .
Others performed the song  बाद , सहित kristofferson खुद , और janis joplin जो अव्वल the u.S. singles चार्ट साथ the सोंग in 1971 बाद उसके मौत , बनाना the सोंग the दूसरी posthumous  number-one single in U.S. chart history after `` ( Sittin ' On ) The Dock of the Bay `` by Otis Redding .
Franklin Delano Roosevelt ( or ; January 30 , 1882 – April 12 , 1945 ) , also known by his initials , FDR , was the 32nd President of the United States ( 1933–1945 )  और a सेंट्रल फिगर in संसार कार्यक्रम दौरान the mid-20th सदी , अग्रणी the संयुक्त राज्य दौरान a समय of विश्वव्यापी आर्थिक अवसाद और कुल  war .
A dominant leader of the  लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी और the तभी अमरीकी अध्यक्ष निर्वाचित to अधिक than दो शर्तें , he निर्मित a नई सौदे गठबन्धन कि realigned अमरीकी राजनीती बाद 1932 , as उसके  domestic policies defined American liberalism for the middle third of the 20th century .
With the  bouncy लोकप्रिय सोंग `` प्रसन्न दिनों हैं यहाँ again `` as उसके अभियान थीम , fdr पराजित लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन हर्बर्ट  Hoover in November 1932 , at the depth of the Great Depression .
Energized by his  निजी विजय over पोलियो , fdr 's unfailing आशावाद और सक्रियता contributed to a नवीकरण of the  national spirit .
He worked closely with British Prime Minister Winston Churchill and Soviet General  सचिव जोसेफ स्टालिन in अग्रणी the allies विरूद्ध जर्मनी और जापानी in संसार युद्ध ii , और restoring समृद्धि to the  nation 's economy .
In his first hundred days in office , which began March 4 , 1933 , Roosevelt spearheaded major legislation and issued a profusion of  कार्यपालिका आदेश कि instituted the नई सौदे —a किस्में of कार्यक्रम designed to उपज राहत ( सरकारी कार्य लिये the बेरोजगार ) , रिकवरी ( आर्थिक विकास ) , और सुधार ( through विनियमन  of Wall Street , banks and transportation ) .
The economy  improved rapidly इससे 1933 to 1937 , लकिन तब  relapsed into a deep recession .
The bipartisan Conservative Coalition that formed in 1937  prevented उसके पैकिंग the परम् अदालत or गुजर कोई considerable विधान ; it abolished अनेक of the राहत कार्यक्रम जब बेरोजगारी diminished दौरान  World War II .
Most of the regulations on business were ended about 1975–85 , except  लिये the विनियमन of वॉल गली by the प्रतिभूति और एक्सचेंज आयोग , जिससे  still exists .
Along with several smaller programs , major  surviving कार्यक्रम शामिल the संघीय जमा बीमे निगम , जिससे थी निर्मित in 1933 , और सोशल सुरक्षा  , which Congress passed in 1935 .
As World War II loomed  बाद 1938 , साथ the जापानी आक्रमण of चीन और the आक्रामकता of नाजी जर्मनी , fdr दिया दमदार  diplomatic and financial support to China and Great Britain , while remaining officially neutral .
His goal  थी to मेक अमेरिका the `` आर्सेनल of लोकतंत्र ``  which would supply munitions to the Allies .
In March 1941 , Roosevelt , with  congressional स्वीकृति , provided lend-lease सहायता to the देशों लड़ विरूद्ध नाजी जर्मनी साथ  Britain .
With very strong national support , he made war on Japan and Germany after the Japanese attack  on पर्ल हार्बर on दिसम्बर 7 , 1941 , कॉलिंग it a `` तिथि जिससे होगा  live in infamy `` .
He supervised the mobilization of the  u.S. अर्थव्यवस्था to support the अलाइड युद्ध प्रयत्न  .
As an active military leader ,  रूज़वेल्ट implemented an overall युद्ध रणनीति on दो fronts कि  ended in the defeat of the Axis Powers and the development of the world 's first atom bomb .
In 1942 Roosevelt ordered  the internment of 100,000 जापानी  American civilians .
बेरोजगारी dropped to 2 % , राहत कार्यक्रम largely ended , और the औद्योगिक अर्थव्यवस्था grew rapidly to नई हाइट्स as लाखो of लोगों स्थानांतरित to नई कार्य in युद्ध centers , और 16  million men and 300,000 women were drafted or volunteered for military service .
रूज़वेल्ट वर्चस्व the अमरीकी राजनैतिक झाँकी  not only during the twelve years of his presidency , but also for decades afterward .
He orchestrated  the realignment of मतदाता कि निर्मित the  Fifth Party System .
fdr 's नई सौदे गठबन्धन संयुक्त मजदूर संघ , बिग नगर मशीने ,  white ethnics , African Americans and rural white Southerners .
He also  बहकावे the बाद सृष्टि of the संयुक्त  Nations and Bretton Woods .
Roosevelt is  consistently रेटेड by विद्वानों as एक of the शीर्ष तीन u.S. राष्ट्रपतियों  , along with Abraham Lincoln and George Washington .
A liberal Democrat , Roosevelt defined his ideological  स्थिति as `` a छोटी बाएँ of बीच . ''
Mara Salvatrucha ( commonly abbreviated as MS ,  मारा , और ms-13 ) is a transnational दण्ड गिरोह कि originated in लॉस एंजिल्स और रै स्प्रेड to अन्य भाग  of the United States , Canada , Mexico , and Central America .
The majority of the gang is ethnically  रचित of सेंट्रल अमेरिकी और क्रियाशील in शहरी और  suburban areas .
In the U.S. , the MS-13 has an especially heavy presence in Los Angeles County and the San Francisco Bay Area in Northern California ; the Washington , D.C. metropolitan  क्षेत्रों of फेयरफैक्स काउंटी , वर्जिनिया , मोंटगोमरी काउंटी , मेरीलैंड , और प्रिंस जार्ज 's काउंटी , मेरीलैंड ; long द्वीप , नई यॉर्क ; the बोस्टन , मैसाचुसेट्स क्षेत्रफल ; शेर्लोट  , North Carolina ; and Houston , Texas .
There is also a  उपस्थिति of ms-13 in टोरंटो , ओंटारियो  , Canada .
Members of MS  फर्क themselves by टैटू covering the देह और भी प्रायः  the face , as well as the use of their own sign language .
They are  बदनाम लिये उनके उपयोग of हिंसा और a subcultural moral कोड कि predominantly  consists of merciless revenge and cruel retributions .
This cruelty of the distinguished members of the `` Maras '' or `` Mareros '' earned them a path to be recruited by the  sinaloa कार्टेल battling विरूद्ध लॉस zetas in an जारी ड्रग युद्ध दक्षिण of the संयुक्त राज्य किनारा  .
Their wide-ranging activities have drawn  the ध्यान of the एफबीआई और आव्रजन और कस्टम प्रवर्तन , जो have initiated wide-scale छापे विरूद्ध ज्ञात और suspected  gang members – netting hundreds of arrests across the country .
Bones is an  अमरीकी अपराधों comedy-drama टेलीविज़न श्रेणी कि premiered on the फॉक्स संजाल in the संयुक्त राज्य on सितंबर  13 , 2005 .
The show is based on forensic anthropology and forensic archaeology , with each episode focusing on an FBI case file concerning the mystery behind human remains brought  by एफबीआई खास एजेंट seeley बूथ ( दाउद boreanaz ) to the forensic anthropologist dr. temperance `` हड्डियों '' ब्रेनन ( एमिली deschanel  ) .
The rest of the main  डाल शामिल michaela conlin , T. J. thyne , eric millegan ,  Tamara Taylor , Jonathan Adams , and John Francis Daley .
Created by Hart Hanson , the series is very loosely based on the life and writings of  उपन्यासकार और forensic anthropologist कैथी reichs , जो भी produces  the show .
Its title character , Temperance Brennan , is named  बाद the समर्थक of reichs ' अपराधों अनोखा श्रेणी  .
Conversely , Dr. Brennan writes successful mystery novels based  around a fictional ( in the हड्डियों ब्रह्मांड ) forensic anthropologist  named Kathy Reichs .
Bones is a joint  उत्पादन by जोसेफसन entertainment , दूर फ़ील्ड प्रोडक्शन्स और 20th  Century Fox Television .
The series has completed airing  इसके आठवीं ऋतु और रै महरूम नवीनीकृत लिये a  ninth season .
Super Bowl XXV was an American football game between the American Football  सम्मेलन ( afc ) चैंपियन भैंस बिल्स और the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) चैंपियन नई यॉर्क दिग्गज to decide the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ) चैंपियन लिये the  1990 season .
the दिग्गज पराजित the बिल्स by the स्कोर of 20–19 , जीतना  their second ever Super Bowl .
It is the  तभी सुपर कटोरी decided by  one point .
The game was held at  tampa स्टेडियम in tampa , फ्लोरिडा , on जनवरी 27 , 1991 , दौरान the  height of the Gulf War .
It was  यूँ निभाई अंतर्गत  much patriotic fervor .
The proceedings included a  rousing rendition of `` the star-spangled ध्वज `` by व्हिटनी ह्यूस्टन दौरान  the pregame ceremonies .
The Bills and their explosive  no-huddle ठोकर यहूद बनाना उनके पहला सुपर कटोरी रूप बाद finishing  the regular season with a 13-3 record , and leading the league in total points scored with 428 .
In advancing to their second  सुपर कटोरी , the दिग्गज भी posted a 13-3 नियमित ऋतु रिकार्ड , लकिन साथ a ball-control  offense and a defense that allowed a league low 211 points .
The game is best  remembered लिये बिल्स placekicker स्कॉट नॉर्वुड 's last-second फ़ील्ड लक्ष्य attempt जिससे गई चौड़ी सही of the uprights  , leading to a Giants victory , and starting a four-game losing streak in the Super Bowl for the Bills .
The  दिग्गज नियत a सुपर कटोरी रिकार्ड पकड़कर कब्ज़ा of  the ball for 40 minutes and 33 seconds .
New York  भी overcame a 12-3 second-quarter deficit , और बना  a 75-yard touchdown drive that consumed a Super Bowl record 9:29 off the clock .
Giants running back Ottis Anderson , who  carried the बॉल 21 टाइम्स लिये 102 गज और एक touchdown , थी नामित सुपर कटोरी mvp  .
He was the  पहला awardee to प्राप्त the newly नामित `` पीट rozelle ट्रॉफी '' ( नामित लिये the पूर्व  commissioner ) .
Anderson also recorded one  रिसेप्शन लिये सात गज .
Malcolm X ( ; May 19 , 1925February 21 , 1965 ) , born  मैल्कम छोटी और भी ज्ञात as el-hajj malik el-shabazz ( ) , थी an african-american मुस्लिम मंत्री और  human rights activist .
To his admirers , he was a  साहसी एडवोकेट लिये the अधिकारों of अश्वेतों , a man जो indicted श्वेत  America in the harshest terms for its crimes against black Americans .
Detractors accused him  of उपदेश जातिवाद , ब्लैक सर्वोच्चता  , and violence .
He has been called one of the greatest and most  influential अफ़्रीकी अमेरिकी in इतिहास  .
Malcolm X 's father  died—killed by श्वेत supremacists , it थी rumored—when he थी यंग ,  and at least one of his uncles was lynched .
When he was 13 , his  माँ थी लगाई in a दिमागी हॉस्पिटल , और he थी लगाई  in a series of foster homes .
In 1946 , at  आयु 20 , he गई to थाना लिये  breaking and entering .
In prison , Malcolm X became a member of the Nation of Islam ; after his  पैरोल in 1952 , he जल्दी रोज़ to become एक of इसके नेताओ  .
For a dozen  सालो , मैल्कम x थी the पब्लिक फेस of the विवादास्पद समूह , लकिन मोहभंग साथ स्वदेश of islam सिर  Elijah Muhammad led him to leave the Nation in March 1964 .
After a period of travel in Africa and the Middle East , he returned to the  संयुक्त राज्य , जहाँ he संस्थापित मुस्लिम मस्जिदे , inc. और the संगठन of afro-american एकता  .
In February 1965 , less  than a साल बाद leaving the स्वदेश of islam , he थी assassinated  by three members of the group .
मैल्कम x 's expressed मान्यताओं बदला substantially  over time .
As a spokesman for the Nation of Islam he taught black supremacy and advocated separation of black and white  अमेरिकी —in कंट्रास्ट to the सिविल अधिकारों गति 's जोर on संयोजन  .
After  तोड़कर साथ the स्वदेश of islam in 1964—saying  of his association with it , `` I did many things as a [ Black ] Muslim that I 'm sorry for now .
I was a zombie then ... pointed in a certain direction and told to  कूच '' —and बनने a सुन्नी मुस्लिम , he disavowed जातिवाद और expressed willingness to कार्य साथ सिविल अधिकारों नेताओ , he जारी  to emphasize Pan-Africanism , black self-determination , and self-defense .
The third season of 90210  , an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न श्रेणी , premiered on सोमवार सितंबर 13 ,  2010 .
The CW  officially नवीनीकृत the दिखाएँ लिये a तीसरा  season on February 16 , 2010 .
With  the खुलासा of the संजाल पतन 2010 अनुसूची , वे घोषित  their decision to move 90210 to Monday nights at 8:00 pm , as a lead-in to Gossip Girl .
It premiered on September 13 , 2010 and was  मिले साथ generally धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों  .
the ऋतु चयन up at the समाप्त of गर्मियाँ और focuses  on the students senior year of high school .
It follows Adrianna 's rise to fame , a new  संबंध between चांदी और navid और a उलझन टेडी जो decides to खुलासा to उसके  family and friends he is gay .
It  भी सौदे साथ the aftermath  of Naomi Clark 's assault .
Regular cast members for the season included Shenae Grimes , Tristan Wilds ,  annalynne mccord , रयान eggold , जेसिका stroup , माइकल steger , जेसिका  Lowndes , Matt Lanter , Gillian Zinser , Trevor Donovan and Lori Loughlin .
Rebecca  sinclair जारी उसके भूमिका as कार्यपालिका  producer for the season .
The  ऋतु premiered to 1.96 लाख दर्शक और a 0.9 दरजा  in the adults 18–49 demographic .
Christmas-themed episode `` Holiday  दीवानगी '' , hit ऋतु highs  in all key demos with 2.1 in The CW 's target demo of women 18–34 , a 1.4 in adults 18–34 and a 1.1 in adults 18–49 .
It was also the most watched  एपीसोड in over a साल साथ 2.2 लाख दर्शक ट्यूनिंग in .
The  ऋतु finale aired on may 16  , 2011 .
the ऋतु averaged 1.75 लाख सजीव दर्शक  and a 0.9 adults 18–49 rating .
It was released on DVD in  the संयुक्त राज्य on अगस्त 30 , 2011 .
Elizabeth II (  एलिज़ाबेथ एलेक्जेंड्रा मरियम ; born 21 अप्रैल 1926 ) is the संवैधानिक monarch of 16 sovereign राज्य , ज्ञात as the राष्ट्रमंडल realms , और उनके territories  and dependencies , and head of the 54-member Commonwealth of Nations .
She is Supreme Governor of the Church of  इंग्लैण्ड और , in कुछ of उसके realms , carries the शीर्षक of defender of the आस्था as भाग of उसके पूरा  title .
On her accession on 6 February 1952 , Elizabeth became Head of the Commonwealth and queen regnant of seven  स्वतंत्र राष्ट्रमंडल देशों : the संयुक्त किंगडम , कनाडा , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , नई जीलैंड , दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी , पाकिस्तानी और ceylon  .
From 1956 to 1992 , the number  of उसके realms varied as territories gained स्वतंत्रता  and some realms became republics .
At present , in addition to the first four aforementioned countries , Elizabeth is Queen of Jamaica , Barbados , the Bahamas , Grenada , Papua New Guinea , the Solomon  आइलैंड्स , तुवालू , संत लूसिया , संत विंसेंट और the grenadines , बेलीज़ , अण्टीगुआ और बारबूडा और संत किट्स  and Nevis .
Her reign of years is  फिलहाल the दूसरी longest लिये a अंग्रेजों monarch ; तभी महारानी विक्टोरिया रै reigned longer  at over 63 years .
Elizabeth was born  in लंदन और शिक्षित privately  at home .
उसके पिता acceded to the सिंहासन as जार्ज vi in 1936 on the abdication of  his brother Edward VIII , from which time she was the heir presumptive .
She  began to undertake पब्लिक कर्तव्य दौरान  the Second World War , in which she served in the Auxiliary Territorial Service .
In 1947 , she  शादीशुदा प्रिंस फिलिप , ड्यूक of एडिनबर्ग , साथ जिसको वो रै  four children : Charles , Anne , Andrew , and Edward .
Her  राजतिलक सेवा took प्लेस in 1953 और थी the पहला  to be televised .
The Queen  's अनेक ऐतिहासिक विज़िट और बैठक शामिल a राज्य विज़िट to the गणतंत्र of आयरलैंड और reciprocal  visits to and from the Pope .
The Queen  रै देखी प्रमुख संवैधानिक परिवर्तन in उसके realms , ऐसे as devolution in the संयुक्त किंगडम और the  patriation of the Canadian constitution .
Times of personal significance have included the births and marriages of her children , the births of her grandchildren ,  the प्रतिष्ठापन of the प्रिंस of वेल्स , और the जश्न of माइलस्टोन ऐसे as उसके चांदी , सुनहरी , और डायमंड jubilees in 1977 , 2002 ,  and 2012 , respectively .
Major events in the Queen 's reign have included the  परेशानियों in उत्तरी आयरलैंड , the falklands युद्ध , युद्धों साथ इराकी और the  War in Afghanistan .
There have been times of personal sorrow for her which include the death of her father at 56 , the assassination of Prince  फिलिप 's ताऊ , रब माउंटबेटन , the विश्लेषण of उसके children 's विवाह in 1992 ( a साल deemed उसके annus horribilis ) , the  death in 1997 of her former daughter-in-law , Diana , Princess of Wales , and the deaths of her mother and sister in 2002 .
The Queen has occasionally faced  कठोर दबायें आलोचना of the royal परिवार और रिपब्लिकन sentiments , लकिन support लिये the साम्राज्य और उसके  personal popularity remain high .
The 2010 United States Senate election in Florida took place  on नवम्बर 2 , 2010 साथ साथ अन्य चुनावों to the संयुक्त राज्य सीनेट in अन्य राज्य as खूब as सब चुनावों to  the United States House of Representatives and various state and local elections .
Republican Marco Rubio , former Speaker of the Florida House of Representatives ,  पराजित स्वतंत्र चार्ली crist और डेमोक्रेट kendrick नम्र in a three-way  race .
One term Senator Mel Martinez was elected  in a बहुत बंद रेस विरूद्ध डेमोक्रेट बेट्टी अरंडी in 2004 साथ 49  % of the vote .
Martinez announced on December 2 , 2008 that  he होता नहीं तलाश re-election to the सीनेट , और होता इस्तीफा prior to the  end of his term .
In August 2009 ,  राज्यपाल चार्ली crist घोषित कि he होता नियुक्त  his former Chief of Staff , George LeMieux , a Republican , to the Senate seat being vacated by Martinez .
Governor Crist publicly  घोषित he थी कार्यशील लिये the सीट  in mid-2009 .
At the time he received many Republican endorsements , such as  the नेशनल रिपब्लिकन senatorial कमेटी , मार्टिनेज , और the 2008 रिपब्लिकन अध्यक्षीय nominee  John McCain .
His  support of the अमरीकी रिकवरी और reinvestment  Act of 2009 hurt his popularity among conservatives , and candidate Marco Rubio surged .
In April 2010 Crist  घोषित he होता बूँद आउट of the रिपब्लिकन प्राथमिक और चलाएं as an स्वतंत्र  .
The National Republican Senatorial Committee withdrew its endorsement of  crist और मांगे a refund of इसके अभियान निधि कि it provided लिये the crist अभियान  .
Congressman  kendrick नम्र थी the पहला डेमोक्रेट to घोषित  his intention to run .
सिकंदर snitker थी the पहला सदस्य of the libertarian पार्टी  on the ballot for senator in Florida 's history .
उपग्रह दृश्य  of Doha
Doha ( , ' or ' , literally :  `` the बिग पेड़ '' ) is the पूंजी नगर of the राज्य of क़तर  .
Located on the  coast of the पारसी गल्फ  ,
it had a  जनसांख्यिकी of 998,651 in 2008 , और is भी  one of the municipalities of Qatar .
Doha  is क़तर 's largest नगर , साथ over 60 % of the स्वदेश 's जनसांख्यिकी residing in दोहा or इसके surrounding  suburbs , and is also the economic centre of the country .
Doha also serves as the seat of  सरकारी of क़तर , जिससे is शासित by शेख़ हमद बिन खलीफा al थानी  .
दोहा is घर to the शिक्षा नगर  , an area devoted to research and education .
Doha was the site of the first  ministerial-level बैठक of the दोहा विकास गोलाकार of संसार व्यापार संगठन  negotiations .
The city of  दोहा आयोजित the 2006 एशियाई खेल , जिससे थी the  largest Asian Games ever held .
Doha also hosted the 2011  पण अरब खेल और सबसे of the खेल at the 2011  AFC Asian Cup .
Doha hosted the UNFCCC Climate  negotiations ( cop 18 ) दिसम्बर 2012 और होगा मेजबान a विशाल क्रमांक of the venues लिये the 2022 फीफा संसार  Cup .
The  संसार पेट्रोलियम परिषद आयोजित the 20th संसार पेट्रोलियम सम्मेलन  in Doha in December 2011 .
paranasal साइनस हैं a समूह of चार युग्म air-filled स्पेसेस कि घेर the nasal गुहा ( ऊर्ध्वहनु साइनस ) , ऊपर  the eyes ( frontal sinuses ) , between the eyes ( ethmoid sinuses ) , and behind the ethmoids ( sphenoid sinuses ) .
The sinuses are named  लिये the फेशियल हड्डियों in जिससे वे हैं स्तिथ  .
Lean manufacturing , lean enterprise , or lean production , often simply , `` Lean , '' is a  उत्पादन अभ्यास कि considers the व्यय of संसाधन लिये कोई लक्ष्य अन्य than the सृष्टि of मान लिये the समाप्त ग्राहक to be अपव्यय , और यूँ a निशाना  for elimination .
Working from the perspective of the customer who consumes a product or service  , `` मान '' is पारिभाषित as कोई कार्रवाई or प्रक्रम कि a ग्राहक होता be willing to  pay for .
essentially , झुकना is केन्द्रित on  preserving value with less work .
Lean  निर्माण is a प्रबन्धन दर्शनशास्त्र निकला ज़्यादातर इससे the टोयोटा उत्पादन प्रणाली ( tps ) ( hence the पद toyotism is भी  prevalent ) and identified as `` Lean '' only in the 1990s .
TPS is  प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके फ़ोकस on कटौती of the असली टोयोटा सात wastes to improve overall ग्राहक मान  , but there are varying perspectives on how this is best achieved .
The  स्थिर विकास of टोयोटा , इससे a छोटी कम्पनी to the संसार 's largest automaker  , has focused attention on how it has achieved this success .
icarly लोगो
icarly is an अमरीकी sitcom कि airs on निकलोडियन  , which premiered on September 8 , 2007 .
Nickelodeon promoted many  एपीसोड so दूर ऐसे as `` ido '' , `` ihire an idiot '' , `` ipity the nevel '' , `` idate sam & फ्रेडी ''  , etc . as specials , despite their being regular episodes .
Every  एपीसोड शीर्षक begins साथ a निम्नतर मामला i जिससे represents  the internet , as in `` iCarly '' .
The show  थी मनोनीत लिये an एमी पुरस्कार लिये बकाया  Children 's Program in 2009 .
the श्रेणी अभिनीत मिरांडा cosgrove as कार्ली शे , a 13-year-old  who becomes an Internet star .
The  श्रेणी ended on नवम्बर 23 , 2012 साथ the one-hour खास  episode `` iGoodbye '' .
A total of 7 seasons  और 109 एपीसोड यहूद ब्रॉडकास्ट .
The largest audience of the  श्रेणी थी 11.2 लाख दर्शक , साथ the खास एपीसोड `` isaved अपना जीवन '' premiered  in January 2010 .
When Carly ( Miranda Cosgrove ) and her  sassy बेहतरीन dost sam ( jennette mccurdy ) अधिनियम मजेदार at a स्कूल हुनर दिखाएँ ऑडिशन , tech-savvy फ्रेडी  ( Nathan Kress ) tapes it and posts it online without telling them .
After seeing the girls ' strong chemistry and  banter , the ऑनलाइन दर्शक clamors लिये अधिक और the icarly वेबकास्ट  is born .
While grappling with typical issues of adolescence , Carly , Sam , and Freddie find out that they have also become online  हस्तियाँ as उनके दिखाएँ – जिससे सुविधाएँ हुनर प्रतियोगिताओं , व्यंजनों , problem-solving , और यादृच्छिक नाचना – garners अंतरराष्ट्रीय accolades  .
Carly lives in Seattle , Washington  साथ उसके 26-year-old bhai और संरक्षक स्पेंसर ( जेरी trainor ) और produces  the show in a makeshift third-floor studio loft in their apartment .
Their mother has never been seen or mentioned , but their father , Steven Shay ( David Chisum ) , is  a u.S. एयर फ़ोर्स अधिकारी temporarily stationed on a पनडुब्बी , और is प्रायः उल्लेखित लकिन is तभी देखी in व्यक्ति दौरान the श्रेणी finale एपीसोड , `` igoodbye  '' .
Westlife were an Irish boy  बैंड जिससे formed in 1998 और disbanded  in 2012 .
Originally signed by Simon Cowell and managed by Louis Walsh , the  समूह 's फाइनल line-up consisted of nicky byrne , kian egan , चिह्नित feehily  and Shane Filan .
Brian McFadden was a member from 1998  जबतक उसके प्रस्थान in 2004 .
Westlife sold over 50 million  रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी , a कुल कि शामिल स्टुडियो एल्बम , singles , वीडियो  releases , and compilation albums .
The group accumulated 14 number-one  singles in the संयुक्त किंगडम ( the third-highest in uk इतिहास ) , tying साथ चट्टान रिचर्ड  and ranking just behind The Beatles and Elvis Presley .
They achieved a total of 26 top ten  singles over उनके 14-year करियर .
By 2010 , Westlife was  सूचीबद्ध in the गिनीज संसार रिकॉर्ड , as the uk 's top-selling एल्बम समूह of the 21st  century .
They  भी जीती the रिकार्ड of the साल ( the तभी म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार आधारित on पब्लिक मत in the uk ) a record-breaking चार टाइम्स और in 2012 , the आधिकारिक चार्ट कम्पनी सूचीबद्ध  Westlife 34th amongst the biggest-selling singles artists in British music history .
Despite their European and Asian success ,  westlife never प्रबंधित to ब्रेक into the u.S. मार्केट , achieving तभी  one hit single in 2000 : `` Swear It Again `` .
In October 2011 ,  westlife घोषित उनके इरादे to विभाजित in 2012 , following उनके महानतम हिट्स दौरे और  the release of their Greatest Hits album .
The  boyband 's फाइनल कॉन्सर्ट यहूद आयोजित on 22  and 23 June 2012 at Croke Park Stadium in Dublin .
the पहला विदाई कॉन्सर्ट , offering 85,000 टिकटें , बेची आउट in a record-breaking  5 minutes and the latter screened live in cinemas worldwide .
Vitamin A is a  समूह of nutritionally असंतृप्त hydrocarbons , जिससे शामिल रेटिनॉल , retinal , retinoic एसिड और अनेक provitamin a carotenoids  among which beta-carotene is the most important .
Vitamin A has multiple functions , it is important for growth and  विकास , लिये the मेंटेनेंस of the प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली और  good vision .
Vitamin A is needed by the retina of the eye in the form of  retinal , जिससे combines साथ प्रोटीन opsin to रूप rhodopsin the light-absorbing अणु , कि is जरुरी लिये दोनो low-light  ( scotopic vision ) and color vision .
Vitamin A also functions in a very different  भूमिका as an irreversibly oxidized रूप of रेटिनॉल ज्ञात as retinoic एसिड , जिससे is an महत्वपूर्ण hormone-like विकास फ़ैक्टर लिये epithelial  and other cells .
In foods of animal origin , the major  रूप of विटामिन a is an ester , primarily retinyl palmitate  , which is converted to retinol ( chemically an alcohol ) in the small intestine .
The retinol form  कृत्यों as a भंडार रूप of the विटामिन , और can be परिवर्तित to और इससे इसके visually क्रियाशील  aldehyde form , retinal .
The associated acid ( retinoic acid ) , a metabolite that can be irreversibly  synthesized इससे विटामिन a , रै तभी आंशिक विटामिन a कार्यकलाप , और करता नहीं फलन  in the retina for the visual cycle .
Retinoic acid is used  लिये विकास और सेल्यूलर differentiation  .
All forms of vitamin A have a beta-ionone ring to which an isoprenoid  कड़ी is संलग्न , पुकारा a retinyl समूह .
Both structural features are  अनिवार्य लिये विटामिन कार्यकलाप  .
The orange  रंजक of गाजर – beta-carotene – can be represented as दो कनेक्ट retinyl समूह  , which are used in the body to contribute to vitamin A levels .
Alpha-carotene and gamma-carotene also have a single  retinyl समूह , जिससे दे उन्हें कुछ विटामिन कार्यकलाप  .
None of the other  carotenes have विटामिन कार्यकलाप  .
The  carotenoid शर्तa- cryptoxanthin possesses  an ionone group and has vitamin activity in humans .
Vitamin A can be  मिला in दो प्रिंसिपल फ़ॉर्म in भोजन  :
Retinol , the form of vitamin A absorbed when  खाने एनिमल खाना स्त्रोत , is a पीला , fat-soluble पदार्थ  .
Since the pure alcohol form is unstable ,  the विटामिन is मिला in ऊतकों in  a form of retinyl ester .
It is also commercially produced  और administered as esters ऐसे as retinyl एसीटेट or palmitate  .
The carotenes alpha-carotene , beta-carotene , gamma-carotene ; and the xanthophyll beta-cryptoxanthin ( all of which contain beta-ionone rings )  , लकिन no अन्य carotenoids , फलन as provitamin a in herbivores और सर्वाहारी पशु , जिससे possess the एंजाइम ( 15-15'-dioxygenase ) जिससे cleaves beta-carotene  in the intestinal mucosa and converts it retinol .
In general , carnivores are poor converters of ionine-containing carotenoids , and  pure carnivores ऐसे as बिल्लियों और ferrets कमी 15-15'-dioxygenase और can नहीं बदलें कोई carotenoids  to retinal ( resulting in none of the carotenoids being forms of vitamin A for these species ) .
सेलिना मारी गोमेज़ ( born जुलाई 22  , 1992 ) is an American singer and actress .
She made her debut as a  चाइल्ड अभिनेत्री in बार्नी & मित्रों  .
In  2007 , गोमेज़ आए to prominence as a अभिनीत डाल सदस्य in the टेलीविज़न  series Wizards of Waverly Place .
She  हस्ताक्षरित to हॉलीवुड रिकॉर्ड the following साल , और became the  founder and lead singer of the pop band Selena Gomez & the Scene .
Their  स्टुडियो एल्बम चुंबन & बताना ( 2009 ) , a साल बगैर बरसात ( 2010 ) , और जब the सूर्य goes bas ( 2011 ) यहूद certified सुनहरा by the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ  of America ( RIAA ) and have spawned Platinum-certified singles `` Naturally `` , `` Who Says `` , and `` Love You like a Love Song `` .
बाद the रिलीज of टेलीविज़न films और उनके accompanying soundtracks , गोमेज़ बना उसके नाट्य फिल्मी  debut in Ramona and Beezus in 2010 and starred in Monte Carlo in 2011 .
Upon the conclusion of Wizards of Waverly Place and the  अंतराल of सेलिना गोमेज़ & the झाँकी in 2012 , वो केन्द्रित on उसके फिल्मी करियर , सेवारत as a आवाज़ अभिनेत्री in होटल  Transylvania and starring in Spring Breakers the following year .
Her debut solo album  is tentatively अनुसूचित to be released in गर्मियाँ 2013 , और is preceded by इसके  lead single `` Come & Get It `` .
बाहर of उसके कार्य in the entertainment उद्योग , गोमेज़ is शामिल in परोपकारी  activities through charity work and various social and environmental causes .
Tracie  monique स्पेंसर ( born जुलाई 12 , 1976 ) is an अमरीकी r & b और पॉप singer-songwriter  , actress , and model .
Sacramento is the  पूंजी नगर of the u.S. राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the सीट of सरकारी  of Sacramento County .
It is  स्तिथ at the संगम of the sacramento नदी और the अमरीकी नदी  in the northern portion of California 's expansive Central Valley .
With an estimated 2011 population of 477,891  , it is the sixth-largest नगर in कैलिफ़ोर्निया और the 35th largest नगर in the संयुक्त राज्य  .
Sacramento is the core cultural and  आर्थिक बीच of the sacramento महानगर क्षेत्रफल जिससे शामिल सात काउंटी साथ  an estimated 2009 population of 2,527,123 .
Its metropolitan area is the fourth  largest in कैलिफ़ोर्निया बाद the वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल , सैन फ्रांसिस्को खाड़ी क्षेत्रफल , और the सैन डिएगो महानगर क्षेत्रफल , as खूब  as the 25th largest in the United States .
Sacramento was cited by Time magazine as  अमेरिका 's सबसे ethnically और racially एकीकृत नगर  in 2002 .
sacramento became a नगर through the प्रयत्न of the स्विस अप्रवासी जॉन sutter , sr. , उसके बेटे जॉन sutter  , Jr. , and James W. Marshall .
Sacramento grew quickly thanks to the protection  of sutter 's फोर्ट , जिससे थी स्थापित by sutter in  1839 .
During the California Gold  फटाफट , sacramento थी a प्रमुख वितरण पाइंट , a वाणिज्यिक और agricultural बीच , और a टर्मिनस लिये वैगन रेल , stagecoaches , riverboats , the टेलीग्राफ ,  the Pony Express , and the First Transcontinental Railroad .
California State  विश्वविद्यालयों , sacramento , अधिक commonly ज्ञात as sacramento राज्य or  Sac State , is the largest local university .
It  is एक of the twenty-three campuses of the कैलिफ़ोर्निया राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों  system .
drexel विश्वविद्यालयों sacramento is स्तिथ  in Downtown , Sacramento .
विश्वविद्यालयों of the प्रशांत 's mcgeorge स्कूल  of Law is located in the Oak Park neighborhood .
In addition , the  विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया , डेविस is स्तिथ in आसपास डेविस ,  west of the capital .
The UC Davis  चिकित्सा बीच , a world-renowned शोध हॉस्पिटल , is स्तिथ in the  city of Sacramento .
Memorial Day is a United States federal holiday which occurs every  साल on the फाइनल सोमवार of  May .
Memorial Day is  a दिन of remembering the मेन और महिलाओं जो died जबकि सेवारत  in the United States Armed Forces .
Formerly known  as सजावट दिन , it originated बाद the अमरीकी सिविल युद्ध to commemorate the संघ और confederate सैनिको जो died in  the Civil War .
By the 20th  सदी मेमोरियल दिन था महरूम विस्तारित to सम्मान सब  Americans who have died in all wars .
It typically marks the start of the summer  अवकाश ऋतु , जबकि मजदूर दिन marks इसके समाप्त  .
Many people visit cemeteries and  memorials , विशेषकर to सम्मान those जो have died in सैन्य  service .
Many volunteers place an  अमरीकी ध्वज on प्रत्येक संगीन in नेशनल कब्रिस्तान  .
By the early 20th century , Memorial Day was an occasion for more general  expressions of मेमोरी , as लोगों visited the क़ब्रों of उनके मृतक रिश्तेदारों in गिरिजाघर कब्रिस्तान , whether वे था परोसा  in the military or not .
It  भी became a long वीकेंड increasingly devoted to खरीदारी , परिवार महफिलों , आतिशबाजी , यात्राएँ  to the beach , and national media events .
Annual Decoration Days for  particular कब्रिस्तान हैं आयोजित on a संडे in लेट वसन्त or जल्दी गर्मियाँ in कुछ ग्रामीण क्षेत्रों of the  American South , notably in the mountains .
In cases involving a  परिवार graveyard जहाँ रिमोट पूर्वजो as खूब as those जो यहूद मृतक अधिक recently हैं दफ्न , इस may लो on the अक्षर of an विस्तारित परिवार  reunion to which some people travel hundreds of miles .
People gather on the designated day  और put पुष्प on क़ब्रों और नवीनीकृत सम्पर्क साथ kinfolk और  others .
There often is a religious service and a `` dinner  on the मैदान , '' the परंपरागत पद लिये a potluck भोजन in जिससे लोगों प्रयुक्त to स्प्रेड the बर्तन आउट on चादरें or चौके on  the grass .
It is believed that this practice began before the American  सिविल युद्ध और यूँ may प्रतिबिंबित the रियल उत्पत्ति of the `` मेमोरियल दिन ''  idea .
Memorial Day is not to be confused with Veterans Day ; Memorial Day is a day of remembering the men  और महिलाओं जो died जबकि सेवारत , जबकि दिग्गजों दिन मनाता the सेवा of सब u.S. सैन्य  veterans , living or dead .
Mt . Zion Church state history  मार्कर निकट फिलाडेल्फिया , मिसिसिपी  .
Freedom Summer ( also known as the  मिसिसिपी गर्मियाँ प्रोजेक्ट ) थी a अभियान in the संयुक्त राज्य शुभारम्भ in जून 1964 to attempt to पंजीकरण as अनेक अफ़्रीकी  American voters as possible in Mississippi , which had historically excluded most blacks from voting .
The project also set up dozens of Freedom Schools ,  स्वतंत्रता घरों , और जातियाँ centers in छोटी कस्बों throughout मिसिसिपी to सहायता the लोकल ब्लैक जनसांख्यिकी  .
The project was  व्यवस्थित by the परिषद of federated संगठन ( cofo ) , a गठबन्धन of the मिसिसिपी शाखाओं of the चार  major civil rights organizations ( SNCC , CORE , NAACP and SCLC ) .
Most of the impetus , leadership , and  financing लिये the गर्मियाँ प्रोजेक्ट आए इससे the sncc .
Robert Parris  मूसा , sncc फ़ील्ड सचिव और co-director of cofo , निर्देशित  the summer project .
Blues is  the नाम दिए to दोनो a musical रूप और a म्यूज़िक विधा कि originated in समुदायों of primarily the `` गहन दक्षिण `` of the संयुक्त राज्य around the समाप्त of the 19th सदी  from spirituals , work songs , field hollers , shouts and chants , and rhymed simple narrative ballads .
The blues form , ubiquitous in jazz , rhythm and blues , and rock and roll  is characterized by विशिष्ट कॉर्ड progressions , of जिससे the twelve-bar ब्लूज़ कॉर्ड progression  is the most common .
The blue notes that , for expressive purposes are sung or played flattened or  धीरे झुकी ( नाबालिग 3rd to प्रमुख 3rd ) in संबंध to the पिच of the प्रमुख स्केल , हैं भी an महत्वपूर्ण  part of the sound .
The blues genre is based on the  ब्लूज़ रूप लकिन possesses अन्य विशेषताएँ ऐसे as विशिष्ट  lyrics , bass lines , and instruments .
Blues can be subdivided into several subgenres ranging from  देश to शहरी ब्लूज़ कि यहूद अधिक or कम लोकप्रिय दौरान अलग  periods of the 20th century .
Best  ज्ञात हैं the डेल्टा , piedmont , जम्प , और  Chicago blues styles .
World War II marked the  परिवर्तन इससे ध्वनिक to इलेक्ट्रिक ब्लूज़ और the प्रगतिशील खोलने of ब्लूज़ म्यूज़िक to a  wider audience , especially white listeners .
In the 1960s and  1970s , a संकर रूप पुकारा blues-rock  evolved .
The term  `` the ब्लूज़ '' refers to the `` ब्लू शैतानों '' , अर्थ वेदना और उदासी ; an जल्दी उपयोग  of the term in this sense is found in George Colman 's one-act farce Blue Devils ( 1798 ) .
Though the use of the phrase in African-American music may be older , it has been attested to since 1912  , जब हार्ट wand 's `` डलास ब्लूज़ `` became the पहला स्वत्वाधिकार ब्लूज़ संयोजन  .
In  गीत the phrase is प्रायः प्रयुक्त to describe a  depressed mood .
A quarter dollar , commonly shortened to quarter , is a coin  लायक 1⁄4 of a संयुक्त राज्य डालर  or 25 cents .
the क्वार्टर रै महरूम उत्पादित  since 1796 .
The choice of 25¢ as a denomination , as opposed  to 20¢ जिससे is अधिक आम in अन्य भाग of the संसार , originated साथ the अभ्यास of dividing  Spanish Milled Dollars into eight wedge shaped segments ( cf. `` pieces of eight `` ) .
At one time `` two bits  `` , i.e . दो wedges , प्रत्येक कील an आठवीं , यूँ a क्वार्टर of the स्पेनी रियल , थी  a common nickname for a quarter .
Day of the  मुर्दे ( ) is a मैक्सिकन अवकाश मनाये throughout मैक्सिको और around the संसार in  other cultures .
The holiday focuses on gatherings of family  और मित्रों to दुवा लिये और याद मित्रों और परिवार सदस्यों जो  have died .
It is particularly celebrated in  मैक्सिको , जहाँ it is a नेशनल अवकाश , और सब  banks are closed .
The  जश्न takes प्लेस on नवम्बर 1 और 2 , in कनेक्शन साथ  the Catholic holidays of All Saints ' Day and All Souls ' Day .
Traditions connected with the holiday include building  निजी altars honoring the मृतक using शुगर skulls , marigolds , और the पसंदीदा  foods and beverages of the departed and visiting graves with these as gifts .
They  भी छोड़ possessions  of the deceased .
Scholars trace the origins of the modern Mexican  अवकाश to स्वदेशी observances डेटिंग वापस सैंकड़ों of सालो और to an एज़टेक पर्व समर्पित to the देवी  Mictecacihuatl .
The holiday has spread  throughout the संसार : in ब्राज़ील , dia de finados is a पब्लिक अवकाश  that many Brazilians celebrate by visiting cemeteries and churches .
In  स्पेन , वहीँ हैं त्यौहार और parades , और , at  the end of the day , people gather at cemeteries and pray for their dead loved ones .
Similar observances occur  elsewhere in यूरोपीय , और similarly प्रसंग जश्न appear in अनेक  Asian and African cultures .
अनीता  Mk VIII .
The ANITA Mark VII and ANITA Mark  viii calculators यहूद शुभारम्भ simultaneously in लेट 1961 as the संसार 's पहला all-  electronic desktop calculators .
designed और निर्मित by the घंटी  Punch Co .
in Britain , and marketed  through इसके sumlock comptometer प्रभाग , वे प्रयुक्त वैक्यूम tubes और cold-cathode switching tubes in उनके लॉजिक circuits  and nixie tubes for their numerical displays .
They were the first of a series of desktop  और hand-held इलेक्ट्रॉनिक calculators कि the कम्पनी थी to develop और बेचें अंतर्गत  the ANITA name into the mid-1970s .
George Washington ( – , 1799 ) was the first President of the United States (  1789–1797 ) , the commander-in-chief of the महाद्वीपीय फौज दौरान the अमरीकी क्रांतिकारी युद्ध , और एक of the founding fathers of  the United States .
He presided over the convention that  drafted the संविधान , जिससे replaced the आलेख of कनफेडरेशन और स्थापित the स्थिति  of President .
Washington was elected President as the unanimous  चुनाव of the 69 निर्वाचक in 1788 , और he  served two terms in office .
He oversaw the creation of a strong , well-financed  नेशनल सरकारी कि कायम neutrality in the युद्धों raging in यूरोपीय , suppressed विद्रोह , और जीती  acceptance among Americans of all types .
His leadership style established  अनेक फ़ॉर्म और संस्कार of सरकारी कि have महरूम प्रयुक्त चूंकि , ऐसे as using a कैबिनेट  system and delivering an inaugural address .
Further , the peaceful transition  इससे उसके प्रेसिडेंसी to the प्रेसिडेंसी of जॉन एडम्स स्थापित a परंपरा कि continues into  the 21st century .
वॉशिंगटन थी hailed as `` पिता of उसके देश ``  even during his lifetime .
Washington  थी born into the प्रांतीय gentry of औपनिवेशिक वर्जिनिया ; उसके धनवान planter  family owned tobacco plantations and slaves .
After both his father and older  bhai died जब he थी यंग , वॉशिंगटन became personally और professionally संलग्न to the शक्तिशाली विलियम फेयरफैक्स  , who promoted his career as a surveyor and soldier .
वॉशिंगटन जल्दी became a वरिष्ठ अधिकारी in the औपनिवेशिक  forces during the first stages of the French and Indian War .
Chosen by the Second Continental  कॉंग्रेस in 1775 to be commander-in-chief of the महाद्वीपीय फौज in the अमरीकी क्रान्ति , वॉशिंगटन प्रबंधित  to force the British out of Boston in 1776 , but was defeated and almost captured later that year when he lost New York City .
बाद क्रासिंग the डेलावेयर नदी in the मुर्दे of शीत , he पराजित the अंग्रेजों in दो लड़ाइयों , retook  New Jersey and restored momentum to the Patriot cause .
क्युकी of उसके रणनीति , क्रांतिकारी शक्तियां captured दो प्रमुख अंग्रेजों सेना at साराटोगा  in 1777 and Yorktown in 1781 .
Historians laud Washington for his selection and  पर्यवेक्षण of उसके सेनापतियों , प्रोत्साहन of मनोबल और क्षमता to थाम साथ the फौज , समन्वय साथ the राज्य राज्यपालों और राज्य मिलिशिया इकाई  , relations with Congress and attention to supplies , logistics , and training .
In battle , however ,  वॉशिंगटन थी repeatedly outmaneuvered by अंग्रेजों सेनापतियों  with larger armies .
After  विजय था महरूम finalized in 1783 , वॉशिंगटन resigned as commander-in-chief बल्कि than seize शक्ति , proving  his opposition to dictatorship and his commitment to American republicanism .
असंतुष्ट साथ the कमजोरियों of the आलेख of कनफेडरेशन , in 1787 वॉशिंगटन  presided over the Constitutional Convention that drafted the United States Constitution .
Elected unanimously as the first President of  the संयुक्त राज्य in 1789 , he attempted to लाओ प्रतिद्वंद्वी गिरोहों साथ to unify the  nation .
He supported Alexander Hamilton 's  कार्यक्रम to अदा बंद सब राज्य और नेशनल कर्ज़ , to implement an प्रभावी कर प्रणाली और to बनाएँ a नेशनल बैंको ( despite विपक्ष  from Thomas Jefferson ) .
Washington proclaimed the  संयुक्त राज्य न्यूट्रल in the युद्धों raging in यूरोपीय बाद  1793 .
He avoided war with Great  ब्रिटेन और गारंटी a दशक of सलाम और लाभप्रद व्यापार by securing the jay सन्धि in 1795 , despite तीव्र  opposition from the Jeffersonians .
Although never officially  joining the federalist पार्टी , he समर्थित  its programs .
Washington 's Farewell  पता थी an influential प्राइमर on रिपब्लिकन पुण्य और a चेतावनी विरूद्ध partisanship , sectionalism , और  involvement in foreign wars .
He retired from the presidency in 1797 and  लौटे to उसके घर , माउंट vernon , और उसके घरेलू जीवन जहाँ he प्रबंधित a किस्में  of enterprises .
he freed सब उसके स्लेव  by his final will .
Washington had a  दृष्टि of a ग्रेट और शक्तिशाली स्वदेश कि होता be  built on republican lines using federal power .
He sought to use the national government to preserve  स्वतंत्रता , improve अवसंरचना , खोलें the पश्चिमी lands , प्रचार कॉमर्स , मिला a स्थाई पूंजी , reduce क्षेत्रीय तनाव और  promote a spirit of American nationalism .
At his death ,  वॉशिंगटन थी eulogized as `` पहला in युद्ध , पहला in सलाम , और पहला in the दिल of  his countrymen '' by Henry Lee .
the federalists बना उसे the प्रतीक of उनके पार्टी लकिन लिये अनेक सालो ,  the Jeffersonians continued to distrust his influence and delayed building the Washington Monument .
As the leader of the first successful  क्रान्ति विरूद्ध a औपनिवेशिक साम्राज्य in संसार इतिहास , वॉशिंगटन became an अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रतीक लिये मुक्ति और राष्ट्रवाद  , especially in France and Latin America .
फिस्कल साल 2012 u.S. संघीय बिता – नकदी  or Budget Basis .
Fiscal Year  2012 u.S. संघीय  Receipts .
The Budget of the  संयुक्त राज्य सरकारी प्रायः begins as the अध्यक्ष 's प्रस्ताव to the u.S. कॉंग्रेस जिससे अनुशंसा funding स्तर लिये the  next fiscal year , beginning October 1 .
However , Congress is the body required by law  to pass a बजट annually और to submit the बजट passed by दोनो घरों to the अध्यक्ष लिये हस्ताक्षर  .
Congressional decisions are governed  by नियम और विधान regarding the संघीय  budget process .
Budget committees set spending limits for the House and  सीनेट समितियों और लिये appropriations subcommittees , जिससे तब स्वीकृति व्यक्तिगत appropriations बिल्स to allocate funding  to various federal programs .
If Congress  fails to pass an सालाना बजट ( as रै महरूम the मामला चूंकि 2009 ) , a श्रेणी of appropriations बिल्स  must be passed as `` stop gap '' measures .
After Congress approves an appropriations bill , it is sent to  the अध्यक्ष , जो may चिह्न it into विधि , or may वीटो it ( as he होता a बजट जब passed by the कॉंग्रेस ) .
A  vetoed विधेयक is भेजा वापस to कॉंग्रेस , जिससे can pass it into विधि साथ  a two-thirds majority in each chamber .
Congress may also combine all or some  appropriations बिल्स into an omnibus reconciliation  bill .
In addition , the president may request and the Congress may pass  supplemental appropriations बिल्स or आपात supplemental appropriations  bills .
Several government agencies provide  बजट आंकड़ा और विश्लेषण .
These include the Government Accountability  दफ्तर ( gao ) , congressional बजट दफ्तर , the दफ्तर of प्रबन्धन और बजट ( omb ) और  the U.S. Treasury Department .
These agencies  have reported कि the संघीय सरकारी is facing a श्रेणी of महत्वपूर्ण financing  challenges .
In the short-run , tax revenues have declined significantly due to a severe recession and  कर नीति चुनाव , जबकि expenditures have विस्तारित लिये युद्धों , बेरोजगारी बीमे और अन्य सुरक्षा जाल  spending .
In the long-run , expenditures related to healthcare programs such  as medicare और medicaid हैं प्रक्षिप्त to grow तेज़ than the अर्थव्यवस्था overall as the जनसांख्यिकी matures  .
New Guinea ( also , Tok  पिसिन : niugini , डच : nieuw गिनी , और ; historically : पापुआ ) is the  world 's second largest island , after Greenland , covering a land area of 786,000 km2 .
Located in the southwest Pacific Ocean , it lies geographically to the east of the  मलय द्वीपसमूह , साथ जिससे it is sometimes शामिल as भाग of a वृहद indo-australian द्वीपसमूह  .
geologically it is a भाग of the वही tectonic  plate as Australia .
When world sea levels were low , the two  साझा shorelines ( जिससे अभी झूठ 100 to 140 मीटर नीचे समुद्र स्तर ) , combining साथ lands अभी inundated into the tectonic महाद्वीप  of Sahul , also known as Greater Australia .
The two landmasses became  अलग जब the क्षेत्रफल अभी ज्ञात as the टोरेस जलसन्धि flooded बाद the समाप्त of the  last glacial period .
Anthropologically , New  गिनी is माना भाग of  Melanesia .
Politically , the western  हाफ of the द्वीप comprises दो इंडोनेशियाई प्रांतों : पापुआ और वेस्ट  Papua .
The  पूर्वी हाफ फ़ॉर्म the मेनलैंड of the देश  of Papua New Guinea .
The island has a population of about 7.5  लाख , साथ a बहुत कम जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व of तभी 8 inh/km2  .
New Guinea is  differentiated इससे इसके drier , खुशामद , और कम fertile दक्षिणी बंटवारा , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , by इसके much उच्चतर वर्षा और इसके क्रियाशील volcanic  geology , with its highest point , Puncak Jaya , reaching an elevation of 4,884 m ( 16,023 ft ) .
Yet the two land masses share a similar animal  fauna , साथ marsupials , सहित wallabies और possums , और the egg-laying monotreme , the spiny anteater  , or echidna .
अन्य than bats और कुछ दो दर्जन स्वदेशी कृंतक genera , वहीँ हैं no  pre-human indigenous placental mammals .
Pigs , several  अतिरिक्त प्रजाति of चूहे , और the पूर्वज of the नई गिनी गायन श्वान यहूद introduced साथ इंसान colonization  .
The  इंसान उपस्थिति on the द्वीप तिथियाँ वापस at तनिक 40,000 सालो to the oldest इंसान migrations  out of Africa .
Research indicates that the highlands were an early and independent center of  कृषि , साथ प्रमाण of सिंचाई going वापस at तनिक 10,000 सालो  .
Because of the time depth of its inhabitation and its highly fractured landscape , an unusually high number of  भाषाएं हैं बोला on the द्वीप , साथ कुछ 1,000 भाषाएं ( a फिगर उच्चतर than कि of सबसे महाद्वीपों ) having महरूम catalogued आउट of an अनुमानित  world-wide pre-Columbian total of 6,000 human dialects .
Most are classified as  पापुआई भाषाएं , a generally स्वीकृत भौगोलिक पद जिससे a  minority of authors hold to be a genetic one .
A  क्रमांक of ऑस्ट्रोनीशियाई भाषाएं हैं बोला on  the coast and on offshore islands .
In the 16th  सदी स्पेनी explorers खोजा the द्वीप  and called it Nueva Guinea .
In recent history western New Guinea  थी शामिल in the डच ईस्ट इंडीज  colony .
The Germans annexed the northern  coast of the पूर्वी हाफ of the द्वीप as जर्मनी नई गिनी in उनके pre–world युद्ध i प्रयत्न to स्थापित themselves as a औपनिवेशिक शक्ति  , whilst the south eastern portion was reluctantly claimed by Britain .
Following the Treaty of Versailles , the  जर्मनी portion थी awarded to ऑस्ट्रेलिया ( जिससे थी already शासी the अंग्रेजों अर्जी , नामित the territory  of Papua ) as a League of Nations mandate .
The eastern half of the  द्वीप थी granted स्वतंत्रता इससे ऑस्ट्रेलिया as पापुआ नई गिनी in  1975 .
The western half gained  स्वतंत्रता इससे the डच in 1961 , लकिन became भाग of इंडोनेशिया जल्द afterwards  in controversial circumstances .
`` The Van Buren Boys '' is the  148th एपीसोड of the sitcom seinfeld , और नाम of a fictional  New York street gang .
Their  चिह्न is क्रासिंग the हैंड्स , साथ एक हाथ साथ  all the fingers 'up ' and spread out .
The other hand has all but the  अंगूठा और सूचक उंगली up , लिये a कुल of आठ (  8 ) .
The gang  is नामित लिये the 8th अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य , मार्टिन वैन buren  ( who was the first president from New York ) .
This was the  14th एपीसोड लिये the 8th ऋतु  .
It aired on  फ़रवरी 6 , 1997 .
bevo चिह्न
Bevo was a non-alcoholic  malt पेय , or निकट बियर , brewed in the संयुक्त राज्य by the anheuser-busch कम्पनी शुरूआत  in the early 20th century .
bevo enjoyed इसके महानतम कामयाबी दौरान the समय of निषेध , जब बियर , वाइन और आसुत liquors  , were made illegal for thirteen years .
The Anheuser-Busch company  प्रारंभ brewing bevo जब alcoholic पेय यहूद निषिद्ध in 1916  by the United States armed forces .
Production rose greatly with national prohibition in 1919  , और bevo थी by दूर the सबसे लोकप्रिय of the अनेक `` खाद्यान्न पेय  '' or `` near beers '' of the time .
At the peak of its popularity in the early 1920s ,  अधिक than पाँच लाख मामले of bevo यहूद बेची annually  .
Renard with a  मग of bevo , चित्रित in टेरा cotta on the आंतरिक  walls of the Bevo building , St. Louis
Labels  on the बोतलों billed it as  `` Bevo the Beverage '' .
The name `` Bevo '' was coined  इससे the शब्द `` पेय '' और the स्लावी भाषा शब्द लिये बियर `` pivo '' , और थी सुनाया  `` Bee-vo '' .
Some Bevo advertising featured the character `` Renard the  फॉक्स `` ( आधारित on the समर्थक of a मध्यकालीन फ्रेंच folk-tale ) , और promotional मग साथ इस अक्षर यहूद  manufactured .
In 1930 Anheuser-Busch built a series of boat-bodied cars  in इसके st. लुई दुकानें पुकारा the `` bevo नौकाएँ '' जिससे यहूद प्रयुक्त लिये  promotion .
Seven are believed to have been built on  pierce-arrow 8-cylinder chassis जबकि एक surviving उदाहरण थी आधारित upon 1930 कैडिलैक  353 V8 .
बिलबोर्ड विज्ञापन bevo in trenton  , New Jersey , 1917
A contemporary advertisement read ``  कूलिंग और invigorating , bevo the पेय  .
Order by the case from your grocer  , druggist , or डीलर .  ''
The paper label on the  वापस of the बोतल पढ़ा `` the all-year-round नरम पेय  .
Appetizing -  healthful - पौष्टिक - ताज़ा  .
Milk or  जल may contain जीवाणु  .
BEVO  never करता .  ''
Bevo became part of the  लोकप्रिय संस्कृति of the समय , और is उल्लेखित in विभिन्न लोकप्रिय गीतों और vaudeville  skits of the era .
This led  to द्वितीयक कठबोली उपयोग of the शब्द ; लिये उदाहरण , in अमरीकी सैन्य कठबोली a यंग  and inexperienced officer was called a `` Bevo '' .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों of टेक्सास नामित इसके शुभंकर `` bevo  '' , a name which has stuck to this day .
Irving Berlin included a paean to the drink ,  `` तुम ca n't रहो up on bevo '' , in उसके 1917 फौज revue , यिप यिप  Yaphank .
In the late 1920s smuggled bootleg beer and liquor  as खूब as `` homebrew `` , काटें into bevo 's marketshare  .
With sales flattening to 100,000 cases by  1929 , anheuser-busch रोका उत्पादन  .
The Bevo Mill  , st. लुई , in 2008
The Bevo building , with the Renard  अक्षर prominently प्रदर्शित at the किनारे , स्टिल operates as  a bottling facility at their main brewery in St. Louis , Missouri .
the लैंडमार्क bevo मिल , constructed  by August Anheuser Busch , Sr. in 1917 .
It was closed in 2009  , लकिन it reopened in अक्तूबर 2009 अंतर्गत नई स्वामी  .
Bevo is also mentioned in  the छोटी स्टोरी `` the हत्यारे `` by अर्नेस्ट हेमिंगवे ; as खूब as  in Babbitt by Sinclair Lewis .
mylanta is an over the काउंटर दवा प्रयुक्त लिये the उपचार  of acid reflux , heartburn , and gastroesophageal reflux disease ( also known as GERD ) .
foremilk और hindmilk नमूने  of human breast milk
A glass of  pasteurized गाय मिल्क
Milk is a  श्वेत द्रव उत्पादित by the mammary ग्रंथियों  of mammals .
It is the  प्राथमिक सोर्स of पोषण लिये यंग स्तनधारियों पहले वे  are able to digest other types of food .
Early- lactation milk contains colostrum , which carries the  माँ 's antibodies to the baby और can reduce the रिस्क of अनेक रोगों in the baby .
It also  contains अनेक अन्य nutrients  .
As an  agricultural उत्पाद , मिल्क is निकाली इससे स्तनधारियों  and used as food for humans .
Worldwide , dairy farms  उत्पादित परिचय 730 लाख टन of  milk in 2011 .
India is the  संसार 's largest निर्माता और उपभोक्ता of मिल्क  , yet neither exports nor imports milk .
New  जीलैंड , the यूरोपीय संघ 's 27 सदस्य राज्य  , Australia , and the United States are the world 's largest exporters of milk and milk products .
China  और रूस हैं the संसार 's largest  importers of milk and milk products .
Throughout the world , there are more  than 6 अरब उपभोक्ता of मिल्क और मिल्क  products .
Over 750  लाख लोगों सजीव भीतर  dairy farming households .
Milk is a key contributor to improving nutrition and  खाना सुरक्षा विशेषकर in विकासशील देशों  .
Improvements in livestock and dairy technology  प्रस्ताव significant वादा in reducing गरीबी और कुपोषण in the  world .
Motorcycle speedway , usually referred to as  स्पीडवे , is a मोटरसाइकिल खेल involving चार और  sometimes up to six riders competing over four anti-clockwise laps of an oval circuit .
Speedway motorcycles use only one gear and have no brakes and  रेसिंग takes प्लेस on a चपटा ओवल track प्रायः consisting of मैल or loosely  packed shale .
प्रतिस्पर्धी उपयोग इस सतह to स्लाइड उनके मशीने बगलों  , powersliding or broadsiding into the bends .
On the  सीधा भाग of the track the मोटरसाइकिल  reach speeds of up .
The  सटीक origins of the खेल हैं अनजान लकिन वहीँ is प्रमाण of a प्रकार of स्पीडवे रेसिंग होने practised in  the USA before the First World War and in Australia in the late 1910s and early 1920s .
There are now both domestic and international  प्रतियोगिताओं in a क्रमांक of देशों सहित the स्पीडवे संसार कप whilst the उच्चतम overall स्कोरिंग व्यक्तिगत in the स्पीडवे ग्रैंड प्रिक्स कार्यक्रम is सुनाया  the world champion .
Speedway is popular in central  और उत्तरी यूरोपीय और to a lesser extent in ऑस्ट्रेलिया और उत्तर अमेरिका  .
A variant of track racing , speedway is administered  internationally by the fédération internationale de motocyclisme  ( FIM ) .
Domestic speedway events  हैं regulated by fim संबद्ध नेशनल मोटर  sport federations .
Vitamin D is a group of fat-soluble secosteroids responsible  लिये intestinal अवशोषण of कैल्सियम और  phosphate .
In humans , the most  महत्वपूर्ण सम्बन्धित यौगिकों of विटामिन  D are vitamin D2 and vitamin D3 .
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) and ergocalciferol ( vitamin D2 )  हैं अद्वितीय as वे constitute कया we जान as विटामिन d और can be ingested इससे the आहार and/or  supplements .
The body can also synthesize vitamin D  ( इससे कोलेस्ट्रॉल ) जब सूर्य एक्सपोज़र is पर्याप्त ( hence इसके उपनाम , the `` सनशाइन  vitamin '' ) .
Although vitamin D is commonly called a vitamin , it is not actually an essential  dietary विटामिन in the सख्त भाव , as it can be synthesized in पर्याप्त amounts by सबसे  mammals exposed to sunlight .
(  बिल्लियों और कुत्तो can नहीं synthesize विटामिन d efficiently  and must receive it in their diet . )
An organic chemical compound ( or related set of  यौगिकों ) is तभी scientifically पुकारा a विटामिन जब it can नहीं be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an सजीव  , and must be obtained from their diet .
However , as with other compounds commonly  पुकारा विटामिन , विटामिन d थी खोजा in an प्रयत्न to ढूँढें the dietary पदार्थ कि थी lacking in a बीमारी , namely , rickets , the बाल्यकाल  form of osteomalacia .
Additionally , like  अन्य यौगिकों पुकारा विटामिन , in the विकसित संसार विटामिन d is added to स्टेपल  foods , such as milk , to avoid disease due to deficiency .
Measures of serum levels reflect endogenous  संश्लेषण इससे एक्सपोज़र to धूप as खूब as सेवन इससे the आहार , और it is believed कि संश्लेषण may योगदान generally to the  maintenance of adequate serum concentrations .
The evidence indicates that the synthesis of  विटामिन d इससे सूर्य एक्सपोज़र works in a प्रतिक्रिया लूप कि रोकता toxicity लकिन , क्युकी of अनिश्चितता परिचय the कर्कट रिस्क इससे धूप , no सुझाव  are issued by the Institute of Medicine , USA , for the amount of sun exposure required to meet vitamin D requirements .
Accordingly , the Dietary Reference Intakes  लिये विटामिन d assume कि no संश्लेषण occurs और कि सब  of a person 's vitamin D is from their diet , although that will rarely occur in practice .
In the liver vitamin D is converted to calcidiol , which is also known as calcifediol ( INN ) , 25-hydroxycholecalciferol , or  25-hydroxyvitamin d—abbreviated 25 ( oh ) d ; और जिससे is the विशिष्ट विटामिन d metabolite कि is measured in सीरम to determine a  person 's vitamin D status .
Part of the calcidiol is converted by the kidneys to  calcitriol , the biologically क्रियाशील रूप of विटामिन D. calcitriol circulates as a हार्मोन in the रक्त , regulating the विशेषज्ञता of कैल्सियम और फास्फेट in the bloodstream और  promoting the healthy growth and remodeling of bone .
Calcidiol is also converted to calcitriol outside of the kidneys  लिये अन्य उद्देश्य , ऐसे as the अप्रसार , differentiation और apoptosis of कोशिकाएं ; calcitriol भी  affects neuromuscular function and inflammation .
Beyond its use to  prevent osteomalacia or rickets , the प्रमाण लिये अन्य स्वास्थ्य प्रभाव of विटामिन d supplementation  in the general population is inconsistent .
The best evidence of benefit is for  अस्थि स्वास्थ्य और a घटी in मृत्यु  in elderly women .
The Duramax is a  सामान्य मोटर्स डीज़ल इंजन परिवार लिये light- और मीडियम ड्यूटी ट्रक , designed  by Isuzu .
The 6.6-liter Duramax is  उत्पादित by dmax , a संयुक्त venture between gm और isuzu in  Moraine , Ohio .
This engine was initially installed in 2001 model year Chevy and GMC trucks  और रै महरूम an विकल्प चूंकि तब in pickups , वैन , और  medium-duty trucks .
In 2006 , production at Moraine was reportedly  सीमित to लगभग 200,000 इंजन प्रति साल .
On May 9 , 2007 , DMAX  घोषित the उत्पादन of the 1,000,000th duramax v-8 डीज़ल  at its Moraine facility .
