is also a traditional written  संक्षिप्त लिये बाल्टीमोर , मेरीलैंड  .
Statue of Balto in Central  पार्क ( नई यॉर्क नगर  )
Balto ( 1919 – March 14 , 1933  ) थी a siberian हस्की sled श्वान जो led उसके टोली on the फाइनल लेग of the 1925 सीरम चलाएं to nome , in जिससे डिप्थीरिया antitoxin  was transported from Anchorage , Alaska , to Nenana , Alaska , by train and then to Nome by dog sled to combat an outbreak of the disease .
The run  is commemorated by the सालाना iditarod ट्रेल  Sled Dog Race .
balto थी नामित बाद the  Sami explorer Samuel Balto .
Balto  died at the आयु  of 14 .
Professor Stephen  हॉकिंग , ज्ञात लिये होने a सैद्धांतिक physicist , रै  appeared in many works of popular culture .
The Nissan Maxima is a mid-size / entry-level  लक्ज़री car manufactured by निसान , marketed as the `` four-door  sports car '' .
The origins of the Maxima began in July  1976 as the डैटसन 810 , an upscale six-cylinder संस्करण of the bluebird , और थी spun into  its own line in 1981 , having been made continuously since then .
The ``  उच्चिष्ट '' नाम थी लागू धीरे , शुरूआत in 1981  .
Most pre-2004  maximas यहूद निर्मित in oppama , जापानी , जबतक the वर्तमान उत्तर  American Maximas started being assembled in Smyrna , Tennessee .
The `` Maxima '' has also been  लागू to cefiros और चलेगा in विभिन्न बाज़ार  .
Propolis  as छत्ता sealing
Propolis is a resinous mixture  कि मधु मधुमक्खियों collect इससे पेड़ कलियों , sap बहती , or अन्य वनस्पति  sources .
It  is प्रयुक्त as a sealant लिये अनावश्यक खोलें स्पेसेस  in the hive .
propolis is प्रयुक्त लिये छोटी गैप ( लगभग or कम ) ,  while larger spaces are usually filled with beeswax .
Its color varies depending on its  वनस्पति सोर्स , the सबसे आम होने अंधेरा भूरा  .
propolis is स्टिकी at और ऊपर रूम तापमान  , .
At lower temperatures ,  it becomes मुश्किल और बहुत भंगुर  .
Steven Tyler ( born Steven Victor Tallarico ; March 26 , 1948 ) is an American singer ,  songwriter , और multi-instrumentalist , बेहतरीन ज्ञात as the frontman और सीसे सिंगर of the बोस्टन -आधारd चट्टान बैंड एरोस्मिथ  , in which he also plays the harmonica , and occasional piano and percussion .
He is known as the  `` राक्षस of screamin ' '' due to उसके ऊँची  screams and his wide vocal range .
He is also  ज्ञात लिये उसके on-stage  acrobatics .
During  उसके high-energy प्रदर्शन , he प्रायः पोशाक in उज्जवल , रंगीन outfits  with his trademark scarves hanging from his microphone stand .
In the 1970s , Tyler rose  to prominence as the frontman of एरोस्मिथ , जिससे released  such milestone hard rock albums as Toys in the Attic and Rocks .
In  the लेट 1970s और जल्दी 1980s , टायलर  had a heavy drug and alcohol addiction , and the band 's popularity waned .
He completed drug rehabilitation in 1986 and  subsequently कायम गम्भीरता लिये over 20 सालो , लकिन था a पतन साथ नुस्खा painkillers  in the late 2000s , for which he successfully received treatment in 2009 .
After Aerosmith launched a remarkable comeback in the late 1980s and early 1990s with the albums Permanent  अवकाश , पंप , और मिलेंगी a पकड़ , टायलर became a household नाम और रै remained  a relevant rock icon .
As a result , he  रै चूंकि embarked on अनेक सोलो endeavors सहित अतिथि दिखावे on अन्य कलाकारों ' म्यूज़िक , फिल्मी और tv भूमिकाएँ ( सहित as a न्यायधीश on  American Idol ) , authoring a bestselling book , and solo work ( including a Top 40 hit single in 2011 ) .
However , he has  जारी to रिकार्ड म्यूज़िक और perform साथ एरोस्मिथ , बाद अधिक than  43 years in the band .
The band 's  नवीनतम एल्बम , म्यूज़िक इससे  Another Dimension !
, was released on  नवम्बर 6 , 2012  .
टायलर is शामिल among रोलिंग पत्थरों  100 Greatest Singers .
He was also  क्रमित 3rd on hit parader 's शीर्ष 100 मेटल vocalists  of All Time .
In 2001 he was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall  of कीर्ति साथ एरोस्मिथ , और he थी the प्रस्तुतकर्ता जब ac/dc थी inducted into  the Hall of Fame in 2003 .
In 2013 , Tyler and his  songwriting संगी जो पेरी होगा be प्राप्तकर्ता of the ascap संस्थापकों पुरस्कार और होगा भी be inducted into  the Songwriters Hall of Fame .
The liver produces urea in the urea  साईकिल as a बर्बाद उत्पाद of the पाचन of प्रोटीन  .
Normal human adult blood should  contain between 7 to 21 mg of यूरिया नाइट्रोजन प्रति 100 ml ( 7–21 mg/ dl )  of blood .
व्यक्तिगत laboratories may have अलग सन्दर्भ सीमाएँ , और  this is because the procedure may vary .
Wayne Fontes ( born February 2 , 1940  ) is a पूर्व अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल कोच और कॉलेज और पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल खिलाड़ी जो थी the सिर कोच of the एनएफएल 's डेट्रॉयट शेर  from 1988 to 1996 .
His 67 wins and 71  नुकसान हैं प्रत्येक the सबसे लिये a सिर कोच in टोली  history .
The Jews ( ISO 259-3 Israeli pronunciation ) , also known as the Jewish  लोगों , हैं a स्वदेश और an ethnoreligious समूह , originating in the israelites or hebrews of the प्राचीन  Near East .
The Jewish ethnicity , nationality , and religion are  strongly interrelated , as judaism is the परंपरागत आस्था of the यहूदी  nation .
converts to judaism , जिनकी औकात as यहूदियों भीतर the यहूदी ethnos is बराबर to those born  into it , have been absorbed into the Jewish people throughout the millennia .
In Jewish tradition , Jewish ancestry is traced to the Biblical patriarchs Abraham ,  इसहाक़ और याक़ूब in the दूसरी मिलेनियम bce .
The modern  राज्य of इसराईल थी स्थापित as a यहूदी nation-state , और defines itself  as such in its Basic Laws .
Its  विधि of वापसी अनुदान the सही of नागरिकता  to any Jew who requests it .
Israel is the only country  जहाँ यहूदियों हैं a बहुमत of the जनसांख्यिकी  .
Jews also  enjoyed राजनैतिक स्वायत्तता twice पहले in प्राचीन  history .
The first of these periods  lasted इससे 1350 to 586 bce , और encompassed the अवधि of the न्यायाधीशों , the संयुक्त साम्राज्य , और the विभाजित साम्राज्य of the kingdoms  of Israel and Judah , ending with the destruction of the First Temple .
The second was the period of  the hasmonean किंगडम spanning इससे  140 to 37 BCE .
Since the destruction of the First  टेम्पल , सबसे यहूदियों have जिया in diaspora  .
A minority in every country in which they live ( except Israel ) , they have  अक्सर अनुभवी persecution throughout इतिहास , resulting in a जनसांख्यिकी कि रै fluctuated दोनो  in numbers and distribution over the centuries .
The world Jewish population reached a peak of 15  लाख prior to the दूसरी संसार युद्ध , लकिन छह लाख यहूदियों यहूद मारे  in the Holocaust .
Since then the population has risen again and , was estimated at  13.4 लाख by the उत्तर अमरीकी यहूदी आंकड़ा बैंको , or कम than 0.2 % of the कुल संसार जनसांख्यिकी  ( roughly one in every 514 people ) .
According to this report , about 42.5 % of all Jews reside in Israel ( 5.7 million ) , and 39.3 %  in the संयुक्त राज्य ( 5.3 लाख ) , साथ सबसे of the शेष जीना in यूरोपीय  ( 1.5 million ) and Canada ( 0.4 million ) .
These numbers include all those who consider  themselves यहूदियों , whether or नहीं वे हैं संबद्ध साथ a यहूदी संगठन .
The total world Jewish population ,  however , is मुश्किल to माप  .
in जोड to मुद्दे साथ जनसांख्यिकी methodology , वहीँ हैं halakhic विवादों  regarding who is a Jew and secular , political , and ancestral identification factors that may affect the figure considerably .
कॉर्पस christi बारात  .
आयल on कैनवास by कार्ल  Emil Doepler .
कॉर्पस domini redirects  here .
For other  उपयोग देखिए कॉर्पस domini  ( disambiguation )
The Feast of Corpus Christi ( Latin for Body of Christ ) , also known as  कॉर्पस domini , is a लैटिन रीति liturgical solemnity celebrating the  tradition and belief in the body and blood of Jesus Christ and his Real Presence in the Eucharist .
It emphasizes the joy of the  संस्था of the eucharist , जिससे थी observed on पावन गुरुवार in  the somber atmosphere of the nearness of Good Friday .
In the present  रोमन missal , the feast is designated the solemnity  of The Most Holy Body and Blood of Christ .
It is  भी मनाये in कुछ anglican , लूथरन , और बूढ़ा कैथोलिक  Churches that hold similar beliefs regarding the Real Presence .
The feast is liturgically  मनाये on the गुरुवार बाद ट्रिनिटी संडे or , `` जहाँ the solemnity of the सबसे पावन देह और रक्त of मसीह is नहीं a पावन दिन of दायित्व , it  is assigned to the Sunday after the Most Holy Trinity as its proper day '' .
At the end of Holy Mass , there is often  a बारात of the धन्य sacrament , generally प्रदर्शित  in a monstrance .
The procession is  followed by सुनाकर of the धन्य sacrament  .
A notable Eucharistic procession is that presided over by the Pope each year in Rome ,  जहाँ it begins at the archbasilica of st. जॉन lateran और makes इसके रास्ता to the basilica of संत मरियम प्रमुख , जहाँ it concludes साथ सुनाकर  .
C-reactive protein ( CRP ) is a protein found  in the रक्त , the स्तर of जिससे वृद्धि in जवाब to सूजन ( i.e . c-reactive प्रोटीन is  an acute-phase protein ) .
Its physiological role is to bind to phosphocholine expressed on the  सतह of मुर्दे or मरना कोशिकाएं ( और कुछ प्रकार of जीवाणु ) in अनुक्रम to activate the पूरक  system via the C1Q complex .
CRP is synthesized by the  जिगर in जवाब to कारकों released by macrophages और मोटे कोशिकाएं ( adipocytes  ) .
It is a member of  the pentraxin परिवार  of proteins .
it is नहीं सम्बन्धित to c-peptide  or protein C .
C-reactive protein  थी the पहला पैटर्न मान्यता receptor ( prr  ) to be identified .
The start of the systematic European  colonization of the americas is typically दिनाँक to 1492 , जब a स्पेनी expedition headed by क्रिस्टोफर कोलंबस sailed लिये इण्डिया to खोलें व्यापार लकिन inadvertently  discovered the Americas .
European  conquest , large-scale खोजी और colonization  soon followed .
Seeing that Europe was preoccupied with many internal wars and was slowly  recovering इससे the अनेक मौतों कि the bubonic प्लेग caused , the रैपिड विस्तार at जिससे it grew in माल और शक्ति थी unforeseeable  in the early 1400s .
The first expeditions occurred along the  caribbean coasts on the आइलैंड्स of हिस्पानिओला , प्यूर्टो रीको और क्यूबा , और बाद 1500 विस्तारित into  the interiors of both North and South America .
In 1497 , sailing from the north on behalf of England , John Cabot  उतरा on the उत्तर अमरीकी coast , और a साल बाद , कोलंबस 's तीसरा voyage पहुँचे  the South American coast .
France founded colonies in much of eastern  उत्तर अमेरिका , on a क्रमांक of caribbean आइलैंड्स , और in  South America .
Portugal  colonized ब्राज़ील  .
Eventually , the entire Western Hemisphere came under the control  of यूरोपीय सरकारें , अग्रणी to profound परिवर्तन to इसके लैंडस्केप , जनसांख्यिकी  , and plant and animal life .
In  the 19th सदी अलोन over 50 लाख लोगों बाएँ  Europe for the Americas .
The  post-1492 era is ज्ञात as the काल of the columbian  Exchange .
Keith Richards  ( born 18 दिसम्बर 1943 ) is an अंग्रेज़ी संगीतकार , singer-songwriter और संस्थापक सदस्य of the अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान बैंड  the Rolling Stones .
Rolling Stone magazine said Richards had created `` rock 's  महानतम सिंगल देह of riffs '' , रैंकिंग उसे 4th on इसके सूची  of 100 best guitarists .
Fourteen songs Richards  लिखा साथ the रोलिंग पत्थरों ' सीसे vocalist मिक जैगर हैं सूचीबद्ध among रोलिंग स्टोन पत्रिका 's `` 500 महानतम  Songs of All Time `` .
Richards ' notoriety  लिये अवैध ड्रग उपयोग तना in भाग इससे अनेक ड्रग busts दौरान the लेट 1960s और 1970s और उसके candour regarding  his addiction to and eventual abstinence from heroin .
Testosterone is a steroid hormone from the  androgen समूह और is मिला in स्तनधारियों , सरीसृपों , पक्षियों , और अन्य  vertebrates .
In mammals ,  टेस्टोस्टेरोन is primarily स्रावित in the अंडकोष of males और the अंडाशय of महिलाओं , हालांकि छोटी amounts  are also secreted by the adrenal glands .
It is the  प्रिंसिपल पुरूष sex हार्मोन और an anabolic स्टेरॉयड  .
In men , testosterone plays a key role in the development  of पुरूष reproductive ऊतकों ऐसे as the testis और प्रोस्टेट as खूब as promoting द्वितीयक यौन  characteristics such as increased muscle , bone mass , and the growth of body hair .
In addition ,  टेस्टोस्टेरोन is अनिवार्य लिये स्वास्थ्य और well-being as खूब as the रोकथाम  of osteoporosis .
On average , in adult human  males , the प्लाज्मा विशेषज्ञता of टेस्टोस्टेरोन is परिचय 7–8 टाइम्स as ग्रेट as the विशेषज्ञता in वयस्क इंसान महिलाओं ' प्लाज्मा , लकिन as the metabolic  consumption of testosterone in males is greater , the daily production is about 20 times greater in men .
Females  भी हैं अधिक संवेदनशील to the हार्मोन  .
टेस्टोस्टेरोन is observed in सबसे vertebrates  .
Fish make a  थोड़ा अलग रूप पुकारा 11-ketotestosterone  .
Its counterpart  in कीट is ecdysone  .
These ubiquitous  steroids सुझाएँ कि sex हार्मोन have an प्राचीन  evolutionary history .
क्लस्टर sampling is a sampling तकनीक प्रयुक्त जब `` प्राकृतिक '' लकिन अपेक्षाकृत समरूप  groupings are evident in a statistical population .
It is  प्रायः प्रयुक्त in विपणन शोध  .
In this technique , the total  जनसांख्यिकी is विभाजित into ये समूह ( or क्लस्टर ) और a सरल यादृच्छिक  sample of the groups is selected .
Then the required  सूचना is एकत्रित इससे a सरल यादृच्छिक नमूना of the तत्व भीतर  each selected group .
This may be done for every  तत्व in ये समूह or a subsample of तत्व may be चयनित  within each of these groups .
A common  प्रेरणा लिये क्लस्टर sampling is to reduce the कुल क्रमांक of साक्षात्कार और लागत दिए  the desired accuracy .
Assuming a fixed sample size , the technique gives more accurate results when most of the  विभिन्नता in the जनसांख्यिकी is भीतर the समूह , नहीं between उन्हें .
Jamestown is a town  in guilford काउंटी , उत्तर कैरोलिना , संयुक्त राज्य , और is a उपनगरीय of the आसपास  cities of Greensboro and High Point .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 3,382 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  .
Natalie Portman ( born Natalie Hershlag ; ;  जून 9 , 1981 ) is an अभिनेत्री और मॉडल साथ डुअल अमरीकी और israeli नागरिकता  .
Her  पहला भूमिका थी as an अनाथ लिया in by a हिटमैन in the 1994 कार्रवाई फिल्मी , लकिन मुख्यधारा कामयाबी आए जब वो थी डाल as padmé amidala  in the Star Wars prequel trilogy ( released in 1999 , 2002 and 2005 ) .
In 1999 , she enrolled at  हार्वर्ड विश्वविद्यालयों to पढ़ाई मनोविज्ञान जबकि स्टिल working  as an actress .
She completed her  स्नातक 's उपाधि in  2003 .
In 2001 , Portman opened in New  यॉर्क नगर 's पब्लिक थिएटर उत्पादन of एंटोन चेखव  's The Seagull .
In 2005 , Portman received a nomination for the Academy Award for  बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री और जीती the सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन supporting अभिनेत्री - गति चित्र  for the drama Closer .
She won a  नक्षत्र पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन मादा प्रदर्शन और a शनि पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री लिये उसके अभिनीत  role in V for Vendetta ( 2006 ) .
She played  अग्रणी भूमिकाएँ in the ऐतिहासिक dramas गोया 's भूत ( 2006 ) और the अन्य बोलिन  Girl ( 2008 ) .
In May 2008 , she served  as the youngest सदस्य of the 61st सालाना  Cannes Film Festival jury .
Portman 's directorial debut , Eve , opened the 65th Venice  अंतरराष्ट्रीय फिल्मी पर्व 's शॉर्ट्स प्रतियोगिता in  2008 .
Portman directed a  खण्ड of the सामूहिक फिल्मी नई यॉर्क , i प्रेम तुम  .
In 2011 , Portman won the Academy Award , the Golden Globe Award , the BAFTA Award , the Screen Actors Guild  पुरस्कार , और the स्वतंत्र स्पिरिट पुरस्कार लिये उसके सीसे प्रदर्शन as नीना sayers  in Black Swan .
Copper  is a रासायनिक तत्व साथ the प्रतीक  Cu ( from ) and atomic number 29 .
It is a ductile metal  साथ बहुत ऊँची थर्मल और विद्युत  conductivity .
Pure copper is soft  और malleable ; a freshly उजागर सतह रै a reddish-orange  color .
It is used as a  कंडक्टर of ऊष्मा और विद्युत , a भवन सामग्री , और a constituent of  various metal alloys .
The metal and its alloys  have महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये हज़ारों  of years .
In the Roman era , copper was principally  mined on साइप्रस , hence the उत्पत्ति of the नाम of the मेटल as сyprium ( मेटल of साइप्रस  ) , later shortened to сuprum .
Its compounds are commonly  encountered as तांबे ( ii ) लवण , जिससे प्रायः impart ब्लू or ग्रीन रंगों to खनिज ऐसे as azurite  and turquoise and have been widely used historically as pigments .
Architectural structures built with  तांबे corrode to दे ग्रीन verdigris ( or  patina ) .
Decorative art prominently  सुविधाएँ तांबे , दोनो by itself और as भाग of pigments  .
Copper is essential to all living  जीवों as a ट्रेस dietary खनिज क्युकी it is a कुंजी constituent of the respiratory एंजाइम जटिल  cytochrome c oxidase .
In molluscs and crustacea copper is a constituent of the blood  रंजक hemocyanin , जिससे is replaced by the iron-complexed हीमोग्लोबिन in  fish and other vertebrates .
The main areas where  तांबे is मिला in vertebrates हैं जिगर , मांसपेशी  and bone .
In sufficient concentration , copper compounds are poisonous to higher organisms and are used as  bacteriostatic substances , fungicides , और लकडी preservatives  .
The major  पेशेवर खेल लीग , or बस प्रमुख लीग , in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा हैं the उच्चतम पेशेवर  competitions of team sports in the two countries .
Although  व्यक्तिगत खेल ऐसे as गोल्फ़ , टेनिस , और स्वचालित रेसिंग हैं भी बहुत लोकप्रिय , the पद is प्रायः  limited to team sports .
The term `` major league ''  थी पहला प्रयुक्त in 1921 in सन्दर्भ to प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल ( एमएलबी ) , the शीर्ष स्तर  of professional American baseball .
Today ,  the प्रमुख उत्तरी उत्तर अमेरिका पेशेवर टोली खेल लीग हैं प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल ( एमएलबी ) , the नेशनल बास्केट संघ  ( NBA ) , the National Football League ( NFL ) , and the National Hockey League ( NHL ) .
अन्य notable लीग शामिल प्रमुख लीग सॉकर ( mls ) , the कनाडाई फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( cfl ) , the एरिना फ़ुटबॉल लीग , प्रमुख लीग lacrosse , the नेशनल  Lacrosse League and the Women 's National Basketball Association .
The NFL , MLB , NBA , and NHL  हैं commonly referred to as  the Big Four .
Each of these is the richest  पेशेवर क्लबों प्रतियोगिता in इसके खेल  worldwide .
The best players can become cultural icons in both countries and elsewhere in the world , because the leagues enjoy a  significant प्लेस in लोकप्रिय संस्कृति in the us और कनाडा .
The NFL has  32 टीमों , और the अन्य have  30 each .
The vast majority of major league teams  हैं concentrated in the सबसे populous महानगर क्षेत्रों of  the United States .
Baseball , football , hockey , and soccer have had  पेशेवर लीग लिये over 100 सालो ; जल्दी लीग ऐसे as the नेशनल संघ , ओहियो लीग , और नेशनल हॉकी संघ formed the  basis of the modern MLB , NFL and NHL respectively .
Soccer was first  professionalized in 1894 , लकिन लीग suffered greatly इससे कमी of स्थिरता  and seldom lasted more than a decade .
Soccer 's greatest  सफलताओं यहूद in the रूप of the अमरीकी सॉकर लीग ( 1921-1933 ) , the असली उत्तर अमरीकी सॉकर लीग ( 1968-1984 ) , the नेशनल पेशेवर सॉकर लीग  ( 1984-2001 ) and , currently , Major League Soccer ( 1996-present ) .
Basketball is a relatively new development ; the NBA evolved  इससे the नेशनल बास्केट लीग और इसके splinter समूह the बास्केट संघ of अमेरिका , लेने on  its current form in 1949 .
Every major league  averages 15,000 प्रशंसक in उपस्थिति प्रति खेल or उच्चतर as  of 2011 .
Meridian Altitude is an  खगोलीय नेविगेशन विधि of calculating an निरीक्षक 's अक्षांश  .
Earned value management ( EVM ) , or Earned  मान project/performance प्रबन्धन ( evpm ) is a प्रोजेक्ट प्रबन्धन तकनीक लिये measuring प्रोजेक्ट प्रदर्शन  and progress in an objective manner .
क्युकी evm रै the क्षमता  to combine measurements of :
पैमाना
अनुसूची
और cost,
in a single integrated system , Earned Value Management is  समर्थ to provide सटीक forecasts of प्रोजेक्ट प्रदर्शन समस्याएं , जिससे is an महत्वपूर्ण योगदान लिये प्रोजेक्ट प्रबन्धन  .
Early EVM research showed  कि the क्षेत्रों of नियोजन और कंट्रोल हैं significantly impacted by इसके उपयोग ; और similarly , using the methodology improves दोनो पैमाना  definition as well as the analysis of overall project performance .
More recent  शोध अध्ययन have दिखाया कि the सिद्धान्त of evm हैं धनात्मक predictors  of project success .
Popularity of EVM has grown significantly in recent years beyond government  contracting , in जिससे सेक्टर इसके महत्व continues to वृद्धि ( e.g. , हाल नई dfar नियम ) , in भाग क्युकी evm can भी सतह in और  help substantiate contract disputes .
रंगीन वसन्त गार्डन  flowers
Spring is one  of the चार conventional शीतोष्ण सीज़न , following शीत और  preceding summer .
There are various technical  परिभाषाएं of वसन्त , लकिन लोकल उपयोग of the पद varies  according to local climate , cultures and customs .
When it is  वसन्त in the उत्तरी गोलार्ध , it होगा be पतझड़  in the southern hemisphere .
At the spring equinox , days are close to  12 घंटों long साथ दिन लंबाई increasing as the ऋतु progresses  .
Spring and `` springtime '' refer to the season , and also to  विचार of rebirth , कायाकल्प , नवीकरण , क़यामत , और regrowth , साथ  festivals such as Carnival , Easter and Holi being celebrated at this time .
jamestown थी a उपनिवेश in the उपनिवेश of वर्जिनिया , the पहला स्थाई अंग्रेज़ी  settlement in the Americas .
Established by the Virginia Company of London as `` James Fort '' on May 14 , 1607 ( O.S . , May 24 , 1607 N.S . ) , it followed several earlier failed  कोशिशें , सहित the खोया उपनिवेश of roanoke  .
Jamestown  परोसा as the पूंजी of the उपनिवेश लिये 83 सालो ,  from 1616 until 1699 .
The settlement was located  भीतर the territory of a राजनैतिक एंटिटी ज्ञात as tsenacommacah , the राज्य of the powhatan confederacy , साथ  around 14,000 native inhabitants , and specifically was in part of the subdivision known as the Paspahegh tribe .
The natives initially welcomed the colonists with dancing , feasting and tobacco ceremonies , and they provided crucial provisions and support for the survival of the colonists , who were not  agriculturally inclined , हालांकि संबंध साथ the newcomers भी soured fairly जल्दी on , अग्रणी to the कुल annihilation of the paspahegh  in warfare within 3 years .
Within a year of Jamestown 's founding ,  the वर्जिनिया कम्पनी brought पॉलिश और डच colonists to सहायता improve the उपनिवेश  .
In 1619 , the first documented Africans were brought to Jamestown ,  हालांकि the आधुनिक धारणा of गुलामी in the भविष्य संयुक्त राज्य किया नहीं शुरू in वर्जिनिया जबतक  1660 .
When the colony was subdivided into the  असली आठ shires of वर्जिनिया in 1634 , the कस्बा became स्तिथ in the eponymous  James City Shire .
The London Company 's second settlement , Bermuda , claims to be the site of the oldest town in the English New World , as  st. जार्ज 's , बरमूडा थी officially स्थापित ( as नई लंदन ) in 1612 , whereas जेम्स फोर्ट , in  Virginia , was not to be converted into James towne until 1619 , and further did not survive into the present day .
In 1699 , the capital was  relocated इससे jamestown to कया is आज williamsburg , बाद जिससे jamestown ceased to मौजूद as a उपनिवेश  , existing today only as an archaeological site .
Today , Jamestown is one of three locations comprising the  ऐतिहासिक त्रिभुज of औपनिवेशिक वर्जिनिया , साथ साथ williamsburg और yorktown , साथ  two primary heritage sites .
Historic Jamestowne , the archaeological site on Jamestown Island , is a  सहकारी प्रयत्न by jamestown नेशनल ऐतिहासिक साईट ( भाग of औपनिवेशिक नेशनल ऐतिहासिक पार्क  ) , and Preservation Virginia .
The  jamestown उपनिवेश , a जीना इतिहास interpretive साईट  , is operated by the Jamestown Yorktown Foundation in conjunction with the Commonwealth of Virginia .
James Christopher Frey ( born September 12 ,  1969 ) is an अमरीकी लेखक  .
His books A  लाख छोटी टुकड़े ( 2003 ) और my dost लियोनार्ड ( 2005 ) , as खूब as उज्जवल चमकदार morning ( 2008  ) , were bestsellers .
He was the subject of a scandal when investigators discovered that prison time and the extent of certain injuries were  अतिरंजित in a लाख छोटी टुकड़े , a अधिकारीगण autobiographical खाता of the लेखक 's संघर्ष साथ व्यसन  .
Deere & Company , most  commonly ज्ञात by इसके नाम जॉन deere , is an अमरीकी निगम आधारित in moline , इलिनोइस , और एक of the largest निर्माताओं  of agricultural machinery in the world .
In 2012 , it was listed as  97th in the सौभाग्य 500 अमेरिका 's रैंकिंग और 190th in the सौभाग्य 500 वैश्विक  ranking .
Deere and Company agricultural products , sold under the John Deere name , include  tractors , combine हार्वेस्टर , कपास हार्वेस्टर , balers , planters / seeders , sprayers  , and UTVs .
The company is also a manufacturer of construction equipment and forestry equipment , as  खूब as a प्रदायक of डीज़ल इंजन और drivetrains ( axles  , transmissions , gearboxes ) used in heavy equipment .
Additionally , John Deere manufactures  उपकरण प्रयुक्त in लॉन , grounds , और turf परवाह , ऐसे as walk-behind लॉन mowers  , zero-turn lawn mowers , lawn tractors , and snowthrowers .
To support the  कोर व्यवसायों , जॉन deere भी provides वित्तीय  services and other related activities .
The company 's slogan is ``  nothing रनों जैसे a deere '' और रै a चित्र of a leaping हिरण as a लोगो , a शब्द खेल pun on `` nothing रनों जैसे  a deer '' .
Carl Westby  coined the phrase `` nothing रनों जैसे a deere '' लिये a विपणन  campaign to sell snowmobiles .
The company 's products are also  identifiable by इसके distinctive शेड of ग्रीन पेंट , प्रायः augmented by  yellow trim .
the संयुक्त राज्य ten-dollar विधेयक ( $ 10  ) is a denomination of United States currency .
The first U.S. Secretary of  the राजकोष ( 1789–95 ) , सिकंदर हैमिल्टन , is फिलहाल प्रदर्शित on the obverse of the विधेयक , जबकि the  U.S. Treasury Building is featured on the reverse .
( Hamilton is one of  दो non-presidents प्रदर्शित on फिलहाल  issued U.S. bills .
The other is Benjamin  फ्रैंकलिन , on the $ 100 विधेयक  .
Hamilton is one of only four people featured on U.S. paper currency ( 1861 to the present ) who was not  born in the महाद्वीपीय संयुक्त राज्य , as he थी इससे the वेस्ट इंडीज  .
The others are : Albert Gallatin , Switzerland ( $  500 1862/63 विधिक टेंडर ) ; जार्ज meade , स्पेन ( $ 1,000 1890/91 राजकोष नोट ) ; और रॉबर्ट मॉरिस , इंग्लैण्ड ( $ 1,000 1862/63 विधिक टेंडर ; $ 10  1878/80 Silver Certificate ) .
In addition , Kamehameha  i , appears on the 2008 हवाई राज्य क्वार्टर  . )
All $ 10 bills  जारी आज हैं संघीय आरक्षित टीप  .
The Bureau of Engraving and Printing  says the औसत जीवन of a $ 10 विधेयक in परिसंचरण is 18 महीने पहले it is replaced  due to wear .
लगभग 6 % of सब us banknotes मुद्रित in 2009  were $ 10 bills .
Ten dollar bills are  वितरित by संघीय आरक्षित बैंको in पीला  straps .
The source of  the फेस on the $ 10 विधेयक is जॉन trumbull ’s 1805 पोर्ट्रेट of हैमिल्टन कि belongs to the पोर्ट्रेट संग्रहण of नई यॉर्क  City Hall .
The $ 10 bill is  the तभी u.S. पेपर करेंसी in परिसंचरण in जिससे the पोर्ट्रेट चेहरों to the बाएँ ( the $ 100,000 विधेयक प्रदर्शित a पोर्ट्रेट of  Woodrow Wilson facing to the left , but was used only for intra-government transactions ) .
Andy  सैमुएल ग्रिफ़िथ ( जून 1 , 1926 – जुलाई 3 , 2012 ) थी an अमरीकी कर्ता , टेलीविज़न  producer , Grammy Award -winning Southern-gospel singer , and writer .
He was a Tony Award nominee for two roles , and gained prominence  in the अभिनीत भूमिका in निदेशक एलिया कज़न 's फिल्मी a फेस in the भीड ( 1957 ) पहले he became बेहतर ज्ञात लिये उसके टेलीविज़न भूमिकाएँ ,  playing the lead characters in the 1960–1968 situation comedy The Andy Griffith Show and in the 1986–1995 legal drama Matlock .
टेरेसा पेनेलोप `` terri '' इरविन , ( née raines ; born जुलाई 20 , 1964 ) is an ऑस्ट्रेलियाई -आधारd , अमरीकी  -born naturalist , author , the widow of Australian naturalist Steve Irwin and owner of Australia Zoo at Beerwah , Queensland , Australia .
She co-starred with her  husband on the मगरमच्छ शिकारी , उनके unconventional टेलीविज़न प्रकृति वृत्तचित्र श्रेणी  along with its spin-off series , Croc Files and The Crocodile Hunter Diaries .
वो रै जिया in ऑस्ट्रेलिया चूंकि 1992 , जब वो शादीशुदा  Steve Irwin .
Andreas Cellarius 's illustration of the Copernican  प्रणाली , इससे the harmonia macrocosmica ( 1660 ) .
Heliocentrism , or heliocentricism , is  the खगोलीय मॉडल in जिससे the धरती और ग्रह revolve around a अपेक्षाकृत stationary  Sun at the center of the Solar System .
The word comes from the  यूनानी ( helios `` सूर्य '' और kentron `` बीच  '' ) .
historically , heliocentrism थी opposed to geocentrism  , which placed the Earth at the center .
The notion that the Earth revolves around the Sun had been proposed as early as the 3rd century BC by  aristarchus of samos , लकिन aristarchus 's heliocentrism आकर्षित छोटी ध्यान जबतक कोपरनिकस revived  and elaborated it .
Lucio Russo ,  however , argues कि इस is a भ्रामक छाप resulting  from the loss of scientific works of the Hellenistic Era .
Using indirect  प्रमाण he argues कि a heliocentric दृश्य थी expounded  in Hipparchus 's work on gravity .
It was not until the 16th century that a fully  predictive गणितीय मॉडल of a heliocentric प्रणाली थी प्रस्तुत , by the पुनर्जागरण गणितज्ञ  , astronomer , and Catholic cleric Nicolaus Copernicus of Poland , leading to the Copernican Revolution .
In the following century , Johannes  कॅप्लर elaborated upon और विस्तारित इस मॉडल to शामिल अंडाकार  orbits , and supporting observations made using a telescope were presented by Galileo Galilei .
With the  observations of विलियम हर्शेल , फ्रेडरिक bessel , और अन्य , खगोलशास्त्रियों एहसास कि the सूर्य थी नहीं the बीच of the ब्रह्मांड और  by the 1920s Edwin Hubble had shown that it was part of a galaxy ( the Milky Way ) that was only one of many billions .
Norah Jones ( born Geetali Norah Jones Shankar ; March  30 , 1979 ) is an अमरीकी singer-songwriter , pianist , और अभिनेत्री  .
She is  the बेटी of भारतीय सितार खिलाड़ी रवि  Shankar and Sue Jones .
She is also  anoushka शंकर 's half-sister  .
In 2002 , she launched her  सोलो म्यूज़िक करियर साथ the रिलीज of the commercially कामयाब और critically acclaimed एल्बम आइये दूर साथ me , a संलयन of  country music and pop with elements of jazz which was certified diamond album , selling over 26 million copies .
The record earned Jones five  ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , सहित the एल्बम of the साल , रिकार्ड of the साल  , and Best New Artist .
Her subsequent studio albums , Feels Like Home , released in 2004 , Not Too Late ,  released in 2007 , the वही साल वो बना उसके फिल्मी डेब्यू in my ब्लूबेरी नाइट्स , और उसके 2009 रिलीज the पतन सब gained प्लेटिनम औकात , selling over a लाख नक़ल और यहूद generally खूब प्राप्त  by critics .
Jones '  पांचवां स्टुडियो एल्बम , छोटी टूटा दिल , थी released  on April 27 , 2012 .
Jones has won nine  ग्रैमी पुरस्कार और थी 60th on बिलबोर्ड पत्रिका  's artists of the 2000–2009 decade chart .
Throughout her  करियर , जोन्स रै जीती numerous पुरस्कार और रै बेची अधिक than 50  million albums worldwide .
बिलबोर्ड नामित उसके the शीर्ष जैज़ कलाकार of  the 2000–2009 decade .
Not  to be उलझन साथ आयाम of a शारीरिक  quantity .
For other  उपयोग , देखिए आयाम  ( disambiguation ) .
From  बाएँ to सही , the वर्गाकार , the  cube , and the tesseract .
The square is bounded by  1-dimensional लाइनों , the घन by 2-dimensional क्षेत्रों , और  the tesseract by 3-dimensional volumes .
a प्रक्षेप of the घन is दिए चूंकि it is viewed on  a two-dimensional screen .
The same applies  to the tesseract , जिससे additionally can तभी be दिखाया as a प्रक्षेप  even in three-dimensional space .
A diagram  प्रर्दशित the पहला चार स्थानिक  dimensions .
In physics and  गणित , the आयाम of a स्पेस or ऑब्जेक्ट is informally पारिभाषित as the न्यूनतम क्रमांक of  coordinates needed to specify any point within it .
Thus a line has a  आयाम of एक क्युकी तभी एक निर्देशांक is needed to बताएँ a पाइंट on it  ( for example , the point at 5 on a number line ) .
A surface  ऐसे as a प्लेन or the सतह of a बेलन or गोला रै a आयाम of दो क्युकी दो निर्देशांक हैं needed  to specify a point on it ( for example , to locate a point on the surface of a sphere you need both its latitude and its longitude ) .
the अंदर of a घन , a बेलन or a गोला is three-dimensional  because three coordinates are needed to locate a point within these spaces .
In physical terms , dimension refers to the constituent structure of all space ( volume ) and its position in time ( perceived as a scalar dimension along  the t-axis ) , as खूब as the स्थानिक संविधान of वस्तुएँ within—structures कि correlate साथ दोनो कण और फ़ील्ड conceptions , interact according to सापेक्ष गुण of द्रव्यमान —and हैं fundamentally  mathematical in description .
These , or other axes , may be referenced to  uniquely पहचानो a पाइंट or ढांचा in इसके रवैया और संबंध to अन्य  objects and occurrences .
Physical theories that incorporate time , such as general  आपेक्षिकता , हैं कहा to कार्य in 4-dimensional `` spacetime `` , ( पारिभाषित as a मिन्कोवस्की स्पेस  ) .
Modern theories tend to be ``  higher-dimensional '' सहित क्वांटम फ़ील्ड और स्ट्रिंग  theories .
The state-space of quantum  यांत्रिकी is an infinite-dimensional फलन स्पेस  .
The concept  of आयाम is नहीं प्रतिबंधित to  physical objects .
High-dimensional spaces occur in mathematics and the sciences  लिये अनेक कारण , अक्सर as विन्यास स्पेसेस ऐसे as in लाग्रांजीय or हेमिल्टोनीय यांत्रिकी ; ये हैं अमूर्त स्पेसेस , स्वतंत्र of  the physical space we live in .
fontana ( ) is a नगर of 200,762 निवासियों in  San Bernardino County , California .
Founded in 1913 , it remained essentially rural until  संसार युद्ध ii , जब उद्योगों हेनरी J. कैसर निर्मित a विशाल स्टील मिल in the  area .
It is now a regional hub of the trucking industry ,  साथ अंतरराज्यीय 10 और राज्य रूट 210 transecting the नगर इससे ईस्ट to वेस्ट , और अंतरराज्यीय 15 गुजर diagonally through इसके northwestern  quadrant .
It is home to the largest of the San  bernardino काउंटी प्रणाली पुस्तकालयों , a संवर ऐतिहासिक थिएटर , a नगरपालिका पार्क , और the स्वचालित क्लबों स्पीडवे on the साईट of the कैसर  Steel Mill .
Fontana also hosts  the fontana दिनों हाफ मैराथन  and 5K run .
This race is the  तीव्रतम half-marathon कोर्स in the संसार  .
The U.S.  2012 जनसांख्यिकी reported कि fontana 's जनसांख्यिकी थी 200,762 in 2012 , बनाना it the दूसरी सबसे populous नगर in सैन bernardino  county county and 14th in the state .
Cowboys Stadium is a stadium  साथ a retractable छत in आर्लिंगटन , टेक्सास  .
It serves as the home of the  नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग 's डलास  Cowboys .
It replaced the partially covered Texas Stadium ,  जिससे खोली in 1971 , और परोसा as the cowboys ' घर through  the 2008 season .
It was  समाप्त on may 27 , 2009 .
The  स्टेडियम सीटे 85,000 , बनाना it the  third largest stadium in the NFL by seating capacity .
The maximum capacity of the stadium ,  सहित खड़ा रूम , is 105,000 .
The Party Pass (  खोलें क्षेत्रों ) भाग हैं पीछे सीटे in प्रत्येक समाप्त मण्डल और on a श्रेणी of छह  elevated platforms connected by stairways .
It has the world 's  largest column-free आंतरिक और the चौथी largest ऊँची परिभाषा वीडियो स्क्रीन , जिससे  hangs from 20 yard line to 20 yard line .
The facility can also be used for a variety of other activities outside of  इसके प्रमुख purpose ( पेशेवर फ़ुटबॉल ) ऐसे as कॉन्सर्ट , बास्केट खेल , मुक्केबाज़ी मिलान , कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल और ऊँची  school football contests , soccer matches , and motocross races .
Canadian  इतिहासकारों जबतक the 1980s tended to फ़ोकस on आर्थिक  history , including labour history .
In part this is because  कनाडा रै था दूर कम राजनैतिक or सैन्य विरोध  than other societies .
This was  विशेषकर सच्चा in the पहला हाफ of the बीसवीं  century when economic history was overwhelmingly dominant .
Many of the most  prominent अंग्रेज़ी कनाडाई इतिहासकारों इससे इस काल यहूद आर्थिक इतिहासकारों  , such as Harold Innis , Donald Creighton and Arthur R. M. Lower
Scholars of Canadian  इतिहास यहूद वारिस to the परंपराओं कि विकसित in यूरोपीय और the संयुक्त राज्य , लकिन frameworks  that worked well elsewhere often failed in Canada .
The heavily Marxist  बहकावे आर्थिक इतिहास कि dominates यूरोपीय रै  little relevance to most of Canadian history .
A focus on class , urban areas , and  उद्योग fails to पता कनाडा 's ग्रामीण और संसाधन  based economy .
Similarly , the monetarist school that  is प्रबल in the संयुक्त राज्य भी रै महरूम मुश्किल to ट्रांसफ़र उत्तर of the  border .
The study of  आर्थिक इतिहास in कनाडा became अत्यधिक केन्द्रित on आर्थिक भूगोल , और लिये अनेक सालो the  dominant school of thought has been the staples thesis .
This school of thought bases the study of the Canadian  अर्थव्यवस्था on the पढ़ाई of प्राकृतिक संसाधन  .
This approach has since  भी become प्रयुक्त बाहर of कनाडा in ऑस्ट्रेलिया  and in many developing nations .
Before the arrival of  europeans , the पहला राष्ट्र of कया होता become कनाडा था a विशाल  and vibrant trade network .
Furs , tools , decorative items , and other goods were often transported  हज़ारों of किलोमीटर , ज़्यादातर by कैनो throughout the अनेक नदियाँ और  lakes of the region .
The early European history of the  कनाडाई अर्थव्यवस्था is प्रायः पढ़ाई through the स्टेपल्स लेख जिससे argues the कनाडाई अर्थव्यवस्था विकसित  through the exploitation of a series of staples that would be exported to Europe .
Carbon-14 , 14C , or radiocarbon , is a radioactive isotope of  कार्बन साथ a केंद्रक containing 6 protons और 8  neutrons .
Its presence in organic materials is the basis of  the radiocarbon डेटिंग विधि pioneered by willard लिब्बी और सहयोगियों ( 1949 ) to तिथि  archaeological , geological and hydrogeological samples .
Carbon-14 was discovered on 27 February  1940 , by मार्टिन कामेन और sam रूबेन at the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया विकिरण प्रयोगशाला in बर्कली  , although its existence had been suggested by Franz Kurie in 1934 .
There are three naturally occurring isotopes of carbon on Earth : 99 % of the  कार्बन is carbon-12 , 1 % is carbon-13 , और carbon-14 occurs in ट्रेस amounts , i.e. , बनाना up परिचय 1 भाग प्रति खरब (  0.0000000001 % ) of the carbon in the atmosphere .
The half-life of  carbon-14 is 5,730±40  years .
carbon-14 decays into nitrogen-14 through  beta decay .
The primary natural  सोर्स of carbon-14 on धरती is लौकिक रे कार्रवाई upon नाइट्रोजन in the  atmosphere , and it is therefore a cosmogenic nuclide .
However , open-air nuclear testing  between 1955–1980 contributed to इस पूल  .
The different  isotopes of कार्बन do नहीं differ appreciably in उनके रासायनिक  properties .
This is used in chemical and biological research , in a technique called carbon labeling : carbon-14 atoms can be used to  बदलें nonradioactive कार्बन , in अनुक्रम to ट्रेस रासायनिक और biochemical प्रतिक्रियाएँ involving कार्बन अणु इससे कोई दिए सशुल्क यौगिक  .
Lightning is a highly  दृश्य रूप of उर्जा  transfer
Lightning  हमलों हैं विद्युत discharges on a विशाल स्केल between the माहौल  and an earth-bound object .
वे ज़्यादातर originate in thunderclouds और terminate on the मैदान  , called Cloud to Ground ( CG ) lightning .
However , they may also  be initiated इससे a बहुत लम्बा grounded ऑब्जेक्ट और पहुँचें into  the clouds .
Although `` a lightning strike '' is commonly used to describe all  बिजली , it is बल्कि ग़लत और a misnomer , as तभी परिचय 25 % of सब बिजली कार्यक्रम विश्वव्यापी हैं cg , the विशाल बल्क of बिजली कार्यक्रम हैं intracloud ( ic ) or बादल to बादल ( cc  ) , where discharge only occurs high in the atmosphere .
The scientific  नाम लिये the पूरा प्रक्रम of a सिंगल बिजली इवेंट is a और it is a बहुत जटिल , अनेक stepped  interaction , which is not completely understood .
Most CG flashes only ``  स्ट्राइक '' एक शारीरिक स्थान , referred to as a termination  .
The primary conducting channel , the bright coursing light you may see and call a `` strike '' , is only about 1 inch  in व्यास , हालांकि to हमारी आँखें it looks much larger  .
वे हैं मील long , upwards of tens of  miles .
And the entire  फ्लैश , lasts तभी a few भिन्नों of a दूसरी , सबसे of जिससे  is not visible to human eyes .
Thunder is always  उत्पादित by बिजली  .
Just like lightning , that deceives our eyes , usually looking  larger or करीब than it वाकई is , the धरती 's माहौल और हमारी दिमाग 's बोध of the बाहर संसार , ultimately determines  whether it is `` heard '' or not .
Lightning can not  happen in a वैक्यूम विहीन of ions , nor can थंडर occur बगैर  molecules to vibrate .
थंडर is a शारीरिक निरपेक्ष लिये प्रत्येक सिंगल फ्लैश of  lightning .
Contrary to popular belief , a  बिजली स्ट्राइक itself is प्रायः नहीं जिम्मेदार लिये अनेक मौतों  or injuries from a single event .
It would be impossible given the natural tendencies of  a फ्लैश , जबतक लोगों or पशु यहूद stacked on शीर्ष of प्रत्येक अन्य , or वे यहूद somehow arranged खड़ा और  part of the flash channel .
When lightning  ignites an उपलब्धियाँ ईंधन सोर्स और an विस्फोट occurs , it is the शॉक वेव or आग causing the  injuries , not the strike itself .
Ground Currents , also called step potential , of an earth termination is what truly  कल्याणकारी सबसे चोटों or मौत to इंसानो  and animals .
The  निकट instantaneous फटाफट of सतह आरोप , induced by the ओवरहेड thundercloud itself , रेस to the स्ट्राइक पाइंट इससे  hundreds to thousands of feet away during discharge .
This current , caused during each  स्ट्रोक , takes the पाथ of तनिक प्रतिरोध , जिससे may be आयन समृद्ध इंसान  or animal legs , over poorly conducting earth .
This is why it is  बेहतरीन to crouch , साथ फीट बंद साथ , if कभी caught  in the open during a thunderstorm .
Unfortunately , most reports do not draw a distinction between the real cause of injury  or मौत , be it the स्ट्राइक itself , a resulting विस्फोट or आग , or प्रायः जिम्मेदार कदम संभावित  .
Peter F. Kilmartin ( born 1962 ) is  the वर्तमान attorney सामान्य of rhode द्वीप  .
Kilmartin is also a  रिटायर्ड पुलिस कप्तान और a पूर्व सदस्य  of the Rhode Island House of Representatives .
A  युगल following उनके विवाह in the  Manti Utah Temple .
Sealing is an ordinance ( ritual ) performed in  latter दिन संतो मंदिरों by a व्यक्ति पकड़कर the sealing प्राधिकार  .
The purpose of this ordinance is to seal familiar  संबंध , बनाना संभावित the अस्तित्व of परिवार संबंध throughout शाश्वत  .
LDS  शिक्षाओं प्लेस ग्रेट महत्व on the विशिष्ट प्राधिकार जरूरी  to perform these sealings .
Church doctrine  सिखाती कि इस प्राधिकार , पुकारा the priesthood ,  corresponds to that given to Saint Peter in .
Sealings are typically performed as  विवाह or as sealing of children to अभिभावक .
They were performed  prior to the मौत of जोसेफ स्मिथ , jr. ( the प्रमुख संस्थापक of the latter दिन संत गति ) , और हैं फिलहाल performed  in The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints .
Although some  अन्य denominations , ऐसे as the जातियाँ of मसीह , दृश्य sealing as an centuries of स्मिथ 's अभ्यास of  plural marriage , some do still perform them .
The 2000s ,  सुनाया `` दो हज़ारों '' , थी a दशक कि began on जनवरी 1 , 2000  , and ended on December 31 , 2009 .
Globalization , which had  त्वरित बाद the जल्दी 1990s पतन of साम्यवादी , जारी to be a फ़ोर्स  in the 2000s .
The growth of the Internet was one of the prime contributors to globalization during the decade , making it possible for people to interact with other people , express ideas ,  introduce अन्य to अलग संस्कृतियों और पृष्ठभूमि , उपयोग goods और सेवाएं , बेचें और ख़रीदे ऑनलाइन , शोध और सीख परिचय बाते , साथ साथ experiencing  the world without having to leave home .
The institutions , linkages and technologies that emerged or were  redefined पहले होता subsequently in इस दशक लाभ अनेक देशों , in particular चीन और  India .
however , in अन्य भाग of the संसार ऐसे प्रगति विफल to पता जारी  struggles with modernity , most notably characterized by the rise of al-Qaeda and other Islamist groups .
The September 11 attacks in 2001 led to the United States , United Kingdom , Spain , Canada and other nations invading  अफगानिस्तान , as खूब as implementing विभिन्न anti-terrorist उपायों at घर और विदेश in  what was known as the War on Terror .
the यूरोपीय संघ देखी further संयोजन और  expansion throughout much of Europe .
The economic growth  of the 2000s था considerable पर्यावरणीय consequences , उठाया माँग लिये घटाते  energy resources , and was still shown to be vulnerable as demonstrated during the Global Financial Crisis of the late 2000s .
The  gunfight at the o.k . corral थी a gunfight कि took प्लेस at परिचय 3:00 p.m. on बुधवार , अक्तूबर 26 , 1881 , in tombstone  , Arizona Territory , and is generally regarded as the most famous gunfight in the history of the American Old West .
The gunfight , believed to have lasted only about  तीस सेकेंड , थी लड़ा between the गैरकानूनी cowboys बिली claiborne , आइक और बिली clanton , और tom और फ़्रैंक mclaury , और the opposing कस्बा मार्शल वर्जिल earp और उसके भाइयो सहायक कस्बा मार्शल मॉर्गन और अस्थाई lawman  Wyatt , aided by Doc Holliday designated as a temporary marshal by Virgil .
Ike Clanton  और बिली claiborne भागा इससे the लड़ो unharmed , लकिन आइक 's bhai बिली clanton  was killed , along with both McLaurys .
Lawmen Virgil and Morgan  earp और दस्तावेज़ हॉलिडे यहूद  wounded .
Only  व्याट earp आए through  the fight unharmed .
The fight has come to represent a time in American history when the frontier was open  दायरा लिये outlaws opposed by विधि प्रवर्तन कि थी स्प्रेड पतला over विशाल territories , leaving कुछ क्षेत्रों unprotected  .
The gunfight  थी नहीं खूब ज्ञात to the अमरीकी पब्लिक जबतक 1931 जब लेखक स्टुअर्ट झील प्रकाशित कया रै चूंकि महरूम संकल्पित to be a largely fictionalized जीवनी , व्याट earp  : Frontier Marshal , two years after Earp 's death .
झील retold उसके स्टोरी in a 1946 किताब कि निदेशक जॉन घाट  developed into the movie My Darling Clementine .
After the movie Gunfight at the O.K . Corral was released in 1957 , the  गोलीबारी आए to be ज्ञात by कि नाम .
Since then , the  विरोध रै महरूम portrayed साथ varying डिग्री of सटीकता in numerous  Western films and books .
Despite its name , the  gunfight दरअसल occurred in a सीमित लॉट छह द्वार वेस्ट of the पश्च प्रवेश to  the O.K . Corral on Fremont Street , and also in the street .
the दो opposing पार्टियों यहूद  initially only about apart .
About thirty shots  यहूद fired in तीस सेकेंड .
Ike Clanton filed murder charges against  the earps और दस्तावेज़ हॉलिडे लकिन वे यहूद आखिरकार exonerated by a लोकल न्यायधीश बाद a 30-day प्रारंभिक सुनना  and then again by a local grand jury .
On  दिसम्बर 28 , 1881 , वर्जिल earp थी maimed in an हत्या attempt by the गैरकानूनी  Cowboys , and on March 18 , 1882 , they assassinated Morgan Earp .
The suspects  सुसज्जित ठोस alibis , और newly नियुक्त डिप्टी u.s . मार्शल व्याट earp took matters into उसके अपना हैंड्स दौरान  the Earp Vendetta Ride , ironically pursued by county Sheriff Johnny Behan with warrants for the Earp 's arrest .
HDMI ( High-Definition Multimedia Interface ) is a compact audio/video interface for transferring uncompressed video data and compressed/uncompressed  डिजिटल ऑडियो आंकड़ा इससे a hdmi-compliant यंत्र ( `` the सोर्स यंत्र '' ) to a संगत कंप्यूटर मॉनिटर , वीडियो प्रोजेक्टर , डिजिटल टेलीविज़न , or डिजिटल ऑडियो यंत्र  .
HDMI is  a डिजिटल बदलना लिये मौजूदा एनालॉग  video standards .
There are a number of HDMI-standard cable  कनेक्टर्स उपलब्धियाँ , प्रत्येक of जिससे can be प्रयुक्त लिये कोई uncompressed tv or pc वीडियो स्वरूप , सहित मानक , उन्नत , ऊँची परिभाषा , और 3d वीडियो सिग्नल ; up to 8 चैनल्स of संपीडित  or uncompressed digital audio ; a CEC ( Consumer Electronics Control ) connection ; and an Ethernet data connection .
HDMI implements the EIA/CEA-861 standards , which define video formats and  waveforms , हस्तांतरण of संपीडित , uncompressed , और lpcm ऑडियो , auxiliary आंकड़ा , और implementations  of the VESA EDID .
The CEC allows HDMI devices to control each other when  जरुरी और allows the उपयोक्ता to operate अनेक डिवाइस साथ एक रिमोट कंट्रोल हैंडसेट .
Because HDMI is electrically compatible with  the cea-861 सिग्नल प्रयुक्त by डिजिटल विज़ुअल इंटरफ़ेस ( dvi ) , no सिग्नल परिवर्तन is जरुरी , nor is वहीँ a घाटा of वीडियो विशेषता जब a dvi-to-hdmi एडाप्टर  is used .
As an uncompressed CEA-861 connection , HDMI is independent of the various digital television standards used by individual devices ,  ऐसे as atsc और dvb , as ये हैं encapsulations of संपीडित एमपीईजी वीडियो स्ट्रीम ( जिससे can be decoded और  output as an uncompressed video stream on HDMI ) .
Production of  उपभोक्ता hdmi उत्पाद प्रारंभ in लेट  2003 .
In Europe either DVI-HDCP or HDMI is  शामिल in the hd तैयार in-store labeling specification लिये tv सेट  for HDTV , formulated by EICTA with SES Astra in 2005 .
HDMI began to appear  on उपभोक्ता hdtv camcorders और डिजिटल स्टिल  cameras in 2006 .
As  of जनवरी 8 , 2013 , जिससे is टेन सालो बाद the रिलीज of the पहला hdmi specification  , over 3 billion HDMI devices have shipped since the launch of the HDMI standard .
Bree Van de Kamp ( née Mason ;  भी ज्ञात in the श्रेणी as ब्री होज और ब्री वेस्टन ) is a fictional अक्षर और  one of the four protagonists on the ABC television series Desperate Housewives .
She is played by actress Marcia Cross , who  रै प्राप्त अनेक पुरस्कार और nominations लिये उसके portrayal , सहित an एमी पुरस्कार नामांकन , तीन सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार nominations , और दो स्क्रीन  Actors Guild Awards .
क्रॉस 's portrayal of ब्री रै महरूम widely  praised by critics and fans .
क्रॉस originally auditioned लिये the भूमिका of मरियम ऐलिस यंग , लकिन  series creator Marc Cherry thought she was better suited for the role of Bree .
Dana Delany , who eventually was cast as  कैथरीन mayfair , थी originally चुनी लिये the भूमिका लकिन turned it bas  , saying it was too similar to her role in Pasadena .
Bree 's main struggle throughout the series has been her attempts to maintain a perfect  जीवन despite विभिन्न बाधाएं ऐसे as widowhood , तलाक , और alcoholism hindering  her .
She  रै महरूम शादीशुदा तीन टाइम्स ; to रेक्स वैन de kamp ( स्टीवन culp ) , orson होज ( काइल  MacLachlan ) and Trip Weston ( Scott Bakula ) .

Algoma is a city in  kewaunee काउंटी in the u.S. राज्य of विस्कॉन्सिन  .
The population was  3,167 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी  .
Algoma is part of the Green  खाड़ी महानगर सांख्यिकीय  Area .
The Hangover Part II  is a 2011 अमरीकी कॉमेडी फिल्मी उत्पादित by legendary तस्वीरें और  distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures .
It is the  sequel to 2009 's the hangover और the  second film in The Hangover franchise .
Todd Phillips directed the film in  जोड to co-authoring the स्क्रिप्ट साथ क्रेग mazin , और scot आर्मस्ट्रांग  .
The film stars Bradley Cooper , Ed Helms , Zach Galifianakis , Ken Jeong ,  जेफरी tambor , जस्टिन bartha और पॉल giamatti  .
The Hangover Part II tells  the स्टोरी of फिल , stu , एलन , और डग as वे सफर to थाईलैंड  for Stu 's wedding .
After  the स्नातक पार्टी in लास वेगास , stu takes no संभावना और opts  for a safe , subdued pre-wedding brunch .
However , things do not go  as नियोजित , resulting in another ख़राब hangover साथ no यादें  of the previous night .
Development of The  hangover भाग ii began in अप्रैल 2009 , दो महीने पहले the hangover  was released .
The principal actors were cast  in कूच 2010 to reprise उनके भूमिकाएँ इससे the पहला  film .
Production began  in अक्तूबर 2010 , in ओंटारियो , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , पहले चलती on स्थान  in Thailand .
The film was released on May 26 , 2011 and ,  despite receiving ज़्यादातर ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों , it became the highest-grossing r-rated कॉमेडी  during its theatrical run .
A  तीसरा फिल्मी is नियत लिये  on May 24 , 2013 .

The English Renaissance  थी a सांस्कृतिक और कलाकारी गति in इंग्लैण्ड डेटिंग इससे the लेट 15th और जल्दी  16th centuries to the early 17th century .
It is associated with  the pan-european पुनर्जागरण कि is प्रायः regarded as शुरूआत in  Italy in the late 14th century .
जैसे सबसे of उत्तरी यूरोपीय , इंग्लैण्ड देखी छोटी of ये developments जबतक  more than a century later .
The beginning of the English Renaissance is often taken , as a  convenience , to be 1485 , जब the बैटल of bosworth फ़ील्ड ended the युद्धों of the गुलाब और उदघाटन  the Tudor Dynasty .
Renaissance style and ideas , however , were slow in penetrating England , and the  elizabethan era in the दूसरी हाफ of the 16th सदी is प्रायः regarded as the ऊँचाई of the अंग्रेज़ी पुनर्जागरण  .
एलिज़ाबेथ ऐन bloomer वारेन `` बेट्टी '' घाट ( अप्रैल 8 , 1918 – जुलाई 8 , 2011 ) , थी पहला महिला of the संयुक्त राज्य इससे 1974 to  1977 during the presidency of her husband Gerald Ford .
As First Lady , she was active in  सोशल नीति और निर्मित precedents as a नीतियां क्रियाशील अध्यक्षीय  wife .
throughout उसके husband 's पद in दफ्तर , वो कायम ऊँची स्वीकृति दरजा despite विपक्ष इससे कुछ रूढ़िवादी republicans जो objected  to her more moderate and liberal positions on social issues .
Ford was noted for raising breast cancer awareness following her  1974 mastectomy और थी a passionate समर्थक of , और activist लिये , the बराबर अधिकारों amendment  ( ERA ) .
Pro-choice  on गर्भपात और a नेता in the महिलाओं 's गति , वो gained कीर्ति as एक of the सबसे निष्कपट पहला महिलाओं  in history , commenting on every hot-button issue of the time , including feminism , equal pay , the ERA , sex , drugs , abortion , and gun control .
She also raised awareness of addiction when she announced  उसके long-running बैटल साथ alcoholism  in the 1970s .
Following her White House years , she continued to lobby for the ERA  और remained क्रियाशील in the feminist गति  .
She was the founder , and served as the first chair of the board of directors , of the Betty  घाट बीच लिये पदार्थ गाली और व्यसन और is a प्राप्तकर्ता of the congressional सुनहरा पदक ( co-presentation साथ उसके husband , जेराल्ड R.  Ford , October 21 , 1998 ) and the Presidential Medal of Freedom ( alone , presented 1991 , by George H. W. Bush ) .
Platelet endothelial cell adhesion molecule ( PECAM-1 ) also known as cluster of  differentiation 31 ( cd31 ) is a प्रोटीन कि in इंसान is एनकोडेड by the pecam1 जीन मिला on chromosome  17 .
PECAM-1 plays a key  भूमिका in निकालना aged neutrophils इससे the देह  .

The Miss Florida USA  प्रतियोगिता is the pageant कि selects the प्रतिनिधि  for the state Florida in the Miss USA pageant .
जबकि फ्लोरिडा रै महरूम कामयाब in शर्तें of runners-up , finalists और semi-finalists , the राज्य रै never जीती the मिस यूएसए pageant , हालांकि  Cheryl Patton became Miss USA after Sylvia Hitchcock won Miss Universe .
Florida 's best  परिणाम यहूद दौरान the mid-1960s to mid-1970s  .
Their most recent  फाइनलिस्ट थी lissette गार्सिया जो लगाई in the शीर्ष 16 in 2011  .
Two former Miss Florida  टीन यूएसए titleholders have जीती इस प्रतियोगिता , और तीन titleholders  have also competed at Miss America .
the वर्तमान titleholder is मिशेल aguirre  of Hialeah .
Anglo-Saxon England refers to the period of the history  of the भाग of ब्रिटेन कि became ज्ञात as इंग्लैण्ड , स्थायी इससे the समाप्त of रोमन occupation और स्थापना of anglo-saxon kingdoms in the 5th सदी जबतक the नॉर्मन conquest  of England in 1066 by William the Conqueror .
Anglo-Saxon is a general term referring to the Germanic peoples who came  to ब्रिटेन दौरान the 5th और 6th सदियां , सहित कोण , saxons , frisii , और jutes  .
The term also refers to the language spoken at the time in England ,  जिससे is अभी पुकारा बूढ़ा अंग्रेज़ी , और to the संस्कृति of the era , जिससे रै long आकर्षित  popular and scholarly attention .
Until the 9th century Anglo-Saxon England was dominated by the Heptarchy ,  the kingdoms of नॉर्थम्ब्रिया , mercia , ईस्ट anglia , एसेक्स , केंट , ससेक्स  , and Wessex .
In terms of religion the kingdoms followed Anglo-Saxon paganism during the early  काल , लकिन परिवर्तित to christianity दौरान the 7th सदी  .
Paganism had a final stronghold in a  काल of mercian आधिपत्य दौरान the 640s , समाप्ति साथ the मौत of पेंदा  of Mercia in 655 .
Facing the  threat of viking invasions , the हाउस of wessex  became dominant during the 9th century , under the rule of Alfred the Great .
दौरान the 10th सदी , the व्यक्तिगत kingdoms एकीकृत अंतर्गत the नियम of wessex into the किंगडम  of England , which stood opposed to the Danelaw , the Viking kingdoms established from the 9th century in the north and east of England .
The Kingdom of  इंग्लैण्ड गिरी in the viking आक्रमण इससे डेनमार्क in 1013 और थी शासित by the हाउस of डेनमार्क जबतक 1042 , जब  the Anglo-Saxon House of Wessex was restored .
The  पिछला anglo-saxon किंग , हेरोल्ड godwinson , थी मारे in 1066  at the Battle of Hastings .

Smoked salmon is a  तैयारी of सामन , typically a fillet कि रै महरूम cured और hot or ठंडा स्मोक्ड  .
Due to its moderately high price  , स्मोक्ड सामन is माना a कोमलता  .
Although the term lox is sometimes applied to  स्मोक्ड सामन , वे हैं अलग उत्पाद  .
View  of defibrillator एलेक्ट्रोड स्थिति  and placement .
Defibrillation is a common treatment for  life-threatening हृदय dysrhythmias , ventricular fibrillation , और pulseless  ventricular tachycardia .
Defibrillation  consists of delivering a therapeutic खुराक of विद्युत उर्जा to the प्रभावित  heart with a device called a defibrillator .
इस depolarizes a नाजुक द्रव्यमान of the दिल मांसपेशी , terminates  the dysrhythmia , and allows normal sinus rhythm to be reestablished by the body 's natural pacemaker , in the sinoatrial node of the heart .
Defibrillators can be external ,  transvenous , or implanted , depending on the प्रकार  of device used or needed .
Some  बाह्य इकाई , ज्ञात as स्वचालित बाह्य defibrillators ( aeds ) , automate the निदान of treatable लय , अर्थ  that lay responders or bystanders are able to use them successfully with little , or in some cases no training at all .
Gabrielle `` Coco '' Bonheur Chanel ( August  19 , 1883 – जनवरी 10 , 1971 ) थी a फ्रेंच फ़ैशन पंक्तियां और संस्थापक of the चैनल  brand .
She was the only fashion designer to appear on Time magazine  's सूची of the 100 सबसे influential लोगों of the 20th  century .
Along with Paul Poiret , Chanel was credited with  liberating महिलाओं इससे the constraints of the `` corseted silhouette '' और popularizing the स्वीकृति of a sportive , कैज़ुअल चिक as the feminine  standard in the post- World War I era .
A prolific fashion  निर्माता , चैनल 's influence विस्तारित  beyond couture clothing .
Her design  aesthetic थी एहसास in आभूषण , हैंडबैग  , and fragrance .
Her signature scent ,  चैनल no . 5 , रै become an iconic  product .
Chanel was known for  उसके lifelong determination , महत्वाकांक्षा और उर्जा  which she applied to her professional and social life .
She achieved both success as  a businesswoman और सोशल prominence धन्यवाद  to the connections she made through her work .
These included  अनेक कलाकारों और craftspeople to जिसको वो became  a patron .
However , Chanel 's highly competitive , opportunistic personality led  उसके to मेक questionable जीवन चुनाव जिससे have उत्पन्न विवाद around उसके प्रतिष्ठा , विशेषकर उसके आचरण दौरान  the German occupation of France in World War II .
Allied  मिलों आटा मिल on the बैंको of the  Manchester Ship Canal
A gristmill ( also : grist  मिल , मकई मिल or आटा मिल ) grinds अनाज into  flour .
The term can refer to  दोनो the पीस यांत्रिकी और the भवन  that holds it .
Romania ( ; dated spellings Roumania and Rumania ; ) is a country located  at the चौराहे of सेंट्रल और southeastern यूरोपीय , bordering on the ब्लैक समुद्र  .
Romania shares a border with Hungary and Serbia to the west , Ukraine and Moldova to  the पूर्वोत्तर और ईस्ट , और बुल्गारिया to the  south .
At , Romania is the  आठवीं largest देश of the यूरोपीय संघ by क्षेत्रफल , और रै the सातवाँ largest जनसांख्यिकी of the यूरोपीय संघ साथ अधिक  than 19 million people .
Its capital and  biggest नगर is बुखारेस्ट , the 11th largest  city in the EU .
The United  principalities उभरा जब the territories of moldavia और wallachia यहूद संयुक्त  under Prince Alexander Ioan Cuza in 1859 .
In 1866 Prince Karl of Hohenzollern-Sigmaringen was called to the  सिंहासन as the सत्ताधारी प्रिंस of the रोमानियाई principate और in 1881 he थी आखिरकार  crowned as King Carol I the first monarch of the Kingdom of Romania .
Independence from the Ottoman Empire was declared  on 9 may 1877 , और थी internationally पहचाना the  following year .
At the end  of संसार युद्ध i , transylvania , bukovina और bessarabia  united with the Kingdom of Romania .
World War  ii दिया कारण to the वृद्धि of a सैन्य तानाशाही in रोमानिया अंतर्गत फासिस्ट सामान्य आयन antonescu , जो chose  to fight on the side of the Axis powers from 1941 to 1944 .
After his removal , Romania  switched पहलू in 1944 और joined the  Allies .
By the end of  the युद्ध , कुछ formerly रोमानियाई northeastern territories यहूद occupied by the सोवियत संघ , साथ  Red Army units stationed on Romanian soil .
In 1947 Romania forcibly became a  लोगों 's गणतंत्र ( 1947-1965 ) और a सदस्य of the वॉरसॉ अनुबंध  .
In 1965 Nicolae Ceauşescu became General Secretary of the Romanian Communist Party , and the harsh austerity measures , political repression , and cult of personality he implemented  led to the समाजवादी गणतंत्र of रोमानिया ( 1965-1989 ) बनने the सबसे stalinist पुलिस राज्य  in the Eastern bloc .
Eventually his authoritarian government was  toppled in दिसम्बर 1989 दौरान the रोमानियाई क्रान्ति  of 1989 .
With the fall of the  आयरन पर्दा , रोमानिया began इसके परिवर्तन towards लोकतंत्र  and a capitalist market economy .
After a decade of post-revolution economic problems and living-standards  मनाही , extensive reforms fostered आर्थिक रिकवरी  .
As of 2010  , रोमानिया is an upper-middle-income देश साथ a ऊँची इंसान  development index .
Romania joined NATO on 29  कूच 2004 , और the यूरोपीय संघ on 1 जनवरी  2007 .
It is also a member of the :  लैटिन संघ , francophonie , osce , wto , bsec , संयुक्त  Nations , etc .
Today , Romania is a unitary  semi-presidential गणतंत्र , in जिससे the कार्यपालिका शाखा consists of the अध्यक्ष और  the Government .
`` Ancient  '' redirects  here .
For other uses , see  प्राचीनता ( बहुविकल्पी ) .
The times  पहले लिखने belong either to protohistory or to प्रागितिहास  .
Khafre 's Pyramid (  4th राजवंश ) और ग्रेट sphinx of गीज़ा  ( c. 2500 BC or perhaps earlier )
Ancient history is the study of the written past from the  शुरूआत of अंकित इंसान इतिहास to the जल्दी मध्य  Ages .
The span of recorded history is roughly 5,000 years , with  cuneiform स्क्रिप्ट , the oldest खोजा रूप of सुसंगत लिखने , इससे  the protoliterate period around the 30th century BC .
This is the beginning of  इतिहास , as opposed to प्रागितिहास , according to the परिभाषा प्रयुक्त by  most historians .
The term classical antiquity is often used to refer to history in the Old World from  the शुरूआत of अंकित यूनानी इतिहास in 776 bc  ( First Olympiad ) .
This roughly coincides with the traditional date of the  founding of रोम in 753 bc , the शुरूआत of the इतिहास of प्राचीन रोम , और the  beginning of the Archaic period in Ancient Greece .
Although the ending date of ancient history is disputed , some  पश्चिमी विद्वानों उपयोग the पतन of the पश्चिमी रोमन साम्राज्य in 476 ad , the closure of the platonic अकादमी in 529 ad , the मौत of the सम्राट जुस्तिनियन i , the  coming of Islam or the rise of Charlemagne as the end of ancient and Classical European history .
In  इण्डिया , the काल शामिल the जल्दी काल of the मध्य kingdoms , और , in  China , the time up to the Qin Dynasty is included .
Methylcobalamin (  दिखाया ) is a रूप of  vitamin B12 .
Physically  it resembles the अन्य फ़ॉर्म of विटामिन b12 , occurring as अंधेरा रेड crystals कि freely  form cherry-colored transparent solutions in water .
Vitamin  b12 , विटामिन b12 or विटामिन b-12 , भी पुकारा cobalamin , is a water-soluble विटामिन  with a key role in the normal functioning of the brain and nervous system , and for the formation of blood .
It is  एक of the आठ  B vitamins .
It is normally involved in the metabolism of every cell of the human  देह , विशेषकर affecting डीएनए संश्लेषण और विनियमन , लकिन भी वसीय एसिड संश्लेषण और उर्जा  production .
Neither fungi ,  पौधे , nor पशु हैं सक्षम of producing  vitamin B12 .
Only bacteria and archaea  have the एंजाइमों जरूरी लिये इसके संश्लेषण , हालांकि अनेक भोजन  are a natural source of B12 because of bacterial symbiosis .
The vitamin is the largest and most structurally complicated  विटामिन और can be उत्पादित industrially तभी through बैक्टीरियल fermentation-synthesis  .
Vitamin B12  consists of a क्लास of chemically सम्बन्धित यौगिकों ( vitamers ) , सब  of which have vitamin activity .
It contains the  biochemically विरल तत्व कोबाल्ट  .
Biosynthesis of the basic structure of the vitamin is accomplished only by  जीवाणु ( जिससे प्रायः उपज hydroxocobalamin ) , लकिन परिवर्तन between अलग  forms of the vitamin can be accomplished in the human body .
A common semi-synthetic form of the vitamin ,  cyanocobalamin , करता नहीं occur in प्रकृति , लकिन is उत्पादित इससे बैक्टीरियल hydroxocobalamin और तब प्रयुक्त in अनेक दवाएँ और पूरक , और as a खाना  additive , because of its stability and lower production cost .
In the body  it is परिवर्तित to the इंसान physiological फ़ॉर्म methylcobalamin और adenosylcobalamin  , leaving behind the cyanide , albeit in minimal concentration .
More recently ,  hydroxocobalamin , methylcobalamin , और adenosylcobalamin can be मिला in अधिक महंगी pharmacological  products and food supplements .
The extra  यूटिलिटी of ये is फिलहाल debated  .
Vitamin B12 was discovered from its relationship to the  बीमारी घातक रक्ताल्पता , जिससे is an असंक्राम्य बीमारी in जिससे parietal कोशिकाएं of the पेट जिम्मेदार लिये secreting  intrinsic factor are destroyed .
Intrinsic factor is  निर्णायक लिये the सामान्य अवशोषण of b12 , so a कमी of मूलभूत फ़ैक्टर , as  seen in pernicious anemia , causes a vitamin B12 deficiency .
Many other subtler kinds of vitamin  b12 कमियां और उनके biochemical प्रभाव have  since been elucidated .
The Roman Empire ( ) was the post- Republican period of the ancient Roman civilization  , characterised by an निरंकुश रूप of सरकारी और विशाल territorial holdings around the भूमध्यसागरीय in यूरोपीय , अफ़्रीकी , और एशिया  .
The 500-year-old Roman Republic ,  जिससे preceded it , था महरूम destabilized through  a series of civil wars .
Several events marked the transition from Republic to Empire , including Julius Caesar 's appointment as perpetual dictator ( 44 BC ) ;  the बैटल of actium ( 31 bc ) ; और the granting of the honorific augustus to octavian by the रोमन सीनेट (  27 BC ) .
The first two centuries of the Empire were a period  of unprecedented स्थिरता और समृद्धि ज्ञात as the pax romana ( `` रोमन  Peace '' ) .
It reached its greatest  expanse दौरान the शासनकाल of त्राजान  ( 98–117 AD ) .
In the  3rd सदी , the साम्राज्य underwent a संकट कि threatened इसके अस्तित्व , लकिन थी reunified  and stabilized under the emperors Aurelian and Diocletian .
Christians rose to power in the 4th century ,  दौरान जिससे समय a प्रणाली of डुअल नियम थी विकसित in the लैटिन वेस्ट और यूनानी  East .
After the collapse of  सेंट्रल सरकारी in the वेस्ट in the 5th सदी , the पूर्वी हाफ जारी as कया होता  later be known as the Byzantine Empire .
Because of the Empire 's vast extent and long endurance , the institutions and culture of Rome had a profound and  स्थायी influence on the विकास of भाषा , धर्म , वास्तुकला , दर्शनशास्त्र , विधि , और फ़ॉर्म of सरकारी in the territory it governed , विशेषकर यूरोपीय , और by अर्थात् of यूरोपीय  expansionism throughout the modern world .
Total body  सतह क्षेत्रफल ( tbsa ) is an मूल्यांकन माप of  burns of the skin .
In adults , the `` rule of  nines '' is प्रयुक्त to determine the कुल प्रतिशत of क्षेत्रफल burned लिये प्रत्येक प्रमुख खण्ड  of the body .
In some cases , the burns may cover more than one body part , or may not fully  कवर ऐसे a भाग ; in ये मामले , burns हैं measured by using the casualty 's ताड़ as a सन्दर्भ पाइंट  for 1 % of the body .
लिये children और infants , the lund-browder  chart is used to assess the burned body surface area .
Different percentages are used because the ratio of the combined surface area  of the सिर और गर्दन to the सतह क्षेत्रफल of the limbs is typically larger in children than कि of an वयस्क  .
Typical  मान लिये आम समूह  of humans follow .
( Due to  rounding , मान may नहीं add to 100 %  . )
