Jonah Kirsten Sorrentino ( born June 26 ,  1975 ) , बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम kj-52 , is a ईसाई rapper इससे  Tampa , Florida .
The `` KJ '' part of his name refers to his old rap  alias , `` किंग J. मैक , '' a नाम जिससे he बाद वर्णित in एक of उसके podcasts  as `` horribly cheesy . ''
`` 52 '' , which is pronounced `` five two '' , not `` fifty-two '' , is a reference to the Biblical story of Jesus feeding the multitude with five  loaves और दो मछली , जिससे is भी सुंग परिचय in उसके सोंग `` धक्का up '' इससे the yearbook और in the `` kj पाँच दो '' on it 's सुनाया 'five दो  .
He was awarded the Rap/Hip Hop Recorded Song of the  साल लिये `` never dekh दूर '' और rap/hip हॉप एल्बम of the साल at the जीएमए dove पुरस्कार of 2007  .
On July 28 , 2009 ,  kj-52 released `` समाप्त of my रस्सी '' , जिससे is the पहला सिंगल लिये उसके  album Five-Two Television .
His song ``  डिअर पतला '' is आधारित on एमिनेम 's सोंग `` स्टेन `` और is a sort  of personal message from KJ-52 to Eminem .
The degree  प्रतीक ( ° ) is a typographical प्रतीक कि is प्रयुक्त , among अन्य बाते , to represent डिग्री of चाप ( e.g . in भौगोलिक निर्देशांक  systems ) , hours ( in the medical field ) , or degrees of temperature .
the प्रतीक consists of a छोटी उठाया वृत्त , historically  a zero glyph .
In  युनिकोड it is एनकोडेड  at .
This  is a सूची of जड़ें , प्रत्यय , और prefixes प्रयुक्त in चिकित्सा  terminology , their meanings , and their etymology .
There are a  few नियम जब using चिकित्सा  roots .
Firstly , prefixes and  प्रत्यय , primarily in यूनानी , लकिन भी in लैटिन , have  a droppable -o- .
As a general rule  , इस -o- लगभग सदा अधिनियमों as a joint-stem to कनेक्ट दो consonantal जड़ें  , e.g . arthr- + -o- + logy = arthrology .
But generally , the -o- is dropped when  connecting to a vowel-stem ; e.g . arthr- + itis = गठिया  , instead of arthr-o-itis .
Secondly , medical roots generally go  साथ according to भाषा : यूनानी prefixes go साथ यूनानी प्रत्यय और लैटिन prefixes साथ लैटिन प्रत्यय  .
हालांकि अंतरराष्ट्रीय वैज्ञानिक शब्दावली is नहीं कठोर परिचय segregating  combining forms of different languages , it is advisable when coining new words not to mix different lingual roots .
Stomach cancer , or gastric cancer ,  refers to कर्कट arising इससे कोई  part of the stomach .
Stomach cancer causes about  800,000 मौतों विश्वव्यापी प्रति  year .
Prognosis is poor ( 5-year  अस्तित्व < 5 to 15 % ) क्युकी सबसे मरीजों उपस्थित  with advanced disease .
Sara Lynn Evans (  born फ़रवरी 5 , 1971 ) is an अमरीकी  country singer and songwriter .
For her  संपूर्ण करियर , वो रै महरूम हस्ताक्षरित to आरसीए रिकॉर्ड  Nashville .
Evans ' debut ,  तीन मदारी और the सच्चाई , किया नहीं उपज a शीर्ष 40 hit  on the Hot Country Songs charts .
She followed  इस up साथ no प्लेस कि दूर ( 1998 ) , born to मक्खी ( 2000 ) , बेचैन  ( 2003 ) and Real Fine Place ( 2005 ) .
No Place That Far  प्राप्त a सुनहरा प्रमाणन इससे the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग संघ of अमेरिका ( riaa ) , जबकि the अन्य तीन एल्बम सब यहूद certified  platinum .
These discs include the number  1 singles `` no प्लेस कि दूर `` , `` born to मक्खी `` , `` suds in the बाल्टी `` और `` a रियल ठीक प्लेस to प्रारंभ `` , प्लस the शीर्ष 10 हिट्स `` i could नहीं पूछो लिये अधिक `` ( a कवर of the एडविन  McCain song ) , `` I Keep Looking `` , `` Perfect `` and `` Cheatin ' `` .
Her 2007 Greatest  हिट्स शामिल the शीर्ष 15 हिट्स `` तुम 'll सदा be my baby ``  and `` As If `` .
Stronger ( 2011 ) included  उसके पांचवां क्रमांक 1 hit , `` a छोटी बिट stronger `` , जिससे थी co-written by हिलेरी  Scott of Lady Antebellum .
इवांस रै भी जीती एक पुरस्कार प्रत्येक इससे बिलबोर्ड , the अकादमी of देश म्यूज़िक , देश म्यूज़िक  Association , Broadcast Music Incorporated ( BMI ) and a Dove Award .
The world 's principal religions and spiritual  परंपराओं may be वर्गीकृत into a छोटी क्रमांक of प्रमुख समूह , हालांकि इस is  by no means a uniform practice .
This theory  began in the 18th सदी साथ the लक्ष्य of recognizing the सापेक्ष  levels of civility in societies .
Berliners watching a C-54  जमीन at tempelhof विमानक्षेत्र ( 1948  )
The  बर्लिन नाकेबंदी ( 24 जून 1948 – 12 may 1949 ) थी एक of the पहला प्रमुख  international crises of the Cold War .
दौरान the बहुराष्ट्रीय occupation of post–world युद्ध ii जर्मनी , the सोवियत  Union blocked the Western Allies ' railway , road , and canal access to the sectors of Berlin under Allied control .
Their aim was to force the western powers to allow the Soviet zone to start supplying  बर्लिन साथ खाना और ईंधन , thereby giving the soviets व्यावहारिक कंट्रोल over  the entire city .
In response , the Western Allies organized  the बर्लिन एयरलिफ्ट to carry आपूर्तियाँ to the लोगों  in West Berlin .
Aircrews from the United States Air Force , the British Royal Air Force  , the royal ऑस्ट्रेलियाई एयर फ़ोर्स , the royal कनाडाई एयर फ़ोर्स , the royal नई जीलैंड एयर फ़ोर्स , और the दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी एयर फ़ोर्स उड़ाया over 200,000 फ़्लाइट in एक साल , providing up to 4700 टन  of daily necessities such as fuel and food to the Berliners .
By the spring of 1949 , the effort was clearly succeeding and , by April , the  एयरलिफ्ट थी delivering अधिक कार्गो than था previously महरूम transported into the नगर by रेल  .
The success of the Berlin Airlift brought  शर्मिंदगी to the soviets जो था refused to मानना it could मेक a अंतर  .
The blockade was lifted in  may 1949 और resulted in the सृष्टि of दो  separate German states .
The Federal  गणतंत्र of जर्मनी ( वेस्ट जर्मनी ) और the जर्मनी लोकतांत्रिक  Republic ( East Germany ) split up Berlin .
In remembrance of the  एयरलिफ्ट , तीन एयरपोर्ट in the पूर्व पश्चिमी zones of the नगर परोसा as the प्राथमिक  gateways to Germany for another fifty years .
The euro  चिह्न ; logotype और हस्तलिखित  .
The euro sign is the currency sign used for  the यूरोपियन , the आधिकारिक करेंसी of the eurozone in the  European Union ( EU ) .
The design was presented to the public by the  यूरोपीय आयोग on 12 दिसम्बर 1996 .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय three-letter कोड ( according to आईएसओ मानक आईएसओ 4217 )  for the euro is EUR .
In  युनिकोड it is  encoded at .
In  अंग्रेज़ी , the चिह्न precedes the  value .
In some styleguides , but  नहीं अन्य , the यूरोपियन चिह्न is unspaced  .
Mate ( , ; sometimes also spelled maté ) , also known as chimarrão ( )  or cimarrón ( ) , is a परंपरागत दक्षिण अमरीकी infused पेय , विशेषकर in अर्जेंटीना , उरुग्वे , पैराग्वे और the दक्षिणी  states of Brazil and to a lesser degree in south of Chile , the Bolivian Chaco , Syria and Lebanon .
It is prepared from steeping dried leaves of yerba mate ( llex paraguariensis  , ज्ञात in पुर्तगाली as erva-mate ) in hot  water .
Mate  is परोसा साथ a मेटल स्ट्रॉ इससे  a shared hollow calabash gourd .
The straw is called a bombilla in some Latin American countries , a bomba in  पुर्तगाली , और a bombija or , अधिक generally , a masassa ( प्रकार of स्ट्रॉ  ) in Arabic .
The straw is  traditionally बना of  silver .
आधुनिक , commercially उपलब्धियाँ लोभी हैं typically बना of निकल  silver , called Alpaca ; stainless steel , or hollow-stemmed cane .
The gourd is known as a mate or a guampa ; while in  ब्राज़ील , it रै the विशिष्ट नाम of cuia , or भी cabaça ( the नाम लिये indigenous-influenced calabash gourds in अन्य regions of ब्राज़ील , स्टिल प्रयुक्त  for general food and drink in remote regions ) .
Even  if the जल is supplied इससे a आधुनिक thermos , the infusion is traditionally  drunk from mates or cuias .
As with other brewed herbs , yerba mate  पत्ते हैं सूखी , कटा , और मैदान into a powdery  mixture called yerba .
The bombilla acts as both a  स्ट्रॉ और a sieve  .
The submerged end is flared , with small holes or slots that allow the brewed  द्रव in , लकिन ब्लाक the चंकी पदार्थ कि makes up much of  the mixture .
A modern bombilla design uses a straight tube with  छेद , or वसन्त स्लीव to अधिनियम as a sieve  .
`` Tea-bag '' type infusions of  mate ( mate cocido ) have महरूम on the मार्केट in अर्जेंटीना , पैराग्वे और उरुग्वे लिये अनेक सालो अंतर्गत ऐसे व्यापार names as `` taragüí vitality  '' in Argentina , `` Pajarito '' and `` Kurupí '' in Paraguay , and in Brazil under the name `` Mate Leão '' .
This is  माना a completely  different drink .
It is never drunk  इससे cuias or पुकारा chimarrão , nor is it संबद्ध  with the gaucho/gaúcho culture .
The automotive industry is a term that covers a wide range of companies  और संगठनों शामिल in the डिज़ाइन , विकास , manufacture , विपणन , और selling of मोटर वाहनों , towed वाहनों  , motorcycles and mopeds .
It is one of the  संसार 's सबसे महत्वपूर्ण आर्थिक सेक्टर by आय  .
The term automotive industry usually does not include  उद्योग समर्पित to the मेंटेनेंस of ऑटोमोबाइल following डिलीवरी to the end-user , ऐसे  as repair shops and motor fuel filling stations .
The term automotive was created from Greek autos  ( स्वः ) , और लैटिन motivus ( of गति ) to represent कोई रूप of  self-powered vehicle .
This term  थी प्रस्तावित by sae सदस्य  Elmer Sperry .
David Michael `` Dave '' Bautista , Jr. ( born January 18 , 1969 ) , is an American mixed martial artist , bodybuilder , actor , and former  पेशेवर पहलवान बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये उसके समय in संसार कुश्ती entertainment स्पर्धा अंतर्गत the रिंग नाम  Batista .
In WWE , he became  a six-time संसार चैंपियन , जीतना the संसार हेवीवेट चैंपियनशिप चार टाइम्स  , and the WWE Championship two times .
He  is the longest-reigning संसार हेवीवेट चैंपियन in डब्ल्यूडब्ल्यूई इतिहास  .
In  जोड to ये championships , बतिस्ता रै जीती the संसार टैग टोली चैंपियनशिप तीन टाइम्स ( twice साथ ric  Flair and once with John Cena ) and the WWE Tag Team Championship once ( with Rey Mysterio ) .
Batista was also the winner of the 2005 Royal  rumble मैच और गई on to शीर्षक रेसलमेनिया 21 , एक of the शीर्ष पाँच highest-grossing pay-per-view कार्यक्रम  in pro wrestling history .
After trying out at World Championship Wrestling 's Power Plant , Batista signed a  अनुबंध साथ the wwf in 2000 और थी भेजा to इसके developmental territory , ओहियो घाटी कुश्ती ( ovw ) , जहाँ he जीती the ovw हेवीवेट  Championship .
In August 2012 , Bautista signed a contract with  क्लासिक entertainment & खेल to लड़ो in मिश्रित martial कला .
He won his MMA debut on  अक्तूबर 6 , 2012 , defeating विंस lucero via tko in the पहला गोलाकार  .
Henry T. Thomas Sampson , Jr. ( born in  जैक्सन , मिसिसिपी in 1934 ) is an african-american  inventor .
He graduated from high  स्कूल in 1951 इससे lanier ऊँची स्कूल in  Jackson , Mississippi .
He then  attended मोरहाउस कॉलेज लिये a युगल of सालो पहले transferring to purdue विश्वविद्यालयों जहाँ he became  a member of the Omega Psi Phi fraternity .
He  प्राप्त a स्नातक 's उपाधि in विज्ञान  from Purdue University in 1956 .
He graduated with an MS  उपाधि in अभियान्त्रिकी इससे the विश्वविद्यालयों of कैलिफ़ोर्निया ,  Los Angeles in 1961 .
Sampson also received his MS in Nuclear Engineering from the  विश्वविद्यालयों of इलिनोइस urbana-champaign in 1965 , और उसके phd in 1967  .
He is the first African American to  earn a ph.d.in नाभिकीय अभियान्त्रिकी  in the United States .
Some of his accomplishments  शामिल होने a सदस्य of the संयुक्त राज्य नेवी between the सालो 1962 और 1964 और कमाई an परमाणु उर्जा  Commission honor between 1964 and 1967 .
Later he was awarded  the ब्लैक चित्र पुरस्कार इससे aerospace निगम in 1982  .
He was awarded  the अश्वेतों in अभियान्त्रिकी , लागू विज्ञान पुरस्कार , और पुरस्कार लिये शिक्षा , by the लॉस एंजिल्स  Council of Black Professional Engineers in 1983 .
In June 2007 , Sampson was married to Laura Howzell  यंग in st. थामस , u.S. वर्जिन आइलैंड्स .
Young-Sampson is a professor in  the कॉलेज of शिक्षा at कैलिफ़ोर्निया राज्य विश्वविद्यालयों  San Bernardino .
Robert Lane Gibbs ( born March  29 , 1971 ) is a वरिष्ठ अभियान adviser लिये us अध्यक्ष बराक  Obama .
Previously , he  थी the 28th श्वेत हाउस दबायें सचिव  .
Gibbs was the  संचार निदेशक लिये then- u.s . सीनेटर  Obama and his 2008 presidential campaign .
Gibbs , who has worked with Obama since 2004 , was press secretary of John Kerry 's 2004  अध्यक्षीय अभियान और रै previously specialized in सीनेट अभियान , having परोसा as संचार निदेशक लिये the लोकतांत्रिक senatorial अभियान कमेटी और लिये चार  individual Senate campaigns , including those of Obama in 2004 and Fritz Hollings in 1998 .
Gibbs  थी भी the दबायें सचिव of प्रतिनिधि  Bob Etheridge .
On November  22 , 2008 , गिब्स थी घोषित  as the press secretary of the Obama administration .
He assumed the role of press  सचिव on जनवरी 20 , 2009 , और दिया उसके पहला आधिकारिक drug on  January 22 .
On January 5 , 2011 , Gibbs announced that he would leave the  श्वेत हाउस to become an बाहर adviser to the प्रशासन  .
He left on  फ़रवरी 11 , 2011  .
On February 12 ,  2013 , it थी घोषित कि गिब्स था महरूम नियुक्त as a योगदानकर्ता  for cable-news channel MSNBC .
His first appearance was on the same  रात्रि prior to the 2013 राज्य of the संघ पता  .
Armando Pérez ( born January 15 , 1981 ) , better  ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम pitbull , is an अमरीकी rapper , songwriter  , and record producer .
His first recorded performance  थी इससे the लील jon एल्बम किंग्स of crunk in 2002  .
In 2004  , he released उसके डेब्यू एल्बम titled m.i.a.m.i . ( छोटी लिये धन  Is A Major Issue ) under TVT Records .
Since then , he has released three other  एल्बम अंतर्गत the लेबल : el mariel in 2006 , the boatlift in 2007 , और ग्रह  Pit in 2011 .
He released  rebelution in 2009 , जिससे शामिल singles `` i जान तुम want  Me ( Calle Ocho ) `` and `` Krazy `` .
The latter peaked at No . 30 on the Hot 100 and No . 11 on the Hot Rap Tracks charts  जबकि `` i जान तुम want me '' peaked at no . 2 on the hot 100 और peaked भीतर the शीर्ष टेन धब्बे of चार्ट in the uk , कनाडा , इटली , और the नीदरलैंड्स  .
The  सोंग पहुँचे no . 1 in फ़्रांस और the यूरोपीय hot 100 on the सप्ताह समाप्ति  August 29 , 2009 according to Billboard magazine .
He later signed with Polo  grounds म्यूज़िक through सोनी म्यूज़िक और निर्मित उसके अपना लेबल mr.  305 Inc .
Another single from Rebelution was `` Hotel  रूम सेवा `` , जिससे peaked at no . 8 on the hot  100 .
Rebelution went on to sell over 7.5  लाख विश्वव्यापी डिजिटल singles और एल्बम संयुक्त  .
nevertheless , he dropped a तोड़ पुकारा `` दे me सबकुछ '' जिससे पहुँचे # 1 विश्वव्यापी  , and featured artists Ne-yo , Nayer , and Afrojack .
He has also performed as a featured artist  in the remixes of अनेक अन्य hit गीतों , जैसे tik टोक , चीख & चिल्लाओ , lo hecho esta hecho , ख़राब , papi , ईंट , कैसा कम , tonight  ( I 'm Lovin ' You ) , Video Phone , Over To You Now and Bumpy Ride .
Pérez is also the host of his own Spanish-language program on the cable  चैनल mun2 titled la esquina ( स्पेनी लिये the  Corner ) .
In 2005 Pérez and rapper Sean  'diddy ' combs co-founded ख़राब लड़के लातीनी , a subsidiary of combs ' ख़राब लड़के रिकॉर्ड  label .
It primarily focuses on Latin hip hop ,  लैटिन आत्मा , लैटिन पॉप और अन्य तीव्र म्यूज़िक , और रै कार्यालयों in नई यॉर्क और  Miami , Florida .
Along with co-founding it ,  pérez फिलहाल heads the a & r  division of the label .
Pérez has become a product endorser ,  representing alongside ड्रेक , रिहाना , और trey songz the “so kodak” अभियान लिये the कोडक ब्रांड और embarking on a साझेदारी साथ the नरम पेय दानव dr pepper  as part of the campaign “ Vida 23 ” for which he recorded the song specifically featured on his album Armando .
Pitbull also  घोषित he रै become the प्रवक्ता लिये voli वोदका , in जिससे he holds a बहुमत  equity stake , and Budweiser has chosen Pitbull to promote its Bud Light line of beer .
The commercials currently highlight Pitbull dancing and  gyrating on स्टेज पकड़कर up a बोतल of कली लाइट  .
Pitbull has also purchased  an इक्विटी हिस्सेदारी in मियामी subs पिज़्ज़ा और  Grill .
हैलोवीन or hallowe'en ( a संकुचन of `` सब hallows ' संध्या `` ) , भी ज्ञात as सब hallows ' संध्या , is a वार्षिक जश्न observed in a क्रमांक of देशों on अक्तूबर  31 , the eve of the Western Christian feast of All Hallows ( or All Saints ) and the day initiating the triduum of Hallowmas .
According to many scholars ,  सब hallows ' संध्या is a christianised feast originally बहकावे by पश्चिमी यूरोपीय कटाई त्यौहार  , and festivals of the dead with possible pagan roots , particularly the Celtic Samhain .
Other scholars maintain that it  originated independently of samhain और रै solely ईसाई  roots .
Typical festive Halloween activities include trick-or-treating ( also known as `` guising `` ) , attending costume parties , carving pumpkins  into jack-o'-lanterns , lighting bonfires , ठहराना bobbing , visiting haunted आकर्षण , playing pranks , telling डरावने  stories , and watching horror films .
Freedom of speech is the political right to communicate one 's  राय और विचार using एक 's देह और प्रॉपर्टी to anyone जो  is willing to receive them .
The term freedom of expression is sometimes  प्रयुक्त synonymously , लकिन शामिल कोई अधिनियम of seeking , receiving और imparting सूचना or विचार , regardless of the  medium used .
In practice , the right to freedom of speech is not  निरपेक्ष in कोई देश और the सही is commonly विषय to सीमाएं , as साथ मानहानि , बदनामी , obscenity , राजद्रोह ( सहित , लिये उदाहरण inciting जातीय द्वेष ) , कापीराइट उल्लंघन ,  revelation of information that is classified or otherwise .
The right to freedom of  अभिव्यक्ति is पहचाना as a इंसान सही अंतर्गत आलेख 19 of the सार्वभौमिक घोषणा of इंसान अधिकारों और पहचाना in अंतरराष्ट्रीय इंसान  rights law in the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights ( ICCPR ) .
Article 19 of the ICCPR  राज्य कि `` [ e ] veryone shall have the सही to थाम राय बगैर हस्तक्षेप '' और `` everyone shall have the सही to स्वतंत्रता of अभिव्यक्ति ; इस सही shall शामिल स्वतंत्रता to तलाश , प्राप्त और impart सूचना और विचार of सब kinds  , regardless of frontiers , either orally , in writing or in print , in the form of art , or through any other media of his choice '' .
Article 19 goes on  to कह कि the कसरत of ये अधिकारों carries `` खास कर्तव्य और जिम्मेदारियों `` और may `` इसलिए be विषय to निश्चित प्रतिबंध '' जब  necessary `` [ f ] or respect of the rights or reputation of others '' or `` [ f ] or the protection of national security or of public order ( order public ) , or of public health or morals '' .
Freedom of  वाक may be legally curtailed in कुछ धार्मिक विधिक प्रणालियों और in धर्मनिरपेक्ष jurisdictions जहाँ  it is found to cause religious offense , such as the British Racial and Religious Hatred Act 2006 .
Sydney  harbour इससे the एयर , प्रर्दशित the ओपेरा हाउस , the सीबीडी , गोलाकार quay , the सेतु , the parramatta  River , North Sydney and Kirribilli in the foreground
The Sydney Harbour  सेतु is a स्टील through मेहराब सेतु आरपार सिडनी harbour कि carries रेल , vehicular ,  bicycle and pedestrian traffic between the Sydney central business district ( CBD ) and the North Shore .
The dramatic view of the bridge , the harbour , and  the आसपास सिडनी ओपेरा हाउस is an iconic चित्र of सिडनी , नई  South Wales , and Australia .
the सेतु is nicknamed `` the coathanger  '' because of its arch-based design .
Under the directions of  dr j.j.c . bradfield of the nsw विभाग of पब्लिक works , the सेतु थी designed और निर्मित  by British firm Dorman Long and Co Ltd of Middlesbrough and opened in 1932 .
The bridge 's design was influenced by  the नरक फाटक  Bridge in New York .
It was the  संसार 's widest long-span सेतु , at 48.8 मीटर ( 160 फीट ) चौड़ी ,  until construction of the new Port Mann Bridge in Vancouver .
It is also the fifth longest spanning-arch bridge  in the संसार , और it is the tallest स्टील मेहराब सेतु , measuring इससे  top to water level .
Until 1967 the Harbour  सेतु थी सिडनी 's tallest ढांचा  .
the हवाई हॉटस्पॉट is a volcanic हॉटस्पॉट स्तिथ निकट  the namesake Hawaiian Islands , in the northern Pacific Ocean .
One of the most well-known and heavily studied hotspots in the world , the Hawaii plume is responsible for the creation of the Hawaiian –  सम्राट seamount कड़ी , an over 5,800 किलोमीटर ( 3,600 mi ) long कड़ी of ज्वालामुखी , चार of जिससे हैं क्रियाशील , दो of जिससे हैं dormant , और अधिक than  123 of which are extinct , many having since been ground beneath the waves by erosion as seamounts and atolls .
The chain extends from south of the island of Hawaii to the  किनारे of the aleutian गर्त , निकट the पूर्वी किनारे of रूस  .
While most volcanoes are created by geological activity  at tectonic थाली सीमाएँ , the हवाई हॉटस्पॉट is स्तिथ दूर इससे आसपास थाली सीमाएँ ; the क्लासिक हॉटस्पॉट सिद्धान्त , पहला प्रस्तावित in 1963 by जॉन tuzo विल्सन , proposes कि  a single , fixed mantle plume builds volcanoes that then , cut off from their source by the movement of the Pacific Plate , become increasingly inactive and eventually erode below sea level over millions of years .
According to this  सिद्धान्त , the nearly 60° बेंड separating the सम्राट और हवाई खण्ड of the कड़ी  was caused by a sudden shift in the movement of the Pacific Plate .
In 2003 , fresh  investigations of इस irregularity led to the प्रस्ताव of a मोबाईल हॉटस्पॉट सिद्धान्त , suggesting कि हॉटस्पॉट हैं मोबाईल , नहीं फिक्स्ड  , and that the 47 million year old bend was caused by a shift in the hotspot 's motion rather than the plate 's .
प्राचीन hawaiians यहूद the पहला to recognize the increasing आयु और weathered राज्य  of the volcanoes to the north as they progressed on fishing expeditions along the islands .
The volatile state of the Hawaiian volcanoes and their  निरंतर बैटल साथ the समुद्र थी a प्रमुख तत्व in हवाई mythology , समाविष्ट  in Pele , the deity of volcanoes .
After the arrival of Europeans on the island , in 1880-1881 James Dwight Dana directed  the पहला औपचारिक geological पढ़ाई of the हॉटस्पॉट 's volcanics , confirming the संबंध long observed  by the natives .
1912 marked  the founding of the हवाई ज्वालामुखी वेधशाला by volcanologist थामस jaggar , initiating निरन्तर  scientific observation of the islands .
In the 1970s , a  मानचित्रण प्रोजेक्ट थी initiated to लाभ अधिक सूचना  about the complex geology of Hawaii 's seafloor .
The hotspot has since been  tomographically imaged , प्रर्दशित it to be चौड़ी और up to गहन , और ओलीवाइन और गार्नेट -आधारd अध्ययन have दिखाया इसके मैग्मा  chamber is approximately .
In its at least 85 million years of  कार्यकलाप the हॉटस्पॉट रै उत्पादित an अनुमानित  of rock .
The chain 's rate of drift has slowly increased over time , causing the amount of time each  व्यक्तिगत ज्वालामुखी is क्रियाशील to घटी , इससे 18 लाख सालो लिये the 76 लाख साल बूढ़ा डेट्रॉयट seamount , to बस अंतर्गत 900,000 लिये the एक लाख year-old kohala ; on the अन्य हाथ  , eruptive volume has increased from per year to about .
Overall , this has caused a trend towards more active but quickly-silenced , closely spaced  volcanoes—whereas ज्वालामुखी on the निकट पक्ष of the हॉटस्पॉट ओवरलैप प्रत्येक अन्य ( forming ऐसे superstructures as हवाई द्वीप और the प्राचीन मावी नुई ) , the oldest  of the Emperor seamounts are spaced as far as apart .
David Palmer , director of the show , announced that the  ऋतु 4 finale is the श्रेणी finale क्युकी निकलोडियन रद्द the  show .
Petitions are being  हस्ताक्षरित to लाओ the दिखाएँ लिये a पांचवां ऋतु  .
The show  airs on treehouse tv कनाडा और  Nick Jr. ( formerly Noggin ) .
Eddie and  the cruisers is a 1983 अमरीकी फिल्मी निर्देशित by मार्टिन डेविडसन साथ  the screenplay written by the director and Arlene Davidson , based on the novel by P. F. Kluge .
It was  marketed साथ the टैगलाइन  `` Rebel .

Osteonecrosis of the jaw ( ONJ ) is a  कठोर अस्थि बीमारी कि affects the maxilla और  the mandible .
विभिन्न फ़ॉर्म of onj have महरूम वर्णित over the पिछला 160 सालो , और  a number of causes have been suggested in the literature .
Osteonecrosis of the jaws associated with bisphosphonate therapy , required by some cancer treatment  regimens , रै महरूम पहचाना और पारिभाषित as a pathological एंटिटी चूंकि 2003  .
The possible risk from lower oral  doses of bisphosphonates , लिया by मरीजों to prevent  or treat osteoporosis , remains uncertain .
Various treatment options have  महरूम छान , however कठोर मामले of onj स्टिल आवश्यकता सर्जिकल हटाना  of the affected bone .
A thorough history and assessement of pre-existing systemic  समस्याएं और संभावित साइट of दंत संक्रमण हैं जरूरी to सहायता prevent the कंडीशन , विशेषकर if bisphosphonate  therapy is considered .
The Boston Red Sox are a professional baseball  टोली आधारित in बोस्टन , मैसाचुसेट्स , और a सदस्य of प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल 's अमरीकी  League Eastern Division .
Founded in as one of the American League 's eight  चार्टर franchises , the रेड sox 's घर ballpark रै महरूम fenway पार्क चूंकि .
The `` Red Sox '' name was chosen by the team owner , John I.  टेलर , around , following पिछला बोस्टन टीमों कि था महरूम ज्ञात as the `` रेड stockings  `` .
They have played in  11 संसार श्रेणी , जीतना  7 .
Boston was a dominant team in the new league , defeating  the पिट्सबर्ग pirates in the पहला संसार श्रेणी in और जीतना चार  more championships by .
However , they then went into one of the longest championship droughts in baseball history , called by some the `` Curse of the Bambino `` after its alleged beginning with  the रेड sox 's बिक्री of बेब रुथ to the प्रतिद्वंद्वी यांकीज़ दो सालो बाद उनके संसार चैंपियनशिप in 1918 , an 86-year इंतजार पहले the टोली 's छठे संसार चैंपियनशिप  in .
However , the team 's history during that period was hardly one of futility , but  थी बल्कि punctuated साथ कुछ of the सबसे यादगार पल in संसार श्रेणी इतिहास , सहित enos वध 's ``  mad dash `` in , the `` Impossible Dream `` of , Carlton Fisk 's home run in , and Bill Buckner 's error in .
Red Sox history has also been marked by  the टोली 's तीव्र फंसने साथ the नई यॉर्क यांकीज़ , arguably the fiercest और सबसे ऐतिहासिक  in North American professional sports .
The Boston Red Sox are owned by  fenway खेल समूह , जो भी अपना लिवरपूल फ़ुटबॉल क्लबों of  the Premier League in England .
The  रेड sox हैं consistently एक of the शीर्ष एमएलबी टीमों in औसत सड़क उपस्थिति , जबकि the छोटी  capacity of Fenway Park prevents them from leading in overall attendance .
From May 15 , 2003  to अप्रैल 10 , 2013 , the रेड sox बेची आउट प्रत्येक घर game-a कुल of 820 खेल ( 794 नियमित ऋतु ) लिये a  major professional sports record that lasted almost a decade .
Mince pie  भर साथ mincemeat
Mincemeat is  a मिश्रण of कटा सूखी फल , आसुत आत्माओं और मसाले , और  sometimes beef suet , beef , or venison .
originally , mincemeat सदा contained मांस  .
Many modern recipes contain beef suet  , हालांकि सब्ज़ी shortening is sometimes प्रयुक्त in इसके प्लेस  .
Variants of  mincemeat हैं मिला in ऑस्ट्रेलिया , ब्रिटनी , कनाडा , उत्तरी यूरोपीय , आयरलैंड , दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी , the संयुक्त  Kingdom and the United States .
In  कुछ देशों the पद mincemeat refers  to minced or ground meat .
Diana , Princess of Wales ( Diana Frances ; née Spencer ; 1 July 1961 – 31  अगस्त 1997 ) थी the पहला बीवी of चार्ल्स , प्रिंस of वेल्स , the ज्येष्ठ बेटे और वारिस apparent of महारानी एलिज़ाबेथ ii  .
She was well known  लिये उसके fund-raising कार्य लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय धर्मार्थ और as an प्रतिष्ठित हस्ती of the लेट  20th century .
Her wedding to the  प्रिंस of वेल्स on 29 जुलाई 1981 थी आयोजित at st पॉल 's गिरजाघर और  seen by a global television audience of over 750 million .
While married she bore the  शीर्षक राजकुमारी of वेल्स , duchess of कॉर्नवॉल , duchess of rothesay , countess  of Chester and Baroness of Renfrew .
The  विवाह उत्पादित दो बेटे , the princes विलियम और हैरी , जो became दूसरी  and third in line to the British throne .
डायना थी born into an वैभवशाली अंग्रेज़ी परिवार  with royal ancestry .
She was the fourth child of John Spencer , 8th Earl Spencer and his  बीवी frances , बेटी of मौरिस रोश ,  4th Baron Fermoy .
She became a public figure with  the घोषणा of उसके सगाई .
She  भी प्राप्त मान्यता लिये उसके दान कार्य और लिये उसके support  of the International Campaign to Ban Landmines .
From 1989 , she was the president of the  ग्रेट ormond गली हॉस्पिटल लिये children , in जोड to  dozens of other charities .
डायना remained the ऑब्जेक्ट of विश्वव्यापी मीडिया scrutiny दौरान और बाद उसके विवाह  , which ended in divorce on 28 August 1996 .
Media attention and public  शोक यहूद considerable following उसके मौत in a car क्रैश in पेरिस on 31  August 1997 .
Argentina , officially the Argentine  गणतंत्र ( ) , is the दूसरी largest देश in दोनो दक्षिण अमेरिका और the लैटिन अमेरिका  region .
The  देश is a संघ of 23 प्रांतों और the autonomous नगर of buenos आयर्स ,  its capital and largest city .
It is the eighth -largest  देश in the संसार by जमीन क्षेत्रफल और the largest among spanish-speaking राष्ट्र by भौगोलिक  area of 2,780,400 km2 and is the fourth by population , with over 41 million people .
Argentina is a founding  सदस्य of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र , mercosur , the संघ of दक्षिण अमरीकी राष्ट्र , the संगठन of ibero-american राज्य  , the World Bank Group and the World Trade Organization , and is one of the G-15 and G-20 major economies .
Argentina is located in South America , bordered  by चिली to the वेस्ट और दक्षिण , बोलीविया और पैराग्वे to the उत्तर और ब्राज़ील और उरुग्वे  to the northeast .
Argentina claims sovereignty over part of Antarctica , the Falkland  आइलैंड्स ( ) और दक्षिण जॉर्जिया और the दक्षिण  Sandwich Islands .
Argentina is the successor  राज्य of the viceroyalty of the río de la प्लाटा , an विदेशी उपनिवेश  of the Spanish Empire .
Argentina  घोषित स्वतंत्रता दौरान the अर्जेंटाइन युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता , जिससे थी followed by  the Argentine Civil Wars during most of the 19th century .
The country  faced अनेक सैन्य coups और राजनैतिक अस्थिरता दौरान the 20th सदी  , along with periodic economic crisis that continue to this day .
A recognized Southern Cone power ,  और मध्य शक्ति , अर्जेंटीना is लैटिन अमेरिका 's third-largest अर्थव्यवस्था , साथ a `` बहुत  high '' rating on the Human development index .
Within  लैटिन अमेरिका , अर्जेंटीना रै the पांचवां उच्चतम नाममात्र जीडीपी प्रति capita और  the highest in purchasing power terms .
The Legatum Institute have argued that the country has a  `` न्यास लिये भविष्य विकास due to इसके मार्केट आकार , स्तर of विदेशी सीधा निवेश , और प्रतिशत of high-tech  exports as share of total manufactured goods '' , and it is classed by investors as middle emerging economy .
Argentina is  the लैटिन अमरीकी देश साथ the सबसे नोबेल पुरस्कार , लिये a कुल of पाँच , सब  obtained during the second half of the twentieth century .
The country  रै तीन नोबेल पुरस्कार in विज्ञान  and two of peace .
The most important aspects of science and technology in  अर्जेंटीना हैं चिंतित साथ आयुर्विज्ञान , नाभिकीय भौतिकी , जैवप्रौद्योगिकी , nanotechnology , स्पेस और प्रक्षेपास्त्र प्रौद्योगिकी और अनेक फ़ील्ड सम्बन्धित to the देश  's Main Economic Activities .
The country also has the mega  प्रदर्शनी बीच of विज्ञान , प्रौद्योगिकी , उद्योग और आर्ट कि हैं लैटिन अमेरिका  's largest .
Hickory is a city in  catawba काउंटी , साथ भाग भी in बुर्के काउंटी और काल्डवेल  County .
The city 's  2010 अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी is 40,010  .
Hickory is the principal city in the Hickory-Lenoir-Morganton  एमएसए , in जिससे the जनसांख्यिकी at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी थी  365,497 .
Polyethylene terephthalate ( sometimes written poly ( ethylene terephthalate ) ) ,  commonly abbreviated पालतु , पीट , or the obsolete petp or pet-p , is a thermoplastic पॉलिमर राल of the पॉलिएस्टर परिवार और is प्रयुक्त in सिंथेटिक मछली ; पेय , खाना  and other liquid containers ; thermoforming applications ; and engineering resins often in combination with glass fiber .
The term polyethylene  terephthalate is a सोर्स of भ्रम क्युकी इस पदार्थ  , PET , does not contain polyethylene .
Thus , the alternate form , poly ( ethylene terephthalate ) ,  is प्रायः प्रयुक्त in scholarly जर्नल्स लिये the खातिर of सटीकता  and clarity .
Depending  on इसके प्रसंस्करण और थर्मल इतिहास , polyethylene terephthalate may मौजूद दोनो as an amorphous  ( transparent ) and as a semi-crystalline polymer .
The  semicrystalline सामग्री might appear पारदर्शी ( कण आकार < 500 nm ) or अपारदर्शी और श्वेत ( कण  size up to a few microns ) depending on its crystal structure and particle size .
Its monomer ( bis-β-hydroxyterephthalate ) can be synthesized by  the esterification प्रतिक्रिया between terephthalic एसिड और एथिलीन ग्लाइकोल साथ जल as a byproduct , or by transesterification प्रतिक्रिया  between ethylene glycol and dimethyl terephthalate with methanol as a byproduct .
Polymerization is through a polycondensation reaction of the  monomers ( किया तत्काल बाद esterification/transesterification  ) with water as the byproduct .
The  बहुमत of the संसार 's पालतु उत्पादन is लिये सिंथेटिक मछली ( in excess of 60  % ) , with bottle production accounting for around 30 % of global demand .
In  the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of वस्त्र अनुप्रयोग , पालतु is referred to by इसके आम नाम , `` पॉलिएस्टर  , '' whereas the acronym `` PET '' is generally used in relation to packaging .
Polyester makes up about 18 % of world  पॉलिमर उत्पादन और is the third-most-produced पॉलिमर  ; polyethylene ( PE ) and polypropylene ( PP ) are first and second , respectively .
PET consists of polymerized units of the monomer  एथिलीन terephthalate , साथ repeating c10h8o4  units .
PET is commonly recycled , and has the  क्रमांक `` 1 '' as इसके रीसाइक्लिंग  symbol .
Louisiana was admitted  to the संघ on अप्रैल 30 , 1812 , और elects सीनेटरों to  Classes 2 and Class 3 .
इसके वर्तमान सीनेटरों हैं डेमोक्रेट मरियम landrieu  and Republican David Vitter .
Black pudding ,  रक्त खीर or रक्त सॉसेज is a प्रकार of सॉसेज बना by कुकिंग रक्त or सूखी रक्त  with a filler until it is thick enough to congeal when cooled .
The dish exists in various  संस्कृतियों इससे एशिया to यूरोपीय और the americas  .
सुअर , चौपायों , शीप , बतख , और बकरी रक्त  can be used depending on different countries .
In Europe and the Americas ,  ठेठ fillers शामिल मांस , मोटे , suet , ब्रैड , cornmeal , मीठी आलू , प्याज ,  chestnuts , barley , and oatmeal .
In Spain ,  पुर्तगाल और एशिया , आलू is प्रायः  replaced by rice .
शेयरधारक may refer  to:
Stakeholder ( corporate ) , a person , group  , संगठन , सदस्य or प्रणाली जो affects or can be प्रभावित by an संगठन  's actions
Stakeholder , an entity that can be affected by the results of that in  जिससे वे हैं कहा to be हितधारकों , i.e.  , that in which they have a stake .
Project  शेयरधारक , a व्यक्ति , समूह or संगठन साथ an ब्याज  in a project
Stakeholder theory , a theory that identifies  और मॉडल the समूह जिससे हैं हितधारकों of a निगम or प्रोजेक्ट
शेयरधारक विश्लेषण , the प्रक्रम of identifying those प्रभावित  by a project or event
Stakeholder ( law ) ,  a तीसरा पार्टी जो temporarily holds धन or प्रॉपर्टी जबकि इसके मालिक is स्टिल  being determined
Jack  smight ( कूच 9 , 1925 - सितंबर 1 , 2003 ) थी an अमरीकी  theatre and film director .
Smight was born in  मिनियापोलिस , मिनेसोटा और गई to स्कूल साथ भविष्य कर्ता  Peter Graves .
His film credits include The  traveling जल्लाद , खरगोश , चलाएं , मीत युगल , मिडवे , हार्पर , विमानक्षेत्र 1975 , फटकार alley और the एमी पुरस्कार -winning एडी , as खूब as अनेक एपीसोड of टेलीविज़न  series such as The Twilight Zone and The Alfred Hitchcock Hour .
He also directed the 1960 Broadway play The 49th Cousin and composed the music for the  फिल्मी adaption of फेंकें of थंडर सुन my क्राई .
Smight died from  कर्कट in लॉस एंजिल्स , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
Dmitri Ivanovich Mendeleev ( ; 8 February 1834 – 2 February 1907  o.s . 27 जनवरी 1834 – 20 जनवरी 1907 ) थी a रूसी केमिस्ट और आविष्कारक  .
He formulated the Periodic Law , created his own version of the  आवधिक तालिका of तत्व , और प्रयुक्त it to सही the गुण of कुछ already खोजा  elements and also to predict the properties of elements yet to be discovered !
Modesto ( Spanish for  `` modest '' ) , officially the नगर of modesto , is the काउंटी सीट और largest नगर of stanislaus  County , California , United States .
With  a जनसांख्यिकी of लगभग 201,165 at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी , modesto बाँधने as the  18th largest city in the state of California .
The Modesto Census County  प्रभाग , जिससे शामिल the शहरों of ceres और riverbank , रै a जनसांख्यिकी of 312,842  as of 2010 .
Modesto is located in the central valley area of Northern California , 90 miles north of Fresno , 92 miles east of San  फ्रांसिस्को , 68 मील दक्षिण of the राज्य पूंजी of sacramento , 66  miles west of Yosemite National Park , and 24 miles south of Stockton .
Modesto , a  29-time पेड़ नगर यूएसए honoree , is घिरी by समृद्ध farmland , lending to a रैंकिंग लिये  the county as 6th among all California counties in farm production .
Led by milk , almonds , chickens , walnuts ,  और मकई साइलेज , the काउंटी grossed nearly $ 3.1 अरब in agricultural उत्पादन in  2011 .
Modesto was immortalized in  the 1973 जार्ज लुकास फिल्मी अमरीकी graffiti  .
The award winning film captured the spirit of `` cruising '' and friendship on 10th and 11th Streets in 1962 and led to  the पुनरुद्धार of 1950 's nostalgia कि शामिल the tv दिखाएँ प्रसन्न दिनों और the अन्य spin-offs  .
Ron Howard ,  हैरिसन घाट और रिचर्ड dreyfuss स्ट्रक्चर in  the film .
The  साउंडट्रैक थी a विशाल कामयाबी  .
Director George  लुकास is a देशी of modesto ,  graduating from Downey High School in 1962 .
The Gallup-Healthways Well-Being Index for 2011 , which  साक्षात्कार 1,000 भागीदार रोज़ और asks individuals to assess उनके कार्य , finances , शारीरिक स्वास्थ्य , emotional राज्य of दिमाग और समुदायों , क्रमित modesto  126 out of the 190 cities surveyed .
In December 2009 , Forbes ranked  modesto 48th आउट of 100 among `` बेहतरीन bang-for-the-buck  Cities '' .
In  इस रैंकिंग , modesto क्रमित 8th in आवास affordability और सफर समय  but also ranked 86th in job forecast growth and 99th in foreclosures .
Independence Day , commonly known as the Fourth of July , is a federal holiday in the United States  commemorating the अपनाना of the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता on जुलाई 4 , 1776 , declaring स्वतंत्रता इससे the किंगडम of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन  .
Independence Day is commonly associated with fireworks ,  parades , barbecues , carnivals , मेलों , picnics , कॉन्सर्ट , बेसबॉल खेल , परिवार reunions , और राजनैतिक भाषणों और ceremonies , in जोड to विभिन्न अन्य पब्लिक और निजी कार्यक्रम celebrating  the history , government , and traditions of the United States .
स्वतंत्रता दिन is the नेशनल दिन of  the United States .
A gender symbol denotes the  sex of an सजीव or characterizes an एजेंट by लिंग  .
The two standard gender symbols denoting male ♂ and female ♀ are  निकला इससे astrological प्रतीकों , denoting the शास्त्रीय ग्रह मंगल और शुक्र ,  respectively .
These symbols have been in use since the Renaissance  भी denoting तत्व in alchemy  , specifically the metals iron and copper .
They were first used to denote the  प्रभावी लिंग of पौधे ( i.e . sex of व्यक्तिगत in a दिए crossbreed , चूंकि सबसे पौधे हैं hermaphroditic  ) by Carolus Linnaeus in 1751 .
A leasehold  एस्टेट is an स्वामित्व of a अस्थाई सही to थाम जमीन or प्रॉपर्टी in जिससे a lessee or a किरायेदार holds अधिकारों  of real property by some form of title from a lessor or landlord .
हालांकि a किरायेदार करता थाम अधिकारों to रियल प्रॉपर्टी , a  leasehold estate is typically considered personal property .
Leasehold is a form of  जमीन कार्यकाल or प्रॉपर्टी कार्यकाल जहाँ एक पार्टी खरीदता the सही to occupy जमीन or a भवन  for a given length of time .
As lease is a  विधिक एस्टेट , leasehold एस्टेट can be खरीदा और  sold on the open market .
A leasehold thus differs from a freehold or fee simple where the ownership of a property is purchased outright and  thereafter आयोजित लिये an अनिर्धार्य लंबाई of समय , और भी differs इससे a tenancy जहाँ a प्रॉपर्टी is let ( rented ) on a आवधिक आधार ऐसे as साप्ताहिक  or monthly .
Until the end of the lease period ( often measured in decades or  सदियां ; a 99 साल पट्टे is काफी आम ) the leaseholder रै the सही to remain in occupation as an assured किरायेदार paying  an agreed rent to the owner .
शर्तें of the अनुबंध हैं contained in a पट्टे , जिससे रै तत्व of अनुबंध  and property law intertwined .
The term estate  लिये सालो may occasionally be  used .
This  refers to a leasehold एस्टेट लिये कोई विशिष्ट काल  of time ( the word `` years '' is misleading ) .
An estate for years  is नहीं automatically नवीनीकृत .
colloquially , `` पट्टे '' और `` पट्टे `` हैं प्रायः a formalization of a longer , विशिष्ट काल as compared साथ a `` rental '' कि निर्मित a tenancy  at will , terminable or renewable at the end of a short period .
Olivia ( also known as Welcome to the World of the Pig Olivia ) is a British-American  children 's एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न श्रेणी उत्पादित by मीडिया कम्पनी chorion और आधारित on इयान falconer 's किताबे  .
It is  देखी on उपनाम jr. in the us ,  Milkshake !
, Nick Jr. in the UK and  आयरलैंड , और डिज़्नी जूनियर in लैटिन अमेरिका और ब्राज़ील , treehouse  TV in Canada .
The show has won a  चांदी अभिभावक ' चुनाव पुरस्कार लिये इसके धनात्मक  story lines and characters .
Location of Panama  between प्रशांत ( नीचे ) और caribbean ( शीर्ष ) , साथ कनाल  at top center
the पनामा कनाल ( ) is a जलयान कनाल in पनामा कि connects the  Atlantic Ocean ( via the Caribbean Sea ) to the Pacific Ocean .
The canal cuts  आरपार the isthmus of पनामा और is a कुंजी conduit लिये अंतरराष्ट्रीय  maritime trade .
There are locks at  प्रत्येक समाप्त to लिफ्ट जहाजों up to gatun झील (  above sea-level ) .
gatun झील थी निर्मित to reduce the राशि  of work required for the canal .
The current  ताले हैं चौड़ी  .
A  तीसरा , wider लेन of ताले is होने  built .
France began work on the canal in  1881 , लकिन था to रोकें क्युकी of अभियान्त्रिकी समस्याएं और ऊँची  mortality due to disease .
The United States ( US )  बाद took over the प्रोजेक्ट और took a दशक to पूरा the कनाल in 1914 , enabling जहाजों to avoid the lengthy केप सींग रूट around the southernmost टिप of दक्षिण अमेरिका  ( via the Drake Passage ) or to navigate the Strait of Magellan .
One of the largest and most difficult engineering projects ever  undertaken , the पनामा कनाल शॉर्टकट बना it संभावित लिये जहाजों to सफर between the अटलांटिक और प्रशांत महासागर in हाफ the समय previously  required .
The shorter , faster , safer route to the US West Coast and to nations in and  साथ the प्रशांत समंदर अनुमत those स्थान to become अधिक एकीकृत साथ the संसार  economy .
During this time ,  स्वामित्व of the territory कि is अभी the पनामा कनाल  was first Colombian , then French , and then American ; the United States completed the construction .
The canal was taken over in  1999 by the panamanian सरकारी , as long नियोजित  .
सालाना ट्रैफ़िक रै risen इससे परिचय 1,000 जहाजों जब the कनाल खोली in 1914 , to 14,702 बरतन in  2008 , the latter measuring a total of 309.6 million Panama Canal/Universal Measurement System ( PC/UMS ) tons .
By 2008 , more than 815,000  बरतन था passed through the कनाल , अनेक of उन्हें much larger than the असली planners could have envisioned ;  the largest ships that can transit the canal today are called Panamax .
The American  समाज of सिविल इंजीनियर्स रै नामित the पनामा कनाल एक of the सात चमत्कार  of the modern world .
Benjamin Franklin ( April  17 , 1790 ) थी एक of the founding fathers of the संयुक्त राज्य  .
A noted polymath ,  फ्रैंकलिन थी a अग्रणी लेखक , मुद्रक , राजनैतिक theorist , राजनेता , postmaster , वैज्ञानिक , संगीतकार  , inventor , satirist , civic activist , statesman , and diplomat .
As a scientist , he was a  प्रमुख फिगर in the अमरीकी आत्मज्ञान और the इतिहास of भौतिकी लिये उसके discoveries  and theories regarding electricity .
He invented the lightning rod ,  bifocals , the फ्रैंकलिन स्टोव , a carriage ओडोमीटर , और the कांच  'armonica ' .
He facilitated many  नागरिक संगठन , सहित a आग विभाग और  a university .
Franklin earned the title of `` The First American '' for his early and  indefatigable campaigning लिये औपनिवेशिक एकता ; as an लेखक और प्रवक्ता in लंदन लिये अनेक colonies , तब as the पहला संयुक्त  States Ambassador to France , he exemplified the emerging American nation .
Franklin was foundational in defining the American ethos as a marriage of the practical values of thrift , hard work , education , community spirit ,  self-governing संस्थानों , और विपक्ष to authoritarianism दोनो राजनैतिक और धार्मिक , साथ the वैज्ञानिक और सहिष्णु मान of the आत्मज्ञान  .
In the words of  इतिहासकार हेनरी स्टील commager , `` in a फ्रैंकलिन could be मिलाया the virtues of puritanism  without its defects , the illumination of the Enlightenment without its heat . ''
To  वाल्टर isaacson , इस makes फ्रैंकलिन `` the सबसे संपन्नता अमरीकी of उसके आयु और the सबसे  influential in inventing the type of society America would become . ''
Franklin , always  गर्व of उसके working क्लास जड़ें , became a कामयाब समाचारपत्र एडिटर और मुद्रक in फिलाडेल्फिया , the  leading city in the colonies .
He was also partners with William Goddard and Joseph Galloway the three of whom published the Pennsylvania  वृत्तान्त , a समाचारपत्र कि थी ज्ञात लिये इसके क्रांतिकारी sentiments और आलोचनाओं of the अंग्रेजों साम्राज्य  in the American colonies .
He became wealthy  प्रकाशन ग़रीब रिचर्ड 's almanack और the पेन्सिलवेनिया गजट  .
Franklin gained international renown as a scientist for his  प्रसिद्ध प्रयोग in विद्युत और लिये उसके अनेक आविष्कारों , विशेषकर the बिजली  rod .
He  निभाई a प्रमुख भूमिका in establishing the विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया और थी निर्वाचित  the first president of the American Philosophical Society .
Franklin became a national hero in America  जब he पथप्रदर्शन the प्रयत्न to have पार्लियामेंट repeal  the unpopular Stamp Act .
An accomplished diplomat , he was widely admired  among the फ्रेंच as अमरीकी मंत्री to पेरिस और थी a प्रमुख फिगर in the विकास  of positive Franco-American relations .
लिये अनेक सालो he थी the अंग्रेजों postmaster लिये the colonies , जिससे सक्रिय  him to set up the first national communications network .
He was  क्रियाशील in जातियाँ अफेयर्स , औपनिवेशिक और राज्य राजनीती , as  well as national and international affairs .
From 1785 to 1788 , he  परोसा as राज्यपाल of पेन्सिलवेनिया  .
Toward the end of his  जीवन , he freed उसके स्लेव और became एक of the सबसे prominent  abolitionists .
His colorful life and legacy of scientific and political achievement , and status as one  of अमेरिका 's सबसे influential founding fathers , have देखी फ्रैंकलिन सम्मानित on coinage और धन ; warships ; the names of अनेक कस्बों , काउंटी , शैक्षणिक संस्थानों , namesakes , और कंपनियाँ ; और अधिक than दो सदियां बाद उसके मौत , अनगिनत  cultural references .
Criminal Minds is an American  पुलिस प्रक्रियात्मक टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम कि premiered सितंबर  22 , 2005 , on CBS .
The series follows a team of profilers from the FBI 's Behavioral  विश्लेषण ईकाई ( bau ) आधारित in क्वांटिको  , Virginia .
The BAU is  भाग of the एफबीआई नेशनल बीच लिये the विश्लेषण  of Violent Crime .
The show differs  इससे अनेक प्रक्रियात्मक dramas by focusing on प्रोफाइलिंग the  criminal , rather than the crime itself .
The show is produced  by the चिह्नित गॉर्डन कम्पनी in संघ साथ सीबीएस टेलीविज़न studios ( originally सर्वोपरि संजाल टेलीविज़न तब सीबीएस सर्वोपरि संजाल  Television ) and ABC Studios ( originally Touchstone Television ) .
CBS announced in October 2009 that Legacy  इंटरैक्टिव होता develop a वीडियो खेल आधारित  on the show .
The game  होता आवश्यकता खिलाड़ी to जाँचें अपराधों दृश्यों लिये clues to  help solve murder mysteries .
The interactive puzzle game was released in  2012 , लकिन किया नहीं विशेषता कोई of the आवाज़ें of the दिखाएँ 's डाल , nor थी the डाल  involved with the project .
On  कूच 14 , 2012 , सीबीएस नवीनीकृत दण्ड minds लिये an आठवीं ऋतु , जिससे premiered  on September 26 , 2012 .
`` Heart-Shaped Box '' is a song by the American  grunge बैंड निर्वाण , लिखा by vocalist और guitarist कर्ट कोबेन .
The song was released as the  पहला सिंगल इससे the समूह 's तीसरा और फाइनल स्टुडियो एल्बम ,  In Utero , in 1993 .
It was one of two songs from the  एल्बम मिश्रित by स्कॉट litt in अनुक्रम to augment the असली उत्पादन  by producer Steve Albini .
While Nirvana 's label DGC Records did not release a  शारीरिक सिंगल लिये बिक्री in the संयुक्त राज्य , `` heart-shaped बक्सा '' प्राप्त much अमरीकी रेडियो airplay , reaching क्रमांक एक on the बिलबोर्ड आधुनिक चट्टान ट्रैक्स चार्ट  .
The  अंतरराष्ट्रीय रिलीज of the सिंगल पहुँचे क्रमांक पाँच on  the UK Singles Chart .
the सोंग 's म्यूज़िक वीडियो , निर्देशित by एंटोन corbijn  , garnered critical plaudits .
The orbital speed of a body , generally a planet ,  a प्राकृतिक उपग्रह , an कृत्रिम उपग्रह , or a अनेक स्टार , is the गति at जिससे it orbits around the barycenter  of a system , usually around a more massive body .
It can be used to refer to  either the औसत कक्षीय गति , the औसत गति as it completes an कक्षा , or instantaneous कक्षीय गति , the गति  at a particular point in its orbit .
The orbital speed at any position in  the कक्षा can be computed इससे the अलहदा to the सेंट्रल देह at कि स्थिति , और the विशिष्ट कक्षीय उर्जा , जिससे is स्वतंत्र of स्थिति  : the kinetic energy is the total energy minus the potential energy .
Brown  राजमहल आंतरिक और अलिंद
Brown Palace Hotel is the second-oldest operating hotel  in डेनवर , कोलोराडो और is एक of the पहला atrium-style होटल  ever built .
It is now  संचालित by कोरम होटल और रिसॉर्ट  .
It was built in 1892  , एक साल बाद than the ऑक्सफोर्ड  Hotel .
It was named for its original owner , Henry  C. भूरा , और थी designed साथ इसके विषम triangular आकार by वास्तु फ़्रैंक  Edbrooke .
The hotel is  स्तिथ at 321 17th st , डेनवर , co between 17th गली , ब्रॉडवे और tremont street/pl  in downtown Denver behind the Republic Plaza .
The  प्रमुख प्रवेश द्वार is  on Tremont Street .
DVD-Video is a consumer  वीडियो स्वरूप प्रयुक्त to स्टोर डिजिटल वीडियो on dvd discs , और is फिलहाल the प्रबल उपभोक्ता वीडियो  format in Asia , North America , Europe , and Australia .
Discs using the DVD-Video specification require a DVD drive and an H.262/MPEG-2 Part 2  डिकोडर ( e.g. , a dvd खिलाड़ी , or a कंप्यूटर dvd ड्राइव साथ  a software DVD player ) .
Commercial DVD  फिल्मों हैं एनकोडेड using a संयोजन of h.262/mpeg-2 भाग 2 संपीडित वीडियो और ऑडियो of varying स्वरुप  ( often multi-channel formats as described below ) .
Typically , the data rate for DVD movies ranges from  3 mbit/s to 9.5 mbit/s , और the  bit rate is usually adaptive .
It was first  उपलब्धियाँ लिये खुदरा around  1997 .
The DVD-Video specification was  निर्मित by dvd फ़ोरम और can be प्राप्त इससे dvd format/logo लाइसेंसिंग  Corporation for a fee of $ 5,000 .
The specification is not publicly  उपलब्धियाँ , क्युकी प्रत्येक सदस्य जरूर चिह्न a non-disclosure  agreement .
Certain information in  the dvd किताब is मालिकाना और गोपनीय  .
The nautical mile ( symbol M , NM or nmi ) is a unit of length that is about one minute of arc  of अक्षांश measured साथ कोई मध्याह्न , or परिचय एक मिनट of चाप of देशांतर  at the equator .
By international agreement it has been  नियत at 1,852 मीटर exactly ( परिचय 6,076 फीट )  .
it is a non- si ईकाई ( हालांकि स्वीकृत लिये उपयोग in the अंतरराष्ट्रीय प्रणाली of इकाई by the bipm ) प्रयुक्त विशेषकर  by navigators in the shipping and aviation industries , and also in polar exploration .
It is commonly used in international law and  treaties , विशेषकर regarding the हद of territorial  waters .
It  विकसित इससे the समुद्र मील और the  related geographical mile .
The nautical mile remains in  उपयोग by समुद्र और एयर navigators विश्वव्यापी क्युकी of इसके convenience  when working with charts .
Most nautical charts use the  मर्केटर प्रक्षेप जिनकी स्केल varies by परिचय a फ़ैक्टर of छह इससे the equator to 80° अक्षांश , so चार्ट covering विशाल  areas can not use a single linear scale .
The nautical mile is nearly equal to a  मिनट of अक्षांश on a चार्ट , so a अलहदा measured साथ a चार्ट divider can be  roughly converted to nautical miles using the chart 's latitude scale .
Shippensburg is a borough  in कम्बरलैंड और फ्रैंकलिन काउंटी in the u.S. राज्य of  Pennsylvania .
Settled in 1730 , Shippensburg lies in the Cumberland Valley ,  41 मील ( 66 km ) west-southwest of harrisburg , और is भाग of the harrisburg– carlisle महानगर सांख्यिकीय  Area .
In 1900 , 3,228  लोगों जिया वहीँ ; in 1910 , 3,457 ; और in 1940 , 5,244  people lived there .
The population was 5,492  at the 2010 जनसांख्यिकी .
shippensburg थी incorporated as a बरो on जनवरी  21 , 1819 .
In the past , there were furniture factories ,  इंजन और पंप works , और अन्य औद्योगिक works स्तिथ भीतर the कस्बा  .
Shippensburg is also the home of The Beistle Company , the oldest and  largest निर्माता of सजावट और पार्टी goods , जिससे बिकता इसके distinctive मधुकोश पेपर सजावट  worldwide .
It is  भी the स्थान of pague और fegan , the oldest लगातार  operated hardware store in Pennsylvania .
In May  2012 , वोल्वो निर्माण उपकरण began a $ 100 लाख विस्तार प्रोजेक्ट to लाओ इसके  American headquarters to Shippensburg .
Shippensburg is also home to Shippensburg  विश्वविद्यालयों of पेन्सिलवेनिया , एक of 14 विश्वविद्यालयों of the पेन्सिलवेनिया राज्य  System of Higher Education .
Yearly  the पिछला पूरा सप्ताह of जुलाई , the shippensburg जातियाँ  Fair is held .
Begun in 1958 , the fair bills itself as  पेन्सिलवेनिया 's largest bi-county  fair .
The fair includes agricultural  दर्शाती , a शिल्प दिखाएँ , खाना विक्रेता , और कार्निवल यात्राएँ amongst  other things .
Every summer on the last Saturday of  अगस्त , shippensburg holds the मकई पर्व , an इवेंट कि brings क्षेत्रीय शिल्पकार और विक्रेता to operate  stands downtown .
The downtown is closed to traffic  लिये at तनिक 5 ब्लॉक लिये सबसे of the  day .
Average attendance at  the पर्व is अनुमानित at 60,000  - 70,000 each year .
Black hairy  जीभ ( bht , भी termed lingua villosa nigra ) refers to a कंडीशन of the जीभ जहाँ the filiform papillae  elongate with black or brown discoloration , giving a black and hairy appearance .
The  रूप may be alarming ,  but it is a harmless condition .
predisposing कारकों शामिल धूम्रपान , xerostomia ( शुष्क मुँह ) , नरम आहार , ग़रीब  oral hygiene and certain medications .
Management is by improving oral  hygiene , विशेषकर scraping or brushing the जीभ  .
the आईईईई 1394 इंटरफ़ेस is a सीरियल बस इंटरफ़ेस मानक लिये high-speed  communications and isochronous real-time data transfer .
It was developed in the late 1980s and  जल्दी 1990s by ठहराना , जो पुकारा it firewire  .
The 1394 interface is comparable to USB ,  और प्रायः those दो technologies हैं माना साथ ,  though USB has more market share .
Apple first included FireWire in some of its 1999 models , and  सबसे ठहराना कंप्यूटर चूंकि the साल 2000 have शामिल firewire पोर्ट , हालांकि , as of 2013 , nothing परे the 800 संस्करण  ( IEEE-1394b ) .
The interface is also  ज्ञात by the ब्रांड i.link ( सोनी  ) , and Lynx ( Texas Instruments ) .
IEEE 1394 replaced parallel SCSI in many  अनुप्रयोग , क्युकी of निम्नतर क्रियान्वयन लागत और a सरलीकृत , अधिक अनुकूलनीय  cabling system .
the 1394 मानक भी defines a backplane  interface , though this is not as widely used .
IEEE 1394 is the High-Definition Audio-Video  संजाल गठबंधन ( हाना ) मानक कनेक्शन इंटरफ़ेस लिये a/v ( audio/visual ) घटक  communication and control .
FireWire is also available in wireless , fiber  ऑप्टिक , और समाक्षीय संस्करण using the isochronous प्रोटोकॉल  .
Stephen `` Stevie '' Ray Vaughan ( October 3 , 1954 –  अगस्त 27 , 1990 ) थी an अमरीकी guitarist , singer-songwriter ,  and record producer .
Often  referred to by उसके आद्याक्षर srv , vaughan is बेहतरीन ज्ञात as a founding सदस्य  and leader of Double Trouble .
Together with drummer Chris Layton and  bassist टॉमी शैनन , वे ignited the ब्लूज़ पुनरुद्धार  of the 1980s .
With a career spanning seven years , Vaughan and Double  ट्रबल consistently बेची आउट कॉन्सर्ट जबकि उनके एल्बम अक्सर  went gold .
He was born and raised  in डलास , टेक्सास , और लिये a छोटी काल  of time lived in Graham , Texas .
As the younger brother of Jimmie Vaughan , Vaughan started playing the guitar at age  सात और formed अनेक bands कि occasionally performed in लोकल nightclubs  .
At age 17 ,  he dropped आउट of ऊँची स्कूल और स्थानांतरित to ऑस्टिन to further pursue उसके musical करियर  , joining groups such as Krackerjack , the Nightcrawlers , and the Cobras .
In 1977 , he  formed ट्रिपल threat revue , a बैंड कि आखिरकार विकसित into दोगुना ट्रबल  and regularly performed around Austin .
In 1982 , Vaughan and Double Trouble performed at the  montreux जैज़ पर्व in स्विट्ज़रलैंड , catching the ध्यान of  musicians David Bowie and Jackson Browne .
Bowie asked Vaughan  to खेल on उसके आगामी स्टुडियो एल्बम let 's नृत्य , जबकि browne offered  the band free use of his personal studio in Los Angeles to record an album .
In March 1983  , vaughan और दोगुना ट्रबल यहूद हस्ताक्षरित to एपिक रिकॉर्ड by दिग्गज रिकार्ड निर्माता जॉन हैमंड sr. और released उनके डेब्यू  album , Texas Flood in June of that year .
After  कामयाब touring , the समूह released the एल्बम , could n't स्टैंड the मौसम ( 1984 ) और आत्मा to आत्मा  ( 1985 ) , the latter of which featured new keyboardist Reese Wynans .
Although his career had progressed successfully , Vaughan checked into a  पुनर्वास हॉस्पिटल in अटलांटा , जॉर्जिया to दे up a कोका और दारू आदत और लौटे to touring साथ the बैंड  .
In June 1989 , In Step was released and earned them a Grammy  पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन समकालीन ब्लूज़ प्रदर्शन  .
On  अगस्त 27 , 1990 , vaughan थी मारे in a हेलीकाप्टर क्रैश following  a performance in East Troy , Wisconsin .
Vaughan 's uniquely eclectic  yet तीव्र स्टाइल थी निकला इससे a किस्में of musical  genres .
He was  बहकावे by ब्लूज़ संगीतकारों सहित अल्बर्ट किंग , फ्रेडी किंग , ओटिस फटाफट ,  and Muddy Waters , and rock guitarists such as Jimi Hendrix and Lonnie Mack .
His guitar  playing reflected the क्लासिक ब्लूज़ और pentatonic  scales .
He has received wide  नाजुक मान्यता लिये उसके गिटार playing , रैंकिंग at # 6 on  Rolling Stones list of `` 100 Greatest Guitarists '' in 2011 .
He was posthumously inducted into the Blues  हॉल of कीर्ति in 2000 और a मेमोरियल प्रतिमा थी erected in ऑस्टिन  's Auditorium Shores park .
Stevie Ray Vaughan is widely considered to be  एक of the महानतम संगीतकारों to आइये इससे the राज्य  of Texas .
GigE  redirects यहाँ  .
For the  कैमरा प्रोटोकॉल , देखिए gige  vision .
In computer  नेटवर्किंग , gigabit ईथरनेट ( gbe or 1 gige ) is a पद describing विभिन्न technologies लिये transmitting ईथरनेट फ्रेम्स at a रेट of a gigabit प्रति  second ( 1,000,000,000 bits per second ) , as defined by the IEEE 802.3-2008 standard .
It came into use beginning in 1999 , gradually  supplanting तेज़ ईथरनेट in तार लोकल संजाल , जहाँ it performed considerably  faster .
The cables and equipment are very similar  to पिछला मानकों और यहूद बहुत आम और किफायती by  2010 .
Half-duplex gigabit links connected through hubs are allowed by the  specification , लकिन full-duplex उपयोग साथ switches is much अधिक आम  .

The main  components of a stamp:
1 . चित्र
2 . perforations
3  . denomination
4 . देश  name
A postage  स्टैम्प is a छोटी टुकड़ा of पेपर कि is खरीदा और प्रदर्शित  on an item of mail as evidence of payment of postage .
Typically  , stamps हैं बना इससे खास पेपर , साथ a नेशनल नामांकन और denomination ( दाम ) on the  face , and a gum adhesive on the reverse side .
Postage stamps are  खरीदा इससे a डाक प्रशासन or अन्य प्राधिकृत विक्रेता और हैं प्रयुक्त to अदा लिये the लागत शामिल  in moving mail as well as other business necessities such as insurance and registration .
The stamp’s shape is usually that of a small  आयताकार of varying proportions , हालांकि त्रिकोण or अन्य आकार हैं occasionally  used .
The stamp is  affixed to an लिफाफा or अन्य डाक कवर ( i.e. , पैकेट , बक्सा , mailing बेलन  ) that the customer wishes to send .
The item is then processed by the postal  प्रणाली , जहाँ a postmark , sometimes ज्ञात as a रद्दीकरण चिह्नित , is प्रायः  applied over the stamp and cover ; this procedure marks the stamp as used , which prevents its reuse .
The postmark indicates the  तिथि और पाइंट of उत्पत्ति of the mailing  .
The mailed item is then delivered to the  पता कि the ग्राहक रै लागू to the लिफाफा or  cover .
postage stamps have facilitated the डिलीवरी  of mail since the 1840s .
Before this time , ink and hand-stamps ( hence the  शब्द 'stamp ' ) , प्रायः बना इससे लकडी or कॉर्क , यहूद प्रायः प्रयुक्त to फ़्रैंक  the mail and confirm the payment of postage .
The first adhesive postage stamp ,  commonly referred to as the पैनी ब्लैक , थी जारी in the  United Kingdom in 1840 .
The invention of the stamp was a part of the attempt to reform and improve the postal system  in the संयुक्त किंगडम of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और आयरलैंड , जिससे in the जल्दी 19th सदी थी in अस्तव्यस्तता और rife साथ भ्रष्टाचार  .
There  हैं varying खाते of the आविष्कारक or  inventors of the stamp .
Before the introduction of postage stamps , mail  in the uk थी सशुल्क लिये by the प्राप्तकर्ता , a प्रणाली कि थी संबद्ध साथ an irresolvable प्रॉब्लम : the लागत of delivering मेल यहूद नहीं recoverable by the डाक  service when recipients were unable or unwilling to pay for delivered items , and senders had no incentive to restrict the number , size , or weight of items sent , whether or not they would ultimately be paid for .
The postage stamp resolved this  समस्या in a सरल और सुरुचिपूर्ण manner , साथ the अतिरिक्त लाभ of रूम  for an element of beauty to be introduced .
Later related inventions  शामिल डाक स्टेशनरी ऐसे as prepaid-postage लिफाफे , पोस्ट ताश , lettercards , aerogrammes और wrappers , postage मीटर , और , अधिक recently , specialty बाक्स  and envelopes provided free to the customer by the U.S. postal service for priority or express mailing .
The  postage स्टैम्प afforded convenience लिये दोनो the मेलर और डाक officials , अधिक efficiently बरामद लागत  for the postal service , and ultimately resulted in a better , faster postal system .
With the conveniences stamps offered , their use  resulted in greatly increased mailings दौरान the  19th and 20th centuries .
Postage stamps during this era were the most popular way  of paying लिये मेल , लकिन by the समाप्त of the 20th सदी यहूद rapidly होने आत  by the use of metered postage and bulk mailing by businesses . )
The same result with respect to communications by private parties occurred over the last decade of the 20th century and the first  दशक of the 21st due to घटती लागत of long अलहदा टेलीफोन संचार और the विकास और विस्फोटक स्प्रेड of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक mailing ( `` e-mail '' via the अंतरजाल ) और  bill paying systems had .
As  postage stamps साथ उनके engraved imagery began to appear on a फैली  basis , historians and collectors began to take notice .
The study of  postage stamps और उनके उपयोग is referred to  as philately .
Stamp  collecting can be दोनो a शौक और a रूप of ऐतिहासिक पढ़ाई और सन्दर्भ , as government-issued  postage stamps and their mailing systems have always been involved with the history of nations .
The University  of अलबामा at बर्मिंघम ( uab ) is a पब्लिक विश्वविद्यालयों in बर्मिंघम  in the U.S. state of Alabama .
Developing from an  एक्सटेंशन बीच स्थापित in 1936 , the संस्था became an autonomous संस्था in 1969 और is आज  one of three institutions in the University of Alabama System .
UAB offers over 140 programs of study in 12  अकादमिक विभाजन अग्रणी to स्नातक 's , निपुण 's , डॉक्टरेट , और पेशेवर डिग्री in the सोशल और behavioral sciences  , the liberal arts , business , education , engineering , and health-related fields such as medicine , dentistry , optometry , nursing , and public health .
The  स्कूल is अत्यधिक प्रसिद्ध लिये इसके चिकित्सा शोध और प्राकृतिक  sciences programs .
The UAB Health  प्रणाली , एक of the largest अकादमिक चिकित्सा centers in the संयुक्त राज्य , is संबद्ध  with the university .
UAB Hospital sponsors residency  कार्यक्रम in विभिन्न चिकित्सा specialties , सहित आतंरिक आयुर्विज्ञान , न्यूरोलॉजी , सर्जरी  , radiology , and anesthesiology .
UAB Hospital is  the तभी acs सत्यापित स्तर i आघात बीच in अलबामा , as रेटेड by the अमरीकी  College of Surgeons Trauma Program .
UAB is the state 's  largest नियोक्ता , साथ अधिक than 18,000 संकाय और स्टाफ और over 53,000  jobs at the university and in the health system .
An estimated 10 percent of the jobs in the  birmingham-hoover महानगर क्षेत्रफल और 1 in 33 कार्य in the राज्य of अलबामा हैं सीधे  or indirectly related to UAB .
the विश्वविद्यालयों 's overall सालाना आर्थिक  impact was estimated to be $ 4.6 billion in 2010 .
In the fall of  2012 , the विश्वविद्यालयों of अलबामा at बर्मिंघम नामांकित 17,999 विद्यार्थी इससे अधिक  than 110 countries , including 1,605 freshmen .
There are  योजनाएँ to commence साथ an `` आक्रामक ''  growth in enrollment at UAB .
the वर्तमान uab अध्यक्ष is  Dr. Ray L. Watts .
Tofu , also  पुकारा सेम दही , is a खाना बना by coagulating सोया रस और तब  pressing the resulting curds into soft white blocks .
It is a component in many  ईस्ट एशियाई और southeast एशियाई व्यंजन  .
There are many different varieties of tofu ,  सहित भैस टोफू और टोफू कि रै महरूम processed in  some way .
Tofu has a subtle flavor and can be  प्रयुक्त in savory और मीठी  dishes .
It is often  seasoned or marinated  to suit the dish .
Tofu  originated in प्राचीन चीन कुछ 2,000  years ago .
चाइनीज लेजेंड ascribes इसके आविष्कार to प्रिंस लियू an ( चाइनीज  : 劉安 Liú Ān , 179–122 BC ) .
Tofu and its production technique were  introduced into कोरियाई और तब जापानी दौरान  the Nara period .
It spread  into अन्य भाग of ईस्ट एशिया as खूब  .
This spread likely coincided with the  स्प्रेड of buddhism क्युकी it is an महत्वपूर्ण सोर्स of प्रोटीन in the शाकाहारी  diet of East Asian Buddhism .
Li Shizhen in the Ming Dynasty  वर्णित a विधि of बनाना टोफू in bencao gangmu  .
Tofu has  a कम कैलोरी गिनती , अपेक्षाकृत विशाल amounts  of protein , and little fat .
It is high in iron and depending on the  coagulant प्रयुक्त in निर्माण , may भी be ऊँची in कैल्सियम and/or मैग्नीशियम  .
Bubbles ( born 1983 ) is a common chimpanzee ,  ज्ञात लिये होने the one-time पालतु of अमरीकी रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार माइकल जैक्सन , जो  bought the primate from a Texas research facility in the early 1980s .
The animal was a frequent travel companion to the singer , whose attachment  to the एनिमल led to मीडिया mockery और , among अन्य कारकों , to a पब्लिक  perception of Jackson as an eccentric .
During the Bad World Tour , for  उदाहरण , जैक्सन brought बुलबुले साथ उसे to जापानी , जहाँ वे दोनो पिया चाय  with the mayor of Osaka .
बुलबुले थी initially रखा at the जैक्सन परिवार 's घर in encino , लॉस  Angeles , but was moved to Neverland Ranch in 1988 .
There , he slept in a crib in Jackson 's  बेडरूम , प्रयुक्त the सिंगर 's प्रसाधन , और ate कैंडी in  the Neverland movie theater .
In 2003 the public learned  कि , जैसे सब खिलाते chimpanzees , बुलबुले था matured into a विशाल  and aggressive adult chimp unsuitable as a companion animal .
He was sent to  a कैलिफ़ोर्निया एनिमल प्रशिक्षक  , where he was reported to have attempted suicide .
When the trainer shut down his  आपरेशन in 2004 , बुलबुले थी स्थानांतरित to the बीच लिये ग्रेट apes , a अभयारण्य in  Wauchula , Florida , where he has lived since 2005 .
Muse  हैं an अंग्रेज़ी चट्टान बैंड इससे  Teignmouth , Devon , which formed in 1994 .
The band consists of school friends Matthew Bellamy ( lead vocals , lead guitar , piano , keyboards , keytar ) ,  क्रिस्टोफर wolstenholme ( बास , vocals , keyboards , लय गिटार , हार्मोनिका ) और डोमिनिक हावर्ड ( ड्रम , percussion ,  synthesisers , sampling ) .
Since the release of  उनके 2006 एल्बम ब्लैक छेद और खुलासे , keyboardist और percussionist मॉर्गन nicholls रै  performed live with the band .
Muse are known for their energetic and extravagant  सजीव प्रदर्शन और उनके संलयन of अनेक म्यूज़िक जाति , सहित स्पेस चट्टान , प्रगतिशील चट्टान , वैकल्पिक चट्टान , भारी मेटल  , classical music and electronica .
Muse have released six studio albums :  showbiz ( 1999 ) , उत्पत्ति of सममिति ( 2001 ) , absolution ( 2003 ) , ब्लैक छेद और खुलासे  ( 2006 ) , The Resistance ( 2009 ) and The 2nd Law ( 2012 ) .
They have  भी जारी तीन सजीव एल्बम , hullabaloo साउंडट्रैक ( 2002 ) , जिससे is भी a संकलन of b-sides , absolution दौरे ( 2005 ) , और haarp ( 2008 ) , जिससे दस्तावेज़ the  band 's performances at Wembley Stadium in 2007 .
Black Holes and Revelations earned the band a Mercury Prize  नामांकन और a तीसरा प्लेस समाप्त in the nme एल्बम of the साल सूची लिये 2006 .
Muse have also won a collection of music awards throughout their history , including five MTV Europe Music Awards  , छह q पुरस्कार , आठ nme पुरस्कार , दो ब्रिट पुरस्कार —winning `` बेहतरीन अंग्रेजों सजीव अधिनियम '' twice , an एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार  , four Kerrang !
पुरस्कार और an अमरीकी  Music Award .
They  यहूद भी मनोनीत लिये पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , of जिससे वे जीती बेहतरीन चट्टान एल्बम , लिये उनके पांचवां स्टुडियो एल्बम  The Resistance ( 2009 ) .
Muse  have बेची over 15 लाख  albums worldwide .
Bloemfontein ( , ;  डच लिये `` फव्वारा of पुष्प '' ) is the पूंजी नगर of the फ़्री राज्य प्रांत of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी ; और , as the न्यायिक पूंजी of the स्वदेश , एक of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी 's तीन नेशनल राजधानी – the अन्य  two being Cape Town , the legislative capital , and Pretoria , the administrative capital .
Bloemfontein is popularly and poetically known as `` the city  of गुलाब `` , owing to the प्रचुरता of ये पुष्प और the सालाना रोज़ पर्व आयोजित वहीँ  .
The city 's Sesotho name is Mangaung , meaning `` place of cheetahs ``  और it रै महरूम शामिल in the mangaung लोकल नगरपालिका चूंकि 2000  .
Bloemfontein is situated  on शुष्क घासभूमि at , at an ऊँचाई  of above sea level .
The  नगर is घर to 369,568 निवासियों , जबकि the mangaung  Local Municipality has a population of 645,455 .
Where  do we आइये इससे  ?
कया हैं  We ?
जहाँ हैं we going  ?
One  of post-impressionist पॉल gauguin  's most famous paintings .
The  अर्थ of जीवन is a philosophical सवाल concerning  the significance of life or existence in general .
It can also be expressed in different forms , such as  `` क्यों हैं we यहाँ ? `` , `` कया is जीवन सब परिचय ? `` , और `` कया is the purpose of अस्तित्व  ? ''
It has been the subject of  much philosophical , वैज्ञानिक , और theological अटकलें throughout  history .
There  have महरूम a विशाल क्रमांक of प्रस्तावित जवाब to ये सवाल इससे  many different cultural and ideological backgrounds .
The meaning of life is in the philosophical and  धार्मिक conceptions of अस्तित्व , सोशल ties , चेतना , और सुख , और सीमायें on अनेक अन्य मुद्दे , ऐसे as सांकेतिक अर्थ , सत्तामीमांसा , मान , purpose , आचार , शुभ और दुष्ट , फ़्री होगा , the अस्तित्व of एक or अनेक देवताओं  , conceptions of God , the soul , and the afterlife .
Scientific contributions focus primarily on describing related empirical  तथ्य परिचय the ब्रह्मांड , exploring the कॉन्टेक्स्ट और पैरामीटर्स concerning the 'how ' of जीवन  .
Science also studies and can provide  सुझाव लिये the pursuit of well-being और a सम्बन्धित धारणा of नैतिकता .
An  वैकल्पिक , humanistic दृष्टिकोण मुद्राएँ the सवाल `` कया is the अर्थ of  my life ? ''
The value  of the सवाल pertaining to the purpose of जीवन may coincide साथ the उपलब्धि of परम वास्तविकता  , or a feeling of oneness , or even a feeling of sacredness .
Family Guy creator Seth MacFarlane also  provides the आवाज़ें of पीटर griffin , stewie griffin , ब्रायन griffin , और ग्लेन  Quagmire .
Family Guy is an American animated sitcom that features  पाँच प्रमुख आवाज़ अभिनेताओं , और numerous नियमित डाल और पुनरावर्ती अतिथि  stars .
The principal voice cast consists of show creator Seth MacFarlane , Alex Borstein , Seth Green , Mila Kunis ( who replaced  लेसी chabert बाद the पहला ऋतु ) और माइक हेनरी और अभी , the नई कर्ता beau ओसबोर्न  .
Recurring voice actors include Patrick Warburton , Adam  वेस्ट , जॉन G. ब्रेनन , निकोल सुलीवान और जेनिफर tilly , और repeat अतिथि सितारों शामिल  Phyllis Diller , Charles Durning , Rush Limbaugh , and Phil LaMarr .
Many cast members provide  आवाज़ें लिये अनेक वर्ण  .
The voice actors , in  portraying the विभिन्न अक्षर personalities on  the show , draw inspiration from celebrities and pop culture .
Family Guy characters have been played by more  than एक कर्ता , बाद सदस्यों of the दिखाएँ बाएँ the श्रेणी or था conflicting दायित्वों  .
Kunis was  मनोनीत लिये an एनी पुरस्कार लिये voicing मेग griffin in the ऋतु 5 एपीसोड `` मुश्किल विधिक `` और macfarlane रै भी जीती an एमी पुरस्कार लिये बकाया voice-over प्रदर्शन और an एनी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन आवाज़ एक्टिंग in an  Animated Television Production , though no other cast member has won an award for their work on the series .
