`` The Princess and the Pea '' ( ; literal translation : `` The Princess on the Pea '' ) is a literary fairy  टेल by hans ईसाई andersen परिचय a यंग स्त्री जिनकी royal पहचान is स्थापित by a परीक्षण of उसके शारीरिक संवेदनशीलता  .
The tale was first published with three others by  andersen in an inexpensive पुस्तिका on 8 may 1835 in कोपेनहेगन  by C.A . Reitzel .
Andersen had heard the story as a child , and it  संभावित रै इसके सोर्स in लोक सामग्री , संभवतः originating  from Sweden as it is unknown in the Danish oral tradition .
Neither `` The Princess and the Pea '' nor Andersen 's other tales of  1835 यहूद खूब प्राप्त by डैनिश आलोचकों , जो disliked उनके कैज़ुअल , chatty स्टाइल , और उनके  lack of morals .
In 1959 `` The Princess and  the मटर '' थी adapted to the musical स्टेज in a उत्पादन पुकारा एकबार upon  a Mattress starring Carol Burnett .
German Americans ( ) are  नागरिकों of the संयुक्त राज्य जो यहूद either born in जर्मनी or हैं of जर्मनी  ancestry .
They comprise  परिचय 50 लाख लोगों , बनाना उन्हें the largest ancestry समूह ahead  of Irish Americans , African Americans and English Americans .
They comprise about 1/3 of the  जर्मनी diaspora सब over the संसार  .
None of the  जर्मनी राज्य था नई संसार  colonies .
नहीं जबतक the 1670s किया the पहला significant समूह of जर्मनी आप्रवासियों  arrive in the British colonies , settling primarily in New York and Pennsylvania .
Immigration continued in very large numbers during the 19th  सदी , साथ कुछ आठ लाख आमद इससे जर्मनी .
They were pulled by the attractions  of जमीन और धार्मिक स्वतंत्रता , और धकेल आउट of यूरोपीय by shortages of जमीन  and religious or political oppression .
Many arrived seeking religious or political freedom , others for economic  अवसर वृहद than those in यूरोपीय , और अन्य बस लिये the मौका to प्रारंभ भैस in the  New World .
The arrivals before 1850  यहूद ज़्यादातर किसानो जो sought आउट the सबसे उत्पादक जमीन , जहाँ उनके intensive  farming techniques would pay off .
बाद 1840 , अनेक आए to शहरों , जहाँ `` germania '' —german-speaking  districts—soon emerged .
German  अमेरिकी स्थापित the पहला kindergartens in the संयुक्त राज्य , introduced the क्रिसमस पेड़ परंपरा  , and originated popular American foods such as hot dogs and hamburgers .
German American celebrations  हैं आयोजित throughout the देश , एक of the सबसे well-known होने the german-american steuben परेड in नई यॉर्क नगर , आयोजित प्रत्येक तीसरा  Saturday in September .
There are also  प्रमुख सालाना कार्यक्रम in शिकागो , सिनसिनाटी , मिल्वौकी  , Pittsburgh , St. Louis and other cities .
Like many other immigrants that came to the United States , an overwhelming  क्रमांक of लोगों of जर्मनी or आंशिक जर्मनी descent have essentially become americanized  .
The Preamble to the United States Constitution is a brief  परिचयात्मक बयान of the संविधान 's आधारभूत उद्देश्य और guiding  principles .
It states in general terms , and  न्यायालयों have referred to it as विश्वसनीय प्रमाण of , the founding fathers ' इरादों regarding the संविधान 's अर्थ और कया वे hoped the संविधान  would achieve as it pertains to all of the people of the United States .
As the phrase , `` we the people '' suggests that the new government originates from the people of the United  राज्य और it सेट into गति a सवाल as it pertains to कि विशाल जनसांख्यिकी concerning the व्यक्तिगत अधिकारों और समता among सब लोगों ; इस can be देखी सबसे broadly in the divide between republicanism और सोशल लोकतंत्र  .
The history  of the अंतरजाल began साथ the विकास of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कंप्यूटर  in the 1950s .
The public was first introduced to  the अवधारणाओं कि होता सीसे to the अंतरजाल जब a संदेश थी भेजा over the arpanet इससे कंप्यूटर विज्ञान प्राध्यापक लियोनार्ड kleinrock 's प्रयोगशाला  at University of California , Los Angeles ( UCLA ) , after the second piece of network equipment was installed at Stanford Research Institute ( SRI ) .
Packet switched networks such as ARPANET , Mark I  at npl in the uk , cyclades , मेरिट संजाल , tymnet , और telenet , यहूद विकसित in  the late 1960s and early 1970s using a variety of protocols .
The ARPANET in particular  led to the विकास of प्रोटोकॉल लिये internetworking , in जिससे अनेक पृथक संजाल could  be joined together into a network of networks .
In 1982 , the Internet protocol suite (  tcp/ip ) थी मानकीकृत , और नतीजतन , the अवधारणा of a world-wide संजाल  of interconnected TCP/IP networks , called the Internet , was introduced .
Access to the ARPANET was expanded in 1981 when the National Science Foundation ( NSF ) developed the Computer Science  संजाल ( csnet ) और again in 1986 जब nsfnet provided अभिगम to महासंगणक साइट in the संयुक्त राज्य इससे शोध और शिक्षा  organizations .
Commercial Internet  सेवा प्रदाताओं ( isps ) began to emerge in the लेट 1980s और  early 1990s .
The  arpanet थी decommissioned in 1990  .
The Internet was commercialized in 1995 when  nsfnet थी decommissioned , निकालना the पिछला प्रतिबंध on the उपयोग of the अंतरजाल to  carry commercial traffic .
Since the  mid-1990s , the अंतरजाल रै था a क्रांतिकारी प्रभाव on संस्कृति और कॉमर्स , सहित the वृद्धि of near-instant संचार by इलेक्ट्रॉनिक मेल , तत्काल messaging , आवाज़ over  Internet Protocol ( VoIP ) `` phone calls '' , two-way interactive video calls , and the World Wide Web with its discussion forums , blogs , social networking , and online shopping sites .
The research and education  जातियाँ continues to develop और उपयोग उन्नत संजाल ऐसे as nsf 's बहुत ऊँची गति  Backbone Network Service ( vBNS ) , Internet2 , and National LambdaRail .
Increasing amounts of data are transmitted at higher and  उच्चतर speeds over रेशा ऑप्टिक संजाल ऑपरेटिंग at 1-gbit/s  , 10-Gbit/s , or more .
The Internet 's takeover over the global  संचार लैंडस्केप थी लगभग तत्काल in ऐतिहासिक शर्तें : it तभी communicated 1 % of the सूचना बहती through two-way  telecommunications networks in the year 1993 , already 51 % by 2000 , and more than 97 % of the telecommunicated information by 2007 .
Today the Internet continues to grow , driven by ever greater  amounts of ऑनलाइन सूचना , कॉमर्स , entertainment , और सोशल नेटवर्किंग  .
Southwest Airlines Co.  ( ) is a प्रमुख u.S. एयरलाइन और the संसार 's largest low-cost  carrier , headquartered in Dallas , Texas .
It was established  in 1967 और अपनाया इसके वर्तमान नाम  in 1971 .
The airline has more than 46,000  कर्मचारी और operates अधिक than 3,400 फ़्लाइट  per day .
As of June 5 , 2011 , it carries  the सबसे घरेलू यात्री of कोई u.S. एयरलाइन  .
As of April 2013 ,  दक्षिणपश्चिम एयरलाइंस रै अनुसूचित सेवा to 84 गंतव्यों in 41 राज्य  and Puerto Rico .
Southwest Airlines has solely operated Boeing 737s  , मगर लिये a few सालो in the 1970s और 1980s , जब it संचालित बोइंग  727s .
As of August 2012  , दक्षिणपश्चिम is the largest ऑपरेटर of the 737 विश्वव्यापी साथ over 550 in  service , each operating an average of six flights per day .
In May 2011 , the airline acquired AirTran  एयरवेज़ , साथ संयोजन of the वाहक अपेक्षित to be पूरा by  2014 .
On March 1 , 2012 , the company  थी जारी a सिंगल ऑपरेटिंग प्रमाणपत्र , technically बनने  one airline .
Rolling  चट्टान is a 4.6 % abv पाले lager शुभारम्भ in 1939 by  the Latrobe Brewing Company .
Although founded as a local  बियर in पश्चिमी पेन्सिलवेनिया , it थी marketed aggressively और आखिरकार became a नेशनल उत्पाद  .
The brand was sold to Anheuser-Busch of St. Louis ,  मिसौरी , in मिड 2006 , जिससे transferred brewing परिचालन to नई  Jersey .
Benedict XVI ( , , ; born Joseph Aloisius Ratzinger on  16 अप्रैल 1927 ) is पोप emeritus of the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर  .
He  परोसा as पोप इससे 2005 to  2013 .
In that position , he was both the  नेता of the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर और sovereign of the वेटिकन  City State .
Benedict was elected on 19 April 2005  in a papal conclave , मनाये उसके papal उद्घाटन द्रव्यमान on 24 अप्रैल 2005 , और took कब्ज़ा  of his cathedral , the Archbasilica of St. John Lateran , on 7 May 2005 .
Ordained as a priest in 1951 in  उसके देशी बायर्न , ratzinger स्थापित खुद as a अत्यधिक regarded विश्वविद्यालयों  theologian by the late 1950s and was appointed a full professor in 1958 .
After a long career as an academic , serving as a professor of theology at several German universities—the last being the University of Regensburg , where he served as Vice President of the university in 1976 and 1977—he  थी नियुक्त archbishop of म्यूनिख और freising और कार्डिनल by पोप पॉल vi in 1977 , an असामान्य प्रमोशन लिये किसी साथ छोटी लुभावने अनुभव  .
In 1981 , he settled in Rome  जब he became prefect of the सभा लिये the doctrine of the आस्था , एक of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण  dicasteries of the Roman Curia .
From 2002  जबतक उसके चुनाव as पोप , he थी भी डीन of the कॉलेज  of Cardinals , and as such , the primus inter pares among the cardinals .
Prior to becoming pope , he  थी `` a प्रमुख फिगर on the वेटिकन स्टेज लिये a क्वार्टर of a सदी '' as `` एक of the सबसे आदरणीय , influential और विवादास्पद सदस्यों of the कॉलेज of कार्डिनल्स ''  ; he had an influence `` second to none when it came to setting church priorities and directions '' as one of Pope John Paul II 's closest confidants .
He was  originally a उदार theologian , लकिन अपनाया रूढ़िवादी  views after 1968 .
His prolific  कृतियाँ बचाव परंपरागत कैथोलिक  doctrine and values .
During his papacy , Benedict  xvi advocated a वापसी to आधारभूत ईसाई मान to काउंटर the increased secularisation of  many Western countries .
He views relativism 's denial of objective truth , and the denial of moral  सच्चाई in particular , as the सेंट्रल प्रॉब्लम of the 21st सदी  .
He  सिखाया the महत्व of दोनो the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर  and an understanding of God 's redemptive love .
Pope Benedict also  revived a क्रमांक of परंपराओं सहित elevating the tridentine द्रव्यमान  to a more prominent position .
He renewed  the संबंध between the कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर और आर्ट , देखने the उपयोग of सौंदर्य as a पाथ to the पवित्र ,  promoted the use of Latin , and reintroduced traditional papal garments , for which reason he was called `` the pope of aesthetics '' .
He has been described as `` the main intellectual force  in the गिरिजाघर '' चूंकि the mid-1980s  .
Several of Pope  बेनेडिक्ट 's विद्यार्थी इससे उसके अकादमिक करियर हैं भी prominent churchmen  today and confidantes of him , notably Christoph Schönborn .
On 11 February 2013 , Pope  बेनेडिक्ट घोषित उसके इस्तीफा in a वाक in लैटिन पहले the कार्डिनल्स , citing a `` कमी of शक्ति of दिमाग और देह  '' due to his advanced age .
His resignation  became प्रभावी on 28 फ़रवरी 2013 .
He is the first pope to resign since Pope Gregory XII in 1415 , and  the पहला to do so on उसके अपना पहल चूंकि पोप celestine v in 1294  .
As  पोप emeritus , बेनेडिक्ट retains the स्टाइल of उसके पवित्रता , और the शीर्षक of पोप , और होगा continue  to dress in the papal colour of white .
He was succeeded by Pope Francis on 13 March 2013 , and he moved into the  newly संवर मेटर ecclesiae मठ लिये उसके रिटायरमेंट on 2  May 2013..

Kaiser-Panorama  consisted of a multi-station देखने apparatus और सेट  of stereo slides .
patented by A. fuhrmann  around 1890 .
कम्पनी of महिलाओं watching stereoscopic छायाचित्र ,  painting by Jacob Spoel , before 1868 .
A very early  चित्रण of लोगों using a stereoscope  .
Stereoscopy ( also called stereoscopics or 3D imaging ) is a technique for  बनाना or बढ़ाना the भ्रम of गहराई in an चित्र by अर्थात् of stereopsis  for binocular vision .
The word stereoscopy derives from the Greek `` στερεός  '' ( stereos ) , `` कड़ , ठोस '' + `` σκοπέω '' ( skopeō ) , `` to dekh '' , `` to देखिए  '' .
Most stereoscopic methods present  दो ऑफसेट बिंब separately to the बाएँ और सही नजर of the  viewer .
These two-dimensional  बिंब हैं तब संयुक्त in the दिमाग to दे the बोध  of 3D depth .
This technique is distinguished from 3D displays that display an  चित्र in तीन पूरा आयाम , allowing the निरीक्षक to बढ़ाएँ सूचना परिचय the 3-dimensional वस्तुएँ  being displayed by head and eye movements .
John Adams ( October 30 , 1735 ( O.S . October 19 , 1735 ) – July 4 , 1826 ) was the  दूसरी अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य ( 1797–1801 ) , having पहले परोसा as the पहला वाइस अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य  .
An American Founding Father , he was  a statesman , राजनयिक , और a अग्रणी एडवोकेट of अमरीकी स्वतंत्रता  from Great Britain .
Well educated , he was an  आत्मज्ञान राजनैतिक theorist जो प्रचारित republicanism और लिखा prolifically परिचय उसके  often seminal ideas , both in published works and in letters to his wife and key adviser Abigail as well as to other Founding Fathers .
एडम्स आए to prominence in the जल्दी चरण  of the American Revolution .
A lawyer and  पब्लिक फिगर in बोस्टन , as a प्रतिनिधि इससे मैसाचुसेट्स to the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस , he निभाई a अग्रणी  role in persuading Congress to declare independence .
He assisted Thomas Jefferson in  drafting the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता in 1776 , और थी इसके प्राथमिक एडवोकेट in  the Congress .
Later , as a diplomat in Europe , he helped  negotiate the eventual सलाम सन्धि साथ ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , और थी जिम्मेदार  for obtaining vital governmental loans from Amsterdam bankers .
A political theorist and historian , Adams largely wrote the  मैसाचुसेट्स संविधान in 1780 , जिससे साथ साथ उसके पहले विचार on सरकारी , बहकावे अमरीकी  political thought .
One of his greatest roles was as a judge of character : in 1775 , he nominated George Washington  to be commander-in-chief , और 25 सालो बाद मनोनीत जॉन मार्शल to be मुख्य इंसाफ of the  United States .
Adams ' revolutionary  श्रेय secured उसे दो शर्तें as जार्ज वॉशिंगटन 's वाइस अध्यक्ष और उसके अपना चुनाव  in 1796 as the second president .
During his one term , he encountered ferocious attacks by the  jeffersonian republicans , as खूब as the प्रबल गुट in उसके अपना federalist पार्टी led by उसके कड़वा  enemy Alexander Hamilton .
Adams  हस्ताक्षरित the विवादास्पद एलियन और राजद्रोह अधिनियमों , और निर्मित up the फौज और नेवी विशेषकर in the फेस of  an undeclared naval war ( called the `` Quasi-War `` ) with France , 1798–1800 .
The major  accomplishment of उसके प्रेसिडेंसी थी उसके शांतिपूर्ण रेज़ोल्यूशन of the विरोध  in the face of Hamilton 's opposition .
In  1800 , एडम्स थी पराजित लिये re-election by थामस जेफरसन  and retired to Massachusetts .
He  बाद resumed उसके दोस्ती  with Jefferson .
He  और उसके बीवी , अबीगैल एडम्स , संस्थापित an संपन्नता परिवार लकीर of राजनेता , राजनयिकों , और  historians now referred to as the Adams political family .
एडम्स थी the पिता of जॉन क्विंसी एडम्स , the छठे  President of the United States .
His achievements have received greater  मान्यता in आधुनिक टाइम्स , हालांकि उसके योगदान यहूद  not initially as celebrated as those of other Founders .
एडम्स थी the पहला u.S. अध्यक्ष to reside  in the building that eventually became known as the White House .
The United States ten-dollar bill ( $  10 ) is a denomination of संयुक्त  States currency .
The first U.S. Secretary of the Treasury ( 1789–95 ) , Alexander Hamilton , is currently  प्रदर्शित on the obverse of the विधेयक , जबकि the u.S. राजकोष भवन is प्रदर्शित on the रिवर्स  .
( Hamilton is one  of दो non-presidents प्रदर्शित on फिलहाल जारी  U.S. bills .
The  अन्य is बेंजामिन फ्रैंकलिन , on the $ 100  bill .
Hamilton is one of only four people featured  on u.S. पेपर करेंसी ( 1861 to the उपस्थित ) जो थी नहीं born in the महाद्वीपीय संयुक्त  States , as he was from the West Indies .
The others are : Albert Gallatin , Switzerland ( $ 500 1862/63 Legal Tender ) ; George  meade , स्पेन ( $ 1,000 1890/91 राजकोष नोट ) ; और रॉबर्ट मॉरिस , इंग्लैण्ड ( $ 1,000 1862/63 विधिक टेंडर ; $ 10 1878/80  Silver Certificate ) .
In addition ,  kamehameha i , appears on the  2008 Hawaii state quarter . )
सब $ 10 बिल्स जारी आज हैं  Federal Reserve Notes .
The  ब्यूरो of नक्काशी और मुद्रण says the औसत जीवन of a  $ 10 bill in circulation is 18 months before it is replaced due to wear .
Approximately 6 % of all US  banknotes मुद्रित in 2009 यहूद  $ 10 bills .
Ten dollar bills are delivered by  संघीय आरक्षित बैंको in पीला straps  .
The source of the face on  the $ 10 विधेयक is जॉन trumbull ’s 1805 पोर्ट्रेट of हैमिल्टन कि belongs to the पोर्ट्रेट संग्रहण  of New York City Hall .
The $ 10 bill  is the तभी u.S. पेपर करेंसी in परिसंचरण in जिससे the पोर्ट्रेट चेहरों to the बाएँ ( the $ 100,000 विधेयक प्रदर्शित  a portrait of Woodrow Wilson facing to the left , but was used only for intra-government transactions ) .
A rider on a  यामाहा waverunner xl performing a high-speed  turn .
A jetboat is a boat propelled by a  जेट of जल ejected इससे the वापस of the शिल्प  .
Unlike a powerboat or motorboat that uses a propeller in the water below or behind the boat ,  a jetboat draws the जल इससे अंतर्गत the नाव into a पंप अंदर the नाव , तब expels it through a nozzle at the stern  .
Jetboats were originally designed by Sir William Hamilton ( who developed  a waterjet in 1954 ) लिये आपरेशन in the fast-flowing और उथले नदियाँ of नई जीलैंड , specifically to overcome the प्रॉब्लम of  propellers striking rocks in such waters .
Previous attempts at waterjet propulsion had very short  lifetimes , generally due to the अकुशल डिज़ाइन of the इकाई और the फैक्ट कि वे offered few लाभ  over conventional propellers .
Unlike  ये पिछला waterjet developments , ऐसे as campini 's और the hanley hydrojet , हैमिल्टन था a विशिष्ट need लिये a नोदन प्रणाली to operate  in very-shallow water , and the waterjet proved to be the ideal solution .
From this ,  the लोकप्रियता of the जेट ईकाई और  jetboat increased rapidly .
Through further developments , it was found the waterjet offered  अनेक अन्य लाभ over propellers लिये a चौड़ी दायरा of पोत प्रकार , और as ऐसे , waterjets हैं प्रयुक्त widely आज लिये अनेक high-speed बरतन , सहित यात्री ferries  , rescue craft , patrol boats and offshore supply vessels .
Jetboats are highly maneuverable , and many can , from  पूरा गति , be reversed और brought to a रोकें भीतर छोटी अधिक than उनके अपना लंबाई , in  a maneuver known as a `` crash stop '' .
The well known Hamilton turn or `` jet spin '' is a high-speed  maneuvre जहाँ the नाव 's इंजन throttle is काटें , the परिचालन is turned sharply और the throttle खोली again , causing the नाव to स्पिन जल्दी around साथ  a large spray of water .
There  is no अभियान्त्रिकी सीमा to the आकार of jetboats , हालांकि  the validity of their use depends a lot on the type of application .
Classic prop-drives are generally more efficient and economical at low speeds , up to about , but as boat speed increases beyond this , the  अतिरिक्त हल प्रतिरोध उत्पन्न by struts , rudders , shafts ( इत्यादि . ) अर्थात् waterjets हैं अधिक कुशल in the 20-50 गांठ  range ( up to ) .
भी , in परिस्थितियों साथ बहुत विशाल propellers turning at slow speeds ( ऐसे as  tug boats ) , the equivalent size waterjet would be too big to be practical .
For these  कारण , the विशाल बहुमत of waterjet इकाई हैं संस्थापित in high-speed बरतन और in particular परिस्थितियों  where shallow draught , maneuverability , and load flexibility are main concerns .
The  biggest jet-driven बरतन हैं मिला in सैन्य उपयोग or the  high-speed passenger/car ferry industry .
South Africa 's s (  लगभग long ) हैं the biggest jet-propelled  vessels so far .
Even these  german-built बरतन हैं सक्षम of performing ``  crash stops '' .
Uveitis  is broadly पारिभाषित as सूजन  of the uvea .
The  uvea consists of the मध्य , pigmented , vascular structures of the नजर और शामिल  the iris , ciliary body , and choroid .
Uveitis requires  an तात्कालिक referral और thorough परिक्षा by an ophthalmologist or optometrist  along with urgent treatment to control the inflammation .

Murphy  is a fictional अक्षर on the comedy-drama टेलीविज़न  series Entourage .
He is  निभाई by केविन connolly  .
The Shining is a 1980 psychological horror film produced and  निर्देशित by स्टेनली kubrick , co-written साथ उपन्यासकार डायने जॉनसन , और अभिनीत जोकर निकोल्सन , शेली  Duvall , Scatman Crothers , and Danny Lloyd .
The film is based  on the स्टीफन किंग अनोखा the  Shining .
A writer , Jack Torrance , takes a job as an  off-season कार्यवाहक at an पृथक  hotel .
His young son possesses psychic abilities and is able to see  बाते इससे the पास्ट और भविष्य , ऐसे as the भूत जो inhabit  the hotel .
Soon after settling in , the  परिवार is फंस in the होटल by a snowstorm , और जोकर धीरे becomes बहकावे by a अलौकिक उपस्थिति ; he उतरता into  madness and attempts to murder his wife and son .
Unlike previous Kubrick films , which developed an audience  धीरे by भवन on word-of-mouth , the जगमगाता थी released as a mass-market फिल्मी , खोलने at पहला in बस दो शहरों on मेमोरियल दिन , तब देशभर  a month later .
Although initial response to the film was mixed , later critical assessment  थी अधिक अनुकूल और it is अभी viewed  as a classic of the horror genre .
Film director Martin Scorsese ,  लिखने in the रोज़ जानवर , क्रमित it as एक of the 11 scariest हॉरर फिल्मों  of all time .
Film critics , film students , and Kubrick  's निर्माता , जन harlan , have remarked on the विशाल influence the फिल्मी रै था on लोकप्रिय  culture .
The initial European  रिलीज of the जगमगाता थी 25 मिनट्स shorter than the अमरीकी संस्करण , हासिल by निकालना  most of the scenes taking place outside the environs of the hotel .
Patio  कोला बोतल
आँगन आहार कोला थी a ब्रांड of आहार सोडा  introduced by Pepsi in 1963 .
It was created in  जवाब to आहार रीति कोला , जिससे थी the पहला  diet cola on the market .
Fitness promoter  डिब्बी ड्रेक थी आँगन आहार कोला 's प्रवक्ता  .
In 1964 , Patio released  नारंगी , अंगूर , और रूट बियर जायका  .
This flavor line was not  meant to compete साथ ब्रांड्स जैसे नारंगी crush , लकिन बल्कि भरण  out the line .
Patio sodas  यहूद उपलब्धियाँ in the cold-bottle  market : grocery and mom-and-pop stores .
Advertising for Patio was  comparatively scarce ; at the समय , bottlers यहूद regionally franchised , और सम्बन्धित विज्ञापन  was necessarily local .
In  1964 , आँगन आहार कोला  became Diet Pepsi .
The newly branded  आहार सोडा थी advertised alongside पेप्सी साथ the टैगलाइन `` पेप्सी either रास्ता  '' , which replaced the slogan `` Dances with flavor '' .
The  छोटी जीवन स्पैन of आँगन आहार कोला makes  it a great addition for bottle collectors .
Most of the remaining  आँगन लकीर of जायका यहूद phased आउट by the जल्दी 1970s , जबकि a few बच  until the mid 70s
अवसंरचना is मौलिक शारीरिक और organizational structures needed लिये the आपरेशन of a समाज  or enterprise , or the services and facilities necessary for an economy to function .
It can be generally defined as the set of interconnected structural  तत्व कि provide फ्रेमवर्क supporting an संपूर्ण ढांचा of विकास  .
It is an important term for  judging a देश or प्रदेश 's विकास  .
The term typically refers to the technical  structures कि support a समाज , ऐसे as सड़कें , पुलों , जल सप्लाई , sewers , विद्युत ग्रिड , दूरसंचार , और so forth , और can be पारिभाषित as `` the शारीरिक components of interrelated प्रणालियों providing commodities और सेवाएं अनिवार्य to  enable , sustain , or enhance societal living conditions . ''
Viewed functionally , infrastructure facilitates the production of goods and  सेवाएं , और भी the वितरण of समाप्त उत्पाद to बाज़ार , as खूब as मौलिक सोशल सेवाएं ऐसे as स्कूलों  and hospitals ; for example , roads enable the transport of raw materials to a factory .
In military parlance ,  the पद refers to the इमारतें और स्थाई संस्थापना  necessary for the support , redeployment , and operation of military forces .
To make it simple ,  अवसंरचना is anything कि is needed रोज  , an everyday item .
A  आलेखीय प्रतिनिधित्व of  the ideal human karyotype
mitochondrial  DNA .
Human genetic variation  is the जेनेटिक मतभेद दोनो भीतर और among  populations .
There may be  अनेक विसंगतियाँ of कोई दिए जीन in the इंसान जनसांख्यिकी  ( genes ) , leading to polymorphism .
Many genes are not polymorphic , meaning  कि तभी a सिंगल allele is उपस्थित in the जनसांख्यिकी : the जीन  is then said to be fixed .
No two  इंसानो हैं genetically  identical .
Even monozygotic twins , who develop from one zygote , have infrequent  जेनेटिक मतभेद due to mutations occurring दौरान विकास और जीन नक़ल क्रमांक विभिन्नता  .
मतभेद between individuals , भी closely सम्बन्धित individuals , हैं the कुंजी  to techniques such as genetic fingerprinting .
Alleles occur at different  बारंबारता in अलग इंसान populations , साथ populations कि हैं अधिक geographically और ancestrally रिमोट tending  to differ more .
कल्याणकारी of मतभेद between individuals शामिल the एक्सचेंज of जीनों दौरान  meiosis and various mutational events .
वहीँ हैं at तनिक दो कारण क्यों जेनेटिक विभिन्नता  exists between populations .
Natural selection may confer an  अनुकूली लाभ to individuals in a विशिष्ट पर्यावरण  if an allele provides a competitive advantage .
alleles अंतर्गत चयन हैं संभावित to occur तभी in those भौगोलिक  regions where they confer an advantage .
The second  प्रमुख कारण of जेनेटिक विभिन्नता is due to the ऊँची  degree of neutrality of most mutations .
Most mutations do not appear to  have कोई चयनात्मक प्रभाव एक रास्ता or the अन्य on the सजीव  .
The main cause is genetic drift , this  is the प्रभाव of यादृच्छिक परिवर्तन in the जीन  pool .
In humans , founder  प्रभाव और पास्ट छोटी जनसांख्यिकी आकार ( increasing the likelihood  of genetic drift ) may have had an important influence in neutral differences between populations .
The theory that humans  recently migrated आउट of अफ़्रीकी supports  this .
The study of human  जेनेटिक विभिन्नता रै दोनो विकासवादी significance  and medical applications .
it can सहायता वैज्ञानिकों समझे प्राचीन इंसान जनसांख्यिकी migrations as खूब as कैसा  different human groups are biologically related to one another .
For  आयुर्विज्ञान , पढ़ाई of इंसान जेनेटिक विभिन्नता may be महत्वपूर्ण क्युकी  some disease-causing alleles occur more often in people from specific geographic regions .
New  निष्कर्षों दिखाएँ कि प्रत्येक इंसान रै on औसत  60 new mutations compared to their parents .
Apart from  mutations , अनेक जीनों कि may have aided इंसानो in प्राचीन  times plague humans today .
For example , it is suspected that  जीनों कि allow इंसानो to अधिक efficiently प्रक्रम खाना हैं those कि मेक लोगों susceptible to मोटापा  and diabetes today .
Tea  पार्टी प्रदर्शनकारियों on the वेस्ट लॉन of the u.S. कैपिटल और the नेशनल मॉल at the करदाताओं कूच  on Washington on September 12 , 2009 .
The Tea  पार्टी गति is an अमरीकी राजनैतिक गति कि अधिवक्ताओं सख्त adherence to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान , reducing u.S. सरकारी  spending and taxes , and reduction of the U.S. national debt and federal budget deficit .
The movement has been called partly conservative ,  partly libertarian , और partly populist  .
The  गति रै प्रायोजित विरोध और समर्थित राजनैतिक उम्मीदवार  since 2009 .
The name of the movement is  निकला इससे the बोस्टन चाय पार्टी of 1773 , an iconic  event in American history .
Anti-tax protesters in the  संयुक्त राज्य have प्रायः referred to the असली बोस्टन चाय पार्टी  for inspiration .
References to the Boston Tea  पार्टी यहूद भाग of कर दिन विरोध आयोजित  throughout the 1990s and earlier .
By 2001 , a custom had developed among  कुछ रूढ़िवादी कार्यकर्ताओं of mailing चाय बैग to विधायक और अन्य officials as a सांकेतिक अधिनियम  .
The currencies  of प्यूर्टो रीको closely follow the ऐतिहासिक विकास of प्यूर्टो  Rico .
As a  उपनिवेश of स्पेन और the संयुक्त राज्य , प्यूर्टो  Rico was granted the use of both foreign and provincial currencies .
Following the Spanish  colonization in 1502 , प्यूर्टो रीको became an महत्वपूर्ण बंदरगाहों , साथ इसके अपना सप्लाई  of gold .
however , as the खनिज reserves भागा खाली भीतर  the century , the archipelago 's economy suffered .
The Spanish Crown issued the Situado Mexicano , which meant that a semi-regular shipment  of सुनहरा इससे the viceroyalty of नई स्पेन होता be भेजा to the द्वीप , as a रास्ता  to provide economic support .
Between 1636 and 1637 , Philip IV  of स्पेन imposed a कर जिससे था to be सशुल्क using a आय  stamp .
Inspired by this , Puerto Rico began producing banknotes in 1766 , becoming the first colony to print  8- रियल banknotes in the स्पेनी साम्राज्य और जिससे in the स्पेनी सरकारी 's स्वीकृति of subsequent  issues .
The situado was discontinued  दौरान the 19th सदी , बनाना an आर्थिक संकट , as a परिणाम  of Mexico gaining its independence from Spain .
Salvador Meléndez Bruna ,  the औपनिवेशिक राज्यपाल in दफ्तर , ordered the समस्या of प्रांतीय banknotes , बनाना  the Puerto Rican peso .
However , printing of  ये banknotes ceased बाद 1815  .
During the following  दशकों , विदेशी सिक्के became  the widespread currency .
In  the 1860s और 1870s , banknotes  reemerged .
On February 1 , 1890  , the banco español de प्यूर्टो रीको थी उदघाटन और  began issuing banknotes .
The bank designed four  श्रेणी और लगाई तीन in परिसंचरण अंतर्गत स्पेनी  rule .
In 1895  , a royal डिक्री ordered the उत्पादन  of provincial peso coins .
On August 13 , 1898 , the Spanish-American  युद्ध ended साथ स्पेन ceding प्यूर्टो रीको to the संयुक्त राज्य  .
The Banco Español de Puerto Rico was renamed Bank of Porto Rico  और जारी बिल्स समतुल्य to the संयुक्त राज्य डालर , बनाना the  Puerto Rican dollar .
In  1902 , the पहला नेशनल बैंको of पोर्टो रीको जारी banknotes in a  parallel manner .
दो अधिक श्रेणी यहूद जारी जबतक  1913 .
After Puerto Rico 's economy and monetary system was fully integrated into the United States '  आर्थिक और मौद्रिक प्रणाली , the प्यूर्टो rican डॉलर यहूद redeemed लिये those जारी by the संयुक्त राज्य राजकोष  .
The peso and dollar have been followed by other contemporary  मुद्दे , सहित commemorative banknotes , निजी करेंसी , और a क्वार्टर सिक्का designed साथ  Fort San Felipe del Morro in the face .
Pepsi ( stylized in lowercase as  पेप्सी , formerly stylized in अपरकेस as पेप्सी ) is a कार्बोनेटेड नरम पेय कि  is produced and manufactured by PepsiCo .
Created and developed in 1893 and introduced as  ब्रैड 's पेय , it थी renamed as pepsi-cola on अगस्त 28 , 1898 , तब to पेप्सी in 1961 .
The Book of Ezekiel is the third  of the latter नबियों in the यहूदी बाइबल , following the किताबे  of Isaiah and Jeremiah and preceding the Book of the Twelve .
(  the अनुक्रम is somewhat अलग in the ईसाई  Old Testament ) .
It derives its  नाम इससे , और रिकॉर्ड the  visions of , the 6th century BC priest and prophet Ezekiel .
According to the book , the prophet , exiled in Babylon , experienced a series of  सात visions दौरान the 22 सालो इससे 593 to 571 bc , a काल जिससे spans the फाइनल विनाश of जेरूसलम  in 586 .
The  visions , और the किताब , हैं संरचित around तीन विषयवस्तु : ( 1 ) निर्णय on इसराईल ( अध्याय 1-24 ) ; ( 2 ) निर्णय on the राष्ट्र  ( chapters 25-32 ) ; and future blessings for Israel ( chapters 33-48 ) .
New Orleans ( or , locally or ; ) is a major  संयुक्त राज्य बंदरगाहों और the largest नगर और महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the राज्य  of Louisiana .
The  जनसांख्यिकी of the नगर थी 343,829  as of the 2010 U.S. Census .
The New  ऑरलियन्स महानगर क्षेत्रफल ( नई orleans–metairie–kenner महानगर सांख्यिकीय  Area ) had a population of 1,167,764 in 2010 and was the 46th largest in the United States .
The New  orleans–metairie–bogalusa संयुक्त सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल , a larger व्यापार  area , had a 2010 population of 1,214,932 .
The city is named after Orléans  , a नगर स्तिथ on the loire नदी in केन्द्र , फ़्रांस , और is खूब ज्ञात लिये इसके पृथक फ्रेंच क्रियोल वास्तुकला , as  well as its cross-cultural and multilingual heritage .
New Orleans is also famous for its cuisine , music ( particularly as  the जन्मस्थान of जैज़ ) , और इसके सालाना जश्न और त्यौहार , सबसे notably  Mardi Gras .
The city is often  referred to as the `` सबसे अद्वितीय '' in अमेरिका  .
New Orleans is located in  southeastern louisiana , straddling the मिसिसिपी  River .
The  नगर और ऑरलियन्स मोहल्ला (  ) are .
The city and parish are bounded by the parishes of St. Tammany to  the उत्तर , st. बर्नार्ड to the ईस्ट , plaquemines to the दक्षिण और जेफरसन to the दक्षिण और वेस्ट  .
Lake Pontchartrain ,  भाग of जिससे is शामिल in the नगर हद , झूठ to the उत्तर और झील borgne झूठ to  the east .
The National Birth Control  लीग थी a जनम कंट्रोल संगठन in  the United States .
It was founded  in कूच 1915 by मरियम dennett , क्लारा  Gruening Stillman and Jessie Ashley .
Its main  purpose थी to overturn the कानून जिससे बैन contraceptives  from the U.S. mails .
Campaigns were  आरोहित in नई यॉर्क , लकिन in 1919 the लीग थी disbanded और reformed  into the Voluntary Parenthood League .
Cancer , known medically as a  malignant फुलाव , is a व्यापक समूह of विभिन्न रोगों , सब involving unregulated  cell growth .
In cancer ,  कोशिकाएं divide और grow uncontrollably , forming malignant tumors  , and invade nearby parts of the body .
The cancer may also  स्प्रेड to अधिक दूर भाग of the देह through the lymphatic  system or bloodstream .
Not all  tumors हैं cancerous  .
Benign tumors do not grow uncontrollably , do not  invade neighboring ऊतकों , और do नहीं स्प्रेड throughout the देह  .
There are over 200  अलग ज्ञात cancers कि पहुँचकर  humans .
Determining  कया कल्याणकारी कर्कट is जटिल  .
Many things are known  to बढ़ाएँ the रिस्क of कर्कट , सहित तम्बाकू उपयोग , निश्चित infections , विकिरण , कमी of शारीरिक कार्यकलाप  , obesity , and environmental pollutants .
ये can सीधे क्षति जीनों or combine साथ मौजूदा  genetic faults within cells to cause the disease .
Approximately  पाँच to टेन प्रतिशत of cancers हैं entirely  hereditary .
कर्कट can be detected in a क्रमांक of तरीके , सहित the उपस्थिति of  certain signs and symptoms , screening tests , or medical imaging .
एकबार a संभावित कर्कट is detected it is diagnosed  by microscopic examination of a tissue sample .
Cancer is usually treated with  कीमोथेरेपी , विकिरण चिकित्सा और सर्जरी  .
The chances of surviving the disease vary greatly by the type and  स्थान of the कर्कट और the extent of बीमारी at the  start of treatment .
While cancer can affect people of  सब आयु , और a few प्रकार of कर्कट हैं अधिक आम in children , the रिस्क of विकासशील  cancer generally increases with age .
In 2007 , cancer  caused परिचय 13 % of सब इंसान मौतों  worldwide ( 7.9 million ) .
Rates are rising as more people  सजीव to an बूढ़ा आयु और as द्रव्यमान जीवनशैली परिवर्तन occur in the  developing world .
Spring ski touring  on hardangervidda , नार्वे
Skiing is a recreational activity and competitive sport in which the  भागीदार attaches long धावक or skis to बूट or जूते on the फीट और उपयोग उन्हें to सफर  on top of snow .
Aside from  मनोरंजन और प्रतियोगिता , स्कीइंग रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये सैन्य उद्देश्य और भी  travelling in areas that experience heavy snowfall .
Many types of competitive  स्कीइंग कार्यक्रम हैं पहचाना by the अंतरराष्ट्रीय ओलम्पिक कमेटी , और the अंतरराष्ट्रीय  Ski Federation .
John  मेनार्ड keynes , 1st सामन्त keynes , cb , fba ( ; 5 जून 1883 – 21 अप्रैल 1946 ) थी a अंग्रेजों अर्थशास्त्री जिनकी विचार have fundamentally प्रभावित the सिद्धान्त और अभ्यास of  modern macroeconomics , and informed the economic policies of governments .
he निर्मित on और greatly परिष्कृत पहले कार्य on the कल्याणकारी of कारोबार चक्र , और is widely माना to be एक of the संस्थापकों of आधुनिक macroeconomics  and the most influential economist of the 20th century .
His ideas are the basis  लिये the स्कूल of विचार ज्ञात as keynesian अर्थशास्त्र , as  well as its various offshoots .
In many ways , subsequent developments in 20th century  अर्थशास्त्र can be viewed as either भवन on keynes ' विचार  or reacting against them .
In the 1930s , Keynes  पथप्रदर्शन a क्रान्ति in आर्थिक सोच , overturning the पुरानी विचार of neoclassical अर्थशास्त्र कि आयोजित कि फ़्री बाज़ार होता  , in the short to medium term , automatically provide full employment , as long as workers were flexible in their wage demands .
Keynes instead argued that aggregate demand determined the overall level of  आर्थिक कार्यकलाप , और कि अपर्याप्त कुल माँग could सीसे to prolonged अवधि of ऊँची  unemployment .
He advocated the  उपयोग of फिस्कल और मौद्रिक उपायों to mitigate the प्रतिकूल  effects of economic recessions and depressions .
Following the outbreak of the Second World  युद्ध , keynes 's विचार concerning आर्थिक नीति यहूद  adopted by leading Western economies .
In 1942 ,  keynes थी awarded a खानदानी peerage as सामन्त keynes of tilton  in the County of Sussex .
Keynes died in 1946 ,  लकिन दौरान the 1950s और 1960s the कामयाबी of keynesian अर्थशास्त्र  resulted in almost all capitalist governments adopting its policy recommendations .
Keynes 's influence waned in the 1970s , partly as a result of problems that began  to पहुँचकर the anglo-american economies इससे the प्रारंभ of the दशक , और partly क्युकी of critiques इससे मिल्टन फ्राइडमैन और अन्य अर्थशास्त्रियों जो यहूद pessimistic परिचय the क्षमता of सरकारें to विनियमित the  business cycle with fiscal policy .
However ,  the आगमन of the वैश्विक वित्तीय संकट in 2007  caused a resurgence in Keynesian thought .
Keynesian economics  provided the सैद्धांतिक underpinning लिये आर्थिक नीतियों undertaken in जवाब to the संकट by राष्ट्रपतियों जार्ज W. बुश और बराक ओबामा of the संयुक्त राज्य , प्रधान मंत्री गॉर्डन भूरा of the संयुक्त किंगडम  , and other heads of governments .
In  1999 , समय पत्रिका शामिल keynes in उनके सूची of the 100 सबसे महत्वपूर्ण और influential लोगों of the  20th century , commenting that : `` His radical idea that governments should spend money they do n't have may have saved capitalism . ''
In addition to being an economist , Keynes was also a civil servant , a director of the British Eugenics Society , a  निदेशक of the बैंको of इंग्लैण्ड , a संरक्षक of the कला और an आर्ट कलेक्टर , a भाग of the bloomsbury समूह of intellectuals , an सलाहकार to अनेक charitable trusts , a लेखक , a पारस ,  a private investor , and a farmer .
This 1768 parchment ( 612×502 mm ) by  jekuthiel sofer emulated the 1675 टेन आयतें at the एम्सटर्डम  Esnoga synagogue .
The Ten Commandments , also known as the Decalogue , are a set of biblical laws relating to  आचार और इबादत , जिससे खेल a आधारभूत भूमिका in judaism , islam और christianity  .
They include instructions  to इबादत तभी परमेश्वर , to रखना the sabbath पावन और prohibitions विरूद्ध idolatry  , blasphemy , murder , theft , deception and adultery .
Different groups  follow थोड़ा अलग परंपराओं लिये interpreting  and numbering them .
the टेन आयतें appear twice in the यहूदी बाइबल  , in the books of Exodus and Deuteronomy .
According to the story in Exodus , God inscribed them on  दो स्टोन टैबलेट , जिससे he दिया to मूसा on माउंट sinai  .
आधुनिक स्कॉलरशिप रै मिला संभावित प्रभाव in hittite और mesopotamian कानून और treaties , लकिन  is divided over exactly when the Ten Commandments were written and who wrote them .
The discography of the English alternative rock band The Smiths consists of four studio  एल्बम , एक विस्तारित खेल ( ep ) , एक सजीव एल्बम , टेन संकलन एल्बम , बीस singles , एक वीडियो एल्बम और चौदह म्यूज़िक वीडियो on the अशिष्ट व्यापार , sire और wea  record labels .
The band was formed in 1982 in Manchester by vocalist Morrissey , guitarist  जॉनी marr , बास खिलाड़ी एंडी rourke और वादक  Mike Joyce .
Despite being  championed by बीबीसी रेडियो 1 डिस्क jockey जॉन छिलके , the बैंड 's डेब्यू सिंगल , `` हाथ in दस्ताने  `` ( May 1983 ) , failed to chart .
Its follow-up , `` This Charming Man `` ( October 1983 )  , मिले साथ नाजुक acclaim और पहुँचे क्रमांक twenty-five on the uk singles  Chart .
The Smiths ' cult status was followed by mainstream success in 1984 , as  वे पहुँचे क्रमांक बारह in the uk साथ the `` कया अंतर करता it मेक ? `` सिंगल और पहुँचे क्रमांक दो on the uk एल्बम चार्ट साथ उनके डेब्यू  album , The Smiths ( 1984 ) .
उनके अगला तीन singles सब पहुँचे the शीर्ष बीस of the चार्ट in the uk ,  helping to consolidate their previous chart success .
The next  स्टुडियो एल्बम , मांस is हत्या ( 1985 ) , पहुँचे the शीर्ष of the अंग्रेजों चार्ट ; however , the तभी सिंगल to be released इससे the एल्बम , `` कि चुटकुला is n't मजेदार  Anymore `` ( 1985 ) , failed to break the UK Top 40 .
Returning to form , The Smiths ' next six singles  सब पहुँचे the उच्चतर than क्रमांक तीस in the uk और उनके तीसरा एल्बम , the  Queen Is Dead ( 1986 ) , reached number two in the UK .
Despite the band 's  चार्ट कामयाबी , marr बाएँ the समूह in अगस्त 1987 due  to a strained relationship with Morrissey .
Failing to find a replacement , The Smiths disbanded by the  समय उनके फाइनल स्टुडियो एल्बम , strangeways , यहाँ we आइये , थी released  in September that year .
Strangeways , Here We Come reached number two in the UK  और became the बैंड 's highest-charting रिलीज in the संयुक्त राज्य जब  it reached number fifty-five on the Billboard 200 .
in जल्दी 1992 , wea acquired the संपूर्ण वापस कैटलॉग of the smiths और उत्पादित दो compilations – बेहतरीन ...  I and ... Best II – the first of which reached the top of the UK Albums Chart .
WEA  released दो further singles compilations in 1995 और 2001 , साथ a further संकलन  , The Sound of The Smiths , released in November 2008 .
Gone  साथ the हवा is a अनोखा लिखा by मार्गरेट मिशेल  , first published in 1936 .
It is often placed in the literary sub-genre of the  ऐतिहासिक रोमांस अनोखा .
However , it has been argued the novel is a `` near miss  '' और करता नहीं contain सब of the तत्व of the रोमांस विधा , बनाना it बस a ऐतिहासिक  novel .
The story is set in  क्लेटन काउंटी , जॉर्जिया , और अटलांटा दौरान the अमरीकी सिविल  War and Reconstruction .
It depicts the experiences of  स्कारलेट o'hara , the बिगड़े बेटी of a well-to-do वृक्षारोपण मालिक , जो जरूर उपयोग प्रत्येक अर्थात् at उसके  disposal to come out of the poverty she finds herself in after Sherman 's `` March to the Sea '' .
Margaret Mitchell began writing  गए साथ the हवा in 1926 to pass the समय जबकि recovering इससे an auto-crash  injury that refused to heal .
In  अप्रैल 1935 , हेरोल्ड लैथम of macmillan , an एडिटर जो  was looking for new fiction , read what she had written and saw that it could be a best-seller .
After Latham agreed to publish the book , Mitchell  worked लिये another छह महीने checking the ऐतिहासिक सन्दर्भ , और rewrote the खोलने  chapter several times .
मिशेल और उसके husband जॉन दलदल , a  copy editor by trade , edited the final version of the novel .
मिशेल लिखा the किताब 's फाइनल पल पहला , और तब  wrote the events that led up to it .
As to what became of  उसके प्रेमियों , रहेट और स्कारलेट , बाद the अनोखा ended , मिशेल किया नहीं जान , और कहा , `` लिये  all I know , Rhett may have found someone else who was less difficult . ''
Mitchell received the Pulitzer  पुरस्कार लिये fiction लिये the किताब in 1937  .
The book was adapted  into a 1939 अमरीकी फिल्मी .
Gone with the Wind  is the तभी अनोखा by मिशेल प्रकाशित दौरान  her lifetime .
Endodontics  ( इससे the यूनानी endo `` अंदर '' ; और odons `` दाँत '' ) is एक of the दंत specialties पहचाना by the अमरीकी दंत संघ , royal  College of Dentists of Canada , and Royal Australasian College of Dental Surgeons , and deals with the tooth pulp and the tissues surrounding the root of a tooth .
Endodontists perform a variety of procedures  सहित endodontic चिकित्सा ( commonly ज्ञात as `` रूट कनाल चिकित्सा '' ) , endodontic retreatment  , surgery , treating cracked teeth , and treating dental trauma .
Root canal  चिकित्सा is एक of the सबसे आम  procedures .
If the pulp ( containing nerves , arterioles ,  venules , lymphatic ऊतक , और तंतुमय ऊतक ) becomes diseased or घायल , endodontic  treatment is required to save the tooth .
Serial Attached  scsi ( sas ) is a point-to-point सीरियल प्रोटोकॉल कि चालें आंकड़ा to और इससे कंप्यूटर भंडार डिवाइस  such as hard drives and tape drives .
SAS replaces the  पुरानी समानांतर scsi ( सुनाया ``  scuzzy '' ) bus technology that first appeared in the mid-1980s .
SAS  , जैसे इसके पूर्ववर्ती , उपयोग the मानक  SCSI command set .
SAS offers  पिछड़ा संगतता साथ second-generation  SATA drives .
SATA 3 Gbit/s drives may be  कनेक्ट to sas backplanes , लकिन sas ड्राइव can नहीं कनेक्ट  to SATA backplanes .
The T10  तकनीकी कमेटी of the अंतरराष्ट्रीय कमेटी लिये सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी मानकों ( incits ) develops और  maintains the SAS protocol ; the SCSI Trade Association ( SCSITA ) promotes the technology .
भाग of the संवैधानिक प्रावधान as it appeared  in 1787
Status as a natural-born citizen of the United States is one of the eligibility requirements established in the  संयुक्त राज्य संविधान लिये चुनाव  to the office of President or Vice President .
This requirement was  intended to protect the स्वदेश इससे विदेशी influence  .
The  संविधान करता नहीं define the phrase natural-born  citizen , and various opinions have been offered over time regarding its precise meaning .
A 2011  congressional शोध सेवा रपट stated
The natural-born-citizen clause has been mentioned in passing in several decisions of the United States Supreme Court and lower courts dealing with the question of eligibility for citizenship by birth  , लकिन the परम् अदालत रै never सीधे addressed the सवाल of a विशिष्ट अध्यक्षीय or vice-presidential प्रत्याशी 's पात्रता as a natural-born नागरिक  .
Kurtis Eugene `` Kurt '' Warner ( born June  22 , 1971 ) is a पूर्व अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल  player .
He  निभाई क्वार्टरबैक लिये तीन नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग ( एनएफएल ) टीमों : the st. लुई  Rams , the New York Giants , and the Arizona Cardinals .
He was originally signed  by the ग्रीन खाड़ी पैकर्स as an undrafted फ़्री एजेंट in 1994 बाद playing कॉलेज  football at Northern Iowa .
Warner would go on to be considered the  बेहतरीन undrafted खिलाड़ी of सब समय , following a 12-year करियर regarded as एक of the महानतम कहानियां in एनएफएल इतिहास  .
Warner first attained stardom while playing for the St.  लुई मेढ़ों इससे 1998 to 2003 , जहाँ he जीती दो एनएफएल mvp पुरस्कार in 1999 और 2001 as खूब  as the Super Bowl MVP award in Super Bowl XXXIV .
He led the 2008 Arizona Cardinals to Super  कटोरी xliii ( the मताधिकार 's पहला सुपर कटोरी berth ) , और owns the तीन उच्चतम single-game  passing yardage totals in Super Bowl history .
Warner currently holds the seventh-highest career  passer दरजा of all-time ( 93.7 ) , और the third-highest करियर पूर्णता  percentage in NFL history with 65.5 % .
In 13 career playoff  खेल , warner बाँधने पहला all-time in पूर्णता प्रतिशत ( 66.5 % ) , गज प्रति attempt ( 8.55 ) , और दूसरी  in passer rating ( 102.8 ) .
He also  holds the उच्चतम पूर्णता प्रतिशत लिये a सिंगल खेल दौरान the नियमित ऋतु , at 92.3 प्रतिशत  ( 24/26 ) , on September 20 , 2009 , against the Jacksonville Jaguars .
He announced  उसके रिटायरमेंट on जनवरी 29 , 2010. < संदर्भ name='cnn  2010-01-29 ' >
Janet Kay Ruthven Hagan ( ; born  may 26 , 1953 ) is the जूनियर संयुक्त राज्य सीनेटर इससे उत्तर कैरोलिना , in दफ्तर  since January 2009 .
Previously she served in  the उत्तर कैरोलिना सीनेट इससे 1999 to  2009 .
She is a member of the  लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी और is viewed as a मॉडरेट सदस्य  of her party .
When Hagan defeated Republican incumbent Elizabeth Dole in the 2008 United  राज्य सीनेट चुनाव , वो became the पहला स्त्री to शिकस्त an लाज़िम स्त्री in a सीनेट  election .
The Heisman Memorial Trophy Award ( usually known colloquially as the Heisman Trophy or the Heisman ) , is awarded annually to the  खिलाड़ी deemed the सबसे बकाया खिलाड़ी in कॉलेजिएट  football .
It was  निर्मित in 1935 as the शहर एथलेटिक क्लबों ट्रॉफी और renamed in 1936 following the मौत of the क्लबों 's एथलेटिक निदेशक , जॉन heisman ( पूर्व भूरा विश्वविद्यालयों और विश्वविद्यालयों  of Pennsylvania player ; head football coach at Oberlin College , Auburn University , Clemson University , Rice University , and the University of Pennsylvania ; and football , basketball , and baseball head coach and athletic director at Georgia Tech ) .
The award is presented by the  heisman ट्रॉफी विश्वास in जल्दी दिसम्बर पहले the postseason  bowl games .
It is the oldest of several overall awards in college football , including  the मैक्सवेल पुरस्कार , वाल्टर शिविर पुरस्कार , और the ap खिलाड़ी of the साल .
The Heisman and the AP Player of the Year are the only awards to honor the most outstanding player , while the Maxwell  पुरस्कार और वाल्टर शिविर पुरस्कार recognize the बेहतरीन खिलाड़ी , और the आर्ची griffin पुरस्कार recognizes the सबसे मूल्यवान खिलाड़ी .
The United Nations Command (  unc ) is the एकीकृत कमांड ढांचा लिये the बहुराष्ट्रीय सैन्य शक्तियां supporting the  Republic of Korea ( South Korea or ROK ) during and after the Korean War .
After  सैनिकों of the लोकतांत्रिक लोगों 's गणतंत्र of कोरियाई ( उत्तर कोरियाई or dprk ) invaded दक्षिण कोरियाई on जून 25 , 1950 , the  United Nations Security Council adopted Resolution 82 calling on North Korea to cease hostilities and withdraw to the 38th parallel .
On June 27 , 1950 , it adopted Resolution 83 ,  recommending कि सदस्यों of the संयुक्त राष्ट्र provide सहायता to the गणतंत्र of कोरियाई `` to repel the हथियारबंद आक्रमण और to restore अंतरराष्ट्रीय  peace and security to the area '' .
Security Council Resolution 84 ,  अपनाया on जुलाई 7 , 1950 , अनुशंसित कि सदस्यों providing सैन्य शक्तियां और अन्य सहायता to दक्षिण कोरियाई `` मेक ऐसे शक्तियां और  other assistance available to a unified command under the United States of America '' .
Although the resolutions  सुझाया the शक्तियां अंतर्गत the unc यहूद `` संयुक्त राष्ट्र शक्तियां '' , और संयुक्त राष्ट्र itself could be माना a belligerent , in अभ्यास the संयुक्त  Nations exercised no control over the combat forces , which were controlled by the United States .
Most observers concluded that the forces  अंतर्गत the unc यहूद नहीं in विधि संयुक्त राष्ट्र सैनिकों , और the अधिनियमों of the  UNC were not the acts of the United Nations .
The UNC can be regarded as an alliance  of नेशनल सेना , ऑपरेटिंग अंतर्गत the सामूहिक सही  of self-defense .
On August 29 , 1950 , the British  राष्ट्रमंडल 's 27th infantry ब्रिगेड arrived at बुसान to जुड़ें the unc , जिससे जबतक तब शामिल  only ROK and U.S. forces .
The  27th ब्रिगेड स्थानांतरित into the naktong नदी लकीर  west of Daegu .
Troop units from other countries of the UN followed in rapid succession ; Australia , Belgian  संयुक्त राष्ट्र कमांड , कनाडा , कोलंबिया , इथियोपिया , फ़्रांस , यूनानियों , ध्वज , the नीदरलैंड्स , नई जीलैंड , the  Philippines , Thailand and Turkey .
the संघ of दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी provided एयर इकाई  which fought alongside the air forces of other member nations .
Denmark , India ,  नार्वे , और स्वीडन provided चिकित्सा  units .
Italy provided a hospital , even  हालांकि it थी नहीं a un सदस्य .
The United Nations Command and  the chinese-north कोरियाई कमांड हस्ताक्षरित the कोरियाई armistice  Agreement on 27 July 1953 , ending the heavy fighting .
The armistice agreement established the Military Armistice Commission  ( मैक ) , consisting of प्रतिनिधि of the दो signatories , to supervise the क्रियान्वयन of the  armistice terms .
The  उत्तर korean-chinese मैक रै महरूम replaced by panmumjon प्रतिनिधि अंतर्गत  exclusive North Korean management .
Regular meetings have been stopped , although duty officers of Joint  सुरक्षा क्षेत्रफल , commonly ज्ञात as the युद्धविराम गाँव of panmunjom , इससे प्रत्येक पक्ष मिलें  regularly .
Lincoln Heights is an American family drama television series about Eddie Sutton , a Mission Vista police officer who  चालें उसके परिवार वापस to उसके बूढ़ा पड़ोस , lincoln हाइट्स , to प्रारंभ a नई जीवन और to सहायता आउट उसके बूढ़ा पड़ोस  .
It is a dangerous place to raise a family , and through the many trials the family goes through ,  वे जल्द सीख कि settling in is नहीं as आसान as it seems  .
While Officer Sutton struggles to cope with every day life  as a गली cop in लॉस एंजिल्स , उसके बच्चे कोशिश to अनुरूप in at उनके नई स्कूलों और साथ उनके नई पड़ोसी  .
The show premiered January 8 ,  2007 on the एबीसी परिवार संजाल साथ 13 एपीसोड ordered लिये  the first season .
It  थी स्वीकृत लिये a दूसरी ऋतु , जिससे  premiered September 4 , 2007 .
Vanessa  हजेंस ' सोंग , कह ok था महरूम प्रयुक्त in a वाणिज्यिक to प्रचार the दूसरी  season .
to प्रचार the तीसरा ऋतु , वे दिखाया क्लिप्स of cassie और चार्ल्स 's संबंध  to the song , Crush by the American Idol 's seventh season runner-up , David Archuleta .
to प्रचार ऋतु 4 , वे 're using the  song , Avalanche by Marie Digby .

On January 29 , 2010 , ABC  परिवार घोषित the रद्दीकरण of the श्रेणी बाद चार सीज़न  .
A Christian denomination is an  identifiable धार्मिक देह अंतर्गत a आम नाम , ढांचा , और doctrine  within Christianity .
In the Orthodox tradition , churches are  विभाजित प्रायः साथ जातीय और भाषाई लाइनों , into पृथक  churches and traditions .
Technically , divisions between  एक समूह और another हैं पारिभाषित by doctrine और गिरिजाघर  authority .
Issues such as the  प्रकृति of यीशु , the प्राधिकार of अपोस्टोलिक उत्तराधिकार , eschatology , और papal primacy पृथक  one denomination from another .
The Roman Catholic Church is the largest denomination with over 1.1 billion members , over half of all  ईसाइयों विश्वव्यापी , बनाना it the largest denomination लिये कोई धर्म विश्वव्यापी  ( although the church does not view itself as a denomination , but as the original pre-denominational church ) .
Protestant denominations comprise  roughly 38–39 % of ईसाइयों विश्वव्यापी , और साथ the catholics , protestants , anglicans , और अन्य closely  related denominations comprise Western Christianity .
the पूर्वी परंपरागत गिरिजाघर , प्राच्य परंपरागत चर्च और the assyrian  Church of the East are considered Eastern Christian denominations .
Western  ईसाई denominations जीतना in पश्चिमी  Europe and its former colonies .
Eastern Christian  denominations हैं represented ज़्यादातर in पूर्वी यूरोपीय  , the Middle East and North Africa .
Christians have various doctrines about the Church , the body of faithful that they  मानना थी स्थापित by यीशु मसीह , और कैसा the दैवी गिरिजाघर corresponds to ईसाई  denominations .
Both the  catholics और the पूर्वी परंपरागत consider प्रत्येक of themselves solely to faithfully represent the एक  Holy Catholic and Apostolic Church to the exclusion of the other .
Protestants separated from the  कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर क्युकी of theologies और practices कि वे माना to be in उल्लंघन  of their interpretation .
Generally , members of the various denominations acknowledge each other as  ईसाइयों , at तनिक to the extent कि वे have mutually पहचाना baptisms और acknowledge historically परंपरागत दृश्य सहित the देवत्व of यीशु और  doctrines of sin and salvation , even though doctrinal and ecclesiological obstacles hinder full communion between churches .
Since the reforms surrounding Vatican II , the  कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर रै referred to प्रोटोस्टेंट समुदायों as `` denominations '' , जबकि reserving the पद `` गिरिजाघर  '' for apostolic churches , including the Eastern Orthodox ( see subsistit in and branch theory ) .
There are  however कुछ non-denominational ईसाइयों जो do नहीं follow  any particular branch .
The  पांडा ( ailuropoda melanoleuca  , lit .
`` black and white  cat-foot '' ) , भी ज्ञात as the दानव पांडा to फर्क it इससे the unrelated रेड पांडा ,  is a bear native to central-western and south western China .
It is  easily पहचाना by the विशाल , distinctive ब्लैक धब्बे around इसके आँखें , over  the ears , and across its round body .
Though it belongs to the order  carnivora , the पांडा 's आहार is 99 % बाँसुरी  .
Pandas  in the जंगली होगा occasionally खा अन्य grasses , जंगली tubers , or  even meat in the form of birds , rodents or carrion .
In captivity , they may receive honey , eggs ,  मछली , yams , झाड़ी पत्ते , संतरे , or केले साथ  with specially prepared food .
The giant panda lives in a few mountain ranges in central China ,  मुख्यतः in सिचुआन प्रांत , लकिन भी in the shaanxi और गांसू  provinces .
As a result of farming ,  वनों और अन्य विकास , the पांडा रै महरूम  driven out of the lowland areas where it once lived .
The panda  is a संरक्षण reliant endangered  species .
A 2007 report shows 239  pandas जीना in captivity अंदर चीन और another  27 outside the country .
Wild  जनसांख्यिकी estimates vary ; एक अनुमान shows कि वहीँ हैं परिचय 1,590 individuals जीना in the जंगली , जबकि a 2006 पढ़ाई via डीएनए विश्लेषण अनुमानित कि इस  figure could be as high as 2,000 to 3,000 .
Some reports also show that  the क्रमांक of pandas in the जंगली is on the वृद्धि  .
However , the IUCN does not believe there is enough certainty yet to  reclassify the प्रजाति इससे endangered to  Vulnerable .
While  the ड्रैगन रै प्रायः परोसा as चीन 's नेशनल emblem , internationally  the panda appears at least as commonly .
as ऐसे , it is बनने widely प्रयुक्त भीतर चीन in अंतरराष्ट्रीय  contexts , for example the five Fuwa mascots of the Beijing Olympics .
The Kite Runner is a 2007 American drama  फिल्मी निर्देशित by मार्क forster आधारित on the अनोखा  of the same name by Khaled Hosseini .
It tells the story of Amir , a well-to-do boy from  the वज़ीर akbar खान ज़िला of काबुल , जो is tormented by the guilt of abandoning उसके dost हसन , the बेटे of उसके पिता 's hazara  servant .
The story is set against a backdrop of tumultuous events , from the fall of the monarchy in  अफगानिस्तान through the सोवियत सैन्य हस्तक्षेप , the द्रव्यमान exodus of अफगान शरणार्थियों to पाकिस्तानी और the संयुक्त राज्य , और the तालिबान  regime .
Though most of the film is set in Afghanistan , these parts were  ज़्यादातर शॉट in काश्गर , चीन , due to the खतरों of फिल्मांकन in अफगानिस्तान at the  time .
The majority of the film  's संवाद is in जमींदारी , साथ the शेष बोला in अंग्रेज़ी  .
The child actors are native speakers  , लकिन अनेक वयस्क अभिनेताओं था to सीख  Dari .
फिल्मांकन लपेटा up on दिसम्बर 21 , 2006 , और the फिल्मी  was expected to be released on November 2 , 2007 .
However , after concern for the safety of the young actors in the film due to fears  of हिंसक reprisals to the यौन प्रकृति of कुछ दृश्यों in जिससे वे appear , इसके रिलीज तिथि  was pushed back six weeks to December 14 , 2007 .
The Kite Runner was  released on dvd on कूच 25 , 2008  .
A HD DVD release  थी घोषित लिये the वही तिथि  , but was canceled following the format 's demise .
the फिल्मी थी मनोनीत लिये the सुनहरी ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये  Best Foreign Language Film in 2007 .
The  फिल्मी 's स्कोर by अल्बर्टो इग्लेसियस थी मनोनीत  for Best Original Score at the Golden Globes and the Academy Awards .
The legality of  कैनबिस varies इससे देश to  country .
Possession of cannabis is illegal in most  देशों और रै महरूम चूंकि the शुरूआत of फैली कैनबिस निषेध  in the late 1930s .
However , many countries have  decriminalized the कब्ज़ा of छोटी quantities of कैनबिस , विशेषकर in उत्तर अमेरिका , दक्षिण अमेरिका और यूरोपीय  .
Furthermore , possession is legal or effectively legal in the Netherlands , North Korea and  होता be in the u.S. राज्य of कोलोराडो और वॉशिंगटन if it यहूद नहीं लिये संघीय विधि , जिससे governs  persons in all states .
The medicinal use of cannabis is legal in a  क्रमांक of देशों , सहित कनाडा , the चेक गणतंत्र  and Israel .
While federal law in the United States bans all sale and possession of cannabis , enforcement varies widely at the state level and some states have established  औषधीय मारिजुआना कार्यक्रम in कि खण्डन संघीय विधि ; दो राज्य ( कोलोराडो और वॉशिंगटन ) have repealed उनके कानून prohibiting the recreational उपयोग of कैनबिस और replaced उन्हें साथ a नियामक शासन ,  also contrary to federal statute .
Some countries have laws that are not as  vigorously prosecuted as अन्य लकिन , अलावा इससे the देशों कि प्रस्ताव अभिगम to चिकित्सा मारिजुआना ,  most countries have various penalties ranging from lenient to very severe .
Some infractions are  लिया अधिक seriously in कुछ देशों than अन्य in लिहाज़ to the cultivation , उपयोग , कब्ज़ा  or transfer of cannabis for recreational use .
A few jurisdictions have lessened penalties  लिये कब्ज़ा of छोटी quantities of कैनबिस , बनाना it दंडनीय by confiscation और a ठीक , बल्कि  than imprisonment .
Some jurisdictions/  ड्रग न्यायालयों उपयोग अनिवार्य उपचार कार्यक्रम लिये यंग or बारंबार उपयोक्ता , साथ स्वतंत्रता इससे narcotic दवाएँ as  the goal and a few jurisdictions permit cannabis use for medicinal purposes .
वहीँ हैं भी परिवर्तन in a अधिक प्रतिबंधक दिशा  as in Canada .
Drug tests  to detect कैनबिस हैं increasingly आम in अनेक देशों और have resulted  in jail sentences and people losing their jobs .
However ,  सरल कब्ज़ा can carry long कारावास वाक्य in कुछ देशों , विशेषकर in भाग of ईस्ट एशिया और southeast एशिया जहाँ the बिक्री  of cannabis may lead to a sentence of life in prison or even execution .
Loxahatchee  is a जातियाँ स्तिथ in ताड़ बीच काउंटी , फ्लोरिडा  , United States .
It is located in the areas north of  वेलिंगटन और वेस्ट और उत्तरपश्चिम of royal ताड़ बीच , फ्लोरिडा और लगभग वेस्ट of वेस्ट ताड़ बीच  .
Loxahatchee is also the name of the Post  दफ्तर कि serves इस क्षेत्रफल , जिससे is अंतर्गत the zip  code of 33470 .
The  नाम loxahatchee अर्थात् `` कछुआ  river . ''

the प्रमुख कारण लिये incorporating थी to बेहतर protect the क्षेत्रफल इससे बुवाई  growth and to preserve the rural character of the neighborhood .

The Canadian Citizenship Test is a test , administered by Citizenship and Immigration Canada  ( सीआईसी ) , कि is जरूरी लिये सब आवेदकों लिये कनाडाई नागरिकता जो हैं aged between 18  and 54 and who meet the basic requirements for citizenship .
The test is  उपलब्धियाँ in दोनो फ्रेंच और अंग्रेज़ी , the आधिकारिक भाषाएं  of Canada .
पुनर्जागरण क्रूज़ , originally संस्थापित in 1989 स्वामित्व by fearnley & eger rederi in ओस्लो - नार्वे , बाद खरीदा  by Edward Rudner ( founder of Alamo Car Rental ) as the company faltered during the Gulf War .
They operated year-round cruise  itineraries to the भूमध्यसागरीय , the यूनानी isles , tahiti और the दक्षिण प्रशांत , उत्तरी  Europe and Scandinavia .
The company  ceased परिचालन on 25 सितंबर 2001 और  accommodated up to 220,000 guests in 2000 .
While  the कम्पनी था महरूम in ग़रीब वित्तीय स्वास्थ्य लिये काफी कुछ समय , the आर्थिक मनाही resulting इससे the सितंबर 11th  terrorist attacks are credited with the demise of this cruise line .
The fleet is listed  अंतर्गत सूची of क्रूज जहाजों .
It was  headquartered in फोर्ट lauderdale  , Florida .
epithelium is एक of the चार मौलिक प्रकार of एनिमल ऊतक , साथ साथ संयोजी ऊतक  , muscle tissue and nervous tissue .
Epithelial tissues line the cavities and  सतहों of structures throughout the देह , और भी रूप अनेक ग्रंथियों  .
कृत्यों of epithelial कोशिकाएं शामिल स्राव , चयनात्मक अवशोषण , सुरक्षा  , transcellular transport and detection of sensation .
In Greek `` ἐπί '' ( `` epi '' ) means ``  on '' or `` upon '' , और `` θηλή ''  ( `` thēlē '' ) means `` nipple '' .
Epithelial layers are avascular , so they must receive nourishment via  diffusion of substances इससे the underlying संयोजी ऊतक  , through the basement membrane .
Epithelia can also be organized into clusters of  कोशिकाएं कि फलन as बहिःस्रावी और अंतःस्रावी  glands .
Kent E. Hovind ( born  जनवरी 15 , 1953 ) is an अमरीकी यंग धरती creationist  .
Hovind has spoken on creation science and  रै aimed to मनाना श्रोता to अस्वीकृत theories of एवोल्यूशन , भूभौतिकी , और cosmology in एहसान  of his interpretation of the Genesis creation narrative from the Bible .
Hovind 's views are  contradicted by वैज्ञानिक प्रमाण और कुछ of उसके विचार have भी महरूम criticized by यंग धरती creationist संगठन  such as Answers in Genesis .
Hovind established the Creation Science Evangelism in 1991 , and  अक्सर spoke on यंग धरती creationism at seminars at निजी स्कूलों और चर्च , debates , और on रेडियो और टेलीविज़न  broadcasts .
Since January 2007 , Hovind has been serving a  ten-year थाना वाक्य बाद होने convicted of 58 संघीय रिश्तो , सहित 12 कर offenses , एक गिनती of obstructing  federal agents , and 45 counts of structuring cash transactions .
He is incarcerated at the Federal  correctional संस्था at बर्लिन , नई हैम्पशायर  .
Bride with  बिंदी सजा  forehead
A bindi ( , from Sanskrit bindu , meaning `` a drop , small particle ,  बिन्दु '' ) , or a pottu/bottu ( in तमिल , तेलुगु , और मलयालम ) is a माथे सजावट worn in दक्षिण एशिया ( विशेषकर इण्डिया , बांग्लादेश , नेपाल , श्री लंका  and Mauritius ) and Southeast Asia .
Traditionally it is  a उज्जवल बिन्दु of रेड रंग लागू in the बीच of the माथे बंद to the eyebrows , लकिन it can भी consist of a चिह्न  or piece of jewelry worn at this location .
The New York gubernatorial election of 2010 was held on Tuesday ,  नवम्बर 2 , 2010 , to elect the राज्यपाल of नई यॉर्क , to serve a four-year पद कि began in जनवरी  2011 .

The main cast of Dragon Ball at  the समाप्त of the manga  .
The Dragon Ball manga  और दुश्मनी श्रेणी सुविधाएँ an extensive डाल of वर्ण निर्मित  by Akira Toriyama .
The  श्रेणी takes प्लेस in a fictional ब्रह्मांड , the वही as toriyama 's पिछला श्रेणी dr. slump , और फ़ॉलो the adventures of martial कलाकार बेटे goku इससे बाल्यकाल to adulthood as he खोज लिये the सात  spheres known as the Dragon Balls , used to summon a wish-granting dragon .
During the course of the story , he  मुठभेड़ों allies ऐसे as bulma , yamcha , kuririn और trunks , विरोधियों ऐसे as tenshinhan  , Piccolo and Vegeta , and enemies such as Freeza and Cell .
While many of the characters are humans  साथ superhuman शक्ति and/or अलौकिक abilities , the डाल भी शामिल anthropomorphic  animals and later , extraterrestrial lifeforms .
The series also includes  depictions of the आफ्टरलाइफ , साथ अनेक वर्ण होने  gods that govern the universe .

The Comanche are a Plains Indian tribe whose historic territory , known as Comancheria ,  consisted of उपस्थित दिन पूर्वी नई मैक्सिको , दक्षिणी कोलोराडो , northeastern एरिज़ोना , दक्षिणी कान्सास , सब of ओक्लाहोमा  , and most of northwest Texas .
The Comanche  लोगों हैं नामांकित in the federally पहचाना comanche  Nation , in Oklahoma .
Historically  , the comanches यहूद hunter-gatherers साथ  a horse culture .
There may have been as many as  45,000 comanches in the लेट 18th  century .
Today , the Comanche Nation  comanche जनजातीय नामांकन संख्याएँ 15,191 साथ लगभग 7,763 सदस्यों residing  in the Lawton – Fort Sill and surrounding areas of Southwest Oklahoma .
The  comanche स्वदेश homecoming powwow is आयोजित annually in walters , ओक्लाहोमा  in mid-July .
The Comanche spoke  the comanche भाषा , a numic भाषा of the uto-aztecan परिवार , sometimes वर्गीकृत as  a Shoshone dialect ; however , only about 1 % of Comanches speak it today .
Ethan Frome is a novel  प्रकाशित in 1911 by the पुलित्जर पुरस्कार -winning अमरीकी  author Edith Wharton .
It is set in  the fictitious कस्बा of starkfield ,  Massachusetts .
the अनोखा थी adapted into a फिल्मी ,  Ethan Frome , in 1993 .
Times  वर्गाकार studios ( तस ) is an अमरीकी टेलीविज़न स्टुडियो स्तिथ in the टाइम्स वर्गाकार  neighborhood of the Manhattan borough of New York City , New York .
