The Las Vegas  स्ट्रिप संसार of coca-cola संग्रहालय  in 2003
Coca-Cola is a carbonated soft drink sold in stores , restaurants , and vending  मशीने in प्रत्येक देश मगर क्यूबा और उत्तर कोरियाई  .
It  is उत्पादित by the coca-cola कम्पनी of अटलांटा , जॉर्जिया , और is प्रायः referred to बस as कोक ( a पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क  of The Coca-Cola Company in the United States since March 27 , 1944 ) .
Originally intended as a patent  आयुर्विज्ञान जब it थी invented in the लेट 19th सदी by जॉन pemberton , coca-cola थी खरीदा आउट by बिजनेसमैन asa griggs candler , जिनकी विपणन  tactics led Coke to its dominance of the world soft-drink market throughout the 20th century .
The company produces concentrate , which is then sold to  licensed coca-cola bottlers throughout the संसार  .
the bottlers , जो थाम territorially विशेष अनुबंध साथ the कम्पनी , उपज समाप्त उत्पाद in डिब्बे और बोतलों इससे the concentrate  in combination with filtered water and sweeteners .
the bottlers तब बेचें , वितरित और merchandise  Coca-Cola to retail stores and vending machines .
ऐसे bottlers शामिल coca-cola उद्यमों , जिससे is the largest सिंगल coca-cola  bottler in North America and western Europe .
The Coca-Cola Company also sells  concentrate लिये सोडा स्रोतों to प्रमुख रेस्तरां  and food service distributors .
The Coca-Cola Company has ,  on अवसर , introduced अन्य कोला पेय अंतर्गत the  Coke brand name .
The most common of these is Diet Coke , with  अन्य सहित caffeine-free coca-cola , आहार कोक caffeine-free , coca-cola चेरी , coca-cola  Zero , Coca-Cola Vanilla , and special versions with lemon , lime or coffee .
Based on Interbrand 's best  वैश्विक ब्रांड 2011 , coca-cola थी the संसार 's सबसे मूल्यवान  brand .
प्रकार of bar-lines
In musical notation , a  बार ( or माप ) is a खण्ड of समय पारिभाषित by a दिए क्रमांक of बीट्स , प्रत्येक of जिससे  are assigned a particular note value .
dividing म्यूज़िक into बार provides नियमित सन्दर्भ अंक to pin पाइंट  locations within a piece of music .
It also makes written music easier to  follow , चूंकि प्रत्येक बार of स्टाफ प्रतीकों can be पढ़ा और निभाई  as a batch .
Typically , a piece consists of several bars of the same length , and in modern musical  संकेतन the क्रमांक of बीट्स in प्रत्येक बार is निर्दिष्ट at the शुरूआत of the स्कोर by the शीर्ष क्रमांक of a समय हस्ताक्षर ( ऐसे as 3/4 ) , जबकि the नीचे क्रमांक indicates the नोट मान of the ताल  ( the beat has a quarter note value in the 3/4 example ) .
The word bar is more common in British English , and the word  माप is अधिक आम in अमरीकी अंग्रेज़ी , हालांकि संगीतकारों generally समझे  both usages .
In American English , although the words bar and measure are often used interchangeably the correct  उपयोग of the शब्द 'bar ' refers तभी to the लंबवत लकीर itself , जबकि the शब्द 'measure ' refers to the बीट्स  contained between bars .
In international usage  , it is बराबर सही to बोलो of बार संख्याएँ और माप संख्याएँ , e.g .  ‘bars 9–16’ or ‘mm . 9–16’ .
Along  the वही लाइनों , it is हिकमत to आरक्षित the abbreviated रूप  ‘bb .
3–4’ etc .  लिये बीट्स तभी ; बार चाहिए be referred to by नाम  in full .
the पहला metrically पूरा  measure within a piece of music is called ‘bar 1’ or ‘m . 1’ .
When the piece  begins साथ an anacrusis ( an अधूरी माप at the सिर of  a piece of music ) , ‘bar 1’ or ‘m . 1’ is the following measure .
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar plant in Spain features 15 hours of  भंडार और can सप्लाई शक्ति 24 घंटों a दिन .
Solar energy , radiant light and  ऊष्मा इससे the सूर्य , रै महरूम harnessed by इंसानो चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स  using a range of ever-evolving technologies .
Solar energy technologies include solar heating , solar photovoltaics , solar thermal electricity  , सौर वास्तुकला और कृत्रिम photosynthesis , जिससे can मेक considerable योगदान to solving कुछ of the सबसे तात्कालिक उर्जा समस्याएं  the world now faces .
Solar technologies are broadly characterized as either passive  सौर or क्रियाशील सौर depending on the रास्ता वे कैप्चर , बदलें और वितरित  solar energy .
Active  सौर तकनीकों शामिल the उपयोग of photovoltaic panels और सौर थर्मल collectors  to harness the energy .
Passive solar techniques include orienting a building to the Sun , selecting materials with favorable thermal mass or  लाइट dispersing गुण , और डिजाइनिंग स्पेसेस कि naturally circulate  air .
In 2011 , the International Energy Agency said that `` the  विकास of सस्ती , inexhaustible और साफ सौर उर्जा technologies होगा have  huge longer-term benefits .
It will increase countries’  उर्जा सुरक्षा through रिलायंस on an स्वदेशी , inexhaustible और ज़्यादातर import-independent संसाधन , बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता , reduce  pollution , lower the costs of mitigating climate change , and keep fossil fuel prices lower than otherwise .
These  लाभ हैं वैश्विक  .
Hence the  अतिरिक्त लागत of the प्रोत्साहन लिये जल्दी deployment चाहिए be माना सीखना निवेश ;  they must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared '' .
Primary care may be  provided in जातियाँ स्वास्थ्य केंद्रों  .
Primary care is the health  परवाह दिए by a स्वास्थ्य परवाह प्रदाता  .
typically इस प्रदाता अधिनियमों as the प्रिंसिपल पाइंट of परामर्श लिये मरीजों भीतर  a health care system and coordinates other specialists that the patient may need .
Such a professional can be a primary care physician , such as a general  practitioner or परिवार चिकित्सक , or depending on the मोहल्ले , स्वास्थ्य प्रणाली संगठन , और रोगी 's discretion , वे may देखिए a फार्मासिस्ट , a चिकित्सक सहायक , a नर्स practitioner , a नर्स ( ऐसे as in the संयुक्त किंगडम ) , a नैदानिक अधिकारी ( ऐसे as in भाग of अफ़्रीकी ) , or an आयुर्वेदिक  or other traditional medicine professional ( such as in parts of Asia ) .
depending on the प्रकृति of the स्वास्थ्य कंडीशन , मरीजों  may then be referred for secondary or tertiary care .
``  समंदर एवेन्यू '' is a सोंग अंकित by अमरीकी  pop punk group Yellowcard .
It was released in  फ़रवरी 2004 as the दूसरी सिंगल इससे समंदर एवेन्यू और  the third track .
It is known for bringing them into the mainstream , as it  प्राप्त numerous spins on एमटीवी और increasing  radio airplay .
Ocean Avenue is a  गली in jacksonville , फ्लोरिडा , the बैंड 's stomping grounds निकट उनके ऊँची स्कूल , डगलस एंडरसन स्कूल of the  Arts , and another street mentioned in the song , Cherry Street .
The name of Ocean Avenue  in jacksonville is दरअसल बीच boulevard  .
They left their original  आधार पीछे जब वे स्थानांतरित to लॉस एंजिल्स  .
The song was featured on the Much Music  संकलन एल्बम बिग चमकदार धुनें 9 .
A psychiatrist is a  चिकित्सक जो specializes in psychiatry  .
A  मनोचिकित्सक specializes in the उपचार of दिमागी  disorders .
Psychiatrists are authorized to prescribe medicine , conduct physical  examinations , अनुक्रम और interpret प्रयोगशाला परीक्षण , उपयोग मनोचिकित्सा और may अनुक्रम दिमाग इमेजिंग अध्ययन ऐसे as computed टोमोग्राफी ( ct/cat स्कैन ) ,  magnetic resonance imaging ( MRI ) , and positron emission tomography ( PET ) scanning .
Within the framework of the World Health Organization 's ( WHO ) definition of health as a state  of पूरा शारीरिक , दिमागी और सोशल well-being , और नहीं merely the अनुपस्थिति of बीमारी or infirmity , reproductive स्वास्थ्य , or यौन health/hygiene , पता  the reproductive processes , functions and system at all stages of life .
Reproductive  स्वास्थ्य , इसलिए , implies कि लोगों हैं समर्थ to have a जिम्मेदार , संतोषजनक और safer sex जीवन और  that they have the capability to reproduce and the freedom to decide if , when and how often to do so .
One interpretation of this implies that men and  महिलाओं ought to be सूचित of और to have अभिगम to सुरक्षित , प्रभावी , सस्ती और स्वीकार्य विधि of जनम कंट्रोल ; भी अभिगम to उचित स्वास्थ्य परवाह सेवाएं of यौन , reproductive आयुर्विज्ञान और क्रियान्वयन of स्वास्थ्य शिक्षा  programs to stress the importance of women to go safely through pregnancy and childbirth could provide couples with the best chance of having a healthy infant .
on the अन्य हाथ individuals do फेस  inequalities in reproductive health services .
Inequalities vary based on  socioeconomic औकात , शिक्षा स्तर , आयु , नस्ल , धर्म , और संसाधन  available in their environment .
It is possible for example , that low  आय individuals कमी the संसाधन लिये उचित स्वास्थ्य सेवाएं और the ज्ञान to जान कया is उचित लिये maintaining  reproductive health .
According to the WHO , ``  reproductive और यौन ill-health खाते लिये 20 % of the वैश्विक बोझ of ill-health लिये महिलाओं  , and 14 % for men . ''
reproductive स्वास्थ्य is a भाग of यौन और reproductive  health and rights .
This is a list of episodes for the Disney Channel original series The  सुइट जीवन on डेक , जिससे aired लिये तीन सीज़न on डिज़्नी चैनल  from September 26 , 2008 to May 6 , 2011 .
Core 2 is a brand encompassing a range of Intel 's consumer 64-bit x86-64  single- , दुआl- , और quad-core microprocessors आधारित on the कोर  microarchitecture .
The single- and  dual-core मॉडल हैं single- die , whereas the quad-core मॉडल comprise दो मरता , प्रत्येक containing दो cores  , packaged in a multi-chip module .
The introduction of Core 2 relegated  the pentium ब्रांड to the mid-range मार्केट , और reunified लैपटॉप और डेस्कटॉप cpu लाइनों , जिससे previously था महरूम  divided into the Pentium 4 , Pentium D , and Pentium M brands .
The Core 2 brand was introduced on 27 July 2006 , comprising the Solo ( single-core ) , Duo (  dual-core ) , क्वाड ( quad-core ) , और in 2007 , the चरम ( दुआl- or quad-core cpu लिये enthusiasts )  subbrands .
Intel Core 2  processors साथ vpro प्रौद्योगिकी ( designed लिये व्यवसायों ) शामिल  the dual-core and quad-core branches .
The Super Bowl is the annual championship game of the National Football League ( NFL ) , the highest level of professional  अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल in the संयुक्त राज्य , culminating a ऋतु कि begins in the लेट गर्मियाँ of the पिछला  calendar year .
The  सुपर कटोरी उपयोग रोमन numerals to पहचानो  each game , rather than the year in which it is held .
For example , Super Bowl I was played on January  15 , 1967 , following the 1966 नियमित ऋतु , जबकि सुपर कटोरी xlvii थी निभाई on फ़रवरी 3 , 2013  , following the 2012 season .
The game was created as part  of a विलय अनुबंध between the एनएफएल और इसके then-rival लीग , the  American Football League ( AFL ) .
It was agreed that the two leagues ' champion teams  होता खेल in an afl–nfl संसार चैंपियनशिप खेल जबतक the विलय थी to officially  begin in 1970 .
After the merger , each league was  redesignated as a `` सम्मेलन `` , और the खेल थी तब निभाई between the सम्मेलन champions  .
Currently , the  नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल सम्मेलन ( nfc ) लीड the श्रेणी साथ 25 विन्स to 22 विन्स लिये the अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल  Conference ( AFC ) .
The day on which the  सुपर कटोरी is निभाई , अभी माना by कुछ a de facto अमरीकी नेशनल अवकाश , is पुकारा ``  Super Bowl Sunday `` .
It is the second-largest day  लिये u.S. खाना खपत , बाद थैंक्सगिविंग  Day .
In addition , the Super  कटोरी रै अक्सर महरूम the सबसे देखी  American television broadcast of the year .
Super Bowl XLV , played in 2011 , became the most-watched  अमरीकी टेलीविज़न कार्यक्रम in इतिहास , आरेखण an औसत दर्शक of 111 लाख दर्शक और लेने over the स्पॉट आयोजित by the पिछला साल 's सुपर कटोरी , जिससे  itself had taken over the # 1 spot held for twenty-eight years by the final episode of M*A*S*H .
The Super Bowl is also among the most watched sporting events in  the संसार , लगभग सब होने उत्तर अमरीकी ऑडियंस , और is दूसरी to संघ  football ’s UEFA Champions League final as the most watched annual sporting event worldwide .
क्युकी of इसके ऊँची viewership , वाणिज्यिक airtime दौरान the सुपर  Bowl broadcast is the most expensive of the year .
Due to the high cost of investing in advertising on  the सुपर कटोरी , कंपनियाँ regularly develop उनके सबसे महंगी विज्ञापन लिये इस  broadcast .
As a  परिणाम , watching और discussing the ब्रॉडकास्ट 's commercials रै become  a significant aspect of the event .
In  जोड , अनेक लोकप्रिय गायकों और संगीतकारों have performed  during the event 's pre-game and halftime ceremonies because of the exposure .
Fiona  is a feminine दिए  name .
The name Fiona was invented , and first used , by the Scottish poet James Macpherson (  1736–96 ) , लेखक of the ossian कविताएं , जिससे he claimed यहूद अनुवाद इससे प्राचीन गैलिक स्त्रोत ( स्त्रोत , जब challenged ,  he never produced ) .
The name was subsequently used as a  pseudonym by विलियम शार्प ( 1855–1905 ) , जो authored अनेक रोमांटिक works अंतर्गत the नाम `` फिओना  Macleod '' .
the नाम रै चूंकि become लोकप्रिय  in England , Scotland and Ireland .
The name  is माना to be a latinised रूप of the गैलिक शब्द  fionn , meaning `` white '' , `` fair '' .
The name Fiona is also sometimes used as an Anglicisation of the Irish-language name  fíona , हालांकि ये names हैं वरना unrelated ( as fíona is निकला इससे an तत्व अर्थ  `` vine '' ) .
There is also a modern tendency to  equate the प्रामाणिक स्कॉटिश गैलिक feminine नाम fionnghal साथ फिओना  .
the नाम फिओना is उठती in लोकप्रियता विशेषकर  in German -speaking countries .
Fiona  थी the 49th सबसे लोकप्रिय नाम लिये baby लड़कियों  born in 2008 in Germany .
Fiona was  tied लिये तीसरा प्लेस in the रैंकिंग of सबसे लोकप्रिय names लिये  baby girls born in the tiny principality of Liechtenstein in 2008 .
The name  थी the 347th सबसे लोकप्रिय नाम लिये लड़कियों born in the संयुक्त राज्य in 2008 , जहाँ it रै क्रमित among the  top 1,000 most popular names for girls since 1990 and among the top 500 since 1999 .
The name Fiona has been particularly popular for girls of Asian or Pacific Islander descent in New York  नगर , जहाँ फिओना क्रमित as the नवीं सबसे लोकप्रिय नाम लिये लड़कियों इससे those समूह in  2007 .
Many languages are  प्रयुक्त , or historically have महरूम प्रयुक्त in the संयुक्त  States .
The  सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त भाषा  is English .
There are also many languages  स्वदेशी to उत्तर अमेरिका or to u.S. राज्य or holdings in the प्रशांत  region .
Languages brought to the country by colonists  or आप्रवासियों इससे यूरोपीय , एशिया , or अन्य भाग of the संसार मेक up a विशाल portion of the भाषाएं फिलहाल प्रयुक्त ; अनेक भाषाएं , सहित creoles  and sign languages , have also developed in the United States .
Approximately 337 languages are  बोला or हस्ताक्षरित by the जनसांख्यिकी , of जिससे 176 हैं स्वदेशी  to the area .
Fifty-two languages formerly spoken  in the देश 's territory हैं अभी  extinct .
the किस्में of अंग्रेज़ी बोला in the संयुक्त  States is known as American English .
English is the de facto national language of the United  राज्य , साथ 80 % of the जनसांख्यिकी claiming it as a माँ जीभ , और कुछ 95 % claiming to बोलो it `` खूब  '' or `` very well '' .
However , no  आधिकारिक भाषा exists at the संघीय  level .
There have  महरूम अनेक प्रस्ताव to मेक अंग्रेज़ी the नेशनल भाषा in amendments  to immigration reform bills , but none of these bills has become law with the amendment intact .
The situation is quite varied at the state and territorial levels , with some states mirroring the federal policy of  adopting no आधिकारिक भाषा in a de jure क्षमता , अन्य adopting अंग्रेज़ी अलोन , अन्य officially adopting अंग्रेज़ी as खूब as लोकल भाषाएं , और स्टिल अन्य adopting a नीति of de facto bilingualism  .
स्पेनी is the दूसरी सबसे आम भाषा in the देश ,  and is spoken by over 12 % of the population .
The  संयुक्त राज्य holds the संसार 's पांचवां largest spanish-speaking  population , outnumbered only by Mexico , Spain , Colombia , and Argentina .
throughout the southwestern संयुक्त राज्य , long-established spanish-speaking  communities coexist with large numbers of more recent Hispanophone immigrants .
Although many new Latin American immigrants are less than fluent in English , nearly all  second-generation हिस्पैनिक अमेरिकी बोलो अंग्रेज़ी धड़ल्ले , जबकि तभी परिचय हाफ स्टिल बोलो  Spanish .
According to the 2000 US census , people of German  ancestry मेक up the largest सिंगल जातीय समूह in the संयुक्त राज्य , और the जर्मनी  language ranks fifth .
Italian ,  पॉलिश , और फ्रेंच हैं स्टिल widely बोला among populations descending इससे आप्रवासियों इससे those देशों in the जल्दी 20th सदी , लकिन the उपयोग  of these languages is dwindling as the older generations die .
Russian  is भी बोला by अप्रवासी populations  .
Tagalog  और वियतनामी have over एक लाख अध्यक्षों प्रत्येक in the संयुक्त राज्य , लगभग entirely  within recent immigrant populations .
Both languages , along with the  किस्में of the चाइनीज भाषा , जापानी , और कोरियाई , हैं अभी प्रयुक्त in चुनावों in अलास्का , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , हवाई , इलिनोइस ,  New York , Texas , and Washington .
Native American languages are spoken in smaller pockets of the country , but these populations  हैं अवरोहण , और the भाषाएं हैं लगभग never widely  used outside of reservations .
Hawaiian , although having few native speakers  , is an आधिकारिक भाषा साथ साथ अंग्रेज़ी at the  state level in Hawaii .
The state government of Louisiana  offers सेवाएं और दस्तावेज़ in फ्रेंच , as करता नई मैक्सिको in स्पेनी  .
Besides English , Spanish , French ,  जर्मनी , navajo और अन्य देशी अमरीकी भाषाएं , सब अन्य भाषाएं हैं प्रायः सीखे इससे अप्रवासी  ancestors that came after the time of independence or learned through some form of education .
1990 's  pontiac ग्रैंड am सेडान  fender and quarter panel
On an automobile , a quarter panel ( or rear wing as it is  ज्ञात in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी ) is प्रायः माना the देह फलक जिससे goes between the पश्च द्वार और  the trunk and typically wraps around the wheel well ; however , the similar front section Fender ( vehicle ) , between the door and the hood , is sometimes incorrectly referred to as a quarter panel .
The  क्वार्टर फलक is typically बना of चादर मेटल , लकिन is sometimes बना of fiberglass  or fiber-reinforced plastic ; although , this varies with different makes and models .
A quarter  फलक is typically a welded on घटक of the uni-body ढांचा  or Monocoque .
बदलना of a चादर मेटल क्वार्टर फलक typically requires it to be काटें बंद the  vehicle and a replacement part to be welded ( or sometimes bonded ) to the Vehicle .
Due to this high amount of specialized labor ,  a क्वार्टर फलक may प्रायः be repaired बल्कि than replaced by hammering आउट the क्षति , और a देह फिलर sometimes referred to as  bondo to be applied to finalize the original surface .
shropshire ( or ; alternatively salop ; abbreviated , in छपाई तभी , shrops ) is a काउंटी  in the West Midlands region of England .
It borders Wales to the west ,  चेशायर to the उत्तर , staffordshire to the ईस्ट , वॉस्टरशायर to the south-east और herefordshire  to the south .
A unitary authority ( Shropshire Council ) was created on 1 April 2009 , taking over from the  पिछला काउंटी परिषद और 5 ज़िला councils , और कवर सबसे of the काउंटी  .
The borough of Telford and Wrekin has been a  पृथक एकात्मक प्राधिकार चूंकि 1998 लकिन continues to be  included in the ceremonial county .
The county 's population and economy is centred on  पाँच कस्बों : the काउंटी कस्बा of shrewsbury , जिससे is culturally और historically महत्वपूर्ण और is स्तिथ in the केन्द्र of the काउंटी ; telford , a नई कस्बा in the ईस्ट जिससे थी constructed around a क्रमांक of पुरानी कस्बों , सबसे notably वेलिंगटन , dawley और madeley , जिससे is आज  the most populous ; and Oswestry in the north-west , Bridgnorth just to the south of Telford , and Ludlow in the south .
The county has many further market  कस्बों , सहित whitchurch in the उत्तर , न्यूपोर्ट बस to the north-east of telford , और  Market Drayton in the north-east of the county .
The Ironbridge Gorge area is a  युनेस्को संसार विरासत साईट , covering ironbridge , coalbrookdale और a भाग of madeley  .
There are , additionally , other notable historic industrial sites located  around the काउंटी , ऐसे as at shrewsbury , broseley , snailbeach और highley as खूब as the shropshire संघ कनाल  .
The Shropshire Hills Area of Outstanding  प्राकृतिक सौंदर्य कवर परिचय a क्वार्टर of the काउंटी , मुख्यतः in the दक्षिण  .
Shropshire is  एक of इंग्लैण्ड 's सबसे ग्रामीण और sparsely आबादी काउंटी , साथ the जनसांख्यिकी घनत्व  of the Shropshire Council area being just 91/km2 ( 337/sq mi ) .
The Wrekin  is एक of the सबसे प्रसिद्ध प्राकृतिक लैंडमार्क in the काउंटी , हालांकि the उच्चतम पहाड़ियाँ  are the Clee Hills , Stiperstones and the Long Mynd .
Wenlock Edge is another significant  भौगोलिक और geological लैंडमार्क .
In the  low-lying उत्तरपश्चिम of the काउंटी ( और अतिव्यापी the किनारा साथ वेल्स ) is the fenn 's , whixall और bettisfield mosses नेशनल प्रकृति आरक्षित , एक of the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण और बेहतरीन preserved  bogs in Britain .
The River  severn , ग्रेट ब्रिटेन 's longest नदी , रनों through the काउंटी , exiting into वॉस्टरशायर  via the Severn Valley .
Shropshire  is landlocked , और साथ an क्षेत्रफल of , is इंग्लैण्ड  's largest inland county .
The  काउंटी पुष्प is the round-leaved  sundew .
For Eurostat purposes , the county ( less the  एकात्मक ज़िला of telford और wrekin ) is a nuts 3 प्रदेश  ( code UKG22 ) .
The two Shropshire unitary areas ( covering all of the  ceremonial काउंटी ) , साथ साथ the अधिकारियों covering the ceremonial काउंटी of staffordshire  , comprise the `` Shropshire and Staffordshire '' NUTS 2 region .
The  बिग बंग सिद्धान्त डाल at कॉमिक कॉन 2009 , इससे बाएँ : कुणाल नय्यर , साइमन helberg ,  Kaley Cuoco , Jim Parsons , and Johnny Galecki
The American sitcom The Big Bang Theory ,  निर्मित और कार्यपालिका उत्पादित by चक lorre और विधेयक prady , premiered on सीबीएस on सितंबर  24 , 2007 .
The show centers on five characters : roommates Sheldon Cooper and Leonard Hofstadter , two Caltech physicists ; Penny , a waitress and aspiring actress who lives  आरपार the हॉल ; और लियोनार्ड और शेल्डन 's मित्रों और co-workers aerospace इंजीनियर हावर्ड wolowitz , और astrophysicist  Rajesh Koothrappali .
Over time , several supporting characters have been promoted to  अभिनीत भूमिकाएँ : लेस्ली winkle ( ऋतु 1 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 2 नियमित ; ऋतु 3 अतिथि ) , a physicist सहयोगी , और , at अलग टाइम्स , a प्रेमी of दोनो लियोनार्ड और हावर्ड ; bernadette rostenkowski-wolowitz ( ऋतु 3 पुनरावर्ती ; ऋतु 4-present नियमित ) , a microbiologist , हावर्ड 's fiancée और subsequent बीवी , और पूर्व part-time वेट्रेस alongside पैनी ; neuroscientist  Amy Farrah Fowler ( season 3 guest ; season 4 recurring ; season 4-present regular ) , who joins the group after being matched to Sheldon on a dating website ; and comic book store-owner , Stuart Bloom ( seasons 2–5 recurring ; season 6-present regular ) , who replaces Howard as Raj 's best friend when Howard is in space .
The show also features  numerous supporting वर्ण , प्रत्येक of जिसको plays a prominent  role in a small group of episodes .
The A-Team is an American action-adventure television series , running from  1983 to 1987 , परिचय a fictional समूह of ex– संयुक्त राज्य फौज खास शक्तियां कर्मियों जो कार्य as सैनिको of सौभाग्य , जबकि on the चलाएं इससे the फौज बाद होने ब्रांडेड  as war criminals for a `` crime they did n't commit `` .
A  विशेषता फिल्मी आधारित on the श्रेणी थी released  by 20th Century Fox on June 11 , 2010 .
A comic book series ,  a-team : shotgun विवाह , began कूच 9  , 2010 .
Diana Prince is a fictional  अक्षर appearing regularly in कहानियां प्रकाशित by dc  Comics .
She debuted in Sensation Comics # 1 ( January 1942 ) and serves as  the civilian और रहस्य पहचान of the सुपरहीरो अचरज  Woman .
The character was created by Charles  moulton और हैरी G. पीटर .
Wat Phra  kaew , बैंकॉक , थाईलैंड
There is no official state religion in the Thai constitution , which guarantees  धार्मिक स्वतंत्रता लिये सब थाई नागरिकों , हालांकि the किंग is जरूरी by विधि to  be Buddhist .
according to the पिछला जनसांख्यिकी ( 2000 ) 94.6 % of thais  are Buddhists of the Theravada tradition .
Muslims are the second largest  धार्मिक समूह in थाईलैंड  at 4.6 % .
थाईलैंड 's southernmost प्रांतों - pattani , yala , narathiwat और भाग of songkhla chumphon have  dominant Muslim populations , consisting of both ethnic Thai and Malay .
The southern  टिप of थाईलैंड is ज़्यादातर जातीय  Malays .
ईसाइयों , मुख्यतः catholics , represent  0.7 % of the population .
A small  लकिन influential जातियाँ of सिखों in थाईलैंड और कुछ हिन्दुओं  also live in the country 's cities , and are heavily engaged in retail commerce .
There is also a  छोटी यहूदी जातियाँ in थाईलैंड , डेटिंग  back to the 17th century .
Since 2001 , Muslim activists , generally described by the Thai government as  आतंकवादी or separatists , have rallied विरूद्ध the सेंट्रल सरकारी क्युकी of कथित भ्रष्टाचार और जातीय पूर्वाग्रह on the भाग  of officials .
Thailand 's Department of Religion , currently under the Ministry of  संस्कृति , is formally जिम्मेदार लिये the पंजीकरण of धार्मिक समूह in थाईलैंड url_http जिससे थाम गुण through legally स्थापित मूलाधार  .
It has oversight , along with the Immigration Police , over the work permits of  प्रचारकों जो हैं `` प्रवासी धार्मिक मजदूर '' of सब धर्मों  .
a मान added कर ( vat ) is a  form of consumption tax .
From the  परिप्रेक्ष्य of the खरीदार , it is a कर on  the purchase price .
From that of the  विक्रेता , it is a कर तभी on the मान added to a उत्पाद , सामग्री , or सेवा  , from an accounting point of view , by this stage of its manufacture or distribution .
The manufacturer remits to  the सरकारी the अंतर between ये दो amounts , और retains the बाकी लिये themselves to ऑफसेट the  taxes they had previously paid on the inputs .
The  मान added to a उत्पाद by or साथ a कारोबार is the बिक्री दाम चार्ज to इसके ग्राहक , ऋण  the cost of materials and other taxable inputs .
A VAT is like a sales tax in  कि ultimately तभी the समाप्त उपभोक्ता  is taxed .
It differs from the sales tax in that , with the latter , the tax is  एकत्रित और remitted to the सरकारी तभी एकबार , at the पाइंट of खरीदें by the समाप्त उपभोक्ता  .
With the VAT , collections , remittances to the government , and  क्रेडिट लिये कर already सशुल्क occur प्रत्येक समय a कारोबार in the  supply chain purchases products .
A  रेफरी कॉलिंग a high-sticking  penaltyHigh
-sticking is the  नाम of दो infractions in the खेल of बर्फ हॉकी कि may occur जब a खिलाड़ी intentionally or  inadvertently plays with his or her stick above the height of the shoulders or above the cross bar of a hockey goal .
This can result in a  stoppage of खेल or in a दंड  .
In the rules of the National Hockey League ,  high-sticking is पारिभाषित as a दंड in नियम 60 और as a non-penalty बेईमानी in नियम 80  .
A stoppage in play results if a  ऊँची स्टिक आता in सम्पर्क साथ the पक और the टोली  who touched it regains control of the puck .
However , play usually continues if a player  छू the पक साथ a ऊँची स्टिक और the opposing टोली gains कंट्रोल of the  puck .
If the puck goes into the opposing net  बाद coming into सम्पर्क साथ a ऊँची स्टिक , the लक्ष्य is प्रतिबंधित  .
The level at which a  स्टिक is माना too ऊँची लिये a लक्ष्य  is the crossbar of the net .
However , if a  खिलाड़ी knocks the पक into उसके अपना जाल साथ a ऊँची स्टिक  , the goal is allowed .
A  दंड is assessed if a खिलाड़ी हमलों another  player with a high stick .
The player is given  a नाबालिग दंड जबतक उसके ऊँची स्टिक caused an चोट , in जिससे मामला the रेफरी रै the विकल्प to assess a double-minor  , major or match penalty .
It is the referee 's  discretion जिससे दंड to assess : the नियम काल्स लिये a दोगुना नाबालिग लिये an आकस्मिक चोट , or a मैच दंड लिये a deliberate attempt  to injure ( whether the opposition player was actually injured ) .
Injury is usually decided by the high stick  causing bleeding , लकिन the उपस्थिति of रक्त करता नहीं automatically औसत an अतिरिक्त दंड is  awarded .
Some referees have been known to award an extra  दंड बगैर the उपस्थिति of रक्त if the रेफरी determines कि the चोट sustained  was sufficient to warrant a double-minor penalty .
Typical  आधुनिक मेमोरी कार्ड रीडर , संगत  with many common formats
A memory card reader is a device , typically  having a usb इंटरफ़ेस , लिये accessing the आंकड़ा on a मेमोरी कार्ड ऐसे as a compactflash ( cf ) , सुरक्षित डिजिटल (  SD ) or MultiMediaCard ( MMC ) .
Most card  पाठक भी प्रस्ताव लिखें काबिलियत , और साथ साथ the कार्ड  , this can function as a pen drive .
Some  मुद्रक और निजी कंप्यूटर  have a built-in card reader .
A multi card  रीडर is प्रयुक्त लिये संचार साथ अधिक than  one type of flash memory card .
Multi card readers do not have built-in memory capacity , but  हैं समर्थ to accept अनेक प्रकार और शैलियाँ of  memory cards .
The number of compatible memory cards  varies इससे रीडर to रीडर और can शामिल अधिक than 20 अलग  types .
The number of  अलग मेमोरी ताश कि a मल्टी कार्ड रीडर can accept is expressed as x-in-1 , साथ x होने a फिगर of मेरिट indicating the क्रमांक  of memory cards accepted , such as 35-in-1 .
वहीँ हैं तीन श्रेणी of कार्ड पाठक sorted by the प्रकार और मात्रा of the कार्ड स्लॉट : सिंगल कार्ड रीडर ( e.g  . 1x SD-only ) , multi card reader ( e.g . 9-in-1 ) and series card reader ( e.g . 4x SD only ) .
Some kinds  of मेमोरी ताश साथ उनके अपना usb कृत्यों do नहीं need the कार्ड रीडर  , such as the Intelligent Stick memory card , which can plug directly into a USB slot .
The  usb यंत्र क्लास प्रयुक्त  is 0x08 .
Bullying is  हानिकारक to विद्यार्थी ' well-being और  development .
Bullying is the  उपयोग of फ़ोर्स or coercion to गाली or intimidate  others .
The behavior  can be habitual और involve an असंतुलन of  social or physical power .
It can include verbal harassment or threat , physical assault or coercion  और may be निर्देशित repeatedly towards particular पीड़ितों , शायद on grounds of रेस , धर्म  , gender , sexuality , or ability .
If bullying is  किया by a समूह , it is पुकारा mobbing  .
The victim of  धमकाना is sometimes referred to as a `` निशाना  '' .
Bullying  can be पारिभाषित in अनेक अलग  ways .
The UK  फिलहाल रै no विधिक परिभाषा of धमकाना , जबकि  some U.S. states have laws against it .
Bullying  consists of तीन मौलिक प्रकार of  abuse – emotional , verbal , and physical .
it typically involves हल्का विधि of coercion  such as intimidation .
Bullying ranges from simple one-on-one bullying to more complex  धमकाना in जिससे the बुली may have एक or अधिक `` lieutenants '' जो may seem to be willing to assist the प्राथमिक बुली in उसके  or her bullying activities .
Bullying in school and  the कार्यस्थल is भी referred to as पीर  abuse .
Robert W.  फुलर रै analyzed धमकाना in the कॉन्टेक्स्ट of  rankism .
A  धमकाना संस्कृति can develop in कोई कॉन्टेक्स्ट in जिससे इंसान beings  interact with each other .
इस शामिल स्कूल , गिरिजाघर , परिवार , the कार्यस्थल  , home , and neighborhoods .
Happy slapping in the  instituto क्षेत्रीय federico errázuriz , सांता  Cruz , Chile
Laura Bush and Rae Leigh Bradbury ( formerly missing  ) on अप्रैल 4 , 2007 , in ऑस्टिन , टेक्सास , बाद the 8-year-old introduced mrs. बुश दौरान  announcement of the future opening of the Texas Regional Office of the National Center for Missing and Exploited Children .
Rae Leigh was the first child in the U.S. to be recovered as a result  of an एम्बर चेतावनी जब वो थी 8 सप्ताह बूढ़ा in  November 1998 .
An AMBER Alert or a Child Abduction Emergency ( SAME code : CAE ) is a child  abduction चेतावनी प्रणाली originating in 1996 , अभी employed in 9 देशों  .
AMBER is officially a backronym for America 's Missing :  प्रसारण आपात जवाब , नामित लिये एम्बर hagerman , a 9-year-old abducted  and murdered in Arlington , Texas in 1996 .
वैकल्पिक क्षेत्रीय चेतावनी names यहूद एकबार प्रयुक्त ; in जॉर्जिया , `` लेवी 's कॉल '' ( नामित बाद लेवी frady ) ; in हवाई , `` maile एम्बर चेतावनी '' ( बाद maile गिल्बर्ट ) ; और अरकंसास , `` मॉर्गन उपनाम एम्बर चेतावनी  '' ( in memory of Morgan Chauntel Nick ) .
AMBER Alerts are distributed via commercial radio stations , Internet radio , satellite radio ,  टेलीविज़न स्टेशन , और केबल tv by the आपात चेतावनी प्रणाली और noaa मौसम रेडियो ( जहाँ वे हैं termed  `` Child Abduction Emergency '' or `` Amber Alerts '' ) .
The  चेतावनियाँ हैं भी जारी via e-mail , इलेक्ट्रॉनिक traffic-condition लक्षण , the led billboards जिससे हैं स्तिथ बाहर of नए walgreens स्थितियाँ , साथ साथ the  LED/LCD signs of billboard companies such as Clear Channel Outdoor , CBS Outdoor and Lamar , or through wireless device SMS text messages .
AMBER Alert has also teamed up  साथ google और फेसबुक to रिले सूचना regarding an  AMBER Alert to an ever growing demographic .
Those interested in subscribing to receive AMBER  चेतावनियाँ in उनके क्षेत्रफल via sms संदेश can विज़िट बेतार एम्बर चेतावनियाँ , जिससे हैं offered by विधि as  free messages .
In some  राज्य , the प्रदर्शक scrollboards in सामने of लॉटरी  terminals are also used .
The decision to declare an AMBER Alert is made by each police  संगठन ( in अनेक मामले , the राज्य पुलिस or राजमार्ग पैट्रोल ) जिससे investigates  each of the abductions .
Public information in an AMBER Alert usually consists of  the नाम और वर्णन of the abductee , a वर्णन of the suspected abductor , और a वर्णन और अनुज्ञा थाली क्रमांक of the abductor 's गाडी ,  if available .
Monica Samille Lewinsky ( born July 23 , 1973 ) is an American woman with whom  संयुक्त राज्य अध्यक्ष विधेयक क्लिंटन admitted to having था an `` improper संबंध '' जबकि वो worked at the श्वेत हाउस in 1995  and 1996 .
The affair and its  परखना ( जिससे शामिल क्लिंटन 's महाभियोग  ) became known as the Lewinsky scandal .
House of Night is a series of vampire -themed fantasy novels by  अमरीकी लेखक P. C. डाल और उसके बेटी kristin डाल  .
It follows the adventures of Zoey  redbird , a sixteen-year-old लड़की जो रै बस become a `` fledgling vampyre '' और is जरूरी to attend  the House of Night boarding school in Tulsa , Oklahoma .
The series has been on the New York Times Best Seller  सूची लिये 63 सप्ताह और वहीँ हैं over सात लाख नक़ल in  print in North America alone .
The sixth novel , Tempted , which went on sale on  अक्तूबर 27 , 2009 साथ a पहला मुद्रण of a लाख नक़ल , डाला the यूएसए आज बेस्टसेलर सूची  that week at # 1 .
In January , 2010 , Gezeichnet , a German  अनुवाद of चिह्नित , पहुँचे the # 1 स्पॉट on the der spiegel  bestseller list .
The series has so  दूर बेची अधिक than टेन लाख किताबे in 39 देशों  .
Burned was released on April 27 ,  2010 , और जैसे इम्तिहान , it डाला the यूएसए आज बेस्टसेलर  list that week at # 1 .
awakened , released in जनवरी , 2011 , भी  entered the list at # 1 .
The series ,  जिससे is प्रकाशित by st मार्टिन 's दबायें  is planned to include twelve books .
In  2008 , योजनाएँ लिये a फिल्मी अनुकूलन  were also announced .
The  दसवाँ किताब in the श्रेणी , छुपा , थी  released on October 16 , 2012 .
The second book in the novellas ( which  दे पृष्ठभूमि on supporting वर्ण ) , lenobia 's प्रण , थी released  January 31 , 2012 .
किताब ग्यारह is फिलहाल पुकारा नाज़िल , और the casts have घोषित कि दो अधिक novellas , neferet’s अभिशाप , नियोजित to be released फ़रवरी 19 , 2013  , and a prequel novel about Kalona , are to be released to coincide with the eleventh and twelfth books .
In Greek  mythology , the trojan युद्ध थी waged विरूद्ध the नगर of ट्रॉय by the achaeans ( यूनानियों ) बाद पेरिस of ट्रॉय took  Helen from her husband Menelaus king of Sparta .
The war is one of the most  महत्वपूर्ण कार्यक्रम in यूनानी mythology और रै महरूम narrated through अनेक works of यूनानी  literature , most notably through Homer 's Iliad and the Odyssey .
The Iliad relates a part  of the पिछला साल of the घेरा of ट्रॉय ; the ओडिसी describes odysseus  's journey home .
Other parts of the  युद्ध हैं contained in a साईकिल of एपिक कविताएं , जिससे have बच through  fragments .
Episodes from the war provided  सामग्री लिये यूनानी त्रासदी और अन्य works of यूनानी साहित्य , और लिये रोमन  poets including Virgil and Ovid .
The war originated  इससे a झगड़ा between the देवियाँ एथेना , hera , और aphrodite , बाद eris , the देवी of संघर्ष और अनबन , दिया उन्हें a सुनहरी  apple , sometimes known as the Apple of Discord , marked `` for the fairest '' .
Zeus sent the  देवियाँ to पेरिस , जो judged कि aphrodite , as  the `` fairest '' , should receive the apple .
In exchange , Aphrodite made Helen , the most beautiful  of सब महिलाओं और बीवी of menelaus , पतन in प्रेम साथ पेरिस , जो took उसके to  Troy .
Agamemnon , king of Mycenae and the  bhai of हेलेन 's husband menelaus , led an expedition of achaean सैनिकों to ट्रॉय और besieged the नगर  for ten years because of Paris ' insult .
After  the मौतों of अनेक नायक , सहित the achaeans achilles और अजाक्स , और the ट्रोजन्स हेक्टर और पेरिस  , the city fell to the ruse of the Trojan Horse .
The Achaeans slaughtered the Trojans ( except  लिये कुछ of the महिलाओं और children जिसको वे रखा or बेची as स्लेव ) और desecrated the मंदिरों , यूँ कमाई the  gods ' wrath .
Few of the Achaeans returned safely  to उनके घरों और अनेक संस्थापित colonies  in distant shores .
The Romans later  traced उनके उत्पत्ति to aeneas , एक of the ट्रोजन्स , जो थी कहा  to have led the surviving Trojans to modern-day Italy .
The  प्राचीन यूनानियों विचार कि the trojan युद्ध थी a ऐतिहासिक इवेंट कि था लिया प्लेस in the 13th or 12th सदी  BC , and believed that Troy was located in modern-day Turkey near the Dardanelles .
By  आधुनिक टाइम्स , दोनो the युद्ध और the नगर यहूद widely believed  to be non-historical .
In 1868 , however , the German archaeologist Heinrich Schliemann  मिले फ़्रैंक calvert , जो कायल schliemann कि ट्रॉय थी at hissarlik और schliemann took over calvert 's excavations on प्रॉपर्टी  belonging to Calvert ; this claim is now accepted by most scholars .
whether वहीँ is कोई ऐतिहासिक वास्तविकता पीछे  the Trojan War is an open question .
Many scholars believe that there is a historical core to  the टेल , हालांकि इस may बस औसत कि the homeric कहानियां हैं a संलयन of विभिन्न किस्से of sieges और रिझाने by  Mycenaean Greeks during the Bronze Age .
Those who believe that the  कहानियां of the trojan युद्ध हैं निकला इससे a विशिष्ट ऐतिहासिक विरोध प्रायः तिथि it to the 12th or 11th सदियां bc , प्रायः preferring the तिथियाँ दिए by इरैटोस्थनिज़ , 1194–1184 bc , जिससे  roughly corresponds with archaeological evidence of a catastrophic burning of Troy VIIa .
Anarchists  have employed निश्चित प्रतीकों लिये उनके कारण , सहित सबसे prominently the circle-a और the ब्लैक ध्वज , हालांकि anarchists  have historically largely denied the importance of symbols to political movement .
Since the revival of anarchism  around the प्रारंभ of the 21st-century संयुक्त साथ the वृद्धि of the anti-globalization गति , अराजकतावादी सांस्कृतिक  symbols are widely present .
The greater palatine canal ( or pterygopalatine  कनाल ) is a ड्योढ़ी in the कपाल कि transmits the वृहद palatine धमनी , रग , और तंत्रिका between the pterygopalatine fossa  and the oral cavity .
Surface temperature of Antarctica in  शीत और गर्मियाँ इससे the यूरोपीय केन्द्र लिये medium-range मौसम  Forecasts
the जलवायु of अंटार्कटिक is  the coldest on the whole of Earth .
Antarctica has the lowest naturally occurring temperature ever  अंकित on the मैदान on धरती : −89.2 °c ( −128.6 °f ) at वोस्तोक  Station .
It is also extremely dry (  technically a मरुस्थल ) , averaging 166 mm ( 6.5 in ) of वर्षण  per year .
Even so ,  on सबसे भाग of the महाद्वीप the हिम rarely melts और is आखिरकार संपीडित to become the glacial बर्फ कि  makes up the ice sheet .
Weather  fronts rarely घुस दूर into the  continent .
Most of Antarctica has  an बर्फ कैप जलवायु ( köppen ef ) साथ बहुत ठंडा , generally अत्यधिक शुष्क मौसम throughout the साल  and no month averaging above 0 °C ( 32 °F ) .
Some fringe  तटीय क्षेत्रों have a टुण्ड्रा जलवायु ( köppen et ) साथ a छोटी गर्मियाँ averaging ऊपर जमने  , and much higher precipitation .
Current  सिर कोच माइक tomlin ,  during the 2007 season
The Pittsburgh  स्टीलर्स मताधिकार रै था 16 सिर कोच  throughout its history .
Founded as the  पिट्सबर्ग pirates in , the नाम थी बदला to the स्टीलर्स prior to the ऋतु to  celebrate the city 's heritage of producing steel .
Joe Bach  परोसा दो पृथक शर्तें as सिर कोच और वॉल्ट kiesling परोसा  three separate terms .
During the and seasons ,  due to the राशि of खिलाड़ी जो लड़ा in संसार युद्ध ii , the स्टीलर्स संयुक्त उनके टोली साथ फिलाडेल्फिया और शिकागो , क्रमशः  .
During these  सीज़न , स्टीलर्स ' कोच वॉल्ट kiesling साझा कोचिंग कर्तव्य साथ चिकनी neale और फिल हैंडलर  , who have not been included within this list .
Struggling for much of the  मताधिकार 's जल्दी सालो , the टोली 's पहला ऋतु साथ अधिक विन्स than नुकसान थी coached by jock sutherland  in .
In ,  अंतर्गत sutherland , the स्टीलर्स निभाई उनके पहला playoff  game against the Philadelphia Eagles .
Ten of the 16 head coaches spent their entire professional coaching  करियर साथ the मताधिकार , सहित जॉन mcnally , वॉल्ट kiesling और चक noll , जो have भी महरूम voted into the प्रो फ़ुटबॉल  Hall of Fame .
One  of तभी चार मेन to कोच the वही टोली  for 23 years , Chuck Noll retired in .
Noll is also  the तभी कोच in नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग इतिहास  to win four Super Bowls .
Bill Cowher , Noll 's  बदलना , coached the स्टीलर्स to उनके पांचवां सुपर कटोरी  victory , in 2005 .
The  स्टीलर्स छठे सुपर कटोरी जीत आए in सुपर कटोरी xliii , जबकि सिर coached  by Mike Tomlin , the team 's current head coach .
In criminal  विधि , धोखाधड़ी is जानबूझकर deception बना लिये निजी लाभ or to क्षति another व्यक्तिगत ; the सम्बन्धित  adjective is fraudulent , and verb is defraud .
Fraud is a  अपराधों और a सिविल विधि उल्लंघन , हालांकि the विशिष्ट दण्ड विधि परिभाषा  varies by legal jurisdiction .
Defrauding  लोगों or entities of धन or valuables is a आम  purpose of fraud .
A hoax also involves  deception , लकिन बगैर the इरादे of लाभ or of damaging  or depriving the victim .
Fraud is a defense in a civil action  लिये उल्लंघन of अनुबंध or विशिष्ट प्रदर्शन of a अनुबंध  .
Fraud is a  आधार लिये निष्पक्ष क्षेत्राधिकार  .
Passover , or Pesach (  इससे : in यहूदी , यहूदी ) , tiberian : , आधुनिक यहूदी : /ˈpesaχ/ pesah , pesakh , यहूदी : peysekh , paysakh  , Paysokh ) is an important Biblically -derived Jewish festival .
Historically , together with Shavuot ( ``  पेंटेकोस्ट '' ) और sukkot ( `` झोपड़ियों '' ) , passover is एक of the तीन यात्राएं त्यौहार ( shalosh regalim ) दौरान जिससे  the entire population of the kingdom of Judah made a pilgrimage to the Temple in Jerusalem .
Samaritans still make this pilgrimage to  माउंट gerizim , लकिन तभी मेन participate in पब्लिक इबादत  .
Passover  commences on the 15th of the यहूदी माह of nisan और lasts लिये either सात दिनों ( in इसराईल  ) or eight days ( in the diaspora ) .
In Judaism , a day  commences at संध्या और lasts जबतक the following संध्या , यूँ the पहला दिन of passover तभी begins बाद संध्या of the 14th of nisan और ends at  dusk of the 15th day of the month of Nisan .
The rituals unique to the Passover celebrations commence  साथ the passover seder जब the 15th of nisan रै begun  .
In the  उत्तरी गोलार्ध passover takes प्लेस in वसन्त as the तोरा prescribes it : `` in the माह  of [ the ] spring '' ( בחדש האביב ) .
It is one of the most widely  observed यहूदी छुट्टियाँ  .
The Jewish people celebrate Passover as a  commemoration of उनके मुक्ति over 3,300 सालो पहले by परमेश्वर इससे गुलामी in प्राचीन मिश्र कि थी शासित by the pharaohs , और उनके जनम as a स्वदेश अंतर्गत  the leadership of Moses .
It  commemorates the स्टोरी of the exodus as वर्णित in the यहूदी  Bible especially in the Book of Exodus , in which the Israelites were freed from slavery in Egypt .
In the narrative of the Exodus , the Bible tells that  परमेश्वर helped the children of इसराईल एस्केप इससे उनके गुलामी in मिश्र by inflicting टेन plagues upon  the ancient Egyptians before the Pharaoh would release his Israelite slaves ; the tenth and worst of the plagues was the death of the Egyptian first-born .
The Israelites were instructed to mark the doorposts of  उनके घरों साथ the रक्त of a slaughtered वसन्त मेमने और , upon देखकर इस , the स्पिरिट of the रब  knew to pass over the first-born in these homes , hence the name of the holiday .
There is  कुछ बहस over जहाँ the पद is दरअसल  derived from .
जब the pharaoh freed the israelites , it is कहा कि वे बाएँ in ऐसे a hurry कि वे could  not wait for bread dough to rise ( leaven ) .
In  commemoration , लिये the अवधि of passover no leavened ब्रैड is खाया , लिये जिससे  reason it is called `` The Festival of the Unleavened Bread '' .
Thus  matzo ( चपटा unleavened ब्रैड ) is खाया दौरान  Passover and it is a symbol of the holiday .
Halley 's Comet or Comet  हैली ( or ) , officially designated 1p/halley , is the best-known of the short-period धूमकेतुओं और is दृश्य  from Earth every 75–76 years .
Halley is  the तभी short-period धूमकेतु कि is clearly दृश्य to the नग्न नजर इससे धरती , और यूँ the तभी naked-eye  comet that might appear twice in a human lifetime .
Other  naked-eye धूमकेतुओं may be उज्जवल और अधिक spectacular , लकिन होगा  appear only once in thousands of years .
Halley 's returns to the inner Solar System  have महरूम observed और अंकित by खगोलशास्त्रियों चूंकि at तनिक 240  BCE .
Clear records of the comet 's appearances were made  by चाइनीज , babylonian , और मध्यकालीन यूरोपीय chroniclers , लकिन यहूद नहीं पहचाना as reappearances  of the same object at the time .
The comet 's  periodicity थी पहला संकल्पित in 1705 by  English astronomer Edmond Halley , after whom it is now named .
हैली 's धूमकेतु पिछला appeared in the भीतरी सौर प्रणाली in 1986  and will next appear in mid-2061 .
During its 1986 apparition , Halley became  the पहला धूमकेतु to be observed in विवरण by spacecraft , providing the पहला observational आंकड़ा on the ढांचा of  a comet nucleus and the mechanism of coma and tail formation .
These observations  समर्थित a क्रमांक of longstanding hypotheses परिचय धूमकेतु निर्माण , विशेषकर फ्रेड whipple 's `` गंदा स्नोबॉल '' मॉडल , जिससे correctly पूर्वानुमानित कि हैली होता  be composed of a mixture of volatile ices – such as water , carbon dioxide and ammonia – and dust .
The  मिशन भी provided आंकड़ा जिससे substantially reformed और reconfigured ये विचार ; लिये उदाहरण it is अभी  understood that Halley 's surface is largely composed of dusty , non-volatile materials , and that only a small portion of it is icy .
anti-communism is विपक्ष to साम्यवादी  .
Organized anti-communism  विकसित in प्रतिक्रिया to the वृद्धि of साम्यवादी , विशेषकर बाद the 1917 अक्तूबर क्रान्ति in रूस  and reaching global dimensions during the Cold War .
Most anti-communists reject the  अवधारणा of ऐतिहासिक भौतिकवाद , जिससे is a सेंट्रल विचार  in Marxism .
Anti-communists  अस्वीकृत the मार्क्सवादी विश्वास कि पूंजीवाद होगा be followed by समाजवादी और साम्यवादी  , just as feudalism was followed by capitalism .
Anti-communists question the validity of the Marxist claim  कि the समाजवादी राज्य होगा `` wither दूर '' जब it becomes अनावश्यक  in a true communist society .
Anti-communists  argue कि the दमन in the जल्दी सालो of bolshevik नियम , जबकि नहीं as चरम as कि दौरान जोसेफ स्टालिन 's नियम , थी स्टिल कठोर by उचित मानकों , citing उदाहरण ऐसे as फेलिक्स dzerzhinsky  's secret police , which eliminated numerous political opponents by extrajudicial executions , and the brutal crushing of the Kronstadt rebellion and Tambov rebellion .
Some anti-communists refer to both Communism and fascism as  सर्वसत्तावाद , देखकर समानता between the क्रियाएँ of कम्युनिस्ट और फासिस्ट  governments .
इतिहासकार रॉबर्ट conquest रै argued कि साम्यवादी थी जिम्मेदार  for tens of millions of deaths during the 20th century .
प्रतिद्वंद्वियों argue कि कम्युनिस्ट पार्टियों कि have आइये to शक्ति have  tended to be rigidly intolerant of political opposition .
These opponents claim  कि सबसे कम्युनिस्ट देशों have दिखाया no लक्षण of advancing  from Marx 's socialist stage of economy to an ideal communist stage .
Rather , Communist governments have been accused of creating a new  सत्ताधारी क्लास ( a nomenklatura ) , साथ शक्तियां और privileges वृहद than those previously enjoyed by the अपर वर्ग in the non-  communist regimes .
Gil Heron ( 9 April  1922 – 27 नवम्बर 2008 ) थी a jamaican  professional footballer .
He was the first black player to play for Scottish club  सेल्टिक , और थी the पिता of कवि और संगीतकार gil scott-heron  .
He died in  डेट्रॉयट of a दिल आक्रमण  on 27 November 2008 .
The soybean ( US ) or soya bean ( UK ) (  glycine अधिकतम ) is a प्रजाति of legume देशी to ईस्ट एशिया , widely grown लिये इसके खाद्य  bean which has numerous uses .
The plant is  classed as an oilseed बल्कि than a पल्स by the un खाना  and Agricultural Organization ( FAO ) .
Fat-free ( defatted ) soybean meal is a significant  और सस्ती सोर्स of प्रोटीन लिये एनिमल फ़ीड्स और अनेक prepackaged meals ; सोया सब्ज़ी आयल is another उत्पाद of प्रसंस्करण the सोयाबीन  crop .
For example ,  सोयाबीन उत्पाद ऐसे as textured सब्ज़ी प्रोटीन ( tvp ) हैं संघटक  in many meat and dairy analogues .
Soybeans produce  significantly अधिक प्रोटीन प्रति एकड़ than  most other uses of land .
Traditional nonfermented food uses  of soybeans शामिल सोया मिल्क , और इससे the latter  tofu and tofu skin .
Fermented foods  शामिल सोया सॉस , fermented सेम paste , natto , और  tempeh , among others .
The oil is used  in अनेक औद्योगिक अनुप्रयोग  .
The main producers of soy  हैं the संयुक्त राज्य ( 35 % ) , ब्राज़ील ( 27 % ) , अर्जेंटीना ( 19 % ) , चीन ( 6 % ) और इण्डिया  ( 4 % ) .
The beans contain  significant amounts of phytic एसिड , alpha-linolenic  acid , and isoflavones .
Harrison Ford ( born July 13 ,  1942 ) is an अमरीकी फिल्मी कर्ता और निर्माता  .
He is famous for his performances as Han Solo in the original Star  युद्धों त्रयी और the शीर्षक अक्षर of the इंडियाना जोन्स फिल्मी श्रेणी .
Ford is also known for his roles as Rick Deckard in Blade Runner , John  किताब in गवाह और जोकर रयान in patriot खेल और साफ और  Present Danger .
His career has spanned six  दशकों और शामिल भूमिकाएँ in अनेक हॉलीवुड blockbusters , सहित presumed निर्दोष  , The Fugitive , Air Force One , and What Lies Beneath .
At one point ,  चार of the शीर्ष छह box-office हिट्स of सब समय शामिल एक of उसके  roles .
पाँच of उसके films have महरूम inducted into  the National Film Registry .
In 1997 , Ford was ranked No . 1 in Empire `` The  शीर्ष 100 फिल्म सितारों of सब समय '' सूची  .
, the United States domestic box office grosses  of घाट 's films कुल over us $ 3.5 अरब , साथ विश्वव्यापी grosses surpassing $ 6 अरब , बनाना घाट the तीसरा उच्चतम grossing u.S. घरेलू  box-office star .
Ford is the  husband of अभिनेत्री calista flockhart  .
a ट्यूब of chapstick
ChapStick is a brand name for  लिप बाम manufactured by फाइजर उपभोक्ता healthcare और  used in many countries worldwide .
It is  intended to सहायता दावत और prevent  chapped lips ; hence the name .
Many  किस्में भी शामिल सनस्क्रीन in अनुक्रम to prevent  sunburn .
Due to its  लोकप्रियता , the पद रै become a  genericized trademark .
It popularly refers to any lip balm  contained in a lipstick-style ट्यूब और लागू in the वही manner  as lipstick .
However , the term is still a  पंजीकृत ट्रेडमार्क , साथ अधिकारों exclusively स्वामित्व by  Pfizer .
In Sweden and in the United Kingdom ,  the उत्पाद 's प्रमुख प्रतिस्पर्धी is lypsyl , बना by novartis उपभोक्ता स्वास्थ्य , जिससे is वितरित in समान पैकेजिंग to chapstick  .
George Berkeley ( ; 12 March 168514 January  1753 ) , भी ज्ञात as बिशप बर्कली ( बिशप of cloyne ) , थी an anglo-irish पारस जिनकी प्राथमिक  achievement was the advancement of a theory he called `` immaterialism '' ( later referred to as `` subjective idealism `` by others ) .
This  सिद्धान्त झुठलाए the अस्तित्व of सामग्री पदार्थ और बजाय contends कि परिचित वस्तुएँ जैसे टेबल और  chairs are only ideas in the minds of perceivers , and as a result can not exist without being perceived .
Thus , as Berkeley  famously put it , लिये शारीरिक वस्तुएँ `` esse est percipi  '' ( `` to be is to be perceived `` ) .
Berkeley  is भी ज्ञात लिये उसके critique of abstraction , an महत्वपूर्ण  premise in his argument for immaterialism .
In 1709 , Berkeley published his first major work , , in which he discussed the limitations of human vision and advanced the theory  कि the उचित वस्तुएँ of sight हैं नहीं सामग्री वस्तुएँ , लकिन लाइट और रंग  .
This foreshadowed his chief philosophical work A Treatise Concerning the Principles of Human Knowledge in 1710 which , after its poor reception ,  he rewrote in संवाद रूप और प्रकाशित अंतर्गत the शीर्षक तीन संवाद between hylas और philonous in 1713  .
In this book , Berkeley 's views were represented by Philonous (  यूनानी : 'प्रेमr of दिमाग ' ) , जबकि hylas ( यूनानी : 'मैटr ' ) embodies the आयरिश thinker’s प्रतिद्वंद्वियों , in particular जॉन locke  .
Berkeley argued against Sir  इसहाक़ न्यूटन 's doctrine of निरपेक्ष स्पेस , समय और गति in de मोटू  ( on Motion ) , published 1721 .
His arguments  यहूद a precursor to the दृश्य of mach और आइंस्टीन  .
In 1732 , he published Alciphron , a Christian apologetic  विरूद्ध the free-thinkers , और in 1734 , he प्रकाशित the विश्लेषक , an empiricist critique of the मूलाधार of infinitesimal  calculus , which was influential in the development of mathematics .
His last major philosophical work ,  siris ( 1744 ) , begins by वकालत the औषधीय उपयोग of तारकोल जल , और तब continues  to discuss a wide range of topics including science , philosophy , and theology .
Interest in Berkeley 's work increased after World War II , because he  tackled अनेक of the मुद्दे of सर्वोपरि ब्याज to दर्शनशास्त्र in the 20th सदी ऐसे as the समस्याएं of बोध , the अंतर between प्राथमिक और द्वितीयक qualities , और the महत्व of भाषा  .
Qingdao ( ) , historically known as Tsingtao , is a major city in eastern Shandong  प्रांत , पूर्वी चीन , साथ a जनसांख्यिकी of over 8.715 लाख  ( 2010 census ) .
Its built  up क्षेत्रफल , बना of 6 शहरी जिले और 4 county-level शहरों  , is home to about 4,896,000 inhabitants in 2010 .
It  सीमायें yantai to the पूर्वोत्तर ,  Weifang to the west and Rizhao to the southwest .
Qīng ( ) in Chinese means `` green  '' or `` रसीले '' , जबकि dǎo ( ) अर्थात्  `` island '' .
चिंगदाओ is administered at the sub-provincial  level .
Lying  आरपार the शानदोंग प्रायद्वीप जबकि looking आउट to the पीला समुद्र , चिंगदाओ is a प्रमुख  seaport , naval base , and industrial centre .
It is also  the साईट of the tsingtao ब्रेवरी  .
The world 's  longest समुद्र सेतु , the चिंगदाओ haiwan सेतु , कड़ी the प्रमुख शहरी क्षेत्रफल of चिंगदाओ साथ huangdao ज़िला , straddling  the Jiaozhou Bay sea areas .
Qingdao is named  चीन 's सबसे livable नगर .
Mimivirus is a viral genus containing a single identified species named  acanthamoeba polyphaga mimivirus ( apmv ) , or is a समूह of phylogenetically सम्बन्धित विशाल वाइरस ( designated  usually MimiN ) .
In colloquial speech , APMV is more  commonly referred to as बस `` mimivirus  '' .
Until October 2011 ,  जब a larger वायरस megavirus chilensis  was described , it had the largest capsid diameter of all known viruses .
mimivirus रै a विशाल और जटिल genome compared  with most other viruses .
mimivirus , छोटी लिये `` mimicking microbe '' , is so पुकारा to प्रतिबिंबित  its large size and apparent Gram-staining properties .
The Mexican War of Independence ( 1810–1821 ) was an armed conflict between the people of  मैक्सिको और the स्पेनी औपनिवेशिक अधिकारियों जिससे प्रारंभ on सितंबर  16 , 1810 .
The movement , which became known as the Mexican War of Independence , was led by  mexican-born spaniards , mestizos और amerindians जो sought स्वतंत्रता इससे स्पेन  .
It started as an idealistic peasants ' rebellion against their  औपनिवेशिक मास्टर्स , लकिन ended as an असंभावित गठबंधन between मैक्सिकन ex-royalists और मैक्सिकन छापामार insurgents  .
Crohn 's disease , also  ज्ञात as crohn सिंड्रोम और क्षेत्रीय enteritis , is a प्रकार of जलन bowel बीमारी कि may affect कोई भाग of the जठरांत्र  tract from mouth to anus , causing a wide variety of symptoms .
It primarily causes abdominal pain , diarrhea ( which may be bloody if inflammation is at its  worst ) , उल्टी ( can be निरन्तर ) , or वज़न घाटा , लकिन may भी कारण जटिलताओं बाहर the जठरांत्र ट्रैक्ट ऐसे as  skin rashes , arthritis , inflammation of the eye , tiredness , and lack of concentration .
Crohn 's  बीमारी is caused by interactions between पर्यावरणीय , immunological और  bacterial factors in genetically susceptible individuals .
This results  in a दीर्घकालिक जलन विकार , in जिससे the देह 's प्रतिरक्षा प्रणाली हमले the जठरांत्र  tract possibly directed at microbial antigens .
Crohn 's disease has wrongly been described as an autoimmune  बीमारी in the पास्ट ; हाल जांचकर्ताओं have वर्णित it as an प्रतिरक्षा कमियां  state .
There is a genetic  संघ साथ crohn 's बीमारी , primarily साथ विसंगतियाँ of the  NOD2 gene and its protein , which senses bacterial cell walls .
सहोदर of प्रभावित individuals  are at higher risk .
Males and females are  बराबर प्रभावित .
Smokers are two times more likely to  develop crohn 's बीमारी than nonsmokers  .
Crohn  's बीमारी affects between 400,000 और 600,000  people in North America .
Prevalence estimates for Northern Europe  have ranged इससे 27–48 प्रति 100,000  .
Crohn 's disease tends to present  initially in the किशोर और twenties , साथ another शिखर incidence in the fifties to seventies , हालांकि the बीमारी  can occur at any age .
There is no known pharmaceutical or  सर्जिकल इलाज़ लिये crohn 's बीमारी  .
Treatment options are restricted  to controlling लक्षण , maintaining remission , और preventing  relapse .
The disease was named after gastroenterologist Burrill Bernard Crohn , who , in 1932 , together with two other colleagues at Mount Sinai Hospital in New  यॉर्क , वर्णित a श्रेणी of मरीजों साथ सूजन of the टर्मिनल ileum , the क्षेत्रफल सबसे commonly प्रभावित by the बीमारी  .
This is  an अधूरी सूची of the tallest  buildings and structures by country .
The list directly includes the tallest buildings and structures for each country , and where appropriate , it also points  to अधिक विस्तृत country-specific सूचियाँ  .
Rough and Ready is a census-designated  प्लेस in नेवाडा काउंटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , संयुक्त राज्य  .
It is  स्तिथ वेस्ट of ग्रास घाटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , लगभग  62 miles ( 100 km ) from Sacramento .
the जनसांख्यिकी थी 963 at  the 2010 census .
YouTube is a  video-sharing जालस्थल , निर्मित by तीन पूर्व paypal कर्मचारी in फ़रवरी 2005 , on  which users can upload , view and share videos .
The company is based in San Bruno , California ,  और उपयोग adobe फ्लैश वीडियो और html5 प्रौद्योगिकी to प्रदर्शक a चौड़ी किस्में of user-generated वीडियो सामग्री , सहित फिल्म क्लिप्स  , TV clips , and music videos , as well as amateur content such as video blogging , short original videos , and educational videos .
Most of the content on YouTube has been uploaded by individuals , although media  corporations सहित सीबीएस , the बीबीसी , vevo , hulu , और अन्य संगठन प्रस्ताव कुछ  of their material via the site , as part of the YouTube partnership program .
Unregistered users can  देखें वीडियो , जबकि पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता can अपलोड an  unlimited number of videos .
Videos considered to contain  potentially अप्रिय सामग्री हैं उपलब्धियाँ तभी to पंजीकृत उपयोक्ता at तनिक  18 years old .
In November 2006 , YouTube , LLC was  खरीदा by google लिये us $ 1.65 अरब , और operates as a subsidiary of google  .
Sister Act is a musical written by Cheri Steinkellner  और विधेयक steinkellner साथ अतिरिक्त किताब सामग्री by डगलस कार्टर beane , साथ गीत by ग्लेन स्लेटर और म्यूज़िक  by Alan Menken .
It is based on  the hit 1992 फिल्मी कॉमेडी of the वही  name .
The 2009 West End production  थी उत्पादित by स्टेज entertainment , whoopi गोल्डबर्ग , और माइकल रेनो  for Sis Acts LLC .
गोल्डबर्ग is भी a निर्माता of the 2011  Broadway adaptation .
Microsoft DirectX is a collection  of अनुप्रयोग प्रोग्रामिंग अंतरफलक ( api ) लिये हैंडलिंग कार्य सम्बन्धित to मल्टीमीडिया , विशेषकर खेल  programming and video , on Microsoft platforms .
Originally , the  names of ये api सब began साथ सीधा , ऐसे as direct3d , directdraw , directmusic , directplay , directsound  , and so forth .
The name DirectX was coined as  आशुलिपि पद लिये सब of ये api ( the x खड़ा in लिये the particular api  names ) and soon became the name of the collection .
When Microsoft later set out to develop a gaming console , the X was used as  the आधार of the नाम एक्सबॉक्स to indicate कि the कंसोल थी आधारित on डाइरेक्टएक्स  technology .
The X initial has been carried forward in the naming of APIs designed for the Xbox such as XInput and the Cross-platform Audio Creation Tool ( XACT ) , while  the डाइरेक्टएक्स पैटर्न रै महरूम जारी लिये खिड़कियाँ api  such as Direct2D and DirectWrite .
Direct3D ( the 3D graphics API within DirectX ) is widely  प्रयुक्त in the विकास of वीडियो खेल लिये microsoft खिड़कियाँ , microsoft एक्सबॉक्स , microsoft एक्सबॉक्स 360 और कुछ sega dreamcast  games .
Direct3D is also used by other software applications for visualization  और ग्राफिक्स कार्य ऐसे as cad/cam अभियान्त्रिकी .
As  direct3d is the सबसे widely publicized घटक of डाइरेक्टएक्स , it is  common to see the names `` DirectX '' and `` Direct3D '' used interchangeably .
The DirectX software development kit ( SDK ) consists of runtime libraries in  redistributable शब्दकोष रूप , साथ साथ accompanying दस्तावेज़ीकरण और headers लिये उपयोग in कोडिंग  .
Originally , the runtimes were only  संस्थापित by खेल or explicitly by the उपयोक्ता  .
खिड़कियाँ 95 किया नहीं लॉन्च साथ डाइरेक्टएक्स , लकिन डाइरेक्टएक्स थी शामिल साथ  Windows 95 OEM Service Release 2 .
Windows 98 and Windows NT 4.0 both shipped with  डाइरेक्टएक्स , as रै प्रत्येक संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ released चूंकि  .
The SDK is  उपलब्धियाँ as a फ़्री डाउनलोड  .
While  the runtimes हैं मालिकाना , closed-source तन्त्र  , source code is provided for most of the SDK samples .
Starting with the  रिलीज of खिड़कियाँ 8 डेवलपर पूर्वावलोकन , डाइरेक्टएक्स sdk  has been integrated into Windows SDK .
Direct3D 9Ex , Direct3D 10 , and Direct3D 11 are only available for Windows Vista and newer because  प्रत्येक of ये नई संस्करण थी निर्मित to निर्भर upon the नई खिड़कियाँ प्रदर्शक ड्राइवर मॉडल कि थी introduced लिये खिड़कियाँ विस्टा  .
The  नई vista/wddm ग्राफिक्स वास्तुकला शामिल a नई वीडियो मेमोरी मैनेजर supporting आभासीकरण of  graphics hardware for various applications and services like the Desktop Window Manager .
Quetzaltenango , also commonly  ज्ञात by इसके स्वदेशी नाम , xelajú , or अधिक commonly , xela , is the दूसरी largest  city of Guatemala .
It is both the capital of Quetzaltenango Department and  the नगरपालिका सीट of quetzaltenango नगरपालिका .
It has  an अनुमानित जनसांख्यिकी  of 224,703 .
The population is about  61 % स्वदेशी or amerindian , 34 % मेस्टिज़ो or ladino  and 5 % European .
Quetzaltenango is located in a  पहाड़ घाटी at an उन्नयन of 2,330 मीटर ( 7,655 ft ) ऊपर समुद्र  level at its lowest part .
It may  पहुँचें ऊपर 2,400 मीटर भीतर the  city .
The  नगरपालिका of quetzaltenango consists  of an area of .
municipalities abutting the नगरपालिका of quetzaltenango शामिल : salcajá , cantel , almolonga ,  Zunil , El Palmar , Concepción Chiquirichapa , San Mateo , La Esperanza , Olintepeque , and San Andrés Xecul .
All these municipalities are part of the Department  of quetzaltenango , मगर सैन आन्द्रेस xecul जिससे is a भाग of the विभाग of  Totonicapán .
The Epic of Gilgamesh , an epic poem from Mesopotamia , is  amongst the earliest surviving works of साहित्य .
The literary history of Gilgamesh begins with five  स्वतंत्र sumerian कविताएं परिचय 'bilgamesh ' ( sumerian लिये  Gilgamesh ) , king of Uruk .
Four of these were used as  सोर्स सामग्री लिये a संयुक्त एपिक in अक्कादी .
This first combined epic , known as the `` Old Babylonian ''  संस्करण , तिथियाँ to the 18th सदी bc और is titled बाद इसके incipit , shūtur एली sharrī  ( `` Surpassing All Other Kings '' ) .
Only a few  fragments of it have बच  .
The later `` Standard Babylonian '' version dates from the 13th to  the 10th सदियां bc और bears the incipit शा naqba  īmuru ( `` He who Saw the Deep '' ) .
Fragments of approximately two thirds of this  longer , twelve-tablet संस्करण have महरूम बरामद  .
Some of the best copies were discovered in the  पुस्तकालयों तबाह of the 7th-century bc assyrian किंग  Ashurbanipal .
The story  centers on a दोस्ती between gilgamesh  and Enkidu .
Enkidu is a wild man created by the gods as  gilgamesh 's बराबर to distract उसे इससे oppressing the लोगों of uruk  .
Together , they journey to the Cedar  पहाड़ to शिकस्त humbaba , इसके monstrous संरक्षक .
Later they kill the Bull of  स्वर्ग , जिससे the देवी इश्तार भेजना to सजा gilgamesh लिये spurning उसके  advances .
As a punishment for  ये क्रियाएँ , the देवताओं वाक्य enkidu  to death .
The second half of the epic focuses on  gilgamesh 's तकलीफ at enkidu 's मौत , और उसके  quest for immortality .
In order to learn  the रहस्य of अनन्त जीवन , gilgamesh undertakes a long और perilous यात्रा  .
He learns that `` The life  कि तुम हैं seeking तुम होगा never ढूँढें  .
When the  देवताओं निर्मित man वे आवंटित to उसे मौत , लकिन जीवन वे retained  in their own keeping . ''
This quote was originally attributed to Siduri in the Old  babylonian संस्करण of the एपिक , और तब attributed to the अमर बाढ़ नायिका utnapishtim in the  Akkadian version of the epic .
Nevertheless , Gilgamesh 's fame lived on after his death , because of his great  भवन प्रोजेक्ट , और उसके खाता of कया utnapishtim बताई उसे happened दौरान  the flood .
the स्टोरी रै महरूम अनूदित into अनेक अलग भाषाएं , और  Gilgamesh has since become adapted in works of popular fiction .
There are  numerous debates over जो निर्मित the पहला वीडियो खेल , साथ the जवाब  depending largely on how video games are defined .
The  एवोल्यूशन of वीडियो खेल represents a उलझे वेब of अनेक अलग उद्योग , सहित  scientific , computer , arcade , and consumer electronics .
The ``  वीडियो '' in `` वीडियो खेल `` traditionally refers to a रास्टर  display device .
With the  लोकप्रिय कैच phrase उपयोग of the पद `` वीडियो खेल '' , the पद अभी  implies all display types , formats , and platforms .
Historians have  भी sought to बायपास the समस्या by बजाय using the अधिक विशिष्ट `` डिजिटल खेल  '' descriptive .
This term leaves  आउट the पहले analog-based  computer games .
This is a list of  best-selling वीडियो खेल franchises कि have बेची or shipped at  least 5 million copies .
Unless otherwise  stated , संख्याएँ indicate विश्वव्यापी इकाई बेची , ordered alphabetically whenever दो or अधिक  list the same amount .
The exception are the ones specifying  शिपमेंट , जिससे have निम्नतर पूर्वता than अन्य लिस्टिंग बिक्री  .
मताधिकार बिक्री शामिल विस्तार पैक भी हालांकि वे हैं  not considered full video games .
For best-selling  व्यक्तिगत वीडियो खेल , देखिए सूची  of best-selling video games .
The sales figures given below do not include arcade game sales , which  can be मिला at सूची of highest-grossing  arcade video games .
– This  रंग indicates a sub-series of a larger वीडियो  game franchise .
This does not necessarily  लागू लिये श्रेणी कि हैं नहीं वीडियो game-based .
Dorothy Ann Willis Richards ( September 1 , 1933 – September 13 ,  2006 ) थी an अमरीकी राजनेता और the 45th राज्यपाल of टेक्सास  .
She first came to national  ध्यान as the राज्य कोषाध्यक्ष of टेक्सास , जब वो वितरित the  keynote address at the 1988 Democratic National Convention .
Richards  परोसा as the 45th राज्यपाल of टेक्सास इससे 1991 to 1995 और थी पराजित  for re-election in 1994 by George W. Bush .
Ann  रिचर्ड्स थी the दूसरी मादा  governor of Texas .
Data Execution Prevention (  dep ) is a सुरक्षा विशेषता शामिल in आधुनिक ऑपरेटिंग  systems .
It is known to be available in Linux , Mac OS X ,  आईओएस , microsoft खिड़कियाँ और एंड्रॉइड ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों और is intended to prevent an अनुप्रयोग or सेवा इससे निष्पादित  code from a non-executable memory region .
This  helps prevent निश्चित कारनामे कि स्टोर कोड  via a buffer overflow , for example .
DEP runs in two  मोड्स : hardware-enforced dep लिये cpu कि can चिह्नित मेमोरी पृष्ठों as nonexecutable , और software-enforced dep साथ सीमित सुरक्षा  for CPUs that do not have hardware support .
software-enforced dep करता नहीं protect विरूद्ध निष्पादन of कोड  in data pages , but instead counters SEH overwrite , another type of attack .
DEP was introduced on  लिनक्स in 2004 ( कर्नेल 2.6.8 ) , on खिड़कियाँ in 2004 साथ खिड़कियाँ xp सेवा पैक 2 , जबकि ठहराना introduced  DEP when they moved to x86 in 2006 .
Example  उदाहरण of दो आम futanari  variants
, is the Japanese word for  hermaphroditism , जिससे is भी प्रयुक्त in a broader भाव लिये androgyny  .
Beyond Japan  the पद is प्रयुक्त to describe a commonly pornographic विधा of कंप्यूटर खेल ,  comics and animations , which includes characters that show both primary sexual characteristics .
But in today 's language it refers almost  exclusively लिये वर्ण जो have an overall feminine  appearance .
In that case the  पद is भी प्रायः abbreviated as futa ( s ) , जिससे is occasionally  also used as term for the works itself .
Early CAPTCHAs  ऐसे as ये , उत्पन्न by the ez-gimpy  program , were used on Yahoo !
A modern CAPTCHA ,  बल्कि than attempting to बनाएँ a distorted पृष्ठभूमि और ऊँची स्तर of warping on the टेक्स्ट , might फ़ोकस on  making segmentation difficult by adding an angled line .
Another way to make segmentation difficult is to crowd  प्रतीकों साथ , as in याहू ! 's वर्तमान  CAPTCHA format .
Some CAPTCHAs try  to utilize the क्षमता of लोगों  to see three-dimensional objects .
On  इस चित्र , प्रतीकों हैं drawn साथ लाइनों of  different thickness to make an effect of extrusion .
A CAPTCHA ( ) is a type of challenge-response test used in computing  as an attempt to ensure कि the जवाब is उत्पन्न by a इंसान होने  .
The process  प्रायः involves a कंप्यूटर पूछे a उपयोक्ता to पूरा a सरल परीक्षण जिससे the कंप्यूटर is समर्थ  to grade .
These tests are  designed to be आसान लिये a कंप्यूटर to generate लकिन मुश्किल लिये a कंप्यूटर to solve , लकिन  again easy for a human .
If a correct solution is  प्राप्त , it can be presumed to have महरूम डाला  by a human .
A common type of CAPTCHA  requires the उपयोक्ता to प्रकार अक्षर and/or अंक इससे a distorted चित्र कि appears  on the screen .
Such tests are commonly used to prevent unwanted internet bots from accessing websites , since a normal human  can easily पढ़ा a captcha , जबकि the bot can नहीं प्रक्रम the चित्र अक्षर और इसलिए , can नहीं जवाब properly , or at सब  .
Although most CAPTCHAs are letter pictures randomly generated , many of them have become difficult even  लिये a इंसान to पढ़ा , so चित्र captchas यहूद निर्मित in जिससे a इंसान is दिखाया a सरल परीक्षण to दिखाएँ a चित्र of a निश्चित एनिमल ( दिए few एनिमल तस्वीरें ) , जिससे is सरल लिये a इंसान होने to प्रक्रम , और इसलिए आसान to चुनें , जबकि a bot can नहीं प्रक्रम और solve the सवाल  because although it can analyze the picture , it can not easily guess the animal .
The term  `` captcha '' थी coined in 2000 by लुइस वोन ahn , मैनुएल ब्लम , निकोलस  J. Hopper , and John Langford ( all of Carnegie Mellon University ) .
It is an acronym based on the word ``  कैप्चर '' और खड़ा लिये `` completely स्वचालित पब्लिक turing परीक्षण  to tell Computers and Humans Apart '' .
Carnegie Mellon University attempted to trademark the term on 15  अक्तूबर 2004 , लकिन the ट्रेडमार्क अनुप्रयोग थी abandoned on 21 अप्रैल  2008 .
A CAPTCHA is sometimes  वर्णित as a रिवर्स turing परीक्षण , क्युकी it is administered by a यंत्र और targeted at a इंसान  , in contrast to the standard Turing test that is typically administered by a human and targeted at a machine .
Jacques-Yves Cousteau ( ; commonly known in English as Jacques Cousteau ; 11 June 1910 – 25 June 1997 ) was a French naval officer , explorer ,  conservationist , फिल्मकार , innovator , वैज्ञानिक , फ़ोटोग्राफ़र , लेखक और शोधकर्ता जो पढ़ाई the समुद्र और सब फ़ॉर्म of जीवन in  water .
He  co-developed the aqua-lung , pioneered समुद्री संरक्षण और थी a सदस्य  of the Académie française .
KFC ( Kentucky Fried Chicken ) is a fast  खाना रेस्तरां कड़ी headquartered in louisville , केंटकी  , United States , which specializes in fried chicken .
An `` American icon '' , it is the world 's second largest restaurant chain  overall ( as measured by बिक्री ) बाद मैकडोनाल्ड 's , साथ over 18,000 आउटलेट in 120 देशों और territories  .
The company  is a subsidiary of  Yum !
Brands , a restaurant  कम्पनी जिससे भी owns पिज़्ज़ा हट और टैको घंटी  .
KFC was founded by Harland Sanders , who began selling fried chicken from his  roadside रेस्तरां in कोर्बिन , केंटकी दौरान the ग्रेट अवसाद .
Sanders was one of the first people to  देखिए the संभावित of the रेस्तरां फ़्रेंचाइज़िंग अवधारणा , साथ the पहला `` केंटकी fried मुर्गा  '' franchise opening in Utah in 1952 .
The franchise popularized  मुर्गा in the तेज़ खाना उद्योग , thereby diversifying the मार्केट  and challenging the dominance of the hamburger .
Marketing himself as `` Colonel Sanders '' , he became a  legendary फिगर of अमरीकी सांस्कृतिक इतिहास , और उसके चित्र is स्टिल prominently प्रयुक्त in केएफसी ब्रांडिंग  .
The company 's rapid expansion saw it grow too  विशाल लिये सैंडर्स to मैनेज , और in 1964 he बेची the कम्पनी to a समूह of निवेशकों led by जॉन  Y . Brown , Jr. and Jack Massey .
KFC was  एक of the पहला तेज़ खाना जंजीरों to विस्तार internationally , खोलने आउटलेट in  England , Mexico and Puerto Rico by the mid-1960s .
Throughout the  1970s और 1980s , केएफसी अनुभवी मिश्रित सौभाग्य domestically , as it गई through a श्रेणी of कॉरपोरेट स्वामी जो  had little or no experience in the restaurant business .
In the early 1970s , KFC was sold to the spirits firm Heublein ,  जो यहूद लिया over by the r.J. रेनॉल्ड्स खाना और तम्बाकू संगुटिका  , who sold the chain to PepsiCo .
The chain continued to expand overseas however  , और in 1987 केएफसी became the पहला पश्चिमी रेस्तरां कड़ी to खोलें  in China .
The chain has since expanded rapidly in China , and  the देश is अभी the कम्पनी 's सबसे लाभप्रद मार्केट  .
PepsiCo spun off its restaurants  प्रभाग as tricon वैश्विक रेस्तरां , जिससे बाद बदला  its name to Yum !
ब्रांड्स .
KFC primarily sells fried chicken pieces and variations such as  मुर्गा सैंडविच और wraps , सलाद और पक्ष बर्तन ऐसे as फ्रेंच फ्राइज़ और coleslaw ,  desserts and soft drinks , often supplied by PepsiCo .
Its  सबसे प्रसिद्ध उत्पाद is दबाव fried मुर्गा टुकड़े , seasoned साथ सैंडर्स  ' `` Original Recipe '' of 11 herbs and spices .
The exact  प्रकृति of ये संघटक is अनजान , और represents a notable  trade secret .
Larger  portions of fried मुर्गा हैं परोसा in a distinctive गत्ता `` बाल्टी '' , जिससे रै  become a signature of the chain since being introduced by franchisee Pete Harman .
KFC is famous for the slogan `` finger lickin ' good '' ,  जिससे रै चूंकि महरूम replaced by `` nobody करता मुर्गा जैसे केएफसी '' और ``  So good '' .
Cnidaria ( with a silent c ) or  coelenterata is a phylum containing over 10,000 प्रजाति of पशु मिला exclusively  in aquatic and mostly marine environments .
Their distinguishing feature is  cnidocytes , specialized कोशिकाएं कि वे उपयोग मुख्यतः लिये  capturing prey .
Their bodies consist of mesoglea , a non-living jelly-like  पदार्थ , sandwiched between दो परतों of epithelium कि हैं ज़्यादातर एक  cell thick .
They have two basic body forms : swimming medusae and sessile polyps , both of which are  radially सममित साथ mouths घिरी by tentacles कि  bear cnidocytes .
Both forms have a single  orifice और देह गुहा कि हैं प्रयुक्त लिये पाचन और श्वसन  .
Many cnidarian species  उपज colonies कि हैं सिंगल जीवों रचित of medusa-like or polyp-like zooids , or दोनो  .
Cnidarians '  क्रियाएँ हैं समन्वित by a विकेन्द्रित तंत्रिका जाल और सरल  receptors .
Several free-swimming  cubozoa और scyphozoa possess balance-sensing statocysts , और  some have simple eyes .
Not  सब cnidarians reproduce  sexually .
Many have complex lifecycles with asexual polyp stages and  यौन medusae , लकिन कुछ omit either the polyp or  the medusa stage .
Cnidarians were for a long  समय grouped साथ ctenophores in the phylum coelenterata , लकिन increasing जागरूकता of उनके मतभेद caused उन्हें  to be placed in separate phyla .
Cnidarians are classified into four main groups : the almost wholly sessile Anthozoa ( sea anemones , corals , sea pens ) ; swimming Scyphozoa ( jellyfish ) ; Cubozoa ( box  jellies ) ; और hydrozoa , a विविध समूह कि शामिल सब the freshwater cnidarians as खूब as अनेक समुद्री फ़ॉर्म , और रै दोनो स्थानबद्ध सदस्यों ऐसे as hydra और औपनिवेशिक swimmers ऐसे  as the Portuguese Man o ' War .
Staurozoa have recently been recognised as a class in their own right rather than a  sub-group of scyphozoa , और वहीँ is बहस परिचय whether myxozoa और polypodiozoa हैं cnidarians or करीब to bilaterians ( अधिक  complex animals ) .
Most cnidarians prey  on जीवों ranging in आकार इससे प्लवक to पशु अनेक टाइम्स larger than themselves , लकिन अनेक obtain much  of their nutrition from endosymbiotic algae , and a few are parasites .
Many are  preyed upon by अन्य पशु सहित starfish  , sea slugs , fish and turtles .
Coral reefs , whose polyps are rich in endosymbiotic  शैवाल , support कुछ of the संसार 's सबसे उत्पादक ecosystems , और protect वनस्पति  in tidal zones and on shorelines from strong currents and tides .
While corals are almost  entirely प्रतिबंधित to गरम , उथले समुद्री waters , अन्य cnidarians सजीव in the  depths , in polar seas and in freshwater .
Fossil cnidarians have been found in  रॉक्स formed परिचय , और अन्य जीवाश्मों दिखाएँ कि corals may have महरूम उपस्थित shortly पहले और diversified  a few million years later .
Fossils of  cnidarians कि do नहीं निर्माण mineralized structures  are very rare .
Scientists currently think that cnidarians ,  ctenophores और bilaterians हैं अधिक closely सम्बन्धित to calcareous sponges than ये हैं to अन्य sponges , और कि anthozoans  are the evolutionary `` aunts '' or `` sisters '' of other cnidarians , and the most closely related to bilaterians .
हाल analyses have concluded कि cnidarians , हालांकि माना अधिक `` आदिम  '' than bilaterians , have a wider range of genes .
The Aztec  पिरामिड at st. cecilia acatitlan ,  Mexico State .
