Aztec cosmogram  in the pre-hispanic codex fejérváry-mayer  - the fire god Xiuhtecuhtli is in the center .
the एज़टेक लोगों यहूद निश्चित जातीय समूह of सेंट्रल मैक्सिको , विशेषकर those समूह जो spoke the नावातल  language and who dominated large parts of Mesoamerica from the 14th to 16th centuries .
The Nahuatl words aztecatl ( singular ) and  aztecah ( बहुवचन ) औसत `` लोगों इससे aztlan `` , a पौराणिक प्लेस लिये the nahuatl-speaking संस्कृति of the  time , and later adopted as the word to define the Mexica people .
Often the term `` Aztec '' refers exclusively to the Mexica  लोगों of tenochtitlan ( अभी the स्थान of मैक्सिको नगर ) , situated on an द्वीप in झील texcoco , जो referred to  themselves as Mexica Tenochca or Cōlhuah Mexica .
Sometimes the term  भी शामिल the निवासियों of tenochtitlan 's दो प्रिंसिपल अलाइड city-states , the acolhuas of texcoco और the tepanecs  of Tlacopan , who together with the Mexica formed the Aztec Triple Alliance which controlled what is often known as `` the Aztec Empire '' .
In other contexts , Aztec may refer to all the various city states and their peoples , who shared large  भाग of उनके जातीय इतिहास और सांस्कृतिक traits साथ the mexica , acolhua और tepanecs , और जो प्रायः भी प्रयुक्त the नावातल  language as a lingua franca .
In this meaning it is  संभावित to बात परिचय an एज़टेक सभ्यता सहित सब the particular सांस्कृतिक पैटर्न आम लिये  most of the peoples inhabiting Central Mexico in the late postclassic period .
From the 13th  सदी , the घाटी of मैक्सिको थी the दिल of एज़टेक सभ्यता : यहाँ the पूंजी of the एज़टेक ट्रिपल गठबंधन  , the city of Tenochtitlan , was built upon raised islets in Lake Texcoco .
The Triple Alliance formed a tributary empire expanding its political hegemony far beyond the  घाटी of मैक्सिको , conquering अन्य नगर राज्य throughout मेसोअमेरिका  .
At its pinnacle ,  एज़टेक संस्कृति था समृद्ध और जटिल पौराणिक और धार्मिक परंपराओं , as खूब as reaching  remarkable architectural and artistic accomplishments .
In 1521 Hernán Cortés , along with a large number of  नावातल बोलना स्वदेशी allies , conquered tenochtitlan और पराजित the एज़टेक ट्रिपल गठबंधन अंतर्गत the नेतृत्व  of Hueyi Tlatoani Moctezuma II .
subsequently the स्पेनी संस्थापित the नई उपनिवेश of मैक्सिको नगर on the साईट of the ruined एज़टेक  capital , from where they proceeded with the process of colonizing Central America .
Aztec culture and history is primarily known through archaeological evidence found in excavations such as that of the renowned Templo  महापौर in मैक्सिको नगर ; इससे स्वदेशी छाल पेपर codices ; इससे eyewitness खाते by स्पेनी conquistadors ऐसे as hernán cortés और बर्नल díaz डेल कैस्टिलो ; और विशेषकर इससे 16th और 17th सदी descriptions of एज़टेक संस्कृति और इतिहास लिखा by स्पेनी  clergymen and literate Aztecs in the Spanish or Nahuatl language , such as the famous Florentine Codex compiled by the Franciscan monk Bernardino de Sahagún with the help of indigenous Aztec informants .
एंडरसन hays कूपर ( born जून 3 , 1967 ) is an अमरीकी पत्रकार  , author , and television personality .
He is the  प्राथमिक लंगर of the सीएनएन न्यूज  show Anderson Cooper 360° .
The program  is सामान्यतः ब्रॉडकास्ट सजीव इससे a नई यॉर्क नगर स्टुडियो ; however  , Cooper often broadcasts live on location for breaking news stories .
As of  सितंबर 2011 , he भी serves as मेजबान of उसके अपना eponymous syndicated दिन बात दिखाएँ , एंडरसन सजीव , जिससे होगा be रद्द  at the end of the second season .
A plot of a normal distribution ( or bell-shaped curve ) where  प्रत्येक बैंड रै a चौडाई of 1 मानक विचलन – देखिए भी : 68-95-99.7  rule
संचयी संभाव्यता of a सामान्य वितरण साथ  expected value 0 and standard deviation 1 .
In statistics and probability theory , standard deviation (  represented by the प्रतीक सिग्मा , σ ) shows कैसा much विभिन्नता or dispersion exists इससे the औसत ( औसत )  , or expected value .
A low standard deviation indicates  कि the आंकड़ा अंक tend to be बहुत बंद to the औसत ; ऊँची मानक विचलन  indicates that the data points are spread out over a large range of values .
The standard  विचलन of a यादृच्छिक परिवर्तनीय , सांख्यिकीय जनसांख्यिकी , आंकड़ा नियत  , or probability distribution is the square root of its variance .
It is  algebraically simpler हालांकि practically कम मजबूत  than the average absolute deviation .
A useful property of  मानक विचलन is कि , नापसंद variance , it is expressed in the  same units as the data .
Note , however  , कि लिये माप साथ प्रतिशत as ईकाई , the मानक  deviation will have percentage points as unit .
In addition to expressing the  variability of a जनसांख्यिकी , मानक विचलन is commonly प्रयुक्त to माप विश्वास in सांख्यिकीय  conclusions .
For example , the margin  of गलती in polling आंकड़ा is संकल्पित by calculating the अपेक्षित मानक विचलन in the परिणाम  if the same poll were to be conducted multiple times .
The reported margin of error  is typically परिचय twice the मानक विचलन ­– the दायरा of a 95 प्रतिशत  confidence interval .
In science , researchers commonly report the standard deviation of experimental data , and only effects that fall far outside the  दायरा of मानक विचलन हैं माना statistically significant – सामान्य यादृच्छिक गलती or विभिन्नता in the माप is in  this way distinguished from causal variation .
Standard deviation is also important in finance , where the  मानक विचलन on the रेट of वापसी on an निवेश is a माप of the  volatility of the investment .
When only a sample of data from a population is available , the  मानक विचलन of the जनसांख्यिकी can be अनुमानित by a परिवर्धित मात्रा पुकारा the `` नमूना मानक विचलन  '' .
When the sample is the entire population , its  unmodified मानक विचलन is पुकारा the `` जनसांख्यिकी मानक  deviation '' .
Ulluco ( u : ju : kɔ : ) (  ullucus tuberosus ) is a संयंत्र grown primarily as a रूट सब्ज़ी , secondarily  as a leaf vegetable .
The  ulluco is एक of the सबसे widely grown और economically  important root crops in the Andean region of South America , second only to the potato .
It is known there with the common  नाम of पापा लिसा , लकिन भी by the क्षेत्रीय names melloco ( इक्वाडोर ) , olluco ( पेरू ) , chugua ( कोलंबिया )  or ruba ( Venezuela ) , among others .
The  पत्ता और the tuber हैं खाद्य , समान  to spinach and the potato , respectively .
They are known to contain high levels of protein  , कैल्सियम , और केरोटीन .
Papalisa were used by the  incas prior to आगमन of europeans in दक्षिण  America .
ulluco tubers हैं marketed as  `` Earth Gems '' in New Zealand , by Halfords Exotic Produce .
ulluco tubers in  New Zealand
An April 24 , 1851 poster warning the `` colored people of Boston '' about  पुलिसकर्मियों एक्टिंग as स्लेव catchers  .
The Fugitive  स्लेव विधि or भगोड़े स्लेव अधिनियम थी passed by the संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस on सितंबर 18 , 1850 , as भाग of the सुलह of 1850 between दक्षिणी  slave-holding interests and Northern Free-Soilers .
This was one of the most controversial  अधिनियमों of the 1850 सुलह और heightened उत्तरी fears of a `` स्लेव शक्ति  conspiracy '' .
It declared that  सब runaway स्लेव यहूद , upon कैप्चर , to be लौटे to उनके मास्टर्स .
Abolitionists nicknamed it the  `` bloodhound विधि '' लिये the कुत्तो कि यहूद प्रयुक्त to track bas runaway  slaves .
Frank Joseph Pallone , Jr. ( born  अक्तूबर 30 , 1951 ) is the u.S. प्रतिनिधि  for , serving since 1993 .
He  is a सदस्य of the  Democratic Party .
He  previously represented the  3rd district from 1988 to 1993 .
trin-i-tee 5:7 is a इन्जील duo इससे नई ऑरलियन्स  , Louisiana in the United States .
The group was marketed as a  इन्जील वैकल्पिक to r & b लड़की समूह ऐसे as नियति  's Child and TLC .
Trin-i-tee 5:7 has  बेची over 2.5 लाख  albums .
in 1998 , the समूह released उनके पहला एल्बम हकदार trin-i-tee 5:7 जिससे डेब्यू  at # 1 on the Top Gospel charts .
The album featured  the गीतों `` परमेश्वर 's अनुग्रह '' और the कवर  song `` Oh !
Mary  do n't तुम रोते  '' .
The album  बाद became certified सुनहरा  .
in 1999 , terri भूरा बाएँ the समूह  and was later replaced by singer Adrian Anderson .
दौरान कि साल , the समूह अंकित और released उनके दूसरी  album , Spiritual Love .
The album became  the समूह 's दूसरी # 1 एल्बम on the  Top Gospel charts .

In 2007 , the group left GospoCentric  रिकॉर्ड और हस्ताक्षरित a रिकार्ड सौदे साथ स्पिरिट उठती म्यूज़िक  .
In late 2007 , Trin-i-tee  5:7 released उनके पांचवां एल्बम t57 , जिससे प्रदर्शित the  top ten gospel single `` Listen '' .
T57 charted # 2 on the  शीर्ष इन्जील एल्बम , # 5 on the शीर्ष ईसाई चार्ट , और  # 12 on the Top R & B charts .
The United States federal earned  आय कर क्रेडिट or अर्जित आय क्रेडिट ( eitc or eic ) is a refundable कर क्रेडिट लिये low- और medium-income individuals  and couples , primarily for those who have qualifying children .
When the  क्रेडिट exceeds the राशि of कर owed , it परिणाम in a कर refund to those  who claim the credit .
This credit  is provided to ऑफसेट the बोझ of सोशल सुरक्षा कर और भी  to promote an incentive to work .
In order for a person or couple to claim one or more persons as their qualifying child ( ren ) , the age ,  संबंध , और साझा रेसिडेंसी आवश्यकताएँ जरूर be मिले , as खूब as कुछ अन्य आवश्यकताएँ  .
U.S. tax forms 1040EZ ,  1040a , or 1040 can be प्रयुक्त to अर्जी eic बगैर qualifying children  .
To claim the credit with  qualifying children , 1040a or 1040 जरूर be प्रयुक्त , as खूब as attaching  Schedule EIC .
EIC phases in slowly , has a  medium-length पठार , और तब phases आउट  more slowly than it phased in .
Since the  क्रेडिट phases आउट at 21 % ( लिये दो children और लिये तीन or अधिक qualilfying children ) or 16 % ( लिये एक qualifying चाइल्ड ) , it is सदा अस्तबलों to have एक अधिक डालर of वास्तविक सैलरी or मजदूरी ( हालांकि  technically , since the EIC table moves by fifty dollar increments , it 's always preferable to have an extra fifty-dollar increment of salary or wages ) .
For tax year 2011 , the maximum  eic लिये a सिंगल व्यक्ति or युगल दाखिल बगैर  qualifying children was $ 464 .
The maximum EIC with one qualifying  चाइल्ड थी $ 3,094 , साथ दो children थी $ 5,112 , और साथ  three or more qualifying children was $ 5,751 .
These amounts are indexed  annually लिये महंगाई .
the अर्जित आय कर क्रेडिट रै महरूम भाग of राजनैतिक debates in the संयुक्त राज्य regarding whether उठाने  the minimum wage or increasing EIC will better address a seeming shortage of good-paying jobs .
The following  is a सूची of मध्यांतर shows आयोजित at the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग  's championship game , the Super Bowl .
While halftime shows are a tradition during football games at all levels of competition , the Super Bowl halftime show represents a fundamental link to  पॉप संस्कृति , जिससे helps broaden the टेलीविज़न दर्शक और देशभर  interest .
In most years since the mid-1980s , the halftime  दिखाएँ of the सुपर कटोरी रै प्रदर्शित लोकप्रिय रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकारों और अन्य well-known हस्तियाँ  .
It has measurably increased  टेलीविज़न दर्शक दौरान और  after the halftime show .
The performance is regarded one of the  most-watched कार्यक्रम in अमरीकी टेलीविज़न annually साथ over 100 लाख  viewers in the United States alone .
Musical genres over the years have  represented a व्यापक दायरा of म्यूज़िक प्रकार , सहित पॉप , चट्टान , क्लासिक चट्टान  , country , hip hop , rap , blues , and soul .
In some  सालो , छोटी skits or नाटक दृश्यों हैं acted  out on a stage .
The performance group Up with People has performed at the  सबसे सुपर कटोरी मध्यांतर shows , अभिनीत in चार दौरान the 1970s और  1980s .
According to Nielsen ratings , Super Bowl  xlvi मध्यांतर दिखाएँ headlined by मैडोना in 2012 remains the most-watched मध्यांतर दिखाएँ in इतिहास , साथ  114 million viewers or about 3 million more than the actual game .
Beyonce 's 2013 halftime  दिखाएँ प्रदर्शन थी the दूसरी सबसे viewed दिखाएँ  in history .
It  is सूचीबद्ध on the गिनीज संसार रिकॉर्ड as the largest tv दर्शक  for a Super Bowl half-time performance .
International Men 's Day ( IMD ) is  an सालाना अंतरराष्ट्रीय इवेंट मनाये on 19th नवम्बर  .
Inaugurated in 1999 in Trinidad  और टोबैगो , the दिन और इसके कार्यक्रम ढूँढें support इससे a किस्में of individuals और समूह in ऑस्ट्रेलिया , the caribbean ,  North America , Asia , Europe and Africa .
Speaking on behalf of UNESCO , Director of Women and  संस्कृति of सलाम ingeborg breines कहा of imd , `` इस is an बेहतरीन विचार और होता  give some gender balance . ''
She added that UNESCO  थी looking आगे to cooperating साथ  the organizers .
The objectives of celebrating an  अंतरराष्ट्रीय मेन 's दिन शामिल focusing on मेन 's और लड़कों ' स्वास्थ्य , improving लिंग संबंध , promoting  gender equality , and highlighting positive male role models .
It is an occasion  to हाइलाइट पक्षपात विरूद्ध मेन और लड़कों और to celebrate उनके उपलब्धियाँ और योगदान , in particular  for their contributions to community , family , marriage , and child care .
The  broader और परम उद्देश्य of the इवेंट is to प्रचार  basic humanitarian values .
International Men 's Day is  मनाये in over 60 देशों , सहित त्रिनिदाद और टोबैगो , जमैका , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , इण्डिया , चीन , संयुक्त राज्य , रोमानिया , सिंगापुर , माल्टा , संयुक्त किंगडम , दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी , तंजानिया , ज़िम्बाब्वे , बोत्सवाना , australia , बुरुंडी , हंगेरियाई , आयरलैंड , आइल of man , घाना , कनाडा , डेनमार्क , नार्वे , ऑस्ट्रिया  , Bosnia and Herzegovina , Ukraine , France , Italy , Pakistan , Cuba , Antigua and Barbuda , St. Kitts and Nevis , St. Lucia , Grenada and Cayman Islands , on 19 November , and global support for the celebration is broad .
Valley  गाँव parkvalley
Village is a  ज़िला in the सैन फर्नांडो घाटी प्रदेश of लॉस एंजिल्स  , California .
The  मध्य आयु of इसके जनसांख्यिकी , at 36 , is `` बूढ़ा लिये the नगर of लॉस एंजिल्स . '' और इसके औसत household  size of two people is low , compared to other parts of the city .
Developmental psychology is the  वैज्ञानिक पढ़ाई of परिवर्तन कि occur in इंसान beings over the कोर्स of उनके जीवन स्पैन  .
Originally concerned  साथ infants और children , the फ़ील्ड रै विस्तारित to शामिल किशोरावस्था  , adult development , aging , and the entire life span .
This field examines change across a broad range of  विषय सहित मोटर कौशल और अन्य psycho-physiological प्रक्रियाओं ; संज्ञानात्मक विकास involving क्षेत्रों ऐसे as प्रॉब्लम solving , moral समझना , और conceptual समझना ; भाषा अधिग्रहण ; सोशल , व्यक्तित्व  , and emotional development ; and self-concept and identity formation .
Developmental  मनोविज्ञान शामिल मुद्दे ऐसे as the extent to जिससे विकास occurs through the क्रमिक accumulation of ज्ञान बनाम stage-like विकास  , or the extent to which children are born with innate mental structures versus learning through experience .
Many  शोधकर्ताओं हैं दिलचस्पी in the बातचीत between निजी विशेषताएँ , the व्यक्तिगत 's बर्ताव , और पर्यावरणीय  factors including social context , and their impact on development ; others take a more narrowly-focused approach .
Developmental psychology informs several applied fields , including : educational  मनोविज्ञान , चाइल्ड psychopathology , और forensic developmental मनोविज्ञान  .
Developmental  मनोविज्ञान complements अनेक अन्य मौलिक शोध फ़ील्ड in मनोविज्ञान  including social psychology , cognitive psychology , ecological psychology , and comparative psychology .
Joseph Michael `` Joey '' Stivic is a fictional  अक्षर जो पहला appeared on the 1970s अमरीकी sitcom सब in the परिवार .
Joey Stivic was the son and only child of Mike Stivic ( played by  रोब reiner ) और ग्लोरिया stivic ( निभाई by सैली struthers ) , और the पोता of आर्ची बंकर ( कैरल  O'Connor ) and Edith Bunker ( Jean Stapleton ) .
The  अक्षर पहला appeared as a नवजात baby in a two-part एपीसोड  of All in the Family which aired in December 1975 .
After many  दिखावे on सब in the परिवार जबतक reiner और struthers बाएँ the श्रेणी in 1978 ( by कि समय , जॉय था महरूम निभाई सबसे प्रायः by प्रत्यावर्ती जुड़वा जेसन और जस्टिन draeger ) , the जॉय stivic अक्षर अगला appeared on the सब  in the Family spin-off series ( some call it a continuation of the original ) Archie Bunker 's Place in a guest appearance in the November 1979 episode `` Thanksgiving Reunion . ''
In this  उदाहरण , the अक्षर थी निभाई by चाइल्ड कर्ता लंड billingsley और  was appropriately pre-school age .
With Gloria now  अलग इससे माइक , वो लौटे to आर्ची बंकर 's प्लेस साथ जॉय in  the February 1982 episode `` Gloria Comes Home . ''
in इस एपीसोड , जॉय थी निभाई  by Christopher Johnston .
जॉय stivic थी a नियमित अक्षर on the सब in the  Family spin-off series Gloria in 1982 and 1983 .
On this series , in which the now-divorced  ग्लोरिया बंकर अक्षर था स्थानांतरित to upstate नई यॉर्क in अनुक्रम to कार्य as an सहायक veterinarian , the भाग of जॉय stivic थी निभाई  by ten-year-old actor Christian Jacobs .
After Gloria was canceled in 1983 , Joey Stivic disappeared  इससे प्रधान समय टेलीविज़न लिये 11 सालो , जबतक the अक्षर बना एक पिछला रूप on 704 hauser , a short-lived 1994 श्रेणी परिचय a ब्लैक परिवार जो था स्थानांतरित into the बूढ़ा बंकर घर  , years after Bunker had sold it .
In this appearance , the Joey Stivic character was  निभाई by केसी siemaszko , an कर्ता born in 1961 ( 14 सालो पहले जॉय stivic 's fictional  birth ) .
In 1976 the Ideal Toy Company released a 14-inch ``  जॉय stivic गुड़िया '' ( पुकारा `` आर्ची बंकर 's पोता '' ) जिससे थी billed as the `` पहला anatomically सही  male doll . ''
The doll  प्रेरित mild विवाद at the समय , और is a collectors  ' item today .
The 2011 Rose Bowl was the 97th edition of the annual bowl game played on  जनवरी 1 , 2011 , as भाग of the 2010 कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल  season .
Played in Pasadena , California , the TCU Horned Frogs of the Mountain West  सम्मेलन पराजित the विस्कॉन्सिन badgers of the बिग टेन सम्मेलन by a स्कोर  of 21 – 19 .
The Pasadena Tournament of  गुलाब संघ थी the आयोजक of the  game .
Vizio Inc. was the  कॉरपोरेट प्रायोजक और the खेल थी officially नामित `` the रोज़ कटोरी खेल  presented by Vizio '' .
This game  चिह्नित the पहला समय a टोली इससे a non-automatic qualifying सम्मेलन  played in , and won , the Rose Bowl in its 97 years .
The contest was broadcast on cable  टेलीविज़न स्टेशन ईएसपीएन साथ a रेडियो ब्रॉडकास्ट on ईएसपीएन रेडियो और xm उपग्रह रेडियो और espn3 स्ट्रीमिंग  video over the internet .
Coverage  began at 1:30 pm ( pst ) साथ kickoff at 2:10  PM ( PST ) .
This marked the first time that the game was not broadcast nationally  `` over-the-air '' ( स्थलीय टेलीविज़न ) चूंकि the खेल prior to the 1952 रोज़ कटोरी , जिससे थी the पहला nationally televised कॉलेज  football game .
the रोज़ कटोरी खेल , प्रसंग भवन सपनो , friendships , & यादें , थी a contractual sell-out , साथ  64,500 tickets allocated to the participating teams and conferences .
टिकट कीमतें लिये सब सीटे in  the Rose Bowl are listed at $ 145 .
The remaining tickets went to the  टूर्नामेंट of गुलाब सदस्यों , प्रायोजकों , नगर of pasadena निवासियों , और the सामान्य  public .
The Rose Bowl stadium capacity is listed at  लगभग 91,000  .
The Declaration of Independence is a statement  अपनाया by the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस on जुलाई 4 , 1776 , जिससे घोषित कि the तेरह अमरीकी colonies , तब at युद्ध साथ ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , regarded themselves  as independent states , and no longer a part of the British Empire .
Instead they now  formed a नई nation—the संयुक्त  States of America .
John Adams was a  नेता in pushing लिये स्वतंत्रता , जिससे थी  unanimously approved on July 2 .
A  कमेटी था already drafted the औपचारिक घोषणा , to  be ready when congress voted on independence .
एडम्स persuaded the कमेटी to चुनें थामस जेफरसन to लिखें the असली ड्राफ्ट of  the document , which congress would edit to produce the final version .
The Declaration  थी ultimately a औपचारिक स्पष्टीकरण of क्यों कॉंग्रेस था voted on जुलाई 2 to घोषित स्वतंत्रता इससे ग्रेट ब्रिटेन  , more than a year after the outbreak of the American Revolutionary War .
The national birthday , the  स्वतंत्रता दिन is मनाये on जुलाई 4 , हालांकि एडम्स चाही जुलाई  2 .
बाद ratifying the टेक्स्ट on जुलाई 4 , कॉंग्रेस  issued the Declaration of Independence in several forms .
It was initially published as  the मुद्रित डनलप broadside कि थी widely वितरित और  read to the public .
The most famous version of the Declaration , a  हस्ताक्षरित नक़ल कि is popularly regarded as the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता , is प्रदर्शित at the नेशनल अभिलेख in वॉशिंगटन  , D.C .
Although the wording of the  घोषणा थी स्वीकृत on जुलाई 4 , the तिथि of इसके हस्ताक्षर थी  August 2 .
The original July 4 United States Declaration of  स्वतंत्रता पाण्डुलिपि थी खोया जबकि सब अन्य नक़ल have महरूम निकला इससे इस असली दस्तावेज़  .
The  स्त्रोत और निर्वचन of the घोषणा have महरूम the विषय of  much scholarly inquiry .
The Declaration justified the independence  of the संयुक्त राज्य by लिस्टिंग औपनिवेशिक grievances विरूद्ध किंग जार्ज iii , और by asserting निश्चित प्राकृतिक और विधिक  rights , including a right of revolution .
Having served its original  purpose in announcing स्वतंत्रता , the टेक्स्ट of the घोषणा थी initially  ignored after the American Revolution .
Since then , it has come to be  माना a प्रमुख बयान on इंसान अधिकारों , विशेषकर  its second sentence:
We hold these truths to be self-evident , that all men are created  बराबर , कि वे हैं endowed by उनके निर्माता साथ निश्चित unalienable अधिकारों , कि among ये हैं जीवन , स्वतंत्रता और the pursuit of सुख  .
This has been called `` one of  the best-known वाक्य in the अंग्रेज़ी भाषा '' , containing `` the सबसे potent और consequential शब्द in अमरीकी  history . ''
The  ड्योढ़ी आए to represent a moral मानक to जिससे the संयुक्त  States should strive .
This view was notably promoted by Abraham Lincoln , who considered the Declaration to be the  न्यास of उसके राजनैतिक दर्शनशास्त्र , और argued कि the घोषणा is a बयान of सिद्धान्त through जिससे the संयुक्त राज्य  Constitution should be interpreted .
It has  प्रेरित कार्य लिये the अधिकारों of अधिकारहीन लोगों  throughout the world .
Chitty Chitty Bang Bang is a 1968  अंग्रेजों musical फिल्मी loosely आधारित on इयान फ्लेमिंग  's novel .
The  फिल्मी 's स्क्रिप्ट is by roald dahl और केन ह्यूजेस और इसके गीतों by the  Sherman Brothers .
It  सितारों लंड वैन dyke as caractacus potts और  Sally Ann Howes as Truly Scrumptious .
The film was directed  by केन ह्यूजेस और उत्पादित by अल्बर्ट R. ब्रोकोली ( co-producer  of the James Bond series of films , also based on Fleming 's novels ) .
John  stears पर्यवेक्षित the खास  effects .
Irwin  kostal पर्यवेक्षित और conducted the म्यूज़िक , जबकि the musical संख्याएँ यहूद मंचन by मार्क  Breaux and Dee Dee Wood .
A region is arid when it is characterized by  a कठोर कमी of उपलब्धियाँ जल , to the extent of hindering or preventing the विकास और विकास of  plant and animal life .
Environments subject to arid  climates tend to कमी वनस्पति और हैं पुकारा xeric  or desertic .
सबसे `` arid '' climates घेर the equator ; ये स्थान शामिल सबसे of अफ़्रीकी  and parts of South America and Central America .
Cancer  ( ♋ ) is an astrological चिह्न , जिससे is संबद्ध साथ the  constellation Cancer .
It spans the 90-120th degree of the zodiac ,  between 90 और 125.25 उपाधि of celestial देशांतर , जिससे the सूर्य transits इस क्षेत्रफल on औसत  between June 22 to July 22 each year .
And under the  sidereal zodiac , it is फिलहाल इससे  July 21 to August 9 .
The United States presidential election  of 1960 थी the 44th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव , आयोजित on मंगलवार , नवम्बर  8 , 1960 .
The Republican Party nominated  लाज़िम vice-president रिचर्ड निक्सन , जबकि the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी मनोनीत जॉन F.  Kennedy , Senator from Massachusetts .
The incumbent President , Republican Dwight D.  आइज़नहावर , थी नहीं योग्य लिये re-election बाद सेवारत  the maximum two terms allowed by the Twenty-second Amendment .
Kennedy was elected with a lead of 112,827 votes , or 0.17 % of the popular vote  , giving उसे a विजय of 303 to 219 in the चुनावी कॉलेज , the closest चूंकि  1916 .
This  थी the पहला चुनाव in जिससे सब  fifty of the current United States participated .
A number of  कारकों बताइये क्यों the चुनाव थी so बंद  .
Kennedy gained since there was an economic recession which  ठेस the लाज़िम रिपब्लिकन , और he था the लाभ of 17 लाख अधिक पंजीकृत डेमोक्रेट  than Republicans .
Furthermore , the new votes that Kennedy gained among  catholics लगभग neutralized the नई मत  Nixon gained among Protestants .
Kennedy 's  campaigning कौशल decisively outmatched  Nixon 's .
In the end , Nixon 's  जोर on उसके अनुभव carried छोटी वज़न , और he wasted उर्जा by campaigning  in all 50 states instead of concentrating on the swing states .
Kennedy used his large , well-funded campaign organization to win the nomination , secure  समर्थन , और , साथ the सहायता of the पिछला of the big-city bosses , to मिलेंगी आउट the vote in the बिग शहरों  .
He relied  on कार्यशील mate lyndon B. जॉनसन to थाम the दक्षिण और  used television effectively .
This election is notable as being the first time in  u.S. इतिहास कि दो बैठे u.s . सीनेटरों ( कैनेडी और जॉनसन ) यहूद निर्वाचित as अध्यक्ष और vice-president , a घटना कि रै महरूम दोहराया एकबार , by बराक ओबामा और जो बिडेन  in 2008 ( in both cases , the president was the younger , more junior senator ) .
Sherwood is  a नगर in वॉशिंगटन काउंटी , ऑरेगॉन , संयुक्त राज्य  .
Located in the southeast corner of  the काउंटी , it is a आवासीय जातियाँ in the tualatin घाटी दक्षिणपश्चिम of पोर्टलैंड  .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 11,791 at the 2000  census .
According to the 2010 census  , the जनसांख्यिकी थी 18,205 निवासियों .
Indirectly  नामित लिये the शेरवुड वन in इंग्लैण्ड , it थी पहला  incorporated in 1893 as a town .
The USA PATRIOT Act of 2001 is an Act  of the u.S. कॉंग्रेस कि थी हस्ताक्षरित into विधि by अध्यक्ष  George W. Bush on October 26 , 2001 .
The title of the act is a ten letter acronym ( USA PATRIOT )  कि स्टैंड लिये uniting ( और ) strengthening अमेरिका ( by ) providing उचित टूल्स जरूरी ( to ) इंटरफेस ( और ) obstruct आतंक  Act of 2001 .
The act , as a response to the terrorist attacks of September 11th , significantly reduced restrictions in law enforcement agencies ' gathering of intelligence within the United States ; expanded the Secretary of the Treasury’s  प्राधिकार to विनियमित वित्तीय ट्रांजेक्शन , विशेषकर those involving विदेशी individuals और entities ; और broadened the discretion of विधि प्रवर्तन और आव्रजन अधिकारियों in निमाड़ और deporting आप्रवासियों  suspected of terrorism-related acts .
The act also expanded the definition of terrorism to  शामिल घरेलू आतंक , यूँ enlarging the क्रमांक of क्रियाएँ to जिससे the यूएसए patriot act’s विस्तारित विधि  enforcement powers can be applied .
On May 26 , 2011 , President Barack Obama used an Autopen to sign the PATRIOT Sunsets Extension Act of 2011 , a four-year extension of  तीन कुंजी प्रावधानों in the यूएसए patriot अधिनियम जबकि he थी in फ़्रांस : roving wiretaps , खोज of कारोबार रिकॉर्ड ( the `` पुस्तकालयों रिकॉर्ड प्रावधान `` ) , और conducting निगरानी of `` लोन भेड़ियों '' — individuals suspected of terrorist-related क्रियाएँ नहीं linked to आतंकवादी  groups .
रिपब्लिकन नेताओ questioned if the उपयोग of the autopen मिले the संवैधानिक  requirements for signing a bill into law .
A house in Queen  ऐनी स्टाइल at 223 एवेन्यू a .
Snohomish is a city in  snohomish काउंटी , वॉशिंगटन , संयुक्त  States .
The  जनसांख्यिकी थी 9,098 at  the 2010 census .
The mayor of Snohomish is  karen guzak , और the नगर मैनेजर is लैरी bauman  .
Snohomish prides itself for its historical downtown , and  थी एकबार ज्ञात लिये इसके अनेक पुरातन दुकानें जब it थी ज्ञात as the ``  Antique Capital of the Northwest . ''
The historic business and residential center of the  कस्बा constitutes the snohomish ऐतिहासिक ज़िला , जिससे is सूचीबद्ध on the नेशनल  Register of Historic Places .
Many houses bear plaques with the  साल the हाउस थी निर्मित और the नाम of the परिवार or व्यक्तिगत जो originally occupied  it .
Once every year , the city gives  टुर of the ऐतिहासिक घरों ; एक of उन्हें , the blackman हाउस , is  a year-round museum .
A  सामान्य विमानन एयरफील्ड , घनघोर एयरफील्ड  , is less than one mile southwest of Downtown Snohomish .
Dave Matthews Band ( DMB ) is an American  चट्टान बैंड कि थी formed in charlottesville , वर्जिनिया  , United States , in 1991 .
The founding members were  singer-songwriter और guitarist डेव matthews , bassist stefan lessard , वादक /backing vocalist कार्टर  Beauford and saxophonist LeRoi Moore .
Boyd  tinsley थी added to the बैंड as a violinist जल्द बाद  the band was formed .
Moore died suddenly in August 2008 due to  जटिलताओं इससे चोटों sustained in an atv  accident .
GRAMMY Award -winner  जेफ़ ताबूत of béla fleck और the flecktones रै चूंकि  filled Moore 's spot as the band 's saxophonist .
Rashawn Ross and Tim  रेनॉल्ड्स have भी become full-time  touring members of the band .
The band 's 2009 album Big Whiskey and the GrooGrux King ( the first album since Moore 's death ) debuted at number one on the  बिलबोर्ड 200 , कमाई the बैंड उनके पांचवां लगातार number-one debut— बनाना उन्हें the दूसरी बैंड पीछे मेटालिका to  do so .
Their most recent album , Away from  the संसार , थी released in 2012 , और भी debuted at क्रमांक  one on the Billboard chart .
As of 2010 ,  the डेव matthews बैंड रै बेची over 30 लाख  records worldwide .
The band is known for their annual  summer-long टुर of the संयुक्त राज्य और यूरोपीय , featuring lengthy improvisational renditions  of their songs , accompanied by an elaborate video and lighting show .
This portion of the tour has become a  स्टैम्प of dmb और रै grown साथ the बैंड चूंकि fenton विलियम्स  began working with them in the early 1990s .
After twenty consecutive  सालो of touring the बैंड घोषित कि it होता लो the  summer of 2011 off .
डेव matthews बैंड रै जीती एक ग्रैमी पुरस्कार  , and was awarded the NAACP Chairman 's Award .
According to  जूलियन बंध , `` वे बेचें आउट the largest arenas on धरती , लकिन अक्सर  give their music away . ''
Transcendental Wild Oats : A Chapter from an  अलिखित रोमांस is a गद्य व्यंग्य लिखा by louisa may alcott , परिचय उसके परिवार 's भागीदारी साथ the transcendentalist जातियाँ  Fruitlands in the early 1840s .
The work  थी पहला प्रकाशित in a नई यॉर्क समाचारपत्र in 1873 , और reprinted  in 1874 , 1876 , and 1915 and after .
In her account , Alcott  provides the रियल लोगों शामिल साथ पतला pseudonymous  disguises .
Her father  अमोस bronson alcott is `` abel मेमने , '' जबकि उसके संगी और जातियाँ co-founder चार्ल्स लेन is `` timon शेर ;  '' Abigail May Alcott , Louisa 's mother and Bronson 's wife , is `` Sister Hope . ''
Alcott depicts her father as  वर्चस्व by उसके अधिक forceful संगी , और दोनो मेन as लापरवाह  and impractical dreamers .
The men of the community  खर्च उनके समय in pointless debates जबकि सिस्टर आशा works इससे  dawn to dusk to maintain their existence .
A crisis arises at harvest  समय , जब the अनाज क्रॉप is threatened by an approaching  storm .
In Alcott 's words , `` About the time the grain was ready to house  , कुछ कॉल of the oversoul wafted सब the मेन दूर .  ''
Sister Hope  organizes the तभी उपलब्धियाँ सहायता , तीन  little girls and a boy , and manages to save the crop .
The little community collapses as soon as the weather turns  ठंडा , जब it becomes साफ कि उनके प्रावधानों हैं too meager to पिछला  the coming winter .
Timon  शेर और उसके बेटे abscond to जुड़ें the shakers — हालांकि timon is अप्रसन्न to सीख  that life among them is `` all work and no play . ''
Abel is crushed by the failure of the enterprise ;  बाद दिनों of despair he begins to खा again तभी जब he realizes  that his family needs him .
सिस्टर आशा पाता a रास्ता लिये उन्हें  to subsist and persevere .
Alcott 's view of male  arrogance और मादा शोषण in इस टुकड़ा is paralleled in उसके अनोखा , प्रकाशित in the वही  year as `` Transcendental Wild Oats . ''
``  अनुभवातीत जंगली जई '' रै महरूम reprinted in अनेक  modern editions .
Mount of the Holy Cross is the northernmost 14,000-foot mountain in the  sawatch दायरा , भाग of the रॉकी kyu in कोलोराडो  .
It  is स्तिथ in the पावन क्रॉस wilderness निकट the भुत  town of Holy Cross City and in Eagle County .
It was named for the  distinctive cross-shaped snowfield on the पूर्वोत्तर फेस  .
Under USDA Forest  सेवा प्रशासन , the पहाड़ थी proclaimed `` पावन  Cross National Monument '' by Herbert Hoover on May 11 , 1929 .
The  स्मारक थी transferred to the नेशनल पार्क  Service in 1933 .
In 1950 , it was returned to the Forest  सेवा और खोया इसके नेशनल स्मारक status—the क्रमांक of विज़िटर to the पहाड़ और the आसपास `` pilgrim 's हट '' था waned , और the व्यय of full-time  staff could not be justified .
इस पहाड़ रै महरूम the विषय of चित्रकार , फ़ोटोग्राफ़र और  even a poem by Henry Wadsworth Longfellow , ( The Cross of Snow ) .
The first publicly  उपलब्धियाँ फोटोग्राफ थी प्रकाशित in नेशनल  Geographic magazine .
Thomas Moran depicted the mountain in an oil painting , which now is part of the collection of  the संग्रहालय of the अमरीकी वेस्ट , भाग of the autry नेशनल बीच in लॉस एंजिल्स , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  .
It is still much  photographed लकिन it is नहीं as खूब ज्ञात आज as it  was in the past .
Nearby features include Bowl of Tears Lake ,  सीधे अंतर्गत the ईस्ट फेस of the शिखर , tuhare झीलों , in a cirque कि झूठ  south of a significant subpeak , and several other lakes .
Notable locations within include the  dotsero ज्वालामुखी ( निकट अंतरराज्यीय 70 ) , vail और aspen  .
us 24 रनों निकट the शिखर through  Gilman .
Photochrom print of  माउंट of the पावन क्रॉस  c. 1900 .
This image is a reversed view of the  पहाड़ compared to कैसा it दरअसल appears  .
The first recorded ascent of  पावन क्रॉस थी in 1873 , by F. V. hayden और फ़ोटोग्राफ़र W. H. जैक्सन दौरान  one of Hayden 's geographical surveys .
However  , the शिखर may खूब have महरूम ascended previously  by miners or American Indians .
The first winter ascent of the peak was made in 1943 by  russel keene और हावर्ड freedman of the 10th पहाड़ प्रभाग , तब stationed  at Camp Hale .
Holy Cross can be climbed by at least  चार अलग रूट , साथ the easiest और सबसे आम रूट होने the उत्तर लकीरें , जिससे involves of लंबवत लाभ  over and is rated YDS Class 2 for moderate scrambling .
The Cross Couloir route forms the vertical portion of the  प्रसिद्ध क्रॉस विशेषता , और provides an उन्नत हिम चढ़ाई or चरम स्की descent  .
माउंट of the पावन क्रॉस रै a इतिहास of endangering  the lives of many hikers .
Primarily , the hikers who require rescue are unfamiliar with the risks of  प्रवेश wilderness क्षेत्रों और do नहीं लाओ पर्याप्त उपकरण और आपूर्तियाँ to respond to आपात शर्तें  .
Although the summit on Mount of the Holy Cross is frequently reached on a long day hike , unprepared hikers  हैं अक्सर stranded or खोया due to बदलना पर्यावरणीय शर्तें और भ्रम regarding the surrounding लैंडस्केप , विशेषकर  on the descent of North Ridge .
Thorough  शोध और उचित नियोजन चाहिए prevent  most tragedies .
Mount of the Holy cross is accessible  इससे tigiwon सड़क , दक्षिण of minturn , कोलोराडो  .
The  हाफ चंद्रमा pass ट्रेल is the मानक रूट to the समिट of माउंट of the  Holy Cross via the North Ridge .
Following the Fall Creek Trail to an ascent of Notch  पहाड़ ट्रेल provides the बेहतरीन दृश्य of the पावन क्रॉस हिम विशेषता इससे पायदान  Mountain Ridge .
the जीएसएम लोगो is प्रयुक्त to पहचानो  compatible handsets and equipment
GSM ( Global System for Mobile  संचार , originally ' ) , is a मानक नियत विकसित by the यूरोपीय दूरसंचार मानकों संस्थान ( etsi ) to describe प्रोटोकॉल लिये दूसरी पीढी ( 2g ) डिजिटल  cellular networks used by mobile phones .
It  became the de facto वैश्विक मानक लिये  mobile communications with over 80 % market share .
The GSM standard was developed as a  बदलना लिये पहला पीढी ( 1g ) एनालॉग सेल्यूलर संजाल , और originally वर्णित a डिजिटल , सर्किट switched  network optimized for full duplex voice telephony .
This was expanded over time to include data communications , first by circuit switched  हस्तांतरण , तब पैकेट आंकड़ा हस्तांतरण via gprs ( सामान्य पैकेट रेडियो सेवाएं ) और किनारे ( उन्नत आंकड़ा दरों  for GSM Evolution or EGPRS ) .
Further improvements  यहूद बना जब the 3gpp विकसित तीसरा पीढी ( 3g ) umts मानकों followed by चौथी पीढी (  4G ) LTE Advanced standards .
`` GSM '' is a  ट्रेडमार्क स्वामित्व by the जीएसएम संघ  .
President Franklin D.  रूज़वेल्ट लक्षण the lend-lease विधेयक to दे सहायता to ब्रिटेन और चीन  ( 1941 )
The Lend Lease act  थी an अधिनियम जहाँ the संयुक्त राज्य था समर्थित इसके  allies .
Lend-Lease ( ) was the law that started a program  अंतर्गत जिससे the संयुक्त राज्य of अमेरिका supplied the संयुक्त किंगडम , the ussr , गणतंत्र of चीन ,  Free France , and other Allied nations with materiel between 1941 and 1945 .
it थी हस्ताक्षरित into विधि on कूच 11 , 1941 , a साल और a हाफ बाद  the outbreak of World War II in Europe in September 1939 .
This was  नौ महीने पहले the u.S. डाला the युद्ध  in December 1941 .
Formally  titled an अधिनियम to further प्रचार the रक्षा of the संयुक्त राज्य , the अधिनियम effectively  ended the United States ' pretense of neutrality .
A total of $  50 .1 अरब ( समतुल्य to $ आज ) लायक of आपूर्तियाँ यहूद shipped : $ 31.4 अरब to ब्रिटेन , $ 11.3 अरब to the सोवियत संघ , $ 3.2  billion to France , $ 1.6 billion to China , and smaller sums to other Allies .
Reverse Lend-Lease  comprised सेवाएं ऐसे as किराया on एयर bases कि गई to the u.S. , और totaled $ 7.8 अरब ; of इस  , $ 6.8 billion came from the British and the Commonwealth .
The terms of the agreement  provided कि the materiel थी to be प्रयुक्त जबतक समय लिये उनके वापसी or  destruction .
Supplies after the termination date were sold to Britain at a large  छूट लिये £1 .075 अरब using long-term लोन इससे the संयुक्त राज्य .
Canada operated a similar program  कि भेजा $ 4.7 अरब in आपूर्तियाँ to the संयुक्त किंगडम और the सोवियत संघ  .
The United States  किया नहीं चार्ज लिये सहायता supplied  under this legislation .
This  कार्यक्रम थी a निर्णायक कदम दूर इससे non-interventionist नीति , जिससे था वर्चस्व संयुक्त राज्य  foreign relations since the end of World War I , towards international involvement .
The Jerusalem artichoke ( Helianthus tuberosus ) , also called sunroot , sunchoke , earth apple or topinambour , is a species of sunflower native to  पूर्वी उत्तर अमेरिका , और मिला इससे पूर्वी कनाडा और maine वेस्ट to उत्तर डकोटा , और  south to northern Florida and Texas .
It is also  cultivated widely आरपार the शीतोष्ण मण्डल लिये इसके tuber , जिससे is प्रयुक्त  as a root vegetable .
Castillo San Felipe del Morro also known as Fort San Felipe del Morro or Morro  किला , is a 16th-century citadel स्तिथ in सैन जुआन , प्यूर्टो  Rico .
Stonehenge is a prehistoric monument in  विल्टशायर , इंग्लैण्ड , परिचय वेस्ट of amesbury और उत्तर  of Salisbury .
One of the most famous sites in the world ,  stonehenge is the remains of a रिंग of खड़ा पत्थरों नियत भीतर earthworks  .
It is in the middle of the most dense complex of  पाषाणकालीन और कांस्य आयु स्मारक in इंग्लैण्ड , सहित अनेक सौ दफ़न  mounds .
archaeologists मानना it थी निर्मित anywhere इससे  3000 BC to 2000 BC .
Radiocarbon dating in 2008 suggested that the first stones  यहूद उठाया between 2400 और 2200 bc , whilst another सिद्धान्त suggests कि bluestones may have महरूम उठाया at the  site as early as 3000 BC .
The surrounding circular  धरती बैंको और खाई , जिससे constitute the earliest phase of the स्मारक ,  have been dated to about 3100 BC .
The site and its  परिवेश यहूद added to the युनेस्को 's सूची of संसार विरासत साइट in 1986 in  a co-listing with Avebury Henge .
It is  a नेशनल legally सुरक्षित अनुसूचित  Ancient Monument .
Stonehenge is  स्वामित्व by the क्राउन और प्रबंधित by अंग्रेज़ी विरासत , जबकि the surrounding  land is owned by the National Trust .
पुरातत्व प्रमाण मिला by the stonehenge riverside प्रोजेक्ट in 2008 indicates कि stonehenge could  have been a burial ground from its earliest beginnings .
The dating of cremated remains found on the site indicate that deposits contain human bone  इससे as जल्दी as 3000 bc , जब the खाई और बैंको यहूद पहला  dug .
Such  जमा जारी at stonehenge लिये at तनिक  another 500 years .
The site is a place of  धार्मिक significance और यात्राएं in  Neo-Druidry .
The NCAA Women 's Division I  चैंपियनशिप is an सालाना कॉलेज बास्केट  tournament for women .
Held each April , the Women 's  चैंपियनशिप थी उदघाटन in the 1981–82 ऋतु  .
The NCAA tournament was preceded by the  aiaw महिलाओं 's बास्केट टूर्नामेंट , जिससे थी आयोजित annually  from 1972 to 1982 .
Basketball  थी एक of बारह महिलाओं 's खेल added to the ncaa चैंपियनशिप कार्यक्रम लिये the 1981-82 स्कूल साल , as the ncaa सगाई in बैटल साथ  the Association for Intercollegiate Athletics for Women for sole governance of women 's collegiate sports .
The AIAW continued to conduct its  स्थापित चैंपियनशिप कार्यक्रम in the वही बारह ( और अन्य ) खेल ; however , बाद a साल  of dual women 's championships , the NCAA prevailed , while the AIAW disbanded .
Attendance and interest in the Women 's Division I Championship have grown over the years  , विशेषकर चूंकि 2003 , जब the फाइनल चैंपियनशिप खेल थी स्थानांतरित to the मंगलवार following the सोमवार मेन 's चैंपियनशिप  game .
The women 's  चैंपियनशिप खेल is अभी the फाइनल overall खेल of the कॉलेज  basketball season .
Before that , the Women 's Final Four was usually  निभाई on the शुक्रवार पहले the मेन 's फाइनल चार or the घंटों पहले the  men played on the final Saturday of the tournament .
the फाइनल थी प्रायः निभाई the संडे दोपहर  following the Men 's Final Four .
The  टूर्नामेंट कोष्ठक is बना up of champions  from each Division I conference , which receive automatic bids .
The remaining slots are  at-large बोलियों , साथ टीमों चुनी by an ncaa चयन कमेटी  .
The  चयन प्रक्रम और टूर्नामेंट seedings हैं आधारित on अनेक कारकों , सहित टोली rankings , win-loss रिकॉर्ड और दरजा  Percentage Index ( RPI ) data .
Unlike the  मेन 's टूर्नामेंट , वहीँ हैं तभी 32 at-large बोलियों ( as of  the next tournament in 2014 ) , and no play-in game .
The women 's tournament , like the men 's ,  is मंचन in a सिंगल विलोपन स्वरूप , और is भाग of the मीडिया और पब्लिक frenzy ज्ञात colloquially  as March Madness or The Big Dance .
सब 63 खेल have महरूम ब्रॉडकास्ट on टेलीविज़न  since 2003 on ESPN and ESPN2 .
Similar to the pre-2011 men 's  टूर्नामेंट कवरेज on सीबीएस , लोकल टीमों हैं दिखाया on प्रत्येक चैनल जब उपलब्धियाँ , साथ `` whip-around '' कवरेज designed to शोकेस the सबसे  competitive contests in the rest of the country .
The  rosetta स्टोन in the  British Museum
The Rosetta  स्टोन is an प्राचीन मिश्र granodiorite stele inscribed साथ a डिक्री जारी  at Memphis in 196 BC on behalf of King Ptolemy V .
The decree appears in three scripts : the upper text is Ancient Egyptian  चित्रलिपि , the मध्य portion demotic स्क्रिप्ट , और the न्यूनतम  Ancient Greek .
Because it presents essentially the same text in all three scripts ( with some  नाबालिग मतभेद between उन्हें ) , it provided the कुंजी to the आधुनिक समझना of मिश्र चित्रलिपि  .
Originally displayed within a temple , the  स्टोन थी संभवतः स्थानांतरित दौरान the जल्दी ईसाई or मध्यकालीन काल और आखिरकार प्रयुक्त as भवन सामग्री in the निर्माण  of Fort Julien near the town of Rashid ( Rosetta ) in the Nile Delta .
It was rediscovered there in 1799 by  a सिपाही , pierre-françois bouchard , of the  French expedition to Egypt .
As the first Ancient Egyptian bilingual text recovered in modern times , the Rosetta Stone aroused widespread public interest with  इसके संभावित to decipher इस hitherto untranslated प्राचीन भाषा  .
Lithographic copies and plaster casts  began circulating among यूरोपीय संग्रहालय और  scholars .
Meanwhile , British troops defeated the  फ्रेंच in मिश्र in 1801 , और the असली स्टोन आए into अंग्रेजों  possession under the Capitulation of Alexandria .
Transported to London , it has been on public display at  the अंग्रेजों संग्रहालय चूंकि 1802 .
It is the  most-visited ऑब्जेक्ट in  the British Museum .
Ever since its rediscovery  , the स्टोन रै महरूम the फ़ोकस of राष्ट्रवादी rivalries , सहित इसके ट्रांसफ़र इससे फ्रेंच to अंग्रेजों कब्ज़ा दौरान the napoleonic युद्धों , a long-running विवाद over the सापेक्ष मान  of Young 's and Champollion 's contributions to the decipherment , and since 2003 , demands for the stone 's return to Egypt .
Study of the decree was already  अंतर्गत रास्ता as the पहला पूरा अनुवाद of the यूनानी टेक्स्ट appeared in 1803  .
It was 20 years , however , before the transliteration of the Egyptian scripts  थी घोषित by jean-françois champollion in पेरिस in 1822 ; it took longer स्टिल पहले विद्वानों यहूद समर्थ to पढ़ा प्राचीन  Egyptian inscriptions and literature confidently .
Major advances in the decoding were : recognition that the stone offered three  संस्करण of the वही टेक्स्ट ( 1799 ) ; कि the demotic टेक्स्ट प्रयुक्त ध्वन्यात्मक वर्ण to वर्तनी विदेशी names ( 1802 ) ; कि the hieroglyphic टेक्स्ट किया so as खूब , और था pervasive similarities to the demotic ( थामस यंग  , 1814 ) ; and that , in addition to being used for foreign names , phonetic characters were also used to spell native Egyptian words ( Champollion , 1822–1824 ) .
Two other fragmentary copies of the same decree were discovered later , and several similar Egyptian bilingual or trilingual inscriptions are now known , including two slightly  पहले ptolemaic डिक्री ( the डिक्री of canopus in 238 bc , और the मेम्फिस डिक्री  of Ptolemy IV , ca . 218 BC ) .
The Rosetta Stone is  इसलिए no longer अद्वितीय , लकिन it थी the अनिवार्य कुंजी to आधुनिक समझना of प्राचीन मिश्र साहित्य  and civilization .
The  पद rosetta स्टोन is अभी प्रयुक्त in अन्य contexts as the नाम लिये the अनिवार्य  clue to a new field of knowledge .
Poison dart frog ( also  dart-poison मेंढक , ज़हर मेंढक or formerly ज़हर तीर मेंढक ) is the आम  name of a group of frogs in the family Dendrobatidae which are native to Central and South America .
These species are diurnal and  प्रायः have brightly रंगीन लाशें  .
Although all wild dendrobatids are at least  somewhat विषाक्त , स्तर of toxicity vary considerably इससे एक प्रजाति to the अगला और  from one population to another .
अनेक प्रजाति हैं threatened  .
These amphibians are often  पुकारा `` डार्ट मेंढक '' due to the amerindians ' स्वदेशी उपयोग of उनके to ज़हर the  tips of blowdarts .
however , of over 175 प्रजाति , तभी चार have महरूम प्रलेखित as होने प्रयुक्त लिये इस purpose ( curare पौधे हैं अधिक commonly प्रयुक्त ) , सब of जिससे आइये इससे the  Phyllobates genus , which is characterized by the relatively large size and high levels of toxicity of its members .
Cajeta  is a मैक्सिकन confection of thickened सिरप प्रायः  made of sweetened caramelised milk .
According to chef Rick Bayless , the name for cajeta came from  the स्पेनी phrase al punto de cajeta , जिससे अर्थात् `` a द्रव thickened to the पाइंट at जिससे a चमचा drawn through the द्रव reveals the नीचे of the घट in  which it is being cooked '' .
Another  परिकल्पना is कि it takes इसके नाम इससे the छोटी  wooden boxes in which it was traditionally packed .
Mexican cajeta is considered a specialty of the city of Celaya in the state of Guanajuato ,  हालांकि it is भी उत्पादित साथ the परंपरागत विधि in अनेक कस्बों of the राज्य of jalisco , ऐसे as mazamitla , sayula , और  Atotonilco el Alto .
Cajeta is made by  simmering बकरी 's मिल्क , or occasionally a sweetened द्रव , stirring अक्सर , जबतक it becomes बहुत viscous due to वाष्पीकरण of जल  , and caramelized .
While goat milk is the  सबसे usual आधार , अन्य liquids or रस may  be used .
In Celaya , and  आखिरकार the बाकी of मैक्सिको , the confection of हाफ बकरी 's मिल्क और हाफ गाय 's मिल्क became ज्ञात by the नाम cajeta , लकिन  elsewhere , the milk candy became known as leche quemada , dulce de leche , etc .
It has cousins in the many Indian milk-based  मिठाई जैसे प्रभा और the मिल्क फ़ज burfi , और in the ओपेरा फ़ज of the u.S. cajeta is खाया on इसके अपना as a  sweet , as a spread or filling for breads and pastries , such as churros , and as a topping for ice cream .
निश्चित liquors हैं added to खास व्यंजनों  called cajeta envinada .
In  जोड , cajeta envinada especial is समृद्ध साथ किशमिश  , almonds , pecans or nuts .
प्रायः it is प्रयुक्त as a टॉपिंग लिये crêpes , as a मीठी सॉस boiled और softened  down with milk to soak the crepes , resulting in a tasty dessert .
In  मैक्सिको अनेक ब्रांड्स मेक cajeta लकिन the  most common brand is Coronado .
It is also very  आम to प्लेस cajeta between obleas to मेक a परंपरागत  Mexican dessert .
प्रिंस विलियम , ड्यूक of कैम्ब्रिज ( विलियम आर्थर फिलिप लुई ; born 21 जून 1982 ) , is the elder बेटे of चार्ल्स , प्रिंस of वेल्स  , and Diana , Princess of Wales , and third-eldest grandchild of Queen Elizabeth II and Prince Philip , Duke of Edinburgh .
He is second in the line of succession , behind his father , to the thrones of sixteen independent sovereign states known as the Commonwealth  realms : the संयुक्त किंगडम , कनाडा , ऑस्ट्रेलिया , नई जीलैंड , जमैका , बारबाडोस , the बहामा , हरा , पापुआ नई गिनी , the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स , तुवालू  , Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent and the Grenadines , Belize , Antigua and Barbuda , and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Prince William  थी शिक्षित at चार स्कूलों in the संयुक्त किंगडम और प्राप्त a उपाधि इससे  the University of St Andrews .
He spent parts of a gap year in  चिली , बेलीज़ , तंजानिया , और कीनिया जहाँ he रै जिया  and holidayed several times .
Prince William has also  लिया kiswahili अध्ययन at विश्वविद्यालयों in  Kenya and Tanzania .
He was commissioned as a  लेफ्टिनेंट in the ब्लूज़ और रॉयल्स रेजीमेंट of the household प्यादे —serving साथ उसके bhai प्रिंस हैरी —and , दो सालो बाद , अर्जित उसके विंग्स  by completing pilot training at Royal Air Force College Cranwell .
In 2009 , he  transferred to the royal एयर फ़ोर्स , थी प्रचारित to उड़ान लेफ्टिनेंट  and underwent helicopter flying training in order to become a full-time pilot with the Search and Rescue Force .
In 2010 , he completed his general and special-to-type helicopter training and went on to RAF Valley on No . 22  स्क्वाड्रन performing co-pilot कर्तव्य on फलक a समुद्र किंग ढूंढें और बचाव हेलीकाप्टर  .
Prince  विलियम शादीशुदा उसके longtime गर्लफ्रेंड , कैथरीन मिडलटन , on  29 April 2011 at Westminster Abbey .
घंटों prior to उसके विवाह , प्रिंस विलियम थी निर्मित ड्यूक of कैम्ब्रिज  , Earl of Strathearn , and Baron Carrickfergus .
माली is a बहुभाषी  country .
The  भाषाएं बोला वहीँ प्रतिबिंबित प्राचीन  settlement patterns , migrations , and its long history .
ऍथनोलॉग रिश्तो  50 languages .
Of these , French is the  आधिकारिक भाषा और bambara is the सबसे widely बोला  .
Altogether 13 of the indigenous languages of  माली have the विधिक औकात  of national language .
Sign  in फ्रेंच , at a स्मारक  in Bamako .
