चाइनीज नई साल
9 – 12 February  ( वियतनाम  )
Rogers Building ,  the मुख्यालय of रोजर्स संचार
Rogers  संचार inc. is a diversified पब्लिक कनाडाई संचार  and media company .
It is particularly in the field of wireless communications , cable television ,  टेलीफोन , और अंतरजाल कनेक्टिविटी साथ significant अतिरिक्त दूरसंचार और द्रव्यमान मीडिया  assets .
The company is  headquartered in the रोजर्स भवन in टोरंटो  , Ontario .
The company claims the  विरासत of the रोजर्स वैक्यूम ट्यूब कम्पनी , संस्थापित in 1925 by एडवर्ड रोजर्स  , which started the CFRB radio station in Toronto , which was later acquired by outside interests .
The  उपस्थित एंटरप्राइज़ तिथियाँ to 1960 , जब रोजर्स ' बेटे ,  Ted Rogers , founded Rogers Radio Broadcasting Ltd .
That company acquired CHFI that year , as  खूब as aldred-rogers प्रसारण , a साझेदारी साथ जोएल aldred जिससे helped  launch CFTO in 1961 .
रोजर्स बाद खरीदा आउट aldred और प्रारंभ the वर्तमान केबल और बेतार परिचालन  , known as Rogers Cablesystems Ltd .
The  मुख्य प्रतिस्पर्धी to the कम्पनी is घंटी कनाडा , जिससे रै a similarly extensive पोर्टफोलियो of रेडियो और टेलीविज़न मीडिया एसेट , as खूब as बेतार , टेलीविज़न  distribution , and telephone services , particularly in Eastern and Central Canada ; the two companies are often seen as having a duopoly on communications services in their regions .
However , the company also competes nationally with Telus for wireless  सेवाएं , और primarily indirectly साथ शॉ संचार लिये टेलीविज़न  service .
The company also competes  साथ a क्रमांक of अन्य मीडिया कंपनियाँ in the प्रसारण उद्योग  .
The  अंतरजाल is a वैश्विक प्रणाली of interconnected कंप्यूटर संजाल कि उपयोग the मानक अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल  suite ( TCP/IP ) to serve billions of users worldwide .
It is a network of networks that consists of millions of private ,  पब्लिक , अकादमिक , कारोबार , और सरकारी संजाल , of लोकल to वैश्विक पैमाना , कि हैं linked by a व्यापक सरणी of इलेक्ट्रॉनिक , बेतार और ऑप्टिकल  networking technologies .
The Internet carries an extensive range of information resources and  सेवाएं , ऐसे as the inter-linked हाइपरटेक्स्ट दस्तावेज़ of the संसार चौड़ी वेब ( www ) और  the infrastructure to support email .
Most traditional communications media including telephone , music , film , and television are being reshaped or redefined by  the अंतरजाल , giving जनम to नई सेवाएं ऐसे as आवाज़ over अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल ( voip ) और अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल टेलीविज़न  ( IPTV ) .
Newspaper , book and other print publishing are adapting to Web  साईट प्रौद्योगिकी , or हैं reshaped into blogging  and web feeds .
The Internet has enabled and accelerated new  फ़ॉर्म of इंसान interactions through तत्काल messaging  , Internet forums , and social networking .
Online shopping has boomed  दोनो लिये प्रमुख खुदरा आउटलेट और छोटी शिल्पकार और व्यापारियों  .
Business-to-business and financial  सेवाएं on the अंतरजाल affect सप्लाई जंजीरों आरपार संपूर्ण उद्योग  .
The origins of the Internet reach back to research commissioned by the United States government in the 1960s to  निर्माण मजबूत , fault-tolerant संचार via कंप्यूटर संजाल  .
The funding of a new U.S. backbone by the National Science Foundation in the 1980s , as well as private funding for other commercial backbones , led to  विश्वव्यापी भागीदारी in the विकास of नई नेटवर्किंग technologies , और the विलय  of many networks .
The commercialization of what  थी by the 1990s an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संजाल resulted in इसके popularization और incorporation into  virtually every aspect of modern human life .
, more than 2.4 billion people—over a third of the world 's human population —have used the  सेवाएं of the अंतरजाल ; लगभग 100 टाइम्स अधिक लोगों than यहूद using it in 1995 , जब it थी ज़्यादातर प्रयुक्त by tech-savvy मध्य और अपर क्लास लोगों in the संयुक्त राज्य और  several other countries .
The Internet has no centralized governance in either  technological क्रियान्वयन or नीतियों लिये अभिगम और उपयोग ; प्रत्येक constituent संजाल सेट इसके  own policies .
Only the overreaching definitions of the two principal name spaces in  the अंतरजाल , the अंतरजाल प्रोटोकॉल पता स्पेस और the डोमेन नाम प्रणाली , हैं निर्देशित by a maintainer संगठन , the अंतरजाल निगम  for Assigned Names and Numbers ( ICANN ) .
The technical underpinning and standardization of the core protocols ( IPv4 and IPv6 ) is an activity of the Internet Engineering Task Force ( IETF ) , a non-profit  संगठन of loosely संबद्ध अंतरराष्ट्रीय भागीदार कि anyone may संबद्ध साथ by contributing तकनीकी विशेषज्ञता  .
The 2006 Winter Olympics , officially known as the XX  ओलम्पिक शीत खेल , थी a शीत multi-sport इवेंट जिससे थी मनाये in टोरीनो , इटली इससे  February 10 , 2006 , through February 26 , 2006 .
This  चिह्नित the दूसरी समय इटली hosted the ओलम्पिक शीत खेल , the पहला होने the सात ओलम्पिक शीत  Games in Cortina d'Ampezzo in 1956 .
इटली भी hosted the खेल of  the XVII Olympiad in Rome in 1960 .
टोरीनो थी चयनित as the  host city for the 2006 games in 1999 .
The official logo displayed the name `` Torino '' , the Italian name of  the नगर ; the नगर is ज्ञात as `` टोरीनो '' in दोनो अंग्रेज़ी  and the local traditional language , Piedmontese .
The Olympic mascots of Torino 2006 were Neve ( ``  हिम '' in इतालवी ) , a मादा स्नोबॉल , और gliz , a पुरूष  ice cube .
the आधिकारिक motto of the xx ओलम्पिक शीत  Games was `` Passion lives here '' .
`` Help ! '' is a song  by the बीटल्स कि परोसा as the शीर्षक सोंग  for both the 1965 film and its soundtrack album .
It was also released as a single , and was number one for  तीन सप्ताह in दोनो the संयुक्त राज्य और the संयुक्त किंगडम .
`` Help ! ''  थी लिखा primarily by जॉन लेनन ,  but credited to Lennon–McCartney .
During an interview with Playboy in  1984 , पॉल mccartney stated कि the शीर्षक थी `` आउट  of desperation '' .
पोस्टर लिये the 2005  exhibition
Siegfried Bing ( 26 February 1838 – 6 September 1905 ) ,  जो प्रायः दिया उसके नाम as S. bing , और थी यूँ प्रायः संदर्भित erroneously as `` सैमुएल bing '' ( सैमुएल ओटो bing , 1850–1905 , थी उसके bhai ) थी a जर्मनी आर्ट डीलर जो जिया in पेरिस as an वयस्क , और जो helped introduce जापानी आर्ट और artworks to the  West and was a factor in the development of the Art Nouveau style during the late nineteenth century .
Comparison of male and female  जीवन प्रत्याशा at जनम लिये देशों और territories as पारिभाषित in the 2011  CIA Factbook , with selected bubbles labelled .
The dotted line  corresponds to बराबर मादा और पुरूष  life expectancy .
The apparent 3D volumes  of the बुलबुले हैं linearly आंशिक to उनके जनसांख्यिकी  .
This is a list of countries by  जीवन प्रत्याशा at जनम  .
kennewick is a नगर in benton काउंटी in the southeastern भाग of the u.S.  state of Washington , near the Hanford nuclear site .
It is the most populous of  the तीन शहरों collectively referred to as the tri-cities ( the अन्य  being Pasco and Richland ) .
Kennewick is  स्तिथ साथ the दक्षिणपश्चिम बैंको of the कोलंबिया नदी , विपरीत  Pasco and just south of the confluence of the Columbia and Yakima rivers .
the जनसांख्यिकी थी  73,917 at the 2010 census .
April 1 , 2012 estimates from the  वॉशिंगटन राज्य दफ्तर of वित्तीय प्रबन्धन put the नगर 's जनसांख्यिकी at  75,160 .
The  निकटतम वाणिज्यिक विमानक्षेत्र is the tri-cities विमानक्षेत्र in pasco , a क्षेत्रीय वाणिज्यिक और निजी  airport .
फोर्ब्स पत्रिका नामित kennewick the # 2 क्षेत्रफल in the संयुक्त राज्य लिये जॉब विकास , जबकि आसपास  Yakima was named # 1 .
The article cites the number of scientists employed by  the प्रशांत उत्तरपश्चिम नेशनल प्रयोगशाला और क्षेत्रफल farmland लिये इस आउटलुक  .
The prothrombin time ( PT ) and its derived measures of prothrombin ratio (  pr ) और अंतरराष्ट्रीय सामान्यीकृत अनुपात ( inr ) हैं उपायों of the extrinsic pathway of  coagulation .
इस परीक्षण is भी पुकारा `` protime  INR '' and `` PT/INR '' .
वे हैं प्रयुक्त to determine the clotting tendency of रक्त , in the माप  of warfarin dosage , liver damage , and vitamin K status .
PT  उपायों कारकों i ( फाइब्रिनोजेन ) , ii ( prothrombin  ) , V , VII , and X .
It is used in  संयोजन साथ the activated आंशिक thromboplastin समय ( aptt  ) which measures the intrinsic pathway .
`` I 'm in the Mood for  प्रेम '' is a लोकप्रिय सोंग  .
The  म्यूज़िक थी लिखा by jimmy mchugh  , the lyrics by Dorothy Fields .
The song was  प्रकाशित in 1935  .
It was  introduced by frances langford in the फिल्म प्रत्येक रात्रि at आठ released कि  year .
The song was featured in  the 1936 हमारी गिरोह ( छोटी दुष्टों ) छोटी , the पिंच सिंगर , सुंग by कार्ल `` अल्फाल्फा ''  Switzer , and in the 1936 film Palm Springs .
It is often known to be  switzer 's हस्ताक्षर सोंग  .
James Moody 's saxophone solo on a  1952 रिकॉर्डिंग of इस सोंग प्रेरित the सोंग `` मूडी 's मनोदशा लिये प्रेम  `` .
Hip hop artist  प्रिंस पॉल sampled the सोंग as the आधार लिये the track `` मनोदशा लिये प्रेम '' on उसके एल्बम a प्रिंस among चोरों ( 1999 ) , साथ डॉन newkirk  singing its original lyrics .
The song 's  शीर्षक प्रेरित the अंग्रेज़ी शीर्षक of वोंग kar wai 's फिल्म  In the Mood for Love .
Cross-cultural psychology is the scientific study of  इंसान बर्ताव और दिमागी प्रक्रियाओं , सहित दोनो उनके variability और invariance  , under diverse cultural conditions .
Through  expanding शोध methodologies to recognize सांस्कृतिक variance in बर्ताव , भाषा , और अर्थ  it seeks to extend and develop psychology .
Since psychology as an academic discipline was developed largely in North America , some psychologists became concerned that constructs  स्वीकृत as सार्वभौमिक यहूद नहीं as निश्चर as previously assumed , विशेषकर चूंकि अनेक कोशिशें to replicate notable  experiments in other cultures had varying success .
Since there are questions as to whether theories dealing with central themes , such as affect , cognition , conceptions of the  स्वः , और मुद्दे ऐसे as psychopathology , चिंता , और अवसाद , may कमी बाह्य वैध जब `` exported '' to अन्य सांस्कृतिक contexts , cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान re-examines उन्हें using methodologies designed to फ़ैक्टर in  cultural differences so as to account for cultural variance .
Although some  आलोचकों have pointed to methodological खामियां in cross-cultural मनोवैज्ञानिक शोध और अर्जी कि गंभीर त्रुटियां in the सैद्धांतिक और methodological bases प्रयुक्त impede बल्कि than सहायता the वैज्ञानिक ढूंढें लिये सार्वभौमिक सिद्धान्त in  psychology , cross-cultural psychologists are turning more to the study of how differences ( variance ) occur , rather than searching for universals in the style of physics or chemistry .
in 1972 the अंतरराष्ट्रीय संघ of cross-cultural  Psychology ( IACCP ) was established .
This branch of psychology has continued to  विस्तार as वहीँ रै महरूम an increasing लोकप्रियता of incorporating संस्कृति और विविधता  into studies .
Cross-cultural psychology is  differentiated इससे सांस्कृतिक मनोविज्ञान  .
The latter is the branch of psychology that holds that human behavior is significantly influenced  by सांस्कृतिक मतभेद , अर्थ कि मनोवैज्ञानिक phenomena can तभी be compared साथ प्रत्येक अन्य आरपार संस्कृतियों to a बहुत सीमित  extent .
In contrast ,  cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान शामिल a ढूंढें लिये संभावित universals in बर्ताव  and mental processes .
Walter J. Lonner , writing for  नजर on psi ची , रै stated कि `` cross-cultural मनोविज्ञान can be विचार of as a प्रकार शोध methodology , बल्कि than an entirely पृथक फ़ील्ड  within psychology ( 2000 ) . ''
`` Judas '' is a song by  अमरीकी रिकॉर्डिंग कलाकार महिला गागा , इससे उसके दूसरी स्टुडियो एल्बम born  This Way ( 2011 ) .
It was released by Interscope  रिकॉर्ड on अप्रैल 15 , 2011 , चार दिनों  ahead of its scheduled release .
Written and produced by Lady Gaga and RedOne , `` Judas '' is a dance  और इलेक्ट्रो हाउस सोंग परिचय a स्त्री in प्रेम साथ a man जो  betrayed her .
It embodies the incidents that  have haunted गागा in the पास्ट , और इसके कोर अर्थ refers  to the negative parts of her life that she ca n't escape .
Gaga has further explained that the  सोंग थी भी परिचय honoring एक 's भीतरी अंधेरा in अनुक्रम to लाओ oneself  into the light .
The  कलाकृति लिये the सिंगल थी designed  by Gaga in Microsoft Word .
In spite of a  polarizing प्रभाव on अनेक धार्मिक समूह , the सोंग थी generally खूब प्राप्त by आलोचकों , जो likened the सोंग  to `` Bad Romance `` with some noting it should have been the album 's lead single .
The song has a similar sound  to गागा 's पिछला redone-produced ट्रैक्स , सहित `` पोकर फेस `` , `` lovegame `` , `` ख़राब रोमांस  '' , and `` Alejandro `` .
it contains तीन पृथक  hooks and a house -influenced break down .
Gaga explained that the lines spoken during the  विश्लेषण बात परिचय उसके as परे मोचन , regarding the परंपरागत दृश्य  of what a woman should be .
`` Judas '' initially had a strong sales  खोलने , लकिन थी कम कामयाब commercially in तुलना to गागा  's previous singles .
The song reached the top ten of the  चार्ट in सबसे प्रमुख म्यूज़िक बाज़ार , और भी पहुँचे the शीर्ष of the चार्ट  in South Korea .
a म्यूज़िक वीडियो लिये the सोंग थी फिल्माया in अप्रैल 2011 , co-directed by गागा और laurieann  Gibson and co-starring Norman Reedus .
It has a Biblical storyline  जहाँ reedus निभाई यहूदा इस्कैरियट और गागा निभाई  Mary Magdalene .
The video portrays  उन्हें as आधुनिक दिन प्रचारकों going  to Jerusalem .
It  शामिल the biblical स्टोरी of यहूदा betraying यीशु , और ended साथ गागा as  Magdalene getting stoned to death .
Before its release , the Catholic League condemned Gaga  लिये the कथित उपयोग of धार्मिक imagery और उसके भूमिका in the वीडियो  .
However ,  आलोचकों generally praised the वीडियो , नहीं ढूंढना  any offensive content .
the वीडियो थी मनोनीत लिये दो पुरस्कार at the 2011  MTV Video Music Awards .
Gaga has performed ``  यहूदा '' on a क्रमांक of टेलीविज़न shows , सहित the ग्राहम नॉर्टन दिखाएँ , शनिवार रात्रि सजीव , शुभ morning americas `` गर्मियाँ कॉन्सर्ट श्रेणी '' , the फ्रेंच x  Factor as well as on The Ellen DeGeneres Show .
H.264/MPEG-4 Part 10 or  avc ( उन्नत वीडियो कोडिंग ) is a मानक लिये वीडियो संपीडन , और is फिलहाल एक of the सबसे commonly प्रयुक्त स्वरुप लिये the रिकॉर्डिंग , संपीडन , और वितरण  of high definition video .
the फाइनल drafting कार्य on the पहला संस्करण of the मानक  was completed in May 2003 .
H.264/MPEG-4 AVC is a block-oriented motion-compensation -based  कोडेक मानक विकसित by the itu-t वीडियो कोडिंग विशेषज्ञ समूह ( vceg ) साथ साथ the iso/iec jtc1 चलती चित्र  Experts Group ( MPEG ) .
The project partnership  प्रयत्न is ज्ञात as the संयुक्त वीडियो टोली ( jvt  ) .
The ITU-T H.264 standard  और the iso/iec mpeg-4 avc मानक ( formally , iso/iec 14496-10 – mpeg-4 भाग 10 , उन्नत वीडियो कोडिंग ) हैं jointly कायम  so that they have identical technical content .
H.264 is perhaps best known as  होने एक of the कोडेक मानकों लिये blu-ray discs ; सब blu-ray डिस्क खिलाड़ी  must be able to decode H.264 .
It is also widely used by  स्ट्रीमिंग अंतरजाल स्त्रोत , ऐसे as वीडियो इससे vimeo , youtube , और the itunes स्टोर , वेब तन्त्र ऐसे as the adobe फ्लैश खिलाड़ी और microsoft silverlight , और भी विभिन्न hdtv प्रसारण  over terrestrial ( ATSC , ISDB-T , DVB-T or DVB-T2 ) , cable ( DVB-C ) and satellite ( DVB-S and DVB-S2 ) .
Non-binding arbitration is a type of  मध्यस्थता in जिससे the arbitrator makes a determination of the अधिकारों of the पार्टियों to the विवाद , लकिन इस determination  is not binding upon them , and no enforceable arbitration award is issued .
The `` award  '' is in प्रभाव an सलाहकार राय of the arbitrator 's दृश्य of the संबंधित  merits of the parties cases .
Non-binding  मध्यस्थता is प्रयुक्त in कनेक्शन साथ कोशिशें to पहुँचें  a negotiated settlement .
The role of an arbitrator in non-binding  मध्यस्थता is , on the सतह , समान to कि of a मध्यस्थ in a मध्यस्थता  .
However , the  प्रिंसिपल भेद is कि whereas a मध्यस्थ होगा कोशिश to सहायता the पार्टियों ढूँढें a मध्य मैदान to सुलह at , the arbitrator remains totally  removed from the settlement process and will only give a determination of liability and , if appropriate , an indication of the quantum of damages payable .
Subsequent to a non-binding arbitration , the parties remain free to pursue their claims either through the  न्यायालयों , or by रास्ता of a बाइंडिंग मध्यस्थता , हालांकि in अभ्यास a उपनिवेश  is the most common outcome .
The award and reasoning in a non-binding  मध्यस्थता is लगभग invariably inadmissible in कोई subsequent कार्रवाई in the न्यायालयों or in another मध्यस्थता  tribunal .
Non-binding arbitration  is utilised ज़्यादातर in the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा  .
It is largely unknown in Europe , although in the United Kingdom there is a practice of parties who are seeking a settlement  to jointly instruct a महारानी 's counsel लिये an राय on the merits और संभावित क्वांटम of a अर्जी , और तब to negotiate on the आधार of the दृश्य expressed in कि राय  .
Augustine Volcano is a Lava Dome Complex on  अगस्टाइन द्वीप in southwestern कुक इनलेट in the kenai प्रायद्वीप बरो of southcentral तटीय अलास्का , दक्षिणपश्चिम  of Anchorage .
the अलास्का ज्वालामुखी वेधशाला फिलहाल दरों माउंट अगस्टाइन as स्तर  of Concern Color Code Green for aviation and the Volcano Alert Level is at Normal .
Augustine Island has a  जमीन क्षेत्रफल of , जबकि वेस्ट द्वीप , बस बंद अगस्टाइन 's पश्चिमी shores , रै .
The island  is बना up मुख्यतः of पास्ट फटना  deposits .
Scientists have been  समर्थ to discern कि पास्ट गुम्बद पतन रै resulted in विशाल avalanches  .
A map  of बेलीज़ .
The country of  बेलीज़ रै roughly 386 km of तटरेखा , और रै अनेक मूँगा reefs  , cays , and islands in the Caribbean Sea .
Most  of ये रूप the बेलीज़ अवरोध रीफ , the longest in the  western hemisphere stemming approximately .
The reef and  इसके आइलैंड्स have महरूम a युनेस्को संसार  Heritage Site since 1996 .
The following is a list of oceanic islands of  बेलीज़ , arranged according to प्रदेश लकिन सब of जिससे  are in the Caribbean Sea .
Most of the islands  variate in स्पेलिंग between `` cay '' और `` caye '' , और भी उपयोग the स्पेनी  `` cayo '' .
River islands  have नहीं महरूम सूचीबद्ध  .
Drive Letter Access ( DLA ) is a discontinued commercial packet  लिखने अनुप्रयोग लिये the microsoft खिड़कियाँ ऑपरेटिंग प्रणाली कि allows ऑप्टिकल डिस्क आंकड़ा भंडार डिवाइस to be प्रयुक्त in a manner समान  to floppy disks .
DLA  is a पैकेट लिखने प्रौद्योगिकी लिये cd और dvd मीडिया कि  uses the UDF file system .
DLA is not compatible with Windows Vista  और नए , हालांकि a पैच exists to फिक्स इस समस्या अंतर्गत खिड़कियाँ  Vista .
Roxio Burn was  introduced on अप्रैल 30 , 2009  .
As a replacement for  dla , it remedies संगतता मुद्दे  Internet Explorer 8 .
Alpha Rex Emmanuel Humbard ( August 13 , 1919 – September 21  , 2007 ) थी a well-known अमरीकी टेलीविज़न इंजीलवादी जिनकी गिरजाघर of कल दिखाएँ थी दिखाया on over 600 स्टेशन at the शिखर  of its popularity .
Limitless is a 2011 American thriller film directed by Neil Burger  और अभिनीत ब्राडली कूपर , abbie cornish , और रॉबर्ट de niro  .
It is  आधारित on the 2001 अनोखा the अंधेरा फ़ील्ड by एलन glynn साथ  the screenplay by Leslie Dixon .
Alaska ( ) is a state in the United States , situated in the northwest extremity of the North American  महाद्वीप , साथ the अंतरराष्ट्रीय boundary साथ कनाडा to the ईस्ट , the आर्कटिक समंदर to the उत्तर  , and the Pacific Ocean to the west and south , with Russia further west across the Bering Strait .
Alaska is the largest  राज्य in the संयुक्त राज्य by क्षेत्रफल , the 4th तनिक populous और the तनिक  densely populated of the 50 United States .
लगभग हाफ of अलास्का 's 731,449 निवासियों सजीव भीतर  the Anchorage metropolitan area .
Alaska 's economy is dominated by the oil , natural  गैस , और फ़िशिंग उद्योग ; it रै ये संसाधन in प्रचुरता  .
Alaska was purchased from Russia on March 30  , 1867 , लिये $ 7.2 लाख ( $ समायोजित लिये महंगाई ) at लगभग  two cents per acre ( $ 4.74/km2 ) .
The land went through several administrative changes before becoming an  व्यवस्थित ( or incorporated ) territory on may 11 , 1912 , और the 49th राज्य of the u.S. on जनवरी  3 , 1959 .
The name `` Alaska '' ( Аляска ) was already introduced in the Russian colonial period , when it  थी प्रयुक्त तभी लिये the प्रायद्वीप और is निकला इससे the aleut alaxsxaq , अर्थ `` the मेनलैंड '' or , अधिक वस्तुतः , `` the ऑब्जेक्ट towards जिससे the कार्रवाई  of the sea is directed '' .
It is also known as Alyeska , the `` great land  '' , an aleut शब्द निकला इससे the वही  root .
नेल्सन मंडेला महानगर विश्वविद्यालयों ( nmmu ) is a दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी tertiary शिक्षा संस्था  with its main administration in the coastal city of Port Elizabeth .
A merging of three  संस्थानों संस्थापित nmmu in जनवरी 2005 लकिन इसके इतिहास तिथियाँ वापस to 1882 साथ the न्यास  of Port Elizabeth Art School .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों draws अंतरराष्ट्रीय विद्यार्थी  from all over the world .
There are over 3000 international students and include students from the  संयुक्त राज्य , फ़्रांस , चीन , जर्मनी , बेल्जियम , डेनमार्क , फिनलैंड  , Netherlands , Norway , Sweden , United Kingdom and many other countries .
NMMU  is a व्यापक विश्वविद्यालयों offering पेशेवर  and vocational training .
The  विश्वविद्यालयों रै छह campuses - पाँच in बंदरगाहों एलिज़ाबेथ  and one in George .
the प्रमुख कैम्पस is the दक्षिण  Campus .
विद्यार्थी at nmmu can पढ़ाई towards diplomas और डिग्री up to और सहित डॉक्टरेट स्तर  qualifications .
A number of courses include  कार्यस्थल अनुभव as भाग of the  curriculum .
covergirl is an अमरीकी कॉस्मेटिक्स ब्रांड संस्थापित in मेरीलैंड , by the noxzema रासायनिक कम्पनी ( बाद  called Noxell ) and acquired by Procter & Gamble in 1989 .
The Noxell Company advertised this cosmetics line by allowing `` cover girls  '' , फ़ैशन मॉडल जो appear on the सामने कवर of महिलाओं 's मैगज़ीन , to पहनें इसके  products .
CoverGirl makes up for lack of direct  व्यक्तिगत ग्राहक सेवा by providing a चौड़ी किस्में of कॉस्मेटिक्स उपलब्धियाँ  at reasonable prices .
On the Origin of Species , published on 24 November  1859 , is a कार्य of वैज्ञानिक साहित्य by चार्ल्स डार्विन जिससे is माना to be the न्यास of  evolutionary biology .
Its full title was On the Origin of Species by Means of Natural  चयन , or the संरक्षण of favoured दौड़  in the Struggle for Life .
For the sixth edition of 1872 ,  the छोटी शीर्षक थी बदला to the उत्पत्ति  of Species .
Darwin 's book introduced the scientific theory that populations evolve  over the कोर्स of पीढियां through a प्रक्रम of प्राकृतिक चयन  .
It presented a body of evidence that the diversity of life arose by common descent through a  branching पैटर्न of एवोल्यूशन  .
Darwin  शामिल प्रमाण कि he था gathered on the beagle expedition in the 1830s और उसके subsequent  findings from research , correspondence , and experimentation .
Various  विकासवादी विचार था already महरूम प्रस्तावित to बताइये  new findings in biology .
There was growing support for such  विचार among dissident anatomists और the सामान्य पब्लिक , लकिन दौरान the पहला हाफ of the 19th सदी the अंग्रेज़ी वैज्ञानिक स्थापना थी  closely tied to the Church of England , while science was part of natural theology .
Ideas about the transmutation of species were controversial as they conflicted  साथ the मान्यताओं कि प्रजाति यहूद अपरिवर्तनशील भाग of a designed पदानुक्रम और कि इंसानो यहूद अद्वितीय  , unrelated to other animals .
The  राजनैतिक और theological implications यहूद पडती debated , लकिन transmutation  was not accepted by the scientific mainstream .
The book was written for  non-specialist पाठक और आकर्षित फैली  interest upon its publication .
As Darwin was an eminent  वैज्ञानिक , उसके निष्कर्षों यहूद लिया seriously और the प्रमाण  he presented generated scientific , philosophical , and religious discussion .
The debate over the  किताब contributed to the अभियान by t.h . हक्स्ले और उसके fellow सदस्यों of the x क्लबों to secularise  science by promoting scientific naturalism .
Within two decades there was widespread  वैज्ञानिक अनुबंध कि एवोल्यूशन , साथ a branching पैटर्न of आम descent , था  occurred , but scientists were slow to give natural selection the significance that Darwin thought appropriate .
During the  `` ग्रहण of डार्विनवाद `` इससे the 1880s to the 1930s , विभिन्न अन्य  mechanisms of evolution were given more credit .
With the  विकास of the आधुनिक विकासवादी संश्लेषण in the 1930s और 1940s , डार्विन 's अवधारणा of विकासवादी अनुकूलन through प्राकृतिक चयन became सेंट्रल  to modern evolutionary theory , now the unifying concept of the life sciences .
Charles Dillon  `` केसी '' स्टेंगल ( ; जुलाई 30 , 1890 – सितंबर 29 , 1975 ) , nicknamed `` the बूढ़ा perfessor '' , थी  an American Major League Baseball outfielder and manager .
He  थी निर्वाचित to the बेसबॉल  Hall of Fame in .
Stengel was born in Kansas City , Missouri , and originally  nicknamed `` डच '' , a आम उपनाम at कि समय लिये अमेरिकी of जर्मनी ancestry  .
After his major league  करियर began , he acquired the उपनाम `` केसी '' , जिससे originally आए इससे the आद्याक्षर of उसके गृहनगर ( `` K.  C. '' ) , which evolved into `` Casey '' , influenced by the wide popularity of the poem Casey at the Bat .
in the 1950s , sportswriters उतावले उसे साथ yet another उपनाम , `` the बूढ़ा प्राध्यापक '' ( or `` perfessor ''  ) , for his sharp wit and his ability to talk at length on anything baseball -related .
Although his  बेसबॉल करियर spanned a क्रमांक of टीमों और शहरों , he is  primarily associated with clubs in New York City .
between playing और मैनेजिंग , he is the तभी man to have worn चार of नई यॉर्क 's प्रमुख लीग  clubs ' uniforms .
He was the first of four men ( through the season )  to मैनेज दोनो the नई यॉर्क यांकीज़ और नई यॉर्क मेट्स ; योगी berra , डलास ग्रीन , और जो टोरेस हैं  the others .
Like Torre ,  he भी प्रबंधित the braves  and the Dodgers .
He ended his baseball  करियर as the beloved मैनेजर लिये the तब विस्तार नई यॉर्क मेट्स , जिससे जीती over the दिल of नई यॉर्क partly  due to the unique character of their veteran leader .
June ( ) is the sixth month of the year in the  जूलियन और gregorian पंचांग और एक of the चार  months with a length of 30 days .
Ovid provides two etymologies  लिये जून 's नाम in उसके कविता concerning the महीने हकदार  the Fasti .
The first is that the month is named after the Roman goddess Juno ,  बीवी of बृहस्पति और समतुल्य to the यूनानी देवी hera ; the दूसरी is कि the नाम आता इससे the लैटिन शब्द iuniores , अर्थ `` younger ones  , '' as opposed to maiores ( `` elders '' ) for which the preceding month May may be named ( Fasti VI.1–88 ) .
See :  महीने in विभिन्न पंचांग भी पुकारा the ऋतु of the जून is the माह साथ the longest daylight घंटों of the साल  in the Northern Hemisphere and the shortest daylight hours of the year in the Southern Hemisphere .
June in the Northern Hemisphere is the seasonal  समतुल्य to दिसम्बर in the दक्षिणी गोलार्ध और वाइस versa .
In the Northern hemisphere , the  शुरूआत of the meteorological  summer is 1 June .
In the Southern hemisphere  , the शुरूआत of the meteorological शीत  is 1 June .
At the start of June , the sun rises in the constellation of Taurus ; at  the समाप्त of जून , the सूर्य उदय in the नक्षत्र  of Gemini .
However , due to the precession of the equinoxes , June  begins साथ the सूर्य in the astrological चिह्न of मिथुन , और ends साथ the सूर्य in the astrological  sign of Cancer .
June is  ज्ञात लिये the विशाल क्रमांक of विवाह कि occur over the  course of the month .
according to एक etymology , जून  is named after Juno ( Hera ) .
Juno was the goddess of marriage  और a शादीशुदा युगल 's household , so कुछ  consider it good luck to be married in this month .
According to another etymology provided by the Roman  कवि ओविड , जून is नामित लिये the iuniores , लैटिन लिये `` यंग लोगों '' ( fasti vi.88 ) और कि the माह  of May is named for the maiores , Latin for `` elders '' .
In Iceland , folklore says that if you bathe naked in  the morning ओस on the morning of जून 24 , तुम हैं supposed to रखना वृद्धावस्था at खाड़ी  for longer .
A constitution is a set  of आधारभूत सिद्धान्त or स्थापित precedents according to  which a state or other organization is governed .
These rules  साथ मेक up , i.e  . constitute , what the entity is .
When these principles are written down into a single document or set of legal documents , those  दस्तावेज़ may be कहा to embody a लिखा संविधान ; if वे हैं लिखा bas in a सिंगल व्यापक  document , it is said to embody a codified constitution .
Constitutions concern different levels  of संगठन , इससे sovereign राज्य to कंपनियाँ और unincorporated एसोसिएशन .
A  सन्धि जिससे establishes an अंतरराष्ट्रीय संगठन  is also its constitution , in that it would define how that organization is constituted .
Within states , whether sovereign or federated , a constitution defines the principles upon  जिससे the राज्य is आधारित , the कार्यविधि in जिससे कानून हैं बना और by  whom .
कुछ constitutions , विशेषकर संहिताबद्ध constitutions , भी अधिनियम as limiters of राज्य  power , by establishing lines which a state 's rulers can not cross , such as fundamental rights .
George Washington at  संवैधानिक सम्मेलन of 1787 , हस्ताक्षर  of U.S. Constitution .
The Constitution of India is the longest written constitution of  कोई sovereign देश in the संसार , containing 448 आलेख , 12 schedules और 100 amendments , साथ 117,369 शब्द in इसके अंग्रेज़ी भाषा संस्करण , जबकि the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान is the shortest लिखा  constitution , at 7 articles and 27 amendments .
रॉन diftler ( बाएँ ) , नासा robonaut मैनेजर assisting in a robonaut familiarization प्रशिक्षण सत्र in the स्पेस पर्यावरण सिमुलेशन  Laboratory at NASA 's Johnson Space Center .
Engineering management is a  specialized रूप of प्रबन्धन कि is चिंतित साथ the अनुप्रयोग of अभियान्त्रिकी सिद्धान्त  to business practice .
अभियान्त्रिकी प्रबन्धन is a करियर कि brings साथ the technological problem-solving savvy of अभियान्त्रिकी और the  organizational , administrative , and planning abilities of management in order to oversee complex enterprises from conception to completion .
Example areas of engineering are product development , manufacturing ,  निर्माण , डिज़ाइन अभियान्त्रिकी , औद्योगिक अभियान्त्रिकी , प्रौद्योगिकी , उत्पादन , or कोई अन्य फ़ील्ड कि employs कर्मियों  who perform an engineering function .
Successful engineering managers  typically आवश्यकता प्रशिक्षण और अनुभव in कारोबार और अभियान्त्रिकी  .
Technically inept  प्रबंधक tend to be वंचित of support by उनके तकनीकी टोली , और non-commercial प्रबंधक  tend to lack commercial acumen to deliver in a market economy .
Largely , engineering managers manage engineers who are driven by  non-entrepreneurial सोच , यूँ आवश्यकता the जरुरी लोगों कौशल to कोच , mentor और motivate तकनीकी पेशेवर  .
Engineering professionals joining manufacturing  कंपनियाँ sometimes become अभियान्त्रिकी प्रबंधक by डिफॉल्ट बाद a काल  of time .
वे हैं जरूरी to सीख कैसा to मैनेज एकबार वे हैं on the  job , though this is usually an ineffective way to develop managerial abilities .
In an insurance policy , the deductible is the amount of  खर्च कि जरूर be सशुल्क आउट of जेब पहले an insurer होगा अदा कोई खर्च  .
In general usage , the term deductible may be used to  describe एक of अनेक प्रकार of clauses ( देखिए नीचे ) कि हैं प्रयुक्त by बीमे कंपनियाँ as a दहलीज  for policy payments .
Deductibles are typically used to deter the large  क्रमांक of नगण्य दावा कि a उपभोक्ता can be reasonably अपेक्षित to भालू the लागत  of .
By restricting its coverage to events that are  significant पर्याप्त to incur विशाल लागत , the बीमे कड़ expects to अदा आउट थोड़ा छोटी amounts much कम अक्सर , रूष्ट  much higher savings .
As a result ,  बीमे प्रीमियम हैं typically सस्ता जब वे  involve higher deductibles .
Deductibles are normally provided as  clauses in an बीमे नीति कि dictate कैसा much of an insurance-covered व्यय is borne by the policyholder  .
They are normally  कोटेड as a फिक्स्ड मात्रा और is a भाग of सबसे नीतियों  covering losses to the policy holder .
The  insurer तब becomes liable लिये claimable खर्च कि exceed इस राशि ( विषय  to the maximum sum claimable indicated in the contract ) .
depending on the नीति , the deductible may लागू प्रति covered  incident , or per year .
For policies where incidences are not easy to delimit ( for  उदाहरण स्वास्थ्य बीमे ) , the deductible is typically लागू प्रति  year .
Several  deductibles can be नियत by the insurer  based on the cause of the claim .
For example , a single  आवास बीमे नीति may contain अनेक deductible amounts लिये घाटा or क्षति arising  from theft , fire , natural calamities , evacuation etc .
वहीँ हैं भी deductible reimbursement कार्यक्रम कि reimburse a deductible in the इवेंट of  an auto , home , boat/yacht or health insurance claim .
An invoice or bill is  a वाणिज्यिक दस्तावेज़ जारी by a विक्रेता to a खरीदार , indicating the उत्पाद , quantities  , and agreed prices for products or services the seller has provided the buyer .
An  चालान indicates the बिक्री लेनदेन  only .
Payment terms are independent of the  चालान और हैं negotiated by the खरीदार और the विक्रेता  .
भुगतान शर्तें हैं प्रायः शामिल  on the invoice .
The buyer could have already paid for the  उत्पाद or सेवाएं सूचीबद्ध on the चालान  .
Buyer can also have a maximum number of days in which to  अदा लिये ये goods और is sometimes offered a छूट  if paid before the due date .
In the rental industry , an invoice must  शामिल a विशिष्ट सन्दर्भ to the अवधि of the समय होने billed , so in जोड to मात्रा , दाम और छूट  the invoicing amount is also based on duration .
Generally each line of a rental  चालान होगा refer to the वास्तविक घंटों , दिनों , सप्ताह , महीने , etc. , होने billed  .
इससे the पाइंट of दृश्य of a विक्रेता ,  an invoice is a sales invoice .
From  the पाइंट of दृश्य of a खरीदार , an चालान  is a purchase invoice .
The document indicates the buyer and seller , but the term  चालान indicates धन is owed  or owing .
In English , the context of the term invoice is usually used to clarify  इसके अर्थ , ऐसे as `` we भेजा उन्हें an चालान '' ( वे owe us धन ) or `` we प्राप्त an चालान इससे उन्हें  '' ( we owe them money ) .
The right main bronchus ( or right primary  bronchus , or सही प्रिंसिपल bronchus ) is a bronchus of the respiratory  system .
It is wider , shorter  , और अधिक लंबवत in दिशा than  the left .
It is about 2.5 cm long ,  और enters the सही फेफड़ों nearly विपरीत  the fifth thoracic vertebra .
The azygos vein arches over it from  पीछे ; और the सही pulmonary धमनी झूठ at पहला नीचे और  then in front of it .
परिचय 2 cm इससे इसके शुरुआत it देता बंद a  branch to the upper lobe of the right lung .
This  is termed the eparterial शाखा of the bronchus , क्युकी it arises ऊपर  the right pulmonary artery .
The  bronchus अभी गुजरता नीचे the धमनी , और is ज्ञात as the hyparterial शाखा ; it divides  into two branches for the middle and lower lobes .
If a foreign body in the airway passes through the  श्वासनली , it होगा सबसे संभावित डालें the सही प्रमुख bronchus बजाय of the बाएँ , due to the straighter संरेखण of  the right bronchus to the trachea .
Squash  is a racquet खेल निभाई by दो ( singles ) or चार खिलाड़ी ( युगल ) in a four-walled अदालत  with a small , hollow rubber ball .
The players must alternate in striking the ball with their racquet and hit  the बॉल onto the playable सतहों of the चार दीवारें  of the court .
The game was formerly called squash racquets , a  सन्दर्भ to the `` squashable '' नरम बॉल प्रयुक्त in the खेल ( compared साथ the fatter  ball used in its parent game racquets or rackets ) .
Squash is recognized  by the ioc और समर्थक हैं lobbying लिये  its incorporation in a future Olympic program .
In  2003 , फोर्ब्स रेटेड स्क्वैश  as the number one healthiest sport to play .
Residual oil is oil  मिला in कम एकाग्रता naturally or in बेहाल  oil fields .
Often mixed with water , it  can नहीं be बरामद by conventional तकनीकों  .
However , it  can be बरामद using कार्बन dioxide-enhanced आयल रिकवरी ( co2 eor ) जिससे involves injecting  carbon dioxide into the well reducing viscosity and enhancing flow of the oil .
The technique is not new but  रै नहीं महरूम प्रयुक्त extensively on अवशेष आयल zones , low-grade जमा of पेट्रोलियम ऐसे as the 38 वर्गाकार मील in the  Permian Basin of Texas leased by Elliott Roosevelt Jr .
the तकनीक is सीमित by उपलब्धता  of carbon dioxide .
It  करता नहीं परिणाम in sequestration of the कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड लकिन the गैस is recycled  as much as possible .
संयुक्त राज्य reserves of अवशेष आयल हैं अनुमानित  to be 100 billion barrels .
Artist 's rendering  of the आग , by जॉन R. chapin , originally मुद्रित in हार्पर 's साप्ताहिक  ; the view faces northeast across the Randolph Street Bridge .
The Great Chicago  आग थी a conflagration कि burned इससे संडे , अक्तूबर 8 , to जल्दी मंगलवार , अक्तूबर 10 , 1871 , हत्या  hundreds and destroying about in Chicago , Illinois .
Though the fire was one of the  largest u.S. आपदाओं of the 19th सदी , the पुनर्निर्माण कि began helped develop शिकागो  as one of the most populous and economically important American cities .
Henry  viii ( 28 जून 1491 – 28 जनवरी 1547 ) थी  king of England from 21 April 1509 until his death .
He was lord , and  बाद किंग , of आयरलैंड , as खूब as continuing the नाममात्र अर्जी  by the English monarchs to the Kingdom of France .
Henry was  the दूसरी monarch of the ट्यूडर राजवंश , succeeding  his father , Henry VII .
besides उसके छह विवाह , हेनरी viii is ज्ञात लिये उसके भूमिका in the विरह of  the Church of England from the Roman Catholic Church .
Henry 's struggles with Rome led to the separation of the Church  of इंग्लैण्ड इससे papal प्राधिकार , the विच्छेद of the monasteries , और उसके अपना स्थापना as the परम् सिर of the गिरिजाघर  of England .
Yet he remained a  आस्तिक in कोर कैथोलिक theological शिक्षाओं , भी बाद उसके excommunication  from the Roman Catholic Church .
Henry oversaw the  विधिक संघ of इंग्लैण्ड और वेल्स साथ the  Laws in Wales Acts 1535 and 1542 .
In 1513 , the new king allied with the Holy Roman Emperor  , maximillian i , और invaded फ़्रांस in 1513 साथ a विशाल , well-equipped  army , but achieved little at a considerable financial cost .
Maximillian , for his  भाग , प्रयुक्त the अंग्रेज़ी आक्रमण to उसके अपना ends , और इस prejudiced इंग्लैण्ड  's ability to defeat the French .
This foray would prove the start of an  obsession लिये हेनरी , जो invaded again  in 1544 .
This time , Henry 's forces captured the important city of Boulogne , but again the Holy Roman Emperor ,  चार्ल्स v , समर्थित हेनरी तभी as long as he needed to और इंग्लैण्ड , strained by the विशाल लागत of the युद्ध  , ransomed the city back for peace .
His contemporaries considered Henry in his prime to be an  आकर्षक , शिक्षित और संपन्नता किंग , और he रै महरूम वर्णित as `` एक of the सबसे charismatic शासकों to बैठना  on the English throne '' .
Besides ruling with absolute  शक्ति , he भी सगाई खुद as an लेखक और  composer .
His desire to  provide इंग्लैण्ड साथ a पुरूष वारिस – जिससे stemmed partly इससे निजी वैनिटी और partly क्युकी he believed a बेटी होता be असमर्थ to consolidate the ट्यूडर राजवंश और  the fragile peace that existed following the Wars of the Roses – led to the two things for which Henry is most remembered : his six marriages and the English Reformation .
Henry became  रुग्ण मोटे और उसके स्वास्थ्य suffered , contributing  to his death in 1547 .
He is frequently characterised  in उसके बाद जीवन as a lustful , egotistical , हर्ष , और असुरक्षित किंग  .
La Reina del Sur ( The Queen of the South ) is a Spanish-language telenovela  उत्पादित by the संयुक्त राज्य टेलीविज़न संजाल telemundo , in संयोजन साथ the एंटेना 3 संजाल और rti producciones  .
Based on a novel of the same name by  स्पेनी लेखक arturo pérez-reverte , the नाटक depicts the वृद्धि of टेरेसा मेंडोज़ा ( केट डेल कैस्टिलो ) , a यंग स्त्री इससे मैक्सिको जो becomes the  most powerful drug trafficker in southern Spain .
Patricio Wills , the  अध्यक्ष of telemundo टेलीविज़न studios , थी the  executive producer .
हालांकि la reina डेल सूर थी मनोनीत लिये novela of the साल , पसंदीदा सीसे  Actress , and Best Bad Luck Video , it won no awards .
With a $ 10 million budget , La Reina del  सूर थी the सबसे महंगी telenovela कभी उत्पादित by telemundo .
the कार्यक्रम 's प्रीमियर on फ़रवरी 28 , 2011 , थी  the network 's highest rated premiere for a telenovela to date .
The program  अक्सर वर्चस्व इसके समय स्लॉट , भी over अंग्रेज़ी भाषा प्रोग्रामिंग  on other major U.S. networks .
La Reina del Sur completed its 63 episode run on Telemundo  और इसके 13 एपीसोड चलाएं on एंटेना 3 simultaneously on may 30 , 2011  .
The final episode was the highest rated  ब्रॉडकास्ट in telemundo 's 19-year इतिहास ( 4.2 लाख दर्शक ) , और ताल सब of the अंग्रेज़ी भाषा u.S. टेलीविज़न  networks to earn the number one slot in the 18-49 adult demographic .
The program 's success  spurred telemundo to लॉन्च इसके पहला अभियान to लाभ  the series an Emmy Award nomination .
A one-night  खास featuring अनेक डाल सदस्यों aired on may 31 , 2011 , और चिह्नित the telemundo डेब्यू of विख्यात  Latina television personality Cristina Saralegui .
La Reina del Sur is broadcast in several other  बाज़ार , सहित सर्बिया , कोलंबिया , चिली , साइप्रस , निकारागुआ , कोस्टा रिका , मैक्सिको , अल्बानियाई , हंगेरियाई  , Slovenia , Croatia , Romania , ( among others ) .
an उदाहरण of  rack mounted servers
A web  होस्टिंग सेवा is a प्रकार of अंतरजाल होस्टिंग सेवा कि allows individuals और संगठन  to make their website accessible via the World Wide Web .
Web hosts are companies that provide space on a server owned or  leased लिये उपयोग by क्लाइंट , as खूब as providing अंतरजाल कनेक्टिविटी , typically  in a data center .
Web hosts can also provide data center space  और कनेक्टिविटी to the अंतरजाल लिये अन्य सर्वर स्तिथ in उनके आंकड़ा बीच  , called colocation , also known as Housing in Latin America or France .
the पैमाना of वेब होस्टिंग सेवाएं  varies greatly .
The most basic is web  पेज और small-scale संचिका होस्टिंग , जहाँ फाइलें can be अपलोड via संचिका ट्रांसफ़र  Protocol ( FTP ) or a Web interface .
The  फाइलें हैं प्रायः वितरित to the वेब  `` as is '' or with minimal processing .
Many Internet service  प्रदाताओं ( isps ) प्रस्ताव इस सेवा फ़्री to  subscribers .
Individuals and organizations  may भी obtain वेब पेज होस्टिंग इससे वैकल्पिक सेवा  providers .
Personal web site  होस्टिंग is typically फ़्री , advertisement-sponsored , or  inexpensive .
Business web site  होस्टिंग प्रायः रै a उच्चतर व्यय depending upon the आकार  and type of the website .
Single page hosting is generally  sufficient लिये निजी वेब पृष्ठों  .
A complex site calls for a more comprehensive package that  provides डेटाबेस support और अनुप्रयोग विकास प्लेटफ़ॉर्म ( e.g . पीएचपी , जावा , माणिक्य on rails  , ColdFusion , or ASP.NET ) .
These facilities allow customers to  लिखें or स्थापना स्क्रिप्ट लिये अनुप्रयोग  like forums and content management .
Also , Secure Sockets  परत ( एसएसएल ) is typically प्रयुक्त लिये  e-commerce .
The host may also provide an interface or control panel for managing the  वेब सर्वर और installing स्क्रिप्ट , as खूब as अन्य मौड्यूल और सेवा अनुप्रयोग जैसे e-mail  .
Some hosts specialize in certain software or services ( e.g . e-commerce ) ,  जिससे हैं commonly प्रयुक्त by larger कंपनियाँ कि outsource संजाल अवसंरचना  .
Madden NFL (  ज्ञात as जॉन मैडेन फ़ुटबॉल पहले 1993 ) is an अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल वीडियो खेल श्रेणी  developed by Electronic Arts Tiburon for EA Sports .
The game series is named after Pro Football Hall  of famer जॉन मैडेन , a well-known पूर्व सुपर कटोरी –winning कोच of the  Oakland Raiders and color commentator .
The series  is the बेहतरीन selling ea खेल  series .
The  खेल have consistently महरूम a बेहतरीन विक्रेता , और रै  even spawned TV shows where players compete .
Among the game 's realistic features include sophisticated  playbooks और खिलाड़ी आंकडे , और आवाज़ commentary कि allows खिलाड़ी to सुन the खेल as if it यहूद a रियल tv ब्रॉडकास्ट .
The Madden NFL series has been  nicknamed the एनएफएल 's 33rd मताधिकार  .
The series was originally conceived by  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक कला संस्थापक ट्रिप हॉकिन्स , जो तब approached मैडेन in 1984 लिये उसके समर्थन और विशेषज्ञता  .
Due  to मैडेन 's insistence कि the खेल be as यथार्थवादी as संभावित  , the first version of John Madden Football was not released until 1988 .
The  दूसरी संस्करण of the खेल थी released in 1990 , साथ सालाना संस्करण  since then .
The series ' name was changed to Madden  एनएफएल in 1993 बाद ea acquired the अधिकारों to उपयोग एनएफएल टीमों और  players .
Despite Madden 's  रिटायरमेंट as a प्रसारणकर्ता in 2009 , he continues to lend उसके नाम  and provide expertise for the game .
Cindy Lee Miller Sheehan ( born  जुलाई 10 , 1957 ) is an अमरीकी antiwar activist जिनकी बेटे , u.S. फौज विशेषज्ञ केसी sheehan  , was killed by enemy action during the Iraq War .
She attracted national and international media attention in August 2005 for her extended  antiwar विरोध at a makeshift शिविर बाहर अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश 's टेक्सास ranch —a स्टैंड कि खींचा दोनो  passionate support and angry criticism .
Sheehan ran  unsuccessfully लिये कॉंग्रेस in  2008 .
She is a vocal  आलोचक of अध्यक्ष बराक ओबामा 's विदेशी  policy .
Her memoir , Peace  माँ : a माँ 's यात्रा through heartache to सक्रियता ,  was published in 2006 .
sheehan थी the 2012 vice-presidential nominee  of the Peace and Freedom Party .
wyclef jeanelle जां ( ; ; born अक्तूबर 17 , 1969 ) wyclef  Dumped From Haiti 's Presidential Ballot – TIME , Aug 21 , 2010 .
`` Before he announced on August 5 that he  थी कार्यशील लिये अध्यक्ष of हैती , wyclef जां थी स्टिल लिस्टिंग  his age as only 37 years old .
But after declaring himself a presidential candidate , the  haitian-american-irish hip-hop स्टार भी decided to आइये साफ और confirm कि he थी वाकई 40 . '' is a three-time ग्रैमी पुरस्कार -winning haitian-american rapper , singer-songwriter , संगीतकार ,  record producer , and politician .
At age nine , Jean moved to the United  राज्य साथ उसके परिवार और रै खर्च much of उसके  life in the country .
He first received fame as a member of  the acclaimed नई जर्सी हिप हॉप समूह the  Fugees .
On  अगस्त 5 , 2010 , जां दायर लिये उम्मीदवारी in the 2010 haitian अध्यक्षीय चुनाव , हालांकि the चुनावी आयोग subsequently शासित उसे अयोग्य  to stand as he had not met the requirement to have been resident in Haiti for five years .
Wyclef  जां to अपील विरूद्ध हैती चुनाव सत्ताधारी – बीबीसी न्यूज , अगस्त  22 , 2010 .
Haiti 's electoral commission said that Mr  जां थी अयोग्य to स्टैंड as the haitian संविधान requires उम्मीदवार to have जिया in the देश  for five years prior to an election .
the 40-year-old सिंगर जीवनदान  in the US .
Jean 's efforts at  भूकंप राहत , अत्यधिक publicized in 2010 throughout हैती और the संयुक्त राज्य , यहूद channeled through उसके charitable  organization , Yéle Haiti .
The charity , which performed a variety of  charitable works in हैती between 2005 और 2010  , effectively closed in 2012 .
In law , a set-off is a statutory defense to  the पूरे or to a portion of a अभियोक्ता 's अर्जी  .
It had no existence under the English  आम विधि , होने निर्मित by 2 जियो . ii c. 22 लिये the राहत of insolvent कर्जदार ,  although set-off was recognized in equity .
Such a defense could be pleaded  तभी in आदर of परस्पर debts of a definite अक्षर  , and did not apply to cases in which damages were claimed , nor to equitable claims or demands .
By the rules of the Supreme Court ( O. XIX . r. 3 ) a defendant in an  कार्रवाई may नियत बंद or नियत up कोई सही or अर्जी by रास्ता of counterclaim विरूद्ध the दावा of a अभियोक्ता ,  and such set-off or counterclaim has the same effect as a statement of claim in a cross-action .
The legal defense of set-off ( above ) was originally  introduced to prevent the अन्यायपूर्ण हालात whereby a व्यक्ति ( `` पार्टी a '' ) जो owed धन to another ( `` पार्टी b '' ) could be भेजा to कर्जदार थाना , despite the फैक्ट  that Party B also owed money to Party A .
The law thus allows both parties to defer payment until  उनके संबंधित दावा have महरूम सुना  in court .
Upon judgment , both claims are extinguished and replaced by a single net sum owing ( e.g . If Party A owes  पार्टी b 100 और पार्टी b owes पार्टी a 105 , the दो रकम हैं नियत बंद और replaced साथ a सिंगल दायित्व of 5 इससे  Party B to Party A ) .
Set-off can also be incorporated by contractual agreement so that ,  जहाँ a पार्टी मूलभूत , the परस्पर amounts owing हैं automatically नियत बंद और बुझे  .
In certain jurisdictions ( including the  uk ) , set-off takes प्लेस automatically upon the  insolvency of a company .
This means that , for each party which is both a creditor and debtor of the  insolvent कम्पनी , परस्पर debts हैं set-off विरूद्ध प्रत्येक अन्य , और तब either the दिवालिया 's creditor can अर्जी the संतुलन in the दिवालियापन  or the trustee in bankruptcy can ask for the balance remaining to be paid , depending on which side owed the most .
This has  महरूम criticized as an undeclared सुरक्षा ब्याज  that violates the principle of pari passu .
The alternative , where a creditor has to pay all its debts  , लकिन प्राप्त तभी a सीमित portion of the leftover moneys कि अन्य unsecured लेनदारों  get , poses the danger of 'knock-on ' insolvencies .
The right  to नियत बंद is विशेषकर महत्वपूर्ण जब रिपोर्टिंग  a bank 's exposures to regulatory authorities .
The situation where a  बैंको रै to रपट कि it रै lent a विशाल योग to a borrower ( और is इसलिए उजागर , क्युकी वहीँ is a रिस्क कि the borrower might डिफॉल्ट thereby अग्रणी to the घाटा of the बैंको 's or इसके जमाकर्ताओं ' धन ) is यूँ replaced (  where the bank has taken security over shares or securities of the borrower ) with an exposure of the money lent minus the value of the security taken .
Jennifer Joanna Aniston ( born February 11 , 1969 ) is  an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री , फिल्मी निदेशक , और निर्माता  .
Aniston gained worldwide  मान्यता in the 1990s लिये portraying रेचल ग्रीन on the टेलीविज़न sitcom मित्रों , a भूमिका  which earned her an Emmy Award , a Golden Globe Award , and a Screen Actors Guild Award .
एनिस्टन रै भी enjoyed a कामयाब  Hollywood film career .
She gained critical acclaim for  उसके प्रदर्शन in the स्वतंत्र films वो 's the एक ( 1996 ) , दफ्तर स्पेस ( 1999 ) ,  The Good Girl ( 2002 ) and Friends with Money ( 2006 ) .
She has had her greatest commercial successes with the films Bruce Almighty ( 2003  ) , the break-up ( 2006 ) , मार्ले & me ( 2008 ) , बस go साथ it ( 2011 ) और भयानक bosses  ( 2011 ) .
Aniston received a  स्टार on the हॉलीवुड चलना of कीर्ति on फ़रवरी  22 , 2012 .
a श्वेत बंगाल बाघ at the  Houston Aquarium
(  वीडियो  )
A White tiger  at tobu चिड़ियाघर , in saitama  , Japan .
the श्वेत बाघ is a recessive म्यूटेंट of the बंगाल बाघ , जिससे थी reported in the जंगली इससे  time to time in Assam , Bengal , Bihar and especially from the former State of Rewa .
Conventional  पीसीआई ( पीसीआई is an initialism formed इससे परिधीय घटक इंटरकनेक्ट , भाग of the पीसीआई लोकल बस मानक  and often shortened to just PCI ) is a local computer bus for attaching hardware devices in a computer .
The PCI bus  supports the कृत्यों मिला on a प्रोसेसर बस , लकिन in a मानकीकृत  format that is independent of any particular processor .
Devices  कनेक्ट to the बस appear to the प्रोसेसर to be कनेक्ट सीधे to the  processor bus , and are assigned addresses in the processor 's address space .
Attached devices can take either the  रूप of an एकीकृत सर्किट fitted onto the मदरबोर्ड itself , पुकारा a planar यंत्र in the पीसीआई specification  , or an expansion card that fits into a slot .
The PCI  लोकल बस थी पहला implemented in ibm pc compatibles , जहाँ it विस्थापित the संयोजन of isa  plus one VESA Local Bus as the bus configuration .
It has subsequently  महरूम अपनाया लिये अन्य कंप्यूटर  types .
PCI and PCI-X are being replaced by PCI  एक्स्प्रेस , लकिन , सबसे motherboards हैं स्टिल बना साथ एक or अधिक पीसीआई स्लॉट , जिससे हैं  sufficient for many uses .
The PCI specification covers the physical size of  the बस ( सहित the आकार और अंतरण of the सर्किट फलक किनारे विद्युत सम्पर्क ) , विद्युत विशेषताएँ  , bus timing , and protocols .
The  specification can be खरीदा इससे the पीसीआई खास ब्याज समूह  ( PCI-SIG ) .
Typical PCI cards used in PCs include :  संजाल ताश , ध्वनि ताश , modems , अतिरिक्त पोर्ट ऐसे as usb or सीरियल , tv ट्यूनर ताश और डिस्क परिरक्षक  .
PCI video cards replaced ISA  और vesa ताश , जबतक growing बैंडविड्थ आवश्यकताएँ outgrew the सामर्थ्य of पीसीआई ; the पसन्दीदा इंटरफ़ेस  for video cards became AGP , and then PCI Express .
PCI video cards  remain उपलब्धियाँ लिये उपयोग साथ बूढ़ा pcs बगैर अगप or  PCI Express slots .
Many devices previously provided on PCI expansion cards are now  commonly एकीकृत onto motherboards or उपलब्धियाँ in सार्वभौमिक सीरियल बस और पीसीआई एक्स्प्रेस संस्करण  .
कैफीन is a कड़वा , श्वेत crystalline xanthine एल्कलॉएड कि अधिनियमों  as a stimulant drug .
Caffeine is found in varying quantities in the seeds , leaves , and fruit of some plants ,  जहाँ it अधिनियमों as a प्राकृतिक कीटनाशक कि paralyzes और मारता निश्चित कीट feeding on the पौधे , as खूब as बढ़ाना the बदला मेमोरी  of pollinators .
It is most commonly consumed by humans in infusions extracted  इससे the बीज of the कॉफी संयंत्र और the पत्ते of the चाय बुश , as खूब as इससे विभिन्न भोजन और पेय containing उत्पाद निकला इससे  the kola nut .
Other sources  शामिल yerba maté , guarana जामुन , guayusa , और the yaupon  holly .
In humans , caffeine acts as a  सेंट्रल बेचैन प्रणाली उत्तेजक , temporarily warding बंद drowsiness  and restoring alertness .
it is the संसार 's सबसे widely खपत psychoactive ड्रग , लकिन नापसंद अनेक अन्य psychoactive  substances , it is legal and unregulated in nearly all parts of the world .
Beverages  containing कैफीन , ऐसे as कॉफी , चाय , नरम पेय , और उर्जा  drinks , enjoy great popularity .
in उत्तर अमेरिका , 90 % of वयस्कों  consume caffeine daily .
Part of the  कारण कैफीन is वर्गीकृत by the खाना और ड्रग प्रशासन as ग्रा ( generally पहचाना as सुरक्षित ) is कि विषाक्त doses ( over  10 grams ) are much higher than typically used doses ( less than 500 milligrams ) .
Ordinary consumption can have low health risks , even when carried on for  सालो – वहीँ may be a modest सुरक्षात्मक प्रभाव विरूद्ध कुछ रोगों , सहित parkinsons बीमारी ,  and certain types of cancer .
Caffeine can  have दोनो धनात्मक और ऋणात्मक प्रभाव on चिंता  disorders .
Some people experience sleep disruption if they consume caffeine ,  विशेषकर दौरान the संध्या घंटों , लकिन अन्य दिखाएँ छोटी disturbance और the प्रभाव of कैफीन on नींद is अत्यधिक परिवर्तनीय .
Evidence of a  रिस्क to गर्भावस्था is equivocal , लकिन कुछ अधिकारियों have concluded कि दूरदर्शी सलाह is लिये  pregnant women to limit consumption to the equivalent of two cups of coffee per day or less .
The American Congress of Obstetricians and Gynecologists ( ACOG  ) concluded in 2010 कि कैफीन खपत is सुरक्षित up to 200 mg प्रति दिन in गर्भवती महिलाओं  .
Caffeine has pressor and mild diuretic effects when administered to people who are not used to it , but regular users develop a  सहिष्णुता to इस प्रभाव , और अध्ययन have generally विफल to support the आम ख़्याल कि ordinary खपत contributes significantly to निर्जलीकरण  .
With heavy use , tolerance develops rapidly to  autonomic प्रभाव ऐसे as elevated दिल रेट और मांसपेशी twitching , लकिन नहीं to the  cognitive or arousal effects of caffeine .
The degree to which caffeine can  उपज clinically significant शारीरिक और दिमागी dependence remains a विषय  of controversy in the medical literature .
A  kicktail क्रूजर
A  longboard is a longer रूपांतर of a स्केटबोर्ड  .
It is  commonly प्रयुक्त लिये cruising , downhill रेसिंग , slalom रेसिंग , स्लाइडिंग , and/or  transport .
स्त्रोत बाहर of विकिपीडिया दे  differing estimates:

The  coast सीमाएँ of कैलिफ़ोर्निया स्पैन इससे हम्बोल्ट काउंटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया  south to Santa Barbara County .
The other three coastal California  पहाड़ सीमाएँ हैं the अनुप्रस्थ  Ranges , Peninsular Ranges and the Klamath Mountains .
Physiographically , they are  a खण्ड of the larger प्रशांत किनारा प्रांत , जिससे in फेरे हैं भाग of the larger  Pacific Mountain System physiographic division .
UNESCO has included the `` California Coast Ranges Biosphere  आरक्षित `` in इसके man और the जीवमंडल कार्यक्रम of संसार संजाल of  Biosphere Reserves since 1983 .
