An automobile , autocar , motor car or car is a  wheeled मोटर गाडी प्रयुक्त लिये transporting यात्री , जिससे भी carries इसके अपना इंजन  or motor .
सबसे परिभाषाएं of the पद बताएँ कि ऑटोमोबाइल हैं designed to चलाएं primarily on सड़कें , to have seating लिये एक to आठ लोगों , to typically have चार पहियों , और to  be constructed principally for the transport of people rather than goods .
The term motorcar has also been used in the context of  electrified रेल प्रणालियों to denote a car जिससे कृत्यों as a छोटी लोकोमोटिव लकिन भी provides  space for passengers and baggage .
ये लोकोमोटिव गाड़ियाँ यहूद प्रायः प्रयुक्त on suburban  routes by both interurban and intercity railroad systems .
It was estimated in 2010 that the number of  ऑटोमोबाइल था risen to over 1 अरब वाहनों , up इससे  the 500 million of 1986 .
The numbers are  increasing rapidly , विशेषकर in चीन और इण्डिया  .
John  fitzgerald `` जोकर '' कैनेडी ( may 29 , 1917 – नवम्बर 22 , 1963 ) , प्रायः referred to by उसके  initials JFK , was the 35th President of the United States , serving from 1961 until his death in 1963 .
After military service  as कमांडर of the मोटर torpedo नौकाएँ pt-109 और pt-59 दौरान संसार युद्ध ii in the दक्षिण प्रशांत , कैनेडी  represented Massachusetts ' 11th congressional district in the U.S. House of Representatives from 1947 to 1953 as a Democrat .
Thereafter , he served in  the u.S. सीनेट इससे 1953 जबतक 1960 .
Kennedy  पराजित वाइस अध्यक्ष और रिपब्लिकन प्रत्याशी  Richard Nixon in the 1960 U.S. presidential election .
At 43 years of age , he is the youngest to have  महरूम निर्वाचित to the दफ्तर , the second-youngest अध्यक्ष ( बाद थियोडोर रूज़वेल्ट ) , और the पहला व्यक्ति born in  the 20th century to serve as president .
A Catholic , Kennedy  is the तभी non- प्रोटोस्टेंट अध्यक्ष , और is the  only president to have won a Pulitzer Prize .
कार्यक्रम दौरान उसके प्रेसिडेंसी शामिल the खाड़ी of सूअर आक्रमण , the क्यूबन मिसाइल संकट , the भवन  of the Berlin Wall , the Space Race , the African-American Civil Rights Movement , and early stages of the Vietnam War .
therein , कैनेडी increased the क्रमांक of सैन्य advisers , खास  operation forces , and helicopters in an effort to curb the spread of communism in South East Asia .
The Kennedy administration adopted the policy of the Strategic Hamlet Program  जिससे थी implemented by the दक्षिण वियतनामी सरकारी  .
It  शामिल निश्चित मजबूर relocation , गाँव internment , और पृथक्करण of ग्रामीण दक्षिण  Vietnamese from the northern and southern communist insurgents .
Kennedy was  assassinated on नवम्बर 22 , 1963 in डलास , टेक्सास .
ली घनघोर ओसवाल्ड थी चार्ज साथ the अपराधों , लकिन he थी शॉट और मारे by जोकर माणिक्य दो  days later , before a trial could take place .
The FBI  और the वारेन आयोग officially concluded  that Oswald was the lone assassin .
However , the United States House  चुनें कमेटी on assassinations ( hsca ) concluded  that those investigations were flawed and that Kennedy was probably assassinated as the result of a conspiracy .
However , ABC News in their investigation , The Kennedy Assassination :  परे षड्यंत्र , पुष्टि the निष्कर्षों of the वारेन आयोग ; having  concluded Oswald acted alone .
Kennedy 's controversial Department of Defense TFX fighter bomber  कार्यक्रम led to a congressional छानबीन कि lasted  from 1963 to 1970 .
Since the 1960s information concerning  कैनेडी 's निजी जीवन रै आइये to लाइट  .
विवरण of कैनेडी 's स्वास्थ्य समस्याएं in जिससे he struggled have become बेहतर  known , especially since the 1990s .
Although initially  रखा रहस्य इससे the सामान्य पब्लिक , रिपोर्ट्स of कैनेडी  's philandering have garnered much press .
Kennedy ranks  अत्यधिक in पब्लिक राय दरजा  of U.S. presidents .
A  siemens mxl आग सचेतक कंट्रोल फलक ( शीर्ष ) और ग्राफिक annunciator ( नीचे  ) for Potomac Hall , at James Madison University .
A Vigilant VM-1  आग सचेतक कंट्रोल ईकाई ( facu ) / autonomous कंट्रोल ईकाई ( acu ) साथ एकीकृत आवाज़ निकासी  and fire fighter telephone system .
manufactured by एडवर्ड्स  , A UTC F & S Company
A Fire Alarm Control  फलक ( facp ) , or आग सचेतक कंट्रोल ईकाई ( facu ) , is the controlling घटक  of a Fire Alarm System .
The panel receives information from environmental sensors designed to detect  परिवर्तन संबद्ध साथ आग , मॉनीटर उनके operational अखंडता और provides लिये स्वचालित कंट्रोल of उपकरण , और हस्तांतरण of सूचना  necessary to prepare the facility for fire based on a predetermined sequence .
The panel may also  सप्लाई विद्युत उर्जा to operate कोई संबद्ध सेंसर  , control , transmitter , or relay .
वहीँ हैं चार मौलिक प्रकार of panels : coded panels , conventional  panels , addressable panels , and multiplex systems .
This is a list of  the पहला म्यूज़िक वीडियो ब्रॉडकास्ट on एमटीवी 's  first day , August 1 , 1981 .
MTV 's  पहला दिन on the एयर थी rebroadcast on vh1 क्लासिक in 2006 और अपलोड onto youtube in 2010 ( हालांकि तभी  the first four hours were authentic ; the rest were edited VH1 rebroadcasts ) .
Bandaranaike International Airport ( BIA ) ( also known as Katunayake  अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र और कोलोन अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र ) is एक of the दो अंतरराष्ट्रीय एयरपोर्ट सेवारत the नगर of कोलोन , the  other is Ratmalana International Airport .
Mattala Rajapaksa  अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र स्तिथ in दक्षिणी नगर of hambantota  is the other international airport in Sri Lanka .
Bandaranaike International  विमानक्षेत्र is स्तिथ in katunayake , 22  miles ( 35 km ) north of Colombo .
It is administered by  विमानक्षेत्र और विमानन सेवाएं ( श्री लंका ) ltd .
It is the  हब of श्रीलंकन एयरलाइंस , the नेशनल वाहक of श्री लंका , और mihin लंका  , the budget airline of Sri Lanka .
Black Swan is a 2010 American  मनोवैज्ञानिक थ्रिलर और हॉरर फिल्मी निर्देशित by डैरेन aronofsky और अभिनीत नताली पोर्टमैन , विंसेंट cassel , और  Mila Kunis .
The plot revolves around a production of  tchaikovsky 's swan झील बैले by a prestigious नई यॉर्क नगर  company .
The production requires a ballerina to play the innocent and fragile White  swan , लिये जिससे the वचनबद्ध नर्तकी नीना ( पोर्टमैन ) is a पूर्ण अनुरूप , as खूब as the अंधेरा और कामुक ब्लैक swan , जिससे हैं qualities समाविष्ट  by the new arrival Lily ( Kunis ) .
Nina is overwhelmed by a feeling of  immense दबाव जब वो पाता herself स्पर्धा लिये the भाग , causing उसके to खोना उसके tenuous पकड़ on वास्तविकता  and descend into a living nightmare .
Aronofsky conceived the premise  by connecting उसके viewings of a उत्पादन of swan झील साथ an unrealized पटकथा परिचय understudies और the ख़्याल of होने haunted  by a double , similar to the folklore surrounding doppelgängers .
Aronofsky cites Fyodor Dostoyevsky 's `` The  दोगुना `` as another प्रेरणा लिये  the film .
The director also considered  ब्लैक swan a साथी टुकड़ा to उसके 2008 फिल्मी the पहलवान , साथ  both films involving demanding performances for different kinds of art .
He and Portman first discussed the project in 2000 , and after a brief attachment to  सार्वभौमिक studios , ब्लैक swan थी उत्पादित in नई यॉर्क नगर in 2009 by फॉक्स searchlight  Pictures .
Portman and Kunis  प्रशिक्षित in बैले लिये अनेक महीने prior to फिल्मांकन , और notable आंकड़े इससे the बैले संसार helped साथ फिल्मी उत्पादन to  shape the ballet presentation .
The film premiered  as the खोलने फिल्मी लिये the 67th वेनिस  International Film Festival on September 1 , 2010 .
It had a limited release in the  संयुक्त राज्य starting दिसम्बर 3 , 2010 और खोली देशभर on  December 17 .
Black Swan received critical praise upon its release , particularly for  पोर्टमैन 's प्रदर्शन और aronofsky 's दिशा , और थी a significant  box office success , grossing $ 329 million worldwide .
The film received five Academy Award nominations and Portman won the Best  अभिनेत्री पुरस्कार लिये the फिल्मी , as खूब as अनेक अन्य बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री पुरस्कार in अनेक guilds और त्यौहार , जबकि aronofsky थी मनोनीत  for Best Director .
In  जोड , the फिल्मी itself प्राप्त a नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन  Picture .
The world’s first ice-calorimeter , used in the winter of 1782-83 , by Antoine Lavoisier and Pierre-Simon  लाप्लास , to determine the ऊष्मा शामिल in विभिन्न रासायनिक परिवर्तन ; calculations  which were based on Joseph Black ’s prior discovery of latent heat .
These experiments  चिह्नित the न्यास of thermochemistry  .
A  ऊष्मामापी ( इससे लैटिन calor , अर्थ ऊष्मा ) is an ऑब्जेक्ट प्रयुक्त लिये कैलोरीमिति  , or the process of measuring the heat of chemical reactions or physical changes as well as heat capacity .
Differential scanning calorimeters ,  समतापी microcalorimeters , titration calorimeters और त्वरित रेट  calorimeters are among the most common types .
A simple calorimeter just  consists of a थर्मामीटर संलग्न to a मेटल  container full of water suspended above a combustion chamber .
To find the enthalpy change per mole of  a पदार्थ a in a प्रतिक्रिया between दो substances a और b , the substances हैं added to a ऊष्मामापी और the आरंभिक और  final temperatures ( before the reaction started and after it has finished ) are noted .
Multiplying the temperature change by the mass and  विशिष्ट ऊष्मा capacities of the substances देता a मान लिये the उर्जा दिए बंद  or absorbed during the reaction .
dividing the उर्जा बदलें by कैसा अनेक औज़ार  of A were present gives its enthalpy change of reaction .
This method is used  primarily in अकादमिक शिक्षण as it describes the सिद्धान्त of  calorimetry .
It does not account for the  ऊष्मा घाटा through the संग्राहक or the ऊष्मा क्षमता of the थर्मामीटर  and container itself .
In addition , the object placed inside the calorimeter shows that the objects transferred their heat to the  ऊष्मामापी और into the द्रव , और the ऊष्मा अवशोषित by the ऊष्मामापी और the द्रव is बराबर to the ऊष्मा दिए बंद  by the metals .
A pair of  ग्रीन flip-flops
Flip-flops ( also called zōri , thongs , jandals , or a variety of  अन्य names throughout the संसार ) हैं a प्रकार of open-toed चन्दन typically worn in कैज़ुअल परिस्थितियों  , such as outside or at the beach .
They consist of a flat sole held loosely on the foot by  a y-shaped डोरी कि गुजरता between the पहला और दूसरी toes और around either पक्ष of the पैर  .
They  may भी be आयोजित to the पैर साथ a सिंगल डोरी over the सामने  of the foot rather than a thong .
The name `` flip-flop ''  originated क्युकी of the ध्वनि कि is बना by slapping between the  sole of the foot and the floor when walking .
This style of footwear has  महरूम worn by the लोगों of अनेक संस्कृतियों throughout the संसार , originating as जल्दी  as the ancient Egyptians in 4,000 B.C .
The modern  flip-flop उतरता इससे the जापानी zōri , जिससे became लोकप्रिय बाद संसार युद्ध  II when soldiers returning to the United States brought them back .
वे became लोकप्रिय in कैज़ुअल जमावट दौरान the 1960s , 1990s , और 2000s , और कुछ किस्में have भी मिला  their way into more formal attire , despite criticism .
The use of flip-flops  can परिणाम in अनेक pains और चोटों ,  including ankle sprains and broken bones .
Some individuals who  चलना लिये long अवधि रपट  pain in the feet , ankles , and lower legs .
The lack of support provided by flip-flops often results in  over-pronation चोटों , caused by the पैर घुसते inwards further  than normal .
This can lead  to चपटा फीट और tendonitis  .
Other injuries that may  परिणाम हैं due to the जूते 's open-toed प्रकृति , ऐसे as stubbed  toes , cuts , and bruises .
Doctors recommend purchasing pricier sandals with  thick-cushioned सोल्स , as खूब as those कि have a डोरी कि is नहीं कैनवास  and that comes back almost to the ankle .
The owners of Hanjin Osaka , seen here transiting the  पनामा कनाल in 2008 , घोषित सामान्य औसत following an विस्फोट in the  ship 's engine room on .
The law of general average is a legal  principle of मेरीटाइम विधि according to जिससे सब पार्टियों in a समुद्र venture proportionally share कोई नुकसान resulting इससे a voluntary  sacrifice of part of the ship or cargo to save the whole in an emergency .
In the exigencies of hazards faced at sea , crew members often have precious little time in which to  determine precisely जिनकी कार्गो वे हैं jettisoning  .
Thus , to avoid quarrelling that could waste valuable time , there  arose the निष्पक्ष अभ्यास whereby सब the व्यापारियों जिनकी कार्गो उतरा सकुशल होता be पुकारा on  to contribute a portion , based upon a share or percentage , to the merchant or merchants whose goods had been tossed overboard to avert imminent peril .
While general average traces its origins in ancient  मेरीटाइम विधि , स्टिल it remains भाग of the admiralty विधि of सबसे  countries .
the पहला संहिताकरण of सामान्य औसत थी the यॉर्क antwerp  Rules of 1890 .
अमरीकी कंपनियाँ स्वीकृत it in 1949  .
General average requires three  तत्व जिससे हैं clearly stated by mr. इंसाफ grier in बर्नार्ड v.  Adams:
``  1st .
A common danger : a  खतरे in जिससे पोत , कार्गो और क्रू सब participate ; a खतरे निकट और जाहिर 'inevitable , ' मगर by voluntarily रूष्ट  the loss of a portion of the whole to save the remainder . ''
`` 2nd . There must be a voluntary jettison , jactus , or casting  दूर , of कुछ portion of the संयुक्त चिंता लिये the purpose of बचने इस निकट peril , periculi imminentis evitandi causa , or , in अन्य  words , a transfer of the peril from the whole to a particular portion of the whole . ''
`` 3rd  .
This  attempt to avoid the निकट आम peril जरूर  be successful '' .
उदाहरण पॉलिश कॉल लिये टीकाकरण  against Diphtheria and Tetanus .
A  टीकाकरण अनुसूची is a श्रेणी of vaccinations , सहित the समय of सब doses ,  which may be either recommended or compulsory , depending on the country of residence .
A vaccine is an  antigenic तैयारी प्रयुक्त to उपज क्रियाशील प्रतिरक्षण to a बीमारी , in अनुक्रम to prevent or reduce the प्रभाव of संक्रमण by कोई प्राकृतिक or `` जंगली  '' pathogen .
Many vaccines require multiple doses for maximum  प्रभावकारिता , either to उपज sufficient आरंभिक प्रतिरक्षा जवाब or to बूस्ट जवाब  that fades over time .
For  उदाहरण , टेटनस टीका boosters हैं प्रायः अनुशंसित  every 10 years .
टीका schedules हैं विकसित by सरकारी एजेंसियों or physicians समूह to achieve अधिकतम  effectiveness using required and recommended vaccines for a locality while minimizing the number of health care system interactions .
Over the past two decades , the  अनुशंसित टीकाकरण अनुसूची रै grown rapidly और become अधिक  complicated as many new vaccines have been developed .
Some vaccines are  अनुशंसित तभी in निश्चित क्षेत्रों ( देशों , subnational क्षेत्रों , or  at-risk populations ) where a disease is common .
For instance , yellow fever vaccination is on the routine vaccine schedule of French Guiana , is recommended in certain regions of Brazil but  in the संयुक्त राज्य is तभी दिए to travelers heading to देशों साथ a इतिहास  of the disease .
In developing countries ,  टीका सुझाव भी लो into खाता the स्तर  of health care access , the cost of vaccines and issues with vaccine availability and storage .
Sample vaccinations schedules discussed by the World Health Organization show a developed country using a schedule which extends over the first five years of a child 's life  और उपयोग टीके जिससे लागत over $ 700 सहित प्रशासन लागत जबकि a विकासशील देश उपयोग a अनुसूची providing टीके  in the first 9 months of life and costing only $ 25 .
This difference is due to the lower cost of health care , the lower cost of many vaccines  provided to विकासशील राष्ट्र , और कि अधिक महंगी टीके , प्रायः लिये कम आम रोगों  , are not utilized .
in 1900 , the smallpox टीका थी  the only one administered to children .
by the जल्दी 1950s , children routinely प्राप्त चार टीके  , for protection against ( diphtheria , pertussis , tetanus , polio , and smallpox ) , and as many as five shots by two years of age .
Since the  mid-1980s , अनेक टीके have महरूम added  to the schedule .
, the US Centers for Disease  कंट्रोल और रोकथाम ( सीडीसी ) अभी अनुशंसा टीकाकरण विरूद्ध at तनिक चौदह  diseases .
By two years of age , U.S. children receive  as अनेक as 24 टीका injections , और might प्राप्त up to पाँच गोलियाँ दौरान एक विज़िट to the डॉक्टर  .
The use of combination vaccine products means  कि , , the संयुक्त किंगडम 's immunization कार्यक्रम consists of 10 injections by the आयु of दो , बल्कि than 25 if टीकाकरण  for each disease was given as a separate injection .
Two  revellers नृत्य in the  streets .
The form  of नाचना is पुकारा `` wining '' ( घुमावदार  ) pronounced wine-ing
a म्यूज़िक ट्रक entertains the भीड  on the streets .
Trucks are an integral part  of the गली परेड , featuring सजीव प्रदर्शन  or deejays
The  त्रिनिदाद और टोबैगो कार्निवल is an सालाना इवेंट आयोजित on the सोमवार और मंगलवार पहले राख बुधवार , और  is well known for participant 's colorful costumes and exuberant celebrations .
कार्निवल in त्रिनिदाद और टोबैगो is the सबसे significant इवेंट on the आइलैंड्स ' सांस्कृतिक और पर्यटन पंचांग , साथ numerous  cultural events running in the lead up to the street parade on Carnival Monday and Tuesday .
It is said that if the islanders are not  celebrating it , तब वे हैं तैयारी लिये it , जबकि reminiscing परिचय the पास्ट साल  's festival .
The heart of the musical  जश्न रै महरूम कैलिप्सो ; recently सोका रै replaced  calypso as the most celebrated type of music .
Costumes , stickfighting and  limbo प्रतियोगिताओं हैं भी महत्वपूर्ण components of the  festival .
Carnival as it is celebrated in Trinidad and Tobago  is भी मनाये in शहरों विश्वव्यापी  .
These including Toronto 's Caribana ,  मियामी 's मियामी कार्निवल , ह्यूस्टन carifest , लंदन 's नॉटिंग हिल कार्निवल as खूब as नई यॉर्क  City 's Labor Day Carnival to name a few .
Carnival was created when West  अफ़्रीकी स्लेव mimicked उनके फ्रेंच स्वामी जो जहाँ ज्ञात लिये उनके lavish  costumes balls .
हराम to partake in ये festivities और confined to उनके quarters , स्लेव  combined elements from their own cultures to their master 's fete .
Hence the creation of characters such as Jab Jab or Jab  molassie ( शैतानों ) , मध्यरात्रि लुटेरों , imps , lagahroo , soucouyant  , La Diablesse and Demons .
With the abolition of slavery in 1838 , freed Africans took their version of Carnival  to the गलियों through अभिव्यक्ति of ड्रम , riddim भाग जैसे tamboo बाँसुरी और as प्रत्येक नई अप्रवासी जनसांख्यिकी डाला  Trinidad , Carnival evolved into what we know today .
the नगर of शिकागो , इलिनोइस आयोजित a nonpartisan mayoral चुनाव  on Tuesday , February 22 , 2011 .
Incumbent Mayor Richard M. Daley , a member  of the लोकतांत्रिक पार्टी जो था महरूम in दफ्तर चूंकि 1989 , किया नहीं तलाश a सातवाँ पद as  mayor .
Candidates needed to collect  12,500 याचिका हस्ताक्षर by नवम्बर 22 , 2010 to qualify लिये a  place on the ballot .
April 5 , 2011 was scheduled to be a  runoff चुनाव तिथि if no प्रत्याशी प्राप्त  an absolute majority .
Rahm  emanuel जीती the रेस लिये महापौर साथ  more than 55 % of the vote .
He  थी उदघाटन on may 16 , 2011  .
``  उत्तेजित up kicks '' is a सोंग by अमरीकी  indie pop band Foster the People .
It was released as the group 's debut single  in सितंबर 2010 , और the following साल थी शामिल on उनके ep फोस्टर the लोगों  and their debut album Torches .
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' became  the समूह 's भेदन hit और थी एक of the सबसे लोकप्रिय  songs of 2011 .
The song was  लिखा और अंकित by frontman चिह्नित फोस्टर जबकि he थी working  as a commercial jingle writer .
Contrasting with the upbeat  musical संयोजन , the गीत describe the homicidal विचार  of a troubled youth .
The track received considerable attention after it was posted online in 2010  as a फ़्री डाउनलोड , और it helped the समूह गार्नर a multi-album रिकार्ड सौदे साथ कोलंबिया रिकॉर्ड imprint startime  International .
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' proved to be a  स्लीपर hit ; in 2011 , बाद receiving significant airplay on आधुनिक चट्टान स्टेशन , the सोंग crossed-over onto समकालीन  hit radio stations .
The song spent eight consecutive weeks at number three on the Billboard Hot 100  चार्ट in the संयुक्त राज्य , बनाना it the पहला बिलबोर्ड वैकल्पिक गीतों number-one सिंगल to क्रैक the  U.S. top 5 since Kings of Leon 's `` Use Somebody `` in 2009 .
The song was widely praised by  आलोचकों , और it रै महरूम licensed लिये उपयोग in a चौड़ी दायरा of लोकप्रिय मीडिया चूंकि  its release .
`` Pumped Up Kicks '' received a  ग्रैमी पुरस्कार नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन पॉप duo/group प्रदर्शन  .
The State Fair of  वेस्ट वर्जिनिया is an सालाना राज्य मेला  for West Virginia .
It is held annually in  mid-august on the राज्य fairgrounds in fairlea , निकट lewisburg , वेस्ट वर्जिनिया in the  southeastern part of the state .
the राज्य fairgrounds consists of a विशाल खोलें फ़ील्ड लिये carnivals और  exhibitions , a horse track , grandstands , and several exhibition buildings .
फ़्री पार्किंग is provided सटा to the fairgrounds और , जबतक 2006 , फ़्री कैंप थी  also available in a large field with running-water toilets and showers , but no hookups .
Campers are  अभी चार्ज a  small fee .
The White House , the president 's  आधिकारिक निवास और बीच of the प्रशासन
Under the  संयुक्त राज्य संविधान , the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य  is the head of state and head of government of the United States .
As chief of the executive branch and head of the federal government as a whole , the  प्रेसिडेंसी is the उच्चतम राजनैतिक दफ्तर in the संयुक्त राज्य by influence और मान्यता  .
The  अध्यक्ष is भी the commander-in-chief of the  United States Armed Forces .
The president is indirectly  निर्वाचित to a four-year पद by an चुनावी कॉलेज ( or by the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि चाहिए  the Electoral College fail to award an absolute majority of votes to any person ) .
चूंकि the अनुसमर्थन of the twenty-second amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान in 1951 , no व्यक्ति may be निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष अधिक  than twice , and no one who has served more than two years of a term to which someone else was elected may be elected more than once .
Upon the  मौत , इस्तीफा , or हटाना इससे दफ्तर of an लाज़िम अध्यक्ष , the वाइस  President assumes the office .
The President must be at least 35 years of  आयु और a `` प्राकृतिक born '' नागरिक of the संयुक्त  States .
This list includes only those persons who were sworn into office as president  following the अनुसमर्थन of the संयुक्त राज्य संविधान , जिससे took प्रभाव on कूच  4 , 1789 .
For American  नेताओ पहले इस अनुसमर्थन , देखिए अध्यक्ष  of the Continental Congress .
The list does not include any  एक्टिंग राष्ट्रपतियों अंतर्गत the twenty-fifth amendment to the संयुक्त राज्य  Constitution .
There have been 43 people sworn into office , and 44 presidencies , as  ग्रोवर क्लीवलैंड परोसा दो non-consecutive शर्तें और is गिने क्रमबद्धता as दोनो the 22nd और 24th  president .
Of the individuals elected as president , four died in office of natural causes ( William Henry Harrison , Zachary Taylor , Warren G. Harding , and Franklin D. Roosevelt )  , चार यहूद assassinated ( अब्राहम lincoln , जेम्स A. गारफ़ील्ड , विलियम mckinley , और जॉन F. कैनेडी ) और एक resigned (  Richard Nixon ) .
George Washington , the first president , was  उदघाटन in 1789 बाद a सर्वसम्मत vote of the चुनावी  College .
William Henry Harrison spent the shortest time in office with 32  दिनों in 1841 , और फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट खर्च the longest साथ over बारह सालो , लकिन died shortly into  his fourth term in 1945 .
He is the  तभी अध्यक्ष to serve अधिक than दो शर्तें , और a संवैधानिक amendment ,  affecting presidents after Harry Truman , was passed to limit the number of times an individual can be elected president .
Andrew  जैक्सन , the सातवाँ अध्यक्ष , थी the पहला to be निर्वाचित by  men of all classes in 1828 after most laws barring non-land-owners from voting were repealed .
Warren  हार्डिंग थी the पहला निर्वाचित बाद महिलाओं gained मतदान  rights in 1920 .
History records four presidents – John Q Adams ,  रदरफोर्ड B. हेज़ , बेंजामिन हैरिसन और जार्ज W. बुश – जो खोया the लोकप्रिय vote  but assumed office .
जॉन F. कैनेडी रै महरूम the तभी अध्यक्ष of रोमन कैथोलिक आस्था , और the  current president , Barack Obama , is the first president of African descent .
`` Lombardi  ट्रॉफी '' redirects यहाँ  .
For the award awarded  annually to the बेहतरीन कॉलेज फ़ुटबॉल lineman or linebacker ,  see Lombardi Award .
The Vince Lombardi Trophy is the trophy awarded each year  to the जीतना टोली of the नेशनल फ़ुटबॉल लीग 's चैंपियनशिप खेल ,  the Super Bowl .
The trophy is named in  सम्मान of legendary एनएफएल कोच विंस लोम्बार्डी  .
This is a  सूची of टेबल of the सत्यापित oldest लोगों in the संसार  in ordinal rank , such as oldest person or oldest man .
In these tables , a  supercentenarian is माना 'verified ' if उसके or उसके अर्जी रै महरूम validated by an अंतरराष्ट्रीय देह  that specifically deals in longevity research , such as the Gerontology Research Group ( GRG ) or Guinness World Records .
The longest  unambiguously प्रलेखित इंसान जीवनकाल is कि of jeanne calment  of France ( 1875–1997 ) , who died at age 122 years , 164 days .
She met Vincent van  gogh जब वो थी 12 or 13  .
This led to news  मीडिया ध्यान in 1985 , बाद calment  turned 110 .
Subsequent investigation found  दस्तावेज़ीकरण लिये calment 's आयु , परे कोई उचित सवाल , in the रिकॉर्ड of उसके  native city , Arles , France .
More evidence of Calment 's  जीवनकाल रै महरूम उत्पादित than लिये कोई अन्य supercentenarian ; उसके मामला serves as an archetype  in the methodology for verifying the ages of the world 's oldest people .
The longest undisputed lifespan for male  supercentenarians is कि of jiroemon किमुरा , जो फिलहाल जीवनदान in जापानी  and is age as of .
Since the death of 115-year old Dina Manfredini of  the संयुक्त राज्य , on 17 दिसम्बर 2012 , किमुरा , born 19 अप्रैल 1897 , is the oldest जीना व्यक्ति in the संसार जिनकी आयु can be  documented .
He has also  महरूम the oldest जीना man चूंकि the मौत of 114-year बूढ़ा वाल्टर breuning  on 14 April 2011 .
Since the death of 115-year  बूढ़ा koto okubo of जापानी on 12 जनवरी 2013 , the oldest जीना स्त्री रै महरूम -year-old misao okawa , भी इससे जापानी  , born on 5 March 1898 .
The People 's Court is an American arbitration-based reality court show , currently presided over by  रिटायर्ड फ्लोरिडा राज्य सर्किट अदालत न्यायधीश मर्लिन milian , in जिससे छोटी दावा विवादों हैं संभाला  .
The People  's अदालत is the पहला अदालत दिखाएँ to उपयोग बाइंडिंग मध्यस्थता , introducing the स्वरूप  into the genre in 1981 .
The system has been duplicated  by सबसे of the दिखाएँ 's successors in the न्यायिक विधा  .
Moreover , The People 's Court is  the पहला लोकप्रिय , long-running वास्तविकता in the न्यायिक विधा  .
It was  preceded तभी by a few short-lived हकीकत in the विधा ; ये short-lived पूर्ववर्तियों यहूद तभी loosely सम्बन्धित  to judicial proceedings , except for one : Parole ( 1959 ) took footage from real-life courtrooms holding legal proceedings .
prior to the लोगों 's अदालत , the विशाल बहुमत  of TV courtroom shows used actors , and recreated or fictional cases ( as did radio before that ) .
Among examples of these  प्रकार of अदालत shows शामिल प्रसिद्ध जूरी ट्रायल और  Your Witness .
The People 's Court  रै था दो चिहृ जीवनदान  .
The show 's first life was  presided over solely by पूर्व लॉस एंजिल्स काउंटी श्रेष्ठ अदालत  Judge Joseph Wapner .
His tenure lasted from the show 's debut on  सितंबर 14 , 1981 , जबतक may 21 , 1993 , जब the दिखाएँ थी रद्द due to कम दरजा  .
This left the  दिखाएँ साथ a कुल of 2,484 1⁄2-hour एपीसोड  and 12 seasons .
The show was taped in  लॉस एंजिल्स दौरान इसके पहला  life .
बाद होने रद्द , reruns  aired until September 9 , 1994 .
On September 8 , 1997 , after being out of production for four  सालो , the लोगों 's अदालत थी revived लिये a दूसरी जीवन in first-run अनुप्रयोग as a 60-minute  program .
Former lawyer and Mayor of New York Ed Koch was  चुनी as arbiter , जिससे he कायम लिये 2 सीज़न इससे the 1997–98 ऋतु through the 1998–99 ऋतु ( the उपस्थित जीवन 's  2nd season and overall show 's 14th ) .
By  the 1999–00 ऋतु , husband of जूडिथ sheindlin ( जो presides over न्यायधीश जुडी ) और  former New York State Supreme Court Judge Jerry Sheindlin succeeded Koch .
Sheindlin lasted one and a half seasons as he was  replaced towards the समाप्त of the 2000–01 ऋतु ( उपस्थित जीवन 's 4th ऋतु और overall दिखाएँ 's  17th ) .
Beginning in spring 2001 , Florida judge Marilyn  milian took over the लोगों 's अदालत और रै presided over the दिखाएँ कभी  since .
Once Milian completes the 2012–13 season ,  वो होगा have परोसा as longest arbiter over the श्रेणी साथ 12 और a हाफ सीज़न  .
As of the  उपस्थित , however , उसके सालो on the कार्यक्रम टाई wapner  at 12 seasons .
In the 2009-10 television season ,  the लोगों 's न्यायालयों 2nd/present जीवन outlasted इसके पहला जब it पहुँचे  13 seasons .
While the show taped in New York City for the first 15 seasons of its  दूसरी जीवन , it अभी टेपों in stamford , कनेक्टिकट as of the 2012-13  season .
On September 3 , 2012 , The  लोगों 's अदालत 's 2nd/present जीवन डाला इसके 16th ऋतु (  28th overall season ) .
With 28 total seasons , The People 's Court ranks as the 2nd  longest-running courtroom कार्यक्रम पीछे the जारी तलाक अदालत at 33 सीज़न ( इससे इसके  3 combined lives ) .
Utah ( or ) ( Arapaho : Wo'tééneihí ' ) is  a राज्य in the पश्चिमी संयुक्त राज्य .
It became the  45th राज्य admitted to the संघ on  January 4 , 1896 .
Utah is the 13th-largest , the 34th-most  populous , और the 10th-least-densely आबादी of the 50 संयुक्त राज्य  .
लगभग 80 % of यूटा 's 2,817,222 लोगों सजीव साथ the wasatch सामने , centering on नमक झील नगर , leaving विशाल expanses of the राज्य nearly uninhabited और बनाना the जनसांख्यिकी the छठे सबसे urbanized in the  U.S. Utah is bordered by Colorado on the east , Wyoming on the northeast , Idaho on the north , Arizona on the south , and Nevada on the west .
It also  छू a कोने of नई मैक्सिको on  the southeast .
यूटा is the सबसे religiously समरूप  state in the Union .
लगभग 63 % of utahns हैं reported to be सदस्यों of the गिरिजाघर of यीशु मसीह of latter-day संतो or lds ( mormons ) , जिससे  greatly influences Utah culture and daily life .
The world headquarters of The Church of Jesus Christ of  latter-day संतो ( lds गिरिजाघर ) is स्तिथ in यूटा 's राज्य  capital .
The state is a center  of परिवहन , शिक्षा , सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी और शोध , सरकारी सेवाएं  , mining , and a major tourist destination for outdoor recreation .
According to the U.S. Census Bureau 's population  estimates , यूटा is the पांचवां fastest-growing राज्य in the संयुक्त राज्य as of 2012  .
St. George , was the  fastest–growing महानगर क्षेत्रफल in the संयुक्त राज्य  from 2000 to 2005 .
A 2012 Gallup national survey  मिला यूटा overall to be the `` बेहतरीन राज्य to सजीव in '' आधारित on 13 forward-looking माप  including various economic , lifestyle , and health-related outlook metrics .
coldwater is a छोटी कस्बा in  Tate County , Mississippi .
It is in  the मेम्फिस महानगर  Area .
The population  थी 1,674 at the 2000 जनसांख्यिकी  .
the मुश्किल तालु is a पतला आड़ा बोनी थाली of the कपाल , स्तिथ  in the roof of the mouth .
It  spans the मेहराब formed by the  upper teeth .
It is  formed by the palatine प्रक्रम of the maxilla और आड़ा  plate of palatine bone .
It forms a partition  between the nasal passages और the मुँह .
Also on the anterior  portion of the छत of the मुश्किल तालु is the rugae जिससे हैं the irregular ridges in the श्लेष्मक झिल्ली कि सहायता सुकर the  movement of food backwards towards the pharynx .
This partition is  जारी deeper into the मुँह by a मांसल एक्सटेंशन पुकारा the नरम  palate .
Complete set of  scrolls , constituting the संपूर्ण  Tanakh .
The Tanakh ( , or ;  भी tenakh , tenak , tanach ) is a नाम प्रयुक्त in judaism लिये  the canon of the Hebrew Bible .
The  tanakh is भी ज्ञात as the masoretic टेक्स्ट or  the Miqra .
the नाम is an एक्रोनिम formed इससे the आरंभिक यहूदी अक्षर of the masoretic टेक्स्ट 's तीन परंपरागत subdivisions : the तोरा ( `` शिक्षण '' ,  also known as the Five Books of Moses ) , Nevi'im ( `` Prophets '' ) and Ketuvim ( `` Writings '' ) —hence TaNaKh .
The name `` Miqra '' ( מקרא ) ,  अर्थ `` कि जिससे is पढ़ा '' , is an वैकल्पिक यहूदी पद  for the Tanakh .
The books  of the tanakh यहूद relayed साथ an accompanying मौखिक परंपरा passed  on by each generation , called the Oral Torah .
Sobriety  नाका in जर्मनी
Driving under the influence ( DUI ) , driving while intoxicated ( DWI ) , drunken driving , drunk  ड्राइविंग , पेय ड्राइविंग , ऑपरेटिंग अंतर्गत the influence , पीने और ड्राइविंग , or impaired ड्राइविंग is the अपराधों of ड्राइविंग  a motor vehicle with blood levels of alcohol in excess of a legal limit ( `` Blood Alcohol Content '' , or `` BAC '' ) .
Similar regulations cover driving or operating certain types  of मशीनरी जबकि प्रभावित by पीने दारू or लेने अन्य दवाएँ , सहित , लकिन नहीं सीमित to नुस्खा  drugs .
इस is a दण्ड ठोकर  in most nations .
Convictions do not  necessarily involve वास्तविक ड्राइविंग of the  vehicle .
In most jurisdictions a  मापन ऐसे as a रक्त दारू सामग्री ( bac ) in excess of a विशिष्ट दहलीज स्तर , ऐसे as 0.05 % or 0.08 % defines the ठोकर , साथ no need  to prove impairment or being under the influence of alcohol .
In some jurisdictions , there is an  क्रोधित श्रेणी of the ठोकर at a उच्चतर स्तर  e.g . 0.12 % .
In most  देशों , anyone जो is convicted of injuring or हत्या किसी जबकि अंतर्गत the influence of दारू or दवाएँ can be heavily fined , as in फ़्रांस , in  addition to being given a lengthy prison sentence .
Some  कार्य have उनके अपना नियम और bac हद , लिये उदाहरण वाणिज्यिक पायलट , और the संघीय रेलरोड प्रशासन in the  United States has a 0.04 % limit for train crew .
Some jurisdictions have multiple levels of BAC  ; लिये उदाहरण , the राज्य of कैलिफ़ोर्निया रै a 0.08 % bac सीमा , जिससे is  lowered to 0.04 % if the operator holds a commercial driver 's license .
The California  bac सीमा is 0.01 % लिये those younger than 21 सालो of आयु  and those on probation for a previous DUI conviction .
Some large corporations have their own rules ; Union Pacific Railroad has their own  bac सीमा of 0.02 % कि , if violated दौरान a यादृच्छिक परीक्षण or a for-cause परीक्षण — लिये उदाहरण , बाद a ट्रैफ़िक दुर्घटना — can परिणाम in termination of नियुक्ति  with no chance of future re-hire .
Many states in the U.S. and provinces in Canada have adopted truth in sentencing  कानून कि enforce सख्त दिशानिर्देश on sentencing , differing इससे पिछला अभ्यास जहाँ थाना  time was reduced or suspended after sentencing had been issued .
कुछ jurisdictions have न्यायिक दिशानिर्देश requiring  a mandatory minimum sentence .
दंड लिये dui आरोप दायरा इससे महंगी शुल्क to forfetiruree of अपना  license plates and in some serious circumstances , your vehicle .
A drunk  ड्राइविंग सिम्युलेटर in montréal ,  Canada
The specific criminal offense may be called , depending on the jurisdiction , driving under the influence [ of alcohol or other drugs ] ( DUI ) , driving under intense  influence ( duii ) , ड्राइविंग जबकि intoxicated ( dwi ) , ऑपरेटिंग अंतर्गत the influence ( oui ) ऑपरेटिंग जबकि intoxicated ( owi ) , ऑपरेटिंग a मोटर गाडी जबकि intoxicated ( omvi ) , ड्राइविंग अंतर्गत the संयुक्त influence of दारू and/or अन्य दवाएँ , ड्राइविंग अंतर्गत the influence प्रति se or नशे in चार्ज  [ of a vehicle ] .
Many such laws apply also to motorcycling , boating , piloting  वायुयान , उपयोग of motile फार्म उपकरण ऐसे as tractors और combines , सवारी  horses or driving a horse-drawn vehicle , or bicycling , possibly with different BAC level than driving .
In some jurisdictions there are separate charges depending on the vehicle used , such as  bwi ( bicycling जबकि intoxicated ) , जिससे may carry a हल्का वाक्य  .
In the United States , local law enforcement agencies made 1,467,300 arrests nationwide for  ड्राइविंग अंतर्गत the influence of दारू in 1996 , compared to 1.9 लाख ऐसे रखवाले दौरान the शिखर साल  in 1983 .
In 1997 an  अनुमानित 513,200 dwi अपराधियों यहूद in थाना or कारावास  , down from 593,000 in 1990 and up from 270,100 in 1986 .
Officers  इससे us कस्टम और किनारा सुरक्षा बोर्डिंग  a ship
Law enforcement in the United States is one of three major  components of the दण्ड इंसाफ प्रणाली of the संयुक्त राज्य , साथ साथ न्यायालयों  and corrections .
हालांकि वहीँ exists an अंतर्निहित interrelatedness between the अलग समूह कि मेक up the दण्ड इंसाफ प्रणाली  based on their crime deterrence purpose , each component operates independently from one another .
However , the judiciary is vested with the power to  मेक विधिक determinations regarding the conduct of the अन्य दो  components .
Apart from maintaining order and  सेवा कृत्यों , the purpose of policing is the छानबीन of suspected दण्ड कार्यकलाप और the referral of the परिणाम of investigations  and of suspected criminals to the courts .
Law enforcement , to varying  डिग्री at अलग स्तर of सरकारी और in अलग एजेंसियों , is भी commonly चार्ज साथ the जिम्मेदारियों of deterring  criminal activity and of preventing the successful commission of crimes in progress ; the service and enforcement of warrants , writs and other orders of the courts .
Law enforcement  एजेंसियों हैं भी शामिल in providing पहला जवाब to emergencies और अन्य खतरे to पब्लिक सुरक्षा ; the सुरक्षा of निश्चित पब्लिक सुविधाएं और अवसंरचना ; the  maintenance of public order ; the protection of public officials ; and the operation of some correctional facilities ( usually at the local level ) .
Elmer  figueroa arce ( born जून 28 , 1968 ) , बेहतरीन ज्ञात अंतर्गत the स्टेज  name Chayanne , is a Puerto Rican Latin pop singer and actor .
As a solo artist ,  chayanne रै released 21 सोलो एल्बम और बेची over 15 लाख एल्बम विश्वव्यापी  .
`` World War  हल्क '' is a कॉमिक किताब क्रॉसओवर कथानक कि भागा through a स्वः titled सीमित श्रेणी और  various other titles published by Marvel Comics in 2007 , featuring the Hulk .
The series consists of five main issues titled World War Hulk , with Greg Pak as  लेखक और जॉन romita , jr. as penciller , और तीन अन्य सीमित श्रेणी : संसार युद्ध हल्क : सामने लकीर , संसार  War Hulk : Gamma Corps , and World War Hulk : X-Men .
It also ran through several  अन्य आश्चर्य कॉमिक्स श्रेणी  .
The plot is the culmination of a series of events that began with the Hulk being tricked into space by  the illuminati और a जीवन मॉडल decoy of उपनाम फ़्यूरी , the हल्क 's subsequent निर्वासन देखी in ग्रह हल्क और उसके निकट वापसी to धरती  to seek revenge on the Illuminati .
marion मिशेल मॉरिसन ( born marion रॉबर्ट मॉरिसन ; may 26 , 1907 – जून 11 , 1979 ) , बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम जॉन वेन , थी  an American film actor , director and producer .
An Academy  पुरस्कार -winner , वेन थी among the शीर्ष बक्सा दफ्तर draws लिये तीन दशकों , और  was named the all-time top money-making star .
An enduring  अमरीकी प्रतीक , he epitomized खुरदरा मर्दानगी और is प्रसिद्ध लिये उसके demeanor , सहित  his distinctive calm voice , walk , and height .
Wayne was born in Winterset , Iowa but  उसके परिवार relocated to the वृहद लॉस एंजिल्स क्षेत्रफल जब  he was four years old .
He found work at local film studios when he lost his football  स्कॉलरशिप to यूएससी as a परिणाम of a bodysurfing दुर्घटना  .
Initially  working लिये the फॉक्स फिल्मी निगम , he ज़्यादातर appeared in  small bit parts .
His first leading role came in the  वाइडस्क्रीन एपिक the बिग ट्रेल ( 1930 ) , जिससे led to अग्रणी भूमिकाएँ in numerous  films throughout the 1930s , many of them in the western genre .
His career rose to  further हाइट्स in 1939 , साथ जॉन घाट 's stagecoach बनाना उसे  an instant superstar .
Wayne would  go on to स्टार in 142 तस्वीरें , primarily typecast  in Western films .
Among his best known later films are The Quiet Man ( 1952 ) , which follows him as an Irish-American boxer and his love affair with a fiery spinster played by Maureen O'Hara ; The  searchers ( 1956 ) , in जिससे he plays a सिविल युद्ध दिग्गज जो seeks आउट उसके abducted भांजी ; रिओ ब्रावो ( 1959 ) , playing a शेरिफ साथ डीन मार्टिन ; सच्चा grit ( 1969 ) , playing a humorous u.s . मार्शल जो सेट आउट to avenge a man 's मौत in the भूमिका कि जीती  Wayne an Academy Award ; and The Shootist ( 1976 ) , his final screen performance in which he plays an aging gunslinger battling cancer .
Wayne moved to Orange  काउंटी , कैलिफ़ोर्निया in the 1960s , और थी a prominent रिपब्लिकन in हॉलीवुड  , supporting anti-communist positions .
He  died of पेट कर्कट  in 1979 .
In June  1999 , the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान नामित वेन  13th among the Greatest Male Screen Legends of All Time .
Galileo Galilei ( ; 15 February 1564 – 8 January  1642 ) , थी an इतालवी physicist , गणितज्ञ , astronomer , और  philosopher who played a major role in the Scientific Revolution .
His  उपलब्धियाँ शामिल सुधार to the दूरदर्शी और consequent खगोलीय observations  and support for Copernicanism .
Galileo has been called the `` father of modern observational astronomy `` , the  `` पिता of आधुनिक भौतिकी `` , the `` पिता of विज्ञान '' , और `` the पिता of आधुनिक  Science '' .
His  योगदान to observational खगोलशास्त्र शामिल the telescopic पुष्टि of the phases of शुक्र , the डिस्कवरी of the चार largest satellites of बृहस्पति ( नामित the galilean moons in उसके इज्ज़त ) , और the अवलोकन  and analysis of sunspots .
गैलीलियो भी worked in लागू विज्ञान और प्रौद्योगिकी , inventing  an improved military compass and other instruments .
Galileo 's championing  of heliocentrism थी विवादास्पद भीतर उसके आजीवन , जब सबसे subscribed to either geocentrism  or the Tychonic system .
He met with opposition from  खगोलशास्त्रियों , जो doubted heliocentrism due to the अनुपस्थिति of an observed तारकीय लंबन  .
The matter was investigated by the  रोमन inquisition in 1615 , और वे concluded कि it could be समर्थित as तभी a सम्भावना , नहीं  an established fact .
Galileo later defended his views in Dialogue Concerning the Two Chief World Systems , which appeared to  आक्रमण पोप शहरी viii और यूँ alienated उसे और the jesuits , जो था दोनो समर्थित गैलीलियो  up until this point .
He was tried by the Inquisition , found `` vehemently suspect of heresy ''  , मजबूर to recant , और खर्च the बाकी of उसके जीवन अंतर्गत हाउस गिरफ़्तार  .
It was while Galileo  थी अंतर्गत हाउस गिरफ़्तार कि he लिखा एक of उसके finest works , दो नई sciences , in जिससे he summarised the कार्य he था किया कुछ चालीस सालो पहले , on the दो sciences  now called kinematics and strength of materials .
