प्रोटोटाइप oled lighting  panel developed by Lumiotec
Demonstration of a  लचीली oled यंत्र
An  oled ( सशुल्क light-emitting डायोड ) is a light-emitting डायोड ( led ) in जिससे the emissive electroluminescent  layer is a film of organic compound which emits light in response to an electric current .
This layer of organic  सेमीकंडक्टर is situated between दो electrodes  .
Generally , at  तनिक एक of ये electrodes is पारदर्शी  .
OLEDs are used to create digital displays in devices such as television  screens , कंप्यूटर मॉनीटर , पोर्टेबल प्रणालियों ऐसे as मोबाईल फोन , हैंडहेल्ड खेल consoles और  PDAs .
A major area of research is the development  of श्वेत oled डिवाइस लिये उपयोग in solid-state lighting अनुप्रयोग  .
वहीँ हैं दो प्रमुख परिवारों of oleds : those आधारित on  small molecules and those employing polymers .
Adding mobile ions to an OLED creates a  light-emitting electrochemical कोशिका or लैक , जिससे रै a थोड़ा अलग  mode of operation .
OLED displays can use  either passive-matrix ( pmoled ) or active-matrix संबोधित  schemes .
Active-matrix  oleds ( amoled ) आवश्यकता a thin-film ट्रांजिस्टर backplane to स्विच प्रत्येक व्यक्तिगत पिक्सेल on or  off , but allow for higher resolution and larger display sizes .
An OLED display  works बगैर a backlight  .
Thus , it can display deep black levels  और can be thinner और हल्का than a द्रव क्रिस्टल प्रदर्शक ( एलसीडी  ) .
In low ambient light conditions such as a dark  रूम an oled स्क्रीन can achieve a उच्चतर कंट्रास्ट अनुपात than an एलसीडी , whether the एलसीडी उपयोग ठंडा कैथोड fluorescent दीये  or LED backlight .
A carton and a glass of  eggnog इससे मॉन्ट्रियल , कनाडा , प्रर्दशित इसके फ्रेंच मुखाग्र ( अंग्रेज़ी रिवर्स ) और the फ्रेंच पद लेत de poule ( वस्तुतः  , `` hen 's milk '' )
Eggnog , or egg nog , is a sweetened dairy  -आधारd पेय traditionally बना साथ मिल्क and/or मलाई , शुगर , और whipped अंडे ( जिससे देता it a frothy  texture ) .
Brandy , rum ,  व्हिस्की , bourbon , वोदका , or a संयोजन of liquors  are often added .
the समाप्त सेवारत is प्रायः garnished साथ a sprinkling  of ground cinnamon or nutmeg .
it थी भी ज्ञात as the  egg milk punch .
Eggnog is a popular drink throughout  the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा , और is प्रायः संबद्ध साथ  Christmas .
Eggnog may be added as a  flavoring to खाना or पेय ऐसे as कॉफी  and tea .
Eggnog as a custard can also be  प्रयुक्त as an बर्फ मलाई आधार  .
A pasty (  , ) , ( sometimes ज्ञात in ब्रिटेन as a cornish pasty , और in the संयुक्त राज्य as a pastie or अंग्रेजों pasty ) is a baked पेस्ट्री , a  traditional variety of which is particularly associated with Cornwall , the westernmost county in England .
It is made by placing uncooked filling  typically of मांस और सब्जियां , बगैर मांस in शाकाहारी संस्करण , on a चपटा पेस्ट्री वृत्त और  folding it to wrap the filling , crimping the edge to form a seal .
After baking , the result  is a उठाया semicircular comestible  .
The traditional Cornish pasty , which has Protected Geographical Indication ( PGI ) status in Europe , is filled with  बीफ , sliced or diced आलू , swede ( भी ज्ञात as a पीला शलजम or rutabaga – referred to in कॉर्नवॉल as शलजम ) और प्याज , seasoned साथ नमक  and pepper , and is baked .
Today ,  the pasty is the खाना सबसे संबद्ध साथ कॉर्नवॉल , it is regarded as the नेशनल डिश , और it खाते  for 6 % of the Cornish food economy .
Pasties with many  अलग fillings हैं बना ; कुछ दुकानें specialise in selling सब sorts of  pasties .
The origins  of the pasty हैं unclear , हालांकि वहीँ हैं अनेक सन्दर्भ to उन्हें  throughout historical documents and fiction .
The pasty is now  लोकप्रिय world-wide due to the स्प्रेड of cornish खनिक , और विसंगतियाँ can be मिला in ऑस्ट्रेलिया ,  the United States , Mexico and elsewhere .
The ( ortho- ) sympathetic nervous system ( SNS ) is  एक of तीन प्रमुख भाग of the autonomic बेचैन प्रणाली : the अन्य होने the enteric और parasympathetic  systems .
Its general action  is to mobilize the देह 's बेचैन प्रणाली fight-or-flight जवाब  .
It is ,  however , constantly क्रियाशील at a मौलिक स्तर to maintain  homeostasis .
Secure Digital or ( SD ) is a  non-volatile मेमोरी कार्ड स्वरूप लिये उपयोग in पोर्टेबल डिवाइस , ऐसे as मोबाईल फोन , डिजिटल  cameras , GPS navigation devices , and tablet computers .
The  सुरक्षित डिजिटल मानक is कायम by the  SD Card Association ( SDA ) .
SD technologies have been implemented in  अधिक than 400 ब्रांड्स आरपार दर्जनों of उत्पाद श्रेणी और अधिक  than 8,000 models .
The Secure Digital format includes four  कार्ड परिवारों उपलब्धियाँ in तीन अलग रूप कारकों  .
The four  परिवारों हैं the असली standard-capacity ( sdsc ) , the high-capacity ( sdhc ) , the  eXtended-Capacity ( SDXC ) , and the SDIO , which combines input/output functions with data storage .
The  तीन रूप कारकों हैं the असली आकार , the `` मिनी '' आकार , और the `` सूक्ष्म  '' size ( see illustration ) .
There are many combinations  of रूप कारकों और यंत्र परिवारों  .
Electrically passive adapters allow the use of a  छोटी कार्ड in a मेजबान यंत्र निर्मित to थाम a larger  card .
Host devices that comply with newer  संस्करण of the specification provide पिछड़ा संगतता और accept पुरानी sd ताश , लकिन इस आलेख explains अनेक  factors that can prevent the use of a newer SD card:
A newer card may  प्रस्ताव वृहद क्षमता than the मेजबान यंत्र can  handle .
A newer  कार्ड may उपयोग a संचिका प्रणाली the मेजबान यंत्र can  not navigate .
Use of  an sdio कार्ड requires the मेजबान यंत्र be designed  for the input/output functions the card provides .
The organization of  the कार्ड थी बदला starting साथ the  SDHC family .
Some  विक्रेता उत्पादित sdsc ताश ऊपर 1 gb पहले the sda था  standardized a method of doing so .
The SDA uses several trademarked logos  to enforce अनुपालन साथ इसके विशेषताएँ और assure उपयोक्ता of संगतता  .
The  following is a सूची of आलोचकों  of the New Deal .
Daniel Lawrence Whitney ( born February 17 , 1963 )  बेहतरीन ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम और अक्षर लैरी the केबल guy , is an अमरीकी stand-up हास्य , कर्ता , देश  music artist , voice actor , and former radio personality .
he थी एक of the सदस्यों of the ब्लू कॉलर कॉमेडी दौरे , a कॉमेडी troupe जिससे शामिल विधेयक engvall  , Ron White , and Jeff Foxworthy ( with whom he has starred on Blue Collar TV ) .
Whitney has released seven comedy albums , of  जिससे तीन have महरूम certified सुनहरा by the riaa लिये शिपमेंट  of 500,000 copies .
In addition , he has starred in three Blue Collar Comedy Tour-related movies , as  खूब as in the films लैरी the केबल guy : स्वास्थ्य इंस्पेक्टर , डेल्टा तमाशा , और witless सुरक्षा , as खूब as voicing  Mater in the Cars franchise .
Whitney 's catchphrase : ``  git-r-done ! '' is भी the शीर्षक of उसके किताब .
On January 26 , 2010 , the TV channel History announced that it was ordering a  श्रेणी अभिनीत व्हिटनी पुकारा तभी in अमेरिका साथ लैरी the केबल guy , in जिससे he होता explore the देश और immerse  himself in different lifestyles , jobs , and hobbies .
The first episode of  the श्रेणी aired on फ़रवरी 8 , 2011  .
Vitamin D is a  समूह of fat-soluble secosteroids जिम्मेदार लिये intestinal अवशोषण  of calcium and phosphate .
In  इंसानो , the सबसे महत्वपूर्ण सम्बन्धित यौगिकों of विटामिन  D are vitamin D2 and vitamin D3 .
Cholecalciferol ( vitamin D3 ) and ergocalciferol ( vitamin D2 )  हैं अद्वितीय as वे constitute कया we जान as विटामिन d और can be ingested इससे the आहार and/or  supplements .
The body can also  synthesize विटामिन d ( इससे कोलेस्ट्रॉल ) जब सूर्य एक्सपोज़र is पर्याप्त ( hence  its nickname , the `` sunshine vitamin '' ) .
Although vitamin D is commonly called a vitamin , it is not  दरअसल an अनिवार्य dietary विटामिन in the सख्त भाव , as it can be synthesized in पर्याप्त amounts by सबसे स्तनधारियों उजागर  to sunlight .
( Cats and dogs can not synthesize  विटामिन d efficiently और जरूर प्राप्त it in  their diet . )
An  सशुल्क रासायनिक यौगिक ( or सम्बन्धित नियत of यौगिकों ) is तभी  scientifically called a vitamin when it can not be synthesized in sufficient quantities by an organism , and must be obtained from their diet .
However , as with other compounds  commonly पुकारा विटामिन , विटामिन d थी खोजा in an प्रयत्न to ढूँढें the dietary पदार्थ कि थी lacking in a बीमारी , namely , rickets , the बाल्यकाल रूप of osteomalacia  .
Additionally , like  अन्य यौगिकों पुकारा विटामिन , in the विकसित संसार विटामिन  D is added to staple foods , such as milk , to avoid disease due to deficiency .
Measures of serum levels reflect endogenous synthesis from exposure to sunlight  as खूब as सेवन इससे the आहार , और it is believed कि संश्लेषण may योगदान generally to the मेंटेनेंस of पर्याप्त सीरम एकाग्रता  .
The evidence indicates that the synthesis of vitamin D from sun  एक्सपोज़र works in a प्रतिक्रिया लूप कि रोकता toxicity लकिन , क्युकी of अनिश्चितता परिचय the कर्कट रिस्क इससे धूप , no सुझाव हैं जारी by the  Institute of Medicine , USA , for the amount of sun exposure required to meet vitamin D requirements .
Accordingly , the Dietary Reference Intakes for vitamin D assume that no synthesis occurs and that all  of a व्यक्ति 's विटामिन d is इससे उनके आहार , हालांकि कि होगा rarely occur in अभ्यास  .
In the liver vitamin D is converted to calcidiol , which is also known as calcifediol ( INN ) ,  25-hydroxycholecalciferol , or 25-hydroxyvitamin d—abbreviated 25 ( oh ) d ; और जिससे is the विशिष्ट विटामिन d metabolite कि  is measured in serum to determine a person 's vitamin D status .
Part of the  calcidiol is परिवर्तित by the गुर्दे to calcitriol , the biologically क्रियाशील रूप of विटामिन D. calcitriol circulates as a हार्मोन in the रक्त , regulating the विशेषज्ञता  of calcium and phosphate in the bloodstream and promoting the healthy growth and remodeling of bone .
Calcidiol is also converted to  calcitriol बाहर of the गुर्दे लिये अन्य उद्देश्य , ऐसे as the  proliferation , differentiation and apoptosis of cells ; calcitriol also affects neuromuscular function and inflammation .
Beyond its use to prevent  osteomalacia or rickets , the प्रमाण लिये अन्य स्वास्थ्य प्रभाव of विटामिन d supplementation  in the general population is inconsistent .
The best evidence of  लाभ is लिये अस्थि स्वास्थ्य और a घटी  in mortality in elderly women .
मानक रूप of the आवधिक  table .
The colors  represent अलग श्रेणी of तत्व समझाया  below .
The periodic table is a tabular display of the chemical elements , organized on the basis of  उनके परमाणु संख्याएँ , इलेक्ट्रॉन configurations , और पुनरावर्ती रासायनिक गुण  .
तत्व हैं प्रस्तुत in अनुक्रम of increasing परमाणु  number ( number of protons ) .
The standard form of  तालिका comprises an 18 × 7 ग्रिड or प्रमुख देह of तत्व , positioned ऊपर  a smaller double row of elements .
The  तालिका can भी be deconstructed into चार आयताकार ब्लॉक : the s-block to the बाएँ , the p-block  to the right , the d-block in the middle , and the f-block below that .
The rows of the table are called periods ; the columns of the s- , d-  , और p-blocks हैं पुकारा समूह , साथ कुछ of ये having names ऐसे as the हैलोजन्स or the प्रतिष्ठित गैसों  .
Since , by definition , a periodic table incorporates  पुनरावर्ती रुझान , कोई ऐसे तालिका can be प्रयुक्त to derive संबंध between  the properties of the elements and predict the properties of new , yet to be discovered or synthesized , elements .
As a result , a periodic  table—whether in the मानक रूप or कुछ अन्य variant—provides a उपयोगी फ्रेमवर्क लिये analyzing रासायनिक  behavior , and such tables are widely used in chemistry and other sciences .
Although precursors exist , Dmitri  mendeleev is generally credited साथ the प्रकाशन , in 1869 , of the पहला widely पहचाना  periodic table .
He developed his  तालिका to illustrate आवधिक रुझान in the गुण of the  then-known elements .
Mendeleev also predicted some properties of then-unknown  तत्व कि होता be अपेक्षित to भरण गैप in इस तालिका  .
Most of his  पूर्वानुमान यहूद proved सही जब  the elements in question were subsequently discovered .
Mendeleev 's  आवधिक तालिका रै चूंकि महरूम विस्तारित और परिष्कृत साथ the डिस्कवरी or संश्लेषण of further नई तत्व और the विकास  of new theoretical models to explain chemical behavior .
All elements from atomic  संख्याएँ 1 ( हाइड्रोजन ) to 118 ( ununoctium ) have महरूम खोजा or  synthesized .
The elements from 1  to 98 ( californium ) have महरूम मिला to मौजूद naturally , हालांकि कुछ हैं मिला तभी in ट्रेस amounts और यहूद initially  discovered by synthesis in laboratories .
The elements after 98  have तभी महरूम synthesized in laboratories  .
Production  of तत्व परे ununoctium is होने धड़ा , साथ the सवाल of कैसा the आवधिक तालिका may  need to be modified to accommodate any such additions being a matter of ongoing debate .
Numerous synthetic  radionuclides of naturally occurring तत्व have भी महरूम उत्पादित in laboratories  .
Minimum wage by U.S. state and U.S. territory ( American  समोआ , गुआम , प्यूर्टो रीको , वर्जिन आइलैंड्स ) , as of  Jan. 1 , 2013 .
in the संयुक्त राज्य , मजदूर हैं generally हकदार to be सशुल्क no  less than the statutory minimum wage .
The federal government mandates a  देशभर न्यूनतम मजदूरी स्तर of $ 7.25 प्रति घंटा , जबकि कुछ राज्य और municipalities have नियत न्यूनतम मजदूरी स्तर उच्चतर than the संघीय स्तर , साथ the उच्चतम राज्य न्यूनतम मजदूरी होने $  9.19 per hour in Washington as of 2013 .
Among those paid by the hour  in 2012 , 1.6 लाख यहूद reported as कमाई exactly the प्रचलित संघीय  minimum wage .
परिचय 2.0 लाख यहूद reported  as earning wages below the minimum .
Together ,  ये 3.6 लाख मजदूर साथ मजदूरी at or नीचे the न्यूनतम  made up 4.7 percent of all hourly-paid workers .
A selection of  bourbons और टेनेसी whiskeys offered at a liquor स्टोर in  Decatur , Georgia
Evan Williams  bourbon whiskey
Bourbon  whiskey is a प्रकार of अमरीकी whiskey – a barrel-aged आसुत  spirit made primarily from corn .
The name of the spirit derives from its historical association with an area known as Old Bourbon ,  around कया is अभी bourbon काउंटी , केंटकी ( जिससे , in फेरे , थी नामित बाद the फ्रेंच हाउस of  Bourbon royal family ) .
It has been  उत्पादित चूंकि the 18th सदी  .
While it may be made anywhere in the  संयुक्त राज्य , it is strongly संबद्ध साथ the अमरीकी दक्षिण in सामान्य  , and Kentucky in particular .
The Mona Lisa ( La Gioconda or La Joconde ) is a half-length portrait of a woman by the  इतालवी कलाकार लियोनार्डो da विंची , जिससे रै महरूम acclaimed as `` the बेहतरीन ज्ञात , the सबसे visited , the सबसे लिखा  about , the most sung about , the most parodied work of art in the world . ''
The painting , thought to be a portrait of Lisa Gherardini , the  बीवी of francesco डेल giocondo , is in आयल on a poplar फलक , और is believed to have महरूम चित्रित between 1503 और  1506 .
It was acquired by King Francis I of France and is now the property of the French Republic ,  on स्थाई प्रदर्शक at the musée du louvre in पेरिस चूंकि 1797  .
The ambiguity of the subject 's expression , which is frequently described as enigmatic ,  the monumentality of the संयोजन , the हल्का मॉडलिंग of फ़ॉर्म और the वायुमंडलीय illusionism यहूद अनोखा  qualities that have contributed to the continuing fascination and study of the work .
Robert Allen Palmer ( 19 January  1949 – 26 सितंबर 2003 ) , थी an अंग्रेज़ी singer-songwriter और  musician .
He was known  लिये उसके distinctive आवाज़ और the eclectic मिक्सर of musical शैलियाँ on उसके एल्बम , combining आत्मा , जैज़ ,  rock , pop , reggae and blues .
He found success  दोनो in उसके सोलो करियर और in the musical अधिनियम the शक्ति स्टेशन , और  had Top 10 songs in both the UK and the US .
His iconic music videos by Terence Donovan for the hits ``  आदी to प्रेम `` और `` बस irresistible `` प्रदर्शित identically वेश नाचना महिलाओं साथ पाले चेहरों , अंधेरा नजर मेकअप और उज्जवल रेड लिपस्टिक , जिससे resembled  the women in the art of Patrick Nagel , an artist popular in the 1980s .
sharp-suited , उसके भागीदारी in the म्यूज़िक उद्योग commenced in the 1960s , covered पाँच  decades and included a spell with Vinegar Joe .
Palmer received a number of awards throughout his  करियर , सहित दो ग्रैमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन पुरूष चट्टान गायन प्रदर्शन , an एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार , और थी twice मनोनीत लिये the ब्रिट पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अंग्रेजों  Male .
Computed tomography  एंजियोग्राफी ( cta ) is a computed टोमोग्राफी तकनीक प्रयुक्त to visualize arterial और venous  vessels throughout the body .
This ranges from arteries  सेवारत the दिमाग to those bringing रक्त to the फेफड़े ,  kidneys , arms and legs .
The Champs-Élysées  सजा साथ ध्वज लिये bastille  Day
Horseman of  the फ्रेंच रिपब्लिकन गार्ड दौरान the 2007 सैन्य परेड  on the Champs-Élysées .
Prise de la Bastille  by jean-pierre-louis-laurent  Houel
Bastille Day is the name given in English-speaking  देशों to the फ्रेंच नेशनल दिन , जिससे is मनाये on the 14th of जुलाई प्रत्येक  year .
In France  , it is formally पुकारा la fête nationale ( ; the नेशनल जश्न ) और commonly le  quatorze juillet ( ; the fourteenth of July ) .
It commemorates the 1790 Fête de la Fédération , held on the first anniversary of the storming of the Bastille on 14 July 1789 ; the anniversary of the storming of the Bastille fortress-prison was seen as  a प्रतीक of the uprising of the आधुनिक स्वदेश , और of the reconciliation of सब the फ्रेंच अंदर the संवैधानिक साम्राज्य जिससे preceded the पहला गणतंत्र  , during the French Revolution .
festivities और आधिकारिक ceremonies हैं आयोजित  all over France .
The  oldest और largest नियमित सैन्य परेड in यूरोपीय is आयोजित on the morning of 14 जुलाई , on the  Champs-Élysées avenue in Paris in front of the President of the Republic , French officials and foreign guests .
The United States of America ( USA or U.S.A. ) , commonly called  the संयुक्त राज्य ( us or u.S. ) or अमेरिका , is a संघीय गणतंत्र consisting  of fifty states and a federal district .
The lower forty-eight  संलग्न राज्य और the संघीय ज़िला of वॉशिंगटन , d.C. हैं in सेंट्रल उत्तर  America between Canada and Mexico .
The state of Alaska is west  of कनाडा और ईस्ट of रूस आरपार the बेरिंग जलसन्धि , और the  state of Hawaii is in the mid-North Pacific .
The country also has five populated  और नौ unpopulated territories in the प्रशांत और  the Caribbean .
At 3.79 million square miles ( 9.83 million km2 ) and with around 315  लाख लोगों , the संयुक्त राज्य is the third- or fourth-largest देश by कुल क्षेत्रफल और the third-largest by दोनो जमीन क्षेत्रफल और जनसांख्यिकी  .
It is one of the world 's most ethnically diverse and  multicultural राष्ट्र , the उत्पाद of large-scale आव्रजन इससे अनेक देशों  .
The geography and climate of the U.S. is also extremely  विविध , साथ रेगिस्तान , मैदान , वनों , और kyu कि हैं घर  to a wide variety of species .
Paleoindians migrated from Asia  to कया is अभी the संयुक्त राज्य मेनलैंड around 15,000 सालो  ago .
बाद 1500 , बूढ़ा संसार रोगों introduced by  Europeans greatly reduced their populations .
European  colonization began around 1600 और  came mostly from England .
the संयुक्त राज्य उभरा इससे तेरह अंग्रेजों  colonies located along the Atlantic seaboard .
Disputes  between ग्रेट ब्रिटेन और the अमरीकी colonies  led to the American Revolution .
On July 4 , 1776 , delegates from the 13  colonies unanimously जारी the घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता , जिससे स्थापित  the United States of America .
The American Revolutionary War , which ended with the recognition of independence of the United States  इससे the किंगडम of ग्रेट ब्रिटेन , थी the पहला कामयाब युद्ध of स्वतंत्रता विरूद्ध a यूरोपीय  colonial empire .
The current Constitution was adopted  on सितंबर 17 , 1787 ; twenty-seven amendments have चूंकि महरूम added to the  Constitution .
The  पहला टेन amendments , collectively नामित the विधेयक of अधिकारों , यहूद  ratified in 1791 and guarantee many fundamental civil rights and freedoms .
चलित by the doctrine of manifest नियति , the संयुक्त राज्य embarked on a vigorous विस्तार  across North America throughout the 19th century .
This involved displacing  देशी जनजातियों , acquiring नई territories , और धीरे admitting  new states .
The American  सिविल युद्ध ended legalized गुलामी in the संयुक्त  States .
By the  समाप्त of the उन्नीसवीं सदी , the संयुक्त राज्य विस्तारित into the प्रशांत समंदर , और इसके अर्थव्यवस्था  was the world 's largest .
The  spanish–american युद्ध और पुष्टि the  country 's status as a global military power .
The United States emerged from as a  वैश्विक महाशक्ति , the पहला देश साथ नाभिकीय हथियार , और a स्थाई सदस्य of the संयुक्त  Nations Security Council .
The end of the Cold War and the  विच्छेद of the सोवियत संघ बाएँ the संयुक्त राज्य as the एकमात्र  superpower .
The United States is a developed country and has the world 's largest  नेशनल अर्थव्यवस्था , साथ an अनुमानित 2012 जीडीपी of $ 15.6 खरब 19 % of वैश्विक जीडीपी at purchasing-power  parity , as of 2011 .
The per capita GDP of the U.S.  थी the संसार 's sixth-highest as of 2010 , हालांकि अमेरिका 's माल असमानता थी  also ranked highest among OECD countries by the World Bank .
The economy is fueled by an  प्रचुरता of प्राकृतिक संसाधन , a well-developed अवसंरचना , और ऊँची उत्पादकता ; और  while its economy is considered post-industrial it continues to be one of the world 's largest manufacturers .
The country accounts for 39 % of global  सैन्य बिता , और is a अग्रणी आर्थिक , राजनैतिक , और सांस्कृतिक फ़ोर्स in the संसार , as खूब  as a leader in scientific research and technological innovation .
The NCAA Men 's  प्रभाग i बास्केट चैंपियनशिप is a single-elimination टूर्नामेंट निभाई प्रत्येक वसन्त in the संयुक्त राज्य , फिलहाल featuring 68 कॉलेज  basketball teams , to determine the national championship of the major college basketball teams .
The tournament , organized by the National Collegiate Athletic Association ( NCAA ) ,  थी निर्मित दौरान 1939 by the नेशनल संघ of बास्केट कोच , और थी the  idea of Ohio State University coach Harold Olsen .
Played mostly during  कूच , it is ज्ञात informally as कूच दीवानगी or the बिग नृत्य , और रै  become one of the most famous annual sporting events in the United States .
The NCAA has credited Bob Walsh of the Seattle Organizing  कमेटी लिये starting the कूच दीवानगी जश्न  during 1984 .
The tournament teams include champions  इससे 31 प्रभाग i सम्मेलनों ( जिससे प्राप्त स्वचालित  bids ) , and 37 teams which are awarded at-large berths .
These `` at-large '' teams are chosen  by an ncaa चयन कमेटी , as विस्तृत  below .
The 64 teams are divided into four  regions और व्यवस्थित into a सिंगल विलोपन `` कोष्ठक '' , जिससे predetermines  , when a team wins a game , which team it will face next .
Each team is `` seeded '' ,  or क्रमित , भीतर इसके प्रदेश  .
After an initial four games between eight lower-ranked  टीमों , the टूर्नामेंट occurs दौरान the कोर्स of तीन सप्ताहांत , at  pre-selected neutral sites around the United States .
Lower-ranked teams are  लगाई in the कोष्ठक विरूद्ध उच्चतर क्रमित  teams .
Each weekend eliminates three-fourths of the teams , from a round of 64 , to  a `` मीठी सोलह '' , और लिये the पिछला वीकेंड of the टूर्नामेंट a फाइनल  Four ; the Final Four is usually played during the first weekend of April .
These four teams , one from each region , then  compete in एक स्थान लिये the नेशनल चैंपियनशिप  .
The  टूर्नामेंट रै महरूम at तनिक partially  televised since 1969 .
Presently , the games are  reported by सीबीएस , tbs , टीएनटी , और trutv by the trade-name ncaa  March Madness .
Since 2011  , सब खेल हैं उपलब्धियाँ लिये देखने  nationwide .
As television coverage has  grown , so too रै the टूर्नामेंट  's popularity .
Presently , millions of Americans ``  भरण आउट a कोष्ठक '' , predicting विजेता of सब 67 खेल  .
With 11 national titles , UCLA has the record for the most NCAA Men 's Division I  बास्केट championships ; जॉन लकड़ी coached ucla to  10 of its 11 titles .
The University of Kentucky is second ,  साथ 8 नेशनल शीर्षक , जबकि इंडियाना विश्वविद्यालयों और the विश्वविद्यालयों of उत्तर कैरोलिना  are tied for third with 5 national titles .
ड्यूक विश्वविद्यालयों बाँधने पांचवां  with 4 national titles .
A sample  of सिंथेटिक मोटर  oil
सिंथेटिक आयल is a स्नेहक consisting of रासायनिक यौगिकों  that are artificially made ( synthesized ) .
Synthetic lubricants can be manufactured using  chemically परिवर्धित पेट्रोलियम components बल्कि than पूरे crude आयल , लकिन can भी be synthesized इससे अन्य  raw materials .
Synthetic oil is used as a substitute for lubricant refined from petroleum when operating in extremes of temperature ,  क्युकी , in सामान्य , it provides श्रेष्ठ mechanical और रासायनिक गुण than those मिला in परंपरागत  mineral oils .
वायुयान जेट इंजन , लिये उदाहरण , आवश्यकता the उपयोग of सिंथेटिक oils , whereas  aircraft piston engines do not .
Jackass is an American reality series , originally shown on MTV from  2000 to 2002 , featuring लोगों performing विभिन्न खतरनाक , crude self-injuring स्टंट  and pranks .
The show served as a launchpad for the television and acting careers of Bam  margera , steve-o , और भी जॉनी knoxville , जो previously था तभी a few नाबालिग एक्टिंग भूमिकाएँ  .
Since 2002 , three Jackass films have been produced and released by MTV  कॉरपोरेट सहोदर सर्वोपरि तस्वीरें , continuing the मताधिकार बाद इसके चलाएं on  television .
The  दिखाएँ sparked अनेक spin-offs सहित चिरायु la bam , wildboyz  , Homewrecker , Dr. Steve-O and Blastazoid .
the दिखाएँ लगाई # 68 on entertainment साप्ताहिक  `` New TV Classics '' list .
Roseanne Cherrie Barr ( born  नवम्बर 3 , 1952 ) is an अमरीकी अभिनेत्री , comedienne , लेखक , टेलीविज़न निर्माता , निदेशक , और 2012 अध्यक्षीय  nominee of the California -based Peace and Freedom Party .
Barr began her  करियर in stand-up कॉमेडी at क्लब पहले gaining कीर्ति लिये उसके भूमिका in the  sitcom Roseanne .
The show was a hit and lasted  नौ सीज़न , इससे 1988 to 1997  .
She won both an Emmy and a Golden  ग्लोब पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन अभिनेत्री लिये उसके कार्य on the दिखाएँ  .
Barr had  crafted a `` fierce working-class घरेलू देवी '' persona in the आठ सालो preceding उसके sitcom और चाही  to do a realistic show about a strong mother who was not a victim of patriarchal consumerism .
The granddaughter of immigrants from  यूरोपीय और रूस , barr थी the oldest of चार children in a working-class यहूदी नमक  Lake City family ; she was also active in the LDS Church .
In 1974 , she  शादीशुदा विधेयक pentland , साथ जिसको वो था तीन children , पहले divorcing in 1990 और  marrying comedian Tom Arnold for four years .
विवाद arose जब वो संग `` the star-spangled ध्वज `` off-key at a 1990 nationally aired बेसबॉल  game , followed by grabbing her crotch and spitting .
After her sitcom ended , she  शुभारम्भ उसके अपना बात दिखाएँ , the roseanne दिखाएँ  , which aired from 1998 to 2000 .
In 2005 , she  लौटे to stand-up कॉमेडी साथ a संसार  tour .
In 2011 , she  स्ट्रक्चर in an unscripted tv दिखाएँ , roseanne 's nuts , कि lasted इससे जुलाई to सितंबर  of that year , about her life on a Hawaiian farm .
In early 2012 , Barr announced  उसके उम्मीदवारी लिये the अध्यक्षीय नामांकन of  the Green Party .
Barr lost  the नामांकन to jill स्टीन  .
She then  sought the अध्यक्षीय नामांकन of the सलाम और स्वतंत्रता  Party , which she won on August 4 , 2012 .
Barr  प्राप्त 61,971 मत in the सामान्य चुनाव ,  placing sixth overall .
Francesco Albani 's 17th century  बपतिस्मा of मसीह is a ठेठ चित्रण साथ the आसमान खोलने और the पावन स्पिरिट descending  as a dove .
The  बपतिस्मा of यीशु marks the शुरूआत of उसके  public ministry .
This event is recorded in  the canonical gospels of मैथ्यू , चिह्नित और ल्यूक  .
John 's  इन्जील करता नहीं describe यीशु ' बपतिस्मा , लकिन जॉन the  Baptist does testify of the other things in .
In the New  वसीयत , जॉन the बैपटिस्ट preached the बपतिस्मा of तौबा लिये the remission of पापों  ( ) , and declared himself a forerunner of he that would baptize `` with the Holy Ghost and with fire '' ( ) .
In so  doing he थी तैयारी the  way for Jesus .
Jesus came to the Jordan  नदी जहाँ he थी baptized by  John .
The baptismal scene includes the  आकाश खोलने , a dove-like descent of the पावन स्पिरिट , और a आवाज़ इससे स्वर्ग saying , `` इस  is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased . ''
Most modern scholars  दृश्य the फैक्ट कि यीशु थी baptized by जॉन as an ऐतिहासिक इवेंट to जिससे a ऊँची उपाधि of certainty  can be assigned .
Along with the crucifixion of Jesus most scholars view it as  एक of the दो historically निश्चित तथ्य परिचय उसे , और प्रायः उपयोग it as the  starting points for the study of the historical Jesus .
The  बपतिस्मा is एक of the पाँच प्रमुख माइलस्टोन in the इन्जील कथा of the जीवन of यीशु , the अन्य  being the Transfiguration , Crucifixion , Resurrection , and Ascension .
Most Christian denominations view the baptism of Jesus as an important event and  a आधार लिये the ईसाई रीति of बपतिस्मा ( देखिए भी  ) .
In Eastern Christianity , Jesus ' baptism  is commemorated on 6 जनवरी , the feast  of Epiphany .
In the Roman Catholic Church , the Anglican  नियाज़ , the लूथरन चर्च और कुछ अन्य पश्चिमी denominations  , it is recalled on a day within the following week , the feast of the baptism of the Lord .
In Roman  catholicism , the बपतिस्मा of यीशु is एक of the चमकदार  Mysteries sometimes added to the Rosary .
It is a Trinitarian feast  in the पूर्वी परंपरागत चर्च  .
methylcobalamin ( दिखाया ) is  a form of vitamin B12 .
Physically it resembles the other forms of vitamin B12 , occurring as  अंधेरा रेड crystals कि freely रूप cherry-colored पारदर्शी  solutions in water .
Vitamin B12 , vitamin B12 or  विटामिन b-12 , भी पुकारा cobalamin , is a water-soluble विटामिन साथ a कुंजी भूमिका in the सामान्य कामकाज of the दिमाग  and nervous system , and for the formation of blood .
It is one  of the आठ b विटामिन  .
It is normally involved in the metabolism of every cell of the human body ,  विशेषकर affecting डीएनए संश्लेषण और विनियमन , लकिन भी वसीय एसिड संश्लेषण और उर्जा  production .
Neither  fungi , पौधे , nor पशु हैं सक्षम of  producing vitamin B12 .
Only bacteria and archaea have the enzymes required for its  संश्लेषण , हालांकि अनेक भोजन हैं a प्राकृतिक सोर्स of b12 क्युकी of बैक्टीरियल symbiosis  .
The  विटामिन is the largest और सबसे structurally जटिल विटामिन  and can be produced industrially only through bacterial fermentation-synthesis .
Vitamin B12 consists of a class of chemically related  यौगिकों ( vitamers ) , सब of जिससे have विटामिन कार्यकलाप  .
It contains  the biochemically विरल तत्व कोबाल्ट  .
Biosynthesis of the basic  ढांचा of the विटामिन is संपन्नता तभी by जीवाणु ( जिससे प्रायः उपज hydroxocobalamin ) ,  but conversion between different forms of the vitamin can be accomplished in the human body .
A common semi-synthetic form of the vitamin ,  cyanocobalamin , करता नहीं occur in प्रकृति , लकिन is उत्पादित इससे बैक्टीरियल hydroxocobalamin और तब  used in many pharmaceuticals and supplements , and as a food additive , because of its stability and lower production cost .
In the body it is converted to the human physiological  फ़ॉर्म methylcobalamin और adenosylcobalamin , leaving पीछे the साइनाइड , albeit  in minimal concentration .
More recently , hydroxocobalamin ,  methylcobalamin , और adenosylcobalamin can be मिला in अधिक महंगी pharmacological उत्पाद और खाना पूरक  .
The extra  यूटिलिटी of ये is फिलहाल debated  .
Vitamin B12 was discovered from its  संबंध to the बीमारी घातक रक्ताल्पता , जिससे is an असंक्राम्य बीमारी in जिससे parietal कोशिकाएं of the पेट जिम्मेदार  for secreting intrinsic factor are destroyed .
Intrinsic factor is crucial for the normal  अवशोषण of b12 , so a कमी of मूलभूत फ़ैक्टर , as देखी in घातक  anemia , causes a vitamin B12 deficiency .
Many other subtler kinds of vitamin B12 deficiency  और उनके biochemical प्रभाव have चूंकि महरूम elucidated  .
Full Metal Jacket is a 1987 war film produced , directed  और co-written by स्टेनली kubrick .
it is an अनुकूलन of गुस्ताव hasford 's 1979 अनोखा the short-timers और सितारों मैथ्यू modine , विंसेंट  D'Onofrio , R. Lee Ermey , Arliss Howard , and Adam Baldwin .
The film follows a platoon  of u.S. marines through उनके प्रशिक्षण और the अनुभवों of दो of the प्लाटून 's marines in  the Tet Offensive during the Vietnam War .
The film 's title  refers to the पूरा मेटल जैकेट गोली प्रयुक्त by infantry  riflemen .
The film  प्राप्त नाजुक acclaim  .
It  प्राप्त an अकादमी पुरस्कार नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन adapted पटकथा  for Kubrick , Michael Herr and Gustav Hasford .
In 2001 , the American Film Institute placed  पूरा मेटल जैकेट at # 95 in उनके `` एएफआई 's 100 सालो ... 100 thrills ``  poll .
TMZ is a celebrity  न्यूज जालस्थल कि debuted on नवम्बर  8 , 2005 .
It was a collaboration between AOL and  telepictures प्रोडक्शन्स , a प्रभाग of warner भाईs. , जबतक समय warner divested एओएल  in 2009 .
However , it remained affiliated  साथ एओएल न्यूज और रै the एओएल न्यूज लोगो affixed in the  upper right corner .
The name TMZ stands for the historic `` studio zone ``  or 30-mile मण्डल दायरा इससे the चौराहे of वेस्ट बेवर्ली boulevard और उत्तर la cienega  Boulevard in Los Angeles .
TMZ 's managing editor is Harvey Levin ,  a lawyer-turned-journalist जो थी previously a विधिक विशेषज्ञ लिये the लॉस एंजिल्स टेलीविज़न  station KCBS-TV .
The site claims that it does not pay for stories or interviews  ; however , levin रै admitted कि tmz करता `` sometimes अदा स्त्रोत  for leads on stories '' .
Levin has stated that `` everything  is शोधकार्य और vetted  for accuracy . ''
A companion TV series , TMZ on TV  , debuted on सितंबर 10  , 2007 .
Scream 3 is a 2000 American slasher film created by Kevin  विलियमसन , निर्देशित by वेस craven और लिखा by ehren क्रूगर , अभिनीत  Neve Campbell , Courteney Cox Arquette and David Arquette .
It was released on February 4 , 2000  as the तीसरा किश्त in the चीख फिल्मी  series .
The events of the story are set three years after  those of चीख 2 और फ़ॉलो sidney प्रेस्कॉट ( कैम्पबेल ) जो रै गए into self-imposed अलगाव following the कार्यक्रम of the पिछला दो films लकिन is drawn to हॉलीवुड बाद a नई ghostface  begins killing the cast of the film within a film `` Stab 3 '' .
Scream 3 combines the  हिंसा of the slasher विधा साथ कॉमेडी और `` whodunit `` रहस्य जबकि  satirizing the cliché of film trilogies .
Unlike the previous Scream films , there was an increased emphasis on  comedic तत्व और the हिंसा और हॉरर थी घटाया in जवाब to increased पब्लिक scrutiny परिचय हिंसा  in media following the Columbine High School massacre .
The film was the concluding chapter of  the चीख श्रेणी जबतक it थी  revived with a sequel , Scream 4 , in 2011 .
Williamson provided a five-page outline for two  सिक्वेल to चीख जब auctioning उसके असली स्क्रिप्ट , उम्मीद to entice bidders साथ the  potential of buying a franchise .
Williamson 's commitments to other projects meant he was unable to develop a complete  स्क्रिप्ट लिये चीख 3 और लिखने कर्तव्य यहूद undertaken by ehren क्रूगर जो discarded much of विलियमसन  's notes .
Craven  और मार्को beltrami लौटे to सीधा और स्कोर the फिल्मी क्रमशः as वे था  with the previous two series entries .
Production was troubled with  स्क्रिप्ट rewrites , साथ पृष्ठों sometimes तभी तैयार on the दिन of फिल्मांकन , और  scheduling difficulties with the main cast .
Scream 3 performed both financially and  critically बदतर than इसके preceding films , कमाई over $ 161 लाख और साथ अनेक आलोचकों claiming कि the  film had become what Scream originally `` spoofed `` .
Despite negative criticism the film did receive  तारीफ़ साथ reviewers कॉलिंग it the पूर्ण समाप्त to the चीख  trilogy .
As of 2012 , the  फिल्मी is फिलहाल the क्रमांक 3 highest-grossing slasher-film in उत्तर अमेरिका , following चीख at  number 1 and Scream 2 at number 2 .
The  फिल्मी 's साउंडट्रैक थी well-received , बिता चौदह सप्ताह on  the Billboard 200 and reaching a high of # 32 .
Shoulder impingement syndrome , also called painful  चाप सिंड्रोम , supraspinatus सिंड्रोम , तैराक 's कंधे , और thrower 's कंधे , is a नैदानिक सिंड्रोम जिससे occurs जब the tendons of the rotator कफ मांसपेशियां become irritated और inflamed as वे pass  through the subacromial space , the passage beneath the acromion .
This  can परिणाम in पीड़ा , कमज़ोरी और घाटा  of movement at the shoulder .
JLA was a monthly comic book published by DC  कॉमिक्स इससे जनवरी 1997 to अप्रैल 2006 featuring the इंसाफ लीग  .
the औपनिवेशिक इतिहास of the संयुक्त राज्य कवर the इतिहास of यूरोपीय settlements इससे the प्रारंभ  of colonization of America until their incorporation into the United States .
in the लेट 16th सदी , इंग्लैण्ड , फ़्रांस , स्पेन और the नीदरलैंड्स शुभारम्भ  major colonization programs in eastern North America .
Small early attempts—such  as the अंग्रेज़ी खोया उपनिवेश of roanoke —often disappeared ; everywhere the मौत रेट  of the first arrivals was very high .
nevertheless कामयाब colonies यहूद  established .
European settlers came from a  किस्में of सोशल और धार्मिक समूह  .
No aristocrats settled permanently , but a  क्रमांक of adventurers , सैनिको , किसानो , और tradesmen  arrived .
Diversity was an American characteristic as the Dutch of New Netherland , the Swedes and Finns of New Sweden , the English Quakers of  पेन्सिलवेनिया , the अंग्रेज़ी puritans of नई इंग्लैण्ड , the अंग्रेज़ी settlers of jamestown , और the `` worthy ग़रीब '' of जॉर्जिया , आए to the नई महाद्वीप और निर्मित colonies साथ  distinctive social , religious , political and economic styles .
Occasionally one colony took  कंट्रोल of another ( दौरान युद्धों between उनके  European parents ) .
Only in Nova Scotia ( now part of Canada ) did the  conquerors निकाल the पिछला colonists  .
Instead they all lived  पक्ष by पक्ष in  peace .
There were no major civil  युद्धों among the 13 colonies , और the दो मुख्य हथियारबंद विद्रोहों ( in वर्जिनिया  in 1676 and in New York in 1689–91 ) were short-lived failures .
Wars between the French and the British—the French and Indian Wars and Father  rale 's युद्ध —were तूल , और शामिल french-support लिये wabanaki confederacy हमले  on the frontiers .
By 1760 France was  पराजित और the अंग्रेजों जब्त इसके  colonies .
the चार पृथक regions यहूद : नई इंग्लैण्ड , the मध्य colonies , the chesapeake  Bay Colonies ( Upper South ) and the Lower South .
Some  इतिहासकारों add a पांचवां प्रदेश , the frontier ,  which was never separately organized .
By the time European  settlers arrived around 1600–1650 , the बहुमत of the देशी अमेरिकी जीना in the पूर्वी संयुक्त राज्य था महरूम decimated  by new diseases , introduced to them decades before by explorers and sailors .
देखिए समयरेखा of औपनिवेशिक अमेरिका लिये सूची  of historical events .
Gloria Laura Vanderbilt ( born February  20 , 1924 ) is an अमरीकी कलाकार , लेखक , अभिनेत्री , heiress , और socialite सबसे विख्यात  as an early developer of designer blue jeans .
She is a member of the  prominent वेंडरबिल्ट परिवार of नई यॉर्क और the माँ  of CNN 's Anderson Cooper .
Greece ( Romanization of Greek| )  , officially the हैलेनिक गणतंत्र ( ' ) , is a देश in southeast यूरोपीय  .
According to the 2011  जनसांख्यिकी , यूनानियों 's जनसांख्यिकी is around 11 लाख  .
Athens is the  स्वदेश 's पूंजी और largest नगर  , its urban area also including Piraeus .
Greece is strategically located at  the क्रॉसरोड्स of यूरोपीय , एशिया , the मध्य ईस्ट , और अफ़्रीकी , और रै जमीन सीमायें साथ  Albania , the Republic of Macedonia and Bulgaria to the north , and Turkey to the northeast .
The Aegean Sea lies to the east of  मेनलैंड यूनानियों , the आयोनियन समुद्र to the वेस्ट , और the भूमध्यसागरीय समुद्र to the दक्षिण  .
Greece has the 11th longest coastline in the world at in length  , featuring a विशाल क्रमांक of आइलैंड्स ( लगभग 1,400 , of जिससे 227 हैं inhabited ) , सहित क्रेट , the  Dodecanese , the Cyclades , and the Ionian Islands among others .
Eighty percent of Greece  consists of kyu , of जिससे माउंट  Olympus is the highest at .
Modern Greece traces its roots to the civilization of Ancient  यूनानियों , generally माना the पालना of पश्चिमी  civilization .
As such , it is the birthplace of democracy , Western philosophy , the Olympic Games , Western literature  और historiography , राजनैतिक विज्ञान , प्रमुख वैज्ञानिक और गणितीय सिद्धान्त , और पश्चिमी नाटक  , including both tragedy and comedy .
This legacy is partly reflected in the seventeen  युनेस्को संसार विरासत साइट स्तिथ in यूनानियों , रैंकिंग it 7th in यूरोपीय और 13th in the  world .
The modern  यूनानी राज्य थी स्थापित in 1830 , following the  Greek War of Independence .
Greece is a founding member of the  संयुक्त राष्ट्र , रै महरूम a सदस्य of कया is अभी the यूरोपीय संघ चूंकि 1981 ( और the eurozone  since 2001 ) , and has been a member of NATO since 1952 .
यूनानियों is a विकसित देश साथ an उन्नत , high-income अर्थव्यवस्था और बहुत ऊँची मानकों of जीना , सहित the  world 's 21st highest quality of life as of 2010 .
Greece 's  अर्थव्यवस्था is भी the largest in the balkans , जहाँ यूनानियों is  an important regional investor .
A prime meridian is a  मध्याह्न , i.e . a लकीर of देशांतर , at जिससे देशांतर  is defined to be 0° .
A  प्रधान मध्याह्न और इसके विपरीत in a 360°-system , the 180th मध्याह्न  ( at 180° longitude ) , form a great circle .
This great circle  divides the गोला , e.g . the धरती , into  two hemispheres .
If one uses directions of East and West from a  पारिभाषित प्रधान मध्याह्न , तब वे can be  called Eastern Hemisphere and Western Hemisphere .
Gerardus Mercator in his Atlas Cosmographicae  ( 1595 ) उपयोग a प्रधान मध्याह्न कही बंद to 25°w , गुजर बस to the वेस्ट of  Santa Maria Island in the Atlantic .
His 180th meridian runs along the  जलसन्धि of anián ( बेरिंग जलसन्धि )
A prime meridian  is ultimately मनमानी , नापसंद an equator , जिससे is संकल्पित by the अक्ष of rotation—and  various conventions have been used or advocated in different regions and throughout history .
Minka Dumont  केली ( born minka dumont dufay ; जून 24 , 1980  ) is an American actress .
She is perhaps best known for her roles in  चार्ली 's फ़रिश्ते , शुक्रवार रात्रि लाइट्स , और the रूममेट  .
R.O.B . ( Robotic Operating Buddy )  , released in जापानी as the , is an accessory लिये the  Nintendo Entertainment System ( NES ) .
It was  released in जुलाई 1985 in जापानी और  later that year in North America .
It had a short product  जीवनकाल , साथ support लिये तभी दो खेल जिससे comprised the `` रोबोट श्रेणी  '' ; Gyromite and Stack-Up .
R.O.B . was released with the intention of portraying the Nintendo  entertainment प्रणाली as कुछ अनोखा in अनुक्रम to alleviate खुदरा fears following  the video game crash of 1983 .
R.O.B . was  उपलब्धियाँ in the डीलक्स नियत , a विन्यास लिये the कंसोल कि शामिल , among अन्य  things , R.O.B . and Gyromite .
Stack-Up was purchased  separately और शामिल इसके अपना शारीरिक खेल  pieces .
The Walking Liberty half dollar was a silver 50-cent piece or half  डालर सिक्का जारी by the संयुक्त राज्य मिंट इससे 1916 to 1947 ; it थी designed by एडाल्फ A. weinman  .
In 1915 , the new Mint Director , Robert W.  woolley , आए to मानना कि he थी नहीं तभी अनुमत लकिन जरूरी by विधि to बदलें सिक्का डिजाइन  that had been in use for 25 years .
He therefore began the process of replacing the Barber coinage : dimes , quarters and half  डॉलर , सब bearing समान डिजाइन by long-time मिंट engraver चार्ल्स E. नाई , और पहला struck  in 1892 .
Woolley had the Commission of Fine Arts  conduct a प्रतियोगिता , as a परिणाम of जिससे weinman थी चयनित  to design the dime and half dollar .
Weinman 's design of Liberty striding towards the Sun  लिये the हाफ डालर proved मुश्किल to पूर्ण , और राजकोष सचिव विलियम G. mcadoo , जिनकी विभाग शामिल the मिंट , माना having  Barber create his own design .
Mint officials were successful in  getting weinman 's डिज़ाइन into उत्पादन , हालांकि it never struck बहुत खूब , जिससे may have महरूम a फ़ैक्टर in इसके बदलना by the फ्रैंकलिन  half dollar beginning in 1948 .
Nevertheless , art  इतिहासकार कॉर्नेलियस vermeule माना the टुकड़ा to be among  the most beautiful US coins .
Since 1986 , a  परिवर्धन of weinman 's obverse डिज़ाइन रै महरूम प्रयुक्त लिये the अमरीकी चांदी  Eagle .
The  टोयोटा 4runner is a mid-size खेल यूटिलिटी गाडी ( एसयूवी ) उत्पादित by the जापानी निर्माता टोयोटा  and sold throughout the world from 1984 to present .
In Japan it was  ज्ञात as the टोयोटा  Hilux Surf .
The original 4Runner was a compact SUV and little more than a Toyota pickup truck  साथ a fiberglass शेल over the bed , लकिन the मॉडल रै चूंकि undergone significant स्वतंत्र विकास into a क्रॉस  between a compact and a mid-size SUV .
All 4Runners have been built at Toyota 's Tahara plant  in tahara , aichi , जापानी , or at hino मोटर्स ' hamura , जापानी संयंत्र  , and in Brazil .
Its mid-size crossover SUV  बंटवारा is the टोयोटा highlander  .
This article deals with medicine as  practiced by प्रशिक्षित पेशेवर इससे प्राचीन  times to the present .
The ancient  उन्होंने था a प्रणाली of आयुर्विज्ञान कि थी बहुत उन्नत लिये इसके समय और बहकावे  later medical traditions .
The Egyptians  और babylonians दोनो introduced the अवधारणाओं of निदान  , prognosis , and medical examination .
The  यूनानियों गई भी further , और उन्नत as खूब  medical ethics .
The Hippocratic Oath , still taken by doctors  आज , थी लिखा in यूनानियों in the 5th सदी bce  .
In the  मध्यकालीन era , सर्जिकल practices inherited इससे the प्राचीन मास्टर्स यहूद improved और तब systematized in  Rogerius 's The Practice of Surgery .
विश्वविद्यालयों began व्यवस्थित प्रशिक्षण of physicians  around the years 1220 in Italy .
During the  पुनर्जागरण , समझना of anatomy improved , और the सूक्ष्मदर्शी  was invented .
The germ theory of  बीमारी in the 19th सदी led to cures लिये अनेक संक्रामक रोगों  .
सैन्य डॉक्टर उन्नत the विधि of आघात उपचार  and surgery .
Public health  उपायों यहूद विकसित विशेषकर in the 19th सदी as  the rapid growth of cities required systematic sanitary measures .
Advanced research centers opened in the early  20th सदी , प्रायः कनेक्ट साथ प्रमुख  hospitals .
The  mid-20th सदी थी characterized by नई biological  treatments , such as antibiotics .
These advancements ,  साथ साथ developments in रसायन , आनुवंशिकी , और lab प्रौद्योगिकी ( ऐसे as  the x-ray ) led to modern medicine .
Medicine  थी heavily professionalized in the 20th सदी , और नई करियर खोली to महिलाओं as नर्स  ( from the 1870s ) and as physicians ( especially after 1970 ) .
The 21st century  is characterized by बहुत उन्नत शोध  involving numerous fields of science .
The Hippocratic Corpus , is a collection of early medical works from ancient Greece strongly  संबद्ध साथ the प्राचीन यूनानी चिकित्सक हिपोक्रेटिस और उसके शिक्षाओं  .
Potassium is a  रासायनिक तत्व साथ प्रतीक k ( इससे neo-latin kalium  ) and atomic number 19 .
Elemental potassium is a soft silvery-white  क्षारीय मेटल कि oxidizes rapidly in एयर और is बहुत प्रतिक्रिया साथ जल , generating sufficient ऊष्मा  to ignite the hydrogen emitted in the reaction and burning with a lilac flame .
Because potassium and sodium are chemically very  समान , उनके लवण यहूद नहीं at पहला differentiated  .
The existence of multiple elements in their salts was suspected from  1702 , और इस थी सिद्ध in 1807 जब पोटैशियम और सोडियम यहूद individually पृथक इससे अलग लवण  by electrolysis .
Potassium  in प्रकृति occurs तभी in  ionic salts .
As  ऐसे , it is मिला dissolved in seawater ( जिससे is 0.04 % पोटैशियम by वज़न )  , and is part of many minerals .
Most industrial  रासायनिक अनुप्रयोग of पोटैशियम employ the अपेक्षाकृत ऊँची घुलनशीलता  in water of potassium compounds , such as potassium soaps .
Potassium metal has only a few special applications , being  replaced in सबसे रासायनिक प्रतिक्रियाएँ साथ सोडियम मेटल  .
Potassium ions are necessary  लिये the फलन of सब जीना  cells .
Potassium ion diffusion is  a कुंजी यांत्रिकी in तंत्रिका हस्तांतरण , और पोटैशियम depletion in पशु , सहित इंसानो , परिणाम  in various cardiac dysfunctions .
पोटैशियम accumulates in संयंत्र कोशिकाएं , और यूँ भैस फल और सब्जियां  are a good dietary source of it .
Conversely , most plants except specialist halophytes are intolerant  of नमक , और सोडियम is उपस्थित in उन्हें तभी in कम विशेषज्ञता  .
This resulted in  पोटैशियम पहला होने पृथक इससे potash  , the ashes of plants , giving the element its name .
For the same reason , heavy crop production rapidly depletes soils of potassium ,  और agricultural fertilizers consume 95 % of वैश्विक पोटैशियम रासायनिक उत्पादन  .
The  सिंगापुर डालर or डालर ( चिह्न : $ ; कोड : sgd ) is the आधिकारिक  currency of Singapore .
It is normally abbreviated with the dollar sign $ , or  alternatively s $ to फर्क it इससे अन्य डालर -denominated  currencies .
it is विभाजित into 100  cents .
The Monetary Authority of Singapore and the Brunei  करेंसी और मौद्रिक फलक स्टिल maintain the ऐतिहासिक exchangeability of उनके दो मुद्राएँ , the  Singaporean dollar and the Brunei dollar , respectively .
The dollar is accepted as  `` प्रथागत टेंडर '' in ब्रुनेई according to the करेंसी  Interchangeability Agreement .
Likewise , the Brunei  डालर is customarily स्वीकृत in  Singapore
James Samuel Coleman ( May 12 , 1926 – March 25 , 1995 ) was an American  समाजशास्त्री , theorist और अनुभवजन्य शोधकर्ता , आधारित chiefly at the विश्वविद्यालयों of  Chicago .
He was elected  अध्यक्ष of the अमरीकी  Sociological Association .
Coleman studied the  समाजशास्त्र of शिक्षा , पब्लिक नीति , और थी एक of the earliest उपयोक्ता of the पद `` सोशल  capital `` .
His Foundations of  सोशल सिद्धान्त बहकावे समाजशास्त्रीय  theory .
His The Adolescent Society ( 1961 ) and `` Coleman Report '' (  समता of शैक्षणिक अवसर , 1966 ) यहूद दो of the सबसे heavily cited किताबे in  educational sociology .
The landmark Coleman Report helped transform  शैक्षणिक सिद्धान्त , reshape नेशनल शिक्षा नीतियों , और बहकावे पब्लिक और scholarly राय regarding the भूमिका of schooling  in determining equality and productivity in the United States .
Superman ( from  dc कॉमिक्स ) थी the पहला सुपरहीरो निर्मित  , art by Jim Lee .
A superhero ( sometimes rendered super-hero or super hero ) is a type of stock character  possessing `` असाधारण or superhuman शक्तियां '' और समर्पित to protecting the पब्लिक  .
चूंकि the डेब्यू of the prototypical सुपरहीरो सुपरमैन in 1938 , कहानियां of superheroes—ranging इससे ब्रैड episodic adventures to continuing  years-long sagas—have dominated American comic books and crossed over into other media .
the शब्द itself तिथियाँ to  at least 1917 .
A female superhero is  sometimes पुकारा a superheroine ( भी rendered super-heroine or सुपर  heroine ) .
`` SUPER  नायक '' is a ट्रेडमार्क co-owned by dc कॉमिक्स  and Marvel Comics .
By most  परिभाषाएं , वर्ण do नहीं सख्ती आवश्यकता वास्तविक superhuman शक्तियां to be deemed superheroes , हालांकि शर्तें ऐसे as costumed अपराधों सेनानी or नकाबपोश vigilantes हैं  sometimes used to refer to those such as Batman and Green Arrow without such powers who share other common superhero traits .
Such characters were generally referred to as `` mystery men  '' in the so-called सुनहरी आयु of कॉमिक किताबे to फर्क उन्हें इससे वर्ण साथ super-powers  .
Normally ,  superheroes उपयोग उनके शक्तियां to काउंटर day-to-day अपराधों जबकि भी combating खतरे  against humanity by supervillains , their criminal counterparts .
प्रायः , एक of ये supervillains होगा be the सुपरहीरो  's archenemy .
As well , some longrunning superheroes , such as  सुपरमैन , बैटमैन , spider-man और आयरन man प्रत्येक रै a rogues  gallery of enemies .
As well , superheroes sometimes will combat such  irregular खतरे as एलियंस , magical/ काल्पनिक entities , अमरीकी युद्ध दुश्मनों ऐसे as नात्सीवाद or  communism , and godlike or demonic creatures .
The following is a historical list of actors and primary  अक्षर भूमिकाएँ जिससे appear on the अमरीकी साबुन ओपेरा एक जीवन  to Live .
The Shawshank Redemption  is a 1994 अमरीकी नाटक फिल्मी लिखा और निर्देशित by फ़्रैंक darabont और अभिनीत  Tim Robbins and Morgan Freeman .
Adapted from the Stephen King novella Rita Hayworth and Shawshank Redemption , the film  tells the स्टोरी of एंडी dufresne , a बैंकर जो खर्च nearly दो दशकों in shawshank राज्य थाना लिये the हत्या of उसके बीवी और उसके प्रेमी despite उसके दावा of innocence  .
During his time at the prison , he befriends a fellow inmate , Ellis Boyd `` Red '' Redding , and finds himself protected by  the गार्ड बाद the वार्डन begins using उसे in उसके धन laundering आपरेशन  .
Despite a lukewarm box office reception that barely recouped its budget , the film received favorable  समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों , अनेक पुरस्कार nominations , और रै चूंकि enjoyed a उल्लेखनीय  life on cable television , VHS , DVD , and Blu-ray .
It  थी शामिल in the अमरीकी फिल्मी संस्थान 's  100 Years ... 100 Movies 10th Anniversary Edition .
IT  प्रबन्धन is the अनुशासन whereby सब of the प्रौद्योगिकी संसाधन of  a firm are managed in accordance with its needs and priorities .
These resources may  शामिल ठोस निवेश जैसे कंप्यूटर हार्डवेयर , तन्त्र , आंकड़ा , संजाल और आंकड़ा केन्द्र सुविधाएं , as खूब as the staffs जो हैं नियुक्त  to maintain them .
Managing this responsibility within a company entails many of the  मौलिक प्रबन्धन कृत्यों , जैसे budgeting , स्टॉफ , और आयोजन और controlling , साथ साथ अन्य पहलुओं कि हैं अद्वितीय to प्रौद्योगिकी , जैसे बदलें  management , software design , network planning , tech support etc .
The Penitentiary of New Mexico Prison Riot , which took place on February 2 and 3  , 1980 , in the राज्य 's अधिकतम सुरक्षा थाना दक्षिण of सांता fe , थी एक of the सबसे हिंसक थाना दंगे in the इतिहास of the अमरीकी correctional  system : 33 inmates died and more than 200 inmates were treated for injuries .
None of the 12  अधिकारियों लिया बंधक यहूद मारे , लकिन सात यहूद treated लिये चोटों  caused by beatings and rapes .
This was the third major riot at the NM State  penitentiary , the पहला occurring on 19 जुलाई 1922 और the दूसरी on 15 जून 1953  .
लेखक रोजर मॉरिस suggests the मौत टोल may have महरूम उच्चतर , as a क्रमांक of लाशें यहूद incinerated  or dismembered during the course of the mayhem .
`` Red  कार्डिनल '' redirects  here .
For  the संयंत्र erythrina herbacea  , see Coral Bean .
The Northern Cardinal (  cardinalis cardinalis ) is a उत्तर अमरीकी बर्ड in the genus cardinalis ; it is भी ज्ञात colloquially  as the redbird or common cardinal .
it can be मिला in दक्षिणी कनाडा , through the पूर्वी संयुक्त राज्य इससे  Maine to Texas and south through Mexico .
It is found  in वुडलैंड्स , gardens , shrublands  , and swamps .
The  उत्तरी कार्डिनल is a mid-sized songbird साथ a देह लंबाई  of 21 centimeters ( 8.3 inches ) .
It has a distinctive crest on the head and a mask on  the फेस जिससे is ब्लैक in the पुरूष और धूसर in the मादा  .
The male is a  हर्षोल्लास रेड , जबकि the मादा is a फीकी  red-brown shade .
The  उत्तरी कार्डिनल is मुख्यतः granivorous , लकिन भी फ़ीड्स  on insects and fruit .
The male behaves  territorially , अंकन आउट उसके territory  with song .
During  प्रेमालाप , the पुरूष फ़ीड्स बीज to the  female beak-to-beak .
A clutch of three  to चार अंडे is रखी , और दो to चार चंगुल हैं  produced each year .
It was once prized  as a पालतु , लकिन इसके बिक्री as पिंजरा पक्षियों is अभी बैन in the संयुक्त  States by the Migratory Bird Treaty Act of 1918 .
Surface runoff , also  पुकारा nonpoint सोर्स प्रदूषण , इससे a फार्म फ़ील्ड in आयोवा दौरान  a rain storm .
Topsoil as well as farm  fertilizers और अन्य संभावित प्रदूषक चलाएं बंद unprotected फार्म फ़ील्ड  when heavy rains occur .
Topsoil is the upper ,  outermost परत of मृदा , प्रायः  the top to .
It has the highest concentration  of सशुल्क पदार्थ और microorganisms और is जहाँ सबसे of the धरती 's biological मृदा  activity occurs .
Musical cryptogram : ``  aschbeg '' नियत in schoenberg 's sechs kleine klavierstücke  , Op . 19 , no . 1 , m. 5 .
Note  कि the टीप do नहीं आइये in स्पेलिंग अनुक्रम लकिन हैं  all adjacent ( not separated by other notes ) .
Sechs kleine Klavierstücke ,  op . 19 ( or छह छोटी पियानो टुकड़े ) is a नियत of टुकड़े लिये सोलो पियानो लिखा by the आस्ट्रिया  composer Arnold Schoenberg , published in 1913 .
McAfee , Inc. ( ) is an American global computer security software  कम्पनी headquartered in सांता क्लारा , कैलिफ़ोर्निया , और the संसार 's largest समर्पित सुरक्षा  technology company .
As of  फ़रवरी 28 , 2011 , मैक्एफ़ी is a wholly  owned subsidiary of Intel .
McAfee 's competitors in the antivirus industry are Avira , BitDefender , BullGuard ,  f-secure , frisk , kaspersky , symantec , और ट्रेंड सूक्ष्म to  name a few .
Saint Rita of Cascia ( Born  margherita lotti 1381 - may 22 , 1457 ) थी an इतालवी augustinian नन , विधवा  and saint venerated in the Roman Catholic Church .
Rita was  शादीशुदा at an जल्दी  age .
The marriage lasted for 18 years , during  जिससे वो is remembered लिये उसके ईसाई मान as a मॉडल बीवी और माँ जो बना प्रयत्न to बदलें उसके  husband from his abusive behavior .
upon the हत्या of उसके husband by another feuding परिवार  , she sought to dissuade her sons from revenge .
She subsequently joined an Augustinian community of religious sisters ,  जहाँ वो थी ज्ञात लिये practicing mortification of the flesh , साथ साथ the apparent efficacy of  her prayers .
St. Rita is venerated due to various miracles attributed to her intercession , and is  प्रायः portrayed साथ a bleeding घाव on उसके माथे , जिससे the रोमन कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर दावा to have महरूम a आंशिक stigmata  .
The Roman  कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर , अंतर्गत the pontificate of पोप leo xiii officially canonized रीता on may  24 , 1900 , while her feast day is celebrated every May 22 .
In many pious Catholic countries ,  रीता is ज्ञात to be a patroness लिये abused पत्नियां और शोक  women .
North America is a continent wholly within the  उत्तरी गोलार्ध और लगभग wholly भीतर the पश्चिमी  Hemisphere .
It is also considered a northern  उपमहाद्वीप of the americas  .
It is bordered to the north by the Arctic Ocean , to the east by the Atlantic Ocean ,  to the वेस्ट और दक्षिण by the प्रशांत समंदर , और to the southeast by दक्षिण अमेरिका और the caribbean  Sea .
North America covers an area of about 24,709,000  वर्गाकार किलोमीटर ( 9,540,000 वर्गाकार मील ) , परिचय 4.8 % of the ग्रह 's सतह or  about 16.5 % of its land area .
As of July  2008 , इसके जनसांख्यिकी थी अनुमानित at nearly 529 लाख लोगों आरपार 23 स्वतंत्र राज्य  , representing about 7.5 % of the human population .
North America is the  third-largest महाद्वीप in क्षेत्रफल , following एशिया और अफ़्रीकी , और the चौथी in जनसांख्यिकी बाद  Asia , Africa , and Europe .
The first people to live in North  अमेरिका यहूद paleoindians जो began to arrive दौरान the पिछला glacial काल by क्रासिंग the  Bering land bridge .
They differentiated into a number of diverse cultures  और समुदायों आरपार the महाद्वीप  .
The largest and most advanced Pre-Columbian civilizations in  उत्तर अमेरिका यहूद the aztecs in कया is अभी मैक्सिको और the mayans in सेंट्रल  America .
यूरोपीय colonists began to arrive starting in the 16th और 17th सदियां , wiping  out large numbers of the native populations and beginning an era of European dominance .
Jermaine Lamarr Cole ( born January 28 , 1985 ) ,  बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम J. कोल , is an अमरीकी hip-hop रिकॉर्डिंग  artist and record producer from Fayetteville , North Carolina .
In 2009 , he  became the पहला कलाकार to चिह्न to jay-z 's आरओसी  Nation label .
His long-awaited  डेब्यू एल्बम , हकदार कोल संसार : the sideline स्टोरी , थी released on सितंबर  27 , 2011 .
The album debuted at number one on the US Billboard 200  , शीर्ष r & b एल्बम और शीर्ष रैप एल्बम चार्ट , selling अधिक than 218,000  in its first week .
he प्राप्त a नामांकन लिये बेहतरीन नई कलाकार  at the 54th Grammy Awards .
The two main  वर्ण of the श्रेणी , ratchet ( सही ) और  Clank ( left ) .
Ratchet &  clank is a श्रेणी of मंच वीडियो खेल  .
The franchise was created and developed by Insomniac Games and published by Sony Computer Entertainment for many different PlayStation consoles ,  ऐसे as प्लेस्टेशन 2 और प्लेस्टेशन 3 साथ the exclusion of आकार matters और रहस्य एजेंट clank , जिससे यहूद विकसित by ऊँची  Impact Games for the PlayStation Portable .
प्रत्येक खेल in the श्रेणी रै महरूम released लिये प्रत्येक कंसोल ,  as the IP is owned by Sony Computer Entertainment .
An animated feature film adaptation  उत्पादित by rainmaker entertainment और नाकेबंदी entertainment is अनुसूचित  for a theatrical release sometime in 2015 .
The games take place in a science fiction setting and follow the adventures of Ratchet ( an  animalistic human-like अक्षर ज्ञात as a lombax , जो is a मैकेनिक ) और clank ( a diminutive , sentient रोबोट ) as वे सफर through the ब्रह्मांड , छायांकन it इससे दुष्ट  forces on a regular basis .
The series is noted for the  समावेश of अनेक exotic और अद्वितीय , over the शीर्ष हथियार और डिवाइस , a अवधारणा  that Insomniac Games also expanded into their other games .
A will or testament is a legal declaration by which a  व्यक्ति , the testator , names एक or अधिक व्यक्तियों to मैनेज his/her  estate and provides for the transfer of his property at death .
For the  devolution of प्रॉपर्टी नहीं disposed of by होगा , देखिए उत्तराधिकार  and intestacy .
In the strictest sense , a `` will  '' रै historically महरूम सीमित to रियल प्रॉपर्टी जबकि `` वसीयत '' applies तभी to dispositions of निजी प्रॉपर्टी ( यूँ giving वृद्धि to the लोकप्रिय शीर्षक  of the document as `` Last Will and Testament '' ) , though this distinction is seldom observed today .
A will may  भी बनाएँ a testamentary विश्वास कि is प्रभावी  only after the death of the testator .
The 19.9 MW Gemasolar solar plant in Spain  सुविधाएँ 15 घंटों of भंडार और can सप्लाई शक्ति 24  hours a day .
Solar energy , radiant light and heat  इससे the सूर्य , रै महरूम harnessed by इंसानो चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स using a दायरा of ever-evolving technologies  .
Solar energy  technologies शामिल सौर हीटिंग , सौर photovoltaics , सौर थर्मल विद्युत , सौर वास्तुकला और कृत्रिम photosynthesis , जिससे  can make considerable contributions to solving some of the most urgent energy problems the world now faces .
Solar technologies  हैं broadly characterized as either passive सौर or क्रियाशील सौर depending on  the way they capture , convert and distribute solar energy .
Active solar techniques include the  उपयोग of photovoltaic panels और सौर थर्मल collectors  to harness the energy .
Passive solar techniques include  orienting a भवन to the सूर्य , selecting सामग्री साथ अनुकूल थर्मल द्रव्यमान or लाइट dispersing  properties , and designing spaces that naturally circulate air .
In 2011 ,  the अंतरराष्ट्रीय उर्जा एजेंसी कहा कि `` the विकास of सस्ती , inexhaustible और  clean solar energy technologies will have huge longer-term benefits .
It will increase countries’ energy security through reliance on an indigenous , inexhaustible  और ज़्यादातर import-independent संसाधन , बढ़ाएँ स्थिरता , reduce प्रदूषण , निम्नतर the लागत of mitigating जलवायु बदलें , और रखना चट्टान ईंधन कीमतें  lower than otherwise .
ये लाभ  are global .
Hence the additional costs of the  प्रोत्साहन लिये जल्दी deployment चाहिए be माना सीखना निवेश ;  they must be wisely spent and need to be widely shared '' .
सर थामस अधिक ( ; 7 फ़रवरी 14786 जुलाई 1535 ) , ज्ञात to रोमन catholics as संत थामस अधिक चूंकि 1935 , थी an  English lawyer , social philosopher , author , statesman , and noted Renaissance humanist .
He was an  महत्वपूर्ण पार्षद to हेनरी viii of इंग्लैण्ड और थी रब  Chancellor from October 1529 to 16 May 1532 .
He was canonized by  पोप पायस xi in 1935 as एक of the जल्दी शहीदो of the schism कि अलग the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड इससे  Rome in the 16th century .
In 2000 , Pope John Paul  ii घोषित उसे संरक्षक of कैथोलिक कूटनीतिज्ञों और राजनेता  .
More was an opponent of the Protestant  reformation , in particular of मार्टिन लूथर और विलियम  Tyndale .
However , since 1980 , he is also  commemorated by the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड as a reformation  martyr .
More coined the word `` utopia `` – a  नाम he दिया to the आदर्श और काल्पनिक द्वीप स्वदेश , the राजनैतिक प्रणाली of जिससे he  described in Utopia , published in 1516 .
He opposed the King 's separation from the Roman  कैथोलिक गिरिजाघर और refused to accept उसे as परम् सिर of the गिरिजाघर of इंग्लैण्ड , a शीर्षक जिससे था महरूम दिए by पार्लियामेंट through  the Act of Supremacy of 1534 .
He was  imprisoned in 1534 लिये उसके refusal to लो the शपथ जरूरी by the पहला उत्तराधिकार अधिनियम  , because the act disparaged Papal Authority and Henry’s marriage to Catherine of Aragon .
In 1535 , he was tried for  देशद्रोह , convicted on perjured गवाही  , and beheaded .
More also  helped to originate the phrase `` grasp at लोभी '' to औसत `` शिद्दत trying भी व्यर्थ बाते '' , in उसके संवाद of सुकून  Against Tribulation .
Intellectuals  और कूटनीतिज्ञों आरपार यूरोपीय यहूद दंग by अधिक 's  execution .
Erasmus saluted him as one `` whose soul was more pure than any snow , whose genius was  ऐसे कि इंग्लैण्ड never था और never again होगा have इसके जैसे  '' .
There was a more controversial  पक्ष to अधिक 's जीवन , क्युकी he advocated the persecution और निष्पादन  of Protestants who refused to recant their faith .
however , the निर्णय of इतिहास रै महरूम largely willing to forgive इस in लाइट of the टाइम्स he  lived in and his martyrdom in the Roman Catholic cause .
Two centuries later Jonathan Swift said More was `` the person of  the महानतम पुण्य इस किंगडम कभी उत्पादित '' , a भावना साथ जिससे सैमुएल  Johnson agreed .
Historian Hugh Trevor-Roper said in 1977 that More was `` the first great Englishman whom we  महसूस कि we जान , the सबसे saintly of humanists , the सबसे इंसान of संतो , the सार्वभौमिक man of हमारी कूल उत्तरी पुनर्जागरण . ''
Captain Nemo  , भी ज्ञात as प्रिंस dakkar , is a fictional अक्षर invented  by the French science fiction author Jules Verne .
Nemo appears in two of Verne 's novels , Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea ( 1870 ) and The Mysterious Island ( 1874 ) ,  और makes a कैमियो रूप in वर्न 's खेल यात्रा through the नामुमकिन ( 1882  ) .
Nemo , one of  the सबसे प्रसिद्ध antiheroes in fiction  , is a mysterious figure .
The son of an Indian Raja , he is a scientific genius who roams the depths of the sea in his  पनडुब्बी , the नॉटिलस , जिससे थी निर्मित on a उजाड़ द्वीप  .
Nemo tries to project a stern ,  नियंत्रित विश्वास , लकिन he is चलित by a प्यास लिये प्रतिशोध और a द्वेष of साम्राज्यवाद ( विशेषकर the  British Empire ) .
He is also wracked by remorse  over the मौतों of उसके क्रू सदस्यों और भी by the मौतों of दुश्मन  sailors .
Nemo has appeared in  विभिन्न adaptations of वर्न 's novels , सहित films , जहाँ  he has been portrayed by a number of different actors .
He has furthermore been adopted by other  लेखक लिये समावेश in उनके novels , सबसे notably in एलन मूर 's the लीग of असाधारण सज्जनों और फिलिप जोस  Farmer 's The Other Log of Phileas Fogg .
Listed below  हैं the प्रमुख लीग बेसबॉल टीमों साथ the बेहतरीन ऋतु  won-lost records in history , as determined by winning percentage ( .700 or better ) , minimum 120 games played .
ध्वनिक coupler  modem
A modem ( modulator-demodulator ) is a device that modulates an  एनालॉग वाहक सिग्नल to encode डिजिटल सूचना , और भी demodulates ऐसे a वाहक सिग्नल to  decode the transmitted information .
The goal is to  उपज a सिग्नल कि can be transmitted easily और decoded  to reproduce the original digital data .
Modems can be  प्रयुक्त over कोई अर्थात् of transmitting एनालॉग सिग्नल , इससे  light emitting diodes to radio .
The most familiar example is a voice band modem that turns the  डिजिटल आंकड़ा of a निजी कंप्यूटर into modulated विद्युत सिग्नल in the आवाज़ आवृत्ति दायरा  of a telephone channel .
These signals can be transmitted over telephone  लाइनों और demodulated by another मॉडेम at the receiver पक्ष to रिकवर the डिजिटल  data .
Modems are generally classified by the  राशि of आंकड़ा वे can भेजें in a दिए ईकाई of समय , प्रायः expressed in बिट्स प्रति दूसरी ( bit/s  , or bps ) , or bytes per second ( B/s ) .
Modems can  alternatively be वर्गीकृत by उनके प्रतीक  rate , measured in baud .
The baud  ईकाई denotes प्रतीकों प्रति दूसरी , or the क्रमांक  of times per second the modem sends a new signal .
For example ,  the itu v.21 मानक प्रयुक्त ऑडियो आवृत्ति शिफ़्ट keying साथ दो संभावित बारंबारता  corresponding to two distinct symbols ( or one bit per symbol ) , to carry 300 bits per second using 300 baud .
By contrast , the original ITU V.22 standard , which was able to transmit and receive  चार पृथक प्रतीकों ( दो बिट्स प्रति प्रतीक ) , संभाला 1,200 bit/s by sending 600 प्रतीकों प्रति दूसरी  ( 600 baud ) using phase shift keying .
The  घोषणा of स्वतंत्रता is a बयान अपनाया by the महाद्वीपीय कॉंग्रेस on जुलाई 4 , 1776 , जिससे घोषित  that the thirteen American colonies , then at war with Great Britain , regarded themselves as independent states , and no longer a part of the British Empire .
बजाय वे अभी formed a नई nation—the  United States of America .
John Adams was a leader in pushing for  स्वतंत्रता , जिससे थी unanimously स्वीकृत  on July 2 .
A committee had  already drafted the औपचारिक घोषणा , to  be ready when congress voted on independence .
Adams  persuaded the कमेटी to चुनें थामस जेफरसन to लिखें the असली ड्राफ्ट of the दस्तावेज़  , which congress would edit to produce the final version .
The Declaration  थी ultimately a औपचारिक स्पष्टीकरण of क्यों कॉंग्रेस था voted on जुलाई 2 to घोषित स्वतंत्रता इससे ग्रेट  Britain , more than a year after the outbreak of the American Revolutionary War .
The national birthday , the Independence Day is  मनाये on जुलाई 4 , हालांकि  Adams wanted July 2 .
After  ratifying the टेक्स्ट on जुलाई 4 , कॉंग्रेस जारी  the Declaration of Independence in several forms .
It was initially published as the printed Dunlap broadside that  थी widely वितरित और पढ़ा to the पब्लिक  .
The most famous version of the  घोषणा , a हस्ताक्षरित नक़ल कि is popularly regarded as the  Declaration of Independence , is displayed at the National Archives in Washington , D.C .
Although  the wording of the घोषणा थी स्वीकृत on जुलाई 4 , the तिथि  of its signing was August 2 .
The original July 4 United States Declaration of  स्वतंत्रता पाण्डुलिपि थी खोया जबकि सब अन्य नक़ल have  been derived from this original document .
The sources and interpretation of the  घोषणा have महरूम the विषय of much scholarly  inquiry .
The Declaration justified the  स्वतंत्रता of the संयुक्त राज्य by लिस्टिंग औपनिवेशिक grievances विरूद्ध किंग जार्ज iii , और by asserting निश्चित प्राकृतिक और विधिक अधिकारों , सहित a सही of क्रान्ति  .
Having served its original purpose in  announcing स्वतंत्रता , the टेक्स्ट of the घोषणा थी initially  ignored after the American Revolution .
Since  तब , it रै आइये to be माना a प्रमुख बयान  on human rights , particularly its second sentence:
We hold these truths to be self-evident ,  कि सब मेन हैं निर्मित बराबर , कि वे हैं endowed by उनके निर्माता साथ निश्चित unalienable अधिकारों , कि among ये  are Life , Liberty and the pursuit of Happiness .
This has been called `` one of the  best-known वाक्य in the अंग्रेज़ी भाषा '' , containing `` the सबसे potent और consequential  words in American history . ''
The passage  आए to represent a moral मानक to जिससे the संयुक्त राज्य  should strive .
This view was  notably प्रचारित by अब्राहम lincoln , जो माना the घोषणा to be the न्यास of उसके राजनैतिक  philosophy , and argued that the Declaration is a statement of principles through which the United States Constitution should be interpreted .
It has inspired work  लिये the अधिकारों of अधिकारहीन लोगों throughout the  world .
The  अर्थव्यवस्था of ग्रीनलैंड can be characterized as छोटी  , mixed and vulnerable .
The present economy consists of a big public sector and comprehensive foreign trade  , जिससे रै resulted in an अर्थव्यवस्था साथ अवधि of दमदार विकास , considerable महंगाई , बेरोजगारी समस्याएं और चरम dependence on  capital inflow from Denmark and use of outside , mainly Danish , skilled labor .
GDP per capita is similar to  the औसत यूरोपीय economies लकिन the अर्थव्यवस्था is critically निर्भर upon substantial support इससे the डैनिश सरकारी , जिससे आपूर्तियाँ परिचय हाफ the revenues of  the home rule government who in turn employ about 8,000 Greenlanders out of a labor force of 40,156 ( Jan. 2012 ) .
Unemployment nonetheless remains high , with the rest of  the अर्थव्यवस्था निर्भर upon माँग लिये निर्यात of  shrimp and fish .
Hydrogen is a  रासायनिक तत्व साथ प्रतीक h और परमाणु  number 1 .
With an atomic weight of ( for hydrogen-1 ) , hydrogen is the lightest element and its monatomic form ( H1 ) is the  सबसे abundant रासायनिक पदार्थ , constituting roughly 75 % of the ब्रह्मांड 's baryonic  mass .
Non- remnant stars  हैं मुख्यतः रचित of हाइड्रोजन  in its plasma state .
At standard temperature and  दबाव , हाइड्रोजन is a colorless , गंधहीन , tasteless , non-toxic , nonmetallic  , highly combustible diatomic gas with the molecular formula H2 .
Most of the hydrogen on  धरती is in अणुओं ऐसे as जल और सशुल्क यौगिकों क्युकी हाइड्रोजन readily फ़ॉर्म  covalent compounds with most non-metallic elements .
Hydrogen plays  a विशेषकर महत्वपूर्ण भूमिका in acid-base रसायन साथ अनेक प्रतिक्रियाएँ exchanging  protons between soluble molecules .
In  ionic यौगिकों , it can लो a ऋणात्मक चार्ज ( an anion ज्ञात as a हाइड्राइड और लिखा as h−  ) , or as a positively charged species H+ .
The latter cation is written  as हालांकि रचित of a bare प्रोटॉन , लकिन in वास्तविकता , हाइड्रोजन cations in ionic  compounds always occur as more complex species .
The most common isotope of  हाइड्रोजन is protium ( नाम rarely प्रयुक्त , प्रतीक 1h ) साथ a सिंगल प्रोटॉन  and no neutrons .
As the simplest atom known , the  हाइड्रोजन अणु रै महरूम of सैद्धांतिक उपयोग  .
For example , as the only neutral atom with an analytic solution to the Schrödinger  समीकरण , the पढ़ाई of the energetics और संबंध of the हाइड्रोजन अणु निभाई a कुंजी भूमिका in the विकास of क्वांटम यांत्रिकी  .
Hydrogen gas was first  artificially उत्पादित in the जल्दी 16th सदी , via the  mixing of metals with acids .
In 1766–81 , Henry Cavendish was the first to recognize that hydrogen gas was a discrete  पदार्थ , और कि it produces जल जब burned , a प्रॉपर्टी जिससे बाद दिया it इसके नाम : in यूनानी , हाइड्रोजन अर्थात्  `` water-former '' .
Industrial production is mainly  इससे the भाप reforming of प्राकृतिक गैस , और कम प्रायः इससे अधिक energy-intensive हाइड्रोजन उत्पादन विधि  like the electrolysis of water .
Most hydrogen is employed near its production  साईट , साथ the दो largest उपयोग होने चट्टान ईंधन प्रसंस्करण ( e.g. , hydrocracking ) और अमोनिया उत्पादन , ज़्यादातर लिये the  fertilizer market .
Hydrogen is a  चिंता in metallurgy as it can embrittle अनेक धातुओं , complicating the डिज़ाइन of pipelines  and storage tanks .
Unstoppable is a 2010  अमरीकी कार्रवाई थ्रिलर फिल्मी निर्देशित by टोनी स्कॉट , लिखा by चिह्नित bomback  , and starring Denzel Washington and Chris Pine .
The film , loosely  आधारित on the real-life csx 8888 घटना , tells the स्टोरी of a runaway भाड़ा ट्रैन , और the दो  men ( Washington and Pine ) who manage to stop it .
It was  स्कॉट 's फाइनल विशेषता फिल्मी पहले  his death in 2012 .
The film was released in  the संयुक्त राज्य और कनाडा on नवम्बर 12 , 2010 , और in the संयुक्त किंगडम  on November 24 , 2010 .
It received mostly favorable reviews from film critics ; it garnered a ``  certified भैस '' दरजा on सड़े टमाटर आधारित upon समग्र समीक्षाएँ और a दरजा of `` generally  favorable reviews '' at Metacritic .
The film  थी मनोनीत लिये an अकादमी पुरस्कार लिये बेहतरीन ध्वनि संपादन at  the 83rd Academy Awards , but lost to Inception .
In photography , bracketing is the general technique of taking  अनेक गोलियाँ of the वही विषय using अलग कैमरा जमावट  .
Bracketing is useful and often  अनुशंसित in परिस्थितियों कि मेक it मुश्किल to obtain a संतोषजनक चित्र साथ a सिंगल शॉट , विशेषकर जब a छोटी विभिन्नता in  exposure parameters has a comparatively large effect on the resulting image .
Autobracketing is automatic bracketing by using a setting on the camera to take several  bracketed गोलियाँ ( in कंट्रास्ट to the फ़ोटोग्राफ़र altering the जमावट by हाथ between प्रत्येक शॉट  ) .
दिए the समय it takes to accomplish अनेक गोलियाँ , it is typically , लकिन नहीं सदा  , used for static subjects .
Insulated glazing ( IG ) , more commonly known as double glazing ( or double-pane , and increasingly triple glazing/pane )  हैं दोगुना or ट्रिपल कांच खिड़की panes अलग by an एयर or अन्य गैस भर स्पेस to reduce ऊष्मा ट्रांसफ़र आरपार a भाग of  the building envelope .
insulated कांच इकाई हैं manufactured साथ कांच in दायरा of मोटाई इससे 3 mm  to 10 mm or more in special applications .
Laminated or  tempered कांच may भी be प्रयुक्त as भाग of the  construction .
Most units are  manufactured साथ the वही मोटाई of कांच प्रयुक्त on दोनो panes लकिन खास अनुप्रयोग ऐसे as ध्वनिक क्षीणन or सुरक्षा may आवश्यकता  wide ranges of thicknesses to be incorporated in the same unit .
A sectioned diagram of a fixed Insulated  चमकीले ईकाई ( igu ) , indicating the क्रमांकन सम्मेलन प्रयुक्त in इस आलेख  .
Surface # 1 is facing outside , Surface # 2 is the inside  सतह of the exterior फलक , सतह # 3 is the बाहर सतह of the आंतरिक फलक , और सतह # 4 is  the inside surface of interior pane .
the खिड़की फ़्रेम is labelled # 5 , a spacer is indicated as # 6 , seals हैं दिखाया in रेड ( # 7 ) , the आतंरिक खुलासा  is on the right hand side ( # 8 ) and the exterior windowsill on the left ( # 9 )
To reduce shear effects on the sealed unit ( a major cause of  असामयिक विफलता ) , निर्माताओं उपयोग a नियम of अंगूठा कि permits a अंतर of 1 mm between the मोटाई of the  panes of glass used in the unit and still maintain the warranty for the unit .
For example , a unit may be  ordered साथ a 4 mm फलक on the exterior और a 3 mm फलक on the आंतरिक  .
ये विसंगतियाँ हैं अनुमत लिये architectural  and cost reasons .
Other combinations can be specified and produced but the manufacturer  may आरक्षित the सही to सीमा the पद of the वारंटी or इंकार to वारंटी  the unit altogether .
For ease of description the surfaces of a double paned unit are named according to the following convention :  सतह # 1 ( facing बाहर ) , सतह # 2 ( अंदर of बाहर फलक ) , सतह # 3 ( बाहर of अंदर फलक ) और सतह # 4 ( अंदर सतह  of inside pane ) .
Applying the corresponding  नामकरण लिये ट्रिपल paned इकाई परिणाम in सतहों # 1 through  # 6 .
