सेलेनियम is a रासायनिक तत्व साथ प्रतीक  Se and atomic number 34 .
It is a  अधातु साथ गुण कि हैं इंटरमीडिएट between those of इसके आवधिक तालिका column-adjacent  chalcogen elements sulfur and tellurium .
It rarely occurs  in इसके elemental राज्य in प्रकृति , or as pure अयस्क यौगिकों  .
Selenium ( Greek σελήνη selene meaning `` Moon '' ) was discovered in 1817 by Jöns Jacob Berzelius , who noted the similarity  of the नई तत्व to the previously-known tellurium ( नामित लिये the धरती )  .
Selenium is found impurely in  मेटल sulfide ores , जहाँ it partially replaces the गंधक  .
Commercially ,  सेलेनियम is उत्पादित as a byproduct in the शोधन  of these ores , most often during copper production .
Minerals that  हैं pure selenide or selenate यौगिकों  are known , but are rare .
the मुख्य वाणिज्यिक उपयोग लिये सेलेनियम आज हैं  in glassmaking and in pigments .
Selenium is a  सेमीकंडक्टर और is प्रयुक्त in  photocells .
Uses in electronics , once important ,  have महरूम ज़्यादातर supplanted by सिलिकॉन  semiconductor devices .
Selenium continues to be used in a few types of DC power surge  protectors और एक प्रकार of fluorescent  quantum dot .
Selenium salts  हैं विषाक्त in विशाल amounts , लकिन ट्रेस amounts हैं जरुरी लिये  cellular function in many organisms , including all animals .
Selenium is a component of the antioxidant enzymes glutathione peroxidase and  thioredoxin reductase ( जिससे indirectly reduce निश्चित oxidized अणुओं in पशु और  some plants ) .
It  is भी मिला in तीन deiodinase एंजाइमों , जिससे बदलें एक थायराइड  hormone to another .
Selenium requirements in plants differ by  प्रजाति , साथ कुछ पौधे requiring अपेक्षाकृत विशाल amounts , और अन्य जाहिर requiring  none .
The United States presidential  चुनाव of 2008 थी the 56th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय  election .
It was  आयोजित on मंगलवार , नवम्बर 4 ,  2008 .
डेमोक्रेट बराक ओबामा , तब the जूनियर सीनेटर इससे इलिनोइस  , defeated Republican John McCain , the senior Senator from Arizona .
As the  अभियान progressed , the युद्ध in इराकी और outgoing रिपब्लिकन अध्यक्ष जार्ज W. बुश  had become increasingly unpopular , and the major-party candidates ran on a platform of change and reform .
Domestic policy and the economy eventually emerged as the main themes in  the पिछला few महीने of the चुनाव अभियान बाद the onset of the worst मंदी चूंकि the 1930s  .
Obama would  go on to जीत a निर्णायक विजय over मैक्केन in दोनो the चुनावी  and popular vote .
Obama received the most votes for a  अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी in अमरीकी इतिहास , और जीती the लोकप्रिय और चुनावी vote by the largest हाशिया in 12 सालो , as खूब as the largest प्रतिशत  of the popular vote for a Democrat in nearly a half-century .
This was the first U.S. presidential  चुनाव in जिससे an अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी थी निर्वाचित , having भी महरूम the पहला in जिससे an अफ़्रीकी अमरीकी जीती the नामांकन  of either major party .
This election was also notable for being the first time in U.S. history that both major  पार्टी उम्मीदवार यहूद बैठे u.s . सीनेटरों , तभी the तीसरा समय ( बाद 1920 और 1960 ) कि कोई बैठे u.s . सीनेटर थी निर्वाचित अध्यक्ष , और तभी the दूसरी समय कि  the winning President and Vice President ( Obama and Biden ) were both sitting U.S . Senators .
This was also the  पहला चुनाव चूंकि 1952 in जिससे neither of the प्रमुख पार्टियों  ' nominees was the incumbent President or Vice President .
The Sovereign Prince or Princess of Monaco is  the reigning monarch और सिर of राज्य of the principality of  Monaco .
All princes or princesses have officially  लिया the नाम of the हाउस of grimaldi , लकिन have belonged to विभिन्न अन्य घरों ( goyon de matignon  , Polignac ) in male line .
The  reigning प्रिंस is अल्बर्ट  II .
Visualization of  fragmentation और तब of defragmentation
In the maintenance of file systems , defragmentation  is a प्रक्रम कि reduces the राशि of fragmentation  .
It does this by physically organizing the contents of the mass  भंडार यंत्र प्रयुक्त to स्टोर फाइलें into the smallest क्रमांक of संलग्न  regions ( fragments ) .
It also attempts to create larger regions of free space using  compaction to impede the वापसी of fragmentation .
Some defragmentation utilities try  to रखना छोटी फाइलें भीतर a सिंगल निर्देशिका साथ , as वे हैं प्रायः  accessed in sequence .
defragmentation is लाभदायक और प्रासंगिक to संचिका प्रणालियों on electromechanical  disk drives .
The movement of the hard drive 's read/write heads over different areas of the disk when accessing  fragmented फाइलें is धीमा , compared to accessing the संपूर्ण सामग्री of a non-fragmented संचिका sequentially बगैर चलती  the read/write heads to seek other fragments .
a service-level अनुबंध ( sla ) is a भाग of a सेवा  contract where a service is formally defined .
In practice , the term SLA is sometimes used to refer to the  contracted डिलीवरी समय ( of the सेवा or प्रदर्शन ) .
As an example , internet service providers  होगा commonly शामिल सेवा स्तर समझौतों भीतर the शर्तें of उनके अनुबंध साथ ग्राहक to define the स्तर ( s  ) of service being sold in plain language terms .
In this case the SLA will typically have a technical definition in terms of mean  समय between असफलताओं ( mtbf ) , औसत समय to मरम्मत or औसत समय to रिकवरी ( mttr ) ;  various data rates ; throughput ; jitter ; or similar measurable details .
Union  स्टेशन is a पूर्व खरीदारी मॉल in संघ नगर , जॉर्जिया , in दक्षिणपश्चिम  metro Atlanta adjacent to Interstate 85 .
After new ownership  और renovations in 2006 , the नाम थी बदला इससे शैनन southpark  Mall in 2007 to Union Station Mall .
A previous  नवीकरण थी किया in the लेट  1990s .
the मॉल रै महरूम बंद चूंकि  November 2010 .
This map shows the contiguous  संयुक्त राज्य और , in insets at the निम्नतर बाएँ , the दो  states that are not contiguous .
The contiguous United States are the 48 adjoining U.S. states on the continent  of उत्तर अमेरिका कि हैं दक्षिण of कनाडा और उत्तर of मैक्सिको , प्लस the ज़िला  of Columbia .
The term  excludes the राज्य of अलास्का और हवाई , और सब off-shore u.S. territories  and possessions , such as Puerto Rico .
साथ , the 48 संलग्न राज्य और d.C. occupy a संयुक्त क्षेत्रफल of , जिससे  is 1.58 % of the total surface area of the Earth .
Of  इस , is जमीन , composing 83.65 % of  U.S. land area .
Officially , is water area ,  composing 62.66 % of the स्वदेश 's जल क्षेत्रफल  .
The 2010 census population was 306,675,006 , composing 99.33 % of the nation 's  जनसांख्यिकी , और a घनत्व of 103.639 inhabitants/sq mi ( 40.015/km2 ) , compared to 87.264/sq mi ( 33.692/km2  ) for the nation as a whole .
`` Why ''  is the शीर्षक of a सोंग  recorded by American country band Rascal Flatts .
It is  the तीसरा सिंगल इससे उनके छठे स्टुडियो  album , Unstoppable .
It was released to radio stations  on सितंबर 29 , 2009 और debuted at # 44 on the u.s . बिलबोर्ड us बिलबोर्ड hot देश  Songs chart for the week of October 10 , 2009 .
It was  लिखा by रोब mathes और एलन  Shamblin .
Utilization management is the evaluation of the appropriateness , medical need and efficiency of health care services procedures and  सुविधाएं according to स्थापित मापदण्ड or दिशानिर्देश और अंतर्गत the प्रावधानों of an लागू  health benefits plan .
Typically  it शामिल नई क्रियाएँ or निर्णय आधारित  upon the analysis of a case .
Utilization management describes  proactive प्रक्रियाओं , सहित निर्वहन नियोजन , संयुक्त नियोजन , pre-certification  and clinical case appeals .
It also covers proactive processes , such as concurrent  नैदानिक समीक्षाएँ और पीर समीक्षाएँ , as खूब as appeals introduced by the प्रदाता  , payer or patient .
As  pre-certification और संयुक्त पुनर्विलोकन of मामले grew , utilization  management spun out of utilization review .
While not synonymous , health care  पेशेवर tend to उपयोग the शर्तें as interchangeable  .
The difference is utilization management is and intends to  मैनेज स्वास्थ्य परवाह मामले efficiently और लागत effectively पहले और दौरान  health care administration .
Utilization review is more considering  whether स्वास्थ्य परवाह थी appropriately लागू बाद it थी  administered .
There are four  मौलिक तकनीकों in utilization management:
माँग प्रबन्धन
utilization  Review
मामला प्रबन्धन
बीमारी प्रबन्धन
The Outsiders  is a coming-of-age अनोखा by S. E. hinton  , first published in 1967 by Viking Press .
Hinton was 15 when she started writing the novel  , लकिन किया सबसे of the कार्य जब वो थी सोलह  and a junior in high school .
Hinton was 18 when the  किताब थी प्रकाशित  .
The book follows two rival groups , the Greasers and the Socs (  सुनाया by the लेखक as , छोटी लिये socials ) , जो हैं विभाजित  by their socioeconomic status .
The  किताब takes प्लेस in तुलसा , ओक्लाहोमा , in  1965 , but it is never stated in the book .
A film adaptation was produced in 1983  , और a little-known short-lived टेलीविज़न श्रेणी appeared in 1990 , picking  up where the movie left off .
The United States  हाउस of प्रतिनिधि is एक of the दो घरों of the संयुक्त राज्य कॉंग्रेस  ( a bicameral legislature ) .
It is frequently  referred to as the हाउस  .
The  अन्य हाउस is the  Senate .
The  संयोजन और शक्तियां of the हाउस हैं स्थापित in आलेख  One of the United States Constitution .
The major power of the House is to pass federal legislation that affects  the संपूर्ण देश हालांकि इसके बिल्स जरूर भी be passed by the सीनेट और further सहमत to by the u.S. अध्यक्ष पहले बनने विधि ( जबतक दोनो the हाउस और  Senate re-pass the legislation with a two-thirds majority in each chamber ) .
The House has several exclusive powers : the power to initiate revenue bills , to  impeach officials , और to elect the u.S. अध्यक्ष in मामला वहीँ is no बहुमत in the चुनावी कॉलेज  .
प्रत्येक u.S. राज्य is represented in the हाउस in proportion to इसके जनसांख्यिकी लकिन is  entitled to at least one representative .
The most populous state ,  कैलिफ़ोर्निया , फिलहाल रै 53 प्रतिनिधि  .
The total  क्रमांक of मतदान प्रतिनिधि is फिक्स्ड by विधि  at 435 .
Each representative  serves लिये a two-year पद  .
The Speaker of the  संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि , जो presides over the कक्ष , is निर्वाचित by the सदस्यों of the हाउस , और is इसलिए traditionally the नेता of the हाउस  Democratic Caucus or the House Republican Conference , whichever party has more voting members .
The House meets in the south  wing of the संयुक्त राज्य कैपिटल  .
A  सप्लाई कड़ी is दरअसल a जटिल और डायनेमिक सप्लाई और माँग  network .
( cf .  wieland/wallenburg  , 2011 )
A supply chain is a  प्रणाली of संगठन , लोगों , क्रियाएँ , सूचना , और संसाधन शामिल in चलती a उत्पाद  or service from supplier to customer .
Supply  कड़ी क्रियाएँ रूपांतरण प्राकृतिक संसाधन , कच्चा सामग्री , और components  into a finished product that is delivered to the end customer .
in sophisticated सप्लाई कड़ी प्रणालियों , प्रयुक्त उत्पाद may  re-enter the supply chain at any point where residual value is recyclable .
Supply  जंजीरों कड़ी मान जंजीरों  .
`` Purple Haze '' is  a सोंग लिखा और अंकित by जिमि हेंड्रिक्स in 1967 , released as the दूसरी सिंगल by the जिमि हेंड्रिक्स  Experience in both the United Kingdom and the United States .
It  बाद appeared on the अमरीकी संस्करण of the बैंड  's 1967 album Are You Experienced .
`` Purple Haze  '' रै become एक of the `` archetypical साइकेडेलिक  drug songs of the sixties '' .
`` Purple Haze 's ''  गिटार virtuosic तकनीकों होता be emulated by अनेक  metal guitarists .
A close up  चित्र of a गैंडा स्किन  .
Skin is the soft  बाहरी covering of vertebrates  .
Other animal coverings  ऐसे as the सन्धिपाद बहि have अलग developmental उत्पत्ति , ढांचा  and chemical composition .
The adjective  cutaneous अर्थात् `` of the स्किन '' ( इससे लैटिन  cutis , skin ) .
In mammals , the skin is the largest organ  of the integumentary प्रणाली बना up of अनेक परतों of ectodermal ऊतक , और गार्ड the underlying  muscles , bones , ligaments and internal organs .
Skin of a different nature exists  in amphibians , सरीसृपों , और पक्षियों  .
All mammals have  कुछ बाल on उनके स्किन , भी समुद्री स्तनधारियों  which appear to be hairless .
The skin  अंतरफलक साथ the पर्यावरण और is the पहला लकीर of  defense from external factors .
For example , the skin plays a key role  in protecting the देह विरूद्ध pathogens और excessive  water loss .
Its other functions are  इन्सुलेशन , तापमान विनियमन , सनसनी , और the उत्पादन  of vitamin D folates .
Severely damaged skin  may चंगा by forming scar ऊतक  .
This is  sometimes discoloured और depigmented  .
The thickness  of स्किन भी varies इससे स्थान to स्थान on an  organism .
In humans for example , the skin located under the eyes and around the eyelids is the  thinnest स्किन in the देह at 0.5 mm मोटा , और is एक of the पहला क्षेत्रों to दिखाएँ लक्षण of वृद्धावस्था ऐसे  as `` crows feet '' and wrinkles .
The skin on the palms and  the सोल्स of the फीट is 4 mm मोटा और the thickest स्किन  in the body .
फर is घना बाल  .
Primarily , fur augments the  इन्सुलेशन the स्किन provides लकिन can भी serve as a द्वितीयक यौन characteristic  or as camouflage .
On some animals  , the स्किन is बहुत मुश्किल और मोटा , और  can be processed to create leather .
Reptiles and fish have hard protective scales on their skin  लिये सुरक्षा , और पक्षियों have मुश्किल feathers , सब बना of मुश्किल β- keratins  .
Amphibian skin is not a strong  अवरोध to ड्योढ़ी of रसायन और is प्रायः विषय to परासरण और diffusive  forces .
For example , a frog  बैठे in an anesthetic समाधान होता be sedated जल्दी , as the रासायनिक diffuses  through its skin .
थामस स्कॉट
The Rev . Thomas Scott ( 1747-1821 ) was an influential preacher and author who is  प्रधानतया ज्ञात लिये उसके best-selling कार्य a commentary on the पूरे बाइबल और the फ़ोर्स of सच्चाई  , and as one of the founders of the Church Missionary Society .
डेनियल radcliffe , जो portrays हैरी कुम्हार , रै महरूम the  icon of the film series since the release of the first film in 2001 .
Some of the most renowned actors of the United Kingdom and Ireland  have voiced or portrayed वर्ण appearing in the हैरी कुम्हार फिल्मी श्रेणी आधारित on the किताब श्रेणी by J. K. रोलिंग  .

जब वे यहूद डाल तभी  Radcliffe had previously acted in a film .
Complementing them on screen are such actors as Helena Bonham  कार्टर , जिम broadbent , जॉन cleese , रोबी coltrane , warwick डेविस , ralph fiennes , माइकल gambon , ब्रेंडन gleeson , रिचर्ड ग्रीफिथ , रिचर्ड हैरिस , जॉन ठेस , जेसन isaacs , miriam margolyes , हेलेन mccrory , गेरी oldman , एलन rickman ,  Fiona Shaw , Maggie Smith , Timothy Spall , Imelda Staunton , David Thewlis , Emma Thompson , and Julie Walters , among others .
तेरह अभिनेताओं have appeared as the वही अक्षर in सब  eight films of the franchise .
Some  well-known अंग्रेजों अभिनेताओं जो have नहीं appeared in the  series , are asked in jest why they have not been cast .
When David Yates was directing the fifth film , Bill Nighy , who had previously collaborated with Yates on three of his television projects  , कहा कि he joked साथ येट्स कि संभवतः अभी he होता n't be the तभी कर्ता in इंग्लैण्ड जो था n't महरूम in हैरी  Potter .
`` But nobody  पुकारा '' , nighy added .
But in 2009  , येट्स डाल nighy as मंत्री of जादू rufus scrimgeour  in Deathly Hallows .
Nighy said  , `` i am no longer the तभी अंग्रेज़ी कर्ता  not to be in Harry Potter and I am very pleased . ''
Jude Law has quipped  , `` nobody 's पूछा me  .
I was  a बिट too बूढ़ा लिये हैरी ''  .
When a reporter compared potions professor Horace Slughorn 's obsession with famous names to the series ' connection to `` every  notable अंग्रेजों कर्ता , '' जिम broadbent , जो plays slughorn कहा , `` खूब , नहीं प्रत्येक कर्ता  gets invited .
I know  कुछ जो हैं स्टिल  waiting . ''
With  the एक्सेप्शन of क्रिस कोलंबस , प्रत्येक निदेशक रै था a कैमियो रूप in उसके संबंधित फिल्मी : अलफोंसो cuarón appears as a जादूगर पकड़कर a मोमबत्ती दौरान a झाँकी at the तीन broomsticks in कैदी of azkaban ; माइक newell is सुना briefly  as the radio presenter in Frank Bryce 's house in Goblet of Fire ; and David Yates features as a wizard within a magical moving portrait in Order of the Phoenix .
Producer David Heyman also makes  a कैमियो रूप as a जादूगर प्रदर्शित भीतर a जादुई  moving portrait in the third film , Prisoner of Azkaban .

A twelve-step program is a set of guiding principles ( accepted by  सदस्यों as 'spiritual सिद्धान्त , ' आधारित on the स्वीकृत साहित्य ) outlining a कोर्स of कार्रवाई लिये रिकवरी  from , compulsion , or other behavioral problems .
Originally proposed by Alcoholics Anonymous ( AA ) as a method of recovery from alcoholism , the Twelve Steps were  पहला प्रकाशित in the किताब alcoholics बेनाम : the स्टोरी of कैसा अधिक than एक सौ मेन have बरामद  from Alcoholism in 1939 .
The method was then adapted  और became the न्यास of अन्य twelve-step कार्यक्रम  .
As summarized by  the अमरीकी मनोवैज्ञानिक संघ  , the process involves the following:
admitting that  एक can नहीं कंट्रोल एक 's व्यसन  or compulsion ;
recognizing a उच्चतर शक्ति कि can दे शक्ति  ;
examining  पास्ट त्रुटियाँ साथ the सहायता of a प्रायोजक (  experienced member ) ;
बनाना amends लिये ये  errors ;
सीखना to सजीव a नई जीवन साथ a नई कोड  of behavior ;
helping  अन्य जो suffer इससे the वही  addictions or compulsions .
Witness impeachment  , in the विधि of प्रमाण of the संयुक्त राज्य , is the प्रक्रम of कॉलिंग into सवाल the विश्वसनीयता of  an individual who is testifying in a trial .
the संघीय नियम of प्रमाण contain the नियम शासी  impeachment in federal courts .
Party leaders and whips of the United  राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि हैं निर्वाचित by उनके संबंधित पार्टियों in a closed-door caucus by रहस्य बैलट और  are also known as floor leaders .
The U.S. House of Representatives does not officially use the  पद `` अल्पसंख्यक नेता '' हालांकि the मीडिया अक्सर  do .
The House instead uses the terms `` Republican  नेता '' or `` लोकतांत्रिक नेता '' depending on जिससे  party holds a minority of seats .
The current House Majority Leader  is रिपब्लिकन eric cantor , जबकि the वर्तमान हाउस अल्पसंख्यक नेता  is Democrat Nancy Pelosi .
The current House Majority  चाबुक is रिपब्लिकन केविन मैकार्थी , जबकि the वर्तमान हाउस अल्पसंख्यक चाबुक  is Democrat Steny Hoyer .
Following the outbreak of World War I in 1914 , the German Army opened the Western Front by first invading Luxembourg and Belgium , then gaining military control  of महत्वपूर्ण औद्योगिक regions in फ़्रांस  .
The tide of  the अग्रिम थी dramatically turned साथ the बैटल  of the Marne .
Following the race to the sea , both sides dug in  साथ a meandering लकीर of fortified trenches , stretching इससे the उत्तर समुद्र to the स्विस  frontier with France .
This line remained  essentially अपरिवर्तित लिये सबसे of the  war .
Between 1915 and 1917  वहीँ यहूद अनेक प्रमुख offensives साथ  this front .
The attacks employed massive artillery  bombardments और massed infantry अग्रिम .
However , a combination of  entrenchments , यंत्र गन nests , कंटीले तार , और तोपखाने repeatedly inflicted कठोर हताहत  on the attackers and counterattacking defenders .
As a result ,  no significant अग्रिम यहूद बना  .
Among the most costly of these offensives  यहूद the बैटल of verdun साथ a संयुक्त [ अनुमानित ] 700,000 मुर्दे , the बैटल of the  Somme with more than [ an estimated ] million casualties , and the Battle of Passchendaele with roughly [ an estimated ] 600,000 casualties .
In an effort to break the  deadlock , इस सामने देखी the परिचय of नई सैन्य प्रौद्योगिकी , सहित ज़हर  gas , aircraft and tanks .
But it was only after the adoption of  improved tactics कि कुछ उपाधि of गतिशीलता थी लौटी  .
The German Spring  अप्रिय of 1918 थी बना संभावित by the सन्धि of brest-litovsk  that marked the end of the conflict on the Eastern Front .
Using the recently-introduced infiltration tactics ,  the जर्मनी सेना उन्नत nearly to the वेस्ट , जिससे चिह्नित the deepest अग्रिम by either पक्ष चूंकि 1914 और बहुत nearly succeeded in forcing  a breakthrough .
In spite of the generally stagnant  प्रकृति of इस सामने , इस थिएटर होता prove निर्णायक  .
The  inexorable अग्रिम of the अलाइड सेना दौरान the दूसरी  half of 1918 persuaded the German commanders that defeat was inevitable , and the government was forced to sue for conditions of an armistice .
The terms of peace were  सहमत upon साथ the हस्ताक्षर of the सन्धि of versailles  in 1919 .

These characters were regularly rotated ,  प्रायः disappearing लिये long अवधि दौरान the श्रेणी .

Some of the characters had no last name and most were commonly  referred to by उनके पहला नाम so इस appeared to be the सबसे लॉजिकल विधि  .
