The First Lady of the  संयुक्त राज्य ( flotus ) is the होस्टेस  of the White House .
Because this position is  traditionally भर by the बीवी of the अध्यक्ष of the संयुक्त राज्य , the शीर्षक is सबसे  often applied to the wife of a sitting president .
The current  पहला महिला is मिशेल ओबामा  .
After her  husband बराक ओबामा थी re-elected on नवम्बर 6 , 2012 , वो is  scheduled to serve until January 20 , 2017 .
Septic shock is a medical condition as a result of severe infection  और सेप्सिस , हालांकि the microbe may be प्रणालीगत or स्थानीयकृत to a particular  site .
It can cause multiple organ  dysfunction सिंड्रोम ( formerly ज्ञात as अनेक अंग विफलता ) और  death .
Its most  आम पीड़ितों हैं children , immunocompromised individuals , और the बुजुर्ग , as उनके प्रतिरक्षा  systems can not deal with the infection as effectively as those of healthy adults .
Frequently , patients suffering from septic  शॉक हैं cared लिये in intensive परवाह इकाई  .
The mortality rate  इससे सेप्टिक शॉक is लगभग  25–50 % .
Kevin Brereton ( born February 20 , 1972 ) , better known by his stage name k-os ( ; ``  अराजकता '' ) , is a कनाडाई rapper , सिंगर , songwriter और  record producer .
His given  नाम may भी be cited as kheaven  , a spelling he later adopted .
The alias `` k-os '' , spelled with a lower case `` k '' , was intended to be  कम आक्रामक than the pseudonyms of अन्य rappers जिनकी names यहूद सब अपर मामला , ऐसे as krs-one  .
It is an acronym for `` Knowledge of Self , '' although in a later interview he said that it originally stood for  `` केविन 's असली ध्वनि . '' k-os ' म्यूज़िक incorporates a चौड़ी किस्में of म्यूज़िक जाति , सहित रैप , दुर्गंध , चट्टान , और रेगी  .
The lyrics frequently focus on promoting a `` positive message '' while at times expressing  आलोचना of मुख्यधारा हिप हॉप संस्कृति 's obsession साथ धन , कीर्ति और glorification  of violence .
A musician as well as a  निर्माता , k-os रै लिखा और उत्पादित nearly  every part of all four of his albums .
k-os प्रायः performs साथ a सजीव बैंड , कुछ  that is uncommon in the hip hop genre .
He  sometimes plays गिटार और कुंजीपटल दोनो दौरान सजीव प्रदर्शन  and in the studio .
k-os received his first  musical एक्सपोज़र साथ the सिंगल `` musical essence '' , released  in 1993 .
After the  रिलीज of उसके दूसरी सिंगल `` वृद्धि जैसे the सूर्य '' in 1996 , he withdrew इससे the उद्योग क्युकी he थी असंतुष्ट  with his musical style .
he reappeared briefly in 1999 और released  his debut album Exit in 2002 .
The album  प्राप्त धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ लकिन बेची अपेक्षाकृत  few copies .
He  released उसके दूसरी एल्बम आनन्द विद्रोह in 2004 , जिससे  received platinum status in Canada .
A third  एल्बम , , थी released in 2006 और  also went platinum .
His fourth  एल्बम , यस  !
,  थी released in  2009 .
His  पांचवां एल्बम ब्लैक on सुनहरे  was released in 2013 .
The official  2007 संस्करण of the ucc  .
भी the गोपनीय अशिष्ट मसौदा of the ucc यहूद saved और  published as a 10-volume set .
The Uniform Commercial Code ( UCC or the Code ) , first published in 1952 , is  एक of a क्रमांक of वर्दी अधिनियमों कि have महरूम promulgated in संयोजन साथ प्रयत्न to harmonize the विधि of बिक्री और अन्य वाणिज्यिक ट्रांजेक्शन  in all 50 states within the United States of America .
Multi-pitch climbing is the ascent  of चढ़ाई रूट साथ एक or अधिक stops at a belay स्टेशन  .
Each section of actual  चढ़ाई between stops at the belay स्टेशन is  called a pitch .
The leader ascends the pitch  , रखकर गियर और stopping to लंगर themselves to the belay स्टेशन .
The  कारण लिये the stops can be संकल्पित by  choice , convention or necessity .
लिये example:
The rope is too short to  do the संपूर्ण रूट in एक पिच ( necessity  ) .
the नेता रै चलाएं आउट of सुरक्षात्मक  gear ( necessity ) .
There is a convenient protectable ledge , or fixed bolts placed by previous  चढना , at the स्थान लिये a belay स्टेशन ( सम्मेलन  ) .
The leader chooses to rest or  एक्सचेंज लीड पहले the अगला खण्ड of the चढ़ाई ( चुनाव  ) .
The general purpose  of ये stops is to allow the दूसरी to ascend to the पाइंट of the सीसे climber जबकि  collecting the protective gear from the route in the course of the lead climber 's ascent .
At the belay station , the protective gear is collected ,  संभवतः exchanged to a नई नेता , और the नेता of the अगला पिच ascends the  route .
A diagram showing an I Formation on  ठोकर और a 4-3 गठन on रक्षा
In American football , each team has  ग्यारह खिलाड़ी on the फ़ील्ड at एक समय .
The specific role that a  खिलाड़ी takes on the फ़ील्ड is पुकारा उनके स्थिति  .
Under the  आधुनिक नियम of अमरीकी फ़ुटबॉल , टीमों हैं अनुमत असीमित subsititutions , कि  is teams may change any number of players after any play .
This has resulted in the development of three ``  platoons '' of खिलाड़ी , the ठोकर ( the टोली साथ the बॉल , जो is trying to स्कोर ) , the रक्षा ( the टोली trying to prevent the अन्य  team from scoring , and to take the ball from them ) , and the special teams ( who play in kicking situations ) .
Within those platoons , various  विशिष्ट स्थितियाँ मौजूद depending on कया the खिलाड़ी 's  main job is .
The Controlled Substances Act ( CSA ) was enacted  into विधि by the कॉंग्रेस of the संयुक्त राज्य as शीर्षक ii of the व्यापक ड्रग गाली रोकथाम  and Control Act of 1970 .
The CSA is the federal U.S. drug policy under which  the manufacture , importation , कब्ज़ा , उपयोग और वितरण of निश्चित substances is regulated .
The Act also served as the national  implementing विधान लिये the सिंगल सम्मेलन  on Narcotic Drugs .
The legislation created five  schedules ( classifications ) , साथ varying योग्यता लिये a पदार्थ  to be included in each .
Two federal agencies , the Drug Enforcement Administration and the Food and Drug  प्रशासन , determine जिससे substances हैं added to or removed इससे the विभिन्न schedules , हालांकि the statute passed by कॉंग्रेस निर्मित the आरंभिक लिस्टिंग , और कॉंग्रेस रै sometimes अनुसूचित अन्य substances through विधान ऐसे as the hillory J. farias और सामन्था reid date-rape  Prevention Act of 2000 , which placed gamma hydroxybutyrate in Schedule I . Classification decisions are required to be made on criteria including potential for abuse ( an undefined term ) , currently accepted medical use in treatment in the United States , and international treaties .
The Wayne Route 23 Transit Center is a New Jersey Transit  park-and-ride स्टेशन in वेन , नई जर्सी साथ the montclair-boonton लकीर कि provides बस सेवा to नई यॉर्क नगर और विभिन्न अन्य अंक in the क्षेत्रफल as खूब as montclair-boonton लकीर ट्रैन सेवा  to New York , Hoboken , and intermediate points along the line between Hackettstown and Montclair State University .
It is located off of the southbound  गलियों of नई जर्सी रूट 23 on वेस्ट बेल्ट सड़क , निकट the इंटरचेंज जहाँ रूट 23 , अंतरराज्यीय 80 , और  U.S. Route 46 meet , across from the Willowbrook Mall .
the स्टेशन खोली in जनवरी 2008 और  has 1,000 parking spaces .
New  जर्सी पारगमन intends लिये इस संयुक्त रेल और बस स्टेशन to become an `` interceptor स्टेशन , '' कि होगा सहायता relieve the habitual  congestion at the West Belt Road Interchange , where the three major highways meet .
In addition , the construction of the station was meant to also  आसानी the जमघट at कया थी तब रूट 23 पार्क & सवारी , a बस डिपो on रूट 23 उत्तर कि रै चूंकि महरूम renamed माँ 's पार्क & सवारी , और the willowbrook  Mall Park & Ride ; the now-Mother 's site had limited parking while NJT was having trouble with overfull parking areas at Willowbrook .
The Wayne Township bus garage is  स्तिथ on the विपरीत पक्ष of रूट  23 .
There has been a proposal to build  a पार्किंग डेक साथ another हजार धब्बे और develop the जमीन at the  station .
In addition to  montclair-boonton रेल , the पारगमन बीच is परोसा by the following नई  Jersey Transit bus lines:
75  to न्यूर्क penn स्टेशन  and Butler
194 to  बंदरगाहों प्राधिकार बस टर्मिनल  and Butler/Newfoundland
198 to  बंदरगाहों प्राधिकार बस टर्मिनल और विलियम  Paterson University
324  to बंदरगाहों प्राधिकार और वेन  Route 23
748 to  willowbrook मॉल और paterson
The at sign @ is also commonly called the at symbol , ampersat  , apetail or वाणिज्यिक at in english—and कम commonly a चौड़ी दायरा of  other terms .
The fact that there is no single word in English for the symbol has prompted  कुछ लेखक to उपयोग the फ्रेंच arobase or स्पेनी और पुर्तगाली arroba—or to सिक्का नई शब्द ऐसे as asperand  , ampersat—but none of these has achieved wide currency .
Originally an accounting and commercial invoice abbreviation meaning `` at the rate of '' ( e.g . 7 widgets @ $ 2 = $ 14  ) , it थी नहीं शामिल on the कुंजीपटल of the earliest commercially कामयाब typewriters , लकिन थी on at तनिक एक 1889 मॉडल और the बहुत कामयाब underwood मॉडल इससे the `` underwood no . 5 '' in 1900  onward .
It is now universally  शामिल on कंप्यूटर keyboards  .
In recent years , its meaning has grown to include the sense of being `` located at , '' `` and  , '' or `` निर्देशित at '' , विशेषकर in ईमेल पता और सोशल मीडिया , विशेषकर  Twitter .
the चिह्नित is एनकोडेड  at .
The Catcher  in the rye is a 1951 अनोखा by  J. D. Salinger .
Originally  प्रकाशित लिये वयस्कों , it रै चूंकि become लोकप्रिय साथ adolescent  readers for its themes of teenage angst and alienation .
It  रै महरूम अनूदित into लगभग सब of the संसार  's major languages .
Around 250,000 copies are sold  प्रत्येक साल साथ कुल बिक्री of अधिक than 65 लाख किताबे  .
The novel 's  समर्थक और antihero , होल्डन caulfield ,  has become an icon for teenage rebellion .
The novel was included on Times 2005  सूची of the 100 बेहतरीन english-language novels लिखा चूंकि 1923 , और it थी नामित by आधुनिक  Library and its readers as one of the 100 best English-language novels of the 20th century .
It has been  अक्सर challenged in the संयुक्त राज्य और अन्य देशों लिये इसके  liberal use of profanity and portrayal of sexuality .
It also deals with  जटिल मुद्दे of पहचान , belonging , कनेक्शन , और alienation  .
Skeletal  मांसपेशियां होमो sapiens
This is a  तालिका of मांसपेशियां of the इंसान  anatomy .
There are  लगभग 642 skeletal मांसपेशियां भीतर the ठेठ इंसान , और लगभग प्रत्येक मांसपेशी constitutes एक भाग of a जोड़ी of  identical bilateral muscles , found on both sides , resulting in approximately 320 pairs of muscles , as presented in this article .
Nevertheless , the exact number is difficult to  define क्युकी अलग स्त्रोत समूह मांसपेशियां differently , e.g . regarding कया is पारिभाषित as अलग  parts of a single muscle or as several muscles .
उदाहरण दायरा इससे 640  to 850 .
The  मांसपेशियां of the इंसान देह can be categorized into a क्रमांक of समूह जिससे शामिल मांसपेशियां relating  to the head and neck , muscles of the torso or trunk , muscles of the upper limbs , and muscles of the lower limbs .
the कार्रवाई refers to the कार्रवाई of प्रत्येक  muscle from the standard anatomical position .
In  अन्य स्थितियाँ , अन्य क्रियाएँ  may be performed .
Bad Girls Club ( BGC ) is an American  वास्तविकता टेलीविज़न श्रेणी निर्मित by जोनाथन मरे लिये the  Oxygen television station .
The show centers on seven feisty and  शरारती महिलाओं साथ अलग पृष्ठभूमि और personalities , जो have a क्रमांक of मनोवैज्ञानिक  and behavioral problems .
They are introduced to  the दिखाएँ बंद उनके घातक बर्ताव और accomplish विशिष्ट  goals .
The cast ,  deemed `` ख़राब लड़कियों '' , आनंद a luxurious जीवनशैली in a ठीक  mansion for three months , during which they must obey specified rules .
Their lives  अंदर – और बाहर – of the हाउस हैं chronicled और अंकित  by the production team .
The Bad  लड़कियों क्लबों is ब्रॉडकास्ट in पाँच देशों ( संयुक्त  States , Netherlands , Australia , Hungary , and Sweden ) .
It has received negative  समीक्षाएँ इससे आलोचकों , जो मानना the दिखाएँ promotes हिंसा by adolescent  viewers .
Furthermore , several cast members made  विवादास्पद remarks जिससे outraged अनेक दर्शक  .
The format of the  दिखाएँ रै बदला इससे जल्दी सीज़न  .
If a  `` ख़राब लड़की '' ब्रेक a नियम , वो is evicted इससे the दिखाएँ और , if it is जल्दी  in the season , replaced by a new `` bad girl '' .
There have been nine complete seasons of The Bad  लड़कियों क्लबों , साथ the दसवाँ ऋतु फिलहाल  airing .
The fourth season had the highest ratings  in the दिखाएँ 's इतिहास , बनने इसके `` भेदन  season '' .
There  have महरूम तीन spin-offs of the ख़राब  Girls Club .
One of them , Love Games :  ख़राब लड़कियों need प्रेम too , जहाँ पास्ट डाल सदस्यों तलाश सच्चा प्रेम , रै gained ऊँची दरजा  .
Oxygen has also released a mobile  खेल , कॉमिक स्ट्रिप और merchandise to  promote the show .
Of the 92 contestants ,  केरी harvick ( of ऋतु एक ) थी a कामयाब देश सिंगर  before the show .
Tanisha Thomas  ( of ऋतु दो ) बाद hosted ऑक्सीजन  's OxygenLive !
and the subsequent  सीज़न of प्रेम खेल : ख़राब लड़कियों need  Love Too .
Thomas , who has been dubbed the `` godmother '' to all  प्रतियोगी , रै उसके अपना टेलीविज़न वृत्तचित्र हकदार  Tanisha Gets Married .
As of Season  8 वो 's महरूम the मेजबान of the पुनर्मिलन  specials .
The Iowa Senate is the  अपर हाउस of the आयोवा सामान्य  Assembly .
There are 50 seats in  the आयोवा सीनेट , representing 50 single-member जिले  across the state with populations of approximately 60,927 per constituency , .
Each Senate district is  रचित of दो हाउस जिले  .
The Senate meets at the  आयोवा राज्य कैपिटल in देस moines  .
Unlike the lower house , the Iowa House of Representatives , Senators serve  four-year शर्तें , साथ हाफ of the सीनेट लड़खड़ाते लिये re-election प्रत्येक दो सालो  .
वहीँ हैं no पद हद लिये  the Senate .
mechanical मरम्मत
मेंटेनेंस , मरम्मत , और परिचालन ( mro ) or मेंटेनेंस , मरम्मत , और overhaul involves फिक्सिंग कोई sort of mechanical , plumbing or विद्युत यंत्र  should it become out of order or broken ( known as repair , unscheduled or casualty maintenance ) .
It also includes performing routine  क्रियाएँ जिससे रखना the यंत्र in working अनुक्रम ( ज्ञात as अनुसूचित मेंटेनेंस ) or prevent ट्रबल इससे arising  ( preventive maintenance ) .
MRO may be defined as , `` All actions which have the objective  of retaining or restoring an मद in or to a राज्य in जिससे it can perform इसके जरूरी  function .
The actions include the  संयोजन of सब तकनीकी और सम्बन्धित प्रशासनिक , managerial ,  and supervision actions . ''
MRO operations can be categorised by whether the product remains the property of the customer , i.e . a service is being  offered , or whether the उत्पाद is खरीदा by the reprocessing संगठन और बेची to कोई ग्राहक wishing to मेक the खरीदें ( guadette  , 2002 ) .
In  the पूर्व मामला it may be a backshop आपरेशन  within a larger organisation or smaller operation .
The former of these represents a  बंद लूप सप्लाई कड़ी और प्रायः रै the पैमाना of मेंटेनेंस  , repair or of the product .
The latter  of the categorisations is an खोलें लूप सप्लाई कड़ी और is typified  by refurbishment and remanufacture .
The main characteristic of the closed loop system is  कि the माँग लिये a उत्पाद is matched साथ the सप्लाई  of a used product .
Neglecting asset write-offs and  असाधारण क्रियाएँ the कुल जनसांख्यिकी of the उत्पाद between the ग्राहक और the सेवा प्रदाता  remains constant .
Prince William , Duke of Cambridge ( William Arthur Philip Louis ; born 21 June 1982 ) , is the elder  बेटे of चार्ल्स , प्रिंस of वेल्स , और डायना , राजकुमारी of वेल्स , और third-eldest पोता of महारानी एलिज़ाबेथ ii और प्रिंस फिलिप , ड्यूक of एडिनबर्ग  .
He is second in the line of succession , behind his father , to the thrones of sixteen independent sovereign states known as the Commonwealth realms : the United Kingdom , Canada , Australia , New Zealand , Jamaica ,  बारबाडोस , the बहामा , हरा , पापुआ नई गिनी , the सुलेमान आइलैंड्स , तुवालू , संत लूसिया , संत विंसेंट और the grenadines , बेलीज़ , अण्टीगुआ और बारबूडा  , and Saint Kitts and Nevis .
Prince William was  शिक्षित at चार स्कूलों in the संयुक्त किंगडम और प्राप्त a उपाधि  from the University of St Andrews .
He spent parts of a gap year in Chile ,  बेलीज़ , तंजानिया , और कीनिया जहाँ he रै जिया और holidayed अनेक टाइम्स  .
प्रिंस विलियम रै भी लिया kiswahili अध्ययन  at universities in Kenya and Tanzania .
He was commissioned as a Lieutenant in the Blues and  रॉयल्स रेजीमेंट of the household प्यादे —serving साथ उसके bhai प्रिंस हैरी —and , दो सालो बाद , अर्जित उसके विंग्स by completing  pilot training at Royal Air Force College Cranwell .
In 2009 , he transferred  to the royal एयर फ़ोर्स , थी प्रचारित to उड़ान लेफ्टिनेंट और underwent हेलीकाप्टर उड़ती प्रशिक्षण in अनुक्रम  to become a full-time pilot with the Search and Rescue Force .
In 2010 , he completed his general and  special-to-type हेलीकाप्टर प्रशिक्षण और गई on to raf घाटी on no . 22 स्क्वाड्रन performing co-pilot कर्तव्य on फलक  a Sea King search and rescue helicopter .
Prince  विलियम शादीशुदा उसके longtime गर्लफ्रेंड , कैथरीन मिडलटन  , on 29 April 2011 at Westminster Abbey .
Hours prior to his wedding ,  प्रिंस विलियम थी निर्मित ड्यूक of कैम्ब्रिज  , Earl of Strathearn , and Baron Carrickfergus .
DeAndre  cortez रास्ता ( born जुलाई 28 , 1990 ) , बेहतर ज्ञात by उसके स्टेज नाम soulja लड़के बताना 'em , or बस soulja लड़के ,  is an American rapper , record producer , actor , and entrepreneur .
in सितंबर 2007 , उसके सिंगल `` crank कि ( soulja  Boy ) `` reached number one on the Billboard Hot 100 .
The single was  initially self-published on the अंतरजाल , और it बाद became a number-one  hit in the United States for seven non-consecutive weeks starting in September 2007 .
On August 17 Way was listed at # 18 on  the फोर्ब्स सूची of hip-hop नकदी किंग्स of 2010 कमाई $ 7 लाख लिये  that year .
रास्ता रै फिलहाल released तीन स्टुडियो एल्बम और एक स्वतंत्र एल्बम : उसके डेब्यू  studio album Souljaboytellem.com ( 2007 ) was certified platinum by the RIAA .
However , his next two albums , iSouljaBoyTellem ( 2008 ) and The DeAndre Way ( 2010 ) did not match the commercial success of his debut , the latter only selling 100,000  नक़ल , despite the कामयाबी of अनेक singles आरपार दोनो एल्बम , ऐसे as `` चुंबन me thru the फोन `` और `` फेरे my swag on `` ( isouljaboytellem  ) and `` Pretty Boy Swag `` ( The DeAndre Way ) .
This was  मुख्यतः due to negotiation समस्याएं साथ interscope रिकॉर्ड जिससे meant a सीमित राशि of रिकॉर्ड यहूद  made available to the public .
As of 2011 , Way has  पुष्टि he is working on उसके चौथी स्टुडियो एल्बम , हकदार यूएसए ड्रे , जिससे  will be released in 2013 .
The electron transport chain in the  सूत्रकणिका is the साईट of oxidative phosphorylation  in eukaryotes .
The NADH and succinate  उत्पन्न in the साइट्रिक एसिड साईकिल हैं oxidized , providing  energy to power ATP synthase .
Photosynthetic electron  हस्तांतरण कड़ी of the thylakoid झिल्ली  .
An electron  हस्तांतरण कड़ी ( इत्यादि ) युगल इलेक्ट्रॉन ट्रांसफ़र between an इलेक्ट्रॉन दाता  ( such as NADH ) and an electron acceptor ( such as O2 ) with the transfer of H+ ions ( protons ) across a membrane .
The  resulting electrochemical प्रोटॉन अनुपात is प्रयुक्त to generate रासायनिक उर्जा in the रूप of एडीनोसिन ट्राइफॉस्फेट  ( ATP ) .
Electron transport chains are the cellular mechanisms used for extracting energy from sunlight in  photosynthesis और भी इससे रेडॉक्स प्रतिक्रियाएँ , ऐसे as the ऑक्सीकरण of sugars  ( respiration ) .
In chloroplasts , light drives the conversion of water to  ऑक्सीजन और nadP+ to nadph साथ ट्रांसफ़र of H+ ions आरपार  chloroplast membranes .
In mitochondria , it is the  परिवर्तन of ऑक्सीजन to जल , nadh to naD+ और succinate to fumarate कि  are required to generate the proton gradient .
Electron  हस्तांतरण जंजीरों हैं प्रमुख साइट of असामयिक इलेक्ट्रॉन leakage to ऑक्सीजन , generating superoxide और potentially  resulting in increased oxidative stress .
Tramadol hydrochloride ( trademarked as Conzip , Ryzolt , Ultracet , Ultram in the  यूएसए , ralivia , zytram xl durella { cr-100/200 mg } in कनाडा or adolonta in स्पेन ) is a centrally एक्टिंग सिंथेटिक analgesic प्रयुक्त to दावत मॉडरेट  to moderately severe pain .
The drug has a wide range of applications , including treatment of  आमवातीय गठिया , बेचैन टाँगे सिंड्रोम , मोटर neurone बीमारी  and fibromyalgia .
It was launched and marketed as  tramal by the जर्मनी फार्मास्युटिकल कम्पनी  Grünenthal GmbH in 1977 .
tramadol is a कमजोर μ-opioid receptor agonist कि भी induces  serotonin release and inhibits the reuptake of norepinephrine .
Tramadol is metabolized  to o-desmethyltramadol , a significantly  more potent μ-opioid agonist .
Tramadol and its major metabolite ( s ) are distinguished from other more potent  opioid agonists by सापेक्ष selectivity लिये μ-opioid receptors  .
Bernard  लॉरेंस `` बर्नी '' madoff ( ; born अप्रैल 29 , 1938 ) is an अमरीकी पूर्व stockbroker , निवेश  advisor , financier , and white collar criminal .
He is the former non-executive  अध्यक्ष of the नैस्डैक भण्डार मार्केट , और the admitted ऑपरेटर of a पेन्शन योजना  that is considered to be the largest financial fraud in U.S. history .
Madoff founded the Wall Street firm Bernard L. Madoff  निवेश प्रतिभूति llc in 1960 , और थी इसके अध्यक्ष जबतक उसके गिरफ़्तार  on December 11 , 2008 .
The firm was one of the top  मार्केट मेकर व्यवसायों on वॉल गली , जिससे bypassed `` विशेषज्ञ '' firms by सीधे निष्पादित आदेश over the काउंटर  from retail brokers .
He employed  at the कड़ उसके bhai पीटर as वरिष्ठ मैनेजिंग निदेशक और मुख्य अनुपालन  Officer ; Peter has since been sentenced to 10 years in prison .
Peter 's daughter Shana Madoff as the firm 's rules and compliance officer and attorney , and  उसके बेटे एंड्रयू और चिह्नित ( चिह्नित वचनबद्ध आत्महत्या by फांसी exactly दो सालो बाद उसके पिता  's arrest ) .
On  दिसम्बर 10 , 2008 , madoff 's बेटे बताई अधिकारियों कि उनके पिता था confessed to  them that the asset management unit of his firm was a massive Ponzi scheme , and quoted him as describing it as `` one big lie . ''
The  following दिन , एफबीआई एजेंटों गिरफ्तार madoff और चार्ज उसे साथ  one count of securities fraud .
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission ( SEC ) had previously conducted  investigations into madoff 's कारोबार practices , लकिन किया नहीं  uncover the massive fraud .
In March 2009 , Madoff pleaded guilty to 11  संघीय felonies और admitted to turning उसके माल प्रबन्धन कारोबार into a विशाल पेन्शन योजना कि झांसे हज़ारों of निवेशकों of अरबों of डॉलर  .
Madoff said he  began the पेन्शन योजना in the जल्दी  1990s .
However , federal  जांचकर्ताओं मानना the धोखाधड़ी began as जल्दी as the 1970s , और those चार्ज साथ recovering the लापता धन मानना  the investment operation may never have been legitimate .
The amount missing from client accounts , including  fabricated gains , थी लगभग $ 65 अरब  .
The  court-appointed ट्रस्टी अनुमानित वास्तविक नुकसान to निवेशकों  of $ 18 billion .
On June 29 , 2009 , he was sentenced  to 150 सालो in थाना ,  the maximum allowed .
Administrative Professionals Day ( also known as Secretaries Day or Admin Day ) is an unofficial secular holiday observed in  अनेक देशों to recognize the कार्य of secretaries , प्रशासनिक assistants , receptionists , और अन्य प्रशासनिक support पेशेवर .
In North  अमेरिका , it is मनाये on the बुधवार of the  last full week of April ( April 24 in 2013 ) .
In France it is celebrated on  the तीसरा गुरुवार in अप्रैल ( अप्रैल 18  in 2013 ) .
In  ऑस्ट्रेलिया it is मनाये on the  first Friday in May
A quasi-judicial body is an entity such as an arbitrator or  ट्रिब्यूनल फलक , generally of a पब्लिक प्रशासनिक एजेंसी , जिससे रै शक्तियां और प्रक्रियाओं resembling those of a अदालत of विधि or न्यायधीश , और जिससे is obligated to objectively determine तथ्य और चित्रण  conclusions from them so as to provide the basis of an official action .
Such actions are able to remedy a situation or impose legal  दंड , और may affect the विधिक अधिकारों , कर्तव्य or privileges of विशिष्ट  parties .
Monument of  tycho ब्राहे और योहानेस कॅप्लर  in Prague
Tycho  ब्राहे ( 14 दिसम्बर 154624 अक्तूबर 1601 ) , born tyge ottesen ब्राहे , थी a डैनिश  nobleman known for his accurate and comprehensive astronomical and planetary observations .
He was  born in स्कैनिया , तब भाग of डेनमार्क , अभी भाग of  modern-day Sweden .
tycho थी खूब ज्ञात in उसके आजीवन as an astronomer  and alchemist .
in उसके de नोवा स्टेला ( on the नई स्टार ) of 1573 , he refuted the  Aristotelian belief in an unchanging celestial realm .
His precise measurements indicated that `` new stars , '' ( stellae novae , now known as supernovae ) in particular that of 1572 , lacked the parallax expected  in sub-lunar phenomena , और यहूद इसलिए नहीं `` वायुमंडलीय '' tailless धूमकेतुओं as previously believed , लकिन यहूद ऊपर the माहौल और  moon .
Using similar measurements he showed  कि धूमकेतुओं यहूद भी नहीं वायुमंडलीय phenomena , as previously विचार  , and must pass through the supposedly `` immutable '' celestial spheres .
As an astronomer , Tycho worked to  combine कया he देखी as the geometrical लाभ of the copernican प्रणाली साथ the philosophical लाभ of the ptolemaic प्रणाली into  his own model of the universe , the Tychonic system .
furthermore , he थी the पिछला of the प्रमुख नग्न नजर  astronomers , working without telescopes for his observations .
Tycho Brahe was granted an estate on the island of Hven and the funding to build the Uraniborg , an early research institute , where he built large  खगोलीय यंत्र और took अनेक careful माप , और बाद stjerneborg , भूमिगत , जब he खोजा कि उसके यंत्र in the पूर्व यहूद नहीं fear  steady .
On the island ( on which he demonstrated autocratic  अक्षर और बर्ताव toward the निवासियों ) he संस्थापित manufactories ऐसे as paper-making to provide सामग्री लिये मुद्रण  his results .
After disagreements with the new Danish king Christian IV in  1597 , he थी आमंत्रित by the bohemian किंग और पावन रोमन सम्राट rudolph ii to प्राग , जहाँ  he became the official imperial astronomer .
He built the new  वेधशाला at benátky nad jizerou  .
Here , from 1600 until his death in 1601 , he was assisted by Johannes  कॅप्लर जो बाद प्रयुक्त tycho 's खगोलीय आंकड़ा to develop कॅप्लर  's laws of planetary motion .
Guro District (  guro-gu ) is a ज़िला of सियोल , दक्षिण  Korea , which was separated from Yeongdeungpo District on April 1 , 1980 .
Located in the southwestern part of the city ,  जहाँ besides yangcheon ज़िला और geumcheon ज़िला guro ज़िला रै an महत्वपूर्ण स्थिति as a हस्तांतरण कड़ी  which contains railroads , land routes from the rest of Seoul to the south of the country .
The Gyeongbu  और gyeongin रेल लाइनों कनेक्ट सियोल to बुसान और  Incheon .
In addition , Seoul  महानगर सबवे लाइनों 1 , 2 , और 7 , और प्रमुख राजमार्गों  intersect in Guro District .
The name Guro originates from  the लेजेंड कि नौ ( ) बूढ़ा मेन ( कोरियाई : ro ) enjoyed आयु  in the district .
A  डिजिटल औद्योगिक जटिल is  located in Guro District .
The Guro Digital Industrial Complex , which played a leading industrial role  मुख्यतः साथ वस्त्र निर्माण , dressmaking और अन्य labour-intensive उद्योग in 1967 , रै महरूम rapidly बदला  into an IT industrial complex .
This  जटिल निभाई a pivotal भूमिका in the आर्थिक विकास of the दक्षिण कोरियाई 's विकास era , referred to as the `` चमत्कार on the  Han River `` , and also contributed 10 percent of national export in the 1970s .
twenty-one प्रतिशत of the कुल क्षेत्रफल of guro ज़िला is a प्रतिबंधित मण्डल  to be used as a greenbelt with the only arboretum in Seoul .
The zone is changing into a lively district as large  labour-intensive कारखानों हैं चलती इससे the क्षेत्रफल और the परिषद is  developing what it terms its four zones .
An `` e-government  `` प्रणाली आधारित on इस hosted the अंतरराष्ट्रीय e-participation फ़ोरम on फ़रवरी 7–9 , 2007 , साथ the भागीदारी  of more than thirty-seven countries .
The forum was launched with the theme `` Promoting Democracy and Regional Development '' and twenty-five mayors including André Santini ( Issy-les-Moulineaux , France ) , Kevin Foy ( Chapel Hill , US ) , Apirak Kosayothin ( Bangkok , Thailand ) , Uvais Mohamed Emthiyas ( Colombo , Sri Lanka ) , and world  विशेषज्ञ ऐसे as dr विलियम H. dutton ( निदेशक of ऑक्सफोर्ड अंतरजाल संस्थान at the विश्वविद्यालयों of ऑक्सफोर्ड , uk ) और dr ari-veiko anttiroiko ( प्राध्यापक at the विश्वविद्यालयों of tampere , फिनलैंड ) participated in the  forum .
The Guro Declaration , adopted  दौरान the फ़ोरम , aims to नियत up a पोर्टल साईट लिये e-government विकास और to स्थापित a कंक्रीट प्रोजेक्ट in अनुक्रम to सेतु the डिजिटल divide  among the world 's cities .
This practice has been recognised for  providing a नई महत्वपूर्ण कदम in the विकास of e-democracy  .
The e-participation forum was a key factor for Guro to play the leading  भूमिका in bridging the डिजिटल divide among शहरों , to provide i.t . उद्यमों स्तिथ in guro डिजिटल औद्योगिक जटिल the अवसर to लॉन्च into the अंतरराष्ट्रीय मार्केट  , to improve its image and become a global leader to concrete e-democracy .
The international  e-participation फ़ोरम on फ़रवरी  7–9 , 2007
A wonton ( also spelled wantan , wanton , or  wuntun in ट्रांसक्रिप्शन इससे cantonese ; मंदारिन : húndùn ) is a प्रकार of पकौड़ी commonly मिला in a क्रमांक of  Chinese cuisines .
Many  लोगों यहूद शामिल in the आविष्कार  of radio as we now know it .
Several possible methods of wireless communication were  माना , सहित आगमनात्मक और capacitive प्रेरण और हस्तांतरण through the मैदान , however the विधि  used for radio today exclusively involves the transmission and reception of electromagnetic waves .
After early speculation on the subject , experimental work on the connection between electricity and magnetism began around 1820 with the work of Hans  ईसाई ओर्स्टेड और जारी साथ the कार्य of andré-marie एम्पीयर , जोसेफ हेनरी , और माइकल  Faraday .
These investigations culminated in  the पूरा सिद्धान्त of विद्युत्चुम्बकत्व विकसित by जेम्स  Clerk Maxwell .
This theory described the  सैद्धांतिक आधार of the propagation of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  waves .
After Maxwell 's theory was published many  लोगों experimented साथ बेतार संचार , कुछ intentionally  using Maxwell 's theory some not .
It is considered likely that  the पहला जानबूझकर हस्तांतरण of a सिग्नल by अर्थात् of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक लहरें थी performed by दाउद एडवर्ड ह्यूजेस around 1880 , हालांकि इस  was considered to be induction at the time .
The first systematic and unequivocal  हस्तांतरण of em लहरें थी performed by heinrich रुडॉल्फ हर्ट्ज़ और वर्णित in papers  published in 1887 and 1890 .
Hertz famously considered  ये परिणाम as होने of छोटी व्यावहारिक मान  .
After Hertz 's work many people were involved in the development of components and  सिद्धान्त शामिल साथ the हस्तांतरण और रिसेप्शन of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  waves .
Others  , notably guglielmo मार्कोनी , यहूद चिंतित साथ व्यावहारिक सुधार और the वाणिज्यिक अनुप्रयोग  of radio to wireless telegraphy .
Later on Reginald A. Fessenden became the  पहला to भेजें an ऑडियो सिग्नल by अर्थात् of इलेक्ट्रोमैग्नेटिक  waves .
Scurvy is a disease resulting from a deficiency of vitamin C , which  is जरूरी लिये the संश्लेषण of कोलेजन in इंसानो  .
the रासायनिक नाम लिये विटामिन c , एस्कॉर्बिक एसिड , is निकला इससे the लैटिन नाम of स्कर्वी , scorbutus , जिससे भी  provides the adjective scorbutic ( `` of , characterized by or having to do with scurvy '' ) .
Scurvy  प्रायः presents itself initially as लक्षण of malaise और lethargy , followed by गठन of धब्बे on  the skin , spongy gums , and bleeding from the mucous membranes .
Spots are most  abundant on the जांघों और टाँगे , और a व्यक्ति साथ the ailment looks पाले  , feels depressed , and is partially immobilized .
As scurvy advances ,  वहीँ can be खोलें , suppurating wounds , घाटा of दांत , पीलिया , ज्वर  , neuropathy and death .
Scurvy was at one time common among sailors , pirates and others  सवार जहाजों at समुद्र longer than perishable फल और सब्जियां could be भंडारित ( subsisting बजाय तभी on cured और salted meats और सूखी  grains ) and by soldiers similarly deprived of these foods for extended periods .
It was described by Hippocrates ( c. 460 BC–c .  380 bc ) , और हर्बल cures लिये स्कर्वी have महरूम ज्ञात in अनेक देशी संस्कृतियों  since prehistory .
Scurvy was one of the limiting factors of marine travel , often  हत्या विशाल संख्याएँ of the यात्री और क्रू on long-distance voyages  .
This  became a significant समस्या in यूरोपीय इससे the शुरूआत of the आधुनिक era in the आयु of डिस्कवरी in the 15th  century , continuing to play a significant role through World War I in the 20th century .
While today scurvy is known to be caused by a nutritional deficiency ,  जबतक the अलगाव of विटामिन c और सीधा प्रमाण of इसके कड़ी to स्कर्वी in 1932 , numerous theories और उपचार यहूद प्रस्तावित , प्रायः on छोटी  or no experimental data .
This inconsistency is  attributed to the कमी of विटामिन c as a पृथक अवधारणा , an अक्षमता to reliably कड़ी अलग भोजन ( notably उपस्थित in  fresh citrus , watercress , and organ meat ) to scurvy .
An additional concept required to  समझे स्कर्वी थी the degradation of विटामिन c by एक्सपोज़र to एयर और तांबे और अन्य परिवर्तन मेटल लवण ऐसे as those  of iron , thus changing the links of foods to scurvy over time .
Treatment by fresh food , particularly citrus  फल , थी periodically implemented , as it था महरूम चूंकि  antiquity .
However until  the 1930s , उपचार थी असंगत , साथ अनेक अप्रभावी उपचार प्रयुक्त into  the 20th century .
It was a Scottish surgeon in the Royal Navy , James Lind who first  proved it could be treated साथ citrus फल in प्रयोग he वर्णित in उसके 1753 किताब , a treatise of the स्कर्वी  , though his advice was not implemented by the Royal Navy for several decades .
In infants , scurvy is sometimes referred  to as barlow 's बीमारी , नामित बाद सर थामस barlow , a अंग्रेजों चिकित्सक जो वर्णित  it .
However , Barlow 's disease  may भी refer to mitral वाल्व prolapse  .
अन्य eponyms लिये स्कर्वी शामिल moeller 's  disease and Cheadle 's disease .
Scurvy does not occur in most animals  क्युकी वे can synthesize उनके अपना विटामिन  C .
However , humans and other higher primates ( the  simians - बंदरों और apes - और tarsiers ) , गिनी सूअर , सबसे or सब bats , और कुछ प्रजाति of पक्षियों और मछली कमी an एंजाइम ( l-gulonolactone  oxidase ) necessary for such synthesis and must obtain vitamin C through their diet .
Vitamin C is widespread in plant tissues , with particularly high  एकाग्रता occurring in citrus फल ( संतरे , नींबू , limes , grapefruits ) , टमाटर  , potatoes , cabbages , and green peppers .
आयरन is a रासायनिक तत्व साथ the प्रतीक fe  ( from ) and atomic number 26 .
It is a  मेटल in the पहला परिवर्तन  series .
It is the most common element ( by mass )  forming the ग्रह धरती as a पूरे , forming much of  Earth 's outer and inner core .
It is  the चौथी सबसे आम तत्व  in the Earth 's crust .
Iron 's very common presence in rocky planets like Earth is due to its abundant production as  a परिणाम of संलयन in high-mass सितारों , जहाँ the उत्पादन of nickel-56 ( जिससे decays to the सबसे आम समस्थानिक of  iron ) is the last nuclear fusion reaction that is exothermic .
This causes radioactive nickel to become the last element  to be उत्पादित पहले पतन of a सुपरनोवा लीड to the विस्फोटक कार्यक्रम कि scatter इस precursor radionuclide of आयरन  abundantly into space .
जैसे अन्य समूह 8 तत्व , आयरन exists in a चौड़ी दायरा of ऑक्सीकरण राज्य  , −2 to +6 , although +2 and +3 are the most common .
elemental आयरन occurs in meteoroids और अन्य कम ऑक्सीजन environments , लकिन  is reactive to oxygen and water .
भैस आयरन सतहों appear lustrous silvery-gray , लकिन oxidize in सामान्य एयर to दे hydrated आयरन आक्साइड , commonly  known as rust .
Unlike many other metals which form passivating oxide layers , iron  आक्साइड occupy अधिक आवाज़ than आयरन मेटल , और यूँ आयरन आक्साइड फ्लेक बंद  and expose fresh surfaces for corrosion .
Iron metal has been  प्रयुक्त चूंकि प्राचीन टाइम्स , हालांकि तांबे alloys , जिससे have निम्नतर melting  temperatures , were used first in history .
Pure  आयरन is नरम ( softer than एल्युमिनियम ) , लकिन is unobtainable by smelting  .
The material is significantly hardened and strengthened by  impurities इससे the smelting प्रक्रम , ऐसे as कार्बन .
A  निश्चित proportion of कार्बन ( between 0.002 % और 2.1 % ) produces स्टील  , which may be up to 1000 times harder than pure iron .
Crude iron metal is  उत्पादित in धमाका furnaces , जहाँ अयस्क is घटाया by कोक to सुअर आयरन  , which has a high carbon content .
Further refinement with oxygen  reduces the कार्बन सामग्री to the सही proportion  to make steel .
Steels and low carbon iron alloys with other metals ( alloy steels  ) हैं by दूर the सबसे आम धातुओं in औद्योगिक उपयोग , due to उनके ग्रेट दायरा of वांछनीय गुण  and the abundance of iron .
Iron chemical  यौगिकों , जिससे शामिल अमिश्रित और  ferric compounds , have many uses .
Iron oxide mixed  साथ एल्युमिनियम चूर्ण can be ignited to  create a thermite reaction , used in welding and purifying ores .
It forms binary  यौगिकों साथ the हैलोजन्स और the chalcogens  .
Among its  कार्बधातुक यौगिकों is ferrocene , the पहला सैंडविच  compound discovered .
Iron plays an important role in  जीवविज्ञान , forming देवालय साथ आणविक ऑक्सीजन in हीमोग्लोबिन और myoglobin ; ये  two compounds are common oxygen transport proteins in vertebrates .
Iron is also the metal used at the active site of many important redox enzymes  dealing साथ सेल्यूलर श्वसन और ऑक्सीकरण और कटौती in पौधे और पशु  .
The Blue Cross  ब्लू शील्ड संघ ( bcbsa ) is a संघ  of 38 separate health insurance organizations and companies in the United States .
Combined , they  सीधे or indirectly provide स्वास्थ्य बीमे  to over 99 million Americans .
The history of Blue Cross dates  वापस to 1929 , जबकि the इतिहास of ब्लू शील्ड तिथियाँ to 1939  .
The Blue Cross Association dates back to  1960 , जबकि इसके ब्लू शील्ड बंटवारा थी  created in 1948 .
The  दो संगठन मिलाया in 1982  , forming the current association .
A potato chip ( known as a chip in American ,  ऑस्ट्रेलियाई , नई जीलैंड , कनाडाई , singaporean , हांग काँग , दक्षिण अफ़्रीकी और jamaican अंग्रेज़ी ; as a कुरकुरे in अंग्रेजों अंग्रेज़ी और hiberno-english  , and as either a chip or wafer in Indian English ) is a thin slice of potato that is deep fried or baked until crunchy .
Potato  चिप्स हैं commonly परोसा as an क्षुधावर्धक  , side dish , or snack .
The basic chips are cooked and salted ;  अतिरिक्त किस्में हैं manufactured using विभिन्न flavorings और संघटक सहित seasonings , herbs , मसाले , cheeses  , and artificial additives .
`` Crisps '' , however , may also refer to many different types of savory snack products  बेची in the संयुक्त किंगडम और आयरलैंड , कुछ बना इससे आलू , लकिन may भी be बना इससे मक्का , tapioca or  other cereals .
an उदाहरण of ये kinds of savory  snacks is Monster Munch .
Potato chips are a predominant part of the snack  खाना मार्केट in english-speaking देशों और numerous अन्य पश्चिमी  nations .
The global potato chip market generated  कुल revenues of us $ 16.4 अरब  in 2005 .
This  accounted लिये 35.5 % of the कुल savory स्नैक्स मार्केट in  that year ( US $ 46.1 billion ) .
Henry Clay , Sr. ( April 12 , 1777 – June 29 , 1852 ) was a lawyer ,  राजनेता और skilled orator जो represented केंटकी in दोनो the सीनेट और in the हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  .
He served three  अलग शर्तें as स्पीकर of the संयुक्त राज्य हाउस of प्रतिनिधि  and was also Secretary of State from 1825 to 1829 .
He lost his  अभियान लिये अध्यक्ष in 1824 ,  1832 and 1844 .
Clay was a  प्रबल फिगर in दोनो the  First and Second Party systems .
As a leading war hawk in 1812 , he favored war  साथ ब्रिटेन और निभाई a significant भूमिका in अग्रणी the स्वदेश to युद्ध in the युद्ध  of 1812 .
In 1824 he ran for president and  खोया , लकिन फेंका उसके चुनावी मत to जॉन क्विंसी एडम्स , जो बना उसे सचिव of राज्य as the jacksonians denounced कया वे माना  a `` corrupt bargain . ''
He ran and lost again in 1832 and 1844 as the  प्रत्याशी of the whig पार्टी , जिससे he संस्थापित और प्रायः वर्चस्व .
Clay was the foremost proponent of the American System , fighting for an increase in tariffs to foster  उद्योग in the संयुक्त राज्य , the उपयोग of संघीय funding to निर्माण और maintain अवसंरचना , और a दमदार  national bank .
He opposed the  annexation of टेक्सास , fearing it होता इंजेक्ट the गुलामी समस्या into  politics .
Clay also opposed the  mexican-american युद्ध और the `` manifest नियति `` नीति of  Democrats , which cost him votes in the close 1844 election .
Dubbed  the `` ग्रेट pacificator , '' मिट्टी brokered महत्वपूर्ण compromises दौरान the nullification  Crisis and on the slavery issue .
As part of the `` Great Triumvirate `` or `` Immortal Trio , '' along  साथ उसके सहयोगियों डेनियल वेबस्टर और जॉन C. calhoun , he थी इंस्ट्रूमेंटल in formulating the मिसौरी  Compromise of 1820 and the Compromise of 1850 .
He was viewed as the  प्राथमिक प्रतिनिधि of पश्चिमी रूचि in इस समूह  , and was given the names `` Henry of the West '' and `` The Western Star . ''
A plantation owner , Clay held  स्लेव दौरान उसके आजीवन लकिन freed उन्हें in उसके  Will .
Abraham Lincoln , the Whig leader in Illinois , was  a ग्रेट admirer of मिट्टी , saying he थी `` my आदर्श of a ग्रेट man  . ''
Lincoln wholeheartedly  समर्थित मिट्टी 's आर्थिक कार्यक्रम  .
In 1957 , a Senate Committee selected Clay as one of  the पाँच महानतम u.s . सीनेटरों , साथ साथ डेनियल वेबस्टर , जॉन C. calhoun , रॉबर्ट la  Follette , and Robert Taft .
BJ 's Wholesale Club , Inc. , commonly  referred to बस as bj 's , is a membership-only गोदाम क्लबों कड़ी ऑपरेटिंग on the संयुक्त राज्य ईस्ट coast , as खूब as in the  state of Ohio .
The company is ranked #  232 on सौभाग्य पत्रिका 's 2010 लिस्टिंग of  America 's 500 largest public corporations .
The Wizard of Oz , known during  उसके शासनकाल as the ग्रेट और शक्तिशाली oz , is the epithet of ऑस्कर zoroaster phadrig इसहाक़ नॉर्मन  Henkel Emmannuel Ambroise Diggs , a fictional character in the Land of Oz , created by American author L. Frank Baum .
The character was further  popularized by the क्लासिक 1939 फिल्म , wherein उसके पूरा नाम is नहीं उल्लेखित  .
Kristinia Jamie  debarge ( ; born कूच 8 , 1990 ) is an अमरीकी सिंगर ,  songwriter , dancer and actress .
She first appeared on national television in 2003  as a प्रतियोगी on the अमरीकी आइडल spin-off , अमरीकी juniors  .
In 2009 , DeBarge  हस्ताक्षरित a अनुबंध साथ the द्वीप रिकॉर्ड विभाग sodapop , releasing उसके डेब्यू एल्बम उजागर  in July of the same year .
The  पहला सिंगल , `` अलविदा `` , पहुँचे  the top 20 in the US and Canada .
The lead single ( `` Cry Wolf ''  ) इससे उसके बेनाम sophomore एल्बम थी released  on September 27 , 2012 .
The Hawaii Warriors football team represents the  विश्वविद्यालयों of hawaiʻi at mānoa in ncaa प्रभाग i  FBS college football .
The team is  coached by norm चाउ .
It was part of the Western Athletic Conference until July  2012 , जब the टोली joined the पहाड़ वेस्ट सम्मेलन  .
The  हवाई योद्धाओं यहूद the तीसरा non-aq टोली to खेल in a bcs कटोरी खेल ; खोने to जॉर्जिया  41–10 in the Sugar Bowl on January 1 , 2008 in New Orleans , Louisiana .
Marvin  gaye ( अप्रैल 2 , 1939april 1 , 1984 ) , born मारविन pentz  Gay , Jr. , was an American singer-songwriter and musician .
Gaye helped to shape the sound of Motown Records in the 1960s with a string of hits including `` How  मीठी it is ( to be loved by तुम ) `` और `` i सुना it through the grapevine `` और duet रिकार्डिंग साथ मरियम कुएं और  Tammi Terrell , later earning the titles `` Prince of Motown '' and `` Prince of Soul '' .
During the 1970s , Gaye recorded the concept  एल्बम कया 's going on और let 's मिलेंगी it on और became among the पहला कलाकारों in motown  to break away from the reins of its production company .
Gaye 's  बाद रिकार्डिंग बहकावे अनेक r &  B subgenres such as quiet storm and neo-soul .
Following a period in Europe  अंतर्गत a कर निर्वासन in the जल्दी 1980s , gaye released the 1982 ग्रैमी award-winning  hit `` Sexual Healing `` and the Midnight Love album .
Since his death in 1984 , Gaye  रै महरूम मरणोपरांत सम्मानित by अनेक संस्थानों , सहित the ग्रैमी आजीवन  Achievement Award and the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame .
Location of  chernobyl नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र
the abandoned नगर of pripyat साथ  Chernobyl plant in the distance
abandoned आवास ब्लॉक in  Pripyat
The Chernobyl disaster ( , Chornobylska Katastrofa – Chornobyl Catastrophe ) was a catastrophic nuclear  दुर्घटना कि occurred on 26 अप्रैल 1986 at the chernobyl नाभिकीय शक्ति संयंत्र in युक्त ( तब officially the यूक्रेनी ssr ) , जिससे थी अंतर्गत the सीधा क्षेत्राधिकार of  the central authorities of the Soviet Union .
An explosion and fire released  विशाल quantities of रेडियोसक्रिय अणु into the  atmosphere , which spread over much of the western USSR and Europe .
The Chernobyl disaster is widely considered to have been the worst nuclear power plant accident in history , and is  एक of तभी दो वर्गीकृत as a स्तर 7 इवेंट on the अंतरराष्ट्रीय नाभिकीय इवेंट स्केल ( the अन्य होने the फुकुशिमा daiichi नाभिकीय विपत्ति  in 2011 ) .
The battle to contain the  संदूषण और avert a वृहद प्रलय ultimately शामिल over 500,000 मजदूर  and cost an estimated 18 billion rubles .
The official Soviet casualty count of 31 deaths has been  विवादित , और long-term प्रभाव ऐसे as cancers और deformities हैं स्टिल  being accounted for .
Mrs. Claus says  अलविदा to उसके husband as he सेट बंद on उसके यात्रा in इस 1919  postcard
Mrs. Claus  is the बीवी of सांता क्लॉस , the क्रिसमस gift-bringer in उत्तर अमरीकी  and European Christmas tradition .
She is  ज्ञात लिये बनाना कुकीज़ साथ  the elves and preparing toys with her husband Santa Claus .
Her first name  is a रहस्य , हालांकि वो रै महरूम referred to as मरियम , जेसिका  , Layla , Annette , Heidi , or Martha .
HijackThis ( also HiJackThis or HJT ) is an  खोलें सोर्स enumerating औजार लिये microsoft खिड़कियाँ originally निर्मित by merijn bellekom , और  later sold to Trend Micro .
The program is notable for targeting  browser-hijacking विधि , बल्कि than relying on a डेटाबेस  of known spyware .
It scans a user 's computer quickly , and  प्रदर्शक ब्राउजर hijacking स्थितियाँ , प्रर्दशित कया प्रविष्टियां  are there .
hijackthis is प्रयुक्त primarily लिये निदान of ब्राउजर hijacking , as uninformed उपयोग of इसके हटाना सुविधाएं  can cause significant software damage to a computer .
hijackthis करता नहीं हटाएँ or detect स्पाइवेयर ; it सूचियाँ सबसे आम  locations where browser hijacking activity can occur .
ब्राउजर hijacking can कारण मैलवेयर  to be installed on a computer .
On February 16 , 2012 , Trend Micro released the  hijackthis सोर्स कोड as खोलें सोर्स और it is अभी उपलब्धियाँ on the sourceforge साईट  .
Saddle Creek  रिकॉर्ड is an अमरीकी रिकार्ड लेबल  based in Omaha , Nebraska .
Started as a college class project on entrepreneurship , the label was  संस्थापित by माइक mogis और जस्टिन oberst in 1993 ( as lumberjack रिकॉर्ड  ) .
Mogis soon turned  over उसके भूमिका in the कम्पनी to robb nansel  .
The label is named after Saddle Creek Road , a street that cuts through the east side of midtown Omaha , and the beginnings of a scene whose members included Conor Oberst ( then a solo artist , currently of Bright  आँखें , conor oberst और the रहस्यवादी घाटी बैंड , desaparecidos और राक्षस of लोक ) , टिम kasher ( तब of slowdown वर्जिनिया , फिलहाल of कर्सिव और  The Good Life ) , and others .
Collectively ,  वे यहूद ज्ञात unofficially as the  `` Creekers '' .
Saddle Creek first appeared in print on a show flyer , offering to  `` खर्च an संध्या साथ काठी क्रीक '' ( बाद to be the  title of the label 's DVD . )
Saddle Creek became an  incorporated एंटिटी as a परिणाम of a क्लास प्रोजेक्ट on उद्यमिता  .
Distribution is handled by the Alternative  वितरण गठबंधन , जिससे is अंतर्गत the warner  Music Group umbrella .
Saddle Creek Records continues to be the flagship label of a style of music  पुकारा `` the ओमाहा ध्वनि `` , characterized by a पतला देश twang  .
This is increasingly inaccurate , though , with the rise of more  इलेक्ट्रॉनिक ध्वनि ऐसे as those favored by the faint और टूटा spindles  .
The eclectic sounds of Saddle Creek 's disparate member bands is somewhat  समझाया by उनके इतिहास ; a क्रमांक of the असली सदस्यों of the लेबल attended  grade school together .
A `` sister label '' , of sorts , to  काठी क्रीक is टोली प्रेम , प्रारंभ by conor oberst in  2004 .
The label opened arms to their first bands  नहीं आधारित in ओमाहा in 2001 साथ रिलीज by अभी it 's ओवरहेड और sorry परिचय ड्रेसडेन  .
Other non-Nebraskan artists followed , including Los Angeles 's Rilo Kiley , Eric  bachmann ( formerly नेता of archers of loaf और कुटिल उंगलियाँ इससे उत्तर कैरोलिना ) , georgie जेम्स ( वॉशिंगटन d.C.  ) , Two Gallants ( San Francisco ) , and most recently Tokyo Police Club ( Toronto ) .
In 2005 , Spend an Evening  साथ काठी क्रीक , a वृत्तचित्र detailing the पहला टेन सालो  of the record label 's history , was released .
The DVD  सुविधाएँ extensive साक्षात्कार साथ the काठी क्रीक bands , archival फुटेज , और विरल सजीव  performances .
On June 8  , 2007 , the लेबल खोली उनके अपना म्यूज़िक स्थान नामित slowdown ( बाद the समूह slowdown  Virginia ) , located in downtown Omaha , Nebraska .
The following is a list of episodes for  the टेलीविज़न दिखाएँ पूरा हाउस  .
In total , there were 192 episodes filmed for  the दिखाएँ over the कोर्स of इसके आठ सीज़न  , from 1987 to 1995 .
पूरा हाउस is a हालात कॉमेडी जिससे क्रॉनिकल्स a विधवा पिता 's struggles of उठाने  his three young daughters and the lives that they have touched .
The patriarch of the family , Danny ( Bob Saget  ) , आमंत्रण उसके brother-in-law जेसी ( जॉन stamos ) और उसके बेहतरीन dost जॉय ( डेव coulier ) , to सहायता उठाएँ उसके children ( candace cameron , jodie sweetin , और मरियम kate/ashley olsen ) , बाद  his wife was killed during an automobile accident involving a drunk driver .
After episodes 88 and 89 , Jesse marries Becky (  लोरी loughlin ) , और वे मूव into the  attic .
Then , after episodes 104 and 105 , Becky and Jesse have twin  लड़कों नामित nicky और एलेक्स ( डेनियल और केविन renteria/blake और डिलन  Tuomy-Wilhoit ) .
The series ends with episode  192 , `` मिशेल यात्राएँ again भाग 2 '' , जब  Michelle loses her memory and the family tries to restore it .
Notice  of स्टैम्प अधिनियम of 1765  in Newspaper
American newspapers reacted to the  स्टैम्प अधिनियम साथ गुस्सा और पूर्वानुमान of the निधन of पत्रकारिता  .
The Stamp Act 1765 ( short title Duties in American Colonies Act 1765 ; 5 George III , c. 12 ) imposed a direct tax by the British Parliament  specifically on the colonies of अंग्रेजों अमेरिका , और it जरूरी कि अनेक मुद्रित सामग्री in the colonies be उत्पादित on stamped पेपर  produced in London , carrying an embossed revenue stamp .
These printed  सामग्री यहूद विधिक दस्तावेज़ , मैगज़ीन , अखबारों और अनेक अन्य प्रकार  of paper used throughout the colonies .
Like previous taxes , the  स्टैम्प कर था to be सशुल्क in मान्य अंग्रेजों करेंसी  , not in colonial paper money .
The  purpose of the कर थी to सहायता अदा लिये सैनिकों stationed  in North America after the British victory in the Seven Years ' War .
The British  सरकारी लगा कि the colonies यहूद the प्राथमिक beneficiaries of इस सैन्य उपस्थिति  , and should pay at least a portion of the expense .
The Stamp  अधिनियम मिले ग्रेट प्रतिरोध in the  colonies .
The  colonies भेजा no प्रतिनिधि to पार्लियामेंट , और इसलिए था no influence over कया  taxes were raised , how they were levied , or how they would be spent .
Many colonists considered it a  उल्लंघन of उनके अधिकारों as अंग्रेजो to be taxed बगैर उनके सहमति —consent  that only the colonial legislatures could grant .
Colonial  सभाओं भेजा  petitions and protests .
The Stamp Act Congress held in New  यॉर्क नगर , reflecting the पहला significant संयुक्त औपनिवेशिक जवाब to कोई अंग्रेजों माप , भी petitioned पार्लियामेंट  and the King .
Local protest  समूह , led by औपनिवेशिक व्यापारियों और landowners , स्थापित कनेक्शन्स through पत्राचार कि निर्मित a ढीला गठबन्धन  that extended from New England to Georgia .
Protests and  demonstrations initiated by the बेटे of स्वतंत्रता प्रायः turned हिंसक और  destructive as the masses became involved .
Very soon all stamp  कर वितरकों यहूद सहमे into resigning उनके आयोग  , and the tax was never effectively collected .
विपक्ष to the स्टैम्प अधिनियम थी नहीं  limited to the colonies .
British merchants and  निर्माताओं , जिनकी निर्यात to the colonies यहूद threatened by औपनिवेशिक आर्थिक समस्याएं exacerbated by the कर  , also pressured Parliament .
The Act was repealed on March 18 , 1766 as a matter of expedience , but Parliament affirmed its power  to legislate लिये the colonies “in सब मामले whatsoever” by भी गुजर the declaratory  Act .
There followed a series  of नई कर और regulations , likewise opposed by the  colonists .
The episode played a major role in defining the  grievances और enabling the व्यवस्थित औपनिवेशिक प्रतिरोध कि led to the अमरीकी क्रान्ति  in 1775 .
pt-105 underway  .
PT boats were a variety  of torpedo-armed तेज़ आक्रमण शिल्प प्रयुक्त by the संयुक्त राज्य नेवी in संसार युद्ध  II to attack larger surface ships .
``  pt '' is the us हल वर्गीकरण प्रतीक लिये ``  Patrol Torpedo '' .
The PT boat squadrons were  nicknamed `` the मच्छर बेड़े '' .
The Japanese  पुकारा उन्हें `` शैतान नौकाएँ ''  .
The original pre– World War  i torpedo नौकाएँ यहूद designed साथ `` विस्थापन  '' hulls .
They  विस्थापित up to 300 टन और the  top speed was .
The PT boats  प्रयुक्त in संसार युद्ध ii यहूद निर्मित using the planing -type  hull form developed for racing boats .
They were much  छोटी ( 30–75 टन ) और तेज़ ( 35–40  knots ) .
दोनो प्रकार यहूद designed to स्ट्राइक at larger warships साथ torpedoes , using अपेक्षाकृत ऊँची  speed to get close , and small size to avoid being spotted and hit by gunfire .
They were  much कम महंगी than विशाल  warships .
PT boats were much  तेज़ , छोटी , और सस्ता than conventional ( विस्थापन  hull ) vessels .
During World War II , American PT boats engaged enemy  destroyers और numerous अन्य सतह शिल्प , ranging इससे छोटी नौकाएँ to विशाल सप्लाई  ships .
PT boats also operated as gunboats against  दुश्मन छोटी शिल्प , ऐसे as कराया barges प्रयुक्त by the जापानी शक्तियां लिये inter-island हस्तांतरण  .
शुभ शुक्रवार is a धार्मिक अवकाश observed primarily  by Christians commemorating the crucifixion of Jesus Christ and his death at Calvary .
The holiday is observed  दौरान पावन सप्ताह as भाग of the paschal triduum on the शुक्रवार preceding ईस्टर संडे , और may coincide साथ the  Jewish observance of Passover .
It is also known as Holy Friday , Great Friday , Black Friday , or Easter Friday ,  हालांकि the latter properly refers to the शुक्रवार in ईस्टर सप्ताह  .
Based on the details of the Canonical gospels , the Crucifixion of  यीशु थी सबसे संभावित to have महरूम on a शुक्रवार ( the दिन पहले the  Sabbath ) ( ) .
The estimated year of the Crucifixion is AD 33 , by two  अलग समूह , और originally as ad 34 by इसहाक़ न्यूटन via the मतभेद between the biblical और जूलियन पंचांग और the crescent of the चंद्रमा  .
A third method , using a completely different  खगोलीय दृष्टिकोण आधारित on a चंद्र crucifixion अंधेरा और ग्रहण मॉडल ( सतत साथ apostle पीटर 's सन्दर्भ to a `` चंद्रमा of रक्त '' in अधिनियमों 2:20 ) , अंक to शुक्रवार , 3 अप्रैल  AD 33 .
the ग्रेट जलाशय is the largest क्षेत्रफल of endorheic watersheds  in North America .
It is noted for both its  arid शर्तें और इसके जलाशय और दायरा स्थलाकृति कि varies इससे the उत्तर अमरीकी कम पाइंट at badwater जलाशय to the उच्चतम पाइंट of the संलग्न संयुक्त राज्य  , less than away at the summit of Mount Whitney .
The region  spans अनेक physiographic विभाजन  , biomes / ecoregions , and deserts .
रास्टर may refer  to:
Raster  ग्राफिक्स , आलेखीय तकनीकों using  arrays of pixel values
रास्टर ग्राफिक्स एडिटर , a  computer program
Raster scan , the pattern of image readout ,  हस्तांतरण , भंडार , और पुनर्निर्माण in टेलीविज़न और कंप्यूटर  images
Rasterisation , or  rasterization , परिवर्तन of a वेक्टर चित्र to a रास्टर  image
Raster image processor , or RIP , a  घटक of a मुद्रण प्रणाली कि performs rasterisation
Raster interrupt ,  a कंप्यूटर इन्टरनेट सिग्नल
रास्टर to वेक्टर , an  image conversion process
रास्टर बार , an  effect used in computer demos
raster-noton ,  a record label
rastrum , a यंत्र प्रयुक्त in मध्यकालीन म्यूज़िक पांडुलिपियों  to draw staff lines
रास्टर दस्तावेज़ ऑब्जेक्ट ,  a file format
Beowulf ( ; Old English : ) is a legendary Geatish hero and later turned king in the  एपिक कविता नामित बाद उसे , एक of the oldest surviving टुकड़े of साहित्य in the अंग्रेज़ी भाषा  .
The attack on Pearl Harbor ( called Hawaii Operation or Operation AI by  the जापानी इम्पीरियल सामान्य मुख्यालय ( आपरेशन z in नियोजन ) और the बैटल of पर्ल हार्बर ) थी a आश्चर्य सैन्य स्ट्राइक conducted by the इम्पीरियल जापानी नेवी  against the United States naval base at Pearl Harbor , Hawaii , on the morning of December 7 , 1941 ( December 8 in Japan ) .
From the standpoint  of the defenders , the आक्रमण commenced at 7:48  a.m. Hawaiian Time .
The attack was intended as a preventive action in order to keep the U.S. Pacific Fleet from interfering with  सैन्य क्रियाएँ the साम्राज्य of जापानी थी नियोजन in southeast एशिया विरूद्ध विदेशी territories of the संयुक्त किंगडम , the नीदरलैंड्स , और  the United States .
The base was attacked by 353 Japanese fighters , bombers and torpedo  planes in दो लहरें , शुभारम्भ इससे छह वायुयान  carriers .
सब आठ u.S. नेवी battleships यहूद क्षतिग्रस्त ,  with four being sunk .
Two  of ये यहूद बाद उठाया , और साथ the बाकी  four repaired , six battleships returned to service later in the war .
The Japanese also sank or damaged three cruisers , three  destroyers , an anti-aircraft प्रशिक्षण जलयान  , and one minelayer .
188 U.S. aircraft  यहूद नष्ट ; 2,402 अमेरिकी यहूद  killed and 1,282 wounded .
Important base installations such as the  शक्ति स्टेशन , डॉकयार्ड , मेंटेनेंस , और ईंधन और torpedo भंडार सुविधाएं , as खूब as the पनडुब्बी पियर और मुख्यालय भवन ( भी घर of  the intelligence section ) were not attacked .
Japanese losses were light : 29  वायुयान और पाँच midget submarines खोया , और 65 servicemen  killed or wounded .
One Japanese sailor was  captured  .
The  आक्रमण आए as a profound शॉक to the अमरीकी लोगों और led सीधे to the अमरीकी प्रविष्टि into  World War II in both the Pacific and European theaters .
The following  दिन ( दिसम्बर 8 ) , the संयुक्त राज्य घोषित  war on Japan .
Domestic support for  non-interventionism , जिससे था महरूम दमदार , disappeared  .
Clandestine support of Britain ( for example  the neutrality पैट्रोल ) थी replaced by क्रियाशील गठबंधन  .
Subsequent operations by the U.S. prompted Germany and  इटली to घोषित युद्ध on the u.S. on दिसम्बर 11 , जिससे थी reciprocated  by the U.S. the same day .
There were  numerous ऐतिहासिक precedents लिये unannounced सैन्य  action by Japan .
However , the lack of any formal warning , particularly while negotiations were  स्टिल जाहिर जारी , led अध्यक्ष फ्रैंकलिन D. रूज़वेल्ट to proclaim दिसम्बर 7 , 1941 , ``  a date which will live in infamy `` .
U.S. Route 85 ( US 85 ) is a north–south United States  राजमार्ग कि रनों लिये in the पहाड़ - उत्तरी मैदान राज्य of the  United States .
The southern  टर्मिनस of the रूट is at the संयुक्त states-mexico किनारा in el पासो , टेक्सास  , connecting with Mexican Federal Highway 45 .
The northern terminus is at the United  states-canada किनारा in fortuna , उत्तर डकोटा , जहाँ the रूट continues उत्तर as  Saskatchewan Highway 35 .
In both  the संयुक्त राज्य और saskatchewan , कनाडा  the route is known as the CanAm Highway .
Sections of US  85 हैं माना भाग of the थियोडोर  Roosevelt Expressway .
The United States  अध्यक्षीय चुनाव of 1968 थी the 46th quadrennial अध्यक्षीय चुनाव , आयोजित  on Tuesday , November 5 , 1968 .
The Republican nominee , former Vice-President Richard Nixon , won the  चुनाव over the लोकतांत्रिक nominee , लाज़िम vice-president ह्यूबर्ट humphrey  .
Nixon ran on a campaign that  promised to restore विधि और अनुक्रम to the स्वदेश 's शहरों , फटा by  riots and crime .
Analysts have argued the election of 1968 is a realigning election as it permanently  disrupted the नई सौदे गठबन्धन कि था वर्चस्व अध्यक्षीय राजनीती लिये 36 सालो  .
Coming four years after Democrat Lyndon B.  जॉनसन जीती in a ऐतिहासिक भूस्खलन , the चुनाव देखी the लाज़िम अध्यक्ष मजबूर आउट of the रेस और a रिपब्लिकन निर्वाचित लिये the पहला  time in twelve years .
It was a wrenching national  अनुभव , conducted दौरान a साल of हिंसा कि शामिल the हत्या of सिविल अधिकारों नेता मार्टिन लूथर किंग , jr. , और subsequent रेस दंगे आरपार the स्वदेश , the assasination of लोकतांत्रिक अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी रॉबर्ट F. कैनेडी ,  widespread opposition to the Vietnam War across university campuses , and violent confrontations between police and anti-war protesters at the 1968 Democratic National Convention as the Democratic party split again and again .
The  चुनाव प्रदर्शित the strongest तीसरा पार्टी प्रयत्न चूंकि 1912 by  former Alabama Governor George Wallace , a Democrat .
Because Wallace 's  अभियान opposed संघीय हस्तक्षेप in the दक्षिण to समाप्त स्कूल पृथक्करण , he carried the गहन दक्षिण  and ran well in ethnic industrial districts in the North .
This was the last  चुनाव in जिससे नई यॉर्क था the सबसे मत in the चुनावी  college ( 43 votes ) .
After the 1970 census , California gained  the सबसे चुनावी मत और रै remained the सबसे populous राज्य  since then .
This is the latest election where a presidential  टिकट जीती बगैर carrying the वाइस अध्यक्षीय प्रत्याशी 's घर राज्य  .
Windows Task Manager is a task manager or System  मॉनिटर अनुप्रयोग शामिल साथ the microsoft खिड़कियाँ nt परिवार of ऑपरेटिंग प्रणालियों कि provides सीमित सूचना परिचय कंप्यूटर प्रदर्शन और कार्यशील अनुप्रयोग , प्रक्रियाओं और cpu उपयोग , कमिट चार्ज और मेमोरी सूचना , संजाल कार्यकलाप और आंकडे , logged-in उपयोक्ता , और प्रणाली सेवाएं ( और as प्रायः is the मामला साथ तन्त्र टूल्स provided by microsoft लिये  Windows , 3rd party software is available which fills the requirements more thoroughly , e.g , `` Process Explorer '' , `` Extended Task Manager '' , `` Anvir Task Manager '' , `` Process Hacker '' , and `` System Explorer '' ) .
The Task Manager can also be used to set  प्रक्रम प्राथमिकताएं , प्रोसेसर अपनापन , forcibly terminate प्रक्रियाओं , और shut bas , restart , hibernate or  log off from Windows .
Windows Task  मैनेजर थी introduced साथ खिड़कियाँ  NT 4.0 .
पिछला संस्करण of खिड़कियाँ nt शामिल the कार्य सूची अनुप्रयोग  , which had far fewer features .
The task list was capable of listing currently  कार्यशील प्रक्रियाओं और हत्या उन्हें , or बनाना a नई प्रक्रम  .
In Windows XP only , a Shutdown menu is  भी उपस्थित कि allows अभिगम to standby , hibernate , फेरे बंद , restart , log  Off and Switch User .
Earlier versions of Microsoft Windows (  microsoft खिड़कियाँ 3.x , खिड़कियाँ 95 , खिड़कियाँ 98 ) था a कार्यक्रम ज्ञात as कार्य to प्रदर्शक the कार्यक्रम  currently running .
This file was executed by running  the taskman.exe संचिका इससे the c : \खिड़कीs निर्देशिका  .
Kanji ( ; ) are the adopted logographic Chinese characters ( hanzi ) that are used in the  आधुनिक जापानी लिखने प्रणाली साथ साथ hiragana ( ひらがな , ) , katakana ( カタカナ , ) , hindu-arabic numerals , और the occasional उपयोग of the लैटिन  alphabet .
The Japanese term kanji ( ) for the Chinese characters literally  अर्थात् `` हान वर्ण '' और is लिखा using the वही वर्ण as the चाइनीज hanzi ( )  .
John R Williams ( May 4 , 1782 – October 20 , 1854 ) was  an अमरीकी सिपाही , व्यापारी , और राजनेता जो is सबसे खूब ज्ञात लिये  serving as the first mayor of Detroit , Michigan .
In total , he served as  डेट्रॉयट 's महापौर लिये पाँच अन्य  terms .
He  भी थी a ब्रिगेडियर सामान्य in the  United States Army during the Black Hawk War .
A simple dry  चुम्बकीय पोर्टेबल कम्पास  .
A smartphone that can be used as  a कम्पास क्युकी of the magnetometer अंदर  .
An iPhone  कि can be प्रयुक्त as a geological कम्पास क्युकी  of the 3-axis teslameter and 3-axis accelerometer inside it
A military compass  कि थी प्रयुक्त दौरान संसार  War I .
A compass is a navigational instrument that shows  दिशानिर्देश in a फ़्रेम of सन्दर्भ कि is stationary सापेक्ष to the सतह of the  earth .
The frame of reference  defines the चार कार्डिनल दिशानिर्देश ( or अंक ) – उत्तर  , south , east , and west .
इंटरमीडिएट दिशानिर्देश हैं भी  defined .
Usually , a diagram called a compass rose , which shows the directions  ( साथ उनके names प्रायः abbreviated to आद्याक्षर ) , is चिह्नित on the कम्पास  .
When the compass is in use , the  रोज़ is लकीर साथ the रियल दिशानिर्देश in the फ़्रेम of  reference , so , for example , the `` N '' mark on the rose really points to the north .
Frequently , in addition to the rose or sometimes  बजाय of it , कोण markings in डिग्री हैं दिखाया on the  compass .
North  corresponds to शून्य डिग्री , और the कोण बढ़ाएँ clockwise , so ईस्ट is 90 डिग्री  , south is 180 , and west is 270 .
These numbers allow the  कम्पास to दिखाएँ azimuths or बियरिंग , जिससे हैं commonly stated  in this notation .
The magnetic  कम्पास थी पहला invented as a यंत्र लिये भविष्यवाणी as जल्दी as the  Chinese Han Dynasty ( Since about 206 BC ) .
The compass was used in Song  राजवंश चीन by the सैन्य लिये navigational orienteering by 1040-1044 , और थी प्रयुक्त लिये  maritime navigation by 1111 to 1117 .
The use of a  कम्पास is अंकित in पश्चिमी यूरोपीय between 1187 और 1202 , और  in Persia in 1232 .
the शुष्क कम्पास थी invented in यूरोपीय  around 1300 .
This was  supplanted in the जल्दी 20th सदी by the  liquid-filled magnetic compass .
The Inca Empire or Inka Empire (  quechua : tawantinsuyu ) थी the largest साम्राज्य in pre-columbian अमेरिका  .
The administrative , political and military center of the  साम्राज्य थी स्तिथ in कुज़्को in modern-day पेरू  .
The Inca  सभ्यता arose इससे the हाइलैंड्स of पेरू sometime  in the early 13th century .
From 1438 to 1533 , the Incas used a variety of methods , from conquest to peaceful assimilation , to incorporate a large portion of western South America , centered on the Andean  पहाड़ सीमाएँ , सहित , besides पेरू , विशाल भाग of आधुनिक इक्वाडोर , पश्चिमी और दक्षिण सेंट्रल बोलीविया , उत्तरपश्चिम अर्जेंटीना , उत्तर और सेंट्रल चिली , और दक्षिणी कोलंबिया into a राज्य comparable to the  historical empires of Eurasia .
The official  भाषा of the साम्राज्य थी quechua , हालांकि सैंकड़ों of लोकल भाषाएं  and dialects of Quechua were spoken .
The Inca referred to their empire as Tawantinsuyu which can  be अनूदित as the चार regions or the चार  United Provinces .
There were many local forms of worship , most of  उन्हें concerning लोकल पवित्र `` huacas `` , लकिन the इन्का नेतृत्व प्रोत्साहित the इबादत of inti —the सूर्य god—and imposed इसके प्रभुता ऊपर  other cults such as that of Pachamama .
The Incas considered their King , the  sapa इन्का , to be the `` चाइल्ड of the सूर्य  . ''
The kidneys are organs that serve several essential  नियामक भूमिकाएँ in सबसे पशु , सहित vertebrates और कुछ invertebrates  .
They are essential in the urinary system and also serve homeostatic functions such as the  विनियमन of इलेक्ट्रोलाइट्स , मेंटेनेंस of acid–base संतुलन , और विनियमन of रक्त दबाव ( via maintaining नमक  and water balance ) .
वे serve the देह as a प्राकृतिक फिल्टर of the रक्त  , and remove wastes which are diverted to the urinary bladder .
In producing urine , the  गुर्दे excrete wastes ऐसे as यूरिया और अमोनियम , और वे  are also responsible for the reabsorption of water , glucose , and amino acids .
The kidneys also produce hormones  सहित calcitriol , erythropoietin , और the एंजाइम  renin .
स्तिथ at the पश्च of the abdominal गुहा in the retroperitoneum  , the kidneys receive blood from the paired renal arteries , and drain into the paired renal veins .
प्रत्येक गुर्दा excretes मूत्र into a ureter , itself a युग्म ढांचा  that empties into the urinary bladder .
Renal physiology is the study of  गुर्दा फलन , जबकि nephrology is the चिकित्सा specialty  concerned with kidney diseases .
Diseases of the kidney are  विविध , लकिन individuals साथ गुर्दा बीमारी अक्सर प्रदर्शक characteristic  clinical features .
Common clinical conditions  involving the गुर्दा शामिल the nephritic और nephrotic syndromes , renal cysts , अधि गुर्दा चोट , दीर्घकालिक गुर्दा  disease , urinary tract infection , nephrolithiasis , and urinary tract obstruction .
Various cancers of the  गुर्दा मौजूद ; the सबसे आम वयस्क renal कर्कट is  renal cell carcinoma .
Cancers , cysts , and some other renal  शर्तें can be प्रबंधित साथ हटाना of the  kidney , or nephrectomy .
When renal function , measured by  glomerular filtration रेट , is persistently ग़रीब ,  dialysis and kidney transplantation may be treatment options .
Although  वे हैं नहीं severely नुकसानदेह , गुर्दा पत्थरों can be  painful and a nuisance .
The removal  of गुर्दा पत्थरों involves अल्ट्रासाउंड उपचार to ब्रेक up the पत्थरों into छोटी  pieces , which are then passed through the urinary tract .
One common symptom of kidney  पत्थरों is a शार्प पीड़ा in the medial/lateral खण्ड of  the lower back .
Lockton Companies Inc. is the world 's largest privately held  बीमे brokerage कड़ , providing बीमे , रिस्क प्रबन्धन और कर्मचारी लाभ समाधान  .
In addition to its Kansas City ,  मिसौरी मुख्यालय , lockton operates 60 स्थितियाँ in 17  countries .
Lockton is currently  घर to अधिक than 4,450 शरीक विश्वव्यापी  .
The company was founded by  जोकर lockton in 1966 और रै चूंकि become the world’s 9th  largest insurance brokerage firm .
Lockton serves a  चौड़ी सरणी of उद्योग साथ सेवाएं कि शामिल रिस्क प्रबन्धन , casualty  , surety , professional indemnity and more .
For 46 years , Lockton  posted असाधारण सशुल्क विकास , साथ वैश्विक revenues reaching  $ 915 million in fiscal 2012 .
Lockton Benefits Group : Lockton’s Employee Benefit’s  टोली works closely साथ बीमे वाहक और प्रशासकों to बनाएँ व्यापक और एकीकृत  benefits strategies for clients .
The Lockton Benefits Group provides services including compliance , executive benefits ,  स्वास्थ्य और welfare , स्वास्थ्य रिस्क समाधान , रिटायरमेंट और अधिक  .
lockton अपनापन : lockton अपनापन , an संबद्ध of lockton कंपनियाँ , meets the बीमे needs  of affinity groups , franchises , professional organizations , and associations of all sizes .
Lockton Affinity offers a  किस्में of बीमे उत्पाद विकल्प और कार्यक्रम  .
Products include :  सामान्य देयता , पेशेवर देयता , प्रॉपर्टी , मजदूर मुआवजे , निर्देशकों & अधिकारियों  Liability , Commercial Auto , Specialty Coverage , Excess , Health Plans and more .
Lockton International : Lockton International  operates कार्यालयों in the uk और आयरलैंड , as खूब as कार्यालयों throughout  Asia and Latin America .
In Europe , Lockton International is a partner  in eos risq , europe’s अग्रणी बीमे  broking and risk management consultancy .
EOS RISQ is an  equity-based यूरोपीय साझेदारी of प्रमुख स्वतंत्र बीमे brokers साथ over 3,500 कर्मचारी  based in more than 30 countries in Europe .
lockton अंतरराष्ट्रीय provides specialized समाधान लिये निजी लाइनों , sme’s और प्रमुख  multi-national clients .
White chocolate is  a चॉकलेट डेरिवेटिव  .
It commonly consists of cocoa butter , sugar , milk solids and  नमक , और is characterized by a पाले पीला or आइवरी रूप  .
The melting point of  cocoa मक्खन , इसके प्राथमिक cocoa सेम घटक , is  high enough to keep white chocolate solid at room temperature .
Donald Leon `` Don '' Blankenship ( born March 14 , 1950 ) was Chairman and CEO of Massey Energy Co.  , the छठे largest कोयले कम्पनी  ( by 2008 production ) in the United States .
He served in  those भूमिकाएँ इससे नवम्बर 30 ,  2000 , until December 31 , 2010 .
Blankenship is an active financial backer of the  रिपब्लिकन पार्टी और भागीदार in लोकल और राज्य राजनीती , विशेषकर in उसके घर राज्य  of West Virginia .
He has frequently spoken out  सरेआम परिचय राजनीती , the पर्यावरण , संघ , और  coal production .
U.S. Securities  और एक्सचेंज आयोग filings दिखाएँ blankenship थी सशुल्क $ 17.8  million in 2009 , the highest in the coal industry .
His 2009 pay represents a $  6.8 लाख उठाएँ over 2008 और लगभग दोगुना उसके मुआवजे पैकेज  in 2007 .
blankenship भी प्राप्त a deferred मुआवजे पैकेज valued  at $ 27.2 million in 2009 .
On December 3 , 2010 , Blankenship announced that he was retiring  as सीईओ at the समाप्त of the साल , और होता be succeeded by massey  President Baxter F. Phillips Jr .

Bow Wow  may भी refer  to:
Bow Wow ( band )  , a जापानी मुश्किल rock/heavy  metal band
