`` Bow Wow Blues ( My Mama Treat Me like a Dog ) '' , a song  रचित in the 1920s by चट्टान dost & nat ओसबोर्न
लापरवाही ( lat . negligentia , इससे neglegere , to उपेक्षा , वस्तुतः `` नहीं to चुनें up कुछ  '' ) is a failure to exercise the care that a reasonably prudent person would exercise in like circumstances .
The area of tort law known as negligence involves  नुक़सान caused by carelessness , नहीं जानबूझकर नुक़सान  .
According  to jay M. feinman of the rutgers  University School of Law ;
`` The core idea of  लापरवाही is कि लोगों चाहिए कसरत उचित परवाह जब वे अधिनियम by लेने खाता  of the potential harm that they might foreseeably cause harm to other people . ''
`` those who go personally or bring  प्रॉपर्टी जहाँ वे जान कि वे or it may आइये into टक्कर साथ the व्यक्तियों or प्रॉपर्टी  of others have by law a duty cast upon them to use reasonable care and skill to avoid such a collision . ''
Fletcher v  rylands ( [ 1866 ] lr 1 ex 265  )
Through civil litigation , if an injured person proves that another  व्यक्ति acted negligently to कारण उनके चोट , वे can रिकवर क्षतिपूर्ति to compensate लिये उनके  harm .
Proving a case for negligence can potentially entitle the injured  अभियोक्ता to मुआवजे लिये नुक़सान to उनके देह , प्रॉपर्टी , दिमागी well-being , वित्तीय औकात , or अंतरंग  relationships .
However , because negligence cases are very fact-specific , this general definition does not  fully बताइये the अवधारणा of जब the विधि होगा आवश्यकता एक व्यक्ति to compensate another लिये नुकसान caused by आकस्मिक चोट .
Further , the law  of लापरवाही at आम विधि is तभी एक पहलू of the विधि  of liability .
हालांकि resulting क्षतिपूर्ति जरूर be सिद्ध in अनुक्रम to रिकवर मुआवजे  in a negligence action , the nature and extent of those damages are not the primary focus of negligence cases .
A melanocytic  nevus ( भी ज्ञात as `` nevocytic nevus '' ) is a प्रकार  of lesion that contains nevus cells ( a type of melanocyte ) .
कुछ स्त्रोत equate the पद  mole with `` melanocytic nevus '' .
Other sources  आरक्षित the पद `` mole '' लिये अन्य उद्देश्य  .
The majority of moles appear during the first two decades  of a person’s जीवन , जबकि परिचय एक in प्रत्येक 100 शिशु is born साथ औज़ार  .
Acquired moles are a form of benign neoplasm , while  जन्मजात औज़ार , or जन्मजात nevi , हैं माना a नाबालिग malformation or hamartoma और may be at a उच्चतर रिस्क  for melanoma .
A mole can be either subdermal ( under the skin ) or a pigmented  विकास on the स्किन , formed ज़्यादातर of a प्रकार of कोशिका  known as a melanocyte .
The high  विशेषज्ञता of the body’s pigmenting  agent , melanin , is responsible for their dark color .
Moles are a member of  the परिवार of स्किन lesions ज्ञात as nevi  .
The  व्यापक metabolic फलक , or रासायनिक स्क्रीन , ( cmp ; cpt कोड 80053 ) is a फलक of 14  blood tests which serves as an initial broad medical screening tool .
The CMP provides a rough check of kidney  फलन , जिगर फलन , और electrolyte और द्रव संतुलन , लकिन  it is far from perfect .
Abnormal values from a CBC may be a result of false positives  और यूँ the cbc may need to be दोहराया लिये a रोगी ( or replaced  with a more specific test ) .
The CMP is an expanded version of  the मौलिक metabolic फलक ( bmp ) , जिससे  does not include liver tests .
A CMP ( or BMP ) can be ordered as part of a routine physical examination , or may be used to  मॉनिटर a रोगी साथ a दीर्घकालिक बीमारी , ऐसे as मधुमेह mellitus or hypertension  .
Previous names  लिये the फलक of परीक्षण have महरूम chem 12 , रसायन फलक  , Chemistry screen , SMA 12 , SMA 20 and SMAC ( Sequential Multiple Analysis - Computer ) .
The tests are  performed on मशीने आधारित on the autoanalyzer  invented in 1957 .
Natural  गैस निष्कर्षण by देशों in घन मीटर  per year .
Natural gas is a naturally occurring hydrocarbon  गैस मिश्रण consisting primarily of मिथेन , लकिन commonly सहित varying amounts of अन्य hydrocarbons , कार्बन डाइऑक्साइड , नाइट्रोजन , और हाइड्रोजन  sulfide .
Natural gas is an energy source  प्रायः प्रयुक्त लिये हीटिंग , कुकिंग , और विद्युत  generation .
It is also  प्रयुक्त as ईंधन लिये वाहनों और as a रासायनिक फर्टिलाइजर in the manufacture of प्लास्टिक और अन्य  commercially important organic chemicals .
Natural gas is found in deep  भूमिगत प्राकृतिक चट्टान formations or संबद्ध साथ अन्य हाइड्रोकार्बन टंकी  in coal beds and as methane clathrates .
Petroleum  is भी another संसाधन मिला in निकटता to और साथ  natural gas .
Most natural gas was created over  समय by दो mechanisms : biogenic और thermogenic  .
Biogenic gas is created by methanogenic  जीवों in marshes , bogs , landfills , और उथले sediments  .
Deeper in the earth , at greater  तापमान और दबाव , thermogenic गैस is निर्मित  from buried organic material .
Before natural gas can be used as a fuel , it must undergo processing  to हटाएँ impurities , सहित जल , to मिलें the विशेषताएँ of marketable प्राकृतिक गैस  .
the by-products of प्रसंस्करण शामिल इथेन , प्रोपेन , butanes , pentanes , और उच्चतर आणविक वज़न hydrocarbons  , hydrogen sulfide ( which may be converted into pure sulfur ) , carbon dioxide , water vapor , and sometimes helium and nitrogen .
Natural gas is often informally referred to  बस as गैस , विशेषकर जब compared to अन्य  energy sources such as oil or coal .
This  पेज is परिचय the कल्पना  Movers band .
For information about the TV show  अभिनीत the बैंड , देखिए कल्पना मूवर्स ( tv श्रेणी  ) .
कल्पना मूवर्स is a बैंड formed in नई ऑरलियन्स  , Louisiana , in 2003 .
The  लाइनअप शामिल समृद्ध कॉलिन्स , स्कॉट durbin , डेव poche  , and Scott `` Smitty '' Smith .
Members  of the समूह यहूद longtime मित्रों  and neighbors .
The group started as a  television/music अवधारणा जिससे थी pitched to लोकल pbs affiliates in  New Orleans .
WLAE-TV was the first to take an interest in the group and later  introduced उन्हें to बेथ कोर्टनी , the अध्यक्ष & मुख्य कार्यपालिका अधिकारी  at Louisiana Public Broadcasting .
Soon after , LPB began airing  one-minute वीडियो उत्पादित by the कल्पना मूवर्स themselves  .
the मूवर्स निर्मित a sizable क्षेत्रीय following by सेटिंग शैक्षणिक गीतों  for kids to melodies and rhythms that adults appreciate as well .
वे बेची अधिक than 100,000 नक़ल of  their self-produced CDs and DVDs .
Their three indie CDs : `` Good Ideas , '' `` Calling All  मूवर्स , '' और `` आठ फीट '' साथ साथ उनके ग्रास जड़ें dvd `` हलचल it up '' have , संयुक्त , जीती चौदह नेशनल पुरस्कार , इससे ऐसे समूह as the नेशनल  Association of Parenting Publications ( NAPPA ) and Parents ' Choice .
In early  2005 , डिज़्नी took सूचना , और initiated negotiations to add  the Movers to the company 's roster .
These were interrupted  in अगस्त जब the बाढ़ सुरक्षा designed और निर्मित by the फौज corps of इंजीनियर्स to  protect New Orleans failed .
The resulting floodwater claimed the band 's office , as well  as the घरों of कॉलिन्स , durbin और poche – लकिन the सौदे थी हस्ताक्षरित  in the spring of 2006 .
In 2008 , Walt Disney  रिकॉर्ड introduced the कल्पना मूवर्स ' म्यूज़िक to the स्वदेश साथ the रिलीज of the मूवर्स ' पहला nationally-released  CD , `` Juice Box Heroes . ''
In September 2008 , a 30-minute show featuring the group began airing on  the डिज़्नी चैनल 's प्रीस्कूल प्रोग्रामिंग ब्लाक ज्ञात as playhouse डिज़्नी , और फिलहाल  airs on Playhouse Disney 's replacement , Disney Junior .
The Movers write and  perform सब the गीतों on उनके  show .
Moreover , the  कल्पना मूवर्स have प्राप्त नाजुक kudos लिये उनके सजीव कॉन्सर्ट प्रदर्शन  .
In October 2009 , the  कल्पना मूवर्स प्रारंभ the `` सजीव इससे the विचार गोदाम  Concert Tour 2009 '' .
Traveling from mid-October to  mid-december 2009 उनके सजीव प्रदर्शन शामिल लोट of उनके पसंदीदा  songs and dancing , as well as video appearances of Warehouse Mouse .
Beginning in  early-february 2011 और wrapping up in लेट may 2011 , the कल्पना मूवर्स प्रस्तुत उनके `` in  a Big Warehouse Concert Tour , '' playing more than 100 shows in 50+ cities across North America .
From March to October 2012 , the Imagination Movers  toured उत्तर अमेरिका on उनके post-disney `` rock-o-matic '' दौरे  .
The show  कायम अनेक तत्व of the असली tv अवधारणा , ऐसे as an on-stage `` विचार आपात '' और अनेक सेट इससे उनके पुरानी कैटलॉग ; however , साथ the प्रस्थान of  Wendy Calio back to her native Hawaii , the character `` Nina '' , along with her musical numbers , is not present .
The tour promotes the Imagination Movers '  नई album/dvd रिलीज , `` rock-o-matic '' , जिससे सुविधाएँ सब नई  music from the band .
The album itself is produced independently of Disney  और रै a notably अधिक वयस्क , समकालीन rock-and-roll ध्वनि , हालांकि  still very appropriate for children .
Several performance dates were  स्थानांतरित to बाद in 2012 to लाभ इससे the increased एक्सपोज़र of the कल्पना मूवर्स tv दिखाएँ अभी playing  daily on Disney Junior .
The platypus (  ornithorhynchus anatinus ) is a semiaquatic स्तनधारी endemic to पूर्वी ऑस्ट्रेलिया , सहित  Tasmania .
Together with the four species of echidna  , it is एक of the पाँच extant प्रजाति of monotremes , the तभी स्तनधारियों कि lay अंडे बजाय of giving  birth .
It is the sole living representative of  इसके परिवार ( ornithorhynchidae ) और genus ( ornithorhynchus ) , हालांकि a क्रमांक  of related species have been found in the fossil record .
The unusual appearance of this egg-laying , duck -billed  , बीवर -tailed , otter -footed स्तनधारी मनोरथ यूरोपीय naturalists जब वे पहला encountered it , साथ कुछ considering  it an elaborate fraud .
It is one of the few venomous mammals , the  पुरूष platypus having a spur on the हिन्द पैर कि delivers a venom सक्षम  of causing severe pain to humans .
The unique features of the platypus make it an important subject in the study of evolutionary biology and a recognisable and iconic symbol  of ऑस्ट्रेलिया ; it रै appeared as a शुभंकर at नेशनल कार्यक्रम और is प्रदर्शित on the रिवर्स of इसके 20-cent सिक्का  .
The platypus is  the एनिमल emblem of the राज्य of नई दक्षिण वेल्स  .
Until the early 20th century , it was hunted for its fur  , लकिन it is अभी सुरक्षित throughout इसके  range .
Although captive  प्रजनन programmes have था तभी सीमित कामयाबी और the platypus is vulnerable  to the effects of pollution , it is not under any immediate threat .
The Chupacabra or Chupacabras ( , from chupar `` to suck  '' और cabra `` बकरी '' , वस्तुतः `` बकरी चूषक '' ) is a legendary cryptid rumored to inhabit भाग of the americas  .
It is associated more recently with sightings of an allegedly unknown animal in Puerto Rico ( where these sightings were first  reported ) , मैक्सिको , और the संयुक्त राज्य , विशेषकर in the latter  's Latin American communities .
The name comes from the animal 's reported  आदत of attacking और पीने the रक्त of पशुधन  , especially goats .
शारीरिक descriptions of the प्राणी  vary .
Eyewitness sightings have been claimed as early as 1995 in Puerto Rico , and have since been reported as far north as Maine , and as  दूर दक्षिण as चिली , और भी होने spotted बाहर the americas in देशों जैसे रूस और the  Philippines .
It is supposedly a heavy creature , the size of a  छोटी भालू , साथ a पंक्ति of कांटे reaching इससे the गर्दन to the  base of the tail .
Sighting  रिपोर्ट्स of the chupacabra have महरूम disregarded as uncorroborated or lacking प्रमाण , जबकि सबसे रिपोर्ट्स in उत्तरी मैक्सिको  and the southern United States have been verified as canids afflicted by mange .
Biologists and wildlife management  officials दृश्य the chupacabra as a समकालीन  legend .
The North American Free Trade Agreement ( NAFTA ) is an agreement  हस्ताक्षरित by कनाडा , मैक्सिको , और the संयुक्त राज्य , बनाना a trilateral व्यापार  bloc in North America .
The agreement  आए into फ़ोर्स on जनवरी 1  , 1994 .
It  superseded the canada–united राज्य फ़्री व्यापार अनुबंध between  the U.S. , Canada , and Mexico
NAFTA has two supplements  : the उत्तर अमरीकी अनुबंध on पर्यावरणीय सहयोग ( naaec ) और the उत्तर अमरीकी  Agreement on Labor Cooperation ( NAALC ) .
Thermal comfort is the condition of mind that expresses  संतोष साथ the थर्मल पर्यावरण और is assessed by subjective मूल्यांकन ( ansi / ashrae  Standard 55 ) .
maintaining इस मानक of थर्मल सुकून लिये occupants of इमारतें or अन्य enclosures  is one of the important goals of HVAC ( heating , ventilation , and air conditioning ) design engineers .
The Predicted Mean  vote ( pmv ) मॉडल स्टैंड among the सबसे पहचाना थर्मल सुकून  models .
It was  विकसित using सिद्धान्त of ऊष्मा संतुलन और प्रायोगिक आंकड़ा एकत्रित in a नियंत्रित जलवायु कक्ष  under steady state conditions .
Because the PMV model was derived from data collected in  a नियंत्रित जलवायु , it is नहीं उपयुक्त लिये अनुप्रयोग in naturally  ventilated spaces which often have high levels of air movement .
This shortcoming motivated the development of a family of empirical statistical models of  थर्मल सुकून in naturally हवादार स्पेसेस ज्ञात as अनुकूली मॉडल  .
Adaptive models of thermal comfort consider occupants as dynamically interacting with their  पर्यावरण , और controlling उनके थर्मल सुकून by अर्थात् of कपडे or window-opening  and closing .
This is in contrast to thermal comfort in sealed  इमारतें , in जिससे occupants अनुभव the पर्यावरण  passively .
थर्मल सुकून is प्रभावित by ऊष्मा conduction , संवहन  , radiation , and evaporative heat loss .
Thermal comfort is maintained when the heat generated by human  चयापचय is अनुमत to dissipate , यूँ maintaining थर्मल  equilibrium with the surroundings .
It has been  long पहचाना कि the सनसनी of अहसास  hot or cold is not just dependent on air temperature alone .
Thermal  सुकून calculations according to ansi/ashrae मानक 55 can be freely performed साथ  the CBE Thermal Comfort Tool for ASHRAE-55 .
Durante degli Alighieri , simply referred to  as दांते ( , ; ; c. 1265–1321 ) , थी a प्रमुख इतालवी कवि of the मध्य  Ages .
His Divine Comedy ,  originally पुकारा ' और बाद पुकारा ' by boccaccio , is widely माना the महानतम  literary work composed in the Italian language and a masterpiece of world literature .
In Italy he is known as ' ( ``  the परम् कवि '' ) or बस '  .
He , Petrarch and Boccaccio are also known as `` the  तीन स्रोतों '' or `` the तीन crowns  '' .
Dante is also called the  `` पिता of the इतालवी भाषा  '' .
मुख्यालय ( कोबे  , Japan )
( )  is a टायर और रबर कम्पनी आधारित  in Japan .
it is भाग of the  Sumitomo Group .
The company traces its origins  to 1909 , जब the sumitomo समूह बना an निवेश in dunlop जापानी , the newly formed जापानी subsidiary  of the British company Dunlop Rubber .
Over the years Sumitomo and  dunlop विकसित a बंद कारोबार  relationship , and in 1963 the Sumitomo Group acquired control of Dunlop Japan and renamed it Sumitomo Rubber Industries Ltd .
In 1985 , when Dunlop Rubber was taken over by BTR  पीएलसी , the कम्पनी acquired the ऑटोमोबाइल टायर एसेट of dunlop , सहित the सही to उपयोग the dunlop ब्रांड on  automobile tires .
the अधिग्रहण किया नहीं शामिल the us और ऑस्ट्रेलियाई व्यवसायों , जिससे यहूद separately स्वामित्व , लकिन in 1986 sumitomo  also acquired the Dunlop Tire Corporation of the US from its management .
In 1997 , Sumitomo formed a joint  venture साथ goodyear टायर और रबर कम्पनी , by जिससे goodyear और sumitomo सहमत to manufacture टायर लिये प्रत्येक  other 's markets , including Dunlop branded tires .
As part of the agreement  , goodyear acquired 75 % रूचि in dunlop टायर , the uk कम्पनी जिससे sumitomo था formed  , and in Dunlop Tire Corporation .
Goodyear and  sumitomo भी बना निवेश  in each other .
Today , the company  makes a चौड़ी दायरा of रबर आधारित उत्पाद , सहित ऑटोमोबाइल टायर , गोल्फ़  balls and tennis balls .
Microsoft Visual Studio Express is a set of freeware integrated development environments ( IDE ) developed by  microsoft कि हैं lightweight संस्करण of the microsoft विज़ुअल स्टुडियो उत्पाद लकीर  .
Express Editions  यहूद conceived शुरूआत साथ विज़ुअल स्टुडियो  2005 .
The idea of Express editions is to provide  streamlined , easy-to-use और easy-to-learn ides लिये उपयोक्ता अन्य than पेशेवर तन्त्र डेवलपर , ऐसे as hobbyists और विद्यार्थी  .
The Alps are one of the great mountain range systems of Europe stretching approximately across eight  अल्पाइन देशों इससे ऑस्ट्रिया और स्लोवेनियाई in the ईस्ट , स्विट्ज़रलैंड , liechtenstein , जर्मनी , फ़्रांस to the वेस्ट और इटली और  Monaco to the south .
The  kyu यहूद formed over सैंकड़ों of लाखो of सालो as the अफ़्रीकी और यूरेशियाई  tectonic plates collided .
Extreme shortening caused by the event resulted in marine sedimentary  रॉक्स उठती by thrusting और फोल्डिंग into ऊँची पहाड़ चोटियों ऐसे as मोंट blanc और the matterhorn  .
Mont Blanc spans the  french–italian किनारा , और at is the उच्चतम पहाड़  in the Alps .
The Alpine region area contains  अनेक चोटियों उच्चतर than , ज्ञात as the  `` four-thousanders `` .
The altitude and size of the  दायरा affects the जलवायु in यूरोपीय ; in the kyu वर्षण स्तर  vary greatly and climatic conditions consist of distinct zones .
Wildlife  ऐसे as ibex सजीव in the उच्चतर चोटियों to elevations of , और पौधे ऐसे as edelweiss grow in  rocky areas in lower elevations as well as in higher elevations .
Evidence of human habitation in the  ऐल्प्स goes वापस to the paleolithic era .
A mummified man ,  संकल्पित to be 5,000 सालो बूढ़ा , थी खोजा on a हिमानी at the austrian–italian  border in 1991 .
By the 6th century BC ,  the सेल्टिक la tène संस्कृति थी खूब स्थापित  .
Hannibal may have crossed  the ऐल्प्स साथ a झुंड of हाथियों , और the romans था settlements in  the region .
In 1800  नेपोलियन crossed एक of the पहाड़  passes with an army of 40,000 .
The 18th and 19th centuries saw an  influx of naturalists , लेखक , और कलाकारों , in particular the romantics , followed by the सुनहरी  age of alpinism as mountaineers began to ascend the peaks .
In World  युद्ध ii the तीसरा reich invaded the अल्पाइन देशों , साथ the एक्सेप्शन of स्विट्ज़रलैंड और liechtenstein ; एडोल्फ हिटलर रखा  a base of operation in the Bavarian Alps throughout the war .
The  अल्पाइन प्रदेश रै a दमदार सांस्कृतिक  identity .
The traditional culture of farming , cheesemaking , and woodworking still exists in Alpine villages , although the tourist industry began to grow early in the 20th  सदी और विस्तारित greatly बाद संसार युद्ध ii to become the प्रबल उद्योग by the समाप्त of the सदी  .
The Winter Olympic Games have been  hosted in the स्विस , फ्रेंच , इतालवी , आस्ट्रिया और जर्मनी ऐल्प्स .
At  उपस्थित the प्रदेश is घर to 14 लाख लोगों और  has 120 million annual visitors .
Lois Patrice Griffin ( née Pewterschmidt )  is a अक्षर इससे the एनिमेटेड टेलीविज़न श्रेणी  Family Guy .
She is voiced by  लेखक एलेक्स borstein और पहला appeared on टेलीविज़न , साथ साथ the बाकी of the परिवार in the 15-minute  short on December 20 , 1998 .
Lois was  निर्मित और designed by श्रेणी निर्माता सेठ macfarlane  .
MacFarlane was asked to pitch a pilot to the Fox  प्रसारण कम्पनी आधारित on लैरी और स्टीव , a छोटी बना by macfarlane जिससे प्रदर्शित a middle-aged  character named Larry and an intellectual dog , Steve .
After the pilot was given the green  लाइट , the griffin परिवार appeared on the एपीसोड `` मौत रै a छाया `` .
Lois is  the माँ of the griffin  family .
With her husband Peter , she  रै था तीन children : मेग , क्रिस  , and Stewie .
Lois is  प्रायः portrayed as a stereotypical टेलीविज़न माँ , despite उसके admitting to होने a  drug user , a recovering meth addict kleptomaniac .
Lois has also had several affairs , one  of जिससे allegedly resulted in the धारणा of  Meg .
She has appeared in other media relating to Family Guy—including a  वीडियो खेल , commercials और books—and प्रेरित an  entire line of merchandise .
Lois 's  distinctive नई यॉर्क एक्सेंट originated इससे a अक्षर in a स्टेज दिखाएँ कि एलेक्स borstein था performed in , जिससे थी largely प्रेरित by a सापेक्ष  who grew up on Long Island , New York .
Family  हस्तांतरण of बास्क भाषा ( बास्क  as initial language )
प्रतिशत of विद्यार्थी पंजीकृत in  Basque language schools ( 2000–2005 ) .
Location of the  basque-language प्रांतों भीतर स्पेन और फ़्रांस
Basque ( endonym : , ) is the ancestral language of the Basque  लोगों , जो inhabit the बास्क देश , a प्रदेश spanning an क्षेत्रफल in northeastern स्पेन और southwestern फ़्रांस  .
It is spoken by  27 % of basques in सब territories ( 714,136  out of 2,648,998 ) .
Of these , 663,035  सजीव in the स्पेनी भाग of the बास्क देश और the बाकी 51,100  live in the French part .
In academic  चर्चाएँ of the वितरण of बास्क in स्पेन और फ़्रांस , it is प्रथागत to  refer to three ancient provinces in France and four Spanish provinces .
Native  अध्यक्षों हैं concentrated in a संलग्न क्षेत्रफल सहित भाग of the स्पेनी autonomous समुदायों  of the Basque Country and Navarre and in the western half of the French département of Pyrénées-Atlantiques .
The Basque Autonomous Community is an administrative entity within the binational ethnographic Basque Country incorporating the traditional Spanish provinces of  biscay , gipuzkoa , और álava , जिससे retain उनके अस्तित्व as politico-administrative  divisions .
These provinces and many areas of Navarre are heavily populated by ethnic Basques , but Basque was , at least until the 1990s , not spoken as a native language in  सबसे of álava , पश्चिमी भाग of biscay और सेंट्रल और दक्षिणी क्षेत्रों of नावारा , either क्युकी it था महरूम replaced by स्पेनी साथ the सदियां , in कुछ क्षेत्रों , or क्युकी it था never महरूम बोला वहीँ , in अन्य  areas .
In southwestern France , the ancient Basque-populated  प्रांतों यहूद labourd , निम्नतर नावारा , और soule  .
They and other regions were  संचित into a सिंगल département in 1790 अंतर्गत the नाम basses-pyrénées  , a name which persisted until 1970 .
A standardized form of the Basque  भाषा , पुकारा euskara batua , थी विकसित by the बास्क भाषा अकादमी in the लेट  1960s .
Euskara Batua was created so that Basque language could be used—and easily understood by all Basque  speakers—in औपचारिक परिस्थितियों ( शिक्षा , द्रव्यमान मीडिया , साहित्य ) ,  and this is its main use today .
The role of this standard  बास्क भाषा depends on the भाषाई शैक्षणिक मॉडल of प्रत्येक प्रदेश और प्रत्येक  school .
In most  क्षेत्रों of the स्पेनी बास्क देश , the शैक्षणिक मॉडल d , जहाँ सब विषय हैं सिखाया in बास्क , मगर ``  Spanish language and literature '' ( which is taught in Spanish ) is now the predominant model .
In France , the Basque language school Seaska and the association for a bilingual ( Basque and  फ्रेंच ) schooling ikasbi मिलें a चौड़ी दायरा of बास्क भाषा शैक्षणिक needs up to the छठे रूप , जबकि प्रायः struggling to surmount  financial and administrative constraints .
Apart from this standardized version , there are five main  बास्क dialects : bizkaian , gipuzkoan , और अपर navarrese in स्पेन , और navarrese–lapurdian और  Zuberoan ( in France ) .
Although they take their names from the mentioned  ऐतिहासिक प्रांतों , the dialect सीमाएँ हैं नहीं congruent साथ प्रांत  boundaries .
The President , Directors and Company , of the Bank of the  संयुक्त राज्य , commonly ज्ञात as the पहला बैंको of the संयुक्त राज्य , थी a सेंट्रल बैंको  , chartered for a term of twenty years , by the United States Congress on February 25 , 1791 .
स्थापना of the बैंको थी शामिल in a three-part विस्तार of संघीय फिस्कल और मौद्रिक शक्ति ( साथ साथ a संघीय मिंट  and excise taxes ) championed by Alexander Hamilton , first Secretary of the Treasury .
Hamilton believed a central bank was necessary to stabilize and  improve the स्वदेश 's क्रेडिट , और to improve हैंडलिंग of the वित्तीय कारोबार of the संयुक्त राज्य  government under the newly enacted Constitution .
Officially proposed to the first  सत्र of the पहला कॉंग्रेस in 1790 , हैमिल्टन 's बैंको faced फैली  resistance from opponents of increased federal power .
Secretary of State  थामस जेफरसन और जेम्स मैडिसन led the विपक्ष , जिससे claimed कि the बैंको थी असंवैधानिक , और कि it benefited  merchants and investors at the expense of the majority of the population .
The First Bank  भवन is अभी a नेशनल ऐतिहासिक लैंडमार्क स्तिथ in फिलाडेल्फिया , पेन्सिलवेनिया भीतर स्वतंत्रता  National Historical Park .
James Wesley Marsters (  born अगस्त 20 , 1962 ) is an अमरीकी कर्ता और  musician .
Marsters first came to the  ध्यान of the सामान्य पब्लिक playing the लोकप्रिय अक्षर  Spike , a platinum-blond yobbish English vampire in the television series Buffy the Vampire Slayer and its spin-off series , Angel , from 1997 to 2004 .
Since then , he has gone on to play other science fiction roles , such as the  एलियन supervillain brainiac on the सुपरमैन -inspired श्रेणी smallville , the omnisexual समय मुसाफ़िर कप्तान जॉन हार्ट  in British science-fiction show Torchwood and terrorist Barnabas Greeley in Sci fi 's Caprica .
Marsters  appeared in a supporting भूमिका in the 2007  movie P.S .
I Love You and as  the प्रमुख विपक्षी , piccolo , in the 2009 काल्पनिक  adventure film Dragonball Evolution .
he appeared as a पुनरावर्ती अक्षर in the पहला  season of the revival of Hawaii 5-0 .
In molecular biology , human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG )  is a हार्मोन उत्पादित by the निषेचित अंडा बाद धारणा  .
Later  दौरान गर्भावस्था it is बना by the विकासशील placenta , और बाद by  the placental component syncytiotrophoblast .
Some cancerous tumors produce this hormone  ; इसलिए , elevated स्तर measured जब the रोगी is नहीं गर्भवती can सीसे  to a cancer diagnosis .
However , it is not known  whether इस उत्पादन is a contributing कारण  or an effect of tumorigenesis .
The pituitary analogue  of hcg , ज्ञात as luteinizing हार्मोन ( lh ) , is उत्पादित in the pituitary ग्रंथि of  males and females of all ages .
,  the एफडीए रै निषिद्ध the बिक्री of `` होम्योपैथिक '' और over the  counter hCG diet products and declared them fraudulent and illegal .
Beyoncé Giselle Knowles-Carter , known by  उसके स्टेज नाम बेयोंस ( ; born सितंबर 4 , 1981 ) , is an अमरीकी सिंगर ,  songwriter , dancer , and actress .
Born and raised in Houston , Texas , she performed in singing  और नाचना प्रतियोगिताओं as a चाइल्ड पहले forming in 1990 a समूह साथ केली rowland और latavia  Roberson that was eventually named Destiny 's Child .
Once  हस्ताक्षरित to कोलंबिया रिकॉर्ड , the लड़कियों  subsequently became one of the world 's best-selling girl groups of all time .
The group was plagued  by आतंरिक विरोध और विधिक turmoil और नॉलेस suffered इससे अवसाद कि lasted  for a number of years .
During the group 's  अंतराल , नॉलेस released उसके डेब्यू सोलो एल्बम dangerously in प्रेम ( 2003 ) , जिससे अर्जित उसके पाँच ग्रैमी पुरस्कार और रै बेची a कुल  of 4.9 million copies in the US alone .
It spawned Billboard  क्रमांक एक singles `` क्रेजी in प्रेम , '' माना by vh1 to be the `` महानतम सोंग of the 00 's , '' और ``  Baby Boy . ''
Following the disbandment of Destiny 's Child in 2005 , Knowles 's second solo  एल्बम b'day ( 2006 ) contained the शीर्ष पाँच singles `` déjà vu `` , `` अपूरणीय `` , और ``  Beautiful Liar `` .
Her  प्रदर्शन in dreamgirls (  2006 ) earned her two Golden Globe nominations .
Knowles '  कार्य playing etta जेम्स in कि  film inspired her subsequent album I Am ...
Sasha Fierce ( 2008 ) which spawned hits  `` if i यहूद a लड़के `` , `` सिंगल महिलाओं ( put a रिंग on it ) `` , `` हेलो `` ,  and `` Sweet Dreams `` .
The album also helped  नॉलेस earn छह grammys in 2010 , तोड़कर the रिकार्ड लिये सबसे ग्रैमी पुरस्कार  won by a female artist in one night .
उसके चौथी एल्बम 4 ( 2011 ) deviated towards परंपरागत r  & B and became her fourth consecutive number one album on the Billboard 200 .
In  जनवरी 2012 , नॉलेस दिया जनम to बेटी ब्लू आइवी कार्टर  , her first child with husband Jay-Z .
Knowles has sold over 13  लाख एल्बम in the us और 118 लाख रिकॉर्ड विश्वव्यापी ( as खूब as a further 50 लाख रिकॉर्ड साथ नियति 's चाइल्ड ) , और is एक of the best-selling  music artists of all time .
The Recording Industry Association of America  ( riaa ) पहचाना नॉलेस as the शीर्ष certified कलाकार of the 2000s  .
In  2009 , बिलबोर्ड नामित उसके the शीर्ष रेडियो गीतों कलाकार of the दशक और  ranked her the Top Female Artist and the fourth Artist of the Decade .
Beyoncé Knowles is the most nominated woman in Grammy Award history ,  receiving 17 पुरस्कार ; अन्य accolades शामिल 12 एमटीवी वीडियो म्यूज़िक पुरस्कार , 7 बिलबोर्ड पुरस्कार सहित a  Millennium Award , and a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame as part of Destiny 's Child .
`` Angry All the Time '' is the title of a  सोंग लिखा by ब्रूस robison और पहला अंकित on उसके 1998 एल्बम लपेटा  .
It was  बाद covered by टिम mcgraw साथ अतिथि vocalist  Faith Hill .
Released in July  2001 , mcgraw 's संस्करण थी the दूसरी सिंगल इससे mcgraw 's नियत इस  Circus Down album .
The song reached  क्रमांक एक on the बिलबोर्ड hot देश singles & ट्रैक्स ( अभी  Hot Country Songs ) charts .
Dear John  is a 2010 अमरीकी रोमांटिक नाटक  - war film starring Amanda Seyfried and Channing Tatum .
It was released  theatrically in उत्तर अमेरिका on फ़रवरी 5  , 2010 .
The film was directed by Lasse Hallström , and it is  an अनुकूलन of निकोलस स्पार्क्स 's अनोखा of the वही नाम  .
It follows the life of a soldier (  चेनिंग टैटम ) बाद he जलप्रपात in प्रेम साथ a यंग स्त्री ( अमांडा seyfried  ) .
They decide to exchange letters  to प्रत्येक अन्य बाद he is तैनात  to the war .
The movie was  फिल्माया in 2009 in चार्ल्सटन , दक्षिण कैरोलिना .
Despite receiving  ऋणात्मक समीक्षाएँ , the फिल्मी बना a दमदार बक्सा दफ्तर प्रदर्शन , knocking बंद अवतार बाद सात सप्ताहांत in पहला प्लेस  and grossing a total of $ 114,977,104 worldwide .
The  फिल्मी थी released on may 25 , 2010 on  DVD and Blu-ray .
These are  सूचियाँ of the व्यस्ततम एयरपोर्ट in the  United States .
Hartsfield–Jackson Atlanta  अंतरराष्ट्रीय विमानक्षेत्र is the व्यस्ततम सिंगल विमानक्षेत्र in the संयुक्त  States .
however , सब of the नई यॉर्क नगर महानगर क्षेत्रफल 's एयरपोर्ट combine to बनाएँ the largest विमानक्षेत्र  system in the United States , second in the world in terms of passenger traffic , and first in the world in terms of total flight operations .
Dora the Explorer is an American animated  टेलीविज़न श्रेणी निर्मित by क्रिस gifford , वैलेरी  Walsh , and Eric Weiner .
Dora the Explorer  became a नियमित श्रेणी in 2000  .
The show is  carried on the निकलोडियन केबल टेलीविज़न संजाल , सहित  the associated Nick Jr. channel .
It  aired on सीबीएस जबतक सितंबर  2006 .
A Spanish-dubbed version first aired as part of a Nick en español block on NBC Universal -owned Telemundo  through सितंबर 2006 ; चूंकि अप्रैल 2008 , इस संस्करण of the कार्यक्रम रै महरूम carried on univision as भाग of the planeta u ब्लाक  .
सांता fe ( ; ( tewa : ogha po'oge , ) )  is the capital of the U.S. state of New Mexico .
It is the  fourth-largest नगर in the राज्य  and is the seat of .
Santa Fe (  अर्थ “holy faith” in स्पेनी  ) had a population of 67,947 in the 2010 census .
It is the principal city of a  महानगर सांख्यिकीय क्षेत्रफल जिससे encompasses सब of सांता fe काउंटी और is भाग of the larger  Albuquerque-Santa Fe-Las Vegas Combined Statistical Area .
The city’s full name when founded was La Villa Real de la Santa Fé de San Francisco de Asís ( “The Royal Town  of the पावन आस्था of st. फ्रांसिस of assisi”  ) .
Pepsi  ( stylized in लोअरकेस as पेप्सी , formerly stylized in अपरकेस as पेप्सी ) is a कार्बोनेटेड  soft drink that is produced and manufactured by PepsiCo .
Created and developed in 1893 and introduced as Brad 's Drink , it was  renamed as pepsi-cola on अगस्त 28 , 1898 , तब to पेप्सी in 1961  .
1765 broadside
The Sons of Liberty was a group consisting of American  देशप्रेमी कि originated in the pre-independence उत्तर अमरीकी अंग्रेजों colonies  .
The group was  formed to protect the अधिकारों of the colonists और to लो to the  streets against the taxes by the British government .
वे हैं बेहतरीन ज्ञात लिये undertaking the बोस्टन चाय पार्टी in 1773 , जिससे led to the असहनीय  Acts ( an intense crackdown by the British government ) , and a counter-mobilization by the Patriots .
ओसाका  castle
is a city in the Kansai region of  जापानी 's प्रमुख द्वीप of होन्शू , a designated नगर अंतर्गत the लोकल स्वायत्तता विधि , the पूंजी नगर of ओसाका प्रीफ़ेक्चर और भी the largest भाग of the keihanshin metropolis  , which comprises three major cities of Japan , Kyoto , Osaka and Kobe .
स्तिथ at the मुँह of the yodo नदी on ओसाका खाड़ी , ओसाका is जापानी 's तीसरा largest  city by population after Tokyo ( special wards ) and Yokohama .
Keihanshin is  the दूसरी largest महानगर क्षेत्रफल in जापानी by जनसांख्यिकी और एक of the largest महानगर क्षेत्रों अत्यधिक क्रमित in the संसार , साथ nearly 19 लाख लोगों , और by जीडीपी the  second largest area in Japan and the seventh largest area in the world .
Historically the commercial center of Japan , Osaka  कृत्यों as एक of the कमांड centers  for the Japanese economy .
The ratio between daytime and night time  जनसांख्यिकी is 141 % , the उच्चतम in जापानी , highlighting इसके औकात as an आर्थिक  center .
Its nighttime population is 2.6 million , the third in the country , but in daytime the population surges to 3.7 million ,  दूसरी तभी बाद टोकियो ( combining the खास wards of टोकियो , जिससे is नहीं a सिंगल incorporated नगर , लिये सांख्यिकीय उद्देश्य ; देखिए the टोकियो आलेख लिये अधिक सूचना on the परिभाषा  and makeup of Tokyo ) .
Osaka used to be referred to as the in feudal Edo  काल क्युकी it थी the केन्द्र of व्यापार लिये राइस , बनाना the पहला आधुनिक futures एक्सचेंज  market in the world .
The Little Mermaid is a 1989  अमरीकी एनिमेटेड musical काल्पनिक फिल्मी उत्पादित by वॉल्ट डिज़्नी विशेषता एनिमेशन  and distributed by Walt Disney Pictures .
Based on the Danish fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen , The Little  मरमेड tells the स्टोरी of a खूबसूरत मरमेड जो सपनो of  becoming human .
Written , directed , and produced by Ron Clements and John Musker , with music by Alan Menken and Howard Ashman , the film features the voices Jodi Benson , Christopher Daniel Barnes , Pat  कैरल , सैमुएल E. राइट , जेसन मारिन , केनेथ मंगल  , Buddy Hacket , and Rene Auberjonois .
The 28th film in  the वॉल्ट डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड क्लासिक श्रेणी , the छोटी मरमेड थी released to थिएटर on नवम्बर 14 , 1989 to largely धनात्मक समीक्षाएँ , garnering $ 84 लाख at the बक्सा दफ्तर दौरान इसके आरंभिक रिलीज  , and $ 211 million in total lifetime gross .
After the success of the 1988 Disney /  amblin फिल्मी जो framed रोजर खरगोश , the छोटी मरमेड is दिए क्रेडिट लिये श्वास जीवन वापस into the आर्ट of डिज़्नी एनिमेटेड विशेषता films  after a string of critical or commercial failures produced by Disney that dated back to the early 1970s .
It also  चिह्नित the प्रारंभ of the era ज्ञात as the  Disney Renaissance .
A stage adaptation of the  फिल्मी साथ a किताब by डग राइट और अतिरिक्त गीतों by एलन menken और नई गीतों  Glenn Slater opened in Denver in July 2007 and began performances on Broadway January 10 , 2008 .
alt=Close-up photo of a  मेटल चमचा भर साथ a viscous , साफ  purple fluid
Purple drank is a slang term  लिये a recreational ड्रग लोकप्रिय in the हिप हॉप जातियाँ in the दक्षिणी  United States , originating in Houston , Texas .
Its main ingredient is  नुस्खा -strength खांसी सिरप containing codeine  and promethazine .
Cough syrup is typically mixed with ingredients such as  sprite नरम पेय or पहाड़ ओस और टुकड़े of प्रसन्न  Rancher candy .
The purplish hue  of जामुनी पिया आता इससे dyes in  the cough syrup .
There are  numerous कठबोली शर्तें लिये जामुनी पिया , सहित sizzurp , झुकना , सिरप ,  drank , barre , purple jelly , Texas tea , and Tsikuni .
First/given , middle ,  और last/family/surname आरेख साथ J. S. बच as उदाहरण  .
J. S. Bach shared his  दिए नाम साथ छह तात्कालिक परिवार सदस्यों और अनेक  extended family members .
He shared his  परिवार नाम साथ सबसे परिवार सदस्यों  .
A given name , in Western contexts often referred to as a first name ,  is a निजी नाम कि specifies और differentiates between सदस्यों of a समूह of individuals , विशेषकर in a परिवार ,  all of whose members usually share the same family name ( surname ) .
A given name is purposefully given , usually by a  चाइल्ड 's अभिभावक at or निकट जनम , in कंट्रास्ट to an inherited एक ऐसे  as a family name .
A given  नाम is sometimes legally बदला through  a name change .
Given names are often  प्रयुक्त in a परिचित और दोस्ताना manner in अनौपचारिक  situations .
In more formal  परिस्थितियों the उपनाम is प्रयुक्त बजाय , जबतक it is जरुरी  to distinguish between people with the same surname .
The idiom `` on a first-name  आधार '' ( or `` on first-name शर्तें '' ) alludes to  the familiarity of addressing another by a given name .
The western style of having both a family name (  उपनाम ) और a दिए नाम is दूर इससे सार्वभौमिक  .
In many countries it is common for ordinary  लोगों to have तभी एक नाम ( a  mononym ) .
Hydrochloric acid is a  साफ , colourless समाधान of हाइड्रोजन  chloride ( H Cl ) in water .
It  is a अत्यधिक क्षयकारी , दमदार खनिज एसिड साथ  many industrial uses .
हाइड्रोक्लोरिक एसिड is मिला naturally in gastric  acid .
Historically  पुकारा muriatic एसिड , और आत्माओं of नमक , हाइड्रोक्लोरिक एसिड थी उत्पादित इससे vitriol  ( sulfuric acid ) and common salt .
It first appeared during the Renaissance , and then it was used by  chemists ऐसे as glauber , प्रीस्टलि और डेवी in उनके वैज्ञानिक शोध  .
With major production starting  in the औद्योगिक क्रान्ति , हाइड्रोक्लोरिक एसिड is प्रयुक्त in the रासायनिक उद्योग as a  chemical reagent in the large-scale production of vinyl chloride for PVC plastic , and MDI / TDI for polyurethane .
It has numerous smaller-scale applications , including  household सफ़ाई , उत्पादन of जिलेटिन और अन्य खाना एडिटिव , descaling , और चमड़े  processing .
परिचय 20 लाख टन of हाइड्रोक्लोरिक  acid are produced annually .
Wheat (  triticum spp . ) is a खाद्यान्न अनाज , originally इससे the  Levant region of the Near East and Ethiopian Highlands , but now cultivated worldwide .
In 2010 , world production of wheat was  651 लाख टन , बनाना it the तीसरा most-produced खाद्यान्न बाद मक्का ( 844 लाख टन  ) and rice ( 672 million tons ) .
Wheat was the second  most-produced खाद्यान्न in 2009 ; संसार उत्पादन in कि साल थी 682 लाख टन  , after maize ( 817 million tons ) , and with rice as a close third ( 679 million tons ) .
This grain is grown on more  जमीन क्षेत्रफल than कोई अन्य वाणिज्यिक खाना .
World  व्यापार in गेहूं is वृहद than लिये सब  other crops combined .
Globally  , गेहूं is the अग्रणी सोर्स of सब्ज़ी प्रोटीन in इंसान खाना , having a उच्चतर प्रोटीन  content than soybeans or the other major cereals , maize ( corn ) or rice .
In terms of total production tonnages used for food , it is currently  दूसरी to राइस as the प्रमुख इंसान खाना क्रॉप और ahead of मक्का , बाद allowing  for maize 's more extensive use in animal feeds .
Wheat was a key factor enabling the  emergence of city-based समाजों at the प्रारंभ of सभ्यता क्युकी it थी एक of the पहला फसलों कि could be easily cultivated on a विशाल स्केल , और था  the additional advantage of yielding a harvest that provides long-term storage of food .
Wheat contributed to the  emergence of city-states in the fertile crescent , सहित the  Babylonian and Assyrian empires .
Wheat grain is a staple food used to make flour for leavened , flat and steamed breads , biscuits , cookies , cakes , breakfast cereal , pasta ,  नूडल्स , couscous और लिये fermentation to मेक बियर , अन्य alcoholic पेय , or  biofuel .
Wheat is planted to a limited extent as a forage crop  लिये पशुधन , और इसके स्ट्रॉ can be प्रयुक्त as a निर्माण सामग्री लिये roofing फूस  .
The whole grain can be milled to  छोड़ बस the भ्रूणपोष लिये श्वेत आटा  .
the by-products of इस हैं  bran and germ .
The whole grain is a concentrated source of vitamins , minerals ,  और प्रोटीन , जबकि the परिष्कृत अनाज is ज़्यादातर  starch .
मुद्रण
to प्रकाशित is to मेक सामग्री उपलब्धियाँ  to the general public .
जबकि विशिष्ट उपयोग of the पद may vary among देशों , it is प्रायः लागू to टेक्स्ट , बिंब , or अन्य audio-visual सामग्री on कोई  traditional medium , including paper ( newspapers , magazines , catalogs , etc . ) .
The  शब्द प्रकाशन अर्थात् the अधिनियम of प्रकाशन , और भी refers  to any printed copies .
Melissa & Joey is an ABC  परिवार असली टेलीविज़न श्रेणी अभिनीत मेलिसा जोन  Hart and Joey Lawrence .
it पहला aired on एबीसी परिवार  on August 17 , 2010 .
The series follows local politician Mel Burke ( Melissa Joan Hart ) and  जो longo ( जॉय लॉरेंस ) , जिसको mel hires to dekh बाद उसके भांजी और भतीजे बाद a  Ponzi scheme leaves him broke .
The series was renewed by  एबीसी परिवार लिये a दूसरी ऋतु of पंद्रह एपीसोड , जिससे began airing on may  30 , 2012 and ended on August 29 , 2012 .
Melissa & Joey ranks as cable TV 's #  1 telecast at 8 o'clock आरपार निशाना ऑडियंस 18–34 , 18–49 और 12–34 जनसांख्यिकी  .
On August 17 , 2012 , ABC Family  नवीनीकृत मेलिसा & जॉय लिये a तीसरा ऋतु ,  set to premiere in spring 2013 .
The Dharma wheel , often  प्रयुक्त to represent the प्रतिष्ठित eightfold  Path
The Noble Eightfold Path ( , ) is one of the principal teachings of the Buddha , who described  it as the रास्ता अग्रणी to the cessation of कष्ट ( dukkha ) और the उपलब्धि of self-awakening  .
It is used to develop insight into the  सच्चा प्रकृति of phenomena ( or वास्तविकता ) और to eradicate  greed , hatred , and delusion .
The Noble Eightfold  पाथ is the चौथी of the बुद्ध 's चार प्रतिष्ठित सच्चाई ; the पहला तत्व of the प्रतिष्ठित eightfold  Path is , in turn , an understanding of the Four Noble Truths .
It is also known  as the मध्य पाथ or मध्य रास्ता  .
सब आठ तत्व of the पाथ शुरू साथ the शब्द `` सही '' , जिससे translates the  word samyañc ( in Sanskrit ) or sammā ( in Pāli ) .
These  denote पूर्णता , एकजुटता , और coherence , और can भी सुझाएँ  the senses of `` perfect '' or `` ideal '' .
'Samma ' is also  अनूदित as `` wholesome '' , `` हिकमत '' और ``  skillful '' .
In Buddhist symbolism , the Noble Eightfold Path is often  represented by अर्थात् of the धर्मं व्हील ( dharmachakra ) , जिनकी आठ तीलियां represent  the eight elements of the path .
The Grammy  पुरस्कार लिये सोंग of the साल is an सम्मान प्रस्तुत at the ग्रैमी पुरस्कार , a रस्म  that was established in 1958 and originally called the Gramophone Awards .
Awards in several categories are distributed annually by the National Academy of Recording Arts  और sciences of the संयुक्त राज्य to `` सम्मान कलाकारी उपलब्धि , तकनीकी proficiency और overall excellence in the रिकॉर्डिंग उद्योग  , without regard to album sales or chart position . ''
अर्थशास्त्र is the सोशल विज्ञान कि analyzes  the production , distribution , and consumption of goods and services .
The term economics comes from the Ancient Greek  ( ' , `` प्रबन्धन of a household , प्रशासन '' ) इससे ( ' , `` हाउस '' ) + ( ' , `` कस्टम  '' or `` law '' ) , hence `` rules of the house ( hold ) '' .
Political economy was the earlier name for the subject , but economists in the late 19th  सदी सुझाया `` अर्थशास्त्र '' as a shorter पद लिये `` आर्थिक विज्ञान '' कि भी avoided a सीमित political-interest connotation और as समान in रूप to `` गणित `` , `` आचार  '' , and so forth .
A focus of the subject is how economic agents  व्यवहार or interact और कैसा economies कार्य  .
Consistent with this , a primary  textbook भेद is between microeconomics और  macroeconomics .
Microeconomics examines the behavior of basic elements  in the अर्थव्यवस्था , सहित व्यक्तिगत एजेंटों ( ऐसे as households और firms or as खरीदार और विक्रेता  ) and markets , and their interactions .
Macroeconomics analyzes the entire  अर्थव्यवस्था और मुद्दे affecting it , सहित बेरोजगारी , महंगाई , आर्थिक विकास , और मौद्रिक और  fiscal policy .
Other broad distinctions include those between positive economics ( describing `` what is '' ) and normative economics ( advocating `` what ought to be '' ) ; between economic theory and applied economics ; between rational and behavioral economics ; and between mainstream economics ( more  `` परंपरागत '' और dealing साथ the `` rationality-individualism-equilibrium नेक्सस '' ) और शास्त अर्थशास्त्र  ( more `` radical '' and dealing with the `` institutions-history-social structure nexus '' ) .
Economic analysis may be applied throughout society , as in business , finance ,  स्वास्थ्य परवाह , और सरकारी , लकिन भी to ऐसे विविध विषय as अपराधों , शिक्षा , the परिवार , विधि , राजनीती , धर्म ,  social institutions , war , and science .
At  the फेरे of the 21st सदी , the expanding डोमेन of अर्थशास्त्र in the सोशल  sciences has been described as economic imperialism .
An  increasing क्रमांक of अर्थशास्त्रियों have पुकारा लिये increased जोर on पर्यावरणीय स्थिरता ; इस क्षेत्रफल of शोध is ज्ञात  as Ecological economics .
This is a list of Schedule IV drugs under  the नियंत्रित substances अधिनियम लिये the संयुक्त राज्य  .
Required findings for  दवाएँ to be लगाई in इस schedule:
The drug or other substance has a low  संभावित लिये गाली सापेक्ष to the दवाएँ or अन्य substances in अनुसूची  III .
The drug or other substance has  a फिलहाल स्वीकृत चिकित्सा उपयोग in उपचार in the संयुक्त  States .
गाली of the ड्रग or अन्य पदार्थ may सीसे to सीमित  physical dependence or psychological dependence relative to the drugs or other substances in schedule III .
The  पूरा सूची of अनुसूची iv दवाएँ हैं as  follows .
The  प्रशासनिक नियंत्रित substances  Code Number for each drug is included .
US county  household मध्य आय  2009 .
Median US  household आय , 2001-2011
Household income is a measure  commonly प्रयुक्त by the संयुक्त राज्य सरकारी  and private institutions .
Each household is  measured by the आय of प्रत्येक निवासी over the आयु  of 15 .
Income includes wages and salaries , unemployment insurance , disability payments , child  support भुगतान प्राप्त , नियमित rental रसीदें , as खूब as कोई निजी कारोबार , निवेश , or अन्य kinds of  income received routinely .
While  inflation-adjusted ( `` रियल '' ) household आय था महरूम increasing लगभग प्रत्येक साल  from 1945 to 1999 , it has since been flat and even decreased recently .
U.S. median  household आय गिरी इससे $ 51,144 in 2010 to  $ 50,502 in 2011 .
Extreme poverty in the United  राज्य , अर्थ households जीना on कम than $ 2 प्रति दिन पहले सरकारी लाभ , doubled इससे 1996 to 1.5 लाख households  in 2011 , including 2.8 million children .
The residents of the household do not have to be related to the head of the  household लिये उनके आय to be माना भाग of the household 's  income .
As households tend to share a similar economic  कॉन्टेक्स्ट , the उपयोग of household आय remains among the सबसे widely स्वीकृत उपायों  of income .
That the size of a household is not commonly taken into account in such  उपायों may विकृत कोई विश्लेषण of fluctuations भीतर or among the household आय श्रेणी , और may रेंडर सीधा comparisons between quintiles मुश्किल  or even impossible .
The lapse rate is defined as the rate of  घटी साथ ऊँचाई लिये an वायुमंडलीय  variable .
The  परिवर्तनीय शामिल is तापमान जबतक  specified otherwise .
The terminology arises from  the शब्द बीतने in the भाव of a घटी  or decline .
While most often applied to Earth 's atmosphere the  अवधारणा can be विस्तारित to कोई gravitationally समर्थित बॉल of  gas .
Blue Mountain State is an American comedy  श्रेणी कि premiered on स्पाइक on जनवरी 11 , 2010  .
The series  निर्माता शामिल क्रिस romano और eric falconer , और it is उत्पादित by lionsgate  Television .
The series is about a  fictional विश्वविद्यालयों , ब्लू पहाड़ राज्य , और इसके फ़ुटबॉल टोली , ``  The Mountain Goats . ''
It portrays certain aspects of American  विश्वविद्यालयों जीवन , सहित फ़ुटबॉल , sex , binge पीने , दवाएँ , जंगली  partying , and hazing .
In February 2012 , it was reported  कि ब्लू पहाड़ राज्य होता नहीं be नवीनीकृत लिये a चौथी ऋतु  .
In March 2013 , Ed Marinaro stated  कि he is working on a ब्लू पहाड़ राज्य फिल्मी  .
Apple Inc. , formerly Apple Computer , Inc. , is an American multinational  निगम headquartered in cupertino , कैलिफ़ोर्निया कि डिजाइन , develops , और बिकता उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स  , computer software and personal computers .
इसके best-known हार्डवेयर उत्पाद हैं the मैक लकीर of कंप्यूटर , the ipod  music player , the iPhone smartphone , and the iPad tablet computer .
Its software includes the OS X and iOS operating systems , the iTunes  मीडिया ब्राउजर , the safari वेब ब्राउजर , और the ilife और iwork रचनात्मकता और उत्पादन suites  .
The company  थी संस्थापित on अप्रैल 1 , 1976 , और incorporated as ठहराना  Computer , Inc. on January 3 , 1977 .
The word `` Computer '' was removed from  इसके नाम on जनवरी 9 , 2007 , reflecting इसके shifted फ़ोकस towards उपभोक्ता इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स बाद  the introduction of the iPhone .
Apple is the world 's  second-largest सूचना प्रौद्योगिकी कम्पनी by आय बाद samsung इलेक्ट्रॉनिक्स , और the संसार  's third-largest mobile phone maker after Samsung and Nokia .
Fortune  पत्रिका नामित ठहराना the सबसे admired कम्पनी in the संयुक्त राज्य  in 2008 , and in the world from 2008 to 2012 .
However , the company has received criticism for its contractors ' labor  practices , और लिये ठहराना 's अपना पर्यावरणीय और कारोबार practices  .
, Apple  maintains 394 खुदरा स्टोर्स in चौदह देशों as  well as the online Apple Store and iTunes Store .
It is the second-largest publicly traded corporation in the world by  मार्केट capitalization , साथ an अनुमानित मान of us $ 414 अरब as of जनवरी 2013  .
, the company  था 72,800 स्थाई full-time कर्मचारी और 3,300 अस्थाई full-time  employees worldwide .
Its worldwide  सालाना आय in 2012 totalled $ 156 अरब  .
खण्ड 8 आवास in  the South Bronx
Section 8 of the Housing Act of 1937 ( ) , often simply known as Section 8 , as repeatedly  amended , authorizes the भुगतान of rental आवास सहायता to निजी जमींदार on निमित्त of लगभग 3.1 लाख  low-income households .
It operates through  अनेक कार्यक्रम , the largest of जिससे , the आवास चुनाव वाउचर कार्यक्रम , pays a विशाल portion of the rents और  utilities of about 2.1 million households .
The US  विभाग of आवास और शहरी विकास  manages the Section 8 programs .
The Housing  चुनाव वाउचर कार्यक्रम provides `` tenant-based '' rental सहायता , so a किरायेदार can  move from one unit of at least minimum housing quality to another .
It also allows individuals to apply their monthly voucher towards the purchase of a home , with over $ 17  अरब going towards ऐसे purchases प्रत्येक साल ( इससे ncsha.org  analysis ) .
The maximum  अनुमत वाउचर is $ 2200 a माह  .
खण्ड 8 भी authorizes a किस्में of `` project-based '' rental सहायता कार्यक्रम , अंतर्गत जिससे the मालिक reserves कुछ or सब of the इकाई in a भवन लिये low-income किरायेदारों , in वापसी लिये a संघीय सरकारी  guarantee to make up the difference between the tenant 's contribution and the rent for 1 cent in the owner 's contract with the government .
A tenant who leaves a subsidized  प्रोजेक्ट होगा खोना अभिगम to the project-based रियायत .
The United States Department of Housing and Urban Development and United States Department of Veterans Affairs have a  खास खण्ड 8 कार्यक्रम पुकारा vash ( दिग्गजों अफेयर्स supportive आवास ) , or hud-vash , जिससे देता आउट a निश्चित क्रमांक of खण्ड 8 वाउचर to योग्य बेघर और वरना  vulnerable US armed forces veterans .
Restaurants  categorized by प्रकार और सूचना परिचय ये अलग  types .
U.S. Federal  आरक्षित टीप in  the mid-1990s
The history of the United  राज्य डालर कवर अधिक than 200  years .
